text: the tucks have a secret , they 're immortal . they
translation: 塔克家族有一个秘密，他们是永生的。
back_translation: The Tucker family has a secret; they are immortal.

text: this could be lizzy 's only chance to start a new life and recreate the family she tragically lost as a child .
translation: 这可能是莉兹唯一的机会去开始新生活，重建她在童年时悲惨失去的家庭。
back_translation: This may be Liz's only chance to start a new life and rebuild the family she tragically lost during her childhood.

text: the book tells of murray , the old scot patriot , who has had his eyes torn out and his house taken away during the english invasion .
translation: 这本书讲述了老苏格兰爱国者穆雷的故事，他在英国侵略期间失去了双眼，家也被拆除。
back_translation: This book tells the story of the old Scottish patriot Murray, who lost his eyesight and had his home destroyed during the British invasion.

text: check your brain and your secret agent decoder ring at the door because you do n't want to think too much about what 's going on . the movie does has some entertainment value - how much depends on how well you like chris rock .
translation: 在门口检查好你的大脑和秘密特工解码戒指，因为你不想太过思考发生了什么。这部电影确实有一些娱乐价值——有多少则取决于你有多喜欢克里斯·洛克。
back_translation: Check your brain and secret agent decoder ring at the door, because you don't want to think too much about what’s happening. This movie does have some entertainment value—how much depends on how much you like Chris Rock.

text: naturally , he returns to his analyst dr . ben sobel ( crystal ) for help and finds that sobel needs some serious help himself as he has inherited the family practice , as well as an excess stock of stress .
translation: 自然，他回到他的分析师本·索贝尔博士（克里斯特尔）那里寻求帮助，发现索贝尔自己也需要一些严重的帮助，因为他继承了家族的业务，以及过度的压力。
back_translation: Naturally, he returned to his analyst, Dr. Ben Sobel (Kristen), for help, only to find that Sobel himself was in need of some serious assistance, as he had inherited the family business and was under excessive stress.

text: still suffering from her hangover , julie does n't realize that ellen is missing when the school bus leaves the cemetery .
translation: 朱莉仍然在为宿醉而苦恼，当学校校车离开墓地时，她没有意识到艾伦失踪了。
back_translation: Julie was still struggling with a hangover, and when the school bus left the cemetery, she didn't realize that Allen was missing.

text: several people are listening to keith 's plight on the radio and are making changes of their own .
translation: 几个人正在收听凯斯的困境，并在做出自己的改变。
back_translation: A few people are listening to Keith's predicament and are making their own changes.

text: a beautifully tooled action thriller about love and terrorism in korea .
translation: 一部精心打磨的动作惊悚片，关于韩国的爱情与恐怖主义。
back_translation: A meticulously crafted action thriller about love and terrorism in Korea.

text: presents a most persuasive vision of hell on earth .
translation: 呈现了一个最具说服力的地狱景象。
back_translation: It presents the most compelling vision of hell.

text: the film 's sharp , often mischievous sense of humor will catch some off guard . . .
translation: 这部电影锐利而常常顽皮的幽默感会让一些人感到惊讶……
back_translation: The movie's sharp and often playful sense of humor may surprise some people...

text: buries an interesting storyline about morality and the choices we make underneath such a mountain of clichM-is and borrowed images that it might more accurately be titled mr . chips off the old block .
translation: 在这样一堆陈词滥调和借用的图像下，埋藏了一个关于道德和我们所做选择的有趣故事情节，以至于它或许更准确地应该被称为“老块头的碎片”。
back_translation: Beneath this heap of clichés and borrowed imagery lies an intriguing storyline about morality and the choices we make, so much so that it might more accurately be referred to as "Fragments of an Old Big Head."

text: like the hugely successful first film , the sequel provides pleasant , engaging if largely disposable entertainment for the general audience .
translation: 与第一部成功的电影一样，续集为大众提供了愉悦、引人入胜但大多可有可无的娱乐。
back_translation: Like the successful first film, the sequel provides the public with enjoyable, engaging but mostly unnecessary entertainment.

text: a sweet , engaging family story about the nature of faith and the power of youthful innocence .
translation: 一个甜蜜而引人入胜的家庭故事，关于信仰的本质和年轻纯真的力量。
back_translation: A sweet and engaging family story about the essence of faith and the power of youthful innocence.

text: real escape , however , may be a goal beyond possibility .
translation: 真正的逃脱，然而，可能是一个超出可能性的目标。
back_translation: True escape, however, may be a goal beyond possibility.

text: the filmmakers skillfully evoke the sense of menace that nature holds for many urban dwellers .
translation: 电影制作人巧妙地唤起了自然对许多城市居民所带来的威胁感。
back_translation: The filmmaker cleverly evokes the sense of threat that nature poses to many city dwellers.

text: unfortunately , he neglects to mention that he is a professional gambler with bad instincts and that the jaguar is borrowed .
translation: 不幸的是，他忘记提到他是一个直觉差的职业赌徒，并且那只美洲虎是借来的。
back_translation: Unfortunately, he forgot to mention that he is a poor intuitive professional gambler and that the jaguar was borrowed.

text: in this racially-charged climate , the lapd 's elite special investigations squad ( sis ) is assigned a high-profile quadruple homicide .
translation: 在这充满种族紧张的气候中，洛杉矶警察局的精英特案调查组（SIS）被指派处理一起引人注目的四重谋杀案。
back_translation: In this climate filled with racial tension, the elite Special Investigation Section (SIS) of the Los Angeles Police Department has been assigned to handle a high-profile quadruple murder case.

text: a remarkable 179-minute meditation on the nature of revolution .
translation: 一段长达179分钟的关于革命本质的非凡沉思。
back_translation: An extraordinary reflection on the essence of revolution lasting 179 minutes.

text: this documentary follows a business partnership between a clan of palestinian fisherman from refugee camps in gaza and israelis from the settlement of dugit , gaza strip .
translation: 这部纪录片讲述了一群来自加沙难民营的巴勒斯坦渔民与来自加沙地带杜吉特定居点的以色列人之间的商业伙伴关系。
back_translation: This documentary tells the story of a group of Palestinian fishermen from Gaza refugee camps and their business partnership with Israelis from the Dugit settlement in the Gaza Strip.

text: this painter 's block has lead to a desperate man obsessed with the need to paint , leaving the artist in a state of disarray .
translation: 这位画家的创作瓶颈使他变得绝望，沉迷于绘画的需要，导致艺术家陷入一种混乱的状态。
back_translation: The creative bottleneck of this artist has made him desperate, and his obsession with the need to paint has led him into a chaotic state.

text: all social structures break down and a new world order emerges from the heart of the desert .
translation: 所有社会结构崩溃，新的世界秩序从沙漠的心脏中出现。
back_translation: All social structures collapse, and a new world order emerges from the heart of the desert.

text: when blake is initiated , he agrees to abide by the three cardinal rules : share your spirit , body and soul with others ; devote your life to saving homeless kids ; and never leave unless the master casts you out .
translation: 当布莱克被接纳时，他同意遵守三个基本规则：与他人分享你的精神、身体和灵魂；将你的生活献给拯救无家可归的孩子；除非主人将你驱逐，否则永远不离开。
back_translation: When Blake was accepted, he agreed to follow three basic rules: share your spirit, body, and soul with others; dedicate your life to saving homeless children; and never leave unless the master drives you away.

text: . . . routine , harmless diversion and little else .
translation: ……例行公事，无害的消遣，仅此而已。
back_translation: ...a routine task, a harmless pastime, that's all there is to it.

text: i suspect this is the kind of production that would have been funnier if the director had released the outtakes theatrically and used the film as a bonus feature on the dvd .
translation: 我怀疑这种制作如果导演将未剪辑片段在影院公映，并将电影作为DVD的奖励特辑，那会更加有趣。
back_translation: I suspect that if the director were to release the unedited footage in theaters and include the film as a bonus feature on the DVD, it would be even more interesting.

text: desert rose is an erotic thriller that takes you through one man 's life experience .
translation: 《沙漠玫瑰》是一部情色惊悚片，讲述了一个男人的生活经历。
back_translation: "Desert Rose" is an erotic thriller that tells the life experience of a man.

text: witt plays a young harvard graduate who also represents grant 's character .
translation: 维特扮演一位年轻的哈佛毕业生，同时也代表格兰特的角色。
back_translation: Vitte plays a young Harvard graduate while also representing Grant's character.

text: blade 's team and the bloodpack are the only line of defense which can prevent the reaper population from wiping out the vampire and human populations .
translation: 刀锋的团队和血盟是唯一可以阻止收割者种群消灭吸血鬼和人类种群的防线。
back_translation: The Blade's team and the Blood Alliance are the only line of defense that can stop the Reaper population from exterminating the vampire and human populations.

text: they intend to bring her back to tel-aviv in order to save her life .
translation: 他们打算把她带回特拉维夫以拯救她的生命。
back_translation: They plan to take her back to Tel Aviv to save her life.

text: when her niece spontaneously dies of fright one week to the day she watched a disturbing video , a cynical journalist ( naomi watts ) travels to the pacific northwest in search of the tape 's origins and its links to a string of suicides at a horse ranch .
translation: 当她的侄女在观看了一段令人不安的视频一周后因惊吓而自发去世时，一位愤世嫉俗的记者（娜奥米·沃茨）前往太平洋西北寻找该录像带的起源以及它与马场一系列自杀事件之间的联系。
back_translation: When her niece spontaneously died from shock a week after watching a disturbing video, a cynical reporter (Naomi Watts) traveled to the Pacific Northwest to investigate the origin of the tape and its connection to a series of suicides at a horse stable.

text: although a number of these laws have been overturned by legislatures or the courts , in the state of texas freedom fighters are still working to eliminate these absurd and unnecessary laws .
translation: 尽管这些法律中的一些已经被立法机构或法院推翻，但在德克萨斯州，自由斗士仍在努力消除这些荒谬且不必要的法律。
back_translation: Although some of these laws have been overturned by legislatures or courts, in Texas, freedom fighters are still working to eliminate these absurd and unnecessary laws.

text: unbeknownst to the contestants , the game 's host has struck a deal with the soldiers hired to guard the money , and does not really have the player 's best interests , or even basic safety , at heart .
translation: 参赛者不知情的是，游戏的主持人与雇来守护奖金的士兵达成了协议，并不是真心关心选手的利益，甚至连基本的安全也不放在心上。
back_translation: What the contestants do not know is that the game host has made a deal with the soldiers hired to guard the prize money, and they do not genuinely care about the contestants' interests, not even their basic safety.

text: the first all-cgi short to be produced by imageworks , sony pictures award-winning character animation and visual effects company , `` the chubbchubbs `` introduces the alien inhabitants of the planet glorf including meeper , its earnest but awkward hero , the singing diva , the zyzaks and the chubbchubbs .
translation: 首部由索尼影业旗下的形象工作室制作的全CGI短片《查布查布斯》介绍了外星人居住的格洛夫星球，包括认真却笨拙的英雄米普、唱歌的女歌手、兹扎克斯以及查布查布斯。
back_translation: The first fully CGI short film "Chab Chabus," produced by Sony Pictures' Imageworks, introduces the alien-inhabited planet Glove, featuring the earnest yet clumsy hero Meep, a singing female artist, Zzakks, and Chab Chabus.

text: but when his feelings for the decidedly unavailable ricki begin to grow , and he actually becomes concerned for brian , tough guy gigli begins to transform into an actual human being . . . which
translation: 但是当他对明显不可得的里基的感情开始增长，并且他真正开始关心布莱恩时，强硬的吉利开始转变为一个真正的人类……这
back_translation: However, when his feelings for the obviously unattainable Ricky began to grow, and he truly started to care for Brian, the tough exterior of Gitty began to transform into that of a real human being...

text: tong is sent back to fetch some things for devlin and unknowingly tries on devlin 's tuxedo and finds that it gives extraordinary powers to anyone that dons the suit .
translation: 汤被送回去为德夫林拿一些东西，并在不知情的情况下试穿了德夫林的晚礼服，发现这件西装赋予任何穿上它的人超凡的力量。
back_translation: Tang was sent back to fetch something for Devlin and unknowingly tried on Devlin's evening dress, discovering that this suit granted extraordinary powers to anyone who wore it.

text: fresh and raw like a blown-out vein , narc takes a walking-dead , cop-flick subgenre and beats new life into it .
translation: 新鲜而原始，如同破裂的血管，《Narc》将行尸走肉的警察电影子类型注入了新的生命。
back_translation: Fresh and raw, like a ruptured blood vessel, "Narc" breathes new life into the zombie-like subgenre of police films.

text: its aims are modest -- to make kids laugh as cuba gooding falls down a lot and to show how thrilling sled dogs are -- and it achieves them .
translation: 它的目标很简单——让孩子们笑，因为古丁经常摔倒，以及展示雪橇犬是多么刺激——并且它实现了这些目标。
back_translation: Its goal is very simple - to make children laugh, because Guding often falls, and to show how exciting sled dogs are - and it achieves these goals.

text: on the surface , the film is played straight , with sustained tension and effective frights . but the director has done his research , and fills every scene with a subversive humor that 's 100 % pure imitation hitchcock .
translation: 从表面上看，这部电影情节紧凑，保持了持续的紧张感和有效的惊吓。然而，导演进行了充分的研究，在每个场景中都注入了一种颠覆性的幽默，这种幽默仿佛是100%纯正的模仿希区柯克。
back_translation: At first glance, this movie has a tight plot that maintains a constant sense of tension and effective scares. However, the director conducted thorough research and infused a subversive humor into each scene, which seems to be 100% pure imitation of Hitchcock.

text: . . . digs beyond the usual portrayals of good kids and bad seeds to reveal a more ambivalent set of characters and motivations .
translation: ... 超越了对好孩子和坏种子的常规描绘，揭示了一组更加复杂的角色和动机。
back_translation: ... transcended the conventional depictions of good children and bad seeds, revealing a set of more complex characters and motivations.

text: if the count of monte cristo does n't transform caviezel into a movie star , then the game is even more rigged than it was two centuries ago .
translation: 如果《基督山伯爵》没有让卡维泽尔变成电影明星，那么这个游戏就比两个世纪前更加不公正。
back_translation: If "The Count of Monte Cristo" did not make Caviezel a movie star, then this game would be even more unjust than it was two centuries ago.

text: an ideal love story for those intolerant of the more common saccharine genre .
translation: 一个理想的爱情故事，适合那些无法忍受更常见的甜腻类型的人。
back_translation: An ideal love story, suitable for those who cannot stand the more common syrupy types.

text: outside of burger 's desire to make some kind of film , it 's really unclear why this project was undertaken
translation: 除了汉堡希望制作某种电影之外，这个项目的发起原因实际上并不明确。
back_translation: Apart from the hope of creating a certain movie with Hamburg, the actual reasons for initiating this project are not clear.

text: at the same time other changes in sumo are being prompted by its growing popularity in the west , where its adherents are lobbying for sumo 's inclusion in the olympic games even as other promoters are arranging amateur sumo tournaments in venues like las vegas casinos - tournaments that not surprisingly bear little resemblance to the sport 's japanese forebear .
translation: 与此同时，随着相扑在西方日益受欢迎，其他变化也正在发生，其追随者正游说将相扑纳入奥运会，同时其他推广者正在拉斯维加斯的赌场等场地安排业余相扑比赛——这些比赛与日本的传统相扑几乎没有相似之处。
back_translation: At the same time, as sumo becomes increasingly popular in the West, other changes are also taking place. Its followers are lobbying to include sumo in the Olympics, while other promoters are arranging amateur sumo matches in venues such as casinos in Las Vegas—these matches bear little resemblance to traditional Japanese sumo.

text: 14-year-old meredith attempts to maintain a religious vow of silence during a thanksgiving dinner with her agnostic family .
translation: 14岁的梅雷迪思在与她的无神论家庭共进感恩节晚餐时，努力保持宗教沉默的誓言。
back_translation: 14-year-old Meredith strives to keep her vow of religious silence during Thanksgiving dinner with her atheist family.

text: docu-drama based on the life of ted bundy , a serial killer who killed at least 19 young women during the 1970 's ( though some sources say as many as 30 to 35 were murdered ) .
translation: 根据特德·万迪的生活创作的纪录剧，特德·万迪是一名连环杀手，在20世纪70年代杀害了至少19名年轻女性（尽管一些来源说杀害的数量可能多达30至35人）。
back_translation: The documentary drama based on the life of Ted Bundy depicts him as a serial killer who murdered at least 19 young women in the 1970s (though some sources suggest the number of victims could be as high as 30 to 35).

text: i wish windtalkers had had more faith in the dramatic potential of this true story . this would have been better than the fiction it has concocted , and there still could have been room for the war scenes .
translation: 我希望《风语者》能更相信这个真实故事的戏剧潜力。这将比它编造的虚构故事更好，而且仍然可以有战争场景的空间。
back_translation: I hope "Windtalkers" can believe more in the dramatic potential of this true story. It would be better than its fabricated fictional narrative, and there can still be space for war scenes.

text: in a world where loyalties are easily abandoned and allegiances bought , six perfect strangers come together to pull off the perfect crime .
translation: 在一个忠诚轻易被放弃、 allegiance可以被购买的世界里，六个完美的陌生人聚在一起，策划了一场完美的犯罪。
back_translation: In a world where loyalty is easily abandoned and allegiance can be bought, six perfect strangers come together to plan the perfect crime.

text: fast-paced and wonderfully edited , the film is extremely thorough .
translation: 节奏快速且剪辑精妙，这部电影极为详尽。
back_translation: The rhythm is fast and the editing is exquisite; this film is extremely detailed.

text: while its careful pace and seemingly opaque story may not satisfy every moviegoer 's appetite , the film 's final scene is soaringly , transparently moving .
translation: 尽管其缓慢的节奏和似乎模糊的故事可能无法满足每位观众的胃口，但影片的最后一幕却激荡人心、令人感动。
back_translation: Although its slow pace and seemingly vague story may not satisfy every viewer's palate, the final scene of the film is inspiring and touching.

text: one-sided documentary offers simplistic explanations to a very complex situation . . . . stylistically , the movie is a disaster .
translation: 单方面的纪录片对非常复杂的情况提供了简单的解释……在风格上，这部电影是一场灾难。
back_translation: The one-sided documentary provides a simplistic explanation for a very complex situation... In terms of style, the film is a disaster.

text: food for love endeavors and largely succeeds in lending equal weight to the emotional turmoil of its older and younger characters .
translation: 《为爱而生》在很大程度上成功地平衡了老年和年轻角色的情感动荡。
back_translation: "Living for Love" successfully balances the emotional turmoil of both old and young characters to a great extent.

text: should n't have been allowed to use the word `` new `` in its title , because there 's not an original character , siuation or joke in the entire movie .
translation: 不应该被允许在标题中使用“新”这个词，因为整部电影中没有一个原创的角色、情节或笑话。
back_translation: The word "new" should not be allowed in the title because there is not a single original character, plot, or joke in the entire movie.

text: they both get close to tun , a lonely youth with an unspecified illness .
translation: 他们都靠近君，一个有着不明疾病的孤独青年。
back_translation: They all gathered around Jun, a lonely young man with an unknown illness.

text: 18-year old dean is handsome and bright , but feels hampered by his working-class background and by his family .
translation: 18岁的迪恩英俊而聪明，但感到受到工薪阶层背景和家庭的限制。
back_translation: Eighteen-year-old Dean is handsome and smart, but feels constrained by his working-class background and family.

text: the movie details the experiences of 'peter pan ' author j . m . barrie , which lead him to write the children 's classic .
translation: 这部电影详细讲述了《彼得潘》作者j.m.巴里经历，为他创作这部儿童经典奠定了基础。
back_translation: This film details the experiences of J.M. Barrie, the author of "Peter Pan," which laid the foundation for him to create this children's classic.

text: the movie occasionally threatens to become didactic , but it 's too grounded in the reality of its characters to go over the edge . a touch of humor or an unexpected plot twist always pulls it back .
translation: 这部电影偶尔会威胁到变得说教，但是它太扎根于角色的现实之中，无法走向极端。一丝幽默或出乎意料的情节转折总能将其拉回。
back_translation: This movie occasionally threatens to become preachy, but it is too rooted in the reality of the characters to go too far. A touch of humor or an unexpected plot twist always manages to bring it back.

text: as a result of this unfortunate circumstance , ella can not refuse any command , and is often left at the mercy of unscrupulous personalities .
translation: 由于这一不幸的情况，埃拉无法拒绝任何命令，经常任由一些不道德的人物摆布。
back_translation: Due to this unfortunate situation, Ella is unable to refuse any orders and often lets some unethical individuals manipulate her.

text: rice is too pedestrian a filmmaker to bring any edge or personality to the rising place that would set it apart from other deep south stories .
translation: 赖斯作为一名电影制作人显得过于平凡，无法为这个崛起的地方带来任何独特的风格或个性，使其与其他深南故事区别开来。
back_translation: Rice, as a filmmaker, appears too ordinary to bring any unique style or personality to this rising place, distinguishing it from other deep South stories.

text: the film would work much better as a video installation in a museum , where viewers would be free to leave . immediately .
translation: 这部电影作为博物馆里的视频装置会更有效，观众可以立即自由离开。
back_translation: This film would be more effective as a video installation in a museum, where viewers can leave freely at any time.

text: set in hounslow , west london and hamburg , the film follows two 18 year olds with their hearts set on a future in professional soccer .
translation: 故事发生在伦敦西部的霍恩斯洛和汉堡，影片讲述了两个18岁的年轻人，他们心中怀揣着成为职业足球运动员的未来梦想。
back_translation: The story takes place in Hounslow, West London, and Hamburg, and it tells the tale of two 18-year-old young men who harbor dreams of becoming professional football players.

text: a mess when it comes to the characters and writing . . . but works its way underneath the skin like few movies have in recent memory .
translation: 在角色和写作方面有些混乱……但它却像最近少数电影一样深入人心。
back_translation: There is some confusion in the roles and writing... but it resonates deeply like only a few recent films do.

text: [ green is ] the comedy equivalent of saddam hussein , and i 'm just about ready to go to the u . n . and ask permission for a preemptive strike .
translation: [绿是]喜剧界的萨达姆·侯赛因，我快要去联合国申请进行先发制人的攻击。
back_translation: "[Green is] the Saddam Hussein of the comedy world, and I am about to go to the United Nations to request a preemptive strike."

text: suddenly , a young boy starts to become ill and starts to suffer from the same syndromes that regan from the fist movie suffered .
translation: 突然，一个年轻男孩开始生病，出现与第一部电影中的雷根相同的症状。
back_translation: Suddenly, a young boy falls ill, exhibiting the same symptoms as Regan in the first movie.

text: the film , a follow-up to `` jack the dog `` , is described as a black comedy about a reformed womanizer ( nestor carbonell ) who struggles to keep his family together .
translation: 这部电影是《杰克狗》的续集，被描述为一部关于一个改过自新的花花公子（尼斯特·卡本内尔）努力让家庭团结在一起的黑色幽默剧。
back_translation: This movie is a sequel to "Jack Dog," described as a dark comedy about a reformed playboy (Nister Cabernel) trying to bring his family together.

text: will he become a grandfather , surrounded by the love and support of a family or will he retreat into his world of memories and lost opportunities ?
translation: 他会成为一个祖父，受到家庭的爱与支持，还是会退回到他充满回忆和失去机会的世界里？
back_translation: Will he become a grandfather, surrounded by the love and support of family, or will he retreat back into his world filled with memories and lost opportunities?

text: paco , a rapper and performer , indifferent to all except her career , dreams of hitting the top ten chart .
translation: 帕科，一个说唱歌手和表演者，对除了她的职业之外的所有事都漠不关心，梦想登上前十名排行榜。
back_translation: Paco, a rapper and performer, is indifferent to everything except for her career, dreaming of breaking into the top ten charts.

text: canada 's arctic light shines bright on this frozen tundra soap opera that breathes extraordinary life into the private existence of the inuit people .
translation: 加拿大的北极光在这片冰冻的苔原肥皂剧中闪耀，赋予因纽特人私密生活以非凡的生命。
back_translation: The northern lights in Canada shine in this frozen tundra soap opera, giving extraordinary life to the private lives of the Inuit.

text: first-time writer-director serry shows a remarkable gift for storytelling with this moving , effective little film .
translation: 首次执导的塞里展示了她在叙事方面的非凡才能，这部感人而有效的小电影让人印象深刻。
back_translation: In her directorial debut, Sery showcased her extraordinary talent for storytelling, and this moving and impactful short film left a deep impression.

text: down and out rock star dewey finn ( black ) gets fired from his band , and he faces a mountain of debts and depression .
translation: 落魄的摇滚明星杜威·芬（黑人）被乐队解雇，他面临着巨额债务和抑郁。
back_translation: Down-and-out rock star Dewey Finn (a Black man) is fired from his band and faces huge debts and depression.

text: despite the sympathetic overtures , rachel is convinced things are n't what they seem and suspects her baby has been abducted .
translation: 尽管有同情的姿态，瑞秋确信事情并不像表面看起来那样，并怀疑她的宝宝被绑架了。
back_translation: Despite the sympathetic gestures, Rachel was convinced that things were not as they seemed and suspected that her baby had been kidnapped.

text: hoffman spends a good deal of screen time alone and without much dialogue , using only his considerable physical skill and screen presence to pull off the role .
translation: 霍夫曼在屏幕上花了很多时间独处，几乎没有对话，仅凭他出色的身体技能和荧幕魅力来完成这个角色。
back_translation: Hoffman spent a lot of time alone on screen, with almost no dialogue, relying solely on his outstanding physical skills and on-screen charisma to fulfill the role.

text: michell , after some sleuthing around , narrows down the suspects to a woman not his wife , another well known victorian poet .
translation: 米歇尔经过一番调查，将嫌疑人缩小到一位并非他的妻子的女性，另一位著名的维多利亚诗人。
back_translation: After some investigation, Michelle narrowed down the suspect to a woman who was not his wife, another famous Victorian poet.

text: la cinta comienza intentando ser un drama , rM-apidamente se transforma en una comedia y termina por ser una parodia absolutamente predecible
translation: 这部影片开始时试图成为一部戏剧，迅速转变为喜剧，最后则变成了完全可以预见的恶搞。
back_translation: The film starts off trying to be a drama, quickly shifts to comedy, and ultimately turns into a completely predictable spoof.

text: it may not be `` last tango in paris `` but . . .
translation: 它可能不是“巴黎最后的探戈”，但是……
back_translation: It may not be "Last Tango in Paris," but...

text: it may not be history M-^V but then again , what if it is ? M-^V but it makes for one of the most purely enjoyable and satisfying evenings at the movies i 've had in a while .
translation: 这可能不是历史，但如果真的是呢？无论如何，这确实是我最近在电影院度过的最愉快和满足的夜晚之一。
back_translation: This may not be history, but what if it is? In any case, it truly was one of the most enjoyable and fulfilling nights I've spent in the cinema recently.

text: director nolan shows here he can handle clever material with a flair .
translation: 诺兰导演在这里展示了他能出色地处理巧妙的素材。
back_translation: Director Nolan showcases his ability to handle clever material exceptionally well here.

text: he discovers that his daughter 's life , unknown to him from an affair with a brazilian woman 15 years earlier , is in danger and must return to rio ; having only five days to finish the deal and find his daughter .
translation: 他发现他的女儿——15年前与一位巴西女性的 affair 所生——的生命处于危险之中，必须返回里约；他只有五天时间来完成交易并找到女儿。
back_translation: He discovers that his daughter—born from an affair with a Brazilian woman 15 years ago—is in danger, and he must return to Rio; he has only five days to finalize the deal and find his daughter.

text: not everything in the film works , including its somewhat convenient ending .
translation: 影片中的一些情节并不是全部都有效，包括它有些方便的结局。
back_translation: Some plot points in the film are not entirely effective, including its somewhat convenient ending.

text: only those most addicted to film violence in all its forms will find anything here to appreciate .
translation: 只有那些对各种形式的电影暴力上瘾的人，才会在这里找到值得欣赏的东西。
back_translation: Only those addicted to various forms of cinematic violence will find something worth appreciating here.

text: when detective ben simm 's wife is killed , he has to learn to be both father and mother to his little girl while searching for a vigilante that has his own sense of justice .
translation: 当侦探本·西姆的妻子被杀时，他必须在寻找一个有自己正义观的义警的同时，学会同时扮演父亲和母亲的角色，照顾他的小女儿。
back_translation: When Detective Ben Sim's wife is murdered, he must learn to play the roles of both father and mother while searching for a vigilante with his own sense of justice, taking care of his young daughter.

text: marco and melanie , a young married couple , are living a life of passion , with chaotic situations , and all the little frustrations of daily life .
translation: 马尔科和梅拉尼是一对年轻的夫妇，他们过着充满激情的生活，生活中充满混乱的情况和日常生活中的小烦恼。
back_translation: Marco and Melani are a young couple who live a passionate life, filled with chaotic situations and minor annoyances in their daily life.

text: what really surprises about wisegirls is its low-key quality and genuine tenderness .
translation: 让人惊讶的是，聪明女孩的低调品质和真诚的温柔。
back_translation: What is surprising is the understated qualities and sincere gentleness of clever girls.

text: the husband meets a man who knows what to do with his sexuality .
translation: 丈夫遇到一个知道如何处理自己性取向的男人。
back_translation: The husband encounters a man who knows how to handle his own sexual orientation.

text: ira member bobby sands is imprisoned in northern ireland .
translation: 爱尔兰共和军成员鲍比·桑兹被监禁在北爱尔兰。
back_translation: Bobby Sands, a member of the Irish Republican Army, was imprisoned in Northern Ireland.

text: in a season of strenuously ambitious art , the laid-back modesty and accessible charm of evelyn is a welcome relief .
translation: 在一个艺术极富雄心壮志的季节，伊夫琳的悠然自得和易于亲近的魅力令人倍感宽慰。
back_translation: In a season rich in artistic ambition, Evelyn's calm demeanor and approachable charm are particularly comforting.

text: does anyone much think the central story of brendan behan is that he was a bisexual sweetheart before he took to drink ?
translation: 有人认为布伦丹·比汉的中心故事是，在他开始酗酒之前，他是一个双性恋的甜心吗？
back_translation: Some people believe that the central story of Brendan Bihan is that he was a bisexual sweetheart before he started drinking heavily?

text: it is zuckerman who stumbles upon silk 's secret and sets out to reconstruct the unknown biography of this eminent , upright man , esteemed as an educator for nearly all his life , and to understand how this ingeniously contrived life came unraveled .
translation: 是祖克曼偶然发现了丝克的秘密，并着手重建这位显赫的、正直的人物的未知传记，他几乎一生都被视为教育者，并试图理解这段巧妙设计的生活是如何解体的。
back_translation: It was Zuckerman who accidentally discovered Suke's secret and set out to reconstruct the unknown biography of this prominent and upright figure, who was regarded as an educator for most of his life, while trying to understand how this intricately designed life disintegrated.

text: the animation is competent , and some of the gags are quite funny , but jonah . . . never shakes the oppressive , morally superior good-for-you quality that almost automatically accompanies didactic entertainment .
translation: 这部动画制作精良，某些笑话也挺有趣，但乔纳……始终无法摆脱几乎自动伴随教化娱乐的压抑和道德优越感。
back_translation: This animated film is well-made, and some jokes are quite interesting, but Jonah... is still unable to escape the oppression and moral superiority that almost automatically accompany edutainment.

text: discouraged , and on the point of giving up writing , yun fei meets a young girl who ca n't see colours , who encourages him to persevere .
translation: 在感到沮丧，几乎要放弃写作的时候，云飞遇到了一位看不见颜色的小女孩，她鼓励他坚持下去。
back_translation: When feeling frustrated and almost ready to give up writing, Yunfei met a colorless little girl who encouraged him to persevere.

text: while in jail they usually have fights with the security guard , a overweight lunatic .
translation: 在监狱里，他们通常会与一位超重的疯子保安打架。
back_translation: In prison, they usually have fights with an overweight crazy security guard.

text: tommy , who is now a well known activist , has his credibility destroyed by the book which causes their breakup .
translation: 汤米现在是一位知名的 activist，但那本书毁掉了他的信誉，导致了他们的分手。
back_translation: Tommy is now a well-known activist, but that book ruined his reputation, leading to their breakup.

text: a composition of gestures stripped of romance and presented in their barest forms .
translation: 一组剥离浪漫的手势，以其最基本的形式呈现。
back_translation: A set of gestures that strip away romance, presented in their most basic form.

text: rowan plays the eponymous lead character in a spoof spy thriller .
translation: 罗温在一部恶搞间谍惊悚片中饰演同名主角。
back_translation: Rowan plays the titular character in a spoof spy thriller.

text: it all comes down to whether you can tolerate leon barlow . i ca n't .
translation: 这一切归结于你能否容忍里昂·巴洛。我不能。
back_translation: It all comes down to whether you can tolerate Leon Barrow. I can't.

text: now , in present day , washed-up child actor julian ( luke eberl ) , the free-spirited hannah ( colombe jacobsen ) , and former teacher grace ( jenny mollen ) , along with a documentary film crew , go on a search for this man , who may be the embodiment of all evil .
translation: 现在，身为已过气童星的朱利安（卢克·埃伯尔）、自由奔放的汉娜（科隆比·雅各布森）和前教师格雷斯（詹妮·莫伦），以及一支纪录片摄制组，一起寻找这个人，他可能是万恶的化身。
back_translation: Now, former child star Julian (Luke Eberle), free-spirited Hannah (Columbi Jacobson), and former teacher Grace (Jenny Morren), along with a documentary film crew, are searching for a person who may embody evil itself.

text: the filmmakers expose this delightfully deranged cult by capturing the daily lives of its members .
translation: 电影制片人通过捕捉成员的日常生活揭露了这个令人愉悦的疯狂邪教。
back_translation: The filmmaker reveals this delightful crazy cult by capturing the daily lives of its members.

text: it 's like a vintage automobile that sometimes runs smoothly , and sometimes lurches and sputters . but it never quite stalls .
translation: 这就像一辆古董汽车，有时运行顺畅，有时却颤抖和 sputters，但它从未完全熄火。
back_translation: It's like an antique car, sometimes running smoothly, sometimes shaking and sputtering, but it never completely stalls.

text: it is a story about love , passion , addiction , brillance and the ignorance of greed .
translation: 这是一个关于爱情、激情、上瘾、才华和贪婪无知的故事。
back_translation: This is a story about love, passion, addiction, talent, and greedy ignorance.

text: sunshine state is a fine example of a carefully written film . but you should n't be too aware that a movie is well-written .
translation: 阳光之州是一个精心制作电影的好例子。但你不应该过于注意一部电影写得有多好。
back_translation: The Sunshine State is a great example of a well-crafted film. However, you shouldn't pay too much attention to how well a movie is written.

text: moved in his heart with the urgency to reach out for christ , he gets an idea to try and reach the masses in his city for jesus .
translation: 他心中充满紧迫感，希望向基督伸出手，他想到了一个点子，试图在他的城市为耶稣接触大众。
back_translation: He was filled with a sense of urgency, hoping to reach out to Christ. He thought of an idea to connect Jesus with the public in his city.

text: testing his theories with a time machine of his own invention , hartdegen is hurtled 800 , 000 years into the future , where he discovers that mankind has divided into the hunter - and the hunted .
translation: 哈特迪根利用自己发明的时光机器测试他的理论，被抛掷到800,000年后的未来，在那里他发现人类已分为猎人和被猎者。
back_translation: Hartdigan tests his theory using his invented time machine, getting thrown into the future 800,000 years later, where he discovers that humanity has split into hunters and hunted.

text: a compelling , moving film that respects its audience and its source material .
translation: 一部引人入胜、感人至深的电影，尊重其观众和源材料。
back_translation: A captivating and heartfelt movie that respects its audience and source material.

text: we 're all out there looking for true love-a very elusive thing indeed , and chance is no exception .
translation: 我们都在寻找真爱——一种非常难以捉摸的东西，而机遇也不例外。
back_translation: We are all searching for true love—a very elusive thing, and opportunity is no exception.

text: they go over less well with tom donnerel , a young farmer and carrie 's fianc & # 233 ; .
translation: 他们在年轻农夫汤姆·多内雷尔和凯莉的未婚夫面前表现得不那么好。
back_translation: They didn't behave very well in front of young farmer Tom Donnelly and Kelly's fiancé.

text: postponing his desire to play basketball on the school team , steve finds an after-school job to support himself and pursues a relationship with the affluent but unhappy sally ( arielle paul ) .
translation: 推迟了他在校队打篮球的愿望后，史蒂夫找了一份课外工作来支持自己，并与富裕但不快乐的莎莉（阿里尔·保罗）展开了一段关系。
back_translation: After postponing his wish to play basketball for the school team, Steve found a part-time job to support himself and started a relationship with the wealthy but unhappy Sally (Ariel Paul).

text: before his very eyes on the store tv monitor , he sees his pick come up as the winning numbers for $ 50-million !
translation: 在商店的电视监视器上，他亲眼看到自己选的号码成为5000万美元的中奖号码！
back_translation: He personally saw on the store's TV monitor that the numbers he chose became the winning numbers for 50 million dollars!

text: like shrek , spirit 's visual imagination reminds you of why animation is such a perfect medium for children , because of the way it allows the mind to enter and accept another world .
translation: 像《怪物史莱克》，《灵魂》的视觉想象让你想起动画为何是儿童如此完美的媒介，因为它能够让心灵进入并接受另一个世界。
back_translation: Like "Shrek" and "Soul," the visual imagination makes you think about why animation is such a perfect medium for children, as it allows the mind to enter and embrace another world.

text: got a david lynch jones ? then you 'd do well to check this one out because it 's straight up twin peaks action . . .
translation: 你有大卫·林奇的风格吗？那么你最好去看看这个，因为它简直就是《双峰》式的剧情……
back_translation: Do you have a style like David Lynch? Then you'd better check this out, because it’s practically a Twin Peaks-style plot...

text: this was also a time , in the midst of a chaotic , decaying environment , when a man tried to cope with the loss of his former lover .
translation: 这也是一个时期，在一个混乱、衰败的环境中，一个人试图应对失去他昔日爱人的痛苦。
back_translation: This is also a period in which a person tries to cope with the pain of losing his former lover in a chaotic and decadent environment.

text: outside a storm rages and when the power goes out , darkness envelops the house .
translation: 外面风暴肆虐，当停电时，黑暗笼罩着整个房子。
back_translation: A storm raged outside, and when the power went out, darkness enveloped the entire house.

text: his father and brother are dead for so many years .
translation: 他的父亲和兄弟已经去世很多年了。
back_translation: His father and brother have passed away many years ago.

text: that same day , gunmen take over the high school - using it to hide $ 300 million worth of cocaine they 've hijacked .
translation: 同一天，枪手占领了高中，利用它藏匿他们抢劫来的价值3亿美元的可卡因。
back_translation: On the same day, the gunmen took over a high school, using it to hide $300 million worth of cocaine they had stolen.

text: it 's always disappointing when a documentary fails to live up to -- or offer any new insight into -- its chosen topic . unfortunately , that 's precisely what arthur dong 's family fundamentals does .
translation: 当一部纪录片未能达到或提供对其所选主题任何新见解时，总是令人失望。不幸的是，亚瑟·董的《家庭基础》正是如此。
back_translation: It is always disappointing when a documentary fails to provide any new insights into its chosen subject. Unfortunately, Arthur Dong's "Family Fundamentals" is just that.

text: no wonder they 're talking about `` talk to her . `` it 's astonishing .
translation: 难怪他们在谈论“和她交谈”。这令人惊讶。
back_translation: No wonder they are talking about "talking to her." It's surprising.

text: jason loses an important story assignment entitled 'big fat liar ' in movie producer marty wolf 's ( paul giamatti ) limo , which wolf then turns into a film .
translation: 杰森在电影制片人马蒂·沃尔夫（保罗·吉亚玛提）的豪华轿车里丢失了一个重要的故事任务，标题为《大胖子骗子》，沃尔夫随后将其改编成了电影。
back_translation: Jason lost an important story assignment titled "The Big Fat Liar" in the luxury car of movie producer Marty Wolf (Paul Giamatti), who later adapted it into a film.

text: her young son dies , her marriage to max is ruined , and her lover is in fact dangerous in his jealousy and mad rage , but no matter what the consequences - his subversive spirit lives inside her , forms her , obsesses her .
translation: 她年幼的儿子去世，她与马克斯的婚姻破裂，她的情人因嫉妒和疯狂的愤怒而确实危险，但无论后果如何——他的颠覆性灵魂在她内心生存，塑造着她，令她着迷。
back_translation: Her young son passed away, her marriage to Max fell apart, and her lover was indeed dangerous due to jealousy and mad rage, but regardless of the consequences—his disruptive spirit lived within her, shaping her and enchanting her.

text: a marvellous journey from childhood idealism to adolescent self-absorption .
translation: 从童年的理想主义到青春期的自我沉迷的奇妙旅程。
back_translation: A wonderful journey from childhood idealism to adolescent self-obsession.

text: the future is on it 's way to atlantic city on a bus .
translation: 未来正在乘坐公交车前往大西洋城。
back_translation: The future is on a bus heading to Atlantic City.

text: impostor has a handful of thrilling moments and a couple of good performances , but the movie does n't quite fly . for starters , the story is just too slim .
translation: 《冒名顶替者》有一些令人激动的时刻和几场不错的表演，但这部电影并没有真正起飞。首先，故事实在是太单薄了。
back_translation: "The Impostor" has some thrilling moments and a few good performances, but the film never really takes off. Firstly, the story is simply too thin.

text: the campy results make mel brooks ' borscht belt schtick look sophisticated .
translation: 这些滑稽的结果让梅尔·布鲁克斯的“红菜头带”的滑稽表演显得格外文雅。
back_translation: These absurd results make Mel Brooks' "The Twelve Chairs" comedic performance seem particularly elegant.

text: the quality of schwentke 's visuals . . . provides ample compensation .
translation: 施温特克的视觉质量……提供了充足的补偿。
back_translation: The visual quality of the Shiventek... provides ample compensation.

text: the scorpion king is more fun than conan the barbarian .
translation: 《蝎子王》比《野蛮人柯南》更有趣。
back_translation: "The Scorpion King" is more interesting than "Conan the Barbarian."

text: the best part about `` gangs `` was daniel day-lewis .
translation: 《黑帮》的最佳部分是丹尼尔·戴-刘易斯。
back_translation: The best part of "The Gangster" is Daniel Day-Lewis.

text: a witty screen adaptation of this classic comedy of manners with its generous supply of snappy one-liners .
translation: 一部机智的银幕改编版，基于这部经典的礼仪喜剧，充满了活泼的妙语连珠。
back_translation: A witty screen adaptation based on this classic comedy of manners, filled with lively and clever dialogue.

text: it is a study of dark forces lurking in the lives of teenagers today .
translation: 这是对当今青少年生活中潜藏的黑暗力量的研究。
back_translation: This is a study of the dark forces lurking in the lives of today's youth.

text: some actors have so much charisma that you 'd be happy to listen to them reading the phone book . hugh grant and sandra bullock are two such likeable actors .
translation: 有些演员有着如此强烈的魅力，让你愿意听他们朗读电话簿。休·格兰特和桑德拉·布洛克就是两位如此受欢迎的演员。
back_translation: Some actors have such a strong charm that you would be willing to listen to them read the phone book. Hugh Grant and Sandra Bullock are two such popular actors.

text: think 'glengarry glen ross ' without the mamet dialogue , and that 's kinda what you 'll get here .
translation: 想象一下《格伦加里·格伦·罗斯》，去掉马梅特的对话，这大概就是你在这里得到的。
back_translation: Imagine "Glengarry Glen Ross" without Mamet's dialogue, this is probably what you get here.

text: even accepting this in the right frame of mind can only provide it with so much leniency .
translation: 即使以正确的心态接受这一点也只能给它带来有限的宽容。
back_translation: Even accepting this with the right mindset can only bring limited tolerance to it.

text: gives you the steady pulse of life in a beautiful city viewed through the eyes of a character who , in spite of tragic loss and increasing decrepitude , knows in his bones that he is one of the luckiest men alive .
translation: 通过一个角色的眼睛，展现了在美丽城市中生活的稳定脉动，尽管经历了悲惨的损失和日益的衰弱，但他在骨子里知道自己是活得最幸运的人之一。
back_translation: Through the eyes of a character, it showcases the steady pulse of life in a beautiful city. Despite experiencing tragic losses and increasing frailty, he deep down knows that he is one of the luckiest people alive.

text: no one knows this better than 35-year-old vince , back in his hometown of van wert , ohio , after a 13-year absence .
translation: 没有人比35岁的文斯更了解这一点，他在离开故乡俄亥俄州瓦恩韦特13年后回到了家。
back_translation: No one understands this better than 35-year-old Vince, who returned home 13 years after leaving his hometown of Warren, Ohio.

text: increasing evidence about one man 's role in a long history of human rights abuses leads to a critical examination of american diplomacy through the lens of international standards of justice .
translation: 关于一个人在漫长的人权 abuses 历史中所扮演角色的日益证据，引发了通过国际正义标准的视角对美国外交的批判性审视。
back_translation: The increasing evidence of a person's role in the long history of human rights abuses has sparked a critical examination of U.S. foreign policy through the lens of international justice standards.

text: what saves it . . . and makes it one of the better video-game-based flicks , is that the film acknowledges upfront that the plot makes no sense , such that the lack of linearity is the point of emotional and moral departure for protagonist alice .
translation: 拯救它的原因……并使它成为更好的游戏改编电影之一，是因为这部电影提前承认剧情毫无意义，因此缺乏连贯性成为主角爱丽丝情感和道德的出发点。
back_translation: The reason for saving it... and making it one of the better video game adaptations is that this film acknowledges in advance that the plot is meaningless, thus the lack of coherence becomes the starting point for the protagonist Alice's emotions and morals.

text: the camera soars above the globe in dazzling panoramic shots that make the most of the large-screen format , before swooping down on a string of exotic locales , scooping the whole world up in a joyous communal festival of rhythm .
translation: 镜头在壮观的全景镜头中飞跃全球，充分利用大屏幕格式，然后俯冲到一系列异国情调的地方，将整个世界汇聚在一个欢乐的节奏共同庆典中。
back_translation: The camera flies over the world in magnificent panoramic shots, making full use of the large-screen format, then swoops down to a series of exotic locations, bringing the entire world together in a joyful rhythm of celebration.

text: this masterfully calibrated psychological thriller thrives on its taut performances and creepy atmosphere even if the screenplay falls somewhat short .
translation: 这部精心调校的心理惊悚片凭借紧凑的表演和阴森的氛围而蓬勃发展，即使剧本略显不足。
back_translation: This meticulously calibrated psychological thriller thrives on its tight performances and eerie atmosphere, even if the script is somewhat lacking.

text: unlike most reunion stories that climax with a clich & # 233 ; happy ending , daughter from danang is a real-life drama .
translation: 与大多数以陈词滥调的快乐结局高潮的重聚故事不同，《来自岘港的女儿》是真实生活中的戏剧。
back_translation: Unlike most reunion stories that culminate in clichéd happy endings, "Daughter from Da Nang" is a drama grounded in real life.

text: the military team must shut down the computer and get out , fighting their way past zombies , mutants , and the computer itself , before the virus escapes and infects the rest of the world .
translation: 军事团队必须关闭计算机并撤离，奋力闯过僵尸、变异体和计算机本身， before the virus escapes and infects the rest of the world .
back_translation: The military team must shut down the computers and evacuate, fighting their way through zombies, mutants, and the computers themselves, before the virus escapes and infects the rest of the world.

text: gondry 's direction is adequate . . . but what gives human nature its unique feel is kaufman 's script .
translation: 贡德里的导演水平尚可……但赋予人性独特感的是考夫曼的剧本。
back_translation: Gondry's directing skills are decent... but it is Kaufman's script that gives a unique sense of humanity.

text: in fact , sean has made the mistake of lending eddie $ 25 , 000 to cover his profligate spending .
translation: 事实上，肖恩犯了一个错误，借给埃迪 25,000 美元来支付他挥霍无度的开支。
back_translation: In fact, Sean made a mistake by lending Eddie $25,000 to cover his extravagant expenses.

text: she 's willing to put him through just about anything to `` cure `` him of t . s . , with pills , counseling , electro-shock therapy , etc . mom 's also concerned about finn 's future - who will care for him ?
translation: 她愿意让他经历几乎所有的事情以“治疗”他的t.s.，包括药物、咨询、电击治疗等等。妈妈还担心芬的未来 - 谁会照顾他呢？
back_translation: She is willing to let him go through almost everything to "treat" his t.s., including medication, counseling, electroshock therapy, and so on. The mother is also worried about Fen's future - who will take care of him?

text: a superb southern gothic slice of horror that is easily the sickest movie to arrive in theaters in a very long time . and i mean that in the nicest way possible .
translation: 一部出色的南方哥特式恐怖片，毫无疑问是很长一段时间以来最让人毛骨悚然的电影，我的意思是以最友好的方式来说。
back_translation: An outstanding Southern Gothic horror film, without a doubt one of the creepiest movies in a long time, and I mean that in the most friendly way.

text: when your leading ladies are a couple of screen-eating dominatrixes like goldie hawn and susan sarandon at their raunchy best , even hokum goes down easily .
translation: 当你的女主角是几位在银幕上颇具魅力的女强人，比如黄金汉（Goldie Hawn）和苏珊·萨兰登（Susan Sarandon），她们在最放荡的状态下，甚至连简单的情节也能轻松上演。
back_translation: When your leading ladies are several charismatic female powerhouses on screen, such as Goldie Hawn and Susan Sarandon, they can effortlessly bring even the simplest plot to life in their most uninhibited states.

text: while enders is initially frustrated with his assignment , his respect grows as the codetalkers prove their worth in the brutal battle to take saipan .
translation: 尽管恩德斯最初对他的任务感到沮丧，但随着编码者在夺取塞班岛的残酷战斗中证明了他们的价值，他对他们的尊重逐渐增加。
back_translation: Although Enders initially felt frustrated with his task, his respect for the coders gradually grew as they proved their worth in the brutal battle for Saipan.

text: cathy ( julianne moore ) is the perfect 50s housewife , living the perfect 50s life : healthy kids , successful husband , social prominence .
translation: 凯西（朱莉安·摩尔）是完美的50年代家庭主妇，过着完美的50年代生活：健康的孩子，成功的丈夫，社会显赫。
back_translation: Kathy (Julianne Moore) is the perfect 1950s housewife, living the perfect 1950s life: healthy kids, a successful husband, and social prominence.

text: . . . another example of how sandler is losing his touch .
translation: ……另一个例子显示桑德勒正在失去他的魅力。
back_translation: ...Another example shows that Sandler is losing his charm.

text: i 'm sure if you 're a hartley fan , you might enjoy yourself . . . me , i did n't care for it .
translation: 我相信如果你是哈特利的粉丝，你可能会喜欢这个……而我，我不太喜欢。
back_translation: I believe that if you are a fan of Hartley, you might like this... as for me, I’m not really a fan.

text: his mission : to gather information on an organization that may just be planning the destruction of the world , led by the nihilistic yorgi .
translation: 他的任务：收集关于一个可能正在策划毁灭世界的组织的信息，该组织由虚无主义者尤尔吉领导。
back_translation: His task: to collect information about an organization that might be planning to destroy the world, led by the nihilist Yurgi.

text: suggests puns about ingredients and soup and somebody being off their noodle , but let 's just say the ingredients do n't quite add up to a meal .
translation: 建议一些关于材料和汤的双关语，以及某人脑袋不太正常的情况，但我们可以说这些材料并不完全构成一顿饭。
back_translation: Suggest some puns about materials and soups, as well as situations where someone is not quite right in the head, but we can say that these materials do not completely constitute a meal.

text: `` secondhand lions `` follows the comedic adventures of an introverted boy ( osment ) left on the doorstep of a pair of reluctant , eccentric great-uncles ( caine and duvall ) , whose exotic remembrances stir the boy 's spirit and re-ignite the men 's lives .
translation: 《二手狮子》讲述了一个内向男孩（奥斯门）被留在一对不情愿的古怪叔叔（凯恩和杜瓦尔）门前的喜剧冒险故事，这对叔叔的异国回忆激发了男孩的灵感，并重新点燃了他们的生活。
back_translation: "Second Hand Lion" tells a comedic adventure story about an introverted boy (Osmond) who is left on the doorstep of a pair of reluctant and eccentric uncles (Gavin and Duval). The uncles' exotic memories inspire the boy and reignite their lives.

text: charlie is man who wakes up to find that no one can see him , by chance he meets carol on a lonely highway .
translation: 查理是一个醒来后发现没有人能看到他的人，偶然间他在一条孤独的高速公路上遇见了卡罗尔。
back_translation: Charlie is a person who wakes up to find that no one can see him, and he encounters Carol by chance on a lonely highway.

text: the rich woman seeks the help of her lawyers to find her lost grandson cary and eventually finds him living in a deprived area with cass .
translation: 这位富有的女人寻求她的律师的帮助，以寻找她失踪的孙子凯里，最终发现他和卡斯一起住在一个贫困地区。
back_translation: This wealthy woman seeks the help of her lawyer to find her missing grandson, Kyle, and ultimately discovers that he is living with Cass in a poor area.

text: sad and alone , caroline wanders the exotic city in search of ansers , finality , and peace of mind .
translation: 悲伤孤独的卡罗琳在这个异国城市中徘徊，寻找答案、终结和内心的平静。
back_translation: The sad and lonely Caroline wanders in this foreign city, searching for answers, closure, and inner peace.

text: for one week , eduardo coutinho and his team talked to 27 residents in an enormous building in copacabana .
translation: 在一周的时间里，爱德华多·库廷霍和他的团队与科帕卡巴纳一栋巨大的建筑内的27位居民进行了交谈。
back_translation: In the span of a week, Eduardo Coutinho and his team spoke with 27 residents in a huge building in Copacabana.

text: along the way , they discover a sinister conspiracy that reaches to the police department and even the highest level of government .
translation: 在这个过程中，他们发现了一个阴险的阴谋，这个阴谋涉及到警察局甚至最高层的政府。
back_translation: During this process, they discovered a sinister conspiracy that involved the police department and even the highest levels of government.

text: several degrees shy of the gross-out contests one expects from current teen fare .
translation: 与当前青少年题材所期望的恶心比赛相比，这里显得温和了几分。
back_translation: Compared to the expected disgusting competitions of current youth-themed works, this one seems a bit milder.

text: plot strands involve a trio of lost transvestites , two girls who never leave the toilets , a pair of innocent under-age drinkers and a guy who is determined to pierce his genitalia , but the central story follows ali as she sets out to humilate her former lover , mike , who slept with another woman .
translation: 情节涉及一组三个失落的变性人，两位从不离开厕所的女孩，一对无辜的未成年人饮酒者，以及一个决心穿刺自己生殖器的家伙，但中心故事围绕艾莉展开，她决心羞辱她的前爱人迈克，因为他与另一名女性发生了关系。
back_translation: The plot involves a group of three lost transgender individuals, two girls who never leave the restroom, a pair of innocent underage drinkers, and a guy determined to pierce his own genitals, but the central story revolves around Ellie, who is determined to humiliate her ex-lover Mike for having an affair with another woman.

text: boromir ( sean bean ) is dead , frodo baggins ( elijah wood ) and samwise gamgee ( sean astin ) have gone to mordor alone to destroy the one ring , merry ( dominic monaghan ) and pippin ( billy boyd ) have been captured by the uruk-hai , and aragorn ( viggo mortensen ) , legolas ( orlando bloom ) , and gimli ( john rhys-davies ) have made friends of the rohan , a race of humans that are in the path of the upcoming war , led by its aging king , th & # 233 ; oden ( bernard hill ) .
translation: 博罗米尔（肖恩·宾）已死，弗罗多·巴金斯（埃尔哈伊·伍德）和山姆怀斯·甘吉（肖恩·阿斯丁）独自前往魔多摧毁魔戒，梅里（多米尼克·莫纳汉）和皮聘（比利·博伊德）已被乌鲁克-海俘获，而阿拉贡（维戈·莫特森）、莱戈拉斯（奥兰多·布鲁姆）和金利（约翰·瑞斯-戴维斯）与罗汗结成了友谊，罗汉是处于即将到来的战争路径上的人类种族，领导他们的是年迈的国王塞奥登（伯纳德·希尔）。
back_translation: Boromir (Sean Bean) is dead, and Frodo Baggins (Elijah Wood) and Samwise Gamgee (Sean Astin) are journeying alone to Mordor to destroy the One Ring. Merry (Dominic Monaghan) and Pippin (Billy Boyd) have been captured by the Uruk-hai, while Aragorn (Viggo Mortensen), Legolas (Orlando Bloom), and Gimli (John Rhys-Davies) have formed an alliance with Rohan, a human race on the path of the impending war, led by the aging King Théoden (Bernard Hill).

text: unbeknownst to the elders , the widows daughter has come to settle the estate , evict them and have an estate sale all in one day .
translation: 在长辈们不知情的情况下，寡妇的女儿来到这里，准备清理遗产，驱逐他们，并在同一天举行遗产拍卖。
back_translation: Unbeknownst to the elders, the widow's daughter came here to sort out the inheritance, evict them, and hold an estate auction on the same day.

text: the story and the friendship proceeds in such a way that you 're watching a soap opera rather than a chronicle of the ups and downs that accompany lifelong friendships .
translation: 这个故事和友谊的发展就像你在看一部肥皂剧，而不是记录伴随终生友谊的起伏波动的编年史。
back_translation: This story and the development of friendship are like watching a soap opera, rather than a chronicle documenting the ups and downs of a lifelong friendship.

text: steve 's best friend , sean , on the other hand , has n't been so lucky .
translation: 史蒂夫最好的朋友肖恩，另一方面，就没有那么幸运了。
back_translation: Steve's best friend Sean, on the other hand, was not so lucky.

text: loonies is a film with light-hearted and cheeky humour that , in a moving way , takes us into the pleasantly disturbed world of five somewhat romanticised psychiatric patients .
translation: 《疯子》是一部充满轻松和调皮幽默的影片，以一种感人的方式带我们进入五位有些浪漫化的精神病患者所构成的愉快而又稍显混乱的世界。
back_translation: "Madman" is a film filled with lighthearted and mischievous humor, taking us into the pleasant yet somewhat chaotic world of five somewhat romanticized mental patients in an endearing way.

text: was i scared ? only at the prospect of beck 's next project . let 's see , a haunted house , a haunted ship , what 's next . . . ghost blimp ?
translation: 我害怕吗？只是在期待贝克下一个项目时感到害怕。让我们看看，鬼屋，鬼船，下一个会是什么……鬼飞艇？
back_translation: Am I scared? I'm just feeling scared while looking forward to Beck's next project. Let's see, haunted house, haunted ship, what will be next... haunted airship?

text: now & # 38 ; forever is a dramatic contemporary love story combining elements of spirituality , heart and integrity .
translation: 现在与永远是一个戏剧性的现代爱情故事，融合了灵性、真诚和诚信的元素。
back_translation: "Now and Forever" is a dramatic modern love story that blends elements of spirituality, authenticity, and integrity.

text: it 's the kind of movie you ca n't quite recommend because it is all windup and not much of a pitch , yet you ca n't bring yourself to dislike it .
translation: 这是一部你无法完全推荐的电影，因为它虽然起伏很大，但并没有太多看点，然而你又无法让自己去讨厌它。
back_translation: This is a movie you can't fully recommend, because although it has many ups and downs, it doesn't have much to watch, yet you can't bring yourself to hate it.

text: a fine , rousing , g-rated family film , aimed mainly at little kids but with plenty of entertainment value to keep grown-ups from squirming in their seats .
translation: 一部精彩、振奋人心、适合家庭观看的G级电影，主要面向小朋友，但也有足够的娱乐价值，让大人在座位上不至于感到无聊。
back_translation: A wonderful, uplifting, family-friendly G-rated movie that is primarily aimed at children, but also has enough entertainment value to keep adults from feeling bored in their seats.

text: regardless , it is through grace 's visions involving him that she learns of her parent 's demonic pastimes , which include abduction , murder , and possibly worse .
translation: 无论如何，正是通过格蕾丝关于他的 visions， 她才得知了自己父母的恶魔过去，包括绑架、谋杀，以及可能更糟的事情。
back_translation: Regardless, it was through Grace's visions about him that she learned about her parents' demonic past, including kidnapping, murder, and possibly worse things.

text: she must look beyond her history with men into a childhood that stopped short because of a shocking event that she has buried deep inside herself .
translation: 她必须超越与男性的历史，回望因一件令人震惊的事件而停止的童年，而这件事她深藏在内心深处。
back_translation: She must transcend her history with men and look back on her childhood, which came to a halt due to a shocking event that she has buried deep within her heart.

text: this version does justice both to stevenson and to the sci-fi genre .
translation: 这个版本既为史蒂文森赢得了公正，也为科幻小说类型做出了贡献。
back_translation: This version not only won fairness for Stevenson but also contributed to the science fiction genre.

text: mother turns out to be his crazy accomplice in mass murder and his quest for immortality .
translation: 母亲原来是他疯狂的同谋，参与了大规模谋杀和他的追求长生不老。
back_translation: The mother was originally his crazy accomplice, involved in large-scale murders and his pursuit of immortality.

text: the boy falls in love with a rich girl ( deeksha ) .
translation: 男孩爱上了一个富有的女孩（迪克莎）。
back_translation: The boy fell in love with a rich girl (Diksha).

text: i love the opening scenes of a wintry new york city in 1899 . cinematic poetry showcases the city 's old-world charm before machines change nearly everything .
translation: 我喜欢1899年冬季纽约市的开场场景。电影诗意展现了这座城市的旧世界魅力，在机器几乎改变一切之前。
back_translation: I love the opening scene of winter in New York City in 1899. The film poetically showcases the old-world charm of the city, before machines changed almost everything.

text: sure , there are flaws , but the moments that do things properly see the screen burst with confidence , rhythm , heat and pizzazz .
translation: 当然，存在缺陷，但那些做得好的时刻让画面充满自信、节奏、热情和魅力。
back_translation: Of course, there are flaws, but the moments that are done well fill the scene with confidence, rhythm, passion, and charm.

text: the sheer dumbness of the plot ( other than its one good idea ) and the movie 's inescapable air of sleaziness get you down .
translation: 剧情的愚蠢（除了其中一个好点子）和电影那无法摆脱的低俗气息让人感到沮丧。
back_translation: The foolishness of the plot (except for one good idea) and the film's inescapable vulgar atmosphere are frustrating.

text: it 's never a good sign when a film 's star spends the entirety of the film in a coma . it 's a worse sign when you begin to envy her condition .
translation: 当一部电影的明星在整个电影中都处于昏迷状态时，这绝不是一个好兆头。当你开始羡慕她的状态时，这就更糟了。
back_translation: When the star of a movie is in a coma for the entirety of the film, it is definitely not a good sign. It gets even worse when you start to envy her state.

text: it will be an act of violence that thrusts the girl into womanhood and leads her to a new life where , not without pain , everything is possible .
translation: 这将是一起暴力事件，将女孩推向成年，将她引入一个新的生活，在那里，尽管伴随着痛苦，一切都是可能的。
back_translation: This will be a violent event that pushes the girl into adulthood, introducing her to a new life where, despite the pain, everything is possible.

text: voyeurism is the order all around , as those who watch for pleasure and those paid to watch get more than bargained for when the operation & # 237 ; s delicate balance of power is skewed by rebellion .
translation: 窥视主义无处不在，因为那些出于享乐而观察的人和那些受雇观看的人，当操作的微妙权力平衡因叛乱而倾斜时，得到的远超过预期。
back_translation: Voyeurism is everywhere, as those who observe for pleasure and those who are hired to watch gain far more than expected when the delicate balance of power shifts due to rebellion.

text: it 's sex and the city meets the wedding banquet for young san franciscan daniel chang , living at home with his clueless , traditional mother .
translation: 这是一部关于旧金山年轻人丹尼尔·张的故事，他与毫无头绪、传统的母亲住在一起，犹如《欲望都市》与《喜宴》的结合。
back_translation: This is a story about a young man named Daniel Zhang in San Francisco, who lives with his traditional mother who has no clue about his life, resembling a blend of "Sex and the City" and "The Wedding Banquet."

text: from that moment on nothing is as it was before . . .
translation: 从那一刻起，一切都不再如昔日一样……
back_translation: From that moment on, everything was no longer as it used to be...

text: stone seems to have a knack for wrapping the theater in a cold blanket of urban desperation .
translation: 石头似乎有一种天赋，可以将剧院包裹在一种城市绝望的寒冷氛围中。
back_translation: The stone seems to have a talent for enveloping the theater in an atmosphere of cold despair of the city.

text: a chronicle , which goes behind the scenes on a stormy collaboration between the iconoclastic dance company , pilobolus , and legendary author-illustrator maurice sendak .
translation: 一部编年史，讲述了颠覆传统的舞蹈公司皮洛布斯与传奇作家插画家莫里斯·桑达克之间风波不断的合作背后故事。
back_translation: A chronicle that narrates the tumultuous collaboration between the groundbreaking dance company Pilobolus and the legendary writer and illustrator Maurice Sendak.

text: the piquant story needs more dramatic meat on its bones .
translation: 这个刺激的故事需要更多戏剧性的内容。
back_translation: This thrilling story needs more dramatic content.

text: a subtle variation on i spit on your grave in which our purported heroine pathologically avenges a hatred for men .
translation: 对《我在你墓碑上吐口水》的微妙变奏，其中我们所谓的女英雄病态地报复对男性的仇恨。
back_translation: A subtle variation of "I Spit on Your Grave," in which our so-called female hero pathologically seeks revenge fueled by hatred for men.

text: a densely constructed , highly referential film , and an audacious return to form that can comfortably sit among jean-luc godard 's finest work .
translation: 一部结构紧凑、引经据典的电影，是一次大胆的回归，堪与让-吕克·戈达尔的杰作相媲美。
back_translation: A compact and allusion-filled film is a bold return that rivals the masterpieces of Jean-Luc Godard.

text: to protect her relationship with john , she `` ditches `` her son , having him arrested and locked in a correctional `` mental `` facility , before coercing her older brother burt , who lives in hollywood , to take him .
translation: 为了保护她与约翰的关系，她“抛弃”了自己的儿子，让他被逮捕并锁进一个矫正“精神”机构，然后逼迫她住在好莱坞的哥哥伯特来接他。
back_translation: In order to protect her relationship with John, she "abandoned" her son, letting him be arrested and locked in a correctional "mental" institution, and then forced her brother Bert, who lived in Hollywood, to take him in.

text: it 's something of the ultimate scorsese film , with all the stomach-turning violence , colorful new york gang lore and other hallmarks of his personal cinema painted on their largest-ever historical canvas .
translation: 这是一部极具斯科塞斯风格的终极电影，包含了让人作呕的暴力、丰富多彩的纽约帮派传说以及他个人电影的其他显著特征，全部在他历史上最大的画布上展现。
back_translation: This is an ultimate film with a highly Scorsese style, featuring nauseating violence, vibrant New York gang legends, and other notable characteristics of his personal filmmaking, all presented on the largest canvas in his history.

text: the moviegoing equivalent of going to a dinner party and being forced to watch the host and hostess 's home video of their baby 's birth .
translation: 看电影就像去参加一个晚宴派对，却被迫观看东道主和女主人拍摄的他们宝宝出生的家庭录像。
back_translation: Watching a movie is like attending a dinner party, but being forced to watch the home video of the host and hostess filming the birth of their baby.

text: it 's a loathsome movie , it really is and it makes absolutely no sense .
translation: 这是一部令人厌恶的电影，真的是，它完全没有任何意义。
back_translation: This is a disgusting movie, really, it has absolutely no meaning at all.

text: the movie is well crafted , and well executed . if you 're paying attention , the `` big twists `` are pretty easy to guess - but that does n't make the movie any less entertaining .
translation: 这部电影制作精良，执行到位。如果你认真看，里面的“重大转折”非常容易猜到——但这并不影响电影的娱乐性。
back_translation: This film is well-produced and executed. If you pay close attention, the "major twists" inside are very easy to guess - but this does not affect the entertainment value of the movie.

text: a feel-good picture in the best sense of the term .
translation: 在这个词的最佳意义上，一幅令人愉悦的画面。
back_translation: In the best sense of the word, a delightful scene.

text: it 's pithy without being saccharine ; it 's funny without ever not taking itself seriously ; it 's full of beautiful characters and great performances .
translation: 它简洁而不甜腻；它搞笑但从不失去认真态度；它充满了美丽的角色和精彩的表演。
back_translation: It is concise yet not overly sweet; it is funny but never loses its serious tone; it is filled with beautiful characters and精彩的 performances.

text: the problem is that the movie has no idea of it is serious or not .
translation: 问题在于这部电影不知道自己究竟是严肃还是不严肃。
back_translation: The problem is that this movie doesn't know whether it is serious or not.

text: besides him , the other residents are `` baggers , `` human-like creatures that are infected by the tall man 's blood , the dwarves , and , of course , the silver spheres , all trying to break out of the barrier that contains them and into the real world .
translation: 除了他，其他居民是“装袋者”，这些是被高个男人的血液感染的人形生物，还有矮人，当然，还有银色球体，所有这些都试图突破困住它们的屏障，进入现实世界。
back_translation: Apart from him, the other residents are "baggers," which are humanoid beings infected by the blood of a tall man, as well as dwarfs, and of course, silver spheres, all of which are trying to break through the barriers that trap them to enter the real world.

text: katie is a young girl who loves to climb .
translation: 凯蒂是一个喜欢攀爬的年轻女孩。
back_translation: Katie is a young girl who loves climbing.

text: this movie seems to have been written using mad-libs . there can be no other explanation . hilariously inept and ridiculous .
translation: 这部电影似乎是用填空游戏写成的，别无他解。非常搞笑，荒谬至极。
back_translation: This movie seems to have been written using a fill-in-the-blank game, there's no other explanation. It's very funny and utterly absurd.

text: nete 's husband seeks comfort outside of their home , her daughter begins to rebel , and as the relationship between nete and her father has not been too good for years , things are bound to explode .
translation: nete的丈夫在家外寻求安慰，女儿开始叛逆，而nete与她父亲的关系多年来一直不太好，因此事情注定要爆发。
back_translation: Nete's husband seeks comfort outside the home, their daughter begins to rebel, and Nete's relationship with her father has not been good for many years, so the situation is destined to explode.

text: mile zero is a story about a father with a remarkable capacity to love , but who lets fear and desperation rule his actions .
translation: 《零英里》是一个关于父亲的故事，他拥有非凡的爱，但却让恐惧和绝望支配了他的行为。
back_translation: "Zero Miles" is a story about a father who possesses extraordinary love but allows fear and despair to govern his actions.

text: now , akshay must battle those that he has to overcome to get what he needs to help his mother and survive the wilderness .
translation: 现在，阿克夏必须与那些他必须战胜的敌人斗争，以获得他所需的东西来帮助他的母亲并在荒野中生存。
back_translation: Now, Aksha must fight against those enemies he must overcome in order to gain what he needs to help his mother and survive in the wilderness.

text: but for one celebrant this holy week is different .
translation: 但对一位庆祝者来说，这个圣周是不同的。
back_translation: But for a celebrant, this Holy Week is different.

text: a film for all who care about the world their children and grandchildren will inherit .
translation: 一部关心子孙后代将继承的世界的所有人的电影。
back_translation: A movie for everyone who cares about the world that future generations will inherit.

text: a knowing look at female friendship , spiked with raw urban humor .
translation: 对女性友谊的深刻洞察，夹杂着生动的城市幽默。
back_translation: A profound insight into female friendship, interspersed with vivid urban humor.

text: the film is darkly funny in its observation of just how much more grueling and time-consuming the illusion of work is than actual work .
translation: 这部电影以其对工作幻觉比实际工作更加艰难和耗时的观察，呈现出黑暗幽默。
back_translation: This film presents dark humor through its observation that the illusion of work is harder and more time-consuming than actual work.

text: any film featuring young children threatened by a terrorist bomb can no longer pass as mere entertainment .
translation: 任何涉及年轻儿童受到恐怖分子炸弹威胁的电影都无法再被视为单纯的娱乐。
back_translation: Any movie involving young children being threatened by terrorist bombs can no longer be regarded as mere entertainment.

text: a movie that does n't aim too high , but does n't need to .
translation: 一部没有太高追求，但也不需要的电影。
back_translation: A movie that doesn't have high aspirations, but also doesn't need to.

text: this is a heartfelt story . . . it just is n't a very involving one .
translation: 这是一个感人的故事…… 只是没有很吸引人。
back_translation: This is a touching story... it's just not very captivating.

text: besides amsterdam , the movie also travels to morocco , to see larry and his love 30 years before , and to the united states , where a & # 239 ; sha 's family lives .
translation: 除了阿姆斯特丹，这部电影还带我们来到摩洛哥，去见拉里和他的爱人在30年前的样子，还去了美国，那里是一个名叫阿莎的家庭的居住地。
back_translation: In addition to Amsterdam, the film also takes us to Morocco to meet Larry and his partner as they were 30 years ago, and to the United States, where the home of a family named Asha is located.

text: this is a smart movie that knows its classical music , knows its freud and knows its sade .
translation: 这是一部聪明的电影，它了解古典音乐，懂得弗洛伊德，也知道萨德。
back_translation: This is a clever movie; it understands classical music, knows Freud, and is aware of Sade.

text: it collapses when mr . taylor tries to shift the tone to a thriller 's rush .
translation: 当泰勒先生试图将语气转变为惊悚片的紧张时，它崩溃了。
back_translation: When Mr. Taylor tried to shift the tone to that of a thriller, it fell apart.

text: but then there came toni , an intriguing photographer that seemed to see inside his soul .
translation: 但后来来了托尼，一个引人入胜的摄影师，似乎能洞察他的灵魂。
back_translation: But then came Tony, a captivating photographer who seemed to be able to see into his soul.

text: the two black men ( anthony and michael ) are successful in the high tech world of silicon valley , and have known each other since childhood .
translation: 这两个黑人男子（安东尼和迈克尔）在硅谷的高科技世界中取得了成功，并且从小就相识。
back_translation: These two Black men (Anthony and Michael) have found success in the high-tech world of Silicon Valley and have known each other since childhood.

text: for revenge , ingrid murders barry with the deadly poison of her favourite flower : the white oleander .
translation: 为了报复，英格丽德用她最喜欢的花：白色夹竹桃的致命毒药杀死了巴里。
back_translation: In order to take revenge, Ingrid killed Barry with the deadly poison of her favorite flower: white oleander.

text: even bigger and more ambitious than the first installment , spy kids 2 looks as if it were made by a highly gifted 12-year-old instead of a grown man .
translation: 比第一部更大、更雄心勃勃，《小子间谍2》看起来像是一个非常有才华的12岁孩子制作的，而不是一个成年男人。
back_translation: Bigger and more ambitious than the first installment, "Spy Kids 2" feels like it was made by a very talented 12-year-old rather than an adult man.

text: if you 're willing to have fun with it , you wo n't feel cheated by the high infidelity of unfaithful .
translation: 如果你愿意玩得开心，就不会觉得因不忠而感到被欺骗。
back_translation: If you are willing to have fun, you won't feel deceived by infidelity.

text: though it pretends to expose the life of male hustlers , it 's exploitive without being insightful .
translation: 虽然它假装揭示男性 hustlers 的生活，但它是剥削性的而并非有洞察力。
back_translation: Although it pretends to reveal the lives of male hustlers, it is exploitative rather than insightful.

text: felice finds herself in danger from the man she came to save .
translation: 费丽斯发现自己处于她来拯救的人的危险之中。
back_translation: Felice found herself in danger of the person she came to save.

text: it has the air of a surprisingly juvenile lark , a pop-influenced prank whose charms are immediately apparent and wear thin with repetition .
translation: 它给人一种出乎意料的幼稚嬉闹的感觉，这是一种受流行音乐影响的恶作剧，其魅力立刻显现，但随着重复而逐渐减弱。
back_translation: It gives a surprisingly childish and playful feeling, which is a prank influenced by popular music. Its charm becomes immediately apparent, but gradually weakens with repetition.

text: its heart is in the right place and the lack of cynicism comes as a pleasant surprise .
translation: 它的出发点是好的，缺乏愤世嫉俗的态度让人感到意外的惊喜。
back_translation: Its starting point is good, and the lack of a cynical attitude brings an unexpectedly pleasant surprise.

text: nic is fixated on getting laid , and watches mike and nadine through the skylight with josh .
translation: 尼克专注于约会，和乔希一起通过天窗观察迈克和纳丁。
back_translation: Nick focuses on dating and observes Mike and Nadine through the skylight with Josh.

text: an intriguing , richly detailed look at the early days of hollywood power and glamour .
translation: 对好莱坞权力与魅力早期日子的引人入胜、细致入微的洞察。
back_translation: An engaging and detailed insight into the early days of power and charm in Hollywood.

text: every member of the pecking order sees the dupe as the new low man on the totem pole , and as a result , the perfect tool to boost themselves towards the top of this dysfunctional hierarchy .
translation: 每个在等级制度中的成员都将这个被愚弄者视为图腾柱上新的低位者，因此，成为了提升自己到达这个功能失调的等级体系顶端的完美工具。
back_translation: Each member in the hierarchical system views this deceiver as a new lowly being on the totem pole, thus becoming the perfect tool to elevate themselves to the top of this dysfunctional hierarchical system.

text: the visionary quest begins on the operating table , where a surgeon grafts a prototype ocular implant into his eye socket .
translation: 这一富有远见的探索始于手术台上，一位外科医生将一个原型眼部植入物植入他的眼窝。
back_translation: This visionary exploration began on the operating table when a surgeon implanted a prototype eye implant into his eye socket.

text: upper west sidey exercise in narcissism and self-congratulation disguised as a tribute .
translation: 上西区的自恋和自我祝贺伪装成了一种致敬的练习。
back_translation: The narcissism and self-congratulation of the West Side have disguised themselves as a practice of homage.

text: is n't it a bit early in his career for director barry sonnenfeld to do a homage to himself ? and it 's a lousy one at that .
translation: 难道巴里·索南菲尔德导演在他的职业生涯中向自己致敬还为时尚早吗？而且这个致敬实在太糟糕了。
back_translation: Is it too early for director Barry Sonnenfeld to pay homage to himself in his career? Moreover, this tribute is truly terrible.

text: once in ghana , otte is called before the chief 's council to explain what happened .
translation: 在加纳，奥特被召到酋长的委员会前解释发生了什么。
back_translation: In Ghana, Otu was summoned before the chief's council to explain what had happened.

text: a terrifically deft picture about the thick line that separates movie glamour from the real world , and the thin line between common sense and paranoia .
translation: 一幅极为巧妙的画面，描绘了电影魅力与现实世界之间的厚重界线，以及常识与偏执之间的微妙界线。
back_translation: A highly clever scene depicting the heavy boundary between the charm of cinema and the real world, as well as the subtle line between common sense and paranoia.

text: murder by numbers is like a couple of mediocre tv-movie -of-the-week films clumsily stuck together .
translation: 《数字谋杀》就像几部平庸的周播电视电影笨拙地拼凑在一起。
back_translation: "Digital Murder" feels like several mediocre weekly TV movies awkwardly stitched together.

text: has enough gun battles and throwaway humor to cover up the yawning chasm where the plot should be .
translation: 有足够的枪战和轻松幽默来掩盖情节应该存在的令人乏味的空洞。
back_translation: There are enough gunfights and light humor to cover up the boring emptiness that should be present in the plot.

text: forced to think fast , the producer decides to digitally create an actress `` simone `` to sub for the star -- the first totally believable synthetic actress .
translation: 由于被迫快速思考，制片人决定数字化创建一位名为“西蒙”的女演员来替代明星——首位完全可信的合成女演员。
back_translation: Due to the need to think quickly, the producer decided to digitally create an actress named "Simone" to replace the star—the first fully believable synthetic actress.

text: there 's not one decent performance from the cast and not one clever line of dialogue .
translation: 演员们没有一个好的表现，也没有一句聪明的台词。
back_translation: The actors did not deliver a good performance, nor were there any clever lines.

text: and finds himself in the middle of two assassination plots masterminded by the cia .
translation: 并发现自己身处两个由中央情报局策划的暗杀阴谋之中。
back_translation: And found himself caught in two assassination plots orchestrated by the CIA.

text: a gem of a romantic crime comedy that turns out to be clever , amusing and unpredictable .
translation: 一部精彩的浪漫犯罪喜剧，既聪明又有趣，充满了意想不到的情节。
back_translation: A wonderful romantic crime comedy that is both clever and entertaining, filled with unexpected plot twists.

text: not since ghostbusters has a film used manhattan 's architecture in such a gloriously goofy way .
translation: 自《捉鬼敢死队》以来，没有哪部电影以如此华丽而搞笑的方式使用曼哈顿的建筑。
back_translation: Since "Ghostbusters," no film has utilized Manhattan's architecture in such a glamorous and funny way.

text: tony gayton 's script does n't give us anything we have n't seen before , but director d . j . caruso 's grimy visual veneer and kilmer 's absorbing performance increase the gravitational pull considerably .
translation: 托尼·盖顿的剧本没有给我们带来我们没有见过的东西，但导演D·J·卡鲁索的阴暗视觉外观和基尔默引人入胜的表演大大增强了吸引力。
back_translation: Tony Gayton's screenplay doesn't provide us with anything we haven't seen before, but director D.J. Caruso's dark visual style and Val Kilmer's captivating performance greatly enhance its appeal.

text: as fran 's requests become more peculiar , chep is thrown into increasingly bizarre situations .
translation: 随着弗兰的请求变得越来越古怪，切普被卷入了越来越奇怪的境遇。
back_translation: As Fran's requests became more and more bizarre, Chip found himself drawn into increasingly strange situations.
