text: . . . with the candy-like taste of it fading faster than 25-cent bubble gum , i realized this is a throwaway movie that wo n't stand the test of time . it 's a trifle .
translation: ……随着它那如糖果般的味道比25美分的泡泡糖消退得更快，我意识到这是一部不会经受时间考验的速食电影。它只是一件小事。
back_translation: ...As its candy-like flavor faded faster than a 25-cent bubblegum, I realized this was a fast-food movie that wouldn't stand the test of time. It was just a trivial matter.

text: like the original , this version is raised a few notches above kiddie fantasy pablum by allen 's astringent wit .
translation: 与原版一样，这个版本在艾伦的辛辣幽默加持下，提升了几档，超越了幼稚的幻想垃圾。
back_translation: Like the original, this version is elevated several notches by Allen's sharp humor, surpassing childish fantasy trash.

text: over months of improv work in the studio , they transform a haunting holocaust legacy into a disturbing theater piece .
translation: 经过几个月的工作，他们在工作室中将一个令人毛骨悚然的大屠杀遗产转变成一个令人不安的戏剧作品。
back_translation: After months of work, they turned a creepy legacy of massacre into a disturbing theatrical production in the studio.

text: while broomfield 's film does n't capture the effect of these tragic deaths on hip-hop culture , it succeeds as a powerful look at a failure of our justice system .
translation: 尽管布鲁姆菲尔德的电影没有捕捉到这些悲惨死亡对嘻哈文化的影响，但它成功地揭示了我们司法系统的失败。
back_translation: Although Bloomfield's film does not capture the impact of these tragic deaths on hip-hop culture, it successfully reveals the failures of our judicial system.

text: it questions whether we really live in a world that can be divided neatly into black hats and white hats . and anyway , it wonders , is the guy in the black hat always wrong ?
translation: 它质疑我们是否真的生活在一个可以明確划分为黑帽和白帽的世界中。不管怎样，它在想，黑帽子的人总是错的吗？
back_translation: It questions whether we truly live in a world that can be clearly divided into black hats and white hats. Anyway, it wonders, are the people wearing black hats always wrong?

text: josh ( anthony michael hall ) is one of those guys who ca n't navigate the shallow ny singles scene .
translation: 乔希（安东尼·迈克尔·霍尔）是那种无法在纽约肤浅的单身圈中找到方向的人。
back_translation: Josh (Anthony Michael Hall) is the kind of person who cannot find his way in the shallow singles scene of New York.

text: . . . a vast adventure that bristles with romance , action and heroism .
translation: ……一场充满浪漫、动作和英雄主义的巨大冒险。
back_translation: ...a grand adventure filled with romance, action, and heroism.

text: it recycles every clichM-i about gays in what is essentially an extended soap opera .
translation: 它回收了关于同性恋的每一个陈词滥调，本质上是一部扩展的肥皂剧。
back_translation: It recycles every cliché about homosexuality and is essentially an extended soap opera.

text: like vardalos and corbett , who play their roles with vibrant charm , the film , directed by joel zwick , is heartfelt and hilarious in ways you ca n't fake .
translation: 像瓦尔达洛斯和科尔贝特一样，他们以充满活力的魅力诠释自己的角色，这部由乔尔·兹维克执导的电影在情感真挚和搞笑方面都无法伪装。
back_translation: Like Vardalos and Colbert, they interpret their roles with vibrant charm, and this film directed by Joel Zwick is unable to disguise its genuine emotions and humor.

text: but coney island 's finest its hot dog lady , rollercoaster operator , cotton candy vendor and performing freak have their own way of doing things .
translation: 但是康尼岛最棒的热狗小妹、过山车操作员、棉花糖商贩和表演奇人都有自己的一套做事方法。
back_translation: However, the best hot dog girl, roller coaster operator, cotton candy vendor, and circus performer at Coney Island all have their own ways of doing things.

text: ruth berman and connie kurtz first met in brooklyn in 1959 , both young married women raising their young children .
translation: 露丝·伯曼和康妮·库尔茨于1959年在布鲁克林首次相遇，当时她们都是年轻的已婚女性，正在抚养自己的小孩。
back_translation: Ruth Berman and Connie Kurts met for the first time in Brooklyn in 1959, when they were both young married women raising their children.

text: you get the feeling that the filmmakers did their homework and that they 're here to represent a harsh reality . ``
translation: 你会觉得这些制片人做了功课，他们在这里是为了呈现一个残酷的现实。
back_translation: You might feel that these producers have done their homework; they are here to present a harsh reality.

text: it 's no surprise that as a director washington demands and receives excellent performances , from himself and from newcomer derek luke .
translation: 作为导演，华盛顿要求并获得优异的表演，这一点并不令人惊讶，无论是他自己还是新人德里克·卢克。
back_translation: As a director, Washington demands and achieves outstanding performances, which is not surprising, whether from himself or newcomer Derek Luke.

text: medem packs it with so much stunning , wildly colorful imagery -- and so much sex -- that it transfixes you even when you 're not quite sure what 's going on .
translation: 梅德姆用如此惊艳、丰富多彩的意象和如此多的性描写填满了它，即使你不太确定发生了什么，仍然让你目不转睛。
back_translation: Meadham fills it with such stunning and vibrant imagery, as well as so much sexual depiction, that even if you're not quite sure what's happening, it still keeps you glued to the page.

text: the acting is just fine , but there 's not enough substance here to sustain interest for the full 90 minutes , especially with the weak payoff .
translation: 演员表现尚可，但这里没有足够的实质内容来支撑整个90分钟的兴趣，尤其是结局太乏力。
back_translation: The actors' performances are decent, but there isn't enough substantial content to sustain interest for the entire 90 minutes, especially as the ending is too weak.

text: an uneven film dealing with too many problems to be taken seriously .
translation: 一部不均衡的电影，涉及太多问题，无法被认真对待。
back_translation: An unbalanced film that tackles too many issues to be taken seriously.

text: the most ill-conceived animated comedy since the 1991 dog rover dangerfield .
translation: 自1991年的《狗狗罗弗危险领域》以来，最缺乏构思的动画喜剧。
back_translation: The most conceptually lacking animated comedy since "A Dog's Dangerous Journey" in 1991.

text: the galactic republic finds itself at the brink of a civil war .
translation: 银河共和国正处于内战的边缘。
back_translation: The Galactic Republic is on the brink of civil war.

text: the agonizing memory that has tortured him all his life -- the death of his father , a convicted murderer who was executed when vincent was just a boy -- still plagues him .
translation: 折磨他一生的痛苦记忆——他父亲是被定罪的谋杀犯，在文森特还是个小男孩时就被执行了死刑——依然困扰着他。
back_translation: The painful memories that tormented him his entire life—his father was a convicted murderer who was executed when Vincent was just a boy—still haunt him.

text: bernal . . . gives an ambiguous performance ; he 's a lightweight actor , but that 's a positive quality when portraying a man on whom nothing leaves a permanent mark .
translation: 伯纳尔的表现模棱两可；他是一个轻量级的演员，但在表现一个没有任何事物留下永久印记的男人时，这是一种积极的特质。
back_translation: Bernal's performance is ambiguous; he is a lightweight actor, but this is a positive trait when portraying a man who leaves no lasting marks on anything.

text: to the outside , he is a faithful servant and a fierce protector of the organization , but inside he is full of doubt .
translation: 在外表上，他是一个忠诚的仆人和组织的坚定保护者，但内心却充满了怀疑。
back_translation: On the outside, he is a loyal servant and a staunch protector of the organization, but inside he is filled with doubt.

text: after finishing the open examination for form 5 students and applying for an adult identity card , yoyo , eighteen , departs for london to meet a guy introduced by her well-meaning parents in britain .
translation: 在完成了五年级学生的公开考试并申请成人身份证后，十八岁的yoyo前往伦敦，去见她在英国的善意父母介绍的一个男孩。
back_translation: After completing the public examination for fifth-grade students and applying for an adult ID card, eighteen-year-old Yoyo went to London to meet a boy introduced by her kind-hearted parents in the UK.

text: what soured me on the santa clause 2 was that santa bumps up against 21st century reality so hard , it 's icky .
translation: 让我对《圣诞老人的第二部》感到反感的是，圣诞老人与21世纪的现实碰撞得如此激烈，这让人感觉很不舒服。
back_translation: What I find offensive about "The Santa Claus: Part Two" is how violently Santa Claus collides with the realities of the 21st century, which makes for an uncomfortable experience.

text: 'the journey ' is the story of a young icelandic girl named kaja .
translation: 《旅程》是一个关于一个名叫卡雅的年轻冰岛女孩的故事。
back_translation: "Journey" is the story of a young Icelandic girl named Kaya.

text: the only entertainment you 'll derive from this choppy and sloppy affair will be from unintentional giggles M-^V several of them .
translation: 您从这场混乱而草率的事件中唯一能获得的乐趣，只能来自于意外的 giggles M-^V 几个。
back_translation: The only joy you can derive from this chaotic and hasty event comes from a few unexpected giggles.

text: although trying to balance self-referential humor and a normal ol ' slasher plot seemed like a decent endeavor , the result does n't fully satisfy either the die-hard jason fans or those who can take a good joke .
translation: 虽然试图在自我指涉的幽默与普通的杀手故事情节之间取得平衡看起来是一个不错的尝试，但结果并没有完全满足忠实的杰森粉丝或那些能够接受幽默的人。
back_translation: Although the attempt to balance self-referential humor with a typical killer storyline seems like a good effort, the outcome does not completely satisfy either loyal Jason fans or those who can appreciate humor.

text: an extraordinary swedish film about the soul adventure of marriage -- the kind of intimate and character-driven film that bille august does best .
translation: 一部关于婚姻灵魂冒险的非凡瑞典电影——那种亲密且以角色为驱动的电影，正是比尔·奥古斯特最擅长的。
back_translation: An extraordinary Swedish film about the soul adventure of marriage - the kind of intimate, character-driven film that is precisely Bill August's forte.

text: they are soon off going from one strange adventure to another .
translation: 他们很快就要去经历又一个奇怪的冒险了。
back_translation: They are soon going to experience another strange adventure.

text: [ aniston is ] so good , she manages to overcome the occasional nuggets of preciousness and self-consciousness in the story .
translation: 阿尼斯顿表现得非常出色，她成功地克服了故事中偶尔出现的矫揉造作和自我意识的瑕疵。
back_translation: Aniston performed exceptionally well, successfully overcoming the occasional pretentiousness and self-awareness flaws present in the story.

text: majandra delfino plays iris , the sheriff 's little sister , and much to his dismay , david 's love interest .
translation: 马亜朱·德尔菲诺饰演艾瑞斯，警长的小妹妹，而让他失望的是，艾瑞斯也是大卫的爱慕对象。
back_translation: Maya Zhu Delphino plays Iris, the sheriff's little sister, and much to his disappointment, Iris is also the object of David's affection.

text: nothing is what it seems , and no one will be the same again , as the truth begins to surface in very dangerous circumstances .
translation: 事物并非如表面所见，而在非常危险的情况下，真相开始浮出水面时，没有人会再是原来的样子。
back_translation: Things are not as they appear on the surface, and in very dangerous situations, when the truth begins to surface, no one will be the same as before.

text: at the age of 34 , with no producing credits to his name , he landed a job as chief of production at paramount pictures .
translation: 在34岁时，他没有任何制作信用，却获得了派拉蒙影业的制作总监职位。
back_translation: At the age of 34, he had no production credits but secured the position of Production Director at Paramount Pictures.

text: along the way he picks up a pastor who desires to learn the deeper things of god .
translation: 沿途他遇到一位渴望了解神更深奥之事的牧师。
back_translation: Along the way, he met a pastor who was eager to understand the deeper mysteries of God.

text: ramsay and morton fill this character study with poetic force and buoyant feeling .
translation: 拉姆塞和莫顿为这个角色研究注入了诗意的力量和愉悦的情感。
back_translation: Ramsey and Morton infused this role with poetic power and delightful emotion.

text: she finds out that the truth about both her parents is very revealing , shocking at times , but comes to terms with her past .
translation: 她发现关于她父母的真相非常揭示，有时令人震惊，但她最终接受了自己的过去。
back_translation: She found the truth about her parents to be very revealing, sometimes shocking, but ultimately she accepted her past.

text: all the performances are top notch and , once you get through the accents , all or nothing becomes an emotional , though still positive , wrench of a sit .
translation: 所有的表演都是顶尖的，虽然一开始有些口音让人难以适应，但一旦熬过去，《全有或全无》就成为了一出情感丰富、虽然仍然积极向上的剧集。
back_translation: All the performances are top-notch. Although the accents were a bit difficult to get used to at first, once you push through, "All or Nothing" becomes an emotionally rich series that is still uplifting.

text: as an exercise in stripped-down filmmaking , interview is grimly effective .
translation: 作为一种简化电影制作的练习，采访实在是有效而阴郁。
back_translation: As a simplified exercise in filmmaking, interviews are indeed effective yet somber.

text: john klein ( richard gere ) , a washington newspaper reporter leaves his job after his wife ( debra messing ) dies to investigate strange reports , including psychic visions ( `` prophecies `` ) and sightings of winged creatures ( `` mothmen `` ) , in a small west virginia town , that may be the signs of an alien invasion of earth . . .
translation: 约翰·克莱因（理查德·基尔饰）是一名华盛顿报纸记者，在其妻子（黛布拉·梅辛饰）去世后辞职，前往西弗吉尼亚州一个小镇调查奇怪的报道，包括超感官视觉（“预言”）和翼状生物（“飞蛾人”）的目击事件，这些事件可能是外星入侵地球的征兆……
back_translation: John Klein (played by Richard Gere) is a Washington newspaper reporter who resigns after the death of his wife (played by Debra Messing). He travels to a small town in West Virginia to investigate strange reports, including sightings of extrasensory perception ("prophecies") and winged creatures ("Mothman"), which may be signs of an alien invasion of Earth...

text: fame hungry roxie hart dreams of a life on the vaudville stage , and spends her nights jazzing it up in the bright lights of chicago , continually hoping that she 'll find her lucky break , and be shot into 1920 's stardom , so able to flee her boring husband amos .
translation: 渴望成名的罗西·哈特梦想着在百老汇舞台上的生活，夜夜在芝加哥的璀璨灯光下尽情狂欢，始终希望能找到她的幸运时刻，一举成名于1920年代，从而逃离她那无聊的丈夫阿莫斯。
back_translation: Roxy Hart, eager for fame, dreams of life on the Broadway stage, reveling every night under the dazzling lights of Chicago, always hoping to find her lucky moment to become famous in the 1920s and escape her boring husband Amos.

text: the principals in this cast are all fine , but bishop and stevenson are standouts .
translation: 这部剧中的主要演员都很出色，但比肖普和史蒂文森尤为突出。
back_translation: The main actors in this drama are all outstanding, but particularly exceptional are Shop and Stevenson.

text: immediately , john q . rushes michael to the hospital 's emergency room for a transplant .
translation: 约翰·Q.立刻将迈克尔送往医院的急救室进行移植。
back_translation: John Q. immediately took Michael to the hospital's emergency room for a transplant.

text: but even greater dangers lie ahead when jim discovers that his trusted friend silver is actually a scheming pirate with mutiny on his mind .
translation: 但更大的危险在前方等待着，当吉姆发现他信任的朋友银实际上是一个心怀叛乱的阴险海盗。
back_translation: But a greater danger awaits ahead when Jim discovers that his trusted friend Silver is actually a treacherous pirate with rebellious intentions.

text: ' . . . a great , participatory spectator sport . '
translation: ‘……一种伟大的、参与性强的观众运动。’
back_translation: "A great, highly participatory audience movement."

text: now grown up , caitlin ( emma caulfield ) calls kyle ( chaney kley ) because her little brother michael ( lee cormie ) is going through the same things he did as a boy , and wants his help .
translation: 现在长大了的凯特林（艾玛·考尔菲尔德）给凯尔（钱尼·克莱）打电话，因为她的小弟弟迈克尔（李·科米）正经历着他小时候所经历的事情，想要他的帮助。
back_translation: Now grown up Caitlin (Emma Caulfield) calls Kyle (Chad Michael Murray) because her little brother Michael (Lee Combs) is going through what she experienced in her childhood and wants his help.

text: behan himself knew how to spin a tale and one ca n't help but think he 'd appreciate this attempt to turn his life into art .
translation: 比汉自己知道如何讲故事，令人不禁想到他会欣赏将自己的生活转化为艺术的尝试。
back_translation: It is hard not to think that he would appreciate the attempt to transform his life into art, as he knows how to tell a story himself.

text: unfortunately the third seems out of reach - the beautiful , seductive anne elise .
translation: 不幸的是，第三个似乎遥不可及——美丽、诱人的安妮·艾莉丝。
back_translation: Unfortunately, the third one seems out of reach—the beautiful and alluring Annie Alice.

text: frank 's newest transport seems no different from the countless ones he 's done in the past .
translation: 弗兰克最新的运输似乎与他过去做过的无数次没有什么不同。
back_translation: Frank's latest shipment seems no different from the countless times he has done it in the past.

text: a surreal fairy tale that coils in on itself like a slow-motion whirlpool and achieves an atmosphere of sublime creepiness without ever precisely making sense .
translation: 一个超现实的童话，如同慢动作的漩涡般扭曲自我，营造出一种崇高的诡异氛围，却从未完全合乎逻辑。
back_translation: A surreal fairy tale, twisted like a slow-motion vortex, creates a sublime and eerie atmosphere, yet never fully conforms to logic.

text: a raw comedy that is intermittently hilarious as it attacks pretty much every taboo around .
translation: 一部粗俗的喜剧，时而令人捧腹，攻击几乎所有禁忌话题。
back_translation: A crude comedy that is sometimes belly-laughing funny, targeting almost all taboo subjects.

text: the californian desert , somewhere between death valley and los angeles .
translation: 加利福尼亚沙漠，在死亡谷和洛杉矶之间的某个地方。
back_translation: California desert, somewhere between Death Valley and Los Angeles.

text: a living testament to the power of the eccentric and the strange . the fact that it is n't very good is almost beside the point .
translation: 一个活生生的证明，彰显了古怪和奇异的力量。它并不是很好这一点几乎无关紧要。
back_translation: A living proof, demonstrating the power of the strange and peculiar. It is not very good; this point is almost irrelevant.

text: a dark , dull thriller with a parting shot that misfires .
translation: 一部阴暗沉闷的惊悚片，最后的反击却失误了。
back_translation: A dark and gloomy thriller, the final counterattack ended up failing.

text: oscar james takes ryan on a rollercoaster ride of mayhem and madness , but everything has a price and oscar wo n't let ryan easily escape this carnage-strewn nightmare 'til the final showdown when he reveals his real purpose .
translation: 奥斯卡·詹姆斯带着瑞安经历了一场疯狂与混乱的过山车之旅，但一切都要付出代价，奥斯卡不会让瑞安轻易逃脱这场充满毁灭的噩梦，直到最终决斗时他揭示自己的真实目的。
back_translation: Oscar James took Ryan on a crazy and chaotic rollercoaster ride, but everything comes at a cost. Oscar won't let Ryan easily escape this destructive nightmare until the final duel, where he reveals his true intentions.

text: [ soderbergh ] tends to place most of the psychological and philosophical material in italics rather than trust an audience 's intelligence , and he creates an overall sense of brusqueness .
translation: [索德伯格]倾向于将大多数心理和哲学材料用斜体字呈现，而不是相信观众的智力，他营造了一种粗暴的整体感觉。
back_translation: Soderbergh tends to present most psychological and philosophical material in italics, rather than trusting the audience's intellect, creating a raw overall feeling.

text: after narrow escapes from the germans and a stray mine in the channel , the two men are picked up at sea and interrogated as spies .
translation: 在经历了与德国人的险象环生和在海峡中的一颗流弹的侥幸逃脱后，这两名男子在海上被救起，并被审问为间谍。
back_translation: After experiencing a perilous situation with the Germans and narrowly escaping a stray bullet in the strait, the two men were rescued at sea and interrogated as spies.

text: alex enlists the aid of his old comrade father thomas ( addy ) and of a troubled artist ( sossamon ) upon whom he once performed an exorcism .
translation: 亚历克斯寻求他旧战友托马斯神父（阿迪）和一个有烦恼的艺术家（索萨蒙）的帮助，而他曾经为她进行过一次驱魔。
back_translation: Alex seeks the help of his old comrade Father Thomas (Adi) and a troubled artist (Sosamon), for whom he had once performed an exorcism.

text: [ screenwriter ] pimental took the farrelly brothers comedy and feminized it , but it is a rather poor imitation .
translation: [ 编剧 ] 皮门塔尔把法雷利兄弟的喜剧进行了女性化处理，但这是一种相当糟糕的模仿。
back_translation: [Screenwriter] Pimentel has feminized the Farrelly brothers' comedy, but it is quite a poor imitation.

text: no doubt the star and everyone else involved had their hearts in the right place . where their heads were is anyone 's guess .
translation: 毫无疑问，明星和其他所有参与者的心都是在正确的地方，但他们的头脑在哪里，谁也说不清。
back_translation: There is no doubt that the hearts of the stars and all other participants are in the right place, but where their minds are, no one can say for sure.

text: rife with the rueful , wry humor springing out of yiddish culture and language .
translation: 充满了源于意第绪文化和语言的悲伤而讽刺的幽默。
back_translation: Filled with a sadness that originates from Yiddish culture and language, along with a sarcastic humor.

text: the story and characters are nowhere near gripping enough .
translation: 故事和角色远没有足够吸引人。
back_translation: The story and characters are far from being engaging enough.

text: the more dreams max has , the closer the fbi are in tracking down the kidnapper , but also as the case continues max discoveres the lies , corruption , and deceit of the government .
translation: 马克斯做的梦越多，联邦调查局就越接近追踪到绑架者，但随着案件的发展，马克斯也发现了政府的谎言、腐败和欺骗。
back_translation: The more dreams Max had, the closer the FBI got to tracking down the kidnapper. However, as the case progressed, Max also uncovered the government's lies, corruption, and deceit.

text: the film is predictable in the reassuring manner of a beautifully sung holiday carol .
translation: 这部电影在一种优美演唱的节日颂歌中以令人安心的方式显得可预测。
back_translation: This movie feels predictable in a comforting way, like a beautifully sung festive anthem.

text: let 's issue a moratorium , effective immediately , on treacly films about inspirational prep-school professors and the children they so heartwarmingly motivate .
translation: 让我们立刻对那些关于感人至深的私立学校教授及其温暖激励孩子们的甜腻电影发布一项禁令。
back_translation: Let's immediately impose a ban on those heartwarming movies about private school teachers who inspire kids with their warmth.

text: 'blue crush ' swims away with the sleeper movie of the summer award .
translation: 《蓝色冲击》获得了今夏最佳潜力电影奖。
back_translation: "Blue Shock" won the Best Potential Film Award this summer.

text: if you love motown music , you 'll love this documentary .
translation: 如果你喜欢摩城音乐，你一定会喜欢这部纪录片。
back_translation: If you like Motown music, you'll definitely enjoy this documentary.

text: this is a beautifully sensitive portrait of a unique school and , a very special teacher .
translation: 这是对一所独特学校和一位非常特别老师的美丽而敏感的肖像。
back_translation: This is a beautiful and sensitive portrait of a unique school and a very special teacher.

text: while on a ski trip , one of them finds passion with a beautiful girl after a random accident on the icy slopes .
translation: 在滑雪旅行中，其中一人在冰冷的滑道上因一次意外与一位美丽女孩产生了激情。
back_translation: During a skiing trip, one person had a passionate encounter with a beautiful girl due to an accident on the icy slope.

text: chris forces mitchell to deliver guns and drugs while he hangs out on a rooftop and freaks out all day .
translation: 克里斯迫使米切尔送枪和毒品，而他自己则在屋顶上闲逛，一整天都紧张不安。
back_translation: Chris forced Mitchell to deliver guns and drugs while he himself was hanging out on the rooftop, feeling anxious all day long.

text: evergon is an affectionate tragicomedy that follows francis evergon in his last days among the unemployed .
translation: 《埃弗贡》是一部感人的悲喜剧，讲述了弗朗西斯·埃弗贡在失业者中度过的最后日子。
back_translation: "Evergon" is a touching tragicomedy that tells the story of Francis Evergon during the last days spent among the unemployed.

text: john j . is a seasoned hit man sent on a job to argentina .
translation: 约翰·J是一名经验丰富的杀手，被派往阿根廷执行任务。
back_translation: John J is an experienced assassin sent to Argentina to carry out a mission.

text: a thoroughly awful movie -- dumb , narratively chaotic , visually sloppy . . . a weird amalgam of 'the thing ' and a geriatric 'scream . '
translation: 一部彻底糟糕的电影——愚蠢、叙事混乱、视觉粗糙……是一种“怪物”和老年版“尖叫”的奇怪融合。
back_translation: A completely terrible movie—stupid, narratively chaotic, visually rough... it's a bizarre fusion of a "monster" and an elderly version of "Scream."

text: ensemble movies , like soap operas , depend on empathy . if there ai n't none , you have a problem .
translation: 群像电影，像肥皂剧一样，依赖于同情心。如果没有同情心，你就会有问题。
back_translation: Ensemble films, like soap operas, rely on empathy. If there is no empathy, you will have problems.

text: offers a persuasive look at a defeated but defiant nation in flux .
translation: 提供了对一个失败但仍然坚定不移的国家在变革中的有说服力的看法。
back_translation: It provides a compelling perspective on a failed yet still resolute nation in transformation.

text: katherine releases all her other clients in order to manage exclusively only her most promising talent .
translation: 凯瑟琳解雇了所有其他客户，以便专注于管理她最有潜力的人才。
back_translation: Catherine fired all other clients in order to focus on managing her most promising talents.

text: by the end of their phenomenal run , this unheralded group of musicians had played on more number ones hits than the beach boys , the rolling stones , elvis and the beatles combined - which makes them the greatest hit machine in the history of popular music .
translation: 在他们辉煌的历程结束时，这个不为人知的乐队所创作的热门歌曲数量超过了海滩男孩、滚石乐队、埃尔维斯和披头士乐队的总和，这使他们成为流行音乐历史上最伟大的热门乐队。
back_translation: At the end of their glorious journey, the number of hit songs created by this little-known band exceeded the total of the Beach Boys, the Rolling Stones, Elvis, and the Beatles, making them the greatest hit band in the history of popular music.

text: coarse , cliched and clunky , this trifling romantic comedy in which opposites attract for no better reason than that the screenplay demands it squanders the charms of stars hugh grant and sandra bullock .
translation: 粗糙、老生常谈且笨拙，这部微不足道的浪漫喜剧中，对立面吸引在剧情要求下没有更好的理由，糟蹋了休·格兰特和桑德拉·布洛克的魅力。
back_translation: Rough, clichéd, and awkward, this insignificant romantic comedy squanders the charm of Hugh Grant and Sandra Bullock with a flimsy justification for the opposites-attract trope dictated by the plot.

text: he works as an illustrator at a news paper and his life is pretty okay .
translation: 他在一家报社担任插画师，生活过得还不错。
back_translation: He works as an illustrator at a newspaper and has a decent life.

text: how good this film might be , depends if you believe that the shocking conclusion is too much of a plunge or not .
translation: 这部电影的好坏取决于你是否认为那个令人震惊的结局太过惊世骇俗。
back_translation: The quality of this movie depends on whether you think that shocking ending is too outrageous.

text: but with betts systematically eliminating anyone in his way , a further web of conspiracy unfolds and rachel and daniel are led to her old family doctor , robert barrum ( frank finlay ) .
translation: 但随着贝茨系统地消灭他道路上的任何人，一张更大的阴谋网展开，瑞秋和丹尼尔被引导到她的老家庭医生罗伯特·巴鲁姆（弗兰克·芬利）。
back_translation: But as Bates systematically eliminates anyone in his way, a larger web of conspiracy unfolds, leading Rachel and Daniel to her old family doctor, Robert Barham (Frank Finlay).

text: there are moments it can be heart-rending in an honest and unaffected ( and gentle ) way .
translation: 有些时刻，它可以以诚实、自然（且温柔）的方式让人心碎。
back_translation: At times, it can break one's heart in an honest, natural (and gentle) way.

text: lazy filmmaking , with the director taking a hands-off approach when he should have shaped the story to show us why it 's compelling .
translation: 懒惰的电影制作，导演采取了一种不闻不问的态度，而本应塑造故事，以展示它为什么引人入胜。
back_translation: Lazy filmmaking, where the director takes an indifferent attitude, should instead shape the story to show why it is engaging.

text: no good deed , based on a short story entitled 'the house on turk street ' by dashiell hammett , is about a police detective ( jack ) who , while doing a friend a favor and searching for a runaway teenager on turk street , stumbles upon a bizarre band of criminals about to pull off a bank robbery .
translation: 《无善行》是根据达希尔·哈米特的短篇小说《土耳其街上的房子》改编的，讲述了一名警探（杰克）在帮助朋友寻找失踪少年时，意外发现了一伙奇怪的罪犯正准备进行一起银行抢劫。
back_translation: "The Good Man" is adapted from Dashiell Hammett's short story "The House on Turk Street" and tells the story of a detective (Jack) who, while helping a friend find a missing teenager, accidentally discovers a group of strange criminals planning a bank robbery.

text: meet the razor eaters : five motivated , pissed-off young men who 've launched an anarchistic crime spree against melbourne , capturing all their deeds on home video .
translation: 会见剃刀食者：五个充满干劲、愤怒的年轻人，他们发动了一场针对墨尔本的无政府主义犯罪狂潮，并将他们的所有行为记录在录像带上。
back_translation: Meeting the Razor Eaters: Five energetic and angry young people who launched an anarchist crime spree in Melbourne and recorded all their actions on videotape.

text: but the day he does , he pulls one last detention duty with the toughest kids in the school .
translation: 但他那天做的时候，他和学校里最顽皮的孩子们一起执行了最后一次拘留责任。
back_translation: But that day, he carried out the final detention duty with the naughtiest kids in the school.

text: soon she grows increasingly wary about the motives of every man with whom she has contact -- and about her own .
translation: 她逐渐对与她接触的每一个男人的动机，以及她自己的动机，变得越来越警惕。
back_translation: She gradually became increasingly wary of the motives of every man she interacted with, as well as her own motives.

text: this journey awakens in ben an erotic passion that dares to destroy his tidy world as he pursues an illicit love affair , not with the administrator 's daughter , but with his wife , dori .
translation: 这段旅程唤醒了本内心的 erotic 激情，敢于摧毁他整洁的世界，因为他追求一段不正当的爱情，不是与管理员的女儿，而是与他的妻子多丽。
back_translation: This journey awakened the erotic passion within Ben, daring to destroy his tidy world as he pursued an improper love, not with the daughter of the caretaker, but with his wife Dolly.

text: there 's a delightfully quirky movie to be made from curling , but brooms is n't it .
translation: 从竞技冰壶中可以制作出一部令人愉快的古怪电影，但《冰壶街霸》并不是。
back_translation: A delightful quirky movie could be made from competitive curling, but "Curling Street Fighter" is not it.

text: 'grasp ' is a darkly humorous mystery peppered with some truly surreal visuals .
translation: 《把握》是一部暗黑幽默的悬疑作品，点缀着一些真正超现实的视觉表现。
back_translation: "Grasp" is a darkly humorous suspense work, adorned with some truly surreal visual representations.

text: but sometimes what we teach our children can be as deadly as not teaching them .
translation: 但有时我们教给孩子的东西可能和不教他们一样危险。
back_translation: But sometimes the things we teach our children can be as dangerous as not teaching them.

text: sayles . . . once again strands his superb performers in the same old story .
translation: 塞尔斯……再次将他出色的表演者们置于同一个老故事中。

text: and in wicker park ( chicago 's answer to greenwich village ) , rachel is about to meet her cosmic match .
translation: 在柳条公园（芝加哥对格林尼治村的回应） ，瑞秋即将遇见她的宇宙般的伴侣。
back_translation: In Willow Park (Chicago's response to Greenwich Village), Rachel is about to meet her cosmic partner.

text: this particular weekend strays from the usual when adam meets a girl at a party ( a simple incident which drives his best friend to the brink of a jealous rage ) .
translation: 这个特定的周末与往常不同，亚当在一个派对上遇到了一个女孩（一个简单的事件，引发了他最好朋友的嫉妒愤怒）。
back_translation: This particular weekend was different from usual; Adam met a girl at a party (a simple event that triggered the jealousy and anger of his best friend).

text: there he encounters dawn 's family who tie him down and put him on trail for the murder of the girl years before .
translation: 在那里，他遇到了黎明的家人，他们将他绑起来，并因多年前谋杀女孩的罪行对他进行审判。
back_translation: There, he met the family of the dawn, who tied him up and put him on trial for the crime of murdering a girl many years ago.

text: on an out of control train holding hostages and high-tech bio-weapons agent kristoff ( van damme ) becomes a one man army to derail the terrorists and save the lives of everyone on board !
translation: 在一列失控的列车上，绑架了人质和高科技生物武器的特工克里斯托夫（范·迪塞尔）变身为一支独立的军队，阻止恐怖分子并拯救车上所有人的生命！
back_translation: On a runaway train, agent Christoph (Vin Diesel), who has taken hostages and high-tech biological weapons, transforms into an independent army to stop the terrorists and save the lives of everyone on board!

text: the movie has very little to offer besides unintentional laughs .
translation: 这部电影除了无意间带来的笑声外几乎没有其他可看之处。
back_translation: This movie has almost nothing else to offer besides the laughter it unintentionally brings.

text: davis ' candid , archly funny and deeply authentic take on intimate relationships comes to fruition in her sophomore effort .
translation: 戴维斯对亲密关系的坦率、幽默和深刻真实的看法在她的第二部作品中得以体现。
back_translation: Davis's candid, humorous, and deeply authentic views on intimate relationships are reflected in her second work.

text: a self-narrated , blatantly lop-sided , cocky , nonchalant , fascinating and juicily entertaining documentary .
translation: 一部自我叙述的，明显偏颇，自信，随意，迷人且极具娱乐性的纪录片。
back_translation: A self-narrated, obviously biased, confident, casual, charming, and highly entertaining documentary.

text: a heroic tale of persistence that is sure to win viewers ' hearts .
translation: 一段有关坚持不懈的英雄故事，必将赢得观众的心。
back_translation: A story about a persistent hero will surely win the hearts of the audience.

text: whe he misses a dose of prozium , a mind-altering drug that hinders emotion , preston , who has been trained to enforce the strict laws of the new regime , suddenly becomes the only person capable of overthrowing it .
translation: 当普雷斯顿错过了一剂普罗齐姆，这种抑制情感的精神药物时，他作为被训练来执行新政权严格法律的人，突然间成为了唯一有能力推翻该政权的人。
back_translation: When Preston missed a dose of Prozium, the suppressive emotional medication, he suddenly became the only person capable of overthrowing the regime, despite being trained to enforce its strict laws.

text: the result is mesmerizing -- filled with menace and squalor .
translation: 结果令人着迷——充满了威胁和肮脏。
back_translation: The result is fascinating—full of threats and dirt.

text: pumpkin takes an admirable look at the hypocrisy of political correctness , but it does so with such an uneven tone that you never know when humor ends and tragedy begins .
translation: 《南瓜》以一种可敬的方式审视政治正确的虚伪，但它的语调却如此不均衡，以至于你永远不知道何时幽默结束，悲剧开始。
back_translation: "The Pumpkin" examines the hypocrisy of political correctness in a commendable way, but its tone is so uneven that you never know when humor ends and tragedy begins.

text: they gradually find themselves drawn to each other but , as their remarkable story plays out , the obstacles to their happiness prove all but insurmountable .
translation: 他们逐渐发现自己被彼此吸引，但随着他们非凡故事的展开，通向幸福的障碍几乎不可逾越。

text: interviews in movie houses , on the street and in the homes of the subjects tell the story of each individual .
translation: 在电影院、街头和受访者的家中进行的采访讲述了每个个体的故事。
back_translation: Interviews conducted in movie theaters, on the streets, and at the homes of respondents tell the stories of each individual.

text: in the end , we go back to a bedroom , one we saw in the very first scene and realize that this story was actually being told by lucy to jess , the lawyer she 's been seeing , two weeks before lucy is scheduled to leave for the writing fellowship .
translation: 最后，我们回到一个卧室，这是在故事的第一幕中见过的，意识到这个故事实际上是露西在向她的律师杰斯讲述的，而露西将在两周后离开去参加写作奖学金。
back_translation: Finally, we return to a bedroom that we saw in the first act, realizing that the story is actually Lucy telling it to her lawyer, Jess, and that Lucy will be leaving in two weeks to attend a writing scholarship.

text: john leguizamo may be a dramatic actor -- just not in this movie .
translation: 约翰·雷吉佐莫可能是一位戏剧演员——只是这部电影不是。

text: all of them have demoted the importance of the real world , giving all of their attention to the fantasy world of the movies .

text: so when charlie sees mallory with her new boyfriend , curtis , he goes a bit mad .

text: it winds up moving in many directions as it searches ( vainly , i think ) for something fresh to say .
translation: 它在寻找（我认为是徒劳的）新鲜话题时，最终朝多个方向移动。

text: the film delivers what it promises : a look at the `` wild ride `` that ensues when brash young men set out to conquer the online world with laptops , cell phones and sketchy business plans .
translation: 这部电影兑现了它的承诺：展示了当年轻的冒险者们带着笔记本电脑、手机和模糊的商业计划踏上征服网络世界的“疯狂旅程”时所引发的局面。

text: ever notice the similarities between steve `` the crocodile hunter `` irwin and boba fett ?
translation: 你有没有注意到斯蒂夫“鳄鱼猎手”欧文和波巴·费特之间的相似之处？

text: awash with melancholy and disillusionment , it 's a tall task to love hong kong .

text: a collage of clichM-is and a dim echo of allusions to other films .

text: obviously , a lot of people wasted a lot of their time ( including mine ) on something very inconsequential .
translation: 显然，很多人浪费了很多时间（包括我自己）在一些非常不重要的事情上。
back_translation: Obviously, many people (including myself) waste a lot of time on some very unimportant things.

text: both they and their wives ami ( meredith salenger ) and claire ( tara westwood ) are dealing with the reality that they are no longer watching mtv , but instead find themselves flipping channels to vh1 .
translation: 他们和他们的妻子阿米（梅雷迪斯·塞林杰）以及克莱尔（塔拉·韦斯特伍德）正在面对这样一个现实：他们不再看MTV，而是发现自己在切换频道到VH1。

text: larry goldberg is the owner of a second-hand bookstore in amsterdam .
translation: 拉里·戈德堡是阿姆斯特丹一家二手书店的老板。

text: ultimately eve struggles with destiny in light of her new found love , rediscovery of homeland , and her sense of life 's purpose .
translation: 最终，伊芙在她新发现的爱、对故土的重新认识以及对生命目的的感知中，努力与命运斗争。

text: lessons abound for the students and teacher culminating in a reunion 25 years later .
translation: 学生和老师的课外活动丰富多彩，最终在25年后迎来了重聚。

text: what we have here is an examination of fathers , sons and sibling rivalry - squared and sideways
translation: 我们这里探讨的是父亲、儿子和兄弟之间的竞争关系——以平方和侧面的方式。
back_translation: What we are discussing here is the competitive relationship between fathers, sons, and brothers—approached from the perspective of squares and sides.

text: sean penn , you owe nicolas cage an apology .

text: the next big thing 's not-so-big ( and not-so-hot ) directorial debut .

text: you really have to salute writer-director haneke ( he adapted elfriede jelinek 's novel ) for making a film that is n't nearly as graphic but much more powerful , brutally shocking and difficult to watch .

back_translation: You should really pay tribute to the writer and director Haneke (who adapted Alfred Jarry's novel), because he has created a film that is not so gory but is more impactful, shocking, and difficult to watch.

text: a powerful , absorbing and thoroughly transporting film experience .

text: does paint some memorable images . . . , but makhmalbaf keeps her distance from the characters
translation: 确实描绘了一些令人难忘的画面……，但马赫马尔巴夫与角色保持了一定的距离。

text: i can easily imagine benigni 's pinocchio becoming a christmas perennial . coal is n't as easy to come by as it used to be and this would be a worthy substitute for naughty children 's stockings .

text: pc stability notwithstanding , the film suffers from a simplistic narrative and a pat , fairy-tale conclusion .

text: older brothers and a brother-in-law are in his way .

text: john takes off , his trust in the system diminishing rapidly .

translation: 随着种族主义、偏执和情妇的介入，事情变得黑暗。

text: no ten & # 237 ; a que enfrentarse con la estrategia y potencia de un ej & # 233 ; rcito enemigo , sino con el jolgorio de grandes masas que invadir & # 237 ; an el territorio con panderetas , risotadas e histeria .
translation: 不仅要面对敌军的策略和实力，还要面对大型群众的热闹，他们将用响板、笑声和歇斯底里侵入领土。

text: this means that his superiors hold him in high regard for his unblemished reputation and excellent track record .
translation: 这意味着他的上级对他高度评价，因为他有着无可挑剔的声誉和出色的业绩。

translation: 在保持趣味性的同时，从未陷入战场陈词滥调的泥沼。

text: the documentary also describes the deployment era of the regulus submarines ( 1958-1964 ) .

text: despite all the talking , by the time the bloody climax arrives we still do n't feel enough of an attachment to these guys to care one way or another .
translation: 尽管有很多对话，但当血腥的高潮到来时，我们仍然对这些角色没有足够的感情来在乎任何一方。

text: when they fall in love for the first time , it 's an impossible situation , because you ca n't just change your life overnight .
translation: 当他们第一次坠入爱河时，这是一种不可能的情况，因为你不能一夜之间就改变自己的生活。

text: the brothers chow nunn and chow lui 's giant computer company is facing a tense crisis - a powerful computer virus is rapidly wiping out their computer network .

text: he talks in her voice at the dinner table and wears her fur coat to bed .
translation: 他在餐桌上用她的声音说话，晚上穿着她的毛皮大衣睡觉。

text: in this way , we will find space between these to fit smaller stones , our small necessities .
translation: 通过这种方式，我们将在这些石头之间找到空间，放入更小的石头和我们的小需求。

text: a squad of british soldiers on training in the lonesome scottish wilderness find a wounded special forces captain and the carnaged remains of his team .
translation: 一队英国士兵在孤独的苏格兰荒野进行训练，发现一名受伤的特种部队队长和他队伍的残骸。

text: the story starts with phillips and a cohort robbing a store and injuring a salesperson .
translation: 故事开始于菲利普斯和一名同伙抢劫一家商店，并伤害了一名销售员。

text: majidi 's direction has never been smoother or more confident .
translation: 马基迪的导演风格从未如此顺畅或自信。

text: bears about as much resemblance to the experiences of most battered women as spider-man does to the experiences of most teenagers .
translation: 与大多数遭受虐待女性的经历相比，这简直和蜘蛛侠与大多数青少年的经历相似。

text: a lapp woman anni gives a shelter to both of them at her farm .
translation: 一个拉普人女子安妮在她的农场给他们两个提供了庇护。

text: after some time the son and daughter-in-law must depart , leaving the old man alone with his dreams and fading breath .
translation: 经过一段时间，儿子和儿媳必须离开，留老人独自面对他的梦想和渐渐消逝的呼吸。

text: fisher has bared his soul and confronted his own shortcomings here in a way . . . that feels very human and very true to life .
translation: 费舍尔在这里坦诚了自己的内心，直面自己的不足，这种方式……让人感受到非常人性化和真实的生活。

text: two hard-boiled detectives ( blair brown and joe grifasi ) and an oddball pathologist ( dylan baker ) investigate a severed hand found in a laundromat - and the results are n't pretty . . .
translation: 两个硬汉侦探（布莱尔·布朗和乔·格里法西）和一个奇怪的法医（迪伦·贝克）调查在洗衣店发现的一个 severed hand - 结果并不美好……
back_translation: Two tough-guy detectives (Blair Brown and Joe Grifasi) and a quirky forensic expert (Dylan Baker) investigate a severed hand found in a laundromat - the outcome is not pleasant...

text: it offers an important lesson about how a supposedly simple disagreement can get so far out of hand that lives are lost .
translation: 它提供了一个重要的教训，即所谓的简单分歧如何会升级到失去生命的地步。
back_translation: It provides an important lesson on how seemingly simple disagreements can escalate to the point of losing lives.

text: there 's not a spark of new inspiration in it , just more of the same , done with noticeably less energy and imagination .
translation: 其中没有一点新的灵感，只是更多的老套，完成时明显缺少活力和想象力。
back_translation: There is not a hint of new inspiration, just more clichés, and it clearly lacks vitality and imagination when completed.

text: with some help from otis and the paddy wagon 's quirky regulars , among them an angry war vet in a parrot costume and a traveling salesman with a `` small `` problem , mark finally gets what he deserves .
translation: 在奥提斯和巡逻车的一些古怪常客的帮助下，其中包括一位穿着鹦鹉服装的愤怒退伍军人和一个“有小问题”的旅行推销员，马克最终得到了他应得的结果。
back_translation: With the help of some quirky regulars at Otis and the patrol car, including an angry veteran dressed in a parrot costume and a traveling salesman with "a few little issues," Mark ultimately got the result he deserved.

text: an authentically vague , but ultimately purposeless , study in total pandemonium .
translation: 一项真正模糊但最终毫无目的的研究，处于完全的混乱之中。

text: an overly familiar scenario is made fresh by an intelligent screenplay and gripping performances in this low-budget , video-shot , debut indie effort .
translation: 一个过于熟悉的情节在这部低预算、视频拍摄的首部独立作品中，通过聪明的剧本和引人入胜的表演重新焕发了活力。
back_translation: A plot that feels too familiar is invigorated in this low-budget, video-shot debut independent work through a clever script and captivating performances.

text: living in a beach shack with three roommates including her rebellious younger sister , she is up before dawn every morning to conquer the waves and count the days until the pipe masters surf competition .
translation: 她和三个室友，包括她叛逆的妹妹，住在海滩的小屋里。每天清晨都在黎明之前起床，征服海浪，计算着距离管道大师冲浪比赛的日子。
back_translation: She lives in a beach cottage with her three roommates, including her rebellious sister. Every morning, they wake up before dawn, conquer the waves, and count down the days until the pipe master surf competition.

text: a superbly acted and funny/gritty fable of the humanizing of one woman at the hands of the unseen forces of fate .
translation: 一部表现出色、幽默而尖锐的寓言，讲述了一位女性在命运无形力量的影响下人性化的过程。

text: `` my dinner with ovitz `` is a pithy , yet epicurean tale of broken dreams , broken hollywood power brokers ( and broken knees ) .
translation: 《我与奥维茨的晚餐》是一个简洁而美味的故事，讲述了破碎的梦想、破碎的好莱坞权力中介（以及破碎的膝盖）。
back_translation: "My Dinner with Ović" is a concise and delicious story that tells of shattered dreams, fractured Hollywood power dynamics (and broken knees).

text: despite the fact that this film was n't as bad as i thought it was going to be , it 's still not a good movie
translation: 尽管这部电影并不像我想象中那么糟，但它仍然不是一部好电影。

text: an interesting , if not entirely successful , biography of two extraordinary personalities .
translation: 一本有趣的，尽管并不完全成功的两位非凡人物的传记。

text: lacking gravitas , macdowell is a placeholder for grief , and ergo this sloppy drama is an empty vessel . leave these flowers unpicked -- they 're dead on the vine .
translation: 缺乏庄重感的麦克道尔只是悲伤的一个象征，因此这部粗糙的戏剧也是一个空壳。让这些花保持未被采摘——它们在藤上已经死了。
back_translation: The McDowell, lacking a sense of solemnity, is merely a symbol of sadness, and thus this rough play is also an empty shell. Let these flowers remain unpicked—they have already died on the vine.

text: there is the mother and the father , who do n't seem to have a normal marriage anymore , there 's the daughter , lena , who has a disease and will soon leave the house for medical treatment in switzerland , and her husband harry , who has a mysterious past .
translation: 有一位母亲和父亲，他们似乎不再拥有正常的婚姻；还有女儿莉娜，她患有一种疾病，并将很快离开家去瑞士接受治疗；以及她的丈夫哈里，拥有一个神秘的过去。

text: dildo diaries takes a lighthearted but 'probing ' approach to exploring the development of sections of the texas penal code and its effects on the adult sex toy industry .

text: slowly but surely devolves into a fascinating , cringe-inducing portrait of cultural solipsism , climaxing in an emotional meltdown that would n't look out of place in mid-period cassavetes .

back_translation: The first shocking thing about "Sister Flower Boys" is that the movie is actually watchable. Even more confusingly, it's surprisingly funny.

text: you may feel compelled to watch the film twice or pick up a book on the subject .

text: they carry out a sentence pronounced by rule of law .

text: the longer one watches this determinedly ragged portrait of blue-collar teenage desperation . . . the more one gets absorbed in the utter unbridled nihilism of its 'characters . '

translation: 在这个关于艺术家弗里达·卡罗生活的叙述中，有些时刻是今年电影界最精彩的部分。不幸的是，它们夹杂在对卡罗生活最无聊的叙述之间。
back_translation: In this narrative about the life of the artist Frida Kahlo, some moments are the most brilliant parts of this year's film industry. Unfortunately, they are interspersed among the most boring accounts of Kahlo's life.

text: his search soon sends him down a dangerous path . . .
translation: 他的搜索很快将他引向一条危险的道路……

text: but when those worlds collide , taking the lives of his wife and younger son , sullivan and his surviving son , michael jr . , leave their sedate home life behind and embark on a startling journey of revenge .
translation: 但当那些世界相撞，夺走了他妻子和小儿子的生命时，沙利文和他幸存的儿子麦克尔·朱诺，抛弃了平静的家庭生活，开始了一段惊人的复仇之旅。
back_translation: But when those worlds collided and took away the lives of his wife and young son, Sullivan and his surviving son, Michael Juno, abandoned their peaceful family life and embarked on an astonishing journey of revenge.

text: like its title character , this nicholas nickleby finds itself in reduced circumstances -- and , also like its hero , it remains brightly optimistic , coming through in the end .
translation: 就像它的主角一样，这部《尼克尔比大侠》也处于困境中——而且，像它的英雄一样，它依然保持着明亮的乐观情怀，最终迎来了曙光。
back_translation: Like its protagonist, this "Nicholas Nickleby" is also in a predicament – and, just like its hero, it maintains a bright sense of optimism and ultimately welcomes the dawn.

text: the film boasts dry humor and jarring shocks , plus moments of breathtaking mystery .

text: the four feathers is definitely horse feathers , but if you go in knowing that , you might have fun in this cinematic sandbox .
translation: 《四根羽毛》绝对是胡说八道，但如果你心里明白这一点，那你可能会在这个电影沙盒中玩得开心。

text: there 's not a fresh idea at the core of this tale .
translation: 这个故事的核心没有新鲜的创意。

text: this attractive , 30 year old successful graphic designer with a captivating personality has n't had a good date in over a year , and she 's not alone - her best friends share the same problem .
translation: 这位30岁、成功且迷人的平面设计师拥有迷人的个性，却已经一年多没有过一次好的约会，她并不孤单 - 她的最好朋友们也面临着同样的问题。
back_translation: This 30-year-old successful and charming graphic designer has a captivating personality, but she hasn't had a good date in over a year. She is not alone—her best friends are facing the same issue.

text: undercover fbi agent and former marine frank castle ( jane ) is devastated when his wife and children are killed when they accidentally witness a mafia hit , and with nothing left to lose , decides to dedicate himself fully to the eradication of crime ( organized and otherwise ) from america , as an army , assassin , judge and jury all rolled up into one man ( and a whole lot of guns ) : the punisher .
translation: 卧底FBI特工和前海军陆战队员弗兰克·卡斯特尔（简）在妻子和孩子意外目睹一起黑手党暗杀后被杀害时感到沮丧，失去一切后，他决定全心投入到消灭美国的犯罪（无论是有组织的还是其他）中，成为一个集合了军队、杀手、法官和陪审团于一身的男人（以及一大堆枪）的惩罚者。
back_translation: Undercover FBI agent and former Marine Frank Castle (also known as The Punisher) becomes disillusioned after he and his wife and children are murdered when they inadvertently witness a Mafia assassination. After losing everything, he resolves to dedicate himself to eliminating crime in America (whether organized or otherwise), becoming a man who embodies the military, assassin, judge, and jury, armed with a vast array of weaponry.

text: it 's thoroughly entertaining and nonpatronizing , and occasionally even insightful .
translation: 这部作品既趣味盎然又不令人感到居高临下，偶尔还能带来一些启发。

translation: 当他发现她是同性恋时，他开始做功课。

text: it 's difficult to imagine the process that produced such a script , but here 's guessing that spray cheese and underarm noises played a crucial role .
translation: 很难想象产生如此剧本的过程，但我猜喷雾奶酪和腋下噪音在其中扮演了关键角色。
back_translation: It's hard to imagine the process that led to such a script, but I guess spray cheese and armpit noises played a key role in it.

text: for decades we 've marveled at disney 's rendering of water , snow , flames and shadows in a hand-drawn animated world . prepare to marvel again .
translation: 几十年来，我们一直惊叹于迪士尼在手绘动画世界中对水、雪、火焰和阴影的表现。准备好再次惊叹吧。
back_translation: For decades, we have been amazed by Disney's portrayal of water, snow, fire, and shadows in the world of hand-drawn animation. Get ready to be amazed once again.

text: whistle completes the trilogy started in from here to eternity and the thin red line .
translation: 《哨子》完成了从《此去经年》和《细红线》开始的三部曲。
back_translation: "The Whistle" completes the trilogy that began with "Gone with the Years" and "The Thin Red Line."

text: when anti-death-penalty activist david gale is convicted and condemned to death for the murder of a colleague , reporter bitsey bloom sets out to learn the story behind gale 's crime .
translation: 当反死刑活动家大卫·盖尔因谋杀一名同事而被定罪并判处死刑时，记者比茨·布鲁姆决定深入了解盖尔犯罪背后的故事。
back_translation: When anti-death penalty activist David Gale was convicted and sentenced to death for the murder of a colleague, journalist Bitsy Bloom decided to investigate the story behind Gale's crime.

text: a captivatingly quirky hybrid of character portrait , romantic comedy and beat-the-clock thriller .
translation: 一个引人入胜、古怪的混合体，结合了角色肖像、浪漫喜剧和紧迫感惊悚片。
back_translation: A captivating and quirky blend that combines character portraiture, romantic comedy, and suspenseful thrillers.

text: they all decide to go together and they leave .
translation: 他们都决定一起去，然后离开了。
back_translation: They all decided to go together and then left.

text: the family come from a long line of masters of disguise who are able to mask themselves as almost anyone or anything by harnessing the great power of energico .
translation: 这个家庭来自于一个长期以来的伪装大师家族，他们能够通过利用巨大的能量力量，伪装成几乎任何人或任何事物。
back_translation: This family belongs to a long-standing lineage of masters of disguise, capable of transforming into almost anyone or anything by harnessing immense energy forces.

text: if we do n't demand a standard of quality for the art that we choose , we deserve the trash that we get .
translation: 如果我们不对所选择的艺术设定质量标准，那么我们就配得上我们所得到的垃圾。
back_translation: If we do not set quality standards for the art we choose, then we deserve the junk we get.

text: the corrupt wizard saruman ( christopher lee ) , under the power of the dark lord sauron , and his slimy assistant , gr & # 237 ; ma wormtongue ( brad dourif ) , have created a grand uruk-hai army bent on the destruction of man and middle-earth .
translation: 腐败的巫师萨鲁曼（克里斯托弗·李），在黑暗领主索伦的力量之下，以及他那阴险的助手格里马·蜗虫（布拉德·道里夫），已经创建了一支庞大的乌鲁克海军队，决心摧毁人类和中土世界。
back_translation: The corrupted wizard Saruman (Christopher Lee), under the power of the dark lord Sauron, along with his treacherous assistant Gríma Wormtongue (Brad Dourif), has created a vast army of Uruk-hai, determined to destroy humanity and Middle-earth.

text: everything about the quiet american is good , except its timing .
translation: 关于《安静的外国人》，一切都很好，除了它的时机。
back_translation: Regarding "The Quiet Foreigners," everything is great, except for its timing.

text: sandler has played weirdos for zany comic effect , and it 's interesting to finally see him play one in a relatively subdued romantic dramedy .
translation: 桑德勒曾经在一些滑稽的喜剧中饰演古怪角色，而在一部相对温和的浪漫喜剧中看到他饰演这样的角色，真是令人感兴趣。
back_translation: Sandler has played quirky characters in some comedic films, and it's quite interesting to see him portray such a role in a relatively mild romantic comedy.

text: delia , greta , and paula rank as three of the most multilayered and sympathetic female characters of the year . as each of them searches for their place in the world , miller digs into their very minds to find an unblinking , flawed humanity .
translation: 德莉亚、格蕾塔和保拉被评价为今年最复杂且最具同情心的女性角色之一。在她们各自寻找在世界中立足之地的过程中，米勒深入探索她们的内心，揭示出一种毫不掩饰的、有缺陷的人性。
back_translation: Delia, Greta, and Paula have been recognized as some of the most complex and empathetic female characters of the year. As they each seek their place in the world, Miller delves deep into their inner selves, revealing a raw and flawed humanity.

text: little does caroline realize that this delicious parisian beauty is a modern-day vampire looking for vunerable victims .
translation: 卡罗琳丝毫没有意识到，这位美味的巴黎美女是一位现代吸血鬼，正在寻找脆弱的猎物。
back_translation: Caroline had no idea that this delicious Parisian beauty was a modern vampire, prowling for vulnerable prey.

text: not a bad way to spend a couple of hours .
translation: 花几个小时这样度过也不错。
back_translation: Spending a few hours like this isn't bad either.

text: nothing more than a widget cranked out on an assembly line to see if stupid americans will get a kick out of goofy brits with cute accents performing ages-old slapstick and unfunny tricks .
translation: 不过是一个在流水线上生产的小玩意儿，看看愚蠢的美国人是否会因为可爱的英国人用可爱的口音表演古老的滑稽戏和不搞笑的把戏而感到高兴。
back_translation: It's just a small gadget produced on an assembly line, let's see if the silly Americans will be pleased because the lovely British perform ancient slapstick and unfunny tricks with their charming accents.

text: just too silly and sophomoric to ensnare its target audience .
translation: 实在太幼稚和傻乎乎了，无法吸引其目标观众。
back_translation: It's really too immature and silly to attract its target audience.

text: when it 's over all that they got is a bag full of black gems which is what the man who hired them wanted .
translation: 当一切结束时，他们得到的只是一袋黑色宝石，而这正是雇佣他们的那个人想要的。
back_translation: When everything was over, what they ended up with was just a bag of black jewels, which was exactly what the person who hired them wanted.

text: the elders hope to return home quickly but their new friend has other plans .
translation: 长者们希望尽快回家，但他们的新朋友却有其他打算。
back_translation: The elders hope to go home soon, but their new friends have other plans.

text: it is survival of the fittest as the friendships are pushed to the limit .
translation: 在友谊经受考验的时刻，适者生存。
back_translation: In times when friendship is put to the test, only the fittest survive.

text: the film fits into a genre that has been overexposed , redolent of a thousand cliches , and yet remains uniquely itself , vibrant with originality .
translation: 这部电影属于一个被过度曝光的类型，充满了无数的陈词滥调，然而它依然独具特色，充满了独创性。
back_translation: This film belongs to a genre that has been overly exposed, filled with countless clichés, yet it remains distinctive and full of originality.

text: una works as a supermarket cashier hating her work and everybody around : the costumers , the manager , the staff .
translation: Una在超市当收银员，厌恨她的工作和周围的每一个人：顾客、经理和员工。
back_translation: Una works as a cashier at a supermarket and hates her job and everyone around her: the customers, the manager, and the employees.

text: amerika and zed are upset that kyle is spending more time with trasha than with them .
translation: 美国和泽德对凯尔花更多时间与特拉沙在一起而感到不满。
back_translation: The United States and Zed are unhappy that Kyle spends more time with Trasha.

text: the raw footage gives us an alternate insight to chaplin 's classic film which started production years before adolph hitler was seen as a major threat in the western world .
translation: 原始镜头让我们对查理·卓别林的经典电影有了另一种视角，该电影的制作开始于阿道夫·希特勒在西方世界被视为重大威胁的几年之前。
back_translation: The original footage gives us a different perspective on Charlie Chaplin's classic film, produced just a few years before Adolf Hitler was seen as a significant threat in the Western world.

text: the orchestra player gets known to his neighbour , a gay man having also relationship troubles , and together they are trying hard to find a way how to go on with their lifes .
translation: 乐团演奏者与邻居相识，这位邻居是一名有着感情困扰的同性恋者，他们一起努力寻找继续生活的方法。
back_translation: A musician from the band becomes acquainted with a neighbor, who is a gay man struggling with emotional issues, and they work together to find ways to continue living their lives.

text: roger swanson is a hopelessly cynical advertising copywriter with a razor-sharp wit who believes he has mastered the art of manipulating women .
translation: 罗杰·斯旺森是一位无可救药的愤世嫉俗的广告文案撰写人，他机智过人，自认为已经掌握了操控女性的艺术。
back_translation: Roger Swanson is an incorrigible cynic and an advertising copywriter who is exceptionally witty, believing that he has mastered the art of manipulating women.

text: if divine secrets of the ya-ya sisterhood suffers from a ploddingly melodramatic structure , it comes to life in the performances .
translation: 如果《耶耶姐妹会的神秘秘密》在情节结构上显得沉闷而戏剧化，但在表演中却焕发了生命。
back_translation: While "The Mysterious Secrets of the Yaya Sisters" appears dull and dramatic in its plot structure, it comes alive in the performance.

text: an overblown clunker full of bad jokes , howling cliches and by-the-numbers action sequences .
translation: 一部充斥着糟糕笑话、老生常谈和千篇一律动作场面的夸张烂片。
back_translation: A ridiculous film filled with bad jokes, clichés, and repetitive action scenes.

text: she meets ian miller , a high school english teacher , wasp , and dreamboat she had made a fool of herself over at the restaurant ; they date secretly for a while before her family finds out .
translation: 她遇到了伊恩·米勒，一位高中英语老师，白人新教徒，还是她在餐厅里让自己出丑的梦中情人；他们秘密约会了一段时间，直到她的家人发现了。
back_translation: She met Ian Miller, a high school English teacher, a white Protestant, and also the dream lover she embarrassed herself in front of in the restaurant; they secretly dated for a while until her family found out.

text: a very slow , uneventful ride around a pretty tattered old carousel .
translation: 一次非常缓慢、平淡无奇的环绕着漂亮但破旧的旋转木马的旅程。
back_translation: A very slow and unremarkable journey around a beautiful but old carousel.

text: his first challenge is from the chinese workers , technicians , and officers , who have been trained to work under the old system and unable to function sufficiently in the new era of international competition .
translation: 他面临的第一个挑战来自中国工人、技术人员和官员，他们是按照旧系统培训的，无法在新的国际竞争时代中有效运作。
back_translation: The first challenge he faces comes from Chinese workers, technicians, and officials who were trained under the old system and are unable to operate effectively in the new era of international competition.

text: if your taste runs to 'difficult ' films you absolutely ca n't miss it .
translation: 如果你喜欢“难懂”的电影，你绝对不能错过它。
back_translation: If you enjoy "difficult to understand" movies, you absolutely cannot miss it.

text: he 's fascinated by a candy machine , and asks his mother for money , but she refuses .
translation: 他对一台糖果机很着迷，请求母亲给他钱，但她拒绝了。
back_translation: He was fascinated by a candy machine and asked his mother for money, but she refused.

text: as violent , profane and exploitative as the most offensive action flick you 've ever seen .
translation: 与你见过的最恶劣的动作片一样暴力、粗俗和剥削。
back_translation: As violent, crude, and exploitative as the worst action movies you've seen.

text: the film 's apocalyptic urban setting and unrelentingly icy zeitgeist is message enough without a triumphant parting shot
translation: 这部电影的末日城市背景和无情的冷酷气氛本身就传达了足够的信息，无需一个胜利的结尾镜头。
back_translation: The apocalyptic city backdrop and the ruthless, cold atmosphere of this movie convey enough information on their own, without needing a victorious ending shot.

text: with the support of her best friend wilma watson and their draft-dodging companion will bacon , emily is able to stand by her convictions in a household dominated by the standards of a salt-of-the-earth father and an unconditionally loving mother .
translation: 在她最好的朋友威尔玛·沃森和他们逃避征兵的伙伴威尔·培根的支持下，艾米莉能够在一个被朴实无华的父亲和无条件爱的母亲的标准主导的家庭中坚持自己的信念。
back_translation: With the support of her best friend Wilma Watson and their draft-dodging partner Will Bacon, Emily was able to uphold her beliefs in a household dominated by the standards of a plainspoken father and an unconditionally loving mother.

text: well as a hero in the guise of prince charmont , whom ella falls in love with .
translation: 以及作为假扮查尔蒙特王子的英雄，艾拉爱上了他。
back_translation: As the heroine who disguises herself as Prince Charmont, Ella falls in love with him.

text: after spending a year in a mental instituton , molly peters finally returns home to her mother .
translation: 在精神病院待了一年后，莫莉·彼得斯终于回到母亲身边。
back_translation: After spending a year in the mental hospital, Molly Peters finally returned to her mother.

text: content merely to lionize its title character and exploit his anger - all for easy sanctimony , formulaic thrills and a ham-fisted sermon on the need for national health insurance .
translation: 内容只是为了抬高其标题角色，利用他的愤怒——这一切都是为了轻松的自以为是、公式化的刺激和对国家健康保险必要性的生硬说教。
back_translation: The content is merely to elevate its titular role, exploiting his anger—this is all for a simplistic self-righteous, formulaic provocation and a blunt preaching on the necessity of national health insurance.

text: undercover brother does n't go far enough . it 's just a silly black genre spoof .
translation: 《卧底兄弟》没有更进一步。它只是一部愚蠢的黑人类型讽刺片。
back_translation: "Undercover Brothers" did not go any further. It is just a silly satire of African American stereotypes.

text: the footage of the rappers at play and the prison interview with suge knight are just two of the elements that will grab you .
translation: 这些饶舌歌手玩乐的视频和与苏格·奈特的监狱采访只是会吸引你的两个元素。
back_translation: These rap artists' music videos and the prison interview with Suge Knight are just two elements that will attract you.

text: takes one character we do n't like and another we do n't believe , and puts them into a battle of wills that is impossible to care about and is n't very funny .
translation: 将一个我们不喜欢的角色和一个我们不相信的角色放在一起，引发一场我们根本无法关心的意志之战，而这场战斗也并不是很好笑。
back_translation: Combining a character we don't like with a character we don't believe in leads to a struggle of wills that we simply cannot care about, and this battle is not very funny either.

text: an entertaining , grimy view of the traps of machismo tucked inside a cop thriller .
translation: 一部警匪惊悚片中蕴含的娱乐性、肮脏的对男人主义陷阱的观察。
back_translation: The entertainment value contained in a crime thriller depicts observations of the dirty traps of male chauvinism.

text: the subject of swinging still seems ripe for a documentary -- just not this one .
translation: 摆动这个主题似乎仍然适合制作纪录片——只是并非这个。
back_translation: The theme of swinging still seems suitable for making a documentary—just not this one.

text: how does it play a significant role in japanese culture , and why does it fascinate american youth ?
translation: 它在日本文化中扮演着重要的角色，为什么它吸引了美国年轻人？
back_translation: It plays an important role in Japanese culture; why does it attract young Americans?

text: even the hastily and amateurishly drawn animation can not engage .
translation: 即使是匆忙和业余水平制作的动画也无法吸引人。
back_translation: Even animations made in a rush and at an amateur level are not engaging.

text: on balance , i recommend the movie both for nicholson 's performance and for the opportunity to spend some time with the kind of man that we often meet in real life , but rarely see on screen .
translation: 总体而言，我推荐这部电影，一方面是因为尼克尔森的表演，另一方面是因为可以花一些时间与我们在现实生活中经常碰到但在银幕上很少见到的那种人相处。
back_translation: Overall, I recommend this movie, partly because of Nicholson's performance, and partly because it offers a chance to spend some time with a type of person we often encounter in real life but seldom see on screen.

text: but for the shell-shocked crew , trapped together in the sub 's narrow corridors and constricted spaces , this is about to become a journey into the sensory delusions , mental deceptions and runaway fear that lurk just below the surface of the ocean and deep inside the human psyche .
translation: 但对于那些在潜艇狭窄的走廊和受限空间中一起被困的身心俱疲的船员们来说，这即将成为一场进入感官幻觉、心理错觉以及潜伏在海洋表面和人类心理深处的失控恐惧的旅程。
back_translation: But for the exhausted crew members trapped together in the narrow corridors and confined spaces of the submarine, this is about to become a journey into sensory hallucinations, psychological illusions, and the uncontrollable fears lurking beneath the ocean's surface and deep within the human psyche.

text: through time travel wells and twain team up with sir arthur conan doyle and a young jules verne and wind up in the year 2001 seeing results of their writings that help in their attempts to find dr . noah and save the world from destruction .
translation: 通过时间旅行井，特温与亚瑟·柯南·道尔爵士和年轻的儒勒·凡尔纳联手，最终来到了2001年，看到他们的作品所带来的结果，这些结果帮助他们寻找诺亚博士，并拯救世界免于毁灭。
back_translation: Through the time travel well, Twain teamed up with Sir Arthur Conan Doyle and the young Jules Verne, ultimately arriving in 2001 to see the results of their works, which helped them find Dr. Noah and save the world from destruction.

text: arrested and imprisoned in a juvenile detention facility , leland comes in contact with an aspiring writer and prison teacher , pearl madison ( cheadle ) .
translation: 被捕并被监禁在青少年拘留所，利兰与一位有抱负的作家和监狱教师珀尔·马迪逊（切德尔）相遇。
back_translation: Imprisoned in a juvenile detention center, Lilan meets an aspiring writer and prison teacher, Pearl Madison (Chedal).

text: if you 're not the target demographic . . . this movie is one long chick-flick slog .
translation: 如果你不是目标观众……这部电影就是一部漫长的女性影片。
back_translation: If you are not the target audience... this movie is a long female film.

text: daughter from danang sticks with its subjects a little longer and tells a deeper story
translation: 来自岘港的女儿与其主题保持更长的时间，讲述了更深刻的故事。
back_translation: The daughter from Da Nang maintains a longer engagement with its theme, telling a deeper story.

text: as it stands it 's an opera movie for the buffs .
translation: 就目前而言，这是一部适合爱好者的歌剧电影。
back_translation: At present, this is an opera film suitable for enthusiasts.

text: ranks with such films as in the bedroom , ordinary people , and terms of endearment in the sensitivity with which it observes the effect a child 's death on the remaining members of the family .
translation: 与《床头故事》、《普通人》和《亲密关系》等影片同列，敏感地观察了孩子死亡对家庭其他成员的影响。
back_translation: Alongside films like "Bedtime Stories," "Ordinary People," and "Intimate Relationships," it sensitively observes the impact of a child's death on other family members.

text: the theme of the film simultaneously addresses the similarities between the two factions of law and crime while revealing the similarities between the two brothers .
translation: 电影的主题同时探讨了法律与犯罪两个派别之间的相似之处，同时揭示了两兄弟之间的相似性。
back_translation: The theme of the movie explores the similarities between the two factions of law and crime, while also revealing the similarities between the two brothers.

text: gooding is the energetic frontman , and it 's hard to resist his enthusiasm , even if the filmmakers come up with nothing original in the way of slapstick sequences .
translation: 古丁是充满活力的主唱，即使电影制作者在滑稽场景方面没有提出任何原创内容，仍然很难抗拒他的热情。
back_translation: Gudin is a charismatic lead singer, and even though the filmmakers didn't offer any original content in the comedic scenes, it's still hard to resist his enthusiasm.

text: when the singing veggies encounter some car trouble , they 're stranded at old , rundown seafood joint where nothing is quite as it seems .
translation: 当歌唱的蔬菜们遇到一些汽车故障时，他们被困在一家陈旧破烂的海鲜餐馆，那里的一切似乎都不太对劲。
back_translation: When the singing vegetables encountered some car troubles, they were trapped in an old, dilapidated seafood restaurant where everything seemed a bit off.

text: he becomes the man he always should have ( and could have ) been .
translation: 他成为了他一直应该（也能够）成为的那个人。
back_translation: He became the person he had always been meant (and able) to be.

text: imax films can sometimes feel like a gimmick , but this is one subject that demands a scope as big as the imagination .
translation: IMAX电影有时可能感觉像是一种噱头，但这是一个需要与想象力一样广阔的视野的主题。
back_translation: IMAX movies can sometimes feel like a gimmick, but it's a theme that requires a vision as vast as the imagination.

text: unlike most teen flicks , swimming takes its time to tell its story , casts mostly little-known performers in key roles , and introduces some intriguing ambiguity .
translation: 与大多数青少年电影不同，泳池等待时间较长来讲述故事，主要由一些不太知名的演员担任关键角色，并引入了一些引人入胜的模糊性。
back_translation: Unlike most teen movies, "The Waiting Pool" takes its time to tell the story, primarily featuring some lesser-known actors in key roles, and introduces some captivating ambiguity.

text: can be classified as one of those 'alternate reality ' movies . . . except that it would have worked so much better dealing in only one reality .
translation: 可以被归类为那些“替代现实”电影之一……不过，如果只处理一种现实，它会效果更好。
back_translation: It can be classified as one of those "alternative reality" movies... however, it would work better if it only dealt with one reality.

text: the adventure does n't contain half the excitement of balto , or quarter the fun of toy story 2 .
translation: 这个冒险没有《巴尔托》一半的刺激，也没有《玩具总动员2》四分之一的乐趣。
back_translation: This adventure is not half as thrilling as "Balto," nor a quarter as fun as "Toy Story 2."

text: majidi is an unconventional storyteller , capable of finding beauty in the most depressing places .
translation: 马基迪是一位非传统的讲故事者，能够在最令人沮丧的地方寻找美。
back_translation: Maqidi is an unconventional storyteller who can find beauty in the most frustrating places.

text: but he 's neglecting his work , carping at his mom , and behaving badly toward his loyal friend bobbi .
translation: 但他正在忽视自己的工作，挑剔妈妈，对忠实的朋友鲍比表现得很不好。
back_translation: But he is neglecting his work, being critical of his mother, and treating his loyal friend Bobby poorly.

text: he follows a new suspect , huh , and eventually catches him in the act of brutally murdering a woman in a crowded techno bar .
translation: 他跟踪一个新的嫌疑犯，哈，最终在一个热闹的电子音乐酒吧里当场抓住他残忍杀害一名女性的行为。
back_translation: He tracked a new suspect and finally caught him in the act of brutally murdering a woman at a crowded electronic music bar.

text: in the second half of the film , frei 's control loosens in direct proportion to the amount of screen time he gives nachtwey for self-analysis .
translation: 在影片的下半部分，弗雷对纳赫特威自我分析所给予的屏幕时间成正比地放松了控制。

text: . . . you can be forgiven for realizing that you 've spent the past 20 minutes looking at your watch and waiting for frida to just die already .
translation: ……你可以理解你花了过去20分钟看手表，等待弗里达快点死去这一点是可以被原谅的。
back_translation: ...you can understand that it's forgivable to have spent the last 20 minutes looking at your watch, waiting for Frida to hurry up and die.

text: another woman , diana , reads a book and is divided from the real world by fiction .
translation: 另一位女性，黛安娜，正在阅读一本书，因虚构而与现实世界隔绝。
back_translation: Another woman, Diana, is reading a book, detached from the real world due to fiction.

text: he seeks the wisdom of his friend and confidant saiid and together their attempts to give niche his identity leads to more problems . . . in
translation: 他寻求他的朋友和知己赛义德的智慧，他们一起试图给尼奇赋予身份，结果却导致了更多的问题……
back_translation: He sought the wisdom of his friend and confidant, Said, and together they tried to give Nietzsche an identity, but it ended up causing more problems...

text: he wants to realize the dream nurtured for year by his father .
translation: 他想实现他父亲多年培育的梦想。
back_translation: He wants to realize the dream that his father nurtured for many years.

text: it 's all about love is the story of two lovers and their attempts to save their relationship in a near-future world on the brink of cosmic collapse .
translation: 《一切都关乎爱情》是一个关于两位恋人的故事，他们在即将崩溃的宇宙世界中努力挽救他们的关系。

text: as it spreads among the friends , their true feelings and personalities emerge as they struggle to survive the virus and each other .

text: like a tarantino movie with heart , alias betty is richly detailed , deftly executed and utterly absorbing .
translation: 就像一部充满温情的昆丁·塔伦蒂诺电影，《别名贝蒂》丰富的细节，巧妙的执行，令人完全着迷。

text: self-congratulatory , misguided , and ill-informed , if nonetheless compulsively watchable .
translation: 自我陶醉、误入歧途且信息不足，但无论如何令人难以抗拒地可看。
back_translation: Self-indulgent, misguided, and lacking information, yet still irresistibly watchable.

text: the members manage to pronounce kok exactly as you think they might , thus giving the cast ample opportunity to use that term as often as possible . it 's very beavis and butthead , yet always seems to elicit a chuckle .
translation: 成员们成功地把“kok”发音得正如你想的那样，因此给演员们提供了充足的机会可以尽可能频繁地使用这个词。这非常像《比弗斯与巴特海德》，但总是能引起人们的一阵轻笑。
back_translation: The members successfully pronounced "kok" just as you would expect, which provided the actors with ample opportunities to use the word as frequently as possible. It was very much like "Beavis and Butt-Head," but it always elicited a chuckle from people.

text: it 's steps , a film that draws its inspiration from the marx brother to monty python and it was done on such a shoe-string budget , it would make a studio executive blush .
translation: 这部电影《它的步骤》从马克斯兄弟到蒙提·派森汲取灵感，以如此微薄的预算制作，甚至会让一位制片执行人感到脸红。
back_translation: The film "Its Steps" draws inspiration from the Marx Brothers to Monty Python, created on such a tight budget that it would even make an executive producer blush.

text: bruce is a down on his luck tv news reporter .
translation: 布鲁斯是一位运气不佳的电视新闻记者。

text: ultimately , the message of trouble every day seems to be that all sexual desire disrupts life 's stasis .
translation: 最终，《每天都有麻烦》的信息似乎是，所有的性欲都扰乱了生活的平衡。
back_translation: Ultimately, the message of "Every Day Has Trouble" seems to be that all desires disturb the balance of life.

text: academy award nominee diane lane stars as frances mayes , a 35-year-old san francisco writer whose perfect life has just taken an unexpected detour .
translation: 学院奖提名者戴安·莱恩饰演弗朗西斯·梅耶斯，一位35岁的旧金山作家，她的完美生活刚刚经历了一个意想不到的转折。
back_translation: Academy Award nominee Diane Lane plays Frances Mayes, a 35-year-old writer from San Francisco whose perfect life has just taken an unexpected turn.

text: the film 's strength is n't in its details , but in the larger picture it paints - of a culture in conflict with itself , with the thin veneer of nationalism that covers our deepest , media-soaked fears .
translation: 这部电影的力量不在于细节，而在于它描绘的更大图景——一个与自身冲突的文化，以及覆盖在我们最深层、充满媒体影响的恐惧上的薄薄民族主义外衣。
back_translation: The power of this film lies not in the details, but in the larger picture it depicts—a culture in conflict with itself, and a thin veil of nationalism that covers the deep-seated, media-influenced fears within us.

text: although their characters and temperaments could n't be less alike , 19-year olds wei and jie are best friends .
translation: 尽管他们的性格和脾气截然不同，19岁的韦和杰却是最好的朋友。
back_translation: Despite their completely different personalities and temperaments, 19-year-old Wei and Jie are the best of friends.

text: confessions is without a doubt a memorable directorial debut from king hunk .

text: it 's like rocky and bullwinkle on speed , but that 's neither completely enlightening , nor does it catch the intensity of the movie 's strangeness .
translation: 这就像《洛基与巴尔乌尔基尔》加速版，但这既没有完全启发，也无法捕捉到电影奇异性的强度。
back_translation: It's like a sped-up version of "Loki and Balurkill," but it neither completely inspires nor captures the intensity of the film's strangeness.

text: so earnest and well-meaning , and so stocked with talent , that you almost forget the sheer , ponderous awfulness of its script .
translation: 如此真诚且富有善意，才华横溢，以至于你几乎可以忘记其剧本的沉重可怕。
back_translation: So sincere and full of kindness, talented to the point that you can almost forget the heavy and terrifying nature of the script.

text: it is late at night in a foreign land .
translation: 在一个外国的夜晚，已经很晚了。
back_translation: On a foreign night, it was already very late.

text: when joe , a us navy seal , and katsuragi , a japanese detective , join forces to stop the circulation of blood heat , they are taken to an underground martial arts tournament in the muscle dome held by the yakuza and triads , where the fighters are blood heat users .
translation: 当美国海军海豹突击队员乔和日本侦探桂木联手阻止血热的传播时，他们被带到一个由黑社会和三合会举办的地下武术比赛——肌肉圆顶，在那里，参赛者都是血热使用者。
back_translation: When U.S. Navy SEAL Joe and Japanese detective Katsuragi team up to stop the spread of Blood Heat, they find themselves in an underground martial arts tournament called Muscle Dome, hosted by the Mafia and Triads, where the participants are all users of Blood Heat.

text: a sloppy , amusing comedy that proceeds from a stunningly unoriginal premise .
translation: 一部马虎的、令人发笑的喜剧，源于一个令人震惊的不原创设定。

text: instead of trying to bust some blondes , [ diggs ] should be probing why a guy with his talent ended up in a movie this bad .

translation: 一部精彩的、低调的成长传奇，没有那些放学特别节目式的狂热。

translation: 她——一个想要永生的人——然而并没有放弃。

text: trapped presents a frightening and compelling 'what if ? ' scenario that will give most parents pause . . . . then , something terrible happens .

text: and for her honor , it will be named 'paradise-casino ' .

translation: 当德克萨斯州农村的一打墓碑被亵渎时，五个二十多岁的年轻人展开调查，最终被一家以食人族为主的家庭追赶，这个家庭由一个高大而疯狂的粗暴者领导，他穿着人皮，名叫“皮革脸”。

text: there is a difference between movies with the courage to go over the top and movies that do n't care about being stupid

text: while not quite `` shrek `` or monsters , inc . `` , it 's not too bad . it 's worth taking the kids to .

text: a young couple is concerned about the future of their relationship as they anticipate their time apart .

translation: 假装是她的父亲杰克快要死了。

text: fans of the modern day hong kong action film finally have the worthy successor to a better tomorrow and the killer which they have been patiently waiting for .

text: morton is a great actress portraying a complex character , but morvern callar grows less compelling the farther it meanders from its shocking start .

text: prosit has made a lot of enemy & # 180 ; s .

text: what emerges is not only an underdog v . simon bar sinister saga but a fascinating character study .
