back_translation: What emerges is not only a story of an underestimated character's confrontation with Simon Bar Sinister, but also an engaging character study.

text: the attorney leaves the scene of the accident and strands the salesman , causing him to miss his custody hearing .
translation: 律师离开了事故现场，留下了销售员，导致他错过了监护权听证会。
back_translation: The lawyer left the accident scene, leaving the salesman behind, which caused him to miss the custody hearing.

text: standard story of boy meets girl and girl thinks he is gay .
translation: 男孩遇见女孩的标准故事，而女孩认为他是同性恋。
back_translation: A standard story of a boy meeting a girl, but the girl thinks he is gay.

text: ultimately , jane learns her place as a girl , softens up and loses some of the intensity that made her an interesting character to begin with .
translation: 最终，简认识到作为女孩的角色，变得温和，失去了一些最初让她成为有趣角色的强烈个性。
back_translation: In the end, Jane realized her role as a girl, becoming gentler and losing some of the strong personality traits that initially made her an interesting character.

text: determined not to let this opportunity slip by , she vows to act on that information right away .
translation: 她决心不让这个机会溜走，发誓要立即采取行动。
back_translation: She was determined not to let this opportunity slip away and vowed to take action immediately.

text: i know that i 'll never listen to marvin gaye or the supremes the same way again
translation: 我知道我再也不会以同样的方式听马文·盖伊或 supreme 了。
back_translation: I know that I will never listen to Marvin Gaye or Supreme in the same way again.

text: carlton `` niche `` james ( cory barlog ) is a man on a mission .
translation: 卡尔顿“利基”詹姆斯（科瑞·巴尔洛格）是一个有使命的人。
back_translation: Carlton "Niche" James (Corey Barlow) is a man on a mission.

text: seeking refuge in his past , the murderer contacts his estranged brother and falls in love with his brother 's wife , gypsy . . .
translation: 在寻求过去的庇护时，谋杀者联系了他疏远的兄弟，并爱上了他兄弟的妻子，吉普赛女孩……
back_translation: In seeking refuge in the past, the murderer reached out to his estranged brother and fell in love with his brother's wife, a gypsy girl...

text: tinke , a 9-year-old orphan from the wilderness , struggles to find her unknown , rich grandparents .
translation: tinke，一个来自荒野的9岁孤儿，努力寻找她未知的富有祖父母。
back_translation: Tinke, a 9-year-old orphan from the wilderness, is striving to find her unknown wealthy grandparents.

text: eventually , he builds a successful career as a us attorney .
translation: 最终，他在美国成为了一名成功的律师。
back_translation: In the end, he became a successful lawyer in the United States.

text: but before he can get to him she sets out with her father to south africa .
translation: 但在他能找到他之前，她和她的父亲一起前往南非。
back_translation: But before he could find him, she went to South Africa with her father.

text: all of the elements are in place for a great film noir , but director george hickenlooper 's approach to the material is too upbeat .
translation: 所有元素都已具备 great film noir 的基础，但导演乔治·希肯卢珀对素材的处理过于乐观。
back_translation: All elements have the foundation of a great film noir, but director George Hickenlooper's handling of the material is overly optimistic.

text: adaptation is probably the ultimate writers ' film , but it 's also a brash , daring , and dynamic film -- as delicate as an orchid but as durable and malleable as the species .
translation: 《改编》可能是终极作家的电影，但它也是一部大胆、勇敢和充满活力的影片——像兰花一样细腻，但又如同这个物种一样坚韧和可塑。
back_translation: "Adaptation" may be the ultimate writer's film, but it is also a bold, brave, and vibrant piece — as delicate as an orchid, yet as resilient and adaptable as the species itself.

text: jordan is a mom & # 38 ; an activist who is on a life long search for true faith as she tries to protect her only child from what she believes is injustice .
translation: 乔丹是一位母亲和活动家，她毕生追求真实的信仰，并努力保护她唯一的孩子，免受她所认为的不公正影响。
back_translation: Jordan is a mother and activist who has devoted her life to pursuing authentic beliefs and strives to protect her only child from what she perceives as unjust influences.

text: barbara novak ( renee zellweger ) has just come down from maine to new york after writing a book called down with love .
translation: 芭芭拉·诺瓦克（蕾妮·齐薇格饰）刚从缅因州来到纽约，刚写了一本名为《爱之下》的书。
back_translation: Barbara Novak (played by Renée Zellweger) has just arrived in New York from Maine and has just written a book called "Under Love."

text: griffin & co . manage to be spectacularly outrageous .
translation: 格里芬公司（Griffin & Co.）成功地令人惊艳地过分。
back_translation: Griffin & Co. has succeeded in an astonishingly excessive manner.

text: it 's sobering , particularly if anyone still thinks this conflict can be resolved easily , or soon .
translation: 这令人 sobering，特别是如果有人仍然认为这场冲突可以轻松或很快解决。
back_translation: This is sobering, especially if someone still thinks that this conflict can be resolved easily or quickly.

text: an incoherent jumble of a film that 's rarely as entertaining as it could have been .
translation: 一部逻辑不清的电影，往往没有达到它本可以有的娱乐效果。
back_translation: A movie with unclear logic often fails to achieve the entertainment effect it could have.

text: paramount to her world is gene , a wealthy disturbed businessman who has slowly become her benefactor over the years .
translation: 在她的世界中至关重要的是基因，一位富有而精神失常的商人，多年来逐渐成为她的资助人。
back_translation: In her world, genes are crucial, and a wealthy yet mentally unstable businessman has gradually become her patron over the years.

text: without blowing the jokes we can say that , if you have found that your sense of humor fit well with christopher guest 's screen outings , you 'll find yourself in the flow with shearer as well .
translation: 如果你发现自己的幽默感与克里斯托弗·盖斯特的银幕作品很契合，那么你也会在希尔的作品中找到共鸣。
back_translation: If you find that your sense of humor resonates with Christopher Guest's film works, you will also find a connection in Hill's works.

text: a gracious , eloquent film that by its end offers a ray of hope to the refugees able to look ahead and resist living in a past forever lost .
translation: 一部优雅而富有表现力的电影，到最后为那些能够展望未来、抵制永远失去的过去的难民们带来了希望的曙光。
back_translation: An elegant and expressive film that brings a glimmer of hope to those refugees who can look to the future and resist the permanently lost past.

text: highlights include detailed instructions on how to perform an icepick lobotomy with household utensils ; a cacophony of robotic voices ; and haunting stills that date back to the turn of the twentieth century .
translation: 亮点包括如何使用家用器具进行冰锥脑叶切除术的详细说明；一系列机器人声音的混乱；以及追溯到二十世纪初的恐怖静态影像。
back_translation: Highlights include a detailed explanation of how to perform a lobotomy using household tools; a cacophony of robotic voices; and terrifying static images dating back to the early twentieth century.

text: 19-year old free spirit daphne reynolds ( amanda bynes ) , raised by her equally free-spirited mother , goes to england to meet her father , who turns out to be a wealthy aristocrat ( colin firth ) .
translation: 19岁的自由灵魂达芙妮·雷诺兹（阿曼达·拜恩斯饰），在同样自由奔放的母亲的抚养下，前往英国与她的父亲见面，结果发现他是一位富有的贵族（科林·费斯饰）。
back_translation: 19-year-old free spirit Daphne Reynolds (played by Amanda Bynes), raised by her equally free-spirited mother, travels to England to meet her father, only to discover that he is a wealthy nobleman (played by Colin Firth).

text: ted ca n't turn the ladies heads like he used to - none of the scams work .
translation: 泰德不能像以前那样吸引女士们的注意了——那些花招都不管用了。
back_translation: Ted can no longer attract the attention of ladies like he used to—those tricks no longer work.

text: he 's got a crush on the sexy young blonde , billy , who he met at an orgy the other night .
translation: 他对那个性感年轻金发女郎比利有好感，他们在前几晚的淫乱派对上认识的。
back_translation: He has a crush on that sexy young blonde woman named Billy, whom he met at the wild parties a few nights ago.

text: a fast paced and suspenseful argentinian thriller about the shadow side of play .
translation: 一部节奏紧凑、悬念迭生的阿根廷惊悚片，探讨游戏的阴暗面。
back_translation: A tightly-paced, suspenseful Argentine thriller that explores the darker side of gaming.

text: a thoroughly unoriginal , but fast-paced and entertaining genre b-flick
translation: 一部完全无创意，但节奏飞快且娱乐性强的B级片
back_translation: A completely uncreative but fast-paced and highly entertaining B-movie.

text: there are some movies that hit you from the first scene and you know it 's going to be a trip . igby goes down is one of those movies .
translation: 有些电影在第一幕就让你感受到震撼，你知道这将是一次旅程。《伊格比堕落》就是这样的电影之一。
back_translation: Some movies shock you right from the first act, making you realize that this will be a journey. "Igby Goes Down" is one of those movies.

text: the results of the gene therapy are passed on to his son bruce .
translation: 基因治疗的结果传给了他的儿子布鲁斯。
back_translation: The results of the gene therapy were passed on to his son, Bruce.

text: only one person can eventually solve the crisis : stefan balsiger himself .
translation: 最终能够解决危机的只有一个人：斯特凡·巴尔西格自己。
back_translation: The only person who can ultimately resolve the crisis is Stefan Balsiger himself.

text: in a place soon to be known as the valley of death , in a small clearing called landing zone x-ray , lt . colonel hal moore ( mel gibson ) and 400 young fathers , husbands , brothers , and sons , all troopers from an elite american combat division , were surrounded by 2 , 000 north vietnamese soldiers .
translation: 在一个即将被称为死亡谷的地方，在一个名为着陆区X射线的小空地上，哈勒·摩尔中校（梅尔·吉布森饰）和400名年轻的父亲、丈夫、兄弟和儿子，都是来自美国精英战斗师的士兵，正被2000名北越士兵包围。
back_translation: In a place that would soon be called Death Valley, in a small clearing known as Landing Zone X-Ray, Colonel Hal Moore (played by Mel Gibson) and 400 young fathers, husbands, brothers, and sons, all soldiers from America's elite fighting division, were surrounded by 2,000 North Vietnamese soldiers.

text: while peterson and her ageless alter ego keep an ironic detachment from the melodramatics , there 's no irony in the end-title dedication to price -- it obviously comes straight from the heart .
translation: 尽管彼得森和她那不受时间影响的另一面对戏剧性的情节保持着讽刺的超然态度，但对普赖斯的结尾致敬显然毫无讽刺可言——这显然是发自内心的。
back_translation: Despite Peterson's ironic detachment from the dramatic plot and her timeless counterpart, the tribute to Price at the end is clearly devoid of irony—it's evidently heartfelt.

text: friday after next takes place back in the hood during the christmas season , craig and day-day are now living in a rundown apartment .
translation: 《下一个周五》发生在街区的圣诞季节，克雷格和戴戴现在住在一间破旧的公寓里。
back_translation: "Next Friday" takes place during the Christmas season in the neighborhood, where Craig and Day-Day now live in a rundown apartment.

text: moments of compassion and kindness circulate within a mounting concern for individual survival .
translation: 关怀和善良的瞬间在对个人生存日益增长的担忧中流动。
back_translation: Moments of care and kindness flow amidst the increasing worries about personal survival.

text: likeable thanks to its cast , its cuisine and its quirky tunes .
translation: 因其演员阵容、美食和奇特的旋律而令人喜爱。
back_translation: Loved for its cast, cuisine, and unique melodies.

text: but paul 's dream job turns into a nightmare of sex for hire , drugs and violence .
translation: 但保罗的梦想工作变成了一个充满性交易、毒品和暴力的噩梦。
back_translation: But Paul's dream job turned into a nightmare filled with sex trafficking, drugs, and violence.

text: instead of a hyperbolic beat-charged urban western , it 's an unpretentious , sociologically pointed slice of life .
translation: 这不是一个夸张的、充满激情的都市西部片，而是一个不矫揉造作、具有社会学意义的生活片段。
back_translation: This is not an exaggerated and passionate urban Western, but a raw and sociologically significant slice of life.

text: clayton is then given a special assignment , to root out a suspected mole that has infiltrated the agency .
translation: 克莱顿被赋予了一个特殊任务，找出潜伏在机构中的疑似内鬼。
back_translation: Clayton was assigned a special task to identify the suspected mole lurking within the organization.

text: it is fascinating to see how much work and preparation goes into stand-up comedy .
translation: 看到现场喜剧背后投入的工作和准备真是令人着迷。
back_translation: It's truly fascinating to see the work and preparation that goes into live comedy.

text: how does one ask his wife to try something that breaks so many taboos ?
translation: 如何向妻子提出尝试一些打破如此多禁忌的事情？
back_translation: How to propose to my wife that we try doing things that break so many taboos?

text: this comedy , based on steve martin 's successful stage play concerns a fictional meeting between a young pablo picasso and a young albert einstein at a paris cafe at the turn of the 20th century .
translation: 这部喜剧基于史蒂夫·马丁成功的舞台剧，讲述了年轻的巴勃罗·毕加索和年轻的阿尔伯特·爱因斯坦在20世纪初的巴黎咖啡馆里的一次虚构会面。
back_translation: This comedy is based on Steve Martin's successful stage play and tells the story of a fictional meeting between young Pablo Picasso and young Albert Einstein in a Paris café in the early 20th century.

text: it 's like going to a house party and watching the host defend himself against a frothing ex-girlfriend . you do n't want to call the cops . you want to call domino 's .
translation: 这就像是去参加一个家庭聚会，看到主人在应对一个怒气冲冲的前女友。你不想报警。你想打电话叫外卖。
back_translation: It's like going to a family gathering and seeing the host dealing with an angry ex-girlfriend. You don't want to call the police. You want to order takeout.

text: beautifully crafted and brutally honest , promises offers an unexpected window into the complexities of the middle east struggle and into the humanity of its people .
translation: 精心制作且直言不讳，《承诺》为我们提供了一个意想不到的视角，展示了中东斗争的复杂性以及其人民的人性。
back_translation: Meticulously crafted and candid, "Commitment" offers us an unexpected perspective that showcases the complexity of the struggles in the Middle East and the humanity of its people.

text: like the best 60 minutes exposM-i , the film ( at 80 minutes ) is actually quite entertaining .
translation: 像最佳的《60分钟》专题节目一样，这部影片（时长80分钟）实际上相当娱乐。
back_translation: Like the best episodes of "60 Minutes," this film (80 minutes long) is actually quite entertaining.

text: a culture clash comedy only half as clever as it thinks it is .
translation: 一部文化冲突喜剧，其聪明程度仅有其自认为的一半。
back_translation: A cultural clash comedy that is only half as clever as it thinks it is.

text: however after his son is witness to a killing he has done mike sullivan finds him self on the run trying to save the life of his son and at the same time looking for revenge on those who wronged him .
translation: 然而，在他的儿子目睹了他所犯下的谋杀后，迈克·沙利文发现自己不得不逃亡，试图拯救他儿子的生命，同时也在寻找对那些伤害他的人的报复。
back_translation: However, after his son witnessed the murder he committed, Mike Sullivan found himself on the run, trying to save his son's life while also seeking revenge against those who had harmed him.

text: an unsentimental albeit heartfelt eulogy to the firefighters who paid the ultimate price while saving new yorkers .
translation: 一篇不带感情却真挚的悼词，献给那些在拯救纽约人时付出终极代价的消防员们。
back_translation: A heartfelt yet emotionless eulogy dedicated to the firefighters who paid the ultimate price while saving the people of New York.

text: improv comedy masters the upright citizens brigade star in this absurdist comedy about an evil chinese food company and their plan to turn little girls into `` saucy `` spare ribs .
translation: 即兴喜剧大师“直立公民旅团”在这部荒诞喜剧中出演，讲述一个邪恶的中餐公司及其将小女孩变成“大胆”的排骨的计划。
back_translation: The improvisational comedy master "Upright Citizens Brigade" stars in this absurd comedy, telling the story of an evil Chinese food company and its plan to turn a little girl into "bold" spare ribs.

text: however , when a search sets in , the people of dogville demand a better deal in exchange for the risk of harbouring poor grace and she learns the hard way that in this town , goodness is relative .
translation: 然而，当搜索开始时，狗镇的人们要求提供更好的交易，以换取庇护可怜的格蕾丝所带来的风险，而她痛苦地学到，在这个小镇上，善良是相对的。
back_translation: However, when the search began, the people of Dogville demanded better deals in exchange for sheltering the risks brought by the unfortunate Grace, and she painfully learned that in this small town, kindness is relative.

text: it treats us to beautiful insights and tragic struggles that swell the heart and make us feel genuine empathy for two people embracing the truth amidst a pack of lies .
translation: 它为我们呈现了美丽的洞察和悲惨的挣扎，让人心潮澎湃，使我们对两个在谎言中拥抱真相的人产生真正的同情。
back_translation: It presents us with beautiful insights and tragic struggles, stirring our emotions and evoking genuine sympathy for two people who embrace the truth within lies.

text: rachel is torn by her aversion to harper and her duty as an agent .
translation: 瑞秋在对哈珀的厌恶和作为特工的责任之间感到纠结。
back_translation: Rachel feels conflicted between her disdain for Harper and her responsibilities as an agent.

text: three stories delicately intertwined by the beauty of sadness .
translation: 三个故事因悲伤之美精巧交织在一起。
back_translation: Three stories are intricately intertwined by the beauty of sadness.

text: the best movie in many a moon about the passions that sometimes fuel our best achievements and other times leave us stranded with nothing more than our lesser appetites .
translation: 许久以来最佳的电影，讲述了有时推动我们取得最好成就的热情，其他时候却使我们留在原地，唯有我们较低的欲望。
back_translation: The best movie in a long time tells the story of how passion sometimes drives us to achieve our best, and at other times keeps us stagnant, limited by our lower desires.

text: i stopped thinking about how good it all was , and started doing nothing but reacting to it - feeling a part of its grand locations , thinking urgently as the protagonists struggled , feeling at the mercy of its inventiveness , gasping at its visual delights .
translation: 我不再考虑这一切有多美好，而是开始只反应于此——感受自己成为其宏伟场景的一部分，随着主角们的挣扎急切思考，感受到其创意的支配，惊叹于其视觉的魅力。
back_translation: I no longer consider how wonderful everything is, but instead begin to react to it—feeling myself become part of its grand scene, urgently contemplating alongside the struggles of the protagonists, sensing the dominance of its creativity, and marveling at its visual charm.

text: it ca n't be easy starting a movie in the middle , staying in the middle , and then ending it in the middle . . .
translation: 在中间开始一部电影，在中间停留，然后再在中间结束，这并不容易……
back_translation: Starting a movie in the middle, pausing in the middle, and then ending in the middle is not easy...

text: everything has taken a turn for the worse and kilo ca n't seem to stop it .
translation: 一切变得更糟，基洛似乎无法阻止这一切。
back_translation: Everything is getting worse, and Kylo seems unable to stop it all.

text: rebecca falls in love with lukas and soon feels more comfortable in the commune than she does at home .
translation: 瑞贝卡爱上了卢卡斯，很快她在公社里的感觉比在家中更加自在。
back_translation: Rebecca fell in love with Lucas, and soon she felt more relaxed in the commune than at home.

text: one of the most important and exhilarating forms of animated filmmaking since old walt doodled steamboat willie .
translation: 自老怀特涂鸦《汽船威利》以来，动画电影制作中最重要和令人振奋的形式之一。
back_translation: Since Old White's graffiti of "Steamboat Willie," one of the most important and exhilarating forms in animated film production.

text: the day takes some twists and turns as elder jones and elder smith ride their bikes to pick up a birthday package for elder smith .
translation: 这一天充满了曲折，琼斯长老和史密斯长老骑着自行车去领取史密斯长老的生日礼物。
back_translation: This day was full of twists and turns, as Elder Jones and Elder Smith rode their bicycles to pick up Elder Smith's birthday gift.

text: the war of the ring has now begun . . .
translation: 指环之战已然开始……
back_translation: The battle for the ring has already begun...

text: the grandfather teaches the boy a small lesson about growing up , while the boy helps the grandfather , a holocaust survivor , open up and tell his story , for the first time .
translation: 祖父教男孩一个关于成长的小教训，同时男孩帮助祖父这位大屠杀幸存者第一次打开心扉，讲述他的故事。
back_translation: The grandfather teaches the boy a small lesson about growing up, while the boy helps his grandfather, a Holocaust survivor, open up for the first time and share his story.

text: so young , so smart , such talent , such a wise * * * .
translation: 如此年轻，如此聪明，如此有才华，如此睿智。
back_translation: So young, so smart, so talented, so wise.

text: as she tries to clear her name , she uncovers information that leads to more murders and more unanswered questions .
translation: 在她试图洗清自己名声的过程中，她发现了更多导致谋杀和未解之谜的信息。
back_translation: In her attempt to clear her name, she uncovered more information leading to the murder and unsolved mysteries.

text: handled correctly , wilde 's play is a masterpiece of elegant wit and artifice . here , alas , it collapses like an overcooked soufflM-i .
translation: 如果处理得当，王尔德的戏剧是一部优雅机智和巧妙的杰作。可惜，在这里，它像一个过度烹饪的舒芙蕾一样崩塌了。
back_translation: If handled properly, Wilde's play is an elegant, witty, and clever masterpiece. Unfortunately, here it collapses like an overcooked soufflé.

text: the roadworkers are mates from way back , and each weekend they go out to an old goldmining site hoping to strike it rich .
translation: 道路工人是老朋友，每个周末他们都会去一个旧的金矿地点，希望能一夜暴富。
back_translation: Road workers are old friends; every weekend they go to an old gold mine site, hoping to get rich overnight.

text: once again , the intelligence of gay audiences has been grossly underestimated , and a meaty plot and well-developed characters have been sacrificed for skin and flash that barely fizzle .
translation: gay观众的智慧再一次被严重低估，而丰满的情节和充分发展的角色则为肤浅和闪光的表象所牺牲，几乎没有任何吸引力。
back_translation: The intelligence of gay audiences has once again been seriously underestimated, while rich plots and well-developed characters are sacrificed for shallow and flashy appearances, leaving almost no appeal.

text: you 'll have more fun setting fire to yourself in the parking lot . you 'll be more entertained getting hit by a bus .
translation: 你在停车场点燃自己会更有乐趣。被公交车撞到会让你更 entertained。
back_translation: Setting yourself on fire in a parking lot will be more fun. Getting hit by a bus will entertain you more.

text: often self-consciously surreal , this award-winner scores high for originality .
translation: 经常自觉地超现实，这部获奖作品在原创性上得分很高。
back_translation: Often consciously surreal, this award-winning work scores high on originality.

text: moore 's complex and important film is also , believe it or not , immensely entertaining , a david and goliath story that 's still very much playing itself out .
translation: 穆尔的这部复杂而重要的电影，信不信由你，也极具娱乐性，是一个大卫与歌利亚的故事，至今仍在持续上演。
back_translation: Moore's complex and important film, believe it or not, is also highly entertaining; it is a story of David and Goliath that continues to unfold to this day.

text: whether it 's the fbi swooping in to rescue us in mississippi burning or a fearless teacher storming a `` ghetto `` school to prove our youth can learn as in dangerous minds , we are often offended by such cinematic myths that are more interested in appeasing white liberal sensibilities than raising complex questions about what whites must truly sacrifice if they are sincere about ending racial injustice .
translation: 无论是联邦调查局在《密西西比燃烧》中 swoop 来拯救我们，还是一位无畏的老师闯入“贫民区”学校以证明我们的年轻人可以学习，正如《危险心灵》所展示的那样，我们常常会对这些电影神话感到反感，这些神话更关心迎合白人自由派的感受，而不是提出复杂的问题，真正问询白人如果真诚希望结束种族不公，他们必须牺牲什么。
back_translation: Whether it is the FBI swooping in to rescue us in "Mississippi Burning," or a fearless teacher breaking into a "ghetto" school to prove that our young people can learn, as shown in "Dangerous Minds," we often feel repulsed by these cinematic myths, which care more about catering to the feelings of white liberals than addressing the complex questions that truly inquire what whites must sacrifice if they genuinely wish to end racial injustice.

text: sebastien cortez is an up and coming film maker who has just gotten his big break in `` the biz . ``
translation: 塞巴斯蒂安·科尔特斯是一位崭露头角的电影制片人，他刚刚在“圈子”中获得了自己的大突破。
back_translation: Sebastian Cortes is an emerging filmmaker who has just made his big breakthrough in the "scene."

text: tends to pile too many `` serious issues `` on its plate at times , yet remains fairly light , always entertaining , and smartly written .
translation: 有时倾向于在其日程上堆积太多“严重问题”，但仍然相当轻松，总是娱乐性十足，且写得聪明。
back_translation: Sometimes it tends to pile up too many "serious issues" on its agenda, but it remains quite relaxed, always entertaining, and writes cleverly.

text: the way coppola professes his love for movies -- both colorful pop junk and the classics that unequivocally qualify as art -- is giddily entertaining .
translation: 科波拉表达他对电影的热爱——无论是五光十色的流行垃圾，还是毫无疑问被视为艺术的经典——都令人欢欣鼓舞。
back_translation: Coppola's expression of his love for film—whether it be colorful popular junk or classics undoubtedly regarded as art—is truly inspiring.

text: ben has a way of making trouble for julie .
translation: 本总是给朱莉惹麻烦。
back_translation: Ben always gets Julie into trouble.

text: a spellbinding african film about the modern condition of rootlessness , a state experienced by millions around the globe .
translation: 一部引人入胜的非洲电影，讲述了现代社会中的无根状态，这种状态被全球数百万人所经历。
back_translation: An engaging African film that depicts the rootlessness experienced by millions of people worldwide in modern society.

text: this gently retro story of a young morman missionary in the pacific islands of tonga loses some wholesomeness points due to some smug insularity .
translation: 这个温和的复古故事讲述了一位年轻的摩门教传教士在汤加的太平洋岛国的经历，但由于一些自以为是的局限性，这个故事失去了一些纯真感。
back_translation: This gentle retro story tells of a young Mormon missionary's experiences in the Pacific island nation of Tonga, but due to some self-righteous limitations, the story loses some of its innocence.

text: meanwhile , assistant chief holland , the only man in the department willing to stand up to the sis , threatens to end perry 's brand of singlehanded `` justice `` on the los angeles streets .
translation: 与此同时，助理主任霍兰德，部门里唯一愿意站出来对抗特工局的人，威胁要终结佩里的那种单枪匹马在洛杉矶街头实施的“正义”。
back_translation: At the same time, Assistant Director Holland, the only person in the department willing to stand up against the agency, threatened to put an end to Perry's solo brand of "justice" being enacted on the streets of Los Angeles.

text: tired , bruised and out of breath , they finally free the professor and arrive at the temple of faramundi scant minutes before gallo and his men .
translation: 疲惫不堪，淤伤累累，气喘吁吁，他们终于解救了教授，并在加洛和他的手下到达之前的几分钟内抵达法拉蒙迪神庙。
back_translation: Exhausted and bruised, panting heavily, they finally rescued the professor and arrived at the Temple of Faramondi just minutes before Galore and his men showed up.

text: fbi agent will graham has been called out of early retirement to catch a serial killer , known by authorities as `` the tooth fairy `` .

back_translation: FBI agent Will Graham is forced out of early retirement to track down a serial killer known to authorities as "Tooth Fairy."

text: the story revolves around lucy kelson ( bullock ) , a brilliant but neurotic attorney , and her client ( grant ) , who is `` charming , irresponsible and fabulously wealthy . ``
translation: 故事围绕露西·凯尔森（布兰登）展开，她是一位聪明但神经过敏的律师，以及她的客户（格兰特），一位“迷人、无责任感且富可敌国”的人。
back_translation: The story revolves around Lucy Kelson (Brandon), a smart but neurotic lawyer, and her client (Grant), a "charming, irresponsible, and fabulously wealthy" man.

text: zak quickly learns how to manipulate the device , and he and his quick-witted , beautiful new friend , francesca , have some real fun .

text: meanwhile , puteri megawati , who is very thankful to the mysterious guy that saved her , meets siti shahirah , a member of the paparazzi that as usual , is looking for sensational news .
translation: 与此同时，梅嘉瓦蒂公主非常感激那位神秘的人救了她，遇到了西蒂·沙希拉，一位像往常一样寻找轰动新闻的狗仔队成员。
back_translation: Meanwhile, Princess Megawati was very grateful to the mysterious person who saved her and encountered Siti Shakira, a paparazzi member who was always on the lookout for sensational news.

text: nete is a tough woman of 35 who runs her job , husband , and teenage daughter with a firm and efficient hand .
translation: nete 是一位35岁的坚强女性，她以果断和高效的方式掌控着工作、丈夫和青春期的女儿。

text: high drama , disney-style - a wing and a prayer and a hunky has-been pursuing his castle in the sky .
translation: 高戏剧性，迪士尼风格 - 一线希望和一个迷人的过气明星追逐他的梦想城堡。

text: since the shoe is his , kumin is then declared the `` mr .
translation: 既然鞋子是他的，库敏被宣布为“先生”。

translation: 更糟糕的是，文斯在区分现实和记忆方面遇到了困难。

text: when every one suspects that it is him , the trio then set out to find the culprit and find out more than they bargained for : the diary of tom riddle , why hagrid was expelled and what the chamber of secrets is and why is it so feared in hogwarts .
translation: 当每个人都怀疑是他的时候，这三人组开始寻找罪犯，结果发现了超出他们预期的事情：汤姆·里德尔的日记，海格为何被开除，以及密室是什么以及它在霍格沃茨为何如此受到恐惧。
back_translation: When everyone suspected him, the trio began to search for the culprit, and they discovered things beyond their expectations: Tom Riddle's diary, why Hagrid was expelled, and what the Chamber of Secrets is and why it is so feared at Hogwarts.

translation: 任何声称热爱电影的人都应该观看亚历山大·索科罗夫的《俄罗斯方舟》。
back_translation: Anyone who claims to love movies should watch Alexander Sokurov's "Russian Ark."

text: director robert rodriguez has once again caught lightning in a bottle .
translation: 导演罗伯特·罗德里格兹再次捕捉到了灵感的火花。

text: dazzling in its complexity , disturbing for its extraordinary themes , the piano teacher is a film that defies categorisation . it haunts , horrifies , startles and fascinates ; it is impossible to look away . ah yes , and then there 's the music . . .
translation: 其复杂性令人眼花缭乱，非凡主题令人不安，《钢琴教师》是一部无法归类的电影。它萦绕于心，令人恐惧，惊讶且着迷；让人无法移开视线。哦，对，还有音乐……
back_translation: Its complexity is dazzling, and its extraordinary themes are unsettling. "The Piano Teacher" is a film that defies categorization. It lingers in the mind, evoking fear, surprise, and fascination; it's impossible to look away. Oh, and then there's the music...

text: this has to be one of the most bizarre love stories ever to be filmed , not since nine M-= weeks has anybody done this much pampering for his 'girlfriend ' .
translation: 这是有史以来最离奇的爱情故事之一，自从《九周半》以来，没有人像他这样为他的“女友”提供如此多的呵护。
back_translation: This is one of the strangest love stories in history. Since "Nine and a Half Weeks," no one has provided as much care for his "girlfriend" as he has.

text: a compelling , gut-clutching piece of advocacy cinema that carries you along in a torrent of emotion as it explores the awful complications of one terrifying day .
translation: 一部引人入胜、令人揪心的倡导电影，在探索一个可怕日子的可怕复杂性时，带你在情感的洪流中前行。
back_translation: An engaging and heart-wrenching advocacy film that takes you through the emotional currents while exploring the terrifying complexities of a dreadful day.

text: an affable but undernourished romantic comedy that fails to match the freshness of the actress-producer and writer 's previous collaboration , miss congeniality .
translation: 一部和蔼可亲但营养不足的浪漫喜剧，未能与女演员、制片人和编剧之前合作的《千机变》相匹配。
back_translation: A charming yet undernourished romantic comedy that fails to match the previous collaboration of the actress, producer, and screenwriter in "The Thousand Faces of Dunjia."

text: context is provided by those who protested against segregation and the limited franchise earlier in bermuda by authoring a `` secret document `` that analysed the social problems of the island .

back_translation: The background is provided by those who opposed racial segregation and limited voting rights in Bermuda, who wrote a "secret document" analyzing the social issues on the island.

text: the entire movie is in need of a scented bath .
translation: 整部电影都需要一个芳香的浴缸。

text: as they become jaded by watching these brutal fights , and betting becomes boring , the bosses realize that they need to take the fights to a new limit .

translation: 现在我明白为什么人们认为我对《蛾人预言》过于苛刻。

text: audrey tatou has a knack for picking roles that magnify her outrageous charm , and in this literate french comedy , she 's as morning-glory exuberant as she was in amM-ilie .
translation: 奥黛丽·塔图擅长挑选能够放大她迷人魅力的角色，在这部文艺法式喜剧中，她的表现和在《天使爱美丽》时一样充满了朝气蓬勃。
back_translation: Audrey Tautou excels at selecting roles that amplify her charming allure, and in this artistic French comedy, her performance is as vibrant as it was in "Amélie."

text: one of the best cat-and-mouse movies to come along in a while , leo has great fun in the role .
translation: 这是最近出现的最佳警匪片之一，里奥在这个角色中表现得很开心。
back_translation: This is one of the best crime films that has emerged recently, and Leo looks very happy in this role.

text: provides a satisfactory overview of the bizarre world of extreme athletes as several daredevils express their own views .
translation: 提供了对极限运动员奇异世界的令人满意的概述，多个冒险者表达了他们自己的观点。

text: skin deep is a psychological thriller about love , sex , race , and betrayal involving an interracial couple , a black couple , and a mistress .
translation: 《肤浅》是一部关于爱情、性、种族和背叛的心理惊悚片，涉及一对跨种族情侣、一对黑人情侣和一位情妇。
back_translation: "Superficial" is a psychological thriller about love, sex, race, and betrayal, featuring an interracial couple, a Black couple, and a mistress.

back_translation: The big compound is operating a child smuggling gang, and "Super Bob" must rescue Dante, or he will lose his son forever.

text: like coming into a long-running , well-written television series where you 've missed the first half-dozen episodes and probably wo n't see the next six .
translation: 就像进入一部长期放映的、写得很好的电视剧，而你错过了前六集，可能也不能看到接下来的六集一样。
back_translation: It's like entering a well-written TV series that has been running for a long time, where you've missed the first six episodes and might also miss the next six.

text: they discover that the one sho stole them is a rival of the criminal , while they go to every single one of his associates to find who has them .
translation: 他们发现偷走他们的人是一个犯罪对手，同时他们去找他每一个同伙来找出谁拿了他们。

text: both an admirable reconstruction of terrible events , and a fitting memorial to the dead of that day , and of the thousands thereafter .
translation: 既是对可怕事件的令人钦佩的重建，也是对那一天以及之后成千上万亡者的恰当纪念。

text: intent on exacting bloody revenge on the reunited english friends murray possesses the body of a guest and turns him into a murderer .
translation: 意图对团聚的英国家友进行血腥报复的穆雷附身于一名客人身上，将他变成了杀人犯。

text: this story centers around a divorced woman in her 30 's and her daughter , who are caught up in a cat-and-mouse game inside their new new york brownstone when three burglars come looking for a hidden cache of cash .
translation: 这个故事围绕一位三十多岁的离婚妇女和她的女儿展开，她们在新的纽约联排别墅中与三名入室盗窃者展开了猫鼠游戏，这些盗贼正在寻找隐藏的现金。
back_translation: This story revolves around a divorced woman in her thirties and her daughter, who engage in a cat-and-mouse game with three burglars in their new townhouse in New York, as the thieves search for hidden cash.

text: detective mi yun ( played by yum jung-ah ) , and her newly appointed partner , detective kang ( played by ji jin-hee ) , are assigned to the case .
translation: 侦探美韵（由廉晶雅饰演）和她的新搭档侦探姜（由池珍熙饰演）被指派处理此案。
back_translation: Detective Mei Yun (played by Lim Jin Ah) and her new partner Detective Kang (played by Ji Jin Hee) have been assigned to handle this case.

translation: nete逼迫一位医生告诉她他还有多少时间。

translation: 第二天早上，他们的星期五变得奇怪，当泰丝和安娜发现自己身处错误的身体里。

text: a lowly thug , gigli ( ben affleck ) , is assigned to kidnap the psychologically challenged younger brother of a powerful federal prosecutor to save his mobster boss from incarceration .
translation: 一个卑微的暴徒吉利（本·阿弗莱克饰）被指派绑架一位心理有障碍的强大联邦检察官的弟弟，以拯救他的黑帮老板免于入狱。
back_translation: A humble thug named Gili (played by Ben Affleck) is tasked with kidnapping the brother of a psychologically troubled powerful federal prosecutor in order to save his mob boss from going to prison.

text: cinephiles will appreciate the fine camerawork and overall mise-en-scene , but people just heading out for a popcorn pleaser will likely be disappointed .

translation: 前世界拉力赛冠军瓦尔特和他的女儿纳塔莎被阿拉伯恐怖分子绑架，带到了柏林。
back_translation: Former World Rally Championship champion Walter and his daughter Natasha were kidnapped by Arab terrorists and taken to Berlin.

text: it wants to be thought of as a subversive little indie film , but it has all the qualities of a modern situation comedy .
translation: 它想被认为是一部颠覆性的独立小电影，但它具备现代情景喜剧的所有特质。

text: in their new environment , the men relinquish their frat mentality and realize how hurtful they have been to women over the years .
translation: 在他们的新环境中，男人们放弃了兄弟会的心态，意识到多年来他们对女性造成的伤害。

text: in 1946 , tests began using nazi v-1 `` buzz bombs `` launched from the decks of american diesel submarines .

text: in adobo , ethnicity is not just the spice , but at the heart of more universal concerns .
translation: 在阿多博中，族裔不仅仅是调料，更是更普遍问题的核心。
