text: die another day is only intermittently entertaining but it 's hard not to be a sucker for its charms , or perhaps it 's just impossible not to feel nostalgia for movies you grew up with .
translation: 《死得其所》虽然只是偶尔有趣，但很难抗拒它的魅力，或者说，无法不对那些伴随你成长的电影感到怀旧。
back_translation: "Die at Ease" may only be occasionally interesting, but it is hard to resist its charm, or rather, it is impossible not to feel nostalgic about the movies that accompanied your growth.

text: when one of them tells the other a rumor that he might be a homicidal maniac they are all scared of him .
translation: 当其中一个人告诉另一个人一个谣言，说他可能是一个杀人狂时，他们都对他感到害怕。
back_translation: When one person tells another a rumor that he might be a killer, they both feel afraid of him.

text: faced with a $ 10 million lawsuit , the department agrees to let producer chase renzi film mitch 's investigation for a new reality tv show , and constantly tries to make everything more `` viewer friendly `` by changing everything about mitch 's life to fit the stereotypical view of police officers -- and partners him with trey .
translation: 面对1000万美元的诉讼，部门同意让制作人切斯·伦齐拍摄米歇尔的调查以制作新的一档真人秀节目，并不断尝试通过改变米歇尔生活中的一切使其更“适合观众”，以迎合对警察的刻板印象，并让他与特雷搭档。
back_translation: Faced with a $10 million lawsuit, the department agreed to let producer Chase Lentz film an investigation into Michelle to create a new reality show, constantly attempting to change everything in Michelle's life to make it more "audience-friendly," catering to stereotypes about the police and pairing him with Trey.

text: it might be the first sci-fi comedy that could benefit from a three 's company-style laugh track .
translation: 这可能是第一部可以从“三个公司”风格的笑声轨道中受益的科幻喜剧。
back_translation: This may be the first sci-fi comedy that can benefit from the laugh track of "Three Companies" style.

text: so , he and a few friends , try to cover up his disability , without the studio executives or the producers knowing that he is directing the film blind .
translation: 所以，他和几个朋友试图掩盖他的残疾，以免制片厂高管或制作人知道他在盲导这部电影。
back_translation: So, he and a few friends tried to cover up his disability so that studio executives or producers wouldn't know he was blind directing the film.

text: this romantic comedy , described as an african-american when harry met sally . . . , centers on a romance between an a & # 38 ; r exec , dre ( diggs ) , at a hip-hop label and a magazine editor , sidney ( lathan ) , who have known each other since childhood .
translation: 这部浪漫喜剧被描述为《当哈里遇见莎莉》的非裔美国版，讲述了一名嘻哈唱片公司的艺术与宣传执行官德雷（迪格斯饰）和一位杂志编辑西德尼（莱瑟饰）之间的爱情故事，他们从小就相识。
back_translation: This romantic comedy is described as the African American version of "When Harry Met Sally," telling the love story between Dre (played by Diggs), the art and publicity executive of a hip-hop record company, and Sidney (played by Latifah), a magazine editor, who have known each other since childhood.

text: the film actually gets to tackle some larger questions than one normally finds in the average fireball drama .
translation: 这部电影实际上探讨了一些比普通火球剧更大的问题。
back_translation: This movie actually explores some issues that are larger than the typical fireball drama.

text: harnessing the explosive momentum of the internet , anime heralds a revolution in 21st century youth culture .
translation: 利用互联网的爆炸性势头，动漫预示着21世纪青年文化的一场革命。
back_translation: Using the explosive momentum of the internet, anime signifies a revolution in youth culture in the 21st century.

text: paul 's true romantic feelings soon surface and jenny finds things to be a little more than she can handle .
translation: 保罗真正的浪漫情感很快浮出水面，而珍妮发现事情超出了她能承受的范围。
back_translation: Paul's true romantic feelings quickly surfaced, and Jenny found that things were beyond what she could bear.

text: they have to prepare for some action as the there will be a full moon tonight . . .
translation: 他们必须为一些行动做好准备，因为今晚将有满月。
back_translation: They must be prepared for some actions because there will be a full moon tonight.

text: but as she comes home , she opens a mysterious door that leads her to an artificial world : the holo-deck .
translation: 但当她回到家时，她打开一扇神秘的门，进入了一个人造世界：全息甲板。
back_translation: But when she returned home, she opened a mysterious door and entered an artificial world: a holographic deck.

text: although she came back to the house in order to sell it , things begin to take a different direction : the house itself , the furniture and other equipment in it seem to become alive for anna , recalling images of her past , her beloved parents and her friend max , who once gave her shelter from the raging policemen when she took part as a photo journalist in a political demonstration in berlin .
translation: 尽管她回到这所房子是为了出售它，但事情开始朝着不同的方向发展：房子本身、家具以及里面的其他设备似乎对安娜来说变得有生命，唤起了她过去的回忆，她心爱的父母和她的朋友马克斯，他曾在她作为摄影记者参加政治示威时为她提供了庇护，当时她在柏林被暴怒的警察追赶。
back_translation: Although she returned to the house to sell it, things began to take a different turn: the house itself, the furniture, and the other belongings inside seemed to come alive for Anna, evoking memories of her past, her beloved parents, and her friend Max, who had sheltered her during political protests when she was pursued by enraged police in Berlin while working as a photojournalist.

text: scared of death , winnie must choose between being immortal and being with jesse or following the circle of life and dying someday .
translation: 害怕死亡的温妮必须在获得永生和与杰西在一起，或是遵循生命的轮回并在某一天死去之间做出选择。
back_translation: Winnie, who fears death, must choose between obtaining immortality to be with Jesse or following the cycle of life and dying one day.

text: the writers , director wally wolodarsky , and all the actors should start their own coeducational fraternity : kappa rho alpha phi .
translation: 编剧、导演瓦利·沃洛达斯基以及所有演员应该成立自己的男女合校兄弟会：卡帕·罗·阿尔法·菲。
back_translation: Screenwriter and director Vali Volodarski and all the actors should establish their own co-ed fraternity: Kappa Ro Alpha Phi.

text: it is quickly agreed however , that selling chocolates door to door , or fire powered potato guns to children , may be too complicated .
translation: 然而，大家很快一致认为，逐家逐户销售巧克力或向孩子们出售火力驱动的土豆枪可能太复杂了。
back_translation: However, everyone quickly reached a consensus that selling chocolate door-to-door or selling children potato guns powered by firearms might be too complicated.

text: the minor figures surrounding [ bobby ] . . . form a gritty urban mosaic .
translation: 环绕在[博比]周围的次要人物……形成了一种粗犷的城市马赛克。
back_translation: The secondary characters surrounding [Bobby]... formed a raw urban mosaic.

text: a garden-fresh morality tale for the kids , with monty python-inspired humor .
translation: 一则为孩子们准备的新鲜花园道德故事，融入了蒙提·帕顿风格的幽默。
back_translation: A fresh garden moral story prepared for children, infused with the humor of Monty Python.

text: smart , sassy interpretation of the oscar wilde play .
translation: 聪明、俏皮的奥斯卡·王尔德戏剧解读。
back_translation: A clever and witty interpretation of Oscar Wilde's plays.

text: lan yu seems altogether too slight to be called any kind of masterpiece . it is , however , a completely honest , open-hearted film that should appeal to anyone willing to succumb to it .
translation: 《蓝宇》似乎过于微不足道，不能称为任何形式的杰作。不过，这是一部完全诚实、真诚的电影，应该吸引任何愿意沉浸其中的人。
back_translation: "Blue Gate Crossing" may seem too trivial to be called any form of masterpiece. However, it is a completely honest and sincere film that should appeal to anyone willing to immerse themselves in it.

text: this spider-woman , secretly connected to the mob , has jealously controlled patricia 's life as well as the one of her husband , casino owner francis hiller ( timothy bottoms ) .
translation: 这个蜘蛛女郎与黑帮秘密勾结，妒忌地控制着帕特里夏和她的丈夫，赌场老板弗朗西斯·希勒（提摩西·博汤斯）的生活。
back_translation: This Spider-Woman secretly colludes with the mob, jealously controlling the lives of Patricia and her husband, casino owner Francis Hiller (Timothy Bontemps).

text: but then the crew detects a break-in on their computer systems , and picard is captured by the romulans because shinzon needs him as his only matching supplier of genetic material .
translation: 但随后机组人员在他们的计算机系统上发现有入侵，皮卡德被罗慕伦人捕获，因为辛扎需要他作为唯一匹配的基因材料供应者。
back_translation: However, the crew soon discovered an intrusion in their computer system, and Picard was captured by the Romulans because Shinzon needed him as the only matching donor for genetic material.

text: a romantic comedy that operates by the rules of its own self-contained universe .
translation: 一部遵循自己独立宇宙规则的浪漫喜剧。
back_translation: A romantic comedy that follows its own independent universe rules.

text: this 72-minute film does have some exciting scenes , but it 's a tad slow .
translation: 这部72分钟的电影确实有一些令人兴奋的场景，但节奏有点慢。
back_translation: This 72-minute movie does have some exciting scenes, but the pacing is a bit slow.

text: john was one of the first porn stars to push for aids testing in the porn industry .
translation: 约翰是第一批在色情行业中推动艾滋病检测的色情明星之一。
back_translation: John is one of the first adult film stars to advocate for AIDS testing in the porn industry.

text: the driver finds himself in a dangerous , yet highly political situation ; this time being pursued by a helicopter gunship while carrying a passenger with a suitcase . . .
translation: 司机发现自己身处一个危险而又高度政治化的境地；这次他在一架直升机攻击机的追击下，载着一名带着手提箱的乘客……
back_translation: The driver finds himself in a dangerous and highly politicized situation; this time, he is being pursued by an attack helicopter while carrying a passenger with a briefcase...

text: comedic high jinks ensue as the two go on the lam and start to fall in love .
translation: 在两人逃亡期间，闹出了许多滑稽的搞笑事件，同时他们开始相爱。
back_translation: During their escape, they encountered many funny and ridiculous situations, and at the same time, they began to fall in love.

text: wounded by tom 's derision , michael befriends ex-convict everette hatch , who , recognizing opportunity , exploits michael 's ideas to his advantage .
translation: 在汤姆的嘲讽中受伤的迈克尔结识了前罪犯埃弗雷特·哈奇，后者识别出机会，利用迈克尔的想法为自己谋取利益。
back_translation: In the midst of Tom's mockery, the injured Michael befriends the former criminal Everett Hatch, who identifies an opportunity and uses Michael's ideas for his own benefit.

text: but a sassy hispanic angel in a mets cap and jacket wrestles joe in an alleyway and makes him listen to the divine message of the miraculous , `` fear not . ``
translation: 但是一个带着大都会队帽子和外套的调皮的西班牙天使在一条小巷里与乔摔跤，并让他倾听来自奇迹的神圣信息：“不要害怕。”
back_translation: But a mischievous Spanish angel wearing a Mets cap and jacket wrestles with Joe in an alley and makes him listen to the sacred message from the miracle: "Do not be afraid."

text: she entranced the founder of the museum of art ( masp ) where the fashion parade was being held , and her career was hence launched .
translation: 她迷住了美术博物馆（masp）的创始人，时尚展览由此启动了她的职业生涯。
back_translation: She captivated the founder of the Museum of Art São Paulo (MASP), which launched her career in fashion exhibitions.

text: about schmidt is undoubtedly one of the finest films of the year . if you 're not deeply touched by this movie , check your pulse .
translation: 《关于施密特》无疑是今年最优秀的电影之一。如果这部电影没有深深打动你，检查一下你的脉搏。
back_translation: "About Schmidt" is undoubtedly one of the best movies of the year. If this film did not deeply move you, check your pulse.

text: what about charlotte : can pally let his heart take the lead ?
translation: 查洛特怎么样：帕利能让他的心主导吗？
back_translation: How is Charlotte: Can Pali let his heart take the lead?

text: schnitzler does a fine job contrasting the sleekness of the film 's present with the playful paranoia of the film 's past .
translation: 施尼茨勒很好地对比了影片现在的光滑与过去的顽皮偏执。
back_translation: Schnitzler contrasts the film's current smoothness with its past mischievousness and paranoia.

text: the only way to find out though what really happened is to enter the site itself . . .
translation: 要了解真正发生了什么，唯一的方法就是进入现场……
back_translation: To understand what really happened, the only way is to go to the scene...

text: mostly centered on indianapolis , this film puts this problem ( which many assume to be an urban phenomenon ) firmly in the heartland of the usa .
translation: 这部电影主要集中在印第安纳波利斯，将这一问题（许多人认为这是一个城市现象）深深植根于美国的心脏地带。
back_translation: This film mainly focuses on Indianapolis, deeply embedding this issue (which many believe to be an urban phenomenon) in the heart of America.

text: slackers ' jokey approach to college education is disappointingly simplistic -- the film 's biggest problem -- and there are no unforgettably stupid stunts or uproariously rude lines of dialogue to remember it by .
translation: 懒散者对大学教育的幽默方式令人失望地过于简单，这部电影最大的问题是没有令人难忘的愚蠢恶作剧或搞笑无礼的对话台词可以让人铭记。
back_translation: The slacker's humorous take on college education is disappointingly simplistic; the biggest issue with this film is its lack of memorable silly pranks or funny, irreverent dialogue that would stick in one's mind.

text: what should have been a cutting hollywood satire is instead about as fresh as last week 's issue of variety .
translation: 应该是尖锐的好莱坞讽刺的作品，却显得和上周的《综艺》杂志一样陈旧。
back_translation: It should be a sharp satire of Hollywood, but it feels as outdated as last week's "Variety" magazine.

text: when an international criminal ( dacascos ) kidnaps the daughter of a gang leader ( dmx ) as part of a diamond heist , it causes a city 's police to engage in an intensive search ( led by a government agent played by li ) , aided by the father 's gangsters .
translation: 当国际罪犯（达卡斯科斯）绑架了一位帮派头目（DMX）的女儿，作为抢劫钻石的一部分，这导致一座城市的警察展开密集搜查（由安吉丽克·李饰演的政府特工主导），父亲的帮派成员也提供了帮助。
back_translation: When an international criminal (Dacascos) kidnaps the daughter of a gang leader (DMX) as part of a diamond heist, it leads to an intensive search by the city's police (led by a government agent played by Angelique Lee), with assistance from the father’s gang members.

text: while she is away a strange man with an axe comes into the motel room and attacks matt .
translation: 当她不在时，一个拿着斧头的陌生人闯入租赁屋，袭击了马特。
back_translation: When she was not there, a stranger with an axe broke into the rental house and attacked Matt.

text: brosnan gives a portrayal as solid and as perfect as his outstanding performance as bond in die another day .
translation: 布朗森的表演如同他在《明日帝国》中出色的邦德角色一样，表现得稳健而完美。
back_translation: Brosnan's performance was solid and perfect, just like his outstanding Bond role in "Tomorrow Never Dies."

text: for those who like quirky , slightly strange french films , this is a must !
translation: 对于喜欢古怪、有些奇特的法国电影的人来说，这是必看之作！
back_translation: For those who enjoy quirky and somewhat peculiar French films, this is a must-see!

text: for the most part , director anne-sophie birot 's first feature is a sensitive , extraordinarily well-acted drama .
translation: 总的来说，导演安-索菲·比罗的首部电影是一部敏感的、演技出色的戏剧。
back_translation: Overall, director Alice Sophie's first film is a sensitive and well-acted drama.

text: a good-natured ensemble comedy that tries hard to make the most of a bumper cast , but never quite gets off the ground .
translation: 一部性格温和的 ensemble 喜剧，努力充分利用众多演员阵容，但始终没有真正起飞。
back_translation: A gently-paced ensemble comedy that strives to make the most of its large cast, but never really takes off.

text: adding to the situation is a killer hurricane bearing down on the island .
translation: 加上情况的是一场致命的飓风正在向岛屿袭来。
back_translation: Adding to the situation is a deadly hurricane approaching the island.

text: `` the best disney movie since the lion king ``
translation: 自《狮子王》以来最好的迪士尼电影
back_translation: The best Disney movie since "The Lion King."

text: this is mild-mannered , been-there material given a pedestrian spin by a director who needed a touch of the flamboyant , the outrageous .
translation: 这是温和的，经历过的素材，经过一位需要一些张扬和离谱的导演的平庸处理。
back_translation: This is gentle, experienced material that has been mediocritly handled by a director who needs some flamboyance and outrageousness.

text: andrew is infatuated with sannah and fantazises about her but believes there 's no chance she will like him if she gets to know him , so he decides it 's better they never meet for real . . .
translation: 安德鲁迷恋桑娜，幻想着她，但他相信如果她了解他，就没有机会会喜欢他，因此他决定最好他们永远不见面……
back_translation: Andrew is infatuated with Sanna, fantasizing about her, but he believes that if she got to know him, there would be no chance she would like him, so he decides it is best if they never meet…

text: it is the first time ever that he leaves the desolate village in the balkan mountains .
translation: 这是他第一次离开巴尔干山脉的荒凉村庄。
back_translation: This is his first time leaving the desolate village in the Balkan Mountains.

text: truth is stranger than fiction , so the old saying goes . in 'catch me if you can , ' it 's also more entertaining .
translation: 真相比虚构更奇怪，这就是古老的说法。在《逮捕我，如果你能》的故事中，它也更加娱乐。
back_translation: Truth is stranger than fiction, that's an ancient saying. In the story of "Catch Me If You Can," it is also more entertaining.

text: large budget notwithstanding , the movie is such a blip on the year 's radar screen that it 's tempting just to go with it for the ride . but this time , the old mib label stands for milder is n't better .
translation: 尽管预算庞大，这部电影在今年的雷达屏幕上几乎没有什么存在感，令人不禁想随波逐流。但这一次，老牌mib的意义是温和并不更好。
back_translation: Despite the large budget, this movie has hardly made any presence on this year's radar, leaving one tempted to go with the flow. But this time, the meaning of the veteran MIB is that being mild is not necessarily better.

text: while the topic has grown heavier here , [ moretti 's ] touch has not , and that disparity is precisely what gives the film its sustained poignancy .
translation: 虽然这个话题在这里变得更加沉重，但[莫雷提]的风格并没有，所以这种差异恰恰赋予了影片持续的感人之处。
back_translation: Although this topic becomes heavier here, [Moretti]'s style does not, so this difference exactly gives the film its enduring emotional impact.

text: a murder in the camp gives him the chance to set a risky plan in motion .
translation: 营地中的谋杀案给了他实施一个冒险计划的机会。
back_translation: The murder in the camp gave him the opportunity to carry out an adventurous plan.

text: hot on the trail of the principle villains , bond travels to iceland where he experiences at first hand the power of an amazing new weapon before a dramatic confrontation with his main adversary back in korea where it all started . . .
translation: 紧追主要反派，邦德前往冰岛，在那里他亲身体验了一种令人惊叹的新武器的力量，然后在韩国进行了一场戏剧性的对决，正是这一切的起点……
back_translation: Bond closely pursues the main villain to Iceland, where he experiences the power of an astonishing new weapon firsthand, and then engages in a dramatic showdown in South Korea, which marks the beginning of it all...

text: partly because of the severe regime of a dreadful nurse , the five decide to escape from their new home and go back to the old one under their own steam .
translation: 部分是因为可怕护士的严厉管理，五个人决定逃离他们的新家，自己回到旧家。
back_translation: Partly due to the harsh management of the terrifying nurse, the five decided to escape their new home and return to their old one.

text: a profoundly stupid affair , populating its hackneyed and meanspirited storyline with cardboard characters and performers who value cash above credibility .
translation: 一桩极其愚蠢的事件，用陈词滥调和怨恨的故事情节填充，充斥着平面化的人物和那些重视金钱而非信誉的表演者。
back_translation: An extremely foolish incident, filled with cliches and a resentful storyline, populated by one-dimensional characters and performers who value money over reputation.

text: de niro looks bored , murphy recycles murphy , and you mentally add showtime to the pile of hollywood dreck that represents nothing more than the art of the deal .
translation: 德尼罗看起来很无聊，墨菲则在重复自己，而你在心里将《秀场》归入那堆毫无意义的好莱坞垃圾中，这些垃圾只代表交易的艺术。
back_translation: De Niro looks very bored, Murphy is repeating himself, and in your mind, you categorize "The Show" among that pile of meaningless Hollywood trash, which only represents the art of transactions.

text: this fairy tale beginning freefalls from happy to disastrous as the newlyweds are besieged by emotionally challenged children , a savagily jealous ex-wife and a drunken dad .
translation: 这个童话故事的开头从快乐迅速跌入灾难，因为新人被情感有问题的孩子、极度嫉妒的前妻和一个酒醉的父亲围困。
back_translation: The beginning of this fairy tale quickly plunges from happiness into disaster, as the newlyweds are besieged by an emotionally troubled child, an extremely jealous ex-wife, and a drunken father.

text: fresh out of prison , dara is on a mission to scatter her mother 's ashes in lake superior .
translation: 刚出狱的达拉正在进行一项任务，要将她母亲的骨灰撒入苏必利尔湖。
back_translation: Just released from prison, Dara is on a mission to scatter her mother's ashes into Lake Superior.

text: after discovering a passenger ship missing since 1962 floating adrift on the bering sea , salvagers claim the vessel as their own .
translation: 在发现一艘自1962年以来失踪的客轮漂流在白令海上后，打捞者声称该船是他们的。
back_translation: After discovering a passenger ship that had been missing since 1962 drifting in the Bering Sea, the salvagers claim the vessel as theirs.

text: it also touches on the encroachment of christianity brought by the missionaries , which is at odds with mepe 's tribal and traditional roots .
translation: 它还触及了传教士带来的基督教侵蚀，这与梅佩的部落和传统根源相悖。
back_translation: It also touched upon the erosion of Christianity brought by missionaries, which contradicts the tribal and traditional roots of the Meipe.

text: the mushy finale turns john q into a movie-of-the-week tearjerker .
translation: 这个感人的结局使《约翰·Q》变成了一部周末电视电影的感人之作。
back_translation: This touching ending makes "John Q" a heartfelt work for a weekend television movie.

text: the story is familiar from its many predecessors ; like them , it eventually culminates in the not-exactly -stunning insight that crime does n't pay .
translation: 这个故事与许多前作相似；像它们一样，最终得出的结论并不令人震惊，那就是犯罪是得不偿失的。
back_translation: This story is similar to many previous works; like them, the conclusion ultimately reached is not shocking, which is that crime does not pay.

text: graM-gas M-`s interaM-gM-ues entre seus personagens , o filme torna-se nM-co apenas uma histM-sria divertida sobre uma curiosa perseguiM-gM-co , mas tambM-im um belo estudo de personagens .
translation: 在角色之间的互动中，这部电影不仅仅是一段关于好奇追逐的有趣故事，也是对角色的精彩研究。
back_translation: In the interactions between the characters, this film is not just an interesting story about a curious chase, but also a brilliant study of the characters.

text: hawn lets it all hang out in this film and i have to admire her guts . sarandon is equally bold and daring in her portrayal of a woman who has lost her way in a closet full of beige suits .
translation: 霍恩在这部电影中毫无保留，我必须佩服她的勇气。萨兰登在饰演一个在满是米色西装的壁橱中迷失方向的女人时，同样大胆而勇敢。
back_translation: Horne is unreserved in this film, and I must admire her courage. Sarandon is equally bold and brave in portraying a woman lost in a closet full of beige suits.

text: even if it is generally amusing from time to time , i spy has all the same problems the majority of action comedies have .
translation: 即使它偶尔会令人感到有趣，但《间谍》依然存在大多数动作喜剧所面临的所有问题。
back_translation: Even though it can be amusing at times, "Spy" still has all the problems that most action comedies face.

text: it teaches the importance and understanding of life and death . it
translation: 它教会了生命和死亡的重要性和理解。
back_translation: It taught the importance and understanding of life and death.

text: sure to stir up some controversy , callous sentiment is a true depiction of how violence can affect ones psyche .
translation: 毫无疑问，这将引发一些争议，无情的情感真实地描绘了暴力如何影响一个人的心理。
back_translation: There is no doubt that this will provoke some controversy; the ruthless emotion vividly depicts how violence affects a person's psyche.

text: reign of fire may be little more than another platter of reheated aliens , but it 's still pretty tasty .
translation: 《火焰统治》可能只是一盘加热过的外星人，但它仍然相当美味。
back_translation: "Flame Ruler" may just be a reheated alien dish, but it is still quite delicious.

text: now the inmates are retaliating , with seagal and ja rule leading them .
translation: 现在囚犯们正在报复，西格尔和杰·鲁尔正在带领他们。
back_translation: The prisoners are now taking revenge, led by Sigel and Jay Rule.

text: concerned that his son is going to embarrass him during his campaign to become the governor of california , brad 's wealthy father and his campaign manager ( underwood ) , hire two juilliard-trained actors ( diggs and anderson ) to disguise themselves as `` real life gangstaz `` , and kidnap his son , dropping him off in the `` real hood `` in compton , in an effort to scare the ghettofied attitude and behavior out of him .
translation: 布拉德的富有父亲和他的竞选经理（安德伍德）担心他的儿子在竞选加州州长期间会让自己尴尬，于是雇佣了两名朱莉亚德训练的演员（迪格斯和安德森）伪装成“真实的街头帮派”，并绑架了他的儿子，把他放到康普顿的“真实街区”，试图吓走他那种街头文化的态度和行为。
back_translation: Brad's wealthy father and his campaign manager (Underwood) were worried that his son might embarrass himself during the campaign for California governor, so they hired two Juilliard-trained actors (Digs and Anderson) to disguise themselves as a "real street gang" and kidnapped his son, placing him in a "real neighborhood" in Compton, trying to scare away his attitude and behavior related to street culture.

text: after being handcuffed to new york city 's 'a ' train by his prep school friends ( keith , perabo , hayward ) , young karim ( mehta ) is forced to ride all the way to the last stop , far rockaway .
translation: 在被他的预备学校朋友（基思、佩拉博、海沃德）铐在纽约市的‘A’线列车上后，年轻的卡里姆（梅赫塔）被迫一路坐到最后一站，远罗克威。
back_translation: After being handcuffed by his prep school friends (Keith, Pelabo, Hayward) on the 'A' line train in New York City, young Karim (Mehta) was forced to ride all the way to the last stop, Far Rockaway.

text: the chateau cleverly probes the cross-cultural differences between gauls and yanks .
translation: 这座城堡巧妙地探讨了高卢人和美国人之间的跨文化差异。
back_translation: This castle cleverly explores the cross-cultural differences between the Gauls and Americans.

text: an eager young englishman is dispatched to sarawak to become part of the british colonial government , encounters some unorthodox local traditions , and finds himself faced with tough decisions of the heart involving the beautiful young selima , the unwitting object of his affections .
translation: 一位热情洋溢的年轻英国人被派往沙捞越，成为英国殖民政府的一员，他遇到了一些非常规的当地传统，并发现自己面临着艰难的内心抉择，涉及到美丽的年轻女子塞利玛，她是他情感的无意对象。
back_translation: An enthusiastic young British man is sent to Sarawak to become a part of the British colonial government. He encounters some unconventional local traditions and finds himself facing a difficult inner choice involving the beautiful young woman Selima, who is the unintended object of his affections.

text: is anyone else out there getting tired of the whole slo-mo , double-pistoled , ballistic-pyrotechnic hong kong action aesthetic ?
translation: 还有其他人对这种慢动作、双枪、弹道烟火风格的香港动作美学感到厌倦吗？
back_translation: Is there anyone else who feels tired of this slow-motion, dual-wielding, ballistic fireworks style of Hong Kong action aesthetics?

text: it does n't do a lot of deep thinking , but unlike many futuristic combos of sf and f/x , it does make a statement : freedom of opinion is a threat to totalitarian systems .
translation: 它并没有进行大量的深度思考，但与许多科幻与特效的未来组合不同，它确实表达了一个观点：言论自由对极权主义系统构成威胁。
back_translation: It did not engage in a lot of deep thinking, but unlike many combinations of science fiction and special effects in the future, it indeed expressed a viewpoint: that freedom of speech poses a threat to totalitarian systems.

text: it 's impossible to duplicate the shock of the 11-year-old lambs , but the new film succeeds at creating nerve-tightening moments of suspense .
translation: 复制11岁羊羔的震撼是不可能的，但这部新电影成功地创造了令人紧张的悬念时刻。
back_translation: It is impossible to replicate the shock of an 11-year-old lamb, but this new film successfully creates tense moments of suspense.

text: holland lets things peter out midway , but it 's notably better acted -- and far less crass - than some other recent efforts in the burgeoning genre of films about black urban professionals .
translation: 荷兰让事情在中途渐渐消失，但它的表演明显更好——而且比一些近年来关于黑人城市专业人士的崛起类型的其他作品要低得多的粗俗。
back_translation: The Netherlands allows things to gradually fade away midway, but its performance is obviously much better—and far less vulgar than some other works in recent years about the rise of Black urban professionals.

text: it 's supposed to be post-feminist breezy but ends up as tedious as the chatter of parrots raised on oprah .
translation: 它本应是后女权主义的轻松之作，但最终却像在奥普拉身边长大的鹦鹉的喋喋不休一样无聊。
back_translation: It was supposed to be a light work of post-feminism, but in the end, it was as boring as the incessant chatter of a parrot raised beside Oprah.

text: only one person has the power to save the princess , a priestess .
translation: 只有一个人有能力拯救公主，那就是一个女祭司。
back_translation: Only one person has the ability to save the princess, and that is a female priestess.

text: the kind of women that own every room they walk into , and who think of all men as 'boys ' .
translation: 那种走进每个房间都能掌控全场的女性，并且把所有男性都视为“男孩”。
back_translation: The kind of woman who walks into every room and can take charge of the situation, seeing all the men as "boys."

text: so saccharine , i 'm not sure i 'd be able to take it under normal conditions .
translation: 太甜腻了，我不确定在正常情况下我能不能接受。
back_translation: It's too sweet and greasy; I'm not sure if I can accept it under normal circumstances.

text: young police officer filipo ( giovanni ribisi ) descends into philippa 's life , changing her bleak outlook on existence into one in search of tranquility among corruption , as they become unlikely soul mates and lovers .
translation: 年轻的警官菲立波（乔凡尼·瑞比西）进入了菲利帕的生活，改变了她对生活的阴暗看法，让她在腐败中寻找宁静，他们成为了不太可能的灵魂伴侣和恋人。
back_translation: Young officer Filippo (Giovanni Ribisi) enters Filippa's life, changing her dark outlook on life and helping her seek tranquility amidst corruption. They become unlikely soulmates and lovers.

text: besides the fact that he is still disliked by professor snape ( alan rickman ) and hated by draco malfoy ( tom felton ) , harry gets off to a great start with his two best friends , ron weasly ( rupert grint ) and hermione granger ( emma watson ) , and famous writer gilderoy lockhart ( kenneth branagh ) has joined the hogwarts staff and is the new defense against the dark arts teacher .
translation: 除了教授斯内普（艾伦·里克曼）仍然不喜欢他和德拉科·马尔福（汤姆·费尔顿）对他的厌恨外，哈利与他的两个好朋友罗恩·韦斯莱（鲁伯特·格林特）和赫敏·格兰杰（艾玛·沃特森）的关系很好，著名作家吉尔德罗伊·洛哈特（肯尼斯·布拉纳）加入了霍格沃茨的教职，是新的黑魔法防御课老师。
back_translation: Except for Professor Snape (Alan Rickman) still not liking him and Draco Malfoy (Tom Felton) having a strong hatred towards him, Harry has a good relationship with his two best friends, Ron Weasley (Rupert Grint) and Hermione Granger (Emma Watson). The famous writer Gilderoy Lockhart (Kenneth Branagh) has joined the faculty at Hogwarts as the new Defense Against the Dark Arts teacher.

text: claude miller airs out a tight plot with an easy pace and a focus on character drama over crime-film complications .
translation: 克劳德·米勒以轻松的节奏和对角色戏剧的关注来展开紧凑的情节，淡化了犯罪电影的复杂性。
back_translation: Claude Miller unfolds a compact plot with a relaxed pace and a focus on character drama, downplaying the complexity of crime films.

text: just teetering south of puberty , young thomas harris has discovered that instead of looking at stars , he can use his new telescope to study the beautiful woman next door .
translation: 年轻的托马斯·哈里斯刚过青春期，他发现与其仰望星空，不如用他的新望远镜观察邻居那位美丽的女人。
back_translation: Young Thomas Harris, just past his teenage years, found that instead of gazing at the starry sky, he preferred to use his new telescope to observe the beautiful woman next door.

text: they call themselves d . e . b . s .
translation: 他们称自己为 d . e . b . s .
back_translation: They call themselves d.e.b.s.

text: it 's another stale , kill-by-numbers flick , complete with blade-thin characters and terrible , pun-laden dialogue .
translation: 这又是一部陈腐的千篇一律的电影，满是薄弱的人物和糟糕的玩弄双关的对话。
back_translation: This is yet another cliché, formulaic movie, filled with weak characters and poorly executed double entendre dialogue.

text: a light-hearted and high-spirited story , full of spice , sensuality and romance , viva zapato tells the tale of dolores , a beautiful cuban dancer who decides to leave her failing marriage and open a restaurant by the beach with her aunt from brazil .
translation: 一个轻松愉快、充满活力的故事，充满了辛辣、感性和浪漫，《万岁鞋子》讲述了美丽的古巴舞者多洛雷斯的故事，她决定离开正在走向失败的婚姻，与来自巴西的姑姑一起在海边开一家餐厅。
back_translation: A lighthearted and vibrant story, full of spice, emotion, and romance, "Hooray for Shoes" tells the tale of the beautiful Cuban dancer Dolores, who decides to leave her failing marriage to open a seaside restaurant with her aunt from Brazil.

text: there 's a story that goes around the town of darkness falls about her , and she 's called the tooth fairy .
translation: 在黑暗降临的城镇里，有一个关于她的故事，她被称为牙仙子。
back_translation: In the town where darkness falls, there is a story about her; she is known as the Tooth Fairy.

text: if myers decides to make another austin powers movie , maybe he should just stick with austin and dr evil .
translation: 如果迈尔斯决定再拍一部奥斯丁·鲍尔斯电影，也许他应该只专注于奥斯丁和邪恶博士。
back_translation: If Myers decides to make another Austin Powers movie, perhaps he should just focus on Austin and the evil doctor.

text: after tracking down the assassin , she is killed before any information can be driven out of her .
translation: 在追踪到刺客后，她在任何信息被提取之前就被杀了。
back_translation: After tracking down the assassin, she was killed before any information could be extracted.

text: beautiful , angry and sad , with a curious sick poetry , as if the marquis de sade had gone in for pastel landscapes .
translation: 美丽、愤怒和悲伤，带着一种好奇病态的诗意，仿佛萨德侯爵涉足了粉彩风景。
back_translation: Beauty, anger, and sadness, infused with a curiously pathological poetry, as if the Marquis de Sade had ventured into pastel landscapes.

text: this is lightweight filmmaking , to be sure , but it 's pleasant enough -- and oozing with attractive men .
translation: 这确实是轻量级的电影制作，但相当愉快，而且充满了迷人的男士。
back_translation: This is indeed lightweight filmmaking, but it's quite enjoyable and filled with charming gentlemen.

text: the result is just enough pixie dust to get this franchise filler off the ground , provided viewers have enough faith and trust in one of the studio 's most fondly remembered titles .
translation: 结果只是足够的魔法粉来让这个系列填充作品起飞，前提是观众对工作室最受喜爱的标题之一有足够的信任和信心。
back_translation: The result was just enough magic dust to get this series of spin-off works off the ground, provided that the audience has enough trust and confidence in one of the studio's favorite titles.

text: the protagonist , sally amonte , is still mourning the loss of her deceased husband and though she is young and beautiful , has resigned herself to working in the textile mill , caring for her elderly mother , and worrying about her rebellious teenage daughter .
translation: 主角萨莉·阿蒙特仍在为已故丈夫的丧失而悲痛，尽管她年轻美丽，但已接受在纺织厂工作、照顾年迈的母亲以及担心叛逆的少女女儿的生活。
back_translation: The protagonist Sally Amont is still mourning the loss of her late husband. Despite being young and beautiful, she has resigned herself to a life of working in a textile factory, taking care of her elderly mother, and worrying about her rebellious teenage daughter.

text: and may bring claire face to face with her past .
translation: 并可能让克莱尔面对她的过去。
back_translation: And it may force Claire to confront her past.

text: the film does n't show enough of the creative process or even of what was created for the non-fan to figure out what makes wilco a big deal .
translation: 这部电影没有展示足够的创作过程，甚至没有展示什么是创作出来的，让非粉丝无法理解威尔科为何如此重要。
back_translation: This movie does not showcase enough of the creative process, nor does it show what was created, making it difficult for non-fans to understand why Wilco is so important.

text: no aspirations to social import inform the movie version . this is a shameless sham , calculated to cash in on the popularity of its stars .
translation: 没有社会影响力的抱负使得电影版变得无趣。这是一个无耻的骗局，旨在利用明星的受欢迎程度来赚钱。
back_translation: The lack of ambition with social influence makes the movie version boring. It is a shameless scam designed to profit from the popularity of stars.

text: as he navigates this decadent new world , he meets a host of characters , including david , an older gay man who desires him , and benjamin , a young hustler from texas who has also managed to find a place among the aristocracy .
translation: 当他在这个奢靡的新世界中穿行时，他遇到了一众角色，包括大卫，一个渴望他的年长同性恋者，还有本杰明，一个来自德克萨斯州的年轻男妓，他也设法在贵族中找到了自己的位置。
back_translation: As he navigated through this extravagant new world, he encountered a cast of characters, including David, an older gay man who desired him, and Benjamin, a young male escort from Texas who managed to find his place among the aristocrats.

text: despite its title , punch-drunk love is never heavy-handed . the jabs it employs are short , carefully placed and dead-center .
translation: 尽管其标题为《拳击迷情》，但这部电影从未显得生硬。它所使用的讽刺短小，位置精准，直击要害。
back_translation: Although its title is "Boxing Fever," the film never feels forced. The satire it employs is succinct, precisely positioned, and hits the mark.

text: quite simply , a joy to watch and -- especially -- to listen to .
translation: 简单来说，观看和听都是一种享受。
back_translation: In simple terms, watching and listening are both forms of enjoyment.

text: there are a few chuckles , but not a single gag sequence that really scores , and the stars seem to be in two different movies .
translation: 有几处笑声，但没有一个能够真正让人捧腹的搞笑片段，而且明星们似乎在演两个不同的电影。
back_translation: There are several laughs, but none that can truly make people double over with laughter, and it seems the stars are acting in two different movies.

text: it wo n't hold up over the long haul , but in the moment , finch 's tale provides the forgettable pleasures of a saturday matinee .
translation: 它在长时间内无法维持，但在此刻，芬奇的故事提供了一个周六午间场次难以忘怀的乐趣。
back_translation: It cannot be sustained for a long time, but at this moment, Finch's story provides an unforgettable pleasure for a Saturday afternoon performance.

text: just like hearst 's enormous yacht , it 's slow and unwieldy and takes a long time to reach its destination .
translation: 就像赫斯特的巨大游艇一样，它缓慢笨重，抵达目的地需要很长时间。
back_translation: Like Hearst's massive yacht, it is slow and cumbersome, taking a long time to reach its destination.

text: during an undercover drug buy mitch was working that trey botched by calling in for backup and drawing media attention , mitch 's partner is shot with a very exotic 12-gauge automatic weapon ; mitch then shoots the video camera out of the hands of a reporter filming the action when the cameraman refused to shut it down .
translation: 在一次秘密毒品交易中，米奇正在进行工作，而特雷则因为呼叫增援并引起媒体的关注而搞砸了。米奇的搭档被一种非常特殊的12号自动武器射击；当摄像师拒绝关闭摄像机时，米奇便将摄像机从记者的手中射掉。
back_translation: During a secret drug deal, Mickey was on the job, while Trey messed up by calling for backup and drawing media attention. Mickey's partner was shot with a very special type 12 automatic weapon; when the cameraman refused to turn off the camera, Mickey shot the camera out of the reporter's hand.

text: the `` easiest `` ( and most dangerous ) way to get it is working for some drug-dealers .
translation: 获得它的“最简单”（同时也是最危险）的方法是为一些毒贩工作。
back_translation: The "easiest" (but also the most dangerous) way to obtain it is to work for some drug dealers.

text: as comedic spotlights go , notorious c . h . o . hits all the verbal marks it should .
translation: 作为喜剧聚光灯，臭名昭著的C.H.O.达到了所有应有的语言标准。
back_translation: As a comedic spotlight, the infamous C.H.O. has met all the necessary linguistic standards.

text: a summer entertainment adults can see without feeling embarrassed , but it could have been more .
translation: 一个成年人可以观看而不感到尴尬的夏季娱乐节目，但本可以做得更好。
back_translation: A summer entertainment program that an adult can watch without feeling embarrassed, but it could have been better.

text: ( lil ' romeo plays a young dancer who has to choose between pursuing a career as a dancer and the quick money of street drug sales ; phifer plays honey 's romantic interest . )
translation: （小罗密欧饰演一位年轻舞者，他必须在追求舞蹈事业和街头毒品销售的快速赚钱之间做出选择；费佛饰演霍尼的情感伴侣。）
back_translation: (Little Romeo plays a young dancer who must choose between pursuing a dance career and the quick money from street drug dealing; Feva plays Honey's emotional partner.)

text: in return for a small plot of land , george agrees to search for princess lunna .
translation: 作为交换一小块土地，乔治同意寻找露娜公主。
back_translation: In exchange for a small piece of land, George agreed to look for Princess Luna.

text: fancy a real downer ? [ leigh ] lays it on so thick this time that it feels like a suicide race .
translation: 想要一个真正的扫兴吗？[莱伊]这次说得那么夸张，感觉就像是一场自杀竞赛。
back_translation: Want to really kill the vibe? [Ray] is being so dramatic this time, it feels like a suicide competition.

text: having sought and found refuge within this ancient religious society , sheldon finds himself captivated by this unusual and powerful world and the three old men who run it .
translation: 在寻求并找到这个古老宗教社团的庇护后，谢尔顿被这个不寻常而强大的世界以及管理它的三位老者所吸引。
back_translation: After seeking and finding the refuge of this ancient religious community, Shelton was drawn to this unusual and powerful world, as well as to the three elders who governed it.

text: not for all tastes . but i , for one , was hooked by this fish 's tale .
translation: 不是所有人的口味。但我，作为一个，对于这个鱼的故事着迷了。
back_translation: Not everyone's taste. But I, as one, am fascinated by the story of this fish.

text: a very bizarre blend of reservoir dogs , fight club , unbreakable and croupier .
translation: 一种非常奇特的《落水狗》、《搏击俱乐部》、《不可摧毁》和《荷官》混合体。
back_translation: A very unique blend of "Falling Down," "Fight Club," "Unbreakable," and "The Dealer."

text: shy san franciscan zoe is a twenty-something love-starved animator who spends countless hours listening to kxch cherish radio , losing herself in a syrupy romantic fantasy of '70s and '80s pop songs .
translation: 害羞的旧金山女孩佐伊是一位二十多岁的渴望爱情的动画师，她花费无数小时收听KXCH Cherish电台，在70和80年代的流行歌曲中迷失于甜蜜浪漫的幻想中。
back_translation: Shy San Francisco girl Zoe is a twenty-something animator yearning for love. She spends countless hours listening to KXCH Cherish radio, getting lost in sweet romantic fantasies with pop songs from the 70s and 80s.

text: if so , then this movie will touch your soul . . .
translation: 如果是这样，那么这部电影将触动你的灵魂……
back_translation: If that's the case, then this movie will touch your soul...

text: a washed-up 80 's pop star ( ferguson ) suddenly has a new direction in life when he discovers that he has a teenage daughter , olivia , ( church ) , in cardiff , wales .
translation: 一位过气的80年代流行歌手（费格森）突然在生活中找到了新的方向，因为他发现自己在威尔士卡迪夫有一个青春期女儿，名叫奥利维亚（丘奇）。
back_translation: An out-of-date pop singer from the 1980s (Ferguson) suddenly finds a new direction in life when he discovers he has a teenage daughter named Olivia (Church) in Cardiff, Wales.

text: at first this encounter with his past is pleasant until julie 's ex-boyfriend ben shows up .
translation: 一开始，这次与他过去的邂逅是愉快的，直到朱莉的前男友本出现。
back_translation: At first, this meeting with him in the past was pleasant, until Julie's ex-boyfriend Ben showed up.

text: billy is now ready to play the ultimate showman !
translation: 比利现在准备好玩《终极表演者》了！
back_translation: Billy is now ready to play "The Ultimate Performer"!

text: but on his latest case , the stakes are higher for vincent -- the suspect he 's investigating is his own son .
translation: 但在他最新的案件中，对文森特来说风险更高——他正在调查的嫌疑犯是他的亲生儿子。
back_translation: But in his latest case, the stakes are higher for Vincent— the suspect he is investigating is his biological son.

text: amitabh ca n't believe the board of directors and his mind is filled with revenge and what better revenge than robbing the bank himself , ironic as it may sound .
translation: 阿米塔布无法相信董事会，他的心中充满了复仇，自己抢银行又何尝不是一种更好的复仇呢，尽管听起来很讽刺。
back_translation: Amitabh couldn't believe the board; his heart was filled with vengeance. Isn't robbing a bank a better form of revenge, even if it sounds ironic?

text: `` one hell of a christmas `` is a dark and action packed comedy that takes place in a modern city as well as in a fearful underworld .
translation: ``一个疯狂的圣诞节``是一部黑暗且动作满满的喜剧，故事发生在现代城市以及一个恐怖的地下世界。
back_translation: "A Crazy Christmas" is a dark and action-packed comedy that takes place in a modern city and a terrifying underground world.

text: splendidly illustrates the ability of the human spirit to overcome adversity .
translation: 精彩地展示了人类精神克服逆境的能力。
back_translation: It brilliantly demonstrates the ability of the human spirit to overcome adversity.

text: a rigorously structured and exquisitely filmed drama about a father and son connection that is a brief shooting star of love .
translation: 一部结构严谨、拍摄精美的戏剧，讲述了一段父子之间短暂而炽烈的爱情，如同流星划过。
back_translation: A well-structured, beautifully filmed drama tells the story of a fleeting yet intense love between a father and son, akin to a meteor streaking across the sky.

text: gets under the skin of a man who has just lost his wife .
translation: 深入了解一位刚失去妻子的男人。
back_translation: A deep understanding of a man who has just lost his wife.

text: this is a monumental achievement in practically every facet of inept filmmaking : joyless , idiotic , annoying , heavy-handed , visually atrocious , and often downright creepy .

text: julia roberts , blair underwood , david duchovny , brad pitt ( cameoing as himself ) , david hyde pierce , catherine keener , and terence stamp are reason enough to see the film , which is billed as a `` movie about movies for people who love movies . ``

text: lilo is a 5 year old hawaiian girl who 's quite peculiar : she has an off beat take on life and is a little obsessed about taking care of downtrodden animals .

back_translation: Lilo is a five-year-old Hawaiian girl who is very unique: she has a different perspective on life and is a bit obsessed with taking care of neglected animals.

text: torn between his father 's dream of making a hospital ( which he can realize by marrying sonia ) and his own personal emotions for dr . neha , akash has to choose either .
translation: 在他父亲希望建立一所医院（他可以通过与索尼娅结婚来实现这个梦想）和他对内哈医生的个人情感之间，阿卡什必须做出选择。
back_translation: Akash must choose between his father's hope of establishing a hospital (which he could achieve by marrying Sonia) and his personal feelings for Dr. Neha.

text: the master of disguise represents adam sandler 's latest attempt to dumb down the universe .
translation: 《伪装大师》代表了亚当·桑德勒最新的试图让宇宙变得愚蠢的尝试。
back_translation: "Master of Disguise" represents Adam Sandler's latest attempt to make the universe silly.

text: instead of being the happy father-in-law , shocked jack attempts to kill himself back in las vegas as he realizes patricia 's rejection .
translation: 而不是成为快乐的岳父，震惊的杰克试图在拉斯维加斯自杀，因为他意识到了帕特里夏的拒绝。
back_translation: Instead of becoming a happy father-in-law, the shocked Jack attempts to commit suicide in Las Vegas because he realizes Patricia's rejection.

text: would you laugh if a tuba-playing dwarf rolled down a hill in a trash can ? do you chuckle at the thought of an ancient librarian whacking a certain part of a man 's body ? if you answered yes , by all means enjoy the new guy .
translation: 如果一个拉低音号的小矮人从山坡上滚下在一个垃圾桶里，你会笑吗？你是否会因为想象一个古老的图书管理员打某个男人身体的特定部位而咯咯笑？如果你的答案是“是”，那么尽情享受这个新家伙吧。
back_translation: If a little dwarf with a tuba rolls down a hill and ends up in a trash can, would you laugh? Would you giggle at the thought of an ancient librarian hitting a specific part of a man's body? If your answer is "yes," then enjoy this new guy to the fullest.

text: the lightest , most breezy movie steven spielberg has made in more than a decade . and the positive change in tone here seems to have recharged him .
translation: 史蒂文·斯皮尔伯格在十多年里制作的最轻松、最愉快的电影。而且，这里语气的积极变化似乎给他注入了新的活力。
back_translation: Steven Spielberg's most lighthearted and enjoyable film in over a decade. Moreover, the positive shift in tone here seems to have infused him with new energy.

text: i do n't think i laughed out loud once . and when you 're talking about a slapstick comedy , that 's a pretty big problem .
translation: 我认为我一次都没有大笑过。而当你在谈论一部滑稽喜剧时，这就成了一个相当大的问题。
back_translation: I don't think I've ever laughed out loud. And when you're talking about a comedy, that becomes quite a big issue.

text: what bloody sunday lacks in clarity , it makes up for with a great , fiery passion .
translation: 《血腥星期日》在清晰性上有所欠缺，但在激情上却展现出伟大而炙热的力量。
back_translation: "Bloody Sunday" may lack clarity, but it displays a great and intense power in its passion.

text: daughter from danang reveals that efforts toward closure only open new wounds . it does n't flinch from its unsettling prognosis , namely , that the legacy of war is a kind of perpetual pain .
translation: 来自岘港的女儿揭示了追求解脱的努力只能开启新的伤口。电影对这一令人不安的预言并不退缩，即战争的遗产是一种永恒的痛苦。
back_translation: The daughter from Da Nang reveals that the pursuit of liberation can only open new wounds. The film does not shy away from this disturbing prophecy, that the legacy of war is an enduring suffering.

text: it 's a glorious groove that leaves you wanting more .
translation: 这是一个辉煌的节奏，让你渴望更多。
back_translation: This is a brilliant rhythm that makes you crave more.

text: the film hinges on its performances , and both leads are up to the task .
translation: 这部电影的关键在于演员的表演，两位主角都胜任这个任务。
back_translation: The key to this movie lies in the performances of the actors, and both leads are well-suited for the task.

text: a stunning and overwhelmingly cogent case for kissinger as a calculating war criminal .
translation: 一个令人震惊且极具说服力的论据，证明基辛格是一个算计的战争罪犯。
back_translation: A shocking and compelling argument that proves Kissinger is a calculating war criminal.

text: instead of using george and lucy 's most obvious differences to ignite sparks , lawrence desperately looks elsewhere , seizing on george 's haplessness and lucy 's personality tics .
translation: 劳伦斯并没有利用乔治和露西最明显的差异来激发火花，而是绝望地寻求其他途径，抓住乔治的无能和露西的性格瑕疵。
back_translation: Lawrence did not leverage the most obvious differences between George and Lucy to spark conflict; instead, he desperately sought other ways to exploit George's incompetence and Lucy's character flaws.

text: in the end , the weight of water comes to resemble the kind of soft-core twaddle you 'd expect to see on showtime 's 'red shoe diaries . '
translation: 最终，水的重量变得类似于你在Showtime的《红鞋日记》中所期望看到的那种软核废话。
back_translation: Ultimately, the weight of the water becomes similar to the kind of softcore nonsense you would expect to see in Showtime's "Red Shoe Diaries."

text: the whole movie is simply a lazy exercise in bad filmmaking that asks you to not only suspend your disbelief but your intelligence as well .
translation: 整部电影简直是一次懒惰的糟糕电影制作练习，要求你不仅要Suspend你的怀疑，还要Suspend你的智力。
back_translation: The entire movie is simply an exercise in lazy and terrible filmmaking, requiring you to not only suspend your disbelief but also suspend your intelligence.

text: though it inspires some ( out-of-field ) creative thought , the film is -- to its own detriment -- much more a cinematic collage than a polemical tract .
translation: 尽管它激发了一些（超领域的）创造性思维，但这部电影——对其自身而言——更像是一个电影拼贴，而不是一种论战文本。
back_translation: Although it has inspired some (transcendent) creative thinking, this film—by its own definition—is more like a cinematic collage rather than a text of argumentation.

text: it 's a very tasteful rock and roll movie . you could put it on a coffee table anywhere .
translation: 这是一部非常有品位的摇滚乐电影。你可以把它放在任何地方的咖啡桌上。
back_translation: This is a very tasteful rock music movie. You can place it on any coffee table.

text: mason novel follows a british officer who resigns his post right before his regiment ships out to battle the rebels .
translation: 梅森的小说讲述了一位英国军官在他的军团出征叛军之前辞职的故事。
back_translation: Mason's novel tells the story of a British officer who resigns before his regiment is deployed to confront the rebels.

text: marker 's incredible collection of newsreel footage -- tv footage from various countries , home movies and other celluloid wonders -- eventually shapes a scattered , pinwheel idea of the era 's attitude .
translation: 这个独特的新闻胶卷收藏——来自各个国家的电视录像、家庭影片和其他胶卷奇观——最终形成了对那个时代态度的一个零散、万花筒般的概念。
back_translation: This unique collection of news reels—television footage, home movies, and other film wonders from various countries—ultimately forms a fragmented, kaleidoscopic concept of the attitudes of that era.

text: september of 1944 , a few days before finland went out of the second world war .
translation: 1944年9月，芬兰在第二次世界大战中退出前的几天。
back_translation: In September 1944, Finland withdrew just a few days before the end of World War II.

text: this is the story of their lives , their memories , their unbending habits and the films they love .
translation: 这是他们生活的故事，他们的记忆，他们固执的习惯和他们爱的电影。
back_translation: This is the story of their lives, their memories, their stubborn habits, and the movies they love.

text: awaking , he meets manny , a mammoth who travels to the north , and decides to follow him .
translation: 醒来后，他遇到了曼尼，一只朝北迁徙的猛犸象，决定跟随他。
back_translation: After waking up, he met Manny, a mammoth migrating north, and decided to follow him.

text: the movie is dawn of the dead crossed with john carpenter 's ghosts of mars , with zombies not as ghoulish as the first and trains not as big as the second .
translation: 这部电影融合了《活死人黎明》和约翰·卡朋特的《火星幽灵》，其中的僵尸没有前者那样可怕，列车也没有后者那样庞大。
back_translation: This film combines "Dawn of the Dead" and John Carpenter's "Ghosts of Mars," with zombies that are not as frightening as those in the former, and trains that are not as colossal as those in the latter.

text: . . . a fairly disposable yet still entertaining b picture .
translation: . . . 一部相当可有可无但仍然有趣的B级片。
back_translation: ...a rather trivial yet still interesting B-movie.

text: whether you like rap music or loathe it , you ca n't deny either the tragic loss of two young men in the prime of their talent or the power of this movie .
translation: 无论你喜欢说唱音乐还是厌恶它， you都无法否认两位年轻人在才华巅峰时期的悲惨逝去，以及这部电影的力量。
back_translation: Whether you love or hate rap music, you cannot deny the tragic demise of two young talents at the peak of their abilities and the power of this film.

text: but idle curiosity leads to a dark secret when rebecca and john cam with vera madeline , an online psychic , who initiates a deadly reign of terror over their lives .
translation: 但出于无聊的好奇，瑞贝卡和约翰与在线灵媒维拉·马德琳相遇，这引发了一场对他们生活的致命恐怖统治。
back_translation: But out of bored curiosity, Rebecca and John encounter the online medium Vera Madeline, which triggers a deadly reign of terror over their lives.

text: quirky and understated office comedy with crispin glover as the guy who would prefer not to work , but likes to hang around .
translation: 离奇而低调的办公室喜剧，克里斯平·格洛弗饰演一个宁愿不工作但喜欢闲逛的人。
back_translation: A bizarre yet understated office comedy, starring Crispin Glover as a person who would rather not work but enjoys hanging out.

text: part of the draw of dance is the impossibility to define its particular joy . tavernier 's film conveys a large element of its appeal -- and more .
translation: 舞蹈的魅力部分在于其特定快乐的无可定义性。塔维涅的电影传达了其吸引力的一大元素——还有更多。
back_translation: The charm of dance lies in its specific joy that cannot be defined. Taviné's film conveys a major element of its appeal—there is more to it.

text: a single-minded man focused on finding the girl of his dreams the perfect vision he 's created in his mind 's eye .
translation: 一个心无旁骛的男人，专注于寻找他梦中女孩的完美形象，这个形象是他在脑海中创造的。
back_translation: A man undistracted, focused on finding the perfect image of the girl from his dreams, an image he created in his mind.

text: the judge gives him until the end of the day to present the papers and thus begins a cat and mouse game between the proponents .
translation: 法官给他时间直到当天结束来提交文件，从而展开了一场支持者之间的猫鼠游戏。
back_translation: The judge gave him time until the end of the day to submit the documents, thus starting a cat-and-mouse game among the supporters.

text: produced by chica luna productions , corporate dawgz is a comedic ode to white revolutionaries who understand that what they give up in privilege they gain tenfold in humanity .
translation: 由Chica Luna Productions制作的《Corporate Dawgz》是对白人民族主义者的喜剧颂歌，他们明白放弃特权所带来的损失在仁爱上获得的回报会是十倍。
back_translation: "Corporate Dawgz," produced by Chica Luna Productions, is a comedic tribute to white nationalists who understand that the loss of privilege will be repaid tenfold in compassion.

text: kanna is intelligent and presently doing final year mbbs in nagpur .
translation: 卡娜很聪明，目前在纳格浦尔读最后一年医学本科。
back_translation: Karna is very smart and is currently in her final year of medical undergraduate studies in Nagpur.

text: a sub-formulaic slap in the face to seasonal cheer .
translation: 对季节欢愉的一记非公式性的耳光。
back_translation: An unofficial slap in the face to seasonal joy.

text: humorless , self-conscious art drivel , made without a glimmer of intelligence or invention .
translation: 没有一点智慧或创意的幽默感缺失、自我意识强烈的艺术废话。
back_translation: A lack of humor devoid of any wisdom or creativity, coupled with a strong self-awareness, amounts to artistic nonsense.

text: what 's infuriating about full frontal is that it 's too close to real life to make sense . what 's invigorating about it is that it does n't give a damn .
translation: 关于《全裸》的令人愤怒之处在于它离现实生活太近，难以理解。让人振奋的是，它毫不在乎。
back_translation: The frustrating thing about "Naked" is that it is too close to real life, making it hard to understand. The exciting part is that it doesn't care at all.

text: `` some like it hot `` meets `` stir crazy `` describes the antics of the film .
translation: 《热情似火》遇上《疯狂闯地下》描述了影片的滑稽情节。
back_translation: "Enthusiastic as Fire" encounters "Crazy Through the Underground," describing the film's comedic situations.

text: the journey is worth your time , especially if you have ellen pompeo sitting next to you for the ride .
translation: 这趟旅程值得你的时间，尤其是如果你身边坐着艾伦·庞佩奥。
back_translation: This journey is worth your time, especially if you're sitting next to Ellen Pompeo.

text: the project honors [ dickens ' ] passionate voice , and the strong ensemble cast sees us through a few tonal shifts .
translation: 该项目尊重[狄更斯]的热情声音，强大的合奏阵容使我们经历了一些音调的变化。
back_translation: The project respects Dickens' passionate voice, and the powerful ensemble allows us to experience some changes in tone.

text: the film would have been more enjoyable had the balance shifted in favor of water-bound action over the land-based 'drama , ' but the emphasis on the latter leaves blue crush waterlogged .
translation: 如果电影的重心更多地倾向于水上动作，而不是陆地上的“戏剧”，那么这部影片会更令人愉快，但对后者的强调使得《蓝色冲击》显得过于沉闷。
back_translation: If the focus of the movie leaned more towards water-based action rather than land-based "drama," it would be more enjoyable. However, the emphasis on the latter makes "Blue Shock" feel too dull.

text: now they must run for their lives as the deluge strikes with full force at the heart of their private world .
translation: 现在，他们必须为自己的生命而奔跑，因为洪水以全力袭击他们私人世界的中心。
back_translation: Now, they must run for their lives as the flood strikes the center of their private world with full force.

text: it 's one heck of a character study -- not of hearst or davies but of the unique relationship between them .
translation: 这是一部绝妙的人物研究——不仅是对赫斯特或戴维斯的研究，而是对他们之间独特关系的研究。
back_translation: This is a wonderful character study—not only of Hearst or Davis, but of the unique relationship between them.

text: starts slowly , but adrien brody M-^V in the title role M-^V helps make the film 's conclusion powerful and satisfying .
translation: 开始得很慢，但阿德里恩·布劳迪在主角中的表现使影片的结局既有力又令人满意。
back_translation: It starts off slowly, but Adrien Brody's performance as the lead makes the film's conclusion both powerful and satisfying.

text: this cheery , down-to-earth film is warm with the cozy feeling of relaxing around old friends .
translation: 这部欢快、接地气的电影充满了和老朋友们围坐在一起轻松放松的温馨感。
back_translation: This cheerful and down-to-earth movie is filled with a warm feeling of sitting together and relaxing with old friends.

text: kok pin is creative and a born artist but his parents would rather he focus on his maths and sciences .
translation: kok pin是个有创意的天生艺术家，但他的父母更希望他专注于数学和科学。
back_translation: Kok Pin is a naturally creative artist, but his parents hope he will focus more on mathematics and science.

text: nearly 75 years after the fact , the matter still has n't given up all its secrets , but denis ' film comes close to a definitive , deeply disturbing account .
translation: 近75年后，这件事情仍然没有揭示所有的秘密，但丹尼斯的电影接近于一个最终的、令人深感不安的叙述。
back_translation: Nearly 75 years later, this matter still hasn’t revealed all its secrets, but Denis's film comes close to a final, haunting narrative.

text: obsessed by the world of pool , johnny ( mars callahan ) could be one of the best .
translation: 对台球世界痴迷的约翰尼（马尔斯·卡拉汉）可能是最好的选手之一。
back_translation: Johnny (Mars Callahan), who is obsessed with the world of billiards, may be one of the best players.

text: as the script progresses , layers are slowly pulled away revealing secret relationships and subversive undercurrents - the wedding shower quickly becomes a free for all .
translation: 随着剧本的发展，层层包袱渐渐被揭开，显露出秘密关系和潜在的暗流 - 婚前派对迅速演变成一场混乱的局面。
back_translation: As the script progresses, layers of baggage are gradually unveiled, revealing secret relationships and potential undercurrents - the bachelorette party quickly devolves into a chaotic situation.

text: the most hopelessly monotonous film of the year , noteworthy only for the gimmick of being filmed as a single unbroken 87-minute take .
translation: 今年最无聊单调的电影，仅因以一次不中断的87分钟长镜头拍摄的 gimmick 而值得注意。
back_translation: The most boring and monotonous movie of the year is noteworthy only for its gimmick of being shot in a single uninterrupted 87-minute long take.

text: lucy is a wannabe writer who hides behind a dead end job in her hometown .
translation: 露西是一个想当作家的女孩，她在家乡的一份无望的工作中掩饰自己。
back_translation: Lucy is a girl who wants to be a writer, and she hides herself in a hopeless job back in her hometown.

text: by the standards of knucklehead swill , the hot chick is pretty damned funny .
translation: 按照傻瓜饮料的标准，那个性感女孩相当搞笑。
back_translation: According to the standards of silly drinks, that sexy girl is quite funny.

text: but something is very wrong in single and looking land .
translation: 但是在单身和寻找伴侣的过程中，有些事情是非常不对劲的。
back_translation: However, during the process of being single and looking for a partner, there are some things that are very wrong.

text: tina tyler cleverly directs five vignettes with unabashed sexual prowess .
translation: 蒂娜·泰勒巧妙地导演了五个小品，展现出毫不掩饰的性魅力。
back_translation: Tina Taylor cleverly directed five skits that showcase unapologetic sexual charm.

text: as now-senator padm & # 233 ; amidala returns to coruscant to vote on an important senatorial matter , an assassination attempt on her life prompts the jedi council to send jedi knight obi-wan kenobi and his padawan anakin skywalker to protect her and find out who the assassin is .
translation: 现任参议员帕德梅·阿米达拉返回科洛桑投票一个重要的参议院事务时，针对她生命的刺杀企图促使绝地委员会派遣绝地骑士欧比旺·肯诺比和他的学徒安纳金·天行者保护她并查明刺客的身份。
back_translation: Senator Padmé Amidala, while returning to Coruscant to vote on an important Senate matter, becomes the target of an assassination attempt, prompting the Jedi Council to send Jedi Knight Obi-Wan Kenobi and his apprentice Anakin Skywalker to protect her and investigate the identity of the assassin.

text: the cynicism is colossal , the casting superb : norton may be the only actor alive who could pull off a character like sherman , without making him either an idiot or a parody .
translation: 这种愤世嫉俗是巨大的，演员阵容精彩：诺顿可能是唯一一个能够成功诠释像舍曼这样的角色，而不让他变成一个傻瓜或讽刺角色的演员。
back_translation: This cynicism is immense, and the cast is impressive: Norton may be the only actor capable of successfully portraying a character like Sherman without turning him into a fool or a caricature.

text: at the same time , mickey steals money from an apartment to help himself and carlos to fulfill their ambitions - with tragic consequences .
translation: 与此同时，米奇从一间公寓偷钱，以帮助自己和卡洛斯实现他们的野心——结果悲惨。
back_translation: Meanwhile, Mickey stole money from an apartment to help himself and Carlos achieve their ambitions - with tragic results.

text: it 's anchored by splendid performances from an honored screen veteran and a sparkling newcomer who instantly transform themselves into a believable mother/daughter pair .
translation: 它由一位受人尊敬的银幕老将和一位闪亮的新秀卓越的表演所支撑，她们瞬间变身为一个令人信服的母女组合。
back_translation: It is supported by the exceptional performances of a respected veteran of the screen and a shining newcomer, who instantly transform into a convincing mother-daughter duo.

text: very annie-mary is familiar but winningly funny and good-hearted .
translation: 非常安妮-玛丽既熟悉又令人愉快，充满幽默和善良。
back_translation: Very Annie-Marie is both familiar and delightful, full of humor and kindness.

text: an interesting psychological game of cat-and-mouse , three-dimensional characters and believable performances all add up to a satisfying crime drama .
translation: 一场有趣的心理猫鼠游戏，三维角色和可信的表演共同构成了一部令人满意的犯罪剧。
back_translation: An interesting psychological cat-and-mouse game, with three-dimensional characters and credible performances, together form a satisfying crime drama.

text: teens are borrowing the family car to drive to manhattan with hopes of being picked to enter studio 54 .
translation: 青少年借用家里的车开往曼哈顿，希望能被选中进入54号工作室。
back_translation: A teenager borrowed the family car to drive to Manhattan, hoping to be selected to join Studio 54.

text: i did n't believe for a moment in these villains or their plot .
translation: 我根本不相信这些恶棍或他们的阴谋。
back_translation: I don’t believe these villains or their schemes at all.

text: the film . . . presents classic moral-condundrum drama : what would you have done to survive ? the problem with the film is whether these ambitions , laudable in themselves , justify a theatrical simulation of the death camp of auschwitz ii-birkenau .
translation: 这部电影呈现了经典的道德困境剧：你会怎么做才能生存？这部影片的问题在于，尽管这些抱负本身值得称道，但是否可以为奥斯威辛二号集中营的戏剧性模拟辩护。
back_translation: This film presents a classic moral dilemma: what would you do to survive? The problem with this film is that, although these aspirations are commendable in themselves, whether they can justify the dramatic simulation of Auschwitz II is questionable.

text: it has plenty of laughs . it just does n't have much else . . . especially in a moral sense .
translation: 它有很多笑点，但其他方面就不太丰富了……尤其在道德层面上。
back_translation: It has many humorous moments, but it lacks depth in other aspects... especially on a moral level.

text: it 's a lovely , eerie film that casts an odd , rapt spell .
translation: 这是一部迷人而神秘的电影，施下了一种奇怪而迷人的魔咒。
back_translation: This is a captivating and mysterious film that casts a strange and enchanting spell.

text: vin diesel reunites with the director ( rob cohen ) and the producer ( neal h . moritz ) of the blockbuster the fast and the furious .
translation: 范·迪塞尔与《速度与激情》的导演（罗布·科恩）和制片人（尼尔·H·莫里兹）重聚。
back_translation: Vin Diesel reunites with the director of "Fast and Furious" (Rob Cohen) and producer (Neal H. Moritz).

text: and even if the answer is `` yes , `` what then ?
translation: 即使答案是“是”，那又如何呢？
back_translation: Even if the answer is "yes," so what?

text: this is just lazy writing . even kids deserve better .
translation: 这只是懒惰的写作。即使是孩子们也值得更好的。
back_translation: This is just lazy writing. Even children deserve better.

text: a little objectivity could have gone a long way .
translation: 一点客观性会有很大帮助。

text: an alcoholic ex-school teacher takes a job watching security cameras in the same house .
translation: 一位酗酒的前学校老师在同一个房子里找到一份监控摄像头的工作。
back_translation: A former school teacher who was an alcoholic found a job with surveillance cameras in the same house.

text: though ganesh is successful in a midlevel sort of way , there 's nothing so striking or fascinating or metaphorically significant about his career as to rate two hours of our attention .
translation: 尽管甘尼什在中等程度上取得了一些成功，但他的职业生涯并没有什么特别引人注目或迷人，或者在比喻上有重大意义，以至于值得我们花两个小时去关注。
back_translation: Although Ganesh has achieved some success to a moderate extent, his career is not particularly remarkable or captivating, nor does it hold significant metaphorical meaning that would warrant our spending two hours focusing on it.

text: they do this by planning india 's biggest bank heist and then de-camping with the loot .
translation: 他们通过策划印度最大的银行抢劫案，然后带着赃物逃跑。
back_translation: They planned the largest bank robbery in India and then fled with the loot.

text: he still lives in his new york city orphanage well after the usual age of release .
translation: 他仍然住在纽约市的孤儿院，远超过通常的释放年龄。
back_translation: He still lives in an orphanage in New York City, well beyond the usual age for release.

text: the film _boogie nights_ was loosely based on his life .
translation: 电影《波西夜》 loosely 基于他的生活。
back_translation: The movie "The Night of Percy" is loosely based on his life.

text: torn between two worlds , trey hides from his discomfort in an increasingly dangerous sexual addiction that threatens to destroy not only his new startup ideas , it may destroy his life .
translation: 在两个世界之间 torn，特雷躲避他日益严重的性上瘾带来的不适，这种上瘾不仅威胁着他的创业新想法，还可能摧毁他的生活。
back_translation: Torn between two worlds, Trey is trying to escape the discomfort brought on by his increasingly severe sex addiction, which not only threatens his entrepreneurial new ideas but could also destroy his life.

text: the best thing i can say about this film is that i ca n't wait to see what the director does next .
translation: 我能说的关于这部电影最好的事情就是，我迫不及待想看看导演接下来会做什么。

text: except shaun runs into one complication after another starting when his application is rejected after his dim-witted guidance counselor sends the wrong application .
translation: 除了肖恩遇到一个又一个的麻烦，首先是因为他的申请被拒绝，而他的愚蠢指导顾问发送了错误的申请。
back_translation: In addition to Sean encountering one trouble after another, the first issue was that his application was rejected because his foolish advisor submitted the wrong application.

text: now finding the town run by the man behind the terrible act , slaughter teams up with the mysterious gunslinger savannah starr to try and rid the west of one of it 's great evils .
translation: 现在寻找由可怕行为背后的男人所掌控的城镇，屠杀者与神秘的枪手薇薇安·斯塔尔联手，试图将西部的一大恶行消除。
back_translation: Now seeking towns controlled by the men behind terrifying actions, a killer teams up with the mysterious gunman Vivian Starr, trying to eradicate a major crime in the West.

text: a somewhat crudely constructed but gripping , questing look at a person so racked with self-loathing , he becomes an enemy to his own race .
translation: 这是一个构建得有些粗糙但引人入胜的故事，讲述一个因自我厌恶而与自己种族为敌的人。
back_translation: This is a somewhat rough yet captivating story about a person who, due to self-loathing, finds themselves at odds with their own race.

text: they all dream about finding their prince charming , and all too often settle for the frog .
translation: 他们都梦想找到白马王子，而往往却只满足于青蛙。
back_translation: They all dream of finding their Prince Charming, but often settle for a frog.

text: seeing no help forthcoming from the sheriff , she turns to the only other person who can help her , jack barone , a grieving father whose daughter , lisa , was the victim of a similar slaying ten years prior .
translation: 她看到治安官没有提供帮助，转而向唯一能帮助她的人求助，即杰克·巴罗恩，一个失去女儿的悲痛父亲，他的女儿丽莎在十年前也遭遇过类似的杀害。
back_translation: She saw that the sheriff was not providing help, so she turned to the only person who could assist her, Jack Barron, a grieving father who lost his daughter Lisa, who had also been murdered in a similar manner ten years ago.

text: for a debut film , skin of man , heart of beast feels unusually assured .
translation: 作为一部处女作，《人皮，兽心》给人一种出乎意料的自信。
back_translation: As a debut work, "Human Skin, Beast Heart" exudes an unexpectedly strong confidence.

text: it 's the chemistry between the women and the droll scene-stealing wit and wolfish pessimism of anna chancellor that makes this `` two weddings and a funeral `` fun .
translation: 正是女性之间的化学反应，以及安娜·钱塞勒的幽默、抢眼的机智和狼似的悲观，使得这部《两场婚礼和一场葬礼》变得有趣。
back_translation: It is the chemistry between the women, along with Anna Chanceller's humor, striking wit, and wolf-like pessimism, that makes "Two Weddings and a Funeral" interesting.

text: texan director george ratliff had unlimited access to families and church meetings , and he delivers fascinating psychological fare .
translation: 德克萨斯导演乔治·拉特利夫获得了对家庭和教会会议的无限访问权限，他提供了引人入胜的心理分析。
back_translation: Texas director George Ratliff gained unlimited access to family and church meetings, providing an engaging psychological analysis.

text: this discovery thrusts tong into world of international intrigue and espionage and pairs him with an inexperienced partner ( hewitt ) .
translation: 这一发现将汤置于国际阴谋和间谍活动的世界，与一个缺乏经验的伙伴（休伊特）搭档。
back_translation: This discovery places Tang in the world of international conspiracy and espionage, partnering with an inexperienced companion (Hewitt).

text: however , once jason realizes what freddy has done , he is infuriated .
translation: 然而，一旦杰森意识到弗雷迪做了什么，他非常愤怒。
back_translation: However, once Jason realized what Freddy had done, he was very angry.

text: [ t ] his slop does n't even have potential as a cult film , as it 's too loud to shout insults at the screen .
translation: 这部烂片甚至没有成为邪典电影的潜力，因为它太吵了，无法对着屏幕骂人。
back_translation: This terrible movie doesn't even have the potential to become a cult classic because it's too noisy to yell at the screen.

text: grueling days of blue-collar construction work fund their nocturnal pursuit of becoming full-time musicians .
translation: 艰苦的蓝领建筑工作日资助他们夜间追求成为全职音乐家的梦想。

text: heartwarming here relies less on forced air than on petter nM-fss ' delicate , clever direction . . . and a wonderful , imaginative script by axel hellstenius .
translation: 感人之处在于不仅仅依赖于强迫的气氛，而是依赖于彼得·nM-fss细腻而聪明的导演手法，还有阿克塞尔·赫尔斯特纽斯的精彩而富有想象力的剧本。
back_translation: The touching aspect lies not only in the atmosphere of coercion but also in Peter nM-fss's delicate and intelligent directorial techniques, as well as Axel Helsternus's brilliant and imaginative script.

text: he decides to play along in order to do research for his floundering novel .
translation: 他决定随波逐流，以此为他那部摇摇欲坠的小说做研究。
back_translation: He decided to go with the flow and use it as research for his faltering novel.

text: against all odds in heaven and hell , it creeped me out just fine .
translation: 在天地之间，尽管一切都不利，这让我感到非常毛骨悚然。
back_translation: Between heaven and earth, despite everything being unfavorable, it makes me feel very eerie.

text: however , soon they have the cops and the anti-terror corps on their tails .
translation: 然而，不久后他们就被警方和反恐部队紧追不舍。
back_translation: However, they were soon relentlessly pursued by the police and counter-terrorism units.

text: i 'm sure the filmmaker would disagree , but , honestly , i do n't see the point . it 's a visual rorschach test and i must have failed .
translation: 我相信电影制片人会不同意，但说实话，我看不出其中的意义。这就像一场视觉罗夏墨迹测试，而我一定是失败了。
back_translation: I believe filmmakers would disagree, but to be honest, I can't see the meaning in it. It's like a visual Rorschach inkblot test, and I must have failed it.

text: lauren hynde ( shannyn sossamon ) is technically a virgin .
translation: 劳伦·海恩德（香农·索萨蒙）在技术上是个处女。
back_translation: Lauren Hayward (Shannon Sossamon) is technically a virgin.

text: as literary desecrations go , this makes for perfectly acceptable , occasionally very enjoyable children 's entertainment . you 'll forget about it by monday , though , and if they 're old enough to have developed some taste , so will your kids .
translation: 就文学亵渎而言，这算是完全可以接受的，有时甚至非常愉快的儿童娱乐。不过，你会在周一就忘记它，如果他们年龄足够大，已经培养了一些品味，你的孩子也会如此。
back_translation: As for literary desecration, this is completely acceptable and can sometimes be very enjoyable children's entertainment. However, you will forget it by Monday, and if they are old enough to have developed some taste, your children will feel the same way.

text: max is surrounded by treachery and can trust no one , including natalie , the dangerously beautiful cia agent assigned to watch over him .
translation: 马克斯被背叛所包围，无法信任任何人，包括被分配来监视他的危险美丽的中情局特工娜塔丽。
back_translation: Max is surrounded by betrayal and unable to trust anyone, including the dangerously beautiful CIA agent Natalie assigned to watch over him.

text: with the help of his two brothers & # 193 ; kos , a successful manager and sex maniac , and andr & # 225 ; s , a poet and complete loser , he tries to make a good impression on the american and persuade him to finance the film project .
translation: 在他的两个兄弟的帮助下，科斯，一个成功的经理和性狂热者，以及安德烈斯，一个诗人和彻底的失败者，他试图给美国人留下好印象，并说服他为电影项目提供资金。
back_translation: With the help of his two brothers, Kos, a successful manager and sex enthusiast, and Andres, a poet and complete failure, he attempted to make a good impression on the Americans and persuade him to fund the film project.

text: her mother convinces gus to let her take some computer classes at college ( making him think it 's his idea ) .
translation: 她的母亲说服古斯让她在大学上几门计算机课程（让他觉得这是他的主意）。
back_translation: Her mother convinced Gus to let her take a few computer courses in college (making him feel like it was his idea).

text: . . . has a bit more going for it than just bikini babes and bitchin ' waves . but the plot is ankle deep at best .
translation: ……除了比基尼美女和炫酷海浪之外还有些其他内容，但情节至多浅显。
back_translation: ...Besides bikini beauties and cool waves, there are some other elements, but the plot is at most superficial.

text: he can not concentrate on his job nor on his studies , being continuously mindful of his girlfriend and concubine ana 's ( dolores fonzi ) whereabouts and activities .
translation: 他无法集中精力于工作或学习，因为他不断关注着女朋友和情妇安娜（多洛雷斯·丰齐）的行踪和活动。
back_translation: He couldn't concentrate on work or study because he was constantly focused on the whereabouts and activities of his girlfriend and mistress Anna (Dolores Fonzi).

text: amaro soon discovers that corruption and the church are old acquaintances in los reyes .
translation: 阿马罗很快发现，在洛斯雷耶斯，腐败与教会是老相识。

text: guy mann has been cursed since birth with blue skin .
translation: 盖伊·曼从出生起就被诅咒，拥有蓝色的皮肤。
back_translation: Guy Mann has been cursed since birth, possessing blue skin.

text: there 's suspension of disbelief and then there 's bad screenwriting . . . this film packs a wallop of the latter .
translation: 有悬念的信念，当然还有糟糕的编剧……这部电影充满了后者的冲击。
back_translation: There is suspenseful belief, and of course, there are terrible screenwriters... This movie is filled with the impact of the latter.

text: toes the fine line between cheese and earnestness remarkably well ; everything is delivered with such conviction that it 's hard not to be carried away .
translation: 恰到好处地走在了奶酪与真诚之间；一切都以如此坚定的信念传达，令人难以不被感染。
back_translation: Walking perfectly between cheese and sincerity; everything is conveyed with such firm belief that it's hard not to be touched.

text: but unfortunately , karl lubeck has seen better days .
translation: 但不幸的是，卡尔·吕贝克的日子已经不如从前。
back_translation: But unfortunately, Karl Lübeck's days are no longer as they used to be.

text: danica mckellar plays a cheerleader named lacy who lives across the street from the boy , who is obsessed with her .
