text: before he can complete his task he meets a young women d & # 218 ; a ( margr & # 233 ; t vilhj & # 225 ; lmsd & # 243 ; ttir ) who he believes might be his daughter .
translation: 在他完成任务之前，他遇到了一个年轻的女人，名叫玛格丽特·维尔哈尔姆斯多蒂尔，他相信她可能是他的女儿。
back_translation: Before he completed his task, he met a young woman named Margaret Verhalmstodter, whom he believed might be his daughter.

text: a hit man from the same mob is sent to kill sullivan and his family , but only kills his wife and son , peter .
translation: 同一黑帮的一名杀手被派去杀死沙利文及其家人，但只杀了他的妻子和儿子彼得。
back_translation: A hitman from the same gang was sent to kill Sullivan and his family, but only killed his wife and his son Peter.

text: shows that you should not fear death , but to fear an unlived life .
translation: 这表明你不应害怕死亡，而应害怕未曾生活的生命。
back_translation: This suggests that you should not fear death, but rather fear a life that has never been lived.

text: brad gluckman ( kennedy ) is a wannabe rap star from malibu who acts and talks like he 's from the `` 'hood . ``
translation: 布拉德·格拉克曼（肯尼迪）是来自马里布的一个想当说唱明星的人，他的举止和言谈方式仿佛来自“贫民区”。
back_translation: Brad Glackman (Kennedy) is someone from Malibu who wants to be a rap star, and his behavior and way of speaking seem to come from the "ghetto."

text: sparkling , often hilarious romantic jealousy comedy . . . attal looks so much like a young robert deniro that it seems the film should instead be called 'my husband is travis bickle ' .
translation: 闪闪发光，常常令人捧腹的浪漫嫉妒喜剧……阿塔尔看起来真像年轻时的罗伯特·德尼罗，以至于这部电影似乎应该叫做“我老公是特拉维斯·比克尔”。
back_translation: Shimmering and often hilariously romantic, this comedy of jealousy... Attal looks so much like a young Robert De Niro that this movie might as well be titled "My Husband is Travis Bickle."

text: talk to her is not the perfect movie many have made it out to be , but it 's still quite worth seeing .
translation: 《与她对话》并不是许多人认为的完美电影，但它仍然值得一看。
back_translation: "Talking to Her" is not the perfect movie that many people think it is, but it is still worth watching.

text: the film runs on a little longer than it needs to -- muccino either does n't notice when his story ends or just ca n't tear himself away from the characters -- but it 's smooth and professional .
translation: 这部电影的时长比需要的稍长——穆奇诺要么没有注意到他的故事结束，要么就是无法从角色中抽身——但整个影片流畅而专业。
back_translation: The movie is slightly longer than necessary—Mugino either didn't realize when his story ended or was unable to detach from the characters—but the entire film is smooth and professional.

text: both the film and nachtwey 's photos hammer home the grim reality of the world 's gutters and battlefields , and will make you question what 'news ' really is .
translation: 这部电影和纳赫特维的照片都深刻揭示了世界街头和战场的残酷现实，并将让你质疑“新闻”到底是什么。
back_translation: This movie and the photographs of Nachtwey profoundly reveal the harsh realities of the world's streets and battlefields, and will make you question what "news" really is.

text: tellis teams with henry oak , a friend of the dead narc and an aggressive cop constantly under the scrutiny of internal affairs .
translation: 泰利斯与亨利·橡树合作，后者是已故毒贩的朋友，同时也是一名不断受到内部事务调查的 agresive 警察。
back_translation: Thales collaborates with Henry Oak, a friend of the deceased drug dealer, who is also an aggressive police officer constantly under investigation for internal affairs.

text: the comedy death to smoochy is a rancorous curiosity : a movie without an apparent audience .
translation: 喜剧《死去的斯穆奇》是一种令人厌恶的好奇：一部没有显然观众的电影。
back_translation: The comedy "Dead Smugy" is a kind of detestable curiosity: a film without an obvious audience.

text: a voice which seems to be coming from within the walls .
translation: 似乎来自墙壁内的声音。
back_translation: It seems to come from inside the wall.

text: in today 's world of facts and figures about smoking related illness and death , one element is greatly overlooked , the consequences that smoking has on the family .
translation: 在当今关于吸烟相关疾病和死亡的事实与数字的世界中，有一个因素被严重忽视，那就是吸烟对家庭的影响。
back_translation: In today's world of facts and figures about smoking-related diseases and deaths, one factor that is seriously overlooked is the impact of smoking on families.

text: the mood , look and tone of the film fit the incredible storyline to a t .
translation: 电影的氛围、外观和语调与令人难以置信的剧情完美契合。
back_translation: The atmosphere, appearance, and tone of the movie perfectly match the incredible plot.

text: the story of the couple is told to a woman in a nursing home ( rowlands ) by an old man who regularly visits to read her the story from a notebook .
translation: 这个故事讲述了一对情侣的故事，一个经常去养老院探望罗兰德女士的老者从一本笔记本中为她朗读这个故事。
back_translation: This story tells the tale of a couple, with an elderly man who often visits Mrs. Roland at the nursing home reading this story to her from a notebook.

text: a look into the underground world of bruce haack , a genius who 's past work continues to garner recognition with time .
translation: 探秘布鲁斯·哈克的地下世界，这位天才的过往作品随着时间的推移不断获得认可。
back_translation: Explore the underground world of Bruce Hack, as this genius's past works continue to gain recognition over time.

text: cho , who 's first concert film was more like a group therapy session than comedy , lightens up considerably for her second
translation: 乔的第一部音乐会电影更像是一个团体治疗会议而不是喜剧，而她的第二部则轻松了许多。
back_translation: Jo's first music concert film feels more like a group therapy session than a comedy, while her second one is much more relaxed.

text: in a small fishing village an established fishmonger , davis , starts to have his supply bought from under him by new boy alan leech .
translation: 在一个小渔村，资深鱼贩戴维斯的供应开始被新人阿兰·利奇抢走。
back_translation: In a small fishing village, the seasoned fishmonger Davis's supply began to be stolen by the newcomer Alan Leach.

text: a guilty pleasure at best , and not worth seeing unless you want to laugh at it .
translation: 充其量是一种罪恶的享受，不值得观看，除非你想嘲笑它。
back_translation: At best, it's a sinful pleasure not worth watching, unless you want to mock it.

text: tiger shark prowls on what should be a routine rescue mission .
translation: 虎鲨潜伏在本应是例行救援任务的海域。
back_translation: The tiger shark lurked in waters that were supposed to be a routine rescue mission.

text: not only must they overcome an enemy adept at technological witchery , they must overcome the curse that marks their destiny .
translation: 他们不仅必须战胜一个擅长技术魔法的敌人，还必须克服标记他们命运的诅咒。
back_translation: They not only have to overcome an enemy skilled in technological magic, but they must also break the curse that marks their fate.

text: what he does n't know yet is that these traits are part of the disguisey family secret legacy .
translation: 他还不知道的是，这些特征是伪装家族秘密遗产的一部分。

text: these devices immediately became an essential household appliance , and were advertised in nearly every women 's magazine and sewing notions catalog of the time .
translation: 这些设备立即成为了一种必不可少的家用电器，并在当时几乎所有的女性杂志和缝纫用品目录中做了宣传。
back_translation: These devices quickly became an essential household appliance and were promoted in nearly all women's magazines and sewing supply catalogs of the time.

text: minority report is exactly what the title indicates , a report .
translation: 《少数派报告》正如标题所示，是一份报告。
back_translation: "Minority Report," as the title suggests, is a report.

text: young marrieds lori and tom relocate from chicago to the country where they end up living next to carl , a right-wing radical who beats his wife , helen .
translation: 年轻的夫妻洛瑞和汤姆从芝加哥搬到乡村，结果他们住在卡尔旁边，卡尔是一个极端右派分子，打妻子海伦。
back_translation: The young couple, Lori and Tom, moved from Chicago to the countryside, and as a result, they lived next to Carl, who is an extreme right-winger and abuses his wife, Helen.

text: an utterly compelling 'who wrote it ' in which the reputation of the most famous author who ever lived comes into question .
translation: 一部完全引人入胜的“谁写的”作品，其中质疑了有史以来最著名作家的声誉。

text: this movie praise the right to be different and unique .
translation: 这部电影赞扬了与众不同和独特的权利。
back_translation: This movie celebrates the rights of being different and unique.

text: bullock stars as lucy kelson , chief counsel for the wade corporation , one of new york city 's top commercial real estate developers .
translation: 布洛克饰演露西·凯尔森，韦德公司的首席顾问，该公司是纽约市顶级商业房地产开发商之一。
back_translation: Block plays Lucy Kelson, the chief consultant for Wade Corporation, one of New York City's top commercial real estate developers.

text: all right , so it 's not a brilliant piece of filmmaking , but it is a funny ( sometimes hilarious ) comedy with a deft sense of humor about itself , a playful spirit and a game cast .
translation: 好吧，这部电影虽然不是杰出的作品，但它是一部有趣（有时甚至搞笑）的喜剧，具有敏锐的自嘲幽默，充满了顽皮的精神和出色的演员阵容。
back_translation: Okay, this movie may not be an outstanding work, but it is an entertaining (sometimes even funny) comedy that has sharp self-deprecating humor, brimming with a playful spirit and an excellent cast.

text: the film is an enjoyable family film -- pretty much aimed at any youngster who loves horses .
translation: 这部电影是一部令人愉快的家庭电影——主要针对任何喜欢马的小朋友。
back_translation: This movie is a delightful family film - mainly aimed at any children who love horses.

text: set against the majestic landscape of canada 's bay of fundy and the highest tides in the world , black swan is a dark comedy that weaves the innocent world of childhood , against the adult world of love , betrayal and murder .
translation: 在加拿大芬迪湾壮丽的景色和世界最高的潮汐背景下，黑天鹅是一部黑暗喜剧，它将纯真的童年世界与充满爱、背叛和谋杀的成年世界交织在一起。
back_translation: In the stunning scenery of Fundy Bay, Canada, and against the backdrop of the world's highest tides, "Black Swan" is a dark comedy that intertwines the innocent world of childhood with the adult world filled with love, betrayal, and murder.

text: the new guy does have a heart . now , if it only had a brain .
translation: 新来的确实有一颗心。现在，如果它只有一个大脑就好了。
back_translation: The newcomer indeed has a heart. Now, if only it had a brain too.

text: the chaotic lead characters are not the sorts one will usually see in a disney film and that makes for a certain amount of unpredictability before it all returns to business as usual .
translation: 混乱的主角并不是通常在迪士尼电影中会看到的角色，这带来了一定程度的不可预测性，随后一切又回归正常。
back_translation: The chaotic protagonist is not the kind of character typically seen in Disney movies, which brings a certain level of unpredictability, and then everything returns to normal.

text: after running circles , dave , trudy , and jolynn find with the light of a new day the lives they been meaning to live .
translation: 在新一天的光辉中，戴夫、特鲁迪和乔琳发现了他们一直想要过的生活。
back_translation: In the brilliance of a new day, Dave, Trudy, and Jolene discovered the life they had always wanted to live.

text: ronnie schwann , a young man regarded as `` slow , `` has affections for sarah , a young woman who stays at hope house , a facility for the mentally ill .
translation: 罗尼·施万，一个被认为“慢”的年轻人，爱恋着莎拉，一个住在希望之家——一个精神病患者的机构——的年轻女子。
back_translation: Ronnie Schwan, a young man considered "slow," is in love with Sarah, a young woman who lives in Hope House—an institution for mental health patients.

text: it is 1492 , and spain has decreed that all jews must either convert to catholicism , go into exile or face trial and execution .
translation: 现在是1492年，西班牙已下令所有犹太人必须要么皈依天主教，要么流亡，要么面临审判和处决。
back_translation: It is now 1492, and Spain has ordered that all Jews must either convert to Catholicism, go into exile, or face trial and execution.

text: calvin 's barbershop is filled with an eclectic and hilarious cast of characters that share their stories , jokes , trials and tribulations .
translation: 卡尔文的理发店里充满了各种各样搞笑的人物，他们分享着自己的故事、笑话、考验和磨难。
back_translation: Calvin's barbershop is filled with all kinds of funny characters who share their stories, jokes, trials, and tribulations.

text: it may only be the third date , but tony knows it 's time to pop the question and make the beautiful , shy katrina his wife .
translation: 尽管这可能只是第三次约会，但托尼知道是时候求婚，让美丽而害羞的卡特里娜成为他的妻子了。
back_translation: Although this might just be their third date, Tony knew it was time to propose and make the beautiful and shy Katrina his wife.

text: his unemployment and the fact that there is no woman in the house to care for the children , evelyn , noel and brendan , make it clear to the authorities that his is an untenable situation .
translation: 他的失业以及家中没有女性照顾孩子，埃夫琳、诺埃尔和布伦丹，明确向当局表明他的处境无法维持。
back_translation: His unemployment and the lack of a woman at home to take care of the children, Evelyn, Noel, and Brendan, clearly indicated to the authorities that his situation was untenable.

text: they think that if they rebuild it to work like it did in their youth , they might be able to communicate with their sister who died mysteriously on that beach 20 years ago .
translation: 他们认为，如果他们重建它，使其像20年前他们年轻时一样运作，他们可能能够与20年前在那片海滩神秘去世的姐妹沟通。
back_translation: They believe that if they rebuild it to operate like it did 20 years ago when they were young, they might be able to communicate with the sister who mysteriously died on that beach 20 years ago.

text: a poignant and gently humorous parable that loves its characters and communicates something rather beautiful about human nature .
translation: 一则深刻而温和幽默的寓言，热爱其角色，并传达了关于人性的美好理念。
back_translation: A profound yet gently humorous fable that cherishes its characters and conveys beautiful ideas about humanity.

text: his family decides to go back on a holiday to india for 2 weeks , when tina discovers the truth about pooja 's e-mails , they decide together that tina will play along with the charade .
translation: 他的家人决定回印度度假两周，当蒂娜发现普贾的电子邮件真相时，他们一起决定让蒂娜配合这个伪装。
back_translation: His family decided to return to India for a two-week vacation, and when Tina discovered the truth about Pooja's email, they collectively decided to have Tina cooperate with the disguise.

text: the film jolts the laughs from the audience -- as if by cattle prod .
translation: 这部影片像用电击器一样将笑声从观众那里猛击出来。
back_translation: This film shocks laughter out of the audience like a stun gun.

text: kung pow : enter the fist is a movie within a movie , created to spoof the martial arts genre .
translation: 《功夫拳：进入拳道》是一部电影中的电影，旨在调侃武术类型。
back_translation: "Kung Fu Punch: Enter the Fist" is a movie within a movie that aims to spoof the martial arts genre.

text: none of these characters resembles anyone you 've ever met in real life , unless you happen to know annoyingly self-involved people who speak in glib sentences that could have only come from the pen of a screenwriter .
translation: 这些角色中没有一个与你在现实生活中见过的人相似，除非你碰巧认识那些令人讨厌、自我沉醉、说着只有剧本作家才能写出的油嘴滑舌句子的人。
back_translation: None of these characters resemble anyone you've met in real life, unless you happen to know those annoying, self-absorbed people who speak in slick lines that only a screenwriter could come up with.

text: an operatic , sprawling picture that 's entertainingly acted , magnificently shot and gripping enough to sustain most of its 170-minute length .
translation: 一部宏大的歌剧式影片，表演引人入胜，拍摄精美，足以保持其170分钟长度的大部分时间内的紧张感。
back_translation: A grand operatic film, with captivating performances and exquisite cinematography, is capable of maintaining a sense of intensity for most of its 170-minute length.

text: a young french journalist , marina , is writing a report on 'the next film starred by melina : the story of lilly ' .
translation: 一位年轻的法国记者玛丽娜正在撰写一篇关于“梅琳娜主演的下一部电影：《莉莉的故事》”的报道。
back_translation: A young French journalist named Marina is writing a report about "Melina's next movie: 'The Story of Lily'."

text: despite the long running time , the pace never feels slack -- there 's no scene that screams `` bathroom break ! ``
translation: 尽管片长很长，但节奏从未显得拖沓——没有任何场景会让人觉得“该上洗手间了！”
back_translation: Although the film is long, the pace never feels lagging—there's not a single scene that makes you think "It's time to go to the restroom!"

text: but starla soon learns that this french girl is not only smart , attractive , and naive , but quite conniving when geneviere , with no social life of her own , beings to take over starla 's , starting with stealing the affections her parents , her friends and starla 's boyfriend .
translation: 但斯塔拉很快就发现，这个法国女孩不仅聪明、迷人和天真，而且相当狡猾。当基尼维尔没有自己的社交生活时，开始逐渐接管斯塔拉的生活，从偷走她父母的关爱、朋友和斯塔拉的男友开始。
back_translation: But Stella soon realized that this French girl was not only smart, charming, and innocent, but also quite cunning. When Guinevere lacked her own social life, she gradually began to take over Stella's life, starting with stealing her parents' affection, friends, and Stella's boyfriend.

text: robinson 's web of suspense matches the page-turning frenzy that clancy creates .
translation: 罗宾逊的悬念网络与克兰西创造的翻页狂潮相匹配。
back_translation: Robinson's suspense network matches the page-turning frenzy created by Clancy.

text: dr . siddharth sinha ( amitabh bachchan ) , a philanthropist and a dedicated surgeon who has devoted his life to build a state-of-the-art hospital to treat the underprivileged patients .
translation: 西达特·辛哈医生（阿米特abh 巴赫昌），一位慈善家和敬业的外科医生，他将自己的生命奉献给建立一所尖端医院，以治疗贫困患者。
back_translation: Dr. Sidat Singh (Amitabh Bachchan), a philanthropist and dedicated surgeon, devoted his life to establishing a state-of-the-art hospital to treat underprivileged patients.

text: a banker , husband , and father , mr . smith ( larry pine ) must leave it behind him .
translation: 一个银行家、丈夫和父亲，史密斯先生（拉里·派恩）必须把这一切留在身后。
back_translation: A banker, husband, and father, Mr. Smith (Larry Pine) must leave it all behind.

text: technically , the film is about as interesting as an insurance commercial .
translation: 从技术上讲，这部电影的趣味性和保险广告差不多。
back_translation: Technically speaking, the entertainment value of this movie is about the same as that of an insurance commercial.

text: with all this going on , gerry 's estranged wife margaret is worried for her daughter 's safety and finds herself another target in the race to find the code .
translation: 在这一切发生之际，杰里的分居妻子玛格丽特担心女儿的安全，并在寻找密码的竞赛中发现了另一个目标。
back_translation: At this moment, Jerry's estranged wife Margaret is concerned for their daughter's safety and discovers another target in the race to find the password.

text: a moving story of determination and the human spirit .
translation: 一个关于决心和人类精神的感人故事。
back_translation: A touching story about determination and the human spirit.

text: ice cube , as usual , is an appealing presence , but the rest of the cast shines as well .
translation: 冰块一如既往地是一个吸引人的存在，但其他演员也同样出色。
back_translation: The ice cubes are still an appealing presence, but the other actors are equally outstanding.

text: a shrewd and splendidly volatile b movie structured around a highly original gambit of suspense .
translation: 一部聪明而极具波动性的B级电影，围绕一个极具创意的悬疑策略构建。
back_translation: A smart and highly volatile B-movie built around a highly creative suspense strategy.

text: to the vast majority of more casual filmgoers , it will probably be a talky bore .
translation: 对大多数较为休闲的观众来说，这部电影可能会显得冗长无聊。
back_translation: For most more casual viewers, this movie may seem long and boring.

text: it 's the type of film about growing up that we do n't see often enough these days : realistic , urgent , and not sugarcoated in the least .
translation: 这是一部我们现在并不常见的关于成长的电影：现实、紧迫，毫不粉饰。
back_translation: This is a film about growth that is not commonly seen nowadays: realistic, urgent, and unapologetic.

text: sid , a sloth who never stops talking is left behind sleeping while everyone else begins the journey to the south .
translation: 西德是一只从不停止说话的树懒，其他人开始南行时，他却被留下来睡觉。
back_translation: West Germany is a sloth that never stops talking; while others start heading south, he is left behind to sleep.

text: like any good romance , son of the bride , proves it 's never too late to learn .
translation: 像任何好的浪漫电影一样，《新娘的儿子》证明了学习永远都不算太晚。
back_translation: Like any good romantic movie, "The Bride's Son" proves that it's never too late to learn.

text: mr . jacobi 's recitation is illustrated with a rush of sensuous nature imagery , beautifully photographed by mr . cox and hans sonneveld and underscored with a lush soundtrack by paul grabowsky .
translation: 雅各比先生的朗诵展示了丰富的感性自然意象，由考克斯先生和汉斯·索内维尔德精美拍摄，并配以保罗·格拉博斯基的华丽原声配乐。
back_translation: Mr. Jacobi's recitation showcases a wealth of rich sensory natural imagery, beautifully filmed by Mr. Cox and Hans Sonneveld, accompanied by the magnificent original score by Paul Grabowski.

text: no ill effects are immediately apparent to lena 's relatives in their spacious house on the prosperous side of town .
translation: 在城镇繁荣的一侧，丽娜的亲戚们在他们宽敞的家中并未立即察觉到任何不良影响。
back_translation: On the prosperous side of the town, Lena's relatives in their spacious home did not immediately notice any adverse effects.

text: it plods along methodically , somehow under the assumption that its `` dead wife communicating from beyond the grave `` framework is even remotely new or interesting .
translation: 它以一种有条不紊的方式缓慢前行，似乎假设其“死去的妻子从坟墓中传递信息”的框架即便在任何程度上也是新颖或有趣的。
back_translation: It moves slowly in an orderly manner, as if assuming that its "dead wife conveys messages from the grave" framework is at least novel or interesting in some way.

text: the tucks try to teach her how she should n't fear death , how they would give anything to die .
translation: 塔克一家试图教她不要害怕死亡，告诉她他们愿意为死去付出一切。
back_translation: The Tucker family tried to teach her not to fear death, telling her that they were willing to give everything for the deceased.

text: their stories of desire , talent , conviction , obsession and addiction are woven together and build up to a climactic series of events that bring them to opening night .
translation: 他们关于欲望、天赋、信念、痴迷和成瘾的故事交织在一起，构成了一系列高潮事件，最终将他们带向开幕之夜。
back_translation: Their stories about desire, talent, belief, obsession, and addiction intertwine to create a series of climactic events that ultimately lead them to opening night.

text: although mother and son are initially at odds , their relationship begins to change when he discovers that his bride-to-be likes his mother 's rock-n-roll lifestyle too .
translation: 虽然母亲和儿子起初存在冲突，但当他发现他的未婚妻也喜欢他母亲的摇滚生活方式时，他们的关系开始发生变化。
back_translation: Although there were conflicts initially between the mother and son, their relationship began to change when he discovered that his fiancée also liked his mother's rock and roll lifestyle.

text: jack , a lonely driver on a desert highway , runs out of gas .
translation: 杰克是一位孤独的司机，在一条沙漠公路上，油耗尽了。
back_translation: Jack is a lonely driver whose fuel has run out on a desert road.

text: and then , did you ever let fear get in your way and keep you from having the person you 've always wanted to be with ?
translation: 然后，你是否曾让恐惧阻碍了你，让你无法与一直想在一起的人在一起？
back_translation: Have you ever let fear hold you back from being with someone you’ve always wanted to be with?

text: a gob of drivel so sickly sweet , even the eager consumers of moore 's pasteurized ditties will retch it up like rancid crM-hme brM- { lM-ie .
translation: 一堆令人作呕的甜腻废话，即使是那些急于消费摩尔的巴氏消毒小曲的听众也会像吃了腐臭的奶酪一样呕吐出来。
back_translation: A pile of nauseatingly sweet nonsense, even listeners eager to consume the pasteurized little tunes will gag as if they've eaten rotten cheese.

text: alone in a cell , she undergoes a spiritual experience similar to that of the great mystics .
translation: 她独自在牢房中，经历了一次类似于伟大神秘主义者的精神体验。
back_translation: She was alone in her cell, experiencing a spiritual experience similar to that of great mystics.

text: if somebody was bored and . . . decided to make a dull , pretentious version of jesus ' son , they 'd come up with something like bart freundlich 's world traveler .
translation: 如果有人感到无聊……并决定制作一个乏味、自命不凡的《耶稣之子》版本，他们可能会想出像巴特·弗伦德利希的《环球旅行者》这样的东西。
back_translation: If someone feels bored... and decides to create a dull, self-important version of "Jesus Christ Superstar," they might come up with something like Bart Freundlich's "The World Traveler."

text: jeffs has created a breathtakingly assured and stylish work of spare dialogue and acute expressiveness .
translation: 杰夫创造了一部令人叹为观止、风格独特的作品，简洁的对话和敏锐的表现力令人印象深刻。
back_translation: Jeff created an awe-inspiring and uniquely styled work, with concise dialogue and impressive expressiveness.

text: an effective portrait of a life in stasis -- of the power of inertia to arrest development in a dead-end existence .
translation: 一幅有效的静止生活画像——惯性的力量在无出路的存在中阻碍发展的展现。
back_translation: An effective still life image— the force of inertia hinders the manifestation of development in a dead-end existence.

text: takes us on a journey toward self-awareness that is both deadpan hilarious and profoundly moving .
translation: 带我们走向自我认知的旅程，这个过程既冷面搞笑又深刻感人。
back_translation: It takes us on a journey of self-awareness, a process that is both darkly comedic and profoundly touching.

text: including finding the anti-christ , who is now a 11-year-old boy .
translation: 包括找到反基督者，他现在是一个11岁的男孩。
back_translation: Including finding the Antichrist, who is now an 11-year-old boy.

text: a senior at an elite college ( katie holmes ) , already under severe pressure to complete her thesis and land a prestigious job , must confront the sudden reappearance of her old boyfriend ( charlie hunnam ) , after his two year , unexplained absence . . .
translation: 一名精英大学的高年级学生（凯蒂·霍尔姆斯），在面临完成论文和获得一份名望工作的巨大压力时，必须面对她的旧男友（查理·汉纳姆）在两年没有解释的缺席后突然重新出现的事实……
back_translation: A senior student at an elite university (Katie Holmes) must confront the sudden reappearance of her ex-boyfriend (Charlie Hunnam) after two years of unexplained absence while facing the immense pressure of completing her thesis and landing a prestigious job…

text: he can talk and drive around all by himself .
translation: 他可以自己说话并驾驶四处走动。
back_translation: He can talk by himself and drive around.

text: it 's sweet , funny , charming , and completely delightful .
translation: 它甜美、有趣、迷人，完全令人愉悦。
back_translation: It is sweet, interesting, charming, and completely delightful.

text: it is said that only salazar slytherin 's true descendent will be able to open it .
translation: 据说只有萨拉扎·斯莱特林的真正后裔才能打开它。
back_translation: It is said that only the true heir of Salazar Slytherin can open it.

text: 'brass tacks ' is a 35mm feature length , narrative drama .
translation: 《铜钉》是一部35毫米的长篇叙事剧情片。
back_translation: "The Copper Nail" is a 35mm feature narrative film.

text: it challenges , this nervy oddity , like modern art should .
translation: 它挑战着这种紧张的怪异，就像现代艺术应该做的那样。
back_translation: It challenges this tension of the strange, just as modern art is supposed to do.

text: sam mendes has become valedictorian at the school for soft landings and easy ways out .
translation: 萨姆·门德斯已成为软着陆与简单解决方案学校的优秀毕业生。
back_translation: Sam Mendes has become an outstanding graduate of the school of soft landings and simple solutions.

text: written , flatly , by david kendall and directed , barely , by there 's something about mary co-writer ed decter .
translation: 由大卫·肯达尔撰写，导演仅次于《关于玛丽的事情》的编剧艾德·德克特。
back_translation: Written by David Kendall, directed by Ed Dechter, who is second only to the screenwriter of "There's Something About Mary."

text: a uniquely sensual metaphorical dramatization of sexual obsession that spends a bit too much time on its fairly ludicrous plot .
translation: 一场独特的感性隐喻戏剧，展现了性痴迷，但在其相当荒谬的情节上花了太多时间。
back_translation: A unique emotive metaphorical drama that showcases sexual obsession, but spends too much time on its rather absurd plot.

text: dripping with cliche and bypassing no opportunity to trivialize the material .
translation: 充满了陈词滥调，丝毫不放过任何机会来使材料平凡化。
back_translation: Full of clichés, not missing any opportunity to trivialize the material.

text: rife with nutty cliches and far too much dialogue .
translation: 充满陈词滥调和过多对话。
back_translation: Full of clichés and excessive dialogue.

text: . . . quite good at providing some good old fashioned spooks .
translation: ……相当擅长提供一些老式的惊吓。
back_translation: ...quite skilled at providing some old-fashioned scares.

text: visually fascinating . . . an often intense character study about fathers and sons , loyalty and duty .
translation: 视觉上令人着迷……这是一部关于父亲与儿子、忠诚与责任的强烈角色研究。
back_translation: Visually captivating... This is a powerful character study about a father and son, loyalty and responsibility.

text: this is the dark , moody tale of a neglected housewife who discovers she can escape her loneliness and recover a sense of interaction with her husband by having conversations with him . . .
translation: 这是一个黑暗、阴郁的故事，讲述了一位被忽视的家庭主妇，她发现通过与丈夫对话，可以摆脱孤独并恢复与丈夫的互动感……
back_translation: This is a dark and gloomy story about a neglected housewife who discovers that by communicating with her husband, she can escape loneliness and regain a sense of interaction with him…

text: on the set he meets movie star and ex-cello-player inga ( fabienne babe ) - and the experience is bizarre spirited uplifting a com & # 233 ; die humaine .
translation: 在片场，他遇到了电影明星和前大提琴手英佳（法比安娜·贝贝）——这一经历奇特、充满活力，充满人性喜剧的气息。
back_translation: On the set, he met the movie star and former cellist Inga (Fabiana Bebe) — this experience was peculiar, vibrant, and full of the spirit of human comedy.

text: generic slasher-movie nonsense , but it 's not without style .
translation: 通用的杀手电影胡说八道，但也并非没有风格。
back_translation: Generic killer movies are nonsense, but they are not without style.

text: a kinetic drama that seems to wander aimlessly , beautifully until it crashes in an odd anti-climax befitting reality itself .
translation: 一部看似漫无目的、优美的动感剧，直到以一种奇怪的反高潮崩溃，这正如现实本身所适配。
back_translation: A seemingly aimless, beautiful dynamic drama that collapses in a strange anti-climax, mirroring reality itself.

text: charlie is man who wakes up one morning to find that no one can see him .
translation: 查理是一个早上醒来发现没有人能看到自己的人。
back_translation: Charlie is a person who wakes up one morning to find that no one can see him.

text: this fascinating look at israel in ferment feels as immediate as the latest news footage from gaza and , because of its heightened , well-shaped dramas , twice as powerful .
translation: 这部关于以色列动荡的迷人作品感觉与来自加沙的最新新闻画面一样迫在眉睫，而且由于其紧张且塑造精良的戏剧性，力量加倍。
back_translation: This fascinating work about the turmoil in Israel feels as urgent as the latest news footage coming from Gaza, and its tension and well-crafted drama double the impact.

text: the only fun part of the movie is playing the obvious game . you try to guess the order in which the kids in the house will be gored .
translation: 这部电影唯一有趣的部分就是玩一个明显的游戏。你试着猜测房子里的孩子们会被残杀的顺序。

text: succeeds very well in its primary aim of making us gasp .
translation: 在其主要目标上非常成功，使我们惊叹不已。

text: paravasu 's cousin and bitter rival yavakri ( nagarjuna ) has just returned triumphant after 10 years of practicing austerities in the jungle , with the gift of universal knowledge from the gods .

text: mitchell listens to a chilling conversation as he realizes harry 's friend is the red neck who tried to attack him earlier .

text: there 's no denying that burns is a filmmaker with a bright future ahead of him .

text: all the while a growing shadow falls upon middle-earth as the dark lord 's army marches on to gondor .

text: this very strong cultural identity , different from the us model allows blanca li to give an original point of view on today 's melting pot of french urban youngsters .

back_translation: This strong sense of cultural identity, which is different from the American model, allows Blanca Li to provide a unique perspective on today's melting pot of young people in French cities.

text: a must see for all sides of the political spectrum

text: unaware that they 're transporting a cache ' of money , along with jimmy hoffa 's finger ( street valued at $ 25 mil ) , they find themselves thwarting pursuers as they manipulate their way out west .
translation: 他们 unaware 自己正在运输一批现金，以及吉米·霍法的手指（街头价值2500万美元），在通过操控逃往西部的过程中，他们发现自己正在阻碍追捕者。

text: mostly , shafer and co-writer gregory hinton lack a strong-minded viewpoint , or a sense of humor .

text: meanwhile an unspoken attraction develops between joe and ella , heightening the claustrophobic tensions in the confined space of the barge .
translation: 与此同时，乔和艾拉之间产生了一种未曾言明的吸引力，使得在狭窄的驳船空间中，压抑的紧张气氛更加加剧。

text: [ chaiken 's ] talent lies in an evocative , accurate observation of a distinctive milieu and in the lively , convincing dialogue she creates for her characters .
translation: [查肯]的才华在于对独特环境的生动、准确观察，以及为她的角色创造生动、可信的对话。

text: kannas brother ghisu is one aggressive and hot-tempered with who is illiterate and is slowly getting attracted towards naxalites .

text: in this documentary , hannah , an ex-refugee , returns with her 55 year old son to the prison where she was held for five years .

text: meanwhile , paro , on the other hand , performed her worldly duties sincerely , but inside her heart , she could never forget devdas for a moment .
translation: 与此同时，帕罗则真诚地履行着她的世俗职责，但在她的心中，她永远无法忘记德夫达斯。

text: it 'll keep you wide awake and . . . very tense .
translation: 这会让你保持清醒，并且……非常紧张。

text: the film starts out as competent but unremarkable . . . and gradually grows into something of considerable power .

text: when he is told that he is being considered for the position of anchorman , he goes out to do a live feed but when it is announced that evan baxter was going to be the new anchorman , and he freaks out .

back_translation: When he was told that he was being considered for the host position, he went out to do a live broadcast, but when it was announced that Evan Baxter would be the new host, he broke down.

text: it reminds us that nathan lane is the best show stealer in show business .
translation: 这让我们想起纳森·雷恩是演艺界最佳的抢戏者。

text: planet is as much sheer fun as its source material .
translation: 这个星球与其原材料一样充满乐趣。

text: after the great success of the ring hollywood decided to take another swing at bringing another japanese film to the rest of us .

text: the level of maturity displayed by this 33-year-old first-time feature director is astonishing , considering her inexperience and her subject matter .
translation: 考虑到她的经验不足和题材，这位33岁首次执导长片的导演所展现的成熟度令人惊讶。

text: nemesis has a delightfully nasty villain and pumped-up action , albeit along familiar lines .
translation: 《复仇女神》有一个令人愉悦的恶棍和激烈的动作场面，尽管情节沿袭了熟悉的套路。

text: the graphic carnage and re-creation of war-torn croatia is uncomfortably timely , relevant , and sickeningly real .
translation: 战争破坏的克罗地亚的图形惨状和重现让人感到不安，同时也相关，并且令人作呕的真实。
back_translation: The graphic devastation of Croatia caused by war is disturbing, yet it is also relevant and nauseatingly real.

text: aftermath asks the question , `` what would happen if the man on the street really did try to stop a bank robber ? ``
translation: 后果提出了一个问题：“如果街头的普通人真的试图阻止银行劫匪，会发生什么？”
back_translation: The consequence raises a question: "What would happen if ordinary people on the street really tried to stop a bank robber?"

text: she 's eighteen , unemployed , broke and hopelessly in love with her wannabe rockstar boyfriend matt .
translation: 她十八岁，失业，身无分文，对她那个想当摇滚明星的男朋友马特毫无希望地恋爱着。
back_translation: She is eighteen, unemployed, and broke, hopelessly in love with her boyfriend Matt, who wants to be a rock star.

text: a film worthy of comparison to truffaut 's best cinematic poems .
translation: 一部值得与特吕弗最佳电影诗作相比的影片。

text: it 's all a rather shapeless good time . . .
translation: 这一切都是一种相当无形的美好时光……

text: so putrid it is not worth the price of the match that should be used to burn every print of the film .
translation: 如此腐臭，以至于连用来焚烧每一份电影拷贝的火柴都不值得这个价格。

text: the film 's fly-on-the-wall technique succeeds in capturing the day-to-day existence of sister helen and the various residents of the home .
translation: 电影的盲拍技巧成功地捕捉了海伦姐妹和家中各位居民的日常生活。

text: as they sort out clues - it 's a slight person , perhaps a woman , who walks with a leg brace and rides the bus - they also find a mutual attraction .
translation: 在他们整理线索的过程中，一个瘦小的人，可能是个女性，走路需要腿部支架并乘坐公共汽车，他们之间也发现了一种相互吸引。
back_translation: During their process of organizing clues, a petite person, possibly a female, who needed leg braces to walk and took the bus, they also discovered a mutual attraction between them.

text: viewing this underdramatized but overstated film is like watching a transcript of a therapy session brought to humdrum life by some freudian puppet .
translation: 观看这部未充分戏剧化但夸大的电影，就像是看一段治疗会议的记录，被某个弗洛伊德木偶平淡地呈现出来。
back_translation: Watching this underdramatized yet exaggerated film is like watching a record of a therapy session presented in a flat manner by some Freud puppet.

text: this story of a determined woman 's courage to find her husband in a war zone offers winning performances and some effecting moments .
translation: 这个故事讲述了一位坚定女性在战区寻找她丈夫的勇气，展现了出色的表演和一些感人的时刻。
back_translation: This story tells of a determined woman's courage in searching for her husband in a war zone, showcasing outstanding performances and some touching moments.

text: light years/ several warp speeds/ levels and levels of dilithium crystals better than the pitiful insurrection . which is n't to say that it 's the equal of some of its predecessors .
translation: 光年/几种曲速/比可怜的叛乱者更高水平的德利提姆晶体。并不是说它能够与一些前作相提并论。
back_translation: Light years / several types of warp speed / higher-level dilithium crystals than the poor rebels. This is not to say that it can be compared to some earlier works.

text: what a concept , what an idea , what a thrill ride . this is a more fascinating look at the future than `` bladerunner `` and one of the most high-concept sci fi adventures attempted for the screen .
translation: 这是对未来更迷人的展望，比《银翼杀手》更精彩，也是为银幕尝试的最高概念科幻冒险之一。
back_translation: This is a more captivating vision of the future, even more exciting than "Blade Runner," and is one of the highest conceptual sci-fi adventures attempted on screen.

text: months on , marie finds herself alone , life having taken a dramatic turn .
translation: 几个月后，玛丽发现自己孤身一人，生活发生了剧变。
back_translation: A few months later, Mary found herself all alone, and her life underwent a dramatic change.

text: i liked the original short story but this movie , even at an hour and twenty-some minutes , it 's too long and it goes nowhere .
translation: 我喜欢原版短篇小说，但这部电影即使只有一个小时二十几分钟，也太长了，而且毫无意义。
back_translation: I like the original short stories, but this movie, even though it's just over an hour and twenty minutes long, is too long and completely meaningless.

text: the most brilliant work in this genre since the 1984 uncut version of sergio leone 's flawed but staggering once upon a time in america .
translation: 自1984年塞尔吉奥·莱翁的缺陷却令人震惊的《美国往事》未删减版以来，该类型中最杰出的作品。
back_translation: Since Sergio Leone's shocking uncut version of "Once Upon a Time in America" in 1984, it has been the most outstanding work in the genre.

text: so we got ten little indians meets friday the 13th by way of clean and sober , filmed on the set of carpenter 's the thing and loaded with actors you 're most likely to find on the next inevitable incarnation of the love boat .
translation: 所以我们得到了十个小印第安人遇上第十三个星期五，通过清醒和戒酒来呈现，拍摄于卡彭特的《怪形》片场，演员大多是你很可能会在下一个不可避免的《爱情船》重制版中看到的。
back_translation: So we got ten little Indians encountering the thirteenth Friday the 13th, presented through sobriety and abstinence, filmed on the set of Carpenter's "The Thing," with actors that you are very likely to see in the next inevitable remake of "The Love Boat."

text: this spawn of william shakespeare and ray kroc has more fun with [ the ] thin premise than you might expect , mostly because of maura tierney .
translation: 这位威廉·莎士比亚和雷·克罗克的产物在这个薄弱的前提下玩得比你想象的更多，主要是因为莫拉·蒂尔尼的表现。
back_translation: This product of William Shakespeare and Ray Croc plays with more on this weak premise than you might imagine, mainly due to Mora Tierney's performance.

text: they 're a conveyance true , but they can also become the unlikely place for a rendezvous .
translation: 它们确实是一种交通工具，但也可以成为一个不太可能的会面场所。
back_translation: They are indeed a mode of transportation, but they can also become an unlikely meeting place.

text: in `` house of 1000 corpses `` , two young couples take a misguided tour onto the back roads of america in search of a local legend known as dr . satan .
translation: 在《千尸屋》中，两对年轻情侣误入美国的乡村小路，寻找一个被称为撒旦博士的地方传说。
back_translation: In "House of 1000 Corpses," two pairs of young couples mistakenly wander into rural backroads in America, searching for a place rumored to be the lair of Dr. Satan.

text: what elevates the movie above the run-of-the-mill singles blender is its surreal sense of humor and technological finish .
translation: 使这部电影超越普通爱情片的是它超现实的幽默感和精致的技术效果。
back_translation: What makes this film stand out from ordinary romantic films is its surreal sense of humor and exquisite technical effects.

text: like schindler 's list , the grey zone attempts to be grandiloquent , but ends up merely pretentious -- in a grisly sort of way .
translation: 像《辛德勒的名单》，《灰色地带》试图显得宏伟，但最终只是显得做作——以一种可怕的方式。
back_translation: Like "Schindler's List," "The Grey Zone" tries to appear grand but ultimately comes off as pretentious—in a horrific way.

text: possesses something rare : a degree of genuine reverence in its depiction of surfing as a sport and a subculture .
translation: 拥有一些罕见的品质：在其对冲浪作为一种运动和亚文化的描绘中体现出真正的尊重。
back_translation: Possess some rare qualities: embodying true respect in its depiction of surfing as a sport and subculture.

text: if ayurveda can help us return to a sane regimen of eating , sleeping and stress-reducing contemplation , it is clearly a good thing .
translation: 如果阿育吠陀能够帮助我们恢复到一个理智的饮食、睡眠和减压的沉思 regimen，这显然是一件好事。

text: in this movie , de niro plays mitch preston , a hard-nosed , hardworking police detective .
translation: 在这部电影中，德尼罗饰演米奇·普雷斯顿，一位坚定不移、努力工作的警察侦探。
back_translation: In this movie, De Niro plays Mickey Preston, a steadfast and hard-working police detective.

text: in the end , debby , beth , and virginia find , if not the relationships of their dreams , peace with each other and within themselves .
translation: 最后，黛比、贝丝和维吉尼亚发现，虽然她们没有得到理想中的关系，但在彼此之间和内心中找到了平和。
back_translation: In the end, Debbie, Beth, and Virginia realized that although they did not achieve the ideal relationship they desired, they found peace within each other and within themselves.

text: no matter how firmly director john stainton has his tongue in his cheek , the fact remains that a wacky concept does not a movie make .
translation: 无论导演约翰·斯坦顿的讽刺有多么明显，事实仍然是一个古怪的概念并不能构成一部电影。
back_translation: No matter how obvious director John Stanton's satire may be, the fact remains that a quirky concept alone cannot constitute a film.

text: the setting is new york 's five points , the most violent part of the world at the time .
translation: 设置在纽约的五点地区，那是当时世界上最暴力的地方。
back_translation: Set in the Five Points area of New York, which was the most violent place in the world at that time.

text: a brilliant pianist , a polish jew , witnesses the restrictions nazis place on jews in the polish capital , from restricted access to the building of the warsaw ghetto .
translation: 一位杰出的钢琴家，一名波兰犹太人，目睹了纳粹对波兰首都犹太人施加的限制，从限制进入华沙犹太区的建筑开始。
back_translation: An outstanding pianist, a Polish Jew, witnessed the restrictions imposed by the Nazis on the Jews of the Polish capital, starting with limitations on entering the buildings in the Warsaw Ghetto.

text: gran historia sobre el amor , la familia , la lealtad y la traiciM-sn que seguramente se convertirM-a en un nuevo clM-asico del gM-inero .
translation: 一部关于爱、家庭、忠诚和背叛的伟大故事，肯定会成为一个新的矿工经典。
back_translation: A great story about love, family, loyalty, and betrayal is sure to become a new classic in mining literature.

text: one of the most successful , provocative and intensely contemporary of israeli films , so much so that to watch it is to feel the country having a passionate argument with itself .
translation: 以色列电影中最成功、最具挑衅性和现代感的作品之一，以至于观看时仿佛感受到这个国家与自身进行着热烈的辩论。
back_translation: One of the most successful, provocative, and modern works in Israeli cinema, so much so that watching it feels like the country is engaged in a passionate debate with itself.

text: in their brief meeting , johnny will get the chance to face his truth , but the truth is never what it seems .
translation: 在他们短暂的会面中，约翰尼将有机会面对他的真相，但真相从来不是表面看起来的那样。
back_translation: In their brief encounter, Johnny will have the chance to confront his truth, but the truth is never what it seems on the surface.

text: those who score well are recruited into a secret paramilitary academy .
translation: 那些测试表现良好的人会被招募到一个秘密的准军事学院。

text: well , robert 's not a suitable chinese girl - but is he gay ?
translation: 嗯，罗伯特不适合中国女孩——但他是同性恋吗？
back_translation: Well, Robert is not suitable for Chinese girls—but is he gay?

text: a lyrical if sluggish excursion set in war-torn iranian kurdistan .
translation: 一个充满抒情但略显缓慢的旅程，发生在饱受战争摧残的伊朗库尔德斯坦。
back_translation: A journey filled with lyricism but slightly slow, taking place in the war-ravaged Kurdish region of Iran.

text: the mystery inc . gang have gone their separate ways and have been apart for two years , until they each receive an invitation to spooky island .
translation: 神秘公司 gang 分道扬镳，分开两年，直到他们每个人都收到去幽灵岛的邀请。
back_translation: The mysterious company gang went their separate ways for two years, until each of them received an invitation to Ghost Island.

text: befriended by the ship 's charismatic cyborg cook , john silver , jim blossoms under his guidance and shows the makings of a fine shipmate as he and the alien crew battle a supernova , a black hole , and a ferocious space storm .
translation: 在船上迷人的半机械人厨师约翰·西尔弗的指导下，吉姆逐渐成长，展现出成为优秀船伴的潜力，与外星船员一起在超级新星、黑洞和猛烈的太空风暴中奋勇作战。
back_translation: Under the guidance of the charming half-mechanical chef John Silver on board the ship, Jim gradually matures, showing potential to become an excellent shipmate as he bravely battles alongside the alien crew in supernovae, black holes, and fierce space storms.

text: this is cruel , misanthropic stuff with only weak claims to surrealism and black comedy .
translation: 这是残酷的、厌世的作品，仅仅有弱小的超现实主义和黑色幽默的主张。
back_translation: This is a cruel, nihilistic work that only has weak assertions of surrealism and black humor.

text: an ancient tablet found by famous british archaeologist professor hyde-white is believed to be a roadmap to the legendary lost temple of faramundi and its hidden treasures .
translation: 著名英国考古学家海德-怀特教授发现的一块古代石板被认为是通往传说中法拉蒙迪失落神庙及其隐藏宝藏的地图。
back_translation: A famous British archaeologist, Professor Hyde-White, discovered an ancient slab that is believed to be a map leading to the legendary lost temple of Pharamondi and its hidden treasures.

text: . . . while each moment of this broken character study is rich in emotional texture , the journey does n't really go anywhere .
translation: ……尽管这个破碎的角色研究中的每一刻都充满了情感的质感，但旅程实际上并没有走向任何地方。
back_translation: ...Although every moment in this fragmented character study is filled with emotional texture, the journey doesn't actually lead anywhere.

text: those who savor well-drawn characters and exotic locales will find the touch of the mystic masseur to be most pleasurable indeed .
translation: 那些品味精心刻画的人物和异国风情的人，将会发现神秘按摩师的触感确实令人感到非常愉悦。
back_translation: Those with a taste for intricately portrayed characters and exotic styles will find the touch of the mysterious masseur to be truly pleasurable.

text: the art direction and costumes are gorgeous and finely detailed , and kurys ' direction is clever and insightful .
translation: 艺术指导和服装精美且细致，库里斯的导演手法聪明且富有洞察力。
back_translation: The art direction and costumes are exquisite and detailed, and Currie's directing style is clever and insightful.

text: durval and his mother carmita live at the back of `` durval discos `` , a record store they own in s & # 227 ; o paulo , specializing in vinyl records .
translation: 杜瓦尔和他的母亲卡米塔住在“杜瓦尔唱片店”的后面，这是一家他们在圣保罗拥有的专门经营黑胶唱片的唱片店。
back_translation: Duval and his mother Kamita live behind the "Duval Record Store," which is a record shop they own in São Paulo that specializes in vinyl records.

text: he checks into a rehab clinic that specializes in treating law enforcement officials .
translation: 他入住了一家专门治疗执法人员的康复诊所。
back_translation: He checked into a rehabilitation clinic that specializes in treating law enforcement personnel.

text: de niro may enjoy the same free ride from critics afforded to clint eastwood in the lazy bloodwork . but like bruce springsteen 's gone-to-pot asbury park , new jersey , this sad-sack waste of a movie is a city of ruins .
translation: 德尼罗可能会享受到批评家给予克林特·伊斯特伍德在《血染之谜》中那种懒惰的宽容待遇。但就像布鲁斯·斯普林斯汀的《废墟之城》一样，这部令人失望的电影简直是一座废墟。
back_translation: De Niro may enjoy the kind of lazy leniency from critics that Clint Eastwood received for "Blood Work." But like Bruce Springsteen's "Ghost Town," this disappointing film is simply a wreck.

text: now , after having an encounter with a hollywood producer who got lost in virgil grove , is asked if he would like to come back to hollywood to direct a feature movie .
translation: 现在，在与一位在维吉尔森林迷路的好莱坞制片人碰面后，他被询问是否愿意回到好莱坞执导一部故事片。
back_translation: Now, after meeting with a Hollywood producer who got lost in the Virgil Forest, he was asked if he would be willing to return to Hollywood to direct a feature film.

text: . . . a fascinating curiosity piece -- fascinating , that is , for about ten minutes . after that it becomes long and tedious like a classroom play in a college history course .
translation: ……一件令人着迷的好奇之物——迷人的是，顶多十分钟。之后，它变得漫长而乏味，像是大学历史课上的一场课堂剧。
back_translation: ...a fascinating object of curiosity—what's intriguing is that at most it lasts ten minutes. After that, it becomes long and tedious, like a classroom play in a university history class.

text: thomas ' wish comes true and he stays up all night watching her .
translation: 托马斯的愿望成真了，他整晚都在看着她。
back_translation: Thomas's wish came true; he watched her all night long.

text: as a fire chief , quinn ( christian bales ) is responsable for warding off the beasts and keeping a community alive as they eke out a meager existence .
translation: 作为消防队长，奎因（克里斯蒂安·贝尔饰）负责抵御野兽并维持社区的生存，帮助他们艰难维持微薄的生计。
back_translation: As the fire chief, Quinn (played by Christian Bale) is responsible for fending off beasts and maintaining the survival of the community, helping them to struggle through their meager livelihoods.

text: the director seems to take an unseemly pleasure in [ the characters ' ] misery and at the same time to congratulate himself for having the guts to confront it .
translation: 导演似乎在角色的痛苦中找到了不合适的快感，同时也在自我 congratulating 由于敢于面对这一切。
back_translation: The director seems to find an inappropriate pleasure in the characters' suffering, while also self-congratulating for daring to face it all.

text: all the more disquieting for its relatively gore-free allusions to the serial murders , but it falls down in its attempts to humanize its subject .
translation: 尽管对连环谋杀的暗示相对没有血腥，但这让人更加不安，然而在试图使其主题人性化时却显得不足。
back_translation: Despite the relatively less graphic implications of the serial murders, they are more unsettling; however, it falls short in attempting to humanize its subject.

text: this is a finely written , superbly acted offbeat thriller .
translation: 这是一部文笔优雅、表演出色的非主流惊悚片。
back_translation: This is a non-mainstream thriller with elegant writing and outstanding performances.

text: a film full of vivid characters , quiet beauty and gentle grace .
translation: 一部充满生动角色、宁静之美和温柔优雅的电影。
back_translation: A film filled with vibrant characters, serene beauty, and gentle elegance.

text: may be the most undeserving victim of critical overkill since town and country .
translation: 可能是自《市镇与乡村》以来最不被应得的批评受害者。
back_translation: Probably the most undeserved victim of criticism since "Town and Country."

text: pipe dream does have its charms . the leads are natural and lovely , the pace is serene , the humor wry and sprightly .
translation: 《pipe dream》确实有其魅力。主角自然可爱，节奏宁静，幽默风趣且生动。
back_translation: "Pipe Dream" indeed has its charm. The protagonist is naturally endearing, the rhythm is gentle, and it is humorous, lively, and engaging.

text: moore provides an invaluable service by sparking debate and encouraging thought . better still , he does all of this , and more , while remaining one of the most savagely hilarious social critics this side of jonathan swift .
translation: 穆尔通过引发辩论和鼓励思考提供了无价的服务。更好的是，他在做这一切的同时，仍然是乔纳森·斯威夫特之后最尖锐幽默的社会评论家之一。
back_translation: Moor provides invaluable service by sparking debates and encouraging thought. Better yet, while doing all of this, he remains one of the sharpest and wittiest social commentators since Jonathan Swift.

text: lejos del paraM-mso es al mismo tiempo una fiesta para los ojos y oM-mdos y un movilizador cuadro de personajes enfrentados a sus propios deseos , miedos y prejuicios .
translation: 远离伪装的同时，它也是一场视觉和听觉的盛宴，并且是一幅让人振奋的画面，展现了那些面对自己欲望、恐惧和偏见的人物。
back_translation: While staying away from pretense, it is also a feast for the eyes and ears, presenting an inspiring scene that showcases those who confront their desires, fears, and prejudices.

text: the noble tradition of men in drag hits an all-time low in sorority boys , whose makers apparently believe that women 's clothing can cover up any deficiency in acting , writing or direction .
translation: 在姐妹会男孩中，男人化妆的高尚传统达到了最低点，制作方显然相信女性服装可以掩盖表演、写作或导演方面的任何缺陷。
back_translation: Among fraternity boys, the noble tradition of men wearing makeup has reached its lowest point, and the producers apparently believe that female costumes can cover up any flaws in performance, writing, or directing.

text: travels a fascinating arc from hope and euphoria to reality and disillusionment .
translation: 经历了一条从希望和狂喜到现实和幻灭的迷人弧线。
back_translation: Experienced a captivating arc from hope and ecstasy to reality and disillusionment.

text: he retires from his dangerous job after his best pal kamandag was killed by a mysterious kidnapping syndicate leader .
translation: 在他最好的朋友卡曼达被一名神秘绑架 syndicate 头目杀死后，他辞去了危险的工作。
back_translation: After his best friend Kamanda was killed by a mysterious kidnapping syndicate leader, he quit his dangerous job.

text: oliveira trusts the intelligence of his audience . . . in the life of the city he suggests the ongoing life of humanity , the context in which individual mortality must be contemplated .
translation: 奥利维拉信任他的观众的智慧……在城市的生活中，他暗示了人类的持续生活，这是需要考虑个体死亡的背景。
back_translation: Oliveira trusts the wisdom of his audience... In the life of the city, he suggests the enduring existence of humanity, which needs to be considered against the backdrop of individual death.

text: but then roxie comes along and velma is old news .
translation: 但接着罗茜出现了，维尔玛就成了过时的新闻。
back_translation: But then Rosie appeared, and Velma became yesterday's news.

text: this sort of cute and cloying material is far from zhang 's forte and it shows .
translation: 这种可爱而让人腻的素材远不是张的强项，这点很明显。
back_translation: This cute yet cloying material is far from Zhang's strong suit, and this is quite obvious.

text: it 's bright , pristine style and bold colors make it as much fun as reading an oversized picture book before bedtime .
translation: 它明亮、洁净的风格和大胆的颜色让人觉得像在睡前阅读一本超大幅画册一样有趣。
back_translation: Its bright, clean style and bold colors make it feel as interesting as reading a giant picture book before bed.

text: it puts washington , as honest working man john q . archibald , on a pedestal , then keeps lifting the pedestal higher .
translation: 它将华盛顿作为诚实劳动者约翰·Q·阿奇博尔德放在一个基座上，然后不断将基座抬得更高。
back_translation: It places Washington on a pedestal as the honest worker John Q. Archibald, and then continually raises the pedestal higher.

text: bolstered by an astonishing voice cast ( excepting love hewitt ) , an interesting racial tension , and a storyline that i have n't encountered since at least pete 's dragon .
translation: 这部作品有着令人惊叹的配音阵容（除了休伊特），有趣的种族紧张关系，以及一个我至少在《大龙彼得》以来没有遇到过的故事情节。
back_translation: This work features an impressive voice cast (except for Hewitt), interesting racial tensions, and a storyline that I haven't encountered since "Big Peter."

text: the feeling of each vision changes drastically as does the way the son looks and acts .
translation: 每个幻象的感觉都发生了巨大的变化，儿子的外貌和行为也随之不同。
back_translation: The feeling of each illusion has undergone a dramatic change, and the appearance and behavior of the son have also changed accordingly.

text: white has n't developed characters so much as caricatures , one-dimensional buffoons that get him a few laughs but nothing else .
translation: 白人并没有创造出真正的人物，而是一些漫画般的角色，单维的傻瓜，只能让他博得几声笑声，却别无他用。
back_translation: White people did not create real characters, but rather some comic-like figures, one-dimensional fools, who can only elicit a few laughs and serve no other purpose.

text: she arrives with every intent of selling it all off and going back to her busy career , but in going through her grandmother 's belongings , she discovers much about her family 's past which ultimately makes her re-evaluate her life and values .
translation: 她怀着卖掉一切并回到忙碌职业的决心到达，但在整理祖母的遗物时，她发现了许多关于家族过去的事情，最终让她重新评估自己的生活和价值观。
back_translation: She arrived with the determination to sell everything and return to her busy career, but while sorting through her grandmother's belongings, she discovered many things about her family's past that ultimately led her to reevaluate her life and values.

text: disturbing for its unabashed honesty , our cast of characters both love and despise each other , their very actions acknowledging the pressures inherent in a tightly bonded peer group .
translation: 令人不安的是，这部作品展现了毫不掩饰的真实，我们的角色既相爱又相恨，他们的行为本身承认了紧密团结的同龄人群体中固有的压力。
back_translation: Disturbingly, this work showcases an unvarnished reality where our characters both love and hate each other, and their actions themselves acknowledge the inherent pressures within tightly-knit peer groups.

text: while mitchell gets ready for school , his mother and her friend ( lisa ) plan a murder , business as usual .
translation: 当米切尔准备上学时，他的母亲和她的朋友（丽莎）正在策划一次谋杀，照常进行。
back_translation: When Mitchell was getting ready for school, his mother and her friend (Lisa) were plotting a murder, as usual.

text: the plot revolves around a young married woman whose mundane life takes a turn for the worse when she strikes up a passionate and illicit affair with an oddball discount-store stock boy who thinks he 's holden caulfield .
translation: 故事围绕一位年轻已婚女性展开，她的平淡生活在与一位自认为是霍尔顿·考尔菲尔德的奇怪折扣店库存员展开一场激情且非法的恋情后急剧恶化。
back_translation: The story revolves around a young married woman whose mundane life takes a dramatic turn after an intense and illicit romance with a peculiar discount store stock clerk who believes he is Holden Caulfield.

text: but , things go frightfully wrong and the game turns into a struggle to make it out of the house alive .
translation: 但事情变得非常糟糕，游戏变成了一场挣扎，以求活着逃出房子。
back_translation: But things became very bad, and the game turned into a struggle to survive and escape from the house.

text: walter hill 's pulpy , stylized boxing melodrama undisputed nearly overcomes its questionable in-the-ring match-up with solid fight choreography and gritty prison authenticity .
translation: 沃尔特·希尔的充满油墨感、风格化的拳击 melodrama 《无可争议》几乎克服了其在擂台上可疑的对决，以扎实的打斗编排和真实的监狱氛围。
back_translation: Walter Hill's ink-saturated, stylized boxing melodrama "Undisputed" almost overcomes its questionable confrontations in the ring with solid fight choreography and an authentic prison atmosphere.

text: the problem is the needlessly poor quality of its archival prints and film footage . the images lack contrast , are murky and are frequently too dark to be decipherable .
translation: 问题在于其档案打印和电影影像的质量不必要地差。图像缺乏对比度，模糊不清，且经常过于暗淡以至于无法解读。
back_translation: The problem is that the quality of its archival prints and film images is unnecessarily poor. The images lack contrast, are blurry, and often too dark to be decipherable.

text: recently ordained a priest , 24-year-old father amaro is sent to a small parish church in los reyes , mexico to assist the aging father benito in his daily work .
translation: 最近被按立为牧师的24岁阿马罗父亲被派往墨西哥洛斯雷耶斯的一座小教区教堂，以协助年迈的贝尼托父亲处理日常工作。
back_translation: Recently, the 24-year-old Amaro's father, who has just been ordained as a pastor, has been assigned to a small parish church in Los Reyes, Mexico, to assist the elderly Father Benito with daily tasks.

text: with an unflappable air of decadent urbanity , everett remains a perfect wildean actor , and a relaxed firth displays impeccable comic skill .
translation: 以一种不动声色的颓废都市气息，埃弗雷特依然是一个完美的王尔德式演员，而放松的菲尔斯则展现了无可挑剔的喜剧才华。
back_translation: With an unassuming air of urban despondency, Everett remains a perfect Wildean actor, while the relaxed Pearce showcases impeccable comedic talent.

text: one just waits grimly for the next shock without developing much attachment to the characters .
translation: 人们只是无情地等待着下一个震撼，不会对角色产生太多依恋。
back_translation: People just coldly await the next shock, without developing much attachment to the characters.

text: now , in the twilight of his life , emile shapes the final chapters of his mental autobiography .
translation: 如今，在他生命的黄昏，埃米尔塑造着他精神自传的最后几章。
back_translation: Now, in the twilight of his life, Emil is shaping the final chapters of his spiritual autobiography.

text: it just goes to show , an intelligent person is n't necessarily an admirable storyteller .
translation: 这只是说明，一个聪明的人不一定是一个令人钦佩的讲故事者。
back_translation: This simply means that a smart person is not necessarily an admirable storyteller.

text: she survives and after being in a coma for five years , she wakes to seek revenge on her co-workers and boss who had attacked her .
translation: 她幸存下来，并在昏迷五年后醒来，开始对袭击她的同事和老板进行复仇。
back_translation: She survived and woke up after five years in a coma, beginning to seek revenge on the colleagues and boss who attacked her.

text: one of the threads follows the brand new ( unmarried ) prime minister ( grant ) of the united kingdom , who on his first day in 10 downing street falls in love with the girl ( mccutcheon ) who brings him his tea ( thompson plays his sister ; rickman plays her husband ) .
translation: 其中一个情节讲述了英国新任（未婚）首相（格兰特）在十号唐宁街的第一天爱上了给他送茶的女孩（麦卡琴）。汤普森饰演他的姐姐，瑞克曼饰演她的丈夫。
back_translation: One of the plotlines tells the story of the newly appointed (unmarried) British Prime Minister (Grant) falling in love with the girl (McCutcheon) who brings him tea on his first day at 10 Downing Street. Thompson plays his sister, and Rickman plays her husband.

text: firefighter gordon brewer is plunged into the complex and dangerous world of international terrorism after he loses his wife and child in a bombing credited to claudio `` the wolf `` perrini .
translation: 消防员戈登·布鲁尔在一场被归咎于克劳迪奥“狼”佩里尼的爆炸中失去了妻子和孩子，因此陷入了复杂且危险的国际恐怖主义世界。
back_translation: Firefighter Gordon Brewer lost his wife and child in an explosion attributed to Claudio "Wolf" Perini, plunging him into a complex and dangerous world of international terrorism.

text: sparkles in its deft portrait of tinseltown 's seasoned veterans of gossip , wealth , paranoia , and celebrityhood .
translation: 在其对好莱坞老手们的熟练描绘中，闪耀着对八卦、财富、偏执和名人生活的生动刻画。
back_translation: In its skilled portrayal of Hollywood veterans, it shines with a vivid depiction of gossip, wealth, paranoia, and celebrity life.

text: a good music documentary , probably one of the best since the last waltz .
translation: 一部好的音乐纪录片，可能是自《最后的华尔兹》以来最好的之一。
back_translation: A good music documentary may be one of the best since "The Last Waltz."

text: two american mafiosi , gino and settimo , take refuge in the glasgow cafe owned by their scottish/italian cousin .
translation: 两个美国黑手党成员吉诺和塞蒂莫在他们的苏格兰/意大利表亲拥有的格拉斯哥咖啡馆避难。
back_translation: Two American mafia members, Gino and Settimo, take refuge in a Glasgow café owned by their Scottish/Italian relatives.

text: plans go awry when the kingpin offers $ 100 million to anyone who can free him .
translation: 当大亨向任何能够营救他的人提供1亿美元时，计划变得岌岌可危。
back_translation: When the tycoon offers $100 million to anyone who can save him, the plan becomes perilous.

text: although barbershop boasts some of today 's hottest and hippest acts from the world of television , music and stand-up comedy , this movie strangely enough has the outdated swagger of a shameless M-^Q70s blaxploitation shuck-and-jive sitcom .
translation: 尽管《理发店》展示了当今电视、音乐和单口喜剧界一些最炙手可热且最时尚的表演，但这部电影奇怪地散发出一种过时的自信，仿佛是一部无耻的70年代黑人剥削喜剧情景剧。
back_translation: Despite showcasing some of the hottest and trendiest performances in today’s television, music, and stand-up comedy scenes, "The Barbershop" oddly exudes a sense of outdated confidence, as if it were an unabashed 70s Black exploitation comedy sketch.

text: later , otte distributes the donations he 's collected throughout the year .
translation: 后来，奥特分发他一年中收集的捐款。
back_translation: Later, Aote distributed the donations he had collected throughout the year.

text: once while beating up one of his foes , he sees komal ( aishwarya rai ) and is so smitten by her beauty that he starts visualizing her wherever he goes and in whatever he does .
translation: 有一次，在打击他的一个敌人时，他看到了科马尔（艾希瓦娅·雷），被她的美丽深深吸引，以至于无论他走到哪里，做什么事情，都开始想象她的身影。
back_translation: One time, while attacking one of his enemies, he saw Komal (Aishwarya Rai) and was so deeply captivated by her beauty that no matter where he went or what he did, he began to imagine her figure.

text: they plan it the way laurel and hardy might plan a bank robbery , or perhaps the marx brothers .
translation: 他们的计划就像劳雷尔和哈代可能计划抢银行一样，或者也许像马克斯兄弟。
back_translation: Their plan is like how Laurel and Hardy might plan to rob a bank, or perhaps like the Marx Brothers.

text: he is a cop , and chances are he 's going to make some trouble for vince too .
translation: 他是个警察， chances are他可能也会给文斯惹麻烦。
back_translation: He is a police officer, and chances are he might also cause trouble for Vince.

text: a teenager rides the same bus to school everyday .
translation: 一个青少年每天乘同一辆公交车上学。
back_translation: A teenager takes the same bus to school every day.

text: it 's so devoid of joy and energy it makes even jason x . . . look positively shakesperean by comparison .
translation: 它是如此缺乏快乐和活力，以至于连《杰森X》......相比之下都显得极为莎士比亚风。
back_translation: It is so lacking in joy and vitality that even "Jason X" seems extremely Shakespearean by comparison.

text: so original in its base concept that you can not help but get caught up .
translation: 它的基本概念如此独特，让你不禁被吸引。
back_translation: Its fundamental concept is so unique that it draws you in.

text: one thing is for sure : this movie does not tell you a whole lot about lily chou-chou .
translation: 有一点是可以确定的：这部电影并没有告诉你太多关于莉莉·周周的事情。
back_translation: One thing is certain: this movie doesn't tell you much about Lily Zhou Zhou.

text: the storylines are woven together skilfully , the magnificent swooping aerial shots are breathtaking , and the overall experience is awesome .
translation: 故事情节巧妙地交织在一起，宏伟的空中镜头令人屏息，整体体验令人惊叹。
back_translation: The plot is intricately woven together, the breathtaking aerial shots are magnificent, and the overall experience is astonishing.

text: her lover , a psychiatrist twice her age , becomes twisted in sarah 's sordid plot to kill her husband for his large inheritance .
translation: 她的情人，一个比她大两倍的心理医生，卷入了莎拉阴险的计划，试图为了她丈夫的大笔遗产而杀死他。
back_translation: Her lover, a psychologist twice her age, is entangled in Sarah's sinister plan to kill her husband for his large inheritance.

text: but this is lohman 's film . her performance moves between heartbreak and rebellion as she continually tries to accommodate to fit in and gain the unconditional love she seeks .
translation: 但这是洛赫曼的电影。她的表演在心碎和叛逆之间徘徊，持续努力适应以融入并获得她所追求的无条件爱。
back_translation: But this is Lothman's film. Her performance oscillates between heartbreak and rebellion, continuously striving to adapt in order to fit in and gain the unconditional love she seeks.

text: `` frida `` chronicles the life frida kahlo ( salma hayek ) shared unflichingly and openly with diego rivera ( alfred molina ) , as the young couple took the art world by storm .
translation: 《弗里达》真实而坦诚地讲述了弗里达·卡洛（萨尔玛·哈耶克 饰）与迭戈·里维拉（阿尔弗雷德·莫利纳 饰）共同度过的生活，这对年轻夫妇在艺术界掀起了波澜。
back_translation: "Frida" tells the true and candid story of Frida Kahlo (played by Salma Hayek) and her life with Diego Rivera (played by Alfred Molina), a young couple who stirred waves in the art world.

text: the film is beautifully mounted , but , more to the point , the issues are subtly presented , managing to walk a fine line with regard to the question of joan 's madness .
translation: 这部电影制作精美，但更重要的是，问题以微妙的方式呈现，成功地在关于琼的疯狂问题上走了一条细致的界线。
back_translation: This movie is beautifully made, but more importantly, the issues are presented in a subtle way, successfully walking a delicate line regarding Joan's madness.

text: against improbable odds , they race towards a thrilling , climactic confrontation on the mysterious isla de muerta .
translation: 在极不可能的情况下，他们朝着神秘的死亡岛奔向一次激动人心、高潮迭起的对决。
back_translation: In a highly unlikely situation, they raced towards the mysterious Death Island for an exciting, thrilling showdown.

text: a very hung-over julie is also there , on a field trip with her art class .
translation: 非常宿醉的朱莉也在那里，和她的艺术班一起参加实地考察。
back_translation: Very hungover Julie was also there, participating in the field trip with her art class.

text: featuring a dangerously seductive performance from the great daniel auteuil , `` sade `` covers the same period as kaufmann 's `` quills `` with more unsettlingly realistic results .
translation: 这部影片《萨德》展示了伟大的丹尼尔·奥图伊的危险诱惑般的表演，涵盖了与考夫曼的《羽毛笔》相同的时期，但结果更加让人不安且真实。
back_translation: The film "Sade" showcases the dangerous and seductive performance of the great Daniel Auteuil, covering the same period as Kaufmann's "The Quill," but resulting in a more unsettling and authentic experience.

text: [ smith ] simply celebrates the universal desire to fashion our homes for our needs and desires .
translation: [ smith ] 简单地庆祝了人们普遍希望根据自己的需求和愿望来装饰家园的愿望。
back_translation: Smith simply celebrated the common desire of people to decorate their homes according to their needs and wishes.

text: billy marries his high school sweet heart , janet and they soon have a son .
translation: 比利娶了他的高中甜心珍妮特，他们很快生了一个儿子。
back_translation: Billy married his high school sweetheart, Janet, and they soon had a son.

text: each vision shows the son at a different age and at a different stage in his pursuit of his life long love , isabelle .
translation: 每个场景展示了儿子在不同的年龄和他追求终身挚爱伊莎贝尔的不同阶段。
back_translation: Each scene showcases the son at different ages and the various stages of his pursuit of his lifelong love, Isabel.

text: just before easter 2001 , a semi-trailer loaded with 40 , 000 bottles of beer crashed into the tweed river on the out skirts of the northern new south wales town of murwillumbah ( known as `` murbah `` to the locals ) .
translation: 在2001年复活节前夕，一辆装载着40,000瓶啤酒的半挂车在新南威尔士北部的小镇穆尔威伦巴（当地人称其为“穆尔巴”）的外 skirts坠入了特威德河。
back_translation: On the eve of Easter in 2001, a semi-trailer loaded with 40,000 bottles of beer plunged into the Tweed River on the outskirts of the small town of Murwillumbah in northern New South Wales, which locals refer to as "Murbah."

text: inside , an old man lies ill on a bed , attended by his son and daughter-in-law .
translation: 屋内，一位老人躺在床上生病，身边有他的儿子和儿媳在照顾他。
back_translation: Inside the room, an elderly man is lying in bed sick, with his son and daughter-in-law taking care of him.

text: a quirky comedy set in newfoundland that cleverly captures the dry wit that 's so prevalent on the rock .
translation: 一部设定在纽芬兰的怪诞喜剧，巧妙地展现了在这片土地上普遍存在的干涩幽默。
back_translation: A bizarre comedy set in Newfoundland that cleverly showcases the dry humor prevalent in this land.

text: terrific as nadia , a russian mail-order bride who comes to america speaking not a word of english , it 's kidman who holds the film together with a supremely kittenish performance that gradually accumulates more layers .
translation: 奈迪亚表现出色，她是一位来自俄罗斯的邮购新娘，来到美国时一句英语都不会说。影片的核心则是凯特·温斯莱特凭借其极具魅力的表演将整个影片串联起来，逐渐展现出更多的层次。
back_translation: Nadia performs excellently; she is a mail-order bride from Russia who couldn’t speak a word of English when she arrived in the U.S. The core of the film is Kate Winslet, whose incredibly charming performance ties the entire film together, gradually revealing more layers.

text: alas , the black-and-white archival footage of their act showcases pretty mediocre shtick .
translation: 唉，他们表演的黑白档案录像展示的其实是相当平庸的噱头。
back_translation: Oh, the black-and-white archive footage they performed is actually quite a mediocre gimmick.

text: based on a true story about ryan dunn 's ex girlfriend , and how she cheated on him all the time , with him and his friends always having to spy on her .
translation: 这是一个基于真实故事的故事，关于瑞安·达恩的前女友，以及她是如何不断地欺骗他的，他和他的朋友们总是不得不监视她。
back_translation: This is a story based on a true story, about Ryan Dunn's ex-girlfriend, and how she continuously deceived him, and he and his friends always had to keep an eye on her.

text: chan in turn , has a job donning exotic costumes as a cyber papel doll for a porn website and a sex-worker lover who has a son and a separate husband on the mainland .
translation: Chan 反过来，担任一个色情网站的网络纸娃娃，穿着异国情调的服装，并且是一个有儿子和一个在大陆有配偶的性工作者情人。
back_translation: Chan, on the other hand, plays a virtual paper doll for a pornographic website, dressed in exotic clothing, and is a sex worker lover who has a son and a spouse on the mainland.

text: it is , by conventional standards , a fairly terrible movie . . . but it is also weirdly fascinating , a ready-made eurotrash cult object . it is also , at times , curiously moving .
translation: 从传统标准来看，这是一部相当糟糕的电影……但它也奇异地引人入胜，是一部现成的欧洲垃圾 cult 作品。有时，它也令人感到奇怪的感动。
back_translation: From a traditional standard, this is quite a terrible movie... but it is also strangely captivating, a ready-made European trash cult film. At times, it also evokes a strangely moving feeling.

text: professionally speaking , it 's tempting to jump ship in january to avoid ridiculous schlock like this shoddy suspense thriller .
translation: 在职业上讲，1月份跳槽以避免这种低劣的悬疑惊悚片的诱惑实在太大了。
back_translation: Professionally speaking, the temptation to switch jobs in January to avoid this low-quality suspense thriller is really strong.

text: for all its alleged youthful fire , xxx is no less subservient to bond 's tired formula of guns , girls and gadgets while brandishing a new action hero .
translation: 尽管被指责为充满青春活力，xxx 依然不乏忠于邦德那陈旧的公式——枪支、美女和 gadget，同时还展示了一个新的动作英雄。
back_translation: Despite being criticized for being full of youthful vigor, xxx still remains loyal to Bond's old formula—guns, beauties, and gadgets—while also showcasing a new action hero.

text: this film was shot during two trips that majid majidi took in western afghanistan in 2001 and 2002 .
translation: 这部电影是在马吉德·马基迪于2001年和2002年两次旅行时拍摄的，地点在阿富汗西部。
back_translation: This movie was filmed during two trips by Majid Majidi in 2001 and 2002, in western Afghanistan.

text: queen of the damned as you might have guessed , makes sorry use of aaliyah in her one and only starring role -- she does little here but point at things that explode into flame .
translation: 《被诅咒的女王》，正如你可能猜到的，那在她唯一的主角角色中对艾利亚的使用可谓很糟糕——她在这里几乎只是在指着那些燃烧起火焰的东西。
back_translation: "The Cursed Queen," as you might have guessed, has a rather poor use of Elia in her only protagonist role—she is almost just pointing at the things that are set ablaze.

text: a reporter , lanie kerrigan ( jolie ) , interviews a psychic homeless man ( shalhoub ) for a fluff piece about a football game 's score .
translation: 记者拉妮·凯里根（朱莉）采访了一位精神病的 homeless man (沙拉布) 关于一场足球比赛的分数的轻松报道。
back_translation: Reporter Rani Kerrigan (Julie) conducted a light-hearted interview with a mentally ill homeless man (Sharab) about the score of a football match.

text: so he starts to write an expose and disguises himself as a naive astronaut named zip martin .
translation: 于是他开始写一篇揭露文章，为了掩盖自己的身份，他伪装成一个天真的宇航员，名叫齐普·马丁。
back_translation: So he began to write an expose, disguising himself as an innocent astronaut named Chip Martin to conceal his identity.

text: ploddy is a living car with a mind of his own !
translation: 普洛迪是一辆有自己思想的活车！
back_translation: Prodi is a living car with its own thoughts!

text: here , in the smallest quietest corner of new england unfolds a disquieting tale of what happens when music meets murder . . .
translation: 在新英格兰最小、最安静的角落里，展开了一个令人不安的故事，讲述音乐与谋杀相遇时会发生什么……
back_translation: In the smallest, quietest corner of New England, an unsettling story unfolds, telling what happens when music and murder meet...

text: with the help of another innocent prisoner ( richard harris ) , he escapes the island and proceeds to transform himself into the wealthy count of monte cristo as part of his plan to exact revenge .
translation: 在另一位无辜囚犯（理查德·哈里斯）的帮助下，他逃离了小岛，并计划将自己转变为富有的蒙特·克里斯托伯爵，以实现他的复仇计划。
back_translation: With the help of another innocent prisoner, Richard Harris, he escapes from the small island and plans to transform himself into the wealthy Count of Monte Cristo to carry out his revenge plan.

text: paravasu is the elder son of the great sage raibhya ( mohan agashe ) .
translation: 帕拉瓦苏是伟大圣人瑞巴雅的长子（莫汉·阿加谢）。
back_translation: Paravasu is the eldest son of the great saint Rebhaya (Mohan Agashe).

text: death to smoochy tells a moldy-oldie , not-nearly -as-nasty -as-it- thinks-it-is joke . over and over again .
translation: 《死于热爱》讲述了一个老掉牙的笑话，远没有它自己想的那么恶劣。一次又一次地重复着。
back_translation: "Die from Love" tells an old joke that is far from as terrible as it thinks itself to be. It repeats again and again.

text: dawdles and drags when it should pop ; it does n't even have the virtue of enough mindless violence to break up the tedium of all its generational bonding .
translation: 拖拖拉拉，应该轻松呈现的时候却显得沉闷；它甚至没有足够的无脑暴力来打破所有代际连接的单调。
back_translation: Procrastination makes what should be presented easily seem dull; it doesn't even have enough mindless violence to break the monotony of all generational connections.

text: the film 's final hour , where nearly all the previous unseen material resides , is unconvincing soap opera that tornatore was right to cut .
translation: 电影的最后一小时，几乎所有未见过的素材都在其中，这是一个不令人信服的肥皂剧，托纳托雷确实是对的，该删掉。
back_translation: The last hour of the movie contains almost all unseen footage; it's an unconvincing soap opera, and Tornatore was indeed right to suggest it should be cut.

text: [ raimi 's ] matured quite a bit with spider-man , even though it 's one of the most plain white toast comic book films you 'll ever see .
translation: 尽管这是你见过的最普通的白吐司漫画电影之一，[雷米] 还是随着《蜘蛛侠》成熟了许多。
back_translation: Although this is one of the most ordinary white toast comic movies you've seen, [Remy] has still matured a lot alongside "Spider-Man."

text: anime reflects both japanese culture ( pre and post wwii ) and western influences upon it , sadly evident in haunting post-apocalyptic images reminiscent of hiroshima and nagasaki .
translation: 动漫反映了日本文化（战前和战后）以及其西方影响，这在令人难忘的后末日图像中显而易见，令人联想到广岛和长崎。
back_translation: Anime reflects Japanese culture (both before and after the war) and its Western influences, which is clearly evident in the memorable post-apocalyptic imagery reminiscent of Hiroshima and Nagasaki.

text: then a young colorado woman ( beth ulrich ) moves across the hall and things look up , until he learns that she has a total backwoods quality that he does n't know how to handle .
translation: 然后，一位年轻的科罗拉多州女性（贝斯·乌尔里希）搬到了对面的一间房间，一切看起来都有好转，直到他发现她有一种完全原始的特质，而他不知道如何应对。
back_translation: Then, a young woman from Colorado (Beth Ulrich) moved into the room across the hall, and everything seemed to improve until he discovered she had a completely primal quality that he didn't know how to handle.

text: aimed squarely at the least demanding of demographic groups : very small children who will be delighted simply to spend more time with familiar cartoon characters .
translation: 针对那些要求最低的人群：非常小的孩子，他们只会因为能够和熟悉的卡通角色花更多时间在一起而感到高兴。
back_translation: For those with the lowest demands: very small children, who are simply happy to spend more time with familiar cartoon characters.

text: empire ca n't make up its mind whether it wants to be a gangster flick or an art film . it does n't work as either .
translation: 《帝国》无法决定是想成为黑帮电影还是艺术片，结果两者都不成功。
back_translation: "The Empire" cannot decide whether it wants to be a gangster movie or an art film, resulting in neither being successful.

text: then a final `` test `` is made to come to a decision . . .
translation: 然后进行最终的“测试”以作出决定……
