back_translation: Martin Van Zant (Victor Garber) is assigned a distasteful task to investigate a crime and find someone to hold accountable.

text: weaves a spell over you , with its disturbingly close-up look at damaged psyches and its subtle undercurrents of danger . but its awkward structure keeps breaking the spell .
translation: 它以对受损心理的令人不安的特写视角和微妙的危险暗流施加了魔咒，但它尴尬的结构不断打破这种魔咒。
back_translation: It casts a spell with its unsettling close-up perspective on damaged psychology and subtle undercurrents of danger, but its awkward structure continually breaks this spell.

text: dense and enigmatic . . . elusive . . . stagy and stilted
translation: 密集而神秘……难以捉摸……做作而不自然
back_translation: Intense and mysterious... hard to grasp... pretentious and unnatural.

text: unless you come in to the film with a skateboard under your arm , you 're going to feel like you were n't invited to the party .
translation: 除非你夹着滑板走进电影院，否则你会感觉自己没有被邀请参加这个派对。
back_translation: Unless you walk into the cinema with a skateboard, you will feel like you weren't invited to this party.

text: the action-packed caper revolves around a 12-year old girl who , with the help of two friends , robs the state-of-the-art bank where her mother works to acquire the cash needed for a costly operation to save her dying father .
translation: 这部充满动作的故事围绕着一个12岁女孩展开，她在两个朋友的帮助下，抢劫了她母亲工作的先进银行，以筹集拯救她垂死父亲所需的高额手术费用。
back_translation: This action-packed story revolves around a 12-year-old girl who, with the help of two friends, robs the high-tech bank where her mother works to raise the money needed for her dying father's expensive surgery.

text: it 's a rosy coming-of-age romp that refuses to see the horror even in the severed heads from the guillotine .
translation: 这是一个充满希望的成长冒险故事，即使在断头台上的 severed heads 也拒绝看到恐怖。
back_translation: This is a hopeful coming-of-age adventure story, where even severed heads on the guillotine refuse to see the horror.

text: offers a pleasant , challenging and quirky puzzle well worth working out .
translation: 提供了一个愉快、具有挑战性和古怪的谜题，非常值得去解答。
back_translation: Provided a pleasant, challenging, and quirky puzzle that is well worth solving.

text: the fetid underbelly of fame has never looked uglier .
translation: 名声的恶臭底层从未看起来如此丑陋。
back_translation: The stench of reputation has never looked so ugly from the bottom.

text: remember when bond had more glamour than clamor ? no more .
translation: 还记得邦德曾经比喧嚣更具魅力的时候吗？不再了。
back_translation: Do you remember when Bond was more charming than the noise? Not anymore.

text: a historical epic with the courage of its convictions about both scope and detail .
translation: 一部充满勇气的历史史诗，既在宏观上又在细节上都坚定信念。
back_translation: A historical epic full of courage, unwavering in both its macro perspective and in the details.

text: three friends get together and bury a box making a pact to open it at midnight at their high school graduation .
translation: 三个朋友聚在一起埋了一个箱子，约定在他们高中毕业的午夜一起打开它。
back_translation: Three friends gathered together to bury a box, making a pact to open it together at midnight after their high school graduation.

text: after spending the night in the wilderness , sarah runs into peter , a survivalist type dressed in full combat gear , who promises to lead her out of the woods .
translation: 在荒野中过了一夜后，莎拉遇到了彼得，一个穿着全套作战装备的求生者，他答应带她走出树林。
back_translation: After spending a night in the wilderness, Sarah encountered Peter, a survivor dressed in full combat gear, who promised to lead her out of the woods.

text: a year after her long time boyfriend showed up at his surprise birthday party with an uninvited date , laura hits rock bottom and decides to try her luck at a dating agency .
translation: 一年后，她的长期男友在他的惊喜生日派对上带来了一个未被邀请的约会对象，劳拉陷入了低谷，决定去约会公司试试运气。
back_translation: A year later, her long-term boyfriend brought an uninvited date to his surprise birthday party, leaving Laura feeling down; she decided to try her luck at a dating agency.

text: given the circumstances , kyle might have been acquitted on the grounds of temporary insanity or perhaps even convicted of the lesser charge of manslaughter , but the fact that a federal policeman was also killed in the shooting , albeit accidentally , sent kyle to marquezas .
translation: 考虑到情况，凯尔可能会因暂时精神失常而被宣判无罪，或甚至被判较轻的过失杀人罪，但由于在射击中一名联邦警察也被意外杀害，这将凯尔送入马克萨斯监狱。
back_translation: Given the circumstances, Kyle may be found not guilty due to temporary insanity, or even sentenced to a lesser charge of involuntary manslaughter. However, because a federal officer was accidentally killed in the shooting, this will lead to Kyle being sent to Maxxus Prison.

text: a beautiful story of love , loss and unexpected reunions , unravels in one weekend .
translation: 一个关于爱情、失落和意想不到重聚的美丽故事，在一个周末中展开。
back_translation: A beautiful story about love, loss, and an unexpected reunion unfolds over a weekend.

text: you do n't know whether to admire the film 's stately nature and call it classicism or be exasperated by a noticeable lack of pace . or both .
translation: 你不知道是应该欣赏这部电影的庄重气质并称其为经典主义，还是因为明显缺乏节奏而感到恼火，或者两者兼而有之。
back_translation: You don't know whether to appreciate the solemn quality of this film and call it classicism or to feel frustrated by its obvious lack of rhythm, or perhaps both.

text: after two years seperated , they are mysteriously joined together to solve a case on spooky island .
translation: 经过两年的分离，他们神秘地再次走到一起，解决一个关于神秘岛的案件。
back_translation: After two years of separation, they mysteriously came together again to solve a case about a mysterious island.

text: a romantic comedy , yes , but one with characters who think and talk about their goals , and are working on hard decisions .
translation: 一部浪漫喜剧，是的，但其中的角色思考并讨论他们的目标，并在做出艰难的决定。
back_translation: A romantic comedy, yes, but the characters think about and discuss their goals and make difficult decisions.

text: and yet , as we discover , these kids are smarter than their actions would let on . . .
translation: 然而，正如我们发现的，这些孩子比他们的行为所表现出来的要聪明。
back_translation: However, as we found out, these children are smarter than their behavior suggests.

text: ripped of her humanity , testud 's christine becomes a working stiff of greek proportions .
translation: 撕掉人性，特斯德的克里斯汀变成了一个希腊比例的劳工。
back_translation: Tearing away humanity, Christine from "The Phantom of the Opera" turned into a laborer of Greek proportions.

text: it 's the kind of pigeonhole-resisting romp that hollywood too rarely provides .
translation: 这是一种不愿被归类的欢闹，好莱坞太少提供这样的作品。
back_translation: This is a kind of revelry that doesn't want to be categorized, and Hollywood offers too few works like this.

text: despite juliet stevenon 's attempt to bring cohesion to pamela 's emotional roller coaster life , it is not enough to give the film the substance it so desperately needs .
translation: 尽管朱丽叶·史蒂文森试图为帕梅拉情感起伏的生活带来连贯性，但这仍然不足以赋予影片所急需的实质。
back_translation: Although Juliette Stevenson strives to bring coherence to Pamela's emotional ups and downs, it still fails to give the film the substance it urgently needs.

text: more of the same from taiwanese auteur tsai ming-liang , which is good news to anyone who 's fallen under the sweet , melancholy spell of this unique director 's previous films .
translation: 来自台湾导演蔡明亮的更多相似作品，对于那些曾被这位独特导演之前的电影所吸引的观众来说，是个好消息。
back_translation: More similar works from Taiwanese director Tsai Ming-liang are great news for audiences who have previously been attracted by this unique director's films.

text: after an assassination attempt on the life of senator padme amidala ( natalie portman ) , jedi obi-wan kenobi ( ewan mcgregor ) and his padawan learner anakin skywalker ( hayden christensen ) are sent to investigate .
translation: 在对参议员帕德梅·阿米达拉（娜塔莉·波特曼）进行暗杀未遂后，绝地武士欧比旺·肯obi（伊wan·麦克格雷戈）和他的学徒阿纳金·天行者（海登·克里斯滕森）被派去调查。
back_translation: After an assassination attempt on Senator Padmé Amidala (Natalie Portman), Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi (Ewan McGregor) and his apprentice Anakin Skywalker (Hayden Christensen) are sent to investigate.

text: when a depressed marketing executive goes to a psychiatrist for help , he discovers the doctor is crazier than he is .
translation: 当一个抑郁的市场营销主管去找精神科医生寻求帮助时，他发现医生比他更疯狂。
back_translation: When a depressed marketing manager goes to see a psychiatrist for help, he finds that the doctor is crazier than he is.

text: although melodramatic and predictable , this romantic comedy explores the friendship between five filipino-americans and their frantic efforts to find love .
translation: 尽管剧情肤浅且可预测，这部浪漫喜剧探讨了五位菲律宾裔美国人之间的友谊以及他们寻找爱情的疯狂努力。
back_translation: Despite the shallow and predictable plot, this romantic comedy explores the friendships among five Filipino Americans and their frantic efforts to find love.

text: throughout this time , their lives have been entwined with the fate of aboriginal people during times of war , disease and controversial government removalist policies .
translation: 在这段时间里，他们的生活与原住民的命运紧密相连，经历了战争、疾病以及有争议的政府迁移政策。
back_translation: During this period, their lives were closely tied to the fate of the indigenous people, experiencing wars, diseases, and controversial government relocation policies.

text: it 's all gratuitous before long , as if schwentke were fulfilling a gross-out quota for an anticipated audience demographic instead of shaping the material to fit the story .
translation: 这一切很快变得毫无意义，仿佛施文特克在为预期的观众群体完成一个粗俗的配额，而不是将材料塑造得与故事相适应。
back_translation: All of this quickly became meaningless, as if Shi Wenteke was fulfilling a vulgar quota for an expected audience rather than molding the material to fit the story.

text: sillier , cuter , and shorter than the first ( as best i remember ) , but still a very good time at the cinema .
translation: 比第一部更傻、更可爱、更短（尽我所记），但在电影院依然非常愉快。
back_translation: Sillier, cuter, and shorter than the first part (as far as I remember), but still very enjoyable in the cinema.

text: but a fictitious geoffrey buonardi , with the same paintings and an inventive back story , can become the darling of the art world .
translation: 但一个虚构的乔弗里·布阿纳尔迪，拥有相同的画作和富有创意的背景故事，可能会成为艺术界的宠儿。
back_translation: But a fictional Geoffrey Buonardi, with the same artworks and a creative backstory, could become a darling of the art world.

text: although the level of the comedy declines as the movie proceeds , there 's no denying the fun of watching de niro and crystal having fun .
translation: 尽管随着电影的推进喜剧的水平下降，但观看德尼罗和克里斯托享受乐趣的过程是无可否认的好玩。
back_translation: Although the level of comedy declines as the movie progresses, the process of watching De Niro and Christo have fun is undeniably enjoyable.

text: resident evil is n't a product of its cinematic predecessors so much as an mtv , sugar hysteria , and playstation cocktail .
translation: 生化危机并不是其电影前辈的产物，而更像是MTV、糖分狂热和PlayStation的鸡尾酒。
back_translation: Resident Evil is not a product of its cinematic predecessors, but rather more like a cocktail of MTV, sugar rushes, and PlayStation.

text: an undistinguished attempt to make a classic theater piece cinematic .
translation: 一个平庸的尝试，将经典戏剧作品改编为电影。
back_translation: A mediocre attempt to adapt a classic dramatic work into a film.

text: clearly in over his head with both assignments , landon is forced to ask jamie for help .
translation: 兰登明显对这两个任务感到束手无策，不得不向杰米求助。
back_translation: Landon clearly felt at a loss with these two tasks and had to turn to Jamie for help.

text: a quirky noir film crammed full of wonderful characters made memorable by excellent acting .
translation: 一部充满奇特风格的黑色电影，里面充满了精彩的角色，这些角色因出色的表演而令人难忘。
back_translation: A noir film full of unique style, featuring精彩的角色 that are unforgettable due to their outstanding performances.

text: `` lovely and amazing is a story about real people . these people are insecure about their lives . they are n't convinced that there 's some inner beauty about them . they see themselves as i suspect most people do , mostly for the flaws . however , these are still
translation: ``可爱而惊人的故事是关于真实的人。这些人对自己的生活感到不安。他们并不相信自己内心有某种美丽。他们看待自己，可能像大多数人一样，主要关注缺陷。然而，这些人依然是
back_translation: ``Cute and amazing stories are about real people. These people feel uneasy about their lives. They do not believe there is some kind of beauty within themselves. They look at themselves, perhaps like most people, mainly focusing on their flaws. However, these people are still...``

text: adolescents will be adequately served by the movie 's sophomoric blend of shenanigans and slapstick , although the more lascivious-minded might be disappointed in the relative modesty of a movie that sports a 'topless tutorial service . '
translation: 青少年将会充分享受到这部电影幼稚的恶作剧和滑稽场景的混合，尽管那些心思更加猥亵的人可能会对这部电影相对保守的表现感到失望，因为它有着“无上装教程服务”。
back_translation: Teenagers will fully enjoy the mix of childish pranks and humorous scenes in this movie, although those with more lewd thoughts may be disappointed by its relatively conservative portrayal, as it features "no top tutorial services."

text: their only solid lead seems to be joanne , a young prostitute , whose own baby provides a link .
translation: 他们唯一的可靠线索似乎是乔安，一个年轻的妓女，她自己的孩子提供了一个关联。
back_translation: Their only reliable lead seems to be Joan, a young prostitute, whose own child provided a connection.

translation: 一个残忍搞笑的青少年喜剧反转，充满了独特的电影技巧和讽刺性的精彩原声带。

text: critics need a good laugh , too , and this too-extreme-for-tv rendition of the notorious mtv show delivers the outrageous , sickening , sidesplitting goods in steaming , visceral heaps .
translation: 评论家们也需要大笑，这部过于极端的电视版本重现了臭名昭著的MTV节目，带来了令人愤慨、令人恶心、令人捧腹的精彩内容，像蒸腾的、充满冲击感的堆积一样。

text: still , as the camp 's highest-ranking american officer , he commands his fellow inmates , keeping a sense of honor alive in a place where honor is easy to destroy , all under the dangerous , ever-watchful eye of ss major wilhelm visser .
translation: 尽管如此，作为营地中最高级的美国军官，他指挥着其他囚犯，在这个荣誉容易被摧毁的地方保持一种荣誉感，所有这一切都在ss少校威尔赫姆·维瑟危险而又时刻关注的目光下进行。

text: the situation brews to a head when a sneak collector , conan ( masterson ) discovers a large collection of perfectly-preserved classic comics , leading the two shops to vie to acquire them , along with a `` villain `` ( elwes ) who hopes to steal them first .

text: with terry in the corner office , you 'll never be late for the morning meeting again .

text: [ moore 's ] better at fingering problems than finding solutions . but though he only scratches the surface , at least he provides a strong itch to explore more .

text: it 's hard to believe that something so short could be so flabby .

text: i am more offended by his lack of faith in his audience than by anything on display here .

text: the movie is a meditation on the love and envy that russia has always felt toward europe , and i wo n't pretend i got more than 30 percent of what was going on .

translation: 它有力气，但没有智慧。

translation: 现在十年过去了，他生活中的希望是找到理想中的女人，一个在他想象中失落的女人。

text: alex bernier ( ledger ) is a member of an arcane order of priests known as carolingians .
translation: 亚历克斯·伯尼尔（账本）是一个被称为加洛林人的神秘教士阶级的成员。

text: an absurd comedy about a parking enforcement officer , who - despite constant abuse from the public - finds truth , honour and serenity in the act of ticketing .
translation: 一部荒诞的喜剧，讲述了一位停车执法官，他尽管受到公众的不断辱骂，却在开罚单的过程中找到了真理、荣誉和宁静。
back_translation: An absurd comedy that tells the story of a parking enforcement officer who, despite being constantly insulted by the public, finds truth, honor, and peace while issuing parking tickets.

text: a sad , superior human comedy played out on the back roads of life .
translation: 在生活的背道上上演了一出悲伤而高人一筹的人类喜剧。

text: director kapur is a filmmaker with a real flair for epic landscapes and adventure , and this is a better film than his earlier english-language movie , the overpraised elizabeth .
translation: 导演卡普尔是一位在史诗风景和冒险作品上有着真正才能的电影制作人，这部电影比他之前被过分赞扬的英语电影《伊丽莎白》要好得多。
back_translation: Director Kapoor is a filmmaker with real talent for epic landscapes and adventure works, and this movie is much better than his previously over-praised English film "Elizabeth."

text: unfolds in a series of achronological vignettes whose cumulative effect is chilling .
translation: 以一系列非按时间顺序排列的小插曲展开，其累积效果令人毛骨悚然。

text: he speaks villon 's poet `` i fell in love with your red hair `` .
translation: 他说的是维永的诗句：“我爱上了你的红发。”

translation: 它从未真正达到沸点，但在大部分运行时间内能够保持良好的微 simmer。
back_translation: It never really reached a boiling point, but it was able to maintain a good micro simmer for most of its running time.

text: john may have been an unfortunate victim forced to watch the brutal murders .
translation: 约翰可能是一个不幸的受害者，被迫目睹了残忍的谋杀。

text: a classy item by a legend who may have nothing left to prove but still has the chops and drive to show how its done .

text: contrived , maudlin and cliche-ridden . . . if this sappy script was the best the contest received , those rejected must have been astronomically bad .
translation: 人为的、过于感伤和充满陈词滥调……如果这个感伤的剧本是比赛中收到的最好作品，那么被拒绝的作品一定是糟糕透顶。
back_translation: Artificial, overly sentimental, and full of cliches... If this sentimental script is the best work received in the competition, then the rejected works must be terrible.

text: set in malaya during the japanese occupation in the 1940s , this film tells the story of a girl , embun , who 's thrown into the forefront of the struggle against the japanese when her freedom-fighter brother , bayu , and father are detained by the japanese .
translation: 这部电影设定在1940年代日本占领下的马来亚，讲述了一个女孩恩本的故事。当她的自由战士兄弟巴尤和父亲被日本人拘留时，她被卷入了对抗日本人的斗争前线。
back_translation: This film is set in 1940s Malaya under Japanese occupation and tells the story of a girl named Enben. When her freedom fighter brother Bayu and father are detained by the Japanese, she becomes involved in the struggle against the Japanese on the front lines.

text: a disfigured pop star confronts the phenomenal devotion of her biggest fan . . .
translation: 一位面部受损的流行歌星面对她最大的粉丝的非凡献身……
back_translation: A pop star with facial injuries faces the extraordinary devotion of her biggest fan...

text: a competent , unpretentious entertainment destined to fill the after-school slot at shopping mall theaters across the country .
translation: 一部合格、朴实无华的娱乐作品，注定要在全国各地的购物中心电影院中填补放学后的时段。
back_translation: A qualified, unpretentious entertainment work is destined to fill the after-school time slots in shopping mall cinemas across the country.

text: . . . perhaps the heaviest , most joyless movie ever made about giant dragons taking over the world .
translation: ……或许是关于巨龙统治世界的最沉重、最无趣的电影。
back_translation: ...perhaps the heaviest and dullest film about dragons ruling the world.

text: fessenden has nurtured his metaphors at the expense of his narrative , but he does display an original talent .
translation: 费森登在叙事上牺牲了比喻，但他确实展现了独特的才华。
back_translation: Fessenden sacrificed metaphor in his narrative, but he did showcase a unique talent.

text: prancing his way through the tailor-made part of a male hooker approaching the end of his vitality , jagger obviously relishes every self-mocking moment .
translation: 在理想化的男性妓男角色接近其生命尽头的过程中，贾格尔显然享受着每一个自嘲的时刻。
back_translation: In the process of the idealized male prostitute character approaching the end of his life, Jagger clearly enjoys every moment of self-mockery.

text: two lost couples find themselves stranded for the night in an old dark house where they are set upon by the family in residence that dabbles in murder , witchcraft , and cannibalism which are just a few of the 1 , 000+ secrets buried in the field behind their house .
translation: 两个失散的情侣在一栋古老阴暗的房子里过夜，却遭遇了住在那里的家庭，他们沉迷于谋杀、巫术和食人族，这只是埋藏在他们房子后面那片田地里1000多个秘密中的一部分。
back_translation: Two separated lovers spend the night in an old, dark house, only to encounter the family that lives there, who are obsessed with murder, witchcraft, and cannibalism, which is just a part of the more than 1,000 secrets buried in the fields behind their house.

text: morrissette has performed a difficult task indeed - he 's taken one of the world 's most fascinating stories and made it dull , lifeless , and irritating .
translation: 莫里塞特确实完成了一项艰巨的任务——他将世界上最迷人的故事之一变得乏味、无生气且令人烦恼。
back_translation: Morissette indeed accomplished a daunting task—he made one of the most captivating stories in the world dull, lifeless, and annoying.

text: after the murder of his beloved wife , danny parker ( val kilmer ) is set adrift in a world where nothing is as it seems .
translation: 在他心爱妻子被杀后，丹尼·帕克（瓦尔·基尔默）在一个看似不再真实的世界中漂泊。
back_translation: After the murder of his beloved wife, Danny Parker (Val Kilmer) drifts through a world that seems no longer real.

text: bloody sunday has the grace to call for prevention rather than to place blame , making it one of the best war movies ever made . it 's a movie that accomplishes so much that one viewing ca n't possibly be enough .
translation: 《血腥星期日》有着呼吁预防而非归咎于人的优雅，使其成为有史以来最优秀的战争电影之一。这是一部成就斐然的电影，一次观看远远不够。
back_translation: "Bloody Sunday" has an elegance that calls for prevention rather than blaming individuals, making it one of the finest war films in history. It is a remarkable achievement, and one viewing is far from enough.

text: [ denis ] might be off her nut , but she can sure make an interesting film , a la davids lynch and cronenberg .
translation: [丹尼斯] 可能有点疯，但她确实能拍出有趣的电影，类似大卫·林奇和克ronenberg的风格。
back_translation: [Denise] might be a bit crazy, but she can indeed make interesting films, similar in style to David Lynch and Cronenberg.

text: he can do anything but when he discovers others in buffalo who are praying , he learns that maybe this job of being god is n't really that easy .
translation: 他可以做任何事情，但当他发现水牛城还有其他人在祈祷时，他意识到，也许做上帝这份工作并不真的那么简单。
back_translation: He can do anything, but when he realized that there were others praying in Buffalo, he understood that maybe being God wasn't really that simple.

text: formula 51 is pretty much quentin tarantino meets guy ritchie , as directed by ronny yu . however , if you like that sort of thing , as i do , you just might have some fun with the chemical imbalance of formula 51 .
translation: 《公式51》基本上是昆汀·塔伦蒂诺与盖·里奇的结合，由罗尼·余执导。不过，如果你喜欢那种风格，像我一样，你可能会在《公式51》的化学失衡中找到一些乐趣。
back_translation: "Formula 51" is essentially a combination of Quentin Tarantino and Guy Ritchie, directed by Ronnie Yu. However, if you enjoy that style, like I do, you might find some enjoyment in the chemical imbalance of "Formula 51."

text: there is an instant chemistry between them , and as they proceed to find out more about each other , we the audience are privy to their innermost thoughts by means of voice-over .
translation: 他们之间立刻产生了一种化学反应，随着他们深入了解彼此，我们观众通过旁白得以知晓他们内心深处的想法。
back_translation: A chemical reaction immediately occurred between them, and as they delved deeper into each other's lives, we, the audience, learned about their innermost thoughts through the narration.

text: special agent rachel anderson is charged with protecting a key witness , richard harper .
translation: 特别探员瑞秋·安德森负责保护关键证人理查德·哈珀。
back_translation: Special Agent Rachel Anderson is responsible for protecting key witness Richard Harper.

text: so anmol returns , not with prize money but with anna and chota chhatri , and others have this wrong notion that anna is just interested in the petty contract money .
translation: 所以安莫尔回来了，不是带着奖金，而是带着安娜和小遮阳伞，其他人却错误地认为安娜只是对那点微薄的合同钱感兴趣。
back_translation: So Amore returned, not with a bonus, but with Anna and a small parasol, while others mistakenly thought that Anna was only interested in that meager contract money.

text: even worse , his influence of a bad las vegas obsessed him of henry having killed his real father douglas .
translation: 更糟糕的是，他对拉斯维加斯的坏影响让他痴迷于亨利杀死自己真实父亲道格拉斯的事。
back_translation: Worse still, his obsession with the bad influence of Las Vegas made him fixate on the fact that Henry killed his real father, Douglas.

text: renee unger is living the life she always hoped for : a little red-brick house in the small town of new russia , ohio , a good husband , a prospering construction business , and a baby on the way .
translation: 蕾妮·昂格过着她一直希望的生活：在俄亥俄州新俄罗斯的小镇上，有一栋小红砖房、一个好丈夫、一家繁荣的建筑公司，以及一个即将出生的宝宝。
back_translation: Renee Ang lives the life she has always hoped for: a small red brick house in the town of New Russia, Ohio, a good husband, a thriving construction company, and an impending baby.

text: stuart 's mother is being over-protective of him , especially when he narrowly escapes injury in a soccer game .
translation: 斯图尔特的母亲对他过于保护，尤其是在他在一场足球比赛中险些受伤的时候。
back_translation: Stuart's mother was overly protective of him, especially when he was almost injured in a football match.

text: reinalda fell hopelessly in love with her long red hair and big good-goods during her days as a french panto teacher and now she will stop at nothing , including the highest office in the land , to be with her always .
translation: 雷纳尔达在她当法语滑稽戏老师的日子里，毫无希望地爱上了她那长长的红发和丰满的身材，现在她誓言不惜一切代价，包括争取最高职位，也要永远和她在一起。
back_translation: Reynalda hopelessly fell in love with her long red hair and voluptuous figure during her days as a French farce teacher, and now she vows to be with her forever at any cost, including striving for the highest position.

text: accuracy and realism are terrific , but if your film becomes boring , and your dialogue is n't smart , then you need to use more poetic license .
translation: 准确性和现实主义非常出色，但如果你的电影变得无聊，且对话不够聪明，那么你需要更多地运用诗意的自由。
back_translation: The accuracy and realism are excellent, but if your movie becomes boring and the dialogue is not clever enough, then you need to use more poetic license.

text: elmo touts his drug as being 51 times stronger than coke . if you 're looking for a tale of brits behaving badly , watch snatch again . it 's 51 times better than this .
translation: 埃尔莫吹嘘他的药物比可卡因强51倍。如果你想看一个英国人行为不端的故事，可以再看看《偷拐搂骗》。它比这个好51倍。
back_translation: Elmo brags that his drug is 51 times stronger than cocaine. If you want to see a story of a British person behaving badly, you can take another look at "The Great British Bake Off." It's 51 times better than this.

text: despite the film 's shortcomings , it 's still a solid effort and a thought-provoking look at idealism gone wrong .
translation: 尽管这部电影有其不足之处，但它仍然是一部扎实的作品，发人深省地探讨了理想主义的误区。
back_translation: Despite its shortcomings, this film is still a solid work that thought-provokingly explores the pitfalls of idealism.

text: as obi-wan 's investigations lead him to kamino , he finds a massive clone army being produced , with a bounty hunter - the last of the mandalorians - named jango fett as the master clone .
translation: 当欧比旺的调查将他引向卡米诺时，他发现正在生产一支庞大的克隆军队，而一位名为詹戈·费特的赏金猎人——最后一位曼达洛人——则是主克隆。
back_translation: When Obi-Wan's investigation leads him to Kamino, he discovers a massive clone army in production, and a bounty hunter named Jango Fett—the last Mandalorian—is the primary clone.

text: at once somber and mysterious , comical and sad . it shows just how lonely a crowded city can be .
translation: 既沉重又神秘，既滑稽又悲伤。它展示了一个拥挤城市可以有多孤独。
back_translation: Both heavy and mysterious, both comical and tragic. It shows how lonely a crowded city can be.

text: a delectable little treat that 's sunny , funny , and far more intelligent than you 'd expect .
translation: 一款美味的小点心，阳光灿烂，幽默搞笑，远比你想象中更聪明。
back_translation: A delicious little treat, sunny and bright, humorous and funny, and far smarter than you might imagine.

text: in keeping with the holiday spirit , the judge gives davey one last chance at redemption-spend the holiday performing community service as the assistant referee for the youth basketball league or go to jail .
translation: 为了保持节日的氛围，法官给了戴维一个最后的救赎机会——在青少年篮球联赛担任助理裁判，进行社区服务，或者入狱。
back_translation: To maintain the festive atmosphere, the judge gave David one last chance for redemption – to serve as an assistant referee in the youth basketball league, perform community service, or go to jail.

text: but with their lives and careers on the brink of devastation , bret 's teammates and family realize that they have to take baseball - and life - back from bret packard , once and for all .
translation: 但随着他们的生活和事业濒临崩溃，布雷特的队友和家人意识到，他们必须彻底地从布雷特·帕卡德手中夺回棒球和生活。
back_translation: But as their lives and careers were on the brink of collapse, Brett's teammates and family realized that they had to completely take back baseball and life from Brett Packard.

text: if h . g . wells had a time machine and could take a look at his kin 's reworked version , what would he say ? 'it looks good , sonny , but you missed the point . '
translation: 如果H·G·威尔斯有一台时间机器，可以看看他后代的改编版本，他会说什么呢？“看起来不错，儿子，但你错过了重点。”
back_translation: If H.G. Wells had a time machine and could see the adaptations of his descendants, what would he say? "Looks good, son, but you missed the point."

text: the soundtrack alone -- the literal pulse of the thing -- will rock you in your seat .
translation: 单单是音轨——事物的真实脉动——就会让你在座位上震撼不已。
back_translation: Just the audio track—the true pulse of things—will leave you shocked in your seat.

text: twohy is not only skilled at building and maintaining suspense , he 's also aware that a cast chock full of experienced character actors is the right fit for a haunted sub flick .
translation: 杜赫不仅擅长制造和维持悬念，他还意识到，一个充满经验丰富的角色演员的阵容非常适合一部幽灵潜艇片。
back_translation: Duhe is not only skilled at creating and maintaining suspense, but he also realizes that a cast filled with experienced character actors is very suitable for a ghost submarine film.

text: this undercover documentary takes you deep into the controversial arena of backyard wrestling where the limits are constantly being tested . . . and
translation: 这部卧底纪录片带你深入备受争议的后院摔跤领域，在这里，界限不断被挑战……
back_translation: This undercover documentary takes you deep into the controversial world of backyard wrestling, where boundaries are constantly being challenged...

text: as underwater ghost stories go , below casts its spooky net out into the atlantic ocean and spits it back , grizzled and charred , somewhere northwest of the bermuda triangle .
translation: 在水下鬼故事中，《下方》将其阴森的网撒向大西洋，并将其吐回，满是灰烬和烧焦的痕迹，某个位置在百慕大三角洲的西北方向。
back_translation: In the underwater ghost story, "Below" casts its eerie net over the Atlantic Ocean and spits it back, full of ashes and charred marks, in a location northwest of the Bermuda Triangle.

text: chilling in its objective portrait of dreary , lost twenty-first century america .
translation: 在其对阴郁迷失的21世纪美国的客观描绘中令人不寒而栗。
back_translation: It is chilling in its objective portrayal of the gloomy and lost America of the 21st century.

text: the girls are treated like outcasts because they have inadvertently wrecked townsville in a superpowered game of tag .
translation: 这些女孩因为在一次超级能力的捉标签游戏中无意间毁坏了汤斯维尔，而被视为被排斥者。
back_translation: These girls are seen as outcasts because they inadvertently destroyed Townsville during a superpower tag game.

text: clever and unflinching in its comic barbs , slap her is a small but rewarding comedy that takes aim at contemporary southern adolescence and never lets up .
translation: 《打她》是一部小而令人满意的喜剧，机智而毫不妥协地讽刺了当代南方青春，始终毫不放松。
back_translation: "Hit Her" is a small yet satisfying comedy that wittily and uncompromisingly satirizes contemporary Southern youth, maintaining its incisiveness throughout.

text: the story is set against a relationship that forms between the american hustler boy and a brazilian teenage girl who must help each other survive the drug gang-controlled slums of rio de janeiro .
translation: 这个故事设定在一个美国骗子男孩与一位巴西少女之间形成的关系中，他们必须互相帮助，以在里约热内卢被毒品帮派控制的贫民区中生存。
back_translation: This story is set in a relationship formed between an American con artist boy and a Brazilian girl, as they must help each other survive in a slum controlled by drug gangs in Rio de Janeiro.

text: too ordinary to restore [ harmon ] to prominence , despite some creepy scenes that evoke childish night terrors , and a praiseworthy attempt to generate suspense rather than gross out the audience .
translation: 太过普通，无法使[哈蒙]重新受到重视，尽管有一些令人毛骨悚然的场景唤起孩童的夜恐，且试图制造紧张气氛的努力值得称赞，而不是让观众感到反感。
back_translation: Too ordinary to make [Harmon] regain attention, although some creepy scenes evoke childhood night terrors, and the attempts to create a tense atmosphere are commendable rather than making the audience feel disgusted.

text: something akin to a japanese alice through the looking glass , except that it seems to take itself far more seriously .
translation: 类似于日本的《爱丽丝镜中奇遇记》，但它似乎更加认真对待自己。
back_translation: Similar to Japan's "Alice's Adventures in Wonderland," but it seems to take itself more seriously.

text: her mother 's friends , who formed a secret society , the ya-ya sisterhood , as children , kidnap siddalee from her new york apartment and take her home to louisiana , where they explain why her mother mistreated her with help from the secret ya-ya scrapbook ( and copious flashbacks ) .
translation: 她母亲的朋友们，作为孩子们组成了一个秘密社团——雅雅姐妹会，绑架了西达丽从她在纽约的公寓，带她回到路易斯安那，在那里他们解释了为什么她的母亲对她不好，并借助秘密的雅雅剪贴簿（以及大量的闪回）。
back_translation: Her mother's friends, as children, formed a secret society called the Yaya Sisterhood, kidnapped Siddhartha from her apartment in New York, and took her back to Louisiana, where they explained why her mother treated her poorly, with the help of a secret Yaya scrapbook (along with a lot of flashbacks).

text: a bit of whimsically warped history elevated by the central performance of ian holm .
translation: 一种略显古怪扭曲的历史，因伊恩·霍尔姆的中心表演而升华。
back_translation: A somewhat quirky and twisted history, elevated by Ian Holm's central performance.

text: aka is the story of a disaffected youth 's search for love , status , and identity in late 1970s britain .
translation: 《aka》是一个关于不满青年在1970年代末的英国寻找爱情、地位和身份的故事。
back_translation: "Aka" is a story about dissatisfied youth in late 1970s Britain searching for love, status, and identity.

text: due to a botched robbery attempt , a ruthless romanian barbarian is somehow resurrected in modern day new york and begins wreaking havok on a small manhattan art-house .
translation: 由于一次失败的抢劫企图，一个残忍的罗马尼亚野蛮人在现代纽约意外复活，并开始在曼哈顿的一家小艺术馆里制造混乱。
back_translation: Due to a failed robbery attempt, a cruel Romanian savage unexpectedly resurrects in modern-day New York and starts causing chaos in a small art gallery in Manhattan.

text: fans of the tv series will be disappointed , and everyone else will be slightly bored .
translation: 电视剧的粉丝会感到失望，而其他人则会有些无聊。
back_translation: Fans of the TV series may feel disappointed, while others might find it a bit boring.

text: investors from around the world are intrigued to bring money to the project heavily backed by patricia .
translation: 来自世界各地的投资者对这个得到帕特里夏大力支持的项目充满兴趣。
back_translation: Investors from all over the world are very interested in this project, which has received strong support from Patricia.

text: they have one request - their bosses head on a plate .
translation: 他们有一个要求 - 他们老板的人头在盘子里。
back_translation: They have a demand - they want their boss's head on a platter.

text: will give many ministers and bible-study groups hours of material to discuss . but mainstream audiences will find little of interest in this film , which is often preachy and poorly acted .
translation: 这部电影将为许多牧师和圣经学习小组提供数小时的讨论材料。但主流观众会发现这部电影兴趣不大，因为它往往过于说教且表演拙劣。
back_translation: This movie will provide hours of discussion material for many pastors and Bible study groups. However, mainstream audiences may find it less interesting, as it often comes off as overly preachy and features poor performances.

text: it 's also curious to note that this film , like the similarly ill-timed antitrust , is easily as bad at a fraction the budget .
translation: 有趣的是，这部电影和时间安排同样糟糕的反垄断片相比，预算少得多却同样糟糕。
back_translation: Interestingly, this movie has a much lower budget but is equally bad when compared to the antitrust film, which also has a poorly arranged schedule.

text: tambor and clayburgh make an appealing couple M-^W he 's understated and sardonic , she 's appealingly manic and energetic . both deserve better .
translation: 坦博和克莱伯赫是一对迷人的情侣，他低调而讽刺，她迷人而充满活力。两人都值得更好的。
back_translation: Tambo and Kleberhe are a charming couple; he is understated and sarcastic, while she is captivating and energetic. Both deserve better.

text: it uses some of the figures from the real-life story to portray themselves in the film . the result is a powerful , naturally dramatic piece of low-budget filmmaking .
translation: 它利用了一些真实故事中的人物来在影片中表现自己。结果是一部强有力、自然戏剧性的低预算电影。
back_translation: It utilizes characters from some real stories to express itself in the film. The result is a powerful, naturally dramatic low-budget movie.

text: what could have been a pointed little chiller about the frightening seductiveness of new technology loses faith in its own viability and succumbs to joyless special-effects excess .
translation: 本可以是一部关于新技术令人恐惧的诱惑的尖锐小惊悚片，却对自己的可行性失去了信心，沦陷于毫无乐趣的特效过度之中。
back_translation: It could have been a sharp little thriller about the frightening allure of new technology, but it lost confidence in its own feasibility and fell into the trap of excessive, joyless special effects.

text: `` maid in manhattan `` is a charmer , a pc `` pretty woman `` that ditches the odious prostitution theme for class commentary
translation: 《马德里女佣》是一部迷人的影片，是一部“漂亮女人”的类似作品，抛弃了令人厌恶的卖淫主题，转而进行阶级评论。
back_translation: "Madame Madrid" is a captivating film, a work similar to "Pretty Woman," which abandons the distasteful theme of prostitution and instead engages in class commentary.

text: when algren is injuried and captured by the samurai , learns about their warrior honor code from katsumoto , the samurai & # 180 ; s leader and decide which side of the conflict he wants to be on . . .
translation: 当阿尔格伦受伤被武士俘获时，他从武士首领胜元那里学习到他们的战士荣誉法则，并决定他想站在哪一方。
back_translation: When Alglen was injured and captured by the samurai, he learned about their warrior code of honor from the samurai leader, Masamoto, and decided which side he wanted to stand on.

text: a band of college students go to a rave on a mysterious island and get more than they bargained for when they find themselves stalked by killer zombies and terrifying creatures intent on feasting on the flesh of the living .
translation: 一群大学生去一个神秘的岛屿参加狂欢派对，但他们所得到的却超出了他们的预期，因为他们发现自己被杀手僵尸和可怕生物追踪，这些生物意图吞噬活人的肉体。
back_translation: A group of college students goes to a mysterious island to attend a wild party, but what they encounter exceeds their expectations, as they find themselves being pursued by killer zombies and terrifying creatures that intend to devour the flesh of the living.

text: while shooting an engagement party , he attempts to make a connection with jen , the beautiful sister of the bride .
translation: 在拍摄订婚派对时，他试图与新娘的美丽姐姐珍建立联系。
back_translation: During the filming of the engagement party, he tried to connect with the beautiful sister of the bride, Jane.

text: an unintentionally surreal kid 's picture . . . in which actors in bad bear suits enact a sort of inter-species parody of a vh1 behind the music episode .
translation: 一幅无意中超现实的儿童画……画中演员们穿着糟糕的熊装，表演一种跨物种的模仿，仿佛是VH1音乐幕后故事的一集。
back_translation: An unintentional surreal children's drawing... The actors in the painting are wearing terrible bear costumes, performing a kind of interspecies mimicry, as if it's an episode of VH1's Behind the Music.

text: goes on and on to the point of nausea .
translation: 无休止，直到恶心为止。
back_translation: Endless, until it makes one sick.

text: neither as scary-funny as tremors nor demented-funny as starship troopers , the movie is n't tough to take as long as you 've paid a matinee price .
translation: 既不如《惊声尖叫》那么可怕搞笑，也不如《星际争霸》那么疯狂搞笑，这部电影只要你支付了下午场票价，就不难接受。
back_translation: This movie is neither as scary and humorous as "Scream" nor as crazily funny as "Starship Troopers"; it's quite acceptable as long as you pay for the afternoon ticket.

text: i ca n't say that i liked homeboy ; it 'd be more accurate to say that i found it intriguing , bizarre , dogma-like in spots - and quite truthful , in its way .
translation: 我不能说我喜欢这个家伙；说我觉得它很吸引人、奇怪、在某些地方显得教条式，更为准确——并且在某种程度上非常真实。
back_translation: I can't say I like this guy; it's more accurate to say that I find him attractive, strange, somewhat dogmatic in certain ways, and to some extent, very genuine.

text: until then , he spends most of his time watching sloppy tearjerkers on video .
translation: 直到那时，他的大部分时间都是在看那些令人流泪的低质量电影。
back_translation: Until then, he spent most of his time watching those tear-jerking low-quality movies.

text: with a rare gift for melding subjectivity with biographical facts , m & # 225 ; rton brings sabina spielrein back to life , body and soul .
translation: 凭借将主观性与传记事实融合的罕见才能，马顿将萨宾娜·斯皮尔里恩的灵魂与身体重新带回生命。
back_translation: With a rare talent for blending subjectivity with biographical facts, Mardon brings the soul and body of Sabina Spielrein back to life.

text: while it does n't expose any new truths about the problems posed by reaching middle age , it reflects wisely on the truths that already exist .
translation: 虽然它没有揭示关于迈入中年所带来的问题的新真相，但它对已经存在的真相进行了明智的反思。
back_translation: Although it does not reveal new truths about the challenges of entering middle age, it provides insightful reflections on the truths that already exist.

text: if borstal boy is n't especially realistic , it is an engaging nostalgia piece .
translation: 如果《少年感化院男孩》并不是特别现实主义，它是一部引人入胜的怀旧作品。
back_translation: If "The Boy at the Juvenile Correctional Facility" is not particularly realistic, it is an engaging nostalgic piece.

text: all of this changes when he finds a large mysterious package left on his doorstep .
translation: 这一切在他发现一个留在门口的大型神秘包裹时发生了变化。
back_translation: Everything changed when he discovered a large mysterious package left at the door.

text: the feature-length stretch . . . strains the show 's concept .
translation: 这部长片的时长……让节目概念承受压力。
back_translation: The length of this feature film... puts pressure on the program concept.

text: unambitious writing emerges in the movie , using a plot that could have come from an animated-movie screenwriting textbook .
translation: 这部电影中出现了缺乏雄心的写作，情节似乎来自于动画电影剧本教材。
back_translation: The film features a lack of ambition in its writing, with a plot that seems to come from a screenplay textbook for animated films.

text: so fiendishly cunning that even the most jaded cinema audiences will leave the auditorium feeling dizzy , confused , and totally disorientated . not to mention absolutely refreshed .
translation: 如此狡猾，以至于即使是最疲惫的电影观众也会在离开放映厅时感到头晕、困惑和完全失去方向感，更别提完全焕然一新了。
back_translation: So cunning that even the most exhausted moviegoers feel dizzy, confused, and completely disoriented when they leave the screening room, let alone completely refreshed.

text: feels like the grittiest movie that was ever made for the lifetime cable television network .
translation: 感觉就像是有史以来最 gritty 的电影，是为生活频道制作的。
back_translation: It feels like the grittiest movie ever made is produced for the Lifestyle Channel.

text: an entertaining quasi-critique of modern manners whose comedy arises out of its gravity -- and a winning performance by ricardo darin .
translation: 一部富有娱乐性的现代礼仪半批评作品，其喜剧效果源于其严肃性——以及里卡多·达林的精彩表演。
back_translation: A humorous modern etiquette semi-critical piece, its comedic effect stems from its seriousness—along with Ricardo Darín's brilliant performance.

text: it ai n't art , by a long shot , but unlike last year 's lame musketeer , this dumas adaptation entertains .
translation: 这不是艺术，远非艺术，但与去年的无聊穆斯凯特人不同，这部大仲马的改编作品令人娱乐。
back_translation: This is not art, far from it, but unlike last year's dull Musketeers, this adaptation of Dumas is entertaining.

text: devastated by her husband 's death from a drug overdose , philippa ( played by cate blanchett ) , a british teacher living in turin , italy , tries to bring justice to the biggest drug dealer in turin when the local police ignore her information about him .
translation: 菲利帕（由凯特·布兰切特饰演），一位居住在意大利都灵的英国教师，因丈夫因药物过量而去世而感到 devastated。当当地警方忽视她对都灵最大毒贩的信息时，她试图为丈夫争取正义。
back_translation: Philippa, played by Cate Blanchett, is a British teacher living in Turin, Italy, who feels devastated after the death of her husband from a drug overdose. When the local police ignore her information about Turin's biggest drug dealer, she tries to seek justice for her husband.

text: once they begin towing the ghost ship towards harbor , a series of bizarre ocurrences happen and the group becomes trapped inside the ship , which they soon learn is inhabited by a demonic creature .
translation: 一旦他们开始拖拽幽灵船驶向港口，一系列奇怪的事件发生，众人被困在船内，他们很快发现船上居住着一个恶魔生物。
back_translation: Once they started to drag the ghost ship toward the harbor, a series of strange events occurred. Everyone was trapped inside the ship, and they soon discovered that a demonic creature resided aboard.

text: the young man find herbert down in his jail cell and learns for himself just what the re-agent is capable of .
translation: 年轻人找到赫伯特，在他的监狱牢房里，亲自了解到这剂试剂的能力。
back_translation: The young man found Herbert and personally learned about the capabilities of this reagent in his prison cell.

text: we just do n't really care too much about this love story . in that setting , their struggle is simply too ludicrous and borderline insulting .
translation: 我们对这个爱情故事并不是很在乎。在那种背景下，他们的挣扎简直太可笑，几乎是对人性的侮辱。
back_translation: We don't really care about this love story. In that context, their struggles are simply ridiculous, almost an insult to humanity.

text: a stone building , newly restored , stands in the clear light of the autumnal equinox .
translation: 一座新近修复的石头建筑矗立在秋分的明亮光线中。
back_translation: A newly restored stone building stands in the bright light of the autumn equinox.

text: struggling to fit in , jonathan decides to stop going to church only to be pursued by the members of the local singles ward who want to reactivate him .
translation: 在努力融入中，乔纳森决定不再去教堂，结果却被当地单身教区的成员追逐，他们想要让他重新回归。
back_translation: In his efforts to fit in, Jonathan decided to stop going to church, but as a result, he was pursued by members of the local single parish who wanted him to return.

text: may take its sweet time to get wherever it 's going , but if you have the patience for it , you wo n't feel like it 's wasted yours .
translation: 可能需要一些时间才能到达目的地，但如果你有足够的耐心，你不会觉得这段时间被浪费了。
back_translation: It may take some time to reach your destination, but if you have enough patience, you won't feel that this time is wasted.

text: it 's more enjoyable than i expected , though , and that 's because the laughs come from fairly basic comedic constructs . cinematic pratfalls given a working over . the cast is spot on and the mood is laid back .
translation: 尽管如此，这比我预期的更令人愉快，因为笑点源自相当基本的喜剧结构。电影中的滑稽跌倒得到了很好的处理。演员阵容恰到好处，气氛轻松。
back_translation: Nevertheless, this was more enjoyable than I expected, as the humor stems from fairly basic comedic structures. The comedic falls in the film are well-executed. The cast is just right, and the atmosphere is relaxed.

text: even if the naipaul original remains the real masterpiece , the movie possesses its own languorous charm .
translation: 即使奈保尔的原作仍然是伟大的杰作，电影本身却拥有它独特的慵懒魅力。
back_translation: Even though Naipaul's original work is still a great masterpiece, the film itself has its unique lazy charm.

text: the young man looks for comfort in his father , but he 's to occupied with winning the eurovision song contest .
translation: 年轻人寻找父亲的安慰，但父亲却忙于争夺欧洲歌唱大赛的冠军。
back_translation: A young person seeks comfort from their father, but the father is busy competing for the championship of the Eurovision Song Contest.

text: everything goes wrong when they try to rob a bank , though they meet mille , who puts them onto a new trail , and peter and martin also make a contribution .
translation: 当他们试图抢劫一家银行时，一切都出错了，尽管他们遇到了米尔，米尔给他们启发了新的线索，而彼得和马丁也做出了贡献。
back_translation: Everything went wrong when they tried to rob a bank, although they encountered Mill, who inspired them with new clues, and Peter and Martin also contributed.

text: . . . watching this film nearly provoked me to take my own life . and if the hours wins 'best picture ' i just might .
translation: ……观看这部电影几乎让我想要自杀。如果《阳光灿烂的日子》赢得“最佳影片”，我真的可能会。
back_translation: ...Watching this movie almost made me want to commit suicide. If "In the Heat of the Sun" wins "Best Picture," I might really do it.

text: the results are as giddy , painful , sad and loving as real life tends to be .
translation: 结果既欢欣鼓舞，又痛苦、悲伤和充满爱意，正如现实生活往往会是的那样。
back_translation: The result is both uplifting and painful, sad and full of love, just as real life often is.

text: talk to her manages to be female-centric even as it explores the lives of men .
translation: 《与她对话》尽管探讨了男性的生活，但仍然以女性为中心。
back_translation: "Talking to Her" explores the lives of men, but still centers around women.

text: she ca n't get in there because te door is locked .
translation: 她进不去那里，因为门锁上了。
back_translation: She can't get in there because the door is locked.

text: the four girls are teased and discriminated against by their other colleagues and are finally fired by their beautiful , evil boss christine .
translation: 四个女孩被其他同事嘲笑和歧视，最终被她们美丽而邪恶的老板克里斯汀解雇。
back_translation: Four girls were mocked and discriminated against by their colleagues, and were ultimately fired by their beautiful yet ruthless boss, Christine.

text: in a botched attempt to organize a protest against their `` slave labor `` , the women take over the prison - a rare glimpse of the effects of the prison industrial complex on female inmates .
translation: 在一次失败的抗议“奴隶劳动”的尝试中，女性接管了监狱——罕见地揭示了监狱工业综合体对女性囚犯的影响。
back_translation: In a failed attempt to protest "slave labor," women took over the prison—rarely revealing the impact of the prison industrial complex on female inmates.

text: he trades his grandmother 's only treasure for a video game ; he throws his food and he throws tantrums .
translation: 他把奶奶唯一的宝物换成了一款电子游戏；他扔掉食物，还发脾气。
back_translation: He exchanged his grandmother's only treasure for a video game; he threw away food and even lost his temper.

text: kids surely will like it . and for adults , it 's perfectly watchable in a rugrats-y sort of way .
translation: 孩子们肯定会喜欢这个。对于成年人来说，这部作品以一种《小阿呆》的方式完全可以观看。
back_translation: The kids will definitely like this. For adults, this work can be enjoyed in a completely "Little Fool" way.

text: will these four be able to move on with their lives and accept the fact that it 's time to start acting their age ?
translation: 这四个人能否继续他们的生活，并接受是时候开始表现出他们的年龄这个事实？
back_translation: Can these four people continue their lives and accept the fact that it is time to start showing their age?

text: later he is catering at a party featuring a wise old guru , who gets drunk and passes out .
translation: 后来，他在一个聚会上提供餐饮，聚会中有一位年长的智者，他喝醉了并昏倒了。
back_translation: Later, at a party where he provided catering, there was an elderly wise man who got drunk and passed out.

text: the inhospitability of the land emphasizes the spare precision of the narratives and helps to give them an atavistic power , as if they were tales that had been handed down since the beginning of time .
translation: 土地的恶劣环境强调了叙述的简洁精确，赋予它们一种原始的力量，仿佛这些故事是自古以来传承下来的。
back_translation: The harsh environment of the land emphasizes the brevity and precision of the narratives, giving them a primal strength, as if these stories have been passed down since ancient times.

text: a committed , intelligent and fascinating piece of work with no irony about it .
translation: 一部投入、聪明且引人入胜的作品，毫无讽刺之意。
back_translation: A devoted, clever, and engaging work, without any irony.

text: in an era when the country 's first line of defense , intelligence , is more important than ever , comes an explosive thriller starring al pacino and colin farrell that for the first time opens the cia 's infamous closed doors and gives an insider 's view into the agency : how trainees are recruited , how they are prepared for the spy game , and what they learn to survive .
translation: 在国家第一道防线——情报——比以往任何时候都更加重要的时代，一部由阿尔·帕西诺和科林·法瑞尔主演的惊悚片震撼来袭，这部影片首次揭开了中央情报局臭名昭著的闭门内幕，展示了机构的内部视角：如何招募特工，如何为间谍游戏做好准备，以及他们学习生存的方式。
back_translation: In an era where national intelligence is more important than ever as the first line of defense, a thriller starring Al Pacino and Colin Farrell has arrived with a shocking impact. This film unveils the notorious behind-closed-doors secrets of the CIA for the first time, showcasing an inside perspective of the agency: how they recruit agents, how they prepare for the spy game, and the ways in which they learn to survive.

text: dori is 50 years old , actually the exact age of ben 's mother .
translation: 多莉50岁，实际上是本母亲的确切年龄。
back_translation: Dolly is 50 years old, which is actually the exact age of her mother.

text: a brutally honest documentary about a much anticipated family reunion that goes wrong thanks to culture shock and a refusal to empathize with others .
translation: 一部无情的纪录片，讲述了一场备受期待的家庭团聚因文化冲击和拒绝理解他人而变得糟糕的故事。
back_translation: A ruthlessly honest documentary tells the story of a highly anticipated family reunion that goes awry due to cultural clashes and a refusal to understand one another.

text: [ cuarM-sn has ] created a substantive movie out of several cliched movie structures : the road movie , the coming-of-age movie , and the teenage sex comedy .
translation: [ cuarM-sn 已 ] 通过几个陈词滥调的电影结构创造了一部实质性的电影：公路电影、成长电影和青春性爱喜剧。
back_translation: [ cuarM-sn already ] created a substantial film through several clichéd movie structures: a road movie, a coming-of-age film, and a teen sex comedy.

text: add yet another hat to a talented head , clooney 's a good director .
translation: 再给这位才华横溢的人增加一顶帽子，库尼是一位优秀的导演。
back_translation: Let's give this talented person another hat, Koony is an excellent director.

text: scooby doo is surely everything its fans are hoping it will be , and in that sense is a movie that deserves recommendation .
translation: 《史酷比》无疑是粉丝们所希望的一切，从这个意义上来说，这部电影值得推荐。
back_translation: "Scooby-Doo" is undoubtedly everything that fans have hoped for, and in this sense, this movie is worth recommending.

text: set in the rugged mountains and lush , untamed forests of the pacific northwest , tribe of joseph is an engrossing tale of troubled youths plucked from the familiarity of their urban lives and transported into the alien isolation and life or death danger of a survivalist existence .
translation: 《约瑟夫部落》的故事设定在太平洋西北部崎岖的山脉和郁郁葱葱、未经驯化的森林中，讲述了一群被从熟悉的城市生活中挑选出来的困扰少年，他们被带入一个陌生的孤立环境，面临生死存亡的求生挑战。
back_translation: The story of "The Joseph Tribe" is set in the rugged mountains and lush, untamed forests of the Pacific Northwest, telling the tale of a group of troubled youths who have been taken from their familiar urban lives and brought into a strange, isolated environment, facing survival challenges that test their very existence.

text: people are becoming petrified , and no-one knows what is doing it .
translation: 人们变得麻木，没有人知道是什么导致的。
back_translation: People have become numb, and no one knows what caused it.

text: despite the opulent lushness of every scene , the characters never seem to match the power of their surroundings .
translation: 尽管每个场景都富丽堂皇，角色们似乎从未能与周围的气势相匹配。
back_translation: Although each scene is magnificent, the characters seem never to match the grandeur around them.

text: along the way , his vendetta quest leads to the son of howard saint ( travolta ) , a former underworld boss who had gone straight , but the death of his son leads him to get back into crime , and he 's gunning for the punisher .
translation: 在这个过程中，他的复仇之路引导他来到霍华德·圣父亲（特拉沃尔塔）的儿子身边，霍华德曾是一个已经洗白的黑帮老大，但他儿子的死让他重回犯罪之路，目标锁定了惩罚者。
back_translation: In this process, his path of revenge leads him to the son of Howard Saint (John Travolta), who was once a reformed crime boss. However, the death of his son pushes him back into a life of crime, with the Punisher as his target.

text: less worrying about covering all the drama in frida 's life and more time spent exploring her process of turning pain into art would have made this a superior movie .
translation: 少关注弗里达生活中的所有戏剧，更多地探讨她将痛苦转化为艺术的过程，这样会使这部电影更显优越。
back_translation: Rather than focusing on all the drama in Frida's life, exploring her process of transforming pain into art would make the film more superior.

text: when mcconaughey 's girlfriend ( played by kate beckinsale ) becomes pregnant , the pair are fearful that the baby will inherit the oldman gene .
translation: 当麦康纳的女友（由凯特·贝金塞尔饰演）怀孕时，这对情侣担心宝宝会遗传老人的基因。
back_translation: When McConaughey's girlfriend (played by Kate Beckinsale) becomes pregnant, the couple worries that the baby will inherit the genes of the elderly.

text: the doctor realizes it' 's a love virus so he advises him to woo the girl somehow , not realizing that munnabhai has fallen for none other than his own younger sister komal .
translation: 医生意识到这是一种爱情病毒，所以他建议他以某种方式追求那个女孩，却没有意识到Munnabhai爱上了他自己的小妹妹Komal。
back_translation: The doctor realizes that this is a love virus, so he suggests that he pursue the girl in some way, not realizing that Munnabhai has fallen in love with his own little sister, Komal.

text: nelson 's intentions are good , but the end result does no justice to the story itself . it 's horribly depressing and not very well done .
translation: 纳尔逊的意图是好的，但最终的结果对故事本身没有公正的反映。它令人非常沮丧，并且做得不是很好。
back_translation: Nelson's intentions were good, but the final result does not fairly reflect the story itself. It is quite frustrating and not well done.

text: comes off like a rejected abc afterschool special , freshened up by the dunce of a screenwriting 101 class . . . . designed to provide a mix of smiles and tears , `` crossroads `` instead provokes a handful of unintentional howlers and numerous yawns .
translation: 像是一部被拒绝的ABC课后特辑，经过101班的笨蛋编剧重新包装……旨在带来笑声和眼泪的《十字路口》却引发了一些意想不到的笑料和许多哈欠。
back_translation: Like a rejected ABC after-school special, repackaged by the foolish screenwriters of Class 101... "Crossroads," intended to bring laughter and tears, instead evokes some unexpected laughs and many yawns.

text: a violent initiation rite for the audience , as much as it is for angelique , the [ opening ] dance guarantees karmen 's enthronement among the cinema 's memorable women .
translation: 这是一场对观众的暴力入会仪式，正如对安洁莉克一样，开场舞确保了卡门在电影令人难忘的女性中登基。
back_translation: This is a violent initiation ritual for the audience, just like for Angelique, where the opening dance ensures that Carmen is crowned among the unforgettable women of the film.

text: these diverse motivations come together creating a big problemo .
translation: 这些不同的动机结合在一起形成了一个大问题。
back_translation: These different motivations combine to form a big problem.

text: based on frances mayes ' memoir of the same name .
translation: 根据弗朗西斯·梅耶斯同名的回忆录。
back_translation: Based on the memoir of the same name by Frances Meyer.

text: a mythic motorcycle tale of father and son `` , this is the story of manuel galloway ( fishburne ) , also known as `` the king of cali `` , the president of a motorcycle club whose members are all african-american men , mostly white-collar workers who exchange their suits and ties at night and on weekends for leather outfits and motorcycle helmets .
translation: 这是一个关于父子关系的传奇摩托车故事，这是曼纽尔·加洛韦（费什伯恩饰）即“加利福尼亚之王”的故事，他是一家摩托车俱乐部的会长，俱乐部的成员都是非裔美国男性，主要是白领工人，他们在夜间和周末将西装和领带换成皮革服装和摩托车头盔。
back_translation: This is a legendary motorcycle story about a father-son relationship, the story of Manuel Galloway (played by Fishburne), also known as "King of California." He is the president of a motorcycle club whose members are African American men, primarily white-collar workers who swap their suits and ties for leather outfits and motorcycle helmets at night and on weekends.

text: the only life he 's known is as a gigolo , working for his mother , but he wants to leave that behind .
translation: 他所知道的唯一生活就是作为一个吉格罗，为他的母亲工作，但他想把这一切抛在脑后。
back_translation: The only life he knows is as a gigolo, working for his mother, but he wants to leave it all behind.

text: having an affair with his girlfriend 's professor forces him to make difficult decisions about love , friendship , career , and the direction his life should take .
translation: 与他女友的教授发生恋情迫使他对爱情、友谊、事业以及他人生的方向做出艰难的决定。
back_translation: His affair with his girlfriend's professor forces him to make difficult decisions about love, friendship, career, and the direction of his life.

text: beth 's style is further cramped by the responsibilities of single motherhood .
translation: 贝丝的风格因单身母亲的责任而更加受限。
back_translation: Beth's style is more restricted due to the responsibilities of being a single mother.

text: but will 's hope of a continued bachelorhood is interrupted when he meets 12-year old marcus , in many ways his complete opposite .
translation: 但在他遇到12岁的马库斯时，'s希望继续单身的生活被打断了，马库斯在许多方面与他完全相反。
back_translation: But when he met 12-year-old Marcus, his hope of continuing a single life was interrupted, as Marcus was completely the opposite of him in many ways.

text: mel cobb leads a lonely existence in an apartment filled with clutter , his only contact with the outside world being as a weekend tele-marketer for a start-up newspaper which features stories on city road , bridge and tunnel construction workers in order to alleviate road rage among motorists who are stuck in traffic .
translation: 梅尔·科布在一个杂乱的公寓中过着孤独的生活，他与外界的唯一接触是作为一家初创报纸的周末电话推销员，该报纸专门报道城市道路、桥梁和隧道建设工人的故事，旨在缓解被堵在交通中的司机的路怒症。
back_translation: Mel Cobb lived a lonely life in a cluttered apartment, with his only contact with the outside world being a weekend telemarketer for a startup newspaper that focused on the stories of construction workers on city roads, bridges, and tunnels, aimed at alleviating road rage for drivers stuck in traffic.

text: the characters are never more than sketches . . . which leaves any true emotional connection or identification frustratingly out of reach .
translation: 这些角色从来不超过草图……这使得任何真正的情感联系或认同令人沮丧地遥不可及。
back_translation: These characters never go beyond sketches... making any real emotional connection or identification frustratingly out of reach.

text: the best laid plans of hung-over boys meet a florist with a cricket bat in this morning after adventure resulting in an unexpected outcome for all .
translation: 宿醉男孩的精心计划与一位手持板球棒的花店老板相遇，这场晨后的冒险让所有人都意想不到地得到了结果。
back_translation: The carefully planned escapade of the hungover boy encounters a florist wielding a cricket bat, resulting in an unexpected outcome for everyone in this morning adventure.

text: brookdale has another , more lucrative facet ; a safe harbour for the chronically drug-addicted rich and famous , especially the sons and daughters of the above , whose families have tried everything .
translation: 布鲁克代尔还有另一个更有利可图的方面；为慢性吸毒的富人和名人提供一个安全港，尤其是那些家庭已尝试过一切的富人及名人的子女。
back_translation: Brookdale also has another more lucrative aspect: providing a safe haven for wealthy and famous individuals struggling with chronic substance abuse, especially for the children of the rich and famous whose families have tried everything.

text: the cast has a high time , but de broca has little enthusiasm for such antique pulp .
translation: 演员们玩得很开心，但德布罗卡对这种古老的庸俗作品没什么热情。
back_translation: The actors had a great time, but De Broca had little enthusiasm for this old and mediocre work.

text: may reawaken discussion of the kennedy assassination but this fictional film looks made for cable rather than for the big screen .
translation: 可能会重新引发对肯尼迪刺杀案的讨论，但这部虚构的电影看起来更像是为有线电视制作的，而不是大银幕。
back_translation: It may reignite discussions about the Kennedy assassination, but this fictional movie seems more suited for cable television rather than the big screen.

text: only two words will tell you what you know when deciding to see it : anthony . hopkins .
translation: 安东尼·霍普金斯
back_translation: Anthony Hopkins

text: if much of me without you strikes a familiar chord , it also intelligently captures the difficulties that can disrupt even a close friendship .
translation: 如果《没有你的我》中的许多部分让你感到熟悉，它也聪明地捕捉到可能干扰即使是密切友谊的困难。
back_translation: If many parts of "Without You" feel familiar to you, it also cleverly captures the difficulties that can disrupt even close friendships.

text: their plan is to take jason back home to crystal lake and have both freddy and jason destroy each other .
translation: 他们的计划是把杰森带回水晶湖，让弗雷迪和杰森互相毁灭。
back_translation: Their plan is to bring Jason back to Crystal Lake and have Freddy and Jason destroy each other.

text: rarely do films come along that are as intelligent , exuberant , and moving as monsoon wedding .
translation: 很少有电影像《季风婚礼》那样聪明、充满活力和感人。
back_translation: Few films are as smart, vibrant, and moving as "Monsoon Wedding."

text: we also catch a glimpse of the band 's ideas about performance from the blend of footage from concerts , television , music videos , and other media .
translation: 我们还从演唱会、电视、音乐视频和其他媒体混合的影像中窥见了乐队对表演的想法。
back_translation: We also got a glimpse into the band's thoughts on performance through mixed visuals from concerts, television, music videos, and other media.

text: the jew ( shylock ) has a long memory of oppression , but revenge is not so sweet .
translation: 犹太人（夏洛克）对压迫有着悠久的记忆，但复仇并不那么甜蜜。
back_translation: Jews (Shylock) have a long memory of oppression, but revenge is not so sweet.

text: thirty years ago , it would have been groundbreaking . now it 's just tired .
translation: 三十年前，这将是一个突破性的成就。现在它只是显得疲惫。
back_translation: Thirty years ago, this would have been a groundbreaking achievement. Now it just seems tired.

text: although tender and touching , the movie would have benefited from a little more dramatic tension and some more editing .
translation: 虽然温馨感人，但这部电影如果能增加一些戏剧张力和更多的剪辑效果会更好。
back_translation: Although it is warm and touching, this movie would be better if it could add some dramatic tension and more editing effects.

text: is this dead visitor all in keith 's head or is she truly a mother ghost ?
translation: 这个死去的访客是在基思的头脑中，还是她真的一个母亲的鬼魂？
back_translation: Is this deceased visitor in Keith's mind, or is she really the ghost of a mother?

text: disappointing in comparison to other recent war moviesM-^Eor any other john woo flick for that matter .
translation: 与其他最近的战争电影相比，这部让人失望，甚至比任何其他的吴宇森电影都要差。
back_translation: Compared to other recent war movies, this one is disappointing, even worse than any other John Woo film.

text: easily stands alongside such throat-clutching classics of cinematic political action as z and the battle of algiers .
translation: 轻松与《Z》和《阿尔及尔之战》等令人窒息的经典政治动作电影齐名。
back_translation: It stands alongside classic political action films like "Z" and "The Battle of Algiers" with ease.

text: the film is like sitting in a downtown cafM-i , overhearing a bunch of typical late-twenty-somethings natter on about nothing , and desperately wishing you could change tables .
translation: 这部电影就像坐在市中心的咖啡馆里，听到一群典型的二十多岁的年轻人喋喋不休地谈论一些无关紧要的事情，拼命希望自己能换个桌子。
back_translation: This movie is like sitting in a café in the city center, listening to a group of typical twenty-somethings chattering endlessly about trivial matters, desperately wishing you could switch tables.

text: a young aboriginal man max stuart , was convicted of murder in the light of questionable evidence presented , of nine year old mary hattam near ceduna , on the south coast of australia .
translation: 一名年轻的土著男子马克斯·斯图尔特，在澳大利亚南海岸的塞杜纳因呈现出可疑的证据而被判谋杀九岁女孩玛丽·哈塔姆。
back_translation: A young Indigenous man, Max Stewart, has been convicted of murdering nine-year-old Mary Hatham in Ceduna on the southern coast of Australia, due to the presentation of suspicious evidence.

text: ultimately feels empty and unsatisfying , like swallowing a communion wafer without the wine .
translation: 最终感觉空虚而不满，就像吞下无酒的圣餐饼一样。
back_translation: In the end, it feels empty and unsatisfying, just like swallowing a communion wafer without any wine.

text: a dedicated scientist , aided by his clueless wife , rolls up his shirt sleeves and tries to save the world from a radioactive monster , curious space aliens , an evil scientist and a crabby skeleton in this send-up of the best of the b movies of the 1950 's .
translation: 一位专注的科学家，在他无知的妻子的帮助下，卷起衬衫袖子，试图拯救世界免受放射性怪物、好奇的外星人、恶毒的科学家和一个脾气暴躁的骷髅的威胁，这是一部对1950年代最佳B级电影的讽刺。
back_translation: A dedicated scientist, with the help of his clueless wife, rolls up his shirt sleeves to try to save the world from the threats of radioactive monsters, curious aliens, evil scientists, and a hot-tempered skeleton, in a satire of the best B-movies of the 1950s.

text: naipaul fans may be disappointed . those who are not acquainted with the author 's work , on the other hand , may fall fast asleep .
translation: 奈保尔的粉丝可能会失望。另一方面，那些不熟悉这位作者作品的人可能会很快入睡。
back_translation: Naipaul's fans might be disappointed. On the other hand, those who are not familiar with the author's works may soon fall asleep.

text: inspired and motivated , the kids save the day , showing bravery and nobility .
translation: 受到启发和激励，孩子们拯救了今天，展现了勇气和高尚。
back_translation: Inspired and motivated, the children saved today, showing courage and nobility.

text: one thing led to another until she ended up giving her virginity not knowing that he made a bet with his friends .
translation: 事情发展到最后，她失去了处女之身，而她并不知道他和朋友们打了个赌。
back_translation: In the end, she lost her virginity, and she had no idea that he made a bet with his friends.

text: yan tells lynn he loves her and wants to marry her .
translation: 燕告诉林他爱她，并想和她结婚。
back_translation: Yan told Lin that he loves her and wants to marry her.

text: `` the institute `` is also for the once-famous , who , having bottomed out , also have no where else to turn but brookdale .
translation: “学院”也是为那些曾经闻名的人准备的，他们在跌入谷底后，也没有其他地方可以去，只有布鲁克代尔。
back_translation: "The academy" is also prepared for those who were once famous, and after falling to the bottom, have nowhere else to go but Brookdale.

text: for all its technical virtuosity , the film is so mired in juvenile and near-xenophobic pedagogy that it 's enough to make one pine for the day when godard can no longer handle the rigors of filmmaking .
translation: 尽管这部电影在技术上非常高超，但却深陷于幼稚和近似排外的教育主义之中，这让人忍不住渴望戈达尔再也无法应对电影制作的艰辛之日。
back_translation: Despite the film's technical excellence, it is deeply entangled in a childish and almost exclusive educationalism, leaving one yearning for the days when Godard could no longer cope with the hardships of filmmaking.

text: a sweet-natured reconsideration of one of san francisco 's most vital , if least widely recognized , creative fountainheads .
translation: 对旧金山一个最重要但不太为人所知的创意源泉进行的一次温和的重新审视。
back_translation: A gentle re-examination of one of San Francisco's most important yet lesser-known sources of creativity.

text: many can not hold a job , or choose not to .
translation: 许多人无法找到工作，或者选择不工作。
back_translation: Many people are unable to find jobs or choose not to work.

text: do n't wait to see this terrific film with your kids -- if you do n't have kids borrow some .
translation: 不要等待与孩子们一起观看这部精彩的电影——如果你没有孩子，可以借一些。
back_translation: Don't wait to watch this wonderful movie with children—if you don't have any, you can borrow some.

text: well , he wakes up on the night when the tooth fairy is supposed to come and get his last tooth and sees her .
translation: 好吧，他在牙仙子应该来拿走他最后一颗牙齿的晚上醒来，看到了她。
back_translation: Okay, he woke up on the night the tooth fairy was supposed to take his last tooth and saw her.

text: this tenth feature is a big deal , indeed -- at least the third-best , and maybe even a notch above the previous runner-up , nicholas meyer 's star trek vi : the undiscovered country .
translation: 这个第十个特色确实很重要——至少是第三佳，甚至可能比之前的亚军，尼古拉斯·迈耶的《星际迷航 VI：未知的国度》更胜一筹。
back_translation: This tenth feature is indeed very important—at least the third best, and it may even surpass the previous runner-up, Nicholas Meyer's "Star Trek VI: The Undiscovered Country."

text: the country was at the start of a rapid process of industrialization and social change .
translation: 该国正处于快速工业化和社会变革的 آغاز阶段。
back_translation: The country is in the early stages of rapid industrialization and social change.

text: for all of the contemporary post-colonialist consciousness that kapur tries to bring to the four feathers , the oddest thing about the movie is how it winds up affirming the same damn moldy values the material has always held dear .
translation: 尽管卡普尔试图将当代后殖民意识带入《四根羽毛》，但电影最奇怪的地方在于它最终却 reaffirmed 了这个素材一直以来所珍视的那些陈旧的价值观。
back_translation: Although Kapoor attempted to bring contemporary postcolonial consciousness into "The Four Feathers," the strangest aspect of the film is that it ultimately reaffirmed the outdated values that the material has always cherished.

text: a memorable experience that , like many of his works , presents weighty issues colorfully wrapped up in his own idiosyncratic strain of kitschy goodwill .
translation: 一次难忘的经历，就像他的许多作品一样，呈现了重要的问题，并以他自己独特的庸俗善意包装起来。
back_translation: An unforgettable experience, much like many of his works, presented important issues wrapped in his own unique, mundane kindness.

text: m & # 225 ; rton 's deft re-enactments and the actors ' dramatic readings of spielrein 's own words tell a chilling story , bringing to light both the work of this pioneer and the dark side of psychoanalysis .
translation: 马尔顿的精妙重演和演员们对斯皮尔雷因自己文字的戏剧性朗读讲述了一段令人不寒而栗的故事，揭示了这位先驱的工作以及精神分析的阴暗面。
back_translation: Marlton's ingenious reinterpretation and the actors' dramatic readings of Spiller's own text tell a chilling story that reveals the work of this pioneer and the darker side of psychoanalysis.

text: a mind-bender in the best sense of the word : the spell it casts follows you all the way home .
translation: 在最好的意义上，这是一部让人费解的作品：它施下的魔咒会一直跟随你回家。
back_translation: In the best sense, this is a puzzling work: the spell it casts will follow you home.

text: but when she escapes a horrific car accident , she finds herself in death 's path of destruction .
translation: 但当她逃脱了一场可怕的车祸时，她发现自己处于死亡的毁灭之中。
back_translation: But when she escaped a terrible car accident, she found herself in the devastation of death.

text: a powerful and telling story that examines forbidden love , racial tension , and other issues that are as valid today as they were in the 1950s .
translation: 一个强大而发人深省的故事，探讨了禁忌之爱、种族紧张关系以及其他在当今与1950年代同样有效的问题。
back_translation: A powerful and thought-provoking story that explores forbidden love, racial tension, and other issues that are just as relevant today as they were in the 1950s.

text: it is so refreshing to see robin williams turn 180 degrees from the string of insultingly innocuous and sappy fiascoes he 's been making for the last several years .
translation: 看到罗宾·威廉姆斯从过去几年的那些乏味而甜腻的失败作品中彻底转变，真是令人耳目一新。
back_translation: It is refreshing to see Robin Williams make a complete turnaround from the dull and sugary failures of the past few years.

text: an amusing , breezily apolitical documentary about life on the campaign trail .
translation: 一部轻松幽默、不带政治色彩的纪录片，讲述了竞选活动中的生活。
back_translation: A lighthearted and humorous documentary without political undertones, depicting life during a campaign.

text: the tone errs on the shrill side , tempered by a soft southern gentility that speaks of beauty , grace and a closet full of skeletons .
translation: 语调偏向刺耳，但又透出一种柔和的南方风度，展现出美丽、优雅以及一个装满骷髅的衣橱。
back_translation: The tone leans towards harshness, yet reveals a gentle southern charm, showcasing beauty, elegance, and a wardrobe full of skeletons.

text: ms . bennett is worth watching , and her story is weirdly detailed enough to prove once more that truth is too strange for good fiction .
translation: 贝内特女士值得一看，她的故事奇异地详细到再次证明真相对好的小说来说太奇怪了。
back_translation: Mrs. Bennett is worth a look; her story is bizarrely detailed enough to once again prove that the truth is too strange for good fiction.

text: a sluggish pace and lack of genuine narrative hem the movie in every bit as much as life hems in the spirits of these young women .
translation: 缓慢的节奏和缺乏真实叙事同样限制了这部电影，就像生活限制了这些年轻女性的精神一样。
back_translation: The slow pace and lack of a genuine narrative also limit this film, just as life constrains the spirits of these young women.

text: rugged contractor rick eyes beth but ends up going home with the more assertive debby .
translation: 粗犷的承包商里克注视着贝丝，但最后却和更有主见的黛比回了家。
back_translation: The rugged contractor Rick gazed at Beth, but in the end, he returned home with the more assertive Debbie.

text: moving to the big city , deeds finds himself besieged by opportunists all gunning for their piece of the pie .
translation: 搬到大城市后，迪德斯发现自己被各路机会主义者包围，他们都在争取分一杯羹。
back_translation: After moving to the big city, Didis found himself surrounded by opportunists, all vying for a piece of the pie.

text: as beacons of individuality in a sea of government conformity they represent freedom for those who own them .
translation: 作为政府统一中的个性灯塔，它们代表了拥有者的自由。
back_translation: As individual beacons within the unified government, they represent the freedom of their owners.

text: the girls want to do a girly pop song , and the entire jury panel consist of muslim boys !
translation: 女孩们想唱一首女孩风格的流行歌曲，但整个评审团都是穆斯林男孩！
back_translation: The girls want to sing a girl-style pop song, but the entire judging panel is made up of Muslim boys!

text: 'butterfingered ' is the word for the big-fisted direction of jez butterworth , who manages to blast even the smallest sensitivities from the romance with his clamorous approach .
translation: “失手的”是杰兹·巴特沃斯（Jez Butterworth）的大手法的词汇，他以喧闹的方式将即使是最细微的敏感情感从浪漫中炸出。
back_translation: "Misfire" is a term from Jez Butterworth's grand style, where he explosively extracts even the subtlest sensitive emotions from romance in a loud manner.

text: steven soderbergh 's digital video experiment is a clever and cutting , quick and dirty look at modern living and movie life .
translation: 史蒂文·索德伯格的数字视频实验是一部机智、犀利、快速且粗糙地呈现现代生活和电影生活的作品。
back_translation: Steven Soderbergh's digital video experiment is a witty, sharp, fast, and roughly presented work that reflects modern life and the life of cinema.

text: a respectable venture on its own terms , lacking the broader vision that has seen certain trek films . . . cross over to a more mainstream audience .
translation: 在自身的条件下，这是一个值得尊重的项目，但缺乏更广泛的视野，未能让某些《星际旅行》电影跨越到更主流的观众群体。
back_translation: Under its own conditions, this is a respectable project, but it lacks a broader vision and fails to bring certain "Star Trek" films to a more mainstream audience.

text: . . . feels as if ( there 's ) a choke leash around your neck so director nick cassavetes can give it a good , hard yank whenever he wants you to feel something .
translation: ……感觉就像脖子上套着一条绞索，导演尼克·卡萨维茨可以在任何时候用力拉扯，让你感受到情感。
back_translation: ...It feels like there is a noose around your neck that director Nick Cassavetes can tighten at any moment, making you feel the emotions.

text: like life on the island , the movie grows boring despite the scenery .
translation: 就像岛上的生活一样，这部电影尽管风景优美，但仍然变得无聊。
back_translation: Just like life on the island, this movie, despite its beautiful scenery, still becomes boring.

text: but with the help of a superhero and a mysterious deep-voiced stranger , arnold and gerald will need to recover a crucial document in order to save their beloved neighborhood .
translation: 但在一位超级英雄和一位神秘深沉声音的陌生人的帮助下，阿诺德和杰拉德将需要找到一份关键文件，以拯救他们心爱的社区。
back_translation: But with the help of a superhero and a mysterious, deep-voiced stranger, Arnold and Gerald will need to find a crucial document to save their beloved community.

text: what 's at stake in this film is nothing more than an obsolete , if irritating , notion of class .
translation: 这部电影所涉及的无非是一个过时的、虽令人烦恼但仍然存在的阶级观念。
back_translation: The film merely involves an outdated class concept that, although troubling, still exists.

text: . . . a rousing fantasy of bloodless revolution against capricious colonial rulers .
translation: ……一场激动人心的无血革命幻想，反抗那些反复无常的殖民统治者。
back_translation: ...an exciting bloodless revolutionary fantasy, resisting those capricious colonial rulers.

text: missing her opportunity with him that night , cameron diaz is talked into pursuing him to his brother 's wedding .
translation: 由于错过了那个晚上的机会，卡梅伦·迪亚兹被劝说去参加他兄弟的婚礼，以追求他。
back_translation: Due to missing the opportunity that night, Cameron Diaz was persuaded to attend her brother's wedding to pursue him.

text: the film is grossly contradictory in conveying its social message , if indeed there is one .
translation: 这部电影在传达其社会信息方面极为矛盾，如果确实有的话。
back_translation: This movie is extremely contradictory in conveying its social message, if it indeed has one.
