text: the movie is engaging and well acted , though , and the pink panther-style credits and background music are worth the price of admission .
translation: 这部电影引人入胜，演技出色，虽然如此，但粉红豹风格的片头字幕和背景音乐值得票价。
back_translation: This movie is captivating, with excellent performances; nonetheless, the Pink Panther-style opening credits and background music are worth the ticket price.

text: a smart , steamy mix of road movie , coming-of-age story and political satire .
translation: 一个聪明、热辣的公路电影、成长故事和政治讽刺的混合体。
back_translation: A clever, spicy mix of a road movie, coming-of-age story, and political satire.

text: he enters an unknown world of rituals and cutural perceptions , and fixes everything in his own unique way .
translation: 他进入了一个充满仪式和文化认知的未知世界，并以他自己独特的方式修复了一切。
back_translation: He entered an unknown world filled with rituals and cultural awareness, and restored everything in his own unique way.

text: what makes the film special is the refreshingly unhibited enthusiasm that the people , in spite of clearly evident poverty and hardship , bring to their music .
translation: 这部电影之所以特别，是因为人们在明显的贫困和困难中，依然带着令人耳目一新的热情投入到他们的音乐中。
back_translation: The reason this film is special is that people, despite obvious poverty and difficulties, still immerse themselves in their music with a refreshing enthusiasm.

text: like other almodM-svar films , it delights in its scandals . but its sensitivities are extravagant , which means it 's one of the most beautiful black comedies ever made .
translation: 像其他阿莫多瓦的电影一样，它沉醉于丑闻之中。但其敏感性则是奢华的，这意味着它是有史以来最美丽的黑色喜剧之一。
back_translation: Like other Almodóvar films, it revels in scandal. But its sensitivity is luxurious, which means it is one of the most beautiful black comedies of all time.

text: ray 's always playing the angles , and he 's got his eye on a horse that 's cheap because it 's been misdiagnosed .
translation: 雷总是在寻找机会，他看上了一匹便宜的马，因为这匹马被误诊了。
back_translation: Lei is always looking for opportunities; he has taken a liking to a cheap horse because it was misdiagnosed.

text: spy kids 2 also happens to be that rarity among sequels : it actually improves upon the original hit movie .
translation: 《特工孩子2》恰好是续集中的罕见之作：它实际上比原版热门电影更出色。
back_translation: "Spy Kids 2" is a rare gem among sequels: it is actually better than the original popular film.

text: after his friend , a hot young artist , is killed , a resourceful american man living in london covers up the crime and tries to keep the friend 's name alive in order to exploit his legacy and reap millions in the process .
translation: 在他的朋友，一位炙手可热的年轻艺术家被杀后，居住在伦敦的一个机智的美国人掩盖了罪行，并试图保住朋友的名声，以利用他的遗产并从中获取数百万的利益。
back_translation: After his friend, a hotshot young artist, is murdered, a witty American living in London covers up the crime and tries to preserve his friend's reputation in order to exploit his estate and profit millions from it.

text: though each with their distinctive story , all three are interwoven with the other .
translation: 尽管每个故事都有其独特之处，但它们三者之间却是相互交织的。
back_translation: Although each story has its unique aspects, they are intertwined with each other.

text: when all seems hopeless , ted gets some guidance from his good friend meg that turns the situation around : `` do n't scam on her , listen to her , be sincere . ``
translation: 当一切看起来绝望时，泰德从他的好朋友梅格那里得到了指导，扭转了局面：“不要在她身上耍花招，倾听她，真诚对待。”
back_translation: When everything seemed hopeless, Ted received guidance from his good friend Meg, turning the situation around: "Don't play tricks on her, listen to her, and be sincere."

text: meyjes 's movie , like max rothman 's future , does not work .
translation: 梅耶斯的电影，就像马克斯·罗斯曼的未来一样，无法奏效。
back_translation: Meyer’s films, like Max Rosman’s future, are unable to work.

text: light the candles , bring out the cake and do n't fret about the calories because there 's precious little substance in birthday girl -- it 's simply , and surprisingly , a nice , light treat .
translation: 点燃蜡烛，拿出蛋糕，不用担心卡路里，因为生日女孩几乎没有实质内容——这只是，令人惊讶的是，一种轻巧的美味。
back_translation: Light the candles, take out the cake, don’t worry about the calories, because the birthday girl is almost immaterial—it's just, surprisingly, a light and delightful treat.

text: while the frequent allusions to gurus and doshas will strike some westerners as verging on mumbo-jumbo . . . broad streaks of common sense emerge with unimpeachable clarity .
translation: 虽然频繁提到的导师和缺陷会让一些西方人觉得接近迷信……但广泛的常识以无可置疑的清晰度浮现出来。
back_translation: Although the frequently mentioned mentors and flaws may make some Westerners feel close to superstition... the widespread common sense emerges with undeniable clarity.

text: it 's fitting that a movie as artificial and soulless as the country bears owes its genesis to an animatronic display at disneyland .
translation: 一部如此人造和无灵魂的电影《乡村熊》起源于迪士尼乐园的一个动画玩偶展示，真是恰如其分。
back_translation: A movie as artificial and soulless as "The Country Bears" fittingly originates from an animatronic puppet exhibit at Disneyland.

text: but even this new relationship is not enough to inspire him to write .
translation: 但即使这种新关系也不足以激励他去写作。
back_translation: But even this new relationship was not enough to motivate him to write.

text: gay or straight , kissing jessica stein is one of the greatest date movies in years .
translation: 无论是同性恋还是异性恋，《吻安妮·斯坦》都是近年来最伟大的约会电影之一。
back_translation: Whether it's about same-sex or opposite-sex relationships, "Kissing Annie Staln" is one of the greatest dating movies in recent years.

text: graced with the kind of social texture and realism that would be foreign in american teen comedies .
translation: 拥有一种社会质感和现实主义，这在美国青少年喜剧中是陌生的。
back_translation: It possesses a sense of social texture and realism that is unfamiliar in American teen comedies.

text: a deft script by mike white . . . elevates the usual teen twaddle by grounding the laughs in feeling .
translation: 迈克·怀特巧妙的剧本……通过将笑点扎根于情感之中，提高了通常青少年无聊的水平。
back_translation: Mike White's clever script... elevates the often mundane level of teenage boredom by rooting the humor in emotions.

text: all is faultless , until fay 's parents ' marriage breaks down suddenly , out of nowhere , after 40 years of wedded bliss .
translation: 一切都是完美的，直到费的父母在幸福婚姻四十年后，突然无缘无故地婚姻破裂。
back_translation: Everything was perfect until Fei's parents suddenly had an inexplicable marriage breakdown after forty years of a happy marriage.

text: sharing the clink with velma , are a collection of other sly females , all awaiting trial for the murders of their own partners .
translation: 与维尔玛同在监狱里的，是一群其他狡诈的女性，她们都在等待审判，因谋杀自己的伴侣而被起诉。
back_translation: In the prison with Wilma, there is a group of other cunning women who are all awaiting trial for being charged with murdering their partners.

text: standard story of a biker gang taking over a town is not saved by the presence of lou diamond phillips as the head biker or sean patrcik flanery as the avenging townsperson who takes on the gangs with the help of an old codger ( robert forster ) .
translation: 一个摩托车帮控制小镇的标准故事并没有因为头号骑士卢·戴蒙德·菲利普斯的出现而改变，也没有因为肖恩·帕特里克·弗兰瑞作为复仇小镇居民与老顽固（罗伯特·福斯特）的帮助而得到改善。
back_translation: The standard story of a motorcycle gang controlling a small town did not change with the arrival of the top rider Lou Diamond Phillips, nor did it improve with Sean Patrick Flanery's role as a vengeful town resident aided by the old stubborn man (Robert Forster).

text: now their quickly expanding population threatens the existence of vampires , and soon there wo n't be enough humans in the world to satisfy their bloodlust .
translation: 现在，他们快速增长的人口威胁着吸血鬼的生存，而不久之后，世界上将没有足够的人类来满足他们对鲜血的渴望。
back_translation: Now, their rapidly growing population threatens the survival of vampires, and soon there will not be enough humans in the world to satisfy their thirst for blood.

text: in the early 1900 's , a new invention ( and one of the very first uses of the electric motor ) was created to address the 'problem ' of women 's hysteria .
translation: 在20世纪初，一种新发明（也是电动机最早的用途之一）被创造出来，以应对女性歇斯底里的“问题”。
back_translation: In the early 20th century, a new invention (one of the earliest uses of the electric motor) was created to address the "problem" of female hysteria.

text: once again , the case seems to be solved with this spectacular arrest .
translation: 案件似乎又一次通过这一惊人的逮捕得以解决。
back_translation: The case seems to have been resolved once again through this astonishing arrest.

text: weird , vulgar comedy that 's definitely an acquired taste .
translation: 奇怪、粗俗的喜剧，绝对需要慢慢品味。
back_translation: A strange and crude comedy that definitely requires slow appreciation.

text: the funk brothers seem to have hardly missed a beat .
translation: 功能兄弟似乎几乎没有错过任何节拍。
back_translation: The functional brothers seem to have missed hardly any beats.

text: cliff has always preferred to play by his own rules much to the disapproval of the regimented , elderly bowls fraternity .
translation: 克利夫一直更喜欢按照自己的规则来玩，这让严守规矩的老年保龄球界十分不满。
back_translation: Kleef has always preferred to play by his own rules, which has frustrated the rule-abiding elderly bowling community.

text: lee 's achievement extends to his supple understanding of the role that brown played in american culture as an athlete , a movie star , and an image of black indomitability .
translation: 李的成就延伸到他对布朗在美国文化中作为运动员、电影明星以及黑人的不屈不挠形象所扮演角色的深刻理解。
back_translation: Li's achievements extend to his profound understanding of the role Brown plays as an athlete, movie star, and the indomitable image of a Black man in American culture.

text: . . . liotta is put in an impossible spot because his character 's deceptions ultimately undo him and the believability of the entire scenario . too bad .
translation: …利奥塔被置于一个不可能的境地，因为他角色的欺骗最终使他自食其果，整个情节的可信度也因此受到影响。真可惜。
back_translation: ...Lyotard was placed in an impossible situation, as the deception of his role ultimately backfired on him, affecting the credibility of the entire plot. It's a shame.

text: to pull him out of his now dangerous financial predicament will turns to his wealthy in-laws , spinning a myriad of desperate lies , half-truths and deceptions .
translation: 为了将他从目前危险的财务困境中解救出来，他转向了富有的岳父岳母，编织了无数绝望的谎言、半真半假的话和欺骗。
back_translation: In order to rescue him from his current dangerous financial predicament, he turned to his wealthy in-laws, weaving countless desperate lies, half-truths, and deception.

text: john roper , ( bruce mathews ) a disillusioned vietnam vet and ex-drug dealer travels through the orient to get spiritual .
translation: 约翰·罗珀（布鲁斯·马修斯）是一名对越战感到失望的退伍军人和前毒贩，前往东方寻求精神上的启迪。
back_translation: John Roper (Bruce Mathews) is a disillusioned Vietnam War veteran and former drug dealer who travels east in search of spiritual enlightenment.

text: he dreams of shedding all material worth and going on a spiritual awakening .
translation: 他梦想摆脱一切物质财富，迎接精神觉醒。
back_translation: He dreams of breaking free from all material wealth and welcoming spiritual awakening.

text: they came to pray , but instead they end up in the middle of an unpleasant religious argument as they suddenly get interrupted by a mystical appearance : is it god ?
translation: 他们来这里祈祷，却意外陷入一场令人不快的宗教争论中，突然被一个神秘的出现打断：那是上帝吗？
back_translation: They came here to pray, but unexpectedly fell into an unpleasant religious debate, suddenly interrupted by a mysterious appearance: was it God?

text: it 's the unsettling images of a war-ravaged land that prove more potent and riveting than the unlikely story of sarah and harrison .
translation: 战火摧毁的土地上那些不安的画面，展现出的冲击力和吸引力，远胜于莎拉与哈里森不太可能的故事。
back_translation: The unsettling images on the war-ravaged land, showcasing their impact and attraction, far surpass the unlikely story of Sarah and Harrison.

text: rock solid family fun out of the gates , extremely imaginative through out , but wanes in the middle
translation: 坚如磐石的家庭乐趣，开局极具想象力，但在中间部分有所减弱。
back_translation: The family fun is as solid as a rock, starting with great imagination, but it weakens in the middle part.

text: a bigger holiday downer than your end-of-year 401 ( k ) statement .
translation: 比年终401(k)报表更让人沮丧的假期。
back_translation: The holidays are more frustrating than the year-end 401(k) statement.

text: haunted by the memories of war , he seeks a quiet life of farming , solitude and prayer .
translation: 被战争的记忆所困扰，他寻求一种安静的农耕、孤独和祈祷的生活。
back_translation: Haunted by the memories of war, he seeks a quiet life of farming, solitude, and prayer.

text: the sequel is everything the original was not : contrived , overblown and tie-in ready .
translation: 续集是原作所完全没有的：牵强、夸张，并且准备与其他内容关联。
back_translation: The sequel is completely absent from the original: far-fetched, exaggerated, and intended to connect with other content.

text: when 19 year old tommy , a gay rights activist and 24 year old alan first meet in 1973 , they find themselves on the opposite sides of the political coin .
translation: 当19岁的汤米，一位同性恋权利活动家，与24岁的艾伦在1973年首次相遇时，他们发现自己处于政治立场的对立面。
back_translation: When 19-year-old Tommy, a gay rights activist, first met 24-year-old Alan in 1973, they found themselves on opposing political sides.

text: the story of ray , a personal injury attorney facing a moral and spiritual crisis .
translation: 雷的故事，一位面临道德和精神危机的人身伤害律师。
back_translation: The story of Lei, a personal injury lawyer facing a moral and spiritual crisis.

text: the film has a laundry list of minor shortcomings , but the numerous scenes of gory mayhem are worth the price of admission . . . if `` gory mayhem `` is your idea of a good time .
translation: 这部电影有一长串小缺点，但众多血腥混乱的场景值得票价……如果“血腥混乱”是你认为的好时光的话。
back_translation: This movie has a long list of minor flaws, but the numerous bloody chaos scenes are worth the ticket price... if "bloody chaos" is what you consider a good time.

text: one regards reign of fire with awe . what a vast enterprise has been marshaled in the service of such a minute idea .
translation: 人们对《火焰之王》抱以敬畏。为了这样一个微小的想法，动员了多么庞大的事业。
back_translation: People hold a sense of awe for "The King of Flames." Such a small idea mobilized a massive undertaking.

text: but nobody figured sam decker and his juvenile delinquents into the equation .
translation: 但是没有人将萨姆·德克和他的少年罪犯考虑在内。
back_translation: But no one took Sam Derc and his juvenile delinquents into consideration.

text: this thing works on no level whatsoever for me .
translation: 这东西对我来说根本毫无作用。
back_translation: This thing is completely useless to me.

text: while not all transitions to adulthood are so fraught , there 's much truth and no small amount of poetry in girls ca n't swim .
translation: 虽然并非所有的成年过渡都如此艰难，但“女孩们不会游泳”这一说法中蕴含着许多真理和不少诗意。
back_translation: Although not all transitions to adulthood are so difficult, the saying "girls can't swim" contains many truths and a fair amount of poetry.

text: ben cronin has it all : the admiration of his many friends , a terrific girlfriend , and he 's on the fast-track to an athletic scholarship .
translation: 本·克罗宁拥有一切：众多朋友的钦佩、一个出色的女友，并且他正朝着运动奖学金的快车道前进。
back_translation: Ben Cronin has it all: the admiration of many friends, an amazing girlfriend, and he is on the fast track to a sports scholarship.

text: sitting in front of a computer , drinking excessive amounts of coffee and smoking cigarettes are the different tasks that keep dana awake and ready for the next message .
translation: 坐在电脑前，喝大量咖啡和抽烟是让达纳保持清醒并准备迎接下一个消息的各种任务。
back_translation: Sitting in front of the computer, drinking large amounts of coffee and smoking are the various tasks that keep Dana awake and ready to welcome the next message.

text: a baffling misfire , and possibly the weakest movie [ woody allen ] has made in the last twenty years .
translation: 一部令人困惑的失利，可能是伍迪·艾伦在过去二十年里制作的最弱电影。
back_translation: A confusing defeat, possibly the weakest film Woody Allen has made in the past twenty years.

text: tuck everlasting is the story of a girl named winnie and a family who she meets , the tucks .
translation: 《永恒的童年》是一个关于一个名叫温妮的女孩和她遇到的一个家庭——塔克家族的故事。
back_translation: "Eternal Childhood" is a story about a girl named Winnie and a family she encounters—the Tuck family.

text: three stories are created by three artists who happen to meet together on the same subway .
translation: 三个故事是由三位艺术家创作的，他们恰好在同一班地铁上相遇。
back_translation: Three stories are created by three artists who happen to meet on the same subway train.

text: color , musical bounce and warm seas lapping on island shores . and just enough science to send you home thinking .
translation: 色彩、音乐般的跳动和温暖的海浪拍打在岛屿的海岸上。还有恰到好处的科学，让你带着思考回家。
back_translation: Colors, music-like rhythms, and warm waves lapping at the island's shore. Plus just the right amount of science that leaves you thinking as you head home.

text: donde cae el sol tells a little story between a 65 years ol man and a woman who is thirty years younger that him .
translation: 《太阳落在哪里》讲述了一个65岁男人与一个比他年轻30岁的女人之间的小故事。
back_translation: "The Sun Sets Where" tells a poignant story about a 65-year-old man and a woman who is 30 years younger than him.

text: vicious , the future descendant of james and jessie of team rocket , travels back in time to wreak havoc , and it 's up to young ash , pikachu and friends to stop him .
translation: 恶毒是火箭队的詹姆斯和杰西的未来后代，他穿越时空来破坏，年轻的阿什、皮卡丘和朋友们必须阻止他。
back_translation: Evil is the future descendant of Team Rocket's James and Jesse, who travels through time to cause destruction. Young Ash, Pikachu, and their friends must stop him.

text: as social exposM-i , skins has its heart in the right place , but that 's not much to hang a soap opera on .
translation: 作为社会剖析，Skins 的出发点是好的，但这并不足以支撑一部肥皂剧。
back_translation: As a social analysis, Skins has a good starting point, but this is not enough to support a soap opera.

text: oedekerk mugs mercilessly , and the genuinely funny jokes are few and far between .
translation: Oedekerk 毫不留情地调侃，而真正有趣的笑话则寥寥无几。
back_translation: Oedekerk makes ruthless jabs, while the truly funny jokes are few and far between.

text: responsM-avel direto pelo fracasso 'artM-mstico ' de doce lar , o roteirista c . jay cox nM-co consegue sequer aproveitar os pouquM-mssimos momentos em que escapa da mediocridade .
translation: 通过《甜蜜的家》这部艺术失败，编剧C. Jay Cox甚至无法利用那为数不多的逃离平庸的时刻。
back_translation: Through the artistic failure of "Sweet Home," screenwriter C. Jay Cox is unable to make use of the few moments that break away from mediocrity.

text: it 's too self-important and plodding to be funny , and too clipped and abbreviated to be an epic .
translation: 它过于自以为是和沉闷，无法引人发笑；又过于简短和缩略，无法成为一部史诗。
back_translation: It is too arrogant and dull to be funny; yet it is also too brief and concise to be an epic.

text: but who is the one doing it , malfoy , gamekeeper hagrid ( robbie coltrane ) , or , even , harry ?
translation: 但是谁在做这件事，马尔福，禁忌森林的看守海格（罗比·科尔特雷恩），还是，甚至是哈利？
back_translation: But who is doing this, Malfoy, Hagrid the gamekeeper of the Forbidden Forest (Robbie Coltrane), or even Harry?

text: this big screen caper has a good bark , far from being a bow-wow .
translation: 这部大屏幕冒险片叫好不叫座，远不是一部平庸的作品。
back_translation: This large-screen adventure film has received critical acclaim but has not performed well at the box office; it is far from being a mediocre work.

text: this is unusual , food-for-thought cinema that 's as entertaining as it is instructive .
translation: 这是不寻常的，既有娱乐性又富有启发性的思考食品电影。
back_translation: This is an unusual, entertaining, and thought-provoking film about food.

text: as an adult , bruce has repressed all memories of his parents do to some horrible event that occured when he was 4 . bruce krensler ( as he uses his adoptive parent 's name ) is working in the same field as his father when a freak lab accident triggers the dormant dna in his body .
translation: 作为成年人，布鲁斯因为在4岁时发生的一些可怕事件而抑制了对父母的所有记忆。布鲁斯·克伦斯勒（他使用养父母的名字）在与父亲相同的领域工作时，一场意外的实验室事故激发了他体内沉睡的DNA。
back_translation: As an adult, Bruce suppressed all memories of his parents due to some traumatic events that occurred when he was 4 years old. Bruce Krenzler (he uses his adoptive parents' name) worked in the same field as his father, and a sudden laboratory accident awakened the dormant DNA within him.

text: they do n't see eye-to-eye on clothes , hair , music , and certainly not in each other 's taste in men .
translation: 他们在服装、发型、音乐方面看法不一，当然在对彼此的男性品味上更是意见分歧。
back_translation: They have different opinions on clothing, hairstyles, and music, and of course, they have even more disagreements about each other's taste in men.

text: parker can not sustain the buoyant energy level of the film 's city beginnings into its country conclusion
translation: 帕克无法维持电影从城市开始到乡村结尾的充沛能量水平。
back_translation: Parker cannot maintain the abundant energy level of the film from the city to the countryside.

text: they continue with all the same characteristics trademarks of the shin-hyun serial killings .
translation: 他们继续保留新贤连环杀人案的所有相同特征和标志。
back_translation: They continue to retain all the same characteristics and signs of the new Xian serial murder case.

text: diego , one of the tigers that attacked the humans , comes also claiming the baby .
translation: 迭戈，一只袭击人类的老虎，也来索要小孩。
back_translation: Diego, a tiger that attacks humans, has come to demand children.

text: it 's a drawling , slobbering , lovable run-on sentence of a film , a southern gothic with the emotional arc of its raw blues soundtrack .
translation: 这是一部拖沓、流口水、惹人爱的冗长句子般的电影，带有南方哥特式风格，情感曲线与其原始蓝调音乐配乐相得益彰。
back_translation: This is a slow, drooling, endearing film that resembles an elongated sentence, featuring Southern Gothic style, with emotional curves that complement its raw blues music score.

text: while the two are falling for each other , the syndicate boss coincidentally sees sienna and hires her as his personal dancer .
translation: 当两人坠入爱河时，黑帮老大偶然看见了西耶娜，并将她雇佣为他的私人舞者。
back_translation: When two people fall in love, the gang boss accidentally sees Sienna and hires her as his private dancer.

text: when john klein , a washington post journalist , and his wife mary finally find the house of their dreams , they just ca n't believe their luck .
translation: 当华盛顿邮报记者约翰·克莱因和他的妻子玛丽最终找到他们梦想中的房子时，他们简直无法相信自己的运气。
back_translation: When Washington Post reporter John Klein and his wife Mary finally found their dream home, they could hardly believe their luck.

text: conflict enters their relationship when anthony expresses to victoria that their sex life is practically non-existent .
translation: 冲突发生在安东尼向维多利亚表达他们的性生活几乎不存在时。
back_translation: The conflict arose when Anthony expressed to Victoria that their sex life was almost nonexistent.

text: starting off small , dealing to the high school and college market , kilo discovers the drug business to be very profitable .
translation: 起初，他从小规模开始，面向高中和大学市场，Kilo发现毒品生意非常有利可图。
back_translation: Initially, he started on a small scale, targeting the high school and college market, and Kilo found the drug business to be very lucrative.

text: julie davis is the kathie lee gifford of film directors , sadly proving once again ego does n't always go hand in hand with talent .
translation: 朱莉·戴维斯是电影导演界的凯西·李·吉弗德，遗憾的是，再次证明了自我并不总是与才能并存。
back_translation: Julie Davis is the Kathy Lee Gifford of the film directing world, sadly proving once again that self-promotion does not always go hand in hand with talent.

text: what might have emerged as hilarious lunacy in the hands of woody allen or mel brooks ( at least during their '70s heyday ) comes across as lame and sophomoric in this debut indie feature .
translation: 在伍迪·艾伦或梅尔·布鲁克斯（至少在他们70年代的全盛时期）手中可能会显得非常搞笑的荒诞，到了这部首部独立电影中却显得无聊而幼稚。
back_translation: What may seem very funny as absurdity in the hands of Woody Allen or Mel Brooks (at least during their peak in the 1970s) comes across as boring and childish in this debut independent film.

text: two brothers along with an ensemble of fresh talent made all this possible and were brought into the light .
translation: 两个兄弟与一群新鲜人才一起，使这一切成为可能，并被带入了光明之中。
back_translation: The two brothers, along with a group of fresh talents, made all of this possible and brought it into the light.

text: light , silly , photographed with colour and depth , and rather a good time .
translation: 轻松、愉快，色彩丰富且层次分明，真的很不错。
back_translation: Relaxed, pleasant, with rich colors and clear layers, it’s really great.

text: [ reno ] may have a few grating gaps in logic and feels as if a good chunk of its story ended up on the cutting room floor , but there is just enough charm and humor peppered throughout to make it feel as if it was n't a complete waste of time to sit through .
translation: 《雷诺》可能在逻辑上有一些让人不满的漏洞，并且感觉故事的很大一部分被删减了，但贯穿其中的魅力和幽默感足以让人觉得观看这一切并不是完全的浪费时间。
back_translation: "Renault" may have some logically unsatisfactory flaws and it feels like a large part of the story has been cut, but the charm and humor throughout are enough to make one feel that watching it is not a complete waste of time.

text: purports to be a hollywood satire but winds up as the kind of film that should be the target of something deeper and more engaging . oh , and more entertaining , too .
translation: 声称是一部好莱坞讽刺片，但最终却变成了一部应该成为更深刻、更吸引人的目标的影片。哦，还有，更娱乐一些。
back_translation: It claims to be a Hollywood satire, but in the end, it turns into a film that should have been a deeper and more engaging target. Oh, and it could have been more entertaining too.

text: worth seeing once , but its charm quickly fades .
translation: 值得看一次，但它的魅力迅速消退。
back_translation: Worth watching once, but its charm fades quickly.

text: this is the story of honey ( alba ) , a tough sexy dancer from the inner city , who becomes a successful music video choreographer , a career which is threatened when her mentor makes him either sleep with him . . .
translation: 这是关于蜜蜂（阿尔巴）的故事，她是来自城市贫民区的一个强悍性感的舞者，后来成为了一名成功的音乐视频编舞师，但当她的导师逼迫她和他发生关系时，她的事业受到了威胁。
back_translation: This is the story of Bee (Alba), a strong and sexy dancer from the urban poor, who later becomes a successful choreographer for music videos. However, her career is threatened when her mentor forces her to have a sexual relationship with him.

text: involving at times , but lapses quite casually into the absurd .
translation: 有时涉及到，但很随意地陷入荒谬。
back_translation: Sometimes it involves, but casually falls into absurdity.

text: however , this task is going to be more difficult than he could ever have imagined .
translation: 然而，这项任务将比他想象的要困难得多。
back_translation: However, this task will be much more difficult than he imagined.

text: john `` eagle eye `` pennell travels the country collecting his former b-17 crewmen in order to fulfill a pact made many years ago in the heat of battle .
translation: 约翰“鹰眼”佩内尔穿越全国，召集他曾经的B-17机组成员，以履行多年前在激战中达成的约定。
back_translation: John "Hawkeye" Penell travels across the country to gather his former B-17 crew members to fulfill a promise made many years ago during intense battles.

text: a grimly competent and stolid and earnest military courtroom drama .
translation: 一部严肃能干、沉稳认真、充满军事法庭戏剧的作品。
back_translation: A serious, capable, composed, and earnest work filled with military courtroom drama.

text: after many years of sleeping in his coffin , the vampire lestat awakens only to find that the world has changed and he wants to be a part of it .
translation: 在沉睡了许多年之后，吸血鬼莱斯特 awakens，发现世界已经改变，他希望能成为其中的一部分。
back_translation: After sleeping for many years, the vampire Lester awakens and discovers that the world has changed; he hopes to become a part of it.

text: it 's a hoot watching the rock chomp on jumbo ants , pull an arrow out of his back , and leap unscathed through raging fire !
translation: 看着巨石强森大口吃掉巨大的蚂蚁，从背上拔出箭矢，然后毫发无伤地跃过熊熊烈火，真是太有趣了！
back_translation: It was really interesting to watch Dwayne Johnson take a big bite out of a giant ant, pull out an arrow from his back, and then leap over the roaring flames unscathed!

text: in the tradition of storytelling , the filmmaker creates a visual parable about the hasidic community that she left as a teenager .
translation: 在讲故事的传统中，电影制片人创作了一个关于她作为青少年离开的哈西德社区的视觉寓言。
back_translation: In the tradition of storytelling, the filmmaker created a visual fable about her departure from the Hasidic community as a teenager.

text: tavernier shows us , in more ways than one , that le cinM-i ma de qualitM-i lives on .
translation: 塔维涅在多种方式上向我们展示了，勒·辛米马·德·夸利塔生活仍在继续。
back_translation: Tavigne has shown us in various ways that the life of Le Sinimama de Qualita continues.

text: there 's a heavy stench of 'been there , done that ' hanging over the film . it 's everything you 'd expect -- but nothing more .
translation: 这部电影弥漫着浓重的“我去过， 做过”的气息。一切都是你所预期的——但没有什么更多。
back_translation: This movie is filled with a strong sense of "I've been there, I've done that." Everything is as you would expect - but nothing more.

text: unfortunately , her plan goes wrong , and she actually kills herself .
translation: 不幸的是，她的计划失败了，结果她实际上自杀了。
back_translation: Unfortunately, her plan failed, and as a result, she actually committed suicide.

text: born in eastern europe , tobias grew up in poverty , the son of a thief , beggar and prostitute .
translation: 托比亚斯出生在东欧，他在贫困中长大，父亲是小偷，母亲是乞丐和妓女。
back_translation: Tobias was born in Eastern Europe, where he grew up in poverty; his father was a thief, and his mother was a beggar and prostitute.

text: uzumaki 's interesting social parallel and defiant aesthetic seems a prostituted muse . . .
translation: '螺旋'有着引人入胜的社会平行和反抗的美学，似乎是一种被贩卖的灵感。。。
back_translation: "Spiral" has an intriguing aesthetic of social parallelism and resistance, seemingly a kind of inspiration that is being sold...

text: emma agrees to bret 's plan and the thefts are go smoothly , resulting in enough money for the lovers to go away , but emma wants more .
translation: 艾玛同意了布雷特的计划，盗窃顺利进行，得到了足够的金钱让恋人们离开，但艾玛想要更多。
back_translation: Emma agreed to Brett's plan, and the robbery went smoothly, providing enough money for the lovers to leave, but Emma wanted more.

text: a morose little soap opera about three vapid , insensitive people who take turns hurting each other . it 's a feature-length adaptation of one of those `` can this marriage be saved ? `` columns from ladies home journal . . .
translation: 一部关于三个无趣、麻木不仁的人轮流伤害彼此的阴郁小肥皂剧。这是对《女士家庭杂志》中“这段婚姻能否拯救？”栏目之一的剧情长篇改编。
back_translation: A gloomy little soap opera about three dull, numb individuals who take turns hurting each other. It is a lengthy adaptation of a storyline from the "Can This Marriage Be Saved?" column in Ladies' Home Journal.

text: it is really quite ironic then that the one guy putting out consistently good comedy is hollywood 's most serious actor .
translation: 真是讽刺的是，那个持续输出优秀喜剧的人竟然是好莱坞最严肃的演员。
back_translation: It is truly ironic that the person who continuously delivers excellent comedy is actually Hollywood's most serious actor.

text: heavily pregnant , and wanting to terminate her pregnancy , she 's on the run from the future parents , searching for sophie 's old flame , ken .
translation: 她怀着重度孕期，想要终止妊娠，正在躲避未来的父母，寻找索菲的旧爱肯。
back_translation: She is in severe pregnancy and wants to terminate her pregnancy, hiding from the future parents and looking for her old love, Ken.

text: this is a film version of the play they wrote based on more than 200 interviews they conducted in laramie .
translation: 这是一部基于他们在拉勒米进行的200多次访谈创作的剧本的电影版本。
back_translation: This is a film version of a script created based on their more than 200 interviews conducted in Laramie.

text: club le monde follows an evening out at a seedy nightspot .
translation: 俱乐部世界跟随在一个破旧夜总会的外出活动。
back_translation: The club world follows an outing at a rundown nightclub.

text: this is more a case of 'sacre bleu ! ' than 'magnifique ' .
translation: 这更像是“天哪！”而不是“太棒了”。
back_translation: This feels more like "Oh my!" rather than "Awesome."

text: a great ending does n't make up for a weak movie , and crazy as hell does n't even have a great ending .
translation: 一个精彩的结局无法弥补一部薄弱的电影，而《疯狂至极》甚至连一个精彩的结局都没有。
back_translation: A brilliant ending cannot compensate for a weak movie, and "Crazy Rich Asians" doesn't even have a brilliant ending.

text: this is a movie where the most notable observation is how long you 've been sitting still .
translation: 这是一部电影，其中最引人注目的观察是你坐着不动有多长时间。
back_translation: This is a movie in which the most striking observation is how long you can sit still.

text: on the way there , he sees a sports car that just hit a tree .
translation: 在前往那里途中，他看到一辆跑车刚撞上了一棵树。
back_translation: On the way there, he saw a sports car just crash into a tree.

text: apparently designed as a reverie about memory and regret , but the only thing you 'll regret is remembering the experience of sitting through it .
translation: 显然是作为对记忆和遗憾的幻想而设计，但你唯一会后悔的就是回忆起坐在那里经历这一切的体验。
back_translation: It is clearly designed as a fantasy about memory and regret, but the only thing you will regret is remembering the experience of sitting there and going through it all.

text: trying to avoid jail time from credit card fraud , price ( patrick mcknight ) , at the advice of his cousin , hides out at a college fraternity .
translation: 为了避免因信用卡欺诈而入狱，帕特里克·麦克奈特在他的表弟的建议下，躲在一个大学兄弟会里。
back_translation: To avoid going to jail for credit card fraud, Patrick McKnight hid out in a college fraternity at the suggestion of his cousin.

text: we are taken on this journey through the voice and body of mnemosyne , mother of memory .
translation: 我们通过记忆之母穆涅摩辛的声音和身体踏上这段旅程。
back_translation: We embark on this journey through the voice and body of Mnemosyne, the mother of memory.

text: the soundtrack alone is worth the price of admission .
translation: 光是配乐就值这个票价。
back_translation: The soundtrack alone is worth the ticket price.

text: michael rooker plays a guard , fisher stevens , john seda , and master p co star .
translation: 迈克尔·鲁克饰演一名保安，费舍·史蒂文斯、约翰·塞达和大师P共同出演。
back_translation: Michael Rooker plays a security guard, joined by Fisher Stevens, John Ceda, and Master P.

text: horace and colt , a fifty-something married couple , are divided - they have lost the key , to their room and to each other .
translation: 霍勒斯和科尔特，这对五十多岁的夫妻，陷入了分歧——他们丢失了通往彼此的钥匙，以及他们房间的钥匙。
back_translation: Horace and Colter, a couple in their fifties, found themselves at a disagreement—they had lost the keys to each other and the keys to their room.

text: conveniently numbed and estranged from her surroundings , lillian sleepwalks through life .
translation: 莉莲便利地麻木，对周围的环境感到陌生，仿佛在生活中梦游。
back_translation: Lilian felt numb and disoriented, as if she were walking through life in a dream.

text: although some viewers will not be able to stomach so much tongue-in-cheek weirdness , those who do will have found a cult favorite to enjoy for a lifetime .
translation: 尽管一些观众可能无法接受如此多的带有讽刺意味的怪异，但那些能够接受的人将找到一部可以终生享受的邪典之作。
back_translation: Although some viewers may not be able to accept such a strange piece filled with irony, those who can will find a cult classic that they can enjoy for a lifetime.

text: blake now starts to sink into the scary , twisted world of the master where sharing , sacrifice and loyalty take on bizarre and dangerous new meanings .
translation: 布雷克现在开始沉浸在主人那可怕而扭曲的世界中，在这里，分享、牺牲和忠诚赋予了奇怪而危险的新含义。
back_translation: Blake is now starting to immerse himself in his master's terrifying and twisted world, where sharing, sacrifice, and loyalty take on strange and dangerous new meanings.

text: it goes on for too long and bogs down in a surfeit of characters and unnecessary subplots .
translation: 它持续时间太长，因角色过多和不必要的副线而拖沓。
back_translation: It is too long, dragging on due to too many characters and unnecessary subplots.

text: it 's somewhat clumsy and too lethargically paced -- but its story about a mysterious creature with psychic abilities offers a solid build-up , a terrific climax , and some nice chills along the way .
translation: 它有些笨拙，节奏也太沉闷了——但它讲述了一个具有超能力的神秘生物的故事，提供了良好的铺垫、精彩的高潮，以及一路上的一些美妙惊悚。
back_translation: It is somewhat clumsy and the pacing is too heavy - but it tells the story of a mysterious creature with superpowers, providing good groundwork, an exciting climax, and some wonderful thrills along the way.

text: his comedy premises are often hackneyed or just plain crude , calculated to provoke shocked laughter , without following up on a deeper level .
translation: 他的喜剧前提往往陈腐或粗俗，计算得当，以激起震惊的笑声，而没有在更深层次上进行跟进。
back_translation: His comedic premise is often clichéd or vulgar, calculated to provoke shocking laughter, without following up on a deeper level.

text: the weakest of the four harry potter books has been transformed into the stronger of the two films by the thinnest of margins .
translation: 四部哈利·波特书中最弱的一部已以微弱的差距转变为两部电影中更强的一部。
back_translation: The weakest book among the four Harry Potter books has transformed into a stronger one in the two films with a slight margin.

text: the result of an old cia mind-control experiment gone bad , felice quick is on the loose and headed for junior-high school teacher sam blacker .
translation: 一个老牌中央情报局心灵控制实验失败的结果，费利斯·奎克（Felice Quick）正在逃逸，目标是初中教师萨姆·布莱克（Sam Blacker）。
back_translation: The result of a failed experiment in mind control by an old-school CIA, Felice Quick is on the run, targeting middle school teacher Sam Blacker.

text: love , politics and intrigue intermingle in this taut retelling of graham greene 's classic tale of a disillusioned british journalist , an idealistic young american and the beautiful vietnamese woman that comes between them in 1950s saigon .
translation: 爱情、政治和阴谋在这部紧凑的改编中交织在一起，讲述了格雷厄姆·格林经典故事：一位失望的英国记者、一位理想主义的年轻美国人以及在1950年代西贡将他们分开的美丽越南女性。
back_translation: Love, politics, and intrigue intertwine in this compact adaptation, telling the classic story of Graham Greene: a disillusioned British journalist, an idealistic young American, and a beautiful Vietnamese woman in 1950s Saigon who keeps them apart.

text: the water game is a teen action drama following a group of graduating high school students as they embark on playing a spy vs . spy type game three weeks prior to graduation .
translation: 水游戏是一部青少年动作剧，讲述了一群即将毕业的高中学生在毕业前的三周内，参与一场间谍对抗间谍的游戏。
back_translation: "Water Game" is a youth action drama that tells the story of a group of high school students who are about to graduate and participate in a game of spy vs. spy during the three weeks leading up to their graduation.

text: a documentary seven years in the making about women in the film business and how they balance , children , love lives and career -- or how they do n't .
translation: 一部花费七年时间制作的纪录片，关于女性在电影行业中的生活，以及她们如何平衡孩子、爱情和事业——或者说她们是如何无法平衡的。
back_translation: A documentary that took seven years to make, about women's lives in the film industry and how they balance children, love, and career—or how they are unable to balance them.

text: in spite of his incarceration , west has been continuing his re-animation research , using rats and mice for subjects , and electrocuting them with a special jerry-rigged apparatus .
translation: 尽管被监禁，韦斯特仍在继续他的再生研究，使用老鼠和小鼠作为实验对象，并用一种特别改装的设备对它们进行电击。
back_translation: Despite being imprisoned, West continues his regeneration research, using rats and mice as test subjects, and subjects them to electric shocks with a specially modified device.

text: i do n't know if frailty will turn bill paxton into an a-list director , but he can rest contentedly with the knowledge that he 's made at least one damn fine horror movie .
translation: 我不知道《虚弱》是否会让比尔·帕克斯顿成为一位A级导演，但他可以心满意足地知道他至少拍摄了至少一部非常出色的恐怖电影。
back_translation: I don't know if "Weakness" will make Bill Paxton an A-list director, but he can be content knowing he has at least made a very outstanding horror film.

text: playwright siddalee walker , on the verge of opening a new play , gives a magazine interview in which she discusses her unhappy childhood .
translation: 剧作家西达莉·沃克即将首演新剧，在一次杂志采访中谈到她不快乐的童年。
back_translation: Playwright Sidali Walker is about to premiere her new play and discussed her unhappy childhood in a magazine interview.

text: children may not understand everything that happens -- i 'm not sure even miyazaki himself does -- but they will almost certainly be fascinated , and undoubtedly delighted .
translation: 孩子们可能不理解发生的一切——我甚至不确定宫崎骏自己是否明白——但他们几乎肯定会感到着迷，并且无疑会感到高兴。
back_translation: Children may not understand everything that is happening—I’m not even sure if Hayao Miyazaki himself understands—but they will almost certainly feel fascinated and undoubtedly feel happy.

text: set against the picturesque landscape of the mississippi delta in the 1940 's , `` the rising place `` follows the close friendship of two young women , each of a different race , and their struggle to find purpose in their lives during this time of social injustice and world war .
translation: 在1940年代风景如画的密西西比三角洲背景下，《上升之地》讲述了两位年轻女性之间的深厚友谊，尽管她们来自不同种族，但在这个社会不公与世界大战的时代，她们努力寻找生活的意义。
back_translation: Set against the picturesque backdrop of the Mississippi Delta in the 1940s, "The Rising Land" tells the story of a deep friendship between two young women who, despite being from different races, strive to find meaning in life amid social injustice and the era of world wars.

text: ram dass fierce grace moulds itself as an example to up-and-coming documentarians , of the overlooked pitfalls of such an endeavour .
translation: 拉姆·达斯的《激烈的恩典》成为了即将崭露头角的纪录片制作人的一个榜样，展示了这一事业被忽视的陷阱。
back_translation: Ram Dass's "Radical Grace" has become a model for emerging documentary filmmakers, highlighting the overlooked pitfalls of the profession.

text: that such a horrible movie could have sprung from such a great one is one of the year 's worst cinematic tragedies .
translation: 这样一部糟糕的电影竟然源自如此伟大的电影，是今年最糟糕的电影悲剧之一。
back_translation: Such a terrible movie actually comes from such a great film; it is one of the biggest movie tragedies of the year.

text: this documentary of cameroon 's repressive political realities begins with the 1990 publication of an open letter to president biya calling for a national conference and the immediate arrest of the letter 's author and publisher .
translation: 这部有关喀麦隆压制政治现实的纪录片以1990年发表的一封致比亚总统的公开信为开端，信中呼吁召开全国会议，并要求立即逮捕信的作者和出版人。
back_translation: This documentary about the repression of political reality in Cameroon begins with an open letter to President Biya published in 1990, calling for a national conference and demanding the immediate arrest of the letter's author and publisher.

text: the film covers the life of young patricia ( jolie jackunas ) who longs for a career as a singer and songwriter .
translation: 这部电影讲述了年轻的帕特里夏（乔莉·贾库纳斯饰）渴望成为歌手和词曲创作人的生活。
back_translation: This movie tells the story of young Patricia (played by Jodie Jakunas) who aspires to become a singer and songwriter.

text: an entertaining , surprisingly well-written and often rowdily amusing picture .
translation: 一部娱乐性强、写得出乎意料好且常常令人捧腹大笑的画面。
back_translation: A highly entertaining piece that is unexpectedly well-written and often brings hearty laughter.

text: after having christmas present and rent money stolen by someone posing as santa , they get jobs working as unarmed security guards in the local mall , they get threatened with eviction , pick up girls , get drunk , take drugs and need quick cash .
translation: 在有人假扮圣诞老人盗走了他们的圣诞礼物和房租后，他们在当地的购物中心找了无武装保安的工作，面临驱逐威胁，约会女孩，喝酒，吸毒，还需要快速赚钱。
back_translation: After someone dressed as Santa Claus stole their Christmas gifts and rent, they looked for unarmed security jobs at the local shopping mall, faced eviction threats, dated girls, drank alcohol, did drugs, and needed to make money quickly.

text: a well-made but emotionally scattered film whose hero gives his heart only to the dog .
translation: 一部制作精良但情感散乱的电影，其英雄只把心交给了狗。
back_translation: A well-made but emotionally scattered film, whose hero only gives his heart to a dog.

text: madison , the `` new girl in town , `` quickly sets her sights on the impressionable ben .
translation: 麦迪逊，这个“新来的女孩”，很快将目光锁定在了容易受影响的本身上。
back_translation: Madison, the "new girl," quickly set her sights on the impressionable Ben.

text: believing his parent 's dead , bruce is raised by adoptive parents .
translation: 相信自己的父母已经去世，布鲁斯被养父母抚养长大。
back_translation: Believing that his biological parents had passed away, Bruce was raised by his adoptive parents.

text: `` the ballad of bering strait `` is a cinema-verite film following seven russian teenagers who have come to america to become country music stars .
translation: 《白令海峡的民谣》是一部真实纪录电影，讲述七位俄罗斯青少年来到美国追求乡村音乐明星梦想的故事。
back_translation: "The Ballad of the Bering Strait" is a documentary film that tells the story of seven Russian teenagers coming to the United States to pursue their dreams of becoming country music stars.

text: cold and scattered , minority report commands interest almost solely as an exercise in gorgeous visuals . that 's not vintage spielberg and that , finally , is minimally satisfying .
translation: 《冷战与分散》几乎完全把少数派报告当作华丽视觉效果的练习。这并不是经典的斯皮尔伯格，而最终，这令人感到略微不满。
back_translation: "The Cold War and Dispersal" almost entirely treats the minority report as an exercise in glamorous visuals. This is not classic Spielberg, and ultimately, it leaves one feeling somewhat unsatisfied.

text: so the hunt begins as ted delivers a first round of come-ons and invitations for his object of desire to become entangled , but nothing works .
translation: 猎物开始了，泰德发出第一轮的挑逗和邀请，希望他的心仪对象能陷入其中，但一切都没有奏效。
back_translation: The hunt began, and Ted initiated the first round of teasing and invitations, hoping his crush would get caught up in it, but none of it worked.

text: in his role of observer of the scene , lawrence sounds whiny and defensive , as if his life-altering experiences made him bitter and less mature .
translation: 在作为观察者的角色中，劳伦斯听起来既抱怨又防御，仿佛他的改变人生的经历使他变得苦涩和不成熟。
back_translation: In the role of an observer, Lawrence sounds both resentful and defensive, as if his life-changing experiences have made him bitter and immature.

text: culled from nearly two years of filming , the documentary 's candid interviews , lyric moments of grim beauty , and powerful verite footage takes us beyond the usual stereotypes of the rap world and into the life of tislam milliner , a struggling rapper who 's ambitious to make it out of the `` hood `` .
translation: 这部纪录片经过近两年的拍摄，从坦诚的采访、悲伤之美的抒情时刻，以及强有力的真实影像中带我们走出嘻哈世界的常规刻板印象，进入奋力挣扎的饶舌歌手蒂斯兰·米利纳的生活，他雄心勃勃地希望能走出“贫民区”。
back_translation: This documentary, filmed over nearly two years, takes us out of the stereotypical perceptions of the hip-hop world through candid interviews, lyrical moments of poignant beauty, and powerful real footage, into the life of struggling rapper Teeslan Milina, who ardently hopes to rise above the "ghetto."

text: however , jane , wendy 's 12-year-old daughter , sees it all as make believe and refuses to believe in the tales .
translation: 然而，简，温迪12岁的女儿，却将这一切视为虚构，并拒绝相信这些故事。
back_translation: However, Jian, Wendy's 12-year-old daughter, sees all of this as fiction and refuses to believe these stories.

text: ( king plays a `` russian mob princess `` ; roden plays an evil kung fu master who is seeking the scroll ) based on the very underground comic book , an immortal tibetan monk ( chow ) finds a mentor in a young street kid ( scott ) whom he can teach to protect the ancient scroll he 's been guarding for the last sixty years .
translation: （国王饰演一位“俄罗斯黑帮公主”；罗登饰演一位邪恶的功夫大师，他在寻找卷轴）这部电影根据非常地下的漫画改编，一位不朽的西藏僧侣（周）发现他可以教导一位年轻的街头孩子（斯科特），来保护他守护了六十年的古老卷轴。
back_translation: (The king plays a "Russian mafia princess"; Rodin plays an evil kung fu master who is searching for a scroll) This movie is adapted from a very underground comic, where an immortal Tibetan monk (Zhou) discovers that he can teach a young street kid (Scott) to protect an ancient scroll he has guarded for sixty years.

text: the controversial bad-boy of comedy delivers a piercing look at his life , lifting the metaphorical smokescreen that he feels has clouded the public view , commenting on everything from the dangers of smoking to the trials of relationships , and unleashing a nonstop litany of raucous anecdotes , stinging social commentary and very personal reflections about life .
translation: 这位颇具争议的喜剧坏小子对自己的生活进行了深刻的剖析，揭开了他认为遮蔽公众视野的隐喻烟幕，评论了从吸烟的危害到人际关系的考验，甩出一连串令人捧腹的轶事、尖锐的社会评论以及对生活的非常个人化的反思。
back_translation: This controversial comedic bad boy performs a deep analysis of his life, unveiling what he believes to be the metaphorical smokescreen that obscures public vision. He comments on everything from the dangers of smoking to the trials of interpersonal relationships, throwing out a series of hilarious anecdotes, sharp social commentary, and very personal reflections on life.

text: bow 's best moments are when he 's getting busy on the basketball court because that 's when he really scores .
translation: 博的最佳时刻是他在篮球场上忙碌的时候，因为那时他真的能得分。
back_translation: Bo's best moments are when he's busy on the basketball court, because that's when he can really score.

text: a colorful , joyous celebration of life ; a tapestry woven of romance , dancing , singing , and unforgettable characters .
translation: 一个五彩缤纷、充满欢乐的生活庆典；一幅由浪漫、舞蹈、歌唱和难忘角色编织而成的织锦。
back_translation: A colorful and joyful celebration of life; a tapestry woven from romance, dance, singing, and unforgettable characters.

text: if you are curious to see the darker side of what 's going on with young tv actors ( dawson leery did what ? ! ? ) , or see some interesting storytelling devices , you might want to check it out , but there 's nothing very attractive about this movie .
translation: 如果你对年轻电视演员的阴暗面感到好奇（道森·里里做了什么？！），或者想看看一些有趣的叙事手法，你可能会想看看这部电影，但这部电影并没有什么特别吸引人的地方。
back_translation: If you're curious about the dark side of young television actors (What did Dawson Leery do?!), or if you want to see some interesting narrative techniques, you might want to check out this movie, but it doesn't have anything particularly captivating.

text: but hamilton high is about to become an all too real battleground when a well-organized group of killers armed with automatic weapons and explosives invade the supposedly deserted school after hours to use it as an operating base for meticulously planned armored car robbery .
translation: 但汉密尔顿高中即将成为一个过于真实的战场，一群组织良好的杀手携带自动武器和爆炸物在放学后闯入这所 supposedly deserted 的学校，将其作为精心策划的盔甲车抢劫行动的基地。
back_translation: But Hamilton High is about to become a hyper-real battlefield, as a group of well-organized killers armed with automatic weapons and explosives storms into this supposedly deserted school after classes, using it as a base for a meticulously planned armored vehicle robbery.

text: undecided about his future , yun fei , an unknown young poet , goes to visit an old university friend in the suburbs of beijing to seek his advice .
translation: 对于自己的未来感到犹豫不决的年轻诗人云飞，前往北京郊区拜访一位老大学朋友以寻求他的建议。
back_translation: The young poet Yun Fei, who feels hesitant about his future, goes to the suburbs of Beijing to visit an old college friend to seek his advice.

text: in this bittersweet slice of working class single new jersey life , best friends debby and beth ( both pushing thirty ) go looking for love in the wrong place - namely their favorite bar , oliver 's .
translation: 在这个带有苦乐参半的工作阶级单身新泽西生活片段中，最好的朋友德比和贝丝（两人都快三十岁了）在错误的地方寻找爱情——也就是她们最喜欢的酒吧，奥利弗酒吧。
back_translation: In this bittersweet working-class single life vignette set in New Jersey, best friends Derby and Beth (both nearing thirty) are looking for love in all the wrong places — specifically, their favorite bar, Oliver's Bar.

text: when a chinese rebel murders chon 's estranged father and escapes to england , chon and roy make their way to london with revenge on their minds .
translation: 当一个中国叛乱者谋杀了春的疏远父亲并逃往英国时，春和罗伊满怀复仇之心前往伦敦。
back_translation: When a Chinese rebel murders Spring's estranged father and flees to England, Spring and Roy head to London filled with a sense of revenge.

text: this does n't go down well with his superiors and they decide that rajput is now a liability to the bank and they sack him .

back_translation: This made his superiors unhappy, and they decided that Rajput was now a burden to the bank, so they fired him.

text: armed with $ 20 dollars and a backpack pastor william sets off on an adventure across the united states in an adventure that would change the lives of millions and test him beyond measure .
translation: 武装着20美元和一个背包，威廉牧师踏上了横跨美国的冒险旅程，这次冒险将改变数百万人的生活，并对他提出了前所未有的挑战。
back_translation: Armed with 20 dollars and a backpack, Pastor William set off on an adventurous journey across America, a journey that would change the lives of millions and present him with unprecedented challenges.

text: M-^Ethe story is far-flung , illogical , and plain stupid .
translation: 这个故事遥远、没有逻辑，非常愚蠢。

translation: 他们大多数意识到这是伪造品，但为时已晚，无法采取行动。

translation: 一个疲惫、干涸的才华，无法摆脱自身困境的作品。
back_translation: A weary, parched talent, unable to escape its own plight.

text: if you like blood , guts and crazy beasts stalking men with guns though . . . you will likely enjoy this monster .

text: enigma is anything but enigmatic about affairs of the heart , and is well worth seeing for its elective affinities alone .

text: a full world has been presented onscreen , not some series of carefully structured plot points building to a pat resolution .

back_translation: A complete world is presented on the screen, rather than a simple ending formed by some carefully constructed plot elements coming together.

text: upon his arrival he hears talk about monroe hutchen ( snipes ) who is the top ranked prison boxing champ 10 years running .

back_translation: When he arrived, he heard discussions about Monroe Hachin (Snipes), who was the prison boxing champion for ten consecutive years.

text: an offbeat horror tale about a group of five college friends on vacation at a remote mountain cabin when one contracts a flesh-eating virus .
translation: 一个离奇的恐怖故事，讲述五个大学朋友在一个偏远的山间小屋度假时，其中一个人感染了一种食肉病毒。

text: for those in search of something different , wendigo is a genuinely bone-chilling tale .

text: though he tried to maintain a life of solitude , he is soon entangled with an artist who is struggling with a personal tragedy and an overly-friendly cuban hot dog vendor .

back_translation: Despite his attempts to live a solitary life, he soon became entangled with an artist going through a personal tragedy and an overly enthusiastic Cuban hot dog vendor.

text: a powerful , compelling and intelligent if imperfect work . . . a film of enormous ambition which realizes its aims more often than not .
translation: 一部强大、引人注目且聪明的作品，尽管不完美……一部雄心勃勃的电影，往往实现了其目标。

text: this is not a retread of `` dead poets ' society . ``
translation: 这不是对《死诗社》的重述。

text: when carlitos is released after doing 2 years of `` hard time `` , he attempts to redeem himself and sets an example for his 5 year-old son .

back_translation: Carlos was released after serving two years in prison. He tried to redeem himself and set an example for his five-year-old son.

text: ritchie 's film is easier to swallow than wertmuller 's polemical allegory , but it 's self-defeatingly decorous .

text: viewed on its own terms , treasure planet is better-than-average family entertainment , but true fans of the stevenson 's novel will likely prefer disney 's more faithful 1950 live-action swashbuckling classic .
translation: 从自身的角度来看，《寻宝奇兵》是超出平均水平的家庭娱乐，但对史蒂文森的小说真正喜爱的粉丝可能更喜欢迪士尼1950年更忠实的真人冒险经典。
back_translation: From my perspective, "The Treasure Hunt" is above average family entertainment, but true fans of Stevenson's novel might prefer Disney's 1950 more faithful live-action classic.

text: it has been a year since johnny and wayne created the ultimate bra for samantha 's company .

text: been there , done that , liked it much better the first time around - when it was called the professional .

text: characterisation has been sacrificed for the sake of spectacle .

back_translation: Just like Steven Spielberg directed Stanley Kubrick's "Artificial Intelligence,"

text: a sexy , peculiar and always entertaining costume drama set in renaissance spain , and the fact that it 's based on true events somehow makes it all the more compelling .
translation: 一部性感、独特且始终引人入胜的服装剧，背景设定在文艺复兴时期的西班牙，而基于真实事件的事实也使它更加引人入胜。
back_translation: A sexy, unique, and always captivating costume drama set in Renaissance Spain, with its basis in real historical events making it even more intriguing.

text: these two facts cause a chain of events that changes not only her life , but also that of her friends in a brutal way . . .
translation: 这两个事实引发了一连串事件，改变了她的生活，也以残酷的方式改变了她朋友的生活……

text: while the subject 's appeal is limited and the film 's 106-minute running time excessive , viewers who do respond to the pic will find it raw , real and cathartic .
translation: 尽管主题的吸引力有限，电影的106分钟片长也显得有些过长，但对这部影片有反响的观众会发现它原始、真实且具有宣泄性。

text: speaks eloquently about the symbiotic relationship between art and life .
translation: eloquently 讲述了艺术与生活之间的共生关系。

text: it picked me up , swung me around , and dropped me back in my seat with more emotional force than any other recent film .
translation: 它把我抱起，转了一圈，然后把我重新放回座位上，情感的力量超过了任何最近的电影。
back_translation: It lifted me up, twirled me around, and then placed me back in my seat; the power of emotion surpassed anything in recent films.

text: if you 're able to go , relax and lower your expectations , you might be carried away by it .
translation: 如果你能够去的话，放松心情，降低期望，你可能会被它所吸引。

text: land , people and narrative flow together in a stark portrait of motherhood deferred and desire explored .
translation: 土地、人群与叙事交融，呈现出一个关于推迟母亲身份和探索欲望的鲜明肖像。

text: less about shakespeare than the spawn of fools who saw quentin tarantino 's handful of raucous gangster films and branched out into their own pseudo-witty copycat interpretations .
translation: 比起莎士比亚，更像是那些看到昆汀·塔伦蒂诺几部喧闹的黑帮电影后，纷纷发展出自己伪机智模仿解读的愚蠢后代。
back_translation: Compared to Shakespeare, they resemble those foolish descendants who, after watching a few noisy gangster films by Quentin Tarantino, develop their own pseudo-witty imitations and interpretations.

text: as asked in the first movie , what sort of people name their son gay m . focker ?

text: set in 1989 , during the historical week in which the berlin wall came tumbling down .
translation: 设定在1989年，正值柏林墙倒塌的历史一周。

text: mitch ( michael paloma ) , our leading man , is an ex-desert storm hero with a lot of bad luck .
translation: 米切（迈克尔·帕洛马）是我们的男主角，他是一位有着许多厄运的前沙漠风暴英雄。

text: at the end of the movie , my 6-year-old nephew said , `` i guess i come from a broken family , and my uncles are all aliens , too . `` congrats disney on a job well done , i enjoyed it just as much !
translation: 在电影结束时，我6岁的侄子说：“我想我来自一个破碎的家庭，我的叔叔们也都是外星人。”恭喜迪士尼，做得很好，我也同样喜欢这部电影！
back_translation: At the end of the movie, my 6-year-old nephew said, "I think I come from a broken family, and my uncles are all aliens." Congratulations Disney, well done, I also loved this movie!

text: this is the kind of movie during which you want to bang your head on the seat in front of you , at its cluelessness , at its idiocy , at its utterly misplaced earnestness .
translation: 这是一部让你想在前面的座椅上撞头的电影，因为它的无知、愚蠢和完全错误的认真态度。

text: when the fire burns out , we 've only come face-to-face with a couple dragons and that 's where the film ultimately fails .
translation: 当大火熄灭时，我们只与几条龙正面交锋，而这正是电影最终失败的地方。

text: jolynn is convinced her clock is ticking and is dead set on making dave hear it -- and on making dave do the laundry .
translation: 乔琳坚信自己的生物钟在滴答作响，并坚定决心让戴夫听到这一声响——并让戴夫洗衣服。
back_translation: Qiao Lin firmly believes that her biological clock is ticking and is determined to let Dave hear this sound—and to make Dave do the laundry.

text: his intricate paintings of the devil and his elaborate journal entries depicting encounters with him led sigmund freud to diagnose him as one of the first known schizophrenics .
translation: 他对魔鬼的复杂画作以及详细的日记记录了与魔鬼的遭遇，导致西格蒙德·弗洛伊德将他诊断为已知的第一批精神分裂症患者之一。
back_translation: His complex paintings of the devil and detailed diary entries documenting encounters with the devil led Sigmund Freud to diagnose him as one of the first known patients with schizophrenia.

text: awara paagal deewana is an action comedy , which revolves around a dentist who accidentally gets trapped into underworld and goes in for a roller coaster ride .
translation: 《Awara Paagal Deewana》是一部动作喜剧，讲述了一位牙医意外卷入黑社会，经历了一场过山车般的旅程。
back_translation: "Awara Paagal Deewana" is an action comedy that tells the story of a dentist who unexpectedly gets involved with the mafia and experiences a rollercoaster journey.

text: and so he does , at the risk of exposing the ugly truth beneath his false facade .
translation: 因此，他这样做，冒着揭露他虚假外表下丑陋真相的风险。

text: assigned to the vicious in-club slaying of a promising young rap act , the two detective delve into the recording industry where they hope to find answers - ideally ones that also come with property buyers or auditions .
translation: 被指派调查一起残酷的俱乐部谋杀案，受害者是一位前途无量的年轻说唱歌手，两位侦探深入音乐行业，希望找到答案——理想情况下，这些答案也能带来地产买家或试镜机会。
back_translation: Assigned to investigate a brutal club murder case, the victim is a promising young rapper. Two detectives delve into the music industry in hopes of finding answers—ideally, answers that could also lead to real estate buyers or audition opportunities.

text: it 's endearing to hear madame d . refer to her husband as 'jackie ' -- and he does make for excellent company , not least as a self-conscious performer .
translation: 听到达夫人称呼她的丈夫为“杰基”让人感到温馨——而且他确实是个极佳的伴侣，尤其是作为一个自觉的表演者。
back_translation: Hearing Mrs. refer to her husband as "Jackie" is heartwarming—he truly is a wonderful partner, especially as a self-aware performer.

text: could use a little more humanity , but it never lacks in eye-popping visuals .
translation: 可以多一些人性，但在视觉效果上从未缺乏惊艳。
back_translation: It could have more humanity, but has never lacked in visual astonishment.

text: more concerned with sade 's ideas than with his actions . the movie achieves as great an impact by keeping these thoughts hidden as . . . [ quills ] did by showing them .
translation: 更关注萨德的思想而非他的行为。这部电影通过将这些思想隐藏起来而取得了与《羽毛笔》展示它们时同样巨大的影响。
back_translation: Focus more on Sad's thoughts rather than his actions. This film achieves a similarly huge impact by concealing these thoughts as "The Quill" does when it displays them.

text: talk to her is so darned assured , we have absolutely no idea who the main characters are until the film is well under way -- and yet it 's hard to stop watching .
translation: 与她交谈是如此令人信服，我们完全不知道主要角色是谁，直到电影已经进行得很深入——然而，很难抵挡住继续观看的欲望。
back_translation: Talking with her is so engaging that we have no idea who the main character is until the movie has progressed quite far—yet it's hard to resist the desire to keep watching.

text: if there was any doubt that peter o'fallon did n't have an original bone in his body , a rumor of angels should dispel it .
translation: 如果还有任何怀疑彼得·奥法龙身上没有一个原创的细胞，那么关于天使的传闻应该可以打消这种怀疑。
back_translation: If there are any doubts that Peter O'Toole does not have an original cell in him, then the rumors about angels should dispel those doubts.

text: a mawkish , implausible platonic romance that makes chaplin 's city lights seem dispassionate by comparison .
translation: 一种过于感伤、令人难以置信的柏拉图式浪漫，使得查普林的《城市之光》看起来显得冷淡。
back_translation: An overly sentimental and incredible Platonic romance makes Chaplin's "City Lights" appear cold.

text: peralta captures , in luminous interviews and amazingly evocative film from three decades ago , the essence of the dogtown experience .
translation: 佩拉尔塔在三十年前的生动采访和惊人唤醒情感的影片中捕捉到了狗镇经历的本质。
back_translation: Peñalta captured the essence of Dogville's experience in a vivid interview and a shocking film that evokes strong emotions thirty years ago.

text: film ca n't quite maintain its initial momentum , but remains sporadically funny throughout .
translation: 这部电影无法维持最初的动力，但在整部影片中偶尔还是能搞笑。
back_translation: The movie fails to maintain its initial momentum, but it can still be funny at times throughout.

text: years after escaping to the wastelands outside the city , claire , one of the few people left who is not an addict , returns looking for the one man who still matters to her .
translation: 在逃到城市外的荒原多年后，克莱尔，少数没有成瘾的人之一，回来了，寻找唯一一个对她仍然重要的男人。
back_translation: Years after escaping to the wasteland outside the city, Claire, one of the few who has not succumbed to addiction, returns to find the only man who still matters to her.

text: they then took over a pub in glenrowan , where they basically held a party , waiting for a train full of police to derail at a part of the track that they tore up .
translation: 他们随后在格伦罗温接管了一家酒吧，基本上举行了一场派对，等待一列满载警察的火车在他们拆毁的一段轨道上出轨。
back_translation: They subsequently took over a bar in Glenrothes, essentially throwing a party while waiting for a train full of police to derail on a section of track they had dismantled.

text: it is a timely film and a transporting one .
translation: 这是一部及时且令人心驰神往的电影。

text: unlike his directorial efforts , la femme nikita and the professional , the transporter lacks besson 's perspective as a storyteller .
translation: 与他的导演作品《尼基塔女郎》和《这个杀手不太冷》不同，《王牌特工》缺乏贝松作为讲述者的视角。
back_translation: Unlike his directorial works "Nikita" and "Léon: The Professional," "Kingsman" lacks Besson's perspective as a storyteller.

text: an unintentional parody of every teen movie made in the last five years .
translation: 对过去五年内所有青少年电影的无意模仿。
back_translation: Unintentional imitation of all teen movies from the past five years.

text: martha is rich in contradictions , her tightly wound personality running counter to the sensual pleasure she offers others through her art .
translation: 玛莎充满了矛盾，她紧绷的个性与通过艺术为他人带来的感官享受形成了对立。
back_translation: Martha is filled with contradictions; her tense personality stands in contrast to the sensory enjoyment she brings to others through art.

text: having never been a huge fan of dickens ' 800-page novel , it surprised me how much pleasure i had watching mcgrath 's version .
translation: 我从来不是狄更斯那部800页小说的忠实粉丝，但看了麦格拉斯的版本后，令我惊讶的是我竟然如此享受。
back_translation: I was never a devoted fan of Dickens' 800-page novel, but after watching McGrath's version, I was surprised at how much I enjoyed it.

text: [ while the last metro ] was more melodramatic , confined to a single theater company and its strategies and deceptions , while tavernier is more concerned with the entire period of history .
translation: [最后的地铁]更具戏剧性，局限于一个剧团及其策略和欺骗，而塔维尼耶更关注整个历史时期。
back_translation: "The Last Subway" is more dramatic, confined to a theater troupe and its strategies and deceptions, whereas Tavernier focuses more on the entire historical period.

text: . . . comes alive only when it switches gears to the sentimental .
translation: ......只有在变换到感性模式时才会活过来。
back_translation: ...it will only come to life when switched to the emotional mode.

text: by candidly detailing the politics involved in the creation of an extraordinary piece of music , [ jones ] calls our attention to the inherent conflict between commerce and creativity .

back_translation: By candidly and thoroughly describing the political aspects involved in the creation of an extraordinary musical work, [Jones] draws our attention to the inherent conflict between commerce and creativity.

text: levi , is an ex-navy man and an animal rights activist who returns home to find the war at home harder to fight than anything he 's ever encountered , but what and who is he fighting for ?
translation: 莱维是一个退役海军并且是动物权益活动家，他回到家中发现，家庭战争比他以往遇到的任何事情都更难以应对，但他到底在为谁和何物而战呢？
back_translation: Levi is a retired Navy veteran and an animal rights activist. Upon returning home, he finds that the family turmoil is more difficult to cope with than anything he has faced before. But who and what is he really fighting for?

text: enter stella ( theron ) , a beautiful nerves-of-steel safecracker , who joins charlie and his former gang when they follow the backstabber to california , where they plan to re-steal the gold by tapping into los angeles ' traffic control system , manipulating signals and creating one of the biggest traffic jams in la history .
translation: 斯特拉（塞朗饰）登场，她是一位美丽且拥有钢铁般神经的保险箱开锁专家，当查理和他之前的团队追踪那个背叛者来到加州时，她加入了他们的行列。他们计划通过接入洛杉矶的交通控制系统，操控信号，制造洛杉矶历史上最大的交通堵塞，重新盗取黄金。
back_translation: Stella (played by Serang) makes her appearance as a beautiful safe-cracking expert with nerves of steel. She joins Charlie and his former team as they track down the traitor to California. They plan to tap into Los Angeles' traffic control system to manipulate the signals and create the biggest traffic jam in the history of Los Angeles to reclaim the gold.

text: but his mentor and `` trainer `` joe ( chazz palminteri ) , a shady hustler who decides how and who johnny plays , is holding him back from his dream .
translation: 但他的导师和“训练师”乔（查兹·帕尔明特里饰）是一位阴险的投机者，他决定约翰尼的比赛方式和对象，阻碍了他实现梦想。
back_translation: But his mentor and "trainer," Joe (played by Chad Palminteri), is a sinister opportunist who decides Johnny's match style and opponents, hindering him from achieving his dreams.

text: a quirky family parks its trailer on a texas desert and tries to build the golf course of the father 's dreams .
translation: 一个古怪的家庭在德克萨斯州的沙漠中停下了他们的拖车，试图建造父亲梦想中的高尔夫球场。
back_translation: A quirky family stopped their trailer in the Texas desert, attempting to build the golf course of the father's dreams.

text: no film could possibly be more contemptuous of the single female population .
translation: 没有任何电影能对单身女性群体表现得如此轻蔑。

text: and could going through with it destroy their marriages and friendships ?
translation: 这样做会摧毁他们的婚姻和友谊吗？

text: the limited sets and small confined and dark spaces also are homages to a classic low-budget film noir movie .
translation: 有限的布景以及狭小封闭和昏暗的空间也是对经典低预算黑色电影的致敬。

text: crazy jones is the story of finnigan jones , a depressed , semi-suicidal leaf-blower with tourette 's syndrome ( t . s . ) .
translation: 疯狂琼斯是芬尼根·琼斯的故事，他是一名抑郁、半自杀倾向的吹叶机工人，患有抽动症。
back_translation: Crazy Jones is the story of Finnegan Jones, a depressed, semi-suicidal leaf blower worker who suffers from Tourette's syndrome.

translation: 哈里斯掌控荧屏，利用他的脆弱感，暗示了一个腐败与无情生活所带来的创伤。

text: . . . a ho-hum affair , always watchable yet hardly memorable .
translation: ……一场平淡无奇的事件，虽然始终可看，却几乎令人难以记住。
back_translation: ...an ordinary event that, although consistently visible, is almost impossible to remember.

text: shows that jackie chan is getting older , and that 's something i would rather live in denial about
translation: 显示成龙正在变老，这让我宁愿对此选择视而不见。

text: in this vivid , emotionally complex ensemble piece , korean writer-director jeong jae-eun portrays this extraordinary turning point in every woman 's life .

text: haruna passes her days looking at the sea , her beautiful face is bandaged .

text: just about all of the film is confusing on one level or another , making ararat far more demanding than it needs to be .

text: huppert 's superbly controlled display of murderous vulnerability ensures that malice has a very human face .
translation: 霍普特精湛的控制表演展现了致命脆弱，确保了恶意有着非常人性化的面孔。

text: after a drastic confrontation with the 'normal ' outside world that results in fighting and panic , the group breaks up .

text: one is found in the city 's landfill site , and the other is horrifically murdered on a public bus .

text: she tells him , and they go to the sonogram appointment together .
translation: 她告诉他，他们一起去做超声波检查。

text: it helps in establishing connections , for instance between the strangely german kulturfilm and the film avant-garde of la sarraz .
translation: 它有助于建立联系，例如在奇特的德国文化电影与拉萨扎的电影先锋主义之间。
back_translation: It helps to establish connections, for example between the unique German cultural cinema and the avant-garde of László.

text: a little judicious editing would have helped a lot , but the talented cast matches the film 's ambitions and compensates for its modest budget .
translation: 一些明智的剪辑会大有帮助，但出色的演员阵容与影片的雄心相匹配，并弥补了其 modest budget。
back_translation: Some wise editing can be quite helpful, but the excellent cast matches the film's ambitions and compensates for its modest budget.

text: the aaa of action , xxx is a blast of adrenalin , rated eee for excitement . and vin diesel is the man .
translation: 这部动作片的aaa，xxx是一场肾上腺素的狂欢，刺激程度评级为eee，而范·迪塞尔就是这个角色的男人。

text: chep 's growing love for fran makes him willing to prowl the dark streets at night in search of items for her .
translation: 切普对弗兰日益增长的爱让他愿意在夜间黑暗的街道上徘徊，寻找能给她的物品。

text: brings awareness to an issue often overlooked -- women 's depression .
translation: 提高人们对一个常常被忽视的问题的认识——女性抑郁症。

text: the whole thing plays like a tired tyco ad .
translation: 整个事情就像一则疲惫的泰科广告。

text: he indeed is douglas ( timothy bottoms ) , a perfect look-a-like .
translation: 他确实是道格拉斯（蒂莫西·博顿），一个完美的双胞胎。

translation: 随着他的朋友、家人和代表们前来帮助他，斯科特无法写作使他的生活朝着一个他可能无法重新控制的方向发展。
