text: it 's clear why deuces wild , which was shot two years ago , has been gathering dust on mgm 's shelf .
translation: 很明显，为什么《双面人》这部两年前拍摄的电影一直在米高梅的货架上积灰。
back_translation: It's obvious why the film "The Man with Two Faces," which was shot two years ago, has been gathering dust on MGM's shelf.

text: it will take a strong stomach for the ordinary viewer to maintain an appetite for pinochet apologetics after this litany of suffering .
translation: 对于普通观众来说，在经历了这一系列痛苦之后，继续对皮诺切特辩护需要强大的承受能力。
back_translation: For the average viewer, continuing to defend Pinochet after experiencing a series of painful events requires a strong capacity for endurance.

text: but things did not work as he planned , until . . .
translation: 但是事情并没有按他的计划进行，直到……
back_translation: But things did not go as he had planned, until...

text: en este ambiente de violencia y pesimismo , salva y & # 193 ; ngel , dos p & # 237 ; caros de barrio , se ganan la vida mendigando en el metro para sus patatas bravas y sus verm & # 250 ; s de grifo .
translation: 在这个充满暴力和悲观的环境中，萨尔瓦和安赫尔，两个来自街区的小家伙，在地铁里乞讨，以为他们的土豆香肠和生啤酒谋生。
back_translation: In this environment filled with violence and pessimism, Salva and Ángel, two little guys from the neighborhood, beg in the subway, hoping to make a living with their potato sausages and draft beer.

text: after a glamorous -- but short-lived -- career as a movie star , evans tried out producing .
translation: 在短暂而光辉的电影明星生涯之后，埃文斯尝试了制作。
back_translation: After a brief and illustrious career as a movie star, Evans ventured into producing.

text: the chase is on - the russians , whose dna code it is that mattie has in her backpack , and a group of terrorists compete to get the code from the person they all assume has it , gerry .
translation: 追逐开始了 - 俄罗斯人，马蒂在她的背包中拥有的DNA密码，以及一群恐怖分子都在争夺他们认为拥有密码的人，杰里。
back_translation: The chase has begun - Russians, Mattie with the DNA code in her backpack, and a group of terrorists are all vying for what they think belongs to the person with the code, Jerry.

text: munnabhai starts wooing komal but she is in love with raja ( ajay devgan ) , a local vagabond doing nothing except working in a bowling alley as a bouncer .
translation: 穆纳拜开始追求科马尔，但她爱的是拉贾（阿贾伊·德维根），一个当地的游民，除了在保龄球馆做保镖外毫无作为。
back_translation: Munabai starts to pursue Komal, but she loves Raja (Ajay Devgn), a local drifter who does nothing except work as a bodyguard at the bowling alley.

text: i complain all the time about seeing the same ideas repeated in films over and over again , but the bourne identity proves that a fresh take is always possible .
translation: 我总是抱怨电影中重复出现相同的创意，但《谍影重重》证明了新的视角总是可能的。
back_translation: I always complain about the same ideas being repeated in movies, but "The Bourne Identity" proves that new perspectives are always possible.

text: after being arrested , a young street-racing addict attempts to avoid the pitfalls of his illegal pastime .
translation: 在被逮捕后，一名年轻的街头赛车迷试图避免他非法爱好的陷阱。
back_translation: After being arrested, a young street racing enthusiast tried to avoid the pitfalls of his illegal hobby.

text: upon sighting a small , previously not there , diner , he pulls in to find help .
translation: 当他看到一个以前没有的小餐馆时，他停了下来寻找帮助。
back_translation: When he saw a small restaurant that hadn't been there before, he stopped to seek help.

text: underachieves only in not taking the shakespeare parallels quite far enough .
translation: 只是在没有将莎士比亚的类比深入挖掘到位上表现得不尽如人意。
back_translation: It simply falls short when it comes to thoroughly exploring Shakespeare's analogies.

text: with his signature sense of angry humour , activist filmmaker michael moore sets out to explore the roots of this bloodshed .
translation: 通过他标志性的愤怒幽默，活动家导演迈克尔·摩尔着手探索这场血腥冲突的根源。
back_translation: Through his signature angry humor, activist director Michael Moore sets out to explore the roots of this bloody conflict.

text: the kind of history lesson that you would n't mind seeing again and again , no matter the format .
translation: 你愿意一次又一次地观看的那种历史课，无论是什么格式。
back_translation: The kind of history lesson that you would be willing to watch over and over again, regardless of the format.

text: a well-crafted film that is all the more remarkable because it achieves its emotional power and moments of revelation with restraint and a delicate ambiguity .
translation: 一部精心制作的电影，更加令人赞叹的是，它以克制和细腻的模糊感实现了情感的力量和揭示的时刻。
back_translation: A meticulously crafted film is even more astonishing in that it achieves the power of emotion and moments of revelation with restraint and a delicate sense of ambiguity.

text: smart and fun , but far more witty than it is wise .
translation: 聪明有趣，但比起智慧来更机智。
back_translation: Smart and interesting, but more clever than wise.

text: it 's as if a bored cage spent the duration of the film 's shooting schedule waiting to scream : `` got aids yet ? ``
translation: 就好像一个无聊的鸟笼在整个电影拍摄期间都在等待尖叫：“得艾滋病了吗？”
back_translation: It's as if a bored birdcage is waiting throughout the entire filming to scream: "Did you get AIDS?"

text: feels a little too carefully crafted to be absolutely truthful , but nonetheless yields rich food for thought about the pains of the creative process and the insecurities of the artistic temperament .
translation: 感觉有些过于精心雕琢，无法完全真实，但 nonetheless 提供了丰富的思考食粮，关于创作过程中的痛苦和艺术性格的不安。
back_translation: It feels a bit overly crafted, unable to be completely authentic, but nonetheless provides rich food for thought about the pain in the creative process and the anxiety of artistic temperament.

text: she falls in love with a successful magician , whose life she has destroyed just by doing her job .
translation: 她爱上了一位成功的魔术师，而她的工作却摧毁了他的生活。
back_translation: She fell in love with a successful magician, but her job destroyed his life.

text: with so many movies out there trying and failing to produce a single honest thrill , it 's so nice to see one come along that 's packed from start to finish with 'em .
translation: 在这么多电影尝试却未能带来真正刺激的情况下，看到一部从头到尾都充满刺激的电影真是太好了。
back_translation: In a situation where so many movies attempt but fail to deliver real excitement, it's truly wonderful to see a film that is thrilling from start to finish.

text: cho 's latest comic set is n't as sharp or as fresh as i 'm the one that i want . . . but it 's still damn funny stuff .
translation: 选择最新的漫画集没有《我想要的那个》那么犀利或新鲜……但它仍然非常好笑。
back_translation: The latest comic collection isn't as sharp or fresh as "The One I Want," but it's still very funny.

text: along the way , he encounters some strange characters , one of which is a cow trained in the martial arts .
translation: 在途中，他遇到了一些奇怪的角色，其中之一是一只受过武术训练的牛。
back_translation: Along the way, he encountered some strange characters, one of which was a martial arts-trained bull.

text: mindless yet impressively lean spinoff of last summer 's bloated effects fest the mummy returns .
translation: 毫无脑子却令人印象深刻的精简衍生作品，出自于去年夏天浮夸特效的《木乃伊归来》。
back_translation: An impressively simplistic derivative work that is utterly mindless, stemming from last summer's extravagant effects in "The Mummy Returns."

text: another useless recycling of a brutal mid-'70s american sports movie .
translation: 又一次对1970年代中期美国体育电影的无用翻拍。
back_translation: Another useless remake of a sports movie from the mid-1970s in America.

text: to ease their roommate ( selma blair ) through a relationship-induced depression , cameron diaz and christina applegate take her out on the town .
translation: 为了帮助她的室友（塞尔玛·布莱尔）度过因恋爱引发的抑郁情绪，卡梅隆·迪亚兹和克里斯蒂娜·阿普尔盖特带她出去玩。
back_translation: To help her roommate (Selma Blair) cope with depression caused by a romantic relationship, Cameron Diaz and Christina Applegate took her out for some fun.

text: she must stand trial to seek freedom from a life of imprisonment .
translation: 她必须接受审判，以寻求从监禁生活中获得自由。
back_translation: She must face judgment to seek freedom from the life of imprisonment.

text: with a shower like this , what could go wrong with the wedding ?
translation: 有了这样的阵雨，婚礼会出什么问题呢？
back_translation: What problems might the wedding encounter with such a rain shower?

text: shainberg weaves a carefully balanced scenario that is controlled by neither character , is weirdly sympathetic to both and manages to be tender and darkly comic .
translation: 沙因贝格编织了一个精心平衡的情境，这个情境既不受任何角色控制，又奇怪地对双方都有同情，同时又能做到温柔且带有黑暗幽默。
back_translation: Shainberg weaves a carefully balanced scenario that is not controlled by any one character, yet strangely shows sympathy for both sides while managing to be gentle and infused with dark humor.

text: by abstracting and showing extreme details and connecting routines with themes and emotions , liesbeth worm gives a whole new perspective on day to day life .
translation: 通过抽象化、展示极端细节以及将日常生活的例行公事与主题和情感相连接，Liesbeth Worm为日常生活提供了全新的视角。
back_translation: Through abstraction, showcasing extreme details, and connecting daily routines with themes and emotions, Liesbeth Worm offers a new perspective on everyday life.

text: an invaluable historical document thanks to the filmmaker 's extraordinary access to massoud , whose charm , cultivation and devotion to his people are readily apparent .
translation: 由于电影制片人对马苏德的非凡接触，这是一份极为珍贵的历史文件，马苏德的魅力、修养和对人民的奉献精神显而易见。
back_translation: Due to the filmmaker's extraordinary access to Masoud, this is a highly valuable historical document, showcasing Masoud's charm, cultivation, and dedication to the people.

text: even if you have no interest in the gang-infested , east-vs . -west coast rap wars , this modern mob music drama never fails to fascinate .
translation: 即使你对充斥帮派的东西海岸说唱战争没有兴趣，这部现代黑帮音乐剧始终令人着迷。
back_translation: Even if you have no interest in the East Coast rap wars filled with gangs, this modern gangster musical is still captivating.

text: arliss howard 's ambitious , moving , and adventurous directorial debut , big bad love , meets so many of the challenges it poses for itself that one can forgive the film its flaws .
translation: 阿尔利斯·霍华德雄心勃勃、感人而冒险的导演处女作《大坏爱》，在面对自己提出的诸多挑战时表现得如此出色，以至于人们可以原谅这部影片的缺陷。
back_translation: Arlis Howard's ambitious, touching, and adventurous directorial debut, "Big Bad Love," performs so excellently in facing the many challenges it sets for itself that one can forgive the film's shortcomings.

text: [ seagal 's ] strenuous attempt at a change in expression could very well clinch him this year 's razzie .
translation: [西格尔]力图改变表情的艰苦尝试，很可能让他获得今年的“金酸梅奖”。
back_translation: [Sigel]'s arduous attempt to change expressions is likely to earn him this year's "Golden Raspberries."

text: much like its easily dismissive take on the upscale lifestyle , there is n't much there here .
translation: 与其对高档生活方式的轻率看法类似，这里并没有太多内容。
back_translation: Similar to the frivolous views on a high-end lifestyle, there isn't much content here.

text: a great cast and a wonderful but sometimes confusing flashback movie about growing up in a dysfunctional family .
translation: 一个出色的演员阵容和一部美好但有时令人困惑的闪回电影，讲述在一个功能失调家庭中成长的故事。
back_translation: An outstanding cast and a beautiful yet sometimes confusing film with flashbacks that tells the story of growing up in a dysfunctional family.

text: a true story set in modern times to bring people closer to the knowledge that there is a better way .
translation: 一个发生在现代的真实故事，旨在让人们更接近了解更好的方法。
back_translation: A true story set in modern times, aimed at helping people understand better ways.

text: watch as the archetypal stories of life and death , love and renewal , and battles between good and evil cross lines of culture and class to speak in the language of raw human emotion .
translation: 观看这些典范的生命与死亡、爱与重生，以及善与恶之间的斗争故事如何跨越文化和阶级的界限，以原始人类情感的语言发声。
back_translation: Watch how these exemplary stories of life and death, love and rebirth, and the struggle between good and evil transcend cultural and class boundaries, speaking in the language of primal human emotions.

text: cube 's charisma and chemistry compensate for corniness and cliche .
translation: 立方体的魅力和化学反应弥补了老套和陈词滥调。
back_translation: The charm of the cube and chemical reactions make up for the clichés and platitudes.

text: it 's not that waiting for happiness is a bad film , because it is n't . it 's just incredibly dull .
translation: 等待快乐并不是一部糟糕的电影，因为它不是。它只是无比乏味。
back_translation: Waiting for Happiness is not a terrible movie because it isn't. It is just incredibly tedious.

text: though tom shadyac 's film kicks off spookily enough , around the halfway mark it takes an abrupt turn into glucose sentimentality and laughable contrivance .
translation: 尽管汤姆·沙迪亚克的影片一开始颇具惊悚感，但在中途却突然转向了过度的甜腻情感和可笑的巧合。
back_translation: Although Tom Shadyac's film begins with a sense of thriller, it suddenly shifts midway to an excessive sweetness and ridiculous coincidences.

text: there seems to be no clear path as to where the story 's going , or how long it 's going to take to get there .
translation: 故事的发展似乎没有明确的方向，也不清楚需要多长时间才能到达那里。
back_translation: The development of the story seems to lack a clear direction, and it is also unclear how long it will take to reach there.

text: while other kids buy into countless hours of studying just so they can get a mark in some teacher 's report book , handsome davis sees it as nothing more than a system of control over your mind .
translation: 而其他孩子为了在老师的成绩单上获得分数而花费无数小时学习，英俊的大卫却认为这不过是对你思维的一种控制系统。
back_translation: While other kids spend countless hours studying to get scores on their report cards, the handsome David sees it merely as a system of control over your thinking.

text: he naively muddles through an underworld of illegal immigrants , immigration lawyers and the ins , and the love of an american girl of indian origin .
translation: 他天真地在一个非法移民、移民律师以及这些关系中挣扎，同时也在追求一个印度裔美国女孩的爱情。
back_translation: He naively struggles with an illegal immigrant, an immigration lawyer, and their relationships, while also pursuing the love of an Indian-American girl.

text: a chicago north side brothel is the setting for double-dealing and blackmail when a new madam arrives .
translation: 芝加哥北区的一家妓院成为了双重交易和勒索的背景，当一位新的女主人到来时。
back_translation: A brothel in Chicago's North Side becomes the backdrop for double dealings and blackmail when a new madam arrives.

text: for all its plot twists , and some of them verge on the bizarre as the film winds down , blood work is a strong , character-oriented piece .
translation: 尽管剧情曲折，且其中一些情节在影片接近尾声时显得有些离奇，但《血缘关系》是一部以角色为中心的强大作品。
back_translation: Despite the convoluted plot, and some of the storylines feeling a bit far-fetched as the film approaches its conclusion, "Blood Ties" is a powerful character-driven work.

text: what the director can & # 8217 ; t do is make either of val kilmer & # 8217 ; s two personas interesting or worth caring about .
translation: 导演所能做的和不能做的是让瓦尔·基尔默的两个角色变得有趣或值得关心。
back_translation: What the director can and cannot do is to make Val Kilmer's two characters interesting or worth caring about.

text: the large-frame imax camera lends itself beautifully to filming the teeming life on the reefs , making this gorgeous film a must for everyone from junior scientists to grown-up fish lovers .
translation: 大型框架IMAX相机非常适合拍摄珊瑚礁上生机勃勃的生活，使这部华丽的影片成为从初学科学的小朋友到热爱鱼类的成年人都不可错过的佳作。
back_translation: The large-format IMAX camera is perfect for capturing the vibrant life on coral reefs, making this stunning film a must-see for everyone from young science enthusiasts to adults who love fish.

text: it 's tommy 's job to clean the peep booths surrounding her , and after viewing this one , you 'll feel like mopping up , too .
translation: 清洁她周围的窥视亭是汤米的工作，看完这个后，你也会觉得想要打扫一下。
back_translation: Cleaning the viewing pavilion around her is Tommy's job, and after seeing this, you will also feel like tidying up a bit.

text: well , there is a boy named kyle who gets a warning from his friend caitlin to not peek .
translation: 有一个男孩叫凯尔，他收到了朋友凯特琳的警告，不要偷看。
back_translation: There is a boy named Kyle who received a warning from his friend Caitlin not to peek.

text: although the film boils down to a lightweight story about matchmaking , the characters make italian for beginners worth the journey
translation: 尽管这部电影的核心是一个关于搭配的轻松故事，但角色们让《意大利语入门》值得一看。
back_translation: Although the core of the movie is a light-hearted story about matching, the characters make "Italian for Beginners" worth watching.

text: claire has a great job , great friends , and a great marriage .
translation: 克莱尔有一份很好的工作，很棒的朋友，以及美好的婚姻。
back_translation: Claire has a good job, great friends, and a wonderful marriage.

text: the charm of the first movie is still there , and the story feels like the logical , unforced continuation of the careers of a pair of spy kids .
translation: 第一部电影的魅力依然存在，故事感觉像是一对间谍小孩职业生涯的合乎逻辑、不勉强的延续。
back_translation: The charm of the first film still exists, and the story feels like a logical and unobtrusive continuation of the career of a pair of spy kids.

text: we 've seen the hippie-turned-yuppie plot before , but there 's an enthusiastic charm in < i ? fire that makes the formula fresh again .
translation: 我们之前见过嬉皮士变成雅皮士的情节，但《我？火》中充满热情的魅力让这个公式重新焕发活力。
back_translation: We have seen the scenario of hippies turning into yuppies before, but the passionate charm of "Me? Fire" revitalizes this formula.

text: tunney , brimming with coltish , neurotic energy , holds the screen like a true star .
translation: 汤尼充满了年轻而神经质的活力，像真正的明星一样掌控着荧幕。
back_translation: Tony was full of youthful and nervous energy, commanding the screen like a real star.

text: genuine movie magic . . . it transports you to a place somewhere between eavesdropping voyeur and silent referee .
translation: 真正的电影魔力……它将你带到一个介于偷听者、窥视者和沉默裁判之间的地方。
back_translation: The real magic of cinema... it takes you to a place between being a listener, a voyeur, and a silent judge.

text: it 's not that their lives are not turning out as expected - it 's that they 're turning out exactly as expected .
translation: 并不是他们的生活没有按预期发展，而是他们的生活恰恰如预期发展。
back_translation: It is not that their lives did not develop as expected, but rather that their lives developed exactly as expected.

text: it almost plays like solaris , but with guns and jokes .
translation: 这几乎就像《索拉里斯》，不过加上了枪和笑话。
back_translation: It's almost like "Solaris," but with guns and jokes added.

text: there 's not a single jump-in-your-seat moment and believe it or not , jason actually takes a backseat in his own film to special effects .
translation: 没有一个让人跳起来的瞬间，信不信由你，杰森实际上在自己的电影中为了特效而退居幕后。
back_translation: There isn't a moment that makes you jump, believe it or not, Jason actually stepped back behind the scenes for special effects in his own movie.

text: though perry and hurley make inspiring efforts to breathe life into the disjointed , haphazard script by jay scherick and david ronn , neither the actors nor director reginald hudlin can make it more than fitfully entertaining .
translation: 尽管佩里和赫利努力让杰伊·谢里克和大卫·朗的支离破碎、杂乱无章的剧本充满活力，但无论是演员还是导演雷吉纳德·哈德林都无法让它变得更具娱乐性。
back_translation: Despite Perry and Huley's efforts to make Jay Sherick and David Lang's fragmented and chaotic script lively, neither the actors nor director Reginald Hudlin could make it more entertaining.

text: dr . david banner , while working on a military project to create a super-soldier of sorts , purposefully modifies his own dna .
translation: 大卫·班纳博士在一个军事项目中，旨在创造一种超级士兵，故意修改了自己的DNA。
back_translation: Dr. David Banner deliberately modified his DNA in a military project aimed at creating a super soldier.

text: once upon a time , in a tiny french village , little reinalda had dreams of a bright future on the stage - being one half of a singing , dancing musical troupe with her father .
translation: 从前，在一个小小的法国村庄里，小瑞娜尔达梦想着在舞台上拥有光明的未来——和她的父亲一起成为一个歌唱、跳舞的音乐团体的一部分。
back_translation: Once upon a time, in a small village in France, little Reynalda dreamed of a bright future on stage—becoming part of a singing and dancing musical group with her father.

text: murder , cannibalism and satanic rituals are just a few of the 1000+ horrors that await .
translation: 谋杀、食人和撒旦仪式只是1000多种等待着的恐怖之一。
back_translation: Murder, cannibalism, and satanic rituals are just one of over 1,000 horrors waiting.

text: the rabbi refuses , but gives goldman peculiar advice on how to do away with her , setting into motion a series of unexpected events .
translation: 拉比拒绝了，但给了戈德曼一些奇怪的建议，告诉她如何处理她，随之引发了一系列意想不到的事件。
back_translation: The rabbi refused, but gave Goldman some strange advice on how to deal with her, which led to a series of unexpected events.

text: since bursting onto the music scene last year with her double platinum first album 'pie on my face ' , tildy st .
translation: 自去年凭借双白金的首张专辑《我脸上的馅饼》闪亮登场音乐界以来，蒂尔迪·圣.
back_translation: Since making a dazzling debut in the music industry last year with her double platinum album "The Pie on My Face," Tirdy Saint.

text: when crystal 's infidelities become overwhelming , kali kicks her out .
translation: 当水晶的背叛变得难以忍受时，卡莉将她赶了出去。
back_translation: When the betrayal of Crystal became unbearable, Carly drove her out.

text: lotte goes to live with her upper middle class dutch aunt in holland , anna to work as a farm hand on her german uncle 's rural farm .
translation: 洛特与她的上层中产阶级荷兰阿姨一起生活，安娜则去德国叔叔的乡村农场做农场助手。
back_translation: Lotte lives with her upper-middle-class Dutch aunt, while Anna goes to her uncle's countryside farm in Germany to work as a farm assistant.

text: . . . there are enough moments of heartbreaking honesty to keep one glued to the screen .
translation: ……有足够的令人心碎的诚实时刻让人目不转睛。
back_translation: ...there are enough heartbreakingly sincere moments that captivate one's attention.

text: stuart rescues a canary , margalo , from a falcon ; she moves in with the littles .
translation: 斯图尔特从一只猎鹰手中救出了金丝雀玛戈洛，她搬进了小家庭。
back_translation: Stewart rescued the canary Margalo from a falcon, and she moved into the little family.

text: a dark psychological drama , i love your work explores the pressures of fame and the difference between getting what you want and wanting what you get .
translation: 一部黑暗的心理剧，《我爱你的作品》探讨了名声的压力以及得到自己想要的与想要自己得到的之间的区别。
back_translation: A dark psychological drama, "I Love Your Work" explores the pressure of fame and the difference between getting what one wants and wanting what one gets.

text: carlos ramirez , 28 , lives in the dominican neighborhood of washington heights in new york city , where his father eddie runs a local bodega .
translation: 卡洛斯·拉米雷斯，28岁，住在纽约市华盛顿高地的多米尼加社区，他的父亲埃迪经营着一家当地的杂货店。
back_translation: Carlos Ramirez, 28, lives in the Dominican community of Washington Heights in New York City, where his father, Eddie, runs a local grocery store.

text: defies logic , the laws of physics and almost anyone 's willingness to believe in it . but darned if it does n't also keep us riveted to our seats .
translation: 违反逻辑、物理定律以及几乎任何人的信念，但偏偏它也让我们目不转睛地盯着座位。
back_translation: It violates logic, physical laws, and almost anyone's beliefs, yet it still manages to keep us glued to our seats.

text: the new code has the ability to mutate and adapt to any computer environment just like organisms can adapt .
translation: 新代码具有像生物一样能够变异和适应任何计算机环境的能力。
back_translation: The new code has the ability to mutate and adapt to any computer environment like a living organism.

text: a sexy urban comedy about how a guy who is addicted to watching pornography discovers love is stronger than fantasy when he meets and falls in love with the girl of his dreams .
translation: 一部性感的都市喜剧，讲述一个痴迷于观看色情影片的男孩，当他遇到并爱上梦中女孩时，发现爱情比幻想更强大。
back_translation: A sexy urban comedy that tells the story of a boy obsessed with watching adult films who discovers that love is more powerful than fantasy when he meets and falls in love with the girl of his dreams.

text: a fake street drama that keeps telling you things instead of showing them .
translation: 一个虚假的街头戏剧，持续告诉你事情，而不是展示它们。
back_translation: A false street drama that keeps telling you things instead of showing them.

text: once the viewer accepts the huge leaps of faith required in the film 's premise , it 's a lot of fun to strap oneself in and enjoy this goofy ride .
translation: 一旦观众接受了影片前提中所需的巨大信念飞跃，系好安全带，尽情享受这段搞笑的旅程就会变得非常有趣。
back_translation: Once the audience makes the enormous leap of faith required by the film's premise, fasten your seatbelts and enjoy this hilarious journey becomes very enjoyable.

text: his love changes vesa , who till then has been fraught with malice to everybody .
translation: 他的爱改变了维萨，直到那时，维萨对每个人都充满了恶意。
back_translation: His love changed Visa, until then, Visa was filled with malice towards everyone.

text: these blow up another ship with jews , deports and jails the atlantic 's refugees in palestine , and then deports them to far-off mauritius islands for 5 years in jail : until the end of the war .
translation: 这些人炸毁了另一艘载有犹太人的船只，驱逐并监禁大西洋的难民在巴勒斯坦，然后将他们驱逐到遥远的毛里求斯岛，监禁五年：直到战争结束。
back_translation: These people blew up another ship carrying Jewish individuals, expelled and imprisoned Atlantic refugees in Palestine, and then deported them to the distant island of Mauritius, where they were imprisoned for five years until the end of the war.

text: as exciting as all this exoticism might sound to the typical pax viewer , the rest of us will be lulled into a coma .
translation: 尽管所有这些异国情调对典型的观众听起来可能很令人兴奋，但我们其他人将会被催眠得昏昏欲睡。
back_translation: Although all these exotic elements may sound exciting to the typical audience, the rest of us will be lulled into a sleepy daze.

text: hypnotically dull , relentlessly downbeat , laughably predictable wail pitched to the cadence of a depressed fifteen-year-old 's suicidal poetry .
translation: 催眠般沉闷，持续阴郁，像一位沮丧的十五岁少年自杀诗歌的韵律般可笑地可预测的哀鸣。
back_translation: Hypnotically dull, perpetually gloomy, like the mockingly predictable lament of a depressed fifteen-year-old boy’s suicide poem.

text: the warm presence of zhao benshan makes the preposterous lying hero into something more than he reasonably should be .
translation: 赵本山的温暖存在让这个荒唐的谎言英雄变得超出了他理应拥有的层次。
back_translation: Zhao Benshan's warm presence makes this absurd lie of a hero rise above the level he should possess.

text: if reno is to the left of liberal on the political spectrum , her tough , funny , rather chaotic show is n't subversive so much as it is nit-picky about the hypocrisies of our time .
translation: 如果里诺在政治光谱上位于自由派的左侧，她那种严厉、有趣而又略显混乱的节目并不是颠覆性的，而是对我们时代的虚伪挑毛病。
back_translation: If Rino is located on the left side of the political spectrum as a liberal, her kind of harsh, humorous, and slightly chaotic show is not subversive, but rather a critique of the hypocrisy of our times.

text: well-intentioned though it may be , its soap-opera morality tales have the antiseptic , preprogrammed feel of an after-school special .
translation: 尽管目的良好，但它的肥皂剧式道德故事却有着放课后特别节目那种消毒、预设的感觉。
back_translation: Despite the good intentions, its soap opera-style moral story has a sanitized, predetermined feel reminiscent of an after-school special.

text: then he meets syd , a 12 year-old girl with bright clothes and green hair .
translation: 然后他遇到了西德，一个穿着鲜艳衣服、留着绿色头发的12岁女孩。
back_translation: Then he met West Germany, a 12-year-old girl dressed in vibrant clothes with green hair.

text: a tender , witty , captivating film about friendship , love , memory , trust and loyalty .
translation: 一部温柔、机智、迷人的电影，关于友谊、爱情、记忆、信任和忠诚。
back_translation: A gentle, witty, and charming film about friendship, love, memory, trust, and loyalty.

text: while the new film is much more eye-catching than its blood-drenched stephen norrington-directed predecessor , the new script by the returning david s . goyer is much sillier .
translation: 虽然新电影比斯蒂芬·诺林顿执导的前作更引人注目，但由回归的大卫·S·戈耶编写的新剧本则显得更加愚蠢。
back_translation: Although the new movie is more eye-catching than the previous one directed by Stephen Norrington, the new script written by returning David S. Goyer seems even more foolish.

text: the director , mark pellington , does a terrific job conjuring up a sinister , menacing atmosphere though unfortunately all the story gives us is flashing red lights , a rattling noise , and a bump on the head .
translation: 导演马克·佩林顿在营造阴险、威胁的氛围方面做得相当出色，尽管不幸的是，故事给我们的只是闪烁的红灯、轰鸣的噪音和头部的撞击。
back_translation: Director Mark Pellington excels at creating a sinister, threatening atmosphere; however, unfortunately, the story offers us only flashing red lights, roaring noises, and head collisions.

text: the lion king was a roaring success when it was released eight years ago , but on imax it seems better , not just bigger .
translation: 《狮子王》在八年前发行时大获成功，但在IMAX上观看似乎更好，不仅仅是更大。
back_translation: "The Lion King" was a huge success when it was released eight years ago, but watching it on IMAX seems even better, not just because it's bigger.

text: he spends each night lying awake in torment , waiting and watching as the evil in the darkness grows stronger , feeding off his fear .
translation: 他每晚都躺着清醒着受折磨，等待和注视着黑暗中的邪恶变得更加强大，靠着他的恐惧滋养。
back_translation: He lies awake every night, tormented, waiting and watching as the evil in the darkness grows stronger, nourished by his fear.

text: in bucks county , pennsylvania , a five-hundred-foot crop circle is found on the farm of graham hess ( gibson ) , the town 's reverend .
translation: 在宾夕法尼亚州的巴克斯县，格雷厄姆·赫斯（吉布森）农场发现了一个五百英尺的农作物圈，赫斯是该镇的牧师。
back_translation: In Bucks County, Pennsylvania, a 500-foot crop circle was found on the farm of Graham Hess (Gibson), who is the town's pastor.

text: call it magic realism or surrealism , but miss wonton floats beyond reality with a certain degree of wit and dignity .
translation: 不论称其为魔幻现实主义还是超现实主义，温顿小姐以某种程度的机智和尊严超越了现实。
back_translation: Whether called magical realism or surrealism, Miss Winton transcends reality with a certain degree of wit and dignity.

text: a team of experts must return back in time and replace the butterfly .
translation: 一组专家必须回到过去，替换掉那只蝴蝶。
back_translation: A group of experts must go back in time to replace that butterfly.

text: their love for each other is like a beacon in the storm .
translation: 他们彼此之间的爱就像暴风雨中的灯塔。
back_translation: Their love for each other is like a lighthouse in a storm.

text: a three part documentary series that explores a unique rehabilitation program for repeat offenders and gang members .
translation: 一部三集的纪录片系列，探讨针对累犯和帮派成员的独特康复计划。
back_translation: A three-part documentary series that explores unique rehabilitation programs for repeat offenders and gang members.

text: a creepy , intermittently powerful study of a self-destructive man . . . about as unsettling to watch as an exploratory medical procedure or an autopsy .
translation: 一部令人毛骨悚然、间歇性强烈的自毁型男性的研究……观看起来就像是一场探索性的医疗程序或一次尸检一样让人不安。
back_translation: A chilling and intermittently intense study of a self-destructive male… watching it feels unsettling, like an exploratory medical procedure or an autopsy.

text: they have 3 weeks until the next full moon to find the madman , but an innocent blind woman has found him first . . .
translation: 他们有三周的时间在下一个满月之前找到那个疯子，但一个无辜的盲女人却首先找到了他……
back_translation: They have three weeks to find the madman before the next full moon, but an innocent blind woman finds him first...

text: rajput blackmails neha ( sushmita sen ) to use her professional skills to help his plan , to train three blind men to rob the bank for him .
translation: 拉贾普特勒索内哈（苏希塔·塞娜）利用她的职业技能来帮助他的计划，训练三名盲人为他抢劫银行。
back_translation: Rajaput let Soneha (Suhita Sen) uses her professional skills to assist his plan, training three blind individuals to rob a bank for him.

text: as lo-fi as the special effects are , the folks who cobbled nemesis together indulge the force of humanity over hardware in a way that george lucas has long forgotten .
translation: 尽管这个特效低糜，那些将《宿敌》拼凑在一起的人以一种乔治·卢卡斯早已遗忘的方式，沉浸于人性之力而非硬件。
back_translation: Although the special effects are low-budget, those who pieced together "The Adversary" immersed themselves in the power of humanity rather than hardware, in a way that George Lucas had long forgotten.

text: she struggles as a barmaid with occasional singing acts in a dubious bar in chicago .
translation: 她在芝加哥一家可疑的酒吧担任酒保，偶尔还会表演唱歌。
back_translation: She works as a bartender at a questionable bar in Chicago and occasionally performs singing.

text: he arrives in the small welsh town , unsettling the life of his ex-lover ( redgrave ) while inspiring his newfound daughter to follow in his footsteps with a musical career of her own , against the wishes of her mother .
translation: 他来到了这个小威尔士镇，打扰了他前情人的生活（雷德格雷夫饰），同时激励他新认识的女儿追随他的脚步，追求自己的音乐事业，尽管她的母亲反对。
back_translation: He arrived in this small Welsh town, disrupting the life of his ex-lover (played by Redgrave), while inspiring his newly acquainted daughter to follow in his footsteps and pursue her music career, despite her mother's opposition.

text: for all its bile and incoherence , in praise of love is filled with haunting images and insights . godard may be a lion in winter , but the lion still roars .
translation: 尽管充满了恶毒和不连贯，《爱之赞歌》仍然充满了萦绕心头的意象和洞察。戈达尔可能是冬日的狮子，但那狮子依然在咆哮。
back_translation: Despite being filled with malice and incoherence, "The Song of Love" is still rich in lingering imagery and insight. Godard may be a lion in winter, but that lion still roars.

text: little incidents pile up , and eventually what was strange becomes terrifying .
translation: 小事不断累积，最终原本奇怪的事情变得可怕。
back_translation: Small matters accumulate endlessly, and ultimately what was once strange becomes terrifying.

text: her unsolicited yet intriguing input begins to inadvertently influence alex and his story and soon real life begins to imitate art .
translation: 她的无意而又引人入胜的意见开始不自觉地影响亚历克斯和他的故事，现实生活很快就开始模仿艺术。
back_translation: Her unintentional yet captivating opinions began to unconsciously influence Alex and his story, as real life quickly started to mimic art.

text: this extremely unfunny film clocks in at 80 minutes , but feels twice as long .
translation: 这部极其不好笑的电影时长80分钟，但感觉像是两倍那么长。
back_translation: This extremely unfunny movie has a runtime of 80 minutes, but it feels like it lasts twice as long.

text: it 's hard to like a film about a guy who is utterly unlikeable , and shiner , starring michael caine as an aging british boxing promoter desperate for a taste of fame and fortune , is certainly that .

translation: 女性焦虑的情感过载不可逆转地拖累了这部电影。
back_translation: The emotional overload of female anxiety has irreversibly hampered this film.

text: soon she finds herself in the most bizarre situations like doing `` harry & # 38 ; sally `` 's famous faked orgasm scene , judging everyone , starting fights and visiting the theatre to find out her boyfriend is `` doing `` other girls on stage .
translation: 不久，她发现自己身处最离奇的情境中，比如重现《哈里与莎莉》中的著名假高潮场景，评判每个人，挑起争吵，以及去剧院发现她的男朋友正在台上“交往”其他女孩。
back_translation: Before long, she found herself in the strangest situations, such as reenacting the famous fake orgasm scene from "When Harry Met Sally," judging everyone, stirring up arguments, and going to the theater only to discover her boyfriend "dating" other girls on stage.

text: while the plot follows a predictable connect-the-dots course . . . director john schultz colors the picture in some evocative shades .
translation: 虽然情节遵循一个可预测的连接点线路……导演约翰·舒尔茨为画面增添了一些富有表现力的色彩。
back_translation: Although the plot follows a predictable connection point storyline, director John Schultz adds some expressive colors to the visuals.

text: me without you has a bracing truth that 's refreshing after the phoniness of female-bonding pictures like divine secrets of the ya-ya sisterhood .
translation: 我没有你的生活中有一种振奋人心的真实感，在女性友谊影片《雅雅姐妹会的神圣秘密》等虚假之作之后让人耳目一新。
back_translation: I don't have the invigorating sense of reality that exists in your life, which is refreshing after watching false works like the women's friendship film "The Sacred Secret of the Yaya Sisterhood."

text: the search takes the family to strife-torn sri lanka , where amudha comes face-to-face with reality , and reconciles herself to it .
translation: 这次寻找使家庭来到了饱受战乱的斯里兰卡，阿穆达与现实正面交锋，并与之和解。
back_translation: This time, the search brought the family to war-torn Sri Lanka, where Amuda confronted reality and reconciled with it.

text: there 's not enough here to justify the almost two hours .
translation: 这里没有足够的内容来证明将近两个小时的时间是值得的。
back_translation: There is not enough content here to prove that nearly two hours of time is worthwhile.

text: matters become even more complicated when juwanna realizes that he is falling for his teammate michelle ( vivica a . fox ) , who shows him that there is more to women than meets the eye .
translation: 当朱万娜意识到自己爱上了队友米歇尔（维维卡·A·福克斯饰）时，事情变得更加复杂，米歇尔向他展示了女性的内涵远不止表面所显现的。
back_translation: When Juanna realizes that she has fallen in love with her teammate Michelle (played by Vivica A. Fox), things become even more complicated as Michelle shows her that the essence of womanhood goes far beyond what is merely visible on the surface.

text: based on the famous 1947 hoax letter written to vought aviation in which thousands of copies have since been distributed .
translation: 基于1947年写给沃特航空公司的著名恶作剧信件，未经授权的副本已被传播数千份。
back_translation: Based on the famous prank letter written to the Walter Aviation Company in 1947, unauthorized copies have been circulated thousands of times.

text: a british television personality , terry twillstein ( bob odenkirk ) , gets sight of ronnie and brings ronnie to hollywood to get him his own tv show .
translation: 一位英国电视名人，特里·特维尔斯坦（鲍勃·奥登科克），看到了罗尼，并将罗尼带到好莱坞，为他争取自己的电视节目。
back_translation: A British television personality, Terry Tevletring (Bob Odenkirk), saw Ronnie and brought him to Hollywood to help him secure his own television show.

text: the tuxedo was n't just bad ; it was , as my friend david cross would call it , 'hungry-man portions of bad ' .
translation: 这件燕尾服不仅糟糕；正如我的朋友大卫·克罗斯所说，它是“超级大份的糟糕”。
back_translation: This tuxedo is not just bad; as my friend David Cross put it, it's "super-sized bad."

text: kimberly corman and her friends decide to head out on a trip .
translation: 金伯利·科曼和她的朋友们决定出去旅行。
back_translation: Kimberly Koman and her friends decided to go on a trip.

text: utterly lacking in charm , wit and invention , roberto benigni 's pinocchio is an astonishingly bad film .
translation: 完全缺乏魅力、机智和创意，罗伯托·贝尼尼的《木偶奇遇记》是一部令人惊讶的糟糕电影。
back_translation: Completely lacking in charm, wit, and creativity, Roberto Benigni's "Pinocchio" is a surprisingly terrible film.

text: an experimental documentary about a family 's loss of a child and the struggle between remembrance and forgetting .
translation: 一部实验性纪录片，讲述了一个家庭失去孩子的故事，以及在怀念与遗忘之间的挣扎。
back_translation: An experimental documentary that tells the story of a family losing a child and their struggle between remembrance and forgetfulness.

text: message movie or an action-packed submarine spectacular ? alas , it 's neither .
translation: 这是一部信息电影，也不是一部充满动作的潜艇大片。唉，它两者都不是。
back_translation: This is an informational film, and it is not an action-packed submarine blockbuster either. Alas, it is neither.

text: 'wheatfield with crows ' takes the life of vincent van gogh and sets it in the modern day music industry .
translation: 《麦田与乌鸦》将文森特·梵高的生命置于现代音乐产业之中。
back_translation: "The Wheatfield and the Crows" places Vincent van Gogh's life within the context of the modern music industry.

text: a dozen years later we find west is an inmate at a forbidding old prison .
translation: 十二年后，我们发现韦斯是一名被关在一所阴森古老监狱的囚犯。
back_translation: Twelve years later, we find that Wes is a prisoner locked away in a grim, ancient prison.

text: an immensely entertaining look at some of the unsung heroes of 20th century pop music .
translation: 对20世纪流行音乐一些不为人知的英雄的极具娱乐性的观察。
back_translation: An entertaining observation of some little-known heroes of 20th-century popular music.

text: broomfield reveals an ironic manifestation of institutionalized slavery that ties a black-owned record label with a white-empowered police force .
translation: 布鲁姆菲尔德揭示了一种讽刺性的制度化奴隶制表现，将一个黑人拥有的唱片公司与一个白人主导的警察力量联系在一起。
back_translation: Bloomfield reveals a ironic manifestation of institutionalized slavery, linking a black-owned record company to a predominantly white police force.

text: even on those rare occasions when the narrator stops yammering , miller 's hand often feels unsure .
translation: 即使在叙述者难得停止喋喋不休的时刻，米勒的手依然常常感到不确定。
back_translation: Even in the rare moments when the narrator stops his incessant chatter, Miller's hands still often feel uncertain.

text: a brain twister , less a movie-movie than a funny and weird meditation on hollywood , success , artistic integrity and intellectual bankruptcy .
translation: 一个脑筋急转弯，少于一部电影，更像是一种有趣而奇怪的对好莱坞、成功、艺术诚信和智力贫困的沉思。
back_translation: A riddle that is less than a movie, more like an interesting and strange reflection on Hollywood, success, artistic integrity, and intellectual poverty.

text: consequently , what begins as an enthusiastic road trip is soon plagued with mysterious roadside obstacles that threaten to prevent the boys from ever making it to the competition .
translation: 因此，最初充满热情的公路旅行很快就被神秘的路边障碍困扰，这些障碍威胁着让男孩们无法顺利参加比赛。
back_translation: Therefore, the initially enthusiastic road trip was soon plagued by mysterious roadside obstacles, which threatened to prevent the boys from participating in the competition smoothly.

text: shanghai ghetto , much stranger than any fiction , brings this unknown slice of history affectingly to life .
translation: 上海贫民区，比任何虚构的故事都要奇异，以感人的方式将这一未知的历史片段生动呈现。
back_translation: The slums of Shanghai are more bizarre than any fictional story, vividly presenting this unknown historical fragment in an emotional way.

text: inherently caustic and oddly whimsical , the film chimes in on the grieving process and strangely draws the audience into the unexplainable pain and eccentricities that are attached to the concept of loss .
translation: 本片本质上具有腐蚀性和奇异的异想天开，探讨了悲伤的过程，并奇怪地将观众带入与失去这一概念相关的无法解释的痛苦和怪异之中。
back_translation: This film essentially has a corrosive and bizarre whimsy, exploring the process of grief and strangely immersing the audience in the inexplicable pain and strangeness associated with the concept of loss.

text: the obnoxious special effects , the obligatory outbursts of flatulence and the incessant , so-five-minutes-ago pop music on the soundtrack overwhelm what is left of the scruffy , dopey old hanna-barbera charm .
translation: 恼人的特效、必不可少的放屁爆发以及不断重复的、早已过时的流行音乐在配乐中淹没了剩下的那点粗糙而傻乎乎的汉纳-巴伯拉魅力。
back_translation: Annoying special effects, essential fart explosions, and the incessant repetition of outdated pop music drown out what little rough and silly Hanna-Barbera charm remains.

text: ver wiel has concocted one of the most elaborately twisted , diverting caper films in years .
translation: 维尔·韦尔创作了一部近年来最复杂且引人入胜的抢劫电影。
back_translation: Veil Ver has created one of the most complex and captivating heist films in recent years.

text: james clayton ( farrell ) might not have the attitude of a typical recruit , but he is one of the smartest graduating seniors in the country - and he 's just the person that walter burke ( pacino ) wants in the agency .
translation: 詹姆斯·克莱顿（法瑞尔）可能没有典型招聘者的态度，但他是全国最聪明的毕业生之一——而且他正是沃尔特·伯克（阿尔·帕西诺）想要的那种人。
back_translation: James Clayton (Farrell) may not have the typical recruiter's attitude, but he is one of the brightest graduates in the nation—and he is exactly the kind of person that Walter Burke (Al Pacino) wants.

text: a serious movie with serious ideas . but seriously , folks , it does n't work .
translation: 一部有着严肃理念的严肃电影。但说真的，伙计们，它并没有奏效。
back_translation: A serious movie with serious ideas. But to be honest, guys, it just didn't work.

text: to get the job done , they must all do what they have never done before # trust each other .
translation: 为了完成任务，他们必须做一些他们从未做过的事情 # 相互信任。
back_translation: In order to complete the task, they must do something they have never done before: trust each other.

text: its scenes and sensibility are all more than familiar , but it exudes a kind of nostalgic spy-movie charm and , at the same time , is so fresh and free of the usual thriller nonsense that it all seems to be happening for the first time .
translation: 它的场景和感性都显得非常熟悉，但却散发出一种怀旧的间谍电影魅力，同时又如此新颖，摆脱了通常惊悚片的无谓干扰，使一切看起来仿佛是第一次发生。
back_translation: Its scenes and emotions feel very familiar, yet they exude a nostalgic charm of a spy movie, while being so novel that it frees itself from the usual pointless distractions of thrillers, making everything seem like it's happening for the first time.

text: suddenly a hand can do something no hand has done before and lips something no lips have ever done .
translation: 突然，一只手能做一些前所未有的事情，而嘴唇也能做一些从未有过的事情。
back_translation: Suddenly, a hand can do some unprecedented things, and lips can also do things that have never been done before.

text: at the same time , gwen who writes for the college paper , is tasked with doing a story on him , but van is too busy partying to do that .
translation: 与此同时，格温为学校报纸写作，她被指派去做一个关于他的故事，但范太忙于聚会，无法做到这一点。
back_translation: Meanwhile, Gwen is writing for the school newspaper, and she is assigned to do a story about him, but Van is too busy with parties to do it.

text: while accompanying an us senator on his mission in cuba , he makes a botch of so many things , that a minor blunder by the senator turns into a serious incident , which intensifies into a second cuban crisis - thanks to further entanglements by the media , police , and diplomats who represent the arch-enemies usa and cuba .
translation: 在陪同一名美国参议员前往古巴的任务中，他处理了许多事情，结果导致参议员一个小失误演变成一个严重事件，进一步升级为第二次古巴危机——这一切还要归咎于媒体、警察和代表美国与古巴这两个宿敌的外交官的进一步纠缠。
back_translation: During a mission accompanying a U.S. senator to Cuba, he handled many matters, which resulted in a small mistake by the senator evolving into a serious incident, further escalating into the second Cuban crisis—this was all attributed to the further entanglement of the media, the police, and diplomats representing the two rivals, the U.S. and Cuba.

text: this `` league `` comprises seafarer/inventor captain nemo ( shah ) , vampiress mina harker ( wilson ) , an invisible man named rodney skinner ( curran ) , american secret service agent tom sawyer ( west ) , the ageless and invincible dorian gray ( townsend ) , and the dangerous split personality of dr . jekyll/mr .
translation: 这个“联盟”由水手/发明家尼莫船长（沙赫）、吸血鬼米娜·哈克（威尔逊）、名叫罗德尼·斯金纳的隐形人（卡朗）、美国秘密特工汤姆·索亚（韦斯特）、永恒不老的多里安·格雷（汤森德）以及危险的杰基尔博士/海德先生的双重人格组成。
back_translation: This "League" is composed of Captain Nemo, the sailor/inventor (Shah), the vampire Mina Harker (Wilson), an invisible man named Rodney Skinner (Karan), American secret agent Tom Sawyer (West), the eternally youthful Dorian Gray (Townsend), and the dangerous dual personality of Dr. Jekyll/Mr. Hyde.

text: the movie begins in the past where a young boy named sam attempts to save celebi from a hunter .
translation: 电影开始于过去，一个名叫萨姆的小男孩试图从猎人手中救出塞雷比。
back_translation: The movie starts in the past, where a little boy named Sam tries to rescue Celebi from the hands of a hunter.

text: after several scenes of this tacky nonsense , you 'll be wistful for the testosterone-charged wizardry of jerry bruckheimer productions , especially because half past dead is like the rock on a wal-mart budget .
translation: 经过几场这种低俗的无聊场景后，你会怀念杰瑞·布鲁克海默制片公司充满睾酮的魔法，尤其是因为《半死不活》就像是在沃尔玛预算上的《超级巨石》。
back_translation: After a few scenes of this lowbrow boredom, you'll long for the testosterone-filled magic of Jerry Bruckheimer's production company, especially because "Half Alive" feels like a "super rock" on a Walmart budget.

text: when the day finally comes , johnny breaks from joe , which leads to only one thing - violence .
translation: 当那一天终于到来时，约翰尼从乔那里解脱出来，这只导致了一件事——暴力。
back_translation: When that day finally arrived, Johnny was freed from Joe, which only led to one thing - violence.

text: oops , she 's really done it this time . that chirpy songbird britney spears has popped up with more mindless drivel .
translation: 哎呀，她这次真的做到了。那个活泼的小鸟布兰妮·斯皮尔斯又出现了一些无脑的胡言乱语。
back_translation: Oh, she really did it this time. That lively little bird, Britney Spears, has come out with some mindless nonsense again.

text: this re-do is so dumb and so exploitative in its violence that , ironically , it becomes everything that the rather clumsy original was railing against .
translation: 这个重拍如此愚蠢，暴力又剥削，以至于讽刺的是，它变成了原版那种笨拙的片子所抗拒的一切。
back_translation: This remake is so stupid, violent, and exploitative that ironically, it has become everything that the original clumsy film resisted.

text: when young , virginal caroline ( misty mundae ) learns of her mother 's death in paris , she travels to the city of lights for the funeral .
translation: 年轻的处女卡罗琳（米斯蒂·穆恩戴）得知母亲在巴黎去世的消息后，前往这个光之城参加葬礼。
back_translation: The young virgin Caroline (Misty Moonday) heads to the City of Light to attend her mother’s funeral after hearing the news of her death in Paris.

text: skins has a desolate air , but eyre , a native american raised by white parents , manages to infuse the rocky path to sibling reconciliation with flashes of warmth and gentle humor .
translation: 《皮肤》散发着一种荒凉的气息，但由白人父母抚养的美洲土著艾尔（Eyre）成功地为兄弟姐妹和解的艰难旅程注入了温暖与温柔幽默的闪光。
back_translation: "Skin" radiates a sense of desolation, yet Eyre, a Native American raised by white parents, successfully infuses the difficult journey of reconciliation among siblings with warmth and a touch of gentle humor.

text: there is no pleasure in watching a child suffer . just embarrassment and a vague sense of shame .
translation: 看着一个孩子痛苦没有任何乐趣。只有尴尬和模糊的羞愧感。
back_translation: Watching a child suffer brings no joy at all. Only awkwardness and a vague sense of shame.

text: enigma looks great , has solid acting and a neat premise . yet why it fails is a riddle wrapped in a mystery inside an enigma .
translation: 《谜》看起来很棒，表演扎实，前提有趣。然而，它为什么失败则是一个裹着谜团的谜团。
back_translation: "The Riddle" looks great, the performances are solid, and the premise is interesting. However, why it failed is a mystery wrapped in an enigma.

text: ultimately , she must accept that those she loves can give her love and nothing more and that she must find her own , uncertain way .
translation: 最终，她必须接受她所爱的人只能给她爱，而没有更多，她必须找到自己那条不确定的道路。
back_translation: In the end, she had to accept that the person she loved could only give her love and nothing more; she had to find her own uncertain path.

text: for carlos - who has been challenged by his mentor to rework a superficial comic strip into something with depth and substance - running the store is the last thing on his mind .
translation: 对于卡洛斯而言，他的导师挑战他将一部肤浅的漫画条目重新加工成更有深度和内涵的作品，经营商店是他最后考虑的事情。
back_translation: For Carlos, his mentor challenged him to rework a superficial comic strip into a more profound and meaningful piece, while running a shop was the last thing on his mind.

text: as tweedy talks about canning his stockbroker and repairing his pool , you yearn for a few airborne tv sets or nude groupies on the nod to liven things up .
translation: 当特威迪谈论解雇他的股票经纪人和修理他的游泳池时，你渴望一些漂浮的电视机或在昏迷状态下的裸体乐队女歌迷来活跃气氛。
back_translation: When Tweedy talks about firing his stockbroker and fixing his swimming pool, you long for some floating televisions or naked band groupies in a comatose state to liven up the atmosphere.

text: but as documentary filmmaker , zeus papagianakopoulous , is about to find out , the real story took place when the cameras were n't rolling .
translation: 但作为纪录片制作人，宙斯·帕帕基亚纳科普洛斯即将发现，真正的故事发生在摄像机没有拍摄的时候。
back_translation: But as a documentary filmmaker, Zeus Papachristopoulos is about to discover that the real story happens when the camera is not rolling.

text: traffics in the kind of prechewed racial clichM-is that have already been through the corporate stand-up-comedy mill .
translation: 在那种已经被企业脱口秀磨练过的、被预先咀嚼的种族陈词滥调中流通。
back_translation: Circulating in those racial clichés that have already been polished by corporate stand-up and pre-digested.

text: one of the pleasures in walter 's documentary . . . is the parade of veteran painters , confounded dealers , and miscellaneous bohos who expound upon the subject 's mysterious personality without ever explaining him .
translation: 沃尔特的纪录片中的一个乐趣是，一群资深画家、困惑的经销商和各种各样的波希米亚人排成一队，他们对这个主题神秘的个性进行阐述，却从未真正解释他。
back_translation: One of the pleasures of Walter's documentary is the lineup of seasoned artists, perplexed dealers, and various Bohemians who elaborate on the mysterious personality of the subject, yet never truly explain him.

text: but he finds an unlikely ally in sofia , beno 's sultry mistress .
translation: 但他意外地找到了一个不太可能的盟友——索非亚，贝诺的性感情人。
back_translation: But he unexpectedly found an unlikely ally—Sophia, Beno's sexy lover.

text: fraud feathers and fairies ( one of the stories from the 'red rock ' trilogy of stage plays ) is based on the california gold rush era in the mythical town of red rock .
translation: 欺诈、羽毛与小精灵（红岩三部曲舞台剧之一）以加利福尼亚淘金热时期的神秘城镇红岩为背景。
back_translation: Fraud, Feathers, and Pixies (one of the Red Rock Trilogy stage plays) is set against the backdrop of the mysterious town of Red Rock during the California Gold Rush.

text: greg kinnear gives a mesmerizing performance as a full-fledged sex addict who is in complete denial about his obsessive behavior .
translation: 格雷格·基尼尔的表演令人着迷，他饰演一位完全沉溺于性欲的瘾君子，完全否认自己的强迫行为。
back_translation: Greg Kinnear's performance is captivating, as he plays an addict completely consumed by lust, who completely denies his compulsive behavior.

text: stryker puts into motion a plan to eradicate the mutants and begins an offensive on the x-men mansion and school .
translation: 斯特莱克启动了一项计划来消灭变种人，并对X战警的府邸和学校发起了攻击。
back_translation: Striker launched a plan to exterminate mutants and attacked the X-Men's mansion and school.

text: the documentary will combine an interview with mr . mcnamara discussing some of the tragedies and glories of the 20th century , archival footage , documents , and an original score by philip glass .
translation: 这部纪录片将结合麦克纳马先生的访谈，讨论20世纪的一些悲剧和辉煌，档案录像、文件以及菲利普·格拉斯创作的原创音乐。
back_translation: This documentary will combine interviews with Mr. McNamara to discuss some tragedies and glories of the 20th century, along with archival footage, documents, and original music created by Philip Glass.

text: he also does n't realize that he accidentally left one of his shoes there .
translation: 他也没有意识到他不小心把其中一只鞋子留在那里。
back_translation: He also didn't realize that he accidentally left one of his shoes there.

text: it could change america , not only because it is full of necessary discussion points , but because it is so accessible that it makes complex politics understandable to viewers looking for nothing but energetic entertainment .
translation: 它可以改变美国，不仅因为它充满了必要的讨论点，还因为它如此易于接近，使得复杂的政治对寻求活力娱乐的观众变得易于理解。
back_translation: It has the potential to change America, not only because it is filled with essential discussion points, but also because it is so accessible, making complex politics easier for audiences seeking lively entertainment to understand.

text: anyone who suffers through this film deserves , at the very least , a big box of consolation candy .
translation: 任何经历这部电影的人，至少都应得到一大盒安慰糖果。
back_translation: Anyone who experiences this movie should at least receive a big box of comfort candy.

text: it proves quite compelling as an intense , brooding character study .
translation: 这证明了它作为一个强烈而沉思的角色研究非常引人注目。
back_translation: This demonstrates that it is a highly engaging character study that is both intense and thought-provoking.

text: the internment of 120 , 000 innocent people was a dark moment in the history of this country .
translation: 对120,000名无辜者的拘禁是这个国家历史上的一个黑暗时刻。
back_translation: The detention of 120,000 innocents is a dark moment in the history of this country.

text: then you remember where the bad dreams came from .
translation: 那你还记得那些噩梦来自哪里。
back_translation: Do you still remember where those nightmares came from?

text: ajileo journeys from his home in zapotitlan de salinas , a village in southern mexico , makes a perilious border crossing through the desert , and comes to hollywood , where everything and nothing is as he dreamed it would be .
translation: 阿希雷奥从墨西哥南部的萨波蒂特兰·德·萨利纳斯的家出发，经历危险的沙漠边境越境，最终来到了好莱坞，在这里，一切又似乎与他的梦想相符，又似乎与他的梦想相违。
back_translation: Achileo set off from his home in Zapotitlán de Salinas in southern Mexico, crossed the dangerous desert border, and eventually arrived in Hollywood, where everything seemed to align with his dreams yet also seemed to contradict them.

text: by contrast , tom finds her world increasingly seductive , and as fatal gradually loses the only person she trusts , she discovers destiny has other plans .
translation: 相反，汤姆发现她的世界越来越迷人，而随着费塔尔渐渐失去她唯一信任的人，她发现命运有其他的安排。
back_translation: On the contrary, Tom found her world increasingly fascinating, and as Fatal gradually lost the only person she trusted, she discovered that fate had other plans.

text: a few zingers aside , the writing is indifferent , and jordan brady 's direction is prosaic .
translation: 几句尖锐的评论之外，这部作品的写作平淡无奇，乔丹·布雷迪的导演手法也很平庸。
back_translation: Besides a few sharp comments, the writing of this work is dull and unremarkable, and Jordan Brady's directorial approach is also quite mediocre.

text: as an actress , madonna is one helluva singer . as the mediterranean sparkles , 'swept away ' sinks .
translation: 作为一名女演员，麦当娜是一位了不起的歌手。随着地中海的闪耀，《被席卷而去》沉没。
back_translation: As an actress, Madonna is an amazing singer. With the sparkle of the Mediterranean, " swept away" sinks.

text: the last 6 weeks have been spent trying to `` get out `` of the relationship .
translation: 过去六周一直在努力“摆脱”这段关系。
back_translation: I have been working hard to "get out of" this relationship for the past six weeks.

text: one horrible night , kimberly mathews , a random girl from the nearby town , wanders too close to willy 's territory .
translation: 一个可怕的夜晚，附近城镇的一个随机女孩金伯莉·马修斯走得太靠近威利的领地。
back_translation: On a frightening night, a random girl from a nearby town, Kimberly Matthews, walked too close to Willy's territory.

text: in the heart of a sanitized suburban neighborhood , herbert 's everyday life is filled with constant emasculation at the hands of his wife , eleanor , and the daily grind of work on the chain .
translation: 在一个经过消毒的郊区社区的中心，赫伯特的日常生活充满了妻子埃莉诺的不断削弱以及连锁店的日常工作压力。
back_translation: In the center of a sanitized suburban community, Herbert's daily life is filled with the continuous weakening of his wife Eleanor and the everyday work pressures of the chain store.

text: thurman plays a character known as the bride , a pregnant assassin who is shot by her boss , bill ( david carradine ) , on her wedding day , leaving herself and the wedding guests lying for dead .
translation: 瑟曼饰演一个名为新娘的角色，一位怀孕的刺客，她在婚礼当天被她的老板比尔（大卫·卡拉丁）射杀，导致她自己和婚礼嘉宾们都倒在地上，似乎已经死去。
back_translation: Thurman plays a character named The Bride, a pregnant assassin who is shot by her boss Bill (David Carradine) on her wedding day, which causes her and the wedding guests to fall to the ground, apparently dead.

text: a wedding is arranged and cassandra is left on the sidelines as everyone around her is drawn into a maelstrom of interconnected relationships .
translation: 一场婚礼即将举行，而卡桑德拉被留下在一旁，周围的人们则卷入了一场错综复杂的关系漩涡中。
back_translation: A wedding is about to be held, and Cassandra is left alone while the people around her become entangled in a complex web of relationships.

text: beautifully written and directed and packed with excellent performances .
translation: 编写精美，导演出色，充满了卓越的表演。
back_translation: Beautifully crafted, excellently directed, and filled with outstanding performances.

text: thirteen conversations about one thing lays out a narrative puzzle that interweaves individual stories , and , like a mobius strip , elliptically loops back to where it began .
translation: 《关于一件事的十三次对话》构建了一个叙事难题，将个人故事交织在一起，像莫比乌斯带一样，椭圆形地循环回到它开始的地方。
back_translation: "The Thirteen Dialogues About One Matter" constructs a narrative dilemma, intertwining personal stories that loop back elliptically to where they began, like a Möbius strip.

text: the police have no clues nor suspects until nick and his colleague realize the killer is a giant octopus .
translation: 警方没有线索，也没有嫌疑人，直到尼克和他的同事意识到凶手是一个巨型章鱼。
back_translation: The police had no clues and no suspects until Nick and his colleagues realized that the killer was a giant octopus.

text: as rachel and daniel race through london 's nightscape , desperate to stay one step ahead of betts , every discovery unleashes further hell , extending way beyond the disappearance of rachel 's baby .
translation: 在伦敦的夜景中，瑞秋和丹尼尔拼命奔跑，急于在贝茨之前保持一步，每一个发现都释放出更大的灾难，远远超出了瑞秋孩子失踪的范围。
back_translation: In the night scene of London, Rachel and Daniel run desperately, eager to stay one step ahead of Bates, with each discovery unleashing a greater disaster that far exceeds the scope of Rachel's missing child.

text: jim finally proposes to michelle , and both families gather for their upcoming wedding .
translation: 吉姆终于向米歇尔求婚，两家人齐聚一堂为即将到来的婚礼庆祝。
back_translation: Jim finally proposed to Michelle, and both families gathered together to celebrate the upcoming wedding.

text: the movie addresses a hungry need for pg-rated , nonthreatening family movies , but it does n't go too much further .
translation: 这部电影满足了对 PG 级别、无威胁的家庭电影的迫切需求，但没有更进一步。
back_translation: This movie meets the urgent need for a PG-rated, non-threatening family film, but doesn't go any further.

text: although very much like the first movie based on j . k . rowling 's phenomenal fantasy best sellers , this second go-round possesses a quite pleasing , headlong thrust and a likably delinquent attitude .
translation: 尽管与基于J.K. 罗琳现象级奇幻畅销书的第一部电影非常相似，这第二部却拥有一种令人愉悦的、迅猛的推进力以及一种可爱的叛逆态度。
back_translation: Despite being very similar to the first movie based on J.K. Rowling's phenomenally successful fantasy bestseller, this second installment possesses a delightful, rapid momentum and a charmingly rebellious attitude.

text: there 's undeniable enjoyment to be had from films crammed with movie references , but the fun wears thin -- then out -- when there 's nothing else happening .
translation: 充满电影引用的影片无疑令人享受，但当没有其他情节时，乐趣就会逐渐减退，甚至消失。
back_translation: A film full of movie references is undoubtedly enjoyable, but when there is no other plot, the fun gradually diminishes, or even disappears.

text: now joined by teiresias , the former king forces his daughter back to her senses and the horrifying realization that not only is her son dead , but that agave herself was `` amongst his butchers . ``
translation: 现在在提瑞西亚斯的陪伴下，前国王迫使他的女儿回归理智，令人毛骨悚然的意识到，不仅她的儿子死了，而且阿伽维自己也是“他屠杀者之一”。
back_translation: Now, accompanied by Tiresias, the former king forces his daughter to return to her senses, chillingly realizing that not only is her son dead, but Agave herself is also "one of his slaughterers."

text: its spirit of iconoclastic abandon -- however canned -- makes for unexpectedly giddy viewing .
translation: 它这种偶像破坏的放纵精神——尽管有些陈腐——却带来了意想不到的愉悦观感。
back_translation: Its indulgent spirit of idol destruction—though somewhat clichéd—brings an unexpected sense of pleasure.

text: notorious c . h . o . has oodles of vulgar highlights .
translation: 恶名昭彰的C.H.O.有着大量粗俗的亮点。
back_translation: The infamous C.H.O. has a lot of vulgar highlights.

text: dana , a college student obsessed with the internet , explores the media to an extent where chatting with a stranger , becomes a higher priority than giving attention to her loved ones .
translation: 达娜是一名沉迷于互联网的大学生，她探索媒体的程度达到与陌生人聊天变得比关注自己的亲人更重要。
back_translation: Dana is a college student addicted to the internet, to the extent that chatting with strangers has become more important to her than paying attention to her own family.

text: a bright , inventive , thoroughly winning flight of revisionist fancy .
translation: 一个聪明、有创意、彻底成功的修正主义幻想的光辉飞翔。
back_translation: A brilliant flight of a smart, creative, and thoroughly successful revisionist fantasy.

text: it should be interesting , it should be poignant , it turns out to be affected and boring .
translation: 它应该是有趣的，应该是感人的，结果却显得乏味而无趣。
back_translation: It was supposed to be interesting and moving, but it ended up feeling dull and uninteresting.

text: west has now identified an electrical phenomenon # the nee # which is discharged from the brain at the moment of death . . . and which may be the 'missing link ' in his studies : if the nee is re-injected into a re-animated corpse , it should restore the 'subject ' to full 'reason ' . . .
translation: 西方现在已经识别出一种电气现象# nee #，它在临死的瞬间从大脑中释放出来……这可能是他研究中的“失落环节”：如果将nee重新注入复生的尸体，它应该能使“主体”恢复完全的“理智”……
back_translation: The West has now identified an electrical phenomenon called #nee#, which is released from the brain at the moment of death... This may be the "missing link" in his research: if nee is reinjected into a revived corpse, it should enable the "subject" to regain full "rationality"...

text: thoughtful , even stinging at times , and lots of fun .
translation: 深思熟虑，甚至有时带刺，且十分有趣。
back_translation: Thoughtful, sometimes even sharp-tongued, and very interesting.

text: a carefully structured scream of consciousness that is tortured and unsettling -- but unquestionably alive .
translation: 一个经过精心构建的意识尖叫，扭曲而令人不安——但无疑是活着的。
back_translation: A meticulously constructed scream of consciousness, twisted and unsettling—but undoubtedly alive.

text: shortly thereafter , kilo is involved in a drug deal with a wired frat boy that goes bad and he is imprisoned .
translation: 不久之后，基洛与一个被窃听的兄弟会男孩卷入了一桩药物交易，这笔交易出了问题，导致他被监禁。
back_translation: Not long after, Kilo got involved in a drug deal with a brotherhood boy who was being wiretapped, and the deal went wrong, resulting in his imprisonment.

text: a young reporter named rachel is investigating these events , but after she and her small son watch the tape , it becomes a race against time to find out why the tape is killing everyone and how it could be stopped .
translation: 一位名叫瑞秋的年轻记者正在调查这些事件，但在她和她的小儿子观看了录像后，时间变成了一场比赛，以找出录像为何会杀死所有人以及如何阻止这一切。
back_translation: A young reporter named Rachel is investigating these events, but after she and her young son watched the footage, time turns into a race to find out why the video is killing everyone and how to stop it.

text: the film brilliantly shines on all the characters , as the direction is intelligently accomplished .
translation: 这部电影出色地展现了所有角色，导演的手法非常聪明。
back_translation: This film brilliantly showcases all the characters, and the director's technique is very clever.

text: phileine is a super-bitch traveling to new york to visit her boyfriend maxto say sorry , for the first time in her life , for the argument the two of them were having before he left .
translation: 菲莲是一位超级泼妇，前往纽约拜访她的男友马克斯，为了向他道歉，这是她人生中第一次为他们之前争吵的事情道歉。
back_translation: Philion is a super tough woman who goes to New York to visit her boyfriend Max in order to apologize to him. This is the first time in her life that she has apologized for something they argued about before.

text: anchored by a terrific performance by abbass , satin rouge shows that the idea of women 's self-actualization knows few continental divides .
translation: 由阿巴斯的出色表演所支撑，《丝绸之路》展示了女性自我实现的理念几乎没有大陆分界。
back_translation: Supported by Abbas's outstanding performance, "Silk Road" showcases the concept of women's self-realization with almost no continental boundaries.

text: one well-timed explosion in a movie can be a knockout , but a hundred of them can be numbing . proof of this is ballistic : ecks vs . sever .
translation: 一场时机恰到好处的爆炸在电影中可以令人震撼，但一百场却可能让人麻木。证据就在于《弹道：艾克斯与塞弗》。
back_translation: A perfectly timed explosion can be shocking in a movie, but a hundred of them might become numbing. The evidence lies in "Ballistic: Eck vs. Sever."

text: as the investigation continues , catherine is forced to choose between her past passions and new possibilities , even as handler is discovering surprising new facts about embry and his possible connection to another disappearance from campus .
translation: 随着调查的继续，凯瑟琳被迫在她过去的热情和新的可能性之间做出选择，尽管处理人正在发现关于埃姆布里及其与校园另一消失事件的可能关联的惊人新事实。
back_translation: As the investigation continued, Catherine was forced to choose between her past passions and new possibilities, even as the investigators were uncovering astonishing new facts about Embry and its possible connection to another disappearance on campus.

text: adapted from a monologue in his `` blue jam `` radio series , chris morris ' first short film is a haunting black comedy about a man who no longer uses his name because he 's decided he 's ceased to deserve one , and a dog called rothko who says he is the man 's lawyer .
translation: 改编自克里斯·莫里斯在他的“蓝色果酱”广播系列中的独白，克里斯·莫里斯的第一部短片是一部令人毛骨悚然的黑色喜剧，讲述一个不再使用自己名字的男人，因为他决定自己已不再值得拥有一个名字，以及一只名叫罗斯科的狗，自称是这个男人的律师。
back_translation: Adapted from a monologue by Chris Morris in his "Blue Jam" radio series, Chris Morris's first short film is a chilling black comedy about a man who no longer uses his own name because he decides he is no longer worthy of having one, and a dog named Roscoe who claims to be the man's lawyer.

text: he has no life ( lives at home with his mother ) and no reason to live .
translation: 他没有生活（和母亲住在一起）也没有活下去的理由。
back_translation: He has no life (living with his mother) and no reason to keep going.

text: [ shyamalan ] continues to cut a swathe through mainstream hollywood , while retaining an integrity and refusing to compromise his vision .
translation: [沙马兰]继续在主流好莱坞中开疆拓土，同时保持着他的 integrity 和拒绝妥协他的视野。
back_translation: [Shyamalan] continues to expand his territory in mainstream Hollywood while maintaining his integrity and refusing to compromise his vision.

text: windtalkers celebrates the human spirit and packs an emotional wallop .
translation: 《风语者》赞美人类精神，并带来了情感的震撼。
back_translation: "Windtalkers" praises the human spirit and brings emotional震撼.

text: viveka is a glamorous woman and has high standards of living .
translation: 维维卡是一位光鲜亮丽的女性，生活标准很高。
back_translation: Viveca is a glamorous woman with high living standards.

text: kids five and up will be delighted with the fast , funny , and even touching story . parents may even find that it goes by quickly , because it has some of the funniest jokes of any movie this year , including those intended for adults .
translation: 五岁及以上的孩子会喜欢这个快节奏、有趣甚至感人的故事。父母们可能会发现故事进展得很快，因为它包含了今年任何电影中一些最搞笑的笑话，包括那些为成年人准备的笑话。
back_translation: Children aged five and above will enjoy this fast-paced, funny, and even touching story. Parents may find that the story progresses quickly, as it includes some of the funniest jokes from any movie this year, including those intended for adults.

text: no one , including the viewers , seems to know who can be trusted , and that 's what makes this movie fun to watch .
translation: 没有人，包括观众，似乎知道谁可以信任，这正是这部电影有趣的地方。
back_translation: No one, including the audience, seems to know who to trust, and that's what makes this movie interesting.

text: the director films a story of an immigrant actor who struggles with his religious and sexual identity in the new land .
translation: 导演拍摄一个关于一位移民演员的故事，他在新土地上挣扎于自己的宗教和性别身份。
back_translation: The director is filming a story about an immigrant actor who struggles with his religious and gender identity in a new land.

text: one day , lilja falls in love with andrej .
translation: 有一天，莉莉雅爱上了安德烈。
back_translation: One day, Lilya fell in love with Andrei.

text: a small independent film suffering from a severe case of hollywood-itis .
translation: 一部小型独立电影，严重受到了好莱坞病的困扰。
back_translation: A small independent film is seriously afflicted by the Hollywood disease.

text: alex nohe 's documentary plays like a travelogue for what mostly resembles a real-life , big-budget nc-17 version of tank girl .
translation: 亚历克斯·诺赫的纪录片像是一部旅行日志，主要呈现出一个类似现实生活中大预算的 NC-17 版《坦克女孩》。
back_translation: Alex Noh's documentary feels like a travel diary, primarily presenting a version of "Tank Girl" with a big budget that resembles real life, rated NC-17.

text: who knows what may be down the next block , or what lies in store for gigi at the end of the walk ?
translation: 谁知道下一个街区可能会有什么，或者在散步结束时吉吉会遇到什么呢？
back_translation: Who knows what the next block might hold, or what Gigi might encounter at the end of her walk?

text: armed with just two revolvers and a dozen grenades , king persuades cuthbertson to join him on a mission to occupied france .
translation: 手持两把左轮手枪和十几个手榴弹，国王说服凯瑟伯顿与他一起前往被占领的法国执行任务。
back_translation: Holding two revolvers and a dozen grenades, the king persuaded Catheburton to accompany him on a mission to occupied France.

text: the story takes place in vermont , against the backdrop of the state capitol , where civil union laws are being debated along with gun control and dwi 's .
translation: 这个故事发生在佛蒙特州，以州首府为背景，在那里公民结合法、枪支管制和醉驾问题正在被辩论。
back_translation: This story takes place in Vermont, set against the backdrop of the state capital, where issues of gun control, drunk driving, and the law are being debated by citizens.

text: now , years later he has two sons and they have a band .
translation: 现在，几年后他有两个儿子，他们有一个乐队。
back_translation: Now, years later, he has two sons, and they have a band.

text: from his first hand accounts of the ( wonderland murders aka woodland murders ) .
translation: 来自他对（仙境谋杀案，即森林谋杀案）的第一手叙述。
back_translation: From his first-hand account of the (Fairyland Murder Case, also known as the Forest Murder Case).

text: in the months that followed , he gave dozens of talks on four continents , conducted scores of interviews , and wrote a book 9-11 that was published in 22 countries and became a surprise bestseller in many of them , including japan .
translation: 在随后的几个月里，他在四大洲进行了数十场演讲，进行了大量采访，并写了一本名为《9-11》的书，该书在22个国家出版，并在其中许多国家，包括日本，意外地成为畅销书。
back_translation: In the following months, he gave dozens of speeches across four continents, conducted a large number of interviews, and wrote a book titled "9-11," which was published in 22 countries and unexpectedly became a bestseller in many of them, including Japan.

text: gigantic is the story of they might be giants , a unique musical group centered on john flansburgh and john linnell .
translation: 《巨大的故事》是关于他们可能是巨人的故事，一个以约翰·弗朗斯伯格和约翰·林内尔为中心的独特音乐组合。
back_translation: "The Huge Story" is about the story of what they might be giants, a unique musical group centered around John Francsberg and John Linnell.

text: the result is a high-stakes mystery , where everyone seems to know exactly who is most guilty .
translation: 结果是一个高风险的谜团，似乎所有人都确切知道谁是最有罪的。
back_translation: The result is a high-risk mystery, where it seems everyone knows exactly who is the most guilty.

text: deliberately and devotedly constructed , far from heaven is too picture postcard perfect , too neat and new pin-like , too obviously a recreation to resonate .
translation: 故意而热情地建造，远离天堂，过于如明信片般完美，过于整齐和崭新，过于明显是个再创造，以至于无法引起共鸣。
back_translation: Intentionally and passionately built, far from heaven, too perfect like a postcard, too neat and brand new, too obviously a recreation, to the point that it fails to resonate.

text: plotless collection of moronic stunts is by far the worst movie of the year .
translation: 这一系列无情节的愚蠢恶作剧无疑是今年最糟糕的电影。
back_translation: This series of senseless and stupid pranks is undoubtedly the worst movie of the year.

text: the friends may listen , but when do they learn , maybe never or only when the journey begins with you ! .
translation: 朋友们可能会倾听，但他们何时才能真正学到东西，也许永远不会，或者只有当旅程和你一起开始时！
back_translation: Friends may listen, but when will they truly learn something? Perhaps never, or only when the journey begins with you!

text: the only young people who possibly will enjoy it are infants . . . who might be distracted by the movie 's quick movements and sounds .
translation: 唯一可能会享受它的年轻人是婴儿……他们可能会被电影的快速动作和声音分散注意力。
back_translation: The only young people who might enjoy it are babies... they may be distracted by the fast action and sounds of the movie.

text: still , she does n't want anyone , not samantha , not the cops and , most importantly , not her beloved dad , to come down on her .
translation: 然而，她不想让任何人，包括萨曼莎、警察，以及最重要的，她心爱的爸爸，对她施加压力。
back_translation: However, she didn't want anyone, including Samantha, the police, and most importantly, her beloved dad, to put pressure on her.

text: with a tone as variable as the cinematography , schaeffer 's film never settles into the light-footed enchantment the material needs , and the characters ' quirks and foibles never jell into charm .
translation: 塞费尔的电影在音调上变化多端，始终没有融入素材所需的轻盈魅力，人物的特征和小缺陷也从未凝聚成迷人之处。
back_translation: Saifeir's films vary greatly in tone, but they never capture the lightness and charm required by the material, and the characters' traits and minor flaws never coalesce into anything enchanting.

text: the rock as a bounty hunter who attempts to square a debt by heading to the amazon jungle to capture someone .
translation: 巨石强森饰演一名赏金猎人，他前往亚马逊丛林抓捕某人以清偿债务。
back_translation: Dwayne Johnson plays a bounty hunter who goes to the Amazon jungle to capture someone in order to clear a debt.

text: like all abstract art , the film does not make this statement in an easily accessible way , and -- unless prewarned -- it would be very possible for a reasonably intelligent person to sit through its tidal wave of imagery and not get this vision at all .
translation: 就像所有的抽象艺术一样，这部电影并没有以一种容易理解的方式表达这一观点，除非事先有所警示，否则一位相当聪明的人可能会从头到尾观看这汹涌的影像，却完全没有领悟到这个意图。
back_translation: Like all abstract art, this film does not express its point in an easily understandable way. Unless there is a prior warning, a reasonably intelligent person might watch the tumultuous imagery from start to finish without ever grasping this intention.

text: a penetrating glimpse into the tissue-thin ego of the stand-up comic .
translation: 对单口喜剧演员脆弱自尊的深刻洞察。
back_translation: A profound insight into the fragile self-esteem of stand-up comedians.

text: [ shyamalan ] turns the goose-pimple genre on its empty head and fills it with spirit , purpose and emotionally bruised characters who add up to more than body count .
translation: [沙马兰] 将恐怖片这一空洞的类型颠覆，并注入了灵魂、目的和情感创伤的人物，这些人物所体现的价值超越了单纯的尸体数量。
back_translation: [Shyamalan] has subverted the hollow genre of horror films by infusing them with soul, purpose, and characters who embody emotional trauma, whose values go beyond merely the number of bodies.

text: armed with a rad '80s soundtrack and a winning cast ( including indie rocker liz phair ) , cherish is an ingenious low-budget thriller .
translation: 《珍爱》是一部巧妙的低预算惊悚片，搭配着炫酷的80年代原声带和优秀的演员阵容（包括独立摇滚歌手莉兹·费尔）。
back_translation: "Dear Love" is a cleverly crafted low-budget thriller, complemented by a cool 80s soundtrack and an excellent cast, including indie rock singer Liz Phair.

text: fireman-turned-writer larry brown are examined in a unique documentary format that incorporates narrative film adaptations of three of his short stories : samaritans , wild thing , and boy & # 38 ; dog .
translation: 转行作家的消防员拉里·布朗在一部独特的纪录片中被审视，该纪录片融合了他三部短篇小说的叙事电影改编：救助者、野生生物和男孩与狗。
back_translation: Firefighter Larry Brown, who switched to a career as a writer, is examined in a unique documentary that combines cinematic adaptations of his three short stories: Rescuer, Wildlife, and Boy and Dog.

text: the script was reportedly rewritten a dozen times -- either 11 times too many or else too few .
translation: 据报道，剧本被重写了十多次——要么重写了11次太多，要么重写得太少。
back_translation: According to reports, the script has been rewritten more than ten times—either it has been rewritten too many times, or not enough.

text: despite the 2-d animation , the wild thornberrys movie makes for a surprisingly cinematic experience .
translation: 尽管是2D动画，《野性荆棘》的电影却带来了令人惊讶的电影体验。
back_translation: Despite being a 2D animation, the film "Wild Thorns" delivers a surprising cinematic experience.

text: the two , along with their agent , go on a year long string of tryouts , impressing major league scouts with mid 90 mph pitching .
translation: 他们两人和他们的经纪人一起，进行了为期一年的试镜，凭借中速90英里每小时的投球技巧给大联盟球探留下了深刻的印象。
back_translation: The two of them, along with their agent, went through a year's worth of auditions, leaving a deep impression on Major League scouts with their pitching skills at a speed of 90 miles per hour.

text: oscar is certain that he could be a better mate to eve than his work-obsessed father .
translation: 奥斯卡确信他可以比沉迷于工作的父亲更好地对待伊芙。
back_translation: Oscar is confident that he can treat Eve better than his workaholic father.
