text: in the near future in the asian city-state sintawan , everyone 's identity is recorded in the vast cyberlink .
translation: 在不久的将来，在亚洲城邦新塔湾，每个人的身份都记录在庞大的网络连接中。
back_translation: In the near future, in the Asian city-state of New Tower Bay, everyone's identity is recorded in a vast network connection.

text: sent to a german stalag prison camp , lieutenant hart is at once thrust into the social order of pows , where every man thinks of himself first with bribery and trading with german captors commonplace .
translation: 被送往德国战俘营的哈特中尉，立即被卷入战俘的社会秩序中，那里每个人都首先考虑自己，贿赂和与德国俘虏交易已经成为常态。
back_translation: Lieutenant Hart, sent to a German POW camp, was immediately drawn into the social order of the prisoners, where everyone primarily looked out for themselves, and bribery and trade with German captors had become the norm.

text: can the elderly and feeble mccaleb , who had intended to spend his retirement living on his boat in the los angeles harbor , and who ca n't drive , and has to nap regularly , muster up the endurance to find the killer ?
translation: 老迈且虚弱的麦卡勒布原本打算在洛杉矶港的船上度过他的退休生活，但他不能开车，且需要定期小睡，他能否鼓起勇气找到杀手呢？
back_translation: The elderly and frail McCaleb originally planned to spend his retirement on a boat in the Port of Los Angeles, but he cannot drive and needs to take regular naps. Can he muster the courage to find the killer?

text: and in the dogs , she finds lost pieces of herself as she fumbles with the leash to her own life - struggling to hold on as it pulls her toward a brighter future before her past catches up with her .
translation: 在这些狗身上，她找到了失去的自我，奋力抓着自己生活的绳子——努力坚持着，因为它将她拉向一个更光明的未来，在她的过去追赶上来的之前。
back_translation: In these dogs, she found her lost self, striving to hold onto the rope of her life—persistently, as it pulled her toward a brighter future, catching up with her past.

text: daphne must attempt to fit in with the social requirements demanded of her , while also getting to know her father , dealing with his territorial other daughter , and maintaining her own self-identity .
translation: 达芙妮必须努力适应她所面临的社会要求，同时也要了解她的父亲，应对他那个有领土意识的女儿，并保持自己的身份认同。
back_translation: Daphne must strive to adapt to the social demands she faces while also understanding her father, coping with his territorial-minded daughter, and maintaining her own identity.

text: disillusioned and with no money the secret knight joins the crusaders and embarks on new adventures .
translation: 失望且身无分文的秘密骑士加入了十字军，并开始了新的冒险。
back_translation: A disappointed and broke secret knight joined the Crusade and began a new adventure.

text: his model girl friend ( anne marie johnson ) immediately leaves him .
translation: 他的模特女友（安妮·玛丽·约翰逊）立即离开了他。
back_translation: His model girlfriend (Annie Marie Johnson) immediately left him.

text: as their relationship builds jenny starts to struggle in her religious beliefs and her new lifestyle .
translation: 随着他们关系的发展，杰妮开始在宗教信仰和新生活方式上感到挣扎。
back_translation: As their relationship developed, Jenny began to struggle with her religious beliefs and the new lifestyle.

text: the film 's trailer also looked like crap , so crap is what i was expecting .
translation: 这部电影的预告片看起来也很糟糕，所以我期待的就是糟糕。
back_translation: The trailer for this movie looks really bad, so I'm just expecting it to be bad.

text: . . . unspeakably , unbearably dull , featuring reams of flatly delivered dialogue and a heroine who comes across as both shallow and dim-witted .
translation: ……无可言喻地、令人无法忍受的乏味，包含大量平淡的对话，女主角既显得肤浅又愚蠢。
back_translation: ...indescribably and unbearably dull, filled with a lot of bland dialogue, the female lead appears both superficial and foolish.

text: or so he tells bobby ( alex feldman ) the eighteen year old male hustler smith employs for company .
translation: 或者他说给鲍比（亚历克斯·费尔德曼），史密斯雇用的十八岁男性妓女来陪伴。
back_translation: Or he said to get Bobby (Alex Feldman), the eighteen-year-old male prostitute hired by Smith, to keep him company.

text: `` dylan 's run `` chronicles the experiences of dylan glenn , the great-grandson of emancipated slaves , as he seeks to become the first black republican from the deep south elected to congress since reconstruction .
translation: 《迪伦的奔跑》记录了迪伦·格伦的经历，他是解放奴隶的曾孙，正在寻求成为自重建以来首位当选国会的南方黑人民主党人。
back_translation: "The Run of Dylan" chronicles the experiences of Dylan Glenn, a descendant of freed slaves, who is seeking to become the first elected black Democrat from the South since Reconstruction.

text: the book records the entire history of the universe , revealing to its readers anything they wish to know .
translation: 这本书记录了宇宙的整个历史，向读者揭示他们想要知道的任何事情。
back_translation: This book records the entire history of the universe, revealing to readers anything they want to know.

text: elizabethean playwright christopher marlowe runs afoul of the queen as well as a jealous male admirer who ultimately hands marlowe 's unpublished work to william shakespeare , an unsuccessful scribe who then pilfers marlowe 's writings .
translation: 伊丽莎白时代的剧作家克里斯托弗·马洛与女王发生了冲突，还遭到了一个嫉妒的男仰慕者的追赶，最终这个人将马洛的未出版作品交给了威廉·莎士比亚，一个不成功的抄写员，莎士比亚随后盗用了马洛的作品。
back_translation: The Elizabethan playwright Christopher Marlowe clashed with the Queen and was pursued by a jealous male admirer, who ultimately handed Marlowe's unpublished works to William Shakespeare, an unsuccessful copyist, who then plagiarized Marlowe's work.

text: even though many of these guys are less than adorable ( their lamentations are pretty much self-centered ) , there 's something vital about the movie .
translation: 尽管这些家伙中的很多人不足以令人喜爱（他们的悲叹几乎都是以自我为中心），但这部电影有一些重要的东西。
back_translation: Although many of these guys are not likable (their lamentations are almost all self-centered), the movie has something important.

text: however to keep the image of him as a sex guru going he has to get more lessons from sharonna whom he begins to fall for despite using her .
translation: 然而为了维持他作为性 guru 的形象，他必须向夏朗娜学习更多课程，尽管他在利用她，但他开始对她产生好感。
back_translation: However, in order to maintain his image as a sex guru, he has to learn more lessons from Xianglan, and although he is taking advantage of her, he begins to develop feelings for her.

text: sent away by her proud parents after she disgraced them by getting pregnant at 15 , desiree , like marly , pursued a career in show business .
translation: 在15岁怀孕让她的父母感到羞耻后，骄傲的父母将她送走，德西蕾像玛丽一样，追求演艺事业。
back_translation: After becoming pregnant at 15 and bringing shame to her parents, her proud parents sent her away, and Desirée, like Mary, pursued a career in the entertainment industry.

text: throws in enough clever and unexpected twists to make the formula feel fresh .
translation: 加入足够聪明和出人意料的转折，使得这个公式感觉新颖。
back_translation: Incorporate enough clever and unexpected twists to make this formula feel fresh.

text: with little visible talent and no energy , colin hanks is in bad need of major acting lessons and maybe a little coffee .
translation: 科林·汉克斯几乎没有可见的才华和精力不足，迫切需要接受重大表演课程，也许还需要喝点咖啡。
back_translation: Colin Hanks has almost no visible talent and a lack of energy, desperately needing to take significant acting classes and perhaps could use a cup of coffee.

text: even though frode is only 7 years old , he does n't really believe in monsters .
translation: 尽管弗罗德只有7岁，但他并不真的相信怪物。
back_translation: Although Frode is only 7 years old, he doesn't really believe in monsters.

text: they create a new day care facility called `` daddy day care `` and have kids like : the smart-mouthed-but-became-polite crispin ( shane baumel ) , the really-smart becca ( hailey noelle johnson ) , and the flash/tony ( jimmy bennett ) .
translation: 他们建立了一个新的日托中心，名为“爸爸日托”，并接待了一些孩子，比如：嘴巴很厉害但变得有礼貌的克里斯平（香农·博梅尔），非常聪明的贝卡（海莉·诺埃尔·约翰逊），以及闪电/托尼（吉米·本内特）。
back_translation: They established a new daycare center called "Daddy Daycare," and welcomed some children, such as the outspoken yet polite Crispin (Shannon Borem), the very smart Becca (Hailey Noelle Johnson), and Lightning/Tony (Jimmy Bennett).

text: a tired , unnecessary retread . . . a stale copy of a picture that was n't all that great to begin with .
translation: 一个疲惫的、不必要的重拍……一部原本就不太出色的电影的陈腐复制品。
back_translation: A tired, unnecessary remake... a stale copy of a film that was already not very outstanding.

text: the words , 'frankly , my dear , i do n't give a damn , ' have never been more appropriate .
translation: “坦率地说，亲爱的，我一点都不在乎。”这句话从未如此恰当。
back_translation: "To be honest, darling, I couldn't care less." This phrase has never been more appropriate.

text: succumbs to the same kind of maudlin , sentimental mysticism that mars the touched by an angel school of non-god spiritual-uplift movies .
translation: 屈服于同种伤感、情感化的神秘主义，这种神秘主义破坏了“天使的触碰”这一非神神灵提升电影的风格。
back_translation: Yielding to the same kind of melancholy, sentimental mysticism undermines the style of "the touch of an angel," a non-divine enhancement of film.

text: killers , revolutionaries , big business , kids , family , god .
translation: 杀手、革命者、大企业、孩子、家庭、上帝。
back_translation: Assassin, revolutionary, large corporation, child, family, God.

text: most fish stories are a little peculiar , but this is one that should be thrown back in the river .
translation: 大多数鱼的故事都有些奇特，但这个故事应该被抛回河里。
back_translation: Most fish stories are a bit peculiar, but this one should be thrown back into the river.

text: decades ago , the legendary james brown sold his soul to the devil for fame and fortune .
translation: 几十年前，传奇人物詹姆斯·布朗为了名声和财富将自己的灵魂卖给了魔鬼。
back_translation: Decades ago, the legendary figure James Brown sold his soul to the devil for fame and fortune.

text: no better or worse than 'truth or consequences , n . m . ' or any other interchangeable actioner with imbecilic mafia toolbags botching a routine assignment in a western backwater .
translation: 不比“真相与后果，N.M.”或任何其他可互换的动作片更好或更差，都是一些愚蠢的黑帮家伙在西部偏远地区搞砸了一项例行任务。
back_translation: Not better or worse than "Truth and Consequences, N.M." or any other interchangeable action movie, it’s just some stupid mob guys screwing up a routine job in a remote area of the West.

text: they detour from their trip to take the girl to the nearest town , where they meet the local sheriff who is hell bent on capturing the girl 's attackers .
translation: 他们偏离旅程，把女孩送到最近的城镇，在那里他们遇到了当地的警长，警长决心抓住女孩的袭击者。
back_translation: They deviated from their journey and took the girl to the nearest town, where they met the local sheriff, who was determined to catch the girl's attacker.

text: in a world ravaged by disease , disasters and hatred - a worldwide plan which dates back more than 2000 years has been implemented to show people that there 's more to life and living then just waste .
translation: 在一个饱受疾病、灾难和仇恨摧残的世界中，一个可以追溯到2000多年前的全球计划已经实施，旨在向人们展示生活不仅仅是浪费，还有更多的意义。
back_translation: In a world ravaged by disease, disaster, and hatred, a global plan that can be traced back more than 2,000 years has been implemented, aimed at showing people that life is not just a waste, but has much more meaning.

text: like a veteran head cutter , barbershop is tuned in to its community .
translation: 像一位经验丰富的理发师，理发店与其社区紧密相连。
back_translation: Like an experienced barber, the barbershop is closely connected to its community.

text: a different kind of love story - one that is dark , disturbing , painful to watch , yet compelling .
translation: 一种不同类型的爱情故事——黑暗、令人不安、观看时痛苦，却又引人入胜。
back_translation: A different type of love story—dark, unsettling, painful to watch, yet captivating.

text: for example , she collects cans and bottles to recycle from the beach and buys fish food with the money she makes , then paddles out in the ocean to feed the fish there .
translation: 例如，她从海滩收集罐子和瓶子进行回收，用赚来的钱购买鱼饲料，然后划船到海里去喂鱼。
back_translation: For example, she collects cans and bottles from the beach for recycling, uses the money she earns to buy fish feed, and then rows out to sea to feed the fish.

text: about a boy vividly recalls the cary grant of room for one more , houseboat and father goose in its affectionate depiction of the gentle war between a reluctant , irresponsible man and the kid who latches onto him .
translation: 《关于一个男孩》生动地回忆起了凯瑞·格兰特在《再多容纳一个》、 《房船》和《父亲大人》中的角色，亲切地描绘了一个不情愿、无责任感的男人与一个依附于他的孩子之间温和的战争。
back_translation: "About a Boy" vividly recalls Cary Grant's roles in "Screwy Louie," "The Boat Nettle," and "Father Figure," warmly depicting a gentle war between a reluctant, irresponsible man and a child who is dependent on him.

text: the lizard , chaos , scar , heartless and sic inhabit the violent and often bizarre world of backyard wrestling .
translation: 蜥蜴、混沌、伤疤、无情和疯子生活在暴力且常常离奇的后院摔跤世界中。
back_translation: Lizards, chaos, scars, ruthlessness, and madmen live in a violent and often bizarre backyard wrestling world.

text: but when irrefutable proof that they are meant to be together arises , both of them are sent into conflict .
translation: 但当无可辩驳的证明他们注定在一起出现时，他们俩都陷入了冲突。
back_translation: But when there was undeniable evidence that they were destined to be together, both of them fell into conflict.

text: the only camouflage carvey should now be considering is a paper bag to wear over his head when he goes out into public , to avoid being recognized as the man who bilked unsuspecting moviegoers .
translation: 卡维现在唯一应该考虑的伪装就是在出门到公共场合时，戴一个纸袋在头上，以避免被认出是那个欺骗无辜观众的人。
back_translation: The only disguise that Kaveh should consider now is wearing a paper bag over his head when going out in public, to avoid being recognized as the person who deceived innocent viewers.

text: a tender and touching drama , based on the true story of a troubled african-american 's quest to come to terms with his origins , reveals the yearning we all have in our hearts for acceptance within the family circle .
translation: 一部温馨动人的戏剧，基于一位有困扰的非裔美国人对自己起源进行和解的真实故事，揭示了我们内心对家庭圈子中被接纳的渴望。
back_translation: A warm and touching drama, based on the true story of a troubled African American reconciling with his origins, reveals our inner yearning for acceptance within the family circle.

text: `` bad santa `` is the story of two conmen who go on a road trip to malls dressed as santa and his elf .
translation: 《坏圣诞老人》是关于两个骗子的故事，他们装扮成圣诞老人和他的精灵，进行一次前往商场的公路旅行。
back_translation: "Bad Santa" is a story about two conmen who dress up as Santa Claus and his elf and embark on a road trip to a shopping mall.

text: how i killed my father is one of those art house films that makes you feel like you 're watching an iceberg melt -- only it never melts .
translation: 《我是如何杀死我父亲的》是一部让你感觉就像在看冰山融化的艺术电影——只不过它永远都不会融化。
back_translation: "I Killed My Father" is an art film that makes you feel like you're watching an iceberg melt—except it will never actually melt.

text: although shot with little style , skins is heartfelt and achingly real .
translation: 尽管拍摄风格简陋，《Skins》却真诚而令人心痛。
back_translation: Despite its rudimentary filming style, "Skins" is sincere and profoundly moving.

text: must-see viewing for anyone involved in the high-tech industry . others may find it migraine-inducing , despite moore 's attempts at whimsy and spoon feeding .
translation: 对于任何参与高科技行业的人来说，这都是必看的节目。然而，其他人可能会觉得这让人头痛，尽管摩尔试图用幽默和润色的方式来呈现。
back_translation: For anyone involved in the high-tech industry, this is a must-see program. However, others may find it headache-inducing, even though Moore attempts to present it in a humorous and polished manner.

text: has something to say . . . but it is a statement and issue worthy of a much more thoughtfulness and insight than a melodramatic and wholly predictable thriller .
translation: 有话要说……但这是一个声明和问题，值得比一个戏剧化且完全可预测的惊悚片更深思熟虑和更具洞察力的对待。
back_translation: There is something to say... but this is a statement and a question that deserves a more thoughtful and insightful treatment than a dramatic and entirely predictable thriller.

text: los angeles ' little tokyo 's foremost studio photographer , miyatake smuggled a lens and film holder into the u . s . wwii camp he was incarcerated in and captured life behind barbed wire with a makeshift camera made of scrap wood .
translation: 洛杉矶的小东京首席摄影师宫竹，偷偷将镜头和胶卷架子带入他被囚禁的美国二战营地，并用由废木材制成的临时相机捕捉铁丝网后的生活。
back_translation: The chief photographer of Little Tokyo in Los Angeles, Miyazuki, secretly brought his lens and film reels into the American internment camp during World War II, capturing life behind barbed wire with a makeshift camera made from scrap wood.

text: it 's hard to recognize change when you 're in the middle of it college follows a young man in his final semester of college as he segues into adult life .
translation: 当你身处其中时，很难识别变化。《大学》讲述了一名年轻人在大学最后一个学期，如何过渡到成年生活。
back_translation: When you are in the midst of it, it is hard to recognize change. "The University" tells the story of a young person in their final semester of college and how they transition into adult life.

text: amber ( madonna ) is 40 , beautiful , rich , spoiled , and arrogant beyond measure .
translation: 安柏（麦当娜）40岁，美丽、富有、被宠坏，傲慢无比。
back_translation: Amber (Madonna) is 40 years old, beautiful, wealthy, spoiled, and incredibly arrogant.

text: not a film for the faint of heart or conservative of spirit , but for the rest of us -- especially san francisco lovers -- it 's a spirited film and a must-see .
translation: 这部影片并不适合胆小或保守的人，但对于我们其他人来说——尤其是旧金山爱好者——这是一部充满活力的电影，是不容错过的。
back_translation: This film is not suitable for the faint-hearted or the conservative, but for the rest of us—especially fans of San Francisco—it is a vibrant movie that should not be missed.

text: a thoughtful , moving piece that faces difficult issues with honesty and beauty .
translation: 一部深思熟虑、感人至深的作品，以诚实和美丽的方式面对困难问题。
back_translation: A deeply thoughtful and profoundly moving work that confronts difficult issues with honesty and beauty.

text: children of the century , though well dressed and well made , ultimately falls prey to the contradiction that afflicts so many movies about writers .
translation: 世纪之子，尽管衣着考究，制作精良，最终还是未能逃脱困扰许多关于作家的电影的矛盾。
back_translation: The Son of the Century, despite its elegant attire and exquisite production, ultimately failed to escape the contradictions that plague many films about writers.

text: if you like your comedy dark and slightly freaky , then steve shainberg 's film deserves your attention .
translation: 如果你喜欢黑暗又略显古怪的喜剧，那么史蒂夫·香贝格的电影值得你关注。
back_translation: If you enjoy dark and slightly quirky comedies, then Steve Chorney's films are worth your attention.

text: believing that he is the `` world 's greatest swordsman , `` juan antonio merrily accepts the challenge until he learns that the duel will be fought with pistols , not swords .
translation: 相信自己是“世界上最伟大的剑客”的胡安·安东尼奥愉快地接受了挑战，直到他得知决斗将用手枪而不是剑进行。
back_translation: Juan Antonio, who believes he is "the greatest swordsman in the world," happily accepted the challenge until he learned that the duel would be fought with pistols instead of swords.

text: in the heat of the moment dante blames lucy saying , `` you never wanted this baby .
translation: 在冲动之下，丹特责怪露西，说：“你从来不想要这个宝宝。”
back_translation: In a fit of impulse, Dante blamed Lucy, saying, "You never wanted this baby."

text: along the way , he meets a long line of interesting and colorful characters , while back at home , ada is learning the ropes of managing her deceased father 's farm with ruby ( renee zellweger ) , a scrappy drifter who assists and teaches ada along the way .
translation: 在旅途中，他遇到了一长串有趣而多彩的角色，而在家里，艾达正在与鲁比（蕾妮·齐薇格）一起学习管理已故父亲的农场，鲁比是一位顽强的流浪者，她在这个过程中帮助并教导艾达。
back_translation: During the journey, he encounters a long series of interesting and colorful characters, while at home, Ada is learning to manage her late father's farm with Ruby (Renée Zellweger), who is a tough wanderer that helps and guides Ada along the way.

text: the film is itself a sort of cinematic high crime , one that brings military courtroom dramas down very , very low .
translation: 这部电影本身就是一种电影界的严重罪行，将军事法庭剧的水平拉得非常，非常低。
back_translation: This film itself is a serious crime in the film industry, bringing the level of military court dramas down very, very low.

text: the journey to the secret 's eventual discovery is a separate adventure , and thrill enough .
translation: 通往秘密最终发现的旅程是一场独立的冒险，足够令人兴奋。
back_translation: The journey to the final discovery of secrets is an independent adventure, thrilling enough.

text: unexpectedly , the caustic loner befriends the girl only to see his life take another turn when she is kidnapped and later murdered .
translation: 出乎意料的是，这位尖刻的孤独者与女孩交了朋友，却在她被绑架并随后被谋杀时，看到自己的生活发生了另一个转折。
back_translation: Unexpectedly, this acerbic loner befriended a girl, but when she was kidnapped and subsequently murdered, he saw his life take another turn.

text: . . . little more than a well-acted television melodrama shot for the big screen .
translation: ……只不过是为大银幕拍摄的表演优异的电视情节剧。
back_translation: ...it's just an excellent television drama adapted for the big screen.

text: he can remember nothing and begins to try to rebuild his memory based on clues such as the swiss bank account , the number of which , is implanted in his hip .
translation: 他什么都记不得，开始尝试根据线索重建自己的记忆，比如瑞士银行账户，而这个账户的号码被植入在他的臀部。
back_translation: He couldn't remember anything and started trying to reconstruct his memory based on clues, such as a Swiss bank account, the number of which was implanted in his buttock.

text: when longfellow deeds , a small-town pizzeria owner and poet , inherits $ 40 billion from his deceased uncle , he quickly begins rolling in a different kind of dough .
translation: 当小镇比萨饼店老板和诗人朗费罗·迪兹从已故的叔叔那里继承了400亿美元后，他迅速开始滚入一种不同的“面团”。
back_translation: When the small-town pizza shop owner and poet Longfellow Dizz inherited $40 billion from his late uncle, he quickly began rolling into a different kind of "dough."

text: young nicholas and his family enjoy a comfortable life , until nicholas ' father dies and the family is left penniless .
translation: 年轻的尼古拉斯和他的家人过着舒适的生活，直到尼古拉斯的父亲去世，家庭陷入贫困。
back_translation: Young Nicholas and his family lived a comfortable life until Nicholas's father passed away, and the family fell into poverty.

text: this is a terrific character study , a probe into the life of a complex man .
translation: 这是一次出色的人物研究，深入探讨了一个复杂男人的生活。
back_translation: This is an outstanding character study that delves into the life of a complex man.

text: maybe the title should have been confusions of a dangerous mind , though the confusion , in this case , can be pretty sublime .
translation: 也许标题应该是《危险思维的混乱》，尽管在这种情况下，混乱可以相当 sublime。
back_translation: Perhaps the title should be "The Chaos of Dangerous Thinking," although in this case, the chaos can be quite sublime.

text: soon after the accident , the survivors of the accident start dropping like flies .
translation: 事故发生后不久，幸存者们开始像苍蝇一样接连倒下。
back_translation: Shortly after the accident occurred, the survivors began to fall one after another like flies.

text: all the suicide attempts comically bump up against the demandes of each family membre .
translation: 所有的自杀尝试都滑稽地与每个家庭成员的要求相碰撞。
back_translation: All suicide attempts comically clash with the demands of each family member.

text: when he begins the mission he meets the exuberant tina ( kareena kapoor ) .
translation: 当他开始执行任务时，他遇到了充满活力的蒂娜（卡瑞娜·卡普尔）。
back_translation: When he started to carry out the mission, he encountered the vibrant Tina (Karina Kapoor).

text: hakimi stops his car and sees a girl is trapped in the car .
translation: 哈基米停车看见一个女孩被困在车里。
back_translation: Hakimi saw a girl trapped in a car.

text: this goofy gangster yarn never really elevates itself from being yet another earnestly generic crime-busting comic vehicle -- a well-intentioned remake that shows some spunk and promise but fails to register as anything distinctive or daring
translation: 这个滑稽的黑帮故事从来没有真正提升自己，仍然只是另一部认真普通的打击犯罪的漫画载体——一部出于好意的翻拍，展现了一些活力和潜力，但未能标志性地或大胆地留下深刻印象。
back_translation: This ridiculous gangster story has never really elevated itself, still just another seriously ordinary comic vehicle for crime-fighting—an earnest remake that shows some vitality and potential but fails to leave a significant or bold impression.

text: the film is a confusing melange of tones and styles , one moment a romantic trifle and the next a turgid drama .
translation: 这部电影是一种令人困惑的各种风格和基调的混合，时而是浪漫的小品，时而又是沉闷的戏剧。
back_translation: This movie is a confusing mix of various styles and tones, sometimes a romantic vignette, at other times a somber drama.

text: both stars manage to be funny , but , like the recent i spy , the star chemistry begs the question of whether random gags add up to a movie .
translation: 两位明星都能搞笑，但就像最近的《间谍游戏》一样，这两位明星的化学反应让我不禁思考，随意的搞笑段子是否足以支撑一部电影。
back_translation: Both stars can be funny, but just like the recent "Spy Game," the chemistry between these two stars makes me wonder whether casual jokes are enough to support a movie.

text: she travels to various locations of jack 's performances , accompanying him afterwards to his bench .
translation: 她前往杰克表演的各个地点，表演结束后陪他回到他的长椅。
back_translation: She went to various locations where Jack was performing and accompanied him back to his bench after the performance.

text: it prevents her making physical contact with other people .
translation: 这阻止了她与其他人进行身体接触。
back_translation: This prevented her from having physical contact with others.

text: it 's not going to be everyone 's bag of popcorn , but it definitely gives you something to chew on .
translation: 这可能不是每个人的风格，但它绝对值得你琢磨。
back_translation: This may not be everyone's style, but it is definitely worth your contemplation.

text: though the controversial korean filmmaker 's latest effort is not for all tastes , it offers gorgeous imagery , effective performances , and an increasingly unsettling sense of foreboding .
translation: 尽管这位有争议的韩国导演最新作品并不适合所有口味，但它提供了华丽的影像、出色的表演，以及日益令人不安的预感。
back_translation: Although the latest work of this controversial South Korean director may not suit all tastes, it offers stunning visuals, excellent performances, and an increasingly unsettling sense of foreboding.

text: little more than a super-sized infomercial for the cable-sports channel and its summer x games .
translation: 不过是一个针对有线体育频道及其夏季极限运动赛事的超级大型宣传片。
back_translation: It's just a super-sized promotional video for a cable sports channel and its summer extreme sports events.

text: a big meal of cliches that the talented cast generally chokes on .
translation: 一顿充满陈词滥调的盛宴，优秀的演员们通常会难以下咽。
back_translation: A feast full of clichés is usually hard to swallow for excellent actors.

text: the sensuous-poetic film is an appeal to dream and a hommage to the great actor klaus kinski .
translation: 这部充满感性和诗意的电影是对梦境的呼唤，也是对伟大演员克劳斯·金斯基的致敬。
back_translation: This film, filled with emotion and poetry, is a call to dreams and a tribute to the great actor Klaus Kinski.

text: an 11 year old boy has been excluded from school for rough behaviour .
translation: 一名11岁的男孩因粗暴行为被学校开除。
back_translation: An 11-year-old boy was expelled from school for his aggressive behavior.

text: it concludes with a laramie staging of `` angels in america `` a year after shephard 's death .
translation: 它以拉勒米制作的“美国的天使”作为结尾，这在谢泼德去世一年后上演。
back_translation: It ends with "The Angel of America" created by Lalami, which was performed a year after Shepherd's death.

text: in reality , she endures the day-to-day hurt of a sensitive girl who is very much alone .
translation: 实际上，她承受着一个非常孤独的敏感女孩日常的伤痛。
back_translation: In fact, she bears the daily pain of a very lonely sensitive girl.

text: the movie is pretty funny now and then without in any way demeaning its subjects .
translation: 这部电影时不时会很好笑，而并没有以任何方式贬低其主题。
back_translation: This film is occasionally very funny, yet does not belittle its themes in any way.

text: david banner is performing regeneration experiments and uses himself as a guinea pig .
translation: 大卫·班纳正在进行再生实验，并把自己当作豚鼠。
back_translation: David Banner is conducting regeneration experiments and is using himself as a guinea pig.

text: kidnapper jash uploads the video clip of anna being tortured onto the internet , which instantly becomes the talk of hong kong .
translation: 绑架者贾什将安娜被折磨的视频片段上传到互联网，瞬间成为香港的热门话题。
back_translation: The kidnapper Josh uploaded video footage of Anna being tortured to the internet, instantly becoming a hot topic in Hong Kong.

text: there is no substitute for on-screen chemistry , and when friel pulls the strings that make williams sink into melancholia , the reaction in williams is as visceral as a gut punch .
translation: 银幕上的化学反应是无法替代的，当弗里尔操控着让威廉斯陷入忧郁时，威廉斯的反应如同一记重拳般直击人心。
back_translation: The chemical reaction on screen is irreplaceable; when Freer manipulates Williams into a state of melancholy, Williams' response hits the heart like a heavy punch.

text: the gender-skewed adventures begin when butch , a handsome , but naive baby butch , is compelled by the queen to seek out and bring back her purlined `` koilos `` the source of all pleasures and the key to order and harmony on her island .
translation: 当英俊但天真的小雌性被女王迫使去寻找并带回她被盗的“koilos”时，性别偏见的冒险开始了，“koilos”是所有快乐的源泉，也是她岛上秩序与和谐的钥匙。
back_translation: When the handsome but naive young female is forced by the queen to find and bring back her stolen "koilos," the adventure of gender bias begins. The "koilos" is the source of all happiness and the key to order and harmony on her island.

text: chalk it up to my adoration for both de niro and murphy , but i had a pretty good time with this movie - despite its myriad flaws .
translation: 归功于我对德尼罗和墨菲的喜爱，尽管这部电影有许多缺陷，我还是度过了愉快的时光。
back_translation: Thanks to my love for De Niro and Murphy, I still had a good time despite the many flaws of this movie.

text: chabrol has taken promising material for a black comedy and turned it instead into a somber chamber drama .
translation: 查布罗尔将一部有潜力的黑色喜剧素材转变成了一部阴郁的室内剧。
back_translation: Chabrol transformed a potentially promising black comedy material into a gloomy indoor drama.

text: the unrelenting wind of the season disrupts a landscape of inaction , theft and drug use .
translation: 季节无情的风打破了无所作为、盗窃和药物使用的景观。
back_translation: The ruthless winds of the season shattered the landscape of inaction, theft, and drug use.

text: as time races on 'superbob ' must rescue his son dante , who has been kidnapped by big yard .
translation: 随着时间的推移，“超级鲍勃”必须拯救他的儿子丹特，他被大院绑架了。
back_translation: As time goes by, "Super Bob" must save his son Dante, who has been kidnapped by a gang.

text: in this prequel to the exorcist , father merrin is a younger man working on a dig in africa .
translation: 在《驱魔者》的前传中，梅林神父是一位年轻人，在非洲进行考古发掘。
back_translation: In the prequel to "The Exorcist," Father Merrin is a young man conducting archaeological digs in Africa.

text: using every means necessary-manipulation , extortion , blackmail-they brought the kingpins of the record industry to their knees , creating a network that controlled top 40 airplay across the country .
translation: 他们使用一切必要手段——操控、勒索、敲诈——将唱片行业的幕后大佬们迫到了膝盖，建立了一个控制全国热门40首播放的网络。
back_translation: They used every necessary means—manipulation, extortion, blackmail—to force the behind-the-scenes bigwigs of the music industry to their knees and established a network that controls the top 40 hits across the country.

text: a ruined , jeckyll and hyde man he may be , but a ruined man may prove to be a heroic one when a villain emerges , and close . . .
translation: 一个被毁灭的、杰基尔与海德般的人，他可能被毁灭，但当一个恶棍出现时，被毁灭的人可能会证明自己是一个英雄，并且结束……
back_translation: A destroyed, Jekyll and Hyde-like person, he may be ruined, but when a villain appears, the ruined person may prove himself to be a hero and end...

text: a timeless , coming of age story set against the epic , sweeping landscape of north africa .
translation: 一个不受时间限制的成长故事，背景设定在北非壮丽的广袤景观中。
back_translation: A timeless story of growth set against the magnificent and vast landscapes of North Africa.

text: melds derivative elements into something that is often quite rich and exciting , and always a beauty to behold .
translation: 将衍生元素融合成一种通常十分丰富而令人兴奋的东西，且总是令人赏心悦目。
back_translation: Merge the derived elements into something that is usually very rich and exciting, and is always pleasing to the eye.

text: may not be a breakthrough in filmmaking , but it is unwavering and arresting .
translation: 这可能不是电影制作的突破，但它坚定而引人注目。
back_translation: This may not be a breakthrough in filmmaking, but it is solid and striking.

text: when valento lets his temper get the better of him , he needs a fall guy , and everyone 's favorite dupe rises to the top .
translation: 当瓦伦托的脾气失控时，他需要一个替罪羊，而每个人最喜爱的傻瓜就脱颖而出了。
back_translation: When Valento's temper gets out of control, he needs a scapegoat, and everyone's favorite fool stands out.

text: the quest takes him to the mountains of north carolina , the beaches of the dominican republic , the islands off of ireland , the gardens of japan and the holy land of india .
translation: 这次探索将他带到北卡罗来纳州的山脉、多米尼加共和国的海滩、爱尔兰沿岸的岛屿、日本的花园以及印度的圣地。
back_translation: This exploration took him to the mountains of North Carolina, the beaches of the Dominican Republic, the islands off the coast of Ireland, the gardens of Japan, and the sacred sites of India.

text: the two play a high-stakes game of pool which ends in a huge debt owed to joe and soon johnny finds that his brother is in jail for trying to steal the money he owes .
translation: 两人进行了一场高风险的台球比赛，结果约翰欠了乔一大笔债务，很快约翰尼发现他的兄弟因试图偷取他欠的钱而入狱。
back_translation: Two people had a high-risk billiards match, resulting in John owing Joe a large sum of money. Soon, Johnny discovered that his brother was in jail for trying to steal the money he owed him.

text: there 's so much to look at in metropolis you hate to tear your eyes away from the images long enough to read the subtitles .
translation: 在大都市中有太多的视觉冲击，让你不愿意离开那些画面，甚至连阅读字幕的时间都不想花。
back_translation: In the metropolis, there are too many visual stimuli that make you unwilling to leave those images, even to the point of not wanting to spend time reading the subtitles.

text: jamie has a `` to-do `` list for her life and also a very big secret she must keep from landon .
translation: 杰米有一个“待办事项”清单，并且她还有一个必须对兰登保守的重大秘密。
back_translation: Jamie has a "to-do" list, and she also has a重大 secret that she must keep from Landon.

text: a mass of weary knights , squires , soldiers of fortune and priests are making their way home across a europe that has changed forever .
translation: 一群疲惫的骑士、侍从、冒险者和牧师正在穿越一片永远改变了的欧洲，朝着回家的方向移动。
back_translation: A group of weary knights, squires, adventurers, and priests is traversing a forever changed Europe, moving towards the direction of home.

text: romanek keeps adding flourishes -- artsy fantasy sequences -- that simply feel wrong . they cheapen the overall effect .
translation: 罗马内克不断添加华丽的修饰——艺术性的幻想场景——但这些感觉就是不对。它们降低了整体效果。
back_translation: Romanek keeps adding extravagant embellishments—artistic fantasy scenes—but they just feel wrong. They detract from the overall effect.

text: he supports her completely , particularly as she begins to paint again .
translation: 他全力支持她，尤其是在她重新开始画画的时候。
back_translation: He fully supports her, especially when she starts painting again.

text: the only thing in pauline and paulette that you have n't seen before is a scene featuring a football field-sized oriental rug crafted out of millions of vibrant flowers .
translation: 在《保琳与保蕾特》中，你未曾见过的唯一场景是一幅由数百万朵绚丽花朵制成的足球场大小的东方地毯。
back_translation: In "Pauline and Bolete," the only scene you haven't seen is a football-field-sized Eastern carpet made of millions of vibrant flowers.

text: every hour brings rausch one step closer to controlling the satellite and taking the world hostage .
translation: 每个小时都让拉乌什更接近控制卫星并挟持全球。
back_translation: Every hour brings Laos closer to controlling satellites and holding the world hostage.

text: just about the best straight-up , old-school horror film of the last 15 years .
translation: 过去15年里最好的传统恐怖电影之一。
back_translation: One of the best traditional horror films of the past 15 years.

text: already living in a society that mistrusts them , the mutants are faced with even more discrimination after an unforeseen enemy - who may be a mutant with extraordinary powers - launches a devastating attack .
translation: 在一个已经对他们缺乏信任的社会中，突变人面临着更严重的歧视，因为一个不可预见的敌人——可能是一个拥有非凡能力的突变人——发起了一次毁灭性的攻击。
back_translation: In a society that has already lost trust in them, mutants face even greater discrimination, as an unforeseen enemy—possibly a mutant with extraordinary abilities—launches a devastating attack.

text: the story itself it mostly told through on-camera interviews with several survivors , whose riveting memories are rendered with such clarity that it 's as if it all happened only yesterday .
translation: 故事主要通过几位幸存者的现场采访讲述，他们生动的回忆清晰得仿佛一切就发生在昨天。
back_translation: The story is primarily told through on-site interviews with several survivors, whose vivid recollections are so clear that it feels as if everything happened just yesterday.

text: the unexpected result demonstrates ignored wills do not remain invisible forever .
translation: 意外的结果表明，被忽视的遗嘱并不总是隐形的。
back_translation: Unexpected results indicate that overlooked wills are not always invisible.

text: the hours makes you examine your own life in much the same way its characters do , and the experience is profound . the hours is what movies are supposed to be . . .
translation: 这些时光使你以与角色相似的方式审视自己的生活，这种体验深刻而震撼。《这些时光》就是电影应有的样子……
back_translation: These moments lead you to reflect on your own life in a way that parallels the characters, and this experience is profound and shocking. "These Moments" is what a movie should be...

text: a literary detective story is still a detective story and aficionados of the whodunit wo n't be disappointed .
translation: 一部文学侦探故事仍然是侦探故事，喜欢推理小说的人不会失望。
back_translation: A literary detective story is still a detective story, and those who enjoy detective novels will not be disappointed.

text: woody allen plays val waxman , a film director , who was once big in the 1970 's and 1980 's , but has now has been reduced to directing tv commercials .
translation: 伍迪·艾伦饰演瓦尔·瓦克斯曼，一位曾在1970年代和1980年代风光无限的电影导演，如今却沦落到执导电视广告。
back_translation: Woody Allen plays Val Waxman, a once-glorious film director from the 1970s and 1980s who has now fallen to directing television commercials.

text: es divertida , visualmente espectacular y muy entretenida . simple y sencillamente te sorprenderM-a .
translation: 它很有趣，视觉上令人惊艳，并且非常娱乐。简单来说，它会让你感到惊喜。
back_translation: It is very interesting, visually stunning, and highly entertaining. Simply put, it will surprise you.

text: he was arrested for dealing drugs , he spent five years in jail and was banned from france for two years .
translation: 他因贩毒被捕，入狱五年，并被禁止再次进入法国两年。
back_translation: He was arrested for drug trafficking, sentenced to five years in prison, and banned from entering France for two years.

text: kapur 's contradictory feelings about his material result in a movie that works against itself .
translation: 卡普尔对他材料的矛盾情感导致了一部自相矛盾的电影。
back_translation: Kapoor's conflicting feelings about his material resulted in a contradictory film.

text: with the dog days of august upon us , think of this dog of a movie as the cinematic equivalent of high humidity .
translation: 随着八月的炎热时节到来，把这部狗一般的电影视为高湿度的电影等价物。
back_translation: With the arrival of the hot season in August, consider this dog-like movie as the equivalent of a high humidity film.

text: throughout nearly a decade she experiences forbidden love , religion , near-death experiences , drugs , starvation , and how it feels to be loved .
translation: 在近十年的时间里，她经历了禁忌之爱、宗教、濒死体验、毒品、饥饿，以及被爱的感觉。
back_translation: In the past ten years, she has experienced forbidden love, religion, near-death experiences, drugs, hunger, and the feeling of being loved.

text: kiarostami profoundly displays uganda 's life and culture through his touristy pictures , as deceptively simple as the alphabet
translation: 基亚罗斯塔米通过他具有观光性质的照片深刻展示了乌干达的生活和文化，尽管看似简单如字母表。
back_translation: Kiarostami profoundly showcases the life and culture of Uganda through his photographic work with a sightseeing nature, despite appearing as simple as the alphabet.

text: it 's like a `` big chill `` reunion of the baader-meinhof gang , only these guys are more harmless pranksters than political activists .
translation: 这就像是“寒流”的再聚会，但这帮人更像是无害的恶作剧者，而不是政治活动家。
back_translation: This is like a reunion of the "Cold Wave," but these people seem more like harmless pranksters than political activists.

text: an enchanting film that presents an audacious tour of the past and takes within its warm embrace the bounties of cultural artifacts inside st . petersburg 's hermitage museum .
translation: 一部迷人的电影，展现了一次大胆的时光之旅，将圣彼得堡冬宫博物馆内丰富的文化遗产紧紧拥入温暖的怀抱。
back_translation: A charming film that showcases a bold time travel adventure, tightly embracing the rich cultural heritage within the Winter Palace Museum in St. Petersburg.

text: a lot like the imaginary sport it projects onto the screen -- loud , violent and mindless .
translation: 很像它在屏幕上呈现的虚构运动——喧闹、暴力且毫无意义。
back_translation: It is very similar to the fictional movement it presents on screen—noisy, violent, and meaningless.

text: obstacles are too easily overcome and there is n't much in the way of character development in the script .
translation: 障碍太容易克服，剧本中人物发展也不多。
back_translation: The obstacles are too easy to overcome, and the character development in the script is lacking.

text: fun , flip and terribly hip bit of cinematic entertainment .
translation: 有趣、翻转且极具时尚感的一段电影娱乐。
back_translation: An interesting, flipped, and extremely stylish piece of movie entertainment.

text: the story . . . is inspiring , ironic , and revelatory of just how ridiculous and money-oriented the record industry really is . it is also a testament to the integrity and vision of the band .
translation: 这个故事...令人鼓舞，讽刺，并揭示了唱片行业是多么荒谬和以金钱为导向。它也是对乐队的诚信和愿景的证明。
back_translation: This story is... inspiring, ironic, and reveals how absurd and money-oriented the music industry is. It is also a testament to the band's integrity and vision.

text: even in the summertime , the most restless young audience deserves the dignity of an action hero motivated by something more than franchise possibilities .
translation: 即使在夏季，最不安分的年轻观众也值得拥有一个受到超越系列可能性驱动的动作英雄的尊严。
back_translation: Even in summer, the most restless young audience deserves a dignity embodied by an action hero driven by possibilities beyond the series.

text: stifler plans to throw the ultimate bachelor party , and finch is not for letting stifler steal the maid of honor , who happens to be michelle 's sexy younger sister , cadence .
translation: 斯蒂夫勒计划举办终极单身派对，而芬奇可不想让斯蒂夫勒抢走伴娘，她恰好是米歇尔的性感妹妹凯丹。
back_translation: Stifler plans to throw the ultimate bachelor party, but Finch doesn't want Stifler to steal the bridesmaid, who just happens to be Michelle's sexy sister, Kaden.

text: it 's filthy . it 's sexist . and it 's hilarious for adult audiences who appreciate lawrence 's raunchy approach and perfect timing .
translation: 这真脏。这性别歧视。而且对于懂得劳伦斯粗俗幽默和完美时机的成年观众来说，这非常搞笑。
back_translation: This is really dirty. It’s sexist. And it's very funny for adult audiences who understand Lawrence's crude humor and perfect timing.

text: matters are complicated still further when beckinsale finds herself falling in love with oldman 's character .
translation: 事情变得更加复杂，当贝金赛尔发现自己爱上了奥德曼饰演的角色。
back_translation: Things became more complicated when Beijinsail realized she had fallen in love with the character played by Odeman.

text: challenged to stop an alien force , the friends must first prevent the slaughter of innocent civilians by a military vigilante , then overcome a threat to the bond between them .
translation: 挑战阻止外星力量，朋友们首先必须防止军队义警对无辜平民的屠杀，然后克服对他们之间关系的威胁。
back_translation: To challenge and stop the alien forces, the friends must first prevent the militia from slaughtering innocent civilians, and then overcome the threats to their relationships.

text: sumo is not only the national sport of japan but a centuries-old cultural treasure that is literally part of the shinto religion .
translation: 相扑不仅是日本的国技，也是一个有着数百年历史的文化瑰宝，实际上是神道教的一部分。
back_translation: Sumo is not only Japan's national sport but also a cultural treasure with a history of hundreds of years; it is essentially part of Shinto.

text: now , all the mutants need to fight together against an enemy in common : general william stryker , who is planning to destroy them all .
translation: 现在，所有的变种人需要团结起来，共同对抗一个共同的敌人：威廉·斯特莱克将军，他正计划消灭他们所有人。
back_translation: Now, all mutants need to unite to collectively fight against a common enemy: General William Striker, who is planning to eliminate all of them.

text: if you 're the kind of parent who enjoys intentionally introducing your kids to films which will cause loads of irreparable damage that years and years of costly analysis could never fix , i have just one word for you -M-^V decasia
translation: 如果你是那种乐于故意让孩子接触那些会造成大量不可逆转伤害的电影的父母，我只有一个词要告诉你 - M-^V Decasia
back_translation: If you are the kind of parent who takes pleasure in deliberately exposing children to films that can cause a lot of irreversible harm, I have only one word to say to you - M-^V Decasia.

text: solid . is n't as groundbreaking as shiri , but has its moments .
translation: 固体并没有像《Shiri》那样开创性的，但也有它的亮点时刻。
back_translation: Solid may not be as groundbreaking as "Shiri," but it does have its standout moments.

text: bernal 's transformation from naive priest to tortured adulterer to hard-nosed careerist is riveting .
translation: 贝尔纳尔从天真的牧师到被折磨的 adulterer 再到冷酷无情的职业生涯追求者的转变引人入胜。
back_translation: Bernal's transformation from a naive pastor to a tormented adulterer and then to a ruthless careerist is captivating.

text: bobby and susan have found in each other what most only dream of finding , their soul mate .
translation: 博比和苏珊在彼此身上找到了大多数人只会梦想找到的东西，他们的灵魂伴侣。
back_translation: Bobby and Susan found in each other what most people can only dream of finding: their soulmate.

text: it does n't seem like it 's following a fixed path to the finish . unlike so many movies , it feels alive .
translation: 它似乎没有沿着固定的路径到达终点。与许多电影不同，它感觉是活的。
back_translation: It seems to not reach the endpoint along a fixed path. Unlike many movies, it feels alive.

text: he sells them the drugs , they teach him how to smoke a joint .
translation: 他卖给他们毒品，他们教他怎么抽大麻。
back_translation: He sold drugs to them, and they taught him how to smoke marijuana.

text: after healing a woman of a stroke , william picks up another pastor who desires to learn the deeper things of god .
translation: 在治愈了一位中风女性后，威廉接待了另一位希望学习上帝更深奥教义的牧师。
back_translation: After healing a woman who had a stroke, William welcomed another pastor who wished to learn the deeper doctrines of God.

text: can henrik win the competition and elena 's heart , and what will happen with the magic shoes ?
translation: 亨瑞克能赢得比赛和艾琳娜的心吗？魔法鞋会发生什么呢？
back_translation: Can Henrick win the game and Elena's heart? What will happen with the magical shoes?

text: it 's disappointing when filmmakers throw a few big-name actors and cameos at a hokey script .
translation: 当电影制片人把几个大牌演员和客串角色塞进一个老套的剧本时，这令人失望。
back_translation: It's disappointing when filmmakers cram several big-name actors and cameos into a clichéd script.

text: this is a man 's man , a ladies man , a super-hero : he 's ted davis : `` bachelorman `` when the woman of his dreams , `` heather `` moves in next door , ted 's ordeal begins .
translation: 这是一个男中之男，一个淑女之男，一个超级英雄：他就是泰德·戴维斯：“独行侠”。当他梦想中的女人“希瑟”搬到隔壁时，泰德的磨难开始了。
back_translation: This is a man's man, a gentleman's gentleman, a superhero: he is Ted Davis, the "Lone Ranger." When the woman of his dreams, "Heather," moves in next door, Ted's trials begin.

text: lovingly photographed in the manner of a golden book sprung to life , stuart little 2 manages sweetness largely without stickiness .
translation: 以一种如同金色图书跃然纸上的方式充满爱意地拍摄，《小斯图亚特2》在很大程度上实现了甜美而又不腻的效果。
back_translation: With a loving touch that brings the golden storybook to life, "Stuart Little 2" largely achieves a sweet yet not cloying effect.

text: sometimes being honest and truthful is all you need . . . sometimes .
translation: 有时候，诚实和真实就是你所需要的一切……有时候。
back_translation: Sometimes, honesty and authenticity are all you need... sometimes.

text: some , like the inmate philosopher , 451 , see the evil of their ways and repent , doing the best to keep their humanity .
translation: 有些人，比如囚犯哲学家451，看到自己行为的邪恶并悔改，尽力保持他们的人性。
back_translation: Some people, like the prisoner philosopher 451, see the evil of their actions and repent, striving to maintain their humanity.

text: the backyard battles you staged with your green plastic army men were more exciting and almost certainly made more sense .
translation: 你用绿色塑料小兵 staged 的后院战斗更激动人心，而且几乎肯定更有意义。
back_translation: The backyard battles you staged with green plastic soldiers are more exciting and almost certainly more meaningful.

text: a distant , even sterile , yet compulsively watchable look at the sordid life of hogan 's heroes star bob crane .
translation: 一个遥远，甚至冷漠，但又让人 compulsively 想看的霍根的英雄明星鲍勃·克莱恩的卑鄙生活的观察。
back_translation: An observation of the despicable life of Bob Klein, a Hogan's Heroes star, who is distant, even indifferent, yet compulsively watchable.

text: . . . the best movie featuring the next generation cast , and a movie that 's ( almost ) every bit as great as [ treks ] ii and vi .
translation: ... 最佳的电影是由下一代演员阵容出演的，这部电影几乎和《星际迷航》II和VI一样精彩。
back_translation: The best movie features a new generation of actors, and it is almost as exciting as Star Trek II and VI.

text: the christ allegory does n't work because there is no foundation for it
translation: 基督象征没有作用，因为没有基础。
back_translation: The symbol of Christ has no effect because there is no foundation.

text: it 's a setup so easy it borders on facile , but keeping the film from cheap-shot mediocrity is its crack cast .
translation: 这是一种简单到几乎轻浮的设定，但让电影避免陷入低级平庸的，是其出色的演员阵容。
back_translation: This is a setting that is simple to the point of being almost superficial, but what prevents the film from descending into crudeness and mediocrity is its outstanding cast.

text: klein ischgl actually turns out to be a stone-age-like townlet ( 9 inhabitants ) up the mountain , and t & # 252 ; rlichs grandfather , who runs the place , even resists to electricity and indoor plumbing .
translation: 克莱因伊施格尔实际上是一个类似于石器时代的小镇（9名居民），位于山上，特尔利赫的祖父经营着这个地方，甚至抵制电力和室内自来水。
back_translation: Klein-Ischgl is actually a small town similar to the Stone Age (with 9 residents), located on a mountain, where Terlich's grandfather ran the place, even resisting electricity and indoor plumbing.

text: hundert 's challenge is to change this young man while maintaining his integrity .
translation: 亨德特的挑战是改变这个年轻人，同时保持他的诚信。
back_translation: Hendett's challenge is to change this young man while maintaining his integrity.

text: however , tania , his wife , tries to push him away from his criminal life , with no success .
translation: 然而，他的妻子塔尼亚试图将他拉离犯罪生活，然而没有成功。
back_translation: However, his wife Tanya tried to pull him away from his life of crime, but she was not successful.

text: methodical , measured , and gently tedious in its comedy , secret ballot is a purposefully reductive movie -- which may be why it 's so successful at lodging itself in the brain .
translation: 有条理、稳重，并且在喜剧上略显冗长的《秘密投票》是一部故意简化的电影——这可能就是它为何如此成功地扎根于人脑中的原因。
back_translation: Organized, composed, and slightly verbose in its humor, "Secret Ballot" is a deliberately simplified film—perhaps that is why it has so successfully taken root in people's minds.

text: ruthie & # 38 ; connie demonstrates the wit and wisdom , heartache and joy of these two wonderfully funny and deeply complex women who live their private lives in public and with passion .
translation: 鲁西和康妮展示了这两位精彩幽默且深刻复杂的女性的智慧与幽默、心痛与快乐，她们在公众面前充满热情地生活着自己的私生活。
back_translation: Lu Xi and Connie showcase the intelligence and humor, heartache and joy of these two remarkable, humorous, and deeply complex women, as they passionately live their private lives in the public eye.

text: even people clueless about skateboarding can enjoy dogtown and z-boys .
translation: 即使对滑板一无所知的人也能享受《狗镇与Z男孩》。
back_translation: Even people who know nothing about skateboarding can enjoy "Dogtown and Z-Boys."

text: but now there is a new threat , matt addison has fully mutated into a seemingly unstoppable creature , code named nemesis , who will stop at nothing until everything around it is dead , but it also has another agenda .
translation: 但现在出现了一种新的威胁，马特·阿迪森已经完全变异成一种似乎无法阻止的生物，代号“复仇者”，它将不惜一切代价，直到周围的一切都死去，但它还有其他的议程。
back_translation: But now a new threat has emerged: Matt Addison has fully mutated into a seemingly unstoppable being, codenamed "Avenger," which will stop at nothing until everything around it is dead, but it has other agendas as well.

text: the film might have been more satisfying if it had , in fact , been fleshed out a little more instead of going for easy smiles .
translation: 如果这部电影的内容更丰富一些，而不是追求轻松的笑点，可能会更让人满意。
back_translation: If the content of this movie were richer and not just focused on easy laughs, it might be more satisfying.

text: thoughtless , random , superficial humour and a lot of very bad scouse accents
translation: 无思考的、随意的、表面的幽默，以及许多非常糟糕的斯卡斯口音
back_translation: Unthinking, casual, superficial humor, and many very bad Scottish accents.

text: this astounding documentary puts reality tv to shame and reminds us of just how unreal that prefabricated situation-based dreck really is .
translation: 这部令人震惊的纪录片让真人秀显得逊色，并提醒我们那些预先设定情境的糟粕到底有多不真实。
back_translation: This shocking documentary makes reality shows seem inferior and reminds us of just how unrealistic the scripted scenarios really are.

text: the daughter of italian immigrants born in s & # 227 ; o paulo , she had to overcome traumas , among these , the suicide of her parents .
translation: 她是出生在圣保罗的意大利移民的女儿，必须克服创伤，包括父母的自杀。
back_translation: She is the daughter of Italian immigrants born in São Paulo and had to overcome trauma, including her parents' suicides.

text: with its dogged hollywood naturalism and the inexorable passage of its characters toward sainthood , windtalkers is nothing but a sticky-sweet soap .
translation: 《风语者》以其顽固的好莱坞自然主义和角色向圣人境界的不可避免的进程，简直就是一部黏腻甜腻的肥皂剧。
back_translation: "Windtalkers" is akin to a sticky, overly sentimental soap opera, with its stubborn Hollywood naturalism and the inevitable progression of characters towards saintly realms.

text: excellent performances from jacqueline bisset and martha plimpton grace this deeply touching melodrama .
translation: 贾基琳·比塞和玛莎·普林普顿的精彩表演为这部深情的情感剧增光添彩。
back_translation: The brilliant performances of Jacqueline Bisset and Martha Plimpton enhance this heartfelt emotional drama.

text: he no longer recognizes his wife isabelle nor his young son antoine nor his best friend fred .
translation: 他不再认得他的妻子伊莎贝尔，也不认得他的小儿子安托万，更不认得他最好的朋友弗雷德。
back_translation: He no longer recognizes his wife Isabel, nor does he recognize his young son Antoine, and he especially does not recognize his best friend Fred.

text: tells the humorous and touching story of six former creative anarchists who lived as house squatters in berlin during its heyday in the 80s when berlin was still an island in the middle of the former eastern germany .
translation: 讲述了六位前创造性无政府主义者的幽默而感人的故事，他们在80年代柏林的繁荣时期以房屋占据者的身份生活，那时的柏林仍然是前东德的一个岛屿。
back_translation: The humorous and touching stories of six former creative anarchists are told, who lived as squatters during the prosperous period of the 1980s in Berlin, when Berlin was still an island of the former East Germany.

text: there 's plenty of footage here of some of the world 's best djs at work , and it 's impressive , even for someone uninterested in the genre .
translation: 这里有大量世界顶级DJ工作的录像，即使对于对这一音乐类型不感兴趣的人来说，也相当令人印象深刻。
back_translation: Here are a large number of videos featuring the work of world-class DJs, which are quite impressive even for those who are not interested in this music genre.

text: talkiness is n't necessarily bad , but the dialogue frequently misses the mark .
translation: 啰嗦并不一定是坏事，但对话常常不够精准。
back_translation: Being verbose is not necessarily a bad thing, but conversations often lack precision.

text: intriguing documentary which is emotionally diluted by focusing on the story 's least interesting subject .
translation: 引人入胜的纪录片，但因集中于故事中最乏味的主题而情感稀薄。
back_translation: An engaging documentary, but emotionally thin due to its focus on the most tedious themes of the story.

text: these human encyclopedias of cinema see two to five films a day , and from 600 to 2 , 000 films per year .
translation: 这些电影的活百科全书每天观看两到五部电影，每年观看600到2000部电影。
back_translation: These movie encyclopedias watch two to five films a day, totaling 600 to 2000 films a year.

text: in a coastal north carolinian small town in the mid 1990 's , a boy from the popular but troubled undirected group of students gets busted , and for punishment , you guessed it , has to do community service activities which include the high school 's spring play .
translation: 在1990年代中期的北卡罗莱纳州沿海小镇，一个来自受欢迎但问题重重的无目标学生群体的男孩被抓住了，作为惩罚，你猜得没错，他必须参加社区服务活动，其中包括高中春季话剧。
back_translation: In a small coastal town in North Carolina in the mid-1990s, a boy from a popular but troubled and aimless group of students got caught, and as a punishment, you guessed it, he had to participate in community service activities, which included the high school spring play.

text: this is as lax and limp a comedy as i 've seen in a while , a meander through worn-out material .
translation: 这是一部我近期见过的最松散、最无力的喜剧，像是在闲逛陈旧的素材。
back_translation: This is the most loose and powerless comedy I have seen recently, as if it is just wandering through outdated material.

text: your stomach for heaven depends largely on your appetite for canned corn .
translation: 你对天堂的渴望在很大程度上取决于你对罐装玉米的胃口。
back_translation: Your desire for heaven largely depends on your appetite for canned corn.

text: stealing harvard does n't care about cleverness , wit or any other kind of intelligent humor .
translation: 《偷窃哈佛》并不在乎聪明才智、机智或任何其他类型的智能幽默。
back_translation: "Stealing Harvard" does not care about intelligence, wit, or any other type of smart humor.

text: a virus has escaped in a secret facility called `` the hive , `` turning the staff into hungry zombies and releasing the mutated lab `` animals `` that they were studying .
translation: 一种病毒在一个名为“蜂巢”的秘密设施中泄露，员工变成了饥饿的僵尸，并释放了他们正在研究的变异实验“动物”。
back_translation: A virus leaked from a secret facility named "The Hive," turning the employees into ravenous zombies and releasing the mutated experiments they were studying, called "Animals."

text: he discovers a dark side to the circus and decides to leave , but finds he is caught between his love of a circus girl and the dark hand of the boss who is determined he stays .
translation: 他发现马戏团有阴暗的一面，决定离开，但发现自己陷入了对一个马戏女孩的爱与一个决心让他留下的老板的阴暗势力之间。
back_translation: He discovered the dark side of the circus and decided to leave, but found himself caught between his love for a circus girl and the sinister forces of a boss determined to make him stay.

text: the two friends devise a plan to dress up in drag , commit a minor felony , get caught and then sent to the same prison in order to retrievie the ticket .
translation: 这两个朋友制定了一个计划，打扮成女装，犯一个轻微的罪行，然后被捕并送进同一所监狱，以便找回那张票。
back_translation: The two friends devised a plan to dress in women's clothing, commit a minor crime, and then get caught and sent to the same prison in order to retrieve that ticket.

text: a woman stands on the shore , looking off into the flooded valley where her friends and neighbors once lived .
translation: 一位女性站在海岸上，凝视着曾经是她的朋友和邻居居住的洪水淹没的山谷。
back_translation: A woman stands on the coast, gazing at the flooded valley that once housed her friends and neighbors.

text: [ denis ' ] bare-bones narrative more closely resembles an outline for a '70s exploitation picture than the finished product .
translation: 德尼的简单叙述更像是70年代剥削电影的提纲，而不是成品。
back_translation: Deni's straightforward narrative resembles an outline for a 1970s exploitation film rather than a finished product.

text: the unexplored story opportunities of `` punch-drunk love `` may have worked against the maker 's minimalist intent but it is an interesting exercise by talented writer/director anderson .
translation: 《醉爱》尚未开发的故事机会可能与创作者的极简主义意图相悖，但这是才华横溢的编剧/导演安德森的一次有趣尝试。
back_translation: The undeveloped story opportunities of "Drunk Love" may contradict the creator's minimalist intentions, but it is an interesting attempt by the talented screenwriter/director Anderson.

text: triple x is a double agent , and he 's one bad dude . when you 've got the wildly popular vin diesel in the equation , it adds up to big box office bucks all but guaranteed .
translation: 三倍X是一个双重特工，他是个坏家伙。当你在这个方程中加入广受欢迎的范·迪塞尔时，这就几乎保证了大把的票房收入。
back_translation: Triple X is a double agent, and he's a bad guy. When you add the widely popular Vin Diesel to this equation, it almost guarantees a huge box office revenue.

text: spurning her mother 's insistence that she get on with her life , mary is thrown out of the house , rejected by joe , and expelled from school as she grows larger with child .
translation: 在母亲坚持让她继续生活的情况下，玛丽被赶出家门，被乔拒绝，并在怀孕期间被学校开除。
back_translation: Under her mother's insistence to continue living, Mary was kicked out of the house, rejected by Joe, and expelled from school during her pregnancy.

text: when she is discovered stealing money from the hotel , she turns to her friend zidanes for help .
translation: 当她被发现从酒店偷钱时，她向她的朋友齐达内寻求帮助。
back_translation: When she was caught stealing money from the hotel, she sought help from her friend Zidane.

text: there are some fairly unsettling scenes , but they never succeed in really rattling the viewer .
translation: 有一些相当不安的场景，但它们从未真正成功地动摇观众。

text: portrait of immigrant youth in two european countries , france and norway , where violence and illegal activity have become a part of everyday life , and where the search for identity can quickly take a dangerous turn .

text: it 's difficult to conceive of anyone who has reached puberty actually finding the characters in slackers or their antics amusing , let alone funny .

text: no dia em que aceitou dirigir esta continuaM-gM-co , harold ramis deve ter saM-mdo da cama com o pM-i esquerdo . e aqueles que decidiram assistir a este filme tambM-im .

translation: 这部电影基于一部备受赞誉的1935年小说，讲述了关于确保爱沙尼亚独立的解放战争（1918-1920）故事，讲述了一群年轻的男孩们前往前线与苏俄军队作战。
back_translation: This film is based on a highly acclaimed novel from 1935, telling the story of the War of Liberation (1918-1920) to ensure Estonia's independence, focusing on a group of young boys who go to the front lines to fight against the Soviet Russian army.

text: stranded on hawaii , experiment # 626 ca n't actually do much harm : water all around , no big cities and two well-equipped representatives of the galactic federation already following close behind to catch him again .
