translation: 天主教会和爱尔兰法院决定道尔兄弟姐妹被送入教会运营的孤儿院。
back_translation: The Catholic Church and the Irish court decided that the O'Driscoll siblings would be sent to an orphanage run by the church.

text: the tale of ancanar is an original fantasy story inspired by the author j . r . r . tolkien .
translation: 安卡纳的故事是一个原创的奇幻故事，灵感来自于作者J.R.R.托尔金。
back_translation: The story of Ankana is an original fantasy tale inspired by the author J.R.R. Tolkien.

text: and the conclusion of the story is how the four attempt to pull off their master plan , this well-thought-out bank robbery .
translation: 故事的结尾是四人如何尝试实施他们的计划，这个精心策划的银行抢劫。
back_translation: The ending of the story is about how the four of them try to implement their plan for the meticulously planned bank robbery.

text: the problem with the bread , my sweet is that it 's far too sentimental .
translation: 面包的问题，我的甜心，是它太过感伤了。
back_translation: The problem with the bread, my sweetheart, is that it is too sentimental.

text: a static and sugary little half-hour , after-school special about interfaith understanding , stretched out to 90 minutes .
translation: 一个静态而甜腻的半小时课后特别节目，关于宗教间的理解，拉长到了90分钟。
back_translation: A static and syrupy half-hour special program after class, about understanding between religions, was extended to 90 minutes.

text: ben rubin , a young israeli internist vying for the position of surgeon , learns that his internship has been terminated and he has been chosen to accompany abraham lazar , the hospital administrator and his wife , dori on a trip to india .
translation: 本·鲁宾，一位年轻的以色列内科医生，竞争外科医生的职位，得知他的实习已被终止，且他被选中随阿布拉哈姆·拉扎尔，医院管理员及其妻子多莉一起前往印度旅行。
back_translation: Ben Rubin, a young Israeli internist, competing for a position as a surgeon, learns that his internship has been terminated and that he has been chosen to travel to India with Abraham Lazar, the hospital administrator, and his wife Dolly.

text: epic battles , spectacular effects and multiple story lines make the two towers a most excellent middle chapter in the lord of the rings film trilogy .
translation: 史诗般的战斗、壮观的特效和多条故事线使《双塔奇谋》成为《指环王》电影三部曲中最出色的中间章节。
back_translation: Epic battles, stunning visuals, and multiple storylines make "The Two Towers" the most outstanding middle chapter of "The Lord of the Rings" film trilogy.

text: throughout their journey they survive gun battles , vicious hand to hand fighting , vision blurring car chases and a heart stopping train wreck hundreds of feet above a rocky gorge .
translation: 在他们的旅程中，他们经历了枪战、激烈的肉搏、视线模糊的汽车追逐，以及在几百英尺高的 rocky gorge 上发生的让人心跳加速的火车事故。
back_translation: On their journey, they experienced gunfights, intense hand-to-hand combat, blurred-vision car chases, and heart-pounding train accidents that occurred hundreds of feet above a rocky gorge.

text: it has a caffeinated , sloppy brilliance , sparkling with ideas you wish had been developed with more care , but animated by an energy that puts the dutiful efforts of more disciplined grade-grubbers to shame .
translation: 它拥有一种充满咖啡因的粗糙辉煌，闪烁着你希望能更加精心发展的想法，但却被一种能量驱动，这种能量使得那些更加守规矩努力追求分数的人的努力显得黯然失色。
back_translation: It has a rough brilliance filled with caffeine, sparkling with ideas that you hope could be more carefully developed, but driven by an energy that makes the efforts of those who are more rule-bound and striving for scores seem pale in comparison.

text: evokes a little of the fear that parents have for the possible futures of their children -- and the sometimes bad choices mothers and fathers make in the interests of doing them good .
translation: 唤起了父母对孩子可能未来的担忧，以及父母为孩子好而有时做出的糟糕选择。
back_translation: It has awakened parents' worries about their child's possible future, as well as the poor choices parents sometimes make for their child's sake.

text: portentous and pretentious , the weight of water is appropriately titled , given the heavy-handedness of it drama .
translation: 《水的分量》这个标题恰如其分，因为它的戏剧性显得沉重而做作。
back_translation: The title "The Weight of Water" is apt, as its dramatic nature feels heavy and contrived.

text: two badly interlocked stories drowned by all too clever complexity .
translation: 两个错综复杂的故事被过于巧妙的复杂性淹没。
back_translation: Two intricate stories are overwhelmed by overly clever complexity.

text: what makes how i killed my father compelling , besides its terrific performances , is fontaine 's willingness to wander into the dark areas of parent-child relationships without flinching .
translation: 《我如何杀死父亲》之所以引人入胜，除了其出色的表演外，还在于丰丹愿意毫不犹豫地深入探讨亲子关系中的黑暗领域。
back_translation: "The way I killed my father" is captivating not only for its outstanding performances but also because Fong Dan is willing to delve into the dark realms of parent-child relationships without hesitation.

text: trapped in a lovers triangle and ruthless game of lust , greed , and betrayal we follow one woman 's hypnotic journey to discover her true self . . .
translation: 陷入一场情感三角恋及无情的欲望、贪婪和背叛游戏中，我们跟随一个女人的催眠般的旅程，去发现她的真实自我……
back_translation: Caught in a love triangle and a ruthless game of desire, greed, and betrayal, we follow a woman's hypnotic journey to discover her true self...

text: a movie more to be prescribed than recommended -- as visually bland as a dentist 's waiting room , complete with soothing muzak and a cushion of predictable narrative rhythms .
translation: 一部更适合开处方而不是推荐的电影——在视觉上平淡无奇，犹如牙医的候诊室，配有舒缓的背景音乐和可预测的叙事节奏。
back_translation: A movie that is more suitable for prescription than recommendation—visually unremarkable, akin to a dentist's waiting room, accompanied by soothing background music and a predictable narrative rhythm.

text: after returning home from a two week trial in chicago , rachel bishop ( rachel nord ) finds her sister emily bishop ( nancy walters ) missing .
translation: 在芝加哥进行为期两周的审判后，瑞秋·毕晓普（瑞秋·诺德）回到家中，发现她的妹妹艾米莉·毕晓普（南希·沃尔特斯）失踪了。
back_translation: After a two-week trial in Chicago, Rachel Bishop (Rachel Nord) returned home to find that her sister Emily Bishop (Nancy Walters) was missing.

text: this event leads to deep thoughts about marriage , friendship , relationships and last not least life itself .
translation: 这个事件引发了对婚姻、友谊、关系以及最后但同样重要的生活本身的深思。
back_translation: This event has sparked deep reflections on marriage, friendship, relationships, and last but not least, life itself.

text: ( hamlet ) privilege seeks to produce a subliminal confrontation with its ever-shifting subject matter , much as the body is reputed to create vortexes of healing and repose in response to traumas .
translation: （哈姆雷特）特权旨在与其不断变化的主题产生潜在的对抗，正如身体被认为在应对创伤时创造治愈和休息的漩涡。
back_translation: The privilege of "Hamlet" aims to generate potential confrontations with its ever-changing themes, just as the body is believed to create a vortex of healing and rest in response to trauma.

text: and suddenly , she spots her beloved , wandering over sand dunes and brings the exhausted patricia to his oasis called 'shangri-la ' . . .
translation: 忽然，她发现了她心爱的人，他正徘徊在沙丘上，将疲惫的帕特里夏带到了他名为“香格里拉”的绿洲……
back_translation: Suddenly, she discovered her beloved, who was wandering on the sand dunes, bringing the weary Patricia to the oasis he called "Shangri-La"…

text: no such thing may be far from perfect , but those small , odd hartley touches help you warm to it .
translation: 这样的东西可能远非完美，但那些小而奇特的哈特利风格细节让你对它产生好感。
back_translation: Such things may be far from perfect, but those small and peculiar details in the Hartley style endear you to it.

text: to worsen things , during the holidays aksel gets teamed up with the two girls , fatima and annika , to perform a song to the local youth club 's song contest , melodi grand prix .
translation: 更糟糕的是，在假期期间，阿克塞尔与两个女孩法蒂玛和安妮卡被组队，为当地青年俱乐部的歌曲比赛“旋律大奖”表演一首歌曲。
back_translation: Worse still, during the holiday, Axel was teamed up with two girls, Fatima and Annika, to perform a song for the local youth club's song competition, "Melody Grand Prix."

text: with dickens ' words and writer-director douglas mcgrath 's even-toned direction , a ripping good yarn is told .
translation: 在狄更斯的文字和编剧兼导演道格拉斯·麦克格拉斯平稳的导演下，讲述了一个引人入胜的故事。
back_translation: Under the steady direction of Douglas McGrath, both a writer and director, a captivating story is told through Dickens' words.

text: from the trembling fury of gheorgiu 's tosca to the penetrating stare of raimondi 's scarpia , this tosca blazes with passion . at its best , it 's sublime .
translation: 从乔治乌的《托斯卡》中颤抖的愤怒，到雷蒙迪的《斯卡皮亚》中深入的凝视，这部《托斯卡》燃烧着激情。在最佳状态下，它是崇高的。
back_translation: From the trembling anger in Puccini's "Tosca" to the deep gaze in Remondi's "Scarpia," this production of "Tosca" burns with passion. At its best, it is sublime.

text: some of the featured art events include `` burial in space `` by woodpussy ( a group of musicians and pyro-technicians who blast their deceased founder into space in a rocket of their own creation ) ; `` nebulous entity `` and `` futura deluxe `` ( two large , roving installation pieces engineered using mathematics derived from fields of neural networks , ecological systems and fractals ) ; and a performance artist dea million who stages her `` wedding `` to america .
translation: 一些特色艺术活动包括“太空葬礼”，由Woodpussy（一个音乐家和烟火技术专家组成的团队，他们将已故创始人发射到太空，使用自己创造的火箭）；“模糊实体”和“未来豪华”（两个大型流动装置艺术作品，采用源自神经网络、生态系统和分形领域的数学设计）；以及表演艺术家Dea Million，她为自己与美国的“婚礼”进行表演。
back_translation: Some featured art activities include a "space funeral," organized by Woodpussy (a team of musicians and pyrotechnics experts who launch the deceased founder into space using their own homemade rockets); "Blurred Bodies" and "Future Luxuria" (two large-scale installation art pieces inspired by mathematical designs derived from neural networks, ecosystems, and fractal fields); and performance artist Dea Million, who performs her "wedding" with America.

text: . . . one big laugh , three or four mild giggles , and a whole lot of not much else .
translation: ……一次大笑，三四声轻微的笑声，以及一大堆其他不算什么的东西。
back_translation: ...a big laugh, three or four soft giggles, and a bunch of other things that don't matter.

text: bold , imaginative , rational and persuasive an account of the lethally dangerous world we live in , the sum of all fears is an international spy drama with visceral impact .
translation: 大胆、富有想象力、理性且具说服力的关于我们生活中致命危险世界的叙述，《恐惧之总和》是一部具有强烈冲击力的国际间谍剧。
back_translation: Bold, imaginative, rational, and persuasive, the narrative of the world of deadly dangers in our lives, "The Totality of Fear" is a highly impactful international espionage drama.

text: continually challenges perceptions of guilt and innocence , of good guys and bad , and asks us whether a noble end can justify evil means .
translation: 不断挑战对罪与 innocence、好人和坏人的看法，并询问我们高尚的目的是否能证明恶劣手段的合理性。
back_translation: Continuously challenge the views on罪 and innocence, good people and bad people, and question whether our noble purposes can justify the use of恶劣手段.

text: but does she realize , that this version of francis , douglas and henry is in reality her grown up son alan ( timothy bottoms ) . . . ?
translation: 但她是否意识到，这个版本的弗朗西斯、道格拉斯和亨利实际上是她长大的儿子艾伦（蒂莫西·博顿）……？
back_translation: But does she realize that this version of Francis, Douglas, and Henry is actually her grown-up son Alan (Timothy Burton)...?

text: the other members of the po-boys - peter , joseph and guy , are also facing a musician 's mid-life crisis in a business that the age 30 is seen as over the hill .
translation: 其他的波包成员——彼得、约瑟夫和盖伊——也在面临音乐家的中年危机，在这个行业中，30岁被视为过了巅峰。
back_translation: Other members of the wave pack—Peter, Joseph, and Guy—are also facing a mid-life crisis as musicians, as 30 is considered past the peak in this industry.

text: he lures her back to las vegas to continue her career .
translation: 他引诱她回到拉斯维加斯继续她的职业生涯。
back_translation: He lured her back to Las Vegas to continue her career.

text: the film has an infectious enthusiasm and we 're touched by the film 's conviction that all life centered on that place , that time and that sport .
translation: 这部电影充满了感染力的热情，我们被电影对那片地方、那段时间和那项运动的信念所感动。
back_translation: This film is filled with infectious passion, and we are moved by its belief in that place, that time, and that sport.

text: about as satisfying and predictable as the fare at your local drive through .
translation: 就像你当地快餐店的食物一样令人满意且可预测。
back_translation: Just as satisfying and predictable as the food from your local fast food restaurant.

text: a new reality-style game show , `` treasure hunt `` has invited a cast of contestants , including a los angeles cop who 's joined to try and make up for an earlier pr blunder , to a tropical island to hunt for a buried treasure worth ten million dollars .
translation: 一档名为《寻宝》的新真人秀节目邀请了一群参赛者，其中包括一名洛杉矶警察，他加入比赛是为了弥补之前的宣传失误，前往一个热带岛屿寻找价值一千万美元的埋藏宝藏。
back_translation: A new reality show called "Treasure Hunt" invites a group of contestants, including a Los Angeles police officer who joined the competition to make up for previous publicity mistakes, to a tropical island to search for a buried treasure worth ten million dollars.

text: it takes viewers on an intimate road trip across north america - from a polyamory conference in the catskills , a swingers ' convention in las vegas , to long-term multipartner families in california .
translation: 它带领观众进行一次亲密的公路旅行，穿越北美——从凯茨基尔的多元恋爱大会，到拉斯维加斯的交换伴侣大会，再到加利福尼亚的长期多伴侣家庭。
back_translation: It takes the audience on an intimate road trip across North America—from the diverse love conference in the Catskills, to the swinger convention in Las Vegas, and then to the long-term polyamorous families in California.

text: eight year old maria has her bicycle stolen , and like a lightning from the clear sky ploddy the policicar comes to the rescue !
translation: 八岁的玛丽亚她的自行车被偷了，像晴天霹雳一样，警察普罗迪赶来营救！
back_translation: Eight-year-old Maria had her bicycle stolen, and it was like a bolt from the blue. Officer Prodi rushed over to help!

text: [ haynes ' ] homage to such films as `` all that heaven allows `` and `` imitation of life `` transcends them . simply put , `` far from heaven `` is a masterpiece .
translation: 海恩斯对《天上人间》和《模仿生命》等影片的致敬超越了它们。简单来说，《远离天堂》是一部杰作。
back_translation: Haynes' tribute to films like "Heavenly Creatures" and "Imitation of Life" transcends them. Simply put, "Far from Heaven" is a masterpiece.

text: if you go to attic town you 'll find a place where the streets have no names and you can never turn back .
translation: 如果你去阁楼镇，你会发现一个地方，那里的街道没有名字，你永远无法回头。
back_translation: If you go to Attic Town, you will find a place where the streets have no names, and you can never turn back.

text: all very stylish and beautifully photographed , but far more trouble than it 's worth , with fantasy mixing with reality and actors playing more than one role just to add to the confusion .
translation: 一切都非常时尚且拍摄精美，但比其值得的麻烦要多得多，幻想与现实混合，演员们扮演多个角色只为增加混乱。
back_translation: Everything is very stylish and beautifully shot, but it involves much more trouble than it's worth, mixing fantasy with reality, and the actors play multiple roles just to increase the confusion.

text: what 's most memorable about circuit is that it 's shot on digital video , whose tiny camera enables shafer to navigate spaces both large . . . and small . . . with considerable aplomb .
translation: 最让人难忘的是《电路》是用数字视频拍摄的，微型摄像机使得谢弗能够自如地穿梭于大空间和小空间之间。
back_translation: What is most unforgettable is that "Circuit" was shot with digital video, and the mini camera allowed Shafer to move freely between large and small spaces.

text: becoming fast friends , they soon both moved with their families near coney island , where they became active community leaders .
translation: 他们迅速成为好友，不久后都和家人一起搬到了康尼岛附近，成为活跃的社区领袖。
back_translation: They quickly became friends and soon moved with their families near Coney Island, becoming active community leaders.

text: watching haneke 's film is , aptly enough , a challenge and a punishment . but watching huppert , a great actress tearing into a landmark role , is riveting .
translation: 观看哈内克的电影，恰到好处地说，是一种挑战和惩罚。但观看休珀特，这位伟大的女演员在一个里程碑般的角色中表现出色，令人着迷。
back_translation: Watching Haneke's films is, to put it aptly, a challenge and a punishment. But watching Huppert, the great actress excelling in a landmark role, is enchanting.

text: ramsay succeeds primarily with her typical blend of unsettling atmospherics , delivering a series of abrasive , stylized sequences that burn themselves upon the viewer 's memory .
translation: 拉姆齐主要通过她典型的不安氛围的融合而成功，呈现出一系列粗犷、风格化的镜头，这些镜头在观众的记忆中留下深刻的印记。
back_translation: Ramsey achieves success mainly through her typical fusion of unsettling atmospheres, presenting a series of raw, stylized shots that leave a deep impression in the audience's memory.

text: upon getting together on their spring break , they realize that they are bored in their small suburban connecticut hometown .
translation: 在春假聚在一起后，他们意识到在康涅狄格州的小镇上感到无聊。
back_translation: After gathering together during spring break, they realized they felt bored in the small town in Connecticut.

text: kidd deals with lust and egoism the way a surgeon is interested in a tumor . he exposes ugly attitudes but maintains compassion for his mean-spirited subject .
translation: 基德以外科医生对肿瘤的态度来处理欲望和自私。他揭露丑陋的态度，但对他所研究的卑劣主题保持同情。
back_translation: Kidd approaches desire and selfishness with the attitude of a surgeon dealing with tumors. He exposes the ugly attitudes while maintaining sympathy for the sordid subjects he explores.

text: what if your most controversial act turned out to be the most traditional thing in the world ?
translation: 如果你最具争议的行为结果却是世界上最传统的事情，那该怎么办？
back_translation: What should you do if the outcome of your most controversial actions is the most traditional thing in the world?

text: the country bears wastes an exceptionally good idea . but the movie that does n't really deliver for country music fans or for family audiences
translation: 这个国家的熊浪费了一个非常好的主意。但这部电影对乡村音乐迷和家庭观众来说都没有真正令人满意。
back_translation: This country's Bear wasted a very good idea. But this movie is not really satisfying for country music fans and family audiences.

text: this is a movie filled with unlikable , spiteful idiots ; whether or not their friendship is salvaged makes no difference in the least .
translation: 这是一部充满了不讨人喜欢、满怀恶意的愚蠢人的电影；他们的友谊是否得以挽救毫无意义。
back_translation: This is a movie filled with unpleasant, malicious foolish people; whether their friendship can be salvaged is meaningless.

text: it 's a good thing that woolly mammoths are extinct , because this movie will have every kid in the schoolyard wishing for their very own .
translation: 毛象灭绝是一件好事，因为这部电影会让学校操场上的每个孩子都希望拥有自己的毛象。
back_translation: The extinction of the woolly mammoth is a good thing because this movie will make every child on the school playground wish to have their own woolly mammoth.

text: someone killed legendary porn king fat guy , and detectives moose & # 38 ; squirrel must go deep undercover ( literally ) to find the murderer with the help of their `` special `` homicide unit .
translation: 有人杀死了传奇色情大亨胖子，侦探穆斯和松鼠必须深入卧底（字面意思）来找到凶手，并借助他们的“特殊” homicide 单位的帮助。
back_translation: Someone has killed the legendary porn mogul Fatty, and Detective Moose and Squirrel must go undercover (literally) to find the murderer, with the help of their "special" homicide unit.

text: overall , it 's a very entertaining , thought-provoking film with a simple message : god is love .
translation: 总体来说，这是一部非常有趣且发人深省的电影，传达了一个简单的信息：上帝就是爱。
back_translation: Overall, this is a very interesting and thought-provoking movie that conveys a simple message: God is love.

text: `` the ballad of bering strait `` is a two and a half year epic that follows bering strait 's amazing cultural fusion-coming of age journey in america .
translation: 《白令海峡的民谣》是一部为期两年半的史诗，讲述了白令海峡在美国的惊人文化融合与成年之旅。
back_translation: "The Ballad of the Bering Strait" is an epic spanning two and a half years, telling the remarkable story of cultural fusion and coming of age in the Bering Strait in the United States.

text: it is a look into one of the major social issues of the 21st century , inmigration .
translation: 这是对21世纪主要社会问题之一——移民的探讨。
back_translation: This is a discussion on one of the main social issues of the 21st century - immigration.

text: anyone who can count to five ( the film 's target market ? ) can see where this dumbed-down concoction is going .
translation: 任何能够数到五的人（该电影的目标市场？）都能看出这个低级的拼凑是要去哪里。
back_translation: Anyone who can count to five (the target audience of the movie?) can see where this low-grade patchwork is heading.

text: about as enjoyable , i would imagine , as searching for a quarter in a giant pile of elephant feces . . . positively dreadful .
translation: 我想这就像在一大堆大象粪便中寻找一个硬币一样令人愉快……简直糟透了。
back_translation: I think it's as enjoyable as looking for a coin in a pile of elephant dung... it's just awful.

text: but there is indie rock , a restless entrepreneurial spirit , and carly , morgan and chuck , three optimistic post college grads , ready to make their splash in the world .
translation: 但这里有独立摇滚、一种不安分的创业精神，还有卡莉、摩根和查克，三个乐观的大学毕业生，准备在这个世界上大展拳脚。
back_translation: But here there is independent rock, a restless entrepreneurial spirit, and Carly, Morgan, and Chuck, three optimistic college graduates ready to make their mark on the world.

text: before they can win some money , a local mob boss , frank finnigan , sees the horse and steals it as payment for the gambling debt of tony , a local jockey and single parent .
translation: 在他们能够赢得一些钱之前，一位当地黑手党头目弗兰克·芬尼根看到这匹马，决定将其偷走作为当地骑师托尼（单身父亲）的赌博债务的偿还。
back_translation: Before they could win some money, a local mafia boss named Frank Finnegan saw the horse and decided to steal it as repayment for the gambling debts of the local jockey Tony, a single father.

text: aside from minor tinkering , this is the same movie you probably loved in 1994 , except that it looks even better .
translation: 除了小幅的调整，这是你可能在1994年深爱的同一部电影，只不过现在看起来更好了。
back_translation: Aside from minor adjustments, this is probably the same movie you loved dearly in 1994, just looking better now.

text: a year later , strange things start to happen , as each person that was connected to the hit and run incident is being killed . . . one
translation: 一年后，奇怪的事情开始发生，所有与肇事逃逸事件有关的人员都接连被杀……一个
back_translation: A year later, strange things began to happen, and all the individuals related to the hit-and-run incident were consecutively murdered... one.

text: our america is the true story of two bright and ambitious chicago teenagers who , living in one of the worst inner-city neighborhoods in the country , get a chance to become reporters for npr .
translation: 我们的美国是两个聪明而有抱负的芝加哥青少年的真实故事，他们生活在全国最糟糕的城市内社区之一，却有机会成为npr的记者。
back_translation: Our America is the true story of two smart and ambitious Chicago teenagers who live in one of the worst inner-city neighborhoods in the country, yet have the opportunity to become NPR reporters.

text: when it comes to entertainment , children deserve better than pokemon 4ever .
translation: 在娱乐方面，孩子们应该得到比《精灵宝可梦：永恒》更好的东西。
back_translation: In terms of entertainment, children deserve something better than "Pokemon: Eternal."

text: geordie ( thom fitzgerald ) , a visiting canadian pornographer , bogdan ( mihai calota ) , a reluctant city dog-catcher , and nathalie ( alberta watson ) , a lonely diplomat 's wife - each risks losing everything as they become embroiled in the struggles of bucharest 's abandoned children , gypsies , dogs and beggars .
translation: 乔迪（汤姆·菲茨杰拉德）、一位来自加拿大的色情电影制作人；博格丹（米哈伊·卡洛塔），一名不情愿的城里捕犬者；还有娜塔莉（阿尔贝塔·沃森），一位孤独的外交官妻子——他们每个人都冒着失去一切的风险，卷入布加勒斯特被遗弃的儿童、吉普赛人、狗和乞丐的斗争之中。
back_translation: Jodie (Tom Fitzgerald), a pornographic film producer from Canada; Bogdan (Mihai Carlotta), a reluctant city dogcatcher; and Natalie (Alberta Watson), a lonely diplomat's wife—each of them risks losing everything as they become embroiled in the struggle involving abandoned children, gypsies, dogs, and beggars in Bucharest.

text: there are now two signs that m . night shyamalan 's debut feature sucked up all he has to give to the mystic genres of cinema : unbreakable and signs .
translation: 现在有两个迹象表明，M·奈特·沙马兰的首次作品耗尽了他对电影神秘类型的所有贡献：《不可摧毁》和《怀疑》。
back_translation: There are now two signs indicating that M. Night Shyamalan's debut work has exhausted all his contributions to the mystery genre of film: "Unbreakable" and "Signs."

text: jonathan parker 's bartleby should have been the be-all-end-all of the modern-office anomie films .
translation: 乔纳森·帕克的《巴特比》本应是现代办公室无名状态电影的终极之作。
back_translation: Jonathan Parker's "Bartleby" should be the ultimate work on the nameless state of modern offices.

text: her struggle for freedom and a sense of identity culminates in a conflict where the one love may not be the one you can trust and the habits with which one sleepwalks through life are not easily broken .
translation: 她对自由和身份感的斗争 culminates 在一个冲突中，那个爱可能不是你可以信任的，而一个人在生活中梦游的习惯是很难打破的。
back_translation: Her struggle for freedom and sense of identity culminates in a conflict where love may not be something you can trust, and the habit of a person sleepwalking through life is hard to break.

text: if the plot seems a bit on the skinny side , that 's because panic room is interested in nothing more than sucking you inM-^Eand making you sweat .
translation: 如果情节看起来有点单薄，那是因为《恐慌室》只关心吸引你，让你紧张。
back_translation: If the plot seems a bit thin, it's because "Panic Room" only cares about gripping you and keeping you tense.

text: feels aimless for much of its running time , until late in the film when a tidal wave of plot arrives , leaving questions in its wake .
translation: 在影片的大部分时间里感觉毫无目的，直到影片后期出现了一波情节高潮，留下了许多悬而未决的问题。
back_translation: For most of the film, it felt aimless, until a wave of dramatic tension emerged in the later part of the film, leaving many unresolved questions.

text: this sade is hardly a perverse , dangerous libertine and agitator -- which would have made for better drama . he 's just a sad aristocrat in tattered finery , and the film seems as deflated as he does .
translation: 这个悲伤的角色很难被视为一个堕落、危险的放荡者和煽动者——这本可以制造出更好的戏剧性。他只是一个穿着破旧华服的悲惨贵族，电影似乎也和他一样气馁。
back_translation: This mournful character is hard to see as a fallen, dangerous libertine and instigator—something that could have created better drama. He is merely a tragic nobleman dressed in tattered finery, and the film seems just as discouraged as he is.

text: despite its good nature and some genuinely funny moments , super troopers suffers from a bad case of arrested development .
translation: 尽管性格良好并且有一些真正搞笑的时刻，但《超级巡警》却遭遇了明显的“发展停滞”问题。
back_translation: Despite having a good character and some genuinely funny moments, "Super Troopers" suffers from a noticeable "stagnation" issue.

text: a dark and quirky comedy set in an eccentric north london jewish old age home , paradise grove revolves around a dysfunctional family comprising 79-year-old izzie goldberg , determined to die with dignity , his daughter dee perry , a mixture of traditional jewish mother and child of the sixties , and her teenage son keith , who 's half-black and half-jewish , and understandably undergoing an identity crisis .
translation: 《天堂林荫道》是一部设定在伦敦北部一间古怪的犹太老年之家中的黑暗而古怪的喜剧，围绕着一个功能失调的家庭展开，家庭成员包括79岁想要体面地死去的伊兹zy·戈德堡，他的女儿迪·佩里，一个混合了传统犹太母亲和六十年代年轻人的形象，还有她的十几岁儿子基思，他是半黑半犹太人，正在经历可理解的身份危机。
back_translation: "Paradise Avenue" is a dark and quirky comedy set in a peculiar Jewish retirement home in North London, revolving around a dysfunctional family that includes 79-year-old Izzy Goldberg, who wants to die with dignity, his daughter Dee Perry, a blend of the traditional Jewish mother and a 1960s youth, and her teenage son Keith, who is half Black and half Jewish and is undergoing a relatable identity crisis.

text: it 's a celebration of self-confidence and a slap in the face of a society that cherises impossibly unnatural physical perfection .
translation: 这是对自信的庆祝，也是对一个珍视不切实际身体完美的社会的嘲讽。
back_translation: This is a celebration of confidence, as well as a satire of a society that values unrealistic physical perfection.

text: and what dark secret does the house harbour that leaves them feeling as though they 're being watched by more than just a million pairs of eyes ?
translation: 这个房子隐藏着什么黑暗的秘密，让他们感觉到自己不仅仅是被百万只眼睛盯着？
back_translation: What dark secrets does this house conceal that makes them feel like they are not just being watched by millions of eyes?

text: none of this sounds promising and , indeed , the first half of sorority boys is as appalling as any 'comedy ' to ever spill from a projector 's lens .
translation: 这一切听起来都不令人期待，事实上，《姊妹会男孩》的前半部分糟糕得像任何从放映机镜头中溢出的“喜剧”。
back_translation: Everything about this sounds unpromising; in fact, the first half of "Sisterhood of the Traveling Pants" is as terrible as any "comedy" that spills out from a projector lens.

text: a corrupt cop is more interested in the money on the criminals he catches than justice ; a young woman discovers she 's pregnant , and her boyfriend is unfeeling ; and a young man calls a prostitute it 's the first time for both , and neither can go through with it .
translation: 一名腐败的警察更关心自己抓到的罪犯身上的钱，而不是正义；一名年轻女性发现自己怀孕了，而她的男朋友对此毫不在乎；一名年轻男子叫了一位妓女，这是他们第一次接触，但两人都无法继续下去。
back_translation: A corrupt police officer cares more about the money on the criminals he catches than about justice; a young woman discovers she is pregnant, and her boyfriend doesn't care at all; a young man calls a prostitute, and it's their first encounter, but neither of them can go through with it.

text: a newscaster for the channel 7 eyewitness news complains about how god has only made his life a total waste .
translation: 频道7目击新闻的播报员抱怨上帝只让他的生活变成了一场彻底的浪费。
back_translation: The anchor of Channel 7 Eyewitness News complained that God has turned his life into a complete waste.

text: twists of fate along the way test and strain their relationship even further .
translation: 沿途的命运变幻进一步考验和拉紧了他们的关系。
back_translation: The twists and turns of fate along the way further tested and tightened their relationship.

text: desta vez , columbus capturou o pomo de ouro .
translation: 这一次，哥伦布捕获了黄金苹果。
back_translation: This time, Columbus captured the golden apple.

text: at his request , she puts him to death to end his suffering and is subsequently charged with murder .
translation: 应他的请求，她将他处死以结束他的痛苦，随后被控谋杀。
back_translation: At his request, she executed him to end his suffering, and was subsequently charged with murder.

text: will they be able to finally destroy the tall man for good ?
translation: 他们能否最终彻底消灭那个高个子吗？
back_translation: Can they eventually completely eliminate that tall one?

text: legendary irish writer brendan behan 's memoir , borstal boy , has been given a loving screen transferral .
translation: 传奇的爱尔兰作家布伦丹·比汉的回忆录《少年犯》已经被赋予了一次充满爱意的银幕改编。
back_translation: The memoir "Young Offender" by the legendary Irish writer Brendan Behan has been lovingly adapted for the screen.

text: any intellectual arguments being made about the nature of god are framed in a drama so clumsy , there is a real danger less sophisticated audiences will mistake it for an endorsement of the very things that bean abhors .
translation: 有关上帝本质的任何智力论证都被框架在一种如此笨拙的戏剧中，以至于不太复杂的观众可能会错误地将其视为对他所厌恶的事物的支持。
back_translation: Any intellectual arguments regarding the nature of God are framed in such a clumsy drama that a less sophisticated audience may mistakenly perceive them as support for the things he loathes.

text: an inexplicable crack in the pyrenees mountains provokes excitement and scientific curiosity .
translation: 比利牛斯山脉中一个无法解释的裂缝引发了兴奋和科学好奇。
back_translation: An inexplicable fissure in the Pyrenees has sparked excitement and scientific curiosity.

text: on this tricky topic , tadpole is very much a step in the right direction , with its blend of frankness , civility and compassion .
translation: 在这个棘手的话题上，蝌蚪非常朝着正确的方向迈出了一步，体现了坦率、礼貌和同情心的结合。
back_translation: On this tricky topic, the tadpole has taken a step in the right direction, embodying a combination of frankness, politeness, and empathy.

text: impressed by his extravagant lifestyle and prowess , his young son kilo yearns to follow in his footsteps .
translation: 受到他奢华生活方式和才能的影响，他的年轻儿子基洛渴望追随他的足迹。
back_translation: Influenced by his luxurious lifestyle and talents, his young son Kilo yearns to follow in his footsteps.

text: the off-center humor is a constant , and the ensemble gives it a buoyant delivery .
translation: 偏离中心的幽默是一个常量，整个团队展现出轻快的表演。
back_translation: The off-center humor is a constant, and the entire team delivers a lively performance.

text: the most memorable moment was when green threw medical equipment at a window ; not because it was particularly funny , but because i had a serious urge to grab the old lady at the end of my aisle 's walker and toss it at the screen in frustration .
translation: 最难忘的时刻是绿先生把医疗设备扔向窗户；不是因为这特别好笑，而是因为我非常想抓住位于我过道尽头的老奶奶的助行器，带着沮丧把它扔向屏幕。
back_translation: The most unforgettable moment was when Mr. Green threw the medical equipment out of the window; not because it was particularly funny, but because I really wanted to grab the old lady's walker at the end of my aisle and throw it at the screen in frustration.

text: 'loosely based on a true love story ' is a romantic comedy starring kate hudson as emma and luke wilson as alex . alex is an author whose writer 's block and gambling debts have landed him in a jam .
translation: 《 loosely based on a true love story 》是一部浪漫喜剧，主演是凯特·哈德森饰演艾玛和卢克·威尔逊饰演亚历克斯。亚历克斯是一位作家，他的创作瓶颈和赌博债务让他陷入困境。
back_translation: "Loosely Based on a True Love Story" is a romantic comedy starring Kate Hudson as Emma and Luke Wilson as Alex. Alex is a writer whose creative block and gambling debts have landed him in trouble.

text: when kanna comes back from nagpur both the persons he loved the most rupi and ghisu are not there for him .
translation: 当卡娜从纳格浦尔回来时，他最爱的人鲁皮和吉苏都不在他身边。
back_translation: When Kana returned from Nagpur, his beloved Rupie and Gisu were not by his side.

text: the gripping story of the dutch bettien martens , based on true facts .
translation: 根据真实事件改编的荷兰贝蒂恩·马滕斯的扣人心弦的故事。
back_translation: A gripping story based on true events about the Dutch Bettien Martens.

text: ben 's rock-solid , promising future and romance with amy are turned upside-down with the arrival of madison bell .
translation: 本的稳固未来和与艾米的浪漫因麦迪逊·贝尔的到来而彻底颠覆。
back_translation: The stable future of Ben and his romance with Amy is completely disrupted by the arrival of Madison Bell.

text: naxalites are becoming more and more popular among tribles because of their capacity to give instant justice and more and more youths are joining them .
translation: 纳萨尔派在部落中越来越受欢迎，因为他们能够提供即时的正义，越来越多的年轻人加入了他们。
back_translation: The Naxalites are becoming increasingly popular in the tribes because they can provide instant justice, and more and more young people are joining them.

text: former maintenance man gary fitch becomes the least likely candidate for mayor of santa monica , california , when he teams up with the wackiest `` dream-team `` imaginable : glory , a former high-priced call-girl ; his homeless buddy foster edwards , iii ; and shane martinez , a gay delivery boy .
translation: 前维修工加里·菲奇成为加利福尼亚州圣塔莫尼卡市最不可能的市长候选人，当他与最疯狂的“梦之队”搭档时：荣耀，一个前高档妓女；他的无家可归朋友福斯特·爱德华兹三世；还有一个同性恋外卖小哥香农·马丁内斯。
back_translation: Former mechanic Gary Fitch became the most unlikely candidate for mayor of Santa Monica, California, when he teamed up with the wildest "dream team": Glory, a former high-class escort; his homeless friend Foster Edwards III; and a gay delivery guy, Shannon Martinez.

text: eric has married his high school sweetheart , has a good job , his first house , yet he jokes about all the things he 's missed in life .
translation: 埃里克已经娶了他的高中 sweetheart，拥有一份好工作，买了第一套房子，但他还是开玩笑说自己错过了生活中的很多事情。
back_translation: Eric has married his high school sweetheart, has a good job, and has bought his first house, but he still jokes that he's missed out on a lot in life.

text: a movie that 's just plain awful but still manages to entertain on a guilty-pleasure , so-bad-it's-funny level .
translation: 一部完全糟糕但仍然能够在一种带有罪恶感的愉悦感上娱乐观众的电影，糟糕得令人发笑。
back_translation: A completely terrible movie that still entertains viewers with a guilty pleasure, so bad that it's laughable.

text: but harper himself is a suspect in several bomb attacks , one of which killed rachel 's partner and friend .
translation: 但是哈珀本人是几起爆炸袭击的嫌疑人，其中一起袭击造成了瑞秋的伴侣和朋友死亡。
back_translation: However, Harper himself is a suspect in several bombing incidents, one of which resulted in the death of Rachel's partner and friend.

text: a disaster of a drama , saved only by its winged assailants .
translation: 一场灾难般的戏剧，只有其有翼的攻击者才能拯救。
back_translation: A disastrous drama, only its winged attackers can save it.

text: this is n't an original film , but it is an effective one .
translation: 这不是一部原创电影，但它是一部有效的电影。
back_translation: This is not an original film, but it is an effective film.

text: poets concentrates on locations and issues within the uk and in an oblique way referencing poetry to the topography , at first seemingly random and esoterical , slowly and ultimately questioning the very nature of our british culture and heritage .
translation: 诗人关注英国的地点和问题，以一种间接的方式将诗歌与地形相联系，最初似乎是随机和深奥的，但最终慢慢质疑我们英国文化和遗产的本质。
back_translation: The poet focuses on places and issues in England, indirectly linking poetry to the landscape, which initially seems random and obscure, but ultimately slowly questions the nature of our English culture and heritage.

text: perhaps no picture ever made has more literally showed that the road to hell is paved with good intentions .
translation: 或许没有一幅画更直白地展现了通往地狱的路是用善意铺就的。
back_translation: Perhaps no painting more directly shows that the road to hell is paved with good intentions.

text: dance teacher ramu leaves india to go to america and join his cousin who is rich and successful .
translation: 舞蹈老师拉穆离开印度，前往美国与他富有成功的表弟团聚。
back_translation: Dance teacher Ramu leaves India to reunite with his wealthy and successful cousin in the United States.

text: an un-relentless action film that will attract , through word of mouth , all those hooked on gaming on their pc 's and drag them back into the cinema auditoriums .
translation: 一部不懈的动作片，将通过口碑吸引所有沉迷于PC游戏的人，并将他们拉回电影院。
back_translation: An unstoppable action movie will attract all those addicted to PC games through its reputation and pull them back to the cinema.

text: how do a man who has never loved and a woman who refused to ever love again deal with the fact that they are meant to be together ?
translation: 一个从未爱过的男人和一个拒绝再爱的女人如何面对他们注定要在一起的事实？
back_translation: How does a man who has never loved and a woman who refuses to love again face the fact that they are destined to be together?

text: francophiles will snicker knowingly and you 'll want to slap them .
translation: 法语爱好者会心地笑，你会想要打他们。
back_translation: French enthusiasts will chuckle knowingly, and you might want to hit them.

text: it is story of an innocent boy ( krishna ) .
translation: 这是一个无辜男孩（克里希那）的故事。
back_translation: This is the story of an innocent boy (Krishna).

text: kirshner and monroe seem to be in a contest to see who can out-bad-act the other . ( kirshner wins , but it 's close . )
translation: 基什纳和门罗似乎在竞争，看看谁能表现得更糟糕。（基什纳获胜，但差距很小。）
back_translation: Kishner and Monroe seem to be competing to see who can perform worse. (Kishner wins, but by a narrow margin.)

text: a film at once depressing and uplifting -- depressing in terms of the sad , often horrifying subjects of nachtwey 's photographs but uplifting in terms of his commitment and integrity .
translation: 既让人感到压抑又让人振奋的电影——在纳赫特维的照片中，令人悲伤且常常可怕的主题让人感到压抑，但他对事业的承诺和诚信又让人感到振奋。
back_translation: A film that is both oppressive and uplifting—In the photographs of Nachtwey, the sad and often terrifying themes evoke a sense of oppression, but his commitment and integrity to his craft are inspiring.

text: on the surface , their exchanges are trivial and stilted .
translation: 表面上，他们的交流琐碎而生硬。
back_translation: On the surface, their communication is trivial and stiff.

text: passing himself as a single father , he starts to meet a string of single mums , confident in his ability to leave them behind when they start to ask for a commitment .
translation: 他冒充单身父亲，开始接触一系列单身妈妈，充满自信地认为在她们开始要求承诺时可以将她们抛在身后。
back_translation: He posed as a single father and began interacting with a series of single mothers, confidently believing that he could leave them behind when they started asking for a commitment.

text: gibney and jarecki just want to string the bastard up .
translation: 吉布尼和贾雷基只是想把那个混蛋吊起来。
back_translation: Jibuni and Jareki just wanted to hang that bastard up.

text: though ronnie works at hope house he does n't follow procedure when he finds sarah wandering outside the confines .
translation: 尽管罗尼在希望之家工作，但当他发现萨拉在外面徘徊时，他没有遵循程序。
back_translation: Although Ronny worked at Hope House, he did not follow the procedure when he saw Sarah wandering outside.

text: rachel soon finds herself involved with the playground and on the killers hitlist .
translation: 瑞秋很快发现自己卷入了游乐场，并成为了杀手的目标。
back_translation: Rachel quickly found herself caught up in an amusement park and became the target of a killer.

text: the question is , will their lives change forever with the riches that come along with professional sports , or will they be destined to live a life in their home country , asking forever , what if ?
translation: 问题是，他们的生活会因职业体育带来的财富而永远改变吗，还是注定要在自己的祖国生活，永远问自己，假如呢？
back_translation: The question is, will their lives be forever changed by the wealth brought by professional sports, or are they destined to live in their own country, always asking themselves, what if?

text: after three rowdy guys get booted from their frat house , they dress up as women and pledge the `` ugly girl `` sorority , where they figure they 'll blend right in .
translation: 在三个吵闹的家伙被踢出兄弟会后，他们打扮成女性，加入“丑女孩”姐妹会，因为他们认为这样可以完全融入其中。
back_translation: After three loud guys were kicked out of the fraternity, they dressed up as women and joined the "Ugly Girls" sorority, believing that this would allow them to blend in completely.

text: . . . a fluffy , flaky croissant of a culture clash comedy , barely substantial enough for a feature but just light and tasty enough to satisfy .
translation: ……一部松软、酥皮般的文化冲突喜剧，虽然内容薄弱，不足以撑起一部影片，但却轻松美味，足以令人满意。
back_translation: ...a soft, flaky cultural clash comedy that, although lacking in substance to support a full film, is light and delightful enough to be satisfying.

text: you can tell almost immediately that welcome to collinwood is n't going to jell .
translation: 你几乎可以立刻察觉到《欢迎来到科林伍德》注定不会成功。
back_translation: You can almost immediately sense that "Welcome to Collingwood" is destined to fail.

text: anxious to use artificial life to improve the world , rosetta stone , ( tilda swinton ) , a bio-geneticist creates a recipe for cyborgs and uses her own dna in order to breed three self replicating automatons , part human , part computer named ruby , olive and marine ( also played by tilda swinton ) .
translation: 渴望利用人工生命改善世界的罗塞塔石（蒂尔达·斯温顿饰），一位生物遗传学家创造了一种赛博格的配方，并使用自己的DNA来培育三个自我复制的自动人形，名为红宝石、橄榄和海洋（也由蒂尔达·斯温顿饰）。
back_translation: The Rosetta Stone (played by Tilda Swinton), a geneticist eager to use artificial life to improve the world, creates a cyborg formula and utilizes her own DNA to cultivate three self-replicating automatons, named Ruby, Olive, and Ocean (also played by Tilda Swinton).

text: beginning with the world trade center 's north tower afire and billowing dense smoke , and ending on the vast expanse of ash-brown debris the following morning , the first 24 hours documents `` ground zero `` in the immediate aftermath of the terrorist attacks on september 11 , 2001 .
translation: 以世贸中心北塔着火并冒出浓密烟雾为开端，结束于次日广袤的灰褐色废墟，这24小时记录了2001年9月11日恐怖袭击后“零点”区域的即时情况。
back_translation: Beginning with the North Tower of the World Trade Center on fire and billowing thick smoke, and ending the next day with the vast gray-brown ruins, these 24 hours captured the immediate situation of the "ground zero" area after the terrorist attacks on September 11, 2001.

text: it is a dark comedy that challenges the traditional ideas of marriage and questions the societal values of money and sex .
translation: 这是一部黑色喜剧，挑战了婚姻的传统观念，并质疑社会对金钱和性别的价值观。
back_translation: This is a black comedy that challenges traditional views of marriage and questions societal values regarding money and gender.

text: george discovers both the princess and the truth behind her strange disappearance .
translation: 乔治发现了公主和她奇怪失踪背后的真相。
back_translation: George discovered the truth behind the princess's strange disappearance.

text: the film sounds like the stuff of lurid melodrama , but what makes it interesting as a character study is the fact that the story is told from paul 's perspective .
translation: 这部电影听起来像是腥膻的情感剧，但作为角色研究，它有趣之处在于故事是从保罗的视角讲述的。
back_translation: This movie sounds like a melodramatic emotional story, but as a character study, its interesting aspect is that the story is told from Paul's perspective.

text: now , it 's up to kimberly , along with the help of flight 180 junkie thomas burke , clear rivers , and the mortician william bloodworth , kimberly must find a way to stop death before it 's to late . . .
translation: 现在，一切都取决于金伯莉，在180号航班的狂热者托马斯·伯克、克里尔·里弗斯和殡葬师威廉·布拉德沃斯的帮助下，金伯莉必须找到办法在为时已晚之前阻止死亡……
back_translation: Now, it all depends on Kimberly. With the help of Thomas Burke, the enthusiast from flight 180, Cleal Rivers, and the mortician William Bradworth, Kimberly must find a way to stop death before it's too late...

text: after losing his and young son to divorce , he finds no alternative but to kidnap the boy inevitably dragging him through a harrowing journey of grief and as he learns to accept himself .
translation: 在失去他的幼子后，他别无选择，只能绑架这个男孩，不可避免地将他拖入一段痛苦的悲伤旅程，同时他也学习如何接受自己。
back_translation: After losing his young son, he had no choice but to kidnap this boy, inevitably dragging him into a painful journey of grief, while also learning how to accept himself.

text: from the late master filmmaker krzysztof kieslowski comes 'heaven ' , the first installment of a trilogy .
translation: 来自伟大导演克日什托夫·基耶斯劳斯基的作品《天堂》，这是一个三部曲的第一部。
back_translation: From the great director Krzysztof Kieślowski's work "Heaven," this is the first part of a trilogy.

text: the plot is very clever , but boyd weighs it down with too many characters and events , all intertwined and far too complicated to keep track of .
translation: 情节非常巧妙，但博伊德让它变得沉重，角色和事件太多，交织在一起，复杂得难以追踪。
back_translation: The plot is very clever, but Boyd makes it heavy, with too many characters and events interwoven, making it complex and difficult to follow.

text: her constant groans and howls of amorous pleasure turn ted 's domain of conquest and libidinous triumph into a nightmare world of bachelorman-interruptus .
translation: 她不断的呻吟和渴望的嚎叫把泰德的征服领域和情色胜利变成了一个单身汉被打断的噩梦世界。
back_translation: Her constant moans and desperate howls turned Ted's realm of conquest and erotic triumph into a nightmarish world interrupted like that of a single man.

text: in 8 minutes we go into the life of a little boy who tries to get away with not doing his task .
translation: 在8分钟内，我们将进入一个小男孩的生活，他试图逃避他的任务。
back_translation: In 8 minutes, we will enter the life of a little boy who is trying to escape his responsibilities.

text: under the pressure of her psychological assaults , sam 's do-gooder vaneer cracks and his true nature is revealed .
translation: 在她的心理攻击压力下，萨姆的乐于助人的外表崩溃，他的真实本性被揭示出来。
back_translation: Under her psychological pressure, Sam's helpful facade crumbles, revealing his true nature.

text: offers a gentle summer fantasy for both grown-ups and little ones .
translation: 为大人和孩子们提供一个温柔的夏日幻想。
back_translation: Provide a gentle summer fantasy for both adults and children.

text: an empty exercise , a florid but ultimately vapid crime melodrama with lots of surface flash but little emotional resonance .
translation: 一场空洞的演习，一部浮华却最终空洞的犯罪 melodrama，充满了表面的华丽，但缺乏情感的共鸣。
back_translation: An empty exercise, a flashy yet ultimately hollow crime melodrama, filled with superficial glamour but lacking emotional resonance.

text: . . . if it had been only half-an-hour long or a tv special , the humor would have been fast and furious -- at ninety minutes , it drags .
translation: ……如果它只有半个小时长或是一部电视特别节目，幽默就会节奏快速且激烈——但九十分钟的时长让它显得拖沓。
back_translation: ...if it were only half an hour long or a special TV program, the humor would be fast-paced and intense— but the ninety-minute length makes it feel dragged out.

text: the x potion gives the quickly named blossom , bubbles and buttercup supernatural powers that include extraordinary strength and laser-beam eyes , which unfortunately do n't enable them to discern flimsy screenplays .
translation: x药水赋予迅速命名的花朵、泡泡和黄油杯超自然力量，包括非凡的力量和激光眼，然而不幸的是，这并不能使她们识别出薄弱的剧本。
back_translation: The potion x grants the rapidly named flowers, bubbles, and buttercups supernatural powers, including extraordinary strength and laser eyes; however, unfortunately, this does not enable them to recognize a weak script.

text: however , the enemy terrorists learn of his secret identity and kidnap his girlfriend/fiancee ( gabriel macht ) .
translation: 然而，敌方恐怖分子得知了他的秘密身份，并绑架了他的女朋友/未婚妻（加布里埃尔·马赫特）。
back_translation: However, the enemy terrorists discovered his secret identity and kidnapped his girlfriend/fiancée, Gabrielle Macht.

text: the ridiculed home secretary is slowly coming to life , but in his way stands a paranoid defense secretary .
translation: 被嘲笑的内政大臣正在慢慢复苏，但在他面前挡住的是一位偏执的国防大臣。
back_translation: The mocked Home Secretary is slowly recovering, but in front of him stands a paranoid Defense Secretary.

text: what better place for a writer to pick up a girl ?
translation: 作为一个作家，哪里更适合搭讪女孩呢？
back_translation: As a writer, where is the best place to flirt with girls?

text: . . . while dark water is n't a complete wash ( no pun intended ) , watched side-by-side with ringu , it ultimately comes off as a pale successor .
translation: 虽然《黑水》并不是完全的失败（无意玩笑），但与《灵异第六感》并排观看时，它最终显得像是一个苍白的继承者。
back_translation: Although "Black Water" is not a complete failure (no pun intended), when watched alongside "The Sixth Sense," it ultimately appears to be a pale successor.

text: chelsea walls is a case of too many chefs fussing over too weak a recipe .
translation: 切尔西墙是过多大厨对一个过于单薄的食谱操心的案例。
back_translation: The Chelsea wall is a case of too many chefs worrying about an overly thin recipe.

text: what if hitler did n't die in berlin at the end of the war ?
translation: 如果希特勒在战争结束时没有死于柏林，会怎么样？
back_translation: What would have happened if Hitler had not died in Berlin at the end of the war?

text: too restrained to be a freak show , too mercenary and obvious to be cerebral , too dull and pretentious to be engaging . . . the isle defies an easy categorization .
translation: 过于拘谨，无法成为怪异秀；过于逐利和明显，无法称为智性；过于乏味和做作，无法吸引人……这个岛屿难以被简单分类。
back_translation: Too restrained to be a quirky show; too profit-driven and obvious to be called intellectual; too dull and contrived to attract people... This island is difficult to categorize simply.

text: the adventures of pluto nash is a whole lot of nada .
translation: 《普卢托·纳什的冒险》完全是一场空。
back_translation: "The Adventures of Pluto Nash" is completely a flop.

text: welcoming the challenge , roger guides nick through the city 's wild nightlife for an all-night crash course , only to realize that he -- the adult -- still has something to learn about what women , and men , really want .
translation: 欢迎这个挑战，罗杰带着尼克在城市的狂野夜生活中度过一个通宵的快速课程，结果意识到他——这个成年人——对女性和男性真正想要的仍然有很多东西需要学习。
back_translation: Welcoming this challenge, Roger takes Nick on a crash course through the wild nightlife of the city, only to realize that he—an adult—still has a lot to learn about what women and men truly want.

text: i have a confession to make : i did n't particularly like e . t . the first time i saw it as a young boy . that is because - damn it ! - i also wanted a little alien as a friend !
translation: 我有一个 confession要说：我第一次作为一个小男孩看到《E.T.》时，并不是特别喜欢。这是因为——该死！——我也想要一个小外星人做朋友！
back_translation: I have a confession to make: when I first saw "E.T." as a little boy, I didn't like it very much. This is because—damn it!—I also wanted to have a little alien as a friend!

text: the crew traveled with the band to their homes in obninsk , russia and to their music conservatories in moscow , documenting how these two girls and five boys became so adept at playing american country music .
translation: 乐队的工作人员随同乐队前往他们在俄罗斯奥布宁斯克的家和莫斯科的音乐学院，记录下这两位女孩和五位男孩是如何熟练演奏美国乡村音乐的。
back_translation: The band’s staff accompanied them to their home in Obninsk, Russia, and the music academy in Moscow, documenting how the two girls and five boys skillfully played American country music.

text: nice balance between real emotions and cute movie moments with a hilarious love scene .
translation: 真实情感与可爱电影时刻之间的良好平衡，加上搞笑的爱情场景。
back_translation: A good balance between genuine emotions and adorable movie moments, combined with humorous romantic scenes.

text: louiso lets the movie dawdle in classic disaffected-indie-film mode , and brother hoffman 's script stumbles over a late-inning twist that just does n't make sense .
translation: Louiso让这部电影在经典的冷漠独立电影模式中拖沓，而霍夫曼兄弟的剧本在最后的曲折情节上绊倒了，完全没有意义。
back_translation: Louiso drags the film in a classic indifferent independent film style, while the Hoffmann brothers' script stumbles over the final twist, making it completely meaningless.

text: the venezuelans say things like `` si , pretty much `` and `` por favor , go home `` when talking to americans . that 's muy loco , but no more ridiculous than most of the rest of `` dragonfly . ``
translation: 委内瑞拉人跟美国人说“是的，差不多”和“请，回家吧”这样的事情。那是非常疯狂，但并不比“蜻蜓”的其他大部分内容更荒谬。
back_translation: Venezuelans tell Americans things like "Yes, more or less" and "Please, go home." That's very crazy, but not more absurd than most of the other content in "Dragonfly."

text: his plan goes awry , however , when the group is forced to work for a drug ring .
translation: 然而，当小组被迫为一个贩毒团伙工作时，他的计划偏离了轨道。
back_translation: However, when the group was forced to work for a drug trafficking gang, his plans went off track.

text: its audacious ambitions sabotaged by pomposity , steven soderbergh 's space opera emerges as a numbingly dull experience .
translation: 史蒂文·索德伯格的太空歌剧因其傲慢的雄心而受挫，最终呈现出一种令人麻木的乏味体验。
back_translation: Steven Soderbergh's space opera is hindered by its arrogant ambitions, ultimately presenting a numbing and tedious experience.

text: when she begins to question his sanity , she decides to take her chances on her own , only to run into another pair , who on the surface appear to be escaped prisoners on the run .
translation: 当她开始质疑他的理智时，她决定独自冒险，却意外遇到了另一对看似正在逃亡的逃犯。
back_translation: When she began to question his sanity, she decided to venture out alone and unexpectedly encountered another pair of seemingly fleeing fugitives.

text: he must fend off beings that seek to gain control over the mysterious black mass .
translation: 他必须抵御那些试图控制神秘黑物质的存在。
back_translation: He must resist those who try to control the existence of the mysterious dark matter.

text: samira makhmalbaf 's new film blackboards is much like the ethos of a stream of consciousness , although , it 's unfortunate for the viewer that the thoughts and reflections coming through are torpid and banal
translation: 萨米拉·马赫马尔巴夫的新电影《黑板》很像一种意识流的精神，尽管对于观众来说，传达出来的思考和反思是不活跃且平庸的，这让人感到遗憾。
back_translation: Samira Mahmoudi's new film "The Blackboard" resembles a stream of consciousness; however, the thoughts and reflections conveyed to the audience are inactive and mediocre, which is regrettable.

text: but when fred is fired , the well runs dry , and our heroes come up with a new plan : make their own `` adult `` film .
translation: 但当弗雷德被解雇时，源泉干涸，我们的英雄们想出了一个新计划：制作自己的“成人”影片。
back_translation: But when Fred was fired and the well ran dry, our heroes came up with a new plan: to make their own "adult" film.

text: capitalizing on his fame as the star of `` hogan 's heroes , `` bob crane ( greg kinnear ) dove into the freewheeling spirit of the 60s and 70s with relish , having affairs with numerous women .
translation: 利用他作为《霍根的英雄》的明星的名声，鲍勃·克雷恩（格雷格·金尼尔）热衷于享受60年代和70年代的自由精神，与众多女性保持婚外情。
back_translation: Using his fame as a star of "Hogan's Heroes," Bob Crane (Greg Kinnear) is keen to embrace the free spirit of the 1960s and 70s, engaging in extramarital affairs with numerous women.

text: an intelligently made ( and beautifully edited ) picture that at the very least has a spark of life to it -- more than you can say for plenty of movies that flow through the hollywood pipeline without a hitch .
translation: 一幅智能制作（并且精美编辑）的图片，至少具有一种生命的火花——这点比许多顺利通过好莱坞流程的电影要强得多。
back_translation: An intelligently crafted (and beautifully edited) image, which contains at least one spark of life, is far superior to many films that smoothly pass through the Hollywood process.

text: this is a third-person story now , told by hollywood , and much more ordinary for it .
translation: 这是一个由好莱坞讲述的第三人称故事，显得更加平凡。
back_translation: This is a third-person story told by Hollywood, which appears more ordinary.

text: even if you 're an elvis person , you wo n't find anything to get excited about on this dvd .
translation: 即使你是埃尔维斯的粉丝，你在这个DVD上也不会找到任何让你感到兴奋的东西。
back_translation: Even if you are an Elvis fan, you won't find anything exciting on this DVD.

text: but when he realizes that he has to deal with what has got to be god 's most arduous task , listening and answering prayers .
translation: 但当他意识到自己必须面对的，无疑是上帝最艰巨的任务，那就是倾听和回应祷告。
back_translation: But when he realized that what he must face was undoubtedly God's most arduous task, which is to listen to and respond to prayers.

text: bravely explores the psychic damage inflicted on jean-luc by a withholding , then absent parent .
translation: 勇敢地探讨了因父母的隐瞒和缺席而给让-吕克带来的心理伤害。
back_translation: It boldly explores the psychological harm that Jean-Luc suffered due to his parents' concealment and absence.

text: there 's something fishy about a seasonal holiday kids ' movie . . . that derives its moment of most convincing emotional gravity from a scene where santa gives gifts to grownups .
translation: 关于一部季节性假日儿童电影，总有些可疑……它那最令人信服的情感重力来自于圣诞老人向成年人赠送礼物的场景。
back_translation: There is always something suspicious about a seasonal holiday children's movie... Its most compelling emotional weight comes from the scene where Santa Claus gives gifts to adults.

text: after gruelling training sessions , the three succeed in robbing the bank , but things go haywire .
translation: 经过艰苦的训练课程，三人成功地抢劫了银行，但事情却出了岔子。
back_translation: After a rigorous training course, the three successfully robbed the bank, but things went wrong.

text: movie fans , get ready to take off . . . the other direction .
translation: 电影迷们，准备好起飞……朝另一个方向。
back_translation: Movie fans, get ready to take off... in another direction.

text: she 's telling her story because she wants to set the record straight , to correct the lies in natalie 's book , which became a bestseller .
translation: 她在讲述自己的故事，因为她想澄清事实，纠正娜塔莉书中的谎言，这本书已经成为畅销书。
back_translation: She is telling her story because she wants to clarify the facts and correct the lies in Natalie's book, which has become a bestseller.

text: the film intercuts between two days , two years apart .
translation: 影片在两个相隔两年的日子之间交错切换。
back_translation: The film alternates between two days that are two years apart.

text: phillip noyce and all of his actors -- as well as his cinematographer , christopher doyle -- understand the delicate forcefulness of greene 's prose , and it 's there on the screen in their version of the quiet american .
translation: 菲利普·诺伊斯和他的所有演员，以及他的 cinematographer 克里斯托弗·道尔，理解格林的散文中那种微妙的强烈感，这在他们的《沉默的美国人》版本中得以展现。
back_translation: Philip Noyce and all his actors, along with his cinematographer Christopher Doyle, grasped that subtle intensity in Greene's prose, which is reflected in their version of "The Quiet American."

text: he awakes to what appears to be the next morning only to find that he is one year into the future and is an escaped convict for the murder of his fianc & # 233 ; e .
translation: 他醒来时以为是第二天早晨，却发现自己已经进入了未来的一年，成为了谋杀未婚妻的逃犯。
back_translation: When he woke up, he thought it was the next morning, but discovered he had entered the future by a year and become a fugitive for murdering his fiancée.

text: thirty years ago he was a poor worker who left his girlfriend to pursuit his dream of success .
translation: 三十年前，他是一个贫穷的工人，离开了女友去追求成功的梦想。
back_translation: Thirty years ago, he was a poor worker who left his girlfriend to pursue his dream of success.

text: big-shot executive robert stiles ' car is damaged when parked at the lodge .
translation: 大亨高管罗伯特·斯泰尔斯的车在小屋停车时受损。
back_translation: Tycoon executive Robert Stiles' car was damaged while parked at the cabin.

text: as the boyfriend also becomes obsessed , it becomes apparent that something more is happening .
translation: 随着男朋友也变得痴迷，显然发生了更深层次的事情。
back_translation: As my boyfriend also became obsessed, it was evident that a deeper issue was occurring.

text: the asylum material is gripping , as are the scenes of jia with his family .
translation: 庇护所的材料引人入胜，贾与家人在一起的场景亦然。
back_translation: The materials of the shelter are captivating, and the scenes of Jia with his family are equally so.

text: the pair wave farewell in the airport and yoyo returns to hong kong to further her studies , while cheung continues to write his unfinished dissertation .
translation: 这对夫妇在机场告别，悠悠返回香港继续她的学业，而张继续写他的未完成的论文。
back_translation: The couple said goodbye at the airport, with Youyou returning to Hong Kong to continue her studies, while Zhang continued to work on his unfinished thesis.

text: when fowler introduces pyle to his beautiful young vietnamese mistress phuong ( hai yen ) the three become swept up in a tempestuous love triangle that leads to a series of startling revelations and finally - murder .
translation: 当福勒把他的美丽年轻越南情人芳娥（海燕）介绍给派尔时，三人卷入了一场激烈的爱情三角关系，导致了一系列震惊的揭示，最终……谋杀。
back_translation: When Fowler introduces his beautiful young Vietnamese lover, Phuong (Hai Yan), to Pyle, the three become entangled in an intense love triangle, leading to a series of shocking revelations, and ultimately... murder.

text: nevertheless , carlos puts his artistic aspirations on hold to take over the store and care for his father .
translation: 尽管如此，卡洛斯还是暂时搁置了他的艺术抱负，接管了商店，并照顾他的父亲。
back_translation: Nevertheless, Carlos temporarily set aside his artistic ambitions, took over the shop, and took care of his father.

text: wanders all over the map thematically and stylistically , and borrows heavily from lynch , jeunet , and von trier while failing to find a spark of its own .
translation: 在主题和风格上到处游走，浓重借鉴了林奇、热内和冯·特里尔的风格，却未能找到自己的火花。
back_translation: Wandering everywhere in theme and style, heavily borrowing from the styles of Lynch, Jene, and von Trier, it failed to find its own spark.

text: it is that rare combination of bad writing , bad direction and bad acting -- the trifecta of badness .
translation: 这是一种罕见的糟糕写作、糟糕导演和糟糕表演的组合——坏的三重奏。
back_translation: This is a rare combination of terrible writing, bad directing, and poor acting—a bad trifecta.

text: behind in rent , losing any real day jobs they have , they plan a bank robbery .
translation: 因租金拖欠，失去任何实际的日间工作，他们策划了一场银行抢劫。
back_translation: Due to rent arrears and the loss of any actual daytime job, they planned a bank robbery.

text: believing himself capable of understanding people from the other side of the track , michael fails to recognize that the ex-con is manipulating him and so sets off a catastrophic chain of events in the community .
translation: 迈克尔相信自己能够理解来自对面街区的人，但他未能意识到这位前罪犯正在操纵他，因此引发了社区中一连串灾难性的事件。
back_translation: Michael believes he can understand the people from the opposite block, but he fails to realize that the ex-convict is manipulating him, leading to a series of disastrous events in the community.

text: working in secret , the progressive group organised the 1959 theatre boycott to end segregation in movie theatres in hamilton .
translation: 进步组织在秘密工作，策划了1959年的戏院抵制活动，以结束汉密尔顿电影剧院的种族隔离。
back_translation: The Progress Organization was working secretly, planning the theater boycott in 1959 to end racial segregation at the Hamilton Movie Theater.

text: the soviet union has collapsed and armenia is on the verge of her independence .

text: as charming , humorous and heimisch as its nomadic subjects .
translation: 如同其游牧主题一样迷人、幽默和温馨。

text: a film within a film , this is a contemporary story of the making of a historical epic about the armenian holocaust between 1915 and 1918 .
translation: 这是一个关于拍摄一部关于1915年至1918年亚美尼亚大屠杀的历史史诗的当代故事，展示了电影中的电影。
back_translation: This is a contemporary story about filming a historical epic regarding the Armenian Genocide from 1915 to 1918, showcasing a film within a film.

text: the result is solemn and horrifying , yet strangely detached .
translation: 结果是庄重而可怕的，但又奇异地显得疏离。
back_translation: The result is solemn and terrifying, yet strangely appears distant.

text: beautiful , gentle people of all color of skin surround her and care about her .
translation: 美丽、温柔的各肤色的人们围绕着她，关心着她。

text: as janice , eileen walsh , an engaging , wide-eyed actress whose teeth are a little too big for her mouth , infuses the movie with much of its slender , glinting charm .
translation: 作为珍妮丝，艾琳·沃尔什是一位迷人、眼神清澈的女演员，她的牙齿对她的嘴巴来说有些过大，为这部电影注入了很多纤细而闪亮的魅力。
back_translation: As Janice, Erin Walsh is a charming actress with clear eyes, and her teeth are somewhat too large for her mouth, adding a lot of delicate and sparkling charm to the film.

text: the angst-ridden , affluent slacker characters are more grating than engaging .
translation: 那些充满焦虑的富有游手好闲角色更让人感到厌烦而非吸引。

text: a beguiling splash of pastel colors and prankish comedy from disney .
translation: 迪士尼带来的迷人淡色调和顽皮喜剧。
back_translation: The charming pastel tones and playful comedy brought by Disney.

text: there 's no denying how nice it is to see veteran actors bob hoskins , michael caine and helen mirren interacting with each other on screen .
translation: 毫无疑问，看到老演员鲍勃·霍斯金斯、迈克尔·凯恩和海伦·米伦在银幕上互动是一件多么美好的事情。
back_translation: There is no doubt that it is such a wonderful thing to see veteran actors Bob Hoskins, Michael Caine, and Helen Mirren interacting on screen.

text: sinks so low in a poorly played game of absurd plot twists , idiotic court maneuvers and stupid characters that even freeman ca n't save it .
translation: 在一场拼凑着荒谬情节转折、愚蠢法庭手段和无脑角色的糟糕游戏中，情节低得如此离谱，连弗里曼也无法拯救它。

text: for the most part , the film does hold up pretty well .
translation: 在大多数情况下，这部电影确实表现得相当不错。
back_translation: In most cases, this movie performs quite well.

text: soon , they discover that their x-laced escapades are to be interrupted by zombies and monsters that attack them on the ground , from the air , and in the sea , ruled by an evil entity in the house of the dead . . .
translation: 不久，他们发现他们的毒品冒险将被僵尸和怪物打断，这些生物从陆地、空中及海洋袭击他们，受到一个邪恶实体在死者之家控制……

text: if the movie is finally stuck halfway been cinema and prose , miller proves that it 's not an unfertile place to linger .
translation: 如果这部电影最终在影院和散文之间卡住，米勒证明这并不是一个不肥沃的停留之地。

text: beautifully shot sequences episodically shift back and forth from the past to the present .
translation: 精美拍摄的镜头在过去和现在之间逐步交替。

text: guru gulab is married to vikrant 's stepsister preeti ( preeti jhangiani ) .
translation: 古鲁·古拉布与维克兰特的继姐姐普丽蒂（普丽蒂·扬贾尼）结婚。

text: once there , she finds more than she expected .
translation: 一到那里，她发现了超出预期的东西。
back_translation: When she arrived there, she discovered things beyond her expectations.

text: a waterlogged version of 'fatal attraction ' for the teeny-bopper set . . . a sad , soggy potboiler that wastes the talents of its attractive young leads .
translation: 一部针对青少年群体的水浸版《致命吸引力》……一部悲伤而潮湿的煽情剧，浪费了其迷人年轻主演的才华。

text: a period story about a catholic boy who tries to help a jewish friend get into heaven by sending the audience straight to hell .
translation: 一个关于天主教男孩的故事，他试图帮助一个犹太朋友进入天堂，结果却将观众直接送往地狱。

text: certain that there 's only one way to find out the truth , rachel returns to the hospital .
translation: 确定只有一个方法可以找出真相，瑞秋返回医院。

text: their letter has been received in whitehall and merton corroborates their heroic story .
translation: 他们的信件已在怀特霍尔收到，而梅顿证实了他们的英雄故事。

text: when rodney is hired to kill a blackmailer who has dirt on a u . s . congressional candidate , it 's just another dead body for a fat wad of cash .
translation: 当罗德尼被雇佣去杀死一个手里握有美国国会候选人黑料的敲诈者时，这对他来说只是为了获取一笔丰厚奖金而又一个尸体。
back_translation: When Rodney was hired to kill a blackmailer who held damaging information on a candidate for the U.S. Congress, it was just another body for him in exchange for a hefty reward.

text: for all its brilliant touches , dragon loses its fire midway , nearly flickering out by its perfunctory conclusion .
translation: 尽管充满了精彩的亮点，《龙》的中途失去了火花，几乎在敷衍的结局中熄灭。

text: however due to roxie 's new found fame , velma is forgotten about .
translation: 然而，由于罗克西的新发现的名声，维尔玛被遗忘了。

text: purely propaganda , a work of unabashed hero worship , it is nonetheless -- and likely inadvertently -- a timely and invaluable implicit reminder of the role that u . s . foreign policy has played in the rise of castro .
translation: 纯粹的宣传，是一部无所顾忌的英雄崇拜之作，但它仍然--并可能是不经意地--成为一个及时且宝贵的隐性提醒，提醒人们美国外交政策在卡斯特罗崛起中所发挥的作用。
back_translation: Pure propaganda, it is a work of unabashed hero worship, but it still—perhaps unwittingly—serves as a timely and valuable implicit reminder of the role that American foreign policy played in the rise of Castro.

text: so riddled with unanswered questions that it requires gargantuan leaps of faith just to watch it plod along .
translation: 充满未解之谜，以至于观看它缓慢进行需要巨大的信心飞跃。

text: the best of the pierce brosnan james bond films to date .

text: the title trapped turns out to be a pretty fair description of how you feel while you 're watching this ultra-manipulative thriller .
translation: 标题“被困”确实很准确地描述了你在观看这部超级操控的惊悚片时的感受。

text: gangster no . 1 is solid , satisfying fare for adults .

text: in late summer 1973 , michael skid , the son of a well-to-do judge , returns home and rents a dilapidated farm .
translation: 1973年夏末，富有法官的儿子迈克尔·斯基德回家，租下了一座破旧的农场。

text: brosnan 's finest non-bondish performance yet fails to overcome the film 's manipulative sentimentality and annoying stereotypes .
translation: 布洛斯南最出色的非邦德表演却无法克服影片的操控性情感和令人厌烦的刻板印象。
back_translation: Brosnan's best non-Bond performance is unable to overcome the film's manipulative emotions and annoying stereotypes.

text: as well as a study of mepe 's demise ; an american made dam that stopped the flow of the river which fishermen depended on for survival .
translation: 以及对mepe消亡的研究；一座美国制造的大坝阻止了渔民赖以生存的河流。

text: the film follows haris , a hip , handsome afghan-american artist who shows his work at a downtown manhattan art gallery .
translation: 这部电影讲述了哈里斯的故事，他是一位时尚帅气的阿富汗裔美国艺术家，在曼哈顿市中心的一家艺术画廊展示他的作品。
back_translation: This movie tells the story of Harris, a fashionable and handsome Afghan-American artist showcasing his work at an art gallery in downtown Manhattan.

text: an exhaustive investigation into the roots and after-effects of the revolutions and counter-revolutions that rocked france , the u . s . , china , latin america and czechoslovakia in 1967 and 1968 .
translation: 对1967年和1968年震撼法国、美国、中国、拉丁美洲和捷克斯洛伐克的革命与反革命根源及其后果的全面调查。
back_translation: A comprehensive investigation into the revolutionary and counter-revolutionary roots and consequences that shocked France, the United States, China, Latin America, and Czechoslovakia in 1967 and 1968.

text: they are living eye-witnesses of the end of an era : 800 years of the death penalty in europe .
translation: 他们是见证一个时代结束的活生生的目击者：欧洲死刑800年的历史。

text: crush could be the worst film a man has made about women since valley of the dolls .
translation: 《迷恋》可能是自《玩偶谷》以来，男人拍的关于女性最糟糕的电影。

text: the filmmakers wisely decided to let crocodile hunter steve irwin do what he does best , and fashion a story around him .

text: a few months later , both parties realize their mistake and find out that 'getting back what you had ' is not so easy .

text: as alex begins to dictate his tale of a romantic love triangle to the charming yet somewhat opinionated stenographer , emma challenges his ideas at every turn .

text: although olivier assayas ' elegantly appointed period drama seems , at times , padded with incident in the way of a too-conscientious adaptation . . . its three-hour running time plays closer to two .
translation: 尽管奥利维耶·阿萨亚斯的这部优雅的时期剧在某些时刻似乎因过于细致的改编而显得情节冗长……但其三小时的放映时间实际上更接近于两小时。
back_translation: Although Olivier Assayas's elegant period drama may at times seem overly long due to its excessively detailed adaptation, its three-hour runtime is actually closer to two hours.

text: an ingenious and often harrowing look at damaged people and how families can offer either despair or consolation .
translation: 一个巧妙且常常令人痛苦的视角，探讨了受伤的人和家庭如何提供绝望或安慰。

text: life , love , and the fear of failing . . .
translation: 生活、爱与对失败的恐惧……

text: like `` this is spinal tap `` , only with more pathetic protagonists- and funnier !
translation: 就像《这就是脊髓鼓》，只是更可怜的主角-而且更搞笑！

text: this only leads to increased anxiety and fear in nicholas .
translation: 这只会导致尼古拉斯更加焦虑和恐惧。

translation: 他们定期来访，其中一些人甚至每天都来，观看他们年轻时的电影。

text: lieutenant hart must then defend the black pilot against charges before an obviously racist american tribunal ; unaware that the trial itself is only a front for the real secret of the prison camp .
translation: 哈特中尉必须在一个显然带有种族歧视的美国法庭上为这位黑人飞行员辩护，而他并不知道审判本身只是监狱营真实秘密的幌子。

text: a near perfect fusion of computer and cel animation .
translation: 计算机动画与传统动画的近乎完美融合。

text: shot as a `` behind-the-scenes `` look at how a fictional kung-fu movie is made , the film is basically a movie about the making of a movie .
translation: 作为一部“幕后花絮”，它展示了一部虚构功夫电影的制作过程，这部电影基本上是有关电影制作的电影。
back_translation: As a "behind-the-scenes" feature, it showcases the production process of a fictional kung fu movie, which is essentially a film about filmmaking.

text: as a feature-length film , it wears out its welcome as tryingly as the title character .
translation: 作为一部完整的电影，它的存在感令人感到厌倦，就像片中角色一样让人忍受。
back_translation: As a complete film, its presence is tiresome, just like the characters in it that are hard to endure.

text: but lulu is newly single and the last thing she needs is a man in her life .
translation: 但是露露刚刚单身，她最不需要的就是生活中有一个男人。
back_translation: But Lulu has just become single, and what she needs the least in her life right now is a man.

text: the film is undone by anachronistic quick edits and occasional jarring glimpses of a modern theater audience watching the events unfold .
translation: 这部电影因不合时宜的快速剪辑和偶尔令人震惊的现代观众观看事件展开的景象而遭到破坏。
back_translation: This film is marred by its untimely rapid editing and occasionally shocking scenes unfolding for the modern audience.

text: two women , one spoiled and clinging , the other unawakened but formidable .
translation: 两个女人，一个被宠坏并依附，另一个未被唤醒但强大。
back_translation: Two women, one spoiled and dependent, the other unawakened but powerful.

text: a standard police-oriented drama that , were it not for de niro 's participation , would have likely wound up a tnt original .
translation: 一部标准的以警察为主题的戏剧，如果没有德尼罗的参与，可能最终会成为TNT原创剧集。
back_translation: A standard police-themed drama, if it had not involved De Niro, might have ultimately become a TNT original series.

text: the longer the movie goes , the worse it gets , but it 's actually pretty good in the first few minutes .
translation: 电影越往后越糟，但开头的几分钟其实还不错。

text: likely to expertly drum up repressed teenage memories in any viewer .
translation: 很可能在任何观众心中激起被压抑的青春回忆。

text: the union , however , faces its own internecine battles as factions inside the organization , one led by james p . hoffa ( son of the infamous jimmy hoffa ) , vie for power .
translation: 然而，这个工会面临着内部的权力斗争，组织内部的派系之一由詹姆斯·P·霍法（臭名昭著的吉米·霍法的儿子）领导，争夺权力。
back_translation: However, this union is facing internal power struggles, with one of the factions led by James P. Hoffa (the notorious Jimmy Hoffa's son) vying for power.

text: a modestly comic , modestly action-oriented world war ii adventure that , in terms of authenticity , is one of those films that requires the enemy to never shoot straight .
translation: 一部适度搞笑、适度动作取向的二战冒险电影，在真实性方面，这类电影要求敌人永远不会射得准确。
back_translation: A moderately funny, moderately action-oriented World War II adventure movie, which in terms of realism, requires that the enemies never shoot accurately.

text: however , she also finds links to a foundation that runs a shelter for battered women , paradiset .
translation: 然而，她还发现了一个运营庇护所的基金会的链接，专门为遭受虐待的女性提供庇护，名为“天堂”。
back_translation: However, she also discovered a link to a foundation that operates a shelter specifically for abused women, called "Heaven."

text: desperate ) ones who undergo sexually-charged secret rituals and become the 'the chosen few ' .
translation: 绝望的那些人经历充满性暗示的秘密仪式，成为“被选择的少数”。
back_translation: Those in despair undergo secret rituals filled with sexual innuendo, becoming the "chosen few."

text: anmol comes to india with his father-in- law ( paresh rawal ) and the moment they step into india they are picked up by choto chhatri ( johny lever ) , who takes them to a local goon , eaida anna ( sunil shetty ) .
translation: 安莫尔和他的岳父（帕雷什·拉瓦尔）来到印度，刚踏入印度，他们就被小喇叭（约翰尼·利弗）抓住，带到一个当地的恶棍艾达·安娜（苏尼尔·谢提）那里。
back_translation: Anmol and his father-in-law (Paresh Rawal) arrived in India, and as soon as they set foot in the country, they were caught by a small-time crook (Johnny Lever) and taken to a local villain, Aida Anna (Suniel Shetty).

text: it would n't be my preferred way of spending 100 minutes or $ 7 . 00 .
translation: 这不是我花费100分钟或7.00美元的首选方式。
back_translation: This is not my preferred way of spending 100 minutes or $7.00.

text: the problem with the mayhem in formula 51 is not that it 's offensive , but that it 's boring .
translation: 公式51中的混乱问题并不是它令人反感，而是它令人厌倦。
back_translation: The chaos in Formula 51 is not what makes it unpleasant, but rather what makes it tedious.

text: and it seems that the only thing that he ca n't do , is alter a person 's free will , so if he wants her back , he has to do it the hard way .
translation: 而且似乎他唯一不能做的就是改变一个人的自由意志，因此如果他想要她回来的话，就必须走艰难的道路。
back_translation: Moreover, it seems that the only thing he cannot do is change a person's free will, so if he wants her to come back, he must take the difficult path.

text: what you end up getting is the vertical limit of surfing movies - memorable stunts with lots of downtime in between .
translation: 你最终得到的是冲浪电影的垂直极限——令人难忘的特技和大量的间歇时间。
back_translation: What you ultimately get is the vertical limit of a surfing movie—unforgettable stunts and plenty of downtime.

text: all the firefighters who participated in the film were friends and collegues of the six firemen who lost their lives .
translation: 参与该电影的所有消防员都是六名失去生命的消防员的朋友和同事。
back_translation: All the firefighters involved in the film are friends and colleagues of the six firefighters who lost their lives.

text: blisteringly rude , scarily funny , sorrowfully sympathetic to the damage it surveys , the film has in kieran culkin a pitch-perfect holden .
translation: 刺耳的无礼，令人毛骨悚然的幽默，对其所调查的损害充满悲伤的同情，这部电影中基兰·卡尔金完美地诠释了霍尔顿。
back_translation: The jarring rudeness, the chilling humor, and the profound sympathy for the damages being investigated are perfectly embodied by Kieran Culkin in this film as Holden.

text: he is a homeless street performer who brings shakespeare 's soliloquies to life each afternoon on various street corners around the city of denver .
translation: 他是一名无家可归的街头艺人，每天下午在丹佛市的各个街角生动演绎莎士比亚的独白。
back_translation: He is a homeless street performer who passionately performs Shakespeare's monologues at various street corners in Denver every afternoon.

text: nakata 's technique is to imply terror by suggestion , rather than the overuse of special effects .
translation: 中田的技巧是通过暗示来暗示恐惧，而不是过度使用特殊效果。
back_translation: Nakatani's skill is to suggest fear through insinuation rather than relying heavily on special effects.
