text: the problem is n't that the movie hits so close to home so much as that it hits close to home while engaging in such silliness as that snake-down-the-throat business and the inevitable shot of schwarzenegger outrunning a fireball .
translation: 问题不在于电影与现实如此贴近，而在于它在进行像蛇从喉咙里滑下这样的荒谬情节时仍然让人感到如此贴近现实，还有施瓦辛格闪避火球的那个必然镜头。
back_translation: The problem is not that the movie is so close to reality, but that it feels so close to reality even while depicting absurd scenarios like a snake sliding down someone's throat, and that inevitable shot of Schwarzenegger dodging fireballs.

text: the problem with all of this : it 's not really funny .
translation: 这一切的问题是：这并不好笑。
back_translation: The problem with all of this is: it’s not funny.

text: two american tourists on a romantic camping trip are brutally murdered .
translation: 两名美国游客在浪漫露营之旅中被残忍谋杀。
back_translation: Two American tourists were brutally murdered during a romantic camping trip.

text: he takes a job as a 4th grade substitute teacher at an uptight private school where his attitude and hijinx have a powerful effect on his students .
translation: 他在一所严格的私立学校担任四年级的替代教师，他的态度和搞笑行为对学生们产生了强烈的影响。
back_translation: He served as a substitute teacher for fourth grade at a strict private school, and his attitude and humorous behavior had a strong impact on the students.

text: the film is darkly atmospheric , with herrmann quietly suggesting the sadness and obsession beneath hearst 's forced avuncular chortles .
translation: 这部电影氛围阴郁，赫尔曼悄然暗示了赫斯特强装欢笑下的忧伤与执着。
back_translation: This movie has a gloomy atmosphere, and Herman quietly hints at Hurst's sadness and obsession hidden beneath his forced laughter.

text: the film is so bad it does n't improve upon the experience of staring at a blank screen .
translation: 这部电影糟糕到连盯着黑屏的体验都没有改善。
back_translation: This movie is so terrible that it doesn't even improve the experience of staring at a black screen.

text: moody , heartbreaking , and filmed in a natural , unforced style that makes its characters seem entirely convincing even when its script is not .
translation: 情绪化，令人心碎，以一种自然、毫不做作的风格拍摄，使得角色显得非常可信，尽管剧本并不总是如此。
back_translation: Emotional and heartbreaking, filmed in a natural, unpretentious style that makes the characters seem very believable, even though the script is not always so.

text: each of the principals has a radically different way of dealing with it .
translation: 每位校长处理此事的方式截然不同。
back_translation: Every principal handles this matter in a completely different way.

text: a thoughtful look at a painful incident that made headlines in 1995 .
translation: 对1995年引发头条的痛苦事件的深思熟虑的回顾。
back_translation: A thoughtful reflection on the painful events that made headlines in 1995.

text: even though the film runs a brief 71 minutes -- finishing off with footage of reno talking with new yorkers on the street in the aftermath of 9/11 -- reno shows enough gusto to make you a fan .
translation: 尽管这部电影仅有71分钟的短暂时长——最后是雷诺在911事件后与纽约街头人们交谈的镜头——但雷诺展现出的热情足以让你成为他的粉丝。
back_translation: Despite the film's brief duration of only 71 minutes—ending with Reno talking to people on the streets of New York after the 9/11 event—Reno's passion is enough to make you a fan of his.

text: the main characters are dr . kanna ( sharad kapoor ) , his fianc & # 233 ; e rupi ( ms . nandita das ) , rajayya ( makrand deshpande ) as naxalite commander , inspector despande ( sayaji shinde ) , ghisu ( vijay raj ) and dattu ( rajpal yadav ) .
translation: 主要角色包括博士卡纳（沙拉德·卡普尔），他的未婚妻鲁皮（南迪塔·达斯），拉贾亚（马克兰德·德什潘德）饰演的纳萨尔派指挥官，德斯潘德探长（萨亚吉·辛德）以及吉苏（维贾伊·拉杰）和达图（拉贾帕尔·雅达夫）。
back_translation: The main characters include Dr. Kanna (Sharad Kapoor), his fiancée Rupi (Nandita Das), the Naxalite commander played by Rajaya (Makrand Deshpande), Inspector Deshpande (Sayaji Shinde), as well as Gisu (Vijay Raj) and Dattu (Rajpal Yadav).

text: effectively feeds our senses with the chilling sights and sounds from within the camp to create a completely numbing experience .
translation: 有效地通过营地内令人毛骨悚然的景象和声音来刺激我们的感官，创造出一种完全麻木的体验。
back_translation: Effectively stimulate our senses through the eerie sights and sounds within the camp, creating an experience of complete numbness.

text: chris , a radio dj , and his wife , katrin , who works at a truck stop , are friends with uwe , who owns a snack bar , and his wife , ellen , who sells perfume .
translation: 克里斯是一名电台DJ，他的妻子凯特琳在一个卡车停靠站工作，他们和拥有小吃店的乌韦及其妻子艾伦（专卖香水）是朋友。
back_translation: Chris is a radio DJ, and his wife Caitlyn works at a truck stop. They are friends with Uwe, who owns a snack bar, and his wife Ellen, who specializes in perfumes.

text: but with little hope of breaking the game 's vicious cycle of money , dark deeds and long spells of incarceration , mel 's life represents everything tiz is trying to escape .
translation: 但几乎没有希望打破金钱、黑暗罪行和漫长监禁的恶性循环，梅尔的生活代表了提兹试图逃避的一切。
back_translation: But there is almost no hope of breaking the vicious cycle of money, dark crimes, and long imprisonment; Mel's life represents everything Tiz is trying to escape from.

text: is the history of two workers of the trains , a professor and a little child that decide to sequester an old train that has been sold to usa for a movie production .
translation: 这是两个火车工人的故事，一个教授和一个小孩，他们决定劫持一列已被卖给美国用于电影制作的旧火车。
back_translation: This is the story of two train workers, a professor, and a child who decide to hijack an old train that has been sold to America for movie production.

text: it did to paul strang , an ex-high school teacher drinking his life away after being nearly killed by a student .
translation: 这对保罗·斯特朗造成了影响，他是一位前高中老师，在差点被学生杀死后，开始酗酒消磨自己的生活。
back_translation: This had an impact on Paul Strong, a former high school teacher, who began to drink heavily and waste his life after nearly being killed by a student.

text: for all the charm of kevin kline and a story that puts old-fashioned values under the microscope , there 's something creepy about this movie .
translation: 尽管凯文·克莱恩魅力满分，故事也将传统价值观置于显微镜下，但这部电影却有些令人毛骨悚然。
back_translation: Despite Kevin Kline's charm and the story placing traditional values under a microscope, the film is somewhat chilling.

text: how often do you see a movie about a subject that truly frightens you ?
translation: 你多久会看到一部真正让你感到恐惧的题材电影？
back_translation: How often do you come across a horror movie that truly scares you?

text: but when their simple robbery explodes into a bloody ambush , the ruthless killers realize that one of them is a cop .
translation: 但当他们的简单抢劫演变成一起血腥的伏击时，冷酷的杀手意识到他们中间有一个是警察。
back_translation: But when their simple robbery turned into a bloody ambush, the cold-blooded killers realized that one among them was a police officer.

text: crudup 's screen presence is the one thing that holds interest in the midst of a mushy , existential exploration of why men leave their families .
translation: 克鲁帕的银幕表现是揭示男人为何离开家庭这一感性存在探索中吸引人之处。
back_translation: The captivating aspect of Krupa's screen performance lies in its exploration of the emotional reasons why men leave their families.

text: about amy 's cuteness , amy 's career success ( she 's a best-selling writer of self-help books who ca n't help herself ) , and amy 's neuroses when it comes to men .
translation: 关于艾米的可爱，艾米的职业成功（她是一位畅销自助书作家，却无法帮助自己），以及艾米在面对男性时的神经质。
back_translation: About Amy's cuteness, Amy's professional success (she is a bestselling self-help author but cannot help herself), and Amy's nervousness when facing men.

text: it 's the movie equivalent of a sweaty old guy in a rain coat shopping for cheap porn .
translation: 这部电影就像一个穿着雨衣的满头大汗的老家伙在寻找廉价色情片。
back_translation: This movie is like an old guy in a raincoat, sweating profusely while searching for cheap porn.

text: there 's only one way to kill michael myers for good : stop buying tickets to these movies .
translation: 要彻底消灭迈克尔·迈尔斯，只有一个办法：停止购买这些电影的票。
back_translation: The only way to completely eliminate Michael Myers is to stop buying tickets for these movies.

text: the film is surprisingly well-directed by brett ratner , who keeps things moving well -- at least until the problematic third act .
translation: 这部电影出乎意料地由布雷特·拉特纳执导得很好，他让情节发展顺畅——至少在有问题的第三幕之前。
back_translation: This movie was unexpectedly well directed by Brett Ratner, who made the plot develop smoothly—at least before the problematic third act.

text: superbly photographed and staged by mendes with a series of riveting set pieces the likes of which mainstream audiences have rarely seen .
translation: 由门德斯精心拍摄和布置，呈现出一系列引人入胜的场景，这是主流观众很少见到的。
back_translation: Carefully filmed and arranged by Mendes, it presents a series of captivating scenes that are rarely seen by mainstream audiences.

text: a film that presents an interesting , even sexy premise then ruins itself with too many contrivances and goofy situations .
translation: 一部呈现出有趣，甚至性感 premise 的电影，却因过多的牵强情节和搞笑场景而自我毁灭。
back_translation: A movie that presents an interesting, even sexy premise, but self-destructs due to excessive far-fetched plots and comedic scenes.

text: the film follows 17-year-old cassandra mortmain ( romola garai ) , and the fortunes of her eccentric family , struggling to survive in a decaying english castle .
translation: 这部电影讲述了17岁的卡桑德拉·莫特梅因（罗莫拉·嘉瑞饰）以及她那古怪的家庭在一座破旧的英格兰城堡中挣扎求生的故事。
back_translation: The film tells the story of 17-year-old Cassandra Mortmain (played by Romola Garai) and her quirky family struggling to survive in a dilapidated castle in England.

text: sharp , lively , funny and ultimately sobering film .
translation: 尖锐、生动、有趣，并最终令人深思的电影。
back_translation: A sharp, vivid, interesting, and ultimately thought-provoking film.

text: julie is a smart and spunky fifteen year old who lost her family to syndicate killers .
translation: 朱莉是一个聪明而有活力的十五岁女孩，她失去了家人，成为了犯罪集团杀手的受害者。
back_translation: Julie is a smart and vibrant fifteen-year-old girl who lost her family and became a victim of a crime syndicate's killer.

text: ted norwood summons all his resistance to finally quit his seemingly successful carreer , only to be outmaneuvered by a powerful executive who barely even notices that she 's in a test of wills .
translation: 特德·诺伍德聚集所有的抵抗力，最终辞去他看似成功的职业，结果却被一位强大的高管巧妙地操控，甚至几乎没有察觉她正在进行一场意志的较量。
back_translation: Ted Norwood summoned all his resistance and ultimately resigned from his seemingly successful career, only to find himself skillfully manipulated by a powerful executive, hardly even realizing that she was engaged in a battle of wills.

text: in depression-era chicago hitman michael sullivan is known to friends and enemies alike as the angel of death .
translation: 在大萧条时期的芝加哥，杀手迈克尔·沙利文被朋友和敌人称为死亡天使。
back_translation: During the Great Depression in Chicago, the killer Michael Sullivan was known as the Angel of Death by both friends and enemies.

text: davis has energy , but she does n't bother to make her heroine 's book sound convincing , the gender-war ideas original , or the comic scenes fly .
translation: 戴维斯充满活力，但她并不在意让她的女主角的书听起来令人信服，性别战争的思想原创，或者让喜剧场景生动有趣。
back_translation: Davis is full of energy, but she doesn't care about making her protagonist's voice sound convincing, original ideas about gender warfare, or making the comedic scenes lively and interesting.

text: after another drunken night they are soon parted from all their accumulated cash .
translation: 在又一个酩酊大醉的夜晚，他们很快就把所有积累的现金全部花光了。
back_translation: On yet another drunken night, they quickly spent all the cash they had accumulated.

text: but what exactly is good & # 38 ; what exactly is evil ?
translation: 但是究竟什么是善？什么又是恶？
back_translation: But what exactly is good? And what is evil?

text: several former state and party functionaries interfere in the filmmaking in the hopes of manipulating katerina 's confessions for their own purposes .
translation: 几位前国家和党派官员干预了拍摄工作，希望操控凯瑟琳娜的供述以达到自己的目的。
back_translation: Several former national and party officials intervened in the filming, hoping to manipulate Katharina's testimony to serve their own purposes.

text: when [ reno ] lets her radical flag fly , taking angry potshots at george w . bush , henry kissinger , larry king , et al . , reno devolves into a laugh-free lecture .
translation: 当[雷诺]放下她的激进旗帜，愤怒地攻击乔治·W·布什、亨利·基辛格、拉里·金等人时，雷诺变成了一场没有笑声的讲座。
back_translation: When [Reynolds] put down her radical banner and angrily attacked George W. Bush, Henry Kissinger, Larry King, and others, Reynolds turned into a lecture without laughter.

text: the latest installment in the pokemon canon , pokemon 4ever is surprising less moldy and trite than the last two , likely because much of the japanese anime is set in a scenic forest where pokemon graze in peace .
translation: 《宝可梦》第四部作品比前两部惊人地少了一些陈词滥调，可能是因为日本动画的大部分情节设定在一个风景如画的森林中，宝可梦们在这里安静地吃草。
back_translation: The fourth installment of "Pokémon" is remarkably less rife with clichés than the first two, possibly because most of the plot in Japanese animation is set in a picturesque forest where Pokémon quietly graze.

text: the inside story sees dean olsen ( curry ) finding a mysterious book in the cellar of his uncle 's ( tingwell ) old house .
translation: 内情故事讲述了迪恩·奥尔森（库里饰）在其叔叔（廷维尔饰）老房子的地下室找到一本神秘的书。
back_translation: The story reveals Dean Olsen (played by Curry) finding a mysterious book in the basement of his uncle's (played by Thunberg) old house.

text: ultimately , in the history of the academy , people may be wondering what all that jazz was about `` chicago `` in 2002 . zellweger 's whiny pouty-lipped poof faced and spindly attempt at playing an ingenue makes her nomination as best actress even more of a an a
translation: 最终，在学院的历史中，人们可能会想知道2002年“芝加哥”到底是怎么回事。泽尔维格的抱怨和嘟嘴的样子，以及她骨瘦如柴地尝试扮演一个年轻女主角，使得她的最佳女演员提名显得更加让人费解。
back_translation: In the end, people may wonder what exactly happened with "Chicago" in 2002 in the history of the academy. Zellweger's complaints and pouty expressions, along with her gaunt attempts to play a young female lead, make her Best Actress nomination seem even more puzzling.

text: set in the los angeles police department in april 1992 , dark blue is a dramatic thriller that takes place just days before the acquittal of four white officers in the beating of black motorist rodney king and the subsequent l . a . riots .
translation: 《深蓝》是一部设定在1992年4月洛杉矶警察局的戏剧性惊悚片，故事发生在四名白人警察因殴打黑人司机罗德尼·金而被宣判无罪的几天前，以及随之而来的洛杉矶骚乱。
back_translation: "Deep Blue" is a dramatic thriller set at the Los Angeles Police Department in April 1992, taking place just days before four white police officers were acquitted of beating African American driver Rodney King, and the subsequent Los Angeles riots.

text: even with harris 's strong effort , the script gives him little to effectively probe lear 's soul-stripping breakdown .
translation: 即使哈里斯竭尽全力，剧本也只给了他很少的机会去有效地探究李尔的灵魂剥离崩溃。
back_translation: Even with Harris's best efforts, the script offered him very few opportunities to effectively explore Lear's soul's disintegration.

text: billy crystal and robert de niro sleepwalk through vulgarities in a sequel you can refuse .
translation: 比利·克里斯托和罗伯特·德尼罗在一部你可以拒绝的续集中对粗俗之词漫不经心地走过。
back_translation: Billy Crystal and Robert De Niro casually walked past vulgar words in a sequel you can refuse.

text: the film belongs to the marvelous verdu , a sexy slip of an earth mother who mourns her tragedies in private and embraces life in public
translation: 这部电影属于了奇妙的维尔杜，她是一个性感的地球母亲，私下里为自己的悲剧哀悼，而在公众面前则拥抱生活。
back_translation: This movie belongs to the wonderful Viridiana, who is a sensual Earth Mother, mourning her tragedy in private while embracing life in public.

text: gorgeous to look at but insufferably tedious and turgid . . . a curiously constricted epic .
translation: 看起来华丽，但令人难以忍受地乏味和沉闷……一个奇特而受限的史诗。
back_translation: It looks gorgeous, but is unbearably dull and dreary... a peculiar and limited epic.

text: fourteen-year-old misfit farm boy duncan midge ( hirsch ) is trying to cope with his mother 's death .
translation: 十四岁的不合群农场男孩邓肯·米乔（赫希饰）正努力应对母亲的去世。
back_translation: Fourteen-year-old misfit farm boy Duncan Meacham (played by Hirsch) is struggling to cope with the death of his mother.

text: graffiti removal has subverted the common obstacles blocking creative expression and become one of the more intriguing and important art movements of our time .
translation: 涂鸦清除已经颠覆了阻碍创造性表达的常见障碍，成为我们时代更具吸引力和重要性的艺术运动之一。
back_translation: Graffiti removal has overturned common obstacles that hinder creative expression, becoming one of the most appealing and significant art movements of our time.

text: there 's plenty to enjoy -- in no small part thanks to lau .
translation: 有很多值得享受的，尤其要感谢刘。
back_translation: There are many things worth enjoying, especially thanks to Liu.

text: while navigating through the tumultuous neighborhoods of south central l . a . , perry and keough must track down cold-blooded killers and face their own demons , which prove to be more ruthless than the criminals they pursue .
translation: 在南中部洛杉矶动荡的社区中，佩里和凯欧必须追踪冷血杀手，并面对他们自己的恶魔，这些恶魔证明比他们追捕的罪犯更为无情。
back_translation: In the turbulent neighborhoods of South Central Los Angeles, Perry and Keo must track down a cold-blooded killer and confront their own demons, which prove to be more ruthless than the criminals they are pursuing.

text: new york fashion designer melanie carmichael suddenly finds herself engaged to the city 's most eligible bachelor .
translation: 纽约时装设计师梅兰妮·卡迈克尔突然发现自己与这座城市最合适的单身汉订婚。
back_translation: New York fashion designer Melanie Carmichael suddenly finds herself engaged to the city's most eligible bachelor.

text: 'while you were waiting ' explores the complex relationship between cigarette addiction and its effects on family members .
translation: 《当你在等待时》探讨了香烟成瘾与其对家庭成员影响之间的复杂关系。
back_translation: "When You Are Waiting" explores the complex relationship between cigarette addiction and its impact on family members.

text: charlie beck is a handsome british charmer , he arrives in a vintage sports car and woos sally until he sweeps her off her feet .
translation: 查理·贝克是一位英俊的英国魅力男士，他驾驶一辆复古跑车到达，向萨莉献殷勤，直到把她迷得神魂颠倒。
back_translation: Charlie Baker is a handsome British charmer who arrives driving a vintage sports car, charming Sally until she is completely captivated by him.

text: the attempt is courageous , even if the result is wildly uneven .
translation: 这一尝试是勇敢的，即使结果非常不平衡。
back_translation: This attempt is brave, even if the result is very unbalanced.

text: in the shop we find eddie ( the entertainer ) , an old barber with strong opinions and no customers .
translation: 在商店里，我们看到埃迪（娱乐者），一个有着强烈观点却没有顾客的老理发师。
back_translation: In the store, we see Eddie (the entertainer), an old barber with strong opinions but no customers.

text: with the help of the sulty nina , sitting alone in the center of the restaurant , simone gets caught up in the flirting , fighting and food and discovers that sometimes , the best things may not be on the menu .
translation: 在性感的尼娜的帮助下，坐在餐厅中央的西蒙被调情、争斗和美食所吸引，发现有时候，最好的东西可能不在菜单上。
back_translation: With the help of the seductive Nina, Simon, sitting in the center of the restaurant, is drawn in by flirting, conflict, and gourmet food, discovering that sometimes the best things may not be on the menu.

text: sensitive , insightful and beautifully rendered film . one of the best of the year .
translation: 敏感、深刻且表现优美的电影。是今年最佳影片之一。
back_translation: A sensitive, profound, and beautifully crafted film. It is one of the best films of the year.

text: the problem with movies about angels is they have a tendency to slip into hokum . a rumor of angels does n't just slip -- it avalanches into forced fuzziness .
translation: 关于天使的电影问题在于它们往往会滑入虚无缥缈的境地。关于天使的传闻并不会轻易消逝，而是像雪崩一样陷入Forced模糊。
back_translation: The problem with movies about angels is that they often slip into elusive territory. Rumors about angels do not easily fade away; instead, they plunge into forced ambiguity like an avalanche.

text: his motives are plain and simple , to meet a woman .
translation: 他的动机简单明了，就是为了接触一个女人。
back_translation: His motivation is simple and clear: to get close to a woman.

text: she 's a troubled young woman who takes off on a journey with a hitchhiker after a strange , fateful encounter on a new york street .
translation: 她是一个困扰的年轻女性，在纽约街头经历了一次奇怪的命运邂逅后，和一个搭便车的人一起踏上了旅程。
back_translation: She is a troubled young woman who embarks on a journey with a hitchhiker after a peculiar twist of fate on the streets of New York.

text: a dark contemporary gangster drama set in chicago , shut-eye derives its edgy chemistry from conflicted loyalties .
translation: 一部设定在芝加哥的黑暗当代黑帮戏剧《闭眼》，其紧张的化学反应源于冲突的忠诚。
back_translation: A dark contemporary gangster drama set in Chicago called "Close Your Eyes," whose tense chemistry stems from conflicting loyalties.

text: when the chemical sisters , montreal 's fabulous club kid duo find an unconscious naked boy on their way out from yet another jetset event , they decide to bring him home and take matters into their own glittery hands .
translation: 当化学姐妹花——蒙特利尔的华丽俱乐部孩子二人组，在又一次豪华活动结束后，发现一个失去意识的裸体男孩时，她们决定把他带回家，亲自处理这件事。
back_translation: When the chemistry duo — the glamorous club kids from Montreal — discovered an unconscious naked boy after yet another lavish event, they decided to take him home to handle things themselves.

text: essentially , this is abel fererra 's it 's a wonderful life .
translation: 本质上，这就是阿贝尔·费拉拉的《这是美好的一生》。
back_translation: Essentially, this is Abel Ferrara's "It's a Beautiful Life."

text: he tells her to keep fighting for her goals but still to compromise .
translation: 他告诉她要继续为自己的目标奋斗，但也要做出妥协。
back_translation: He told her to continue striving for her goals, but also to make compromises.

text: cal is an unpleasantly shallow and immature character with whom to spend 110 claustrophobic minutes .
translation: 卡尔是一个令人不快的肤浅和不成熟的角色，与他共度110分钟的压抑时光。
back_translation: Karl is an unpleasant, superficial, and immature character, spending 110 oppressive minutes with him.

text: as she makes her way through the dazed world of the city 's junkies , only one person seems able to provide any help : the obsessive and self-destructive miles , the last of the city 's security officers .
translation: 当她穿越这个恍惚的城市瘾君子世界时，似乎只有一个人能够提供帮助：那个偏执而自毁的迈尔斯，城市最后的安全官员。
back_translation: As she navigated through this hazy world of city addicts, it seemed that only one person could offer help: the paranoid and self-destructive Miles, the city's last security officer.

text: feelings he interprets with his five senses reflect the emotions of others , not his own .
translation: 他通过五种感官解读的感受反映的是他人的情感，而不是他自己的情感。
back_translation: The feelings he interprets through the five senses reflect the emotions of others, rather than his own emotions.

text: the major problem with windtalkers is that the bulk of the movie centers on the wrong character .
translation: 《风语者》的主要问题在于电影的大部分情节围绕着错误的角色展开。
back_translation: The main issue with "Windtalkers" is that much of the film's plot revolves around the wrong characters.

text: a strange film employing old home movies and newly shot footage in an effort to expose one hungarian family and their mutiple problems from the 1940s to current .
translation: 一部奇特的电影，结合了旧家庭电影和新拍摄的镜头，旨在揭示一个匈牙利家庭及其从1940年代到现在的多重问题。
back_translation: A unique film that combines old family footage with new shots, aiming to reveal a Hungarian family's multiple issues from the 1940s to the present.

text: wanker goths are on the loose ! run for your lives !
translation: 流浪的哥特青年出现了！快为自己的生命逃跑！
back_translation: The wandering goth youth has appeared! Hurry and run for your life!

text: 'murder by numbers ' is a psychological suspense-thriller that tells the story of a tenacious homicide detective , cassie mayweather ( sandra bullock ) and her new partner sam kennedy ( ben chaplin ) who become pitted against two malevolently brilliant young men ( ryan gosling and michael pitt ) in an ingenious battle of wits as they try to solve a murder case .
translation: 《数字谋杀》是一部心理悬疑惊悚片，讲述了一位顽强的 homicide侦探卡西·梅威瑟（桑德拉·布洛克 饰）和她的新搭档萨姆·肯尼迪（本·查普林 饰）在尝试解决一起谋杀案时，与两个恶意而聪明的年轻人（瑞安·高斯林和迈克尔·皮特 饰）之间展开的智斗。
back_translation: "Digital Murder" is a psychological suspense thriller that tells the story of a tenacious homicide detective, Cassie Mayweather (played by Sandra Bullock), and her new partner, Sam Kennedy (played by Ben Chaplin), as they engage in a battle of wits against two malicious and clever young men (played by Ryan Gosling and Michael Pitt) while trying to solve a murder case.

text: the story line follows how making the film transforms the life of an 18-year-old man hired as a driver on the production .
translation: 这个故事情节讲述了制作电影如何改变一名18岁男子的生活，他被聘为制作的司机。
back_translation: This storyline tells how making a film changes the life of an 18-year-old man who is hired as the production's driver.

text: two friends purchase a winning lottery ticket , only to have it stolen by a woman while she is robbing the cafe in which they are having lunch .
translation: 两个朋友购买了一张中奖的彩票，但在他们午餐时，一名女性抢劫咖啡馆时将彩票偷走。
back_translation: Two friends purchased a winning lottery ticket, but during their lunch, a woman stole the ticket while robbing the café.

text: beresford nicely mixes in as much humor as pathos to take us on his sentimental journey of the heart . it really is a shame that more wo n't get an opportunity to embrace small , sweet 'evelyn . '
translation: 贝雷斯福德巧妙地将幽默与深情交织在一起，带我们踏上他的心灵旅程。真可惜更多人无法有机会领略到小而甜美的“伊芙琳”。
back_translation: Beresford skillfully intertwines humor and deep emotion, taking us on a journey through his soul. It’s a pity that more people don’t have the opportunity to experience the small and sweet "Evelyn."

text: mexican crimelord beno gildemontes has stolen classified intelligence data .
translation: 墨西哥犯罪头目贝诺·吉尔德蒙特斯已窃取机密情报数据。
back_translation: Mexican crime boss Beno Gildemonte has stolen classified intelligence data.

text: the widow 's teenage daughter wants to be a professional gambler and she convinces her mother to date a british man whose new in town .
translation: 这位寡妇的 teenage 女儿想要成为一名职业赌徒，并说服她的母亲与一个新来到城里的英国人约会。
back_translation: The widow's teenage daughter wants to become a professional gambler and convinces her mother to date a newcomer from England.

text: in order to appease the lord of gods indra ( amitabh bachchan ) , custodian of rain , a grand fire sacrifice is being conducted at the palace under the guidance of the chief priest , paravasu ( jackie shroff ) .
translation: 为了安抚众神之主因陀罗（阿米特abh·巴奇汉），雨神，一场盛大的火祭正在在宫殿中进行，由首席祭司帕拉瓦苏（杰基·叔罗夫）指导。
back_translation: To appease Indra, the lord of the gods (Amitabh Bachchan), the rain god, a grand fire ritual is being held in the palace, led by the chief priest Paravasu (Jackie Shroff).

text: throughout all the tumult , a question comes to mind : so why is this so boring ?
translation: 在所有的动荡中，一个问题浮现心头：那么这为什么这么无聊？
back_translation: Amidst all the turmoil, one question arises: why is this so boring?

text: two young mormon missionaries wake up to find themselves evicted from the house , where they had been renting rooms from a now deceased widow .
translation: 两个年轻的摩门教传教士醒来发现自己被赶出了房子，他们曾在一位已故的寡妇那里租房间。
back_translation: Two young Mormon missionaries wake up to find themselves thrown out of the house where they had been renting a room from a deceased widow.

text: the values that have held the enterprise crew together through previous adventures and perils do so again-courage , self-sacrifice and patience under pressure .
translation: 在以往的冒险和危机中，曾将企业船员团结在一起的价值观再次发挥作用——勇气、自我牺牲和在压力下的耐心。
back_translation: In previous adventures and crises, the values that once united the crew of the enterprise are at play again—courage, self-sacrifice, and patience under pressure.

text: muccino seems to be exploring the idea of why human beings long for what they do n't have , and how this gets us in trouble . but even while his characters are acting horribly , he is always sympathetic .
translation: 穆奇诺似乎在探讨人类为什么渴望自己所没有的东西，以及这如何会给我们带来麻烦。但即使他的角色行为可怕，他总是表现出同情。
back_translation: Muccino seems to explore why humans desire what they do not have and how this can lead to trouble for us. But even when his characters' actions are terrible, he always shows compassion.

text: his older brother junnie offers to coach him on how to be a player , promising martin that within two weeks , she 'll be his .
translation: 他的哥哥俊尼主动提出指导他如何成为一个玩家，承诺马丁在两周内，她就会是他的。
back_translation: His brother Junni主动 offered to guide him on how to become a player, promising that in two weeks, Martin would be his.

text: at the beginning , the cast assembles for a seemingly traditional wedding shower .
translation: 一开始，演员们聚集在一起，举行一场看似传统的婚礼祝福派对。
back_translation: At the beginning, the actors gathered together to hold what seemed to be a traditional wedding blessing party.

text: feeling like a dope has rarely been more fun than it is in nine queens .
translation: 在《九女皇》中，感觉像个傻瓜的乐趣从未如此强烈。
back_translation: In "Nine Queens," the pleasure of feeling like a fool has never been so intense.

text: a sham construct based on theory , sleight-of-hand , and ill-wrought hypothesis .
translation: 一个基于理论、手法和拙劣假设的虚假构造。
back_translation: A false construct based on theory, methods, and crude assumptions.

text: with nothing to go on but his dreams and gut instinct , vince launches into his own search for ellen . . . or is he really searching for sara ?
translation: 仅凭他的梦想和直觉，文斯开始了自己寻找艾伦的旅程……或者说他实际上是在寻找萨拉？
back_translation: With just his dreams and instincts, Vince began his journey to find Allen... or was he actually looking for Sara?

text: . . . delivers few moments of inspiration amid the bland animation and simplistic story .
translation: ……在平淡的动画和简单的故事中几乎没有带来灵感的时刻。
back_translation: ...there are almost no inspiring moments in the plain animation and simple story.

text: terri ( eve ) is a hard-edged woman who ca n't seem to leave her two-timing boyfriend .
translation: 特丽（伊芙）是一个强硬的女人，她似乎无法离开她那个脚踏两只船的男朋友。
back_translation: Tilly (Eve) is a tough woman who seems unable to leave her boyfriend, who is straddling two boats.

text: before long , pazuzu , the demon from the movies , fully possesses the boy and father merrin is the only one who can stop pazuzu 's evil plan of world domination .
translation: 不久之后，电影中的恶魔帕祖祖完全占据了那个男孩，而梅林神父是唯一能够阻止帕祖祖邪恶的世界统治计划的人。
back_translation: Not long after, the demon Pazuzu completely took over the boy in the movie, and Father Merrin was the only one who could stop Pazuzu's evil plan for world domination.

text: to my taste , the film 's comic characters come perilously close to being amoses and andys for a new generation .
translation: 在我看来，这部电影的喜剧角色似乎危险地接近于为新一代创造的阿莫斯与安迪。
back_translation: In my opinion, the comedic characters in this movie seem dangerously close to the Amos and Andy created for a new generation.

text: whenever it threatens to get bogged down in earnest dramaturgy , a stirring visual sequence like a surge through swirling rapids or a leap from pinnacle to pinnacle rouses us . if horses could fly , this is surely what they 'd look like .
translation: 每当它威胁要陷入严肃的戏剧性时，一段鼓舞人心的视觉序列像是在翻滚的急流中激增或从一个高峰跃向另一个高峰一样唤醒我们。如果马能够飞，那它们肯定就是这样的模样。
back_translation: Whenever it threatens to plunge into serious drama, an inspiring visual sequence awakens us like a surge in a rushing current or a leap from one peak to another. If horses could fly, they would surely look like this.

text: caught in an intrigue of baby-snatching , a bounty hunter and diaper-changing , dave and ruby spend a hilarious , unexpected and wild night together .
translation: 在一场与婴儿绑架有关的阴谋中，赏金猎人和换尿布的达人戴夫与露比度过了一个搞笑、意外且疯狂的夜晚。
back_translation: In a plot related to a baby kidnapping, bounty hunter and diaper-changing expert Dave spends a funny, unexpected, and crazy night with Ruby.

text: as the girls begin to bond , laura gradually begins to find herself abandoning the safety of the fantasy and falling into her first real friendship .
translation: 随着女孩们开始建立联系，劳拉逐渐发现自己放弃了幻想的安全感，沉浸在她的第一段真正友谊中。
back_translation: As the girls began to connect, Laura gradually realized that she had given up the sense of security that her fantasies provided, immersing herself in her first real friendship.

text: a counterfeit 1000 tomin bank note is passed in a bazaar .
translation: 在集市上出现了一张伪造的1000托门银行钞票。
back_translation: A counterfeit 1000 Toman banknote appeared at the market.

text: this stuck pig of a movie flails limply between bizarre comedy and pallid horror .
translation: 这部糟糕的电影在荒诞的喜剧和乏味的恐怖之间无力地挣扎。
back_translation: This terrible movie struggles helplessly between absurd comedy and tedious horror.

text: paralyzed by the discovery he is only capable of leaving with a stupid excuse , trying to hide from ana the anguish that barely lets him breath .
translation: 因发现自己只能用一个愚蠢的借口来离开而感到瘫痪，试图向安娜掩饰那几乎让他无法呼吸的痛苦。
back_translation: Feeling paralyzed by the realization that he could only use a stupid excuse to leave, he tried to conceal the almost suffocating pain from Anna.

text: it seems that vince 's sister , sara , has shown up too , about 22 years after she was abducted and murdered .
translation: 看来文斯的姐姐萨拉也出现了，距离她被绑架和谋杀大约22年。
back_translation: It seems that Vince's sister Sara has also appeared, about 22 years after she was kidnapped and murdered.

text: despite the inexperience of the director and his cast , there 's rarely a false moment .
translation: 尽管导演和演员们缺乏经验，但几乎没有出现虚假的瞬间。
back_translation: Despite the lack of experience from the director and actors, there were almost no false moments.

text: absurdities and clichM-is accumulate like lint in a fat man 's navel .
translation: 荒谬与陈词滥调像肥胖男子肚脐里的绒毛一样积累。
back_translation: Absurdity and clichés accumulate like fluff in the belly button of an overweight man.

text: it 's all very cute , though not terribly funny if you 're more than six years old .
translation: 这一切都很可爱，但如果你超过六岁就不是特别搞笑了。
back_translation: It's all very cute, but it's not particularly funny if you're over six years old.

text: ca n't get enough of libidinous young city dwellers ? try this obscenely bad dark comedy , so crass that it makes edward burns ' sidewalks of new york look like oscar wilde .
translation: 有没有觉得对充满淫荡的年轻城市居民无法抵抗？试试这部极其糟糕的黑暗喜剧，它粗俗到让爱德华·伯恩斯的《纽约的街道》看起来像奥斯卡·王尔德的作品。
back_translation: Do you feel unable to resist the depraved young city dwellers? Try this extremely terrible dark comedy, which is so vulgar that it makes Edward Burns' "Street of New York" look like a work of Oscar Wilde.

text: but they 're also so much more , as you 'll find out in deborah dickson 's powerful and intimate documentary .
translation: 但它们还有更多，正如你在德博拉·迪克森强有力而亲密的纪录片中会发现的那样。
back_translation: But there is much more, as you will discover in Deborah Dickson's powerful and intimate documentary.

text: between bursts of automatic gunfire , the story offers a trenchant critique of capitalism .
translation: 在自动步枪喷火的间隙，这个故事对资本主义提出了尖锐的批评。
back_translation: In the gaps between the automatic rifle's gunfire, this story offers a sharp criticism of capitalism.

text: it will probably prove interesting to ram dass fans , but to others it may feel like a parody of the mellow , peace-and-love side of the '60s counterculture .
translation: 这可能对 رام داس 的粉丝来说会很有趣，但对其他人来说，这可能感觉像是对60年代反文化中那种温和、和平与爱情的一种讽刺。
back_translation: This might be interesting for fans of Ram Dass, but for others, it could feel like a satire of the mild, peace and love ethos of the 1960s counterculture.

text: jacki resolves to play this one last gig and then throw in the towel if she does not find success .
translation: 杰基决心再演这一场演出，如果没有成功就彻底放弃。
back_translation: Jackie is determined to perform this show again; if he doesn't succeed, he will give up entirely.

text: when max 's performance is no competition for producers ' nephews and bigger `` names , `` his only option is to cripple the competition - literally .
translation: 当马克斯的表演无法与制作人的侄子和更大“名人”竞争时，他唯一的选择就是用暴力削弱对手。
back_translation: When Max's performance couldn't compete with the producer's nephew and other larger "celebrities," his only option was to weaken his rivals with violence.

text: edi is wrongly accused of having raped the girl whose brothers have got the control over one of the city areas .
translation: 埃迪被错误指控强奸了一个女孩，而那个女孩的兄弟掌控着城市的一个区域。
back_translation: Eddie was falsely accused of raping a girl, and the girl's brother controls an area of the city.

text: lapd patrol officer trey sellars joined the force as a day job until his acting career took off .
translation: 洛杉矶警察局巡警特雷·塞拉斯加入警队作为一份日常工作，直到他的演艺事业腾飞。
back_translation: Los Angeles police officer Trey Seras joined the police force as a regular job until his acting career took off.

text: this formulaic chiller will do little to boost stallone 's career .
translation: 这部公式化的惊悚片对史泰龙的职业生涯几乎没有帮助。
back_translation: This formulaic thriller has done almost nothing to help Stallone's career.

text: provides the kind of 'laugh therapy ' i need from movie comedies -- offbeat humor , amusing characters , and a happy ending . after seeing 'analyze that , ' i feel better already .
translation: 提供我从电影喜剧中所需的那种“笑声疗法”——独特的幽默、有趣的角色和快乐的结局。在看完《分析一下》之后，我已经感觉好多了。
back_translation: Provide me with the kind of "laughter therapy" I need from comedy films—unique humor, interesting characters, and happy endings. I already feel much better after watching "Analyze This."

text: this roller coaster tale teams a young man , will turner , with an unlikely ally in rogue pirate jack sparrow .
translation: 这个过山车般的故事将年轻人威尔·特纳与不太可能的盟友、流浪海盗杰克·斯派罗搭档在一起。
back_translation: This rollercoaster-like story pairs young Will Turner with the unlikely ally, the wandering pirate Jack Sparrow.

text: of course , this is n't the best idea , since it involves sneaking into gun-nut carl 's house in the middle of the night .
translation: 当然，这并不是个好主意，因为这涉及在半夜潜入枪迷卡尔的家。
back_translation: Of course, this is not a good idea, as it involves sneaking into the gun enthusiast Carl's house in the middle of the night.

text: what if fate intervened and hitler was forced into hiding in post-war london ?
translation: 如果命运介入，希特勒被迫在战后伦敦藏匿，会怎么样呢？
back_translation: If fate intervened and Hitler was forced to hide in post-war London, what would happen?

text: i did n't find much fascination in the swinging . what they 're doing is a matter of plumbing arrangements and mind games , of no erotic or sensuous charge . but that they are doing it is thought-provoking .
translation: 我对这种摇摆并没有太多的兴趣。他们所做的只是管道安排和心理游戏，没有任何情色或感官的冲击。但他们在做这件事是值得思考的。
back_translation: I don't have much interest in this kind of swinging. What they do is just pipe arrangements and psychological games, with no erotic or sensory impact. But it is worth thinking about what they are doing.

text: an edgy indie-psychological drama about an alluring but mixed-up l . a . girl who flip-flops between facing life 's uncertainty under her own direction or `` the good life `` provided by a wealthy , disturbing middle-aged benefactor .
translation: 一部前卫的独立心理戏剧，讲述了一位迷人而复杂的洛杉矶女孩，她在面对生活的不确定性时摇摆不定，选择自己掌控生活的方向，还是接受一个富有且令人不安的中年恩人的“美好生活”。
back_translation: An avant-garde independent psychological drama that tells the story of a charming and complex Los Angeles girl who wavers in the face of life's uncertainties, deciding whether to take control of the direction of her life or to accept a "better life" offered by a wealthy and unsettling middle-aged benefactor.

text: as before , the resistance was able to send another t-800 as a protector for john , and its still a question of which one will reach him first . . .
translation: 与之前一样，抵抗组织能够派出另一台T-800作为约翰的保护者，而哪个会首先抵达他仍然是一个问题……
back_translation: As before, the resistance organization can send another T-800 as John's protector, but which one will arrive first remains a question...

text: when his only friend and co-worker dies , a young man born with dwarfism moves to an abandoned train depot in rural new jersey .
translation: 当他唯一的朋友和同事去世时，一个出生时有矮小症的年轻人搬到了新泽西州乡村一个废弃的火车站。
back_translation: When his only friend and colleague passed away, a young man born with dwarfism moved to an abandoned train station in the New Jersey countryside.

text: many have no physical sex lives , living instead in a world of romance with stars like james dean or audrey hepburn .
translation: 许多人没有现实中的性生活，而是生活在与詹姆斯·迪恩或奥黛丽·赫本等明星的浪漫世界中。
back_translation: Many people do not have a sex life in reality, but instead live in a romantic world with stars like James Dean or Audrey Hepburn.

text: he 's sixteen and lives with his younger sister , mother cheryl and her boyfriend john , in a modest house in bakersfield , california .
translation: 他十六岁，和他的妹妹、母亲谢丽尔以及她的男友约翰一起住在加利福尼亚州贝克斯菲尔德的一座普通房子里。
back_translation: He is sixteen years old and lives in a regular house in Bakersfield, California, with his younger sister, mother Cheryl, and her boyfriend John.

text: he seems impossible to stop as when the possessed guest is killed , murray passes into the killer to continue his mission of murdering all nine of them .
translation: 当被附身的客人被杀时，穆雷似乎无法被阻止，他转移到杀手身上，继续执行谋杀他们九个的任务。
back_translation: When the possessed guest was killed, Murray seemed unstoppable as he transferred to the killer and continued the mission to murder the nine of them.

text: to spite the hated infidel ways of her father , she has settled into a complacent relationship and is struggling ( not too hard ) with issues of fidelity to her kind but unexciting husband .
translation: 为了抵制她父亲那令人厌恶的异教徒方式，她已经安于一种自满的关系，并在与善良但无趣的丈夫之间的忠诚问题上苦苦挣扎（但并没有太努力）。
back_translation: In order to resist her father's odious pagan ways, she has settled into a complacent relationship and struggles with the loyalty issue between her kind but dull husband (though not putting in too much effort).

text: willy , on impulse , takes her captive and murders her .
translation: 威利出于冲动，绑架了她并杀了她。
back_translation: Willy acted on impulse, kidnapped her, and killed her.

text: the tone shifts abruptly from tense to celebratory to soppy .
translation: 语调突然从紧张转变为庆祝再到感伤。
back_translation: The tone suddenly shifted from tense to celebratory and then to sentimental.

text: the story follows a visit to bobby by his mother .
translation: 这个故事讲述了他的母亲拜访博比的经过。
back_translation: This story describes the process of his mother visiting Bobby.

text: 'you 'll laugh for not quite and hour and a half , but come out feeling strangely unsatisfied . you 'll feel like you ate a reeses without the peanut butter . . . '
translation: “你会笑大约一个半小时，但出来时感到奇怪的不满足。你会觉得就像吃了一块没有花生酱的瑞士糖。”
back_translation: "You will laugh for about an hour and a half, but come out feeling strangely unsatisfied. You will feel as if you have eaten a piece of Swiss chocolate without peanut butter."

text: as a young man , walter t . shaw jr . saw his father go unaccredited for his remarkable work and set out on his ironically celebrated career in crime .
translation: 作为一名年轻人，沃尔特·T·肖 Jr. 看到他的父亲因出色的工作未得到认可，因此踏上了他讽刺地备受瞩目的犯罪生涯。
back_translation: As a young man, Walter T. Shaw Jr. embarked on his ironically attention-grabbing criminal career after witnessing his father go unrecognized for his outstanding work.

text: if the last man were the last movie left on earth , there would be a toss-up between presiding over the end of cinema as we know it and another night of delightful hand shadows .
translation: 如果最后一个人是地球上最后一部电影，那么在主持我们所知的电影结束和另一个愉快的手影之夜之间将会有一个抉择。
back_translation: If the last person is the last movie on Earth, then there will be a choice between the end of the movies we know and another delightful shadow play night.

text: but early on there are signs of trouble , and lena is prey to suspicions no one else need consider : a new face may be a new kid in town-or a face from the grave .
translation: 但早期就有麻烦的迹象，莱娜遭遇了只有她需要考虑的怀疑：一个新面孔可能是城里的新孩子，也可能是来自坟墓的面孔。
back_translation: However, there were early signs of trouble, as Lena faced a suspicion that only she needed to consider: a new face could be the new kid in town, or it could be a face from the grave.

text: shanghai ghetto may not be as dramatic as roman polanski 's the pianist , but its compassionate spirit soars every bit as high .
translation: 上海孤儿区或许没有罗曼·波兰斯基的《钢琴家》那样戏剧化，但它的同情精神同样高昂。
back_translation: The Shanghai Orphan District may not be as dramatic as Roman Polanski's "The Pianist," but its spirit of compassion is equally high.

text: in an isolated town named raccoon city , the largest corporate supplier of healthcare , medical supplies , and defense technology has a secret research facility located half a mile underground called the hive .
translation: 在一个名为洛克人市的偏远小镇上，最大的一家医疗保健、医疗用品和国防技术的企业供应商拥有一个位于地下半英里处的秘密研究设施，称为“蜂巢”。
back_translation: In a remote small town named Rockman City, the largest supplier of healthcare, medical supplies, and defense technology has a secret research facility located half a mile underground, called "The Hive."

text: it 's a shame that pokemon 4ever 's dialogue is so trite and flatly delivered because the tale itself presents serious ideas worthy of more poetic language .
translation: 《宝可梦：永恒》中的对话如此陈腐和平淡，真让人遗憾，因为故事本身提出了值得更具诗意语言的严肃思想。
back_translation: The dialogues in "Pokémon: Eternity" are so clichéd and bland, which is truly regrettable, as the story itself presents serious thoughts that deserve more poetic language.

text: tor loves jessica but his life has got stuck in a rut .
translation: 托尔爱杰西卡，但他的生活陷入了困境。
back_translation: Tor loves Jessica, but his life is in turmoil.

text: an interview with rick rescorla , head of security for morgan stanley dean witter , filmed in his office on the 44th floor of the world trade center in 1998 .
translation: 1998年，在世界贸易中心44楼的办公室内，对摩根士丹利·迪恩·维特证券公司安全负责人瑞克·雷斯科拉进行了采访。
back_translation: In 1998, an interview was conducted with Rick Rescorla, the head of security for Morgan Stanley Dean Witter Securities, in an office on the 44th floor of the World Trade Center.

text: bittersweet comedy/drama full of life , hand gestures , and some really adorable italian guys .
translation: bittersweet喜剧/Drama充满生活，手势，还有一些非常可爱的意大利男孩。
back_translation: Bittersweet comedy/drama filled with life, gestures, and some very lovely Italian boys.

text: a beyond-lame satire , teddy bears ' picnic ranks among the most pitiful directing debuts by an esteemed writer-actor .
translation: 一部极其无趣的讽刺作品，《泰迪熊的野餐》在著名编剧兼演员的导演处女作中名列最悲惨之列。
back_translation: An extremely uninteresting satirical work, "Ted's Picnic" ranks among the most tragic in the directorial debut of a renowned screenwriter and actor.

text: but her stepmother bitch was to ruin it all .
translation: 但她的继母就是想毁掉这一切。
back_translation: But her stepmother just wanted to destroy it all.

text: . . . the whole thing succeeded only in making me groggy .
translation: ……整个事情只让我感到昏昏欲睡。
back_translation: ...the whole thing just makes me feel drowsy.

text: its salient points are simultaneously buried , drowned and smothered in the excesses of writer-director roger avary .
translation: 其显著之处同时被编剧兼导演罗杰·艾弗里的大量夸张掩埋、淹没和窒息。
back_translation: Its notable aspects are buried, submerged, and suffocated by the excessive exaggeration of writer and director Roger Avary.

text: . . . a boring parade of talking heads and technical gibberish that will do little to advance the linux cause .
translation: ......一场无聊的谈话头和技术术语的游行，对推进Linux事业几乎没有帮助。
back_translation: ...a boring conversation filled with technical jargon, which has hardly contributed to advancing the Linux cause.

text: but zamindar narayan mukherjee ( vijay crishna ) , devdas ' father , met paro 's mother sumitra 's ( kiran kher ) marriage proposal with condescending arrogance .
translation: 但是扎敏达尔纳扬·穆克吉（维贾伊·克里希纳）——德夫达斯的父亲，以居高临下的傲慢态度对待帕罗的母亲苏米特拉（基兰·凯尔）的婚姻提议。
back_translation: However, Zamin Dar Nayan Mukherjee (Vijay Krishna), Devdas's father, treated the marriage proposal of Paro's mother Sumitra (Kiran Kher) with a condescending arrogance.

text: it 's hard not to like a film that has sky divers jumping out of helicopters to catch flying dragons in a big net .
translation: 很难不喜欢一部让跳伞者从直升机跳下去，用大网捕捉飞龙的电影。
back_translation: It's hard not to like a movie that has skydivers jumping out of a helicopter to catch flying dragons with a giant net.

text: an endearingly offbeat romantic comedy with a great meet-cute gimmick .
translation: 一部惹人喜爱的别致浪漫喜剧，带有一个精彩的偶然相遇元素。
back_translation: A charming and stylish romantic comedy featuring a splendid element of a chance encounter.

text: it is supremely unfunny and unentertaining to watch middle-age and older men drink to excess , piss on trees , b . s . one another and put on a show in drag .
translation: 看中年及老年男人过量饮酒、在树上撒尿、互相夸夸其谈以及穿着女装表演，实在是无聊至极且毫无娱乐性。
back_translation: Watching middle-aged and elderly men excessively drinking, urinating on trees, boasting to each other, and performing in women's clothing is incredibly boring and has no entertainment value whatsoever.

text: a brutal and funny work . nicole holofcenter , the insightful writer/director responsible for this illuminating comedy does n't wrap the proceedings up neatly but the ideas tie together beautifully .
translation: 一部残酷而幽默的作品。尼科尔·霍洛夫赛特，这位富有洞察力的编剧/导演，负责这部启发性的喜剧，她并没有将事情完美地收尾，但这些思想却巧妙地结合在一起。
back_translation: A brutal yet humorous piece of work. Nicole Holofcener, the insightful writer/director behind this inspiring comedy, doesn't tie things up perfectly, yet these thoughts are cleverly interwoven.

text: it 's like every bad idea that 's ever gone into an after-school special compiled in one place , minus those daytime programs ' slickness and sophistication ( and who knew they even had any ? ) .
translation: 这就像是所有曾经出现在课后特别节目中的糟糕主意都集中在一个地方，缺少了那些白天节目所具备的光鲜和精致（谁知道它们竟然还有这些？）。
back_translation: It's like all the bad ideas that have ever appeared in after-school specials are concentrated in one place, lacking the polish and refinement that daytime shows possess (who knew they actually had these?).

text: when sara ( elizabeth hurley ) is served divorce papers while she is in new york , she is stunned .
translation: 当萨拉（伊丽莎白·赫利）在纽约收到离婚文件时，她感到震惊。
back_translation: When Sarah (Elizabeth Hurley) receives divorce papers in New York, she is shocked.

text: whenever you think you 've figured out late marriage , it throws you for a loop .
translation: 每当你觉得自己明白了晚婚的问题，它总是会让你感到困惑。
back_translation: Whenever you think you understand the issue of late marriage, it always leaves you feeling perplexed.

text: the overall result is an intelligent , realistic portrayal of testing boundaries .
translation: 总体结果是对测试边界的智能且现实的描绘。
back_translation: The overall result is an intelligent and realistic depiction of the testing boundaries.

text: they wander around japan in panda outfits , wreak havoc on a once civilized golf court , they even do stunts involving live alligators , and so on .
translation: 他们穿着熊猫服在日本游荡，在曾经文明的高尔夫球场上制造混乱，甚至还进行涉及活鳄鱼的特技表演，等等。
back_translation: They wandered around Japan wearing panda costumes, creating chaos on the once-civilized golf course, and even performing stunts involving live crocodiles, among other things.

text: 4 friends , 2 couples , 2000 miles , and all the pabst blue ribbon beer they can drink - it 's the ultimate redneck road-trip .
translation: 四个朋友，两对情侣，2000英里，还有他们能喝的所有巴布斯蓝带啤酒——这是终极的红脖公路之旅。
back_translation: Four friends, two couples, 2000 miles, and all the Bub's Blue Ribbon beer they can drink—that's the ultimate redneck road trip.

text: it 's a decent glimpse into a time period , and an outcast , that is no longer accessible , but it does n't necessarily shed more light on its subject than the popular predecessor .
translation: 这是一段对一个不再可接触的时期和一个被排斥者的不错洞察，但它并不一定比前作更深入地揭示其主题。
back_translation: This is a good insight into a time that is no longer accessible and a person who is excluded, but it does not necessarily reveal its themes more deeply than the previous work.

text: a sweet , tender sermon about a 12-year-old welsh boy more curious about god than girls , who learns that believing in something does matter .
translation: 一篇甜美而温柔的讲道，讲述一个12岁的威尔士男孩，他对上帝的好奇心超过了对女孩的兴趣，最终明白相信某种事物是很重要的。
back_translation: A sweet and gentle sermon telling the story of a 12-year-old Welsh boy whose curiosity about God surpassed his interest in girls, and ultimately came to understand the importance of believing in something.

text: when danny 's beloved grandfather dies , does his greed overcome his love ?
translation: 当丹尼心爱的祖父去世时，他的贪婪是否战胜了他的爱？
back_translation: When Danny's beloved grandfather passed away, did his greed triumph over his love?

text: three mischevious employees ( paulo costanzo , woody harrelson , alicia silverstone ) of a bank in a small deserted town all make plans to rob at the same time , however none of them knows about the others .
translation: 三名顽皮的员工（保罗·科斯坦佐、伍迪·哈里尔森、艾丽西亚·西尔维斯通）在一个偏僻小镇上的银行，同时计划抢劫，但他们并不知道彼此的计划。
back_translation: Three mischievous employees (Paul Constantzo, Woody Harrelson, Alicia Silverstone) in a remote town's bank simultaneously plan a robbery, but they are unaware of each other's plans.

text: the performances are strong , though the subject matter demands acting that borders on hammy at times .
translation: 演出很出色，尽管题材有时要求的表演接近夸张。
back_translation: The performance was outstanding, although the material sometimes required an almost exaggerated style of acting.

text: borstal boy represents the worst kind of filmmaking , the kind that pretends to be passionate and truthful but is really frustratingly timid and soggy .
translation: 《少年教养院的男孩》代表了最糟糕的电影制作，这种电影假装充满激情和真实，但实际上令人沮丧地胆怯和乏味。
back_translation: "The Boy from the Juvenile Reform School" represents the worst in filmmaking, pretending to be full of passion and authenticity while actually being frustratingly timid and dull.

text: there 's something about a marching band that gets me where i live .
translation: 有一种军乐队让我感同身受。
back_translation: There is a military band that resonates with me.

text: one of those rare films that seems as though it was written for no one , but somehow manages to convince almost everyone that it was put on the screen , just for them .
translation: 其中一部稀有的电影，似乎是为谁都不是而创作的，但不知怎么地，却能让几乎所有人相信这部电影就是专门为他们呈现的。
back_translation: One rare film seems to have been made for no one in particular, yet somehow manages to make almost everyone believe that it was specifically created for them.

text: to confirm his worst fears , thomas sprints outside and discovers that it is not just a terrible dream - his vision may never be the same .
translation: 为了确认他最糟糕的恐惧，托马斯冲出门外，发现这不仅仅是一个可怕的梦——他的视力可能永远都不会再一样。
back_translation: To confirm his worst fear, Thomas rushed out the door, only to discover that this was not just a terrible dream—his vision might never be the same again.

text: two tedious acts light on great scares and a good surprise ending .
translation: 两个乏味的行为，大量的惊吓和一个好的惊喜结局。
back_translation: Two boring actions, a lot of scares, and a good surprise ending.

text: for sokurov , the hermitage -- home to generations of romonovs and repository of so much russian history -- is the ark of the russian soul , guarding it affectionately until the world sees better days .
translation: 对于索库罗夫来说，艾尔米塔什博物馆——是历代罗曼诺夫王朝的家园，也是如此多俄罗斯历史的宝库——是俄罗斯灵魂的方舟，深情地守护着它，直到世界迎来更美好的日子。
back_translation: For Sokurov, the Hermitage Museum - the home of the Romanov dynasty through the ages and a treasure trove of so much Russian history - is the ark of the Russian soul, tenderly guarding it until the world welcomes better days.

text: a dopey movie clothed in excess layers of hipness .
translation: 一部被过度时髦外衣包裹的傻乎乎的电影。
back_translation: A silly movie wrapped in an overly trendy exterior.

text: it almost feels as if the movie is more interested in entertaining itself than in amusing us .
translation: 这部电影似乎更关心自我娱乐，而不是取悦我们。
back_translation: This movie seems more concerned with self-entertainment rather than pleasing us.

text: unfortunately , a cast of competent performers from movies , television and the theater are cast adrift in various new york city locations with no unifying rhythm or visual style .
translation: 不幸的是，一群来自电影、电视和戏剧的优秀演员在纽约市的不同地点被抛弃，没有统一的节奏或视觉风格。
back_translation: Unfortunately, a group of excellent actors from film, television, and theater has been discarded at different locations in New York City, lacking a unified rhythm or visual style.

text: jack valento has the goods on the da and casts a mean shadow over his hand-picked micro-community of indentured employees .
translation: 杰克·瓦伦托掌握着关于地区检察官的资料，并对他精心挑选的契约雇员小社区施加了严厉的影响。
back_translation: Jack Valento has control over information about the district attorney and exerts a strong influence on his carefully selected contract employees in the small community.

text: the truly independent film , the after school special , was a simple story that said so much and touched people in so many ways .
translation: 真正独立的电影《放学后的特别节目》是一个简单的故事，却传达了许多深意，深深打动了人们的心。
back_translation: The truly independent film "After School Special" tells a simple story, yet conveys profound meanings that deeply touch people's hearts.

text: strong filmmaking requires a clear sense of purpose , and in that oh-so-important category , the four feathers comes up short .
translation: 强有力的电影制作需要清晰的目标，而在这个至关重要的类别中，《四根羽毛》显得不足。
back_translation: Strong filmmaking requires clear goals, and in this crucial category, "Four Feathers" appears to fall short.

text: charly comes off as emotionally manipulative and sadly imitative of innumerable past love story derisions .
translation: 查理给人的感觉是情感操控，令人遗憾地模仿了无数过去爱情故事的嘲讽。
back_translation: Charlie gives the impression of emotional manipulation, regrettably mimicking the satire of countless past love stories.

text: the you-are-there style ultimately enhances abc africa 's ability to get inside the soul of uganda , and of the viewer .
translation: 你在场的风格最终增强了abc africa深入乌干达及观众灵魂的能力。
back_translation: The style you bring enhances abc africa's ability to delve deeply into Uganda and the soul of its audience.

text: thus , it is only natural that kyle begins a steady decline towards becoming one of the monsters he despises .
translation: 因此，凯尔开始稳定地走向他所厌恶的怪物之一，这完全是自然的。
back_translation: Therefore, Kyle began to steadily walk toward one of the monsters he hated, which was completely natural.

text: as his agent pushes him to be bigger , and valerie , the bakery owner , adds a surprise of her own , stan begins to strain under the pressures of mass production while simultaneously trying to create hand painted masterpieces . . .
translation: 当他的经纪人鼓励他变得更出色，而面包店老板瓦莱丽也增添了她自己的惊喜时，斯坦在大规模生产的压力下开始感到吃力，同时还试图创作手工绘制的杰作……
back_translation: As his agent encourages him to excel, and the bakery owner Valerie adds her own surprises, Stan begins to feel the strain under the pressure of mass production while also trying to create hand-painted masterpieces...

text: documentary about brazil 's best surfers , doing their thing on the best beaches around the world , located in hawaii , indonesia , brazil , south africa and california .
translation: 关于巴西最佳冲浪者的纪录片，他们在世界各地的最佳海滩上展示自己的技能，这些地方包括夏威夷、印度尼西亚、巴西、南非和加利福尼亚。
back_translation: A documentary about the best surfers in Brazil showcasing their skills on the best beaches around the world, including Hawaii, Indonesia, Brazil, South Africa, and California.

text: based on nick hornby 's popular british novel , about a boy is a comedy-drama starring hugh grant as will , a rich , child-free and irresponsible londoner in his thirties who , in search of available women , invents an imaginary son and starts attending single parent meetings .
translation: 根据尼克·霍恩比的热门英国小说，《一个男孩》是一部喜剧-drama，主演是休·格兰特，他饰演威尔，一个富有、无小孩且不负责任的伦敦三十多岁男人。为了寻找可以交往的女性，他虚构了一个想象中的儿子，并开始参加单亲父母会议。
back_translation: Based on Nick Hornby's popular British novel, "About a Boy" is a comedy-drama starring Hugh Grant as Will, a wealthy, childless, and irresponsible man in his thirties living in London. In order to find women to date, he invents an imaginary son and starts attending single parent meetings.

text: together , miller , kuras and the actresses make personal velocity into an intricate , intimate and intelligent journey .
translation: 米勒、库拉斯和那些女演员共同将《个人速度》变成了一段复杂、亲密且智慧的旅程。
back_translation: Miller, Kuras, and those actresses collectively turned "Personal Speed" into a complex, intimate, and insightful journey.

text: i do n't think this movie loves women at all .
translation: 我认为这部电影根本不好女性。
back_translation: I don't think this movie is good for women at all.

text: the pace and the visuals are so hyped up that a curious sense of menace informs everything .
translation: 这种节奏和视觉效果的激昂让人觉得一股好奇的威胁感 permeates 一切。
back_translation: This exhilarating rhythm and visual effect gives a curious sense of threat that permeates everything.

text: a broad , melodramatic estrogen opera that 's pretty toxic in its own right .
translation: 一部广泛、情感丰富的雌激素歌剧，本身就相当有毒。
back_translation: A sweeping, emotionally rich estrogen opera that is quite toxic in itself.

text: delia is a spirited , working-class woman from a small town in new york who leaves her abusive husband and sets out on a journey to reclaim the power she has lost .
translation: 德莉娅是来自纽约一个小镇的充满活力的工人阶级女性，她离开了虐待她的丈夫，开始了一段旅程，去重拾她失去的力量。
back_translation: Delia is a vibrant working-class woman from a small town in New York. She leaves her abusive husband and embarks on a journey to reclaim her lost strength.

text: jim and michelle are getting married , and need to do it quickly because jim 's grandmother is sick and wants to see jim walk down the aisle .
translation: 吉姆和米歇尔要结婚，并且需要尽快进行，因为吉姆的奶奶生病了，想要看到吉姆走入婚姻殿堂。
back_translation: Jim and Michelle are getting married, and they need to do it soon because Jim's grandmother is sick and wants to see Jim enter the marriage hall.

text: it just might all be bearable , somehow possible to live through , if it were n't for those damned 'monsters ' that keep trying to kill him .
translation: 如果不是那些该死的“怪物”不断试图杀死他，这一切或许都可以忍受，也许还能活下去。
back_translation: If it weren't for those damn "monsters" constantly trying to kill him, perhaps all of this could be endured, and maybe he could survive.

text: fessenden continues to do interesting work , and it would be nice to see what he could make with a decent budget . but the problem with wendigo , for all its effective moments , is n't really one of resources .
translation: 费辛登继续做有趣的工作，如果他能有一个合理的预算，那就更好了。不过，关于《温迪戈》，尽管它有许多有效的时刻，但问题并不在于资源。
back_translation: Feixindeng continues to do interesting work, and it would be even better if he had a reasonable budget. However, regarding "Wendigo," although it has many effective moments, the problem does not lie in the resources.

text: will you go ape over this movie ? well , it probably wo n't have you swinging from the trees hooting it 's praises , but it 's definitely worth taking a look .
translation: 你会对这部电影疯狂吗？好吧，它可能不会让你像猩猩一样从树上荡下来大声称赞，但绝对值得一看。
back_translation: Will you go crazy over this movie? Well, it might not make you swing down from the trees like a gorilla to shout its praises, but it is definitely worth watching.

text: ruled by instant gratification and material desires , they plot to steal a napoleon collection from one of their parents ' homes .
translation: 被即时满足和物质欲望所驱动，他们策划从父母的家中盗取一套拿破仑收藏。
back_translation: Driven by instant gratification and material desires, they planned to steal a collection of Napoleon memorabilia from their parents' home.

text: an improvement on the feeble examples of big-screen poke-mania that have preceded it .
translation: 比之前那些软弱的大屏幕宝可梦热潮的例子有了显著改善。
back_translation: There has been a significant improvement compared to the previous examples of the weak big-screen Pokémon craze.

text: the plot has a number of holes , and at times it 's simply baffling .
translation: 情节有许多漏洞，有时简直令人困惑。
back_translation: The plot has many loopholes and is sometimes downright confusing.

text: edgar gets wind inez is up to something and blows his cool , beating her and making her a prisoner in their own home .
translation: 埃德加察觉到伊内兹在策划什么，失去了冷静，殴打她并把她囚禁在他们的家中。
back_translation: Edgar sensed that Inez was plotting something, lost his composure, beat her, and imprisoned her in their home.

text: taken seriously , it 's not much to think about , but taken as a dirtier version of other girlie films . . . it 's at least entertaining and sexy fun .
translation: 认真对待的话，这并没有太多可思考的，但是作为其他女孩电影的更肮脏的版本来看……至少它是有趣且性感的乐趣。
back_translation: If taken seriously, there isn't much to think about, but viewed as a dirtier version of other girl movies... at least it is fun and sexy entertainment.

text: bM-iart and berling are both superb , while huppert . . . is magnificent .
translation: bM-iart和berling都非常出色，而huppert则是辉煌的。
back_translation: bM-iart and berling are both outstanding, while huppert is brilliant.

text: after five years of research and shooting , this unique film is now completed .
translation: 经过五年的研究和拍摄，这部独特的影片现在已经完成。
back_translation: After five years of research and filming, this unique film is now complete.

text: in the pianist , polanski is saying what he has long wanted to say , confronting the roots of his own preoccupations and obsessions , and he allows nothing to get in the way .
translation: 在《钢琴家》中，波兰斯基表达了他长期以来想要说的话，面对自己困扰和痴迷的根源，并且不让任何事情妨碍他。
back_translation: In "The Pianist," Polanski expresses what he has long wanted to say, confronting the roots of his troubles and obsessions, and not allowing anything to hinder him.

text: in imax in short , it 's just as wonderful on the big screen .
translation: 在IMAX上，简而言之，在大屏幕上同样精彩。
back_translation: In IMAX, in short, it's just as spectacular on the big screen.

text: aloof and lacks any real raw emotion , which is fatal for a film that relies on personal relationships .
translation: 冷漠，缺乏真正的原始情感，这对于一部依赖个人关系的电影来说是致命的。
back_translation: Indifference and a lack of genuine primitive emotions can be fatal for a film that relies on personal relationships.

text: a member of a vigilante group , fields decides to go undercover with a hidden camera and cross with a group of undocumented immigrants .
translation: 作为一个义警组织的成员，菲尔兹决定隐身潜入，带着隐藏的摄像机与一群无证移民接触。
back_translation: As a member of a volunteer police organization, Fields decided to go undercover, approaching a group of undocumented immigrants while carrying a hidden camera.

text: she 's saving money for a ticket to rome to get out of her life and visit an italian with whom she had a one night stand several months ago .
translation: 她正在攒钱买去罗马的票，想逃离自己的生活，去见几个月前和她发生过一夜情的意大利人。
back_translation: She is saving money to buy a ticket to Rome, wanting to escape her life and meet the Italian man she had a one-night stand with a few months ago.

text: director jay russell weighs down his capricious fairy-tale with heavy sentiment and lightweight meaning .
translation: 导演杰伊·拉塞尔使他那不拘一格的童话变得沉重，情感浓烈而意义浅薄。
back_translation: Director Jay Russell turns his unconventional fairy tale into something heavy, with intense emotions but shallow meaning.

text: tsai ming-liang 's ghosts are painfully aware of their not-being .
translation: 蔡明亮的幽灵痛苦地意识到他们的不存在。
back_translation: Cinematic ghosts painfully realize their own non-existence.

text: big fat liar is little more than home alone raised to a new , self-deprecating level .
translation: 《大胖骗子》不过是《小鬼当家》提升到一种新的、自我贬低的层次。
back_translation: "The Big Fat Liar" is just a new, self-deprecating level of "Home Alone."

text: a woozy , roisterous , exhausting mess , and the off-beat casting of its two leads turns out to be as ill-starred as you might expect .
translation: 一个迷糊、嘈杂、令人疲惫的乱局，而两位主角的非传统选角果然如你所料般不幸。
back_translation: A confusing, noisy, and exhausting mess, and the unconventional casting of the two protagonists indeed turned out to be unfortunate as you expected.

text: it has something of the aura of four weddings and a funeral about it , mixed in with a bit of bridget jones 's diary , but the movie 's just too different , too risky for huge popularity .
translation: 它有些像《四个婚礼和一个葬礼》的气息，混合了一点《布里奇特·琼斯的日记》的元素，但这部电影实在是太不同了，对大众来说太冒险，无法获得巨大的流行。
back_translation: It has a bit of the vibe of "Four Weddings and a Funeral," mixed with some elements of "Bridget Jones's Diary," but this movie is really very different, too risky for the public to achieve huge popularity.

text: an indelible and ultimately moving vision of humanity buffeted by the elements and by international political tides .
translation: 一种无法磨灭且最终感人的人类景象，被自然元素和国际政治潮流所冲击。
back_translation: An indelible and ultimately moving human scene, shattered by natural elements and international political currents.

text: during the course of the night each of the friends comes to terms with their lives and relationships and how they are not whom they thought each other was .
translation: 在夜间，朋友们逐渐面对自己的生活和关系，意识到他们并不是彼此想象中的那个人。
back_translation: At night, friends gradually confront their own lives and relationships, realizing that they are not the person each other had imagined.

text: the stakes are high and the characters have to face their fears , their futures and their fellow grads as the game , and their lives , advance towards the climactic ending .
translation: 赌注很高，角色们必须面对他们的恐惧、未来和同学，随着游戏和他们的生活朝着高潮结局发展。
back_translation: The stakes are high, and the characters must confront their fears, their futures, and their classmates, as the game and their lives build towards a climactic conclusion.

text: this sensitive , smart , savvy , compelling coming-of-age drama delves into the passive-aggressive psychology of co-dependence and the struggle for self-esteem .
translation: 这部敏感、聪明、精明、引人入胜的成长剧深入探讨了共依存的被动攻击心理和自尊心的斗争。
back_translation: This sensitive, smart, shrewd, and captivating coming-of-age drama delves into the struggles of passive-aggressive psychology in codependency and self-esteem.

text: the film focuses on the relationships between each of the four people and what happens when an affair takes place between two of them who are not married to each other and logically betraying the two remaining characters .
translation: 这部电影聚焦于四个人之间的关系，以及当其中两个未婚的人发生婚外情时所发生的事情，这在逻辑上背叛了其他两个角色。
back_translation: This movie focuses on the relationships between four people and what happens when two of the unmarried individuals have an affair, which logically betrays the other two characters.

text: through trial and failures , she teaches him to use the power of eternal souls to solve both his professional and personal problems .
translation: 通过尝试和失败，她教他使用永恒灵魂的力量来解决他的职业和个人问题。
back_translation: Through trial and error, she taught him to harness the power of the eternal soul to solve his professional and personal issues.

text: impossible as it may sound , this film 's heart is even more embracing than monty , if only because it accepts nasty behavior and severe flaws as part of the human condition .
translation: 尽管听起来不可能，这部电影的核心比《蒙提·派森》更加包容，原因在于它将恶劣行为和严重缺陷视为人性的一部分。
back_translation: Although it sounds impossible, the core of this film is more inclusive than "Monty Python," as it views bad behavior and serious flaws as part of being human.

text: my oh my , is this an invigorating , electric movie .
translation: 哎呀，这真是一部振奋人心、引人入胜的电影。
back_translation: Oh, this is really an inspiring and captivating movie.

text: the latest vapid actor 's exercise to appropriate the structure of arthur schnitzler 's reigen .
translation: 最新的平庸演员挑选亚瑟·施尼茨勒的《圆舞曲》的结构进行改编。
back_translation: The latest mediocre actors are adapting the structure of Arthur Schnitzler's "La Ronde."

text: in stunning color film noir , with munich germany , as the backdrop , this is the amazing story of one man and one woman against the odds .
translation: 在令人惊叹的彩色黑色电影中，以德国慕尼黑为背景，这是一个关于一男一女逆境而战的惊人故事。
back_translation: Set against the backdrop of Munich, Germany, this is an amazing story of a man and a woman fighting against adversity in a stunning color black movie.

text: nM-co encanta como 'o rei leM-co ' nem diverte como 'a nova onda do imperador ' , mas ao menos nM-co cansa como 'atlantis : o reino perdido ' .
translation: nM-co迷人，如同《国王的迷雾》，也不像《皇帝的新衣》那样有趣，但至少nM-co不像《亚特兰蒂斯：失落的王国》那样让人疲倦。
back_translation: nM-co is charming, like "The King's Speech," but not as interesting as "The Emperor's New Clothes." At least nM-co is not as tiring as "Atlantis: The Lost Empire."

text: too sincere to exploit its subjects and too honest to manipulate its audience .
translation: 太真诚而无法剥削其主题，太诚实而无法操控其观众。
back_translation: Too sincere to exploit its subject, too honest to manipulate its audience.

text: only a little later , johnathan 's life is already in extreme danger as well as those of his friends and teammates .
translation: 仅仅过了一小会儿，约翰逊的生活已经处于极大的危险之中，他的朋友和队友也是如此。
back_translation: In just a short while, Johnson's life was already in great danger, as were his friends and teammates.

text: for those who are intrigued by politics of the '70s , the film is every bit as fascinating as it is flawed .
translation: 对于那些对70年代政治感兴趣的人来说，这部电影既迷人又有缺陷。
back_translation: For those interested in the politics of the 1970s, this film is both fascinating and flawed.

text: the whole thing feels like a ruse , a tactic to cover up the fact that the picture is constructed around a core of flimsy -- or , worse yet , nonexistent -- ideas .
translation: 整个事情感觉像是一个伎俩，一个掩盖事实的策略，事实是这幅画是围绕着一些脆弱的想法构建的，或者更糟糕的是，根本没有想法。
back_translation: The whole thing feels like a trick, a strategy to cover up the facts, which are that this painting is built around some fragile ideas, or worse, no ideas at all.

text: mickey kilpatrick is the sweet-natured superintendent of their building , whose loopy dreams of becoming a professional bowler are met with only derision and confusion by his father sean .
translation: 米奇·基尔帕特里克是他们大楼的和蔼可亲的管理员，他渴望成为职业保龄球选手的疯狂梦想只收到了父亲肖恩的嘲讽和困惑。
back_translation: Mickey Kilpatrick is the friendly building manager who has a crazy dream of becoming a professional bowler, which only received mockery and confusion from his father, Sean.

text: that dogged good will of the parents and 'vain ' jia 's defoliation of ego , make the film touching despite some doldrums .
translation: 父母那执着的善意和“虚荣”的贾对自我的剥离，使得这部电影在一些低谷中依然感人。
back_translation: The parents' unwavering kindness and Jia's "vanity" of self-estrangement make this film moving even during its lows.

text: well-shot but badly written tale set in a future ravaged by dragons .
translation: 拍摄精良但剧本糟糕的故事，背景设定在一个被 dragons 荒废的未来。
back_translation: A well-shot story with a terrible script, set in a future ravaged by dragons.

text: the woods have n't been this creepy since the blair witch project .
translation: 自《宾虚女巫》以来，树林就没有这么阴森了。
back_translation: Since "The Witch of Ben-Hur," the woods have never been so eerie.

text: . . . devastatingly direct to the heart of the matter , demonstrating that there is no easy walk toward peace in a region with such strong conflicting traditions
translation: . . . 直指问题核心，展示在一个存在如此强烈冲突传统的地区，通往和平的道路并不容易。
back_translation: ... directly pointing to the core of the issue, demonstrating that in a region with such strong conflicting traditions, the path to peace is not easy.

text: everything that 's worthwhile about collision course can already be seen on television .
translation: 关于《碰撞轨迹》的所有值得一提之处都可以在电视上看到。
back_translation: All noteworthy aspects of "Collision Course" can be seen on television.

text: shiner can certainly go the distance , but is n't world championship material
translation: 闪光者当然可以走得很远，但不是世界冠军的材料。
back_translation: The flashy player can certainly go far, but they are not material for a world champion.

text: it cuts to the core of what it actually means to face your fears , to be a girl in a world of boys , to be a boy truly in love with a girl , and to ride the big metaphorical wave that is life -- wherever it takes you .
translation: 这切中了面对恐惧的真正意义，成为一个在男孩世界中的女孩，真正爱着一个女孩的男孩，以及骑上生活这条巨大的隐喻之浪——不论其带你去哪里。
back_translation: This strikes at the true meaning of facing fear: being a girl in the world of boys, a boy who truly loves a girl, and riding the enormous metaphorical wave of life—no matter where it takes you.

text: into this mix is thrown jed , jackson 's hunky cousin , which leads jackson to seriously contemplate the technicalities of incest .
translation: 这场混乱中加入了杰德，杰克逊的长得很帅的表弟，这让杰克逊认真考虑起乱伦的技术细节。
back_translation: In the midst of this chaos, Jett, Jackson's very handsome cousin, joined in, making Jackson seriously consider the technical details of incest.

text: yes , 4ever is harmless in the extreme and it 'll mute your kids for nearly 80 minutes , but why not just treat the little yard apes to the real deal and take them to spirited away ?
translation: 是的，4ever在极端情况下是无害的，它可以让你的孩子安静近80分钟，但为什么不带他们去看真正的电影《千与千寻》呢？
back_translation: Yes, 4ever is harmless in extreme situations; it can keep your child quiet for nearly 80 minutes, but why not take them to see the real movie "Spirited Away"?

text: . . . a visually seductive , unrepentantly trashy take on rice 's second installment of her vampire chronicles .
translation: ……对莱斯的吸血鬼编年史第二部的视觉诱惑，毫不掩饰的低俗演绎。
back_translation: ...the visual seduction of the second part of Rice's Vampire Chronicles, a blatant and vulgar interpretation.

text: painfully bleak and disheartening . . . brilliantly made and uncompromising
translation: 痛苦得令人沮丧且令人心碎……制作精湛且毫不妥协
back_translation: Painfully frustrating and heart-wrenching... exquisitely crafted and uncompromising.

text: a vampire so consumed with an insatiable bloodlust that they prey on vampires as well as humans , transforming victims who are unlucky enough to survive into reapers themselves .
translation: 一个因无法满足的嗜血欲望而完全沉迷的吸血鬼，它不仅以人类为食，还猎杀其他吸血鬼，将那些不幸幸存的受害者变成死神。
back_translation: A vampire completely immersed in an insatiable bloodlust, it not only feeds on humans but also hunts other vampires, turning those unfortunate survivors into reapers.

text: granted , much of the marlovian argument is patently ridiculous ( was ben johnson really part of a massive cover-up ? ) but it 's good fun .
translation: 诚然，马尔洛论证的大部分看起来明显荒谬（本·约翰逊真的参与了一个巨大的掩盖吗？）但这很有趣。
back_translation: Indeed, much of Marlowe's argument seems obviously absurd (Did Ben Johnson really participate in a huge cover-up?), but it's quite interesting.

text: a film of empty , fetishistic violence in which murder is casual and fun .
translation: 一部充满空洞、恋物癖暴力的电影，其中谋杀是随意且有趣的。
back_translation: A film filled with emptiness and fetishistic violence, where murder is casual and entertaining.

text: if you thought tom hanks was just an ordinary big-screen star , wait until you 've seen him eight stories tall .
translation: 如果你认为汤姆·汉克斯只是一个普通的大屏幕明星，那你等着，看他八层楼高的样子吧。
back_translation: If you think Tom Hanks is just an ordinary big screen star, wait until you see him at eight stories tall.

text: his daughter has been kidnapped by the man who owns the stones , and wants them back .
translation: 他的女儿被拥有那些宝石的男人绑架了，他想要回宝石。
back_translation: His daughter was kidnapped by the man who owns those jewels, and he wants to get the jewels back.

text: the boarders between life and stage merge and makes him to the mockery of his follow human beings .
translation: 生活与舞台之间的界限模糊了，使他成为同类人类的嘲弄。
back_translation: The boundary between life and stage has blurred, making him a mockery among his kind.

text: hardly makes the kind of points egoyan wanted to make , nor does it exist as the kind of monument he wanted to build , to victims whose voices have never gained the ears of the world .
translation: 几乎没有传达出埃戈扬想要表达的观点，也无法作为他想要为那些从未被世界倾听的受害者建立的纪念碑。
back_translation: It hardly conveys the point that Egoyan wants to express, nor can it serve as a monument for the victims who have never been heard by the world.

text: but our wet hero is n't dead , and soon finds himself in zurich .
translation: 但我们的湿英雄并没有死，很快就发现自己在苏黎世。
back_translation: But our wet hero was not dead and soon found himself in Zurich.

text: add to the mix a sob sister , roxie 's hapless husband amos , and a warm prison matron who watches out for her girls ( if there 's something in it for her ) , and you have chicago .
translation: 再加上一个爱哭的姐妹，罗克西那无辜的丈夫阿莫斯，还有一个关心她们的温暖监狱女看守（如果对她有好处的话），你就得到了《芝加哥》。
back_translation: Add a crybaby sister, Roxy's innocent husband Amos, and a warm prison matron who cares for them (if it serves her interests), and you get "Chicago."

text: the problem is that rather than dramatizing this premise , mr . desplechin is content to state it .
translation: 问题在于，德斯佩尔钦先生与其将这个命题戏剧化，不如说他只是满足于陈述它。
back_translation: The problem is that Mr. Desperation is more content to state the proposition rather than dramatize it.
