text: the film makes a tragic error by going on for too long , trying to mirror every subsequent event in chinese history : war , revolution , communism , etc .
translation: 这部电影犯了一个悲惨的错误，过于冗长，试图反映中国历史上的每一个后续事件：战争、革命、共产主义等等。
back_translation: This movie makes a tragic mistake by being overly lengthy and attempting to reflect every subsequent event in Chinese history: wars, revolutions, communism, and so on.

text: at the end of the second world war , 38 year-old career soldier gian singh resigns his commission with the british indian army and returns to his childhood village , near the border with pakistan .
translation: 在第二次世界大战结束时，38岁的职业军人吉安·辛格辞去了英国印度军队的职务，回到了他位于巴基斯坦边界附近的童年村庄。
back_translation: At the end of World War II, 38-year-old professional soldier Jan Singh resigned from his position in the British Indian Army and returned to his childhood village near the Pakistan border.

text: it 's not a great monster movie . but if you 've paid a matinee price and bought a big tub of popcorn , there 's guilty fun to be had here . chomp chomp !
translation: 这不是一部很好的怪兽电影。但如果你支付了下午场的票价，还买了一大桶爆米花，那么这里还是可以享受一些罪恶的乐趣。咀嚼咀嚼！
back_translation: This is not a very good monster movie. But if you paid for an afternoon ticket and bought a large bucket of popcorn, you can still enjoy some guilty pleasures here. Chew, chew!

text: too clumsy in key moments . . . to make a big splash .
translation: 在关键时刻太笨拙……无法引起大轰动。
back_translation: Being too clumsy at critical moments... cannot create a big sensation.

text: off the ramp , however , they are sexy , yet alone , in a male dominated society .
translation: 然而，在男性主导的社会中，她们性感而孤独。
back_translation: However, in a male-dominated society, they are sexy yet lonely.

text: but sam decker still has a few tricks to teach the kids , and he 's got some thingfs to learn from them .
translation: 但萨姆·德克还可以教孩子们一些技巧，他也有一些东西可以从他们身上学习。
back_translation: But Sam Dyk can also teach children some skills, and he has things to learn from them as well.

text: owners who will do almost anything to keep them running .
translation: 业主们几乎会不惜一切代价来让它们运转。
back_translation: Owners will almost go to any lengths to keep them running.

text: an enterprising jokester is a member of a local bowling club purely for the purpose of renting out his car park space to nearby workers .
translation: 一位有进取心的笑星加入当地的保龄球俱乐部，纯粹是为了将他的停车位出租给附近的工作人员。
back_translation: An ambitious comedian joined the local bowling club purely to rent out his parking space to nearby employees.

text: with a stolen police cruiser ( the red one ) , the destructive being races towards a little and already doomed planet : earth .
translation: 驾驶着一辆被盗的警车（红色的），这个破坏性生物朝着一个注定要灭亡的小行星——地球——飞驰而去。
back_translation: Driving a stolen police car (red), this destructive creature raced towards a doomed little asteroid—Earth.

text: i 'm going to give it a marginal thumbs up . i liked it just enough .
translation: 我会给它一个勉强的赞许。我觉得还不错。
back_translation: I'll give it a reluctant approval. I think it's not bad.

text: the movie , while beautiful , feels labored , with a hint of the writing exercise about it .
translation: 这部电影虽然美丽，但感觉有些费力，似乎带有一种写作练习的迹象。
back_translation: Although this movie is beautiful, it feels a bit laborious and seems to have signs of a writing exercise.

text: it 's crap on a leash -- far too polite to scale the lunatic heights of joe dante 's similarly styled gremlins .
translation: 这是一条拴着的废物——太过客气，无法攀登乔·丹特类似风格的《小精灵》那样的疯狂高度。
back_translation: This is a tied-up piece of waste — too polite to reach the crazy heights of Joe Dante's style in "Gremlins."

text: the hours of life snatched from death lead them in a wild chase across romania , looking for the truth .
translation: 从死亡中夺回的生命时光，将他们引向罗马尼亚进行疯狂的追逐，寻找真相。
back_translation: The life time reclaimed from death leads them on a wild chase to Romania in search of the truth.

text: besides a few survivors , the only two who know about freddy 's plans are teenagers lori ( monica keena ) and will ( jason ritter ) .
translation: 除了几个幸存者，只有两个知道弗雷迪计划的青少年，洛里（莫妮卡·基纳）和威尔（杰森·里特）。
back_translation: Apart from a few survivors, only two teenagers know about Freddy's plan: Lori (Monica Keena) and Will (Jason Ritter).

text: the miseducation of mitchell is a gritty , inner-city drama that covers one day in the life of mitchell , a quiet ten-year-old boy who lives with his crack-head mother ( nayomi ) in a roach infested downtown l . a . motel .
translation: 《米切尔的错误教育》是一部 gritty 的城市戏剧，讲述了米切尔的一天，他是一个安静的十岁男孩，和他的吸毒母亲（娜约米）住在洛杉矶市中心一家虫满为患的汽车旅馆里。
back_translation: "Mitchell's Misguided Education" is a gritty urban drama that tells the story of a day in the life of Mitchell, a quiet ten-year-old boy living with his drug-addicted mother, Naomi, in an infested motel in downtown Los Angeles.

text: red dragon is less baroque and showy than hannibal , and less emotionally affecting than silence . but , like silence , it 's a movie that gets under your skin .
translation: 《红龙》没有《汉尼拔》那么华丽和张扬，也没有《沉默的羔羊》那么动人。然而，就像《沉默的羔羊》一样，它是一部能让你内心感到触动的电影。
back_translation: "Red Dragon" is not as glamorous and flamboyant as "Hannibal," nor is it as moving as "The Silence of the Lambs." However, like "The Silence of the Lambs," it is a film that can touch your heart.

text: in the shadow of the casinos , is a world of backroom deals that can end a life over less money than the price of a bus ticket home .
translation: 在赌场的阴影下，是一个充满暗箱交易的世界，少于一张回家公交车票的钱就能结束一条生命。
back_translation: In the shadow of the casino lies a world filled with shady deals, where the price of a bus ticket home can end a life.

text: thinking this will be his chance to go out on top victor soon finds out that he has been double crossed and his last option is to get revenge .
translation: 维克多很快发现他被两面夹击，他最后的选择就是复仇。
back_translation: Victor quickly realized that he was caught in a two-pronged attack, and his final choice was revenge.

text: flounders due to the general sense that no two people working on the production had exactly the same thing in mind .
translation: 由于制作过程中没有两个工作人员的想法完全相同，导致了一些困境。
back_translation: Due to the fact that the ideas of the two staff members were not completely the same during the production process, some difficulties arose.

text: a riveting profile of law enforcement , and a visceral , nasty journey into an urban hades .
translation: 对执法的引人入胜的剖析，以及深入城市地狱的直观、恶劣之旅。
back_translation: An engaging analysis of law enforcement, as well as an intuitive and harsh journey deep into urban hell.

text: adaptation 's success in engaging the audience in the travails of creating a screenplay is extraordinary .
translation: 适应作品成功吸引观众关注创作剧本过程中的艰辛是非凡的。
back_translation: The adaptation of the work successfully attracts the audience's attention to the hardships of the scriptwriting process, which is remarkable.

text: dignified ceo 's meet at a rustic retreat and pee against a tree . can you bear the laughter ?
translation: 尊严的首席执行官们在一个乡村度假胜地会面，在树旁小便。你能忍受这种笑声吗？
back_translation: Dignified CEOs meet at a rural resort, urinating next to the trees. Can you stand such laughter?

text: the tale unfolds as a group of hustlers encounter `` the dean `` and pull off a successful sting that results in their pursuit by a vengeful gangster .
translation: 故事展开时，一群骗子遇到了“院长”，并成功实施了一场骗局，结果引来了一个复仇心切的黑帮的追杀。
back_translation: As the story unfolds, a group of con artists encounters the "director" and successfully executes a scam, which leads to them being pursued by a vengeful gang.

text: a few days later , during the ancient festival of samhain , a group of american university students moves in a beautiful cottage , surrounded by a lush forest and a majestic lake they are here to learn about the rituals of the ancient druids and other celtic legends .
translation: 几天后，在古老的万圣节节日（samhain）期间，一群美国大学生搬进了一座美丽的小屋，周围环绕着茂密的森林和壮丽的湖泊。他们在这里学习古代德鲁伊的仪式和其他凯尔特传说。
back_translation: A few days later, during the ancient festival of Samhain, a group of American college students moved into a beautiful cabin surrounded by dense forests and magnificent lakes. They were there to study ancient Druid rituals and other Celtic legends.

text: joe enders , a decorated marine who is by-the-book to a fault , is just coming back on duty ( by cheating on his medical tests ) .
translation: 乔·恩德斯，一位受到表彰的海军陆战队员，严守规矩到有些过分，刚刚通过作弊医疗测试重新上岗。
back_translation: Joe Enders, an award-winning Marine, is so strict about following the rules that it's somewhat excessive, and he has just returned to duty by cheating on a medical test.

text: through intimate vignettes of the milliner family , tiz 's close-knit crew , his pregnant girlfriend , his overzealous manager , and his mentor , the legendary kool g rap , tiz 's hopes and the quiet despair of his `` book of life filled with pain `` gradually emerge .
translation: 通过帽匠家庭的亲密小插曲，Tiz 的紧密团队、他怀孕的女友、过于热情的经理和他的导师传奇人物 Kool G Rap，Tiz 的希望以及他“充满痛苦的生活之书”的默默绝望逐渐浮现出来。
back_translation: Through the intimate little episodes of the hat maker's family, Tiz's close-knit team, his pregnant girlfriend, his overly enthusiastic manager, and his legendary mentor Kool G Rap, Tiz's hopes and the silent despair of his "book of a life filled with pain" gradually come to light.

text: slight , but colorful and forward-moving . . . wasabi has the cheeky verve and heart of a shaggy dog movie that is aiming to please its owner , nothing more , nothing less .
translation: 轻微，但色彩丰富且向前推进……芥末电影具有一只毛茸茸的狗电影的顽皮活力和心灵，旨在取悦它的主人，既不更多，也不少。
back_translation: Mild, yet rich in color and forward-moving... The mustard movie possesses the playful vitality and soul of a fluffy dog movie, aiming to please its owner, neither more nor less.

text: his reins in the countryside around the happy forest surpassed the sporadic attacks by the evil knight .
translation: 他在快乐森林周围的乡村中，驾驭着马缰，超越了邪恶骑士的零星袭击。
back_translation: He rode the reins through the countryside around Happy Forest, surpassing the sporadic attacks of the evil knights.

text: time out plays out slowly , but vincent 's disconnectedness creates odd suspense and black humor .
translation: 超时的情节进展缓慢，但文森特的疏离感营造出奇怪的悬疑和黑色幽默。
back_translation: The slow progression of the plot in "Overtime" is enhanced by Vincent's sense of alienation, which creates a strange atmosphere of suspense and dark humor.

text: the fake `` attack `` turns into a bloodbath .
translation: 假“攻击”变成了血腥的屠杀。
back_translation: The so-called "attack" has turned into a bloody massacre.

text: kids will love its fantasy and adventure , and grownups should appreciate its whimsical humor .
translation: 孩子们会喜欢它的幻想和冒险，而大人们应该会欣赏它的奇幻幽默。
back_translation: Children will enjoy its fantasy and adventure, while adults are likely to appreciate its whimsical humor.

text: a remake of the danish blockbuster `` klatretosen , `` catch that girl is described as `` ocean 's 11 `` or `` mission : impossible `` for kids .
translation: 丹麦热卖电影《Klatretosen》的重拍版《Catch That Girl》被描述为儿童版的《十一罗汉》或《碟中谍》。
back_translation: The Danish hit movie "Klatretosen" has a remake titled "Catch That Girl," which is described as a children's version of "Ocean's Eleven" or "Mission: Impossible."

text: they fight with glass plates , staple guns , light bulbs , fire and other homemade weapons .
translation: 他们用玻璃板、订书钉枪、灯泡、火和其他自制武器进行战斗。
back_translation: They fought using glass panels, staplers, light bulbs, fire, and other homemade weapons.

text: the balance of the movie shows the revenge of the various wronged parties .
translation: 电影的平衡展示了各个被冤屈方的复仇。
back_translation: The film balanced the display of revenge from various wronged parties.

text: soon the evil boss learns about sienna 's affair with kilabot and kidnaps her to exact revenge .
translation: 不久，邪恶的老板得知了西耶娜与基拉博特的绯闻，并绑架了她以报复。
back_translation: Soon, the evil boss learned about the rumor between Sienna and Kilabot and kidnapped her in revenge.

text: three families , living in a three storey building , leave for their summer vacations .
translation: 三户人家住在一栋三层楼的建筑里，出门去度暑假。
back_translation: Three families live in a three-story building and went out for summer vacation.

text: picard and the enterprise can escape , only to find themselves battling shinzons completely cloaked warbird , who is after the complete destruction of earth .
translation: 皮卡德和企业号能够逃脱，却发现自己正在与辛钟完全隐形的战鸟作战，它的目标是彻底毁灭地球。
back_translation: Picard and the Enterprise managed to escape, but found themselves battling a completely invisible warbird whose objective was to completely destroy Earth.

text: director of photography benoit delhomme shot the movie in delicious colors , and the costumes and sets are grand .
translation: 摄影指导本诺伊·德洛梅以迷人的色彩拍摄了这部电影，服装和布景都非常宏伟。
back_translation: The cinematographer Benoît Delhomme shot the film with captivating colors, and the costumes and sets are very grand.

text: bartleby is a one-joke movie , and a bad joke at that .
translation: 《巴特尔比》是一部只有一个笑话的电影，而且这个笑话还很糟糕。
back_translation: "Bartleby" is a movie with only one joke, and that joke is really bad.

text: like mike is a harmlessly naM-ove slice of b-ball fantasy , fit for filling in during the real nba 's off-season .
translation: 《像麦克一样》是一部无害的篮球幻想作品，适合在真正的NBA休赛期填补空白。
back_translation: "Like Mike" is a harmless basketball fantasy that is suitable to fill the gap during the real NBA offseason.

text: susie is obsessed about losing weight , thus being `` bonita `` and not `` gorda `` - the two keywords in the original spanish title .
translation: 苏西对减肥非常着迷，因此想要变得“漂亮”，而不是“胖”——这是原西班牙语标题中的两个关键词。
back_translation: Susie is very obsessed with losing weight, so she wants to become "beautiful" instead of "fat" — these are the two key words from the original Spanish title.

text: a young man is struggling to get over harmful memories from his childhood , but while doing so discovers a technique that allows him to travel back in time and occupy his childhood body changing his history forever .
translation: 一个年轻人努力摆脱童年时期的痛苦记忆，但在这个过程中发现了一种技术，允许他回到过去，重新占据自己的童年身体，从而永远改变他的历史。
back_translation: A young man struggles to escape painful memories from his childhood, but in the process discovers a technology that allows him to return to the past and reclaim his childhood body, thereby forever changing his history.

text: ms . rampling , still beautiful well into her 50s , has an earth-bound weariness and lively spirit that convey a life fully and tragically lived .
translation: 拉姆普林女士，在50多岁时依然美丽，展现出一种尘世的疲惫和生动的精神，传达出一个全面而悲剧地活过的生命。
back_translation: Ms. Rampling, still beautiful in her 50s, exhibits a sense of worldly weariness and a vivid spirit, conveying a life that has been fully and tragically lived.

text: he has orchestrated a perverse sport where prisoners fight , sometime to the death for the entertainment and profit of he and his cronies .
translation: 他策划了一场扭曲的运动，让囚犯们互相搏斗，有时甚至斗到死亡，以供他和他的同伙娱乐和牟利。
back_translation: He orchestrated a twisted spectacle where prisoners fought each other, sometimes to the death, for his and his accomplices' entertainment and profit.

text: she 's answering questions about how she became the speed queen , one of the sonic killers how mainlining speed with her husband , lamont , and her lover , natalie , grew into dealing , how dealing turned into robbery , and robbery into mass murder .
translation: 她正在回答有关她如何成为速食女王的问题，她是声波杀手之一，讲述了与丈夫拉蒙特和爱人娜塔莉一起使用毒品的经历，如何从吸毒发展到贩毒，贩毒又如何演变为抢劫，而抢劫最终变成了大规模谋杀。
back_translation: She is answering questions about how she became the fast-food queen, one of the sonic killers, recounting experiences of using drugs with her husband Lamont and lover Natalie, how drug use progressed to drug dealing, how dealing evolved into robbery, and how robbery eventually turned into large-scale murder.

text: meanwhile in india , vikrant announces grand prize money to those who tell him the whereabouts of guru .
translation: 与此同时，在印度，维克兰特宣布向那些告诉他古鲁下落的人提供丰厚的奖金。
back_translation: Meanwhile, in India, Vikrant announced a generous reward for those who could tell him the whereabouts of the Guru.

text: he 's also still got a murder to solve , in addition to the blackmail and framing of an innocent bystander being orchestrated by the man they were chasing .
translation: 他还需要解决一起谋杀案，此外还有他们追逐的那个人策划的勒索和诬陷无辜旁观者的事件。
back_translation: He also needs to solve a murder case, in addition to the incidents of extortion and framing innocent bystanders plotted by the person they are chasing.

text: adam miauczynski , the character known from director marek koterski 's previous films , is a 44 year-old teacher , who reads poetry during school lessons and later goes home swearing and calling his neighbours ' names .
translation: 亚当·米奥钦斯基，这位角色来自导演马雷克·科特斯基的前几部电影，是一位44岁的教师，在上课时朗读诗歌，回家后却咒骂邻居，称呼他们一些侮辱性的名字。
back_translation: Adam Mionchinski, a character from director Marek Koterski's earlier films, is a 44-year-old teacher who reads poetry in class but curses at his neighbors and calls them various insulting names when he gets home.

text: this curious figure gives nicholas the impression he is pressing his young son closer to the girls in his life and away from bobby .
translation: 这个好奇的人物给尼古拉斯的印象是，他正在让自己年轻的儿子更靠近他生活中的女孩，而远离鲍比。
back_translation: This curious character gave Nicholas the impression that he was bringing his young son closer to the girl in his life, while distancing him from Bobby.

text: a seasoned call girl is offered a way out of the business if she uncovers a blackmail ring in a house of prostitution .
translation: 一名经验丰富的按摩女郎被提供了一种脱离这个行当的方法，但前提是她必须揭露一个在妓院内的勒索团伙。
back_translation: An experienced massage girl was offered a way to escape this profession, but on the condition that she must expose a blackmail gang operating within the brothel.

text: he is increasingly tormented by his conscience as the new order of the day is revealed .
translation: 随着新秩序的显露，他的良知越来越被折磨。
back_translation: As the new order emerged, his conscience was increasingly tormented.

text: broomfield 's style of journalism is hardly journalism at all , and even those with an avid interest in the subject will grow impatient .
translation: 布鲁姆菲尔德的新闻风格几乎算不上新闻，甚至连对这个话题有浓厚兴趣的人也会变得不耐烦。
back_translation: Bloomfield's news style is hardly even news, and even those with a strong interest in the topic can become impatient.

text: the corpse count ultimately overrides what little we learn along the way about vicarious redemption .
translation: 尸体的数量最终压倒了我们在这个过程中对替代救赎所了解的那些微不足道的东西。
back_translation: The number of corpses ultimately overwhelmed the insignificant things we understood about alternative redemption during this process.

text: the unluckiest man in vegas ( william h . macy ) - a guy whose bad luck is contagious - is used by the last of the old time mob run casinos to kill high rollers ' action .
translation: 在拉斯维加斯最倒霉的人（威廉·H·梅西）- 一个坏运气具有传染性的人 - 被最后一家老式黑手党运营的赌场利用来终结高赌注玩家的“行动”。
back_translation: The unluckiest person in Las Vegas (William H. Macy) - a person whose bad luck is contagious - is used by the last old-fashioned mafia-operated casino to put an end to the “action” of high-stakes players.

text: the best way to hope for any chance of enjoying this film is by lowering your expectations . then lower them a bit more .
translation: 希望能享受这部电影的最佳方法是降低你的期望值。然后再降低一点。
back_translation: The best way to enjoy this movie is to lower your expectations. Then lower them a bit more.

text: if you love reading and/or poetry , then by all means check it out . you 'll probably love it .
translation: 如果你热爱阅读和/或诗歌，那就一定要去看看。你可能会喜欢它。
back_translation: If you love reading and/or poetry, you should definitely check it out. You might enjoy it.

text: might be one of those vanity projects in which a renowned filmmaker attempts to show off his talent by surrounding himself with untalented people .
translation: 这可能是一个虚荣项目，著名导演试图通过让自己周围环绕着没有才华的人来炫耀自己的才华。
back_translation: This may be a vanity project, where a famous director tries to showcase their own talent by surrounding themselves with untalented people.

text: fly along with skilled helicopter crews as they carry out sea and mountain rescues , apprehend drug smugglers , repair high voltage lines , save endangered animals , deliver humanitarian aid , and undertake a reconnaissance mission .
translation: 与熟练的直升机机组人员一起飞行，他们执行海洋和山区救援，抓捕贩毒者，修复高压电线，拯救濒危动物，提供人道主义援助，并进行侦察任务。
back_translation: Flying with skilled helicopter crews, they perform ocean and mountain rescues, apprehend drug traffickers, repair high-voltage power lines, rescue endangered animals, provide humanitarian aid, and conduct reconnaissance missions.

text: the moral shrapnel and mental shellshock will linger long after this film has ended .
translation: 道德碎片和精神创伤将在这部电影结束后很久仍然挥之不去。
back_translation: The fragments of morality and psychological trauma will linger long after this film ends.

text: the storytelling may be ordinary , but the cast is one of those all-star reunions that fans of gosford park have come to assume is just another day of brit cinema .
translation: 尽管故事叙述可能平淡无奇，但演员阵容却是那种明星重聚，戈斯福德公园的粉丝们早已将其视为英国电影的又一个平常日子。
back_translation: Despite the story's narrative being rather ordinary, the cast is one of those star reunions that fans of Gosford Park have long regarded as just another typical day in British cinema.

text: the man who kidnapped his daughter is also doing what he can to find them .
translation: 绑架女儿的男人也在尽力寻找他们。
back_translation: The man who kidnapped the daughter is also doing his best to find them.

text: worth a salute just for trying to be more complex than your average film .
translation: 值得敬佩，仅仅因为试图比普通电影更复杂。
back_translation: Admirable, simply for attempting to be more complex than an ordinary movie.

text: underachieving misfits pete and lanny are wannabe `` gangsta rappers , `` who find the constraints of suburbia stifling to their artistic goals .
translation: 不顺利的失败者皮特和兰尼是想成为“黑帮说唱歌手”的人，他们发现郊区的限制对他们的艺术追求形成了压制。
back_translation: Unsuccessful losers Peter and Lanny are aspiring "gangsta rappers" who find that the constraints of suburbia suppress their artistic pursuits.

text: . . . nothing scary here except for some awful acting and lame special effects .
translation: ……这里只是一些糟糕的表演和无聊的特效，没有什么可怕的。
back_translation: ...here are just some terrible performances and boring special effects, nothing scary.

text: ordinary melodrama that is heavy on religious symbols but wafer-thin on dramatic substance
translation: 平庸的情节剧，宗教符号繁多但戏剧内容薄弱。
back_translation: Mediocre drama with numerous religious symbols but weak dramatic content.

text: obviously a socialist commentary , poets is in turn informative , witty and thought-provoking .
translation: 显然是一篇社会主义评论，诗人在其中既具有信息性，又机智且引人深思。
back_translation: It is clearly a commentary on socialism, where the poet is both informative and witty, provoking deep thought.

text: after being rejected for the perfect job , the aspiring animator faces an impending interview for a receptionist position at the same firm .
translation: 在被完美的工作拒绝后，渴望成为动画师的她面临着在同一家公司申请接待员职位的即将到来的面试。
back_translation: After being rejected by the perfect job, she, who longs to become an animator, is facing an upcoming interview for a receptionist position at the same company.

text: the four reluctantly come together when they have to return a human child to its father while braving the deadly elements of the impending ice age .
translation: 四人勉强聚在一起，因为他们必须将一个人类孩子送回父亲身边，同时勇敢地面对即将到来的冰河时期的致命元素。
back_translation: The four of them reluctantly came together because they had to return a human child to its father while bravely facing the deadly elements of the impending Ice Age.

text: nothing 's at stake , just a twisty double-cross you can smell a mile away -- still , the derivative nine queens is lots of fun .
translation: 没有什么悬念，只有你能闻到一英里外的曲折背叛——不过，导出版本的九个皇后依然非常有趣。
back_translation: There are no surprises; only you can smell the twisted betrayal from a mile away—however, the exported version of Nine Queens is still very interesting.

text: former criminal investigator , major korenev , nicknamed fox is released from prison .
translation: 前犯罪调查员，名为科连涅夫的上校，绰号“狐狸”，被释放出狱。
back_translation: Former crime investigator, Colonel Koryenev, nicknamed "Fox," has been released from prison.

text: a fanciful drama about napoleon 's last years and his surprising discovery of love and humility .
translation: 一部幻想剧，讲述拿破仑的最后岁月以及他对爱情和谦逊的惊人发现。
back_translation: A fantasy drama that tells the story of Napoleon's final years and his astonishing discoveries about love and humility.

text: the first hour is tedious though ford and neeson capably hold our interest , but its just not a thrilling movie .
translation: 虽然福特和尼尔森能够有效地吸引我们的兴趣，但第一个小时非常乏味，这部电影就是不够刺激。
back_translation: Although Ford and Nielsen can effectively capture our interest, the first hour is very boring; the movie just isn't exciting enough.

text: long before the first exorcist , we are taken to the birth of the demon pazuzu , and follow him through his life , eventually bringing us to the middle east where he waits for a victim to use as a vehcile to destroy the world with .
translation: 在第一个驱魔人还未出现之前，我们被带到了恶魔帕祖祖的诞生，并跟随他经历了整个生命，最终来到中东，他在这里等待着一个受害者作为毁灭世界的工具。
back_translation: Before the first exorcist appeared, we were taken to the birth of the demon Pazuzu, and we followed him through his entire life, eventually arriving in the Middle East, where he awaited a victim to serve as a tool for the destruction of the world.

text: he 's dead ; and all their money is gone .
translation: 他死了；他们所有的钱都没了。
back_translation: He is dead; all their money is gone.

text: plodding , poorly written , murky and weakly acted , the picture feels as if everyone making it lost their movie mojo .
translation: 沉闷、写得很糟糕、模糊且表演弱，整个影片给人一种参与制作的每个人都失去了电影灵感的感觉。
back_translation: Dull, poorly written, vague, and weak in performance, the entire film gives the impression that everyone involved in its production has lost their inspiration for filmmaking.

text: not only does this musical documentary showcase a band that 's at the top of its form . . . it also serves as indictment of the ridiculously shallow , pre-fab music industry in general .
translation: 这部音乐纪录片不仅展示了一支处于巅峰状态的乐队……它还对可笑的肤浅、拼凑的音乐产业提出了控诉。
back_translation: This music documentary not only showcases a band at the peak of their performance... it also makes a case against the ridiculous superficiality and patchwork nature of the music industry.

text: when their less-than-stunning female forms earn them an invite to a `` dog catcher `` party at their old frat , they decide to brave the harassment so they can grab the rest of their belongings from the house and make a clean break .
translation: 当她们不那么惊艳的女性形象让她们受邀参加旧兄弟会的``捕狗者``派对时，她们决定忍受骚扰，以便从房子里拿走她们其余的物品，彻底断绝关系。
back_translation: When their less glamorous female image got them invited to the old fraternity's "dog catchers" party, they decided to endure the harassment in order to take their remaining belongings from the house and sever all ties completely.

text: what starts off as a potentially incredibly twisting mystery becomes simply a monster chase film .
translation: 一开始看似是一个可能极具扭曲性的悬疑故事，最终变成了一部简单的怪物追逐电影。
back_translation: At first, it seemed like a potentially highly distorted suspense story, but ultimately it turned into a simple monster chase movie.

text: director lee has a true cinematic knack , but it 's also nice to see a movie with its heart so thoroughly , unabashedly on its sleeve .
translation: 李导演确实有着真正的电影才华，但看到一部电影如此彻底、坦率地表露出它的心声也让人感到很愉快。
back_translation: Director Li truly possesses genuine filmmaking talent, but it is also very pleasant to see a movie express its voice so thoroughly and candidly.

text: with the help of their gay hairdresser ( pop star jordan chan ) and some friends inside the company , the girls become `` irresistibly `` beautiful , and secretly get rehire under new identities .
translation: 在他们的同性恋发型师（流行歌手陈冠希）的帮助下，以及公司内部的一些朋友，女孩们变得“不可抗拒”地美丽，并秘密以新身份重新雇佣。
back_translation: With the help of their gay hairstylist (pop singer Edison Chen) and some friends within the company, the girls became "irresistibly" beautiful and were secretly re-employed under new identities.

text: a psychological thriller with a genuinely spooky premise and an above-average cast , actor bill paxton 's directing debut is a creepy slice of gothic rural americana .
translation: 这是一个心理惊悚片，拥有真正毛骨悚然的前提和超过平均水平的演员阵容，演员比尔·帕克斯顿的导演处女作是一部令人毛骨悚然的哥特式乡村美国电影。
back_translation: This is a psychological thriller with a genuinely chilling premise and an above-average cast. Actor Bill Paxton's directorial debut is a haunting Gothic country American film.

text: this is a visually stunning rumination on love , memory , history and the war between art and commerce .
translation: 这是一部令人惊叹的视觉作品，思考了爱、记忆、历史以及艺术与商业之间的战争。
back_translation: This is an astonishing visual piece that contemplates love, memory, history, and the conflict between art and commerce.

text: faced with its aftermath , angela flees town , unaware that she has put into motion a dramatic and intense string of events that will forever change the course of their lives .
translation: 安吉拉面对事情的后果，逃离了小镇，却不知道自己已经推动了一系列戏剧性而激烈的事件，这些事件将永远改变他们的生活轨迹。
back_translation: Angela faced the consequences of her actions and fled the town, unaware that she had set off a series of dramatic and intense events that would forever alter the course of their lives.

text: makes one thing abundantly clear . american musical comedy as we know it would n't exist without the precedent of yiddish theater , whose jolly , fun-for-fun's-sake communal spirit goes to the essence of broadway .
translation: 这一点非常明确。我们所知的美国音乐喜剧在没有意第绪剧院的前例下是不存在的，而意第绪剧院那种欢乐、为了快乐而快乐的共同精神正是百老汇的核心所在。
back_translation: This point is very clear. The American musical comedy as we know it would not exist without the precedents set by Yiddish theater, and the joyful, communal spirit of enjoyment for the sake of enjoyment that characterizes Yiddish theater is at the core of Broadway.

text: the talented and clever robert rodriguez perhaps put a little too much heart into his first film and did n't reserve enough for his second .
translation: 才华横溢且聪明的罗伯特·罗德里格兹或许在他的第一部电影中投入了太多的心血，而没有为他的第二部电影留出足够的情感。
back_translation: The talented and clever Robert Rodriguez may have poured too much heart into his first film and didn't leave enough emotional investment for his second film.

text: the film gets close to the chimps the same way goodall did , with a serious minded patience , respect and affection .
translation: 这部电影以与古道尔相似的方式接近猩猩，展现出一种严肃的耐心、尊重和深情。
back_translation: This film approaches the gorillas in a way similar to Goodall, displaying a serious patience, respect, and deep emotion.

text: the story really has no place to go since simone is not realM-^Wshe ca n't provide any conflict .
translation: 这个故事真的没有发展空间，因为西蒙不是个真实的人，她无法提供任何冲突。
back_translation: This story really has no room for development because Simon is not a real person; she cannot provide any conflict.

text: they team up and live their lives in the fast lane on the run .
translation: 他们组队并在快节奏的生活中逃亡。
back_translation: They teamed up and fled in the fast-paced life.

text: after confining herself in her home for two months , to rehabilitate , physically and mentally , she is persuaded by friends and family to get out of her inner prison and face the world .
translation: 在家中禁闭了两个月，为了身心康复，她受到朋友和家人的劝说，走出自己的内心监狱，面对现实世界。
back_translation: After being confined at home for two months, she was persuaded by her friends and family to step out of her inner prison and face the real world for her mental and physical recovery.

text: a pleasant ramble through the sort of idoosyncratic terrain that errol morris has often dealt with . . . it does possess a loose , lackadaisical charm .
translation: 在埃罗尔·莫里斯常常处理的那种独特地形中进行愉快的漫步……它确实拥有一种松散、漫不经心的魅力。
back_translation: Enjoying a pleasant stroll in the unique terrain that Errol Morris often navigates... it truly possesses a loose, nonchalant charm.

text: the story remarks the difference between social classes in mexico city , and their characters risk everything just to save their love .
translation: 这个故事强调了墨西哥城市中社会阶层之间的差异，他们的角色为了拯救他们的爱情不惜冒险一切。
back_translation: This story highlights the differences between social classes in Mexican cities, where their characters risk everything to save their love.

text: a go ! ! ! `` and the paper is dated with the year 2003 .
translation: 去吧！！！`` 这份文件的日期是2003年。
back_translation: Go!!! This document is dated 2003.

text: but this hope is quickly jeopardized when it becomes revealed that his comforting visitations may be being made from beyond the grave .
translation: 但当他的安慰探访可能是从阴间发来的时，这种希望很快就受到威胁。
back_translation: But when his comforting visit may be coming from the underworld, this hope is quickly threatened.

text: valento feels the heat and turns the table : he makes the dupe into one of his own and rubs the da 's nose in it .
translation: 瓦伦托感受到压力，反转局势：他把受害者变成了自己的人，并把检察官的鼻子摩擦在上面。
back_translation: Valento felt the pressure and turned the situation around: he turned the victims into his own people and rubbed the prosecutor's nose in it.

text: mike leigh mainstay timothy spall deftly shades in the designated goner , fellow still crazy alum bill nighy is sweetly wispy as the capable fop , and anger-management counselor olivia williams trembles pleasantly as usual .
translation: 迈克·李的常客蒂莫西·斯波尔巧妙地诠释了被指定的垮掉者，另一位《仍然疯狂》的校友比尔·奈伊则以甜美飘渺的形象展现了能够的花花公子，而愤怒管理顾问奥利维亚·威廉姆斯一如既往地愉快地颤抖着。
back_translation: Mike Leigh's regular Timothy Spall cleverly interprets the designated loser, while another "Still Crazy" alumnus, Bill Nighy, presents a charmingly ethereal image of the capable playboy, and anger management consultant Olivia Williams continues to shake with delightful excitement.

text: when he kills a butterfly , he unknowingly sets off a chain reaction that will erase humanity from existence .
translation: 当他杀死一只蝴蝶时，他无意中引发了一场连锁反应，将人类从存在中抹去。
back_translation: When he killed a butterfly, he inadvertently triggered a chain reaction that erased humanity from existence.

text: when she understands that the killer is very intelligent and organized , she elaborates a strategy to arrest him .
translation: 当她意识到杀手非常聪明且有条理时，她制定了一项逮捕他的策略。
back_translation: When she realized that the killer was very clever and organized, she devised a strategy to catch him.

text: or does kip just want to destroy the planet ?
translation: 或者基普只是想摧毁这个星球？
back_translation: Or maybe Kip just wants to destroy this planet?

text: [ majidi ] makes us think twice about immigrants we see around us every day .
translation: [ majidi ] 让我们重新思考每天看到的移民。
back_translation: [Majidi] Let's rethink the immigrants we see every day.

text: a very good film sits in the place where a masterpiece should be .
translation: 一部非常好的电影占据了一个杰作应有的位置。
back_translation: A very good movie occupies the place that a masterpiece deserves.

text: goyer 's screenplay and direction are thankfully understated , and he has drawn excellent performances from his cast .
translation: 戈耶的剧本和导演手法令人欣慰地保持了低调，他从演员阵容中引出了出色的表演。
back_translation: Goya's script and directing style reassuringly maintain a low profile, drawing excellent performances from the cast.

text: a film that 's flawed and brilliant in equal measure .
translation: 一部缺陷与 brilliance 同样并存的电影。
back_translation: A movie where flaws and brilliance coexist equally.

text: also , a conservative judge and the attorney general become suspicious of his early release and it 's relation to the murdered prisoner .
translation: 此外，一位保守派法官和检察长对他的提早释放及其与被谋杀囚犯的关系感到怀疑。
back_translation: In addition, a conservative judge and the prosecutor expressed doubts about his early release and his association with the murdered inmate.

text: that enemy has developed a `` micro-device `` that can be injected into victims in order to kill them at will .
translation: 那个敌人开发了一种“微型设备”，可以注入受害者体内，以便随意杀死他们。
back_translation: The enemy developed a "microscale device" that can be injected into the victims' bodies to kill them at will.

text: a dream cast of solid female talent who build a seamless ensemble . there is n't a weak or careless performance amongst them .
translation: 一支由实力女性演员组成的梦幻阵容，她们构建了无缝的合奏。她们中间没有弱或马虎的表演。
back_translation: A dream team composed of powerful female actors, they create a seamless ensemble. Among them, there are no weak or careless performances.

text: in the process they have tortured villagers and something dreadful happens and rupi disappears .
translation: 在这个过程中，他们折磨村民，发生了一些可怕的事情，鲁皮消失了。
back_translation: During this process, they tortured the villagers, and some terrifying things happened; Lu Pi disappeared.

text: the sinister inspiration that fuelled devito 's early work is confused in death to smoochy into something both ugly and mindless .
translation: 德维托早期作品所受到的阴暗启示在《死去的心情》中被扭曲成一种既丑陋又无脑的东西。
back_translation: The dark inspiration in DeVito's early works is twisted into something both ugly and brainless in "The Dead Mood."

text: his only-way-out is to create for himself a new identity franklin mann one without the doubt , pain or guilt .
translation: 他唯一的出路就是为自己创造一个新的身份，弗兰克林·曼恩，一个没有怀疑、痛苦或内疚的身份。
back_translation: His only way out was to create a new identity for himself, Franklin Mann, an identity free of doubt, pain, or guilt.

text: esha and rahul start a letter based friendship that blossoms into love .
translation: 埃莎和拉胡尔开始了一段基于信件的友谊，渐渐发展成了爱情。
back_translation: Asha and Rahul began a friendship based on letters, which gradually developed into love.

text: writer/director steve oedekerk uses contemporary characters and splices them into a 1970s kung-fu film , weaving the new and old together .
translation: 编剧/导演史蒂夫·歐德卡克使用当代角色，将它们融入到1970年代的功夫电影中，将新旧元素交织在一起。
back_translation: Screenwriter/director Steve Odekerk uses contemporary characters and integrates them into 1970s kung fu movies, weaving together new and old elements.

text: i did n't laugh . i did n't smile . i survived .
translation: 我没有笑。我没有微笑。我活下来了。
back_translation: I didn't laugh. I didn't smile. I survived.

text: mitch does n't particular like the idea , especially working with his new partner trey sellars ( eddie murphy ) , a cop who spends much of his time mugging for the cameras mounted inside the car he shares with mitch .
translation: 米奇并不特别喜欢这个主意，尤其是和他的新人搭档特雷·塞拉斯（艾迪·墨菲）一起工作，特雷是一名警察，他大部分时间都在为安装在他与米奇共享的汽车内的摄像头摆姿势。
back_translation: Mickey wasn't particularly fond of the idea, especially working with his new partner Trey Selas (Eddie Murphy), who was a police officer mostly posing for the camera installed in the car that he shared with Mickey.

text: a young couple moves into a neighborhood obsessed with the frightening silent movie history that took place 80 years before .
translation: 一对年轻夫妇搬进了一个痴迷于80年前发生的可怕无声电影历史的邻里。
back_translation: A young couple moved into a neighborhood obsessed with the terrifying history of silent films that took place 80 years ago.

text: with an expressive face reminiscent of gong li and a vivid personality like zhang ziyi 's , dong stakes out the emotional heart of happy .
translation: 东凭借着令人联想到巩俐的表情和像章子怡一样鲜明的个性，巧妙地把握住了《快乐》的情感核心。
back_translation: Dong cleverly grasped the emotional core of "Happiness" with an expression reminiscent of Gong Li and a distinct personality like Zhang Ziyi.

text: ice age is the first computer-generated feature cartoon to feel like other movies , and that makes for some glacial pacing early on .
translation: 《冰河世纪》是第一部计算机生成的特征动画片，使其感觉像其他电影，这在早期导致了一些缓慢的节奏。
back_translation: "Ice Age" is the first computer-generated feature animated film, making it feel like other movies, which initially led to a slower pace.

text: the film favors the scientific over the spectacular ( visually speaking ) .
translation: 这部电影在视觉上更倾向于科学而非壮观。
back_translation: This movie is visually more inclined towards science rather than spectacle.

text: bennett 's dramatization of her personal descent into post-breakup perdition has a morbid appeal that 's tough to shake .
translation: 本尼特对她个人在分手后堕落的戏剧化表现具有一种难以摆脱的病态吸引力。
back_translation: Bennett's dramatic portrayal of her personal decline after the breakup has a hauntingly pathological allure.

text: emerging from the human psyche and showing characteristics of abstract expressionism , minimalism and russian constructivism , graffiti removal has secured its place in the history of modern art while being created by artists who are unconscious of their artistic achievements .
translation: 涂鸦清除从人类心理中涌现，展示出抽象表现主义、极简主义和俄罗斯构成主义的特征，已在现代艺术史上占据了一席之地，同时这些创作是由对其艺术成就毫无意识的艺术家们创作的。
back_translation: Doodle removal emerges from the human psyche, showcasing characteristics of abstract expressionism, minimalism, and Russian constructivism, and has occupied a place in the history of modern art, while these creations are made by artists who are completely unaware of their artistic achievements.

text: does an impressive job of relating the complicated history of the war and of filling in the background .
translation: 在叙述战争复杂历史和填补背景方面做得非常出色。
back_translation: It does an excellent job of narrating the complex history of the war and filling in the background.

text: chabrol ratchets up such a level of suspense -- and huppert gives such a mesmerizingly deadpan performance -- that merci pour le chocolat turns out to be as irresistible as a piece of dark chocolate .
translation: 查布罗尔将悬念提升到如此程度，而于佩尔的表演又是如此引人入胜、面不改色，以至于《谢谢你，巧克力》就像一块黑巧克力一样令人无法抗拒。
back_translation: Chabrol elevates the suspense to such a degree, and Huppert's performance is so captivating and composed, that "Thank You, Chocolate" is as irresistible as a piece of dark chocolate.

text: when his sister meets a grisly death in san francisco , he goes there to hunt her killer .
translation: 当他的妹妹在旧金山遭遇可怕的死亡时，他前往那里追查她的杀手。
back_translation: When his sister encountered a terrible death in San Francisco, he went there to track down her killer.

text: in 19th-century new mexico , a father ( tommy lee jones ) comes back home , hoping to reconcile with his adult daughter maggie ( cate blanchett ) .
translation: 在19世纪的新墨西哥，一位父亲（汤米·李·琼斯）回到家中，希望与他的成年女儿玛吉（凯特·布兰切特）重归于好。
back_translation: In 19th century New Mexico, a father (Tommy Lee Jones) returns home hoping to reconcile with his adult daughter Maggie (Cate Blanchett).

text: never mind whether you buy the stuff about barris being a cia hit man . the kooky yet shadowy vision clooney sustains throughout is daring , inventive and impressive .
translation: 不用在意你是否相信巴里斯是中央情报局的杀手。克鲁尼始终保持的古怪而神秘的视野大胆、富有创意且令人印象深刻。
back_translation: Don't worry about whether you believe Barris is a CIA assassin. Clooney's consistently strange and mysterious vision is bold, creative, and impressive.

text: an arrested drug kingpin is transported by a los angeles police department swat team led by jackson 's character out of the city and into federal custody .
translation: 一名被捕的毒枭由洛杉矶警察局特警队（SWAT）在杰克逊角色的带领下，从城市中转移到联邦拘留所。
back_translation: A captured drug lord was transferred from the city to a federal detention center by the Los Angeles Police Department SWAT team, led by Officer Jackson.

text: matt , a city boy , island hopping to take in the festival of fire , hears that she has been tricked ; for jake is not dying .
translation: 马特，一个城市男孩，正在岛屿跳跃，参加火焰节，听说她被欺骗了；因为杰克并没有快要死。
back_translation: Matt, a city boy, is island hopping, participating in the Flame Festival, and heard that he was deceived; because Jack was not dying after all.

text: lanie 's professional success means she must be a failure at life , because she 's driven by ambition and does n't know how to have fun .
translation: 兰妮的职业成功意味着她在生活中一定是个失败，因为她被野心驱动，不知道如何享受生活。
back_translation: Lani's professional success means that she must be a failure in life because she is driven by ambition and doesn't know how to enjoy life.

text: sam leads the kids in a running battle with the gunmen throughout the school .
translation: 萨姆带领孩子们在学校与持枪者展开激烈追逐。
back_translation: Sam led the children in a fierce chase with the gunman at school.

text: there 's a disreputable air about the whole thing , and that 's what makes it irresistible .
translation: 整件事情散发着一种不光彩的气息，而正是这让它变得不可抗拒。
back_translation: The whole situation exudes an air of disgrace, and it is this that makes it irresistible.

text: unable to get time off work his mother leaves him outside in their garden to avoid him causing trouble .
translation: 由于无法请假，他的母亲把他留在他们的花园里，以避免他惹麻烦。
back_translation: Due to the inability to take leave, his mother left him in their garden to avoid causing trouble.

text: this compelling undercover documentary is not for the faint of heart , taking you deep into a world where very often pain and blood are the price of glory .
translation: 这个引人入胜的卧底纪录片并不适合胆小的人，它带你深入一个经常以痛苦和血液作为荣耀代价的世界。
back_translation: This captivating undercover documentary is not suitable for the faint-hearted; it takes you deep into a world that often pays the price of glory with pain and blood.

text: the movie has lots of dancing and fabulous music . there are slow and repetitive parts , but it has just enough spice to keep it interesting .
translation: 这部电影有很多舞蹈和精彩的音乐。虽然有些部分比较缓慢和重复，但它恰到好处地增添了趣味，使其保持吸引力。
back_translation: This movie has a lot of dance and wonderful music. Although some parts are a bit slow and repetitive, they add just the right amount of interest to keep it engaging.

text: frank and his sister caroline arrive in mystical attic town where the great syndicate is ruling and robbing the citizens .
translation: 弗兰克和他的妹妹卡罗琳来到一个神秘的阁楼小镇，在这里大联盟统治并掠夺市民。
back_translation: Frank and his sister Caroline arrive at a mysterious attic town, where the Big League rules and plunders the citizens.

text: no one can guess who the next killer will be or how to break the chain .
translation: 没有人能猜到下一个杀手会是谁，或者如何打破这个链条。
back_translation: No one can guess who the next killer will be or how to break this chain.

text: that is , until the villainous captain hook mistakes her for wendy and abducts her to never land in an attempt to lure and capture peter pan .
translation: 也就是说，直到恶棍胡克船长误将她当作温迪，绑架她到梦幻岛，以此试图引诱并捕捉彼得潘。
back_translation: In other words, it was not until the villain Captain Hook mistakenly took her for Wendy and kidnapped her to Neverland, attempting to lure and capture Peter Pan.

text: this familiar rise-and-fall tale is long on glamour and short on larger moralistic consequences , though it 's told with sharp ears and eyes for the tenor of the times .
translation: 这个熟悉的起伏故事充满了魅力，却缺乏更大的道德后果，尽管它以敏锐的耳朵和眼睛捕捉了时代的基调。
back_translation: This familiar ebb and flow of the story is full of charm, yet lacks greater moral consequences, even though it captures the tone of the era with keen ears and eyes.

text: it 's an exhilarating blast that makes good use of the large-format screen .
translation: 这是一次令人振奋的狂欢，充分利用了大屏幕的优势。
back_translation: This is an exciting celebration that makes full use of the advantages of the large screen.

text: when their house is robbed on christmas eve they team up to track him down .
translation: 当他们的房子在圣诞夜被抢劫时，他们联手追踪抢劫者。
back_translation: When their house was robbed on Christmas Eve, they joined forces to track down the robbers.

text: ao sair do cinema , eu estava feliz e com saudades de um tempo em que , para mim , a existM-jncia de papai noel era um fato inquestionM-avel .
translation: 走出电影院时，我感到快乐，怀念那个父亲圣诞老人确实存在的时代。
back_translation: As I walked out of the cinema, I felt happy, reminiscing about the time when Father Christmas truly existed.

text: isabel ( rica ) and clara ( maui ) , two childhood friends separated by fate .
translation: 伊莎贝尔（丽卡）和克拉拉（毛伊），两个命运分离的童年朋友。
back_translation: Isabel (Rika) and Clara (Maui), two childhood friends whose destinies are separated.

text: he is almost to school when a red neck attacks him .
translation: 他快到学校时，一个红脖子袭击了他。
back_translation: As he was nearing the school, a redneck attacked him.

text: an ambitious , guilt-suffused melodrama crippled by poor casting .
translation: 一部雄心勃勃、充满内疚的情感剧，但因演员阵容不佳而受挫。
back_translation: An ambitious and guilt-filled emotional drama, but hindered by a poor cast.

text: stiles takes red green and the other lodge members to court , forcing them to come up with $ 10 , 000 in damages in ten days - or else lose their beloved possum lodge .
translation: 斯泰尔斯将红色、绿色和其他小屋成员告上法庭，迫使他们在十天内筹集到10,000美元的赔偿金，否则将失去他们心爱的负鼠小屋。
back_translation: Stiles took the red, green, and other members of the cabin to court, forcing them to raise $10,000 in damages within ten days, or they would lose their beloved opossum cabin.

text: their timing and desperate behavior trigger a horror so powerful , no six-shooter can put a dent in it .
translation: 他们的时机和绝望的行为引发了一种如此强大的恐惧，以至于没有六发左轮手枪能够对其造成影响。
back_translation: Their timing and desperate actions triggered a fear so powerful that no six-shot revolver could make a difference.

text: he falls in love with christine and wants her for his own , but she only has eyes for raoul viscount de chagny .
translation: 他爱上了克里斯汀，并想要她成为自己的，但她的心中只有拉乌尔·德·查尼子爵。
back_translation: He fell in love with Christine and wanted her to be his, but her heart belonged only to Raoul de Chagny.

text: a frustrated businessman , jeffery goldman ( john pankow ) tries to end his hopeless marriage to wife , ellen ( rebecca pidgeon ) by asking his local rabbi ( eli wallach ) to place a curse on her .
translation: 一位沮丧的商人杰弗里·戈德曼（约翰·潘考）试图通过请当地的拉比（埃利·瓦拉赫）对他的妻子艾伦（丽贝卡·皮金）下咒语来结束他无望的婚姻。
back_translation: A frustrated businessman, Jeffrey Goldman (John Pankow), tries to end his hopeless marriage by asking the local rabbi (Eli Wallach) to cast a spell on his wife, Ellen (Rebecca Pidgeon).

text: now pistachio must make the most of his inherited power in an attempt to track down devilin and save his parents .
translation: 现在开心果必须充分利用他继承的力量，试图追踪恶魔并拯救他的父母。
back_translation: Now, Pistachio must fully utilize the power he inherited to try to track down the demon and save his parents.

text: woo 's fights have a distinct flair . his warriors collide in balletic explosion that implies an underlying order throughout the chaos .
translation: 伍的战斗具有独特的风格。他的武士在芭蕾般的爆发中相互碰撞，暗示着在混乱中潜藏着一种基本的秩序。
back_translation: Wu's battles possess a unique style. His warriors collide in a balletic explosion, suggesting that a fundamental order lies hidden within the chaos.

text: there are plot holes big enough for shamu the killer whale to swim through .
translation: 有巨大的情节漏洞，足够让杀人鲸莎姆游过。
back_translation: There are huge plot holes wide enough for the killer whale Shamu to swim through.

text: we never truly come to care about the main characters and whether or not they 'll wind up together , and michele 's spiritual quest is neither amusing nor dramatic enough to sustain interest .
translation: 我们从未真正关心主要角色以及他们是否会走到一起，而米歇尔的精神追求既不有趣也没有戏剧性，无法维持兴趣。
back_translation: We never really cared about the main characters and whether they would end up together, and Michelle's spiritual pursuits are neither interesting nor dramatic enough to maintain interest.

text: toula portokalos is 30 , greek , and works in her family 's restaurant , dancing zorba 's , in chicago .
translation: 图拉·波托卡洛斯30岁，希腊人，在芝加哥的家族餐厅“佐尔巴的舞蹈”工作。
back_translation: Tula Potokalos is 30 years old, Greek, and works at her family's restaurant "Zorba's Dance" in Chicago.

text: birthday girl does n't try to surprise us with plot twists , but rather seems to enjoy its own transparency .
translation: 生日女孩并不试图用情节反转来给我们惊喜，而是似乎享受它自身的透明性。
back_translation: The birthday girl does not try to surprise us with plot twists, but rather seems to enjoy its own transparency.

text: lost and stranded , they are set upon by a bizarre family of psychotics .
translation: 迷失并被困，他们遭遇了一家怪异的精神病患者。
back_translation: Lost and trapped, they encountered a strange mental patient.

text: their only common bond is the vague promise of riches at the end of their journey as they try to stay one step ahead of santiago , a violent gangster out for their blood and gaining on them all the time .
translation: 他们唯一的共同纽带是模糊的财富承诺，在旅程的尽头，试图始终领先于圣地亚哥，一个暴力的黑帮分子，时刻追赶着他们，企图杀了他们。
back_translation: Their only common bond is a vague promise of wealth, as they attempt to stay one step ahead of Santiago, a violent gangster who is constantly chasing them, trying to kill them.

text: shane bradley , who is fixated on ideas of luck and destiny , tries to win the girl of his dreams .
translation: 肖恩·布拉德利（Shane Bradley）沉迷于好运和命运的观念，试图赢得他梦寐以求的女孩。
back_translation: Shane Bradley is obsessed with the idea of luck and fate, trying to win the girl of his dreams.

text: surrounded by a bevy of adoring but completely wrong for her men ( and one dead girl from manchester ) , chance has to pick her way through her messy life in order to figure out which guy is `` it `` .
translation: 被一群崇拜但完全不适合她的男人（还有一个来自曼彻斯特的死女孩）包围，Chance必须在她混乱的生活中小心翼翼地寻找，以弄清楚哪个男人是“对的人”。
back_translation: Surrounded by a group of admirers who are completely unsuitable for her (and a dead girl from Manchester), Chance must carefully navigate her chaotic life to figure out which man is the "right one."

text: a recent favourite at sundance , this white-trash satire will inspire the affection of even those unlucky people who never owned a cassette of def leppard 's pyromania .
translation: 在最近的圣丹斯电影节上，这部关于白人贫民的讽刺作品将激发即使是那些从未拥有过德夫·勒帕德《火焰狂热》盒带的不幸人们的喜爱。
back_translation: At the recent Sundance Film Festival, this satirical work about white underprivileged people is sure to inspire the admiration of even those unfortunate individuals who have never owned the tape of "Fire Enthusiast" by Devo LePard.

text: si el siglo xxi necesita de hM-iroes , el hombre araM-qa parece haber llegado para quedarse .
translation: 如果21世纪需要英雄，那么网络蜘蛛似乎已经来了，并将永远存在。
back_translation: If the 21st century needs heroes, then the web spiders seem to have arrived and will exist forever.

text: cho 's fans are sure to be entertained ; it 's only fair in the interest of full disclosure to say that -- on the basis of this film alone -- i 'm not one of them .
translation: Cho的粉丝们一定会很开心；在全面披露的兴趣下，我必须诚实地说——仅根据这部电影，我并不是他们中的一员。
back_translation: Cho's fans will surely be very happy; under the interest of full disclosure, I must honestly say - based solely on this movie, I am not one of them.

text: not even steven spielberg has dreamed up such blatant and sickening product placement in a movie .
translation: 甚至史蒂文·斯皮尔伯格也没有梦到过在电影中如此明显和令人恶心的产品植入。
back_translation: Even Steven Spielberg never dreamed of such obvious and disgusting product placement in a movie.

text: hoping to win prize money offered by a local band contest , dewey forms a rock band with the kids in the class .
translation: 德威希望赢得当地乐队比赛提供的奖金，于是与班上的孩子们组建了一支摇滚乐队。
back_translation: Dewei hopes to win the prize offered by the local band competition, so he formed a rock band with the kids in his class.

text: the documentary weaves verite rehearsal , interviews , rare holocaust footage , and performances into a revelation of the creative process .
translation: 这部纪录片将纪录片排练、访谈、珍贵的霍洛克斯镜头和表演交织在一起，揭示了创作过程。
back_translation: This documentary weaves together footage from rehearsals, interviews, precious Horrocks footage, and performances, revealing the creative process.

text: he moves around the urban landscape from park bench to bus bench with his best friend , an aging dog named bones .
translation: 他和他的最好朋友，一只名叫“骨头”的老狗，穿梭于市区的公园长椅和公交车长椅之间。
back_translation: He and his best friend, an old dog named "Bone," weave between the park benches and bus benches in the city center.

text: she sets out to strike down her once fellow assassins , leaving bill for last .
translation: 她开始着手消灭她曾经的同伴刺客，将比尔留到最后。
back_translation: She began to eliminate her former assassin companions, leaving Bill for last.

text: benigni 's pinocchio is extremely straight and mind-numbingly stilted , its episodic pacing keeping the film from developing any storytelling flow .
translation: 贝尼尼的《匹诺曹》极为生硬，令人昏昏欲睡，其分散的节奏使得影片无法形成任何叙事的流畅性。
back_translation: Benini's "Pinocchio" is extremely stiff and boring, with its disjointed rhythm preventing the film from achieving any narrative fluidity.

text: it certainly wo n't win any awards in the plot department but it sets out with no pretensions and delivers big time .
translation: 它在情节方面肯定不会赢得任何奖项，但它毫无 pretensions 地展开，并取得了巨大的成功。
back_translation: It definitely won't win any awards for its plot, but it unfolds without any pretensions and achieves great success.

text: though an important political documentary , this does not really make the case the kissinger should be tried as a war criminal .
translation: 尽管这是一个重要的政治纪录片，但这并没有真正证明基辛格应该作为战争罪犯受到审判。
back_translation: Although this is an important political documentary, it does not actually prove that Kissinger should be tried as a war criminal.

text: benefits from a strong performance from zhao , but it 's dong jie 's face you remember at the end .
translation: 受益于赵的出色表现，但在最后你记住的是董洁的脸。
back_translation: Benefiting from Zhao's outstanding performance, but in the end, what you remember is Dong Jie’s face.

text: the story follows a year in the life of the hemples , a family that takes home schooling to an extreme - and has for generations .
translation: 这个故事讲述了亨普尔一家为期一年的生活，他们在家庭教育方面极为偏执，并且这种做法已经持续了好几代。
back_translation: This story recounts the year-long life of the Hempel family, who are extremely obsessive about homeschooling, a practice that has lasted for several generations.

text: until now , zak gibbs ' greatest challenge has been finding a way to buy a car .
translation: 直到现在，扎克·吉布斯最大的挑战就是找到一种买车的方法。
back_translation: Until now, Zach Gibbs' biggest challenge has been finding a way to buy a car.

text: and while ingrid 's gift is to give astrid the power to survive , astrid 's gift is to teach her mother about love .
translation: 而英格丽德的礼物是给予阿斯特丽德生存的能力，阿斯特丽德的礼物则是教导她母亲关于爱的知识。
back_translation: Ingrid's gift is to give Astrid the ability to survive, while Astrid's gift is to teach her mother the knowledge of love.

text: the bottom line with nemesis is the same as it has been with all the films in the series : fans will undoubtedly enjoy it , and the uncommitted need n't waste their time on it .
translation: 关于《宿敌》的结论与该系列中的所有电影一样：粉丝们无疑会喜欢它，而那些没有兴趣的人就不必浪费时间。
back_translation: Regarding "The Enemy," the conclusion is the same as with all the movies in the series: fans will undoubtedly enjoy it, while those who are not interested do not need to waste their time.

text: raimi crafted a complicated hero who is a welcome relief from the usual two-dimensional offerings .
translation: 雷米塑造了一个复杂的英雄，与通常的二维角色相比，令人耳目一新。
back_translation: Remy has shaped a complex hero, refreshing compared to the usual two-dimensional characters.

text: igby slocumb , a rebellious and sarcastic seventeen year-old boy , is at war with the oppressive world of his east coast `` old money `` family .
translation: 伊格比·斯洛坎布是一个叛逆而讽刺的十七岁男孩，他与东海岸“老钱”家庭压迫的世界展开战争。
back_translation: Iggby Slocumb is a rebellious and sarcastic seventeen-year-old boy who wages war against the oppressive world of "old money" families on the East Coast.

text: if you liked the 1982 film then , you 'll still like it now .
translation: 如果你喜欢1982年的电影，那么你现在仍然会喜欢它。
back_translation: If you liked the movie from 1982, then you will still enjoy it now.

text: as fate would have it , they realize how close they all are from the other side ; of life , of love , and of losing it .
translation: 命运使然，他们意识到彼此之间是多么接近；生活、爱情，以及失去它。
back_translation: Fate has made them realize how close they are to each other; life, love, and the loss of it.

text: britney spears ' phoniness is nothing compared to the movie 's contrived , lame screenplay and listless direction .
translation: 布兰妮·斯皮尔斯的虚假与电影的牵强、无聊的剧本和缺乏生气的导演相比，简直微不足道。
back_translation: Britney Spears' falsehoods are trivial compared to the film's contrived, boring script and the lackluster direction.

text: . . . the first 2/3 of the film are incredibly captivating and insanely funny , thanks in part to interesting cinematic devices ( cool visual backmasking ) , a solid cast , and some wickedly sick and twisted humor . . .
translation: … 影片的前2/3部分令人难以动眼且疯狂搞笑，这离不开有趣的电影手法（酷炫的视觉反向影像）、强大的演员阵容，以及一些极其病态和扭曲的幽默…
back_translation: The first two-thirds of the film are captivating and hilariously insane, which can be attributed to interesting cinematic techniques (cool visual reverse images), a strong cast, and some extremely morbid and twisted humor...

text: the real reason to see runteldat is to watch lawrence deploy his deep and wide powers of empathy to depict such diverse experiences as childbirth , breast-feeding and recovering from illness .
translation: 观看《runteldat》的真正原因是看到劳伦斯运用他深厚而广泛的同理心来描绘如此多样的经历，如分娩、哺乳和康复。
back_translation: The real reason to watch "runteldat" is to see Lawrence use his deep and broad empathy to portray such a diverse range of experiences, such as childbirth, breastfeeding, and recovery.

text: that all changes when a teammate is mysteriously stabbed during a ball field brawl .
translation: 这一切都在一场球场斗殴中，一名队友神秘遭到刺伤时发生了变化。
back_translation: Everything changed during a brawl on the court when a teammate was mysteriously stabbed.

text: go for la salle 's performance , and make do as best you can with a stuttering script .
translation: 去参加拉萨尔的演出，尽量在一个结结巴巴的剧本上做到最好。
back_translation: Go to participate in Lasalle's performance and do your best on a stuttering script.

text: deacon , matt and fred will do anything for even a glimpse of sex and spend their mornings pirating porno movies from fred 's after school job at the video store .
translation: 执事、马特和弗雷德会不惜一切代价，只为一睹性事，早晨他们在弗雷德放学后的录像店工作中盗版色情电影。
back_translation: The deacon, Matt, and Fred would go to any length just to catch a glimpse of sexual activities, and in the morning, they pirated pornographic movies while working at the video store after Fred finished school.

text: despite its dry wit and compassion , the film suffers from a philosophical emptiness and maddeningly sedate pacing .
translation: 尽管影片具有干燥的幽默和同情，但它却遭受了哲学上的空虚和令人恼火的缓慢节奏。
back_translation: Despite the film's dry humor and compassion, it suffers from philosophical emptiness and an irritatingly slow pace.

text: he is sensitive and compassionate , speaks french fluently , is passionate about voltaire , and thinks the feature that tells the most about a woman is her hands .
translation: 他敏感而富有同情心，流利地说法语，热爱伏尔泰，认为最能反映一个女人特征的是她的手。
back_translation: He is sensitive and compassionate, speaks French fluently, loves Voltaire, and believes that the most telling feature of a woman is her hands.

text: seemingly a vehicle to showcase the canadian 's inane ramblings , stealing harvard is a smorgasbord of soliloquies about nothing delivered by the former mr . drew barrymore .
translation: 看似一个展示加拿大人无聊喃喃自语的载体，《偷哈佛》是由前任德鲁·巴里摩尔先生演绎的一系列关于无所事事的独白盛宴。
back_translation: Seemingly a vehicle for showcasing Canadian boredom and mumbling, "Stealing Harvard" is a series of monologues about idleness performed by former Mr. Drew Barrymore.

text: while awaiting trial , zoe is confined to house arrest , where she alternates falling in love with her frequent visitor and parole officer , daly , and trying to prove her innocence to regain her life and freedom .
translation: 在等待审判期间，佐伊被限制在家中，她交替地与经常来访的假释官达利坠入爱河，并努力证明自己的清白，以重新获得生活和自由。
back_translation: During the waiting period for her trial, Zoe was confined to her home, where she alternately fell in love with her often-visiting probation officer, Dali, and worked hard to prove her innocence in order to regain her life and freedom.

text: heartwarming and gently comic even as the film breaks your heart .
translation: 温馨而轻松幽默，即使电影让你心碎。
back_translation: Warm and lightly humorous, even if the movie breaks your heart.

text: the film uses chapman 's own unseen personal papers and unpublished memoirs in order to recreate his years at cambridge university , medical school , the monty python years , his struggles with alcohol , his ground-breaking stance on homosexuality , his exploits with john cleese , keith moon , harry nilsson , ringo starr , and his untimely death at age 48 , of cancer .
translation: 这部电影利用查普曼本人未公开的私人文件和未发表的回忆录，重现了他在剑桥大学、医学院、怪博士时期的岁月，以及他与酗酒的斗争、对同性恋的开创性立场、与约翰·克里斯、基思·穆恩、哈里·尼尔森、林戈·斯塔尔的经历，以及他在48岁时因癌症不幸去世的故事。
back_translation: This movie uses personal documents and unpublished memoirs of Chapman himself to recreate his years at Cambridge University, medical school, and his time as the mad doctor, as well as his struggle with alcoholism, his groundbreaking stance on homosexuality, his experiences with John Cleese, Keith Moon, Harry Nilsson, and Ringo Starr, and the story of his unfortunate death from cancer at the age of 48.

text: insomnia does not become one of those rare remakes to eclipse the original , but it does n't disgrace it , either .
translation: 失眠并未成为那些罕见的重制版来超越原作，但它也没有让原作蒙羞。
back_translation: Insomnia did not become one of those rare remakes that surpass the original, but it did not bring shame to the original either.

text: blue crush follows the formula , but throws in too many conflicts to keep the story compelling .
translation: 《蓝色冲击》遵循了公式，但加入了太多冲突，使故事不够引人入胜。
back_translation: "Blue Impact" follows a formula but adds too many conflicts, making the story not engaging enough.

text: however tina disregards him and chooses not to respond to his first e-mail , in turn pooja decides to keep in touch with him but signs under tina 's name .
translation: 然而，蒂娜无视了他，并选择不回复他的第一封电子邮件，反过来，普贾决定与他保持联系，但以蒂娜的名义签名。
back_translation: However, Tina ignored him and chose not to respond to his first email. In turn, Pujha decided to keep in touch with him, but signed in Tina's name.

text: it 's hard not to feel you 've just watched a feature-length video game with some really heavy back story .
translation: 很难不觉得你刚刚看了一部有着沉重背景故事的长篇视频游戏。
back_translation: It's hard not to feel like you've just experienced a lengthy video game with a heavy backstory.

text: he makes all efforts to bring ghisu back but does not succeed .
translation: 他尽了所有的努力想让吉苏回来，但没有成功。
back_translation: He did everything he could to bring Jisu back, but he was unsuccessful.

text: bogdanovich taps deep into the hearst mystique , entertainingly reenacting a historic scandal .
translation: 博格达诺维奇深入挖掘赫斯特神秘的魅力，生动地重现了一场历史丑闻。
back_translation: Bogdanović delves deep into Hearst's mysterious allure, vividly recreating a historical scandal.

text: there is a secret test hidden with in the sat .
translation: 在SAT考试中隐藏着一个秘密测试。
back_translation: There is a hidden secret test within the SAT exam.

text: `` it 's said that only love can save them from disgrace , but that 's crap .
translation: 人们说只有爱能拯救他们免于耻辱，但那都是胡说。
back_translation: People say that only love can save them from humiliation, but that's nonsense.

text: among the drove is a pair of con men , on a decadent road trip as santa and his elf .
translation: 在这群人中，有一对骗子，以圣诞老人和他的精灵的身份进行一场颓废的公路旅行。
back_translation: Among this group of people, there is a pair of con artists who are taking a despondent road trip disguised as Santa Claus and his elf.

text: a film that takes you inside the rhythms of its subject : you experience it as you watch .
translation: 一部让你深入其主题节奏的电影：在观看时你会亲身体验。
back_translation: A movie that immerses you in its thematic rhythm: you will experience it personally while watching.

text: here she encounters the menacing dennis betts ( clive russell ) and in an attempt to flee from him , she & # 237 ; s forced to hide in a car belonging to daniel stone ( douglas henshall ) , a hospital porter .
translation: 在这里，她遇到了威胁性的丹尼斯·贝茨（克莱夫·拉塞尔饰），为了逃离他，她被迫藏在一辆属于医院搬运工丹尼尔·斯通（道格拉斯·亨肖饰）的车里。
back_translation: Here, she encounters the threatening Dennis Bates (played by Clive Russell), and to escape him, she is forced to hide in a vehicle belonging to the hospital porter Daniel Stone (played by Douglas Henshall).

text: . . . an enjoyably frothy 'date movie ' . . .
translation: . . . 一部令人愉快的轻松“约会电影” . . .
back_translation: ... a delightful light "date movie" ...

text: daria 's boys are : dante , who owns some of the hottest clubs in the city and believes monogamy is a dirty word , unless he 's being cheated on .
translation: 达里亚的男朋友有：丹特，他是城市里一些最热门俱乐部的老板，认为一夫一妻制是个脏字，除非他被背叛。
back_translation: Daria's boyfriend is Dante, who is the owner of some of the hottest clubs in the city and believes that monogamy is a dirty word, unless he is betrayed.

text: quietly pulls you into its sun drenched style of american gothic in the heartland
translation: 静静地把你带入心脏地带阳光普照的美国哥特风格中。
back_translation: Quietly lead you into the heart of sunlit American Gothic style.

text: now , johnny and lena ( wayne 's girlfriend ) are asked to make the ultimate baby product , called mighty baby .
translation: 现在，约翰尼和莱娜（韦恩的女朋友）被要求制作终极婴儿产品，名为“超能宝贝”。
back_translation: Now, Johnny and Lena (Wayne's girlfriend) have been tasked with creating the ultimate baby product called "Super Baby."

text: for the first time in several years , mr . allen has surpassed himself with the magic he 's spun with the hollywood empress of ms . leoni 's ellie .
translation: 在数年之中，艾伦先生首次超越了自己，与好莱坞女皇莱奥尼的艾莉一起编织出魔幻般的作品。
back_translation: For the first time in years, Mr. Allen surpassed himself, weaving a magical work alongside Hollywood queen Leoni's Ellie.

text: it 's all going well for the very single eleanor , until she realizes it 's all a ruse .
translation: 一切对非常单身的埃莉诺来说都进行得很顺利，直到她意识到这一切都是一个骗局。
back_translation: Everything was going smoothly for very single Eleanor until she realized it was all a scam.

text: the characters struggle to find love in a world that no longer needs sex to reproduce , a world that is changing and is populated with people who use provisional identities and are seen through virtual selves and a world where love is the only thing that makes things real .
translation: 角色们在一个不再需要性来繁殖的世界中挣扎寻找爱，这个世界正在变化，生活着使用临时身份的人，他们通过虚拟自我被看待，而爱是唯一让事物变得真实的东西。
back_translation: The characters struggle to find love in a world where reproduction no longer requires sex, a world that is changing and inhabited by people using temporary identities, who are viewed through their virtual selves, while love is the only thing that makes things real.

text: talk to her is excellent movie-making and much of it is wondrous , but my conscience wo n't allow me to be devoted to unconditionally singing its praises .
translation: 《跟她说话》是一部优秀的电影制作，许多地方都令人惊叹，但我的良知不允许我无条件地对它赞美。
back_translation: "Talking to Her" is an excellent film production, with many stunning aspects, but my conscience does not allow me to praise it unconditionally.

text: the story of two lads from belfast as they stumble their way through the london gay underworld in search of 'gainful employment ' .
translation: 两个来自贝尔法斯特的年轻人在伦敦的同性恋地下世界中跌跌撞撞地寻找“有利可图的工作”的故事。
back_translation: The story of two young men from Belfast stumbling through the gay underground world in London in search of "lucrative work."

text: as a revenge thriller , the movie is serviceable , but it does n't really deliver the delicious guilty pleasure of the better film versions .
translation: 作为一部复仇惊悚片，这部电影还算合格，但并没有像更好的电影版本那样带来令人愉悦的罪恶快感。
back_translation: As a revenge thriller, the movie is acceptable, but it does not deliver the pleasurable sense of wickedness like better versions of the film.

text: another in-your-face wallow in the lower depths made by people who have never sung those blues .
translation: 另一种令人难以忽视的沉溺于低谷的表现，来自那些从未经历过这种蓝调的人。
back_translation: Another striking manifestation of indulging in the lows comes from those who have never experienced such blues.

text: when the switchblade , the most sophisticated prototype stealth fighter created yet , is stolen from the u . s . government , one of the united states ' top spies , alex scott ( owen wilson ) , is called to action .
translation: 当最新的、最复杂的原型隐形战斗机“开关刀”从美国政府手中被盗时，美国顶级间谍之一亚历克斯·斯科特（欧文·威尔逊饰）被召唤出行动。
back_translation: When the latest and most advanced prototype stealth fighter "Switchblade" is stolen from the U.S. government, top spy Alex Scott (portrayed by Owen Wilson) is called into action.

text: as they used to say in the 1950s sci-fi movies , signs is a tribute to shyamalan 's gifts , which are such that we 'll keep watching the skies for his next project .
translation: 正如1950年代科幻电影中常说的那样，《异象》是对沙马兰天赋的致敬，我们会继续仰望天空，期待他的下一个项目。
back_translation: As often said in sci-fi movies of the 1950s, "Phenomena" is a tribute to Shyamalan's talent, and we will continue to look up at the sky, anticipating his next project.

text: spellbound by the rich and mysterious world manuela has shown him , his idyll is shattered when the reality of why he 's there comes crashing down around him .
translation: 被玛努埃拉展示的丰富而神秘的世界迷住了，他的理想生活在他来到这里的现实如同噩梦般降临时破灭了。
back_translation: He was captivated by the rich and mysterious world displayed by Manuela, but his ideal life shattered like a nightmare when the reality of his arrival here set in.

text: during the course of the story we also learn that his father died at age 40 ; and now , as jones approaches his 40th birthday , he suffers from `` survivor 's guilt . ``
translation: 在故事的发展过程中，我们也了解到他的父亲在40岁时去世；而现在，当琼斯接近他的40岁生日时，他承受着“幸存者的负罪感”。
back_translation: In the course of the story, we learn that his father passed away at the age of 40; now, as Jones approaches his 40th birthday, he is burdened with "survivor's guilt."

text: her stalker looks threatening but his manner seems to suggest that he is just a confused social outcast , trapped in an obsessive , repetitive rut that revolves around anna .
translation: 她的跟踪者看起来很威胁，但他的举止似乎暗示他只是一个困惑的社会边缘人，陷入围绕安娜的强迫性重复的生活模式中。
back_translation: Her stalker looked quite threatening, but his behavior seemed to suggest that he was just a confused social outcast, trapped in a compulsive repetitive life pattern revolving around Anna.

text: the cumulative effect of the movie is repulsive and depressing .
translation: 这部电影的综合效果令人厌恶和沮丧。
back_translation: The overall effect of this movie is disgusting and frustrating.

text: insomnia is one of the year 's best films and pacino gives one of his most daring , and complicated , performances .
translation: 《失眠症》是今年最好的影片之一，帕奇诺奉献了他最具挑战性和复杂性的表演之一。
back_translation: "Insomnia" is one of the best films of the year, and Pacino delivers one of his most challenging and complex performances.

text: the heart of the film is the drop dead sexy drea de matteo who , as the mother and real head of the family , commands every scene .
translation: 影片的核心是令人惊艳的德蕾亚·德·马泰奥，她作为母亲和家庭的真正掌舵者，主宰着每一个场景。
back_translation: The heart of the film is the stunning Drea de Matteo, who, as a mother and the true captain of the family, dominates every scene.

text: he is under the impression that rupi is dead .
translation: 他误以为鲁皮已经死了。
back_translation: He mistakenly thought that Lu Pi was already dead.

text: in the affable maid in manhattan , jennifer lopez 's most aggressive and most sincere attempt to take movies by storm , the diva shrewdly surrounds herself with a company of strictly a-list players .
translation: 在《曼哈顿的宜人女仆》中，詹妮弗·洛佩兹对冲击电影界所做的最强烈和最真诚的尝试，她聪明地将自己置身于一群绝对一线演员的包围中。
back_translation: In "Maid in Manhattan," Jennifer Lopez makes the most striking and sincere attempt to break into the film industry by cleverly surrounding herself with a group of top-tier actors.

text: what makes blade 2 marginally better than blade , especially if you thought the first was a hollow spectacle ? it has a plot .
translation: 《刀锋2》相比于《刀锋》稍微更优秀的原因是什么，特别是如果你认为第一部只是一个空洞的视觉盛宴？它有了情节。
back_translation: What are the reasons that "Blade II" is slightly better than "Blade," especially if you think the first film was just a hollow visual feast? It has a plot.

text: each weekend they come back with nothing but a hangover .
translation: 每个周末他们回来时只带着宿醉。
back_translation: Every weekend they come back only with a hangover.

text: she wants justice and will do anything to get it .
translation: 她想要正义，并会不惜一切代价去争取。
back_translation: She wants justice and will spare no effort to fight for it.

text: after a chance encounter at a theater , two men , benigno and marco , meet at a private clinic where benigno works .
translation: 在一次偶然的剧院邂逅后，两名男子，贝尼诺和马可，在贝尼诺工作的私人诊所再次相遇。
back_translation: After an偶然 encounter at the theater, two men, Benino and Marco, meet again at the private clinic where Benino works.

text: that haynes can both maintain and dismantle the facades that his genre and his character construct is a wonderous accomplishment of veracity and narrative grace .
translation: 海因斯能够同时维持和拆解他的类型和角色所构建的表象，是一种令人惊叹的真实性和叙事优雅的成就。
back_translation: Hynes' ability to simultaneously maintain and dismantle the facade constructed by his types and roles is a remarkable achievement of authenticity and narrative elegance.

text: police and investigators believed the murders were in retaliation for a robbery days prior to the murders .
translation: 警方和调查人员认为，这些谋杀是对几天前一起抢劫事件的报复。
back_translation: Police and investigators believe that these murders are a retaliation for a robbery that occurred a few days ago.

text: a canny , derivative , wildly gruesome portrait of a london sociopath who 's the scariest of sadists .
translation: 一幅精明、衍生、极其 gruesome 的伦敦社会病态者肖像，他是最可怕的施虐者。
back_translation: A shrewd, derivative, and extremely gruesome portrait of a sociopath in London, who is the most terrifying of abusers.

text: well made but uninvolving , bloodwork is n't a terrible movie , just a stultifyingly obvious one -- an unrewarding collar for a murder mystery .
translation: 制作精良但缺乏吸引力，《血液检测》并不是一部糟糕的电影，只是过于明显的一部——对谋杀悬疑片来说，令人失望的选择。
back_translation: Well-made but lacking in appeal, "Blood Test" is not a terrible movie, just an overly obvious one—a disappointing choice for a murder mystery.

text: like it or not , anne marie starts losing her balance - and finding it - as she falls for matt .
translation: 喜欢与否，安妮·玛丽在爱上马特的过程中开始失去平衡——又重新找回平衡。
back_translation: Whether she liked it or not, Anne-Marie began to lose her balance in the process of falling in love with Matt—only to regain her balance again.

text: this is an ungainly movie , ill-fitting , with its elbows sticking out where the knees should be .
translation: 这是一部笨拙的电影，结构不合适，肘部在膝盖应该的地方突出。
back_translation: This is a clumsy movie with an inappropriate structure, where the elbows protrude where the knees should be.

text: jason must get back , therefore he gets a new and unique mask , and goes after the kids of elm street .
translation: 杰森必须回归，因此他得到了一个新的独特面具，并追踪埃尔姆街的孩子们。
back_translation: Jason must return, so he gets a new unique mask and tracks down the children of Elm Street.

text: tam & # 225 ; s is a young , budapest-based director of video clips and commercials who dreams of directing his first feature film with the title 'the guilty city ' .
translation: Tam是一位年轻的、位于布达佩斯的视频剪辑和广告导演，他梦想执导自己的第一部标题为《有罪之城》的故事片。
back_translation: Tam is a young video editor and advertising director based in Budapest, who dreams of directing his first feature film titled "City of Guilt."

text: try as you might to scrutinize the ethics of kaufman 's approach , somehow it all comes together to create a very compelling , sensitive , intelligent and almost cohesive piece of film entertainment .
translation: 无论你多么努力地审视考夫曼的方法的伦理，所有这些 somehow 都结合在一起，创造出一部非常吸引人、敏感、聪明且几乎连贯的影片娱乐作品。
back_translation: No matter how hard you scrutinize the ethics of Kaufman's method, all of this somehow comes together to create a very engaging, sensitive, smart, and almost coherent piece of film entertainment.

text: a young great gatsbyish hip hopper named summer g falls for a middle to upper class sister while in college .
translation: 一个年轻的如伟大盖茨比般的嘻哈青年，名叫夏天·G，在大学期间爱上了一位中产到上层阶级的姐妹。
back_translation: A young hip-hop enthusiast named Summer G, who is reminiscent of the great Gatsby, fell in love with a middle to upper-class sister during his college years.

text: in addition to hoffman 's powerful acting clinic , this is that rare drama that offers a thoughtful and rewarding glimpse into the sort of heartache everyone has felt , or will feel someday .
translation: 除了霍夫曼强大的表演课程之外，这是一部罕见的戏剧，它提供了一个深思熟虑且有价值的洞察，展现了每个人都曾经历过或将来会经历的那种心痛。
back_translation: In addition to Hoffman’s powerful acting class, this is a rare drama that offers a thoughtful and valuable insight into the kind of heartache that everyone has experienced or will experience in the future.

text: and with the birth of tiz 's son , it becomes unavoidably evident that tiz 's fate and his hopes for success involve far more than just his own happiness .
