translation: 随着提兹的儿子出生，提兹的命运和他对于成功的希望不可避免地显现出远不止他自己的幸福。
back_translation: With the birth of Tiz's son, Tiz's fate and his hopes for success inevitably revealed far more than just his own happiness.

text: imamura 's delight in the infinite oddity of men and women is goofy ; it 's also , at heart , reverent .
translation: 今村对男女无尽怪异的喜悦是滑稽的；但本质上，这也是一种敬畏。
back_translation: The endless and strange joy that Kimura feels towards men and women is comical; but essentially, it is also a form of awe.

text: halpern and rolov follow three young men : 23-year old straight-laced circuit virgin , brandon ; 21-year old party boy with a drug problem , tone ; and sensitive but strong-willed 19-year old , jon .
translation: 哈尔彭和罗洛夫跟随三名年轻男性：23岁的守规矩的电路处男布兰登；21岁的聚会狂人托尼，他有药物问题；以及性格敏感但意志坚定的19岁少年乔恩。
back_translation: Harpen and Roloff followed three young men: 23-year-old rule-abiding circuit virgin Brandon; 21-year-old party animal Tony, who has drug problems; and the sensitive but determined 19-year-old Jon.

text: the fight scenes are fun , but it grows tedious .
translation: 打斗场景很有趣，但变得乏味。
back_translation: The fight scenes are interesting but become tedious.

text: guns , money , and a chance at paradise . . .
translation: 枪支，金钱，以及通往乐园的机会……
back_translation: Guns, money, and the opportunity to paradise...

text: its weighty themes are too grave for youngsters , but the story is too steeped in fairy tales and other childish things to appeal much to teenagers .
translation: 其沉重的主题对年轻人而言过于严肃，但故事又浸透了童话和其他幼稚的元素，难以对青少年产生吸引力。
back_translation: Its heavy themes are too serious for young people, yet the story is permeated with fairy tale and other childish elements, making it difficult to appeal to teenagers.

text: with all the sympathy , empathy and pity fogging up the screen . . . his secret life enters the land of unintentional melodrama and tiresome love triangles .
translation: 在所有的同情、共鸣和怜悯模糊了视线的情况下……他的秘密生活进入了无意的戏剧化和令人厌倦的爱情三角关系。
back_translation: In all the cases where sympathy, resonance, and compassion blurred the vision... his secret life entered into an unintentional drama and a tiresome love triangle.

text: beneath clouds is the story of lena , the light-skinned daughter of an aboriginal mother and irish father and vaughn , a murri boy doing time in a minimum security prison in north west nsw .
translation: 《云下》讲述了琳娜的故事，她是一个土著母亲和爱尔兰父亲的浅色皮肤女儿，以及沃恩，一个在新南威尔士州西北部一所最低安全级别监狱服刑的穆里男孩。
back_translation: "Under the Clouds" tells the story of Lina, a light-skinned daughter of an Indigenous mother and an Irish father, and Vaughan, a Murri boy serving time in a low-security prison in northwest New South Wales.

text: bright seems alternately amused and disgusted with this material , and he ca n't help throwing in a few of his own touches .
translation: 布莱特似乎对这些材料时而感到 amused，时而感到厌恶，他忍不住添加了一些自己的风格。
back_translation: Brett seemed to feel amused by these materials at times, and disgusted at others, and he couldn't help but add some of his own style.

text: when raj 's family move to england to get involved in an internet business , raj promises tina that he will keep in touch with her and that their friendship will always be forever .
translation: 当拉杰的家人搬到英国参与一项互联网业务时，拉杰向蒂娜承诺，他会与她保持联系，他们的友谊将永远持续下去。
back_translation: When Raj's family moved to the UK to engage in an internet business, Raj promised Tina that he would stay in touch with her and that their friendship would last forever.

text: when wei is promoted from the rank of nightclub parking valet to the rank of debt-collector in brother gu 's gang , he persuades his boss to hire jie to work alongside him .
translation: 当韦从夜总会停车小哥的职位晋升为兄弟古帮派的讨债人时，他说服老板雇佣杰与他一起工作。
back_translation: When Wei was promoted from the parking attendant at the nightclub to a collector for the Brother Gu gang, he convinced the boss to hire Jie to work with him.

text: a perplexing example of promise unfulfilled , despite many charming moments .
translation: 一个复杂的例子，尽管有许多迷人的时刻，但承诺未能实现。
back_translation: A complex example, despite many captivating moments, the commitment was not fulfilled.

text: a path that will lead to the day in and day out drudgery of a soul-less survival or a path that will lead them down the road in pursuit their dreams .
translation: 一条通向日复一日毫无生气的生存所需的艰辛之路，或是通向追求梦想的道路。
back_translation: A difficult road leading to a lifeless existence day after day, or a path towards pursuing dreams.

text: when he loses his power the bully becomes victim and blames everyone else for his demise .
translation: 当他失去权力时，欺凌者变成了受害者，并把自己的失败归咎于其他人。
back_translation: When he lost power, the bully became the victim and blamed his failure on others.

text: chomsky places the terrorist attacks in the context of american foreign intervention throughout the postwar decades -- in vietnam , central america , the middle east , and elsewhere .
translation: 乔姆斯基将恐怖袭击置于美国在战后几十年中的外交干预背景下——在越南、中美洲、中东以及其他地方。
back_translation: Chomsky places terrorist attacks within the context of U.S. foreign interventions in the decades following the war—in Vietnam, Central America, the Middle East, and elsewhere.

text: all these games of chasing , rejecting and seducing are played out in an economically and spiritually depressed hong kong , without much gusto .
translation: 所有这些追逐、拒绝和诱惑的游戏都在一个经济和精神上都处于低迷状态的香港进行，毫无活力。
back_translation: All these games of chase, rejection, and temptation are taking place in a Hong Kong that is economically and spiritually depressed, lacking vitality.

text: the ultimate forms of hell are about to be unleashed on earth once again .
translation: 终极地狱的形式即将再次降临地球。
back_translation: The ultimate form of hell is about to descend upon the Earth once again.

text: a punch line without a premise , a joke built entirely from musty memories of half-dimensional characters .
translation: 一个没有前提的笑点，一个完全建立在陈旧记忆中的半维角色的笑话。
back_translation: A punchline without premise, a joke completely based on outdated memories featuring a half-dimensional character.

text: despite what anyone believes about the goal of its makers , the show . . . represents a spectacular piece of theater , and there 's no denying the talent of the creative forces behind it .
translation: 尽管任何人对其制作者的目标有不同看法，但这部剧……代表了一部壮观的戏剧作品，无法否认其背后创造力量的才华。
back_translation: Despite anyone's differing views on the creator's intentions, this play... represents a spectacular theatrical work, undeniably showcasing the talent behind its creative power.

text: dizzy harrison is an unpopular , high school geek going through a hellish senior year .
translation: 迪兹·哈里森是一位不受欢迎的高中书呆子，正在经历一个糟糕的高四年。
back_translation: Diz Harrison is an unpopular high school nerd who is having a terrible senior year.

text: according to wendigo , 'nature ' loves the members of the upper class almost as much as they love themselves .
translation: 根据温迪戈的说法，“自然”几乎和上层阶级成员爱他们自己一样爱他们。
back_translation: According to Wendigo, "nature" loves them almost as much as the upper-class members love themselves.

text: they all collide during the course of a typical no thrills weekend an urban fairy tale-romantic comedy , in which nola , an aspiring songwriter , leaves an abusive kansas home and journeys to new york to find her biological father .
translation: 他们都在一个典型的无惊无险的周末中相遇，形成了一场城市童话般的浪漫喜剧。在这个故事中，诺拉，一位有抱负的词曲创作人，离开了一个充满虐待的堪萨斯家，前往纽约寻找她的亲生父亲。
back_translation: They all met during a typical uneventful weekend, forming a romantic comedy reminiscent of an urban fairy tale. In this story, Nora, an aspiring songwriter, leaves an abusive home in Kansas to go to New York in search of her biological father.

text: when she hears about her plan going awry , she collapses .
translation: 当她听到她的计划出错时，她崩溃了。
back_translation: When she heard that her plan had gone wrong, she broke down.

text: a women from holland returns to indonesia , the country of her roots .
translation: 一位来自荷兰的女性回到印度尼西亚，回到她的根源之地。
back_translation: A woman from the Netherlands returned to Indonesia, back to her roots.

text: often hilarious , well-shot and , importantly , entertaining , hell house is a fascinating document of an event that has to be seen to be believed .
translation: 经常令人捧腹、拍摄精良、重要的是令人娱乐的《地狱屋》是一个引人入胜的事件纪录，必须亲自观看才能相信。
back_translation: "Haunt" is often hilarious, well-crafted, and, importantly, entertaining—it's a captivating event documentary that must be experienced in person to be believed.

text: ziyad and maryam are a happy young couple in lebanon , yet after three years of marriage they remain childless .
translation: ziyad和maryam是黎巴嫩的一对幸福年轻夫妇，但结婚三年后，他们依然没有孩子。
back_translation: Ziyad and Maryam are a happy young couple from Lebanon, but after three years of marriage, they still do not have any children.

text: the name refers to the green mountains they felt they were being pushed into ( out of their new homes ) .
translation: 这个名字指的是他们感到被推入的绿色山脉（离开他们的新家）。
back_translation: This name refers to the green mountains they feel pushed into (away from their new home).

text: paco ( debora falabella ) and tonho ( roberto bomtempo ) are illegal brazilian immigrants in new york .
translation: 帕科（德博拉·法拉贝拉）和汤霍（罗伯托·博姆坦波）是纽约的非法巴西移民。
back_translation: Paco (Deborah Falabella) and Tumho (Roberto Bomtempo) are illegal Brazilian immigrants in New York.

text: the police investigation that followed - led by detectives sam nico ( ted levine ) , louis cruz ( frankie g . ) and mike peters ( m . c .
translation: 随后的警方调查由侦探萨姆·尼科（泰德·莱文）、路易斯·克鲁兹（弗兰基·G）和迈克·彼得斯（M·C）领导。
back_translation: The subsequent police investigation was led by Detective Sam Nicco (Ted Levine), Luis Cruz (Frankie G), and Mike Peters (M.C.).

text: because eight legged freaks is partly an homage to them , tarantula and other low- budget b-movie thrillers of the 1950s and '60s , the movie is a silly ( but not sophomoric ) romp through horror and hellish conditions .
translation: 因为《八腿怪物》部分致敬于它们，以及1950年代和1960年代的狼蛛和其他低成本B级惊悚片，这部电影是一个愚蠢（但不是幼稚）的在恐怖和地狱般环境中的嬉戏。
back_translation: Because "The Eight-Legged Freaks" pays homage to them, as well as to the wolf spiders and other low-budget B-movie thrillers from the 1950s and 1960s, this film is a silly (but not childish) romp in a horrific and hellish setting.

text: williams has n't been this creepy since his starring role in popeye .
translation: 威廉姆斯自从在《大力水手》中担任主角以来就没有像现在这样让人毛骨悚然。
back_translation: Since taking on the lead role in "Popeye," Williams has never been as creepy as he is now.

text: pryor lite , with half the demons , half the daring , much less talent , many fewer laughs .
translation: 普赖尔轻版，半数的恶魔，半数的勇气，远少于的才能，少得多的笑声。
back_translation: A lighter version of Pryor, half demons, half courage, far less talent, and much less laughter.

text: there are times when a rumor of angels plays like an extended episode of touched by an angel -- a little too much dancing , a few too many weeping scenes -- but i liked its heart and its spirit .
translation: 有时，关于天使的传言就像是一集延长的《天使在身边》——有些过多的舞蹈，有些过多的哭泣场面——但我喜欢它的心和精神。
back_translation: Sometimes, the rumors about angels feel like an extended episode of "Angels Among Us" — with a bit too much dancing and a bit too many crying scenes — but I love its heart and spirit.

text: this `` hitchcockian `` thriller tells the story of a young new york investment banker ( hartnett ) who becomes obsessed with a woman he sees in a cafe , believing her to be his long-lost love , following her home to her apartment , where he waits for her , going so far as to put his engagement on hold .
translation: 这部“希区柯克式”的惊悚片讲述了一位年轻的纽约投资银行家（哈特尼特）痴迷于他在咖啡馆里看到的一位女性，认为她是他失散多年的爱人，跟踪她回到她的公寓，在那里等她，甚至将自己的订婚搁置一旁。
back_translation: This "Hitchcockian" thriller tells the story of a young New York investment banker (Hartnett) who becomes obsessed with a woman he sees in a café, believing she is his long-lost love. He follows her back to her apartment, waits for her there, and even puts his own engagement on hold.

text: unhappy father of a draining family he has no controls whatsoever over his life .
translation: 一个对疲惫家庭感到不满的父亲，他对自己的生活完全没有控制权。
back_translation: A father who feels dissatisfied with his exhausted family, who has no control over his life at all.

text: the new insomnia is a surprisingly faithful remake of its chilly predecessor , and when it does elect to head off in its own direction , it employs changes that fit it well rather than ones that were imposed for the sake of commercial sensibilities .
translation: 新的《失眠症》是对其冷峻前作令人惊讶的忠实重制，当它选择走自己方向时所做的改动与其风格相得益彰，而不是为了商业考虑而强加的改动。
back_translation: The new "Insomnia" is a surprisingly faithful remake of its icy predecessor, with changes that complement its style when it chooses to go its own way, rather than being imposed for commercial reasons.

text: if you saw it on tv , you 'd probably turn it off , convinced that you had already seen that movie .
translation: 如果你在电视上看到了它，你可能会关掉电视，确信你已经看过那部电影。
back_translation: If you saw it on TV, you might turn off the television, convinced that you have already seen that movie.

text: this mistaken-identity picture is so film-culture referential that the final product is a ghost .
translation: 这张错误身份的照片如此具有电影文化的参考意义，以至于最终成品就像幽灵。
back_translation: This photo of mistaken identity is so rich in cinematic references that the final product resembles a ghost.

text: a thoroughly entertaining comedy that uses grant 's own twist of acidity to prevent itself from succumbing to its own bathos .
translation: 一部彻底有趣的喜剧，运用了格兰特自身独特的辛辣幽默，避免陷入自身的沉痛之中。
back_translation: A thoroughly entertaining comedy that employs Grant's unique biting humor, avoiding getting trapped in its own pain.

text: `` austin powers in goldmember `` has the right stuff for silly summer entertainment and has enough laughs to sustain interest to the end .
translation: 《奥斯汀·鲍尔斯：黄金会员》拥有适合夏季娱乐的幽默元素，并且有足够的笑点让人保持兴趣直到最后。
back_translation: "Austin Powers: Goldmember" features humorous elements suitable for summer entertainment and has enough laughs to keep people engaged until the end.

text: the only hope is the veritas project , a highly trained investigative team working undercover to expose the truth .
translation: 唯一的希望是维拉提斯项目，一个高度训练的调查团队，秘密工作以揭露真相。
back_translation: The only hope is the Veritas Project, a highly trained investigative team working secretly to uncover the truth.

text: the painter visually depicts the life of a lonely immigrant woman who seeks companionship with the window repairman .
translation: 画家通过视觉呈现了一位孤独移民女性的生活，她渴望与窗户修理工建立陪伴。
back_translation: The artist visually depicts the life of a lonely immigrant woman who yearns for companionship with a window repairman.

text: `` nicholas nickleby `` is a perfect family film to take everyone to since there 's no new `` a christmas carol `` out in the theaters this year . charlie hunnam has the twinkling eyes , repressed smile and determined face needed to carry out a dickensian hero .
translation: 《尼古拉斯·尼克尔比》是一个适合全家人的完美影片，因为今年电影院没有新的《圣诞颂歌》。查理·汉纳姆拥有闪烁的眼睛、压抑的微笑和坚定的面孔，正是扮演狄更斯式英雄所需的。
back_translation: "Nicholas Nickleby" is a perfect film for the whole family, especially since there is no new "A Christmas Carol" in theaters this year. Charlie Hunnam has twinkling eyes, a suppressed smile, and a determined face, which are just what is needed to portray a Dickensian hero.

text: tykwer 's surface flash is n't just a poor fit with kieslowski 's lyrical pessimism ; it completely contradicts everything kieslowski 's work aspired to , including the condition of art .
translation: 泰克韦尔的《表面闪光》不仅与基耶斯劳斯基的抒情悲观主义格格不入；它完全与基耶斯劳斯基作品所追求的一切，包括艺术的本质，背道而驰。
back_translation: Tai Kewell's "Surface Flash" is not only incompatible with Kieslowski's lyrical pessimism; it completely contradicts everything that Kieslowski's works pursue, including the essence of art.

text: it 's gruesome violence combined with tongue-in-cheek humor . . . fans of this genre will flock to fulltime killer , and they 'll be blown away .
translation: 这是残酷的暴力与挖苦幽默的结合……这一类型的粉丝将会蜂拥而至《全职杀手》，他们会感到震撼。
back_translation: This is a combination of brutal violence and ironic humor... This type of fan will flock to "Professional Killer," and they will be shocked.

text: george `` ice man `` chambers ( rhames ) is a top ranked heavyweight boxer .
translation: 乔治“冰人”钱伯斯（拉莫斯）是一名顶级重量级拳击手。
back_translation: George "Iceman" Chambers (Ramos) is a top heavyweight boxer.

text: time literally stops on a dime in the tries-so-hard-to-be-cool `` clockstoppers , `` but that does n't mean it still wo n't feel like the longest 90 minutes of your movie-going life .
translation: 在努力变得酷炫的《时间停滞者》中，时间确实在一分一秒中停下，但这并不意味着它不会让你觉得这是你观影生涯中最长的90分钟。
back_translation: In the effort to be cool, "The Time Stopper" does indeed pause time for a minute and a second, but that doesn't mean it won't make you feel like this is the longest 90 minutes of your movie-watching life.

text: wonder of wonders -- a teen movie with a humanistic message .
translation: 奇迹中的奇迹——一部带有人文关怀信息的青少年电影。
back_translation: A miracle among miracles - a youth film with messages of humanitarian concern.

text: . . . a somber film , almost completely unrelieved by any comedy beyond the wistful everyday ironies of the working poor .
translation: ...一部阴郁的电影，几乎没有任何幽默感，除了那些对劳动阶层日常生活的伤感讽刺。
back_translation: ...a gloomy film with almost no sense of humor, except for the poignant irony about the daily lives of the working class.

text: based on a devilishly witty script by heather mcgowan and niels mueller , the film gets great laughs , but never at the expense of its characters
translation: 这部电影基于海瑟·麦戈万和尼尔斯·穆勒的极具机智的剧本，获得了很多笑声，但从不以角色为代价。
back_translation: This film, based on the witty script by Heather McGowan and Niels Mueller, generates a lot of laughs without sacrificing the characters.

text: the problem , amazingly enough , is the screenplay .
translation: 问题，令人惊讶的是，剧本。
back_translation: The question is surprisingly the script.

text: the entertaining new film version of robert ludlum 's 1980 spy thriller , the bourne identity , adds a crisp , tangy autumnal feel to the hot dog days of summer moviegoing .
translation: 罗伯特·拉德拉姆1980年间谍惊悚小说《谍影重重》的新版本，带来了清新、尖锐的秋季氛围，给炎热的夏季观影日增添了乐趣。
back_translation: The new version of Robert Ludlum's 1980 spy thriller "The Bourne Identity" brings a refreshing and sharp autumn atmosphere, adding enjoyment to the hot summer movie viewing.

text: about the only thing to give the movie points for is bravado -- to take an entirely stale concept and push it through the audience 's meat grinder one more time .
translation: 这部电影唯一值得称道的就是它的勇气——将一个完全陈旧的概念再一次推向观众的磨碎机。
back_translation: The only commendable aspect of this movie is its courage—to bring a completely outdated concept back to the audience's grinder once again.

text: the mothman prophecies , which is mostly a bore , seems to exist only for its climactic setpiece .
translation: 《蛾人预言》大部分内容都很无聊，似乎仅仅存在于其高潮戏剧性场景之中。
back_translation: Most of the content in "The Mothman Prophecies" is quite dull and seems to only exist within its climactic dramatic scenes.

text: like brosnan 's performance , evelyn comes from the heart .
translation: 就像布洛斯南的表演一样，伊夫琳来自内心。
back_translation: Just like Brosnan's performance, Evelyn comes from the heart.

text: the news of the assault causes a public outcry against the mutants , including renewed support for the mutant registration act , and william stryker , a military leader rumored to have experimented on mutants ( possibly including wolverine ) , is among the most vocal supporters of the legislation .
translation: 袭击事件的消息引发了公众对变种人的强烈抗议，包括对变种人登记法的重新支持。传言曾对变种人（可能包括金刚狼）进行实验的军事首领威廉·斯特赖克，是该立法最 vocal 的支持者之一。
back_translation: The news of the attack has triggered strong public protests against mutants, including renewed support for the Mutant Registration Act. The military leader William Stryker, rumored to have experimented on mutants (possibly including Wolverine), is one of the most vocal supporters of this legislation.

text: . . . familiar and predictable , and 4/5ths of it might as well have come from a xerox machine rather than ( writer-director ) franc . reyes ' word processor .
translation: ……熟悉且可预测，其中五分之四的内容更像是来自复印机，而不是（编剧兼导演）弗朗西斯·雷耶斯的文字处理器。
back_translation: ...familiar and predictable, with four-fifths of the content resembling more of a copy machine than the word processor of (screenwriter and director) Francis Reyes.

text: a story of love and enchantment set in the coldest of winters , it explores the issues , dilemmas and barriers facing the lucky and unlucky in love in the 21st century , based on the novel of the same name by pullitzer prize-winning author carol shields .
translation: 一个发生在寒冷冬季的爱情与魅力的故事，探讨了21世纪幸运与不幸爱情中面临的问题、困境和障碍，基于普利策奖获得者卡罗尔·希尔兹同名小说。
back_translation: A love and charm story set in a cold winter, exploring the challenges, dilemmas, and obstacles faced in 21st-century love—both fortunate and unfortunate—based on the Pulitzer Prize-winning novel by Carol Shields.

text: merely as a technical , logistical feat , russian ark marks a cinematic milestone .
translation: 《俄罗斯方舟》仅仅作为一项技术和后勤壮举，标志着一个电影里程碑。
back_translation: "Russian Ark" merely stands as a technical and logistical feat, marking a cinematic milestone.

text: and to make matters worse , he 's been replaced by a man with a moustache !
translation: 更糟的是，他被一个留着胡子的男人取代了！
back_translation: Worse still, he was replaced by a bearded man!

text: that rara avis : the intelligent romantic comedy with actual ideas on its mind .
translation: 那只稀有的鸟：一部真正有思想的聪明浪漫喜剧。
back_translation: That rare bird: a truly thoughtful clever romantic comedy.

text: nick is about to discover , true love can be found in the strangest of places . . .
translation: 尼克即将发现，真爱可以在最奇怪的地方找到……
back_translation: Nick is about to discover that true love can be found in the strangest places...

text: they are under the impression that models have more beauty than brains and are not capable of much more than looking good .
translation: 他们认为模特的美丽胜过智慧，除了好看之外几乎没有其他能力。
back_translation: They believe that a model's beauty surpasses her intelligence and that she has almost no other abilities apart from being good-looking.

text: fourth generation war hero col . william mcnamara is imprisoned in a brutal german pow camp .
translation: 第四代战争英雄威廉·麦克纳马上校被关押在一个残酷的德国战俘营中。
back_translation: Fourth-generation war hero William McNamara was imprisoned in a brutal German POW camp.

text: evans is such a capable storyteller that you find yourself liking him even though he 's not exactly likeable .
translation: 埃文斯是一位非常能干的讲故事的人，尽管他并不完全讨人喜欢，但你还是会发现自己喜欢上他。
back_translation: Evans is a very skilled storyteller; although he is not entirely likable, you will still find yourself growing fond of him.

text: what we have here is n't a disaster , exactly , but a very handsomely produced let-down .
translation: 我们这里并不是灾难，但确实是一个制作精美的失望。
back_translation: It's not a disaster here, but it is indeed a beautifully crafted disappointment.

text: when siti starts her `` siapa mr cinderella `` show , kumin is among the hundreds of fake mr cinderella that participates in the show to collect the reward .
translation: 当西蒂开始她的“谁是灰姑娘”秀时，库敏是参与这场比赛的数百个假灰姑娘之一，目的是为了获得奖励。
back_translation: When Siti began her "Who is Cinderella" show, Kumin was one of the hundreds of pseudo-Cinderellas participating in this competition, aiming for the rewards.

text: a generation x artifact , capturing a brief era of insanity in the sports arena that surely can not last .
translation: 一种X世代的文物，捕捉了体育竞技场中短暂而疯狂的时代，这种疯狂显然无法持久。
back_translation: An artifact from Generation X, capturing the brief and狂 crazy era in the sports arena, a madness that is clearly unsustainable.

text: move over bond ; this girl deserves a sequel .
translation: 让开，邦德；这个女孩值得有续集。
back_translation: Move aside, Bond; this girl deserves a sequel.

text: the pitch must have read like a discarded house beautiful spread .
translation: 这个提案的内容一定像是被丢弃的《美丽家居》特辑。
back_translation: The content of this proposal must resemble the discarded special edition of "Beautiful Home."

text: after leoncio 's death , robert feels terribly sorry for annie especially when he discovers that she is suffering from schizophrenia .
translation: 在莱昂西奥去世后，罗伯特对安妮感到非常歉疚，尤其是当他发现她正遭受精神分裂症的折磨时。
back_translation: After Leoncio's death, Robert felt very guilty towards Annie, especially when he discovered that she was suffering from schizophrenia.

text: linked to her only by cell phone , the driver narrows in on her location in a desperate race against time and tide .
translation: 司机通过手机与她保持联系，急切地缩小她的位置，进行一场与时间和潮水的绝望赛跑。
back_translation: The driver kept in touch with her through his phone, desperately narrowing down her location in a desperate race against time and the tide.

text: though this film can be clumsy , its ambitions are equally -- and admirably -- uncommercial .
translation: 尽管这部电影可能有些笨拙，但它的野心同样是非商业性的，而且令人钦佩。
back_translation: Although this film may be a bit clumsy, its ambition is equally non-commercial and admirable.

text: serry perfectly captures the peculiar climate , creating uncanny echoes with today 's situation .
translation: 谢里完美地捕捉了那种特有的气候，与今天的情况形成了不可思议的共鸣。
back_translation: Shelley perfectly captured that unique climate, creating an incredible resonance with today's situation.

text: one of those based-on-truth stories that persuades you , with every scene , that it could never really have happened this way .
translation: 这是一个基于真实故事的情节，让你在每一个场景中都坚信，这种事情不可能真的发生过。
back_translation: This is a plot based on a true story that makes you believe in every scene that such things could not have really happened.

text: this examination of aquatic life off the shores of the baja california peninsula of mexico offers an engrossing way to demonstrate the virtues of the imax format .
translation: 这部对墨西哥下加利福尼亚半岛沿海水生生物的考察提供了一种引人入胜的方式来展示IMAX格式的优点。
back_translation: This investigation of the marine life along the coast of Baja California, Mexico, provides an engaging way to showcase the advantages of the IMAX format.

text: stan lee discusses the origins of the industry ; neil gaiman and john byrne speak on superheroes as modern mythology ; frank miller and bill sienkewicz discuss the relationship of politics and comics ; peter david tells the story of the meanest thing he has ever done to a fan ; and much more .
translation: 斯坦·李讨论了这一行业的起源；尼尔·盖曼和约翰·拜尔讨论超级英雄作为现代神话；弗兰克·米勒和比尔·西恩凯维奇讨论政治与漫画的关系；彼得·大卫讲述了他对一个粉丝所做过的最恶劣的事情；还有更多内容。
back_translation: Stan Lee discussed the origins of the industry; Neil Gaiman and John Byrne talked about superheroes as modern myths; Frank Miller and Bill Sienkiewicz discussed the relationship between politics and comics; Peter David recounted the most terrible thing he had done to a fan; and much more.

text: it 's not so much a movie as a joint promotion for the national basketball association and teenaged rap and adolescent poster-boy lil ' bow wow .
translation: 这部片子与其说是一部电影，不如说是国家篮球协会和青少年说唱歌手小鲍·瓦之间的联合推广。
back_translation: This film is less of a movie and more of a joint promotion between the National Basketball Association and the young rap artist Lil Bow Wow.

text: but when the cockettes flew to new york city to appear off broadway^ & # 197 ; well , you 'll just have to see what happened when new yorkers took a look at them .
translation: 但是当小鸟们飞往纽约市，在百老汇外演出时，你得看看纽约人看到他们时发生了什么。
back_translation: But when the little birds flew to New York City and performed outside of Broadway, you have to see what happened when New Yorkers saw them.

text: a very long movie , dull in stretches , with entirely too much focus on meal preparation and igloo construction .
translation: 一部非常长的电影，节奏沉闷，过于专注于餐食准备和冰屋建造。
back_translation: A very long movie with a dull pace, overly focused on meal preparation and ice house construction.

text: mark , fresh from college , returns to his boring hometown to work off his gambling debts .
translation: 马克刚从大学毕业，回到他无聊的家乡去偿还他的赌博债务。
back_translation: Mark has just graduated from college and returned to his boring hometown to pay off his gambling debts.

text: macbeth . mcdonald 's . how far apart these poles of popular culture seemed until billy morrissette 's sly mcshakespeare crime comedy .
translation: 麦克白。麦当劳。在比利·莫里塞特的隐秘麦克白犯罪喜剧出现之前，这两种流行文化似乎有多么遥远。
back_translation: Macbeth. McDonald’s. How distant these two pop cultures seemed before the release of Billy Morrissette’s secret Macbeth crime comedy.

text: this unique short film follows the night of a young british insomniac named jack , narrated almost hour by hour from a first hand perspective .
translation: 这部独特的短片讲述了一位名叫杰克的年轻英国失眠者的夜晚，几乎从第一人称的角度逐小时叙述。
back_translation: This unique short film tells the story of a young British insomniac named Jack, narrated almost in the first person on an hour-by-hour basis.

text: when spain and portugal physically separate from the continent , the detached iberian peninsula aimlessly floats off to sea , becoming home to a group of god-like humans .
translation: 当西班牙和葡萄牙从大陆上物理分离时，脱离的伊比利亚半岛无目标地漂浮在海上，成为一群类神人类的家园。
back_translation: When Spain and Portugal were physically separated from the continent, the detached Iberian Peninsula floated aimlessly on the sea, becoming a home for a group of god-like beings.

text: beautiful , sophisticated women are all over oscar grubman .
translation: 美丽、优雅的女性遍布于奥斯卡·格鲁曼周围。
back_translation: Beautiful and elegant women surround Oscar Grueman.

text: goldmember has none of the visual wit of the previous pictures , and it looks as though jay roach directed the film from the back of a taxicab .
translation: 《金牌特务》没有前几部作品的视觉巧思，看起来杰伊·罗奇似乎是在出租车后座上导演这部电影的。
back_translation: "Kingsman: The Golden Circle" does not have the visual ingenuity of the previous installments, and it seems Jay Roach directed this movie from the backseat of a taxi.

text: 3 beautiful agents try to find the treasure , but they must fight the evil datuk azmi , an old enemy of madame x . it has been four years since the alien-seeking agents averted an intergalactic disaster of epic proportions .
translation: 三个美丽的特工试图寻找宝藏，但他们必须与邪恶的阿兹米达图克作斗争，后者是麦当娜X的老敌人。自从寻找外星人的特工们避免了一场史诗般的星际灾难已经过去四年。
back_translation: Three beautiful agents attempt to find a treasure, but they must fight against the evil Azmidatuk, who is an old enemy of Madonna X. It has been four years since the alien-hunting agents avoided an epic interstellar disaster.

text: if you 're as happy listening to movies as you are watching them , and the slow parade of human frailty fascinates you , then you 're at the right film .
translation: 如果你在听电影时感到幸福，就像在看电影时一样，并且人类脆弱的缓慢游行让你着迷，那么你来对地方了。
back_translation: If you feel happiness while listening to a movie, just like when watching it, and the fragile slow march of humanity captivates you, then you have come to the right place.

text: he tries , with his family 's support , to find a job and live a normal life .
translation: 在家人的支持下，他努力找工作，过上正常的生活。
back_translation: With the support of his family, he worked hard to find a job and live a normal life.

text: `` on guard ! `` wo n't be placed in the pantheon of the best of the swashbucklers but it is a whole lot of fun and you get to see the one of the world 's best actors , daniel auteuil , have a whale of a good time .
translation: 《警惕！》不会被列入最优秀的剑客电影之中，但它确实非常有趣，你可以看到世界上最好的演员之一，丹尼尔·奥图伊，玩得非常开心。
back_translation: "Beware!" will not be included among the best sword-fighting movies, but it is indeed very interesting. You can see one of the best actors in the world, Daniel Auteuil, having a great time.

text: against their better judgment , dara and noble agree to deliver the body to duluth and hope that will be the end of it .
translation: 尽管心里有顾虑，达拉和诺布尔同意将尸体运送到杜鲁斯，并希望这件事就此结束。
back_translation: Despite their reservations, Darla and Noble agreed to transport the body to Duluth, hoping that this would be the end of the matter.

text: while introducing his film mockery , he receives a phone call from his producer lying in intensive care at a hospital .
translation: 在介绍他的电影《嘲弄》时，他接到了来自住在医院重症监护室的制片人的电话。
back_translation: While introducing his film "Mockery," he received a call from the producer who was staying in the hospital's intensive care unit.

text: combine the paranoid claustrophobia of a submarine movie with the unsettling spookiness of the supernatural -- why did n't hollywood think of this sooner ?
translation: 将潜艇电影的偏执幽闭恐惧症与超自然的令人不安的神秘感结合在一起——好莱坞怎么没有更早想到这一点呢？
back_translation: Combining the paranoia of submarine movies with the unsettling mystery of the supernatural—why didn't Hollywood think of this earlier?

text: all of her hard work pays off when she is accepted to a prominent dance program in new york .
translation: 她的努力终于得到了回报，成功被纽约一所著名的舞蹈项目录取。
back_translation: Her hard work finally paid off, and she was successfully admitted to a prestigious dance program in New York.

text: unfortunately this film will not satisfy if you are looking to discover the missing link , but if you are simply interested in humor and some 'interesting ' footage , to say the least , you will not be disappointed .
translation: 不幸的是，如果你想发现缺失的环节，这部电影可能不会让你满意，但如果你只是对幽默和一些“有趣”的镜头感兴趣，至少，你不会失望。
back_translation: Unfortunately, if you're looking to discover the missing links, this movie may not satisfy you, but if you're just interested in humor and some "fun" visuals, at least you won't be disappointed.

text: there 's no mistaking the fact that this hybrid misses the impact of the disney classic , and even that of the excellent 1934 mgm version .
translation: 毫无疑问，这部混合体缺少了迪士尼经典的影响，甚至缺少1934年米高梅版的卓越。
back_translation: There is no doubt that this hybrid lacks the influence of Disney classics and even the excellence of the 1934 MGM version.

text: shae powell , a successful single mom , wakes up rattled from a horrible dream .
translation: 谢伊·鲍威尔，一位成功的单身母亲，惊慌地从一个可怕的梦中醒来。
back_translation: Shea Powell, a successful single mother, woke up in a panic from a terrible dream.

text: a movie version of a paint-by-numbers picture . we can tell what it is supposed to be , but ca n't really call it a work of art .
translation: 一部涂色图的电影版。我们可以看出它应该是什么，但不能真正称之为艺术作品。
back_translation: A movie version of a coloring book. We can see what it should be, but we can't really call it a work of art.

text: `` the mothman prophecies `` is a difficult film to shake from your conscience when night falls .
translation: 《飞蛾人预言》是一部在夜幕降临时很难从你的良知中抹去的影片。
back_translation: "The Mothman Prophecies" is a film that is hard to erase from your conscience once night falls.

text: now a new terminaor whos has power over all machines , has been sent back to kill him , the terminatrix or t-x ( kristanna loken ) who does n't require weapons as she has a laser cannon on her hand and is capable of turning herself into machinery .
translation: 现在，一个新的终结者被送回去杀死他，她是终结女（T-X，克里斯塔娜·洛肯饰），她对所有机器拥有控制权，并且不需要武器，因为她的手上安装了激光炮，并能将自己变成机械。
back_translation: Now, a new Terminator has been sent back to kill him; she is the Terminatrix (T-X, played by Kristanna Loken), who has control over all machines and does not need weapons, as she is equipped with laser cannons on her arms and can transform herself into machinery.

text: the fact that he owns the gun of a popular man , who got killed , from that town makes him prime suspect .
translation: 他拥有那位在该城镇被杀的知名人士的枪支，这使他成为首要嫌疑人。
back_translation: He possessed the firearm of the well-known individual who was killed in that town, making him the prime suspect.

text: [ a ] smarter and much funnier version of the old police academy flicks .
translation: 比旧版警察学院电影更聪明且更有趣的版本。
back_translation: A version that is smarter and more fun than the old Police Academy movie.

text: it 's unnerving , stimulating , likely to provoke anger and sorrow on both political sides -- and , above all , it 's extremely funny .
translation: 这让人感到不安，刺激，可能会激起双方政治的愤怒和悲伤——而且，最重要的是，它极其搞笑。
back_translation: This is unsettling, provocative, and may provoke anger and sadness from both sides politically - and, most importantly, it is extremely funny.

text: the nicest thing that can be said about stealing harvard ( which might have been called freddy gets molested by a dog ) is that it 's not as obnoxious as tom green 's freddie got fingered .
translation: 关于《偷哈佛》这部电影（可能本来叫《弗雷迪被狗侵犯》）最好的评价是，这部电影并不像汤姆·格林的《弗雷迪被指指点点》那样令人厌恶。
back_translation: The best comment about the movie "Stealing Harvard" (which may originally have been called "Freddy Got Fingered") is that it is not as obnoxious as Tom Green's "Freddy Got Fingered."

text: but her marriage is loveless and she suffers from the loss of her baby in childbirth .
translation: 但她的婚姻没有爱情，并且她因在分娩中失去了婴儿而倍感痛苦。
back_translation: But her marriage lacked love, and she was deeply saddened by the loss of her baby during childbirth.

text: viewers of `` the ring `` are more likely to remember the haunting images than the plot holes .
translation: 《指环》观众更容易记住令人毛骨悚然的画面，而不是情节的漏洞。
back_translation: Audiences of "The Ring" are more likely to remember the chilling visuals rather than the plot holes.

text: sleepwalking tells the story of three friends at three very different stages of their lives .
translation: 《梦游》讲述了三个朋友在他们生活中三个截然不同的阶段的故事。
back_translation: "Dream Travel" tells the story of three friends at three distinctly different stages of their lives.

text: he soon escapes and runs into a woman who has recently had a car accident and is suffering with amnesia .
translation: 他很快逃脱了，并遇到了一位最近发生车祸并正遭受失忆症的女人。
back_translation: He quickly escaped and encountered a woman who had recently been in a car accident and was suffering from amnesia.

text: while some of the subplots are very sketchy and the motivations of some of the characters are not clear , it is a journey worth taking because of the wondrous imagery .
translation: 尽管一些支线情节非常简单，某些角色的动机也不明确，但由于奇妙的意象，这段旅程是值得经历的。
back_translation: Although some subplots are very simple and certain characters' motives are unclear, the journey is worth experiencing due to the wonderful imagery.

text: is it possible for a documentary to be utterly entranced by its subject and still show virtually no understanding of it ?
translation: 一个纪录片是否有可能对其主题完全着迷，却几乎没有表现出对其的理解？
back_translation: Is it possible for a documentary to be completely obsessed with its subject yet show almost no understanding of it?

text: her cathexis was rapid and she formed an intense attachment to her young doctor , who seems to have reciprocated .
translation: 她的情感投资非常迅速，并且她与她的年轻医生形成了强烈的依恋，而这位医生似乎也对此作出了回应。
back_translation: Her emotional investment was very rapid, and she formed a strong attachment to her young doctor, who also seemed to respond to it.

text: along the way , ash continues to mature into the unstoppable pok & # 233 ; mon trainer he will become in the future .
translation: 在这个过程中，小智不断成长为他未来将成为的无敌宝可梦训练师。
back_translation: In this process, Xiao Zhi continuously grows into the invincible Pokémon trainer he will become in the future.

text: a muckraking job , the cinematic equivalent of a legal indictment , and a fairly effective one at that .
translation: 一项揭丑的工作，电影版的法律起诉书，而且相当有效。
back_translation: A job of exposing the ugly truth, a movie version of a legal indictment, and quite effective.

text: this is standard crime drama fare . . . instantly forgettable and thoroughly dull .
translation: 这是一部标准的犯罪剧……瞬间让人忘记，完全无聊。
back_translation: This is a standard crime drama... instantly forgettable and completely boring.

text: first time director sam jones documents the making of wilco 's fourth studio album , yankee hotel foxtrot .
translation: 首次执导的山姆·琼斯记录了威尔科（Wilco）第四张录音室专辑《扬基酒店空中楼阁》（Yankee Hotel Foxtrot）的制作过程。
back_translation: First-time director Sam Jones documented the production process of Wilco's fourth studio album, "Yankee Hotel Foxtrot."

text: we have poignancy jostling against farce , thoughtful dialogue elbowed aside by one-liners , and a visual style that incorporates rotoscope animation for no apparent reason except , maybe , that it looks neat .
translation: 我们有沉重与滑稽的碰撞，深思熟虑的对话被冷幽默推到一旁，还有一种视觉风格结合了旋转动画，似乎没有明显的理由，只有可能是它看起来很酷。
back_translation: We have a collision of heaviness and absurdity, thoughtful dialogues pushed aside by deadpan humor, and a visual style that combines rotating animations, seemingly without obvious reason, perhaps simply because it looks cool.

text: his mother persuades a renowned entomologist to take them on a trip to the jungle to search for the butterfly , leading to an adventure that will transform their lives .
translation: 他的母亲说服了一位著名的昆虫学家带他们去丛林寻找蝴蝶，这引发了一场将改变他们生活的冒险。
back_translation: His mother convinced a famous entomologist to take them into the jungle to search for butterflies, which sparked an adventure that would change their lives.

text: a martial artist , afflicted with a disease that makes beautiful women want to kill him , goes on a suicide mission to find true love anyway .
translation: 一位武术家，患有一种使美丽女性想要杀死他的疾病，尽管如此，他仍然踏上了一场自杀式的旅程，以寻找真爱。
back_translation: A martial artist, afflicted with a disease that makes beautiful women want to kill him, nevertheless embarks on a suicidal journey in search of true love.

text: terry and dean are lifelong friends who have grown-up together : shotgunning their first beers , forming their first garage band , and growing the great canadian mullet known as `` hockey hair `` .
translation: 特里和迪恩是一生的朋友，他们一起长大：喝第一罐啤酒、组成他们的第一支车库乐队，以及留着被称为“冰球头”的加拿大名发型。
back_translation: Terry and Dean are lifelong friends who grew up together: drinking their first can of beer, forming their first garage band, and sporting the Canadian hairstyle known as the "hockey hair."

text: the low-key direction is pleasingly emphatic in this properly intense , claustrophobic tale of obsessive love .
translation: 低调的叙述方式在这个恰到好处的、压抑的强烈痴爱故事中令人愉悦地强调。
back_translation: The understated narrative style pleasingly emphasizes the poignant and intense love story in just the right, oppressive manner.

text: everyone thinks that it 's him that has opened the chamber of secrets because that is what slytherin was famous for .
translation: 每个人都认为是他打开了密室，因为这正是斯莱特林出名的原因。
back_translation: Everyone believes that he opened the hidden chamber, as this is precisely the reason Slytherin is famous.

text: one senses in world traveler and in his earlier film that freundlich bears a grievous but obscure complaint against fathers , and circles it obsessively , without making contact .
translation: 有人在《世界旅行者》和他早期的电影中感受到，弗朗德利奇对父亲们有着一种严重但模糊的抱怨，并对此进行着执着的回旋，但始终未能触及。
back_translation: Some people feel in "The World Traveler" and his early films that Frandrich harbors a serious yet vague complaint against fathers, which he relentlessly circles around but never quite reaches.

text: a lot more dimensional and complex than its sunny disposition would lead you to believe .
translation: 比它阳光灿烂的外表所给人的印象要复杂和立体得多。
back_translation: It is much more complex and three-dimensional than the impression given by its sunny exterior.

text: it 's push-the-limits teen comedy , the type written by people who ca n't come up with legitimate funny , and it 's used so extensively that good bits are hopelessly overshadowed .
translation: 这是一部挑战极限的青春喜剧，类型是由那些无法想出真正搞笑内容的人创作的，并且使用得如此广泛，以至于好的片段被彻底掩盖。
back_translation: This is a youth comedy that challenges limits, created by those who cannot come up with truly funny content, and used so extensively that the good segments are completely overshadowed.

text: writer-director steven soderbergh follows up ocean 's 11 with the low-budget 'full frontal ' , his first digitally shot film .
translation: 编剧兼导演史蒂文·索德伯格继《十一罗汉》之后，推出了低成本的《全面接触》，这是他第一部数字拍摄的电影。
back_translation: Screenwriter and director Steven Soderbergh released the low-budget film "Full Contact" after "Ocean's Eleven," which is his first film shot digitally.

text: the movie features veteran horror heroines leslie culton and jenny wallace , and actors john saenz and jonathan tabor .
translation: 这部电影的主演是资深恐怖女演员莱斯利·库尔顿和珍妮·沃莱斯，以及演员约翰·萨恩斯和乔纳森·塔博尔。
back_translation: The main cast of this movie includes veteran horror actresses Leslie Coulton and Jenny Wallace, as well as actors John Sauns and Jonathan Tabor.

text: here the love scenes all end in someone screaming . maybe there 's a metaphor here , but figuring it out would n't make trouble every day any better .
translation: 这里的爱情场景总是以有人尖叫结束。也许这里有一种隐喻，但理清楚也不会让每天的麻烦变得更好。
back_translation: The love scenes here always end with someone screaming. Perhaps there is a metaphor here, but clarifying it won't make the daily troubles any better.

text: an entertaining and topical adventure drama which responds to our society 's fascination with doomsday cults , survivalist sects and their messianic leaders .
translation: 一部娱乐性和时代性兼备的冒险剧，回应了我们社会对末日邪教、生存主义教派及其救世主般领袖的迷恋。
back_translation: An adventurous drama that combines entertainment and timeliness, responding to our society's fascination with doomsday cults, survivalist sects, and their messianic leaders.

text: [ t ] he film is never sure to make a clear point M-^V even if it seeks to rely on an ambiguous presentation .
translation: 这部电影永远不会明确表达一个清晰的观点，即使它试图依赖模糊的表现。
back_translation: This film never clearly expresses a definitive viewpoint, even though it attempts to rely on vague representations.

text: on the road to lake tahoe , a stressed out young executive meets a woman who forever changes his life .
translation: 在通往太浩湖的道路上，一位压力重重的年轻高管遇见了一位改变他一生的女性。
back_translation: On the road to Lake Tahoe, a young executive under a lot of pressure met a woman who changed his life.

text: the primitive force of this film seems to bubble up from the vast collective memory of the combatants . it 's like watching a nightmare made flesh .
translation: 这部电影的原始力量似乎源自战斗者们浩瀚的集体记忆。就像是在观看一个化为现实的噩梦。
back_translation: The original power of this film seems to stem from the vast collective memory of the fighters. It's like watching a nightmare come to life.

text: the dialogue is very choppy and monosyllabic despite the fact that it is being dubbed .
translation: 对话非常生硬而且单音节，尽管它正在被配音。
back_translation: The dialogue is very stiff and monosyllabic, even though it is being dubbed.

text: who needs mind-bending drugs when they can see this , the final part of the 'qatsi ' trilogy , directed by godfrey reggio , with music by philip glass ?
translation: 谁还需要令人难以置信的药物，当他们可以看到这个呢，这是“qatsi”三部曲的最后一部分，由戈弗雷·雷吉奥执导，菲利普·格拉斯作曲？
back_translation: Who needs incredible drugs when they can see this? This is the final part of the "qatsi" trilogy, directed by Godfrey Reggio and composed by Philip Glass.

text: but ralph 's got a special talent - an ability to impersonate any hollywood celebrity - the perfect disguise to hide his stutter . . .
translation: 但拉尔夫有一种特殊的才能——能够模仿任何好莱坞名人——这是掩饰他结巴的完美伪装……
back_translation: But Ralph has a special talent - the ability to impersonate any Hollywood celebrity - which perfectly masks his stutter...

text: in gleefully , thumpingly hyperbolic terms , it covers just about every cliche in the compendium about crass , jaded movie types and the phony baloney movie biz .
translation: 它以欢快、响亮、夸张的措辞，涵盖了关于粗俗、厌倦的电影类型和虚假的电影产业几乎所有的陈词滥调。
back_translation: It uses cheerful, loud, and exaggerated language to cover almost all the clichés about vulgar, tedious movie genres and the false film industry.

text: how has the `` excitement `` of the 70 's turned into the `` blandness `` of today ?
translation: 70年代的“兴奋”是如何转变为今天的“单调”的？
back_translation: How did the "excitement" of the 1970s transform into today's "monotony"?

text: the action of the story derives from the collision of these two competing worlds .
translation: 故事的行动源于这两个竞争世界的冲突。
back_translation: The action of the story arises from the conflict between these two competing worlds.

text: what could and should have been biting and droll is instead a tepid waste of time and talent .
translation: 本应尖锐而机智的内容，现在却变成了乏味的时间和才华的浪费。
back_translation: What should have been sharp and witty content has now turned into a boring waste of time and talent.

text: but , sometimes what we teach our children can be as deadly as not teaching them .
translation: 但是，有时候我们教给孩子的东西可能和不教他们一样致命。
back_translation: However, sometimes the things we teach children can be just as deadly as not teaching them at all.

text: writer-director debrauwer does manage to wrap things up in an * * * -pleasing 78 minutes . it 's is n't much , but it 's a lot more than callous callie khouri did with that `` ya-ya `` mess . also , there are no irritating hats .
translation: 编剧兼导演德布罗尔确实在令人满意的78分钟内完成了故事。这虽然不算很多，但比冷漠的卡莉·库里在那部“雅雅”烂片中所做的要好得多。另外，没有令人烦恼的帽子。
back_translation: Screenwriter and director Debrohl indeed completed the story in a satisfying 78 minutes. While that isn't much, it's certainly better than the indifferent Carly Curry managed in that terrible "Yaya" film. Additionally, there are no annoying hats.

text: to say analyze that is de niro 's best film since meet the parents sums up the sad state of his recent career .
translation: 说《分析》是德尼罗自《见面家长》以来最好的一部电影，概括了他最近事业的悲惨状态。
back_translation: It is said that "Analyze This" is De Niro's best film since "Meet the Parents," summarizing the tragic state of his recent career.

text: and the detective is n't convinced that this will be the last . . .
translation: 而侦探并不相信这将是最后一次……
back_translation: And the detective does not believe that this will be the last time...

text: it suggests the wide-ranging effects of media manipulation , from the kind of reporting that is done by the supposedly liberal media . . . to the intimate and ultimately tragic heartache of maverick individuals like hatfield and hicks .
translation: 它暗示了媒体操纵的广泛影响，从所谓的自由派媒体所做的报道类型，到像哈特菲尔德和希克斯这样的特立独行者的亲密而最终悲惨的心痛。
back_translation: It suggests the widespread impact of media manipulation, from the types of reports produced by so-called liberal media to the intimate and ultimately tragic heartache of mavericks like Hartfield and Hicks.

text: based on an attraction at disneyland , the country bear jamboree , `` the country bears `` ( 2002 ) is one in a long line of live action disney family films .
translation: 基于迪士尼乐园的一个景点“乡村熊欢乐聚会”，电影《乡村熊》（2002）是迪士尼真人家庭电影系列中的一部。
back_translation: Based on the Disneyland attraction "The Country Bear Jamboree," the film "The Country Bears" (2002) is part of Disney's live-action family film series.

text: on her deathbed , candice klein accidentally asks the question , `` what did i ever do to deserve this ? ``
translation: 在她的临终床上，坎迪斯·克莱因不经意地问道：“我到底做了什么值得受这个惩罚？”
back_translation: On her deathbed, Candice Klein casually asked, "What exactly did I do to deserve this punishment?"

text: chao was chen kaige 's assistant for years in china . he has not learnt that storytelling is what the movies are about .
translation: 超在中国曾是陈凯歌的助手多年。他还没有意识到故事讲述才是电影的核心所在。
back_translation: Chao was once Chen Kaige's assistant for many years. He still hasn't realized that storytelling is the core of filmmaking.

text: stephen rea , aidan quinn , and alan bates play desmond 's legal eagles , and when joined by brosnan , the sight of this grandiloquent quartet lolling in pretty irish settings is a pleasant enough thing , 't is .
translation: 斯蒂芬·瑞亚、艾丹·奎因和阿兰·贝茨出演德斯蒙德的法律鹰，然后与布罗斯南一起，这个宏伟的四重奏在美丽的爱尔兰背景下悠闲地摆姿势，真是令人愉悦的景象。
back_translation: Stephen Rea, Aidan Quinn, and Alan Bates star in "The Law of Desire," and then, along with Brosnan, this magnificent quartet leisurely poses against the beautiful Irish backdrop, creating a truly delightful scene.

text: watching queen of the damned is like reading a research paper , with special effects tossed in .
translation: 观看《被诅咒的女王》就像在阅读一篇研究论文，中间夹杂了一些特效。
back_translation: Watching "The Cursed Queen" feels like reading a research paper, interspersed with some special effects.

text: shaun brumder is a local surfer kid from orange county who dreams of going to stanford to become a writer and to get away from his disfunctional family household .
translation: 肖恩·布拉姆德是来自橙县的一个当地冲浪少年，他梦想着能够进入斯坦福大学，成为一名作家，并摆脱他那个功能失调的家庭。
back_translation: Sean Blumberg is a local surfing teenager from Orange County who dreams of getting into Stanford University, becoming a writer, and escaping his dysfunctional family.

text: new best friend should n't have gone straight to video ; it should have gone straight to a mystery science theater 3000 video .
translation: 《新好朋友》不应该直接发行视频；它应该直接去拍摄《神秘科学剧院3000》的视频。
back_translation: "The New Good Friends" should not be released as a video directly; it should go directly to filming a video of "Mystery Science Theater 3000."

text: the mystery of enigma is how a rich historical subject , combined with so much first-rate talent . . . could have yielded such a flat , plodding picture .
translation: 《谜》的神秘在于这样一个富有历史感的主题，结合了如此多的一流才华……却怎么会产生如此平淡、沉闷的画面。
back_translation: The mystery of "The Riddle" lies in its historically rich theme, combined with so much top-tier talent... yet how could it result in such bland and dull visuals?

text: craig is an older , average-looking man who is n't handling aging well .
translation: 克雷格是一个年长的、外貌普通的男人，他对衰老的接受并不好。
back_translation: Craig is an older man with an average appearance, and he doesn't accept aging well.

text: in this cinematic concert , mesmerizing images are plucked from everyday reality , then visually altered with state-of-the-art digital techniques .
translation: 在这场电影音乐会中，迷人的图像从日常现实中提取出来，然后通过先进的数字技术进行视觉修改。
back_translation: In this film concert, enchanting images are extracted from everyday reality and then visually modified through advanced digital technology.

text: his destiny lies in the shadows of a black rose - the symbol of decayed innocence .
translation: 他的命运藏于黑玫瑰的阴影中——腐朽纯真的象征。
back_translation: His fate is hidden in the shadows of the black rose—a symbol of decayed innocence.

text: strangely comes off as a kingdom more mild than wild .
translation: 奇怪的是，它显得更像一个温和的王国，而不是狂野的。
back_translation: Strangely, it seems more like a gentle kingdom rather than a wild one.

text: gambling and throwing a basketball game for money is n't a new plot -- in fact toback himself used it in black and white . but toback 's deranged immediacy makes it seem fresh again .
translation: 赌博和为钱故意输掉一场篮球比赛并不是一个新情节——事实上，托巴克自己在黑白电影中也曾使用过。但托巴克的疯狂紧迫感让它看起来重新焕发了生机。
back_translation: Gambling and deliberately losing a basketball game for money is not a new plot—indeed, Toback himself used it in a black-and-white film. But Toback's crazy sense of urgency makes it seem revitalized.

text: smith examines the intimate , unguarded moments of folks who live in unusual homes -- which pop up in nearly every corner of the country .
translation: 史密斯观察那些住在不同寻常住房中的人们的亲密、毫无防备的时刻，这些住房几乎出现在全国的每个角落。
back_translation: Smith observes the intimate and unguarded moments of people living in unconventional housing, which can be found in almost every corner of the country.

text: two college grads land an entry level mafia job driving a retiring don 's car cross country .
translation: 两个大学毕业生找到了一份入门级的黑手党工作，负责将一位退休教父的车开跨国。
back_translation: Two college graduates found an entry-level job with the mafia, responsible for driving a retired godfather's car across countries.

text: screenwriter maureen tilyou , director martin duffy and an extremely competent cast handle the controversial aspects of the topic in an even-handed manner .
translation: 编剧莫琳·蒂利尤、导演马丁·达菲以及一支非常优秀的演员阵容以公正的方式处理了这一主题的争议性方面。
back_translation: Screenwriter Maureen Thillieu, director Martin Duffy, and a very talented cast have handled the controversial aspects of this theme in a fair manner.

text: katie 's father 's injury comes back to haunt him and he finds himself paralyzed from the neck down .
translation: 凯蒂的父亲的伤势开始反复发作，他发现自己全身瘫痪。
back_translation: Katie's father's injuries began to recur, and he found himself completely paralyzed.

text: he is imprisoned , awaiting the death sentence for his crimes .
translation: 他被监禁，等待因犯罪而判处死刑。
back_translation: He is imprisoned, awaiting a death sentence for his crimes.

text: now the chinese man shows up wanting the gems .
translation: 现在那个中国人出现想要宝石。
back_translation: Now that Chinese person has appeared wanting a gemstone.

text: the whole mess boils down to a transparently hypocritical work that feels as though it 's trying to set the women 's liberation movement back 20 years .
translation: 整个混乱归结为一个明显虚伪的作品，让人感觉它试图把女性解放运动倒退20年。
back_translation: The entire chaos boils down to a blatantly hypocritical work that makes one feel as if it is attempting to roll back the women's liberation movement by 20 years.

text: after selling the shop to a local loan shark , calvin slowly begins to see his father 's vision and legacy and struggles with the notion that he just sold it out .
translation: 在将商店出售给当地放贷者之后，卡尔文开始逐渐理解他父亲的愿景和遗产，并为自己刚刚出卖这一切的想法而感到挣扎。
back_translation: After selling the store to a local lender, Calvin gradually began to understand his father's vision and legacy, and struggled with the idea that he had just sold everything.

text: simultaneously devastating and hilarious , the film manages to capture the daily rituals and mundanities of life in such engrossing proximity that everything becomes drama .
translation: 既令人心碎又令人捧腹的电影，成功地捕捉了生活中日常仪式和琐事的紧密联系，使得一切都变成了戏剧。
back_translation: A movie that is both heart-wrenching and hilarious successfully captures the close connection between daily rituals and trivialities in life, making everything feel like a drama.

text: adam sandler 's heart may be in the right place , but he needs to pull his head out of his butt
translation: 亚当·桑德勒的心可能在正地方，但他需要把头从屁股里拿出来。
back_translation: Adam Sandler's heart might be in the right place, but he needs to get his head out of his ass.

text: that the e-graveyard holds as many good ideas as bad is the cold comfort that chin 's film serves up with style and empathy .
translation: 电子墓地中既有好点子也有坏想法，正是这一点让陈的电影以风格和同情心提供了冷静的安慰。
back_translation: The electronic graveyard contains both good ideas and bad thoughts, and it is this aspect that provides a calm comfort with style and compassion in Chen's film.

text: when virginia visits her aunt millie at christmas , she discovers a stack of handwritten letters over half a century old , and unlocks the story of her aunt 's youthful days as a young woman living in hamilton , mississippi , during the second world war .
translation: 当维吉尼亚在圣诞节拜访她的姑姑米莉时，她发现了一叠半个世纪前的手写信件，并揭开了她姑姑在第二次世界大战期间作为年轻女性在密西西比州汉密尔顿生活的故事。
back_translation: When Virginia visited her aunt Millie at Christmas, she discovered a stack of handwritten letters from half a century ago and uncovered the story of her aunt's life as a young woman in Hamilton, Mississippi during World War II.

text: ultimately engages less for its story of actorly existential despair than for its boundary-hopping formal innovations and glimpse into another kind of chinese 'cultural revolution . '
translation: 最终，它更吸引人的是其跨界的形式创新和对另一种中国“文化革命”的一瞥，而非演员的存在主义绝望故事。
back_translation: Ultimately, what makes it more appealing is its innovative cross-border form and a glimpse into another kind of Chinese "cultural revolution," rather than the existential despair stories of the actors.

text: a few nonbelievers may rethink their attitudes when they see the joy the characters take in this creed , but skeptics are n't likely to enter the theater .
translation: 一些非信仰者可能会在看到角色们对这个信条所感受的喜悦时重新思考他们的态度，但怀疑者不太可能走进剧院。
back_translation: Some non-believers may reconsider their attitudes when they see the joy the characters feel regarding this creed, but skeptics are unlikely to walk into the theater.

text: and although billy does n't want jackson , two other guys do : derek , a clean-cut record store customer , and sam , the straight record store owner .
translation: 尽管比利不想要杰克逊，但另外两个男生却想要他：德里克，一个精神饱满的唱片店顾客，和萨姆，一个正直的唱片店老板。
back_translation: Although Billy doesn't want Jackson, the other two boys do: Derek, an energetic record store customer, and Sam, an honest record store owner.

text: i walked away not really know who `` they `` were , what `` they `` looked like . why `` they `` were here and what `` they `` wanted and quite honestly , i did n't care .
translation: 我走开时并不知道“他们”是谁，“他们”长什么样子，“他们”为什么在这里以及“他们”想要什么，老实说，我并不在乎。
back_translation: I didn't know who "they" were when I walked away, what "they" looked like, why "they" were here, or what "they" wanted. To be honest, I didn’t care.

text: with the machine they travel across the country ( uruguay ) traing to escape to brazil .
translation: 他们乘坐机器穿越全国（乌拉圭），试图逃往巴西。
back_translation: They traveled across the country (Uruguay) in a machine, trying to escape to Brazil.

text: in the spirit of voltaire and moliM-hre , on guard volleys great wit and deadly gestures in a milieu of lush apparel , landscapes , captivating music and 18th-century lacy sleeves .
translation: 本着伏尔泰和莫里哀的精神，《保持警惕》在华丽的服装、迷人的风景、动人的音乐和18世纪的蕾丝袖子中展示了绝妙的智慧和致命的手势。
back_translation: In the spirit of Voltaire and Molière, "Stay Alert" showcases exquisite wisdom and deadly gestures amidst glamorous costumes, captivating scenery, enchanting music, and 18th-century lace sleeves.

text: exonerated of lying , king and cuthbertson are nevertheless reprimanded by the court for their behaviour , but receive an invitation to tea with the prime minister should they ever be in whitehall .
translation: 尽管金和卡斯伯特森被宣布无罪，但法院仍对他们的行为进行 reprimand，并邀请他们如果有机会来到怀特霍尔，去与首相共进午茶。
back_translation: Although Jin and Kasperton were acquitted, the court still reprimanded their behavior and invited them to have tea with the Prime Minister should they have the opportunity to come to Whitehall.

text: the kind of sweet-and-sour insider movie that film buffs will eat up like so much gelati .
translation: 那种酸甜口味的内幕电影，电影爱好者会像吃冰淇淋一样津津有味地享受。
back_translation: Insider movies with that sweet and sour flavor are something that film enthusiasts enjoy just like savoring ice cream.

text: [ it 's ] a clever thriller with enough unexpected twists to keep our interest .
translation: 这是一部聪明的惊悚片，拥有足够多的意想不到的转折来保持我们的兴趣。
back_translation: This is a clever thriller with enough unexpected twists to keep our interest.

text: the word that comes to mind , while watching eric rohmer 's tribute to a courageous scottish lady , is painterly .
translation: 在观看埃里克·罗梅尔对一位勇敢的苏格兰女士的致敬时，让我想到的词是“绘画般的”。
back_translation: The word that comes to mind while watching Éric Rohmer's tribute to a brave Scottish lady is "pictorial."

text: three fraternal bank robbers languishing in jail , discover a profitable ( if not dodgy ) way to spend their time .
translation: 三个兄弟般的银行劫匪在监狱中闲逛，发现了一种有利可图（尽管不太正当）的消遣方式。
back_translation: Three brother-like bank robbers are hanging out in prison and discover a profitable (albeit somewhat improper) pastime.

text: noyce films it more as a shocking history lesson than as drama .
translation: 诺伊斯更多地将其拍摄成一堂令人震惊的历史课，而非戏剧。
back_translation: Nois treats it more as a shocking history lesson than a drama.

text: a fourteen year old lad discovers his first love at the point of his pencil whilst drawing the portrait of a sickly but coquettish fifteen year old girl .
translation: 一个十四岁的男孩在为一位虚弱但妩媚的十五岁女孩画肖像时，发现了他初恋的感觉。
back_translation: A fourteen-year-old boy discovers his feelings of first love while painting a portrait of a frail yet charming fifteen-year-old girl.

text: a young professional discovers the difficulty of leaving the corporate nest .
translation: 一位年轻的职场专业人士发现离开企业巢穴的困难。
back_translation: A young professional finds it difficult to leave the corporate nest.

text: a demand for money is made and the men wait for payment .
translation: 有人提出了金钱的要求，男人们在等待付款。
back_translation: Someone has made a demand for money, and the men are waiting for payment.

text: but their cultural difference further separates them as lando ( antonio aquitania ) , isabel 's boyfriend , enters into the picture .
translation: 但他们的文化差异进一步使他们隔离，因为伊莎贝尔的男朋友兰多（安东尼奥·阿基坦尼亚）进入了他们的生活。
back_translation: But their cultural differences further isolated them, as Isabel's boyfriend Lando (Antonio Aquitania) entered their lives.

text: rarely has so much money delivered so little entertainment .
translation: 如此多的钱竟带来了如此少的娱乐，实属罕见。
back_translation: It is rare that so much money brings so little entertainment.

text: especially one girl , isa , has to choose between two boys who are fighting against each other .
translation: 特别是一个女孩，伊莎，必须在两个互相争斗的男孩之间做出选择。
back_translation: Especially a girl, Isha, must make a choice between two fighting boys.

text: the fictional film `` the dragon `` tells the story of how a young boy , who 's master is killed by a group of thugs , grows up to avenge his teacher 's murder .
translation: 虚构电影《龙》讲述了一个年轻男孩的故事，他的师父被一群恶棍杀害，他长大后为了为老师复仇。
back_translation: The fictional movie "Dragon" tells the story of a young boy whose master is killed by a group of villains, and as he grows up, he seeks revenge for his teacher.

text: michael , sr . and michael , jr . then set out to get revenge on the man who killed peter and mrs . sullivan .
translation: 迈克尔·老年和迈克尔·年轻随即出发，为杀死彼得和沙利文夫人的人复仇。
back_translation: Michael the Elder and Michael the Younger set off immediately to take revenge on the person who killed Peter and Mrs. Sullivan.

text: lukas and his friends live in a commune out in the woods .
translation: 卢卡斯和他的朋友们住在森林中的一个公社里。
back_translation: Lucas and his friends live in a commune in the forest.

text: when his affair with a young troubled janitor ( kidman ) is uncovered , the secret silk had harbored for over fifty years from his wife , his children and colleague , writer nathan zuckerman , fast explodes in a conflagration of devastating consequences .
translation: 当他与一位年轻的麻烦清洁工（基德曼）的绯闻被揭穿时，丝克隐藏了超过五十年的秘密，从他的妻子、孩子和同事作家内森·祖克曼那里，迅速在毁灭性的后果中爆发成一场大火。
back_translation: When his affair with a young troubled cleaner (Kidman) is exposed, Sirk reveals a secret he has hidden for over fifty years, leading to a devastating explosion that affects his wife, children, and colleague writer Nathan Zuckerman.

text: the most impressive quality of this charming movie is the way the characters , who are all recognizable 'types , ' refuse to behave the way we expect .
translation: 这部迷人电影最令人印象深刻的特点是，所有角色都是我们熟悉的“类型”，但他们拒绝以我们预期的方式行事。
back_translation: The most impressive feature of this captivating movie is that all the characters are familiar "types," yet they refuse to act in the way we expect.

text: after one gets the feeling that the typical hollywood disregard for historical truth and realism is at work here , it 's a matter of finding entertainment in the experiences of zishe and the fiery presence of hanussen .
translation: 在一个人感受到典型好莱坞对历史真相和现实主义的不屑一顾后，接下来就是在zishe的经历和hanussen的炽热存在中寻找娱乐。
back_translation: After a person feels the typical Hollywood disdain for historical truth and realism, the next step is to find entertainment in the experiences of Zishe and the fervent presence of Hanussen.

text: it 's a movie -- and an album -- you wo n't want to miss .
translation: 这是一部你绝对不想错过的电影——也是一张专辑。
back_translation: This is a movie you absolutely don't want to miss — it's also an album.

text: jolie 's performance vanishes somewhere between her hair and her lips .
translation: 朱莉的表演在她的头发和嘴唇之间消失了。
back_translation: Julie's performance disappeared between her hair and her lips.

text: what 's most unusual about beijing bicycle in terms of recent chinese history is that any form of class conflict is depicted at all .
translation: 在最近的中国历史中，北京自行车最不寻常的是任何形式的阶级冲突被描绘出来。
back_translation: In recent Chinese history, what is most unusual is the depiction of any form of class conflict in Beijing bicycles.

text: in present-day london , twelve-year-old quinn watches as his mother , a construction engineer , inadvertently wakes an enormous fire-breathing beast from its century-long slumber .
translation: 在现代伦敦，十二岁的奎因看到他的母亲，一位建筑工程师，无意中唤醒了一只沉睡了一个世纪的巨大喷火兽。
back_translation: In modern London, twelve-year-old Quinn sees his mother, an architectural engineer, accidentally awaken a gigantic fire-breathing beast that has been asleep for a century.

text: the story suffers a severe case of oversimplification , superficiality and silliness .
translation: 这个故事严重简化，表面化和幼稚。
back_translation: This story is overly simplified, superficial, and childish.

text: a criminal mastermind has set in motion a plan to infiltrate a high tech prison in order to persuade a death row inmate to reveal the whereabouts of $ 200 million worth of gold .
translation: 一个犯罪 mastermind 已经开始实施一个计划，渗透到一个高科技监狱中，以说服一名死刑犯揭示价值 2 亿美元黄金的下落。
back_translation: A criminal mastermind has begun to execute a plan to infiltrate a high-tech prison to persuade a death row inmate to reveal the whereabouts of $200 million worth of gold.

text: helmut busch ( now bruno ) will fall in love with adela , one of the activists , and that faces him into a dilema because he has orders to kill the head of the group where the young woman serves as a militant .
translation: 赫尔穆特·布施（现在叫布鲁诺）将会爱上阿黛拉，她是一个活动分子，这让他面临两难境地，因为他接到命令要杀掉该组织的领导者，而阿黛拉恰好是这个组织的激进分子。
back_translation: Helmut Busch (now named Bruno) will fall in love with Adela, who is an activist, putting him in a dilemma because he receives orders to kill the leader of the organization, and Adela happens to be a radical member of this organization.

text: a poky and pseudo-serious exercise in sham actor workshops and an affected malaise .
translation: 一个狭窄且伪严肃的伪演员工作坊练习，以及一种做作的不适感。
back_translation: A narrow and pseudoserious pseudoperformer workshop exercise, along with a sense of affected discomfort.

text: the trail is strewn with corpses and everything points to them as the killers .
translation: 小径布满尸体，一切都显示他们是杀手。
back_translation: The path is filled with corpses, and everything indicates that they are the killers.

text: this time nick is `` getting out ! `` . . . or
translation: 这次尼克是“准备出门了！”……或者
back_translation: This time Nick is "ready to go out!"... or

text: the talk-heavy film plays like one of robert altman 's lesser works .
translation: 这部话语繁多的电影像是罗伯特·阿尔特曼的一部较为逊色的作品。
back_translation: This talkative film is like a lesser work by Robert Altman.

text: the way home is an ode to unconditional love and compassion garnered from years of seeing it all , a condition only the old are privy to , and . . . often misconstrued as weakness .
translation: 回家的路是一首献给无条件爱与同情的颂歌，这种爱与同情源于多年目睹一切的经历，这是只有年长者才会拥有的状态，并且……常常被误解为软弱。
back_translation: The road home is a hymn dedicated to unconditional love and compassion, a love and compassion that stem from years of witnessing everything, a state possessed only by the elderly, and often... misunderstood as weakness.

text: semi-improvised on the streets of liverpool , dan reed 's drama brings the true face of britain 's underworld to light .
translation: 在利物浦的街头半即兴创作，丹·里德的戏剧揭示了英国地下世界的真实面貌。
back_translation: On the streets of Liverpool, Dan Reid's play reveals the true face of the British underground world through semi-improvised performances.

text: there 's a sweetness to it that 's disarming and diverting -- mostly thanks to performances of slater , richard dreyfuss as his partner in crime , and portia di rossi as dreyfuss ' daughter .
translation: 其中有一种令人心动和吸引的甜美，主要得益于斯莱特、理查德·德雷福斯作为他的犯罪搭档和波尔夏·迪·罗西作为德雷福斯的女儿的出色表演。
back_translation: There is a captivating and alluring sweetness, primarily attributed to the outstanding performances of Slater, Richard Dreyfuss as his criminal partner, and Portia de Rossi as Dreyfuss's daughter.

text: suffers from unlikable characters and a self-conscious sense of its own quirky hipness .
translation: 受制于不讨喜的人物和自我意识强烈的古怪时尚感。
back_translation: Restricted by unlikable characters and a strong sense of eccentric fashion.

text: the zany search for the shoes begins , as she follows the footsteps through the lively streets of havana , running into the quirky , colorful characters that bring viva zapato and dolore 's dream .
translation: 寻找鞋子的疯狂旅程开始了，她沿着哈瓦那热闹的街道追踪脚步，遇见那些古怪而多彩的角色，带来了维瓦扎帕托和多洛雷斯的梦想。
back_translation: The crazy journey to find the shoes began, as she traced footsteps along the bustling streets of Havana, encountering those quirky and colorful characters, who brought the dreams of Viva Zapato and Dolores.

text: a nicely constructed film with an unusual , though not unheard-of theme for chinese cinema .
translation: 一部制作精良的电影，主题独特，尽管在中国电影中并不鲜见。
back_translation: A well-made film with a unique theme, although not uncommon in Chinese cinema.

text: it is a journey that will take both carol and charlie to the edge of reality .
translation: 这是一次旅程，会把卡罗尔和查理带到现实的边缘。
back_translation: This is a journey that will take Carol and Charlie to the edge of reality.

text: bisset still commands the screen as the graceful and outspoken frances .
translation: 比塞特依然在屏幕上展现出优雅和直言不讳的法兰西斯。
back_translation: Bissett still displays the elegance and candor of a Francis on screen.

text: chomsky 's voice may be unpopular , but his incisive arguments , based on decades of research and analysis , are heard and considered in this chronicle comprised of interview footage , and various talks he 's given .
translation: 乔姆斯基的声音可能不受欢迎，但基于几十年的研究和分析，他犀利的论点在这部由访谈片段和他所做的各种演讲组成的纪实中被听到并受到重视。
back_translation: Chomsky's voice may not be popular, but based on decades of research and analysis, his sharp arguments are heard and valued in this documentary composed of interview clips and various speeches he has delivered.

text: it 's a mystery how the movie could be released in this condition .
translation: 不知道这部电影怎么会以这种状态发行，真是一桩谜。
back_translation: I don't understand how this movie could be released in such a state; it really is a mystery.

text: they are soon caught up in the erotic nature of the chat sessions they host , changing both their lives .
translation: 他们很快沉浸在他们主持的聊天会议的情色性质中，从而改变了他们的生活。
back_translation: They quickly immersed themselves in the erotic nature of the chat meeting they were hosting, thereby changing their lives.

text: liman , of swingers and go , makes his big-budget action film debut something of a clunker as he delivers a long , low-heat chase , interrupted by a middling car chase .
translation: 利曼的《摇摆者与出发》在他的大预算动作片首秀中显得有些乏力，因为他呈现了一场漫长、低调的追逐战，被一场平庸的汽车追逐所打断。
back_translation: Leman's "The Swingers and the Departure" feels somewhat lackluster in his big-budget action film debut, as it presents a long, subdued chase scene interrupted by a mediocre car chase.

text: never engaging , utterly predictable and completely void of anything remotely interesting or suspenseful .
translation: 从未吸引人，完全可以预见，完全没有任何远离有趣或悬念的东西。
back_translation: Never attractive, completely predictable, and entirely devoid of anything interesting or suspenseful.

text: michael , an obessive compulsive real estate dealer who enjoys `` the younger set . ``
translation: 迈克尔，一位有强迫症的房地产经纪人，他喜欢“年轻一代”。
back_translation: Michael, a real estate agent with obsessive-compulsive disorder, likes the "younger generation."

text: hardly a masterpiece , but it introduces viewers to a good charitable enterprise and some interesting real people .
translation: 虽然算不上杰作，但它让观众了解了一个好的慈善事业和一些有趣的真实人物。
back_translation: Although it cannot be considered a masterpiece, it helps the audience understand a good charity and some interesting real people.

text: because the intelligence level of the characters must be low , very low , very very low , for the masquerade to work , the movie contains no wit , only labored gags .
translation: 因为角色的智商水平必须很低，极低，真的非常低，才能让伪装奏效，这部电影没有机智，只有费力的笑料。
back_translation: Because the character's IQ level must be very low, extremely low, really very low, to make the disguise effective, this movie lacks wit and only offers forced humor.

text: he has to learn to accept ian ; ian has to learn to accept toula 's huge family , and toula has to learn to accept herself .
translation: 他必须学会接受伊恩；伊恩必须学会接受图拉的大家庭，而图拉必须学会接受自己。
back_translation: He must learn to accept Ian; Ian must learn to accept Tula's big family, and Tula must learn to accept herself.

text: obstacles pop up left and right , as the adventure gets wilder and wilder .
translation: 障碍不断出现，冒险变得越来越疯狂。
back_translation: Obstacles keep appearing, and the adventures are becoming crazier and crazier.

text: hank azaria and vincent d'onofrio also star as does screenwriter/comedienne heather morgan as the canine wife .
translation: 汉克·阿扎利亚和文森特·多诺弗里奥也参与主演，编剧/喜剧演员海瑟·摩根饰演狗妻。
back_translation: Hank Azaria and Vincent D'Onofrio also co-star, with writer/comedian Heather Morgan playing the role of the dog wife.

text: you have to pay attention to follow all the stories , but they 're each interesting . the movie is well shot and very tragic , and one to ponder after the credits roll .
translation: 你需要注意跟进所有故事，但每个故事都很有趣。这部电影拍得很好，非常悲惨，是一部看完片尾后值得深思的作品。
back_translation: You need to pay attention to following all the stories, but each story is very interesting. This movie is well-made and very tragic; it's a work that is worth contemplating after watching the credits.

text: on the heels of the ring comes a similarly morose and humorless horror movie that , although flawed , is to be commended for its straight-ahead approach to creepiness .
translation: 紧接着《戒指》的，是一部同样阴郁且无趣的恐怖电影，虽然存在缺陷，但值得赞赏的是其直白的恐怖呈现方式。
back_translation: Following "The Ring" is another equally grim and dull horror film. Although it has its flaws, it deserves praise for its straightforward approach to horror.

text: mr . soderbergh 's direction and visual style struck me as unusually and unimpressively fussy and pretentious .
translation: 索德伯格先生的导演风格和视觉风格让我觉得异常繁琐且毫无印象。
back_translation: Mr. Soderbergh's directing style and visual style make me feel extremely cumbersome and unimpressive.

text: this definitely delivers a remarkable mixture of explosive drama with wickedly ironical humor as you follow this eclectic story surrounding this tide-dyed , free spirited couple 's showdown with a mysterious faberge ' egg and a seedy , well-woven cast of criminals that will both trill and amuse .
translation: 这绝对带来了戏剧性与辛辣讽刺幽默的精彩混合，随着这对潮染、自由奔放的情侣围绕一个神秘的法贝热蛋和一群错综复杂的犯罪分子的对决，你将感受到既紧张又愉悦的故事。
back_translation: This definitely brings a dramatic and sharply satirical mix, as this pair of flamboyant and free-spirited lovers confronts a mysterious Fabergé egg and a group of complex criminals, you'll feel a story that is both thrilling and enjoyable.

text: . . . could easily be called the best korean film of 2002 .
translation: ...很容易被称为2002年最佳韩国电影。
back_translation: ...easily regarded as the best Korean film of 2002.

text: he 's your standard adrenaline junkie with no fear and a lousy attitude .
translation: 他是你标准的肾上腺素上瘾者，毫无恐惧，态度糟糕。
back_translation: He is your typical adrenaline junkie, fearless and with a terrible attitude.

text: remember the kind of movie we were hoping `` ecks vs . sever `` or `` xxx `` was going to be ? this is it .
translation: 记得我们曾经期待的电影《Ecks vs. Sever》或《XXX》会是什么样子吗？这就是它。
back_translation: Do you remember what we once expected the movie "Ecks vs. Sever" or "XXX" to be like? This is it.

text: as things become increasingly more complicated in the small community , the walls around father amaro begin to crumble .
translation: 随着小社区变得越来越复杂，阿马罗神父周围的墙壁开始崩溃。
back_translation: As the small community became increasingly complex, the walls around Father Amaro began to crumble.

text: moretti . . . is the rare common-man artist who 's wise enough to recognize that there are few things in this world more complex -- and , as it turns out , more fragile -- than happiness .
translation: 莫雷蒂……是少数懂得识别这个世界上很少有东西比幸福更复杂——而且，结果证明，更脆弱的——普通人艺术家的稀有例子。
back_translation: Moretti... is a rare example of an ordinary artist who understands that there are very few things in this world more complex—and, as it turns out, more fragile—than happiness.

text: a young man is found bruised , beaten and stumbling down a secluded road .
translation: 一个年轻男人被发现受伤、被打得遍体鳞伤，踉跄地走在一条偏僻的道路上。
back_translation: A young man was found injured, battered and bruised, staggering along a secluded road.

text: and having been with one woman his whole life , he loves to make silly jokes about how he , ami , steve , and claire should `` swap `` .
translation: 他一生都和一个女人在一起，他喜欢开一些傻笑话，关于他、阿米、史蒂夫和克莱尔应该“互换”。
back_translation: He spent his whole life with one woman, and he liked to tell some silly jokes about how he, Amie, Steve, and Claire should "swap."

text: plummer steals the show without resorting to camp as nicholas ' wounded and wounding uncle ralph . it 's a great performance and a reminder of dickens ' grandeur .
translation: 普拉默在没有依赖滑稽表演的情况下，成功成为焦点，饰演尼科拉斯的“受伤而又伤人的拉尔夫叔叔”。这是一次伟大的表演，提醒我们狄更斯的伟大。
