back_translation: Plummer successfully became the focus without relying on comedic performances, portraying Nicholas's "injured yet hurtful Uncle Ralph." It is a great performance that reminds us of Dickens's greatness.

text: they board the boat that is to carry them to the isles of the blessed .
translation: 他们登上了将他们带往幸福岛的船。
back_translation: They boarded the ship that would take them to Happiness Island.

text: the true story of revolutionary war leader ethan allen ( 1738-1789 ) and his group of fighters , the green mountain boys , who fought for the freedom of vermont before the war officially started .
translation: 革命战争领袖伊桑·艾伦（1738-1789）和他的战斗小组“绿山男孩”的真实故事，他们在战争正式开始之前为佛蒙特的自由而战。
back_translation: The true story of revolutionary war leader Ethan Allen (1738-1789) and his fighting group "Green Mountain Boys," who fought for the freedom of Vermont before the war officially began.

text: documentary feature about the traditional viennese cinema `` bellaria `` , which is specialised in german cinema from the 20s , 30s and 40s and its regular customers , whose idols are stars like zarah leander or karl sch & # 246 ; nb & # 246 ; ck .
translation: 关于传统维也纳电影院“贝拉里亚”的纪录片，专注于20、30和40年代的德国电影以及其常客们，他们崇拜的偶像是像扎拉·伦德尔或卡尔·香奈尔这样的明星。
back_translation: The documentary about the traditional Viennese cinema "Bellaria" focuses on German films from the 20s, 30s, and 40s, as well as its regular patrons, who idolized stars like Zarah Leander or Karl R. Schönherr.

text: [ the kid 's ] just too bratty for sympathy , and as the film grows to its finale , his little changes ring hollow .
translation: [这个孩子]实在太顽皮了，难以引起同情，随着电影接近尾声，他的小变化显得空洞。
back_translation: This child is really too mischievous, making it hard to evoke sympathy. As the movie comes to an end, his small changes feel hollow.

text: in any case , i would recommend big bad love only to winger fans who have missed her since 1995 's forget paris . but even then , i 'd recommend waiting for dvd and just skipping straight to her scenes .
translation: 无论如何，我只会推荐《大坏爱情》给从1995年的《忘记巴黎》以来一直想念她的Winger粉丝。但即便如此，我还是建议等DVD出来后，直接跳到她的戏份。
back_translation: In any case, I would only recommend "The Big Bad Love" to Winger fans who have been missing her since "French Kiss" in 1995. But even so, I still suggest waiting for the DVD and skipping straight to her scenes.

text: glizty but formulaic and silly . . . cagney 's 'top of the world ' has been replaced by the bottom of the barrel .
translation: 华丽但程式化和傻乎乎的……凯根的“世界之巅”已被“谷底”所取代。
back_translation: Gorgeous yet formulaic and silly... Kagan's "Pinnacle of the World" has been replaced by the "Bottom."

text: too loud , too long and too frantic by half , die another day suggests that the bond franchise has run into a creative wall that 007 can not fly over , tunnel under or barrel through .
translation: 《再死一天》过于嘈杂、过于漫长且过于疯狂，暗示邦德系列已经碰到了一个创意壁垒，007无法飞越、探隧或冲破。
back_translation: "Die Another Day" is too noisy, too long, and too crazy, suggesting that the Bond series has hit a creative wall that 007 cannot fly over, bore through, or break through.

text: back home , he encounters a place which no longer exists .
translation: 回到家，他遇到一个不再存在的地方。
back_translation: When he returned home, he encountered a place that no longer existed.

text: it 's a smart , funny look at an arcane area of popular culture , and if it is n't entirely persuasive , it does give exposure to some talented performers .
translation: 这是对一个晦涩的流行文化领域的聪明且幽默的观察，尽管它并不是完全令人信服，但确实让一些有才华的表演者得到了曝光。
back_translation: This is a clever and humorous observation of an obscure pop culture realm; although it is not entirely convincing, it has indeed given some talented performers exposure.

text: as both marly and desiree grapple with the sometimes overwhelming weight of family history and family expectations , and wrestle with questions of love , duty and responsibility , the tale offers a portrait of two women , two families , and two communities standing on the brink of change .
translation: 在玛莉和德西蕾努力应对家庭历史和家庭期望的沉重负担，以及在爱情、责任和义务的问题上挣扎时，这个故事描绘了两位女性、两个家庭和两个社区，正处于变革的边缘。
back_translation: The story depicts two women, two families, and two communities on the brink of change as Mary and Desiree struggle to cope with the heavy burden of family history and expectations, while grappling with issues of love, responsibility, and duty.

text: any one episode of the sopranos would send this ill-conceived folly to sleep with the fishes .
translation: 《黑道家族》的任何一集都能让这个不明智的愚行沉入海底。
back_translation: Any episode of "The Sopranos" can sink this foolish action to the bottom of the sea.

text: the reason this picture works better than its predecessors is that myers is no longer simply spoofing the mini-mod-madness of '60s spy movies .
translation: 这张图片比它的前作更成功的原因在于，迈尔斯不再仅仅是在模仿60年代间谍电影的迷你时尚狂潮。
back_translation: The reason this image is more successful than its predecessor is that Miles is no longer just mimicking the mini fashion craze of 60s spy films.

text: at its best early on as it plays the culture clashes between the brothers .
translation: 在最开始，它展示了兄弟之间的文化冲突。
back_translation: In the beginning, it showcases the cultural conflict between the brothers.

text: like a fish that 's lived too long , austin powers in goldmember has some unnecessary parts and is kinda wrong in places .
translation: 就像一条活得太久的鱼，《奥斯汀·鲍尔斯：黄金会员》有一些多余的部分，并且在某些地方有些不对劲。
back_translation: Like a fish that has lived too long, "Austin Powers: Goldmember" has some excessive parts and feels off in certain places.

text: helmer devito . . . attempts to do too many things in this story about ethics , payola , vice , murder , kids ' tv and revenge .
translation: 赫尔默·德维托在这个关于伦理、贿赂、罪恶、谋杀、儿童电视和复仇的故事中尝试做太多事情。
back_translation: Helmer DeVito tries to do too much in this story about ethics, bribery, evil, murder, children's television, and revenge.

text: based on a short story by bengali writer prafulla roy , the central idea developed by director dasgupta , tells the story of a girl , lati , whose mother rajani is a prostitute living and working in a brothel in rural india .
translation: 基于孟加拉作家普拉富拉·罗伊的一则短篇小说，导演达斯古普塔发展了一个中心思想，讲述了一个女孩拉提的故事，她的母亲拉贾尼是一名妓女，生活和工作在印度农村的一个妓院里。
back_translation: Based on a short story by Bangladeshi writer Prabha Roy, director Dasgupta developed a central theme that tells the story of a girl named Rathi, whose mother Rajani is a prostitute living and working in a brothel in rural India.

text: dramatic events throw them together on a journey with no money and no transport .
translation: 戏剧性的事件将他们聚集在一起，展开一段没有金钱和交通工具的旅程。
back_translation: Dramatic events brought them together, embarking on a journey without money and transportation.

text: looks more like a travel-agency video targeted at people who like to ride bikes topless and roll in the mud than a worthwhile glimpse of independent-community guiding lights .
translation: 看起来更像是一段针对喜欢赤裸上身骑自行车和在泥里打滚的人的旅行社视频，而不是对独立社区引导者的有价值的瞥见。
back_translation: It looks more like a travel agency video aimed at people who enjoy biking shirtless and rolling around in the mud, rather than a valuable glimpse into independent community guides.

text: it 's not a classic spy-action or buddy movie , but it 's entertaining enough and worth a look .
translation: 这不是一部经典的间谍动作片或搭档电影，但它足够有趣，值得一看。
back_translation: This is not a classic spy action film or buddy movie, but it's interesting enough to be worth watching.

text: racial bigotry , violence and corruption thrive in places like marquezas .
translation: 种族偏见、暴力和腐败在像马奎萨斯这样的地方滋生。
back_translation: Racial bias, violence, and corruption breed in places like Maquisas.

text: his loyal assistant is killed and he is framed with the evidence at the chinese border by the chinese military and u . s . drug enforcement agency .
translation: 他的忠诚助手被杀，证据被中方军方和美国缉毒局陷害至中国边境。
back_translation: His loyal assistant was killed, and the evidence was framed by the Chinese military and the US Drug Enforcement Administration to the Chinese border.

text: somewhere inside the mess that is world traveler , there is a mediocre movie trying to get out .
translation: 在这个糟糕的《全球旅行者》中，某个地方有一部平庸的电影试图挣扎而出。
back_translation: In this terrible "Global Traveler," there is a mediocre film somewhere trying to break free.

text: shae is about to return to bed when she hears water running in the bathroom .
translation: 莎艾正准备回到床上时，她听到了浴室里水流的声音。
back_translation: As Sha Ai was getting ready to return to bed, she heard the sound of running water in the bathroom.

text: when she gets into trouble with the police simon represses his death wish and decides to help her out .
translation: 当她与警方闹 trouble的时候，西蒙压抑了他的死亡愿望，决定帮助她。
back_translation: When she was causing trouble with the police, Simon suppressed his wish to die and decided to help her.

text: bullock 's complete lack of focus and ability quickly derails the film
translation: 布洛克完全缺乏专注和能力迅速毁掉了这部电影。
back_translation: Block completely lacked focus and ability, quickly ruining the film.

text: elsa keeps her head above water through several badly paid jobs and occasional criminal offences with her friends walter , laura and toni .
translation: 艾尔莎通过几份报酬微薄的工作和偶尔与朋友沃尔特、劳拉和托尼一起犯的犯罪行为来保持头 above 水面。
back_translation: Elsa keeps her head above water through a few poorly paid jobs and occasional criminal activities with her friends Walter, Laura, and Tony.

text: things really heat up when sparks sizzle between her and her new colleague at work , tiago , an irresistible , compulsive womanizer .
translation: 当她与新同事蒂亚戈之间产生火花时，事情真的变得热烈起来，蒂亚戈是一个不可抗拒、令人着迷的花花公子。
back_translation: Things really heated up when she began to feel a spark with her new colleague Tiago, an irresistible and charming playboy.

text: it 's too interested in jerking off in all its byzantine incarnations to bother pleasuring its audience .
translation: 它太专注于其复杂的变形而不愿去取悦观众。
back_translation: It is too focused on its complex transformations to please the audience.

text: hired to take mr . brown to a rendezvous with the devil ( gary oldman ) , the driver soon finds himself entangled in fiendish plans .
translation: 被雇佣送布朗先生去与魔鬼（加里·奥德曼）会面，司机很快发现自己卷入了阴险的计划中。
back_translation: Hired to take Mr. Brown to meet the devil (Gary Oldman), the driver quickly finds himself caught up in a sinister plot.

text: in the end , the film feels homogenized and a bit contrived , as if we 're looking back at a tattered and ugly past with rose-tinted glasses .
translation: 最终，电影让人感觉同质化且有些做作，就好像我们带着玫瑰色眼镜回望那个破旧而丑陋的过去。
back_translation: In the end, the movie feels homogenized and somewhat contrived, as if we are looking back at a worn and ugly past through rose-colored glasses.

text: when she 's approached one day by a handsome stranger while trying to hail a taxi , she becomes obsessed with him and eventually starts an affair .
translation: 一天，当她在试图招手叫出租车时，被一位英俊的陌生人接近，她对他产生了痴迷，最终开始了一段恋情。
back_translation: One day, while she was trying to hail a taxi, she was approached by a handsome stranger, and she became infatuated with him, eventually starting a romantic relationship.

text: lynn and yan shared an unspoken love in the past which is now rekindled in the open , and lynn begins to question whether she wants to continue to be an assassin .
translation: 林和燕在过去分享了一段无言的爱情，现在这种感情在公开场合重新燃起，林开始质疑自己是否还想继续作为一个刺客。
back_translation: Lin and Yan shared a silent love in the past, and now this feeling has reignited in public. Lin begins to question whether he still wants to continue as an assassin.

text: his story explores the ramifications of leaving afghanistan and living as a refugee in america .
translation: 这个故事探讨了离开阿富汗和作为难民在美国生活的后果。
back_translation: This story explores the consequences of leaving Afghanistan and living as a refugee in the United States.

text: when the professor turns up missing , one of his students , jake whitcomb , finds the professor 's journal , inside of which is a copy of the map .
translation: 当教授失踪时，他的一名学生杰克·惠特科姆发现了教授的日记，里面有一份地图的副本。
back_translation: When the professor went missing, one of his students, Jack Whitcomb, discovered the professor's diary, which contained a copy of a map.

text: a film that will be best appreciated by those willing to endure its extremely languorous rhythms , waiting for happiness is ultimately thoughtful without having much dramatic impact .
translation: 一部最佳欣赏于愿意忍受其极其缓慢节奏的人的影片，等待幸福的过程最终是深思熟虑的，但并没有太多戏剧性的冲击。
back_translation: A film best appreciated by those willing to endure its extremely slow pace; the process of waiting for happiness is ultimately thoughtful, but lacks much dramatic impact.

text: set in san francisco , this is the story of a mysterious immortal tibetan kung fu master ( yun-fat ) , who has spent the last 60 years traveling around the world protecting an ancient scroll , who is now mentoring a street kid ( scott ) in the wonders of his ancient ways . . .
translation: 故事设定在旧金山，讲述了一位神秘的不朽西藏功夫大师（云发），他花了60年的时间环游世界保护一卷古老的卷轴，现在正在指导一位街头男孩（斯科特）领略他古老方式的奇妙。
back_translation: The story is set in San Francisco and tells of a mysterious immortal Tibetan kung fu master (Yun Fa) who has spent 60 years traveling the world to protect an ancient scroll. He is now guiding a street boy (Scott) in experiencing the wonders of his ancient ways.

text: nights feels more like a quickie tv special than a feature film . . . it 's not even a tv special you 'd bother watching past the second commercial break .
translation: 这部电影感觉更像是一部快速播出的电视特别节目，而不是一部完整的电影……甚至连你不会在第二个广告中断后继续观看的电视特别节目都算不上。
back_translation: This movie feels more like a quickly aired television special rather than a complete film... it doesn't even qualify as a television special that you wouldn't continue watching after the second ad break.

text: it is no coincidence that funding for `` anti-graffiti `` campaigns often outweighs funding for the arts .
translation: “反涂鸦”运动的资金通常超过艺术资金，这并非巧合。
back_translation: The funding for the "anti-graffiti" movement often surpasses that of the art funding, and this is not a coincidence.

text: the characters seem one-dimensional , and the film is superficial and will probably be of interest primarily to its target audience .
translation: 角色似乎是单维的，电影显得肤浅，可能主要会吸引其目标观众的兴趣。
back_translation: The characters seem one-dimensional, making the movie appear superficial, likely only attracting the interest of its target audience.

text: aside from being the funniest movie of the year , simone , andrew niccol 's brilliant anti-hollywood satire , has a wickedly eccentric enchantment to it .
translation: 除了是今年最搞笑的电影，《西蒙》也是安德鲁·尼科尔卓越的反好莱坞讽刺作品，具有一种古怪而迷人的魅力。
back_translation: In addition to being the funniest movie of the year, "Simon" is also Andrew Niccol's outstanding anti-Hollywood satire, possessing a quirky and captivating charm.

text: reinforces the often forgotten fact of the world 's remarkably varying human population and mindset , and its capacity to heal using creative , natural and ancient antidotes .
translation: 强调了世界上人类人口和心态的显著差异这一事实，以及其利用创造性、自然和古老疗法的能力来治愈。
back_translation: It emphasizes the significant differences in human population and mindset around the world, as well as the ability to heal through creativity, nature, and ancient therapies.

text: soon it 's not just harry who is worried about survival , as dreadful things begin to happen at hogwarts .
translation: 不久之后，不仅是哈利担心生存，因为霍格沃茨开始发生可怕的事情。
back_translation: Soon, it was not only Harry who was worried about survival, as terrible things began to happen at Hogwarts.

text: as with so many merchandised-to-the-max movies of this type , more time appears to have gone into recruiting the right bands for the playlist and the costuming of the stars than into the script , which has a handful of smart jokes and not much else .
translation: 与许多此类最大化商品化的电影一样，似乎投入在为播放列表招募合适乐队和明星服装上的时间比在剧本上花费的时间更甚，剧本中只有一些聪明的笑话，没有其他更多内容。
back_translation: Like many such highly commercialized films, it seems that more time was spent recruiting the right bands and star costumes for the playlist than on the script, which contains only a few clever jokes and little else.

text: in his sleepy home town on the english coast , nothing much inspires him . . . apart from bowls .
translation: 在他那个沉睡的家乡，坐落于英格兰海岸，没有什么能够激励他……除了保龄球。
back_translation: In his sleepy hometown, nestled on the coast of England, nothing could motivate him… except for bowling.

text: beneath the uncanny , inevitable and seemingly shrewd facade of movie-biz farce . . . lies a plot cobbled together from largely flat and uncreative moments .
translation: 在电影事业的怪异、不可避免且似乎精明的表象之下，藏着一个由大量平淡且缺乏创意的时刻拼凑而成的情节。
back_translation: Beneath the strange, inevitable, and seemingly shrewd facade of the film industry lies a plot stitched together from a multitude of mundane and uninspired moments.

text: rather than spreading good cheer , the duo 's motive is to rob each establishment , a strategy that becomes complicated when they encounter a precocious 8-year old that teaches them the true meaning of christmas .
translation: 这对组合的动机不是传递快乐，而是抢劫每个商店，当他们遇到一个聪慧的8岁小孩并教会他们圣诞节的真正意义时，这一策略变得复杂。
back_translation: The motivation for this duo is not to spread joy, but to rob every store. Their strategy becomes complicated when they encounter a clever 8-year-old who teaches them the true meaning of Christmas.

text: serry does a fine job of capturing the climate of the times and , perhaps unwittingly , relating it to what is happening in america in 2002 . but hard-to-believe plot twists force the movie off track in its final half hour .
translation: 赛里很好地捕捉了时代的气候，也许不知不觉中将其与2002年美国发生的事情联系起来。但难以置信的情节转折在电影的最后半小时中让故事失去了方向。
back_translation: The film captures the climate of the times very well, perhaps unconsciously linking it to the events that occurred in the United States in 2002. However, the unbelievable plot twists in the last half hour of the movie cause the story to lose its direction.

text: transforms one of [ shakespeare 's ] deepest tragedies into a smart new comedy .
translation: 将莎士比亚最深刻的悲剧之一转变为一部聪明的新喜剧。
back_translation: Transform one of Shakespeare's most profound tragedies into a clever new comedy.

text: during his skyrocketing career , johnathan has to experience what alexi has found out : blood brings more viewing pleasure to the audience .
translation: 在他迅速上升的职业生涯中，约翰内斯不得不经历亚历克斯所发现的事情：血液给观众带来了更多的观赏乐趣。
back_translation: In his rapidly rising career, Johannes had to experience what Alex had discovered: blood brought more entertainment to the audience.

text: ghisu and rupi are now promoted as commanders of their new dalam .
translation: ghisu 和 rupi 现在被升职为他们新的 dalam 的指挥官。
back_translation: Ghisu and Rupi have now been promoted to commanders of their new dalam.

text: with no option , joe and katsuragi must use their martial arts skills to fight in the muscle dome .
translation: 在没有选择的情况下，乔和桂木必须利用他们的武术技能在肌肉穹顶中战斗。
back_translation: Without any choice, Qiao and Guimu must use their martial arts skills to fight in the muscle dome.

text: it 's an often-cute film but either needs more substance to fill the time or some judicious editing .
translation: 这是一部经常很可爱的电影，但要么需要更多的实质内容来填充时间，要么需要一些恰当的剪辑。
back_translation: This is a movie that is often quite charming, but it either needs more substance to fill the time or some appropriate editing.

text: the film presents a brief but intriguing biography of its subject .
translation: 这部影片简要而引人入胜地呈现了其主题的传记。
back_translation: This film presents a brief and captivating biography of its theme.

text: veteran film director matty bonkers ( bob rafelson ) , a hollywood legend , arrives in berlin for an honorary retrospective tribute .
translation: 资深电影导演马蒂·邦克斯（鲍勃·拉费尔森），好莱坞传奇人物，抵达柏林参加一场荣誉回顾展的致敬活动。
back_translation: Veteran film director Marty Bunks (Bob Rafelson), a Hollywood legend, arrived in Berlin to attend a tribute event for an honorary retrospective.

text: da primeira seqM-|M-jncia de luta M-` piada que encerra a histM-sria , o espectador jamais desgruda os olhos da tela , saindo do cinema com a sensaM-gM-co de que gastou bem seu dinheiro .
translation: 从第一场战斗序列开始，这部电影的故事就在一个笑话中结束，观众始终目不转睛地盯着屏幕，走出电影院时感到花钱非常值。
back_translation: From the first battle sequence, the story of the movie ends with a joke, keeping the audience glued to the screen, and they feel that their money was well spent when leaving the cinema.

text: with a cast of non-actors , drawn from the very world which the film portrays , 'shooters ' is not just another british genre gangster film - it 's a film about real british gangsters .
translation: 《射手》是由非职业演员出演，他们来自影片所描绘的真实世界，这部电影不仅仅是一部英国类型的黑帮电影——它是一部关于真实英国黑帮的电影。
back_translation: "Target" features non-professional actors who come from the real world depicted in the film. This movie is not just a typical British gangster film—it's a film about the real British gangsters.

text: this 'blonde goddess ' , however , left her career at its peak to devote herself to a life of meditation and religious devotion , in the mountains of rio de janeiro .
translation: 这位“金发女神”在事业巅峰时选择离开，投身于里约热内卢山区的冥想和宗教献身生活。
back_translation: This "blonde goddess" chose to leave at the peak of her career to dedicate herself to a life of meditation and religious devotion in the mountains of Rio de Janeiro.

text: holofcener sees all of her characters as loving and amazing and she spreads the love to each .
translation: 霍洛夫斯基认为她的所有角色都是充满爱和令人惊叹的，她把这种爱传递给每一个角色。
back_translation: Holovbski believes that all her characters are full of love and amazing, and she conveys this love to each character.

text: they 're also neighbours , living with widower fathers and problem siblings in the suburbs of taipei .
translation: 他们也是邻居，和寡父以及有问题的兄弟姐妹一起生活在台北的郊区。
back_translation: They are also neighbors, living in the suburbs of Taipei with their widowed father and troubled siblings.

text: the boys ' sparring , like the succession of blows dumped on guei , wears down the story 's more cerebral , and likable , plot elements .
translation: 男孩们的对练，就像一连串的拳击压在戈伊身上一样，削弱了故事中更具智力性和可爱的一些情节元素。
back_translation: The boys' sparring, like a series of punches weighing down on Go Yi, weakened some of the more intellectually engaging and charming elements of the story.

text: winnie falls inlove with one of the tucks , jesse , a `` 17 `` year old boy who shares the same feelings for her .
translation: 维尼爱上了塔克家族中的一个人，杰西，一个“17岁”的男孩，他也对她有相同的感情。
back_translation: Vini fell in love with someone from the Tucker family, Jesse, a "17-year-old" boy who also has the same feelings for her.

text: in the 1800 's there was a woman that little children would take their old teeth ( ones they had recently lost ) to in exchange for a gold coin .
translation: 在1800年代，有一位女性，小孩们会把他们刚掉落的旧牙齿带去换取一枚金币。
back_translation: In the 1800s, there was a woman to whom children would bring their fallen-out baby teeth in exchange for a gold coin.

text: may lack the pungent bite of its title , but it 's an enjoyable trifle nonetheless .
translation: 可能缺乏其标题所暗示的浓烈刺激，但它仍然是一项愉快的琐事。
back_translation: It may lack the intense stimulation implied by its title, but it is still an enjoyable trivia.

text: soon discovering that they 're in a strange fourth dimension where our laws of physics do n't apply , they have to unravel the secrets of the `` hypercube `` in order to survive . . .
translation: 他们很快发现在一个奇怪的第四维度，其中我们的物理法则不再适用，他们必须解开“超立方体”的秘密才能生存下去……
back_translation: They soon discovered a strange fourth dimension where our physical laws no longer apply, and they must unravel the secrets of the "hypercube" to survive...

text: a zippy , enormously entertaining heist movie that , with a kind heart at its core , encompasses the styles of yesterday , today , and if we 're lucky , maybe even tomorrow .
translation: 一部快速、极具娱乐性的盗窃电影，内心充满温情，融合了昨天、今天的风格，也许还有明天的风格，如果我们足够幸运的话。
back_translation: A fast-paced, highly entertaining heist movie, filled with warmth, blending styles of yesterday and today, and perhaps tomorrow's style, if we are lucky enough.

text: urban ground squirrels is the hilarious tale of love , friendship , and experiences set against the battlefield of a modern college campus .
translation: 城市地松鼠是一个关于爱情、友谊和经历的搞笑故事，背景设定在现代大学校园的战场上。
back_translation: "Urban Squirrel" is a comedic story about love, friendship, and experiences, set against the backdrop of a modern university campus battlefield.

text: with this masterful , flawless film , [ wang ] emerges in the front ranks of china 's now numerous , world-renowned filmmakers .
translation: 凭借这部精湛无瑕的电影，[王] 在中国众多世界知名的电影制作人中脱颖而出。
back_translation: With this flawless film, [Wang] stands out among many world-renowned filmmakers in China.

text: meanwhile , dre is growing increasingly restless with his company 's focus on profit over artistry , which leads to signing the gimmicky duo ren and ten while ignoring the talented chris .
translation: 与此同时，德雷对公司将重心放在利润而非艺术上的做法感到越来越不安，这导致他签下了花哨的二人组雷恩和滕，而忽视了有才华的克里斯。
back_translation: Meanwhile, Dre became increasingly uneasy about the company's focus on profit rather than art, which led him to sign the flashy duo of Rain and Teng, while neglecting the talented Chris.

text: the picture seems uncertain whether it wants to be an acidic all-male all about eve or a lush , swooning melodrama in the intermezzo strain .
translation: 这幅画似乎不确定自己想要成为一个酸涩的全男性版《亚当的女人》，还是一个在间奏中充满奢华与晕眩的情感剧。
back_translation: This painting seems unsure whether it wants to be a tart all-male version of "Adam's Woman" or an emotional drama filled with luxury and dizziness during the interlude.

text: the submarine 's crew , led by the unyielding captain alexi vostrikov , races against time to prevent a chernobyl-like nuclear disaster which threatens not only the lives of his crew , but has the potential to ignite a world war between the super powers .
translation: 潜艇的船员由坚定不移的船长亚历克西·沃斯特里科夫领导，他们与时间赛跑，以防止类似切尔诺贝利的核灾难，这不仅威胁到船员的生命，还有可能引发超级大国之间的世界大战。
back_translation: The submarine's crew is led by the steadfast Captain Alexei Vostrikov, as they race against time to prevent a nuclear disaster similar to Chernobyl, which not only threatens the lives of the crew but also has the potential to ignite a world war between superpowers.

text: jenny even turns to the flower girl - who is n't much help .
translation: 珍妮甚至转向花童，但她并没有太大帮助。
back_translation: Jenny even turned to the flower girl, but she wasn't much help.

text: one year later , in los angeles , the surviving team members create a smart and devious plan to steal back the gold and get their revenge on the traitor .
translation: 一年后，在洛杉矶，幸存的团队成员制定了一个聪明而狡诈的计划，夺回黄金并报复叛徒。
back_translation: A year later, in Los Angeles, the surviving team members devised a clever and cunning plan to regain the gold and take revenge on the traitor.

text: the pied piper production penned by christian otjen concerns a 36-year-old man ( brian wimmer ) who returns to his hometown to confront the harsh reality of his father 's supposed suicide .
translation: 由克里斯蒂安·奥杰恩创作的《纳米小号者》讲述了一名36岁男子（布莱恩·维默）返回故乡，面对父亲所谓自杀的残酷现实。
back_translation: "Nano Trumpeter," created by Christian Augien, tells the story of a 36-year-old man (Brian Wimmer) returning to his hometown to confront the harsh reality of his father's alleged suicide.

text: the brass are convinced this is a serial killer chosing victims at random , but sam and buckley discover a pattern involving health personnel who work in neonatal intensive care .
translation: 高层确信这是一名随机选择受害者的连环杀手，但萨姆和巴克利发现了一个涉及在新生儿重症监护中工作的医护人员的模式。
back_translation: The high-ranking officials are sure that this is a serial killer who randomly selects victims, but Sam and Buckley discovered a pattern involving healthcare workers in the neonatal intensive care unit.

text: zhang . . . has done an amazing job of getting realistic performances from his mainly nonprofessional cast .
translation: 张……在获取他主要是非专业演员的真实表演方面做得非常出色。
back_translation: Zhang... has done an excellent job in capturing the authentic performances of primarily non-professional actors.

text: it 's a beautifully accomplished lyrical meditation on a bunch of despondent and vulnerable characters living in the renown chelsea hotel . . .
translation: 这是一部精美成熟的抒情沉思，描绘了一群生活在著名切尔西酒店的沮丧和脆弱的人物……
back_translation: This is a beautifully mature lyrical reflection that portrays a group of depressed and fragile characters living in the famous Chelsea Hotel...

text: you see what he sees , you feel what he feels , you experience the horrible delusions and the verge of insanity as he struggles to find the thinning line between reality and the subconscious .
translation: 你看到他所看到的，你感受到他所感受到的，你体验到他在努力寻找现实与潜意识之间那条日益模糊的界线时所经历的可怕幻想和逼近疯狂的感觉。
back_translation: You see what he sees, you feel what he feels, and you experience the terrifying fantasies and the feeling of approaching madness that he goes through as he struggles to find the increasingly blurred line between reality and the subconscious.

text: part way through the filming , stevie is arrested and charged with a serious crime that tears his family apart .
translation: 在拍摄过程中，斯蒂夫被逮捕并被控以严重罪行，这使他的家庭支离破碎。
back_translation: During the filming process, Steve was arrested and charged with serious crimes, which shattered his family.

text: riveting when it focuses on the challenges of crossing a generational divide .
translation: 当它聚焦于跨越代际鸿沟的挑战时，十分吸引人。
back_translation: It is quite fascinating when it focuses on the challenge of bridging the generational gap.

text: the impact of the armenian genocide is diluted by too much stage business in the modern day .
translation: 亚美尼亚种族灭绝的影响在现代被过多的舞台事务所稀释。
back_translation: The impact of the Armenian Genocide is overly diluted by contemporary theatrical affairs.

text: windtalkers is shapelessly gratifying , the kind of movie that invites you to pick apart its faults even as you have to admit that somehow it hit you where you live .
translation: 《风语者》是不拘一格的令人满足，虽然你会挑剔它的缺陷，但你不得不承认它以某种方式直击你的内心。
back_translation: "The Wind Whisperer" is uniquely satisfying; although you might critique its flaws, you cannot deny that it strikes at your heart in some way.

text: a young boy is devastated when the planned vacation with his father is cancelled due to an emergency salvage mission at a remote canadian lake .
translation: 一个年轻男孩在与父亲的计划假期因紧急打捞任务而取消时感到沮丧，这个任务是在一个偏远的加拿大湖泊进行的。
back_translation: A young boy feels frustrated when his planned vacation with his father is canceled due to an urgent recovery task taking place at a remote lake in Canada.

text: a coming of age dramatic comedy dealing with the effect that two `` summers `` have on the lives of several teenagers .
translation: 一部成长剧情喜剧，讲述了两个“夏天”对几位青少年生活的影响。
back_translation: A coming-of-age comedy-drama that tells the story of how two "summers" impact the lives of several teenagers.

text: what really makes it special is that it pulls us into its world , gives us a hero whose suffering and triumphs we can share , surrounds him with interesting characters and sends us out of the theater feeling we 've shared a great adventure .
translation: 真正让它特别的是，它把我们带入它的世界，让我们有一个可以分享其痛苦和胜利的英雄，周围有有趣的角色，并让我们走出影院时感到我们分享了一次伟大的冒险。
back_translation: What truly makes it special is that it takes us into its world, allowing us to share in the pain and victories of its hero, surrounded by interesting characters, and leaving us feeling like we’ve shared in a great adventure when we walk out of the cinema.

text: she is really hiding her true emotional motivation behind a mask .
translation: 她实际上是在面具后隐藏她真实的情感动机。
back_translation: She is actually hiding her true emotional motives behind a mask.

text: it showcases carvey 's talent for voices , but not nearly enough and not without taxing every drop of one 's patience to get to the good stuff .
translation: 它展示了卡维在声音方面的才华，但远远不够，并且在达到精彩内容的过程中极大地消耗了每一滴耐心。
back_translation: It showcases Kaveh's talent in sound, but it's far from sufficient, and it greatly consumes every drop of patience in the process of reaching something remarkable.

text: though the film is well-intentioned , one could rent the original and get the same love story and parable .
translation: 尽管这部电影是出于善意，但人们可以租借原版并获得相同的爱情故事和寓言。
back_translation: Although this movie is made with good intentions, people can rent the original version and get the same love story and fable.

text: harry potter is in his second year of hogwarts school of witchcraft and wizardry .
translation: 哈利·波特在霍格沃茨魔法与巫术学校的第二年。
back_translation: Harry Potter's second year at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

text: as the girls foil this threat and defeat an army of superpowered monkeys , the powerpuff girls learn that with great power comes great responsibility .
translation: 当女孩们化解这一威胁并击败一支超能力猴子军队时，泡泡糖女孩们明白了巨大的力量伴随着巨大的责任。
back_translation: When the girls resolved this threat and defeated a super-powered monkey army, the Powerpuff Girls understood that with great power comes great responsibility.

text: the actors improvise and scream their way around this movie directionless , lacking any of the rollicking dark humor so necessary to make this kind of idea work on screen .
translation: 演员们在这部电影中即兴表演并尖叫，毫无方向感，缺乏使这种想法在银幕上奏效所必需的欢快黑暗幽默。
back_translation: The actors improvise and scream in this movie, lacking a sense of direction and the cheerful dark humor necessary to make this concept work on screen.

text: usually when i get this much syrup , i like pancakes to go with it .
translation: 通常当我有这么多糖浆时，我喜欢配上煎饼。
back_translation: Usually when I have so much syrup, I like to pair it with pancakes.

text: it is then that they discover the myth of 'the bread in the bed ' - a huge bed full of money .
translation: 就在那时，他们发现了“床上的面包”这个神话——一张满是钱的巨大床。
back_translation: At that moment, they discovered the myth of "bread on the bed" — a huge bed full of money.

text: no , the dangerous lives of altar boys does not exist in a state of perfect grace . however , its sins are forgivably venial , because its virtues are palpably human .
translation: 不，祭坛男孩的危险生活并不存在于完美优雅的状态中。然而，它的罪恶是可以被宽恕的小罪，因为它的美德显然是人性的。
back_translation: No, the dangerous life of the altar boy does not exist in a state of perfect elegance. However, its sins are small offenses that can be forgiven, because its virtues are evidently human.

text: a coming-of-age film that avoids the cartoonish clichM-is and sneering humor of the genre as it provides a fresh view of an old type -- the uncertain girl on the brink of womanhood .
translation: 一部成长电影，避免了该类型中的卡通化陈词滥调和嘲讽的幽默，提供了对一种旧类型的新视角——一个在迈向成年之际感到不确定的女孩。
back_translation: A coming-of-age film that avoids the cartoonish clichés and sarcastic humor typical of the genre, offering a fresh perspective on an old trope—a girl who feels uncertain as she approaches adulthood.

text: like being trapped inside a huge video game , where exciting , inane images keep popping past your head and the same illogical things keep happening over and over again .
translation: 就像被困在一个巨大的电子游戏中，刺激的荒谬画面不断在你脑海中闪过，而同样不合逻辑的事情则一次又一次地重演。
back_translation: It's like being trapped in a massive video game, with thrilling and absurd images flashing through your mind, while the same illogical events replay over and over again.

text: his house , container of lives and memories , is closed and locked .
translation: 他的房子，盛载着生活和记忆的容器，已关闭并上了锁。
back_translation: His house, a container filled with life and memories, has been closed and locked.

text: the case gets more complicated , when even the police themselves appear to become suspects in the murders .
translation: 案件变得更加复杂，因为甚至连警察自己似乎也成为了谋杀案的嫌疑人。
back_translation: The case has become more complicated, as even the police themselves seem to have become suspects in the murder.

text: watching spirited away is like watching an eastern imagination explode .
translation: 观看《千与千寻》就像目睹一种东方想象的绽放。
back_translation: Watching "Spirited Away" is like witnessing the blossoming of an Eastern imagination.

text: strong setup and ambitious goals fade as the film descends into unsophisticated scare tactics and b-film thuggery .
translation: 强有力的情节设定和雄心勃勃的目标在影片逐渐陷入不成熟的惊吓策略和B级片的打斗场面时逐渐消退。
back_translation: The strong plot setting and ambitious goals gradually fade as the film descends into immature jump scares and B-movie fight scenes.

text: devoid of any of the qualities that made the first film so special .
translation: 缺乏使第一部电影如此特别的任何品质。
back_translation: Lacking any qualities that made the first film so special.

text: in comparison to his earlier films it seems a disappointingly thin slice of lower-class london life ; despite the title . . . amounts to surprisingly little .
translation: 与他早期的电影相比，这部影片似乎是一幅令人失望的伦敦下层阶级生活的薄片；尽管有这个标题……实际上所呈现的内容令人惊讶地少。
back_translation: Compared to his earlier films, this movie seems like a disappointing slice of life from London's lower class; despite its title... the actual content presented is surprisingly minimal.

text: in order to preserve her art and also herself , beyond death , for all posterity , she has herself cloned .
translation: 为了保护她的艺术和她自己，超越死亡，为了所有的后世，她选择了克隆自己。
back_translation: In order to protect her art and herself, transcending death, for all future generations, she chose to clone herself.

text: it 's a mindless action flick with a twist -- far better suited to video-viewing than the multiplex .
translation: 这是一部毫无意义的动作片，带有一个扭曲的情节——比起在电影院播放，更适合在视频上观看。
back_translation: This is a completely meaningless action film with a twisted plot — it's more suited for watching on video than in a theater.

text: it 's excessively quirky and a little underconfident in its delivery , but otherwise this is the best 'old neighborhood ' project since christopher walken kinda romanced cyndi lauper in the opportunists .
translation: 这部作品过于古怪，传达上有些缺乏自信，但除此之外，这是自克里斯托弗·沃肯在《机会主义者》中有些调情辛迪·劳波以来，最好的“老社区”项目。
back_translation: This work is too quirky and conveys a bit of lack of confidence, but aside from that, it's the best "old school" project since Christopher Walken's somewhat flirtatious performance in "The Opportunists."

text: april 's shower is a comedy about love , romance and expectation .
translation: 四月的阵雨是一场关于爱情、浪漫和期待的喜剧。
back_translation: The April showers are a comedy about love, romance, and anticipation.

text: kilo is now a free man and a new father with a drug franchise covering both coasts .
translation: 基洛现在是一个自由人，还是一个新父亲，他拥有一个覆盖东西海岸的毒品加盟店。
back_translation: Kilo is now a free man and a new father; he owns a drug franchise that covers the East and West Coasts.

text: hitting the road in a brand-new suv , they 're having the time of their lives until something funny happens on the way to the monster truck show in reno .
translation: 驾驶着一辆崭新的SUV，他们享受着人生中最快乐的时光，直到前往雷诺的怪物卡车秀途中发生了一件有趣的事情。
back_translation: Driving a brand new SUV, they were enjoying the happiest time of their lives until something interesting happened on the way to the Renault monster truck show.

text: as laughable is his vanity fair interview , incriminating of `` the gay mafia `` for his fall , `` my dinner with ovitz `` is even funnier as it rams the actual interview headlong into coppola 's `` godfather . ``
translation: 他的《维尼尔杂志》采访是如此可笑，指责“同性恋黑手党”导致他的堕落，而《我与奥维茨的晚餐》则更搞笑，因为它将实际采访生猛地撞入了科波拉的《教父》。
back_translation: His interview with "Viniere Magazine" is so ridiculous, blaming the "gay mafia" for his downfall, while "Dinner with Ovitz" is even more amusing because it violently collides the actual interview with Coppola's "The Godfather."

text: peter pan 's quest to return jane safely home is jeopardized until she can begin to believe in the magic of imagination .
translation: 彼得·潘返回简安全回家的任务受到威胁，直到她能够开始相信想象的魔力。
back_translation: Peter Pan's mission to bring Jane home safely is threatened until she begins to believe in the magic of imagination.

text: a literate presentation that wonderfully weaves a murderous event in 1873 with murderous rage in 2002 .
translation: 一场文采斐然的演讲，精彩地将1873年的一起谋杀事件与2002年的杀人狂热交织在一起。
back_translation: An eloquent speech intricately wove together a murder case from 1873 with the killing frenzy of 2002.

text: based on a david leavitt story , the film shares that writer 's usual blend of observant cleverness , too-facile coincidence and slightly noxious preciousness .
translation: 这部电影基于大卫·利维特的故事，展现了他一贯的观察智慧、过于巧合的情节和略显毒性的矫饰。
back_translation: This film is based on David Levithan's story, showcasing his consistent observational wit, overly coincidental plotlines, and slightly toxic embellishments.

text: it 's not a film to be taken literally on any level , but its focus always appears questionable .
translation: 这部电影在任何层面上都不应被字面理解，但其焦点总是显得值得怀疑。
back_translation: This movie should not be taken literally on any level, but its focus always seems to be worth questioning.

text: in this sense it is merely a travelogue , yet there is so much more , spanning from the traditional to the avant-garde , from the sublime to the ridiculous , very different , highly original and with a unique zeitgeist narrative structure .
translation: 在这个意义上，它仅仅是一部旅行游记，但还有更多内容，涵盖了从传统到先锋，从崇高到荒谬，非常不同，极具原创性，并具有独特的时代精神叙事结构。
back_translation: In this sense, it is merely a travelogue, but it contains much more, covering a wide range from the traditional to the avant-garde, from the sublime to the absurd, very different, highly original, and possessing a unique narrative structure that reflects the spirit of the times.

text: one day , a girl walks into his store , who looks like larry 's lost love from morocco .
translation: 一天，一个女孩走进他的店，她看起来像拉里的失落之爱，从摩洛哥来。
back_translation: One day, a girl walked into his shop; she looked like Larry's lost love, coming from Morocco.

text: gradually we learn of joe 's past relationship with the dead woman .
translation: 我们逐渐了解到乔与那位已故女性的过去关系。
back_translation: We gradually learned about Joe's past relationship with the deceased woman.

text: the secrets of time travel will have been discovered , indulged in and rejected as boring before i see this piece of crap again .
translation: 时间旅行的秘密将在我再次看到这个垃圾之前被发现、沉迷和拒绝为无趣。
back_translation: The secrets of time travel will be discovered, indulged in, and dismissed as uninteresting before I see this garbage again.

text: my little eye is the best little `` horror `` movie i 've seen in years .
translation: 我的小眼睛是我多年见过的最好的“小恐怖”电影。
back_translation: My Little Eyes is the best "little horror" movie I have seen in many years.

text: `` in that sleep of death what dreams may come . . ``
translation: 在那死亡的沉睡中会产生什么梦境……
back_translation: What dreams will arise in that deathly slumber...

text: now , along with other surviors , jill valentine , claire redfield and carlos oliviera , they must fight to survive , to escape the nightmare that has plauged raccoon city .
translation: 现在，连同其他幸存者，吉尔·瓦伦丁、克莱尔·雷德菲尔德和卡洛斯·奥利维拉，他们必须为生存而战，逃离困扰浣熊市的噩梦。
back_translation: Now, along with other survivors, Jill Valentine, Claire Redfield, and Carlos Oliveira must fight for survival and escape the nightmare that plagues Raccoon City.

text: the dramatic scenes are frequently unintentionally funny , and the action sequences -- clearly the main event -- are surprisingly uninvolving .
translation: 戏剧性的场景常常意外地搞笑，而动作场面——显然是主要事件——出人意料地没有吸引力。
back_translation: Dramatic scenes are often unexpectedly humorous, while action sequences—clearly the main events—are surprisingly unappealing.

text: the merchant-ivory team continues to systematically destroy everything we hold dear about cinema , only now it 's begun to split up so that it can do even more damage .
translation: 商人与象牙团队继续系统地摧毁我们所珍视的电影一切，只是现在他们已经开始分开，以便能够造成更大的伤害。
back_translation: The merchants and the ivory team continue to systematically destroy everything we cherish about film, but now they have begun to operate separately in order to cause even greater harm.

text: when the movie mixes the cornpone and the cosa nostra , it finds a nice rhythm .
translation: 当电影将乡土气息与黑手党文化混合在一起时，它找到了愉悦的节奏。
back_translation: When the movie blends rural flavor with Mafia culture, it finds a delightful rhythm.

text: when his father decides that it 's time for tough love , he does n't pay his tuition .
translation: 当他的父亲决定是时候施行严厉的爱时，他不再支付他的学费。
back_translation: When his father decided it was time to enforce tough love, he stopped paying for his tuition.

text: the deeper matt runs into the forest the farther his mind is lost to the blackwoods .
translation: 马特越深入森林，他的思绪就越沉迷于黑木林。
back_translation: The deeper Matt went into the forest, the more his thoughts became immersed in the black woods.

text: erin , who we discover is a master manipulator of the men in the gang , reveals another side to jack - a melancholy romantic who could have been a classical pianist .
translation: 艾琳，我们发现她是这个帮派中男性的高手操纵者，向杰克展示了另一个面 - 一个忧郁的浪漫主义者，他本可以成为一名古典钢琴家。
back_translation: Irene, we found that she is the master manipulator among the men in this gang, showing Jack another side - a melancholic romantic who could have become a classical pianist.

text: the milieu is wholly unconvincing . . . and the histrionics reach a truly annoying pitch .
translation: 环境完全不可信……而且过分的戏剧化达到了令人烦恼的程度。
back_translation: The environment is completely untrustworthy... and the excessive dramatization has reached a bothersome level.

text: plot , characters , drama , emotions , ideas -- all are irrelevant to the experience of seeing the scorpion king .
translation: 情节、角色、戏剧、情感、思想——这些与观看《蝎子王》的体验无关。
back_translation: Plot, characters, drama, emotions, thoughts—these have nothing to do with the experience of watching "The Scorpion King."

text: considering his profession could be a very dangerous occupation .
translation: 考虑到他的职业可能是一个非常危险的职业。
back_translation: Considering that his profession could be a very dangerous one.

text: she scorned him for not standing by her and they parted forever with a heart-broken paro entering into a chaste marriage with a wealthy , much older man , zamindar bhuvan ( vijayendra ghagte ) , while a shattered devdas walked towards anguish , alcoholism & # 38 ; chandramukhi ( madhuri dixit ) .
translation: 她嘲笑他没有支持她，他们永别了，心碎的帕罗与一位富有且年长的男子，土地所有者布万（维贾扬德拉·格哈特）结成了贞洁的婚姻，而一个破碎的德夫达斯则走向痛苦、酗酒以及昌德拉穆基（马杜里·迪克希特）。
back_translation: She mocked him for not supporting her, and they parted ways forever. Heartbroken, Paro entered into a chaste marriage with a wealthy and older man, the landowner Bhuwan (Vijayendra Ghatak), while a broken Devdas turned to pain, alcoholism, and Chandramukhi (Madhuri Dixit).

text: if they get caught cheating again stark will make a note in their permanent records and possibly kill their chances of getting into college .
translation: 如果他们再次被抓到作弊，斯塔克会在他们的永久记录中做个备注，并可能毁掉他们进入大学的机会。
back_translation: If they are caught cheating again, Stark will make a note on their permanent record and may ruin their chances of getting into college.

text: a moving portrait of a man who has lost his place in the world .
translation: 一个失去自己在世界上位置的人的动人肖像。
back_translation: A poignant portrait of a person who has lost their place in the world.

text: the guilt that he feels has altered his sense of reality , making matt 's life a mystery full of shadows and phantoms .
translation: 他所感受到的罪恶感改变了他的现实感，使得马特的生活变成了一个充满阴影和幻影的谜。
back_translation: The guilt he felt altered his sense of reality, turning Matt's life into a puzzle filled with shadows and illusions.

text: 'in this poor remake of such a well loved classic , parker exposes the limitations of his skill and the basic flaws in his vision . '
translation: 在这个对如此受欢迎经典的糟糕改编中，帕克暴露了他技能的局限性以及他视野中的基本缺陷。
back_translation: In this terrible adaptation of such a beloved classic, Parker reveals the limitations of his skills and the fundamental flaws in his vision.

text: though frodo 's quest remains unfulfilled , a hardy group of determined new zealanders has proved its creative mettle .
translation: 尽管佛罗多的任务尚未完成，但一群坚持不懈的新西兰人已证明了他们的创造力。
back_translation: Although Frodo's task is not yet complete, a group of tenacious New Zealanders has proven their creativity.

text: but he strongly believed testing was needed for all actors & # 38 ; actresses in the porn industry .
translation: 但他坚信，在色情行业的所有演员和女演员中都需要进行测试。
back_translation: But he is convinced that testing is necessary for all actors and actresses in the pornography industry.

text: the story unveils three high school seniors who dress and live by the philosophy of `` goth , `` good friends and great rebels : digger , noisy , and dvd .
translation: 这个故事揭示了三位高年级学生，他们按照“哥特”哲学的穿着和生活，都是很好的朋友和伟大的叛逆者：挖掘者、喧闹者和DVD。
back_translation: This story reveals three senior students who, dressed and living according to "Goth" philosophy, are good friends and great rebels: the Excavator, the Noisemaker, and the DVD.

text: there 's ushi , harry 's lawyer , who knows something about harry lena does n't know , eddie , a friend of harry and his new girlfriend pol , and at last , there are two policemen who are in fact unwelcome .
translation: 有乌希，哈里的律师，他知道一些莉娜不知道的关于哈里的事情；还有哈里的朋友艾迪和他的女朋友波尔；最后，有两个实际上是不受欢迎的警察。
back_translation: There is Ushi, Harry's lawyer, who knows some things about Harry that Lina doesn't know; then there's Harry's friend Eddie and his girlfriend Paul; finally, there are two police officers who are actually unpopular.

text: though howard demonstrates a great eye as a director , this southern gothic drama is sadly a tough sit , with an undeveloped narrative and enough flashbacks and heavy-handed metaphors to choke a horse -- or at least slow him down to a canter .
translation: 尽管霍华德作为导演展现了出色的眼光，但这部南方哥特剧令人遗憾地难以观看，叙事尚不成熟，闪回和生硬的隐喻多到足以窒息一匹马——或者至少让它的速度放慢到慢跑。
back_translation: Although Howard showcases excellent vision as a director, this Southern Gothic drama is unfortunately difficult to watch, with an immature narrative and so many flashbacks and clumsy metaphors that they could choke a horse—or at least slow it down to a jog.

text: more intimate than spectacular , e . t . is carried less by wow factors than by its funny , moving yarn that holds up well after two decades .
translation: 比起壮观，E.T. 更加亲密，它并不是靠惊艳的因素驱动，而是靠那动人而幽默的故事，而这个故事在二十年后依然经得起考验。
back_translation: Compared to grandeur, E.T. is more intimate; it is not driven by stunning elements but by a touching and humorous story, a story that still holds up twenty years later.

text: his exciting and stylish life as a drug lord seems to have come to a halt .
translation: 他作为毒枭那种令人兴奋且时尚的生活似乎已经停止了。
back_translation: His exciting and glamorous life as a drug lord seems to have come to an end.

text: a smart comedy about a day in the life of a barbershop on the south side of chicago .
translation: 一部关于芝加哥南侧理发店一天生活的聪明喜剧。
back_translation: A clever comedy about a day's life in a barbershop on the South Side of Chicago.

text: crumbling yerba city stands empty , except for its drug-parlors , where the remnants of the population cluster , drifting towards oblivion .
translation: 破败的耶尔巴城空无一人，除了那几家毒品酒吧，残留的人口在这里聚集，飘向遗忘。
back_translation: The ruined city of Yerba is empty, except for a few drug bars where the remaining population gathers, drifting toward oblivion.

text: nobody seems to have cared much about any aspect of it , from its cheesy screenplay to the grayish quality of its lighting to its last-minute , haphazard theatrical release .
translation: 似乎没有人对它的任何方面有太多关注，从它廉价的剧本到灰暗的灯光质量，再到最后时刻仓促的院线发行。
back_translation: It seems that no one pays much attention to any aspect of it, from its cheap script to the dull lighting quality, and finally to the rushed theatrical release at the last moment.

text: especially one of them , holo tokyo boy , was designed to be her lover .
translation: 尤其是其中一个，Holo东京男孩，被设计成她的爱人。
back_translation: Especially one of them, Holo Tokyo Boy, was designed to be her lover.

text: on the case , he soon deducts that the killer , who staged the murder to look like a random robbery , may actually be a serial killer terry was trailing for years in the fbi .
translation: 在这个案件中，他很快推断出，那个将谋杀伪装成随机抢劫的杀手，实际上可能是陶瑞在联邦调查局追踪多年的连环杀手。
back_translation: In this case, he quickly deduced that the killer who disguised the murder as a random robbery might actually be the serial killer that the FBI had been tracking for years, known as Tao Rui.

text: time changer may not be the most memorable cinema session but its profound self-evaluation message about our fragile existence and the absence of spiritual guidance should at least invade an abundance of mindsets
translation: 《时间改变者》可能不是最难忘的电影放映，但它关于我们脆弱存在和缺乏精神引导的深刻自我评估信息，至少应该引发大量的思考。
back_translation: "The Time Changer" may not be the most unforgettable film screening, but its profound self-assessment about our fragile existence and lack of spiritual guidance should at least provoke a lot of thought.

text: aka birdseye is the saga of an obsessive colorado sheriff and his trusting teenage son , who risk it all when their twisted reconstruction of a mysterious kidnapping case escalates into a dangerous hunt for a mythical swiss criminal .
translation: 又名《鸟瞰》，讲述了一位痴迷的科罗拉多州警长和他信任的青少年儿子，他们在扭曲重建神秘绑架案的过程中，冒着一切风险，展开了一场对神秘瑞士罪犯的危险追捕。
back_translation: Also known as "Bird's Eye View," it tells the story of an obsessed sheriff from Colorado and his trusted teenage son, who take every risk to engage in a dangerous hunt for a mysterious Swiss criminal while reconstructing a mysterious kidnapping case in a distorted manner.

text: with virtually no interesting elements for an audience to focus on , chelsea walls is a triple-espresso endurance challenge .
translation: 几乎没有引人注目的元素供观众关注，《切尔西墙》是一场三杯浓缩咖啡的耐力挑战。
back_translation: With hardly any notable elements for the audience to focus on, "Chelsea Wall" is an endurance challenge akin to three cups of strong coffee.

text: a delightful fable about the enduring value of literature .
translation: 关于文学持久价值的美妙寓言。
back_translation: A wonderful parable about the enduring value of literature.

text: little more than a stylish exercise in revisionism whose point . . . is no doubt true , but serves as a rather thin moral to such a knowing fable .
translation: 这不过是一次时尚的修正主义练习，其观点……无疑是真实的，但作为这样一个深知的寓言的道德来说，实在显得有些薄弱。
back_translation: This is merely a fashionable exercise in revisionism, whose viewpoint... is undoubtedly true, but as the moral of such a well-known fable, it seems rather weak.

text: the film focuses on a morally conscious assassin called quinn .
translation: 这部电影聚焦于一个具有道德意识的刺客，名叫奎因。
back_translation: This film focuses on an assassin with a moral conscience named Quinn.

text: together they flee to the city of hamburg and smuggle with them what used to be the greatest export of the vikings , an icelandic falcon .
translation: 他们一起逃往汉堡市，并走私一种曾经是维京人最大出口的商品，一只冰岛猎鹰。
back_translation: They fled to the city of Hamburg together and smuggled a product that was once the Vikings' biggest export, an Icelandic falcon.

text: henrik , the young cook , is hopelessly in love with enchanting elena , but lacks the courage to dance with her .
translation: 年轻的厨师亨里克深深爱着迷人的埃琳娜，但却缺乏与她舞蹈的勇气。
back_translation: The young chef Henrik is deeply in love with the charming Elena, but lacks the courage to dance with her.

text: the second : a saturday two years later , where charlotte and cecil now a couple , fight , break-up and finally reunite .
translation: 第二个场景：两年后的一个星期六，夏洛特和塞西尔现在已经成为情侣，他们争吵、分手，最后重聚。
back_translation: Scene two: Two years later on a Saturday, Charlotte and Cecil have now become a couple. They argue, break up, and ultimately reunite.

text: flashy gadgets and whirling fight sequences may look cool , but they ca n't distract from the flawed support structure holding equilibrium up .
translation: 华丽的小玩意和旋转的战斗场面可能看起来很酷，但它们无法掩盖支撑平衡的缺陷结构。
back_translation: Gorgeous little gadgets and spinning battle scenes may look cool, but they cannot hide the flawed structure that supports the balance.

text: he has a vast knowledge of modern photography and develops photos for various customers at the sav-mart .
translation: 他对现代摄影有广泛的知识，并在sav-mart为各种客户冲洗照片。
back_translation: He has extensive knowledge of modern photography and develops photos for various clients at Sav-Mart.

text: the worst pain for him is the next 5 minutes of living .
translation: 对于他来说，最痛苦的是接下来五分钟的生活。
back_translation: For him, the most painful part is the next five minutes of life.

text: the two men ( anthony and michael ) are successful in the high tech world of silicon valley , and have known each other since childhood .
translation: 这两位男士（安东尼和迈克尔）在硅谷的高科技世界中取得了成功，并且他们从小就认识。
back_translation: These two gentlemen (Anthony and Michael) have achieved success in the high-tech world of Silicon Valley, and they have known each other since childhood.

text: she 's at a dead end , married to edgar ( henry thomas ) , a petty thief who had his shot and missed long ago , but is too dense to realize it .
translation: 她处于绝境，嫁给了埃德加（亨利·托马斯饰），一个小偷，早已错过了机会，但他太笨拙以至于没有意识到这一点。
back_translation: She was in a desperate situation and married Edgar (played by Henry Thomas), a thief who had long missed his chance, but he was so clumsy that he didn't realize it.

text: not exaggerated enough to be a parody of gross-out flicks , college flicks , or even flicks in general . it merely indulges in the worst elements of all of them .
translation: 并没有夸张到足以成为恶搞恶心电影、大学电影甚至电影本身的程度。它只是沉迷于所有这些电影中最糟糕的元素。
back_translation: It is not exaggerated enough to be considered a parody or a disgusting movie, a college film, or even a movie in itself. It simply indulges in the worst elements of all these films.

text: one thing has been made very clear -- being john malkovich was n't a fluke .
translation: 有一件事非常明确——《做约翰·马尔科维奇》不是偶然。
back_translation: One thing is very clear — "Being John Malkovich" is not accidental.

text: when eliza discovers that poachers in africa 's serengeti desert plan to kill an elephant herd with an electrified fence , she and her chimpanzee friend darwin must somehow find a way to stop them .
translation: 当埃莉扎发现非洲塞伦盖蒂沙漠中的偷猎者计划用电网杀死一群大象时，她和她的黑猩猩朋友达尔文必须想办法阻止他们。
back_translation: When Eliza discovers that poachers in the African Serengeti Desert plan to use electric nets to kill a herd of elephants, she and her chimpanzee friend Darwin must find a way to stop them.

text: anna strikes a deal with vikrant that he 'll kill guru and acquire the prize money offered by him .
translation: 安娜与维克兰特达成协议，让他杀了古鲁并获得他提供的奖金。
back_translation: Anna reached an agreement with Vikrant to have Guru killed and receive the bounty he offered.

text: there are problems with this film that even 3 oscar winners ca n't overcome , but it 's a nice girl-buddy movie once it gets rock-n-rolling .
translation: 这部电影存在一些即使三个奥斯卡获奖者也无法克服的问题，但一旦开始热火朝天，它还是一部不错的女孩搭档电影。
back_translation: This movie has some issues that even three Oscar winners can't overcome, but once it gets into full swing, it still makes for a decent girl buddy film.

text: a clash between the artificial structure of the story and the more contemporary , naturalistic tone of the film . . .
translation: 故事的人工结构与电影更现代、自然主义的语调之间的冲突。
back_translation: The conflict between the artificial structure of the story and the more modern, naturalistic tone of the film.

text: lightbulbs , fire , barbed wire , mousetraps , staple guns , thumbtacks and glass are weapons of choice in the backyard .
translation: 灯泡、火、铁丝网、捕鼠器、订书机、大头钉和玻璃是后院中的首选武器。
back_translation: Light bulbs, fire, wire mesh, mouse traps, staplers, thumbtacks, and glass are the preferred weapons in the backyard.

text: there 's nothing more satisfying during a summer of event movies than a spy thriller like the bourne identity that 's packed with just as much intelligence as action .
translation: 在夏季活动电影中，没有什么比《谍影重重》这样的间谍惊悚片更令人满意，它拥有与动作同样丰富的智慧。
back_translation: In summer action movies, nothing is more satisfying than a spy thriller like "The Bourne Identity," which is rich in both action and intelligence.

text: out of money and out of luck ambitious sophie pressures marie into accepting a lucrative job as surrogate mother .
translation: 身无分文且运气欠佳的雄心勃勃的索菲施压玛丽接受一个高薪的代孕工作。
back_translation: The ambitious Sophie, who is broke and down on her luck, pressures Mary into accepting a high-paying surrogacy job.

text: eventually moves and stirs you , even if it often resembles those steamy mexican tv dramas/soap operas called telenovelas .
translation: 最终会感动和激励你，尽管它常常像那些名为“肥皂剧”的热情墨西哥电视剧一样。
back_translation: In the end, it will touch and inspire you, even though it often resembles those passionate Mexican soap operas.

text: the trouble with making this queen a thoroughly modern maiden is that it also makes her appear foolish and shallow rather than , as was more likely , a victim of mental illness .
translation: 将这位女王塑造成一个彻底现代的少女的问题在于，这让她看起来愚蠢而肤浅，而不是更有可能的是，精神疾病的受害者。
back_translation: The problem with portraying this queen as a completely modern girl is that it makes her appear foolish and shallow, rather than more likely being a victim of mental illness.

text: sands also convinces jorge ramirez ( retired-fbi , has old scores to settle with barrillo ) to come out of retirement and take out barrillo and dr . guevera ( personal dr . to barrillo , killed jorge 's partner a long time ago ) , who brutally tortured and killed ramirez ' fbi partner .
translation: 桑兹还说服退役联邦调查局特工豪尔赫·拉米雷斯（与巴里略有旧怨）复出，去干掉巴里略和古埃拉博士（巴里略的私人医生，早在很久以前杀了拉米雷斯的搭档），他亲手残忍折磨并杀死了拉米雷斯的联邦调查局搭档。
back_translation: Sands also persuaded retired FBI agent Jorge Ramirez, who had a history with Barillo, to come out of retirement to eliminate Barillo and Dr. Guevara (Barillo's personal doctor, who had killed Ramirez's partner long ago). He personally torturously killed Ramirez's FBI partner.

text: welles groupie/scholar peter bogdanovich took a long time to do it , but he 's finally provided his own broadside at publishing giant william randolph hearst .
translation: 韦尔斯的粉丝/学者彼得·博根诺维奇花了很长时间，但他最终对出版巨头威廉·兰道夫·赫斯特进行了自己的猛烈攻击。
back_translation: Wells' fan/scholar Peter Bogdanovich took a long time, but he ultimately launched his own fierce attack on publishing giant William Randolph Hearst.

text: connor and murphy are quite content with this `` natural `` life and their pasts begin to seem faded and worn .
translation: 康纳和墨菲对这种“自然”的生活感到相当满足，他们的过去似乎开始变得模糊和陈旧。
back_translation: Connor and Murphy were quite satisfied with this "natural" way of life, and their past seemed to begin to blur and feel outdated.

text: nine good teeth reveals many of the common truths hidden away in all our families , as well as the unexpected - late night visits from jack kerouac , illicit love affairs and the occasional murder .
translation: 《九颗好牙》揭示了我们所有家庭中隐藏的许多共同真相，以及一些意想不到的事情——杰克·凯鲁亚克的深夜拜访、非法恋情和偶尔的谋杀。
back_translation: "Nine Good Teeth" reveals many common truths hidden in all our families, as well as some unexpected things—Jack Kerouac's late-night visits, illegal romances, and occasional murders.

text: very well made , but does n't generate a lot of tension .
translation: 制作得非常好，但没有产生太多紧张感。
back_translation: It was made very well, but it didn't create much tension.

text: red and the boys embark on a road trip across the country , en route to a duct tape festival in the usa , where they intend to win first prize by creating a sculpture made of at least 50 % duct tape .
translation: 红和他的朋友们开始了一场横跨全国的公路旅行，目的地是美国的一个胶带节，他们打算通过制作一个至少50%由胶带制成的雕塑来赢得一等奖。
back_translation: Hong and his friends started a cross-country road trip, with the destination being a tape festival in the United States. They plan to win first place by creating a sculpture that is made of at least 50% tape.

text: it will definitely keep you on the edge of your seat because of the blood and gore or the good looking babes .
translation: 这肯定会让你紧张刺激，因为有血腥和残酷的场面，或者漂亮的美女。
back_translation: This will definitely make you feel tense and excited, as there are bloody and brutal scenes, or beautiful girls.

text: as his circle of friends keeps getting smaller one of the characters in long time dead says 'i 'm telling you , this is f * * * ed ' . maybe he was reading the minds of the audience .
translation: 随着他的朋友圈不断缩小，《长时间死去》中的一个角色说：“我告诉你，这真是彻底糟糕。”也许他在读观众的心思。
back_translation: As his circle of friends continues to dwindle, a character in "Long Time Dead" says, "I'm telling you, this is really bad." Perhaps he is reading the audience's thoughts.

text: a movie so bad that it quickly enters the pantheon of wreckage that includes battlefield earth and showgirls .
translation: 一部糟糕到迅速进入包括《战场地球》和《秀女》在内的烂片殿堂的电影。
back_translation: A film so terrible that it quickly entered the hall of shame alongside titles like "Battlefield Earth" and "Showgirls."

text: it 's hard to fairly judge a film like ringu when you 've seen the remake first . many of the effective horror elements are dampened through familiarity , [ yet ] are worthwhile .
translation: 在先看了重制版之后，很难公正地评价像《午夜凶铃》这样的电影。许多有效的恐怖元素因熟悉而减弱，但它们依然值得一看。
back_translation: After watching the remake, it's hard to fairly evaluate a movie like "The Ring." Many effective horror elements are diminished due to familiarity, but they are still worth a watch.

text: may be far from the best of the series , but it 's assured , wonderfully respectful of its past and thrilling enough to make it abundantly clear that this movie phenomenon has once again reinvented itself for a new generation .
translation: 可能离该系列的最佳作品还有些远，但它确实，充满敬意地尊重它的过去，并且足够激动人心，让人清楚地意识到这个电影现象再次为新一代进行了重塑。
back_translation: It may still be a bit far from the best work in the series, but it truly respects its past with reverence and is exciting enough to clearly make one aware that this cinematic phenomenon has been redefined for a new generation.

text: an instantly forgettable snow-and-stuntwork extravaganza that likely will be upstaged by an avalanche of more appealing holiday-season product .
translation: 一部瞬间让人忽略的雪景和特技表演盛会，可能会被一波更具吸引力的节日季产品抢去风头。
back_translation: A snow scene and stunt performance event that people can easily overlook may be overshadowed by a wave of more attractive holiday season products.

text: he 's lost his super powers , and it will take all of bachelorman 's skill and cunning to get his lois lane back .
translation: 他失去了超能力，要找回他的洛伊斯·莱恩需要巴切尔曼所有的技巧和聪明才智。
back_translation: He lost his superpowers, and to regain his Lois Lane, he needs all the skills and intelligence of Bachman.

text: american and european cinema has amassed a vast holocaust literature , but it is impossible to think of any film more challenging or depressing than the grey zone .
translation: 美国和欧洲的电影积累了大量的 Holocaust 文献，但很难想到有哪部电影比《灰色地带》更具挑战性或更令人沮丧。
back_translation: American and European films have accumulated a wealth of Holocaust literature, but it is hard to think of any film more challenging or more frustrating than "The Grey Zone."

text: the film includes victim discussion therapy sessions , phone councilling , conversations between police and abusers , arrests , debates and discussion between the workers at the refuge , trying to decide what should be done about certain cases .
translation: 这部电影包括受害者讨论治疗会议、电话咨询、警察与施害者之间的对话、逮捕、以及庇护所工作人员之间的辩论和讨论，试图决定对于某些案件应该采取什么措施。
back_translation: This film includes victim discussion therapy sessions, phone consultations, dialogues between the police and the perpetrators, arrests, and debates and discussions among shelter staff trying to decide what actions should be taken for certain cases.

text: blueberry is stationed in the little town of palomito as sheriff .
translation: 蓝莓担任小镇帕洛米托的警长。
back_translation: Blueberry serves as the sheriff of the town of Palomito.

text: a subtle , poignant picture of goodness that is flawed , compromised and sad .
translation: 一幅微妙而动人的画面，展现了有缺陷、妥协和悲伤的善良。
back_translation: A subtle and moving image that showcases the kindness found in flaws, compromise, and sorrow.

text: tess and her daughter anna are always fighting and they think each other do n't see how hard their life is .
translation: 特丝和她的女儿安娜总是争吵，她们认为对方看不到自己的生活有多困难。
back_translation: Tess and her daughter Anna are always arguing; they believe that the other cannot see how difficult their life is.

text: this version 's no classic like its predecessor , but its pleasures are still plentiful .
translation: 这一版本不像它的前作那样经典，但它的乐趣仍然丰盛。
back_translation: This version may not be as classic as its predecessor, but its enjoyment is still abundant.

text: cul de sac is a story about a man who tries to end his life unsuccessfully .
translation: 《死胡同》是一个关于一个试图结束自己生命但未能成功的男人的故事。
back_translation: "Dead End" is a story about a man who tries to end his own life but fails to succeed.

text: though clearly well-intentioned , this cross-cultural soap opera is painfully formulaic and stilted .
translation: 尽管显然是出于好意，这部跨文化的肥皂剧却显得极其公式化和生硬。
back_translation: Despite being clearly well-intentioned, this cross-cultural soap opera comes across as extremely formulaic and stiff.

text: kar is an unlikely candidate , a streetwise young man whose only interest is himself .
translation: 卡尔是一个不太可能的候选人，一个世故的年轻人，他唯一感兴趣的是自己。
back_translation: Carl is an unlikely candidate, a worldly young man whose only interest is himself.

text: julian , a young heroin addict tattoos a ouija board on his back to communicate with a spirit he has known .
translation: 朱利安，一个年轻的海洛因成瘾者，在他的背上纹了一个通灵板，以便与他认识的一个灵魂交流。
back_translation: Julian, a young heroin addict, tattooed a ouija board on his back to communicate with a spirit he knew.

text: the wild thornberrys movie has all the sibling rivalry and general family chaos to which anyone can relate .
translation: 《野性史东贝瑞电影》充满了任何人都能感同身受的兄弟姐妹竞争和家庭混乱。
back_translation: "The Wild History of East Bay is filled with sibling rivalry and family chaos that anyone can relate to."

text: carol miller is a psychologist with a dark secret that prevents her making physical contact with other people .
translation: 卡罗尔·米勒是一名心理学家，她有一个黑暗的秘密，使她无法与其他人进行身体接触。
back_translation: Carole Miller is a psychologist who has a dark secret that prevents her from having physical contact with others.

text: their calendar became a worldwide sensation , out-selling even of britney spears and cindy crawford .
translation: 他们的日历成为了全球轰动，销量甚至超过了布兰妮·斯皮尔斯和辛迪·克劳馥。
back_translation: Their calendar has become a global sensation, with sales even surpassing those of Britney Spears and Cindy Crawford.

text: much of the lady and the duke is about quiet , decisive moments between members of the cultural elite as they determine how to proceed as the world implodes .
translation: 《女士与公爵》的许多内容都围绕着文化精英成员之间的安静而果断的时刻，他们在这个世界崩溃的时刻决定如何应对。
back_translation: Much of the content of "The Lady and the Duke" revolves around the quiet yet decisive moments among members of the cultural elite as they decide how to respond during the collapse of this world.

text: it 's not just the vampires that are damned in queen of the damned -- the viewers will feel they suffer the same fate .
translation: 在《被诅咒的女王》中，不仅是吸血鬼受到诅咒——观众会感到他们也遭受同样的命运。
back_translation: In "The Cursed Queen," it is not only the vampires who are cursed—audiences will feel that they are suffering the same fate.

text: moore 's performance impresses almost as much as her work with haynes in 1995 's safe .
translation: 摩尔的表现几乎与她在1995年与海恩斯合作的《安全》中的表现一样令人印象深刻。
back_translation: Moore's performance is almost as impressive as her work in the 1995 film "Safe," which she collaborated on with Haynes.

text: harsh , effective documentary on life in the israeli-occupied palestinian territories .
translation: 关于以色列占领下的巴勒斯坦地区生活的严厉而有效的纪录片。
back_translation: A harsh yet effective documentary about life in the Palestinian areas under Israeli occupation.

text: it 's lost the politics and the social observation and become just another situation romance about a couple of saps stuck in an inarticulate screenplay .
translation: 它失去了政治性和社会观察，变成了一部关于一对愚蠢情侣困在无言剧本中的又一个情感故事。
back_translation: It has lost its political and social observation, turning into yet another emotional story about a pair of foolish lovers trapped in a silent script.

text: she also has an ulcer and does n't get much sleep .
translation: 她还有一个溃疡，睡眠不太好。
back_translation: She also has an ulcer and does not sleep well.

text: a documentary to make the stones weep -- as shameful as it is scary .
translation: 一部让石头哭泣的纪录片——既可耻又令人恐惧。
back_translation: A documentary that makes stones cry — both shameful and terrifying.

text: this story of unrequited love does n't sustain interest beyond the first half-hour .
translation: 这个单相思的故事在前半小时之后无法维持兴趣。
back_translation: This story of unrequited love loses its interest after the first half hour.

text: bobby quickly learns however , that smith is no regular john , and their meeting has unintended consequences that neither of them is prepared to afford .
translation: 然而，鲍比很快意识到史密斯并非普通的约翰，他们的会面带来了双方都未准备好承受的意外后果。
back_translation: However, Bobby quickly realized that Smith was not an ordinary John, and their meeting brought unexpected consequences that neither of them was prepared to bear.

text: on the whole , the movie lacks wit , feeling and believability to compensate for its incessant coarseness and banality .
translation: 总的来说，这部电影缺乏机智、情感和可信度，无法弥补其持续的粗俗和平庸。
back_translation: Overall, this movie lacks wit, emotion, and credibility, failing to compensate for its ongoing coarseness and mediocrity.

text: this is pretty dicey material . but some unexpected zigs and zags help .
translation: 这是一段相当危险的材料。但一些意想不到的曲折和转折有所帮助。
back_translation: This is a rather dangerous material. But some unexpected twists and turns have helped.

text: her in-laws , who are tired of eva interfering in their lives , decide to set her up with someone so she can leave them alone .
translation: 她的公婆厌倦了伊娃干涉他们的生活，决定给她安排一个对象，这样她就可以不再打扰他们。
back_translation: Her in-laws grew tired of Eva interfering in their lives and decided to arrange a suitor for her so that she would no longer bother them.

text: carion relies on a gesture or passages of silence to get his point across ; it 's a technique that packs a greater emotional punch than a tidy , hollywood-style monologue ever would .
translation: 卡里翁依靠手势或沉默的段落来表达他的观点；这种技巧所传达的情感冲击力远超过整洁的好莱坞风格独白。
back_translation: Caryon relies on gestures or silent passages to express his views; the emotional impact conveyed by this technique far exceeds that of neatly crafted Hollywood-style monologues.

text: however when her doodles of a spiralling forest continue to draw themselves it is only the start of a creative process that will see her removed from her dull form .
translation: 然而，当她的涂鸦画出一个螺旋森林时，这只是一个创造过程的开始，它将使她摆脱乏味的形式。
back_translation: However, when her doodle depicted a spiral forest, it was just the beginning of a creative process that would free her from dull forms.

text: after a confrontation with a house elf named dobby , harry escapes to the weasley house with ron weasley ( rupert grint ) in a flying car .
translation: 在与一个名叫多比的家养小精灵对峙后，哈利与罗恩·韦斯利（鲁伯特·格林特）一起乘坐飞车逃到了韦斯利家。
back_translation: After confronting a house-elf named Dobby, Harry and Ron Weasley (played by Rupert Grint) escaped to the Weasley home in a flying car.

text: it is a film that will have people walking out halfway through , will encourage others to stand up and applaud , and will , undoubtedly , leave both camps engaged in a ferocious debate for years to come .
translation: 这是一部会让人半途而废的电影，会鼓励其他人站起来鼓掌，并且无疑会让双方在未来几年内进行激烈的辩论。
back_translation: This is a movie that will make people give up halfway, encourage others to stand up and applaud, and undoubtedly lead to intense debates between both sides in the coming years.

text: martin and barbara are complex characters -- sometimes tender , sometimes angry -- and the delicate performances by sven wollter and viveka seldahl make their hopes and frustrations vivid .
translation: 马丁和芭芭拉是复杂的角色——有时温柔，有时愤怒——斯文·沃尔特和维韦卡·塞尔达尔精湛的表演让他们的希望和挫折变得生动。
back_translation: Martin and Barbara are complex characters—sometimes gentle, sometimes angry—and the superb performances by Sven Walter and Viveka Seydahl bring their hopes and frustrations to life.

text: even tere 's final schizoid moment ca n't dilute the hopefulness of guillen 's bittersweet saga .
translation: 即使特雷的最后一刻分裂也无法削弱吉伦的苦乐交织传奇的希望。
back_translation: Even the last moment of Trey's split could not diminish the hope of the intertwined legend of joy and sorrow embodied by Gilen.

text: tempest productions journeys to the heart of the anime subculture in search of answers .
translation: 暴风雨制作公司踏上了探索动漫亚文化核心的旅程，寻求答案。
back_translation: Storm Productions embarked on a journey to explore the core of anime subculture in search of answers.

text: yoyo and cheung promise to get marry in order to please their mothers .
translation: 优优和张承诺结婚，以使他们的母亲高兴。
back_translation: Youyou married Zhang Chengnuo to make their mothers happy.

text: but when evil marauders steal their mothers & # 180 ; s body in an attempt to trick their way into the island , the brothers join forces to deliver their dead mother to be buried with their father .
translation: 但是当邪恶的掠夺者偷走他们母亲的尸体试图欺骗进入岛屿时，兄弟们联手将他们的母亲送去埋葬，和他们的父亲一起。
back_translation: But when the evil raiders stole their mother's body in an attempt to deceive their way onto the island, the brothers joined forces to bury their mother, alongside their father.

text: he reluctantly agrees to protect a child , pinta balletto ( fanning ) , whose parents are threatened by a rash of kidnappings .
translation: 他勉强同意保护一个孩子，平塔·巴莱托（扇子舞），他的父母正受到一系列绑架事件的威胁。
back_translation: He reluctantly agreed to protect a child, Pinta Baleto (Fan Dance), whose parents were threatened by a series of kidnapping incidents.

text: instead of admitting his guilt , the detective is given an unexpected alibi , but this `` solution `` only multiplies the emotional complexity and guilt over his partner 's death .
translation: 侦探没有承认自己的罪行，而是获得了一个意想不到的不在场证明，但这个“解决方案”只加深了他对搭档死亡的情感复杂性和愧疚感。
back_translation: The detective did not confess to his crimes, but instead obtained an unexpected alibi. However, this "solution" only deepened his emotional complexity and guilt regarding his partner's death.

text: lovable rogue max mackendrick dreams about winning big on the melbourne cup .
translation: 可爱的恶棍马克斯·麦肯德里克梦想在墨尔本杯上赢得大奖。
back_translation: The charming villain Max McKendrick dreams of winning the grand prize at the Melbourne Cup.

text: it takes this never-ending confusion and hatred , puts a human face on it , evokes shame among all who are party to it and even promotes understanding .
translation: 它将这无休止的混乱和仇恨化为一种人性，让参与其中的所有人感到羞愧，甚至促进理解。
back_translation: It transforms this endless chaos and hatred into a form of humanity, making everyone involved feel ashamed, and even fostering understanding.

text: since then , he was considered crazy by everyone in town , except for his childhood girlfriend , caitlin ( emma caulfield ) , and her younger brother .
translation: 自那时以来，镇上的每个人都认为他疯了，除了他的童年女友凯特琳（艾玛·考尔菲尔德）和她的弟弟。
back_translation: Since then, everyone in town has believed he is crazy, except for his childhood girlfriend Caitlin (Emma Caulfield) and her brother.

text: `` politics are murder `` is a `` film noir `` comedy mixing dry martinis with politics and murder .
translation: 《政治就是谋杀》是一部将干马提尼酒与政治和谋杀混合的黑色幽默电影。
back_translation: "Politics is Murder" is a dark comedy film that mixes dry martinis with politics and murder.

text: there is no solace here , no entertainment value , merely a fierce lesson in where filmmaking can take us .
translation: 这里没有安慰，也没有娱乐价值，仅仅是一个严厉的教训，告诉我们电影制作可以带我们走向何方。
back_translation: There is no comfort here, nor entertainment value, just a harsh lesson that shows us where filmmaking can lead us.

text: against the background of an australian desert landscape , so much space and so few people , sandy , a geologist , and hiromitsu , a japanese businessman , play out a story of human inconsequence in the face of the blistering universe .
translation: 在澳大利亚沙漠的背景下，广阔的空间和稀少的人群，沙砾满地，一位地质学家和一位日本商人弘光上演着在炽热宇宙面前人类微不足道的故事。
back_translation: Against the backdrop of the Australian desert, with vast spaces and sparse populations, strewn with gravel, a geologist and a Japanese businessman named Hiroko enact a story of human insignificance in the face of a scorching universe.

text: one of the film 's most effective aspects is its tchaikovsky soundtrack of neurasthenic regret .
translation: 这部电影最有效的方面之一是其柴可夫斯基的配乐，充满了神经衰弱的遗憾。
back_translation: One of the most effective aspects of this film is its Tchaikovsky score, filled with neurotic regret.

text: like rudy yellow lodge , eyre needs to take a good sweat to clarify his cinematic vision before his next creation and remember the lessons of the trickster spider .
translation: 就像鲁迪·黄旅馆一样，埃尔需要进行一次彻底的锻炼，以澄清他的电影视野，然后再进行下一部创作，并记住诡计之蛛的教训。
