back_translation: Like the Rudy Yellow Hotel, El needs to undergo a thorough exercise to clarify his cinematic vision before proceeding with his next creation, and remember the lessons of the spider’s tricks.

text: thus , christina spends the rest of the movie searching for him with her best friend courtney .
translation: 因此，克里斯蒂娜在电影的剩余部分与她最好的朋友考特尼一起寻找他。
back_translation: Therefore, Christina spends the rest of the movie looking for him with her best friend Courtney.

text: this eruption of bloody violence becomes the catalyst for the unleashing of dark forces with terrifying results .
translation: 这场血腥暴力的爆发成为了黑暗力量释放的催化剂，带来了恐怖的后果。
back_translation: The outbreak of this bloody violence became a catalyst for the release of dark forces, bringing terrible consequences.

text: one day in the life of a hit man , ronnie , who spends it trying to save the life of fellow hit man , august , who he had brought into the business three years ago .
translation: 一个职业杀手罗尼的一天，他花时间试图拯救同为杀手的奥古斯特的生命，后者是他三年前带入这一行的。
back_translation: A day in the life of a professional assassin named Ronnie, who spends time trying to save the life of August, another assassin whom he introduced to this line of work three years ago.

text: the film 's thoroughly recycled plot and tiresome jokes . . . drag the movie down .
translation: 这部电影彻底回收的情节和乏味的笑话……拖累了整部电影。
back_translation: The storyline and the boring jokes that completely fell flat dragged down the whole movie.

text: he is an aspiring writer struggling with these : endless nights marked by creative block , memories of a childhood rotten with abuse , and the thirst of unspeakable sexual desires .
translation: 他是一位有抱负的作家，正在与以下问题作斗争：无尽的夜晚被创作障碍所困扰，童年的痛苦记忆，以及无法言说的性渴望。
back_translation: He is an aspiring writer struggling with the following issues: endless nights plagued by writer's block, painful memories from childhood, and unexpressed sexual desires.

text: ~a contract brings them together in bucharest : a rigged attack on a romanian general standing for election , an attack during which they will let themselves be killed .
translation: ~一份合同将他们聚集在布加勒斯特：一次针对参加选举的罗马尼亚将军的阴谋袭击，在这次袭击中他们将任由自己被杀。
back_translation: A contract brought them together in Bucharest: a conspiracy to ambush a Romanian general participating in the elections, in which they would willingly allow themselves to be killed.

text: a bonanza of wacky sight gags , outlandish color schemes , and corny visual puns that can be appreciated equally as an abstract frank tashlin comedy and as a playful recapitulation of the artist 's career .
translation: 一场充满奇怪视觉笑料、荒诞色彩方案和老套视觉双关语的盛宴，可以被视为一部抽象的弗兰克·塔什林式喜剧，也可以作为艺术家职业生涯的俏皮回顾。
back_translation: A feast filled with strange visual humor, absurd color schemes, and clichéd visual puns can be viewed as an abstract Frank Tashlin-style comedy, as well as a playful retrospective of the artist's career.

text: run , do n't walk , to see this barbed and bracing comedy on the big screen .
translation: 快跑，别走，去大银幕上看这部尖锐而振奋的喜剧。
back_translation: Run fast, don’t walk, go to the big screen to watch this sharp and uplifting comedy.

text: no matter what people tried , nothing could stop the water .
translation: 无论人们尝试了什么，都无法阻止水流。
back_translation: No matter what people try, they cannot stop the flow of water.

text: during the hunt fedot meets his love marusya - the magical bird-woman .
translation: 在狩猎过程中，费多特遇见了他的爱人马鲁莎——那位神奇的鸟女人。
back_translation: During the hunting process, Fedot met his lover Marusya—the magical bird woman.

text: the story is timeless , but when adapted to the modern age , it makes for a wrenching film -- never preachy or sentimental , and refreshingly non-judgmental about the fundamental and contradictory issues it raises .
translation: 这个故事是永恒的，但当它被改编为现代时代时，变成了一部令人心痛的电影——既不说教也不煽情，并且对它所提出的根本和矛盾的问题保持令人耳目一新的非评判态度。
back_translation: This story is timeless, but when adapted to modern times, it turns into a heartbreaking film—neither preachy nor melodramatic, and maintains a refreshingly non-judgmental attitude towards the fundamental and contradictory issues it raises.

text: an amusing , even joyful second take on e . b . white 's beloved children 's book .
translation: 对E.B.怀特这本备受喜爱的儿童书籍的新颖、甚至愉快的再次诠释。
back_translation: A novel and even delightful reinterpretation of E.B. White's beloved children's book.

text: you 've seen it before : the ex-con who stumbles while striving to assimilate back into society . but writer-director joe maggio and his able cast makes you care about this man 's sorry journey in virgil bliss .
translation: 你之前见过：那个在努力重新融入社会时跌倒的前囚犯。但是编剧兼导演乔·马吉奥和他出色的演员阵容让你关心这个男人在《维吉尔·布利斯》中的悲惨旅程。
back_translation: You have seen him before: the former prisoner struggling to reintegrate into society who falls down. However, writer and director Joe Maggio and his outstanding cast make you care about this man's tragic journey in "Virgil Bliss."

text: waiting for godard can be fruitful : 'in praise of love ' is the director 's epitaph for himself .
translation: 等待戈达尔可能是有益的：《爱的赞美》是导演留给自己的铭文。
back_translation: Waiting for Godard may be beneficial: "The Praise of Love" is the director's inscription left for himself.

text: this is a movie so insecure about its capacity to excite that it churns up not one but two flagrantly fake thunderstorms to underscore the action .
translation: 这是一部对自己的激发能力如此不自信的电影，以至于它产生了不仅一个而是两个显而易见的虚假雷暴来强调情节。
back_translation: This is a movie so lacking in confidence in its own ability to inspire that it creates not just one but two obvious false climaxes to emphasize the plot.

text: however , as simone 's fame skyrockets , he can not bear to admit his fraud to himself or the world .
translation: 然而，随着西蒙的声名鹊起，他无法承认自己的欺诈行为，无论是对自己还是对世界。
back_translation: However, as Simon's fame grew, he could not acknowledge his fraudulent actions, either to himself or to the world.

text: his old friends and family members have changed , almost beyond recognition .
translation: 他的老朋友和家人几乎变得面目全非。
back_translation: His old friends and family have almost become unrecognizable.

text: while investigating a career-making cover story about a mysterious billionaire ( jason priestley ) , she finds herself accused of murder .
translation: 在调查一个有关神秘亿万富翁（贾森·普里斯特利）的职业生涯的重要封面故事时，她发现自己被指控谋杀。
back_translation: While investigating an important cover story about a mysterious billionaire (Jason Priestley), she finds herself accused of murder.

text: i walked away from this new version of e . t . just as i hoped i would -- with moist eyes .
translation: 我走开了，正如我所希望的那样，眼中泛着泪光，对这个新版的《外星人》。
back_translation: I walked away, just as I hoped, with tears glimmering in my eyes at this new version of "Alien."

text: but instead of broadway or movies , her appearances have been limited to industrials and infomercials .
translation: 但她的露面并不是限于百老汇或电影，而是局限于工业广告和信息广告。
back_translation: But her appearances are not limited to Broadway or films, but confined to industrial advertisements and informational ads.

text: but he does n't plan on the long line of other houseguests that try to keep him from his mission .
translation: 但他并没有考虑到一长串试图阻碍他完成任务的其他房客。
back_translation: But he did not take into account the long list of other tenants trying to hinder him from completing his task.

text: who 'd want to hang out in hef 's grotto with james caan and three dozen playmates , when you can grow up with reaganomics and rock hudson 's declining health ? ``
translation: 谁会想和詹姆斯·凯恩及三打伴娘一起在赫夫的洞穴里闲逛呢，当你可以经历里根经济学和洛克·哈德森的健康衰退？
back_translation: Who would want to hang out with James Caan and the bridesmaids in Hove's Cave when you could experience Reaganomics and Rock Hudson's health decline?

text: this means that he is able to speak/understand snakes .
translation: 这意味着他能够说/理解蛇语。
back_translation: This means he is able to speak/understand Parseltongue.

text: by the end , it becomes clear that the patient is the woman in the story and the narrator is her suitor .
translation: 最后，显然病人是故事中的女人，叙述者是她的追求者。
back_translation: In the end, it is clear that the patient is the woman in the story, and the narrator is her suitor.

text: it captures the spirit of a small , country town as its citizens discover that beer definitely tastes better when it 's free .
translation: 它捕捉了一个小乡镇的精神，因为镇上的居民们发现，免费的啤酒确实更好喝。
back_translation: It captures the spirit of a small town, as the residents find that free beer indeed tastes better.

text: rodriguez . . . was unable to reproduce the special spark between the characters that made the first film such a delight .
translation: 罗德里戈斯无法再现角色之间那种特殊的火花，使得第一部电影如此令人愉悦。
back_translation: Rodriguez is unable to recreate the special spark between the characters that made the first film so enjoyable.

text: perhaps the most remarkable aspect of murderous maids is how restrained and sensitive french director jean-pierre denis keeps his film .
translation: 谋杀女仆最引人注目的方面或许是法籍导演让-皮埃尔·德尼对他影片的控制和敏感。
back_translation: The most striking aspect of the murder of the maid may be the control and sensitivity that French director Jean-Pierre Denis has over his film.

text: to escape their troubles and find women , they book a trip on board a cruise-liner , unaware the travel agent has just played a horrid trick on them in retaliation for nick offending his secret gay lover .
translation: 为了逃避他们的问题并寻找女性，他们在一艘邮轮上预定了一次旅行，却不知道旅行代理正在因尼克冒犯他的秘密同性恋情人而对他们进行了可怕的报复。
back_translation: In order to evade their problems and seek out women, they booked a trip on a cruise ship, unaware that the travel agent was exacting terrible revenge on them for Nick's offense towards his secret gay lover.

text: set in a future britain , this black comedy revolves around one day in the life of a drug dealer .
translation: 设定在未来的英国，这部黑色喜剧围绕一个毒贩一天的生活展开。
back_translation: Set in a future Britain, this black comedy revolves around the life of a drug dealer over the course of one day.

text: a fascinating , unnerving examination of the delusions of one unstable man .
translation: 对一个不稳定男人妄想的迷人而令人不安的考察。
back_translation: A fascinating and disturbing examination of a man's delusions of instability.

text: a famous psychiatrist ( ty adams ) takes on the job of trying to cure patients at the sedah state hospital , run by it 's folksy doctor ( sam delazo ) .
translation: 著名精神科医生（泰·亚当斯）接受了在塞达州立医院治疗病人的工作，该医院由其和蔼可亲的医生（萨姆·德拉佐）管理。
back_translation: The famous psychiatrist (Ty Adams) accepted the job of treating patients at Cedar State Hospital, which is managed by its friendly doctor (Sam DeLazo).

text: a renowned plastic surgeon with a serious gambling problem owes a huge sum of money to the mafia .
translation: 一位著名的整形外科医生有严重的赌博问题，欠下了巨额债务给黑手党。
back_translation: A famous plastic surgeon has a serious gambling problem and owes a huge debt to the mafia.

text: this is the story of a pot-smoking , free-wheeling los angeles record producer ( mcdormand ) , with a rock star boyfriend ( nivola ) , whose straight-laced son ( bale ) comes back home after graduation from harvard medical school with his rich fianc & # 233 ; ( beckinsale ) , who 's working on a book .
translation: 这是一个关于一个抽大麻、自由奔放的洛杉矶唱片制作人（麦克多曼），她有一个摇滚明星男朋友（尼沃拉）。她那拘谨的儿子（贝尔）从哈佛医学院毕业后回到家中，带着他的富有未婚妻（贝金赛尔），她正在写一本书。
back_translation: This is a story about a marijuana-smoking, free-spirited record producer in Los Angeles (Mikdoman) who has a rock star boyfriend (Nivola). Her reserved son (Bell) has returned home after graduating from Harvard Medical School, bringing along his wealthy fiancée (Beckinsale), who is writing a book.

text: juliette binoche 's sand is vivacious , but it 's hard to sense that powerhouse of 19th-century prose behind her childlike smile .
translation: 朱丽叶·比诺什的沙子充满活力，但很难感受到她那天真笑容背后19世纪散文的强大力量。
back_translation: Juliette Binoche's energy is vibrant, but it is difficult to sense the powerful force of 19th-century prose behind her innocent smile.

text: so they hire the lesbian carpet cleaners to rid the evil bitch trasha once and for all .
translation: 于是他们雇佣了女同性恋地毯清洁工，把邪恶的婊子特拉莎彻底清除。
back_translation: So they hired a lesbian carpet cleaner to completely get rid of the evil bitch Theresa.

text: charles ' entertaining film chronicles seinfeld 's return to stand-up comedy after the wrap of his legendary sitcom , alongside wannabe comic adams ' attempts to get his shot at the big time .
translation: 查尔斯的娱乐影片记录了塞infeld在其传奇情境喜剧结束后的回归单口喜剧，以及喜剧新秀亚当斯争取获得成功的努力。
back_translation: Charles' entertainment film documents Seinfeld's return to stand-up comedy after the end of his legendary sitcom, as well as the struggles of comedy newcomer Adams to achieve success.

text: chan 's stunts are limited and so embellished by editing that there 's really not much of a sense of action or even action-comedy .
translation: 陈的特技有限，而且经过剪辑的修饰，实际上几乎没有什么动作感或者甚至是动作喜剧的感觉。
back_translation: Chen's skills are limited, and after editing and embellishment, there is almost no sense of action or even the feeling of action comedy.

text: dre is an executive with a hip-hop record company based in new york .
translation: 德雷是一家总部位于纽约的嘻哈唱片公司的高管。
back_translation: Dre is an executive at a hip-hop record label based in New York.

text: it 's too harsh to work as a piece of storytelling , but as an intellectual exercise -- an unpleasant debate that 's been given the drive of a narrative and that 's been acted out -- the believer is nothing less than a provocative piece of work .
translation: 作为一段故事来说，这太严厉了，但作为一种智力练习——一种不愉快的辩论在叙事的推动下进行并被演绎出来——《信徒》无疑是一部挑衅性的作品。
back_translation: As a piece of storytelling, it is too severe, but as a form of intellectual exercise—a grim debate driven and interpreted through narrative—"The Believer" is undoubtedly a provocative work.

text: the five main characters are 20-year-olds who are close friends and always hang out together at each others ' homes and at their favorite coffeehouse .
translation: 这五个主要角色都是20岁，他们是亲密的朋友，总是一起在彼此的家和他们最喜欢的咖啡馆聚会。
back_translation: The five main characters are all in their twenties, and they are close friends who always gather at each other's homes and their favorite coffee shop.

text: schefberg has the courage to make the story messily un-formulaic .
translation: schefberg勇于打破常规，使故事显得杂乱而不公式化。
back_translation: Schefberg dares to break conventions, making the story appear chaotic and unformulaic.

text: the film , explores the human relationships through fully identifiable human beings , taking also into account the prejudices , the lust of life and all those everyday defeats .
translation: 这部电影通过完全可识别的人类，探讨了人际关系，同时也考虑了偏见、生活的欲望以及那些日常的失败。
back_translation: This movie explores interpersonal relationships through fully recognizable humans, while also considering biases, desires in life, and those everyday failures.

text: steers turns in a snappy screenplay that curls at the edges ; it 's so clever you want to hate it . but he somehow pulls it off .
translation: 剧本机智地转折，边缘处微微翘起；它聪明得让人想要厌恶。但他不知怎么地做到这一点。
back_translation: The script cleverly twists and curls slightly at the edges; it's so smart that it makes one want to hate it. But he doesn't know how he managed to do that.

text: the night of graduation , they open the box and they strike up a conversation .
translation: 毕业之夜，他们打开盒子，开始了对话。
back_translation: On graduation night, they opened the box and started a conversation.

text: the color sense of stuart little 2 is its most immediate and most obvious pleasure , but it would count for very little if the movie were n't as beautifully shaped and as delicately calibrated in tone as it is .
translation: 《斯图尔特·利特尔2》的色彩感是其最直接和最明显的乐趣，但如果电影的形状和音调没有如此优美和微妙的调整，那就几乎毫无意义。
back_translation: The visual appeal of "Stuart Little 2" is its most direct and obvious pleasure, but it would be nearly meaningless if the shape and tone of the film were not so beautifully and subtly tuned.

text: like to think of the film as local hero for kids , as the boy has to adapt from his urban kid lifestyle to the slow , simple ways of generations before . will he do it ? will it work out ? can love overcome ?
translation: 我喜欢把这部电影看作是为孩子们创作的《地方英雄》，因为男孩必须从都市孩子的生活方式适应前几代人缓慢、简单的生活方式。他能做到吗？会成功吗？爱能克服一切吗？
back_translation: I like to view this movie as a "Local Hero" made for children, because the boy must adapt from the urban lifestyle of kids to the slow, simple way of life of previous generations. Can he do it? Will he succeed? Can love overcome everything?

text: even though many at the time believed it was a violation of their civil rights to privacy .
translation: 尽管当时很多人认为这侵犯了他们的隐私权。
back_translation: Although many people at the time believed this violated their right to privacy.

text: once he starts learning to compromise with reality enough to become comparatively sane and healthy , the film becomes predictably conventional .
translation: 一旦他开始学会与现实妥协，变得相对理智和健康，电影就变得可预测地传统。
back_translation: Once he starts to learn to compromise with reality, becoming relatively rational and healthy, the movie becomes predictably conventional.

text: it 's valentines day , sweets are currency , and new yorkers ca n't seem to get enough of their favorite moses donuts .
translation: 今天是情人节，糖果就是货币，而纽约人似乎对他们最喜欢的摩西甜甜圈欲罢不能。
back_translation: Today is Valentine's Day, candy is the currency, and New Yorkers seem unable to resist their favorite Moishe's donuts.

text: a time where all fantasies can come true - unfortunately , it is no longer the '70s .
translation: 一个所有幻想都能实现的时代——不幸的是，这已经不是70年代了。
back_translation: An era where all fantasies can be realized—unfortunately, this is no longer the 1970s.

text: together , they team up on an adventure that would take them to some very unexpected places and people .
translation: 他们一起踏上了一场冒险之旅，去往一些非常意想不到的地方和人物。
back_translation: They embarked on an adventurous journey together, heading to some very unexpected places and meeting unusual characters.

text: it measures a students ability to lie , cheat , fight and kill .
translation: 它衡量一个学生撒谎、作弊、打斗和杀人的能力。
back_translation: It measures a student's ability to lie, cheat, fight, and kill.

text: but dr . jookiba and the earth expert pleakley never could have guessed that earth girl lilo adopts the experiment as dog , gives him the name stitch and actually causes an emotional development in the little beast .
translation: 但乔基巴博士和地球专家普利克利永远无法想到，地球女孩莉萝会把这个实验品当作狗收养，给它起名为史迪奇，并实际上引发了这个小野兽的情感发展。
back_translation: But Dr. Jocubia and Earth expert Prickly could never have imagined that the Earth girl Lilo would adopt this experiment as a dog, name it Stitch, and actually spark the emotional development of this little beast.

text: there are wonderful moments of humor , and demonstrations of humanity , strength , and the resilience of the human spirit .
translation: 有美妙的幽默时刻，以及人性、力量和人类精神韧性的展示。
back_translation: There are wonderful moments of humor, as well as displays of humanity, strength, and the resilience of the human spirit.

text: mattei is tiresomely grave and long-winded , as if circularity itself indicated profundity .
translation: 马泰显得冗长而严肃，似乎循环本身就表明了深度。
back_translation: Matthai appears lengthy and serious, as if the cycle itself indicates depth.

text: steeped in lore and unabashedly surreal , the film is just charming enough for children and just bizarre enough for adults -- a perfect balance .
translation: 充满传说并毫不掩饰超现实的这部电影，对儿童来说恰到好处的魅力，对成年人来说又恰到好处的奇异——完美的平衡。
back_translation: This film, filled with legends and unabashedly surreal, has just the right charm for children and just the right strangeness for adults—perfect balance.

text: wiseman is patient and uncompromising , letting his camera observe and record the lives of women torn apart by a legacy of abuse .
translation: 智者耐心而坚定，让他的相机观察和记录被虐待遗产撕裂的女性的生活。
back_translation: The wise person is patient and steadfast, letting his camera observe and document the lives of women torn apart by abused heritage.

text: a biopic of an artist that actually looks artistic .
translation: 一部看起来真正具有艺术性的艺术家传记电影。
back_translation: A biographical film about an artist that truly seems to possess artistic qualities.

text: a set of grisly murders brings fbi agent will graham ( norton ) out of retirement and puts him in search of an atrocious killer ( fiennes ) who 's driven by the image of a painting .
translation: 一系列可怕的谋杀案使FBI探员威尔·格雷厄姆（诺顿）重出江湖，他开始追捕一名受画作影响的残忍杀手（费因斯）。
back_translation: A series of horrifying murders brings FBI agent Will Graham (Norton) back into action as he begins to hunt down a brutal killer influenced by paintings (Fiennes).

text: taken outside the context of the current political climate ( see : terrorists are more evil than ever ! ) , the sum of all fears is simply a well-made and satisfying thriller .
translation: 脱离当前政治气候的背景（参见：恐怖分子比以往任何时候都更邪恶！），所有恐惧的总和只是一部制作精良且令人满意的惊悚片。
back_translation: Separated from the current political climate (see: terrorists are more evil than ever!), the sum of all fears is merely a well-produced and satisfying thriller.

text: a peruvian film that tells the story of the bank robberies ' legend , orlando gonz & # 225 ; les best known as django .
translation: 一部秘鲁电影讲述了银行抢劫传奇人物奥兰多·冈萨雷斯（最著名的绰号是Django）的故事。
back_translation: A Peruvian movie tells the story of the bank robbery legend Orlando González, who is most famously known by the nickname Django.

text: the ultimate hell is about to be raised on earth .
translation: 终极地狱即将在地球上降临。
back_translation: The ultimate hell is about to descend upon the Earth.

text: `` washington heights `` tells the story of carlos ramirez , a young illustrator burning to escape the latino neighborhood of the same name to make a splash in new york city 's commercial downtown comic book scene .
translation: 《华盛顿高地》讲述了卡洛斯·拉米雷斯的故事，他是一位年轻的插画师，渴望逃离同名的拉丁裔社区，在纽约市的商业漫画界崭露头角。
back_translation: "Washington Heights" tells the story of Carlos Ramirez, a young illustrator who yearns to escape the eponymous Latino community and make a name for himself in New York City's commercial comic book scene.

text: terry , a spoilt brat is just too lazy a student .
translation: 特里是个被宠坏的孩子，实在是个太懒的学生。
back_translation: Terry is a spoiled child and truly a very lazy student.

text: when his wayward sister , kassie ( kerry washington ) , goes missing eddie burns finds himself subjected to a fiendish and ingenious campaign of revenge by the mysterious charlie strom ( gary oldman ) .
translation: 当他放荡的姐妹卡西（凯瑞·华盛顿）失踪时，埃迪·伯恩斯发现自己受到神秘的查理·斯特罗姆（加里·奥德曼）设计的一个狡诈而巧妙的复仇行动的影响。
back_translation: When his wild sister Cassie (Kerry Washington) goes missing, Eddie Burns finds himself caught up in a cunning and cleverly devised revenge plan orchestrated by the mysterious Charlie Strom (Gary Oldman).

text: if . . . you 're the adventurous sort , check it out .
translation: 如果你是那种喜欢冒险的人，去看看吧。
back_translation: If you are the kind of person who loves adventure, go take a look.

text: it 's exactly what you 'd expect : no more and no less .
translation: 这正是你所期待的：多一分也不行，少一分也不行。
back_translation: This is exactly what you expected: not a bit more, not a bit less.

text: however a school teacher warned the train , so the gang and all the others in the pub ended up in a shootout with scores of policemen .
translation: 然而，一位学校教师警告了火车，因此帮派和酒吧里的所有其他人最终与数十名警察发生了枪战。
back_translation: However, a school teacher warned the train, leading to a shootout between the gang and everyone else in the bar against dozens of police officers.

text: the game 's mastermind has stolen his identity , put him on the fbi 's most wanted list , and is blackmailing him to take a part in a real twisted plan of world destruction .
translation: 游戏的策划者窃取了他的身份，将他列入联邦调查局的头号通缉犯名单，并以此威胁他参与一个真正扭曲的世界毁灭计划。
back_translation: The game's planner stole his identity, placed him on the FBI's Most Wanted list, and used this to threaten him into participating in a truly twisted world destruction plan.

text: like a can of 2-day old coke . you can taste it , but there 's no fizz .
translation: 就像一罐放了两天的可乐。你能尝到味道，但没有气泡。
back_translation: It's like a can of cola that's been left out for two days. You can taste the flavor, but there are no bubbles.

text: you 'd be hard put to find a movie character more unattractive or odorous [ than leon ] .
translation: 你很难找到一个比莱昂更令人厌恶或更臭的电影角色。
back_translation: It's hard to find a more detestable or stinkier movie character than Leon.

text: first-time writer-director dylan kidd also has a good ear for dialogue , and the characters sound like real people .
translation: 首次执导的作家兼导演迪伦·基德对对话也有很好的把握，角色听起来像真实的人。
back_translation: First-time writer and director Dylan Kidd has a good grasp of dialogue, making the characters sound like real people.

text: it never hurts to have the aid of a mind-reading squirrel - too bad adam does n't know any !
translation: 有一只会读心思的松鼠的帮助总是好的 - 可惜亚当不认识任何一只！
back_translation: It's always good to have the help of a squirrel that can read minds - unfortunately, Adam doesn't know any!

text: only the android attendants are still capable of action , mindlessly maintaining and administering the 'drip ' .
translation: 只有安卓助手仍然能够行动，毫无意识地维持和管理“点滴”。
back_translation: Only the Android assistant is still able to act, unconscious of maintaining and managing the "drips."

text: but can handsome convince his pals to pull off one last , great cheat with him and outsmarting stark and the system , even if it means possibly destroying their friendships ?
translation: 但是，帅哥能否说服他的伙伴们和他一起完成最后一次伟大的作弊，聪明地击败斯塔克和系统，即使这可能意味着毁掉他们的友谊？
back_translation: However, can the handsome guy persuade his partners to join him in completing one last great cheat, cleverly defeating Stark and the system, even if it might mean ruining their friendship?

text: the film is a hoot , and is just as good , if not better than much of what 's on saturday morning tv especially the pseudo-educational stuff we all ca n't stand .
translation: 这部电影非常有趣，和周六早晨电视上许多节目一样好，甚至比那些我们都无法忍受的伪教育类节目还要好。
back_translation: This movie is very interesting, just as good as many shows on Saturday morning television, and even better than those pseudo-educational programs that we can hardly tolerate.

text: for as god watches we live , some according to his will and some not .
translation: 因为上帝在注视着我们生活，有的人按照他的意愿生活，有的人则不是。
back_translation: Because God is watching over our lives, some people live according to His will, while others do not.

text: the film creates an effective sense of time and place , though sheridan is not above hitting us over the head with obvious stylistic contrivances .
translation: 这部电影有效地营造了时间和地点的氛围，尽管谢里丹并没有害怕用明显的风格手法来给我们敲打。
back_translation: This film effectively creates an atmosphere of time and place, although Sheridan is not afraid to use obvious stylistic techniques to hammer it home for us.

text: the talents of the actors helps `` moonlight mile `` rise above its heart-on-its-sleeve writing .
translation: 演员们的才华使得《月光之旅》超越了其直露情感的剧本。
back_translation: The talent of the actors elevated "Moonlight Journey" beyond its overtly emotional script.

text: a coming-of-age tale from new zealand whose boozy , languid air is balanced by a rich visual clarity and deeply felt performances across the board .
translation: 一部来自新西兰的成长故事，其醉人而慵懒的氛围与丰富的视觉清晰度和深刻的表演相得益彰。
back_translation: A coming-of-age story from New Zealand, where its intoxicating and languid atmosphere complements the rich visual clarity and profound performances.

text: a steroid of sorts , it drives whoever takes the drugs to kill .
translation: 一种类固醇，它促使服用这种药物的人杀人。
back_translation: A type of steroid that drives those who take the drug to commit murder.

text: several years after his release , his drug-using father manny comes back into his life and kilo reluctantly welcomes him back with a job overseeing all of his drug runners .
translation: 几年后，他的吸毒父亲曼尼回到他的生活中，基洛不情愿地欢迎他回来，并给他一份监督所有毒品运输者的工作。
back_translation: A few years later, his father Manny, who was addicted to drugs, returned to his life. Kilo reluctantly welcomed him back and gave him a job supervising all the drug transporters.

text: this film is based on `` our sunshine `` by robert drew , a novel based on the life of australian bushranger and icon , ned kelly .
translation: 这部电影是根据罗伯特·德鲁的《我们的阳光》改编的，这是一部基于澳大利亚土匪和偶像内德·凯利生活的小说。
back_translation: This film is adapted from Robert Drew's "Our Sunshine," which is a novel based on the life of Australian outlaw and icon Ned Kelly.

text: she is forced to approach roxie with an offer of a part in her vaudville act ( filling the gap left by her murdered sister ) , but roxie turns down her offer flat , thinking she needs no support in topping the bill .
translation: 她被迫接近罗克西，提出让她参与自己的杂耍表演（弥补被谋杀的姐妹留下的空缺），但罗克西直接拒绝了她的提议，认为她不需要支持来成为焦点。
back_translation: She was forced to approach Roxie and proposed that she join her juggling act (to fill the void left by her murdered sister), but Roxie flatly rejected her suggestion, believing she didn't need support to be the center of attention.

text: a team of scientists is recruited in a crash project to send a ship and bomb into the center of the earth to prevent the catastrophe .
translation: 一组科学家被招募到一个紧急项目，计划派遣一艘飞船和炸弹进入地球中心，以防止灾难发生。
back_translation: A group of scientists was recruited for an emergency project to send a spacecraft and a bomb into the center of the Earth to prevent a disaster from occurring.

text: jimmy sees the tv proposal and returns to town convinced that he can change her mind , however he faces formidable opposition from almost every side .
translation: 吉米看到电视提案，回到城里相信他可以改变她的想法，但他面临来自几乎每一方的强大反对。
back_translation: Jimmy saw the television proposal and returned to the city believing he could change her mind, but he faced strong opposition from almost every side.

text: ferrara directs the entire film with the kind of detachment that makes any given frame look like a family 's custom-made christmas card .
translation: 费拉拉用一种疏离感指导整部电影，使得每一帧看起来都像是一家人定制的圣诞卡片。
back_translation: Ferrara guides the entire film with a sense of detachment, making each frame look like a customized Christmas card from a family.

text: a modest pleasure that accomplishes its goals with ease and confidence .
translation: 一种适度的乐趣，轻松自信地实现其目标。
back_translation: A moderate amount of fun, achieving its goals with ease and confidence.

text: the friends may listen , but when do they learn maybe never or only when the journey begins with you .
translation: 朋友们可能会倾听，但他们何时才能真正学习呢？也许从未，或仅在与你的旅程开始时。
back_translation: Friends may listen, but when can they truly learn? Perhaps never, or only when your journey begins.

text: de oliveira seems not only to have read john berger 's famous essay on looking , but also to have taken it as his personal instruction manual for filmmaking .
translation: 德·奥利维拉似乎不仅阅读了约翰·伯杰关于观察的著名论文，而且还将其视为他个人的电影制作说明书。
back_translation: De Oliveira seems to have not only read John Berger's famous essay on observation but also regarded it as a personal manual for his filmmaking.

text: to honestly address the flaws inherent in how medical aid is made available to american workers , a more balanced or fair portrayal of both sides will be needed .
translation: 要诚实地解决提供医疗援助给美国工人的固有缺陷，需要对双方进行更平衡或公平的描绘。
back_translation: To honestly address the inherent flaws in providing medical assistance to American workers, a more balanced or fair portrayal of both parties is needed.

text: a chilling tale of one of the great crimes of 20th century france : the murder of two rich women by their servants in 1933 .
translation: 一个冷酷的故事，讲述了20世纪法国的一宗重大罪案：1933年，两名富有女性被她们的仆人谋杀。
back_translation: A cold-hearted story that recounts a major crime in 20th century France: in 1933, two wealthy women were murdered by their servant.

text: a shy aristocratic english woman falls in love with a dashing younger artist and then rejects him fearing what society may think .
translation: 一个害羞的贵族英国女人爱上了一位潇洒的年轻艺术家，但由于害怕社会的看法而拒绝了他。
back_translation: A shy noblewoman from England falls in love with a handsome young artist, but rejects him out of fear of society's opinions.

text: they renege , but a legitimate kidney becomes available for transplant .
translation: 他们失信了，但一个合法的肾脏可以用于移植。
back_translation: They have broken their promise, but a legal kidney can be used for transplantation.

text: would make an excellent companion piece to the similarly themed 'the french lieutenant 's woman . '
translation: 将与主题相似的《法国中尉的女人》成为一部优秀的伴随作品。
back_translation: "One can regard the thematically similar 'The French Lieutenant's Woman' as an excellent companion piece."

text: the trouble is , something is already waiting for them inside - something that does n't want them to leave .
translation: 麻烦的是，里面已经有东西在等他们——一些不想让他们离开的东西。
back_translation: The trouble is, there are already things inside waiting for them—some things that don't want them to leave.

text: it is just too bad the film 's story does not live up to its style .
translation: 真可惜这部电影的故事没有与它的风格相匹配。
back_translation: It's a pity that the story of this movie doesn't match its style.

text: hear commentary by some of the top stars of no-holds-barred including rorion gracie , mark kerr , keith hackney and bas rutten .
translation: 听取一些无禁忌比赛顶级明星的评论，包括罗里昂·格雷西、马克·凯尔、基思·哈克尼和巴斯·鲁滕。
back_translation: Listen to comments from top stars of the no-holds-barred competition, including Roryon Gracie, Mark Kearney, Keith Hackney, and Bas Rutten.

text: derailed by bad writing and possibly also by some of that extensive post-production reworking to aim the film at young males in the throes of their first full flush of testosterone .
translation: 被糟糕的写作所 derail 可能还受到那些广泛后期制作重做的影响，目的是将电影瞄准正经历第一次强烈睾酮冲动的年轻男性。
back_translation: Being derailed by poor writing may also be influenced by the extensive post-production reshoots aimed at targeting young males who are experiencing their first intense surge of testosterone.

text: the movie is a satire of behind the music rock & # 38 ; roll bands .
translation: 这部电影是对“幕后音乐”摇滚乐队的讽刺。
back_translation: This movie is a satire on the rock band "Behind the Music."

text: as she is questioned after the events by the subtle and manipulative dr . cleave , we learn how she found love only by losing any contact with respectable life and any semblance of propriety .
translation: 在事件发生后，当她被微妙而善于操控的克里夫博士质询时，我们了解到她如何通过失去与体面生活和任何体面形式的联系来找到爱情。
back_translation: After the incident, when she was questioned by the subtly manipulative Dr. Cliff, we learned how she found love by losing connection with a decent life and any form of decency.

text: fifteen years later , and their friendship has blossomed via e-mail , raj believing that he 's getting to know tina when it 's really pooja .
translation: 十五年后，他们的友谊通过电子邮件 blossomed，拉贾相信他在逐渐了解蒂娜，实际上却是普贾。
back_translation: Fifteen years later, their friendship blossomed through email, and Raja believed he was gradually understanding Tina, when in fact it was Puja.

text: britney 's performance can not be faulted . lucy 's a dull girl , that 's all .
translation: 布兰妮的表演无可挑剔。露西是个乏味的女孩，仅此而已。
back_translation: Britney's performance is impeccable. Lucy is a boring girl, that's all.

text: bret owns a small but successful art gallery , balancing aesthetics and business deftly .
translation: 布雷特拥有一家小而成功的艺术画廊，在美学和商业之间巧妙地取得平衡。
back_translation: Brett owns a small but successful art gallery that skillfully balances aesthetics and business.

text: but he has his reasons , as there is a chance that his teen love hillevi will show up .
translation: 但他有他的理由，因为他的青少年爱恋希尔维可能会出现。
back_translation: But he has his reasons, as his teenage love Sylvie may appear.

text: from her complex and enduring relationship with her mentor and husband to her illicit and controversial affair with leon trotsky , to her provocative and romantic entanglements with women , frida kahlo lived a bold and uncompromising life as a political , artistic , and sexual revolutionary .
translation: 从她与导师和丈夫的复杂而持久的关系，到她与列昂·托洛茨基的非法和具有争议的恋情，再到她与女性之间的挑衅和浪漫纠葛，弗里达·卡洛过着一个大胆而不妥协的生活，作为一个政治、艺术和性革命者。
back_translation: From her complex and enduring relationships with her mentor and husband to her illegal and controversial affair with Leon Trotsky, and her provocative and romantic entanglements with women, Frida Kahlo lived a bold and uncompromising life as a political, artistic, and sexual revolutionary.

text: set 10 years after the events in `` the phantom menace `` .
translation: 设置在《幽灵的威胁》事件发生十年后。
back_translation: Set ten years after the events of "The Phantom Menace."

text: this film is a prequel to all of the the house of the dead video games .
translation: 这部电影是《死屋》系列视频游戏的前传。
back_translation: This movie is a prequel to the "Dead House" video game series.

text: supreme chancellor palpatine moves for a vote for a republic army to protect the republic , as there has not been a full-scale war since the formation of the republic .
translation: 最高议长帕尔帕廷提出投票，以建立一支共和国军队来保护共和国，因为自共和国成立以来还没有发生过全面战争。
back_translation: Supreme Chancellor Palpatine proposed a vote to establish a republic army to protect the Republic, as there has not been a full-scale war since the founding of the Republic.

text: ratliff deserves high marks for his restraint and willingness not to try and shape or mold our opinion regarding what is being shown .
translation: 拉特利夫因其克制和不试图影响或塑造我们对所展示内容的看法而值得高度评价。
back_translation: Ratliff is highly regarded for his restraint and for not attempting to influence or shape our perception of the content presented.

text: samantha noble ( elizabeth berkley ) is a high-profile magazine editor .
translation: 萨曼莎·诺布尔（伊丽莎白·伯克利）是一位高端杂志编辑。
back_translation: Samantha Noble (Elizabeth Berkley) is a high-end magazine editor.

text: wishing to free himself more firmly he locks himself into d & # 233 ; pendance and lack of power .
translation: 他希望更坚定地解放自己，因此锁定在依赖和无能之中。
back_translation: He hopes to liberate himself more decisively, thus becoming trapped in dependency and helplessness.

text: there 's nothing provocative about this film save for the ways in which it studiously avoids provoking thought .
translation: 这部电影没有任何挑衅之处，唯一的特点就是它在各方面都故意避免引发思考。
back_translation: This movie has no provocation whatsoever; its only characteristic is that it deliberately avoids provoking thought in every aspect.

text: it 's not like having a real film of nijinsky , but at least it 's better than that eponymous 1980 biopic that used soap in the places where the mysteries lingered .
translation: 这并不像拥有真实的尼金斯基电影，但至少比那部1980年的同名传记片要好，那部电影在神秘之处使用了肥皂。
back_translation: This is not like having a real Nijinsky film, but at least it is better than the 1980 biopic of the same name, which used soap in its mysterious aspects.

text: `` the french came and bruoght the gun and the coyote took away the sleepiness `` .
translation: “法国人来了，带来了枪，而土狼带走了瞌睡。”
back_translation: "The French have come, bringing guns, while the coyotes took away the nap."

text: cassavetes thinks he 's making dog day afternoon with a cause , but all he 's done is to reduce everything he touches to a shrill , didactic cartoon .
translation: 卡萨维茨认为他正在拍摄一部有意义的《狗日午后》，但他所做的只是把他所接触的一切减少为一种刺耳的、说教式的卡通。
back_translation: Casavetes believes he is making a meaningful "Dog Day Afternoon," but all he has done is reduce everything he touches to a jarring, didactic cartoon.

text: the elders bikes are unfortunately backed over at the post office and they end up bumming a ride with an older but kindly man .
translation: 不幸的是，老人的自行车在邮局被倒过来，他们最终搭上了一个年长但和蔼的男人的车。
back_translation: Unfortunately, the old man's bicycle was overturned at the post office, and they eventually got a ride with an older but friendly man.

text: his dream had vanished , so he went home and got a job at his fathers gas station in virgil grove , population 28 .
translation: 他的梦想已经消失，所以他回家在维吉尔格罗夫他父亲的加油站找了份工作，那里的人口是28。
back_translation: His dreams had vanished, so he went home and found a job at his father's gas station in Virgil Grove, where the population was 28.

text: are the experiences of the main character profound , or simply routine ?
translation: 主角的经历是深刻的还是仅仅是例行公事？
back_translation: Is the protagonist's experience profound or just a routine affair?

text: it 's almost as if it 's an elaborate dare more than a full-blooded film .
translation: 这几乎就像是一种精心设计的挑战，而不是一部血肉丰满的电影。
back_translation: It almost feels like a meticulously designed challenge rather than a fleshed-out movie.

text: naturally , our boys band together and go for the bronze !
translation: 当然，我们的男孩们团结在一起，争夺铜牌！
back_translation: Of course, our boys united together to compete for the bronze medal!

text: for almost the first two-thirds of martin scorsese 's 168-minute gangs of new york , i was entranced .
translation: 在马丁·斯科塞斯的168分钟电影《纽约黑帮》的前两个三分之二时间里，我感到着迷。
back_translation: During the first two-thirds of Martin Scorsese's 168-minute film "Gangs of New York," I was captivated.

text: and a lyrical portrait of the ever-present guardians who preserve life 's natural harmony .
translation: 以及描绘那些守护生命自然和谐的常在守护者的抒情肖像。
back_translation: And portray the lyrical portraits of those eternal guardians who protect the harmony of life in nature.

text: it 's incredibly enjoyable to watch derrida pick apart , and fight against , the very process and premise of making a film about someone , particularly him .
translation: 观看德里达剖析并反对拍摄关于某个人，尤其是关于他自己的电影的过程和前提，实在是令人难以置信的享受。
back_translation: Watching Derrida analyze and oppose the process and premise of making a film about someone, especially about himself, is truly an incredible pleasure.

text: five office workers are taken hostage by shy colleague neil ( ned dennehy ) , and his evil hand puppet morgan .
translation: 五名办公室员工被害羞的同事尼尔（内德·丹尼希饰）和他的邪恶手偶摩根挟持。
back_translation: Five office employees are taken hostage by their shy colleague Neil (played by Ned Dennehy) and his evil puppet Morgan.

text: . . . `` bowling for columbine `` remains a disquieting and thought-provoking film . . .
translation: 《为哥伦拜恩而保龄》仍然是一部令人不安和引人深思的电影。
back_translation: "Bowling for Columbine" remains an unsettling and thought-provoking film.

text: a movie in which two not very absorbing characters are engaged in a romance you ca n't wait to see end .
translation: 一部电影中，两位不太吸引人的角色正在上演一场你迫不及待想要看到结束的浪漫。
back_translation: In a movie, two unattractive characters are performing a romance that you can't wait to see come to an end.

text: a portrait of a generation that has evolved into individuals and lost respect for the gift of love .
translation: 一幅描绘了一代人如何发展成个体并失去了对爱的礼物的尊重的肖像。
back_translation: A portrait depicting how a generation develops into individuals and loses respect for the gift of love.

text: women craved him and men wanted to be him .
translation: 女性渴望他，男性想成为他。
back_translation: Women desire him, while men want to become him.

text: down on the shore , a boat is slowly being loaded with the personal possessions from the dying man 's home .
translation: 在海岸边，一只船正在缓缓装载着垂死者家中的个人物品。
back_translation: By the shore, a boat is slowly loading the personal belongings of the deceased from their home.

text: its impressive images of crematorium chimney fires and stacks of dead bodies are undermined by the movie 's presentation , which is way too stagy .
translation: 其令人印象深刻的火葬场烟囱火焰和尸体堆叠的图像被电影的呈现所削弱，显得过于舞台化。
back_translation: The impressive images of crematorium chimney flames and stacked corpses are diminished by the film's presentation, appearing overly staged.

text: as the death toll mounts , it falls to detective maria delgado - mistrusted outsider from madrid ( played by mira sorvino ) - to stop the bizarre killings .
translation: 随着死亡人数的上升，马德里被视为外人的侦探玛丽亚·德尔加多（由米拉·索维诺饰演）承担起阻止这些离奇杀戮的责任。
back_translation: As the death toll rises, Madrid is seen through the eyes of outsider detective María Delgado (played by Mira Sorvino), who takes on the responsibility of stopping these bizarre murders.

text: privileged and popular , deanna differs dramatically from the alienated alicia .
translation: 德安娜特权和受欢迎，与孤立的艾莉西亚截然不同。
back_translation: Deanna enjoys privileges and popularity, which is in stark contrast to the isolated Alicia.

text: the filmmakers lack the nerve . . . to fully exploit the script 's potential for sick humor .
translation: 电影制作人缺乏勇气……未能充分发挥剧本在病态幽默方面的潜力。
back_translation: The filmmakers lack courage and fail to fully realize the script's potential in terms of dark humor.

text: though the bosses killed his father , he is loyal to them and is considered family .
translation: 虽然老板们杀了他的父亲，但他对他们忠诚，并被视为家人。
back_translation: Although the bosses killed his father, he remained loyal to them and was seen as family.

text: though it is by no means his best work , laissez-passer is a distinguished and distinctive effort by a bona-fide master , a fascinating film replete with rewards to be had by all willing to make the effort to reap them .
translation: 尽管这绝不是他最好的作品，《通行证》是一部杰出而独特的努力，展现了一位真正大师的风采，这是一部迷人的电影，充满了愿意付出努力去收获的人所能获得的奖励。
back_translation: Although it is far from his best work, "The Pass" is an outstanding and unique effort that showcases the style of a true master. It is a captivating film filled with the rewards that one can gain from being willing to put in the effort.

text: their assignment : using equal parts skill and humor , catch arnold gundars , one of the world 's most successful illegal arms dealers , and foil his treacherous plans for the plane .
translation: 他们的任务：运用同样的技能和幽默，捉拿阿诺德·冈达斯，世界上最成功的非法军火贩子之一，挫败他对飞机的阴险计划。
back_translation: Their mission: to use the same skills and humor to capture Arnold Gondas, one of the world's most successful illegal arms dealers, and thwart his sinister plans for aircraft.

text: what might have been acceptable on the printed page of iles ' book does not translate well to the screen .
translation: 在伊尔斯的书的印刷页面上可能是可以接受的内容，在银幕上却不太适合。
back_translation: Content that may be acceptable on the printed pages of Iles's book is not quite suitable for the screen.

text: calvin ( cube ) , who inherited the struggling business from his deceased father , views the shop as nothing but a burden and waste of his time .
translation: 卡尔文（方块），从已故父亲那里继承了这家困难重重的生意，认为这家店只是一个负担和浪费他的时间。
back_translation: Calvin (the square) inherited this troubled business from his late father and believes that it is just a burden and a waste of his time.

text: failing cartoon writer , millard mudd , has sunk deep into one .
translation: 失败的卡通作家米拉德·穆德深陷其中。
back_translation: The failed cartoonist Milard Mood is deeply entangled in it.

text: . . . an hour-and-a-half of inoffensive , unmemorable filler .
translation: 一个半小时的无伤大雅、毫无记忆点的填充物。
back_translation: An hour and a half of harmless, forgettable filler.

text: as gamely as the movie tries to make sense of its title character , there remains a huge gap between the film 's creepy , clean-cut dahmer ( jeremy renner ) and fiendish acts that no amount of earnest textbook psychologizing can bridge .
translation: 尽管这部电影尽力去理解其标题角色，但电影中干净利落的达默（杰瑞米·雷纳饰）与那种无可挽回的恶行之间仍然存在巨大的差距，任何严肃的教科书心理分析都无法填补。
back_translation: Although the film attempts to understand its titular character, there remains a significant gap between the clean-cut Dahmer (played by Jeremy Renner) and the irredeemable evil of his actions, one that no serious textbook psychological analysis can bridge.

text: for those with the stomach and stamina for its heartbeat-quickening intensity and body-slamming action , rollerball delivers exactly what it promises : a people 's hero you can really get behind .
translation: 对于那些拥有承受快节奏强度和猛烈撞击的勇气和耐力的人来说，《滚球》恰如其分地提供了它所承诺的一切：一个你真的可以支持的人民英雄。
back_translation: For those who have the courage and endurance to withstand the fast-paced intensity and violent impacts, "Rolling" aptly delivers everything it promises: a people's hero you can truly support.

text: goes some way towards explaining how the tragedy occurred and its enduring legacy today .
translation: 在一定程度上解释了悲剧是如何发生的及其今天持久的遗产。
back_translation: To some extent, it explains how tragedy occurs and its enduring legacy today.

text: focuses on joan 's raging hormones and sledgehammers the audience with spanish inquisitions about her `` madness `` so much that i became mad that i wasted 123 minutes and $ 9 . 50 on this 21st century torture device .
translation: 专注于乔安的狂暴荷尔蒙，猛烈攻击观众关于她“疯狂”的西班牙宗教裁判所问题，以至于我感到自己浪费了123分钟和9.50美元在这个21世纪的折磨工具上。
back_translation: Focusing on Joanna's raging hormones, the film aggressively attacks the audience with her "madness" akin to a Spanish Inquisition, making me feel like I wasted 123 minutes and $9.50 on this torturous tool of the 21st century.

text: in visual fertility treasure planet rivals the top japanese animations of recent vintage .
translation: 在视觉上，《火星宝藏》与最近的顶级日本动画相比毫不逊色。
back_translation: Visually, "Mars Treasure" is no less impressive than the recent top Japanese animations.

text: danny , who gets paranoid and makes a scene while they watch `` der lift `` ( a black & # 38 ; white german horror movie ) and hallucinates about being the actor in the film ( ricardo mamood ) , has not the courage to face a girl half his age .
translation: 丹尼在观看《电梯》（一部黑白德国恐怖电影）时变得偏执并闹出了场面，他开始幻想自己是片中的演员（里卡多·马穆德），但却没有勇气面对一个比他小一半的女孩。
back_translation: Danny became paranoid while watching "The Elevator" (a black-and-white German horror film) and caused a scene. He started to fantasize that he was the actor in the film (Ricardo Mahmood), but he lacked the courage to face a girl who was half his age.

text: brad , an art student hoping to win a prestigious fellowship , finds his life and career turned upside down when he falls for a faculty member at his college , lisa ducharme , who just happens to be his girlfriend 's thesis adviser . . .
translation: 布拉德是一名艺术学生，希望赢得一个有声望的奖学金，但当他爱上了自己大学的教员丽莎·杜夏尔时，他的生活和职业生涯彻底改变了，而丽莎恰好是他女朋友的论文导师……
back_translation: Brad is an art student hoping to win a prestigious scholarship, but when he falls in love with Lisa Dushar, a faculty member at his university, his life and career take a drastic turn, and Lisa happens to be the thesis advisor of his girlfriend...

text: from then on , patricia rises immediately to stardom .
translation: 从那时起，帕特里夏立即成名。
back_translation: From that moment on, Patricia immediately became famous.

text: samantha is then forced to question her own place in the shark-eat-shark world of ambition and power where truth is ever elusive , enemies wear a friend 's face and the stakes are nothing less than life or death .
translation: 萨曼莎被迫质疑自己在这个残酷的野心与权力交织的世界中的位置，在那里真相总是难以捉摸，敌人披着朋友的面孔，赌注无非就是生死存亡。
back_translation: Samantha was forced to question her position in this cruel world intertwined with ambition and power, where the truth is always elusive, enemies wear the faces of friends, and the stakes are nothing less than survival or death.

text: certainly no biopic , nijinsky is short on facts , but long on expression .
translation: 这绝对不是一部传记片，《尼基欣斯基》缺乏事实，却充满了表现力。
back_translation: This is definitely not a biographical film; "Nijinsky" lacks facts but is full of expressiveness.

text: little ella 's birthright is the gift - and curse - of obedience .
translation: 小艾拉的出生权是服从的恩赐与诅咒。
back_translation: Little Ayla's birthright is a gift and a curse of obedience.

text: . . . hopefully it 'll be at the dollar theatres by the time christmas rolls around . wait to see it then .
translation: ...希望到圣诞节的时候可以在一美元电影院看到。等到那时候再看吧。
back_translation: ...I hope to see it at the one-dollar theater by Christmas. Let's wait until then to watch it.

text: a former eastern germany secret agent runs away fron his past and lands in m & # 233 ; xico under a fake identity .
translation: 一名前东德秘密特工逃避过去，化名来到墨西哥。
back_translation: A former East German secret agent escapes the past and adopts a new identity in Mexico.

text: it 's too long , too repetitive , and takes way too many years to resolve to be a total winner .
translation: 这太长了，太重复，而且需要太多年才能解决，无法算是一个完全的赢家。
back_translation: This is too long, too repetitive, and it will take too many years to solve, so it cannot be considered a complete winner.

text: there is simply not enough of interest onscreen to sustain its seventy-minute running time .
translation: 银幕上没有足够的看点来支撑这部七十分钟的片长。
back_translation: There aren't enough highlights on the screen to support this seventy-minute film.

text: by the time its otherwise paint-by-numbers story reaches a finale , drumline has made band seem cool -- no small feat in the wake of american pie 2 .
translation: 在它那一成不变的故事达到高潮时，《鼓手》让乐队看起来很酷——在《美国派2》之后，这可不是一件小事。
back_translation: At the climax of its unchanging story, "Drumline" makes the band look cool—after "American Pie 2," that’s no small feat.

text: the characters . . . are paper-thin , and their personalities undergo radical changes when it suits the script .
translation: 这些角色……纸糊般薄弱，他们的个性在适合剧本时经历剧烈变化。
back_translation: These characters... are paper-thin, and their personalities undergo drastic changes to fit the script.

text: a young idealistic priest in northern ireland has his faith put to the test when he is faced with the ultimate moral dilemma .
translation: 一位年轻理想主义的牧师在北爱尔兰面临最终道德困境时，他的信仰受到了考验。
back_translation: A young idealistic pastor faces a final moral dilemma in Northern Ireland, where his faith is put to the test.

text: an efficient , exceedingly likable family film about orphans and sports that comes with equal doses of sentimentality , corny jokes and life lessons .
translation: 一部高效而极具可爱的家庭电影，讲述孤儿和体育，融合了适度的感伤、老套的笑话和人生道理。
back_translation: A highly efficient and charming family movie that tells the story of an orphan and sports, blending moderate sentimentality, clichéd jokes, and life lessons.

text: as bob the tomato and the kids settle in to wait for a tow truck to help get their van back on the road , the `` pirates who do n't do anything `` share a little story about a guy named jonah .
translation: 当番茄鲍勃和孩子们安顿下来等待拖车帮助他们的面包车重新上路时，“不做任何事的海盗”分享了一个关于一个名叫约拿的人的小故事。
back_translation: As Tomato Bob and the kids settled in to wait for the tow truck to help get their van back on the road, the "Pirate of Doing Nothing" shared a little story about a man named Jonah.

text: while treating a homicide detective for smoking , hypnotherapist michael strother has a telepathic vision of a young girl floating beneath the surface of a stream .
translation: 在治疗一名因吸烟而来的 homicide 侦探时，催眠治疗师迈克尔·斯特罗瑟有了一个心灵感应的异象，看到一个年轻女孩漂浮在溪流的表面下。
back_translation: While treating a homicide detective who came in due to smoking, hypnotherapist Michael Strother had a psychic vision of a young girl floating beneath the surface of a stream.

text: the case is re-opened when two more bodies are discovered , both pregnant women .
translation: 案件在发现另外两具尸体时重新开启，都是怀孕的女性。
back_translation: The case was reopened when two more bodies were found, both of which were pregnant women.

text: young is a tribute to the nobility of those men under fire , their common acts of uncommon valor , and their loyalty to and love for one another .
translation: 年轻是对在战火中那些人的高贵的致敬，他们普通却不平凡的勇敢行为，以及他们对彼此的忠诚和爱。
back_translation: Youth is a noble tribute to those people in the midst of war, their ordinary yet extraordinary acts of bravery, and their loyalty and love for each other.

text: six of the nations brightest spoken word artists came together in new orleans on september 2 , to begin a life transforming journey to new york city for the memorial anniversary of september 11 .
translation: 六位国家最优秀的口语艺术家于9月2日在新奥尔良聚集，开始了一段改变人生的旅程，前往纽约市纪念9月11日的周年纪念。
back_translation: Six of the nation's best oral artists gathered in New Orleans on September 2 to embark on a life-changing journey to New York City to commemorate the anniversary of September 11.

text: both lead performances are oscar-size . quaid is utterly fearless as the tortured husband living a painful lie , and moore wonderfully underplays the long-suffering heroine with an unflappable '50s dignity somewhere between jane wyman and june cleaver .
translation: 两位主演的表演都是奥斯卡般的。夸伊毫无畏惧地饰演一个生活在痛苦谎言中的受折磨丈夫，而摩尔则以一种不动声色的“50年代”的尊严出色地演绎了这个长期受苦的女主角，介于简·怀曼和琼·克里弗之间。
back_translation: Both lead performances are Oscar-worthy. Quai fearlessly plays a tormented husband living in painful lies, while Moore excellently portrays the long-suffering female lead with a poised "50s" dignity, straddling between Jane Wyman and Joan Crawford.

text: they 're jewish , they 're grandmothers , and they 're lesbians .
translation: 她们是犹太人，她们是祖母，她们是女同性恋者。
back_translation: They are Jewish, they are grandmothers, they are lesbians.

text: i wo n't argue with anyone who calls 'slackers ' dumb , insulting , or childish . . . but i laughed so much that i did n't mind .
translation: 我不会和任何称呼“懒汉”为愚蠢、侮辱或幼稚的人争论……但我笑得太多，以至于不在乎。
back_translation: I won't argue with anyone who calls "lazy people" stupid, insulting, or childish... but I laugh too much to care.

text: a well-done film of a self-reflexive , philosophical nature .
translation: 一部做得很好的自我反思、哲学性质的电影。
back_translation: A well-made film of self-reflection and philosophical nature.

text: as they try to keep one step ahead of peter , it becomes clear that there is someone else in the woods , someone who is watching them all .
translation: 当他们试图保持比彼得更进一步时，显然在树林里还有其他人，有人在监视着他们所有人。
back_translation: When they tried to stay ahead of Peter, it was clear that there were others in the woods, and someone was watching all of them.

text: the two leads , nearly perfect in their roles , bring a heart and reality that buoy the film , and at times , elevate it to a superior crime movie .
translation: 这两位主角在各自的角色中几乎完美，带来了温情和现实感，使电影更加生动，有时甚至将其提升为一部优秀的犯罪电影。
back_translation: The two main characters are almost perfect in their respective roles, bringing warmth and realism, which makes the film more vivid, sometimes even elevating it to an excellent crime movie.

text: whether or not ram dass proves as clear and reliable an authority on that as he was about inner consciousness , fierce grace reassures us that he will once again be an honest and loving one .
translation: 无论拉姆·达斯在这个问题上是否像他在内心意识方面那样清晰可靠，《猛烈的恩典》都向我们保证，他将再次成为一个诚实和充满爱的权威。
back_translation: Regardless of whether Ram Dass is as clear and reliable on this issue as he is in terms of inner consciousness, "The Fierce Grace" assures us that he will once again be an honest and loving authority.

text: when starla is forced to quit the cheerleading squad after getting some bad grads , genevieve moves in to take her place .
translation: 当斯塔拉因成绩不佳被迫退出啦啦队时，珍妮薇夫接替了她的位置。
back_translation: When Starla was forced to leave the cheerleading team due to poor performance, Genevieve took her place.

text: when jack rebuffs charlie 's alcoholic advances , an enemy is born .
translation: 当杰克拒绝查理的酒鬼逼近时，一个敌人就诞生了。
back_translation: An enemy was born when Jack refused the drunkard Charlie's advances.

text: then from 1983 to 1984 , the `` stander gang `` ( stander , alan heyl & # 38 ; patrick mccall ) rob as many as four banks a day .
translation: 然后从1983年到1984年，“斯坦德帮”（斯坦德、艾伦·赫尔和帕特里克·麦考尔）每天抢劫多达四家银行。
back_translation: From 1983 to 1984, the "Stand Gang" (Stan, Allen Hall, and Patrick McCall) robbed up to four banks a day.

text: it 's one of the most honest films ever made about hollywood .
translation: 这是一部关于好莱坞最诚实的电影之一。
