text: the entire movie is filled with deja vu moments .
translation: 整部电影充满了既视感的时刻。
back_translation: The whole movie is filled with déjà vu moments.

text: joe is beaten up by some of johnny 's buddies as a sign to leave him alone , and with this final act of freedom , johnny leaves the world of pool-sharking .
translation: 乔被约翰尼的一些朋友打了一顿，作为警告让他不要再打扰约翰尼，而通过这个最后的自由行为，约翰尼离开了圈套的世界。
back_translation: Qiao was beaten by some of Johnny's friends as a warning to stop bothering Johnny, and through this final act of freedom, Johnny left the world of traps.

text: a dark , quirky road movie that constantly defies expectation .
translation: 一部黑暗而古怪的公路电影，不断地颠覆期望。
back_translation: A dark and bizarre road movie that continuously subverts expectations.

text: even with all those rough edges safely sanded down , the american insomnia is still pretty darned good .
translation: 即便经过打磨去掉了所有那些粗糙的边缘，美国失眠仍然相当不错。
back_translation: Even after polishing away all the rough edges, American insomnia is still pretty good.

text: we weave in and out of eight defective lives and go for a turbulent mental ride where lilli 's reality spirals out of control and we 're lead to an unforgettable climax where some fall apart and some piece themselves together .
translation: 我们在八个有缺陷的生活中穿梭，经历一场动荡的心理旅程，在这里莉莉的现实失控，我们被引向一个令人难忘的高潮，有些人崩溃，有些人重拾自我。
back_translation: We weave through eight flawed lives, experiencing a turbulent psychological journey where Lily's reality unravels, leading us to a memorable climax where some break down and some rediscover themselves.

text: filmmaker tian zhuangzhuang triumphantly returns to narrative filmmaking with a visually masterful work of quiet power .
translation: 电影制片人田壮壮以一部视觉上精湛、内涵深邃的作品骄傲地回归叙事电影制作。
back_translation: Filmmaker Tian Zhuangzhuang proudly returns to narrative filmmaking with a visually stunning and thought-provoking work.

text: a slick new york publicist ( farrell ) who picks up a ringing receiver in a phone booth is told that if he hangs up , he 'll be killed . . .
translation: 一位时髦的纽约公关（法瑞尔）在电话亭里接起一个响铃的电话，电话那头告诉他如果他挂断电话，他就会被杀死……
back_translation: A stylish New York publicist (Farrell) answers a ringing phone in a phone booth, and the person on the other end tells him that if he hangs up, he will be killed...

text: sam and ash become good friends as they fight to save celebi from the new team rocket villain , the iron-masked marauder and his darkball , which turns pok & # 233 ; mon evil and augments their powers to the maximum .
translation: 山姆和艾什成为好朋友，他们一起努力拯救塞尔比免受新的火箭队恶棍铁面掠夺者和他的黑球的侵害，黑球会使宝可梦变得邪恶，并将它们的力量增强到极限。
back_translation: Sam and Ash became good friends as they worked together to save Selby from the new Rocket Team villain, Iron Mask Marauder, and his Dark Ball, which can corrupt Pokémon and enhance their powers to the maximum.

text: 'enigma ' is the kind of engaging historical drama that hollywood appears to have given up on in favor of sentimental war movies in the vein of 'we were soldiers . '
translation: 《谜团》是一部引人入胜的历史剧，好莱坞似乎已经放弃了这种类型，而更倾向于像《我们是士兵》那样感伤的战争电影。
back_translation: "Mystery" is a captivating historical drama, while Hollywood seems to have given up on this genre, favoring more sentimental war films like "We Were Soldiers."

text: a turkish fortune-teller predicts that the girl will convalesce if somebody sacrifices his life for her .
translation: 一个土耳其占卜师预言，如果有人为她牺牲生命，这个女孩就会康复。
back_translation: A Turkish fortune teller predicted that if someone sacrifices their life for her, the girl will recover.

text: the trinity assembly approaches the endeavor with a shocking lack of irony , and george ratliff 's documentary , hell house , reflects their earnestness M-^W which makes for a terrifying film .
translation: 三位一体集会以令人震惊的缺乏讽刺的态度来面对这一努力，而乔治·拉特利夫的纪录片《地狱之家》反映了他们的真诚，这使得这部电影变得可怕。
back_translation: The Trinity Gathering approaches this endeavor with a shocking lack of irony, while George Ratliff's documentary "Hell House" reflects their sincerity, which makes the film frightening.

text: this is especialy true when he makes a special connection at a hollywood industry party .
translation: 这在他在好莱坞行业派对上建立特殊联系时尤其真实。
back_translation: This is especially true when he establishes special connections at Hollywood industry parties.

text: a triumph , a film that hews out a world and carries us effortlessly from darkness to light .
translation: 一部胜利之作，塑造了一个世界，轻松地引领我们从黑暗走向光明。
back_translation: A victorious masterpiece that shapes a world, effortlessly guiding us from darkness to light.

text: the originally noble motive rapidly degenerated into an orgy of bloodletting and terror .
translation: 最初高尚的动机迅速堕落为一场血腥恐怖的狂欢。
back_translation: The initially noble motives quickly degenerated into a bloody and terrifying carnival.

text: as this bizarro weekend unfolds , we see exactly what adam has to do to preserve his sanity and his friendships .
translation: 随着这个奇怪的周末展开，我们看到亚当为了维护自己的理智和友谊必须做的事情。
back_translation: As this strange weekend unfolds, we see what Adam must do to maintain his sanity and friendship.

text: despite its flaws . . . belinsky is still able to create an engaging story that keeps you guessing at almost every turn .
translation: 尽管存在缺陷……贝林斯基仍然能够创造出一个引人入胜的故事，让你在几乎每一个转折处都充满悬念。
back_translation: Despite its flaws... Belinsky still manages to create an engaging story that keeps you in suspense with almost every twist and turn.

text: when taraneh discovers she is pregnant she decides against all advice and intense social pressure , to keep the baby .
translation: 当塔拉内发现自己怀孕时，她在所有建议和巨大社会压力的影响下，决定保留这个孩子。
back_translation: When Talane discovered she was pregnant, influenced by all the advice and tremendous social pressure, she decided to keep the child.

text: he begins to spread the gospel of communal ideals , which he has absorbed during his travels in india .
translation: 他开始传播他在印度旅行中所吸收的共同理想的福音。
back_translation: He began to spread the gospel of the common ideals he had absorbed during his travels in India.

text: where the trail ends , terror begins soft-spoken 15-year old leland fitzgerald ( gosling ) commits a seemingly senseless murder that shocks his community , affecting both his victim 's family and his own .
translation: 小径的尽头，恐怖始于15岁温文尔雅的莱兰·菲茨杰拉德（戈斯林饰），他犯下了一宗看似毫无意义的谋杀，震惊了他的社区，影响了受害者的家庭和他自己的家庭。
back_translation: At the end of the path, horror begins with 15-year-old refined and gentle Leland Fitzgerald (played by Gosling), who commits what seems to be a senseless murder, shocking his community and affecting both the victim's family and his own.

text: but tongue-in-cheek preposterousness has always been part of for the most part wilde 's droll whimsy helps `` being earnest `` overcome its weaknesses and parker 's creative interference . . .
translation: 但是，半开玩笑的荒谬性一直是大部分情况下王尔德的古怪幽默，帮助《认真者》克服其弱点和帕克的创造性干预……
back_translation: However, the half-joking absurdity has always been Wilde's eccentric humor in most cases, helping "The Importance of Being Earnest" overcome its weaknesses and Parker's creative interventions...

text: it 's supposed to be a romantic comedy - it suffers from too much norma rae and not enough pretty woman .
translation: 这应该是一部浪漫喜剧——但却存在太多《诺orma Rae》，而《漂亮女人》却太少。
back_translation: This should be a romantic comedy—but there is too much "Norma Rae" and too little "Pretty Woman."

text: if you 're an extreme sports fan , this is probably a must own dvd .
translation: 如果你是极限运动的爱好者，这个DVD可能是必备之选。
back_translation: If you are an extreme sports enthusiast, this DVD may be a must-have.

text: a playful iranian parable about openness , particularly the need for people of diverse political perspectives to get along despite their ideological differences .
translation: 一个关于开放的伊朗寓言，特别是不同政治观点的人们尽管在意识形态上有分歧，但仍需要和睦相处。
back_translation: A parable about an open Iran, where people with different political views, despite their ideological differences, still need to coexist peacefully.

text: arriving in the us with a phony passport , she was imprisoned by the ins for one year while her asylum case was being tried .
translation: 她持假护照抵达美国，在她的庇护案件审理期间，被移民局拘禁了一年。
back_translation: She arrived in the United States with a fake passport and was detained by immigration for a year during the processing of her asylum case.

text: nadine works there as a prostitute though she is married with children , hannah keeps the appointment book , christie is an actress who has been cast as a prostitute and must learn the ins and outs , and josephine is a student who is forced into it for economical reasons .
translation: 纳丁在那儿当妓女，尽管她已婚并有孩子，汉娜负责预约本，克里斯蒂是一名女演员，她被选中演一个妓女的角色，必须学习其中的门道，而约瑟芬则是一名学生，由于经济原因被迫进入这个行业。
back_translation: Nadine works as a prostitute there, even though she is married and has children. Hannah is responsible for booking appointments, and Kristi is an actress who was chosen to play the role of a prostitute and must learn the ropes. Josephine is a student who has been forced into this industry due to financial reasons.

text: `` sumo east and west `` takes us into this world through the story of wayne vierra of hawaii , aka kamakiiwa , a former professional sumo wrestler in japan whose pro career was cut short by injury , but who rebounded to become a champion in the growing world of amateur sumo .
translation: ``相扑东西`` 通过夏威夷的韦恩·维埃拉（Wayne Vierra），即卡马基瓦（Kamakiiwa）的故事带我们进入这个世界，他曾是日本的职业相扑摔跤手，但因伤退役，随后他重新振作，成为不断发展的业余相扑界的冠军。
back_translation: "Sumo East and West" takes us into this world through the story of Wayne Vierra, known as Kamakiiwa, who was a professional sumo wrestler in Japan. After retiring due to injury, he made a comeback and became a champion in the ever-evolving amateur sumo scene.

text: as `` daddy day care `` starts to catch on , it launches them into a comedic rivalry with the chapman academy tough-as-nails director , ms . harridan ( anjelica huston ) .
translation: 随着《爸爸托儿所》的流行，它使他们与查普曼学院坚韧不拔的导演哈里丹女士（安吉丽卡·休斯顿）展开了一场喜剧竞争。
back_translation: With the popularity of "Daddy Daycare," it sparked a comedic rivalry between them and the resilient director Mrs. Haridan (Angelica Huston) from Chapman Academy.

text: stupid , infantile , redundant , sloppy , over-the-top , and amateurish . yep , it 's `` waking up in reno . `` go back to sleep .
translation: 愚蠢、幼稚、多余、草率、过于夸张和业余。没错，就是“在雷诺醒来”。回去睡觉吧。
back_translation: Stupid, childish, redundant, hasty, overly exaggerated, and amateurish. That's right, it's "Waking Up in Renault." Go back to sleep.

text: this is pure , exciting moviemaking . you wo n't exactly know what 's happening but you 'll be blissfully exhausted .
translation: 这是一部纯粹、激动人心的电影制作。你可能不会完全知道发生了什么，但你会感到无比疲惫却又心满意足。
back_translation: This is a purely exhilarating film production. You may not fully understand what is happening, but you will feel utterly exhausted yet completely satisfied.

text: john , and world-famous ice skating star , elena , are about to sign divorce papers when they realise that , in spite of everything happening around them , their love is worth fighting for .
translation: 约翰和世界著名的花样滑冰明星艾琳娜即将签署离婚文件，然而他们意识到，尽管周围发生了一切，他们的爱情值得为之奋斗。
back_translation: John and the world-renowned figure skating star Elena are about to sign divorce papers, however, they realize that despite everything happening around them, their love is worth fighting for.

text: ( e . t . ) stands as a perfect movie-going experience that i do n't believe will ever show signs of age .
translation: 《外星人》是一部完美的观影体验，我相信它永远不会显露出衰老的迹象。
back_translation: "Alien" is a perfect viewing experience, and I believe it will never show signs of aging.

text: documentarians weissman and weber have expertly crafted a record of a wondrous time and a wild group in the cockettes , and you wo n't want to miss a minute of it .
translation: 记录片制片人威斯曼和韦伯巧妙地记录了一个奇妙的时代和一群狂野的人——《科克特斯》，你一定不想错过其中的任何一分钟。
back_translation: Documentary filmmakers Wiseman and Weber skillfully capture a remarkable era and a group of wild individuals in "The Cockettes," which you definitely won't want to miss a single minute of.

text: bruce nolan is a television reporter , who is currently assigned what he considers to be undignified assignments , that has him being the butt of a joke .
translation: 布鲁斯·诺兰是一名电视记者，目前被分配到他认为不光彩的工作，这让他成为了笑话的对象。
back_translation: Bruce Nolan is a television reporter who is currently assigned to a job he considers disgraceful, which makes him the subject of ridicule.

text: too stagey , talky -- and long -- for its own good .
translation: 过于做作，话多——而且——对自己来说也太长了。
back_translation: Too pretentious, too wordy—and—too long for myself as well.

text: eventually , crane teamed up with video technician john carpenter to document his exploits , an association that may very well have led to his murder in a scottsdale , arizona motel room in 1978 , which remains officially unsolved to this day .
translation: 最终，克雷恩与视频技术人员约翰·卡彭特合作，记录他的冒险，这种合作关系可能最终导致他在1978年在亚利桑那州斯科茨代尔一家汽车旅馆被谋杀，此案至今仍然官方未解决。
back_translation: Ultimately, Crane collaborated with video technician John Carpenter to document his adventures, a partnership that may have ultimately led to his murder in 1978 at a motel in Scottsdale, Arizona, a case that remains officially unsolved to this day.

text: ultimately the project comes across as clinical , detached , uninvolving , possibly prompting audience members to wonder , 'what 's the point ? '
translation: 最终，这个项目给人的感觉是冷漠、疏离、缺乏参与感，这可能会让观众产生“重点是什么？”的疑问。
back_translation: In the end, this project gives people a sense of indifference, estrangement, and lack of engagement, which may lead viewers to question, "What is the point?"

text: it 's a love story in havana at the begining of the 19th century , between a young women from hait & # 237 ; and a german man .
translation: 这是一个发生在19世纪初哈瓦那的爱情故事，讲述了一位来自海地的年轻女子和一位德国男子之间的爱情。
back_translation: This is a love story set in early 19th century Havana, telling the tale of a young woman from Haiti and a German man.

text: thomas narrowly escapes when his brother sean finds a wishbone , and suggests that they make a wish .
translation: 托马斯在他的兄弟肖恩找到一根许愿骨并建议他们许愿时，侥幸逃脱。
back_translation: Thomas narrowly escaped when his brother Sean found a wishbone and suggested they make a wish.

text: no one else , that is , until an extra-ordinary group of six outlaws lands on their front porch .
translation: 没有其他人，也就是说，直到一个非凡的六人亡命之徒团队出现在他们的门口。
back_translation: There was no one else, that is to say, until an extraordinary team of six outlaws appeared at their doorstep.

text: a canny franchise escapade ; it gets the job done .
translation: 一个精明的特许经营冒险；它完成了任务。
back_translation: A shrewd franchising venture; it accomplished its mission.

text: my wife is an actress works as well as it does because [ the leads ] are such a companionable couple .
translation: 我妻子是一名演员，她的工作之所以顺利，是因为主角们是一对如此和谐的情侣。
back_translation: My wife is an actress, and her work goes smoothly because the lead characters are such a harmonious couple.

text: even if the ring has a familiar ring , it 's still unusually crafty and intelligent for hollywood horror .
translation: 即使这个环有一种熟悉的感觉，它在好莱坞恐怖片中仍然显得异常狡猾和聪明。
back_translation: Even though this ring has a familiar feeling, it still appears exceptionally cunning and clever in Hollywood horror movies.

text: the end of innocence has already begun and a new path , dark and hopeful , stands waiting like the ships beyond her window .
translation: 纯真的结束已经开始，一条黑暗而充满希望的新道路正像她窗外的船只一样静静等待。
back_translation: The end of innocence has already begun, and a dark yet hopeful new path is quietly waiting like the boats outside her window.

text: the film just might turn on many people to opera , in general , an art form at once visceral and spiritual , wonderfully vulgar and sublimely lofty -- and as emotionally grand as life .
translation: 这部电影可能会让很多人对歌剧产生兴趣，这是一种既具感官冲击又富有精神性的艺术形式，既惊人粗俗又崇高优雅，情感的壮阔程度与生活本身相媲美。
back_translation: This film may spark interest in opera for many, which is an art form that is both sensory and spiritual, astonishingly crude yet sublime and elegant, with a grandeur of emotion that rivals life itself.

text: at the same time , scientist and businessman norman osborn , after exposure to an experimental nerve gas , develops an alternate personality himself ; the super-strong , psychotic green goblin !
translation: 与此同时，科学家和商人诺曼·奥斯本在接触一种实验性的神经毒气后，发展出了另一个人格；超强、精神错乱的绿魔！
back_translation: Meanwhile, scientist and businessman Norman Osborn developed another personality after encountering an experimental nerve gas; the super-powered, insane Green Goblin!

text: joseph just broke up with his girlfriend and is not taking it very well .
translation: 约瑟夫刚和女朋友分手，他对此并没有很好地应对。
back_translation: Joseph just broke up with his girlfriend, and he is not coping well with it.

text: the nightmare isnt over , william birkin ordered the hive to be reopened , and in doing so contaminated all of raccoon city , a city of the daed , with alice stuck right in the middle .
translation: 噩梦还没有结束，威廉·伯金下令重新开放蜂巢，这样一来，整个浣熊市被污染了，而艾丽斯正身处其中。
back_translation: The nightmare is not over yet; William Birkin ordered the reopening of the Hive, which resulted in the entire Raccoon City being contaminated, and Alice is right in the middle of it.

text: one day , he came to her and asked her to have dinner and drive her home .
translation: 一天，他来到她身边，请她共进晚餐，并送她回家。
back_translation: One day, he came to her side, invited her to dinner, and took her home.

text: a `` film poem `` which is a 2002 updated version of the famous 1936 general post office film 'night mail ( 1936 ) ' .
translation: 一部“电影诗”，这是对1936年著名邮政总局影片《夜邮》（1936）的2002年更新版本。
back_translation: A "film poem," this is a 2002 updated version of the famous 1936 Post Office film "Night Mail."

text: what if he escaped with the intention of joining all those other nazi evil-geniuses in sun-soaked south america ?
translation: 如果他逃跑的目的是为了加入那些在阳光普照的南美洲的其他纳粹恶棍呢？
back_translation: What if his purpose for escaping is to join those other Nazi villains in sun-soaked South America?

text: he uses radical methods to get some mation from magneto , and plans an attack to prof . xavier 's mutant school when there is only wolverine and the young students ( jean grey and storm are looking for a new mutant , nightcrawler , and xavier and clycops are in magneto 's plastic prison ) .
translation: 他使用激进的方法从万磁王那里获取一些信息，并计划在只有金刚狼和年轻学生（琴·格蕾和风暴正在寻找一个新的变种人夜行者，而X教授和魅惑女郎则被关在万磁王的塑料监狱中）的时候攻击X教授的变种人学校。
back_translation: He uses radical methods to obtain some information from Magneto and plans to attack Professor X's mutant school when only Wolverine and the young students (Jean Grey and Storm are looking for a new mutant Nightcrawler, while Professor X and Mystique are locked in Magneto's plastic prison) are present.

text: the writer creates a story of a elderly man who seeks happiness because of the recent lose of his wife .
translation: 作家创作了一个故事，讲述一位老年人因最近失去妻子而寻求幸福的经历。
back_translation: The writer created a story about an elderly man seeking happiness after recently losing his wife.

text: curling may be a unique sport but men with brooms is distinctly ordinary .
translation: 冰壶可能是一项独特的运动，但拿着扫帚的男人却显得非常普通。
back_translation: Curling may be a unique sport, but the man holding the broom seems very ordinary.

text: a generic bloodbath that often becomes laughably unbearable when it is n't merely offensive .
translation: 一种通用的血腥场景，当它不仅仅是令人反感时，往往会变得令人可笑地无法忍受。
back_translation: A generic bloody scene, when it is not just repulsive, often becomes absurdly unbearable.

text: the entire point of a shaggy dog story , of course , is that it goes nowhere , and this is classic nowheresville in every sense .
translation: 一则冗长的故事的全部意义，当然就是它没有目的，而这在任何意义上都是经典的无处可去。
back_translation: The entire meaning of a lengthy story, of course, is that it has no purpose, and this is, in every sense, a classic aimlessness.

text: kyle 's decline into a `` living hell `` is part of a journey to that thing we all battle within our selves .
translation: 凯尔的堕落成了一场“生不如死”的旅程，是我们每个人内心都在斗争的东西的一部分。
back_translation: Kyle's fall has become a journey of "living worse than death," representing a part of the struggle that each of us faces within ourselves.

text: when he tries to grant everybody what they want , turmoil ensues .
translation: 当他试图满足每个人的需求时，混乱随之而来。
back_translation: Chaos ensued as he tried to meet everyone's needs.

text: what they soon discover is that they are n't alone . . . and it is n't a german soldier that 's hunting them down .
translation: 他们很快发现他们并不孤单……而且追捕他们的并不是德国士兵。
back_translation: They quickly realized that they were not alone... and that it was not German soldiers who were pursuing them.

text: the drama was so uninspiring that even a story immersed in love , lust , and sin could n't keep my attention .
translation: 这部戏剧如此缺乏灵感，以至于即使是一个充满爱、欲望和罪恶的故事也无法吸引我的注意。
back_translation: This play is so lacking in inspiration that even a story filled with love, desire, and sin cannot capture my attention.

text: will rachel be able to protect harper and prove who has really been planting the bombs ?
translation: 瑞秋能否保护哈珀，并证明究竟是谁在安放炸弹？
back_translation: Can Rachel protect Harper and prove who is actually planting the bombs?

text: the mismatch between whitey 's good heart and never-ending optimism and davey 's constant troublemaking soon have them both wondering if going to jail would n't have been easier !
translation: 白人的善良与永无止境的乐观与戴维的不断惹麻烦之间的矛盾，让他们都开始怀疑，去监狱是不是更简单！
back_translation: The contradiction between the kindness and endless optimism of white people and David's constant troublemaking made them all begin to wonder whether going to prison might be easier!

text: a new york city oil company troubleshooter is brought to a remote b . c .
translation: 一名纽约市石油公司的问题解决者被派到偏远的不列颠哥伦比亚省。
back_translation: A problem solver from an oil company in New York City was sent to remote British Columbia.

text: very much a home video , and so devoid of artifice and purpose that it appears not to have been edited at all .
translation: 非常像是一部家庭录像，缺乏造作和目的，似乎根本没有经过编辑。
back_translation: It resembles a home video very much, lacking artifice and purpose, and seemingly not edited at all.

text: . . . expands the horizons of boredom to the point of collapse , turning into a black hole of dullness , from which no interesting concept can escape .
translation: ……将无聊的视野扩展到崩溃的边缘，变成了一个无趣的黑洞，任何有趣的概念都无法逃脱。
back_translation: ...expanded the boring perspective to the edge of collapse, turning into a dull black hole from which no interesting concepts could escape.

text: produced by 20th century fox , ice age falls short of classic status . but it 's one of the best such features not to wear the disney or dreamworks banner .
translation: 由20世纪福克斯制作的《冰川时代》在经典地位上有所欠缺，但它是最好的一部没有披上迪士尼或梦工厂标志的作品之一。
back_translation: Produced by 20th Century Fox, "Ice Age" may fall short of classic status, but it is one of the best works that does not bear the Disney or DreamWorks label.

text: even through its flaws , revolution # 9 proves to be a compelling , interestingly told film .
translation: 即使有它的缺陷，《革命9号》仍然是一部引人入胜、叙述有趣的电影。
back_translation: Even with its flaws, "Revolution 9" is still an engaging and interestingly narrated film.

text: both flawed and delayed , martin scorcese 's gangs of new york still emerges as his most vital work since goodfellas .
translation: 尽管存在缺陷和延迟，马丁·斯科塞斯的《纽约黑帮》仍然成为他自《好家伙》以来最重要的作品。
back_translation: Despite its flaws and delays, Martin Scorsese's "Gangs of New York" remains his most important work since "Goodfellas."

text: martyr gets royally screwed and comes back for more .
translation: 殉道者被彻底糟蹋，然后又回来找麻烦。
back_translation: Martyrs are thoroughly trampled and then come back to cause trouble.

text: a horror movie with seriously dumb characters , which somewhat dilutes the pleasure of watching them stalked by creepy-crawly bug things that live only in the darkness .
translation: 一部有着非常愚蠢角色的恐怖电影，这在某种程度上削弱了观看他们被生活在黑暗中的令人毛骨悚然的虫子追逐的乐趣。
back_translation: A horror movie with very stupid characters, which somewhat diminishes the enjoyment of watching them being chased by creepy crawlers living in the dark.

text: not one moment in the enterprise did n't make me want to lie down in a dark room with something cool to my brow .
translation: 在整个过程中，没有一个时刻让我不想躺在一个黑暗的房间里，用什么冰凉的东西敷在额头上。
back_translation: At no moment during the entire process did I not want to lie in a dark room with something cold pressed against my forehead.

text: hamilton high is no place for a teacher who cares .
translation: 汉密尔顿高中不适合关心学生的老师。
back_translation: Hamilton High School is not suitable for teachers who care about students.

text: the direction occasionally rises to the level of marginal competence , but for most of the film it is hard to tell who is chasing who or why .
translation: 导演的水平偶尔达到边际能力，但在大多数影片中，很难分清谁在追谁以及为什么。
back_translation: The director's skill occasionally reaches the threshold of competence, but in most films, it is hard to distinguish who is pursuing whom and why.

text: in a futuristic world , a strict regime has eliminated war by suppressing emotions : books , art and music are strictly forbidden and feeling is a crime punishable by death .
translation: 在一个未来世界，一个严格的政权通过压制情感消除了战争：书籍、艺术和音乐被严格禁止，感受是可判死刑的犯罪。
back_translation: In a future world, a strict regime eliminates war by suppressing emotions: books, art, and music are strictly prohibited, and feeling is punishable by death.

text: after battling an attack by robbers with her amazing martial arts skills , she tells yan her family 's history .
translation: 在用她惊人的武术技能抵挡住抢匪的攻击后，她向燕讲述了她家族的历史。
back_translation: After using her amazing martial arts skills to fend off the robber's attack, she told Yan about her family's history.

text: the film has the high-buffed gloss and high-octane jolts you expect of de palma , but what makes it transporting is that it 's also one of the smartest , most pleasurable expressions of pure movie love to come from an american director in years .
translation: 这部电影拥有德帕尔马作品中常见的高度抛光的光泽和强烈的刺激，但让人陶醉的是，它也是近年来美国导演中最聪明、最令人愉悦的纯电影热爱的表达之一。
back_translation: This film has the highly polished sheen and intense stimulation common in De Palma's works, but what is intoxicating is that it is also one of the smartest and most enjoyable pure cinematic expressions among American directors in recent years.

text: soon after , christin returns as a fierce ghost , and begins to kill all in her path at the hotel as a means for revenge .
translation: 不久之后，克里斯汀以一个凶猛的幽灵身份回归，开始在酒店里杀死她路径上的所有人，以此作为报复。
back_translation: Not long after, Christine returned in a fierce ghostly form, starting to kill everyone in her path at the hotel as an act of revenge.

text: after the death of a `` mucker `` and two others opposing her sect , the local authorities decide to act against her and her followers .
translation: 在一位“贼者”和其他两名反对她教派的人去世后，当地当局决定对她及其追随者采取行动。
back_translation: After a "thief" and two other opponents of her sect died, local authorities decided to take action against her and her followers.

text: he tells mitchell that he is now in debt .
translation: 他告诉米切尔他现在欠债。
back_translation: He told Mitchell that he is in debt now.

text: i felt sad for lise not so much because of what happens as because she was captured by this movie when she obviously belongs in something lighter and sunnier , by rohmer , for example .
translation: 我为丽丝感到难过，不是因为发生的事情，而是因为她被这部电影所困住，而她显然应该在更轻松、更阳光的作品中，比如罗梅尔的电影。
back_translation: I feel sorry for Lise, not because of what happened, but because she is trapped in this movie when she clearly should be in something lighter and sunnier, like one of Romer's films.

text: his new worldliness and ideas go over well with impoverished siblings madonna and silver brassaurd and the hopelessly na & # 239 ; ve carrie .
translation: 他的新世俗观和想法受到贫困的兄弟姐妹麦当娜和银色布拉索尔，以及天真无邪的凯莉的热烈欢迎。
back_translation: His new secular views and ideas were warmly welcomed by his impoverished siblings Madonna and Silver Brasor, as well as the innocent Kelly.

text: but things go terribly wrong for the honest bank manager when he finds one of his own employees trying to con the customers .
translation: 但是，当诚实的银行经理发现自己的一个员工试图诈骗客户时，事情变得非常糟糕。
back_translation: However, things got very bad when the honest bank manager discovered that one of his employees was attempting to defraud clients.

text: that rare movie that works on any number of levels -- as a film of magic and whimsy for children , a heartfelt romance for teenagers and a compelling argument about death , both pro and con , for adults .
translation: 那部罕见的电影在多个层面上都有效——作为一部儿童的魔幻和奇思妙想的影片，作为一部令人感动的青少年爱情故事，以及作为一部关于死亡的引人深思的论证，既有赞成也有反对，适合成年人观看。
back_translation: That rare film works on multiple levels— as a magical and whimsical movie for children, as a touching teenage love story, and as a thought-provoking discourse on death, presenting arguments both for and against, suitable for adult viewers.

text: colorful , energetic and sweetly whimsical . . . the rare sequel that 's better than its predecessor .
translation: 色彩斑斓，充满活力，甜美而富有幻想……是一部优于其前作的罕见续集。
back_translation: Colorful, full of vitality, sweet and rich in fantasy... it is a rare sequel that surpasses its predecessor.

text: moves in such odd plot directions and descends into such message-mongering moralism that its good qualities are obscured .
translation: 情节发展得如此奇怪，下降到如此信息传播的道德主义，以至于其优点被掩盖。
back_translation: The plot develops in such a strange way, descending to such a moralism of information dissemination that its advantages are overshadowed.

text: it is most of the things costner movies are known for ; it 's sanctimonious , self-righteous and so eager to earn our love that you want to slap it .
translation: 这是凯文·科斯特纳电影大多数情况下所知的特征；它自以为是，充满说教，急切地想要赢得我们的爱，以至于让你想要给它一巴掌。
back_translation: This is a characteristic that is often associated with Kevin Costner's movies; they are self-righteous, preachy, and eager to win our affection to the point that it makes you want to slap them.

text: johnny knoxville and his crazy friends appear on the big screen for the very first time in jackass : the movie .
translation: 约翰尼·诺克斯维尔和他疯狂的朋友们首次在大银幕上亮相，影片名为《恶作剧：电影》。
back_translation: Johnny Knoxville and his crazy friends made their big screen debut in the film titled "Jackass: The Movie."

text: a gracefully acted , unsentimental , quite likable little coming-of-age movie .
translation: 一部表演优雅、没有伤感、相当讨人喜欢的小成长电影。
back_translation: A charming little coming-of-age film that is elegantly performed, without sadness, and quite likable.

text: johnathan accepts and learns the ropes of rollerball : the players are on rollerblades , trying to bring a heavy metal ball into a high goal .
translation: 约翰athan接受并学习轮球的规则：运动员穿着滑轮，试图将一个重金属球带入一个高的球门。
back_translation: Jonathan learns and accepts the rules of rollerball: athletes wear skates and try to bring a heavy metal ball into a high goal.

text: resort to an all-night crime spree that nets them a ten thousand dollar reward for their own crimes , thanks to a bizarre twist of fate .
translation: 因一场奇怪的命运转折，他们进行了一场整夜的犯罪狂欢，获得了自己犯罪的奖励，竟然高达一万美元。
back_translation: Due to a strange twist of fate, they engaged in a night-long crime spree, receiving rewards for their crimes that surprisingly amounted to ten thousand dollars.

text: while van wilder may not be the worst national lampoon film , it 's far from being this generation 's animal house .
translation: 虽然《范·怀尔德》可能不是最糟糕的《国家公园》电影，但距离这一代人的《动物屋》还有很远。
back_translation: Although "Van Wilder" may not be the worst "National Lampoon" movie, it is still far from being this generation's "Animal House."

text: the driver races to locate a kidnapped victim locked in the trunk of an abandoned car somewhere on the water 's edge .
translation: 司机全速寻找被绑架的受害者，她被锁在一辆废弃汽车的后备箱里，地点就在水边的某个地方。
back_translation: The driver is speeding to find the kidnapped victim, who is locked in the trunk of an abandoned car somewhere by the water.

text: sean 's a drug dealer , owes a lot of money to `` fellow `` dealer rupert guest ( clifton collins , jr . ) , and sleeps with nearly half of the female population on campus .
translation: 肖恩是个毒贩，欠了很多钱给“同行”贩毒者鲁珀特·古斯特（克利夫顿·柯林斯 Jr.），同时还和校内近一半的女性发生关系。
back_translation: Sean is a drug dealer who owes a lot of money to fellow drug dealer Rupert Gust (Clifton Collins Jr.) and has also been involved with nearly half of the women on campus.

text: . . . a b-movie-and-proud-of-it thrill ride , probably the best of its kind since tremors .
translation: ……一部自豪地被称为B级电影的刺激之旅，可能是自《地震》以来同类影片中最好的。
back_translation: ...a thrilling journey proudly referred to as a B movie, potentially the best of its kind since "Earthquake."

text: in awe of seductive club singer velma kelly ( who is subsequantly arrested for the murder of her husband and sister - after discovering their affair ) , roxie meets fred cassely a man who convinces her he can 'make her showbiz career take off ' .
translation: 罗克西对迷人的俱乐部歌手维尔玛·凯利（她因发现丈夫与姐妹的 affair而随后被捕）感到惊叹，遇见了弗雷德·卡塞利，一个说服她可以“让她的演艺事业腾飞”的男人。
back_translation: Roxy is amazed by the charming club singer Velma Kelly (who was arrested after discovering her husband’s affair with her sister) and meets Fred Casely, a man who persuades her that he can "make her career take off."

text: everything is pegged into the groove of a new york dating comedy with 'issues ' to simplify .
translation: 一切都被简化成了一部带有“问题”的纽约约会喜剧。
back_translation: Everything has been simplified into a New York dating comedy with a "problem."

text: a beautiful meditation on the life force and redemptive power of literature -- for writers and readers alike -- and on what it means to be fully alive , navigating the rocky terrain between vision and execution .
translation: 对生命力和文学救赎力量的美丽沉思——无论是对作家还是读者——以及完整活着的意义，在愿景与执行之间驾驭崎岖地形。
back_translation: A beautiful meditation on the vitality of life and the redemptive power of literature—whether for writers or readers—and the meaning of living fully, navigating the rugged terrain between vision and execution.

text: the word in las vegas is that he is dead .
translation: 拉斯维加斯的消息是他已经去世。
back_translation: The news from Las Vegas is that he has passed away.

text: the real draw , though , is the performance by dunst that is , alone , worth the price of admission .
translation: 真正的亮点是邓斯特的表演，这一表演本身就值票价。
back_translation: The real highlight is Dunst's performance, which alone is worth the ticket price.

text: after a decade of hidden feelings , divorces and failed relationships , they both finally reveal their true feelings for one another - to find out they both are in love with the other .
translation: 经过十年的隐秘感情、离婚和失败的关系，他们终于向彼此坦白了真实的感受——发现他们彼此相爱。
back_translation: After ten years of a secret relationship, divorce, and failed connections, they finally opened up to each other about their true feelings—realizing that they love each other.

text: they threw loads of money at an idea that should 've been so much more even if it was only made for teenage boys and wrestling fans .
translation: 他们在一个本应更有潜力的创意上投入了大量资金，即使这个创意只是为青少年男孩和摔跤迷而制作的。
back_translation: They invested a large amount of money in a concept that should have had more potential, even though this concept was only aimed at teen boys and wrestling fans.

text: credit director ramsay for taking the sometimes improbable story and making it feel realistic .
translation: 感谢导演拉姆西让这个有时候看似不切实际的故事变得真实可信。
back_translation: Thank you to director Ramsay for making this sometimes seemingly unrealistic story feel real and credible.

text: enter four months later , when it seems reasonable to say that charlie should be feeling better .
translation: 四个月后，当人们认为查理应该感觉好一些的时候。
back_translation: Four months later, when people thought Charlie should be feeling better.

text: if the man from elysian fields is doomed by its smallness , it is also elevated by it -- the kind of movie that you enjoy more because you 're one of the lucky few who sought it out .
translation: 如果来自极乐世界的男人因其小众而注定失败，那么它也因其小众而被提升——这是一种电影，你会更喜欢，因为你是那些幸运的少数人之一，主动去寻找它。
back_translation: If a man from the realm of paradise is destined to fail because of his niche status, he is also elevated because of it - this is a film you would prefer, as you are one of those fortunate few who actively seek it out.

text: amanda is faced with making right decisions amidst trying circumstances .
translation: 阿曼达面临着在困难情况下做出正确决策的挑战。
back_translation: Amanda faces the challenge of making the right decisions in difficult situations.

text: new york serves as a backdrop for a cast of characters in search of love , lust or lucre including a woman who makes awkward moves on the man renovating her soho loft , an embezzler , a sleazy artist and a phone psychic .
translation: 纽约成为了一群角色寻找爱情、欲望或金钱的背景，包括一个在给她的苏豪楼阁翻新的男人身上做出尴尬举动的女人，一个挪用公款者，一个卑鄙的艺术家和一个电话灵媒。
back_translation: New York serves as the backdrop for a group of characters searching for love, desire, or money, including a woman who makes an awkward advance on a man renovating her Soho loft, an embezzler, a despicable artist, and a phone psychic.

text: in the end , we are left with something like two ships passing in the night rather than any insights into gay love , chinese society or the price one pays for being dishonest .
translation: 最后，我们留下的只是一幕像是夜间擦肩而过的两艘船，而不是对同性恋爱、中国社会或因不诚实而付出的代价的任何深刻见解。
back_translation: In the end, all we are left with is a scene reminiscent of two ships passing by each other at night, rather than any profound insights into same-sex love, Chinese society, or the costs incurred due to dishonesty.

text: the following things are not at all entertaining : the bad sound , the lack of climax and , worst of all , watching seinfeld ( who is also one of the film 's producers ) do everything he can to look like a good guy .
translation: 以下内容一点都不娱乐：糟糕的音效、缺乏高潮，以及最糟糕的是，看着塞infeld（他也是这部影片的制片人之一）竭尽全力想看起来像个好人。
back_translation: The following content is not entertaining at all: terrible sound effects, a lack of climax, and worst of all, watching Seinfeld (who is also one of the producers of this film) trying so hard to appear to be a good person.

text: one ca n't shake the feeling that crossroads is nothing more than an hour-and-a-half-long commercial for britney 's latest album .
translation: 人们总有一种感觉，《十字路口》不过是对布兰妮最新专辑的一个半小时长的宣传片。
back_translation: People always have a feeling that "Crossroads" is just a one-and-a-half-hour long promotional film for Britney's latest album.

text: all these developments and challenges facing santa weigh down the plot so heavily that they drain all the film of its energy and needlessly strain credibility .
translation: 所有这些发展和挑战让圣诞老人感到负担沉重，以至于剧情变得过于沉闷，消耗了电影的活力，并无谓地削弱了可信度。
back_translation: All these developments and challenges weigh heavily on Santa Claus, making the plot overly gloomy, draining the vitality of the film, and needlessly undermining its credibility.

text: the good girl is a film in which the talent is undeniable but the results are underwhelming .
translation: 《好女孩》是一部才华不可否认但结果令人失望的电影。
back_translation: "Good Girl" is a movie with undeniable talent but a disappointing outcome.

text: when all but one of mi5 's top agents are killed in an explosion .
translation: 当除了一名之外，mi5的所有顶级特工在一场爆炸中被杀。
back_translation: All top MI5 agents were killed in an explosion, except for one.

text: the whole of sunshine state is less than the sum of its parts , but the parts are often lovely , and always true .
translation: 阳光州整体不及其各部分之和，但各部分常常是美丽的，且总是真实的。
back_translation: The whole of Sunshine State is not as good as the sum of its parts, but each part is often beautiful and always real.

text: treats a potentially explosive set-up with adult reflection and thoughtfulness .
translation: 以成年人的反思和深思熟虑对待一个潜在爆炸性的局面。
back_translation: Treat a potentially explosive situation with the reflection and careful consideration of an adult.

text: though not as tightly focused or as well-performed as malkovich , human nature has its own absurdist flair .
translation: 虽然没有《马尔科维奇之门》那么紧凑或表现得那么出色，但《人性》也有其荒诞的魅力。
back_translation: Although not as tight or impressive as "Being John Malkovich," "Human Nature" also has its absurd charm.

text: in a surrealistic approach typical of the director , a clumsy cat and an intelligent monkey are also present in the film .
translation: 在导演典型的超现实主义风格中，影片中还有一只笨拙的猫和一只聪明的猴子。
back_translation: In the director's typical surrealist style, there is also a clumsy cat and a clever monkey in the film.

text: it 's deep-sixed by a compulsion to catalog every bodily fluids gag in there 's something about mary and devise a parallel clone-gag .
translation: 它被一种强迫症所掩盖，想要分类每一个体液的笑话，里面有《玛丽有什么事》和设计一个平行的克隆笑话。
back_translation: It is overshadowed by an obsession, wanting to classify jokes about every bodily fluid, including "What's the matter with Mary" and designing a parallel cloning joke.

text: a kilted jackson is an unsettling sight , and indicative of his , if you will , out-of-kilter character , who rambles aimlessly through ill-conceived action pieces .
translation: 穿着格子裙的杰克逊让人感到不安，这表明了他的性格，如果你愿意的话，可以说是格格不入，他在设计糟糕的动作片中漫无目的地游荡。
back_translation: Jackson, wearing a plaid skirt, makes people feel uneasy, which reflects his personality; if you like, you could say he is out of place as he aimlessly wanders through poorly designed action films.

text: less an examination of neo-nazism than a probe into the nature of faith itself .
translation: 这不仅是对新纳粹主义的检视，更是对信仰本质的探究。
back_translation: This is not only an examination of neo-Nazism, but also an exploration of the essence of belief.

text: despite impeccable acting . . . and a script that takes some rather unexpected ( even , at times , preposterous ) turns , love is just too , too precious in the end .
translation: 尽管演技无可挑剔……剧本也有一些相当意想不到（甚至，有时荒谬）的转折，但最终，爱情实在是太过珍贵。
back_translation: Despite the impeccable acting... the script has some quite unexpected (and at times absurd) twists, but in the end, love is simply too precious.

text: vincent gallo is right at home in this french shocker playing his usual bad boy weirdo role .
translation: 文森特·加洛在这部法国惊悚片中游刃有余，扮演了他一贯的坏男孩怪胎角色。
back_translation: Vincent Gallo effortlessly plays his usual bad boy freak role in this French thriller.

text: director roger kumble offers just enough sweet and traditional romantic comedy to counter the crudity . and there 's the inimitable diaz , holding it all together .
translation: 导演罗杰·坎布尔提供了足够的甜蜜和传统浪漫喜剧，以抵消粗俗。而且还有独特的迪亚兹，撑起了一切。
back_translation: Director Roger Campbell offers enough sweetness and traditional romantic comedy to offset the vulgarity. And there is also the unique Diaz, who holds it all together.

text: after a long inventory of break-up mishaps , nick enlists the help of his best friend to plan the perfect escape from his overbearing girlfriend .
translation: 在经历了漫长的分手麻烦后，尼克请他的好朋友帮助他计划一次完美的逃离，摆脱他那高压的女友。
back_translation: After going through a long breakup trouble, Nick asked his good friend to help him plan the perfect getaway to escape his high-pressure girlfriend.

text: < em > the crocodile hunter : collision course < /em > is one of the most unusual movies i 've ever seen , but it remains faithful to irwin 's appeal , and therefore it works .
translation: 《鳄鱼猎人：碰撞课程》是我见过的最不寻常的电影之一，但它忠实于欧文的魅力，因此它奏效。
back_translation: "Crocodile Hunter: Collision Course" is one of the most unusual movies I've ever seen, but it stays true to Steve Irwin's charm, so it works.

text: nemesis suffers from a paunchy midsection , several plodding action sequences and a wickedly undramatic central theme .
translation: 《天敌》有着臃肿的中段、几个缓慢的动作场景以及一个极其缺乏戏剧性的中心主题。
back_translation: "The Heavenly Enemy" has a bloated middle section, several slow action scenes, and a central theme that lacks dramatic tension.

text: he dies before he gets a chance to communicate with the spirit and his dead body with the ouija board is left to the devices to his strung out friends .
translation: 他在有机会与灵魂沟通之前就去世了，他的尸体和灵异棋盘被他那些神志不清的朋友们随意处置。
back_translation: He died before having the chance to communicate with the soul, and his body along with the mystical chessboard was carelessly disposed of by his deranged friends.

text: only nurse bloom knows the spells to ensure that the child will see benevolent spirits , not evil ones , but she has n't bargained for lena 's mother , who scoffs at 'old time ideas ' and discreetly disposes of the special tea the nurse has brewed .
translation: 只有布鲁姆护士知道能确保孩子看到善良灵魂而不是恶灵的咒语，但她没有考虑到莱娜的母亲，母亲嘲笑“旧时代的观念”，并悄悄处理掉护士煮的特别茶。
back_translation: Only Nurse Bloom knew the spell that could ensure the child saw the kind souls instead of evil spirits, but she did not take into account Lena's mother, who mocked "old-fashioned ideas" and quietly disposed of the special tea that the nurse had brewed.

text: the warden 's attitude starts to change after 8 years , when mitra tries to protect a new inmate from rape at the hands of her older cellmates .
translation: 在八年后，当米特拉试图保护一名新入监者免受年长牢友的强奸时，监狱长的态度开始发生变化。
back_translation: Eight years later, when Mitra tried to protect a new inmate from being raped by older prison mates, the warden's attitude began to change.

text: if you think it 's a riot to see rob schneider in a young woman 's clothes , then you 'll enjoy the hot chick .
translation: 如果你觉得看到罗布·施奈德穿着年轻女性的衣服很有趣，那么你一定会喜欢《热辣女郎》。
back_translation: If you find it amusing to see Rob Schneider dressed in women's clothing, then you will definitely enjoy "Hot Chick."

text: there 's enough melodrama in this magnolia primavera to make pta proud yet director muccino 's characters are less worthy of puccini than they are of daytime television .
translation: 这部《木兰春》的戏剧成分足以让PTA感到自豪，但导演穆奇诺的角色更值得在白天电视剧中出现，而不是普契尼的作品中。
back_translation: The dramatic elements of "Mulan Spring" are sufficient to make the PTA proud, but the role of director Muccino is more fitting for daytime television than for a Puccini work.

text: wise , cruelly observant of human nature and hysterically funny .
translation: 聪明，残酷地观察人性，并且极其幽默。
back_translation: Smart, cruelly observing human nature, and extremely humorous.

text: it 's the kind of film where the villain even gives an evil look for his passport photo . how can you resist that ?
translation: 这是一部连反派在护照照片中都能露出邪魅眼神的电影。你怎么能抗拒呢？
back_translation: This is a movie where even the villain can show a charming and mischievous look in their passport photo. How can you resist it?

text: pascale bailly 's rom-com provides amM-ilie 's audrey tautou with another fabuleux destin -- i . e . , a banal spiritual quest .
translation: 帕斯卡尔·拜伊的浪漫喜剧为阿黛丽·塔图提供了另一个美妙的命运——即一种平凡的精神追求。
back_translation: Pascal Bai's romantic comedy provides Audrey Tautou with another wonderful fate - a pursuit of ordinary spirituality.

text: astonishing is n't the word -- neither is incompetent , incoherent or just plain crap . indeed , none of these words really gets at the very special type of badness that is deuces wild .
translation: 惊人并不是这个词——无能、没有条理或者简单粗暴也不是。实际上，这些词都无法准确表达“双骰野”这种特别的糟糕。
back_translation: Amazement is not the word—ineptitude, lack of organization, or simple brutality aren't either. In fact, none of these words can accurately convey the particularly bad nature of "Double Dice Wild."

text: when two african american pilots become the first non-white soldiers in the camp , one turns up murdered and the other accused of killing a white sergeant .
translation: 当两位非裔美国飞行员成为营地里首位非白人士兵时，一位被发现谋杀，而另一位则被指控杀害了一名白人军士。
back_translation: When two African American pilots became the first non-white soldiers in the camp, one was found murdered, while the other was accused of killing a white sergeant.

text: as a result , sarah embarks upon a journey of discovery that leads to danger , heartbreak and romance in the far corners of the world .
translation: 因此，莎拉踏上了一段发现之旅，这段旅程带她走向世界的偏远角落，经历危险、心碎和浪漫。
back_translation: Therefore, Sarah embarked on a journey of discovery that took her to the remote corners of the world, where she encountered danger, heartbreak, and romance.

text: the two animals decide to search for the father and return the baby to him .
translation: 这两只动物决定去寻找父亲，把小宝宝送回给他。
back_translation: The two animals decided to go find their father and return the little baby to him.

text: at least it 's a fairly impressive debut from the director , charles stone iii .
translation: 至少这是导演查尔斯·斯通三世相当令人印象深刻的首秀。
back_translation: At least this is quite an impressive debut for director Charles Stone III.

text: and he also has to deal with the daughter 's older brother , who 's on the run from local drug dealers .
translation: 他还必须应对女儿的哥哥，他正在逃避当地毒贩的追捕。
back_translation: He also has to deal with his daughter's brother, who is escaping from the local drug dealers.

text: john has become not just a full fledged phenomenon and household word , but a critics darling and social enigma as well .
translation: 约翰不仅成为了一个成熟的现象和家喻户晓的名字，还成为了评论家的宠儿和社会谜团。

text: they must begin a journey , avoiding the mysterious detective mr barlow and the terrifying inhuman jack , to uncover the dark truth to charlie 's life .
translation: 他们必须开始一段旅程，避开神秘的侦探巴洛先生和可怕的非人类杰克，以揭示查理生活中的黑暗真相。
back_translation: They must embark on a journey to evade the mysterious detective Mr. Barrow and the terrifying inhuman Jack to uncover the dark truths in Charlie's life.

text: the film is rich with colorful characters and enlivened by its strong , convincing picture of rural trinidad .
translation: 这部电影充满了丰富多彩的人物，并通过强烈而令人信服的描绘乡村特立尼达而生动起来。
back_translation: This movie is filled with vibrant characters and comes to life through a strong and compelling depiction of rural Trinidad.

text: together [ time out and human resources ] establish mr . cantet as france 's foremost cinematic poet of the workplace .
translation: “时间管理和人力资源”共同将坎特先生确立为法国职场电影的首要诗人。
back_translation: "Time management and human resources" together established Mr. Kanté as the foremost poet of workplace films in France.

text: suddenly , going to church becomes much more appealing .
translation: 突然间，去教堂变得更加有吸引力。
back_translation: Suddenly, going to church became more attractive.

text: such an incomprehensible mess that it feels less like bad cinema than like being stuck in a dark pit having a nightmare about bad cinema .
translation: 如此难以理解的混乱，感觉更像是陷入黑暗的深渊中，做着关于糟糕电影的噩梦，而不是糟糕的电影。
back_translation: Such an incomprehensible chaos feels more like being trapped in a dark abyss, having nightmares about bad movies, rather than actually watching bad movies.

text: lillard and cardellini earn their scooby snacks , but not anyone else .
translation: 利拉德和卡德琳妮赢得了他们的斯库比小吃，但其他人没有。
back_translation: Lillard and Cadilini won their Scooby snacks, but the others did not.

text: the result , however well-intentioned , is ironically just the sort of disposable , kitchen-sink homage that illustrates why the whole is so often less than the sum of its parts in today 's hollywood .
translation: 然而，尽管出发点良好，结果却讽刺地成为了一种可抛弃的、杂乱无章的致敬，恰好说明了为什么如今好莱坞的作品常常不如其部分的总和。
back_translation: However, despite the good starting point, the result ironically became a disposable and haphazard tribute, which precisely illustrates why Hollywood's works often fall short of the sum of their parts.

text: the trick when watching godard is to catch the pitch of his poetics , savor the pleasure of his sounds and images , and ponder the historical , philosophical , and ethical issues that intersect with them .
translation: 观看戈达尔时的窍门是抓住他诗学的调性，品味他的声音和图像带来的乐趣，并思考与之交织的历史、哲学和伦理问题。
back_translation: The key to watching Godard is to grasp the tone of his poetics, enjoy the pleasures brought by his sound and images, and contemplate the historical, philosophical, and ethical issues intertwined with them.

text: with no known family , he leave his california roots for middle america in search of what may be a distant cousin .
translation: 他没有已知的家庭，因此离开加利福尼亚的根基，前往中西部寻找可能是远方表亲的人。
back_translation: He has no known family, so he left the roots in California to head to the Midwest in search of what might be distant relatives.

text: soul is what 's lacking in every character in this movie and , subsequently , the movie itself .
translation: 灵魂是这部电影中每个角色以及整部电影所缺乏的东西。
back_translation: The soul is what every character and the entire movie lacks in this film.

text: in order to protect his sister , eddie - disabled , betrayed and alone - journeys into the heart of his own darkness : where he discovers that the reason for his ordeal lies in his own past sins and those of his adversary charlie strom .
translation: 为了保护他的妹妹，艾迪 - 残疾，背叛，孤独 - 进入了自己内心的黑暗深处：在那里他发现，造成他痛苦的原因在于他自己过去的罪过以及他的对手查理·斯特罗姆的罪行。
back_translation: In order to protect his sister, Eddie - disability, betrayal, loneliness - ventured into the dark depths of his own heart: there he discovered that the source of his pain lay in his own past sins and the crimes of his rival, Charlie Strom.

text: less cinematically powerful than quietly and deeply moving , which is powerful in itself .
translation: 不如在安静和深刻的感动中那样具有电影的力量，而这种力量本身就很强大。
back_translation: It is not as powerful as having the strength of a movie in quiet and profound emotions, and this power itself is already very strong.

text: sharkey , part of the sinister world of child trade , picks up vlado , an orphan of war , dreaming of freedom and a better life .
translation: 沙基，阴暗的儿童交易世界的一部分，接走了弗拉多，一个渴望自由和更好生活的战争孤儿。
back_translation: Shaki, a part of the dark world of child trafficking, took in Vlado, a war orphan yearning for freedom and a better life.

text: it gets onto the screen just about as much of the novella as one could reasonably expect , and is engrossing and moving in its own right .
translation: 它在屏幕上展现了这部中篇小说几乎所有合理的内容，并且本身就引人入胜，感人至深。
