text: after he arrives , things seem to go smoothly at first , but eventually , life becomes very complicated for the young father as he spends more time in the community .
translation: 在他到达后，一开始一切似乎很顺利，但随着他在社区中花费更多的时间，这位年轻父亲的生活最终变得非常复杂。
back_translation: When he arrived, everything seemed to go smoothly at first, but as the young father spent more time in the community, his life ultimately became very complicated.

text: the film 's plot may be shallow , but you 've never seen the deep like you see it in these harrowing surf shots .
translation: 这部电影的情节可能很浅薄，但你从未见过像这些令人心碎的冲浪镜头那样的深度。
back_translation: The plot of this movie may be shallow, but you have never seen depth like these heartbreaking surfing scenes.

text: a fascinating examination of the joyous , turbulent self-discovery made by a proper , middle-aged woman .
translation: 对一位得体中年女性进行的迷人探索，展现了她在自我发现过程中经历的快乐与动荡。
back_translation: A charming exploration of a poised middle-aged woman, showcasing the joys and upheavals she experiences in her journey of self-discovery.

text: raimi and his team could n't have done any better in bringing the story of spider-man to the big screen .
translation: 雷米和他的团队在将蜘蛛侠的故事搬上大银幕方面做得无可挑剔。
back_translation: Remy and his team have done an impeccable job of bringing Spider-Man's story to the big screen.

text: if deuces wild had been tweaked up a notch it would have become a camp adventure , one of those movies that 's so bad it starts to become good . but it was n't .
translation: 如果《二甲基愁绪》再提升一个档次，它本可以成为一场营地冒险电影，属于那种“糟糕到变好的”类型。但事实并非如此。
back_translation: If "Dimethyl Grief" had been elevated to a higher level, it could have become a camp adventure movie, one of those "so bad it's good" types. But that's not the case.

text: while johnny knoxvile and his pals put their life at risk , they are entertaining people at the same time .
translation: 当约翰尼·诺克斯维尔和他的朋友们冒着生命危险时，他们同时也在娱乐人们。
back_translation: When Johnny Knoxville and his friends risk their lives, they are also entertaining people.

text: tiz 's best friend mel is a veteran of the `` drug game `` and has spent some part of every year in prison since he was twelve .
translation: 提兹的好朋友梅尔是一名“毒品游戏”的老手，自十二岁以来几乎每年都要在监狱里度过一段时间。
back_translation: Tiz's good friend Mel is a veteran of the "drug game" and has spent time in prison almost every year since he was twelve.

text: being a sayles film , this has a way of looking at things with more patience and maturity than a plot summary might lead us to expect .
translation: 作为一部赛勒斯电影，它以更耐心和成熟的视角看待事物，这一点可能超出了情节摘要所能预期的。
back_translation: As a Cyrus film, it takes a more patient and mature perspective on things, which may exceed what one might expect from the plot summary.

text: toss in david 's best friends a dying pre-op transsexual best friend and an aging , bitter , fag-hag journalist .
translation: 把大卫最好的朋友们也算上，一个垂死的变性人最好的朋友和一个衰老、愤世嫉俗的同性恋记者。
back_translation: Including David's best friends, a dying transgender person's best friend and an aging, cynical gay journalist.

text: during the heist , they have to work together to overcome high-tech security systems , guard dogs , a nasty head of security , and a bank vault that is suspended 30 feet above ground .
translation: 在抢劫过程中，他们必须齐心协力，克服高科技的安全系统、警犬、一个讨厌的保安负责人以及悬挂在离地30英尺高的银行保险库。
back_translation: During the robbery, they had to work together to overcome high-tech security systems, police dogs, an annoying head of security, and a bank vault suspended 30 feet above the ground.

text: it manages to squeeze by on angelina jolie 's surprising flair for self-deprecating comedy .
translation: 它凭借安吉丽娜·朱莉令人惊讶的自嘲幽默来勉强过关。
back_translation: It barely makes it through thanks to Angelina Jolie's astounding self-deprecating humor.

text: lars von trier re-explores the concept of goodness , but this in an idiom very different from that of his gold heart trilogy ( breaking the waves , the idiots and dancer in the dark ) .
translation: 拉斯·冯·提尔重新探讨了善的概念，但这一次使用的语言风格与他的“金心三部曲”（《海浪拍打》、《白痴》和《黑暗中的舞者》）截然不同。
back_translation: Lars von Trier reexamines the concept of goodness, but this time the language style used is vastly different from his "Golden Heart Trilogy" ("Breaking the Waves," "The Idiots," and "Dancer in the Dark").

text: banks is a hit man , the best , usually working for latin american drug cartels .
translation: 银行是一个职业杀手，最棒的，通常为拉丁美洲毒品贩运集团工作。
back_translation: The bank is a professional killer, the best, usually working for drug trafficking organizations in Latin America.

text: the son winds up re-creating his father 's elusive life in a series of legends and myths inspired by the few facts he knows .
translation: 这个儿子最终通过他所知道的少数事实，重塑了他父亲扑朔迷离的生活，创作了一系列传说和神话。
back_translation: This son ultimately reshaped his father's enigmatic life through the few facts he knew, creating a series of legends and myths.

text: in `` the hill `` , director kurt burk brings us on a voyage through dreams of a lost childhood , to the emptiness of a normal , conditioned life , into a fantastic , surreal dream world that echoes of the past .
translation: 在《山丘》中，导演库尔特·伯克带我们踏上一段穿越失落童年梦想的旅程，进入一种正常、被条件化的生活的空虚，进入一个幻想的、超现实的梦境世界，回响着过去的声音。
back_translation: In "Hills," director Kurt Burkhart takes us on a journey through lost childhood dreams, delving into the emptiness of a normal, conditioned life and entering a fantastical, surreal dream world that echoes the voices of the past.

text: sam and the kids band together and manage to combat the armed thugs and foil lamb 's perfectly planned crime .
translation: 山姆和孩子们齐心协力，成功击退了武装恶棍，挫败了兰博完美策划的犯罪活动。
back_translation: Sam and the children worked together to successfully fend off the armed thugs, thwarting Rambo's perfectly planned criminal activities.

text: the film is ultimately about as inspiring as a hallmark card .
translation: 这部电影最终与贺卡一样鼓舞人心。
back_translation: This movie is ultimately as inspiring as a greeting card.

text: a heartfelt , understated and occasionally heavy-handed slice of heartland .
translation: 一段真挚、低调且偶尔略显生硬的心灵印记。
back_translation: A sincere, low-key, and occasionally somewhat awkward imprint of the soul.

text: together , tok and o orchestrate a buoyant , darkly funny dance of death . in the process , they demonstrate that there 's still a lot of life in hong kong cinema .
translation: 一起，Tok 和 O 协同演绎了一场充满活力又带有黑色幽默的死亡舞蹈。在这个过程中，他们展示了香港电影仍然充满生机。
back_translation: Together, Tok and O collaborated to present a vibrant death dance infused with black humor. In the process, they showcased that Hong Kong cinema is still full of vitality.

text: in the meantime , josh applies some of his newly acquired wisdom coupled with his own honest approach on doreen ( marlo marron ) - a woman his two buddies have deemed out of his league .
translation: 与此同时，乔希运用他新获得的智慧，再加上他自己真诚的方式，对多琳（马尔洛·马伦饰）展开追求——这是他两位朋友认为他高攀不起的女人。
back_translation: Meanwhile, Josh pursues Doreen (played by Marlo Maren) using his newly acquired wisdom, along with his own sincere approach—someone his two friends believe is out of his league.

text: as in his other searingly intelligent docs , dong presents the facts in an admirably clear-eyed way .
translation: 正如他其他引人深思的纪录片一样，董以令人钦佩的清晰眼光呈现事实。
back_translation: Like his other thought-provoking documentaries, Dong presents the facts with admirable clarity.

text: so exaggerated and broad that it comes off as annoying rather than charming .
translation: 如此夸张和广泛，以至于给人一种烦人的印象，而不是迷人的感觉。
back_translation: So exaggerated and widespread that it gives off an annoying impression rather than a charming feeling.

text: watching e . t now , in an era dominated by cold , loud special-effects-laden extravaganzas , one is struck less by its lavish grandeur than by its intimacy and precision .
translation: 现在在观看《E.T.》，在一个被冷漠、嘈杂、特效繁重的盛大场面主宰的时代，令人感受到的更多是它的亲密感和细腻，而不是华丽的壮观。
back_translation: Currently watching "E.T." In an era dominated by indifferent, noisy, and heavily special effects-laden grand scenes, what one feels more is its intimacy and delicacy, rather than its splendid spectacle.

text: they find him guilty and he is sent back into the forest to be hunted down by the family .
translation: 他们裁定他有罪，并将他送回森林，让家人追捕他。
back_translation: They ruled him guilty and sent him back to the forest to be hunted down by his family.

text: visually engrossing , seldom hammy , honorably mexican and burns its kahlories with conviction .
translation: 视觉上引人入胜，鲜少做作，荣誉地展现墨西哥风情，并坚定地消耗它的卡路里。
back_translation: Visually captivating, rarely artificial, it honorably showcases Mexican flair while firmly consuming its calories.

text: it 's exactly the kind of movie toback 's detractors always accuse him of making .
translation: 这正是托巴克的批评者总是指责他拍摄的那种电影。
back_translation: This is precisely the kind of movie that Toback's critics always accuse him of making.

text: fbi agent cheryl hammer , arrives in a small california town to catch an elusive killer .
translation: 联邦调查局特工谢丽尔·哈默来到加利福尼亚州一个小镇，以抓捕一个难以捉摸的杀手。
back_translation: FBI agent Cheryl Hammer arrived at a small town in California to catch an elusive killer.

text: a forceful drama of an alienated executive who re-invents himself .
translation: 一部关于一个被疏离的高管重新塑造自己的强烈戏剧。
back_translation: A powerful drama about an alienated executive who reconstructs himself.

text: for the little hope that is left , frodo and sam march on into mordor , unprotected .
translation: 为了那一点剩余的小希望，佛罗多和山姆在毫无保护的情况下向魔多进发。
back_translation: For that remaining flicker of hope, Frodo and Sam set out towards Mordor without any protection.

text: a warm but realistic meditation on friendship , family and affection .
translation: 对友谊、家庭和亲情的温暖但现实的沉思。
back_translation: Warm yet realistic contemplation on friendship, family, and affection.

text: amongst these are a middle-aged couple who met through the classified ads in a newspaper , a call-girl who keeps her daughter and her sister , a retired actor , an ex-football player , and a janitor who suspects that his adopted father , whom he dreams about every night , is his real father .
translation: 其中有一对中年夫妇，他们通过报纸上的分类广告相识，一位养女，同时抚养着女儿和姐姐的妓女，一位退休演员，一位前足球运动员，以及一位怀疑他的养父（他每晚梦到的）才是真正父亲的清洁工。
back_translation: Among them is a middle-aged couple who met through classified ads in the newspaper, an adopted daughter, a prostitute who raises both her daughter and her sister, a retired actor, a former football player, and a cleaner who doubts that his adoptive father (the one he dreams about every night) is his real father.

text: the entire town begins to look for ellen when she fails to appear at home that night .
translation: 整个镇子开始寻找艾伦，因为她那晚没有回家。
back_translation: The whole town began searching for Allen because she hadn't come home that night.

text: there are just too many characters saying too many clever things and getting into too many pointless situations . where 's the movie here ?
translation: 角色太多了，各种聪明的话语不断出现，还陷入了太多无谓的情境。这部电影在哪里呢？
back_translation: There are too many characters, and various clever dialogues keep appearing, while getting caught up in too many pointless situations. Where is this movie?

text: breen 's script has deadpan wit , though it becomes a little labored as it goes along .
translation: 布林的剧本风格冷静而幽默，尽管随着情节发展略显矫揉造作。
back_translation: Bolin's script style is calm and humorous, although it becomes somewhat contrived as the plot develops.

text: as for the music world , history 's future king is coming from the past .
translation: 在音乐界，历史的未来之王正从过去而来。
back_translation: In the music world, the future king of history is coming from the past.

text: the course of their experiences ultimately involves with sammy boi , an aggressive rapper caught in a bad contract while on of his songs is a major radio hit ; joan vicks , a devious a & # 38 ; r executive for viewpointe records , randy tigge , a drug addicted , cross-dressing rock star ; and michael dileo , the chairman of viewpointe record , who some simply call satan .
translation: 他们的经历涉及到萨米·博伊，一个在一首歌曲成为主要电台热门时被困在糟糕合约中的激进说唱歌手；琼·维克斯，一个狡猾的视点唱片的A&R主管；兰迪·提格，一个吸毒成瘾的易装摇滚明星；以及迈克尔·迪利奥，视点唱片的董事会主席，有人简单地称他为撒旦。
back_translation: Their experiences involve Sami Boy, a radical rapper trapped in a bad contract when a song became a major radio hit; Joan Vicks, a shrewd A&R executive at a record label; Randy Teague, a drug-addicted glam rock star; and Michael DiLeo, the chairman of the record label's board, simply referred to as Satan.

text: but what if it 's lord voldemort trying to make his evil return ?
translation: 但是如果是伏地魔试图邪恶回归呢？
back_translation: But what if Voldemort is trying to make an evil return?

text: there ai n't a lot more painful than an unfunny movie that thinks it 's hilarious .
translation: 没有什么比一部自以为搞笑但实际上一点也不好笑的电影更令人痛苦的了。
back_translation: There is nothing more painful than a movie that thinks it's funny but is actually not funny at all.

text: soulless and -- even more damning -- virtually joyless , xxx achieves near virtuosity in its crapulence .
translation: 无灵魂且——更为严厉的批评——几乎没有快乐，xxx在其垃圾之作中达到了近乎完美的技艺。
back_translation: Soul-less and - more critically - almost devoid of joy, xxx has achieved near perfection in technique with his garbage works.

text: one day there is an ordinary row in the local saloon , but one of the trouble makers , called prosit , shows up to be baron werner amadeus von luckner .
translation: 一天，当地酒吧里发生了一场普通的争吵，但其中一个麻烦制造者，名叫普罗斯特，竟然是韦尔纳·阿马迪乌斯·冯·卢克纳男爵。
back_translation: One day, an ordinary argument broke out in a local bar, but one of the troublemakers, named Prost, turned out to be Baron Werner Amadeus von Luckner.

text: i thought my own watch had stopped keeping time as i slogged my way through clockstoppers .
translation: 我以为我自己的手表在我艰难地看《时间停止者》时已经停止计时了。
back_translation: I thought my own watch had stopped timing while I was struggling to watch "The Time Stopper."

text: a story of faith , family relations , and finding yourself .
translation: 一个关于信仰、家庭关系和自我发现的故事。
back_translation: A story about faith, family relationships, and self-discovery.

text: a young woman ( thandie newton ) in paris is about to divorce her husband when she discovers . . .
translation: 一位年轻女性（丹迪·牛顿）在巴黎即将与丈夫离婚时，她发现……
back_translation: A young woman (Dandy Newton) is about to divorce her husband in Paris when she discovers...

text: gangs of new york is an unapologetic mess , whose only saving grace is that it ends by blowing just about everything up .
translation: 《纽约劫匪》是一部毫不掩饰的混乱之作，唯一的拯救之处在于它以几乎摧毁一切的方式结束。
back_translation: "New York Heist" is a brutally chaotic work, and the only redeeming aspect is its almost destructive ending.

text: let 's face it , even vin 's fake tats have more charisma than pierce brosnan .
translation: 让我们面对现实吧，连文的假纹身都比皮尔斯·布鲁斯南更有魅力。
back_translation: Let’s face it, even Wen's fake tattoo is more charming than Pierce Brosnan.

text: . . . captures the pain and desperation of adolescent powerlessness and humiliation with powerful intimacy . . .
translation: ……以强烈的亲密感捕捉青少年无力与屈辱的痛苦与绝望……
back_translation: ...to capture the pain and despair of adolescent powerlessness and humiliation with a strong sense of intimacy...

text: it 's mildly sentimental , unabashedly consumerist . . . studiously inoffensive and completely disposable .
translation: 它略显感伤，毫不掩饰地商业化……刻意不冒犯且完全可一次性使用。
back_translation: It is slightly sentimental, unabashedly commercial... deliberately non-offensive and completely disposable.

text: exudes the fizz of a busby berkeley musical and the visceral excitement of a sports extravaganza .
translation: 散发出巴兹比·伯克利音乐剧的泡沫和体育盛事的强烈兴奋感。
back_translation: Emitting the bubbly essence of a Busby Berkeley musical and the intense excitement of a sporting event.

text: suffocated at conception by its munchausen-by-proxy mum . punish the vehicle to adore the star .
translation: 在受孕时被其穆恰森代理母亲窒息。惩罚载体以崇拜星星。
back_translation: Suffocated by its surrogate mother during conception. Punish the vessel for worshiping the stars.

text: convinced that peter is tracking her , she turns to them for help .
translation: 她相信彼得在跟踪她，于是向他们寻求帮助。
back_translation: She believes Peter is following her, so she seeks help from them.

text: along the way , their political spirit resurfaces , leading to their fight against the new york city board of education for domestic partner benefits , and their establishment of a pflag chapter for retirees in florida .
translation: 在这个过程中，他们的政治精神重新浮现，导致他们为纽约市教育委员会争取伴侣福利而斗争，并在佛罗里达州建立了一家退休人员的PFLAG分会。
back_translation: During this process, their political spirit resurfaced, leading them to fight for partner benefits for the New York City Board of Education and establish a chapter of PFLAG for retirees in Florida.

text: a malaysian government agency led by madame x , try to get the lost treasure on a sunken ship ( `` mendam berahi `` ) in sulu sea .
translation: 由麦当娜X领导的马来西亚政府机构，试图获取在苏禄海沉没船只（“mendam berahi”）上的失落宝藏。
back_translation: A Malaysian government agency led by Madonna X is attempting to retrieve the lost treasure on the sunken ship in the Sulu Sea ("mendam berahi").

text: 'i capture the castle ' is based on the dodie smith novel which was published in 1948 , before she wrote 101 dalmatians .
translation: 《我捕获城堡》是基于多迪·史密斯的小说，该小说于1948年出版，在她创作《一百零一只斑点狗》之前。
back_translation: "I Capture the Castle" is based on the novel by Dodie Smith, which was published in 1948, before she wrote "One Hundred and One Dalmatians."

text: an off-beat and fanciful film about the human need for monsters to blame for all that is amiss in the world .
translation: 一部离奇而富有幻想的电影，讲述了人类需要怪物来推卸世界上所有不妥之事的故事。
back_translation: A bizarre and fantastical film that tells the story of how humans need monsters to shirk all the wrongdoings in the world.

text: a pathetically inane and unimaginative cross between xxx and vertical limit .
translation: 一个可悲的无脑且缺乏想象力的混合体，介于《色情游戏》和《垂直极限》之间。
back_translation: A sad, brainless, and unimaginative mix, somewhere between "erotic games" and "Vertical Limit."

text: yes , i have given this movie a rating of zero . but fans of the show should not consider this a diss . consider it 'perfection . '
translation: 是的，我给这部电影打了零分。但是该节目的粉丝们不应该将其视为贬低。可以把它看作“完美”。
back_translation: Yes, I gave this movie a score of zero. However, fans of the show shouldn't view it as a downgrade. It can be seen as "perfect."

text: shot perhaps 'artistically ' with handheld cameras and apparently no movie lights by joaquin baca-asay , the low-budget production swings annoyingly between vertigo and opacity .
translation: 由华金·巴卡-阿萨伊执导，或许是“艺术性地”使用手持摄影机拍摄，显然没有电影灯光，这部低预算作品在眩晕与模糊之间令人不悦地摇摆不定。
back_translation: Directed by Joaquín Bacalao-Asaí, this low-budget work perhaps "artistically" employs handheld camerawork and obviously lacks cinematic lighting, oscillating unpleasantly between dizziness and blur.

text: those who managed to avoid the deconstructionist theorizing of french philosopher jacques derrida in college can now take an 85-minute brush-up course with the documentary derrida . or , you can do something fun tonight .
translation: 那些在大学里成功避开法国哲学家雅克·德里达的解构主义理论的人，现在可以通过纪录片《德里达》进行85分钟的复习课程。或者，你今晚可以做些有趣的事情。
back_translation: Those who successfully avoided the deconstruction theory of French philosopher Jacques Derrida in college can now have an 85-minute review course through the documentary "Derrida." Or you might do something fun tonight.

text: he works as a photocopy clerk under the close watch of his sexy boss sabine , who uses him to his libido 's advantage .
translation: 他在性感的老板萨宾的严密监视下担任复印员，她利用他来满足自己的欲望。
back_translation: He works as a copyist under the strict surveillance of his seductive boss Sabine, who uses him to satisfy her desires.

text: the techno tux is good for a few laughs , as are chan and hewitt , but when such a good design turns out to be a cheap knockoff , we ca n't recommend anything but a rental for the tuxedo .
translation: 科技晚礼服让人忍俊不禁，陈和休伊特也一样，但当如此好的设计结果变成了廉价的仿制品时，我们只能推荐租赁这款晚礼服。
back_translation: The technological evening gown is amusing, and so is Chen and Hewitt, but when such a good design result turns into a cheap imitation, we can only recommend renting this evening gown.

text: a small gem of a movie that defies classification and is as thought-provoking as it is funny , scary and sad .
translation: 一部小宝石般的电影，难以分类，同时既引人深思，又幽默、恐怖和悲伤。
back_translation: A small gem of a movie, difficult to categorize, simultaneously thought-provoking, humorous, terrifying, and sad.

text: unlike conventional movies , kill bill is told in chapter format making the narrative flow more like a book than a film .
translation: 与传统电影不同，《杀死比尔》以章节格式叙述，使叙事的流动更像一本书而不是一部电影。
back_translation: Unlike traditional films, "Kill Bill" is narrated in a chapter format, making the flow of the narrative more like a book than a movie.

text: an incredibly thoughtful , deeply meditative picture that neatly and effectively captures the debilitating grief felt in the immediate aftermath of the terrorist attacks .
translation: 一幅极具深思与沉思的图画，巧妙而有效地捕捉了在恐怖袭击后的直接影响中所感受到的严重悲痛。
back_translation: A profoundly contemplative and reflective picture that cleverly and effectively captures the deep sorrow felt in the immediate aftermath of a terrorist attack.

text: one of the most splendid entertainments to emerge from the french film industry in years .
translation: 近年来法国电影产业中出现的最精彩的娱乐之一。
back_translation: One of the most exciting entertainments that has emerged in the French film industry in recent years.

text: this is the story of ryan , a thirty-something office worker , persecuted by his supervisor angela and under-appreciated his fianc & # 233 ; e jo .
translation: 这是关于瑞安的故事，他是一位三十多岁的办公室工作人员，受到他的主管安吉拉的迫害，同时也得不到他的未婚妻乔的重视。
back_translation: This is the story of Ryan, a thirty-something office worker who is persecuted by his supervisor Angela and also does not receive attention from his fiancée, Jo.

text: although a sympathetic judge assures desmond that when his financial situation reverses , he will be able to get his children back ; money is hard to come by .
translation: 尽管一位同情的法官向德斯蒙德保证，当他的财务状况好转时，他将能够夺回他的孩子，但钱却很难得到。
back_translation: Although a sympathetic judge assured Desmond that he would be able to regain his children when his financial situation improved, money was hard to come by.

text: family ties and mob allegiances become confused as betrayals , reprisals , and changes of heart set the stage for an unexpected climax .
translation: 家庭关系和黑帮忠诚变得混乱，背叛、报复和心意的变化为一个意想不到的高潮铺平了道路。
back_translation: Family relationships and gang loyalty become chaotic, with betrayal, revenge, and changes of heart paving the way for an unexpected climax.

text: johnathan cross , a lover of extreme sports , is recruited by alexi petrovich to star in his sportive invention , rollerball .
translation: 约翰athan·克罗斯是一位极限运动爱好者，他被阿列克谢·彼得罗维奇招募，出演他的体育发明《滚轮球》。
back_translation: Jonathan Cross is an extreme sports enthusiast who has been recruited by Alexei Petrovich to star in his sports invention "Roller Ball."

text: seymour 'sy ' parrish has been doing photo development for 20 years .
translation: 西摩尔·“赛”·帕里什已经从事照片冲洗工作20年了。
back_translation: Seymour "Sy" Parrish has been working in photo developing for 20 years.

text: but everyone 's plans do n't go according to schedule . . .
translation: 但每个人的计划都不按预定的时间进行……
back_translation: But everyone's plans don't go according to schedule...

text: buy is an accomplished actress , and this is a big , juicy role .
translation: 买是位出色的女演员，这个角色既重要又精彩。
back_translation: Mai is an outstanding actress, and this role is both important and exciting.

text: aimed at a new age audience , but its subject 's sincerity and gentle , self-deprecating nature translate well to a general audience .
translation: 旨在吸引新时代的观众，但其主题的真诚以及温和、自嘲的特性也能很好地传达给广大观众。
back_translation: Aimed at attracting a new generation of viewers, its themes of authenticity, along with a gentle and self-deprecating nature, can also resonate well with a wide audience.

text: missteps take what was otherwise a fascinating , riveting story and send it down the path of the mundane .
translation: 失误让原本引人入胜、扣人心弦的故事走向平淡之路。
back_translation: A misstep led the originally captivating and gripping story to take a dull turn.

text: outside , another man sits by the door keeping vigil .
translation: 外面，另一个男人坐在门口守夜。
back_translation: Outside, another man is sitting at the door keeping watch.

text: 'nine dead gay guys ' is the outrageous but hilarious result of the ensuing caper as the lads begin the search for the elusive bed .
translation: 《九个死去的同性恋者》是这场追逐的荒诞但搞笑的结果，因为这些小伙子们开始寻找那个难以捉摸的床。
back_translation: "The Nine Dead Gay Guys" is the absurd yet humorous result of this chase, as these young men begin searching for that elusive bed.

text: with her as a mentor he gains confidence and strength of character .
translation: 有她作为指导，他获得了自信和坚强的品格。
back_translation: With her as a guide, he gained confidence and a strong character.

text: what resulted is a stirring and emotional reflection of that day and his experience .
translation: 结果是对那一天及他经历的一个感人而充满情感的反思。
back_translation: The result is a touching and emotional reflection on that day and what he experienced.

text: this is one of those rare docs that paints a grand picture of an era and makes the journey feel like a party .
translation: 这是一个罕见的文档，它描绘了一个时代的宏伟图景，使这段旅程感觉像是一场派对。
back_translation: This is a rare document that depicts the grand panorama of an era, making this journey feel like a celebration.

text: he gathers a following and becomes a rock star only to find that his music awakens the ancient queen akasha and she wants him to become her king . . .
translation: 他聚集了一群追随者，成为了摇滚明星，却发现他的音乐唤醒了古老的女王阿卡莎，她想要他成为她的国王……
back_translation: He gathered a group of followers, became a rock star, but found that his music awakened the ancient queen Akasha, who wanted him to be her king...

text: a faction of political separatists , led by count dooku , attempts to assassinate her .
translation: 一群由杜库伯爵领导的政治分裂分子试图刺杀她。
back_translation: A group of political separatists led by Count Ducuber attempted to assassinate her.

text: two angels realize that the babies have been switched , and decide to try and find the antichrist and prevent the end of the world .
translation: 两个天使意识到婴儿被调换了，决定试图找到反基督并阻止世界末日的到来。
back_translation: Two angels realize that the babies have been switched and decide to try to find the Antichrist and prevent the arrival of the apocalypse.

text: his determination is turned to desperation by a personal tragedy that now drives him to want to change the past .
translation: 他的决心因一场个人悲剧而变成绝望，这场悲剧驱使他想要改变过去。
back_translation: His determination turned into despair due to a personal tragedy, which led him to want to change the past.

text: she gives frode a small monster puppet , which frode throws in the closet in his bedroom .
translation: 她给了弗罗德一个小怪物玩偶，弗罗德把它扔进了他卧室的衣橱里。
back_translation: She gave Frodo a small monster toy, and Frodo threw it into the closet in his bedroom.

text: confronted with the reality that jazz has limited commercial appeal , the story focuses on the band 's battles with the music industry and one another to find respect and recognition without 'selling out ' .
translation: 面对爵士乐有限的商业吸引力，这个故事集中在乐队与音乐产业及彼此之间的斗争，以寻找尊重和认可，而不“出卖自己”。
back_translation: Faced with the limited commercial appeal of jazz, this story focuses on the band's struggle with the music industry and each other in their quest for respect and recognition, without "selling out."

text: the small daily routines of everyday life are not as clear and obvious as one might think .
translation: 日常生活中的小日常并不像人们想象的那样清晰明了。
back_translation: The little routines in daily life are not as clear-cut as people imagine.

text: an energetic and engaging film that never pretends to be something it is n't .
translation: 一部充满活力和引人入胜的电影，它从未假装成不是它自己的东西。
back_translation: A vibrant and captivating movie that never pretends to be anything other than itself.

text: barney has created a tour de force that is weird , wacky and wonderful .
translation: 巴尼创造了一部奇怪、古怪而又奇妙的力作。
back_translation: Barney created a strange, quirky, and wonderful masterpiece.

text: best of all is garcia , who perfectly portrays the desperation of a very insecure man .
translation: 最棒的要数加西亚，他完美地展现了一个非常不安全感男人的绝望。
back_translation: The best has to be Garcia, who perfectly illustrates the desperation of a very insecure man.

text: the unceasing sadism is so graphically excessive , the director just ends up exposing his own obsession .
translation: 不断的 sadism 是如此直观而过度，导演最终只是暴露了他自己的痴迷。
back_translation: The constant sadism is so intuitive and excessive that the director ultimately just exposes his own obsession.

text: like an exotic , endangered species , these colorful cars roam around this island paradise trapped in a 1950 's time warp .
translation: 像一种异域、濒危的物种，这些色彩鲜艳的汽车在这个被困在1950年代时光漩涡的岛屿天堂游荡。
back_translation: Like an exotic, endangered species, these vividly colored cars wander through this island paradise trapped in a time vortex of the 1950s.

text: nha fala ( my voice ) , a musical comedy , is the story of vita , a young african woman who must never sing .
translation: 《nha fala（我的声音）》是一部音乐喜剧，讲述了年轻非洲女性维塔的故事，她绝不能唱歌。
back_translation: "Nha Fala (My Voice)" is a musical comedy that tells the story of a young African woman named Vita, who can never sing.

text: when a storm leaves the two shipwrecked on a deserted island , however , the tables suddenly turn . . .
translation: 当一场风暴将两名船难者抛到一个荒岛上时，局势却突然发生了变化……
back_translation: When a storm casts two shipwrecked survivors onto a deserted island, the situation suddenly takes a turn...

text: is this love or is it masochism ? binoche makes it interesting trying to find out .
translation: 这是爱情还是施虐倾向？比诺什让人感兴趣的是试图找出答案。
back_translation: Is this love or a tendency for sadism? What intrigues Binoche is the attempt to find the answer.

text: every time you look , sweet home alabama is taking another bummer of a wrong turn .
translation: 每当你查看时，《甜蜜的家，阿拉巴马》总是走上另一个糟糕的错误方向。
back_translation: Every time you look at it, "Sweet Home Alabama" always takes another wrong turn.

text: he grew up in the lush village of taj sonapur , where he spent his childhood , indulged by his lovely playmate paro ( aishwarya ) .
translation: 他在丰饶的塔吉索纳布尔村长大，在那里度过了他的童年，沉浸在他可爱的玩伴帕罗（艾西瓦娅）的宠爱中。
back_translation: He grew up in the prosperous village of Tajisonabul, where he spent his childhood immersed in the affection of his lovely playmate, Paro (Aishwarya).

text: a moving essay about the specter of death , especially suicide .
translation: 关于死亡的幽灵，尤其是自杀的动人散文。
back_translation: A moving essay about the ghost of death, especially about suicide.

text: personal velocity ought to be exploring these women 's inner lives , but it never moves beyond their surfaces .
translation: 个人的速度应该探索这些女性的内心生活，但它从未超越她们的表面。
back_translation: The personal pace should explore the inner lives of these women, but it has never gone beyond their surface.

text: he comes to the terrible realization that he has never held his mothers right hand .
translation: 他意识到他从未握过母亲的右手。
back_translation: He realized he had never held his mother's right hand.

text: based on a true story , the blue butterfly tells the story of a terminally ill 10-year-old boy whose dream is to catch the most beautiful butterfly on earth , the mythic and elusive blue morpho .
translation: 基于真实故事，《蓝色蝴蝶》讲述了一个身患绝症的10岁男孩的故事，他的梦想是捕捉地球上最美丽的蝴蝶——神秘而难以捉摸的蓝色摩尔福蝴蝶。
back_translation: Based on a true story, "The Blue Butterfly" tells the story of a 10-year-old boy suffering from a terminal illness, whose dream is to catch the most beautiful butterfly on Earth—the mysterious and elusive blue morpho butterfly.

text: as the sisters approach the end of an era , and the end of an order , they search their souls in an examination of their life 's work .
translation: 随着姐妹们接近一个时代的结束和一个秩序的终结，她们在审视自己一生的工作中探索内心。
back_translation: As the sisters approach the end of an era and the conclusion of a chapter, they explore their inner selves while reflecting on the work of their lives.

text: making such a tragedy the backdrop to a love story risks trivializing it , though chouraqui no doubt intended the film to affirm love 's power to help people endure almost unimaginable horror .
translation: 将这样的悲剧作为爱情故事的背景，可能会使其显得琐碎，尽管乔拉基毫无疑问希望影片能够 affirm 爱的力量，帮助人们忍受几乎难以想象的恐怖。
back_translation: Using such a tragedy as the backdrop for a love story might make it seem trivial, although Joraki undoubtedly hopes that the film can affirm the power of love and help people endure horrors that are almost unimaginable.

text: blessed encompasses the lives of four women who are inescapably involved in a brothel at the centre of the plot .
translation: 《受祝福》围绕着四位女性的生活展开，她们不可避免地卷入了情节中心的一家妓院。
back_translation: "Blessed" revolves around the lives of four women who are inevitably drawn into the central plot of a brothel.

text: this is a fragmented film , once a good idea that was followed by the bad idea to turn it into a movie .
translation: 这是一个支离破碎的电影，曾经是一个好主意，但随后变成了一个糟糕的主意，决定将其拍成电影。
back_translation: This is a fragmented movie that was once a good idea but later turned into a bad idea to decide to make it into a film.

text: [ gosling 's ] combination of explosive physical energy and convincing intelligence helps create a complex , unpredictable character .
translation: [gogling的]爆炸性身体能量和令人信服的智力的结合，帮助创造了一个复杂且不可预测的角色。
back_translation: The combination of explosive physical energy and compelling intelligence helped create a complex and unpredictable character.

text: august -- a pupil of ingmar bergman 's -- manages to tell a tragic tale while avoiding the heavy-laden angst of a bergman film .
translation: 奥古斯特——英格玛·伯格曼的学生——设法讲述了一个悲剧故事，同时避免了伯格曼电影中沉重的焦虑感。
back_translation: August - a student of Ingmar Bergman - managed to tell a tragic story while avoiding the heavy sense of anxiety present in Bergman's films.

text: marjorie standiford sits on oklahoma 's death row , hours away from execution , speaking into a tape recorder , telling her life story .
translation: 马乔里·斯坦迪福德坐在俄克拉荷马州的死刑牢房中，距离执行死刑只有几个小时，正对着录音机讲述自己的生活故事。
back_translation: Marjorie Standiford sat in a death row cell in Oklahoma, just hours away from execution, recounting her life story into a tape recorder.

text: the locale . . . remains far more interesting than the story at hand .
translation: 这个地方……比当前的故事更加有趣。
back_translation: This place... is more interesting than the current story.

text: it 's sweet and romantic without being cloying or melodramatic .
translation: 它甜美浪漫，却不令人厌腻或戏剧化。
back_translation: It is sweet and romantic, yet not overwhelming or dramatic.

text: so , in addition to curing him she 's also trying to get him married off to a `` good , strong , responsible `` woman .
translation: 所以，除了治好他，她还想把他嫁给一个“优秀、强壮、负责任”的女人。
back_translation: So, in addition to healing him, she also wants to marry him off to a "good, strong, and responsible" woman.

text: the actors pull out all the stops in nearly every scene , but to diminishing effect . the characters never change .
translation: 演员们在几乎每个场景中都全力以赴，但效果逐渐减弱。角色始终没有变化。
back_translation: The actors give their all in almost every scene, but the effect gradually diminishes. The characters remain unchanged.

text: the deuces are determined to do whatever is necessary to keep drugs off their block even if that means dying .
translation: 二人组决心不惜一切代价将毒品拒之于他们的街区，即使这意味着要付出生命的代价。
back_translation: The duo is determined to keep drugs out of their neighborhood at all costs, even if it means paying with their lives.

text: this film tells the true story of fraudulent washington , d . c . journalist stephen glass ( christensen ) , who rose to meteoric heights as a young writer in his 20s , becoming a staff writer at `` the new republic `` for three years ( 1995-1998 ) , where 27 of his 41 published stories were either partially or completely made up .
translation: 这部电影讲述了华盛顿特区欺诈性记者斯蒂芬·格拉斯（克里斯滕森饰）的真实故事，他在20多岁时迅速崛起，成为《新共和国》的 staff writer，任职三年（1995-1998），他发表的41篇文章中有27篇都是部分或完全虚构的。
back_translation: This film tells the true story of Stephen Glass (played by Christensen), a fraudulent journalist in Washington, D.C., who quickly rose to prominence in his twenties as a staff writer for The New Republic. During his three-year tenure (1995-1998), 27 of the 41 articles he published were partially or wholly fabricated.

text: as carolyn 's `` perfect life `` falls apart , pumpkin teaches her that perfect is n't always perfect after all .
translation: 随着卡罗琳的“完美生活”崩溃，南瓜教会了她完美并不总是完美。
back_translation: As Caroline's "perfect life" crumbled, the pumpkin taught her that perfection is not always perfect.

text: it 's often faintly amusing , but the problems of the characters never become important to us , and the story never takes hold .
translation: 这常常稍显有趣，但角色们的问题从未对我们变得重要，故事也从未抓住我们的注意力。
back_translation: This is often somewhat interesting, but the characters' problems have never become important to us, nor has the story ever captured our attention.

text: not that any of us should be complaining when a film clocks in around 90 minutes these days , but the plotting here leaves a lot to be desired .
translation: 虽然我们现在看电影时，不应该抱怨片长大约90分钟，但这里的情节有很多可提升的空间。
back_translation: Although we shouldn't complain about the movie length being about 90 minutes when we watch films now, there is a lot of room for improvement in the plot here.

text: all of a sudden , one brings up the topic of her going to los angeles for a record contract audition .
translation: 突然，有人提起她去洛杉矶参加唱片合同试镜的话题。
back_translation: Suddenly, someone brought up the topic of her going to Los Angeles for a record contract audition.

text: a little weak -- and it is n't that funny .
translation: 有点无聊——而且并不是那么好笑。
back_translation: A bit boring—and not that funny.

text: the movie is saved from unbearable lightness by the simplicity of the storytelling and the authenticity of the performances .
translation: 这部电影因叙事的简单性和表演的真实性而免于难以承受的轻盈感。
back_translation: This film is spared from an unbearable lightness due to its simple narrative and the authenticity of the performances.

text: the harrowing rescue of the young woman opens the door to a dark history hidden below the surface , revealing the true identity of the killer and answering the mystery of who killed jack 's daughter .
translation: 年轻女性的惊心动魄的救援揭开了隐藏在表面之下的黑暗历史，揭示了杀手的真实身份，并解答了是谁杀了杰克的女儿的谜团。
back_translation: The thrilling rescue of a young woman uncovers a dark history hidden beneath the surface, revealing the true identity of the killer and answering the mystery of who killed Jack's daughter.

text: josch now has to convince t & # 252 ; rlich about the evil intentions of dump fast , only has there just been quite a fight between the two lifelong friends .
translation: 乔什现在必须说服图尔利希相信“快餐店”的恶意，然而刚刚这两位终身好友之间发生了一场激烈的争吵。
back_translation: Josh now has to convince Thurlitch of the malice of the "fast food restaurant," but just moments ago, there was a fierce argument between these two lifelong friends.

text: a tale of three women who have reached a turning point in their lives .
translation: 三个女性的故事，她们都到了人生的转折点。
back_translation: The stories of three women, all of whom have reached a turning point in their lives.

text: armed with twenty dollars and a backpack , pastor william sets off on an unusual call from god to walk across the country preaching the gospel .
translation: 带着二十美元和一个背包，威廉牧师踏上了一段不寻常的神之召唤，开始横穿全国宣讲福音。
back_translation: With twenty dollars and a backpack, Pastor William embarked on an unusual divine calling, beginning to travel across the country to preach the gospel.

text: once he leaves his chinese prison cell robert would rather enjoy his freedom back in the u . s . and keep his past behind him , but the tong catches up to him and threatens not only his life but that of his wife .
translation: 一旦罗伯特离开中国监狱，他宁愿在美国享受自由，把过去抛在身后，但帮派找上了他，威胁不仅他的生命，还威胁他的妻子。
back_translation: Once Robert leaves the prison in China, he would rather enjoy freedom in the United States and leave the past behind, but the gang comes after him, threatening not only his life but also his wife's.

text: femme fatale offers nothing more than a bait-and-switch that is beyond playing fair with the audience . are we dealing with dreams , visions or being told what actually happened as if it were the third ending of clue ?
translation: 致命女人提供的不过是一种诱饵与转换，远远超出了与观众公平对待的界限。我们是在处理梦境、幻象，还是被告知实际上发生了什么，就像是《线索》的第三个结局？
back_translation: Deadly Women only offers a bait and a shift, far exceeding the boundaries of fair treatment with the audience. Are we dealing with dreams, illusions, or are we being told what actually happened, like in the third ending of "Clue"?

text: and the moment they touch each other for a first time , the fortune-teller 's prophesy comes true .
translation: 当他们第一次触碰到对方的那一刻，算命师的预言成真了。
back_translation: At the moment they first touched each other, the fortune teller's prophecy came true.

text: he began a film , a search , to discover not only what had happened to stevie over the past ten years but to understand the forces that had shaped his entire life .
translation: 他开始了一部影片，一个探索，不仅要发现过去十年里斯蒂夫发生了什么，还要理解塑造他整个生命的力量。
back_translation: He started a film, an exploration not only to discover what happened to Steve over the past decade but also to understand the forces that shaped his entire life.

text: while the ensemble player who gained notice in guy ritchie 's lock , stock and two smoking barrels and snatch has the bod , he 's unlikely to become a household name on the basis of his first starring vehicle .
translation: 虽然在盖·里奇的《周末夜狂热》和《偷拐抢骗》中引起注意的角色演员身材魁梧，但他不太可能凭借首次主演的作品而成为家喻户晓的名字。
back_translation: Although the character actors in Guy Ritchie's "Saturday Night Fever" and "Snatch" are notable for their imposing physiques, it is unlikely that he will become a household name solely based on his debut starring role.

text: all the movie 's narrative gymnastics ca n't disguise the fact that it 's inauthentic at its core and that its story just is n't worth telling .
translation: 所有电影的叙事花招掩盖不了它本质上是不真实的事实，以及它的故事根本不值得讲述。
back_translation: The narrative tricks of all films cannot conceal the fact that they are fundamentally unrealistic, and their stories are simply not worth telling.

text: ziyad repeatedly reassures her of his undying love , but family and social pressure , particularly his evil , meddling mother , gradually poison their happy relationship until the love , enthusiasm and humour of their early days soon take a tragic turn .
translation: ziyad一再向她保证他对她不变的爱，但家庭和社会压力，特别是他那干涉不断的恶毒母亲，逐渐侵蚀了他们快乐的关系，直到他们早期的爱、热情和幽默很快发生悲惨的转变。
back_translation: Ziyad repeatedly assured her of his unwavering love for her, but the pressure from family and society, especially his meddling and malicious mother, gradually eroded their happy relationship, until their early love, passion, and humor quickly underwent a tragic transformation.

text: only an epic documentary could get it all down , and spike lee 's jim brown : all american at long last gives its subject a movie worthy of his talents .
translation: 只有一部史诗般的纪录片才能将这一切记录下来，而斯派克·李的《吉姆·布朗：美国全能运动员》最终为其主题提供了一部值得他才华的影片。
back_translation: Only an epic documentary can capture all of this, and Spike Lee's "Jim Brown: All-American" ultimately provides a film worthy of its subject's talent.

text: one of the most incoherent features in recent memory .
translation: 近期记忆中最不连贯的特点之一。
back_translation: One of the most incoherent characteristics in my recent memory.

text: set on an island off the coast of florida , a techno rave party attracts a diverse group of college coeds and a coast guard officer .
translation: 设定在佛罗里达海岸的一座岛屿上，一场电子音乐狂欢派对吸引了各种各样的大学女生和一名海岸警卫队官员。
back_translation: Set on an island off the coast of Florida, an electronic music rave attracts a variety of college girls and a Coast Guard officer.

text: it 's a great american adventure and a wonderful film to bring to imax .
translation: 这是一次伟大的美国冒险，也是带入IMAX的精彩影片。
back_translation: This is a great American adventure and an exciting film presented in IMAX.

text: what we have is a character faced with the possibility that her life is meaningless , vapid and devoid of substance , in a movie that is definitely meaningless , vapid and devoid of substance .
translation: 我们看到的是一个角色面临生命可能毫无意义、平淡无奇和缺乏实质的可能性，而这部电影确实也是毫无意义、平淡无奇和缺乏实质的。
back_translation: What we see is a character facing the possibility that life may be completely meaningless, mundane, and lacking substance, and this film indeed is also meaningless, mundane, and lacking substance.

text: coral reef adventure is a heavyweight film that fights a good fight on behalf of the world 's endangered reefs -- and it lets the pictures do the punching .
translation: 珊瑚礁冒险是一部重量级电影，为世界濒危的珊瑚礁而奋战——而且它让画面来出击。
back_translation: Coral Reef Adventure is a powerful movie that fights for the world's endangered coral reefs—and it lets the visuals take center stage.

text: nothing more than an amiable but unfocused bagatelle that plays like a loosely-connected string of acting-workshop exercises .
translation: 不过是一部友好但缺乏重点的小品，就像一串松散联系的表演工作坊练习。
back_translation: It's just a friendly but unfocused piece, like a series of loosely connected performance workshop exercises.

text: an unusual and compelling chinese film about the loving interventions of a father and mother whose oldest son is a drug addict .
translation: 一部关于一对父母对他们的大儿子吸毒问题展开关爱干预的非凡而引人入胜的中国电影。
back_translation: An extraordinary and engaging Chinese film about a pair of parents who launch a caring intervention for their eldest son's drug addiction problem.

text: the taxi driver is a serial killer who picks up innocent women but not all of his victims are as innocent as he thinks .
translation: 这名出租车司机是一个连环杀手，他专门接送无辜的女性，但并不是所有的受害者都如他所想的那么无辜。
back_translation: This taxi driver is a serial killer who specializes in picking up innocent women, but not all of the victims are as innocent as he thinks.

text: the government sends in an elite military task force lead by alice ( jovovich ) and rain ( rodriguez ) to contain the virus in three hours before it escapes and infects the rest of the world .
translation: 政府派出一支由艾丽斯（约翰逊饰）和雷恩（罗德里格兹饰）领导的精英军事特遣队，在三个小时内控制病毒，以防它传播并感染世界其他地方。
back_translation: The government dispatched an elite military task force led by Alice (played by Johnson) and Rain (played by Rodriguez) to contain the virus within three hours to prevent it from spreading and infecting other parts of the world.

text: unwilling to disappoint his proud mother , morales wastes no time in looking for a job to pay his way through school .
translation: 为了不让自豪的母亲失望，莫拉莱斯毫不浪费时间寻找一份工作，以支付他的学费。
back_translation: In order not to disappoint his proud mother, Morales wasted no time in looking for a job to pay for his tuition.

text: scott calvin ( tim allen ) has been santa claus for the past eight years , and his loyal elves consider him the best santa ever .
translation: 斯科特·卡尔文（蒂姆·艾伦）已经做了八年的圣诞老人，他忠诚的小精灵们认为他是有史以来最好的圣诞老人。
back_translation: Scott Calvin (Tim Allen) has been Santa Claus for eight years, and his loyal little elves think he is the best Santa Claus of all time.

text: douglas mcgrath 's nicholas nickleby does dickens as it should be done cinematically .
translation: 道格拉斯·麦克格拉斯的《尼古拉斯·尼克尔比》将狄更斯以应有的电影方式呈现出来。
back_translation: Douglas MacMillan's adaptation of "Nicholas Nickleby" presents Dickens in the cinematic way he deserves.

text: the story is so light and sugary that were it a macy 's thanksgiving day parade balloon , extra heavy-duty ropes would be needed to keep it from floating away .
translation: 这个故事轻松而甜美，如果它是一只梅西感恩节游行的气球，就需要额外加固的绳索才能防止它飘走。
back_translation: This story is easygoing and sweet; if it were a Macy's Thanksgiving Day parade balloon, it would need extra-secured ropes to prevent it from floating away.

text: the assembled team includes local guide clayton tyne ( russel ferrier ) , renowned wilderness expert and author winston burg ( phil granger ) and the beautiful marla lawson ( andrea roth ) .
translation: 组建的团队包括当地向导克莱顿·泰恩（拉塞尔·费里尔）、著名荒野专家和作家温斯顿·伯格（菲尔·格兰杰）以及迷人的玛拉·劳森（安德rea·罗斯）。
back_translation: The assembled team includes local guide Clayton Thain (Russell Ferrer), renowned wilderness expert and writer Winston Berg (Phil Granger), and the charming Mara Lawson (Andrea Ross).

text: uneven performances and a spotty script add up to a biting satire that has no teeth .
translation: 不均匀的表演和零散的剧本汇聚成了一部毫无力度的尖锐讽刺。
back_translation: Uneven performances and fragmented scripts coalesce into a sharp satire lacking in strength.

text: a perfectly respectable , perfectly inoffensive , easily forgettable film .
translation: 一部完全体面、完全无害、容易被遗忘的电影。
back_translation: A completely decent, completely harmless, and easily forgettable movie.

text: gangs , despite the gravity of its subject matter , is often as fun to watch as a good spaghetti western .
translation: 尽管其主题十分严肃，但《帮派》常常像一部好的意大利西部片一样有趣。
back_translation: Although its theme is very serious, "The Gang" is often as entertaining as a good Italian Western.

text: although initially repelled by simon , rose is determined to make him fall in love with her and succeeds .
translation: 尽管一开始被西蒙拒绝，罗斯决心让他爱上自己并成功了。
back_translation: Although Simon rejected Ross at first, Ross was determined to make him fall in love and succeeded.

text: at the eleventh hour king and cuthbertson are saved by the arrival of major merton ( derek jacobi ) , churchill 's chief intelligence advisor .
translation: 在最后关头，国王和卡斯伯特森及时被梅尔顿大校（德里克·雅各比饰）所救，他是丘吉尔的首席情报顾问。
back_translation: At the last moment, the king and Casburton were timely rescued by Colonel Melton (played by Derek Jacobi), who is Churchill's chief intelligence advisor.

text: . . . a quietly introspective portrait of the self-esteem of employment and the shame of losing a job . . .
translation: ……一幅静静内省的肖像，描绘了就业的自尊与失业的羞愧……
back_translation: ...a quietly introspective portrait that depicts the self-esteem of employment and the shame of unemployment...

text: but when sy begins spying on the yorkins , he begins to feel that he wants to be in the yorkin 's life .
translation: 但当西开始监视约金一家时，他开始感到想要融入约金的生活。
back_translation: But when Xie began to monitor the Yue family, he started to feel the desire to integrate into their lives.

text: some will fall in love , one will change his life , another will be out for whatever and whomever she can get .
translation: 有些人会坠入爱河，有人会改变自己的生活，还有人会为了任何人或任何事而出去。
back_translation: Some people will fall in love, some will change their lives, and others will go out for anyone or anything.

text: a real step forward for the digital video revolution .
translation: 数字视频革命的一个真正进步。
back_translation: A real advancement in the digital video revolution.

text: when your subject is illusion versus reality , should n't the reality seem at least passably real ?
translation: 当你的主题是幻觉与现实时，现实难道不应该看起来至少有些真实吗？
back_translation: When your theme is about illusion and reality, shouldn't reality at least look somewhat real?

text: this is dicaprio 's best performance in anything ever , and easily the most watchable film of the year .
translation: 这是迪卡普里奥在任何作品中的最佳表现，也是今年最值得观看的电影。
back_translation: This is Leonardo DiCaprio's best performance in any work, and the most worthwhile movie to watch this year.

text: then the next day he finds out that the previous night his mother actually died in a car crash .
translation: 然后第二天他发现，前一晚他的母亲实际上在一场车祸中去世了。
back_translation: The next day he discovered that his mother had actually died in a car accident the night before.

text: two brothers inherit an old , broken down carousel on an abandoned boardwalk in new jersey .
translation: 两个兄弟继承了一个位于新泽西州废弃木栈道上的破旧旋转木马。
back_translation: Two brothers inherited a dilapidated carousel located on an abandoned boardwalk in New Jersey.

text: pitted against steroid-taking competitors and the biggest sports-nutrition company in the world , he is up against odds and enemies who want to destroy him .
translation: 他面临着使用类固醇的竞争对手和全球最大的运动营养公司，正处于逆境之中，遭遇着想要摧毁他的敌人。
back_translation: He is facing competitors who use steroids and the largest sports nutrition company in the world, finding himself in adversity, encountering enemies who want to destroy him.

text: now escaped from prison , mel begins his quest for vengeance .
translation: 现在逃离监狱的梅尔开始了他的复仇之旅。
back_translation: Now, Mel, who has escaped from prison, has begun his journey of revenge.

text: alice is a cleaning lady at the nearby hospital and she sells the books that the patients leave behind .
translation: 爱丽丝是附近医院的清洁工，她出售病人遗留的书籍。
back_translation: Alice is a cleaner at a nearby hospital, and she sells the books left behind by patients.

text: the story starts with hakimi , a freelance scriptwriter who is on his way to send his 7-year-old daughter , imelda , to his ex-wife 's house on one stormy night .
translation: 故事开始于哈基米，一个自由职业的编剧，他在一个风暴夜晚的路上，正准备把他7岁的女儿伊梅尔达送到前妻家。
back_translation: The story begins with Hakimi, a freelance screenwriter who is on the road on a stormy night, preparing to take his 7-year-old daughter Imelda to her mother’s house.

text: akash has a soft corner for his fellow doctor neha mathur , a suave and self-assured woman who will never let her personal life get in the way of her profession .
translation: 阿卡什对他的同事医生内哈·马图尔有一种特别的好感，她是一位优雅且自信的女性，永远不会让个人生活影响到她的职业。
back_translation: Akash has a special affection for his colleague Dr. Neha Mathur. She is an elegant and confident woman who never allows her personal life to affect her profession.

text: simone is not a bad film . it just does n't have anything really interesting to say .
translation: 西蒙不是一部坏电影。它只是不太有趣的内容可以传达。
back_translation: "Simon" is not a bad movie. It just has somewhat uninteresting content to convey.

text: one stormy night , they go to get the shoes when calvin and the shoes are struck by lightning .
translation: 在一个暴风雨的夜晚，他们去拿鞋子时，卡尔文和鞋子被闪电击中。
back_translation: On a stormy night, while they were going to get the shoes, Calvin and the shoes were struck by lightning.

text: trying to make head or tail of the story in the hip-hop indie snipes is enough to give you brain strain -- and the pay-off is negligible .
translation: 在嘻哈独立音乐中尝试弄清楚故事的头尾就足以让你脑力疲惫，而收益微乎其微。
back_translation: Trying to figure out the beginning and end of a story in hip-hop independent music can be exhausting, with very little reward.

text: the da sends the dupe into valento-land in hopes of getting the sociopath off his back .
translation: 检察官将重复者送入瓦伦托国，希望能摆脱这个社会病态者的纠缠。
back_translation: The prosecutor sent the repeat offender to Valento in hopes of getting rid of the entanglement with this societal pathology.

text: edi is severely punished for that but he accepts his fate taking care of the girl 's child .
translation: 埃迪因其行为受到严厉惩罚，但他接受了自己的命运，照顾那个女孩的孩子。
back_translation: Eddie was severely punished for his actions, but he accepted his fate and took care of the girl's child.

text: after military service in the gulf war and the former yugoslavia , he returned to his inner city neighborhood to teach at the toughest school in town .
translation: 在海湾战争和前南斯拉夫的军队服役后，他回到了自己的内城社区，在城里最艰苦的学校任教。
back_translation: After serving in the Gulf War and the military in former Yugoslavia, he returned to his inner-city community to teach at the toughest school in town.

text: the gang quickly grab the publics ' allegiance by targeting members of our community we 'd all like to see 'get nailed ' .
translation: 这个团伙迅速通过针对我们社区中我们都希望看到“受到惩罚”的成员来争取公众的支持。
back_translation: This gang quickly garnered public support by targeting members of our community that we all want to see "punished."

text: 3 years after retiring from the fbi because of a near-fatal encounter with hannibal lecter , who was helping him catch the `` chesapeake ripper `` , only to reveal it was hannibal himself , will graham is asked by his ex-partner jack crawford to come solve one last case - 2 slaughtered families every full moon .
translation: 在与汉尼拔·莱克特的险些致命遭遇后，威尔·格雷厄姆从FBI退休了三年，汉尼拔当时帮助他追捕“切萨皮克裂口杀手”，却揭示杀手其实就是汉尼拔自己。威尔·格雷厄姆被他的前搭档杰克·克劳福德请求，来解决最后一个案件——每个满月都会有两户人家被屠杀。
back_translation: After his near-fatal encounter with Hannibal Lecter, Will Graham retired from the FBI for three years. Hannibal had helped him track down the "Chesapeake Ripper," only to reveal that the killer was actually Hannibal himself. Will Graham is requested by his former partner Jack Crawford to solve one last case—two households are slaughtered every full moon.

text: such a good-looking picture deserved to have more depth and unpredictability in its story . but it does stand out as a personal and unique entry in a time-worn genre , and that may be good enough .
translation: 这样一幅好看的画面值得在其故事中拥有更多的深度和不可预测性。然而，它作为一个个人化和独特的作品在一个陈腐的类型中脱颖而出，这或许已经足够了。
back_translation: Such a beautiful scene deserves more depth and unpredictability in its story. However, as a personalized and unique piece, it stands out in a clichéd genre, which may be enough on its own.

text: may is a young strange girl who had a very disturbed childhood and does not still know the meaning of true friendship or love .
translation: 梅是一个年轻奇怪的女孩，她有一个非常不幸的童年，至今仍然不知道真正的友谊或爱的意义。
back_translation: Mei is a young and strange girl who has had a very unfortunate childhood and still doesn't understand the true meaning of friendship or love.

text: and does he feel the same way about daniel ?
translation: 他对丹尼尔也有同样的感觉吗？
back_translation: Does he feel the same way about Daniel?

text: pacino is the best he 's been in years and keener is marvelous .
translation: 帕奇诺是多年来最棒的，基纳表现也很出色。
back_translation: Pacino has been the best over the years, and Keener's performance is also outstanding.

text: years of guilt and sorrow tumble over each other as vince struggles to retain his sanity and understand who it is he is hoping to find alive .
translation: 多年的内疚和悲伤交织在一起，文斯努力保持理智，试图理解他希望找到的活着的人是谁。
back_translation: Years of guilt and sadness intertwined, Vince struggled to stay sane, trying to understand who the living person he hoped to find was.

text: it lacks the compassion , good-natured humor and the level of insight that made [ eyre 's ] first film something of a sleeper success .
translation: 它缺乏同情心、善意的幽默和深刻的见解，这些使得[艾尔]的第一部电影成为一种意外成功。
back_translation: It lacks compassion, good-natured humor, and profound insights, which made [Al]'s first film an unexpected success.

text: immigrant worker tobias horvath gets up at 5 : 00 a . m . , washes , shaves , has some breakfast , and runs to the main square .
translation: 移民工人托比亚斯·霍瓦特早上5点起床，洗漱、刮胡子，吃些早餐，然后跑到市中心广场。
back_translation: Migrant worker Tobias Hovat wakes up at 5 a.m., washes up, shaves, has some breakfast, and then runs to the city center square.

text: proof that a newcomer indie filmmaker can infuse some new life into the downtrodden loser character study .
translation: 证明一位新晋独立电影制作者能够为被低估的失败者角色研究注入新活力。
back_translation: Prove that a new independent filmmaker can inject new vitality into the study of undervalued loser characters.

text: ted runs next door to attest his true feelings for the only woman he could ever love - and sure enough - it works !
translation: 泰德冲到隔壁去表达他对唯一能爱上的女人的真实感情——果然，这有效！
back_translation: Teddy rushed next door to express his true feelings for the only woman he could love—sure enough, it worked!

text: young cop kong yat hong ( karen mok ) and her partner mark are put on the case .
translation: 年轻的警察孔逸鸿（莫文蔚饰）和她的搭档马克被分配到了这个案件。
back_translation: Young police officer Kong Yihong (played by Karen Mok) and her partner Mark are assigned to this case.

text: the santa clause 2 proves itself a more streamlined and thought out encounter than the original could ever have hoped to be .
translation: 《圣诞老人2》证明了自己是一个比原作更为简化且思路更为清晰的故事。
back_translation: "Santa Claus 2" proves to be a simpler and clearer story than the original.

text: the movie 's ripe , enrapturing beauty will tempt those willing to probe its inscrutable mysteries .
translation: 这部电影成熟而迷人的美将吸引那些愿意探寻其深不可测的神秘的人。
back_translation: The mature and enchanting beauty of this film will attract those willing to explore its unfathomable mysteries.

text: in 1931 , in chicago , michael sullivan ( tom hanks ) , a hit man working for john rooney ( paul newman ) , and irish mob boss , faces a dilemma when what he does his witnessed by his twelve-year-old son .
translation: 1931年，在芝加哥，迈克尔·沙利文（汤姆·汉克斯）是一名为约翰·鲁尼（保罗·纽曼）工作的杀手，鲁尼是一名爱尔兰黑帮头目。当他所做的事情被他的十二岁儿子目睹时，迈克尔面临着一个两难的选择。
back_translation: In 1931, in Chicago, Michael Sullivan (Tom Hanks) is a hitman working for John Rooney (Paul Newman), an Irish mob boss. When his twelve-year-old son witnesses what he does, Michael faces a dilemma.

text: the film has a terrific look and salma hayek has a feel for the character at all stages of her life .
translation: 这部电影的视觉效果非常出色，萨尔玛·海耶克在她生命的各个阶段都对角色有着深刻的理解。
back_translation: The visual effects of this movie are outstanding, and Salma Hayek has a deep understanding of her character at various stages of her life.

text: a film about two intelligent , romantic people who ultimately have to 'earn ' each other .
translation: 一部关于两个聪明、浪漫的人，他们最终必须“赢得”彼此的电影。
back_translation: A movie about two smart, romantic people who ultimately must "win" each other.

text: this lively klasky csupo production is a convincing amplification of the popular nickelodeon series .
translation: 这部生动的克拉斯基·丘波制作是对热门尼克儿童频道系列节目的有力扩展。
back_translation: This lively production by Klasky Csupo is a strong extension of the popular Nickelodeon series.

text: living in a hidden illegal migrant camp in southern california with her brother and sister , evelia becomes a witness to murder involving international spies .
translation: 埃维莉亚和她的兄弟姐妹一起住在南加州一个隐藏的非法移民营地，目睹了一起涉及国际间谍的谋杀案。
back_translation: Evelia lives with her siblings in a hidden illegal immigrant camp in Southern California, where she witnesses a murder involving international spies.

text: this weekend-sized slice of college life follows the amusing escapades of adam parker and his three closest friends .
translation: 这个周末大小的大学生活片段讲述了亚当·帕克和他三个最亲密的朋友的有趣冒险。
back_translation: This weekend's college life segment tells the interesting adventures of Adam Parker and his three closest friends.

text: as the police investigate and suspect is arrested , we discover that joe knows more than he is letting on .
translation: 随着警方调查和嫌疑人被逮捕，我们发现乔知道的比他表面上所表现的要多。
back_translation: As the police investigation unfolds and suspects are arrested, we find that Joe knows much more than he has let on.

text: the only way to tolerate this insipid , brutally clueless film might be with a large dose of painkillers .
translation: 忍受这部无聊且毫无头绪的电影的唯一办法可能是服用大量止痛药。
back_translation: The only way to endure this boring and aimless movie may be to take a large amount of painkillers.

text: even when he 's not at his most critically insightful , godard can still be smarter than any 50 other filmmakers still at work .
translation: 即使在他不是最具批判性洞察力的时候，戈达尔仍然可以比任何50位仍在工作中的电影制作人要聪明。
back_translation: Even when he is not at his most critically insightful, Godard can still be smarter than any 50 working filmmakers.

text: this real-life hollywood fairy-tale is more engaging than the usual fantasies hollywood produces .
translation: 这个现实生活中的好莱坞童话比好莱坞制作的普通幻想更吸引人。
back_translation: This real-life Hollywood fairy tale is more captivating than the ordinary fantasies produced by Hollywood.

text: josh also gets fixated on sex , though he has no clear idea what it 's all about , and in particular on nadine ; to mike 's chagrin , she seems more interested in josh than in him .
translation: 乔希也对性产生了执念，虽然他对这到底是什么并没有清晰的了解，特别是对纳丁；让迈克感到沮丧的是，她似乎对乔希更感兴趣，而不是对他。
back_translation: Josh also developed an obsession with sex, although he didn't have a clear understanding of what it really was, especially regarding Nadine; what frustrated Mike was that she seemed more interested in Josh than in him.

text: billy is more a showbiz p . r agent than a legal lawyer and minipulates the tabloids into thinking roxie is no more than an innocent 'good time girl ' who took the wrong path , than a scheming murderess .
translation: 比利更像是一个娱乐界的公关代理，而非法律律师，他操控小报让人们认为萝西不过是一个走上歧途的无辜“开心女孩”，而不是一个阴险的谋杀犯。
back_translation: Billy is more like a PR agent in the entertainment industry rather than a legal lawyer; he manipulates tabloids to make people think of Rosie as just an innocent "happy girl" who went astray, rather than a sinister murderer.

text: once the transformation is complete , he 's ready to take on the evil perpetrators of operation whitewash -- mr feather , penelope snow aka white she devil , and , ultimately , the man .
translation: 一旦转变完成，他就准备好迎接“白washed行动”的恶棍——费瑟先生、佩内洛普·斯诺（又名白色女魔）以及最终的那个家伙。
back_translation: Once the transformation is complete, he is ready to face the villains of the "Whitewashed Operation" — Mr. Feathers, Penelope Snow (also known as the White Witch), and the final guy.

text: reggio falls victim to relying on the very digital technology that he fervently scorns , creating a meandering , inarticulate and ultimately disappointing film .
translation: 雷焦陷入了对他极力鄙视的数字科技的依赖，产生了一部漫无目的、表达不清且最终令人失望的电影。
back_translation: Leijiao fell into a dependence on the digital technology he despised, resulting in a aimless, unclear, and ultimately disappointing film.

text: his best friend , daria knows just what to do and invites sebastien to a dinner party to meet `` the boys . ``
translation: 他最好的朋友达里亚知道该怎么做，邀请塞巴斯蒂安参加一个晚宴，以见“那些男孩”。
back_translation: His best friend Daria knows what to do and invites Sebastian to a dinner to meet "the boys."

text: the problem is that for the most part , the film is deadly dull .
translation: 问题是大多数时候，这部电影无聊得令人乏味。
back_translation: The problem is that most of the time, this movie is boring to the point of being tedious.

text: the gang breaks their leader out of jail , killing the policemen in the process .
translation: 这个帮派劫狱，过程中杀死了警察。
back_translation: This gang broke into the prison and killed police officers in the process.

text: looking aristocratic , luminous yet careworn in jane hamilton 's exemplary costumes , rampling gives a performance that could not be improved upon .
translation: 穿着简·汉密尔顿杰出服装的拉姆普林，看起来既显贵又光泽，然而又饱经风霜，她的表演无可挑剔。
back_translation: Lampley, dressed in Jane Hamilton's exquisite attire, looks both elegant and radiant, yet weathered by time; her performance is impeccable.

text: but when his lab assitant , a monkey named jojo , causes the accidental addition of chemical x to the mix , the professor ends up with not one but 3 perfect , powerful little girls .
translation: 但当他的实验室助手，一只名叫乔乔的猴子，意外地将化学X加入混合物中时，教授最终得到了不仅仅是一个而是三个完美、强大的小女孩。
back_translation: But when his laboratory assistant, a monkey named Jojo, accidentally added chemical X to the mixture, the professor ended up with not just one, but three perfect, powerful little girls.

text: together writer-director danny verete 's three tales comprise a powerful and reasonably fulfilling gestalt .
translation: 编剧兼导演丹尼·维雷特的三个故事构成了一个强大而相当令人满意的整体。
back_translation: The three stories by writer and director Danny Villette form a powerful and quite satisfying whole.

text: this is the question posed to john wesley after a heavy night of drinking .
translation: 这是在约翰·韦斯利一晚狂饮后提出的问题。
back_translation: This is a question raised after John Wesley drank heavily one night.

text: in life , there 's silver , and there 's lead , says rikki ortega , as he moves to be king of the street in `` & # 193 ; nglio , `` l . a . 's east side .
translation: 在生活中，有银子，也有铅，里基·奥尔特加说，他正向成为“安吉洛”中的街头之王迈进，洛杉矶东区。
back_translation: In life, there is silver, and there is lead. Ricky Ortega said he is on his way to becoming the street king in "Angelo" in East Los Angeles.

text: but someone breaks the link before they have finished and now a demon is trapped in their world and the only way to banish it , is for all the people who summoned it to die .
translation: 但有人在完成之前打破了链接，现在一个恶魔被困在他们的世界中，而唯一驱逐它的方法就是所有召唤它的人都要死。
back_translation: But someone broke the link before it was completed, and now a demon is trapped in their world, with the only way to expel it being that all who summoned it must die.

text: jason x has cheesy effects and a hoary plot , but its macabre , self-deprecating sense of humor makes up for a lot .
translation: 《杰森X》特效俗套，情节陈腐，但其阴郁自嘲的幽默感弥补了很多缺陷。
back_translation: "Jason X" has clichéd special effects and a stale plot, but its darkly self-deprecating humor compensates for many flaws.

text: jack and agent hammer turn to father patrick , a catholic priest , for help .
translation: 杰克和哈默特工向天主教神父帕特里克求助。
back_translation: Jack and Hammer sought help from Catholic priest Patrick.

text: the decision gets complicated when old secrets , false hope , and personal tragedies threaten to break up the band .
translation: 当旧秘密、虚假的希望和个人悲剧威胁着分裂乐队时，决定变得复杂。
back_translation: When old secrets, false hopes, and personal tragedies threaten to divide the band, the decisions become complicated.

text: [ kline 's ] utterly convincing -- and deeply appealing -- as a noble teacher who embraces a strict moral code , and as a flawed human being who ca n't quite live up to it .
translation: [kline 的] 完全令人信服——并且深具吸引力——作为一位拥抱严格道德准则的高尚教师，以及作为一个无法完全践行这一准则的有缺陷的人。
back_translation: Completely convincing—and deeply appealing—as a noble teacher who embraces strict ethical standards, and as a flawed person who is unable to fully practice this standard.

text: with one exception , every blighter in this particular south london housing project digs into dysfunction like it 's a big , comforting jar of marmite , to be slathered on crackers and served as a feast of bleakness .
translation: 有一个例外，在这个位于南伦敦的住房项目中，其他人都像是把功能障碍当作一个舒适的大罐马末，热衷地涂抹在饼干上，作为一场悲惨的盛宴。
back_translation: There is an exception in this housing project located in South London, where others seem to treat dysfunction as a cozy big jar of marmalade, eagerly spreading it on biscuits as part of a tragic feast.

text: on the verge of judgement day , the most advanced terminator unit ever , the t-x , arrives from the future to ensure the rise of the machines .
translation: 在审判日的边缘，史上最先进的终结者单位T-X从未来抵达，以确保机器的崛起。
back_translation: At the edge of Judgment Day, the most advanced Terminator unit T-X arrives from the future to ensure the rise of machines.

text: evokes the frustration , the awkwardness and the euphoria of growing up , without relying on the usual tropes .
translation: 唤起了成长过程中的挫败感、尴尬和兴奋，而不依赖于通常的陈词滥调。
back_translation: It evokes feelings of frustration, awkwardness, and excitement during the growth process, without relying on usual clichés.

text: using their immense skills , max and charisse track rausch , a brilliant international arms dealer , around the globe .
translation: 利用他们的极高技能，马克斯和查里斯追踪拉乌什，一位杰出的国际军火商，环球而行。
back_translation: Using their exceptional skills, Max and Charles track down Raush, a prominent international arms dealer, as he travels around the globe.

text: reign of fire looks as if it was made without much thought -- and is best watched that way .
translation: 《火焰统治》看起来似乎是在没有太多思考的情况下制作的——最好以这种方式观看。
back_translation: "Flame Rule" seems to have been made without much thought - it's best to watch it this way.

text: this is the true story of real ira bombers during the peak of the troubles in northern ireland , 1981 .
translation: 这是关于在北爱尔兰动乱高峰期，真实爱尔兰共和军炸弹袭击者的真实故事，发生在1981年。
back_translation: This is a true story about a real Irish Republican Army bomber during the peak of the troubles in Northern Ireland, which took place in 1981.

text: those who want to be jolted out of their gourd should drop everything and run to ichi .
translation: 那些想要被冲击的人应该放下所有，赶快去一池。
back_translation: Those who want to be impacted should let go of everything and quickly go to a pool.

text: the script falls back on too many tried-and-true shenanigans that hardly distinguish it from the next teen comedy .
translation: 这个剧本依赖于太多老套的搞笑桥段，几乎无法让它与下一个青春喜剧区分开来。
back_translation: This script relies on too many clichéd comedic moments, making it almost indistinguishable from the next teen comedy.

text: the film is enriched by an imaginatively mixed cast of antic spirits , headed by christopher plummer as the subtlest and most complexly evil uncle ralph i 've ever seen in the many film and stage adaptations of the work .
translation: 这部电影因充满想象力的混合演员阵容而更加丰富，其中克里斯托弗·普卢默饰演的叔叔拉尔夫是我在众多影视和舞台改编作品中见过的最微妙、最复杂的邪恶角色。
back_translation: This movie is enriched by its imaginative mix of cast, where Christopher Plummer's Uncle Ralph is one of the most subtle and complex villains I have seen in numerous film and stage adaptations.

text: at the same time , sanitarian doctor oswaldo cruz comes back to brazil after three years in paris , where he had studied in the pasteur institute .
translation: 与此同时，卫生医生奥斯瓦尔多·克鲁兹在巴黎学习了三年后回到巴西，期间他曾在巴斯德研究所学习。
back_translation: Meanwhile, the health doctor Oswaldo Cruz returned to Brazil after studying in Paris for three years, during which he studied at the Pasteur Institute.

text: the movie barely makes sense , with its unbelievable naM-ovetM-i and arbitrary flashbacks .
translation: 这部电影几乎没有道理可言，情节令人难以置信，插入的闪回也显得随意。
back_translation: This movie makes almost no sense, the plot is unbelievable, and the inserted flashbacks seem arbitrary.

text: there 's . . . tremendous energy from the cast , a sense of playfulness and excitement that seems appropriate .
translation: 演员们有着巨大的能量，一种似乎很合适的玩乐和兴奋感。
back_translation: The actors have enormous energy, a sense of playfulness and excitement that seems very fitting.

text: the film engages with the divergent paths taken , linked by childhood friendship and a mewling kitten , but a third act event is presented so abruptly it confuses the viewer until it rebounds somewhat with a satisfying closure .
translation: 这部影片探讨了因童年友谊和一只咕噜咕噜的小猫而连接的不同道路，但第三幕的事件呈现得如此突然，以至于让观众感到困惑，直到最后稍微有了一个令人满意的结局。
back_translation: This film explores the different paths connected by childhood friendship and a purring little cat, but the events of the third act are presented so abruptly that they leave the audience confused until a somewhat satisfying ending emerges at the very end.

text: once his products become good enough , he has to face severe competition , and , in some cases , humiliations , from well-established foreign companies .
translation: 一旦他的产品足够好，他就必须面对来自已建立良好的外国公司的激烈竞争，并在某些情况下遭遇羞辱。
back_translation: Once his product is good enough, he must face intense competition from well-established foreign companies and in some cases experience humiliation.

text: the evening after his father 's funeral , he meets the lovely paula , runs into her the next day , but is sure she 'll never look twice at him .
translation: 在他父亲的葬礼后的夜晚，他遇到了美丽的保拉，第二天偶然再次见到她，但他确信她永远不会再看他第二眼。
back_translation: On the night after his father's funeral, he met the beautiful Paula, and the next day he happened to see her again, but he was certain she would never look at him a second time.

text: the only thing i laughed at were the people who paid to see it .
translation: 我唯一会笑的就是那些花钱来看的人。
back_translation: The only thing I can laugh at is those who pay to come see me.

text: the rules - if one person leaves , everyone loses .
translation: 规则 - 如果一个人离开，大家都会失去。
back_translation: Rule - If one person leaves, everyone will lose.

text: quiet , sexual , disturbing , often beautifully melancholic .
translation: 安静、性感、令人不安，常常令人美丽而忧郁。
back_translation: Quiet, sexy, unsettling, often beautifully melancholic.

text: all or nothing is set on a london working-class housing estate over a long weekend , and also tells the stories of a range of phil and penny 's neighbors , some of whom become involved in the family 's lives , and all of whom experience an emotional journey .
translation: 《全有或全无》设定在伦敦的一个工人阶级住房区，故事发生在一个长周末，讲述了菲尔和佩妮的一系列邻居的故事，其中一些人参与到了这个家庭的生活中，所有人都经历了一段情感旅程。
back_translation: "All or Nothing" is set in a working-class housing area in London and takes place over a long weekend, telling the stories of Phil and Penny's series of neighbors, some of whom become involved in the family's life, with everyone experiencing an emotional journey.

text: she confronts him , but the smooth talking mackenheim seduces her into a romantic dinner at his house .
translation: 她 confronts him ，但圆滑的麦肯海姆诱惑她到他家享用浪漫晚餐。
back_translation: She confronts him, but the smooth McKenheim tempts her to his home for a romantic dinner.

text: reeboir varies between a sweet smile and an angry bark , while said attempts to wear down possible pupils through repetition . it has no affect on the kurds , but it wore me down .
translation: reeboir在甜美的微笑和愤怒的吼叫之间变化，而said试图通过重复来耗尽可能的学生。这对库尔德人没有影响，但却折磨了我。
back_translation: Reeboir shifts between a sweet smile and an angry roar, while Said tries to exhaust as many students as possible through repetition. This has no effect on the Kurds, but it torments me.

text: diana seeks to escape the wasteland of lies she ca n't stop telling .
translation: 戴安娜试图逃离她无法停止的谎言荒原。
back_translation: Diana tried to escape the wasteland of lies she could not stop.

text: a thinly veiled excuse for wilson to play his self-deprecating act against murphy 's well-honed prima donna shtick .
translation: 这是威尔逊为了和墨菲的精心打磨的自恋表演对抗而提出的一个半隐晦的借口。
back_translation: This is a half-subtle excuse proposed by Wilson to counter Murphy's finely crafted narcissistic performance.

text: it might be 'easier ' to watch on video at home , but that should n't stop die-hard french film connoisseurs from going out and enjoying the big-screen experience .
translation: 在家看视频可能“更容易”，但这不应该阻止死忠的法国电影爱好者走出去享受大银幕的体验。
back_translation: Watching videos at home may be "easier," but this should not stop dedicated French film enthusiasts from going out to enjoy the experience of the big screen.

text: the five protagonists of my film are women who have not been able to organize the large `` stones `` in their lives .
translation: 我电影中的五位主角是一些在生活中未能整理好大“石头”的女性。
back_translation: The five protagonists in my film are women who have not been able to sort out the big "stones" in their lives.

text: disney again ransacks its archives for a quick-buck sequel .
translation: 迪士尼再次掠夺其档案以获取快速盈利的续集。
back_translation: Disney is once again plundering its archives for quick-profit sequels.

text: the documentary follows otte from holland to ghana , where he 's set to celebrate his fifth anniversary as the leader of mepe , the region of 300 , 000 people who installed him .
translation: 这部纪录片跟随荷兰的奥特前往加纳，他将在那里庆祝自己作为梅佩地区领导者的五周年，该地区有30万人选择了他。
back_translation: This documentary follows Otto from the Netherlands as he travels to Ghana, where he will celebrate his five-year leadership as the leader of the Mepe area, a region that has 300,000 people who chose him.

text: in scope , ambition and accomplishment , children of the century . . . takes kurys ' career to a whole new level .
translation: 在范围、雄心和成就上，《世纪的孩子……》将库里斯的职业生涯提升到了一个全新的水平。
back_translation: In terms of scope, ambition, and achievement, "The Children of the Century..." has elevated Currys' career to a whole new level.

text: it wraps up a classic mother/daughter struggle in recycled paper with a shiny new bow and while the audience can tell it 's not all new , at least it looks pretty .
