back_translation: You appear in a daze, unable to tell whether you are watching a pornographic film or a documentary.

text: tim , who had scoffed at nick 's idea and passed on an opportunity to get in on the deal , can only watch as nick 's fortune -- and tim 's own envy -- grow to equally outrageous proportions .
translation: 蒂姆曾嘲笑尼克的想法，并放弃了参与这一交易的机会，如今只能看着尼克的财富，以及蒂姆自己日益增长的嫉妒，达到同样离谱的程度。
back_translation: Tim once scoffed at Nick's idea and missed the opportunity to get involved in the deal. Now he can only watch Nick's wealth grow, along with his own increasingly outrageous jealousy.

text: the movie 's accumulated force still feels like an ugly knot tightening in your stomach . but is that knot from dramatic tension or a symptom of artistic malnutrition ?
translation: 这部电影的累积力量仍然让你感觉像是肚子里有一个难看的结在收紧。但这个结是由于戏剧张力，还是艺术营养不足的症状呢？
back_translation: The cumulative power of this film still makes you feel like there is an ugly knot tightening in your stomach. But is this knot a result of dramatic tension, or a symptom of artistic malnutrition?

text: open-ended and composed of layer upon layer , talk to her is a cinephile 's feast , an invitation to countless interpretations .
translation: 开放式的，由一层又一层组成，《与她对话》是影迷的盛宴，邀请观众进行无数的解读。
back_translation: Open-ended and composed of layers upon layers, "Talking to Her" is a feast for film fans, inviting the audience to engage in countless interpretations.

text: charlie decides it 's time to take action to recover his lost love : he secretly befriends her new boyfriend and attempts to sabotage their relationship by introducing temptation , mistrust - and jennifer . . .
translation: 查理决定是时候采取行动来挽回失去的爱情：他秘密接近她的新男友，并试图通过引入诱惑、不信任以及詹妮弗来破坏他们的关系……
back_translation: Charlie decided it was time to take action to reclaim his lost love: he secretly approached her new boyfriend and tried to sabotage their relationship by introducing temptation, distrust, and Jennifer...

text: the movie is amateurish , but it 's a minor treat .
translation: 这部电影虽然显得业余，但还是小有看头。
back_translation: Although this movie seems amateurish, it still has some highlights.

text: as he struggles for his humanity , he fights his oppressors and is quickly sent to `` the shu `` where his unbridled rage catapults him to the victor 's circle .
translation: 在他为自己的人性而奋斗时，他与压迫者作斗争，迅速被送往“石头监狱”，在那里他无法控制的愤怒将他推向了胜利者的圈子。
back_translation: As he fought for his humanity, he struggled against the oppressor and was swiftly sent to the "Stone Prison," where his uncontrolled anger pushed him into the circle of victors.

text: insomnia loses points when it surrenders to a formulaic bang-bang , shoot-em-up scene at the conclusion . but the performances of pacino , williams , and swank keep the viewer wide-awake all the way through .
translation: 失眠在结尾时屈服于公式化的轰轰烈烈、射击场景时失去了分数。但帕奇诺、威廉姆斯和斯旺克的表演使观众始终保持清醒。
back_translation: Insomnia succumbs to formulaic drama at the end, losing its score during the action scenes. However, the performances of Pacino, Williams, and Swank keep the audience alert throughout.

text: his two buddies , sean and tim never have trouble in that department , and they set out to help in their own way .
translation: 他的两个朋友肖恩和提姆在那方面从来没有遇到过问题，他们以自己的方式出发来提供帮助。
back_translation: His two friends Sean and Tim have never encountered problems in that regard; they set out in their own way to provide assistance.

text: rebuffed in love and uncertain of life , simon is the story of a young englishman 's physical and spiritual journey during algeria 's battle for independence from france .
translation: 遭遇爱情的拒绝和对生活的不确定，西蒙的故事描绘了一位年轻英国人在阿尔及利亚争取独立于法国过程中的身体与精神之旅。
back_translation: Encountering rejection in love and uncertainty in life, Simon's story depicts the physical and spiritual journey of a young British man in Algeria during the struggle for independence from France.

text: the pain , loneliness and insecurity of the screenwriting process are vividly and painfully brought to slovenly life in this self-deprecating , biting and witty feature written by charlie kaufman and his twin brother , donald , and directed by spike jonze .
translation: 编剧过程中的痛苦、孤独和不安在查理·考夫曼和他的双胞胎兄弟唐纳德所写、斯派克·琼斯导演的这部自嘲、尖刻而机智的作品中生动而痛苦地展现出来。
back_translation: The pain, solitude, and anxiety of the screenwriting process are vividly and painfully depicted in this self-deprecating, sharp, and witty work written by Charlie Kaufman and his twin brother Donald, directed by Spike Jonze.

text: the boy gets a shock when he comes to know that the job involves spying sharad 's wife .
translation: 男孩得知这份工作涉及到监视沙拉德的妻子时感到震惊。
back_translation: The boy was shocked to learn that the job involved monitoring Shalad's wife.

text: the brittle containment of the surface is no match for the volatile eruptions from the unspoken interior - a harrowing and erotic underworld of need and confession that permits the release of all that has been silenced .
translation: 表面的脆弱封闭无法抵挡来自无言内心的剧烈喷发——一种令人痛苦又充满情色的地下世界，充满需求与忏悔，允许释放所有曾被沉默的东西。
back_translation: The surface's fragile closure cannot withstand the violent eruption from the unspoken depths of the heart—an underground world that is both painful and filled with desire, full of needs and confessions, allowing the release of all that has been silenced.

text: 451 tries to help kyle adjust to this unfamiliar and violent world but kyle is a man destined to fight his own battles .
translation: 451试图帮助凯尔适应这个不熟悉且暴力的世界，但凯尔注定要独自面对自己的斗争。
back_translation: 451 tries to help Kyle adapt to this unfamiliar and violent world, but Kyle is destined to face his struggles alone.

text: this is a children 's film in the truest sense . it 's packed with adventure and a worthwhile environmental message , so it 's great for the kids . parents , on the other hand , will be ahead of the plot at all times , and there is n't enough clever innuendo to fil
translation: 这是一部真正意义上的儿童电影。它充满了冒险和有价值的环保信息，非常适合孩子们。而父母则会在整个过程中对情节了如指掌，影片中没有足够聪明的暗示来填补这一点。
back_translation: This is a true children's movie. It is filled with adventure and valuable environmental messages, making it very suitable for kids. Parents, on the other hand, will find the plot quite straightforward throughout the whole process, as there aren't enough clever hints to fill this gap.

text: nayomi and lisa walk in , and pick up the gun that mitchell just dropped off and leave .
translation: 纳约米和丽莎走了进来，捡起米切尔刚刚放下的枪，然后离开。
back_translation: Naomi and Lisa walked in, picked up the gun that Mitchell had just put down, and then left.

text: it all plays out . . . like a high-end john hughes comedy , a kind of elder bueller 's time out .
translation: 这一切就像高端的约翰·休斯喜剧一样上演，仿佛是一种老年布埃勒的休息时间。
back_translation: Everything unfolds like a high-end John Hughes comedy, as if it's a break time for an elderly Bueller.

text: to cure their boredom , they decide to ( inspired after watching the movie , `` the sure thing `` ) go on various road trips looking for love .
translation: 为了消除无聊，他们决定（受到电影《绝对要好事》的启发）进行各种公路旅行，寻找爱情。
back_translation: To eliminate boredom, they decided to go on various road trips in search of love, inspired by the movie "Definitely Maybe."

text: chilling but uncommercial look into the mind of jeffrey dahmer , serial killer .
translation: 令人不安但并不商业化地深入杰弗里·达默尔（Jeffrey Dahmer）这名连环杀手的内心世界。
back_translation: Delving into the unsettling yet non-commercial inner world of the serial killer Jeffrey Dahmer.

text: blake falls in love with melinda but the master compels blake to marry ariel against his will to keep him away from melinda his kept woman .
translation: 布雷克爱上了梅琳达，但大师强迫布雷克违背自己的意愿与阿里尔结婚，以使他远离梅琳达这个情妇。
back_translation: Blake fell in love with Melinda, but the master forced Blake to marry Ariel against his will in order to keep him away from Melinda, his mistress.

text: . . . manages to fall closer in quality to silence than to the abysmal hannibal .
translation: ……在质量上更接近沉默而非糟糕的汉尼拔。
back_translation: ...in quality is closer to silence rather than a bad Hannibal.

text: the filmmakers needed more emphasis on the storytelling and less on the glamorous machine that thrusts the audience into a future they wo n't much care about .
translation: 电影制作人需要更加注重故事讲述，而不是使观众进入一个他们并不在意的未来的华丽机器。
back_translation: Filmmakers need to focus more on storytelling rather than immersing audiences in a flashy machine of a future that they do not care about.

text: when the three precogs , who only work together , floating connected in a tank of fluid , have a vision , the names of the victim and the perpetrator as well as video imagery of the crime and the exact time it will happen , are given out to the special cops who then try to prevent the crime from happening .
translation: 当三个预知者在一个液体罐中漂浮连接在一起时，他们共同工作，产生一个预见，受害者和犯罪者的名字，以及犯罪的影像和精确发生时间，会传递给特别警员，随后他们会努力阻止犯罪的发生。
back_translation: When three clairvoyants float connected in a liquid tank, they work together to produce a vision that conveys the names of the victim and the perpetrator, as well as images of the crime and the precise time it occurs, which are relayed to special officers who then work to prevent the crime from happening.

text: marly temple is living her father 's dream of running a motel , only it has become her nightmare .
translation: 玛丽·泰普尔正在生活她父亲经营汽车旅馆的梦想，但这已经变成了她的噩梦。
back_translation: Mary Temple is living her father's dream of running a motel, but it has turned into her nightmare.

text: in the end , they confront an unparalleled horror , with the fate of the world in the balance .
translation: 最终，他们面对着一种无与伦比的恐怖，世界的命运岌岌可危。
back_translation: In the end, they faced an unparalleled terror, and the fate of the world was at stake.

text: thomas , the studious and responsible brother , creates a better life for himself through education and hard , honest work .
translation: 托马斯，那个勤奋和负责任的哥哥，通过教育和努力诚实的工作，为自己创造了更好的生活。
back_translation: Thomas, the diligent and responsible brother, created a better life for himself through education and hard, honest work.

text: director duncan roy impressively presents aka through three simultaneous frames rather than one , offering the audience a deeper and more complex perspective through which to view dean 's engrossing story .
translation: 导演邓肯·罗伊令人印象深刻地通过三个同时的画面而非一个，展示了《AKA》，为观众提供了更加深刻和复杂的视角来观看迪恩引人入胜的故事。
back_translation: Director Duncan Roy impressively presents "AKA" through three simultaneous images rather than one, offering the audience a deeper and more complex perspective to view Dean's captivating story.

text: the film explores the cultural differences between a north american mother and a mexican father in the face of death .
translation: 这部电影探讨了一位北美母亲和一位墨西哥父亲在面对死亡时的文化差异。
back_translation: This movie explores the cultural differences between a North American mother and a Mexican father when faced with death.

text: hands down the year 's most thought-provoking film . but it pays a price for its intricate intellectual gamesmanship .
translation: 毫无疑问，这是今年最发人深省的电影。但它为其复杂的智力博弈付出了代价。
back_translation: There is no doubt that this is the most thought-provoking movie of the year. However, it pays a price for its complex intellectual games.

text: his plans go awry , however , when his older brother , keith , returns from prison .
translation: 然而，当他的哥哥基思从监狱回来时，他的计划发生了变化。
back_translation: However, when his brother Keith returned from prison, his plans changed.

text: `` a sound of thunder `` is about a game hunter ( burns ) who goes on a time-traveling safari owned and operated by kingsley 's character to hunt dinosaurs in the prehistoric era .
translation: 《雷声》讲述的是一个猎人（伯恩斯）参加一个由金斯利角色经营的时间旅行狩猎之旅，去史前时代猎杀恐龙。
back_translation: "The Thunder" tells the story of a hunter (Burns) who participates in a time-travel hunting trip managed by a character named Kingsley, going back to the prehistoric era to hunt dinosaurs.

text: now faced with the discovery of a bloodied body , a flaming liquor store just off native land that sells millions of cans of beer a year to the native population , and his brother 's ongoing self-destruction , rudy goes on a quest to avenge himself , his family , and his culture and to seek justice .
translation: 现在，鲁迪面临着发现一具血淋淋的尸体、一个位于原住民土地旁边的燃烧的酒类商店（该商店每年向原住民出售数百万罐啤酒），以及他兄弟持续的自我毁灭，他踏上了复仇之旅，为自己、家人和文化寻求公正。
back_translation: Now, Rudy faces the discovery of a bloody corpse, a burning liquor store located next to Indigenous lands (the store sells millions of cans of beer to Indigenous people each year), and his brother's ongoing self-destruction, as he embarks on a journey of vengeance to seek justice for himself, his family, and his culture.

text: in its ragged , cheap and unassuming way , the movie works .
translation: 以其破旧、廉价和不起眼的方式，这部电影有效。
back_translation: In its shabby, inexpensive, and unassuming way, this film is effective.

text: it irritates and saddens me that martin lawrence 's latest vehicle can explode obnoxiously into 2 , 500 screens while something of bubba ho-tep 's clearly evident quality may end up languishing on a shelf somewhere .
translation: 马丁·劳伦斯的最新作品能够肆意地在2500个银幕上上映，这让我感到恼火和伤心，而《巴巴·霍特普》明显的质量却可能最终被搁置在某个角落。
back_translation: Martin Lawrence's latest work can casually be released on 2,500 screens, which frustrates and saddens me, while the obvious quality of "Baba Ho-tep" might ultimately be left in some corner.

text: it has the requisite faux-urban vibe and hotter-two-years-ago rap and r & b names and references .
translation: 它具有必要的假城市氛围以及两年前更流行的说唱和节奏蓝调名称和引用。
back_translation: It has the necessary fake city atmosphere, along with names and references from rap and R&B that were more popular two years ago.

text: the tonal shifts are jolting , and though wen 's messages are profound and thoughtfully delivered , more thorough transitions would have made the film more cohesive .
translation: 音调的变化让人感到震惊，尽管温的讯息深刻且表达得很有思考，但如果能够有更全面的过渡，影片将会更加连贯。
back_translation: The change in tone is shocking; although the message from Wen is profound and expresses deep thought, the film would be more coherent if there were a more comprehensive transition.

text: she bets ( against all logic ) to be able to build a new palace for caesar within three months .
translation: 她打赌（违反所有逻辑）能在三个月内为凯撒建造一座新宫殿。
back_translation: She bet (against all logic) that she could build a new palace for Caesar in three months.

text: yet , while all this is going on , sauron 's troops mass toward the city of gondor , for the war of the ring is about to begin .
translation: 然而，在这一切发生的同时，索伦的军队正朝着冈多尔城集结，因为魔戒战争即将开始。
back_translation: However, at the same time, Sauron's army was gathering towards the city of Gondor, as the War of the Ring was about to begin.

text: the movie straddles the fence between escapism and social commentary , and on both sides it falls short .
translation: 这部电影在逃避现实和社会评论之间摇摆不定，两个方面都未能达到预期。
back_translation: This movie wobbles between escaping reality and social commentary, failing to meet expectations in both aspects.

text: no amount of good acting is enough to save oleander 's uninspired story .
translation: 再好的表演也无法拯救夹竹桃平淡无奇的故事。
back_translation: No matter how good the performance is, it cannot save the dull and ordinary story of the oleander.

text: a superfluous sequel . . . plagued by that old familiar feeling of 'let 's get this thing over with ' : everyone has shown up at the appointed time and place , but visible enthusiasm is mighty hard to find .
translation: 一个多余的续集……遭受着那种老熟悉的“赶快结束这件事”的感觉的困扰：每个人都在约定的时间和地点出现，但明显的热情却难以寻找。
back_translation: An unnecessary sequel... plagued by that familiar feeling of "let's just get this over with": everyone shows up at the agreed time and place, but the evident enthusiasm is hard to find.

text: one whom he could never love and one whom he could never stop loving . . .
translation: 一个他永远无法爱的人和一个他永远无法停止爱的人成。
back_translation: A person he can never love and a person he can never stop loving.

text: why sit through a crummy , wannabe-hip crime comedy that refers incessantly to old movies , when you could just rent those movies instead , let alone seek out a respectable new one ?
translation: 为什么要看一部糟糕的、伪潮流的犯罪喜剧，它不断地提及旧电影，而你完全可以租借那些电影，甚至寻找一部值得尊敬的新片呢？
back_translation: Why watch a bad, faux-trendy crime comedy that constantly references old movies when you could easily rent those movies or even find a respectable new film?

text: little do they know that these pirates are cursed .
translation: 他们不知道这些海盗是被诅咒的。
back_translation: They did not know that these pirates were cursed.

text: when johnny and lena are stumped , they turn to wayne . . . but
translation: 当约翰尼和莱娜遇到难题时，他们会求助于韦恩……但是
back_translation: When Johnny and Lena encounter a problem, they turn to Wayne for help... but

text: a tough go , but leigh 's depth and rigor , and his skill at inspiring accomplished portrayals that are all the more impressive for their lack of showiness , offsets to a notable degree the film 's often-mined and despairing milieu .
translation: 虽然环境艰难，但利的深度和严谨，以及他激发出不华丽却更加令人印象深刻的出色表现的能力，在很大程度上弥补了影片常常深挖且绝望的氛围。
back_translation: Although the environment is challenging, Li's depth and rigor, as well as his ability to evoke impressive performances that are not flamboyant but more striking, largely compensate for the film's often deep and desperate atmosphere.

text: it looks closely , insightfully at fragile , complex relationships .
translation: 它深入细致地观察脆弱而复杂的关系。
back_translation: It conducts a deep and detailed observation of fragile and complex relationships.

text: tabloid journalist annika bengtzon is writing about a murder in the port of stockholm and she suspects that the yugoslav mafia is involved .
translation: 小报记者安妮卡·本戈松正在撰写关于斯德哥尔摩港口一起谋杀案的报道，她怀疑南斯拉夫黑手党参与了此案。
back_translation: Young journalist Annika Bengtsson is writing a report on a murder case at the port of Stockholm, and she suspects the involvement of the Yugoslav mafia in the incident.

text: `` dreamcatcher `` tells the story of four young friends who perform a heroic act - and are changed forever by the uncanny powers they gain in return .
translation: 《梦捕手》讲述了四个年轻朋友的故事，他们进行了一次英雄行为，并因获得的超自然力量而永远改变。
back_translation: "The Dream Catcher" tells the story of four young friends who perform a heroic act and are forever changed by the supernatural powers they gain.

text: his dog is missing and he suspects the people at work might be behind it .
translation: 他的狗丢了，他怀疑同事们可能与此有关。
back_translation: His dog is missing, and he suspects that his colleagues might be involved.

text: an undercover narc dies , the investigation stalls , so the detroit p . d .
translation: 一名卧底毒贩死于非命，调查陷入停滞，因此底特律警局……
back_translation: An undercover drug dealer died under mysterious circumstances, and the investigation came to a standstill, so the Detroit Police Department...

text: a simple , sometimes maddeningly slow film that has just enough charm and good acting to make it interesting , but is ultimately pulled under by the pacing and lack of creativity within .
translation: 一部简单的电影，有时缓慢得令人发狂，但它拥有足够的魅力和优秀的表演使其引人入胜，但最终还是因节奏和缺乏创意而沉沦。
back_translation: A simple movie that can sometimes be maddeningly slow, but it has enough charm and excellent performances to keep it engaging; however, it ultimately falters due to its pacing and lack of creativity.

text: even if you 've seen `` stomp `` ( the stage show ) , you still have to see this !
translation: 即使你已经看过“踩踏”（舞台表演），你仍然必须看看这个！
back_translation: Even if you've already seen "Stampede" (the stage performance), you still have to check this out!

text: they swore to have their unborn babies get married when they grew up .
translation: 他们发誓要让未出生的宝宝在长大后结婚。
back_translation: They swore to have their unborn baby get married when they grow up.

text: the volatile dynamics of female friendship is the subject of this unhurried , low-key film that is so off-hollywood that it seems positively french in its rhythms and resonance .
translation: 女性友谊的多变动态是这部缓慢而低调的电影的主题，这部电影如此非好莱坞，以至于在节奏和共鸣上似乎显得极具法国风情。
back_translation: The changing dynamics of female friendship is the theme of this slow and understated film, which is so non-Hollywood that it seems to have a distinctly French flair in its pacing and resonance.

text: the ring is worth a look , if you do n't demand much more than a few cheap thrills from your halloween entertainment .
translation: 如果你对万圣节娱乐的要求只是一点便宜的刺激，那么这部电影值得一看。
back_translation: If your only requirement for Halloween entertainment is a bit of cheap thrills, then this movie is worth a watch.

text: by providing a dynamic expression of the struggles and celebrations of the expatriate lifestyle , leela has the potential to be a crossover film - popular among expatriate south asians and mainstream english speaking audiences the world over .
translation: 通过生动表达外籍人士生活的挣扎和庆祝，Leela 有潜力成为一部跨界电影 - 在世界各地的外籍南亚人和主流英语观众中都受到欢迎。
back_translation: By vividly expressing the struggles and celebrations of expatriates, Leela has the potential to become a crossover film that is welcomed by expatriate South Asians and mainstream English-speaking audiences around the world.

text: after all , she is the woman of his dreams .
translation: 毕竟，她是他梦想中的女人。
back_translation: After all, she is the woman of his dreams.

text: depressive , slow , darkly funny , unyielding in its formal rigor , and unsettlingly beautiful .
translation: 抑郁、缓慢、黑暗幽默、在形式上毫不妥协，并且令人不安地美丽。
back_translation: Depressing, slow, darkly humorous, uncompromising in form, and disturbingly beautiful.

text: it 's a talking head documentary , but a great one .
translation: 这是一部访谈式纪录片，但非常精彩。
back_translation: This is an interview-style documentary, but it's very精彩.

text: in 1975 , as the vietnam war was ending , thousands of orphans and amerasian children were brought to the united states as part of `` operation babylift . ``
translation: 1975年，随着越南战争的结束，成千上万的孤儿和美籍亚裔儿童作为“婴儿空运行动”的一部分被带到美国。
back_translation: In 1975, with the end of the Vietnam War, thousands of orphans and Asian American children were brought to the United States as part of the "Operation Baby Lift."

text: `` brown sugar `` admirably aspires to be more than another `` best man `` clone by weaving a theme throughout this funny film .
translation: 《棕糖》以一种令人钦佩的方式，努力成为不仅仅是另一个“伴郎”克隆，通过在这部搞笑电影中编织一个主题。
back_translation: "Brown Sugar" strives to be more than just another "groomsman" clone in a commendable way, weaving a theme throughout this comedy film.

text: nothing can detract from the affection of that moral favorite : friends will be friends through thick and thin .
translation: 没有什么能够减损那位道德偶像的深情：朋友会在艰难时刻依然是朋友。
back_translation: Nothing can diminish the deep affection for that moral idol: friends remain friends even in difficult times.

text: incredibly , dionysus ' unarmed women defeat pentheus ' formidable royal army .
translation: 令人难以置信的是，狄俄尼索斯的未武装女性打败了潘修斯强大的皇室军队。
back_translation: Incredibly, the unarmed women of Dionysus defeated the powerful royal army of Pentheus.

text: if you 've grown tired of going where no man has gone before , but several movies have - take heart . this is the best star trek movie in a long time .
translation: 如果你已经厌倦了去那些没有人去过的地方，但几部电影却去了——请振作。这是很久以来最好的星际迷航电影。
back_translation: If you are tired of going to places where no one has been, but a few movies have ventured there—cheer up. This is the best Star Trek movie in a long time.

text: will lightman is a hip londoner who one day realizes that his friends are all involved with the responsibilities of married life and that leaves him alone in the cold .
translation: 威尔·莱特曼是一个时髦的伦敦人，有一天他意识到他的朋友们都忙于婚姻生活的责任，这让他感到孤独寒冷。
back_translation: Will Lightman is a stylish Londoner who one day realizes that his friends are all busy with the responsibilities of married life, which leaves him feeling lonely and cold.

text: it seems like a perfect opportunity for kilo to get back to his family , but this job leads to a world of trouble for kilo after his release .
translation: 这似乎是一个完美的机会，让基洛回到他的家人身边，但这份工作在他出狱后却给基洛带来了无尽的麻烦。
back_translation: This seems like a perfect opportunity for Kilo to return to his family, but this job brought endless trouble to Kilo after he was released from prison.

text: finds a way to tell a simple story , perhaps the simplest story of all , in a way that seems compelling and even original .
translation: 找到了一种讲述简单故事的方法，也许是所有故事中最简单的故事，以一种看似引人入胜甚至独特的方式。
back_translation: I have found a method to tell simple stories, perhaps the simplest story among all stories, in a way that appears engaging and even unique.

text: sunk by way too much indulgence of scene-chewing , teeth-gnashing actorliness .
translation: 淹没在过度沉迷于抠图、咬牙切齿的演员风格中。
back_translation: Drowned in an excessive obsession with cutting images and the gritting-of-teeth acting style.

text: until she leaves to the kitchen and he finds out that under the bed a male shoe that does not belong to him is carefully hidden by a male hand , under his own eyes .
translation: 直到她走进厨房，他发现床下藏着一只不属于他的男性鞋子，正被一只男性的手小心翼翼地藏着，就在他自己的眼前。
back_translation: Until she walked into the kitchen, he discovered a man's shoe hidden under the bed that did not belong to him, carefully concealed by a man's hand, right in front of his own eyes.

text: tired of his constant fixation on drinking and television , herk 's wife anna and daughter jenny decide to find new love interests in divorced dad eliot arnold and his son matt .
translation: 厌倦了他对饮酒和电视的不断沉迷，赫克的妻子安娜和女儿詹妮决定在离婚父亲埃利奥特·阿诺德和他的儿子马特身上寻找新的爱情。
back_translation: Tired of his constant obsession with drinking and television, Heck's wife Anna and daughter Jenny decide to seek new love in the divorced father Elliott Arnold and his son Matt.

text: a positively thrilling combination of ethnography and all the intrigue , betrayal , deceit and murder of a shakespearean tragedy or a juicy soap opera .
translation: 这是一个让人兴奋的结合，融合了人种学和莎士比亚悲剧或刺激肥皂剧中所有的阴谋、背叛、欺骗和谋杀。
back_translation: This is an exciting combination that fuses all the plots, betrayals, deceptions, and murders of ethnography and Shakespearean tragedy or thrilling soap operas.

text: cannon 's confidence and laid-back good spirits are , with the drumming routines , among the film 's saving graces .
translation: 坎农的自信和轻松愉快的精神，加上打击乐的表演，成为了这部电影的几个亮点之一。
back_translation: Cannon's confidence and easy-going spirit, combined with the percussion performances, became one of the highlights of this film.

text: when she ventures to vietnam to meet her mother , she unknowingly embarks on an emotional pilgrimage that spans decades and distance .
translation: 当她前往越南与母亲见面时，她无意中开始了一段跨越数十年与距离的情感朝圣之旅。
back_translation: When she went to Vietnam to meet her mother, she inadvertently embarked on an emotional pilgrimage that spanned several decades and distances.

text: scared and confused , frank and caroline must find their way back home , all the while avoiding danger at every turn .
translation: 害怕和困惑的弗兰克和卡罗琳必须找到回家的路，同时在每一个转折中避开危险。
back_translation: Fearful and confused, Frank and Caroline must find their way home while avoiding danger at every turn.

text: the importance of being earnest resonates and inspires rapid-fire bouts of laughter , perhaps even a few giggles from the author himself , whom posterity has rewarded the last laugh .
translation: 《不可儿戏》的重要性引起共鸣，并激发出一阵阵迅速的笑声，甚至可能引来作者本人发出的几声轻笑，留给后人的是最后的笑声。
back_translation: The importance of "No Child's Play" resonates, evoking bursts of quick laughter, and may even elicit a few light chuckles from the author themselves, leaving future generations with the final laughter.

text: harrison 's flowers puts its heart in the right place , but its brains are in no particular place at all .
translation: 《哈里森的花朵》精神上是正确的，但在逻辑上却没有明确的方向。
back_translation: "The Flowers of Harrison" is spiritually correct, but it lacks a clear direction logically.

text: as adapted by kevin molony from simon leys ' novel `` the death of napoleon `` and directed by alan taylor , napoleon 's journey is interesting but his parisian rebirth is stillborn
translation: 根据凯文·莫隆尼的改编，自西蒙·莱斯的小说《拿破仑之死》并由阿兰·泰勒导演，拿破仑的旅程很有趣，但他的巴黎重生却是死胎。
back_translation: Based on Kevin Moroney's adaptation of Simon Leys' novel "The Death of Napoleon" and directed by Alain Taylor, Napoleon's journey is interesting, but his rebirth in Paris is stillborn.

text: the movie is a lumbering load of hokum but . . . it 's at least watchable .
translation: 这部电影是一堆笨重的胡说八道，但……至少还能看。
back_translation: This movie is a load of heavy nonsense, but... at least it's watchable.

text: . . . ambition is in short supply in the cinema , and egoyan tackles his themes and explores his characters ' crises with seriousness and compassion .
translation: ……在电影中，抱负供不应求，而埃戈扬严肃而富有同情心地处理他的主题，探索他的人物危机。
back_translation: In the film, ambition is in short supply, and Egoyan treats his subjects with seriousness and compassion, exploring the crises of his characters.

text: a documentary examining the december 2nd , 1999 assassination of microsoft ceo bill gates in los angeles , and the group of key players seeking to unravel the mystery of his alleged assassin as well as the circumstances surrounding his death .
translation: 一部纪录片，探讨1999年12月2日微软首席执行官比尔·盖茨在洛杉矶遭刺杀的事件，以及一群关键参与者试图揭开其被指控的刺客及其死亡背景的谜团。
back_translation: A documentary exploring the assassination of Microsoft CEO Bill Gates in Los Angeles on December 2, 1999, and the efforts of a group of key participants to unravel the mystery surrounding the alleged assassin and the circumstances of his death.

text: this orange has some juice , but it 's far from fresh-squeezed .
translation: 这个橙子有一些果汁，但远不新鲜。
back_translation: This orange has some juice, but it's far from fresh.

text: director dan verete uses his camera as the metaphoric needle , and his cast in each segment as his thread , to form a sweeping tapestry of mis-explanation and contention .
translation: 导演丹·维瑞特将他的相机作为隐喻的针，将每个部分的演员作为线，编织出一幅关于误解释和争议的宏伟挂毯。
back_translation: Director Dan Verret uses his camera as a metaphorical needle, weaving a grand tapestry about misinterpretation and controversy with the actors in each part serving as the threads.

text: it centers on inez macbeth ( dominique swain ) , a wisp of a girl just a shade over twenty , who may lack a formal education , but has already been taught plenty by life .
translation: 故事围绕伊内兹·麦克白（多米尼克·斯温饰）展开，她是一个稍微超过二十岁的娇弱女孩，虽然缺乏正式的教育，但已通过生活学到了很多。
back_translation: The story revolves around Inez Macbeth (played by Dominique Swain), a delicate girl in her early twenties who, despite lacking formal education, has learned a lot from life.

text: if you like quirky , odd movies and/or the ironic , here 's a fun one .
translation: 如果你喜欢奇特、古怪的电影和/或讽刺类型，这里有一部很有趣的影片。
back_translation: If you enjoy peculiar, quirky movies and/or satire, here is a very interesting film.

text: a fine documentary can be distinguished from a mediocre one by the better film 's ability to make its subject interesting to those who are n't part of its supposed target audience . judging by those standards , 'scratch ' is a pretty decent little documentary .
translation: 一部优秀的纪录片可以通过其让不属于预期目标观众的人也对其主题产生兴趣的能力来区别于平庸的纪录片。按照这些标准，《Scratch》是一部相当不错的小纪录片。
back_translation: An excellent documentary can be distinguished from an average one by its ability to generate interest in its theme among viewers who may not belong to the intended target audience. By these standards, "Scratch" is quite a good short documentary.

text: a very funny look at how another culture handles the process of courting and marriage .
translation: 对另一种文化如何处理求爱和婚姻过程的非常有趣的观察。
back_translation: A very interesting observation on how another culture handles the process of courtship and marriage.

text: at the last minute a cyber-friend arrives to join the battle .
translation: 在最后一刻，一个网络朋友赶来加入战斗。
back_translation: At the last moment, an online friend rushed in to join the fight.

text: even if you do n't think [ kissinger 's ] any more guilty of criminal activity than most contemporary statesmen , he 'd sure make a courtroom trial great fun to watch .
translation: 即使你不认为基辛格比大多数当代政治家更有罪，观看他的法庭审判肯定会很有趣。
back_translation: Even if you don't think Kissinger is more guilty than most contemporary politicians, it would definitely be interesting to watch his trial.

text: when sang-woo 's mother finds work and finally returns for him , sang-woo has become a different boy .
translation: 当尚宇的母亲找到工作并最终回来找他时，尚宇已经变成了一个不同的男孩。
back_translation: When Shangyu's mother found a job and eventually came back to look for him, Shangyu had already become a different boy.

text: women prisoners strike up a friendship with a young law student who works as a part-time prison guard .
translation: 女囚与一名兼职监狱看守的年轻法学生建立了友谊。
back_translation: A female prisoner forms a friendship with a young law student who works part-time as a prison guard.

text: soledad , the desert artist who accompanies hilary home , hopes this trip will be the start of their new life together .
translation: 索莱达，这位陪伴希拉里回家的沙漠艺术家，希望这次旅行能成为他们共同新生活的开始。
back_translation: Soledad, the desert artist who accompanied Hillary home, hopes this trip can mark the beginning of their new life together.

text: consider the title 's clunk-on-the-head that suggests the overtime someone put in to come up with an irritatingly unimaginative retread concept .
translation: 考虑这个标题“砸在头上的声音”，它暗示了某人在想出一个令人烦恼的、没有想象力的重做概念时所付出的加班努力。
back_translation: Consider the title "The Sound that Falls on Your Head"; it suggests the overtime effort someone puts in when coming up with a frustrating and uninspired redo concept.

text: the people may be drawn comically , but the animals are rendered with skill and grace and the action scenes achieve true excitement .
translation: 人们的表现可能是搞笑的，但动物的描绘却既技巧高超又优雅，动作场景则真正达到了令人兴奋的程度。
back_translation: People's performances may be funny, but the depiction of animals is both skillful and elegant, and the action scenes truly reach an exciting level.

text: edgar becomes intent on laying down some new rules and turning his coddled son into someone who can take on the family farm .
translation: 埃德加决心制定一些新规则，把他宠溺的儿子培养成能够承担家庭农场责任的人。
back_translation: Edgar was determined to establish some new rules to raise his pampered son into someone capable of taking on the responsibilities of the family farm.

text: the trail twists and turns until the squad uncovers more than anyone would have ever given them credit for .
translation: 这条小径蜿蜒曲折，直到小队发现了比任何人都更值得他们信赖的事情。
back_translation: This winding path led the small group to discover something more trustworthy than anyone else.

text: the underworld urban angst is derivative of martin scorsese 's taxi driver and goodfellas , but this film speaks for itself .
translation: 地下世界的城市焦虑源于马丁·斯科塞斯的《出租车司机》和《好家伙》，但这部电影本身就有其独特的表达。
back_translation: The urban anxiety of the underground world originates from Martin Scorsese's "Taxi Driver" and "Goodfellas," but this film has its own unique expression.

text: when he meets a beauty , renee ( izabella miko ) , who says she 's reincarnated he must confront his beliefs .
translation: 当他遇到一位美丽的女子瑞妮（伊莎贝拉·米科）时，她说自己是转世，他必须面对自己的信仰。
back_translation: When he meets a beautiful woman named Reni (Isabella Miko), she claims to be a reincarnation, and he must confront his beliefs.

text: and keeping their heads on their necks will become their main concern . . .
translation: 保持他们脖子上的头将成为他们最关心的问题……
back_translation: Keeping their heads on their necks will become their biggest concern...

text: if you enjoy being rewarded by a script that assumes you are n't very bright , then blood work is for you .
translation: 如果你喜欢被一部假设你不太聪明的剧本所奖赏，那么血液检测适合你。
back_translation: If you enjoy being rewarded by a script that assumes you're not very smart, then blood tests are for you.

text: an entertaining documentary that freshly considers arguments the bard 's immortal plays were written by somebody else .
translation: 一部娱乐性的纪录片，新颖地探讨了关于这位诗人的不朽戏剧是由其他人创作的论点。
back_translation: An entertaining documentary that innovatively explores the argument that the immortal drama of this poet was created by others.

text: we open on the main character alex , a chef , put out by her effort for the shower and struggling with her desire to make things `` picture-perfect . ``
translation: 故事开始于主角亚历克斯，一位厨师，她因准备洗澡而感到疲惫，同时也在努力平衡自己让一切“完美如画”的渴望。
back_translation: The story begins with the protagonist Alex, a chef, who feels exhausted as she prepares to take a shower, while also struggling to balance her desire to make everything "picture-perfect."

text: city by the sea is the cinematic equivalent of defensive driving : it 's careful , conscientious and makes no major mistakes . but what saves lives on the freeway does not necessarily make for persuasive viewing .
translation: 海边的城市是防御性驾驶的电影版：谨慎、周到，没有大的失误。但在高速公路上拯救生命的方法并不一定能带来引人入胜的观影体验。
back_translation: The coastal city is the movie version of defensive driving: cautious, thoughtful, and without major mistakes. However, the methods of saving lives on the highway do not necessarily lead to an engaging viewing experience.

text: it may be an easy swipe to take , but this barbershop just does n't make the cut .
translation: 这家理发店可能很容易选择，但就是没能达到标准。
back_translation: This barber shop may be easy to choose, but it just doesn't meet the standards.

text: tim plans to spend his 21st birthday at his scottish estate with eight of his closest friends .
translation: 蒂姆计划和他八个最亲密的朋友在他的苏格兰庄园庆祝他的21岁生日。
back_translation: Tim plans to celebrate his 21st birthday at his Scottish estate with his eight closest friends.

text: as the police try to piece together what happened , the convoluted relationship between a young woman and her two suitors gradually emerges .
translation: 随着警方试图拼凑发生的事情，一名年轻女子与她的两个追求者之间错综复杂的关系逐渐浮出水面。
back_translation: As the police attempt to piece together what happened, a complex relationship between a young woman and her two suitors gradually comes to light.

text: it 's been 13 months and 295 preview screenings since i last walked out on a movie , but resident evil really earned my indignant , preemptive departure .
translation: 距离我上次在看电影时离场已经过去了13个月和295场预映，但《生化危机》确实让我决意愤然离开。
back_translation: It has been 13 months and 295 screenings since I last left a movie, but "Resident Evil" really made me decide to leave in anger.

text: he needs their help , figuring out why the vacationers are leaving mellow and sober .
translation: 他需要他们的帮助，弄清楚为什么度假者们离开时显得轻松而清醒。
back_translation: He needs their help to figure out why the vacationers seemed relaxed and alert when they left.

text: the plot goes on with a lot of action scenes and many revelations , following the comic books .
translation: 故事情节充满了许多动作场景和众多揭示，遵循漫画书的内容。
back_translation: The storyline is filled with many action scenes and numerous revelations, following the content of the comic book.

text: in all , this is a watchable movie that 's not quite the memorable experience it might have been .
translation: 总的来说，这是一部值得一看的电影，但并不是一个可能会让人铭记的体验。
back_translation: Overall, this is a movie worth watching, but it is not likely to be a memorable experience.

text: his surrounding is a peaceful dreamplace called `` shangri-la `` .
translation: 他的周围是一个名为“香格里拉”的宁静梦幻之地。
back_translation: Around him is a tranquil, dreamlike place called "Shangri-La."

text: adam sandler is to gary cooper what a gnat is to a racehorse .
translation: 亚当·桑德勒对加里·库珀，就像小蚊子对赛马一样。
back_translation: Adam Sandler is to Gary Cooper as a mosquito is to a racehorse.

text: but all their training could n't have prepared them for what they were going to encounter . . .
translation: 但他们的所有训练都无法为他们即将遭遇的事情做好准备……
back_translation: But all their training could not prepare them for what was about to happen...

text: grief is awkward and funny and strange sometimes . so is moonlight mile .
translation: 悲伤有时是 awkward、搞笑和奇怪的。月光里也是如此。
back_translation: Sadness can sometimes be awkward, funny, and strange. The same goes for the moonlight.

text: henceforth , he will meet with unexpected situations that give him the idea for the perfect counterpoint in his plot of the absurd .
translation: 从今往后，他将遇到意想不到的情况，这些情况为他的荒诞情节提供了完美的对立点的构思。
back_translation: From now on, he will encounter unexpected situations that provide a perfect counterpoint to the absurdity of his plot.

text: the fate of the earth depends on the tournaments outcome .
translation: 地球的命运取决于比赛的结果。
back_translation: The fate of the Earth depends on the outcome of the competition.

text: however , ruby 's encounters suffer from impotence and unexplained rashes .
translation: 然而，鲁比的遭遇遭受着无力感和不明的皮疹。
back_translation: However, Ruby's experience is plagued by a sense of powerlessness and an unexplained rash.

text: christin has been working at a hotel owned by budcasso , her friend 's fianc & # 233 ; .
translation: 克里斯汀在一家由她朋友的未婚夫布达卡索拥有的酒店工作。
back_translation: Christine works at a hotel owned by her friend's fiancé, Budakasso.

text: van wilder does n't bring anything new to the proverbial table , but it does possess a coherence absent in recent crass-a-thons like tomcats , freddy got fingered , and slackers .
translation: 《范·懷爾德》並沒有給傳統的電影帶來什麼新鮮元素，但它擁有一種在最近的低俗喜劇如《貓頭鷹》、《弗雷迪被指控》和《遊手好閒》中的缺乏的一致性。
back_translation: "Van Wilder" does not bring any fresh elements to traditional cinema, but it possesses a consistency that is lacking in recent lowbrow comedies such as "The Owl," "Freddy Got Fingered," and "Slackers."

text: although they do n't even exchange glances he tells his friend of a love at first sight relationship between himself and the beautiful veronique .
translation: 尽管他们连眼神都没有交流，他还是告诉他的朋友他和美丽的维罗妮克之间有一种一见钟情的关系。
back_translation: Although they didn't even exchange glances, he still told his friend that he had a love-at-first-sight connection with the beautiful Veronique.

text: the creators of visas and virtue ( 1997 academy award winner , best live action short film ) have embarked on a new journey - the production of independence day .
translation: 《签证与美德》的创作者（1997年奥斯卡获奖影片，最佳真人短片）开始了新的旅程——制作《独立日》。
back_translation: The creator of "Visa and Virtue" (the Oscar-winning film in 1997 for Best Live Action Short) has embarked on a new journey—producing "Independence Day."

text: chasm is a black comedy , set in a time when trading body parts has become commonplace and blinding light and torrential rain overpower the land .
translation: 《深渊》是一部黑色喜剧，设定在一个交易身体部位已成为常态的时代，刺眼的光和倾盆大雨覆盖着大地。
back_translation: "Abyss" is a black comedy set in an era where trading body parts has become the norm, with blinding light and pouring rain covering the land.

text: everything was as superficial as the forced new jersey lowbrow accent uma had .
translation: 一切都像Uma所强迫的纽约低俗口音一样肤浅。
back_translation: Everything is as superficial as the vulgar New York accent that Uma forces.

text: if this movie belonged to a sorority , it would be called beta alpha delta .
translation: 如果这部电影属于一个姐妹会，它会被称为贝塔阿尔法德尔塔。
back_translation: If this movie were part of a sorority, it would be called Beta Alpha Delta.

text: `` garmento `` tells the other side of the story , with a dark and satirical look at new york 's wholesale garment industry , where shady deals are made for a buck and ruthlessness is a prerequisite for career success .
translation: 《garmento》从另一个角度讲述了故事，以黑暗和讽刺的方式审视纽约的批发服装行业，在那里，为了赚取利润而进行阴暗交易，残酷无情是职业成功的先决条件。
back_translation: "Garmento" tells the story from another perspective, examining the wholesale clothing industry in New York with darkness and irony, where shady deals are made to earn profits and ruthless cruelty is a prerequisite for professional success.

text: warren is the outrageous gay hairdresser , alex the shy assistant , steven - the smarmy client and gary , the photographer on the verge of a nervous breakdown .

translation: 还有亨利·科维尔，一个难以捉摸的专业走私酒贩，和拉特·金宁森，魁北克·比尔永远感到沮丧的雇工。
back_translation: There is also Henry Coville, an elusive professional smuggler, and Rat Kinnington, the perpetually frustrated employee of Quebec Bill.

text: the movie 's vision of a white american zealously spreading a puritanical brand of christianity to south seas islanders is one only a true believer could relish .
translation: 这部电影描绘了一个白人美国人热衷于将清教徒品牌的基督教传播给南海岛民的愿景，只有真正的信徒才能享受。
back_translation: This film depicts the vision of a white American who is passionate about spreading Puritan-brand Christianity to the islanders of the South Seas, which can only be enjoyed by true believers.

text: first good , then bothersome . excellent acting and direction .
translation: 先是很好，然后变得烦人。出色的演技和导演。
back_translation: First it was great, then it became annoying. Excellent acting and directing.

text: eddie is a `` normal `` dad , who loves life , his job and most of all family .
translation: 埃迪是一个“正常”的父亲，他热爱生活、热爱工作，最重要的是热爱家庭。
back_translation: Eddie is a "normal" father who loves life, loves his work, and most importantly, loves his family.

text: this dreadfully earnest inversion of the concubine love triangle eschews the previous film 's historical panorama and roiling pathos for bug-eyed mugging and gay-niche condescension .
translation: 这种可怕而认真的妃嫔爱情三角的反转回避了前一部电影的历史全景和翻滚的痛苦，而是选择了夸张的表情和对同性恋小众的居高临下。
back_translation: This terrifying and serious love triangle among the concubines avoids the historical panorama and rolling pain of the previous film, instead choosing exaggerated expressions and a condescending attitude towards the LGBTQ+ minority.

text: astonishingly skillful and moving . . . it could become a historically significant work as well as a masterfully made one .
translation: 令人惊叹的技艺和感人……它可能成为一部历史上具有重大意义的作品，同时也是一部精心制作的作品。
back_translation: The astonishing craftsmanship and emotional impact... it could become a work of significant historical importance, while also being a meticulously crafted piece.

text: [ reno ] delivers a monologue that manages to incorporate both the horror and the absurdity of the situation in a well-balanced fashion .
translation: [Reno] 发表了一段独白，成功地将情境中的恐怖与荒谬以一种良好的平衡方式融入其中。
back_translation: [Reno] delivered a monologue that successfully balanced the horror and absurdity of the situation.

text: as each wait for a bus to new york city it is soon clear they are both hiding dark secrets while running from the past .
translation: 当他们等待前往纽约市的公交车时，很快就明显他们都在隐藏黑暗的秘密，同时逃避过去。
back_translation: As they waited for the bus to New York City, it quickly became obvious that they were all hiding dark secrets while fleeing from the past.

text: transcends its agenda to deliver awe-inspiring , at times sublime , visuals and offer a fascinating glimpse into the subculture of extreme athletes whose derring-do puts the x into the games .
translation: 超越其议程，呈现出令人惊叹、时而崇高的视觉效果，并提供一个诱人的视角，深入极限运动员的亚文化，他们的勇气为这些游戏增添了精彩。
back_translation: Beyond its agenda, it presents stunning and occasionally sublime visuals, offering an enticing perspective that delves into the subculture of extreme athletes, whose bravery adds excitement to these games.

text: the only problem is that `` the tooth fairy `` is getting inside information about graham and his family from none other than dr . lecter .
translation: 唯一的问题是“牙仙”从拉克特博士那里获得了有关格雷厄姆和他家人的内部信息。
back_translation: The only problem is that the "Tooth Fairy" obtained inside information about Graham and his family from Dr. Ractett.

text: the affectionate loopiness that once seemed congenital to demme 's perspective has a tough time emerging from between the badly dated cutesy-pie mystery scenario and the newfangled hollywood post-production effects .
translation: 与德梅的视角似乎天生具备的亲切俏皮感相比，糟糕且过时的可爱小谜题情节与新潮好莱坞后期制作效果之间的对比使得这种感受很难显现出来。
back_translation: Compared to the naturally cheerful and playful feeling of DeMe's perspective, the contrast between the terrible and outdated cute puzzle plot and the trendy Hollywood post-production effects makes it difficult for this feeling to emerge.

text: a delicate balance of nostalgia and contemporary themes win out over scripting pregnant with cinematic schmaltz .
translation: 怀旧与当代主题之间的微妙平衡胜过充满电影陈词滥调的剧本。
back_translation: The subtle balance between nostalgia and contemporary themes surpasses a script filled with cinematic clichés.

text: as a young teenager , he finds out who his father is .
translation: 作为一个年轻的青少年，他发现了自己的父亲是谁。
back_translation: As a young teenager, he discovered who his father was.

text: the film is a poignant story about a unique relationship between a grandfather and his grandson before the boys bar mitzvah .
translation: 这部电影讲述了一段感人至深的故事，讲述了一位祖父与他的孙子之间在男孩巴米茨瓦之前的独特关系。
back_translation: This movie tells a deeply touching story about the unique relationship between a grandfather and his grandson before the boy's bar mitzvah.

text: the story of mitchell , a ten-year-old african american who lives with his mom in a crack-infested hotel in downtown l . a . mitchell misses the school bus one day and quickly becomes the property of chris ; a suicidal drug dealer who might be losing his mind .
translation: 故事讲述了十岁的非裔美国人米切尔，他和母亲住在洛杉矶市中心一个毒品猖獗的酒店里。一天，米切尔错过了校车，随即成为了克里斯的财产；克里斯是一个可能精神失常的自杀倾向的毒贩。
back_translation: The story follows ten-year-old African American Mitchell, who lives with his mother in a drug-ridden hotel in downtown Los Angeles. One day, Mitchell misses the school bus and subsequently becomes the property of Chris; Chris is a drug dealer who may be mentally unstable and has suicidal tendencies.

text: an art whose medium is one of flesh and bone .
translation: 一种以肉体和骨骼为媒介的艺术。
back_translation: An art mediated by flesh and bone.

text: here , they return stateside on a hospital ship , each with their own wounds , and the movie follows their intertwined and separate destinies .
translation: 他们乘坐一艘医院船返回美国，每个人都有自己的创伤，这部电影追随着他们交织又各自独立的命运。
back_translation: They returned to the United States on a hospital ship, each carrying their own traumas. The film follows their intertwined yet independent destinies.

text: but it seems they are brought back as one for more than just solving a case .
translation: 但看起来他们被召回不仅仅是为了破案。
back_translation: But it seems they were called back not just to solve the case.

text: it 's unfortunate that wallace , who wrote gibson 's braveheart as well as the recent pearl harbor , has such an irrepressible passion for sappy situations and dialogue .
translation: 令人遗憾的是，沃莱斯不仅为吉布森执导的《勇敢的心》写过剧本，还参与了最近的《珍珠港》，但他对感情纠葛和煽情对话有着难以抑制的热情。
back_translation: Unfortunately, Wallace not only wrote the script for Gibson's directed "Braveheart," but also participated in the recent "Pearl Harbor," yet he has an uncontrollable passion for emotional entanglements and sentimental dialogue.

text: these efforts lead inez to concoct a desperate scheme involving murder , betrayal , and escape .
translation: 这些努力使伊内兹策划了一个绝望的计划，涉及谋杀、背叛和逃脱。
back_translation: These efforts led Inez to devise a desperate plan involving murder, betrayal, and escape.

text: recoing 's fantastic performance does n't exactly reveal what makes vincent tick , but perhaps any definitive explanation for it would have felt like a cheat .
translation: 雷科宁的精彩表现并没有确切揭示出文森特的动机，但也许任何明确的解释都会让人觉得不真实。
back_translation: Raikkonen's brilliant performance did not clearly reveal Vincent's motives, but perhaps any explicit explanation would feel unrealistic.

text: you might not buy the ideas . but you 'll definitely want the t-shirt .
translation: 你可能不认同这些观点，但你肯定会想要那件T恤。
back_translation: You may not agree with these views, but you will definitely want that T-shirt.

text: the terrorist must destroy any genetic remains on the junkie to keep the key to her code a secret .
translation: 恐怖分子必须摧毁瘾君子身上的任何遗传物质，以保持她密码的秘密。
back_translation: Terrorists must destroy any genetic material on the addict to keep her code a secret.

text: it 's as raw and action-packed an experience as a ringside seat at a tough-man contest .
translation: 它就像在拳赛现场席上观看一场硬汉比赛一样，原始而充满刺激。
back_translation: It's like watching a tough guy match live at a boxing event, raw and full of excitement.

text: a well-made and often lovely depiction of the mysteries of friendship .
translation: 对友谊之谜的精美且常常令人愉悦的描绘。
back_translation: A beautiful and often delightful depiction of the mystery of friendship.

text: one of the best films of the year with its exploration of the obstacles to happiness faced by five contemporary individuals . . . a psychological masterpiece .
translation: 这是年度最佳影片之一，探讨了五位当代个体面临的幸福障碍……一部心理杰作。
back_translation: This is one of the best films of the year, exploring the happiness obstacles faced by five contemporary individuals... a psychological masterpiece.

text: 'rare birds ' tries to force its quirkiness upon the audience .
translation: 《稀有鸟类》试图将其古怪强加给观众。
back_translation: "Rare Birds" attempts to impose its eccentricity on the audience.

text: the script , like the character danny , is complex and needs your attention . . .
translation: 这个剧本，像角色丹尼一样，复杂且需要你的关注……
back_translation: This script, like the character Danny, is complex and requires your attention...

text: not only is his business booming , he is also hired by the governor to kill another inmate in return for an early release .
translation: 不仅他的生意蒸蒸日上，他还被州长雇佣去杀死另一名囚犯，以换取提前释放。
back_translation: Not only is his business thriving, but he was also hired by the governor to kill another inmate in exchange for early release.

text: if i have to choose between gorgeous animation and a lame story ( like , say , treasure planet ) or so-so animation and an exciting , clever story with a batch of appealing characters , i 'll take the latter every time .
translation: 如果让我在华丽的动画和无聊的故事（就像《宝藏星球》那样）之间选择，或是动画一般但故事激动人心、聪明有趣且角色吸引人的选项，我每次都会选择后者。
back_translation: If I had to choose between gorgeous animation and a boring story (like "Treasure Planet"), or an animation that is average but has an exciting, clever, and interesting story with engaging characters, I would choose the latter every time.

text: what he does n't expect is to get teamed up with a cocky civilian , world class boxing champion kelly robinson ( eddie murphy ) , on a dangerous top secret espionage mission .
translation: 他没有料到的是，在一次危险的最高机密间谍任务中，他会与一个自大的平民、世界级拳击冠军凯利·罗宾逊（埃迪·墨菲）搭档。
back_translation: What he didn't expect was that during a dangerous top-secret spy mission, he would team up with an arrogant civilian, world-class boxing champion Kelly Robinson (Eddie Murphy).

text: a skillfully made example of your typical schwarzenegger action film .
translation: 一部制作精良的典型施瓦辛格动作片的范例。
back_translation: A well-produced example of a typical Schwarzenegger action film.

text: the colorful cast of characters includes the addlepated cafe owner , freddy , picasso 's sexy young femme dujour , his pompous art dealer , and a mysterious visitor from the future .
translation: 色彩斑斓的人物角色包括头脑发热的咖啡馆老板弗雷迪、毕加索性感的年轻女主角、他自大的艺术经纪人，以及一个来自未来的神秘访客。
back_translation: The colorful characters include the hot-headed café owner Freddy, the sexy young protagonist inspired by Picasso, his arrogant art dealer, and a mysterious visitor from the future.

text: this is riveting stuff , especially in its account of how refugee culture and community spring up almost overnight .
translation: 这真是令人着迷的内容，特别是在描述难民文化和社区如何几乎在一夜之间涌现时。
back_translation: This is truly fascinating content, especially in describing how refugee cultures and communities can emerge almost overnight.

text: the combination of lightness and strictness in this instance gives italian for beginners an amiable aimlessness that keeps it from seeming predictably formulaic .
translation: 在这个例子中，轻松与严谨的结合使《意大利语初学者》呈现出一种友好的无目的性，从而避免给人一种可预测的公式化印象。
back_translation: In this example, the combination of ease and rigor gives "Italian for Beginners" a friendly aimlessness, thereby avoiding a predictable and formulaic impression.

text: things begin to go wrong when they are given a handgun to reward their success in the new job .
translation: 事情开始出错是因为他们被给予了一把手枪作为新工作的成功奖励。
back_translation: The trouble started when they were given a handgun as a reward for their success in the new job.

text: the viewer takes great pleasure in watching the resourceful molly stay a step ahead of her pursuers .
translation: 观众在观看机智的莫莉始终领先于追捕者时，感到非常愉悦。
back_translation: The audience feels very pleased while watching the clever Molly always stay ahead of her pursuers.

text: the film follows the story of duncan , a fourteen-year old misfit farm boy trying to fill the void and alleviate the numbness left by his mother 's passing .
translation: 这部电影讲述了十四岁的农场男孩邓肯的故事，他试图填补因母亲去世而留下的空虚和麻木感。
back_translation: This movie tells the story of a fourteen-year-old farm boy named Duncan, who tries to fill the void and numbness left by his mother's death.

text: good for a few unintentional laughs , `` extreme ops `` was obviously made for the `` xxx `` crowd , people who enjoy mindless action without the benefit of decent acting , writing , and direction .
translation: 《极限特工》显然是为了“成人”观众而制作的，适合喜欢无脑动作的人，没有优秀的表演、编剧和导演的加持，偶尔还能带来几分无意的笑声。
back_translation: "XXX: State of the Union" is clearly made for an "adult" audience, suitable for those who enjoy mindless action. It lacks excellent performances, writing, and directing, but occasionally manages to bring a few unintended laughs.

text: works as another uncompromisingly adult movie that assumes its audience is intelligent and does n't have to cut narrative corners to make viewers feel safe .
translation: 这部作品是一部绝对成熟的电影，假设观众是聪明的，不需要为了让观众感到安全而在叙事上走捷径。
back_translation: This work is an absolutely mature film, assuming that the audience is intelligent and does not need shortcuts in the narrative to feel safe.

text: it all starts to smack of a hallmark hall of fame , with a few four letter words thrown in that are generally not heard on television .
translation: 这一切开始让人觉得像是霍尔马克名人堂，只是偶尔夹杂了一些在电视上通常听不到的四个字母的脏话。
back_translation: All of this starts to feel like a Hallmark Hall of Fame, occasionally mixed with some four-letter words that you usually wouldn't hear on television.

text: after making an incredible career in the international narcotics world during 1984-1992 , bettien was arrested at piazza navona in rome as one of the targets of the international police operation `` green ice `` .
translation: 在1984年至1992年期间，在国际毒品领域取得了令人难以置信的职业生涯后，贝蒂安在罗马的纳沃纳广场被捕，成为国际警察行动“绿冰”的目标之一。
back_translation: After an incredible career in the international drug arena from 1984 to 1992, Betian was arrested in Piazza Navona in Rome and became one of the targets of the international police operation "Green Ice."

text: its juxtaposition of overwrought existentialism and stomach-churning gore will have you forever on the verge of either cracking up or throwing up .
translation: 其夸张的存在主义与令人不适的血腥场面并置，将让你永远处于爆笑或呕吐的边缘。
back_translation: Its exaggerated existentialism juxtaposed with disturbing bloody scenes will keep you on the verge of either laughter or vomiting.

text: but career pressure , burned toast and dirty laundry erode any feelings of tenderness , and they never seem to find enough time for their six-year-old son , benny .
translation: 但是职业压力、焦糊的吐司和脏衣服侵蚀了任何温柔的感觉，他们似乎总是没有足够的时间陪伴他们六岁的儿子本尼。
back_translation: However, the stress from work, burnt toast, and dirty laundry eroded any feelings of tenderness, and they always seemed to lack enough time to spend with their six-year-old son, Benny.

text: the pianist is the film roman polanski may have been born to make .
translation: 《钢琴家》是罗曼·波兰斯基可能注定要拍摄的电影。
back_translation: "The Pianist" is a film that Roman Polanski was perhaps destined to make.

text: based on the 1997 john king novel of the same name with a rather odd synopsis : `` a first novel about a seasoned chelsea football club hooligan who represents a disaffected society operating by brutal rules .
translation: 基于1997年约翰·金同名小说的一个相当奇特的梗概：“这是一本关于一位经验丰富的切尔西足球俱乐部流氓的处女作，他代表了一个在残酷规则下运作的失落社会。”
back_translation: Based on the 1997 novel of the same name by John King, this is a rather peculiar summary: "It is a debut work about an experienced Chelsea Football Club thug, representing a lost society operating under brutal rules."

text: the performances are amiable and committed , and the comedy more often than not hits the bullseye .
translation: 表演亲切且投入，喜剧往往一针见血。
back_translation: The performance is warm and engaging, and the comedy often hits the nail on the head.

text: but roger 's seemingly foolproof world of smooth talk and casual sex begins to unravel when he is paid a surprise visit by his teenager nephew , nick .
translation: 但罗杰看似万无一失的轻松交谈和随意性行为的世界开始崩溃，当他的青少年侄子尼克意外来访时。
back_translation: However, Roger's seemingly foolproof world of casual conversations and random hookups begins to crumble when his teenage nephew Nick unexpectedly drops by.

text: it has the charm of the original american road movies , feasting on the gorgeous , ramshackle landscape of the filmmaker 's motherland .
translation: 它拥有原版美国公路电影的魅力，沉醉于导演家乡那美丽而破旧的景观中。
back_translation: It possesses the charm of the original American road movie, reveling in the beautiful yet dilapidated landscapes of the director's hometown.

text: her building 's doorman ( newhart ) quickly shows her the ways and workings of our nation 's capital .
translation: 她所在大楼的门卫（纽哈特）迅速向她展示了我们国家首都的运作方式和规则。
back_translation: The building's doorman (Newhart) quickly showed her how the capital of our country operates and its rules.

text: joe hickley thinks he 's got a great scheme : kidnap the child of rich parents , hold it for 24 hours , keeping the mother under his control while an accomplice gets the ransom from the father , who is on a trip .
translation: 乔·希克利认为他有一个好办法：绑架富有父母的孩子，拘留24小时，同时控制母亲，让一个同伙从正在旅行的父亲那里获取赎金。
back_translation: Joe Hickley thinks he has a good idea: to kidnap the children of wealthy parents, hold them for 24 hours, while controlling the mother, and have an accomplice get the ransom from the father who is traveling.

text: the story follows mirabelle , a disenchanted salesgirl and aspiring artist who sells gloves and accessories at neiman marcus .
translation: 这个故事讲述了米拉贝尔，一个失望的售货员和有抱负的艺术家，她在尼曼·马库斯出售手套和配饰。
back_translation: This story tells about Mirabel, a dissatisfied salesperson and aspiring artist, who sells gloves and accessories at Neiman Marcus.

text: pretension , in its own way , is a form of bravery . for this reason and this reason only -- the power of its own steadfast , hoity-toity convictions -- chelsea walls deserves a medal .
translation: 自负在某种意义上是一种勇气。正因如此，仅仅因为它那坚定而自负的信念，切尔西墙值得一枚奖牌。
back_translation: In a sense, self-confidence is a kind of courage. For this reason, Chelsea's wall deserves a medal solely because of its strong and confident belief.

text: often demented in a good way , but it is an uneven film for the most part .
translation: 通常以一种好的方式疯狂，但总体来看这部电影不太均衡。
back_translation: It's usually crazily good in a way, but overall this movie is not very balanced.

text: after john anderton lost his son to a crime a six years ago , he took up drugs , and works the precog division like nobody else .
translation: 在约翰·安德顿六年前失去儿子于一桩罪案后，他开始吸毒，并在先知部门工作得如同其他人无法相比。
back_translation: Six years after John Anderton lost his son in a crime, he began using drugs and worked in the precrime department like no one else could.

text: christian taylor , a writer on hit tv series six feet under , is being profiled by a british documentary crew when he 's sacked , though he does n't know they 've overheard the firing .
translation: 克里斯蒂安·泰勒，一位在热门电视剧《六尺之下》上工作的编剧，正被一个英国纪录片组进行采访，当他被解雇时，却不知道他们已经偷听到了解雇的过程。
back_translation: Christian Taylor, a writer working on the hit TV show "Six Feet Under," is being interviewed by a British documentary crew when he is fired, unaware that they have overheard the entire termination process.

text: an annoying orgy of excess and exploitation that has no point and goes nowhere .
translation: 一个令人烦恼的奢靡和剥削的狂欢，没有意义，也没有目的。
back_translation: A frustrating revelry of luxury and exploitation, devoid of meaning and purpose.

text: kat and shaun are both bandleaders struggling to make a name for themselves in the contemporary music industry .
translation: 凯特和肖恩都是乐队领袖，在当代音乐行业中努力争取名声。
back_translation: Kate and Sean are both band leaders striving for fame in the contemporary music industry.

text: he returns with his wife , mercedes , an argentinean he met in spain , and his two adolescent children , mateo and cayetana , born in the same country and forced into a land they know only throught the biased tales of their parents .
translation: 他和妻子梅赛德斯一起回来了，梅赛德斯是他在西班牙认识的阿根廷人，还有他们的两个青少年孩子，马泰奥和凯耶塔娜，他们出生在同一个国家，却被迫来到一个他们只通过父母的偏见故事了解的土地。
back_translation: He returned with his wife Mercedes, an Argentine woman he met in Spain, along with their two teenage children, Mateo and Cayetana. They were born in the same country but were forced to come to a land they only knew through the biased stories told by their parents.

text: if the very concept makes you nervous . . . you 'll have an idea of the film 's creepy , scary effectiveness .
translation: 如果这个概念让你感到紧张……你就会明白这部电影令人毛骨悚然、恐怖的效果。
back_translation: If this concept makes you feel anxious... you'll understand the chilling and terrifying effect of this film.

text: watching les destinM-ies , whose pace may not be for everyone , is to be virtually part of the creative process .
translation: 观看《命运》，尽管其节奏可能并不适合所有人，但实际上是在参与创作过程。
back_translation: Watching "Destiny," even though its pace may not suit everyone, is actually participating in the creative process.

text: dizzy then gets noticed by the head cheerleader , danielle , and helps the school football team gain self-respect to win games .
translation: 然后，Dizzy 引起了校队拉拉队长 Danielle 的注意，并帮助学校足球队赢得自尊并赢得比赛。

text: with a completely predictable plot , you 'll swear that you 've seen it all before , even if you 've never come within a mile of the longest yard .

text: unfortunately , the insurance would not cover his son 's transplant .
translation: 不幸的是，保险不会覆盖他儿子的移植手术。

text: franco agonizaba y el pr & # 237 ; ncipe , jefe de estado en funciones , se encontraba en una posici & # 243 ; n dif & # 237 ; cil para afrontar un problema fundamental .
translation: 弗朗哥正在奄奄一息，而王子，现任国家首脑，正面临一个难以解决的根本问题。

text: when warren secretly discovers a wedding dress hidden in toni 's closet , he realizes he has some serious decisions to make .

text: as a film director , labute continues to improve .

text: watching the so-called powerful falling on their own petards is a venal pleasure , yet it also serves as a life lesson .

back_translation: Watching the so-called strong suffer the consequences of their actions is a shameful pleasure, but it is also a lesson in life.

text: the film flat lines when it should peak and is more missed opportunity and trifle than dark , decadent truffle .
translation: 这部电影在应该达到高潮的时候变得平淡，更多的是错失良机和轻浮，而不是黑暗、颓废的松露。
back_translation: This movie becomes mundane at the point where it should reach its climax, marked more by missed opportunities and frivolity rather than the dark, bleak truffles.

text: ryan plays a lonely new york woman who discovers the darker side of passion after becoming involved with a tough homicide detective who is investigating a series of murders in her neighborhood .
translation: 瑞安扮演一位孤独的纽约女性，她在与一位调查她所在社区一系列谋杀案件的强硬 homicide 侦探交往后，发现了激情的另一面。
back_translation: Rui An plays a lonely New York woman who discovers another side of passion after dating a tough homicide detective investigating a series of murder cases in her community.

text: though a capable thriller , somewhere along the way k-19 jettisoned some crucial drama .
translation: 虽然是一部能干的惊悚片，但在某个时候《K-19》抛弃了一些关键的戏剧性元素。

text: the task of stopping them falls to young detective danny berdan , a man not afraid of bending rules to apprehend his prey .

text: ranging from funny to shattering and featuring some of the year 's best acting , personal velocity gathers plenty of dramatic momentum .
translation: 从搞笑到震撼，并展现了今年一些最优秀的表演，《个人速度》积聚了丰富的戏剧张力。

text: deserves high marks for political courage but barely gets by on its artistic merits .

text: likely to give up their first born before they give up their lodge , the crowd puts their heads together and come up with not one , but three methods of raising the money .
translation: 他们可能会在放弃他们的住所之前放弃他们的第一个孩子，众人集思广益，想出了不止一种，而是三种筹集资金的方法。

text: the movie understands like few others how the depth and breadth of emotional intimacy give the physical act all of its meaning and most of its pleasure .

text: human nature initially succeeds by allowing itself to go crazy , but ultimately fails by spinning out of control .
translation: 人性最初通过让自己疯狂而取得成功，但最终却因失控而失败。
back_translation: Human nature initially achieves success by driving itself to madness, but ultimately fails due to losing control.

text: waydowntown just like most large cities , is n't somewhere you 'll want to spend the rest of your life , but it sure is a fun place to visit for a while .
translation: 正如大多数大城市一样，Waydowntown 并不是一个你想要度过余生的地方，但它确实是一个值得短暂游玩的有趣地方。

text: nikola , the director , and his friends have to make the choice - whether to compromise with their consciences and their art , ( as normally happens here in the balkans ) , or whether to preserve katerina 's message .
translation: 尼古拉、导演以及他的朋友们必须做出选择——是妥协于他们的良知和艺术（在巴尔干地区通常发生这种情况），还是坚持凯瑟琳娜的信息。
back_translation: Nikola, the director, and his friends must make a choice—whether to compromise their conscience and art (which often happens in the Balkan region) or to stick to Katerina's message.

text: the movie is loaded with good intentions , but in his zeal to squeeze the action and our emotions into the all-too-familiar dramatic arc of the holocaust escape story , minac drains his movie of all individuality .
translation: 这部电影充满了善意，但在他急于将动作和我们的情感压缩到过于熟悉的关于大屠杀逃生故事的戏剧性弧线中时，米纳克使他的电影失去了所有的独特性。

text: looking for a short cut to fame , glass concocted sources , quotes and even entire stories , but his deception did not go unnoticed forever , and eventually , his world came crumbling down . . .
translation: 为了追求名声的捷径，他 concocted 了一些虚假的来源、引语甚至整个故事，但他的欺骗并未永远不被察觉，最终，他的世界崩溃了……

text: ki-duk kim has created a provocatively violent and sexual film with an oddly idyllic sensibility . it 's a mysterious but ultimately rewarding experience .
translation: 金基德创作了一部富有挑衅性的暴力和色情影片，带有一种奇特的田园诗般的敏感性。这是一种神秘但最终令人满意的体验。

text: however , the job his army buddy promised does n't materialize , and he ca n't escape his past .

text: but later that year she was gunned down by assasins hired by the same criminal drug lords she exposed .

text: it 's not a bad plot ; but , unfortunately , the movie is nowhere near as refined as all the classic dramas it borrows from .

text: adaptation is intricately constructed and in a strange way nails all of orlean 's themes without being a true adaptation of her book .

text: steve quickly discovers that burt can not even provide temporary lodging , but an administrator at his new high school directs him to a shelter for runaway kids where he soon learns to navigate his way .

text: but as the roles get bigger , the competition gets stronger , the stakes get higher , and now with an undercover thespian cop on his trail , max must struggle with his ongoing road to success and the choices he 's made .
translation: 但随着角色的增加，竞争变得愈发激烈，风险也随之加大，而现在随着一名卧底戏剧演员警察的追踪，马克斯必须在通往成功的道路上与自己所做的选择进行斗争。

text: jaunty fun , with its celeb-strewn backdrop well used .
translation: 愉快的乐趣，名人汇聚的背景发挥得淋漓尽致。

text: set during the cull of the stray dogs in the city of bucharest , the wild dogs weaves together a week in the lives of several citizens of and visitors to the hauntingly beautiful city .
translation: 《野犬》以布加勒斯特市流浪狗的捕杀为背景，编织出几位市民和游客在这个 hauntingly beautiful 城市里的一周生活。

text: the faithful will enjoy this sometimes wry adaptation of v . s . naipaul 's novel , but newcomers may find themselves stifling a yawn or two during the first hour .

text: a heartening tale of small victories and enduring hope .

text: death to smoochy is often very funny , but what 's even more remarkable is the integrity of devito 's misanthropic vision .

text: manages in two minutes what malcolm lee 's cousin spike 's bamboozled could n't in over two hours .

text: however , there just might be more to him than meets the eye .
translation: 然而，或许他身上还有更多不为人知的秘密。

translation: 扎实、让人哽咽的家庭娱乐，通过坚持事实来获取力量。

text: keith discovers a new man and a new attitude .
translation: 基思发现了一个新的人和一种新的态度。

text: the sequel drops the adult aspects of the story in favor of talking reindeer and a life-size , plastic santa replacement ( also played by allen ) that is strongly reminiscent of that creepy family from the duracell commercials .
translation: 续集去掉了故事中的成人元素，转而出现会说话的驯鹿和一个与杜拉赛尔广告中那 creepy 家庭非常相似的真人大小的塑料圣诞老人（同样由艾伦饰演）。
back_translation: The sequel removed the adult elements from the story and instead featured a talking reindeer and a life-sized plastic Santa Claus that closely resembles the creepy family from the Duracell commercial (also played by Allen).

text: ca n't kick about the assembled talent and the russos show genuine promise as comic filmmakers . still , this thing feels flimsy and ephemeral .
translation: 无法抨击聚集的人才，鲁索兄弟作为喜剧电影制作人确实展现了真诚的潜力。不过，这部作品仍然感觉脆弱而短暂。

translation: 一位希腊电影制片人（叙述者）在自己国家被军事政府禁止放映他的电影。
back_translation: A Greek filmmaker (the narrator) is prohibited by the military government in his country from screening his film.

text: as expected , sayles ' smart wordplay and clever plot contrivances are as sharp as ever , though they may be overshadowed by some strong performances .
translation: 如预期的那样，赛尔斯的聪明语言游戏和巧妙的情节设计依然锐利，尽管它们可能会被一些强大的表演所掩盖。

text: the will factor vertically splits the gang in two .
translation: 意志因素在垂直上将帮派分成两部分。

text: by the time the plot grinds itself out in increasingly incoherent fashion , you might be wishing for a watch that makes time go faster rather than the other way around .
translation: 当情节以越来越不连贯的方式展开时，你可能会希望有一只让时间过得更快的手表，而不是相反。
back_translation: When the plot unfolds in an increasingly incoherent manner, you may wish for a watch that makes time go by faster, rather than the opposite.

text: director oliver parker labors so hard to whip life into the importance of being earnest that he probably pulled a muscle or two .
translation: 导演奥利弗·帕克拼尽全力让《无足轻重的严肃性》充满生机，以至于他可能扭伤了几根肌肉。
back_translation: Director Oliver Parker has put in every effort to make "The Importance of Being Earnest" lively to the point that he may have strained a few muscles.

text: things got out of hand and led to a tragic ending .
translation: 事情失控，导致了悲惨的结局。
back_translation: Things got out of control, resulting in a tragic ending.

text: sound the trumpets : for the first time since desperately seeking susan , madonna does n't suck as an actress .
translation: 吹响号角：自《疯狂寻找苏珊》以来，麦当娜作为演员终于不再糟糕。
back_translation: Sound the horn: Since "Desperately Seeking Susan," Madonna has finally stopped being terrible as an actress.

text: guy gets girl , guy loses girl , audience falls asleep .
translation: 男孩追女孩，男孩失去女孩，观众开始打瞌睡。
back_translation: The boy chases the girl, the boy loses the girl, and the audience starts to doze off.

text: father benito has been receiving financial help from the region 's drug lord for the construction of a new health clinic .
translation: 贝尼托神父一直在接受该地区毒枭的财务支持，用于建设新的健康诊所。
back_translation: Father Benito has been receiving financial support from drug lords in the region to build new health clinics.

text: payne constructs a hilarious ode to middle america and middle age with this unlikely odyssey , featuring a pathetic , endearing hero who is all too human .
translation: 佩恩以这场不太可能的奥德赛构建了一首幽默的颂歌，描绘了中美和中年生活，故事中的英雄既可怜又令人喜爱，展现了人性的一面。
back_translation: Payne constructs a humorous ode through this unlikely odyssey, depicting Sino-American relations and middle-aged life, with a hero in the story who is both pitiable and lovable, showcasing a facet of humanity.

text: using surveillance , bribery and conspiracy , han 's blonde and busty investigative reporter , fallopia wigglesworth spins a bizarre web of deceit to net her young and vulnerable prey .
translation: 利用监视、贿赂和阴谋，汗的金发丰满女记者法洛皮亚·维格尔斯沃斯编织了一张奇怪的欺骗网，以捕获她年轻而脆弱的猎物。
back_translation: Using surveillance, bribery, and conspiracy, the blonde and voluptuous reporter Falopia Wiggelsworth has woven a strange web of deception to ensnare her young and vulnerable prey.

text: as night falls , the terrified group of young athletes must fight their own fears and prejudices and come together in a seemingly hopeless struggle asainst a winged nightmare , hellbent on stockpiling as many victims as it can on the ultimate night of its grizzly , ritual feast .
translation: 随着夜幕降临，这群年轻运动员感到恐惧，他们必须战胜自己的恐惧和偏见，团结在一起，面对一场看似绝望的斗争，抵抗一只翅膀可怕的噩梦，誓言在其可怕仪式的盛宴之夜尽可能多地囤积牺牲品。
back_translation: As night falls, this group of young athletes feels fear; they must overcome their own fears and prejudices, unite together to face a seemingly hopeless struggle, resisting a terrifying nightmare with wings, vowing to stockpile as many sacrifices as possible on the night of its dreadful ritual feast.

text: though the material sounds complex and potentially sleep-inducing , director robert j . siegel paints his portrait of boredom and discontent with deft strokes .
translation: 尽管材料听起来复杂且可能令人昏昏欲睡，但导演罗伯特·J·西格尔用灵巧的笔触描绘了无聊和不满的肖像。
back_translation: Although the material may sound complex and potentially boring, director Robert J. Siegel skillfully portrays a picture of boredom and dissatisfaction.

text: the movie suffers from two fatal ailments -- a dearth of vitality and a story that 's shapeless and uninflected .
translation: 这部电影存在两个致命的问题——缺乏活力和一个没有形状且没有情感的故事。
back_translation: This movie has two fatal problems - a lack of energy and a shapeless, emotionless story.

text: the animation merely serves up a predictable , maudlin story that swipes heavily from bambi and the lion king , yet lacks the emotional resonance of either of those movies .
translation: 这部动画仅仅提供了一个可预测、感伤的故事， heavily借鉴了《小鹿斑比》和《狮子王》，却缺乏这两部电影的情感共鸣。
back_translation: This animation merely offers a predictable, sentimental story, heavily borrowing from "Bambi" and "The Lion King," yet lacking the emotional resonance of these two films.

text: but billy still has memories of a wife who cheated on him .
translation: 但是比利仍然对一个背叛他的妻子有着记忆。
back_translation: But Billy still has memories of a wife who betrayed him.

text: irish eyes are crying explores the relationship between two irish-american brothers in boston born to immigrant parents and raised in a rough , working class irish neighborhood .
translation: 《爱尔兰人的眼泪》探讨了波士顿两位爱尔兰裔美国兄弟之间的关系，他们出生于移民家庭，并在一个艰苦的工人阶级爱尔兰社区中成长。
back_translation: "The Tears of the Irishman" explores the relationship between two Irish-American brothers in Boston, born into an immigrant family and raised in a tough working-class Irish community.

text: this is as respectful a film as byatt fans could hope for , though lovers of the book may wonder why it 's necessary .
translation: 这部电影是比亚特粉丝所能希望的最具尊重的作品，尽管书迷可能会想知道这部电影为何是必要的。
back_translation: This film is the most respectful work that Beatles fans could hope for, although book lovers might wonder why this movie is necessary.

text: soon , annie 's condition helps leoncio 's children realize the essence of a family .
translation: 很快，安妮的情况帮助莱昂西奥的孩子们领悟了家庭的本质。
back_translation: Soon, Annie's situation helped Leoncio's children understand the essence of family.

text: the movie is so contrived , nonsensical and formulaic that , come to think of it , the day-old shelf would be a more appropriate location to store it .
translation: 这部电影如此矫揉造作、荒谬且公式化，仔细想想，放在过期货架上更合适。
back_translation: This movie is so pretentious, ridiculous, and formulaic that, upon reflection, it would be better suited on an outdated shelf.

text: the girl 's lover thinks she 's been kidnapped , and goes looking for her .
translation: 女孩的爱人认为她被绑架了，于是开始寻找她。
back_translation: The girl's lover believes she has been kidnapped, so he starts searching for her.

text: giving birth to her first child should be a time of happiness for rachel ( emily woof ) , but the dream is shattered when she learns that her newborn baby has died during the night .
translation: 给她第一个孩子的出生应该是瑞秋（艾米丽·伍夫饰）幸福的时刻，但当她得知她的新生儿在夜间去世时，这个梦想破灭了。
back_translation: The birth of her first child was supposed to be a happy moment for Rachel (played by Emily Woof), but when she learns that her newborn has died during the night, that dream is shattered.

text: as a young writer , her fun loving , witty and kind personality represent everything that rio is not .
translation: 作为一名年轻的作家，她那热爱生活、机智幽默和善良的个性代表了里约所有的对立。
back_translation: As a young writer, her love for life, wit, humor, and kindness embodies all the contradictions of Rio.
