text: behind every suicide bombing there is at least one human story that ends , the story of the suicide bomber .
translation: 每一次自杀式爆炸背后至少都有一个人的故事结束，那就是自杀炸弹攻击者的故事。
back_translation: Behind every suicide bombing, there is at least one story that comes to an end, and that is the story of the suicide bomber.

text: kitchen scenes playing as obvious and light-hearted metaphors for states of mind and relationships , mostly martha leaves a few elements hanging that it probably should have tidied .
translation: 厨房场景作为心态和人际关系的明显而轻松的隐喻，主要是玛莎留下了一些未处理的元素，这些元素本来应该整理好。
back_translation: The kitchen scene serves as a clear and easy metaphor for mindset and interpersonal relationships, primarily because Martha has left some unaddressed elements that should have been organized.

text: faced with cold , hunger and death , afghan children still try to learn , play and enjoy whatever life offers them .
translation: 在寒冷、饥饿和死亡面前，阿富汗的孩子们仍然努力学习、玩耍，并享受生活提供的一切。
back_translation: In the face of cold, hunger, and death, children in Afghanistan still strive to learn, play, and enjoy everything that life offers.

text: the film serves as a valuable time capsule to remind us of the devastating horror suffered by an entire people .
translation: 这部电影作为一个宝贵的时光胶囊，提醒我们一个民族曾经遭受的毁灭性恐怖。
back_translation: This movie serves as a valuable time capsule, reminding us of the devastating terror that a nation once endured.

text: surprisingly , considering that baird is a former film editor , the movie is rather choppy .
translation: 令人惊讶的是，考虑到贝尔德是一位前电影剪辑师，这部电影的剪辑相当生硬。
back_translation: Surprisingly, considering that Baird is a former film editor, the editing of this film is quite rough.

text: the movie introduces us to frankie ( played by david eigenberg ) a would-be romeo who will put himself though great pains to find his juliet .
translation: 这部电影向我们介绍了弗兰基（由大卫·艾根伯格饰演），一位渴望成为罗密欧的人，他愿意经历巨大的痛苦来寻找他的朱丽叶。
back_translation: This movie introduces us to Frankie (played by David Eichenberg), a man who aspires to be Romeo and is willing to endure great pain in search of his Juliet.

text: when a harvard-educated cia agent is killed during an operation , the secret agency recruits his twin brother ( chris rock ) , an african-american street-wise hustler with no idea what 's coming for him .
translation: 当一名哈佛大学毕业的中央情报局特工在执行任务时被杀，该秘密机构招募了他的双胞胎兄弟（克里斯·洛克饰），一个对即将发生的事情毫不知情的非裔美国街头混混。
back_translation: When a Harvard University graduate and CIA agent is killed while on a mission, the secret agency recruits his twin brother (played by Chris Rock), an African American street hustler who is completely unaware of what is about to happen.

text: an affectionately goofy satire that 's unafraid to throw elbows when necessary . . .
translation: 一部充满深情的滑稽讽刺作品，毫不畏惧地在必要时出手相向……
back_translation: A deeply emotional satirical work that fearlessly strikes back when necessary...

text: stitch as the new family member brings quite some action into all their lifes , and after a while , not even pleakley and dr . jookiba can recognize their former target .
translation: 斯蒂奇作为新的家庭成员为他们的生活带来了不少动荡，过了一段时间，连普利克利和朱基医生都无法认出他们以前的目标。
back_translation: Stitch, as the new family member, brought a lot of upheaval to their lives. After a while, even Prickly and Dr. Juki could no longer recognize their former targets.

text: a retired emerald smuggler , robert , is convinced by his contact in brazil to come to rio and assist him with a lucrative deal .
translation: 一位退休的翡翠走私者罗伯特，被他在巴西的联系人说服来到里约，协助他完成一笔丰厚的交易。
back_translation: A retired emerald smuggler named Robert was persuaded by his contact in Brazil to come to Rio to help him complete a lucrative deal.

text: fate deals young orphan matt murdock a strange hand when he is doused with hazardous waste .
translation: 命运给予年轻孤儿马特·穆尔多克一个奇异的际遇，当他被危险废物淋湿时。
back_translation: Fate gives young orphan Matt Murdock a strange encounter when he is splashed with radioactive waste.

text: scorsese does n't give us a character worth giving a damn about .
translation: 斯科塞斯并没有给我们一个值得关心的角色。
back_translation: Scorsese did not give us a character worth caring about.

text: boasts a handful of virtuosic set pieces and offers a fair amount of trashy , kinky fun .
translation: 拥有一 handful 精湛的精彩片段，并提供相当数量的低俗、古怪的乐趣。
back_translation: It has a handful of brilliant moments and provides a considerable amount of lowbrow, quirky fun.

text: yet ridiculed on his views toward aids testing by fellow actors and actresses .
translation: 然而，他对艾滋病检测的看法却遭到了其他演员的嘲笑。
back_translation: However, his views on AIDS testing were ridiculed by other actors.

text: one thing you have to give them credit for : the message of the movie is consistent with the messages espoused in the company 's previous video work .
translation: 有一点必须给他们认可：这部电影传达的消息与公司之前视频作品所宣扬的信息是一致的。
back_translation: One thing that must be acknowledged is that the message conveyed by this film is consistent with the information promoted by the company's previous video works.

text: a movie that amply delivers on the epic promise of its title , entertaining , enlightening , and emboldening viewers with its deceptively simple premise and execution .
translation: 一部充分兑现其标题史诗承诺的电影，以其 deceptively simple 的前提和表现 entertain，enlighten 和 embolden 观众。
back_translation: A film that fully delivers on its epic promise in the title, entertaining, enlightening, and emboldening the audience with its deceptively simple premise and presentation.

text: the film is complex , intricate , interesting and almost hypnotizing , till charlie gets stuck ( the screenplay he 's writing is the one you 're watching ) . glad he had the gonads to do what he did then , but it subtracts from the overall entertainment value .
translation: 这部电影复杂、错综复杂、有趣，几乎让人产生催眠感，直到查理卡住了（他正在写的剧本就是你正在观看的）。很高兴他有勇气去做他当时做的事，但这减损了整体的娱乐价值。
back_translation: This movie is complex, intricate, and interesting, almost creates a hypnotic effect, until Charlie gets stuck (the script he is writing is the one you are watching). It's good that he had the courage to do what he was doing at the time, but this diminishes the overall entertainment value.

text: it 's simply delightful to watch an actor like michel serrault do his stuff .
translation: 看一个像米歇尔·塞拉尔特这样的演员表演，真是令人愉悦。
back_translation: Watching an actor like Michel Serrault perform is truly a delight.

text: stripped almost entirely of such tools as nudity , profanity and violence , labute does manage to make a few points about modern man and his problematic quest for human connection .
translation: 几乎完全剥夺了裸体、粗言秽语和暴力等工具，拉布特仍然设法提出了一些关于现代人及其与人类连接的复杂追求的观点。
back_translation: Almost completely stripped of tools like nudity, profanity, and violence, Labute still manages to present some views on the complex pursuits of modern people and their connections with humanity.

text: it is unclear on how he contracted the virus .
translation: 目前尚不清楚他是如何感染该病毒的。
back_translation: It is currently unclear how he became infected with the virus.

text: there 's a bit of thematic meat on the bones of queen of the damned , as its origins in an anne rice novel dictate , but generally , it 's a movie that emphasizes style over character and substance .
translation: 《被诅咒的女王》在主题上有一些实质内容，毕竟它源于安妮·赖斯的小说，但总的来说，这是一部更注重风格而非角色和内涵的电影。
back_translation: "The Cursed Queen" has some substantial content in its themes, as it is based on Anne Rice's novel. However, overall, it is a film that focuses more on style rather than characters and depth.

text: captures that perverse element of the kafkaesque where identity , overnight , is robbed and replaced with a persecuted `` other . ``
translation: 捕捉到那种异化的卡夫卡式元素，身份在一夜之间被剥夺，并被一个受迫害的“他者”所取代。
back_translation: Capturing that kind of alienated Kafkaesque element, where identity is stripped away overnight and replaced by a persecuted "other."

text: the boy 's obsessive compulsive parents are played by wendie malick and stephen root .
translation: 男孩的强迫症父母由温迪·马利克和史蒂芬·鲁特饰演。
back_translation: The boy's obsessive-compulsive parents are played by Wendy Malick and Stephen Root.

text: 77 minutes of pokemon may not last 4ever , it just seems like it does . my only wish is that celebi could take me back to a time before i saw this movie and i could just skip it .
translation: 77分钟的宝可梦可能不会持续永远，只是感觉上好像会。我的唯一愿望是让塞尔比带我回到我看这部电影之前的时间，这样我就可以跳过它。
back_translation: The 77 minutes of Pokémon might not last forever, it just feels like it will. My only wish is to have Celebi take me back to a time before I watched this movie, so I can skip it.

text: filippo , the official translator , believes in her innocence , and conceives a plan for her escape .
translation: 菲利波，官方翻译，坚信她是无辜的，并为她的逃脱制定了一个计划。
back_translation: Filippo, the official translator, firmly believes she is innocent and has devised a plan for her escape.

text: journeying from the vietnam war to pulaski , tennessee and back to vietnam , daughter from danang tensely unfolds as cultural differences and the years of separation take their toll in a riveting film about longing and the personal legacy of war .
translation: 从越南战争到田纳西州的普拉斯基，再回到越南，来自岘港的女儿紧张地展开了一段旅程，文化差异和多年的分离对她产生了影响，这是一部关于渴望和战争个人遗产的扣人心弦的电影。
back_translation: From the Vietnam War to Pulaski, Tennessee, and back to Vietnam, a daughter from Da Nang nervously embarks on a journey, influenced by cultural differences and years of separation. This is a gripping film about longing and the personal legacy of war.

text: joanna , a young wife and mother , moves from manhattan to the upper-class suburb of stepford , connecticut .
translation: 乔安娜，一位年轻的妻子和母亲，从曼哈顿搬到康涅狄格州的上层阶级郊区斯特夫德。
back_translation: Joanna, a young wife and mother, moves from Manhattan to the upscale suburb of Stepford in Connecticut.

text: this movie is more fun than many of those tall tales that hollywood calls feature films .
translation: 这部电影比好莱坞称之为故事片的那些许多夸张故事更有趣。
back_translation: This movie is more interesting than many of the exaggerated stories that Hollywood calls feature films.

text: skip work to see it at the first opportunity .
translation: 趁第一次机会跳过工作去看看。
back_translation: Take the first opportunity to skip work and go take a look.

text: it comes off as so silly that you would n't be surprised if ba , murdock and rest of the a-team were seen giving chase in a black and red van .
translation: 这听起来太傻了，你不会感到惊讶，如果巴、默多克和其他“特种部队”的成员被看到在一辆黑红色的面包车里追逐。
back_translation: That sounds too silly; you wouldn’t be surprised if Ba, Murdoch, and other members of the "special forces" were seen chasing in a black and red van.

text: they try real deal get rich quick schemes but nothing pans out .
translation: 他们尝试真正的快速致富计划，但都没有成功。
back_translation: They tried real get-rich-quick schemes, but none of them succeeded.

text: denied political-prisoner-of-war status , he initiates a hunger strike .
translation: 他被拒绝了政治战俘身份，开始了绝食抗议。
back_translation: He was denied the status of a political prisoner and began a hunger strike in protest.

text: and that 's what you get when sampling the wonderful idiosyncrasies in this love story on espresso .
translation: 这就是你在品尝这部爱情故事中的美妙特性时所得到的浓缩咖啡的滋味。
back_translation: This is the rich flavor of the espresso you get while savoring the delightful characteristics of this love story.

text: victor ( leguizamo ) , is trying to escape his life as a drug dealer in the south bronx .
translation: 维克多（莱吉扎莫）试图逃离他在南布朗克斯作为毒贩的生活。
back_translation: Victor (Leguizamo) tries to escape his life as a drug dealer in South Bronx.

text: high crimes works to keep us involved and make us care .
translation: 重大罪行让我们保持参与并关心。
back_translation: Serious crimes keep us engaged and concerned.

text: he gives t-mon the gun , while t-mon tries to get the trick right .
translation: 他把枪给了T-Mon，而T-Mon则试图掌握这个技巧。
back_translation: He handed the gun to T-Mon, who then tried to master the skill.

text: the contents of which will decide the fate of a nation .
translation: 其内容将决定一个国家的命运。
back_translation: Its content will determine the fate of a country.

text: has no reason to exist , other than to employ hollywood kids and people who owe favors to their famous parents .
translation: 没有存在的理由，除了雇佣好莱坞的孩子和那些对他们著名父母欠有人情的人。
back_translation: There is no reason for existence, except for hiring Hollywood kids and those who owe favors to their famous parents.

text: secretary `` is owned by its costars , spader and gyllenhaal . maggie g . makes an amazing breakthrough in her first starring role and eats up the screen .
translation: 《秘书》由斯帕德和吉伦哈尔共同主演。梅吉·吉伦哈尔在她的首个主演角色中取得了惊人的突破，充分展现了她的表演魅力。
back_translation: "The Secretary" stars Spade and Gyllenhaal. Maggie Gyllenhaal made an impressive breakthrough in her first leading role, showcasing her acting charisma.

text: a delightful surprise because despite all the backstage drama , this is a movie that tells stories that work -- is charming , is moving , is funny and looks professional .
translation: 一个令人愉快的惊喜，因为尽管有所有的幕后戏剧，这是一部讲述有效故事的电影——迷人、感人、有趣，并且看起来很专业。
back_translation: A delightful surprise, as despite all the behind-the-scenes drama, this is a film that tells an effective story—charming, moving, entertaining, and looks very professional.

text: second in a three-part anthology on relationships between humans and aliens .
translation: 关于人类与外星人关系的三部曲中的第二部。
back_translation: The second part of the trilogy about the relationship between humans and aliens.

text: it is best appreciated as an immersion in a three-dimensional toyland outfitted with enough whimsical gadgetry to fill a thousand playrooms .
translation: 它最被人欣赏的是作为一种沉浸在一个三维玩具乐园中的体验，这个乐园配备了足够填满一千个游乐室的奇幻小玩意。
back_translation: What is most appreciated about it is the experience of being immersed in a three-dimensional toy paradise, equipped with enough whimsical gadgets to fill a thousand playrooms.

text: a distinctly mixed bag , the occasional bursts of sharp writing alternating with lots of sloppiness and the obligatory moments of sentimental ooze .
translation: 这是一种明显的混杂，偶尔会有尖锐的文字闪现，但也夹杂着大量的马虎和必然出现的感伤情绪。
back_translation: This is a clear mixture, with occasional sharp words flashing through, but also filled with a lot of carelessness and inevitably present sentimental emotions.

text: somewhere short of tremors on the modern b-scene : neither as funny nor as clever , though an agreeably unpretentious way to spend ninety minutes .
translation: 在现代B级电影中略逊于《地震》，既不够搞笑也不够聪明，虽然花九十分钟观看也是一种令人愉快的不做作的方式。
back_translation: Slightly inferior to "Earthquake" in modern B-movies, it is neither funny enough nor clever enough, although spending ninety minutes watching it is a pleasantly unpretentious way to pass the time.

text: as their adopted identity grows , the gang tumbles into a downward spiral of excitement , excess and fun .
translation: 随着他们所采纳的身份不断成长，帮派陷入了一场兴奋、过度和乐趣的下行螺旋。
back_translation: As the identities they adopted continued to grow, the gang fell into a downward spiral of excitement, excess, and fun.

text: the movie is beautiful to behold and engages one in a sense of epic struggle -- inner and outer -- that 's all too rare in hollywood 's hastier productions .
translation: 这部电影令人赏心悦目，让人感受到一种史诗般的内外斗争，这在好莱坞匆忙制作的作品中实属罕见。
back_translation: This movie is pleasing to the eye and conveys a sense of epic internal and external conflict, which is rare in hastily produced Hollywood works.

text: it 's pretentious in a way that verges on the amateurish .
translation: 这有点自命不凡，几乎显得有些业余。
back_translation: This is a bit pretentious, almost seeming a little amateurish.

text: in the end , ted bundy 's only justification is the director 's common but unexplored fascination with the frustrated maniac ; there 's no larger point , and little social context .
translation: 最终，泰德·邦迪的唯一辩解是导演对受挫疯狂者的普遍但未被探讨的迷恋；没有更大的意义，也几乎没有社会背景。
back_translation: Ultimately, Ted Bundy's only defense is the general yet unexamined obsession of the director with frustrated maniacs; there is no greater significance and almost no social context.

text: she is married to henry bauford ( linus roache ) son of a wealthy british industrialist , when she encounters nick callahan ( clive owen ) a renegade doctor , whose impassioned plea for help to support his relief efforts in war-torn africa moves her deeply .
translation: 她嫁给了亨利·博福德（林纳斯·罗契饰），他是一个富有的英国工业家的儿子，然而她在遇到流亡医生尼克·卡拉汉（克莱夫·欧文饰）时改变了方向，尼克对她的恳求，支持他在战火纷飞的非洲进行救援工作，深深打动了她。
back_translation: She married Henry Beaufort (played by Linus Roache), the son of a wealthy British industrialist, but her direction changed when she met the exile doctor Nick Callahan (played by Clive Owen). Nick's plea for her support in his rescue work amidst the war-torn Africa deeply moved her.

text: it 's dumb fun slapped silly , a new franchise inspired by the bond films that 's not far from the porn its title promises ; the film is a veritable orgy of outrageous stunts .
translation: 这是一部愚蠢而有趣的影片，受到007电影的启发，并不远离其标题所暗示的色情内容；这部电影是荒谬特技的真正狂欢。
back_translation: This is a silly and funny film, inspired by the 007 movies, and not far from the erotic content implied by its title; the film is a true carnival of absurd stunts.

text: discovering the hard way that their involved in witchcraft .
translation: 发现他们涉及巫术的艰难过程。
back_translation: Discover the difficult process they are involved in with witchcraft.

text: danny is antagonized by undercover narcotics agents ( anthony lapaglia and doug hutchison ) and sadistic dealer pooh bear ( vincent d'onfronio ) .
translation: 丹尼受到卧底毒品探员（安东尼·拉帕利亚和道格·哈奇森）和残忍的毒贩普熊（温森特·多诺弗里奥）的迫害。
back_translation: Danny is persecuted by undercover drug agents (Anthony LaPaglia and Doug Hutchison) and the ruthless drug dealer Puxiong (Vincent D'Onofrio).

text: evergon is ultimately a compelling story about the human condition , exploring a young man 's search for love , steady employment and self-respect .
translation: 《埃尔文》最终是一个引人入胜的关于人类境况的故事，探讨了一位年轻人对爱情、稳定工作的追求和自我尊重的寻求。
back_translation: "Elwin" ultimately is a captivating story about the human condition, exploring a young man's pursuit of love, stable employment, and self-respect.

text: with `` ichi the killer `` , takashi miike , japan 's wildest filmmaker gives us a crime fighter carrying more emotional baggage than batman . . .
translation: 在《杀手一》中，日本最狂野的导演三池崇史为我们展现了一个背负比蝙蝠侠更多情感负担的犯罪斗士。
back_translation: In "Killer 1," Japan's wildest director Takashi Miike presents us with a crime fighter burdened with more emotional weight than Batman.

text: a handsome and talented college student , david morales , is devastated when a bum knee causes him to lose his scholarship to the university of san diego .
translation: 一位英俊且才华横溢的大学生大卫·莫拉莱斯因膝盖受伤而失去了圣地亚哥大学的奖学金，感到非常沮丧。
back_translation: A handsome and talented college student, David Morales, lost his scholarship to the University of San Diego due to a knee injury and felt very frustrated.

text: stir in some language barriers , cultural faux pas and a bright , young japanese female undergrad , and the intensity of the experience heightens to comical proportions .
translation: 在一些语言障碍、文化失误和一位活泼年轻的日本女大学生的混合下，体验的强度变得滑稽可笑。
back_translation: Amid a mix of language barriers, cultural misunderstandings, and a lively young Japanese university student, the intensity of the experience becomes hilariously absurd.

text: a vile , incoherent mess . . . a scummy ripoff of david cronenberg 's brilliant 'videodrome . '
translation: 一个可怕、不连贯的烂摊子……一个对大卫·柯南伯格辉煌的《视频嗜血》的卑劣抄袭。
back_translation: A terrible, incoherent mess... a vile imitation of David Cronenberg's brilliant "Videodrome."

text: a number of new allies join with aragorn , gimli , legolas , pippin and merry .
translation: 一群新的盟友与阿拉贡、吉姆利、莱戈拉斯、皮平和梅里加入了。
back_translation: A group of new allies joined Aragorn, Gimli, Legolas, Pippin, and Merry.

text: a documentary , this film , co-produced by several countries finally became reality .
translation: 这部纪录片由多个国家共同制作，最终变成了现实。
back_translation: This documentary was produced collaboratively by multiple countries and ultimately became a reality.

text: when possum lodge is taken to court by big-shot executive robert stiles ( richard fitzpatrick ) , whose limousine was damaged while parking at the lodge , the boys are ordered to pay $ 10 , 000 in damages within ten days - or their beloved lodge will become property of the town .
translation: 当豪门高管罗伯特·斯泰尔斯（理查德·菲茨帕特里克饰）将负鼠旅馆告上法庭时，因他的豪华轿车在旅馆停车时受损，男孩们被判在十天内支付10,000美元的赔偿，否则他们心爱的旅馆将成为镇上的财产。
back_translation: When the wealthy executive Robert Stiles (played by Richard Fitzpatrick) took the Possum Lodge to court due to damage to his luxury car while parked at the lodge, the boys were ordered to pay $10,000 in compensation within ten days, or their beloved lodge would become property of the town.

text: the lead character of bruce is a tribute to the late great martial arts legend and portrays many of the stereotypical characteristics and ideosyncrasies that distinguished his illustrious career .
translation: 布鲁斯的主角致敬于已故的伟大武术传奇，表现出许多典型的特征和独特性，突显了他辉煌职业生涯的特征。
back_translation: The protagonist of Bruce pays tribute to the late great martial arts legend, showcasing many typical characteristics and uniqueness that highlight the features of his illustrious career.

text: `` the ring `` is pretty much an english-language copy of the film that inspired it , and it carries the same strengths and flaws .
translation: 《刀锋战士》基本上是受其启发的电影的英文版，具有相同的优缺点。
back_translation: "Blade Warrior" is essentially the English version of a movie inspired by it, with the same strengths and weaknesses.

text: nair does n't treat the issues lightly . she allows each character to confront their problems openly and honestly .
translation: 奈尔并不轻视这些问题。她让每个角色坦诚地面对他们的问题。
back_translation: Nair does not take these issues lightly. She allows each character to confront their problems honestly.

text: told in five parts to represent each of the five senses , the sheltered 25-year-old learns to understand his own senses and those around him .
translation: 以五个部分讲述，代表五种感官，这位25岁的受保护者学会理解自己的感官和周围的感官。
back_translation: Told in five parts, representing the five senses, this 25-year-old protected individual learns to understand their own senses and the senses of those around them.

text: but this is 1960 's england , and when the neighbours start to make life difficult for the new arrivals , david 's family are caught in the middle , and he has to choose between fitting in and standing up for the new friends who have turned his world upside down .
translation: 但这是1960年代的英格兰，当邻居们开始给新移民的生活带来困难时，大卫的家庭被卷入其中，他必须在融入与为那些颠覆他世界的新朋友挺身而出之间做出选择。
back_translation: But this is England in the 1960s, and as neighbors begin to create difficulties for the lives of new immigrants, David's family gets caught up in it, forcing him to choose between fitting in and standing up for the new friends who are undermining his world.

text: it helps that lil bow wow . . . tones down his pint-sized gangsta act to play someone who resembles a real kid .
translation: 小小Bow Wow把他的微型帮派角色收敛一些，饰演一个更像真正孩子的人，这点帮助很大。
back_translation: Little Bow Wow toned down his micro gang character and portrayed a more relatable child, which helped a lot.

text: the planet however is populated by murderous psychopaths who kill two of the astronauts right away .
translation: 然而，这颗星球上生活着一些凶残的精神病患者，他们立刻杀死了两名宇航员。
back_translation: However, there are some vicious psychopaths living on this planet who immediately killed two astronauts.

text: cinematic pyrotechnics aside , the only thing avary seems to care about are mean giggles and pulchritude . it makes sense that he went back to school to check out the girls -- his film is a frat boy 's idea of a good time .
translation: 抛开电影特效不谈，艾弗里似乎只关心尖刻的笑声和美貌。可以理解的是，他回到学校去看看女孩们——他的电影是一个兄弟会男孩的好时光的想法。
back_translation: Setting aside the film’s special effects, Avery seems to only care about sharp laughs and beauty. It is understandable that he goes back to school to check on the girls—his movie is a portrayal of a fraternity boy’s good times.

text: the script , the gags , the characters are all direct-to-video stuff , and that 's where this film should have remained .
translation: 剧本、笑料和角色都是直接为视频制作的东西，这部电影本应该留在那里。
back_translation: The script, jokes, and characters are all things made specifically for the video; this movie should have stayed there.

text: if you love the music , and i do , its hard to imagine having more fun watching a documentary . . .
translation: 如果你热爱音乐，而我也是，想象看一部纪录片能有更多乐趣是很困难的。
back_translation: If you love music, and I do too, it's hard to imagine that watching a documentary could be more enjoyable.

text: the script is a disaster , with cloying messages and irksome characters .
translation: 剧本是一场灾难，充满了令人厌烦的信息和烦人的角色。
back_translation: The script is a disaster, filled with annoying messages and irritating characters.

text: fresh out of a long-term relationship in which she lost custody of a dog , janey passes the end of day on her stoop .
translation: 珍妮刚结束一段长期关系，在这段关系中她失去了对一只狗的监护权，她在门廊上度过一天的结束。
back_translation: Jenny has just ended a long-term relationship, during which she lost custody of a dog. She spends the end of the day on the porch.

text: just a kiss wants desperately to come off as a fanciful film about the typical problems of average people . but it is set in a world that is very , very far from the one most of us inhabit .
translation: 《只是一吻》渴望被呈现为一部关于普通人典型问题的奇幻电影。但是它设置在一个与我们大多数人所生活的世界非常遥远的地方。
back_translation: "Just a Kiss" aspires to be presented as a fantasy film about the typical problems of ordinary people. However, it is set in a world very far removed from the one most of us live in.

text: part travelogue , part road picture , part meditation on class , mortality and intimacy , this extraordinary little movie might be the perfect harbinger of summer , as astute as it is steamy .
translation: 部分旅行日志，部分公路电影，部分对阶级、死亡和亲密关系的冥思，这部非凡的小电影可能是夏天的完美前兆，既敏锐又热烈。
back_translation: A part travelogue, a part road movie, and a part meditation on class, death, and intimacy, this extraordinary little film may be the perfect harbinger of summer, both sharp and passionate.

text: a woman who has recently discovered that she is the daughter of angelo , a major mafia boss , decides to wreak vengeance when he is killed by a hitman .
translation: 一名女性最近发现自己是大恶霸安杰洛的女儿，在他被刺客杀死后决定报仇。
back_translation: A woman recently discovered that she is the daughter of the notorious gangster Angelo, and after he was killed by an assassin, she decided to seek revenge.

text: the two jedi are then sent on two different missions , anakin is sent to naboo with padme and obi-wan is sent to the planet of kamino where he will investigate the assassination attempts .
translation: 这两位绝地随即被派往两个不同的任务，安纳金与帕德梅被派往纳布，而欧比旺则被派往卡米诺星球，他将在那里调查刺杀未遂事件。
back_translation: The two Jedi were immediately assigned to two different missions; Anakin and Padmé were sent to Naboo, while Obi-Wan was sent to the planet Kamino, where he would investigate the assassination attempt.

text: one day , his own name arrives in the `` perpetrator `` chute , and the precogs predict that he will kill a man he never knew in less than 36 hours .
translation: 一天，他自己的名字出现在“罪犯”信箱里，预知者预测他将在不到36小时内杀死一个他从未认识的人。
back_translation: One day, his own name appeared in the "criminal" mailbox, and the seer predicted that he would kill someone he had never known in less than 36 hours.

text: . . . unlikable , uninteresting , unfunny , and completely , utterly inept .
translation: ……不讨人喜欢，没意思，没趣且完全无能。
back_translation: ...unlikable, dull, uninteresting, and completely incompetent.

text: a young african american man , quickly closing in on the much sought after american dream , comes to terms with the fact that no amount of success can shield him from the ills that face our society .
translation: 一位年轻的非裔美国男性，迅速接近梦寐以求的美国梦，意识到无论多大的成功都无法使他免受我们社会中存在的种种弊病。
back_translation: A young African American man, quickly approaching the American dream he has always desired, realizes that no amount of success can shield him from the various ills that exist in our society.

text: when perry fists a bull at the moore farm , it 's only a matter of time before he gets the upper hand in matters of the heart .
translation: 当佩里在摩尔农场与公牛搏斗时，俨然只是时间问题，他将在感情上占据上风。
back_translation: When Perry was fighting the bull at Moore Farm, it seemed only a matter of time before he would have the emotional upper hand.

text: the clues are few and time is running out for the students of rogers high school .
translation: 线索不多，罗杰斯高中学生的时间正在耗尽。
back_translation: There are not many clues, and time is running out for the Rogers High School students.

text: few films this year have been as resolute in their emotional nakedness .
translation: 今年很少有电影在情感的赤裸上如此坚定。
back_translation: This year, very few movies are as unwaveringly raw in their emotions.

text: for his drug is not dope or crack or smack . . .
translation: 因为他的药物不是毒品、冰毒或海洛因……
back_translation: Because his medication is not drugs, methamphetamine or heroin...

text: i do n't even care that there 's no plot in this antonio banderas-lucy liu faceoff . it 's still terrible !
translation: 我甚至不关心这场安东尼奥·班德拉斯和刘玉玲的对决没有情节。它仍然糟糕透了！
back_translation: I don't even care that this showdown between Antonio Banderas and Lucy Liu has no plot. It's still terrible!

text: lynn tells sue she wants to stop their criminal life and get married ^ & # 214 ; she wo n't accept chow nunn 's order for the second killing .
translation: 琳告诉苏，她想停止他们的犯罪生活并结婚；她不会接受周南的第二次杀戮命令。
back_translation: Lin told Su that she wanted to end their life of crime and get married; she would not accept Zhou Nan's order for a second kill.

text: to define 'family ' , guy must seek beyond what he can see , touch , taste , smell or hear .
translation: 要定义“家庭”，人必须超越他所能看到、触摸、品尝、嗅到或听到的东西。
back_translation: To define "family," one must go beyond what can be seen, touched, tasted, smelled, or heard.

text: tian emphasizes the isolation of these characters by confining color to liyan 's backyard .
translation: 天通过将色彩限制在丽妍的后院中，强调了这些角色的孤立。
back_translation: The sky emphasizes the isolation of these characters by limiting the colors to Liyan's backyard.

text: meanwhile the kids find a stray dog who needs a home .
translation: 与此同时，孩子们发现了一只需要家的流浪狗。
back_translation: Meanwhile, the children discovered a stray dog that needed a home.

text: in fact a blueprint : a blueprint of her mother .
translation: 实际上是一个蓝图：她母亲的蓝图。
back_translation: In fact, it is a blueprint: her mother's blueprint.

text: clara has gone wild after her mother runs off with another man .
translation: 克拉拉在她母亲和另一个男人私奔后变得疯狂。
back_translation: Clara went crazy after her mother eloped with another man.

text: his songs are no longer seen as top grade .
translation: 他的歌曲不再被视为一流。
back_translation: His songs are no longer considered top-tier.

text: retired nfl linebacker , `` terrible `` terry tate enforces the office rules at the felcher and sons ' headquarters the only way he knows how : with bone-crushing tackles and hard-core trash-talk .
translation: 退役NFL外线卫“可怕的”特里·泰特以他唯一知道的方式在菲尔彻父子公司的总部执行办公室规则：以摧毁骨头的铲球和生猛的 trash-talk。
back_translation: Retired NFL linebacker "Terrifying" Terry Tate enforces office rules at the headquarters of the Fletcher & Sons Company in the only way he knows how: with bone-crushing tackles and fierce trash talk.

text: a strong first quarter , slightly less so second quarter , and average second half .
translation: 强劲的第一季度，第二季度略逊，下半场表现平平。
back_translation: A strong first quarter, slightly weaker second quarter, and a mediocre performance in the second half.

text: 'the war of the roses , ' trailer-trash style . entertaining but like shooting fish in a barrel .
translation: 《玫瑰战争》，贱民风格。娱乐性强，但就像在桶里打鱼一样简单。
back_translation: "War of the Roses," in a lowbrow style. Highly entertaining, but as easy as shooting fish in a barrel.

text: as a kind of colorful , dramatized pbs program , frida gets the job done . but , for that , why not watch a documentary ?
translation: 作为一种色彩丰富、戏剧化的PBS节目，《弗里达》完成了它的使命。不过，既然这样，为什么不看一部纪录片呢？
back_translation: As a colorful and dramatic PBS program, "Frida" has fulfilled its mission. However, if that is the case, why not watch a documentary?

text: all in all , it 's a pretty good execution of a story that 's a lot richer than the ones hollywood action screenwriters usually come up with on their own .
translation: 总的来说，这是一个相当不错的故事呈现，其内容远比好莱坞动作编剧通常独立创作的故事要丰富得多。
back_translation: Overall, this is a rather good story presentation, with content that is much richer than the stories usually created independently by Hollywood action screenwriters.

text: a loyal british drummer , one of the thousands of british soldiers stationed in america , accidently drops his canteen into a stream while trying to fill it with water .
translation: 一位忠诚的英国鼓手，成千上万驻扎在美洲的英国士兵之一，在试图用水装满自己的水壶时，不小心将水壶掉入了小溪中。
back_translation: A loyal British drummer, one of the thousands of British soldiers stationed in America, accidentally dropped his water bottle into a creek while trying to fill it with water.

text: can the three dons outwit them and not get bluffed by their obvious charms ?
translation: 这三个大亨能否智胜他们，不被他们明显的魅力所欺骗？
back_translation: Can these three tycoons outsmart them without being deceived by their obvious charm?

text: as a result of one of his liaisons , he meets marcus , an odd 12-year-old boy with problems at school .
translation: 由于他的一次外遇，他遇到了马库斯，一个在学校有问题的奇怪12岁男孩。
back_translation: Due to his affair, he met Marcus, a strange 12-year-old boy with problems in school.

text: fails to satisfactorily exploit its gender politics , genre thrills or inherent humor .
translation: 未能令人满意地利用其性别政治、类型惊险或内在幽默。
back_translation: Failed to satisfactorily utilize its gender politics, genre thrills, or inherent humor.

text: vile and tacky are the two best adjectives to describe ghost ship .
translation: “可恶”和“低俗”是形容幽灵船的两个最佳形容词。
back_translation: "Detestable" and "vulgar" are the two best adjectives to describe the ghost ship.

text: . . . very funny , very enjoyable . . .
translation: ……非常有趣，非常愉快……
back_translation: ...very interesting, very pleasant...

text: it understands , in a way that speaks forcefully enough about the mechanisms of poverty to transcend the rather simplistic filmmaking .
translation: 它以一种足够有力的方式理解贫困机制，从而超越了相对简单的电影制作。
back_translation: It understands the mechanisms of poverty in a sufficiently powerful way, surpassing relatively simple filmmaking.

text: spanning from post world war ii during the late 1950 's through the irish mob wars of the 1970 's and culminating in their adulthood in the 1990 's , the story is set to the backdrop of backroom politics and the realities of the irish mob and it 's gang wars .
translation: 故事背景设定在二战后到1950年代末期，再到1970年代的爱尔兰黑帮战争，最终 culminates 在1990年代的成年生活。背景是关于内幕政治和爱尔兰黑帮及其 gang wars 的现实。
back_translation: The story is set in the period from post-World War II to the late 1950s, and then to the Irish gang wars of the 1970s, ultimately culminating in adult life in the 1990s. The backdrop is about the realities of insider politics and the Irish mob and its gang wars.

text: in the vein of raiders of the lost ark , this action packed thriller takes us on a roller coaster ride from the bone chilling cold of moscow to the mystical beauty of india .
translation: 在《夺宝奇兵》的风格中，这部动作惊悚片带我们从莫斯科的刺骨寒冷到印度的神秘美丽，进行了一场过山车般的旅程。
back_translation: In the style of "Indiana Jones," this action thriller takes us on a rollercoaster journey from the biting cold of Moscow to the mysterious beauty of India.

text: he comes back , calling himself the master , and becomes a charismatic spiritual leader , running a teen shelter in hollywood .
translation: 他回来了，自称为大师，成为了一位充满魅力的精神领袖，在好莱坞经营一个青少年庇护所。
back_translation: He has returned, calling himself a master, and has become a charismatic spiritual leader, running a youth shelter in Hollywood.

text: not really bad so much as distasteful : we need kidnapping suspense dramas right now like we need doomsday thrillers .
translation: 并不是特别糟糕，而是令人厌恶：我们现在需要绑架悬疑剧，就像我们需要末日惊悚片一样。
back_translation: It's not that bad, but rather annoying: what we need now are gripping suspense dramas, just like we need apocalyptic thrillers.

text: the beatle fan is a drama about albert , a psychotic prisoner who is a devoted fan of john lennon and the beatles .
translation: 《披头士粉丝》是一部关于阿尔伯特的戏剧，他是一名精神病患者囚犯，是约翰·列侬和披头士乐队的狂热粉丝。
back_translation: "Beatles Fan" is a play about Albert, a mentally ill prisoner who is an obsessive fan of John Lennon and the Beatles.

text: scherfig 's light-hearted profile of emotional desperation is achingly honest and delightfully cheeky .
translation: 施尔菲格轻松幽默的情感绝望画像既诚实动人，又令人愉悦地调皮。
back_translation: Shirley Feg's light-hearted and humorous portrait of emotional despair is both sincerely moving and delightfully playful.

text: accompanied by his assistant bough ( ben miller ) , johnny bungles his way through one scrape after another .
translation: 在他的助手博（本·米勒）的陪伴下，约翰尼东躲西藏，经历了一次又一次的麻烦。
back_translation: With his assistant Bo (Ben Miller) by his side, Johnny hid and experienced trouble time and again.

text: all ms . jovovich , as the sanctified heroine , has to do is look radiant , grimly purposeful and mildly alarmed while forcing open doors , wielding wrenches and fleeing monsters .
translation: 所有的乔沃维奇小姐，作为被神圣化的女英雄，要做的就是看起来光彩照人、严肃坚定并且稍显惊恐，同时用力打开门、挥舞扳手和逃离怪物。
back_translation: All the Miss Jovoviches, as sanctified heroines, are meant to look glamorous, serious and steadfast, yet somewhat fearful, while forcefully opening doors, wielding wrenches, and escaping from monsters.

text: by the end of the day , everybody is nervous and tensions gets high .
translation: 到一天结束时，每个人都感到紧张，气氛也变得紧张。
back_translation: By the end of the day, everyone felt tense, and the atmosphere became tense as well.

text: it is a story about finding yourself when you did n't even know you were looking .
translation: 这是一个关于在你甚至不知道自己在寻找的时候发现自己的故事。
back_translation: This is a story about discovering yourself when you don't even realize you're searching.

text: if you can keep your eyes open amid all the blood and gore , you 'll see del toro has brought unexpected gravity to blade ii .
translation: 如果你能够在所有的血腥和残酷中保持眼睛睁开，你会发现德尔托罗给《刀锋战士2》带来了意想不到的分量。
back_translation: If you can keep your eyes open amid all the bloodshed and brutality, you will find that Del Toro brings an unexpected weight to "Blade II."

text: it was only a matter of time before some savvy producer saw the potential success inherent in the mixture of bullock bubble and hugh goo .
translation: 只是在时间问题上，某个精明的制作人看到了牛皮泡沫和休·古混合中固有的潜在成功。
back_translation: It was just a matter of time before a shrewd producer recognized the inherent potential for success in the mix of a bull market and Hugh Grant.

text: juwanna mann follows the story of jamal jeffries ( miguel a . nunez , jr . ) , the reigning 'bad boy ' of basketball , whose undisciplined on-court antics land him out of the league and without any prospects .
translation: 《朱万纳·曼》讲述了贾马尔·杰弗里斯（米格尔·A·努涅斯 Jr.饰）的故事，他是篮球界的“坏小子”，由于在场上不受控制的行为，最终被迫离开联赛，失去了任何前景。
back_translation: "Juana Man" tells the story of Jamal Jeffries (played by Miguel A. Nunez Jr.), who is the "bad boy" of the basketball world. Due to his uncontrollable behavior on the court, he ultimately gets forced out of the league and loses all prospects.

text: in india , with ben 's help , the couple intends to retrieve their ailing sick daughter , who is stuck in a buddhist monastery in a far off and remote village .
translation: 在印度，在本的帮助下，这对夫妇打算接回他们生病的女儿，她困在一个偏远村庄的佛教寺院里。
back_translation: In India, with the help of Ben, the couple plans to bring back their sick daughter, who is trapped in a Buddhist monastery in a remote village.

text: 'stages ' is the story of a day in the life of brad and scott , two actors who starred in a tv series twenty years ago .
translation: 《阶段》是布拉德和斯科特这两位演员生活中一天的故事，他们二十年前曾在一部电视剧中主演。
back_translation: "Stage" is a story about a day in the lives of actors Brad and Scott, who starred together in a television drama twenty years ago.

text: [ n ] o matter how much good will the actors generate , showtime eventually folds under its own thinness .
translation: 无论演员们产生多少好意，演出最终还是会因为自身的薄弱而失败。
back_translation: No matter how much goodwill the actors generate, the performance will ultimately fail due to its own shortcomings.

text: being author wells ' great-grandson , you 'd think filmmaker simon wells would have more reverence for the material . but this costly dud is a far cry from either the book or the beloved film .
translation: 作为威尔斯的曾孙，电影制片人西蒙·威尔斯本应对这部作品更加敬畏。然而，这部昂贵的失败之作与原著或经典电影相去甚远。
back_translation: As the great-grandson of H.G. Wells, filmmaker Simon Wells should have had more reverence for this work. However, this expensive failure is far removed from the original or the classic film.

text: this is a poster movie , a mediocre tribute to films like them !
translation: 这是一部海报电影，对这些电影的 mediocre 致敬！
back_translation: This is a poster movie, a tribute to those mediocre films!

text: to his surprise , he makes it , but now the real challenge begins - to cease being jamal and start new life as juwanna .
translation: 令他惊讶的是，他成功了，但真正的挑战现在开始——停止做贾马尔，开始作为朱安娜的新生活。
back_translation: What surprised him was that he succeeded, but the real challenge now begins—stopping being Jamal and starting a new life as Juana.

text: watching the chemistry between freeman and judd , however , almost makes this movie worth seeing . almost .
translation: 观看弗里曼和贾德之间的化学反应，几乎让这部电影值得一看。几乎。
back_translation: Watching the chemistry between Freeman and Jude is almost worth the price of admission for this movie. Almost.

text: dale desperately tries everything to try and calm him down , until the horrors in the dark make him realize brian had good reason to be so afraid !
translation: 代尔拼命尝试一切来让他冷静下来，直到黑暗中的恐怖让他意识到布莱恩有充分的理由如此害怕！
back_translation: Dale desperately tried everything to calm him down, until the terror in the darkness made him realize that Brian had every reason to be so afraid!

text: the obligatory break-ups and hook-ups do n't seem to have much emotional impact on the characters .
translation: 强制性的分手和约会似乎对角色们没有太大的情感影响。
back_translation: The forced breakups and dates don't seem to have much emotional impact on the characters.

text: the entire movie is so formulaic and forgettable that it 's hardly over before it begins to fade from memory .
translation: 整部电影如此公式化和让人遗忘，以至于几乎在结束前就开始从记忆中淡去。
back_translation: The entire movie is so formulaic and forgettable that it almost starts to fade from memory before it even ends.

text: peter and martin - the two chefs - want to get him out and soon father and son meet for the first time in their lives .
translation: 彼得和马丁——这两个厨师——想要把他放出来，父亲和儿子很快就将在他们生活中第一次见面。
back_translation: Peter and Martin—these two chefs—want to let him go, and the father and son will soon meet for the first time in their lives.

text: an intelligent and sobering look at a person 's self worth , and the measures he or she will take to restore it .
translation: 对一个人自我价值的深刻而清醒的探讨，以及他或她为恢复自我价值所采取的措施。
back_translation: A profound and clear examination of a person's self-worth, and the measures taken by him or her to restore that self-worth.

text: accompanying them is jon 's `` soulmate , `` todd , a 35-year old businessman recklessly reliving his adolescence , plus other `` circuit friends `` the boys make along the way .
translation: 陪伴他们的是乔恩的“灵魂伴侣”托德，一个35岁的商人，鲁莽地重温自己的青春，以及途中遇到的其他“交际朋友”。
back_translation: Accompanying them is Jon's "soulmate" Todd, a 35-year-old businessman who recklessly relives his youth, along with other "social friends" he meets along the way.

text: fred , daphne , velma , shaggy and scooby soon realize that they can not solve this mystery without help from each other .
translation: 弗雷德、达夫妮、维尔玛、沙吉和史酷比很快意识到，他们无法单独解决这个谜团，必须互相帮助。
back_translation: Fred, Daphne, Velma, Shaggy, and Scooby quickly realized that they couldn't solve the mystery alone and needed to help each other.

text: miller tells this very compelling tale with little fuss or noise , expertly plucking tension from quiet .
translation: 米勒以极少的喧嚣和麻烦讲述了这个非常引人入胜的故事，巧妙地从安静中提取出紧张感。
back_translation: Miller tells this very captivating story with minimal fuss and trouble, skillfully extracting tension from the quiet.

text: will raja be able to convince the doctor and munnabhai about his love ?
translation: 拉贾能说服医生和穆纳拜相信他的爱吗？
back_translation: Can Raja convince the doctor and Munabai of his love?

text: in order get loan sharks off his back , he must finish his novel in 30 days or wind up dead .
translation: 为了摆脱高利贷者的纠缠，他必须在30天内完成他的小说，否则将面临死亡。
back_translation: In order to escape the entanglement of the loan shark, he must finish his novel within 30 days, or he will face death.

text: but his yearning for expression , love and devotion stays unsatisfied .
translation: 但他对表达、爱和忠诚的渴望仍然未得到满足。
back_translation: However, his desire for expression, love, and loyalty still remains unfulfilled.

text: not one to be left behind , munnabhai also follows them and all beans are spilled when the doctor comes to know about raja and komal 's affair and munnabhai 's intentions .
translation: 不想被落下，穆纳拜也跟着他们，当医生得知拉贾和科玛尔之间的恋情以及穆纳拜的意图时，所有的秘密都被揭开了。
back_translation: Not wanting to be left behind, Munabai also followed them. When the doctor learned of the romance between Raja and Komal as well as Munabai's intentions, all the secrets were revealed.

text: perfectly enjoyable , instantly forgettable , nothing to write home about .
translation: 完美享受，瞬间忘却，没什么特别值得一提的。
back_translation: Perfect enjoyment, forgetting in an instant, nothing particularly noteworthy.

text: the story is set in a place called attic town , where the great syndicate robs and kills anyone who stands in their way .
translation: 故事发生在一个叫阁楼镇的地方，伟大的 syndicate 抢劫并杀死任何挡道的人。
back_translation: The story takes place in a place called Attic Town, where a great syndicate robs and kills anyone who gets in their way.

text: she may not be real , but the laughs are .
translation: 她可能不是真的，但笑声是真实的。
back_translation: She may not be real, but the laughter is real.

text: an energizing , intoxicating documentary charting the rise of hip-hop culture in general and the art of scratching ( or turntablism ) in particular .
translation: 一部充满活力、令人陶醉的纪录片，追踪了嘻哈文化的崛起，尤其是划盘艺术（或称转盘艺术）。
back_translation: A vibrant and captivating documentary that tracks the rise of hip-hop culture, particularly the art of turntablism.

text: i have two words to say about reign of fire . great dragons !
translation: 我对《火之统治》有两个词要说。伟大的龙！
back_translation: I have two words to say about "The Reign of Fire": Great Dragon!

text: this film puts wang at the forefront of china 's sixth generation of film makers .
translation: 这部电影将王置于中国第六代电影制作人的前沿。
back_translation: This film places Wang at the forefront of China's sixth generation of filmmakers.

text: a high-spirited buddy movie about the reunion of berlin anarchists who face arrest 15 years after their crime .
translation: 一部充满活力的好友电影，讲述了一群柏林无政府主义者在犯罪15年后重聚面临逮捕的故事。
back_translation: A vibrant buddy film that tells the story of a group of anarchists in Berlin reuniting after 15 years of crime and facing arrest.

text: kilo decides to learn how to prosper in the drug world and his new life as a dealer begins .
translation: 基洛决定学习如何在毒品世界中繁荣，他作为经销商的新生活开始了。
back_translation: Gilo decided to learn how to thrive in the drug world, and his new life as a dealer began.

text: these four robbed a bank and hijacked an entire town for 3 days .
translation: 这四个人抢劫了一家银行，并劫持了整个城镇长达三天。
back_translation: The four people robbed a bank and held the entire town hostage for three days.

text: to show these characters in the act and give them no feelings of remorse -- and to cut repeatedly to the flashback of the original rape -- is overkill to the highest degree .
translation: 展示这些角色的行为并不赋予他们任何悔恨的情感——而是不断切换到原始强奸的闪回——这简直是过度的表现。
back_translation: The portrayal of these characters' actions does not imbue them with any feelings of regret—instead, it constantly shifts to flashbacks of the original assault—this is simply excessive.

text: five screenwriters are credited with the clichM-i-laden screenplay ; it seems as if each watered down the version of the one before .
translation: 五位编剧被认为为充满陈词滥调的剧本负责；似乎每个人都在淡化前一个版本。
back_translation: Five screenwriters are considered responsible for the clichéd script; it seems that everyone is downplaying the previous version.

text: a team of professional thieves are hired to rob a jewelry exchange .
translation: 一队专业小偷被雇来抢劫一家珠宝交易所。
back_translation: A team of professional thieves was hired to rob a jewelry exchange.

text: at the end a 50-foot high , neon-lit , wooden effigy is burned , igniting a wild , tribal , all-night celebration .
translation: 最后，一个50英尺高、霓虹灯装饰的木制偶像被燃烧，点燃了一场狂野的部落式通宵庆祝活动。
back_translation: Finally, a 50-foot tall wooden effigy adorned with neon lights was burned, igniting a wild tribal-style all-night celebration.

text: when petty thief cosimo ( luis guzman ) is given the plan for the perfect heist from a lifer in prison - the kind of job you dream about - he has to get out of jail , fast .
translation: 当小偷科西莫（路易斯·古兹曼饰）从一个终身监禁的囚犯那里得到了一个完美抢劫的计划——那种你梦寐以求的工作——他必须尽快出狱。
back_translation: When the thief Cosimo (played by Luis Guzmán) gets a perfect robbery plan from a lifelong inmate—a job you could only dream of—he needs to get out of prison as soon as possible.

text: as with too many studio pics , plot mechanics get in the way of what should be the lighter-than-air adventure .
translation: 与太多的工作室电影一样，情节机制妨碍了本该是轻松愉快的冒险。
back_translation: Like too many studio films, the plot mechanics get in the way of what should be a light-hearted adventure.

text: while there prove to be a lot of pitches to be thrown before he makes it off the mound , big-league dreams are revived , and there 's no telling where he could go .
translation: 尽管在他离开投手丘之前还有很多投球要投，但大联盟的梦想被重新唤醒，谁也无法预料他将去往何方。
back_translation: Although he still had many pitches to throw before leaving the mound, the dream of making it to the major leagues was reignited, and no one could predict where he would go next.

text: great trash , one of those mediocre movies that in its own crass way is more enjoyable than most things that get nominated for oscars .
translation: 真是垃圾，这是一部平庸的电影，以其粗鄙的方式比大多数奥斯卡提名的作品更令人愉悦。
back_translation: It's really trash; this is an average movie that is more enjoyable in its crude manner than most of the Oscar-nominated works.

text: makes an aborbing if arguable case for the man 's greatness .
translation: 对这位男性的伟大提出了一个引人入胜但有争议的论点。
back_translation: An intriguing yet controversial argument has been made about the greatness of this man.

text: anything anyone tells her to do , she must obey .
translation: 她必须服从任何人告诉她做的事情。
back_translation: She must obey whatever anyone tells her to do.

text: familiar stranger chronicles stacy krebbs , a 19-year-old college student : who is viciously attacked one night in her home by a mysterious stalker .
translation: 熟悉的陌生人编年史讲述了19岁大学生斯泰西·克雷布斯的故事：她在家中被一个神秘的跟踪者猛烈袭击。
back_translation: The Chronicles of Familiar Strangers tells the story of 19-year-old college student Stacey Krebs: she is violently attacked at home by a mysterious stalker.

text: he 's got the rap , the charm and his little black book weighs several pounds .
translation: 他有说唱的才能、魅力，而且他的黑色小本子重达几磅。
back_translation: He has the talent and charisma for rapping, and his black notebook weighs several pounds.

text: one of the best films that showcase a romance within the context of an artistic movement
translation: 展示艺术运动背景下浪漫关系的最佳电影之一
back_translation: One of the best films showcasing romantic relationships against the backdrop of art movements.

text: the story follows a university of texas professor , dr . david gale , an advocate for the abolishment of capital punishment , who is falsly convicted of rape and murder of another activist .
translation: 故事讲述了德克萨斯大学教授大卫·盖尔博士的经历，他是一名反对死刑的倡导者，因错误被定罪为强奸和谋杀另一位活动家。
back_translation: The story tells of the experiences of Dr. David Gale, a professor at the University of Texas, who is an advocate against the death penalty and was wrongfully convicted of raping and murdering another activist.

text: it offers little beyond the momentary joys of pretty and weightless intellectual entertainment .
translation: 它仅仅提供了短暂的快乐，作为美丽而轻盈的智力娱乐。
back_translation: It only provides a fleeting happiness, as a beautiful and light-hearted intellectual amusement.

text: in the end family , good friends , and a supportive community rally to help him once again find joy .
translation: 最终，家人、好朋友和支持的社区再次团结在一起，帮助他重新找到快乐。
back_translation: In the end, family, good friends, and a supportive community came together once again to help him rediscover happiness.

text: you 're not merely watching history , you 're engulfed by it .
translation: 你不仅仅是在观看历史，你被历史淹没了。
back_translation: You are not just watching history; you are submerged in it.

text: as the story unfolds , the real intentions of the little devil become clear .
translation: 随着故事的发展，小恶魔的真实意图逐渐显现。
back_translation: As the story unfolds, the true intentions of the little demon gradually become apparent.

text: spencer meets paula in a hairsalon where he is getting his hair cut .
translation: 斯宾塞在一个理发店遇见了宝拉，他正在那里理发。
back_translation: Spencer met Paula at a barber shop, where he was getting a haircut.

text: john , a computer whiz on the rebound from a disastrous break-up , starts an adult internet site with his roommate , moe .
translation: 约翰是一位计算机高手，刚经历了一场灾难性的分手，和他的室友莫一起创办了一个成人网站。
back_translation: John is a computer whiz who just went through a disastrous breakup and launched an adult website with his roommate, Mo.

text: colt seeks the repair of a femininity damaged by an earlier incest .
translation: 小马寻找修复因早期乱伦而受损的女性气质。
back_translation: The little horse is seeking to restore the femininity damaged by early incest.

text: it 's mired in a shabby script that piles layer upon layer of action man clichM-i atop wooden dialogue and a shifting tone that falls far short of the peculiarly moral amorality of [ woo 's ] best work .
translation: 它陷入了一部寒酸的剧本中，堆积了一层又一层的动作英雄陈词滥调，搭配生硬的对话和不断变化的语调，远未达到[伍]最佳作品中那种特殊的道德非道德感。
back_translation: It is trapped in a shabby script, piled with layer upon layer of action hero clichés, accompanied by awkward dialogue and constantly shifting tones, far from achieving that unique sense of moral ambiguity found in [Wu]'s best works.

text: winds up being both revelatory and narcissistic , achieving some honest insight into relationships that most high-concept films candy-coat with pat storylines , precious circumstances and beautiful stars .
translation: 最终既具有启示性又显得自恋，获得了一些对人际关系的真实洞察，而大多数高概念电影却用陈词滥调的情节、珍贵的处境和美丽的明星来进行粉饰。
back_translation: Ultimately, it is both enlightening and self-indulgent, providing some genuine insights into interpersonal relationships, while most high-concept films tend to gloss over clichés, precious situations, and beautiful stars.

text: far from a bad film , and at least two of its central trio of performances provide moments of disarming grace , but do n't be surprised if a whiff of self-congratulation emanates from the screen .
translation: 远非一部糟糕的电影，至少其中三位主角中的两位表演提供了令人愉悦的时刻，但如果屏幕上散发出一丝自我陶醉的气息，也不要感到惊讶。
back_translation: Far from being a terrible movie, at least two of the three main characters deliver enjoyable moments, but don't be surprised if there's a hint of self-indulgence emanating from the screen.

text: as the day unfolds , the decisions become clearer and yet more difficult to make as the characters question what the true meaning of their lives are .
translation: 随着一天的展开，决策变得更加明确，但同时也更加难以做出，角色们开始质疑他们生命的真正意义。
back_translation: As the day unfolds, decisions become clearer, but at the same time, harder to make, and the characters begin to question the true meaning of their lives.

text: dead bodies are being found in the new york harbor .
translation: 在纽约港发现了尸体。
back_translation: A body was discovered in New York Harbor.

text: the man 's life is thrown into jeopardy when a teenage boy escapes with the only key to the dealer 's merchandise , leaving him little time to finish the deal , find his daughter and make it out of the country alive .
translation: 当一个少年带着唯一的车商商品钥匙逃跑时，这名男子的生命陷入险境，让他几乎没有时间完成交易、找到女儿并活着离开这个国家。
back_translation: When a young man escapes with the only car dealer's key, the man's life is put in jeopardy, leaving him with almost no time to complete the deal, find his daughter, and leave the country alive.

text: during quinn 's surveillance of tasha , planning for the perfect moment to make his kill , he becomes infatuated with her beauty and pure innocence .
translation: 在奎因对塔莎的监视过程中，他计划在完美时机实施杀戮，但却对她的美丽和纯真产生了迷恋。
back_translation: During Quinn's surveillance of Tasha, he planned to strike at the perfect moment, but he became enamored with her beauty and innocence.

text: enlisted for a dangerous covert mission , he must combat a clever , organized , and ruthless enemy far beyond the scope of his experience .
translation: 他被选中执行一项危险的秘密任务，必须与一个聪明、组织严密且冷酷无情的敌人作斗争，这个敌人远超他的经验范围。
back_translation: He was chosen to carry out a dangerous secret mission and must fight against a clever, well-organized, and ruthless enemy who far exceeds his level of experience.

text: . . . with `` the bourne identity `` we return to the more traditional action genre .
translation: ...随着《谍影重重》的推出，我们回到了更传统的动作类型。
back_translation: ...With the release of "The Bourne Identity," we returned to a more traditional action genre.

text: she and her daughter flee to find sylvie 's first love in the countryside .
translation: 她和女儿逃离到乡村去寻找西尔维的初恋。
back_translation: She and her daughter escaped to the countryside to find Sylvie's first love.

text: exhausted and physically drained , they slowly pack up their equipment as the dawn light gradually builds and the emotional impact of the night 's events deepens .
translation: 筋疲力尽，身体疲惫，他们慢慢收拾起设备，随着黎明的光线逐渐增强，夜晚事件的情感冲击也在加深。
back_translation: Exhausted and physically drained, they slowly began to pack up their equipment. As the dawn light gradually intensified, the emotional impact of the night's events deepened.

text: interview with the assassin is structured less as a documentary and more as a found relic , and as such the film has a difficult time shaking its blair witch project real-time roots .
translation: 《刺客的访谈》更像是一个发现的遗物，而非纪录片，因此，这部电影很难摆脱《女巫布莱尔》项目实时拍摄的根源。
back_translation: "The Interview with a Assassin" resembles a discovered relic rather than a documentary, making it difficult for the film to break away from the real-time filming roots of "The Blair Witch Project."

text: nicklas lives a pretty normal teenage life , until one day , not far from graduation , when a gangster from his school beats him up .
translation: 尼克拉斯过着相当正常的青春期生活，直到一天，离毕业不远时，他在学校被一个黑帮打了。
back_translation: Niklas was living a fairly normal adolescence until one day, not long before graduation, he was attacked by a gang at school.

text: the movie does n't think much of its characters , its protagonist , or of us .
translation: 这部电影对其角色、主角以及我们都没有很高的评价。
back_translation: This movie does not have a high rating for its characters, the protagonist, or for us.

text: chon lin follows rathbone to london to kill him , while sending chon a letter telling him of the murder .
translation: chon lin跟随rathbone来到伦敦以杀死他，同时给chon发了一封信告诉他这个谋杀。
back_translation: Chon Lin followed Rathbone to London to kill him, at the same time sending Chon a letter informing him of the murder.

text: it 's a bad sign when you 're rooting for the film to hurry up and get to its subjects ' deaths just so the documentary will be over , but it 's indicative of how uncompelling the movie is unless it happens to cover your particular area of interest .
translation: 当你希望电影能快点达到主题人物的死亡，只为让纪录片结束时，这就是一个坏兆头，但这也表明了电影是多么地缺乏吸引力，除非它恰好涉及你特别感兴趣的领域。
back_translation: When you hope that the movie will quickly reach the death of the main character just to let the documentary end, this is a bad sign, but it also indicates how unengaging the film is, unless it happens to involve an area you are particularly interested in.

text: neighbor 's dog operates at a consistent chuckle pitch that frequently gives way to guffaws .
translation: 邻居的狗以一种一致的咯咯声调运作，经常转变为大笑。
back_translation: The neighbor's dog operates with a consistent clucking tone, often transitioning into hearty laughter.

text: it 's a terrible movie in every regard , and utterly painful to watch .
translation: 这是一部在各个方面都糟糕透顶的电影，看起来极其痛苦。
back_translation: This is a movie that is terrible in every way and looks extremely painful.

text: a mysterious video tape is killing off anyone who watches it .
translation: 一卷神秘的录像带正在杀死所有观看它的人。
back_translation: A mysterious videotape is killing everyone who watches it.

text: to help him complete his manuscript he hires stenographer emma .
translation: 为了帮助他完成手稿，他雇佣了速记员艾玛。
back_translation: To help him complete the manuscript, he hired a stenographer named Emma.

text: clarissa vaughn , a modern woman living in present times is throwing a party for her friend richard , a famous author dying of aids .
translation: 克拉丽莎·沃恩，一位生活在现代的女性，正在为她的朋友理查德举办派对，理查德是一位因艾滋病而垂死的著名作家。
back_translation: Clarissa Vaughan, a modern woman, is hosting a party for her friend Richard, a famous writer who is dying of AIDS.

text: for all its failed connections , divine secrets of the ya-ya sisterhood is nurturing , in a gauzy , dithering way .
translation: 尽管《雅雅姐妹会的神秘秘密》有许多失败的连接，但它以一种朦胧而摇摆的方式展现了关怀。
back_translation: Although "The Mysterious Secret of the Yaya Sisterhood" has many failed connections, it presents care in a hazy and swaying manner.

text: you 'd think by now america would have had enough of plucky british eccentrics with hearts of gold . yet the act is still charming here .
translation: 你会认为到现在美国应该对那些充满勇气的、拥有金子般的心的英国怪人感到厌倦了。然而，这个表演在这里仍然很迷人。
back_translation: You might think that by now, America should be tired of those British eccentrics who are full of courage and have hearts of gold. However, this performance is still captivating here.

text: by halfway through this picture i was beginning to hate it , and , of course , feeling guilty for it . . . . then , miracle of miracles , the movie does a flip-flop .
translation: 到这部影片进行到一半时，我开始讨厌它，当然也对此感到内疚……然后，奇迹般地，这部电影却发生了翻转。
back_translation: By the middle of the film, I started to hate it, and of course, I felt guilty about it... Then, miraculously, the movie took a turn.

text: as this sacrifice draws to its close , our story begins .
translation: 随着这个牺牲接近尾声，我们的故事开始了。
back_translation: As this sacrifice nears its end, our story begins.

text: returning aggressively to his formula of dimwitted comedy and even dimmer characters , sandler , who also executive produces , has made a film that makes previous vehicles look smart and sassy .
translation: 沙德勒在他的愚蠢喜剧和更愚蠢角色的公式中激进回归，作为执行制片人的他制作了一部让之前的作品显得聪明而机智的影片。
back_translation: Shadler makes a radical return to his formula of silly comedies and even sillier characters, and as the executive producer, he has created a film that makes his previous works seem clever and witty.

text: you 'll laugh at either the obviousness of it all or its stupidity or maybe even its inventiveness , but the point is , you 'll laugh .
translation: 你会因为这一切的明显性、愚蠢或甚至是它的创造性而笑，但重点是，你会笑。
back_translation: You might laugh at the obviousness, the foolishness, or even the creativity of it all, but the point is, you will laugh.

text: just another combination of bad animation and mindless violence . . . lacking the slightest bit of wit or charm .
translation: 又是一种糟糕动画和无脑暴力的组合……缺乏丝毫机智或魅力。
back_translation: Another combination of terrible animation and mindless violence... lacking any wit or charm.

text: about nowhere kids who appropriated turfs as they found them and become self-made celebrity athletes -- a low-down version of the american dream .
translation: 关于那些在发现土地时私自占用的无名孩子们，他们成为自制名人运动员——美国梦的低端版本。
back_translation: Regarding those unnamed children who secretly occupied land when it was discovered, they have become self-made celebrity athletes—a lower-end version of the American Dream.

text: as he struggles to achieve social success , he discovers his darker side .
translation: 当他努力追求社会成功时，他发现了自己阴暗的一面。
back_translation: As he struggled to pursue social success, he discovered his dark side.

text: faced with endless dead-end gigs and his own loss of passion for the music he once thought was his life , he finds himself returning home to the three generations of women that he left behind .
translation: 面对无尽的死胡同和他对曾经认为是自己生命的音乐失去的激情，他发现自己回到了那三代女性的家中。
back_translation: Faced with endless dead ends and the lost passion for the music he once considered the essence of his life, he found himself back in the home of three generations of women.

text: unfortunately , it 's also not very good . especially compared with the television series that inspired the movie .
translation: 不幸的是，它也没有很好，尤其是与启发这部电影的电视剧相比。
back_translation: Unfortunately, it didn't fare well, especially compared to the TV series that inspired this movie.

text: watching `` ending `` is too often like looking over the outdated clothes and plastic knickknacks at your neighbor 's garage sale . you ca n't believe anyone would really buy this stuff .
translation: 观看《结局》就像是在邻居的车库出售会上看过时的衣服和塑料小玩意儿，你无法相信会真的有人购买这些东西。
back_translation: Watching "The Ending" is like visiting a neighbor's garage sale and seeing outdated clothes and plastic trinkets; you can't believe anyone would actually buy those things.

text: as long as vincent lives in the protection of the present , he does n't have to deal with the pain of his past -- or his sorrow over his broken relationship with joey .
translation: 只要文森特生活在当下的保护中，他就不必面对过去的痛苦——或对与乔伊破裂关系的悲伤。
back_translation: As long as Vincent lives under the protection of the present, he does not have to face the pain of the past—or the sadness of his broken relationship with Joy.

text: deep in the blue ridge mountains , just outside of a small , quiet town , lives willy , an animalistic , southern rebel .
translation: 在蓝岭山脉深处，靠近一个小而宁静的小镇，住着威利，一个具有动物本能的南方叛逆者。
back_translation: Deep in the Blue Ridge Mountains, near a small and tranquil town, lived Willy, a southern rebel with animal instincts.

text: the touch is generally light enough and the performances , for the most part , credible .
translation: 触感通常足够轻盈，表演在大多数情况下都令人信服。
back_translation: The touch is usually light enough, and the performance is convincing in most cases.

text: lynn runs into yan , the cousin of an old friend who died .
translation: 琳遇到了燕，一个已故老朋友的表妹。
back_translation: Lin met Yan, a cousin of a deceased old friend.

text: in theory , a middle-aged romance pairing clayburgh and tambor sounds promising , but in practice it 's something else altogether -- clownish and offensive and nothing at all like real life .
translation: 从理论上讲，中年浪漫搭档克莱布格和坦博尔听起来很有前景，但实际上则完全不同——显得滑稽且冒犯，与现实生活毫无相似之处。
back_translation: In theory, the mid-life romantic duo of Kleberg and Tambor sounds promising, but in reality, it is completely different—appearing ridiculous and offensive, with no resemblance to real life.

text: set in present-day hollywood , the story concerns a script which does not exist , but nonetheless draws praise and bids from the creative community .
translation: 故事发生在现代好莱坞，讲述了一个并不存在的剧本，但仍然受到创意界的赞誉和竞标。
back_translation: The story takes place in modern-day Hollywood and tells of a script that does not exist, yet still receives acclaim and bidding from the creative community.

text: as it stands , there 's some fine sex onscreen , and some tense arguing , but not a whole lot more .
translation: 就目前而言，屏幕上有一些精彩的性爱场景和紧张的争吵，但并没有太多其他内容。
back_translation: At present, there are some exciting sex scenes and tense arguments on the screen, but not much else.

text: secretary manages a neat trick , bundling the flowers of perversity , comedy and romance into a strangely tempting bouquet of a movie .
translation: 《秘书》巧妙地将变态、喜剧和浪漫的元素捆绑在一起，形成了一个奇特诱人的电影花束。
back_translation: "The Secretary" cleverly weaves together elements of perversion, comedy, and romance to create a uniquely enticing bouquet of cinematic experiences.

text: those of you who are not an eighth grade girl will most likely doze off during this one .
translation: 那些不是八年级女孩的人很可能会在这期间打瞌睡。
back_translation: Those who are not eighth-grade girls are likely to doze off during this period.

text: while they think they are driving out the rojas , a local gang that runs the meth trade for bosses in cabo san lucas , rikki is running an elaborate double-cross on his own family .
translation: 当他们认为自己正在驱逐罗哈斯时，一个在卡波圣卢卡斯为老板经营甲基苯丙胺贸易的当地帮派，里基却在对自己的家人进行精心策划的双重背叛。
back_translation: While they believed they were driving out Rojas, Ricky was orchestrating a carefully planned double betrayal against his own family, in a local gang operating the methamphetamine trade for the boss in Cabo San Lucas.

text: it 's like a rap rashomon . there 's a million different stories here .
translation: 这就像一个说唱版的《罗生门》。这里有一百万个不同的故事。
back_translation: It's like a rap version of "Rashomon." There are a million different stories here.

text: 4ever has the same sledgehammer appeal as pokemon videos , but it breathes more on the big screen and induces headaches more slowly .
translation: 4ever 具有与口袋妖怪视频相同的震撼吸引力，但在大屏幕上更具生气，并且引发头疼的速度更慢。
back_translation: 4ever has the same shocking appeal as Pokémon videos, but with more vitality on the big screen and a slower pace that triggers headaches.

text: a cellophane-pop remake of the punk classic ladies and gentlemen , the fabulous stains . . . crossroads is never much worse than bland or better than inconsequential .
translation: 一部以塞洛法薄膜重新演绎的朋克经典《淑女与绅士，华丽的污垢》……《十字路口》从来没有比平淡更糟糕，也没有比无关紧要更好。
back_translation: A punk classic reinterpreted with cellulose film, "Ladies and Gentlemen, The Fabulous Stains"... "Crossroads" has never been worse than mundane, nor better than irrelevant.

text: cameroon and its peoples are the lark , its feathers plucked first by colonialism and then by native strong-men : `` alouette , je te plumerai . ``
translation: 喀麦隆及其人民是云雀，它的羽毛首先被殖民主义拔走，然后被土著强人掠夺：“云雀，我要拔你的羽毛。”
back_translation: Cameroon and its people are the lark, whose feathers were first plucked by colonialism and then looted by indigenous warlords: "Lark, I want to pluck your feathers."

text: he then goes to paris where he prepares to make a political film criticizing the state of repression in his native land .
translation: 然后他去巴黎，准备拍摄一部政治电影，批评他祖国的压制状况。
back_translation: Then he went to Paris to prepare for shooting a political film that critiques the oppressive situation in his homeland.

text: like a documentary version of fight club , shorn of social insight , intellectual pretension and cinematic interest .
translation: 就像是一部没有社会洞察、知识假装和电影趣味的《搏击俱乐部》纪录片版本。
back_translation: It's like a documentary version of "Fight Club" without social insight, pretentious knowledge, and cinematic flair.

text: the film is an earnest try at beachcombing verismo , but it would be even more indistinct than it is were it not for the striking , quietly vulnerable personality of ms . ambrose .
translation: 这部影片是对海滩捡拾现实主义的一次真诚尝试，但如果没有安布罗斯小姐那引人注目、内敛脆弱的个性，它会显得更加模糊不清。
back_translation: This film is a sincere attempt at a realist portrayal of beachcombing, but it would seem even more unclear without Miss Ambrose's remarkable, quietly fragile personality.

text: true to its animatronic roots : . . . as stiff , ponderous and charmless as a mechanical apparatus . . . 'the country bears ' should never have been brought out of hibernation .
translation: 忠于其机器人根源：……就像一个僵硬、笨重且没有魅力的机械装置……“乡村熊”绝不应该被唤醒。
back_translation: True to its robotic origins:... like a stiff, clumsy, and charm-less mechanical device... "Country Bear" should never be awakened.

text: frei assembles a fascinating profile of a deeply humanistic artist who , in spite of all that he 's witnessed , remains surprisingly idealistic , and retains an extraordinary faith in the ability of images to communicate the truth of the world around him .
translation: frei描绘了一位深具人文主义色彩的艺术家的引人入胜的肖像，尽管他目睹了许多，但依然令人惊讶地理想主义，并且对图像传达周围世界真理的能力保持着非凡的信念。
back_translation: Frei depicts an engaging portrait of an artist rich in humanism, who, despite witnessing much, remains surprisingly idealistic and holds an extraordinary belief in the ability of images to convey the truths of the surrounding world.

text: the crossing , even after a hard year of hiding , was to be a hardship : three months in a makeshift vessel with two thousand other fugitives , the victims not only of disease , hunger , and death , but primarily of the british navy and intelligence services .
translation: 过境，即使在艰难的隐藏一年后，仍然是一个艰难的过程：与两千名其他逃亡者在一艘简陋的船上度过三个月，这些人不仅是疾病、饥饿和死亡的受害者，更主要的是英国海军和情报部门的牺牲品。
back_translation: Crossing borders, even after a difficult year of hiding, remains a challenging process: spending three months on a shabby boat with two thousand other refugees, who are not only victims of disease, hunger, and death, but primarily victims of the British Navy and intelligence services.

text: the circles cause a media frenzy and test hess 's faith as he journeys to find out the truth behind the crop circles .
translation: 这些圆圈引发了媒体的疯狂和对赫斯信仰的考验，他在探索禾田圈背后的真相的旅途中。
back_translation: These circles sparked a media frenzy and tested the belief in Hess as he embarked on a journey to explore the truth behind the crop circles.

text: this is , not to put too fine a point on it , a swashbuckler , a costume drama . if you love that old story form , you will be in old-fogy heaven , as it is nearly a perfect example of a genre that died out years ago .
translation: 这是一部，毕竟不想太过拗口，冒险片，一部古装剧。如果你喜欢这种老故事形式，你将会在古老的怀旧中如鱼得水，因为它几乎是一个多年之前已消失的类型中完美的代表。
back_translation: This is a film, after all, that doesn't want to be too convoluted, an adventure film, a period drama. If you enjoy this old storytelling format, you will find yourself perfectly at home in the nostalgia of the past, as it is almost a perfect representation of a genre that has largely vanished many years ago.

text: director shekhar kapur and screenwriters michael schiffer and hossein amini have tried hard to modernize and reconceptualize things , but the barriers finally prove to be too great .
translation: 导演谢卡尔·卡普尔和编剧迈克尔·希弗和侯赛因·阿米尼努力尝试现代化和重新构思，但最后的障碍证明实在太大。
back_translation: Director Shekhar Kapur and screenwriters Michael Schiffer and Hossein Amini made efforts to modernize and reimagine, but the final obstacles proved too great.

text: arrests of his posse are piling up and profits are plummeting .
translation: 他的团伙被逮捕的人数不断增加，利润也急剧下滑。
back_translation: The number of people arrested in his gang continues to rise, and the profits are plummeting sharply.

text: in the not-too-distant future , movies like ghost ship will be used as analgesic balm for overstimulated minds . right now , they 're merely signposts marking the slow , lingering death of imagination .
translation: 在不远的将来，像《幽灵船》这样的电影将被用作对过度刺激大脑的镇痛膏。而现在，它们仅仅是标志，标志着想象力的缓慢、持续的死亡。
back_translation: In the near future, movies like "Ghost Ship" will be used as pain relievers for overstimulated brains. And right now, they are merely symbols, marking the slow and steady death of imagination.

text: a ragbag of promising ideas and failed narrative , of good acting and plain old bad filmmaking .
translation: 一袋充满希望的创意和失败的叙事，融汇了出色的演技和纯粹糟糕的电影制作。
back_translation: A bag full of hopeful creativity and narratives of failure, blending excellent acting with purely terrible filmmaking.

text: who , exactly , is fighting whom here ? ah , yes , that would be me : fighting off the urge to doze .
translation: 究竟是谁在和谁战斗呢？啊，是我：抵御想打瞌睡的冲动。
back_translation: Who is fighting against whom? Ah, it's me: resisting the urge to doze off.

text: you need n't be steeped in '50s sociology , pop culture or movie lore to appreciate the emotional depth of haynes ' work . though haynes ' style apes films from the period . . . its message is not rooted in that decade .
translation: 你不需要对50年代的社会学、流行文化或电影知识有深入了解，就能欣赏海恩斯作品的情感深度。尽管海恩斯的风格模仿了那个时代的电影……但其信息并不扎根于那个十年。
back_translation: You don’t need an in-depth understanding of the sociology, pop culture, or film of the 1950s to appreciate the emotional depth of Haines' work. Although Haines' style mimics the films of that era... the message is not rooted in that decade.

text: an action comedy prequel to spang olsen 's box office hit in china they eat dogs .
translation: 一部动作喜剧前传，讲述斯潘·奥尔森在中国的票房成功作《他们吃狗》的故事。
back_translation: A prequel to an action-comedy that tells the story of Span Olsen's box office success in China with "They Eat Dogs."

text: but as each retreats into their private worlds of fantasy , a much more lively story unfolds - a story of confrontations that should have happened , of secrets that need to be revealed .
translation: 但当每个人都退入他们各自的幻想世界时，一个更加生动的故事展开了——一个关于应该发生的对抗、需要揭示的秘密的故事。
back_translation: But when everyone retreats into their own fantasy worlds, a more vivid story unfolds—a story about the confrontations that should happen and the secrets that need to be revealed.

text: emory , a former governor of his tribe , is reunited with his son larry , via the help of a friend , sky montgomery , who invites larry to travel from the old pueblo to the new `` big city `` to join his father at a photo-art exhibition hosted by sky .
translation: 埃莫里，曾是他部落的酋长，在朋友斯凯·蒙哥马利的帮助下，与他的儿子拉里团聚。斯凯邀请拉里从旧普韦布洛前往新的“大城市”，参加由斯凯举办的父亲的摄影艺术展览。
back_translation: Emory, who was once the chief of his tribe, reunited with his son Larry with the help of his friend Sky Montgomery. Sky invited Larry to travel from the old Pueblo to the new "big city" to attend the photography art exhibition of his father hosted by Sky.

text: a much better documentary -- more revealing , more emotional and more surprising -- than its pedestrian english title would have you believe .
translation: 这是一部比其平庸的英文标题所暗示的更好、更具启发性、更具情感和更令人惊讶的纪录片。
back_translation: This is a better, more inspiring, more emotional, and more surprising documentary than its mediocre English title suggests.

text: it 's the brilliant surfing photography bringing you right inside the massive waves that lifts blue crush into one of the summer 's most pleasurable movies .
translation: 这部精彩的冲浪摄影将你带入巨大的海浪中，使得《蓝色冲击》成为夏季最愉悦的电影之一。
back_translation: This amazing surfing photography takes you into huge waves, making "Blue Shock" one of the most enjoyable movies of the summer.

text: this latest installment of the horror film franchise that is apparently as invulnerable as its trademark villain has arrived for an incongruous summer playoff , demonstrating yet again that the era of the intelligent , well-made b movie is long gone .
translation: 这部最新的恐怖电影系列作品，显然像它的标志性反派一样坚不可摧，已于一个不协调的夏季上映，再次证明了智能且制作精良的B级电影时代早已一去不复。
back_translation: This latest horror film series is clearly as indestructible as its iconic villain, having been released in a disjointed summer, once again proving that the era of smart and well-produced B-movies is long gone.

text: the overall effect is awe and affection -- and a strange urge to get on a board and , uh , shred , dude .
translation: 整体效果是惊叹和喜爱——还有一种奇怪的冲动想要上板，呃，畅玩，伙计。
back_translation: The overall effect is one of amazement and love—there’s also a strange impulse to jump on board, uh, to enjoy it, buddy.

text: toledo ( daniel hendler ) , 25 years old , future architect , suffers from an acute jealousy .
translation: 托莱多（丹尼尔·亨德勒），25岁，未来的建筑师，患有严重的嫉妒症。
back_translation: Toledo (Daniel Handler), 25 years old, a future architect, suffers from severe jealousy.

text: then after rumers spread that he was a communist he was blacklisted from hollywood forever .
translation: 然后在传出他是共产主义者的谣言后，他被好莱坞永久列入黑名单。
back_translation: After rumors spread that he was a communist, he was permanently blacklisted in Hollywood.

text: 'cq may one day be fondly remembered as roman coppola 's brief pretentious period before going on to other films that actually tell a story worth caring about
translation: 'cq 可能会被怀念为罗曼·科波拉在转向其他真正值得关心的故事的短暂自负时期。'
back_translation: "CQ may be remembered as the brief period of hubris for Roman Coppola before he turned to other truly worthy stories."

text: hawn and sarandon hit the ground running , and are so funny and goofy that they distract and delight us .
translation: 霍恩和萨兰登一开场就充满活力，他们的疯狂搞笑让我们既分心又开心。
