back_translation: Horn and Sarandon opened with lots of energy, and their crazy humor kept us both distracted and entertained.

text: the title not only describes its main characters , but the lazy people behind the camera as well .
translation: 这个标题不仅描述了它的主要角色，还描述了镜头后面的懒人。
back_translation: This title not only describes its main character but also the lazy person behind the camera.

text: at dinner , his father asks him about his new telescope .
translation: 在晚餐时，他的父亲询问他有关新望远镜的情况。
back_translation: During dinner, his father asked him about the new telescope.

text: it feels like an after-school special gussied up with some fancy special effects , and watching its rote plot points connect is about as exciting as gazing at an egg timer for 93 minutes .
translation: 这感觉像是一部被华丽特效包装的课后特别节目，观看它那机械的情节连接就像是目不转睛地看着一个蛋计时器整整93分钟一样无聊。
back_translation: This feels like a glamorous special program wrapped in special effects, and watching its mechanical plot connections is as boring as staring at an egg timer for a full 93 minutes.

text: jordan must decide if simon 's answers are good or evil as the paths become intertwined into each other and the lives of the four friends are eopardized as one falls victim to society 's views and the other three bond together to carry out a friends promise .
translation: 乔丹必须决定西蒙的回答是善还是恶，因为路径交错在一起，四个朋友的生活岌岌可危，其中一个成为社会观点的受害者，而其他三人团结在一起履行朋友的承诺。
back_translation: Jordan must decide whether Simon's answer is good or evil, as the paths intertwine, putting the lives of the four friends in jeopardy, with one becoming a victim of societal views, while the other three unite to fulfill the promise of friendship.

text: has a shambling charm . . . a cheerfully inconsequential diversion .
translation: 有一种笨拙的魅力……一种令人愉快的无关紧要的消遣。
back_translation: There is a kind of clumsy charm... a delightful trivial pastime.

text: when they get there , strange happenings invade the school .
translation: 他们到达时，校园里发生了奇怪的事情。
back_translation: When they arrived, strange things were happening on campus.

text: brutally honest and told with humor and poignancy , which makes its message resonate .
translation: 残酷诚实，带着幽默和深刻的情感，使其信息引起共鸣。
back_translation: Cruelly honest, infused with humor and profound emotions, making its message resonate.

text: this is the story of `` johnny `` , a struggling blues musician estranged from both his family and the country roots he left behind .
translation: 这是关于“约翰尼”的故事，他是一个挣扎中的蓝调音乐家，与自己的家人和他所遗弃的乡村根基格格不入。
back_translation: This is the story of "Johnny," a struggling blues musician who feels out of place with his family and the rural roots he has abandoned.

text: this is christmas future for a lot of baby boomers .
translation: 这对很多婴儿潮一代来说是圣诞节的未来。
back_translation: This is the future of Christmas for many baby boomers.

text: soon after , his wife passes away and he must come to terms with his daughter 's marriage to a man he does not care for and the failure that his life has become .
translation: 不久之后，他的妻子去世，他必须面对女儿与一个他并不喜欢的男人结婚，以及他生活的失败。
back_translation: Soon after, his wife passed away, and he had to confront his daughter marrying a man he did not like, as well as the failures in his life.

text: . . . an agreeable time-wasting device -- but george pal 's low-tech 1960 version still rules the epochs .
translation: ……一个令人愉悦的浪费时间的装置——但乔治·帕尔1960年的低科技版本依然主宰着时代。
back_translation: ... a delightful time-wasting device - but George Pal's low-tech version from 1960 still dominates the era.

text: manages to be wholesome and subversive at the same time .
translation: 既纯真又颠覆。
back_translation: Both innocent and subversive.

text: secret ballot is too contemplative to be really funny .
translation: 无记名投票太沉思，无法真正搞笑。
back_translation: Anonymous voting is too contemplative to be truly funny.

text: the man from elysian fields is a cold , bliss-less work that groans along thinking itself some important comment on how life throws us some beguiling curves .
translation: 《伊利西亚田野上的人》是一部冷漠、无福的作品，以呻吟的节奏前行，认为自己对生活如何给我们抛出一些迷人的曲线的评论是至关重要的。
back_translation: "The People on the Fields of Elysia" is a cold and joyless work that moves forward with a rhythm of moaning, believing that its commentary on how life throws us some enchanting curves is of utmost importance.

text: irene is about to experience all new ways of romance .
translation: 艾琳即将体验全新的浪漫方式。
back_translation: Irene is about to experience a whole new way of romance.

text: less funny than it should be and less funny than it thinks it is .
translation: 比它应该有的幽默感少，比它认为的幽默感少。
back_translation: Less humor than it should have, less humor than it thinks it has.

text: this nickleby thing might have more homosexual undertones than an eddie murphy film . and just when you think it ca n't get any more gay , in pops nathan lane .
translation: 这个尼克尔比的事情可能比艾迪·墨菲的电影有更多的同性恋暗示。而就在你认为它再也不会更“同性恋”时，内森·连恩出现了。
back_translation: This Nickleby thing might have more gay undertones than an Eddie Murphy movie. And just when you think it couldn't get any more "gay," Nathan Lane shows up.

text: it 's hard to quibble with a flick boasting this many genuine cackles , but notorious c . h . o . still feels like a promising work-in-progress .
translation: 很难对一部有如此多真实开怀大笑的电影提出异议，但臭名昭著的C.H.O.仍然感觉像是一部充满潜力的未完成作品。
back_translation: It's hard to argue against a movie that brings so many genuine laughs, but the notorious C.H.O. still feels like an unfinished work full of potential.

text: what is unique about his secret life is that an assumption of intelligence , tolerance , and acceptance is already made , and thus the movie can focus on telling a compelling story .
translation: 他秘密生活的独特之处在于，已经对智慧、宽容和接受做出了假设，因此电影可以专注于讲述一个引人入胜的故事。
back_translation: The uniqueness of his secret life lies in the assumptions made about wisdom, tolerance, and acceptance, allowing the film to focus on telling an engaging story.

text: as of then , bettien became a `` pentita `` and now is a guest of the `` witness protection program `` .
translation: 截至那时，贝蒂恩成为了一个“悔过者”，现在是“证人保护计划”的一名嘉宾。
back_translation: By then, Bettienne had become a "repentant" and is now a guest in the "Witness Protection Program."

text: perceptive in its vision of nascent industrialized world politics as a new art form , but far too clunky , didactic and saddled with scenes that seem simply an ill fit for this movie .
translation: 对新兴工业化世界政治的视角十分敏锐，然而过于笨重、说教味太浓，并且夹杂一些明显不适合这部电影的场景。
back_translation: The perspective on the political landscape of the emerging industrialized world is very keen, but it is overly cumbersome, overly preachy, and interspersed with some scenes that are clearly unsuitable for this film.

text: the rookie feels like baseball itself : sort of boring , sort of stately , yet possessed of an ineffable poetry that speaks to the young heart of old men and their sons .
translation: 《新秀》感觉就像棒球本身：有些无聊，有些庄重，但却拥有一种无法言喻的诗意，能触动老年人和他们儿子年轻的心灵。
back_translation: "Rookie" feels just like baseball itself: somewhat boring, somewhat solemn, but possessing an indescribable poetry that can touch the hearts of the elderly and their young sons.

text: at the same time , there are rumors that the romulans are ready to begin peace talks with the federation .
translation: 与此同时，有传言称罗慕伦人准备与联邦开始和平谈判。
back_translation: Meanwhile, there are rumors that the Romulans are preparing to begin peace negotiations with the Federation.

text: the film tries too hard to be funny and tries too hard to be hip . the end result is a film that 's neither .
translation: 这部电影过于拼命搞笑，也过于拼命追求时尚。最终的结果是一部两者均不是的电影。
back_translation: This movie tries too hard to be funny and also tries too hard to be fashionable. The end result is a film that is neither.

text: some of his most popular work was when he played `` johnny wadd `` private detective .
translation: 他最受欢迎的工作之一是扮演“约翰尼·瓦德”私人侦探。
back_translation: One of his most popular roles was playing the private detective "Johnny Ward."

text: the only way around this is using illegal simulated identity implants ( sims ) .
translation: 唯一的解决方法是使用非法的模拟身份植入物（sims）。
back_translation: The only solution is to use illegal simulated identity implants (sims).

text: a pretty funny movie , with most of the humor coming , as before , from the incongruous but chemically perfect teaming of crystal and de niro .
translation: 一部相当搞笑的电影，大部分幽默来自于水晶与德尼罗这对不和谐却化学完美的搭档。
back_translation: A rather funny movie, most of the humor comes from the discordant yet perfectly chemistry-driven duo of Crystal and De Niro.

text: john , completely devastated , soon finds some sketches his wife made after the accident .
translation: 约翰感到完全绝望，随后发现了一些他妻子在事故后画的草图。
back_translation: John felt completely despairing, and then discovered some sketches his wife had drawn after the accident.

text: a great ensemble cast ca n't lift this heartfelt enterprise out of the familiar .
translation: 一支出色的群星阵容无法将这个真挚的作品从熟悉的框架中解脱出来。
back_translation: An outstanding star-studded lineup cannot free this sincere work from its familiar framework.

text: after their relationship falters , shane begins to think he might be unlucky and turns to gambling as an outlet for his obsession .
translation: 在他们的关系出现裂痕后，肖恩开始感觉自己可能不幸，并转向赌博作为他痴迷的发泄途径。
back_translation: After their relationship showed signs of fracture, Sean began to feel that he might be unlucky and turned to gambling as an outlet for his obsession.

text: it aimlessly and unsuccessfully attempts to fuse at least three dull plots into one good one .
translation: 它毫无目的且失败地试图将至少三个乏味的情节融合成一个好的情节。
back_translation: It aimlessly and unsuccessfully attempts to merge at least three dull plots into one good plot.

text: not a cozy or ingratiating work , but it 's challenging , sometimes clever , and always interesting , and those are reasons enough to see it .
translation: 这部作品不是温馨或迎合的，但它具有挑战性，有时很聪明，并且始终引人入胜，这些都是值得一看的理由。
back_translation: This work is not warm or accommodating, but it is challenging, sometimes clever, and always captivating, which are all reasons to take a look.

text: adroit but finally a trifle flat , mad love does n't galvanize its outrage the way , say , jane campion might have done , but at least it possesses some .
translation: 灵巧但最终有些平淡，《疯狂的爱》并没有像简·坎皮恩那样激发愤怒，但至少它拥有一些。
back_translation: Agile but ultimately somewhat bland, "Crazy Love" doesn't ignite anger like Jane Campion does, but at least it has some.

text: she 'll just have to remember everything for the both of them .
translation: 她只需要为他们两个人记住一切。
back_translation: She only needs to remember everything for the two of them.

text: this film is full of rabbits . brimful . but like most rabbits , it seems to lack substance .
translation: 这部电影充满了兔子，满满的。但和大多数兔子一样，它似乎缺乏实质。
back_translation: This movie is filled with rabbits, completely full. But like most rabbits, it seems to lack substance.

text: this is presumably a somewhat true story , as charlie kaufman is the real life screenwriter of adaptation .
translation: 这显然是一个有些真实的故事，因为查理·考夫曼是《改编》这部电影的现实生活中的编剧。
back_translation: This is clearly a somewhat true story, as Charlie Kaufman is the real-life screenwriter of the movie "Adaptation."

text: there are only three u . s . states left .
translation: 只剩下三个美国州。
back_translation: Only three states in the United States are left.

text: [ janey ] forgets about her other obligations , leading to a tragedy which is somehow guessable from the first few minutes , maybe because it echoes the by now intolerable morbidity of so many recent movies .
translation: [珍妮] 忘记了她的其他义务，这导致了一场可以从头几分钟中猜测到的悲剧，也许是因为它反映了最近许多电影中已经无法忍受的病态。
back_translation: [Jennie] forgot her other obligations, which led to a tragedy that could be anticipated from the first few minutes, perhaps because it reflects a pathology that has become unbearable in many recent films.

text: those who are n't put off by the film 's austerity will find it more than capable of rewarding them .
translation: 那些不被电影的简朴所打扰的人会发现它能够给他们带来更多的回报。
back_translation: Those who are not disturbed by the simplicity of the film will find that it can bring them greater rewards.

text: their one song rarely - if ever - gets played on the radio .
translation: 他们的一首歌几乎从来不会在电台播放。
back_translation: One of their songs almost never gets played on the radio.

text: in event of death of any of the inheritors ' death , a death certificate has to be produced to the bank .
translation: 如果任何继承人去世，必须向银行出示死亡证明。
back_translation: If any heir passes away, a death certificate must be presented to the bank.

text: an excellent date movie , because you and your date will likely be clinging on to each other within 10 minutes .
translation: 一部优秀的约会电影，因为你和你的约会对象很可能在10分钟内就紧紧依偎在一起。
back_translation: A great dating movie, because you and your date are likely to be snuggled up together within 10 minutes.

text: rarely does such high-profile talent serve such literate material .
translation: 如此高调的人才很少会提供如此有文化的作品。
back_translation: Such a ostentatious person is rarely able to produce such cultured works.

text: at the right time of day , in the right frame of mind , baran can and should be appreciated as a work of delicate and unmistakable beauty .
translation: 在一天的正确时刻，处于正确的心境中，巴兰可以且应该被欣赏为一部细腻而鲜明的美丽作品。
back_translation: At the right moment of the day, in the right state of mind, Baran can and should be appreciated as a delicate and vivid work of beauty.

text: meanwhile , more people end up dead . . .
translation: 与此同时，更多的人最终死去……
back_translation: Meanwhile, more people ultimately die...

text: rio danisworo ( marcellius siahaan ) is a rigid `` all about business `` young profesional .
translation: 里约·丹尼斯沃罗（马塞利乌斯·西亚汉）是一个严格的“全心全意做生意”的年轻专业人士。
back_translation: Rio Denis Volo (Macerlius Siahan) is a young professional who is strictly a "business-first" individual.

text: maggie 's father , yayo , runs a successful bakery , steve is a politician , elena is a fashion designer , ms . al seeks love , conrado is a bashful deliveryman , and mateo is looking for a chance in life .
translation: 玛吉的父亲雅约经营着一家成功的面包店，史蒂夫是一名政治家，埃琳娜是一名时尚设计师，艾尔女士在寻找爱情，孔拉多是一个害羞的送货员，马特奥在寻求生活中的机会。
back_translation: Maggie's father Yahweh runs a successful bakery, Steve is a politician, Elena is a fashion designer, Ms. Al is looking for love, Conrado is a shy delivery man, and Matteo is seeking opportunities in life.

text: after an uncertain start , murder hits and generally sustains a higher plateau with bullock 's memorable first interrogation of gosling .
translation: 在一个不确定的开端之后，《谋杀》进入并通常维持一个更高的水平，特别是布洛克对高斯林的首次令人难忘的审问。
back_translation: After an uncertain beginning, "Murder" enters and usually maintains a higher level, especially with Brock's memorable first interrogation of Gosling.

text: seven-year-old sang-woo is left with his grandmother in a remote village while his mother looks for work .
translation: 七岁的尚宇被留在一个偏远的村庄，与奶奶生活在一起，而他的母亲则外出找工作。
back_translation: Seven-year-old Shang Yu was left in a remote village to live with his grandmother, while his mother went out to find work.

text: a witty coming-of-middle-age comedy with hilarious performances by first-time director tony shalhoub and wife brooke adams .
translation: 一部机智的中年喜剧，由首次执导的托尼·沙尔胡伯和妻子布鲁克·亚当斯带来搞笑表演。
back_translation: A witty comedy about middle age, featuring hilarious performances brought by first-time director Tony Schalhuber and his wife, Brooke Adams.

text: not a stereotype is omitted nor a clichM-i left unsaid .
translation: 没有一个刻板印象被省略，也没有一个陈词滥调被留未说。
back_translation: Not a single stereotype was omitted, nor was any cliché left unspoken.

text: a directorial tour de force by bernard rose , ivans xtc . is one of this year 's very best pictures .
translation: 由伯纳德·罗斯执导的《伊万斯的绝望》是今年最好的影片之一。
back_translation: Directed by Bernard Rose, "Despair" is one of the best films of the year.

text: a profoundly moving document . . . the filmmakers ' refusal to downplay the situation 's intractability makes the glimmer of hope the film offers that much more powerful .
translation: 一部深具感动的文件……电影制作者拒绝淡化这一局势的顽固性，使得影片所提供的那丝希望显得更加强大。
back_translation: A deeply moving documentary... The filmmakers refuse to downplay the stubbornness of the situation, making the glimmer of hope presented in the film feel even more powerful.

text: seducing ben is only beginning ; she becomes his biggest `` fan `` and most unexpected nightmare , as her obsessions quickly spiral out of control into betrayal , madness and , ultimately , murder .
translation: 诱惑本只是开始; 她成为他最大的“粉丝”和最意想不到的噩梦，因为她的痴迷迅速失控，演变成背叛、疯狂，最终以谋杀告终。
back_translation: The temptation was just the beginning; she became his biggest "fan" and the most unexpected nightmare, as her obsession quickly spiraled out of control, evolving into betrayal, madness, and ultimately ending in murder.

text: a haunting , rich film . . . [ fraser ] and caine blend beautifully with their sweet-and-sour mix of acting .
translation: 一部令人难忘、丰富的电影……[弗雷泽]和凯恩在他们甜中带酸的表演中完美融合。
back_translation: An unforgettable and rich film... [Fraser] and Kane perfectly blend in their sweet-and-sour performances.

text: it says a lot about a filmmaker when he can be wacky without clobbering the audience over the head and still maintain a sense of urgency and suspense .
translation: 当一位电影制片人能够让观众感到奇特而不会让人感到厌烦，同时依然保持紧迫感和悬念时，这说明了很多关于他自己的事情。
back_translation: When a filmmaker can make the audience feel intrigued without causing boredom, while still maintaining a sense of urgency and suspense, it says a lot about him.

text: after the short encounter , they separated and go their on ways .
translation: 在短暂的相遇后，他们分开，各自走上了自己的道路。
back_translation: After a brief encounter, they parted ways and each walked their own path.

text: the film is delicately narrated by martin landau and directed with sensitivity and skill by dana janklowicz-mann .
translation: 这部电影由马丁·兰道细腻地叙述，由达娜·扬克洛维奇-曼敏感而熟练地导演。
back_translation: This film is delicately narrated by Martin Landau and sensitively and skillfully directed by Dana Junglovich-Man.

text: who knows what exactly godard is on about in this film , but his words and images do n't have to add up to mesmerize you .
translation: 谁知道戈达尔在这部电影中到底在说什么，但他的话语和图像并不需要相互对应就能让你着迷。
back_translation: Who knows what Godard is really saying in this film, but his words and images can fascinate you without needing to correspond with each other.

text: refusing at first to open up , the young man eventually breaks down and reveals a horrific childhood .
translation: 起初拒绝开放的年轻人最终崩溃，揭示了一个可怕的童年。
back_translation: The young person who initially refused to open up ultimately broke down, revealing a terrifying childhood.

text: features nonsensical and laughable plotting , wooden performances , ineptly directed action sequences and some of the worst dialogue in recent memory .
translation: 情节荒唐可笑，表演生硬，动作场面导演拙劣，还有一些近年来最糟糕的对话。
back_translation: The plot is absurd and ridiculous, the performances are stiff, the action scenes are poorly directed, and there are some of the worst dialogues in recent years.

text: definitely a crowd-pleaser , but then , so was the roman colosseum .
translation: 绝对是众人喜爱的，但罗马斗兽场也是。
back_translation: Absolutely loved by many, but so is the Colosseum.

text: essentially , the film is weak on detail and strong on personality
translation: 本质上，这部电影在细节上较弱，但个性十足。
back_translation: Essentially, this movie is weak in details, but full of personality.

text: the jokes are telegraphed so far in advance they must have been lost in the mail .
translation: 笑话提前得太远，肯定是在邮寄中丢失了。
back_translation: The joke was sent too far in advance, it must have been lost in the mail.

text: there is a knock at the door and mitchell hears his mother asking for t-mon .
translation: 门上响起敲门声，米切尔听到他母亲在叫t-mon。
back_translation: There was a knock on the door, and Mitchell heard his mother calling for t-mon.

text: tins is a glamour doll who is the one person who can help arjun get what he wants .
translation: 蒂娜是一个魅力洋娃娃，唯一能帮助阿尔君得到他所想要的人的。
back_translation: Tina is a charming doll, the only one who can help Aljun get the person he wants.

text: if hill is n't quite his generation 's don siegel ( or robert aldrich ) , it 's because there 's no discernible feeling beneath the chest hair ; it 's all bluster and clichM-i .
translation: 如果希尔不完全是他这一代的唐·西格尔（或罗伯特·阿尔德里奇），那是因为在胸毛下没有明显的情感；一切都是大话和陈词滥调。
back_translation: If Hill is not entirely the Don Siegel (or Robert Aldrich) of his generation, it is because there is no obvious emotion beneath the chest hair; everything is just bluster and cliché.

text: has not so much been written as assembled , frankenstein-like , out of other , marginally better shoot-em-ups .
translation: 并不是写了很多，而是像弗兰肯斯坦一样，从其他边缘略微更好的射击游戏中拼凑而成。
back_translation: It's not that a lot has been written, but rather that it is pieced together like Frankenstein, from other slightly better shooting games on the fringe.

text: at 78 minutes it just zings along with vibrance and warmth .
translation: 在78分钟时，它充满活力和温暖地快速进行。
back_translation: At 78 minutes, it progresses quickly with energy and warmth.

text: i wish i could say `` thank god it 's friday `` , but the truth of the matter is i was glad when it was over .
translation: 我希望我能说“谢谢上帝，今天是周五”，但实际上我很高兴它结束了。
back_translation: I wish I could say "Thank God, it's Friday," but in reality, I'm just glad it's over.

text: he stands at the window and struggles to understand why his mother will not stop smoking , even after being diagnosed with emphysema .
translation: 他站在窗边，努力理解为什么他的母亲在被诊断为肺气肿后仍然不戒烟。
back_translation: He stood by the window, trying to understand why his mother still didn't quit smoking after being diagnosed with emphysema.

text: this is the true story of molly craig , a young black australian girl who leads her younger sister and cousin in an escape from an official government camp , set up as part of an official government policy to train them as domestic workers and integrate them into white society .
translation: 这是年轻的黑澳大利亚女孩莫莉·克雷格的真实故事，她带领她的妹妹和表弟逃离一个官方政府设立的营地，该营地是政府政策的一部分，旨在将她们培养成家庭工作者，并将她们融入白人社会。
back_translation: This is the true story of Molly Craig, a young Aboriginal girl from Australia, who led her sister and cousin to escape from a government-established camp, a part of government policy aimed at training them to become domestic workers and integrating them into white society.

text: the couch - considered holy because certain hasidic rabbis had slept on it - survived wwii and is in the filmmaker 's great grandfather 's house in rohod , a northeast hungarian town .
translation: 这张沙发被认为是神圣的，因为某些哈西迪拉比在上面睡过，它在二战中幸存下来，目前位于匈牙利东北部罗霍德一个小镇的电影制片人曾祖父的家中。
back_translation: This sofa is considered sacred because certain Hasidic rabbis have slept on it. It survived World War II and is currently located in the home of a filmmaker's great-grandfather in a small town in northeastern Hungary.

text: the film sometimes flags . . . but there is enough secondary action to keep things moving along at a brisk , amusing pace .
translation: 这部电影有时会显得有些拖沓……但有足够的次要情节来保持事情以轻快、有趣的节奏继续进行。
back_translation: This movie can sometimes feel a bit slow... but it has enough subplots to keep things moving at a lively and interesting pace.

text: the film is exhilarating to watch because sandler , liberated from the constraints of formula , reveals unexpected depths as an actor .
translation: 这部电影让人看得兴奋，因为桑德勒摆脱了公式的束缚，作为演员展现了意想不到的深度。
back_translation: This movie is exhilarating to watch because Sandler breaks free from the confines of formulaic roles and showcases unexpected depth as an actor.

text: a film centering on a traditional indian wedding in contemporary new delhi may not sound like specialized fare , but mira nair 's film is an absolute delight for all audiences .
translation: 一部以当代新德里传统印度婚礼为中心的电影听起来可能并不特别，但米拉·奈尔的电影绝对是所有观众的美妙享受。
back_translation: A film centered around contemporary traditional Indian weddings in New Delhi may not sound particularly unique, but Mira Nair's film is undoubtedly a wonderful experience for all audiences.

text: jonah is sunday school lite . but it 's told with a comic edge usually associated with the devilish act of laughter .
translation: 约拿是主日学校的轻松版本。但这是以一种通常与恶作剧的笑声相关的喜剧风格来讲述的。
back_translation: Jonah is a relaxed version of the Sunday school. But it is told in a comedic style that is usually associated with the laughter of pranks.

text: everyone is wishing for a miracle to happen this summer .
translation: 每个人都在期望今年夏天能发生奇迹。
back_translation: Everyone is hoping for a miracle to happen this summer.

text: one of the funniest motion pictures of the year , but . . . also one of the most curiously depressing .

text: this time out , [ sade ] is an unsettlingly familiar figure -- in turns loyal and deceitful , responsible and reckless , idealistically selfless and coldly self-interested .

text: it 's a sci-fi , time travel , action adventure , comedy , drama mystery all rolled into one as mark twain on the way home from one of his last speaking tours in 1906 , is jostled on a train by 2 men , one in pursuit of the other , twain picks up a newspaper that one of them drops and the headline reads `` manned mars mission . . . .
translation: 这是一本科幻、时间旅行、动作冒险、喜剧、戏剧和神秘融合在一起的作品，讲述的是马克·吐温在1906年从他最后一次演讲巡回演出回家的路上，在火车上被两个男人推搡，其中一个在追赶另一个，吐温捡起了他们其中一个掉落的报纸，头条写着“载人火星任务……”。
back_translation: This is a work that blends science fiction, time travel, action-adventure, comedy, drama, and mystery, telling the story of Mark Twain being jostled by two men on a train while on his way home from his last speaking tour in 1906, one of whom is chasing the other. Twain picks up a newspaper that one of them dropped, with the headline reading "Manned Mars Mission…".

text: this time , the hype is quieter , and while the movie is slightly less successful than the first , it 's still a rollicking good time for the most part .

text: turns a potentially interesting idea into an excruciating film school experience that plays better only for the film 's publicists or for people who take as many drugs as the film 's characters
translation: 将一个潜在有趣的想法变成了一个痛苦的电影学院体验，这部电影只对电影的宣传人员或像电影中的角色一样吸食大量毒品的人更具吸引力。

text: `` die another day `` is a worthy entry in the pantheon of james bond movies .

text: this is n't a good movie ; this is n't a bad movie . this is a movie that dispenses with the whole good/bad paradigm and exists on its own plane of reality .

back_translation: This is not a good movie; nor is it a bad movie. It is a film that transcends the categories of good and bad and exists independently in its own reality.

text: you can fire a torpedo through some of clancy 's holes , and the scripters do n't deserve any oscars . but the nerve-raked acting , the crackle of lines , the impressive stagings of hardware , make for some robust and scary entertainment .
translation: 你可以通过一些克兰西的漏洞发射鱼雷，而编剧们不值得任何奥斯卡奖。但那种紧张的表演、台词的火花以及令人印象深刻的硬件布置，构成了一些强劲而可怕的娱乐。
back_translation: You can launch torpedoes through some Clancy loopholes, and the writers are not deserving of any Oscar awards. But that kind of tense performance, the spark in the dialogue, and the impressive hardware setup create some powerful and terrifying entertainment.

text: shot on location in the williamsburgh and flatbush neighborhoods of brooklyn , hung-up is a 35mm short story in the tradition of happy gilmore and taxi driver .

text: an unpredictable blend of gal-pal smart talk , romantic comedy and dark tragedy that bites off considerably more than writer/director john mckay can swallow .

back_translation: A virus leaked from a secret facility called "Hivemind," turning all the researchers into hungry zombies and releasing the mutated experiments they were studying, known as "animals."

back_translation: An old-fashioned yet emotionally stirring adventure story, a type of tale that is rarely produced nowadays.

text: the movie sticks much closer to hornby 's drop-dead confessional tone than the film version of high fidelity did .
translation: 这部电影与霍恩比的直白自白语气相比，更加接近，而不是像《高保真》电影版那样。
back_translation: This movie is closer to Hornby's straightforward confessional tone, rather than like the film version of "High Fidelity."

text: wilco fans will have a great time , and the movie should win the band a few new converts , too .
translation: 威尔科的粉丝们会度过美好的时光，这部电影也应该能为乐队吸引一些新的听众。
back_translation: Wilco's fans will have a great time, and this movie should also help the band attract some new listeners.

text: he tries other legal approaches , which also fail .
translation: 他尝试了其他法律途径，但也都失败了。
back_translation: He tried other legal avenues, but they all failed as well.

text: knowing that the legend of the temple describes ancient mystical music as the key to unlock its secrets , jake enlists the help of samantha `` sam `` kincaid , an expert musicologist .
translation: 知道寺庙的传说将古老神秘的音乐描述为解开其秘密的关键，杰克请来了音乐学专家萨曼莎“萨姆”金凯德的帮助。
back_translation: Knowing that the legends of the temple describe the ancient and mysterious music as the key to unlocking its secrets, Jack sought the help of music expert Samantha "Sam" Kincaid.

text: the film is just a big , gorgeous , mind-blowing , breath-taking mess .
translation: 这部影片简直就是一场宏大、华丽、令人震惊和惊心动魄的混乱。
back_translation: This film is simply a grand, magnificent, shocking, and thrilling chaos.

text: an atonal estrogen opera that demonizes feminism while gifting the most sympathetic male of the piece with a nice vomit bath at his wedding .
translation: 一部无调性雌激素歌剧，妖魔化 feminism，同时在男主角的婚礼上赠予他一个舒适的呕吐浴。
back_translation: An atonal estrogen opera that demonizes feminism, while giving the male lead a comforting vomit bath at his wedding.

text: many years have passed since the secret knight avenged his family by slaying the evil knight .
translation: 自从秘密骑士通过击杀邪恶骑士为家人复仇以来，已经过去了许多年。
back_translation: Many years have passed since the Secret Knight avenged his family by killing the Evil Knight.

text: he does n't accept himself and even everyday contacts with others cause his aggression .
translation: 他不接受自己，甚至与他人的日常接触也会引发他的攻击性。
back_translation: He does not accept himself, and even daily interactions with others can trigger his aggression.

text: provided with a blurry picture of william the media turns his ministry into a human interest story that spans the country in a massive media hunt for this `` miracle man `` .
translation: 媒体拿到了一张模糊的威廉照片，便将他的事迹转变为一场跨国的公众关注故事，展开了对这个“奇迹人”的大规模媒体追踪。
back_translation: The media obtained a blurry photo of William and turned his story into a transnational public interest narrative, launching a large-scale media pursuit of this "miracle man."

text: bad . very bad . stultifyingly , dumbfoundingly , mind-numbingly bad .
translation: 糟糕。非常糟糕。令人窒息、令人震惊、令人麻木地糟糕。
back_translation: Terrible. Very terrible. Suffocating, shocking, and numbing terrible.

text: max finally decides to help the fbi by describing his constant dreams about the kidnapping .
translation: 马克斯最终决定通过描述他关于绑架的持续梦境来帮助联邦调查局。
back_translation: Max ultimately decided to assist the FBI by describing his ongoing dreams about the kidnapping.

text: the narrator and the other characters try to convince us that acting transfigures esther , but she 's never seen speaking on stage ; one feels cheated , and esther seems to remain an unchanged dullard .
translation: 叙述者和其他角色试图说服我们，表演让埃丝特发生了变化，但她从未在舞台上讲话；人们会感到被骗，而埃丝特似乎始终是一个毫无变化的呆子。
back_translation: The narrator and other characters try to convince us that the performance changes Esther, but she never speaks on stage; people might feel deceived, and Esther seems to always be a completely unchanged fool.

text: after he 's dumped on valentine 's day by mallory , his girlfriend of three years , charlie finds himself obsessed and unable to live a normal life without her .
translation: 在情人节被交往三年的女友马洛里抛弃后，查理发现自己变得着迷，不再能过上正常的生活。
back_translation: After being dumped by his girlfriend Mallory, whom he had been dating for three years on Valentine’s Day, Charlie found himself becoming obsessed and unable to live a normal life anymore.

text: many a parent and their teen ( or preteen ) kid could bond while watching a walk to remember . so could young romantics out on a date .
translation: 许多父母和他们的青少年（或前青少年）孩子可以在观看《记忆中的步行》时建立感情。年轻的浪漫主义者在约会时也是如此。
back_translation: Many parents and their teenage (or pre-teen) children can develop feelings while watching "Walking in Memory." The same goes for young romantics when dating.

text: amongst these , ruth , a girl of 17 , writes a diary on the journey they are to undertake on the atlantic .
translation: 在这些人中，17岁的女孩露丝在她们即将踏上的大西洋之旅中写下了日记。
back_translation: Among these people, 17-year-old girl Ruth wrote a diary as they were about to embark on their journey across the Atlantic.

text: it made me want to wrench my eyes out of my head and toss them at the screen .
translation: 让我想把眼珠子从眼睛里挖出来扔向屏幕。
back_translation: Let me think about digging my eyeballs out of my eyes and throwing them at the screen.

text: collapses after 30 minutes into a slap-happy series of adolescent violence .
translation: 在30分钟后崩溃，变成一系列轻松愉快的青少年暴力场景。
back_translation: After 30 minutes of collapse, it turned into a series of lighthearted teenage violence scenes.

text: it all drags on so interminably it 's like watching a miserable relationship unfold in real time .
translation: 一切都拖延得无休止，就像在实时观看一段悲惨的关系展开。
back_translation: Everything drags on endlessly, like watching a tragic relationship unfold in real time.

text: jacobi , the most fluent of actors , is given relatively dry material from nijinsky 's writings to perform , and the visuals , even erotically frank ones , become dullingly repetitive .
translation: 雅可比，这位最为流利的演员，所表演的材料相对干燥，来自尼金斯基的著作，尽管视觉效果，甚至是露骨的画面，变得令人乏味地重复。
back_translation: Jacobi, the most fluent actor, performed material that is relatively dry, drawn from Nijinsky's works, even though the visual effects, and even the explicit images, became tediously repetitive.

text: as [ the characters ] get more depressed , the story gets more tiresome , especially as it continues to mount a conspicuous effort to be profound .
translation: 随着角色们越来越沮丧，故事变得更加乏味，尤其是在它不断努力显得深刻的时候。
back_translation: As the characters become increasingly frustrated, the story becomes more tedious, especially as it constantly struggles to appear profound.

text: but this murder investigation is drawing vincent home to long beach , the self-proclaimed city by the sea , where the past has been waiting for him to return .
translation: 但这起谋杀调查正将文森特带回长滩，这座自称“海滨城市”的地方，过去一直在等待他的归来。
back_translation: But this murder investigation is bringing Vincent back to Long Beach, a place that calls itself a "coastal city" and has been waiting for his return.

text: a story about a troubled genius who attempts to build a magnetic engine in hopes of greatly reducing the worlds consumption of fossil fuels and electricity .
translation: 一个关于困扰天才的故事，他试图制造一台磁能发动机，希望大大减少全球对化石燃料和电力的消耗。
back_translation: A story about a genius who is troubled as he attempts to create a magnetic energy engine, hoping to significantly reduce the world's consumption of fossil fuels and electricity.

text: the dons have their own hierarchal manipulations - chotte baba ( jackie shroff ) , medium baba ( gulshan grover ) and bade baba ( amitabh bachchan ) .
translation: 教父们有他们自己的等级操控 - 小爸爸（杰基·沙roff）、中爸爸（古尔珊·格罗弗）和大爸爸（阿米特·巴赫坎）。
back_translation: The Godfathers have their own hierarchy - little dad (Jackie Shroff), middle dad (Gulshan Grover), and big dad (Amitabh Bachchan).

text: one of those movies that catches you up in something bigger than yourself , namely , an archetypal desire to enjoy good trash every now and then .
translation: 这是那些电影之一，它让你陷入比自己更大的事物中，即一种原型的渴望，偶尔享受一些好垃圾。
back_translation: This is one of those movies that immerses you in something larger than yourself, a longing for archetypes, occasionally enjoying some good trash.

text: even if you do n't understand what on earth is going on , this is a movie that will stimulate hours of post viewing discussion , if only to be reminded of who did what to whom and why .
translation: 即使你不明白到底发生了什么，这部电影还是会激发数小时的观看后讨论，至少会提醒你谁对谁做了什么以及为什么。
back_translation: Even if you don't fully understand what happened, this movie will spark hours of discussion after watching, reminding you at least about who did what to whom and why.

text: [ grant 's ] bumbling magic takes over the film , and it turns out to be another winning star vehicle .
translation: [格兰特的] 笨拙魔法主导了电影，结果这又是一部成功的明星影片。
back_translation: Grant's clumsy magic dominated the film, resulting in another successful star-studded movie.

text: the doctor also finds he has an attraction to her , despite their age difference .
translation: 医生发现自己对她产生了吸引力，尽管他们之间有年龄差异。
back_translation: The doctor found himself attracted to her, despite the age difference between them.

text: an exciting debut from promising , and fairly disturbed , young director/screenwriter dylan kidd .
translation: 一位前途光明且颇为困扰的年轻导演/编剧迪伦·基德带来了令人兴奋的首秀。
back_translation: A promising yet troubled young director/screenwriter, Dylan Kidd, has delivered an exciting debut.

text: the editing is chaotic , the photography grainy and badly focused , the writing unintentionally hilarious , the direction unfocused , the performances as wooden .
translation: 剪辑杂乱，摄影颗粒感强且对焦不准，写作意外搞笑，导演思路不清，表演生硬。
back_translation: The editing is chaotic, the cinematography has a strong grainy feel and the focus is off, the writing is unexpectedly funny, the director's vision is unclear, and the performances are stiff.

text: in this age of soulless , fx-driven action franchises raimi anachronistically emphasizes character development .
translation: 在这个灵魂缺失、特效驱动的动作系列时代，雷米不合时宜地强调角色发展。
back_translation: In this era of soulless, effects-driven action series, Remy inappropriately emphasizes character development.

text: the only excitement comes when the credits finally roll and you get to leave the theater .
translation: 唯一的兴奋就是当片尾字幕终于滚动时，你可以离开电影院。
back_translation: The only excitement is when the end credits finally roll, and you can leave the cinema.

text: nothing makes this woman happy , including her wealthy but passive husband ( tony ) , a pharmaceutical kingpin .
translation: 这个女人没有什么能让她快乐，包括她那富有但消极的丈夫（托尼），一个制药大亨。
back_translation: This woman has nothing that makes her happy, including her wealthy but negative husband (Tony), a pharmaceutical tycoon.

text: in the bank vault the young man discovers his name , jason bourne .
translation: 在银行的保险库里，年轻人发现了他的名字，杰森·伯恩。
back_translation: In the bank's vault, the young man found his name, Jason Bourne.

text: ultimately , the film amounts to being lectured to by tech-geeks , if you 're up for that sort of thing .
translation: 最终，这部电影就像是被科技极客们讲课，如果你对此感兴趣的话。
back_translation: In the end, this movie feels like a lecture delivered by technology geeks, if you're interested in that.

text: she 's aided by her sister sue ( zhao wei ) , who operates the pair 's world panorama surveillance system , which allows them to tap into any video security system in the world .
translation: 她的妹妹苏（赵薇）对她提供帮助，苏负责操作这对姐妹的全球全景监控系统，允许她们连接世界上任何视频监控系统。
back_translation: Her sister Su (Zhao Wei) helps her, and Su is in charge of operating the global panoramic monitoring system for the sisters, allowing them to connect to any video surveillance system in the world.

text: just a collection of this and that -- whatever fills time -- with no unified whole .
translation: 这只是一些琐碎的东西的集合——任何消磨时间的东西——没有统一的整体。
back_translation: This is just a collection of trivial things—anything to pass the time—lacking a unified whole.

text: a lot can happen when an honest , young , naive japanese man visits a foreign country for the first time .
translation: 诚实、年轻、天真的日本男人第一次访问外国时，可能会发生很多事情。
back_translation: An honest, young, and naive Japanese man may encounter many things during his first visit to a foreign country.

text: eva dandridge is a very uptight young woman who constantly meddles in the affairs of her sisters and their husbands .
translation: 伊娃·丹德里奇是一个非常紧张的年轻女性，她不断插手她姐妹和她们丈夫的事务。
back_translation: Eva Dandrich is a very anxious young woman who constantly meddles in the affairs of her sisters and their husbands.

text: suddenly , fields realizes that he has more in common with the migrants and their search for home , family and freedom than he thought .
translation: 突然，费尔兹意识到自己与移民们在寻找家、家庭和自由的过程中有更多共同点，比他想象的要多。
back_translation: Suddenly, Feirz realized that he had more in common with the immigrants in their search for home, family, and freedom than he had imagined.

text: . . . in the pile of useless actioners from mtv schmucks who do n't know how to tell a story for more than four minutes .
translation: ……在那些来自不懂得讲述超过四分钟故事的MTV傻瓜们所制作的一堆无用动作片中。
back_translation: ...among a bunch of useless action movies made by those MTV fools who can't tell a story longer than four minutes.

text: lilli black , battling her painful memories and the secrets surrounding her dying father , collides into the complicated and obsessive life of morrison wiley on the streets of new york city .
translation: 莉莉·布莱克在与痛苦的记忆和围绕她垂死父亲的秘密斗争时，撞上了摩里森·怀利在纽约街头复杂而执着的生活。
back_translation: Lily Black collides with Morrison Wylie’s complex and tenacious life on the streets of New York while grappling with painful memories and the secrets surrounding her dying father.

text: the subtitled costume drama is set in a remote african empire before cell phones , guns , and the internal combustion engine , but the politics that thump through it are as timely as tomorrow .
translation: 这部带字幕的 Costum剧设定在一个偏远的非洲帝国，时间在手机、枪支和内燃机出现之前，但其中的政治动荡与明天一样及时。
back_translation: This subtitled costume drama is set in a remote African empire, before the emergence of mobile phones, firearms, and internal combustion engines, yet its political turmoil is as timely as tomorrow.

text: after being trapped in hell for quite some time , freddy krueger meets up with jason voorhees after jason is sent to hell by creighton duke ( forget part x ; rewind to friday the 13th part ix ) .
translation: 在地狱被困了很长一段时间后，弗雷迪·克鲁格与杰森·沃赫斯相遇，此时杰森被克雷顿·迪克送入地狱（忘记第十部分；倒回《十三号星期五》第九部分）。
back_translation: After being trapped in hell for a long time, Freddy Krueger encounters Jason Voorhees, who has been sent to hell by Creighton Duke (forget about Part 10; rewind to Friday the 13th Part 9).

text: rajani plans to offer her daughter to an older man , a rich husband and protector to her daughter .
translation: 拉贾尼计划将女儿嫁给一个年长的男人，一个富有的丈夫和女儿的保护者。
back_translation: Rajani plans to marry her daughter to an older man, a wealthy husband and protector of her daughter.

text: sunshine state is sayles at his most robert altman-ish , purposefully juggling about a dozen narrative balls in the air , and letting the mundanity and smallish drama of everyday life tell a larger story .
translation: 阳光州是塞尔斯在他最具罗伯特·阿尔特曼风格的作品中，自觉地将大约十个叙事元素抛向空中，让日常生活的平凡和琐碎戏剧讲述一个更大的故事。
back_translation: Sunshine State is a work by Searls in which he consciously tosses about ten narrative elements into the air in his most Robert Altman-style piece, allowing the ordinary and trivial dramas of everyday life to tell a larger story.

text: the story revolves around a dying father and his son , who is trying to learn more about his dad by piecing together the stories he has gathered over the years .
translation: 这个故事围绕一个濒死的父亲和他的儿子展开，儿子试图通过拼凑多年收集的故事来更多地了解父亲。
back_translation: This story revolves around a dying father and his son, who tries to learn more about his father by piecing together stories collected over the years.

text: 'all in all , reign of fire will be a good ( successful ) rental . '
translation: 总的来说，《火焰之王》将会是一部好的（成功的）租赁影片。
back_translation: Overall, "King of Flames" will be a good (successful) rental film.

text: an unusual family and a staff of two are preparing a party on their cosy mansion .
translation: 一个不寻常的家庭和两个员工正在为他们温馨的 mansion 准备一场派对。
back_translation: An unusual family and two employees are preparing for a party in their cozy mansion.

text: cac & # 225 ; , a vj who works for s & # 227 ; o paulo mtv , comes to rio de janeiro to make a report about a new band , whose members are poor and live in a slum called morro do alem & # 227 ; o .
translation: cac & # 225 ;，一位为圣保罗 MTV 工作的 VJ，来里约热内卢做一个关于一个新乐队的报道，这个乐队的成员贫穷，住在一个叫做 Morro do Alem & # 227 ; o 的贫民窟。
back_translation: Cac, a VJ who works for MTV in São Paulo, came to Rio de Janeiro to do a report on a new band whose members are poor and live in a slum called Morro do Alemão.

text: the filmmaker ascends , literally , to the olympus of the art world , but he would have done well to end this flawed , dazzling series with the raising of something other than his own cremaster .
translation: 这位电影制作人在艺术界的殿堂中上升，字面上说，但他最好能以其他事物的提升来结束这一 flawed、耀眼的系列，而不是他自己的cremaster。
back_translation: This filmmaker rises in the hall of fame in the art world, literally speaking, but he would do best to conclude this flawed, dazzling series with the elevation of other things rather than his own cremaster.

text: maybe it 's the star power of the cast or the redundant messages , but something aboul `` full frontal `` seems , well , contrived .
translation: 也许是演员的星光魅力或多余的信息，但《全裸》似乎显得有些做作。
back_translation: Perhaps it's the starry charm of the actors or the excessive information, but "All Naked" seems a bit pretentious.

text: charlotte contacts the perfect life saver to thank him , but everything is n't what it seems .
translation: 夏洛特联系了完美的救命恩人以表达感谢，但一切并不像看起来那样。
back_translation: Charlotte contacted her perfect savior to express her gratitude, but everything is not as it seems.

text: impostor does n't do much with its template , despite a remarkably strong cast .
translation: 《冒名顶替者》尽管有着相当强大的演员阵容，但在其模板上并没有做太多创新。
back_translation: "Imposter" has a quite strong cast, but does not innovate much on its template.

text: works better in the conception than it does in the execution . . . winds up seeming just a little too clever .
translation: 在构思上效果更好，而在执行上则显得稍显做作……最终似乎显得有些过于聪明。
back_translation: The concept is more effective, but the execution seems a bit forced... In the end, it appears somewhat overly clever.

text: based on euripides ' immortal drama of the same name , the bacchae ( bahk-ai ' ) is an intense and contemporary retelling of the classic myth in which dionysus , son of zeus , seeks vengeance on thebes , the city of his birth and site of his mortal mother semele 's cruel and horrible death .
translation: 根据欧里庇得斯的同名不朽戏剧，《巴卡赫》（Bahk-ai）是一部激烈而现代的重述经典神话的作品，其中宙斯之子酒神狄俄尼索斯寻求对其出生地底比斯的报复，那是他凡人母亲塞墨勒遭受残酷而可怕死亡的地方。
back_translation: Based on Euripides' timeless play of the same name, "Bacchae" is a passionate and modern retelling of a classic myth in which Zeus's son, the god of wine Dionysus, seeks revenge on his birthplace of Thebes, the place where his mortal mother Semele suffered a cruel and terrible death.

text: blade then tenuously enters into an alliance with the bloodpack , an elite team of vampires trained in all modes of combat to defeat the reaper threat .
translation: 布雷德随后与血盟建立了脆弱的联盟，血盟是一个精英吸血鬼团队，经过各种战斗方式的训练，以击败收割者的威胁。
back_translation: Bled subsequently formed a fragile alliance with the Blood League, an elite team of vampires trained in various combat methods to counter the threat of the Reapers.

text: as they encounter ranger megan it turns out that werewolves are active in the region .
translation: 当他们遇到游骑兵梅根时，发现狼人正在该地区活跃。
back_translation: When they encountered the Ranger Megan, they discovered that werewolves were active in the area.

text: it is bad , but certainly not without merit as entertainment .
translation: 这很糟糕，但作为娱乐内容肯定不乏有其价值。
back_translation: This is terrible, but as entertainment content, it definitely has its value.

text: but he meets cac & # 225 ; 's brother , nando , who tries to convince him to take part in a scam .
translation: 但他遇到了Cac的哥哥南多，他试图说服他参与一个诈骗。
back_translation: But he encountered Cac's brother, Nando, who tried to persuade him to participate in a scam.

text: documentary about robert mcnamara , secretary of defense in the kennedy and johnson administrations , who subsequently became president of the world bank .
translation: 关于罗伯特·麦克纳马拉的纪录片，他是甘迺迪和约翰逊政府的国防部长，后来成为世界银行的总统。
back_translation: The documentary is about Robert McNamara, who served as the Secretary of Defense under the Kennedy and Johnson administrations, and later became the president of the World Bank.

text: `` pink-loving , blonde-haired harvard law school graduate elle woods ( witherspoon ) returns in this sequel , as she turns her legal and fashion-savvy know-how towards getting a bill passed through congress , relocating a second time , after adapting her beverly hills ways to harvard , and now . . .
translation: 热爱粉色的金发哈佛法学院毕业生艾尔·伍兹（瑞茜·威瑟斯彭饰）在这部续集中回归，她将自己的法律和时尚诀窍转向推动一项法案在国会通过，并再次搬迁，此前她已将自己在比佛利山庄的生活方式适应到了哈佛，现在……
back_translation: The pink-loving, blonde-haired Harvard Law School graduate Elle Woods (played by Reese Witherspoon) returns in this sequel, using her legal and fashion savvy to push a bill through Congress and relocating once again, having previously adapted her lifestyle from Beverly Hills to Harvard, and now...

text: when gene returns , lillian finds herself caught in the middle of a triangle .
translation: 当基因回来时，莉莲发现自己身处三角关系之中。
back_translation: When the genes returned, Lillian found herself in a love triangle.

text: the lord of the vampires is about some 20 something kids getting into trouble and then stepping into even bigger trouble when they happen upon a peculiar home .
translation: 《吸血鬼之王》讲述了一群二十多岁的年轻人陷入麻烦，然后当他们偶然发现一座奇特的家时，卷入更大麻烦的故事。
back_translation: "The King of Vampires" tells the story of a group of young people in their twenties who find themselves in trouble, and then get caught in even bigger trouble when they accidentally discover a strange house.

text: even by dumb action-movie standards , ballistic : ecks vs . sever is a dumb action movie .
translation: 即使按低智商动作电影的标准，《弹道：艾克斯对塞佛》也是一部愚蠢的动作电影。

text: in the end , the film is less the cheap thriller you 'd expect than it is a fairly revealing study of its two main characters M-^W damaged-goods people whose orbits will inevitably and dangerously collide .
translation: 最终，这部电影不像你预期的那样是廉价惊悚片，而是对两个主要角色——受伤的人——进行的相当揭示性的研究，他们的轨迹不可避免且危险地交汇。
back_translation: Ultimately, this film is not the cheap thriller you might expect, but rather a quite revealing study of the two main characters — the wounded people — whose trajectories inevitably and dangerously intersect.

text: one tragic night , john rescues angela from a wicked act of betrayal .

text: kung pow is oedekerk 's realization of his childhood dream to be in a martial-arts flick , and proves that sometimes the dreams of youth should remain just that .
translation: 《功夫搞笑》是奥德基克实现他童年梦想到武侠电影中出演的作品，证明有时候年轻时的梦想应该留在梦中。
back_translation: "Kung Fu Comedy" is a work in which Oddy Kk realizes his childhood dream of appearing in a martial arts film, proving that sometimes dreams from youth should remain just that—dreams.

text: the movie is too cute to take itself too seriously , but it still feels like it was made by some very stoned college students .

text: in order to continue giving therapy without leaving his home he gives it over the internet .

text: not about to lose the fortune she amassed with her self-serving texas husband , she makes an offer to her process server , joe ( matthew perry ) that sets them off on a wild trip across the country .
translation: 她不想失去与她自私的德克萨斯丈夫累积的财富，便向她的送达员乔（马修·佩里）提出了一个提议，让他们踏上了一场疯狂的横穿美国之旅。
back_translation: She didn't want to lose the wealth she had accumulated with her selfish Texas husband, so she made a proposal to her delivery man Joe (Matthew Perry), which led them on a crazy cross-country journey across America.

back_translation: Mary Gilbert, head of the FBI's Internet Investigation Division, is handling the case with her team and her awkward nephew.

text: the fascination comes in the power of the huston performance , which seems so larger than life and yet so fragile , and in the way the ivan character accepts the news of his illness so quickly but still finds himself unable to react .
translation: 这种迷人的地方在于休斯顿表演的力量，这种力量似乎超越了生活，但又如此脆弱；还有伊万角色如此迅速地接受自己生病的消息，却又发现自己无法作出反应。
back_translation: The charm of this place lies in the power of the performance in Houston, a power that seems to transcend life yet is so fragile; and in Ivan's character, who quickly comes to terms with the news of his illness but finds himself unable to react.

translation: 一个盲女孩接受了角膜移植手术，以便能够再次看见。

text: deep intelligence and a warm , enveloping affection breathe out of every frame .

text: following the gruesome murder of a young woman in her neighborhood , a self-determined woman living in new york city -- as if to test the limits of her own safety -- propels herself into an impossibly risky sexual liaison .

translation: 提供引人入胜的悬念和可信的人物，而不依赖于当下流行的技术手法或做作的对话。

translation: 《基督山伯爵》巧妙地强调了精心编织的故事，省略了不必要的追逐场景和剑斗，随着复仇的展开。

translation: 这些热烈基督教故事情节的一个关键问题是，事情的结果从来没有悬念。

translation: 现在他正在与超越坟墓的力量作斗争。

translation: 宝莱坞/好莱坞是一部轻松愉快的小品电影，令人容易品味，因为它既不费力又极具回报。

text: it is as uncompromising as it is nonjudgmental , and makes clear that a prostitute can be as lonely and needy as any of the clients .
translation: 它既毫不妥协，又不带评判，明确表示妓女的孤独和需求可以和任何客户一样强烈。

text: he meets god and is given all the powers of god .

text: `` i blame all men for war , `` [ the warden 's daughter ] tells her father . the movie is about as deep as that sentiment .

back_translation: "I blame all wars on all men," [the prison warden's daughter] told her father. The depth of this film is roughly captured by that sentiment.

text: to what sweet end is the story of a reunion between mary and david , who were once passionate lovers - for two weeks , thirty-five years ago and have n't seen each other since .
translation: 玛丽和大卫之间的重聚故事，曾是一对热情洋溢的恋人——在三十五年前的两周里，他们彼此相爱，此后再未相见，这个故事的美好结局是什么呢？
back_translation: The reunion story between Mary and David, who were once passionate lovers—during a two-week period thirty-five years ago, they loved each other and have not seen each other since. What is the beautiful ending of this story?

text: he 's not happy just to run this fratricidal con , he also wants to cash in as much as he can of one hundred kilos of crystal meth that he stole from the rojas ( and the mexicans ) , seduce the girlfriend of one of his victims , and stay ahead of a cop who was a childhood friend .
translation: 他不仅不满足于参与这个兄弟之间的欺诈，他还想尽可能多地从他从罗哈斯（和墨西哥人）那里偷来的十公斤冰毒中获利，勾引他受害者的女友，并且要时刻提防一位曾是童年朋友的警察。
back_translation: He was not only dissatisfied with participating in the fraud among the brothers, but he also wanted to profit as much as possible from the ten kilograms of ice meth he had stolen from Rojas (and the Mexicans), seduce his victim's girlfriend, and always keep an eye out for a police officer who had once been a childhood friend.

text: one by one , his friends are deserting his annual pilgrimage to the wisconsin state high school hockey tournament , forcing him to confront some harsh truths about his bizarre obsession .
translation: 一个接一个，他的朋友们纷纷退出对威斯康星州高中冰球锦标赛的年度朝圣，迫使他面对自己对这种怪异痴迷的一些严酷真相。
back_translation: One by one, his friends were dropping out of the annual pilgrimage to the Wisconsin high school hockey championship, forcing him to confront some harsh truths about his strange obsession.

text: using two separate filmmaking teams ( an all-white crew filming white residents and an all-black camera crew filming black residents ) , two towns of jasper captures very different racial views by townsfolk in jasper , texas , the location for a racially motivated murder of an african american in 1998 .
translation: 使用两个独立的电影制作团队（一个全白人团队拍摄白人居民，一个全黑人摄影团队拍摄黑人居民），《杰斯珀的两个城市》展示了德克萨斯州杰斯珀市居民截然不同的种族观点，这是1998年一起针对一名非洲裔美国人的种族动机谋杀案的发生地。
back_translation: Using two independent film production teams (one all-white team shooting white residents and one all-black team shooting black residents), "Two Towns of Jasper" showcases the starkly different racial perspectives of the residents of Jasper, Texas, the site of a racially motivated murder of an African American in 1998.

text: a whimsical if predictable time-travel fable marred by a willful single-mindedness .
translation: 一个古怪但可预测的时间旅行寓言，被固执的单一思维所破坏。
back_translation: A quirky yet predictable time travel fable disrupted by stubborn single-mindedness.

text: cold , pretentious , thoroughly dislikable study in sociopathy .
translation: 冷漠、虚伪，彻底让人厌恶的反社会行为研究。
back_translation: Indifferent, hypocritical, utterly detestable antisocial behavior research.

text: he has yet to break out from under his mentor 's shadow until he finds a pair of love letters in the textbook that once belonged to one of his idols , a famous long dead victorian poet .
translation: 他还没有摆脱他导师的阴影，直到他在一本曾属于他偶像的教材中发现了一对情书，那个偶像是一位已故的著名维多利亚时期诗人。
back_translation: He had not yet escaped the shadow of his mentor until he discovered a pair of love letters in a textbook that once belonged to his idol, a deceased famous Victorian poet.

text: do n't let the subtitles fool you ; the movie only proves that hollywood no longer has a monopoly on mindless action .
translation: 不要让字幕欺骗你；这部电影只是证明好莱坞不再垄断无脑动作片。
back_translation: Don't let the subtitles deceive you; this movie is just proof that Hollywood no longer monopolizes brainless action films.

text: centers on an american ex-soldier ( washington ) living out his days in naples , italy .
translation: 故事围绕一位在意大利那不勒斯度过余生的美国退伍军人（华盛顿）。
back_translation: The story revolves around an American veteran (Washington) spending his later years in Naples, Italy.

text: 'ejemplo de una cinta en que no importa el talento de su reparto o lo interesante que pudo haber resultado su premisa , pues el resultado es francamente aburrido y , por momentos , deplorable . '
translation: '这是一个例子，说明一部电影的演员阵容或它的前提再有趣，也无关紧要，因为最终的结果实在是无聊，有时甚至令人沮丧。'
back_translation: "This is an example that illustrates that no matter how interesting a movie's cast or premise may be, it ultimately doesn't matter because the final result is simply boring, and sometimes even frustrating."

text: nair does capture the complexity of a big family and its trials and tribulations . . .
translation: 奈尔确实捕捉到了大家庭的复杂性及其经历的磨难与考验……
back_translation: Nile has indeed captured the complexity of the extended family and the trials and hardships they experience...

text: if director michael dowse only superficially understands his characters , he does n't hold them in contempt .
translation: 如果导演迈克尔·道斯只是浅显地理解他的角色，他并不鄙视他们。
back_translation: If director Michael Dawes understands his characters only superficially, he does not look down on them.

text: nete 's father does not die , his appetite comes back , the doctors begin to have doubts as to the prognosis , and nete has a problem .
translation: nete的父亲没有死，他的食欲恢复了，医生们开始对预后产生怀疑，而nete面临一个问题。
back_translation: Nete's father is not dead; his appetite has returned, and the doctors have begun to question the prognosis, while Nete faces a dilemma.

text: this follow-up boasts most of the felicities of the original .
translation: 这部续集拥有原作的大部分优点。
back_translation: This sequel retains most of the original's strengths.

text: unspools like a highbrow , low-key , 102-minute infomercial , blending entrepreneurial zeal with the testimony of satisfied customers .
translation: 像一部高雅、低调的102分钟信息广告一样展开，将创业热情与满意客户的证词结合在一起。
back_translation: It unfolds like an elegant, understated 102-minute infomercial, combining entrepreneurial passion with testimonials from satisfied customers.

text: attal 's hang-ups surrounding infidelity are so old-fashioned and , dare i say , outdated , it 's a wonder that he could n't have brought something fresher to the proceedings simply by accident .
translation: 阿塔尔对不忠的固执观念如此陈腐，敢说已经过时，真让人惊讶他竟然没有意外地在这场过程中带来一些更新鲜的东西。
back_translation: Attal's stubborn views on infidelity are so stale that it is surprising that he has not unexpectedly brought something fresher to this process.

text: soon , the entire team is self-destructing , and bret could n't be happier .
translation: 不久之后，整个团队自我崩溃，而布雷特快乐得不可自已。
back_translation: Not long after, the entire team fell apart, and Brett was happier than ever.

text: jarecki and gibney do find enough material to bring kissinger 's record into question and explain how the diplomat 's tweaked version of statecraft may have cost thousands and possibly millions of lives .
translation: 贾雷基和吉本确实找到了足够的材料来质疑基辛格的记录，并解释了这位外交官调整后的国家治理方式可能导致数千甚至数百万人的生命损失。
back_translation: Jarecki and Gibney indeed found enough material to question Kissinger's record and explain how this diplomat's altered approach to governance could result in the loss of thousands or even millions of lives.

text: fearing also for the safety of her daughter , she decides that there 's only one way out of the marriage : kill him .
translation: 她也担心女儿的安全，因此决定婚姻只有一个出路：杀了他。
back_translation: She is also worried about her daughter's safety, so she decides that there is only one way out of the marriage: to kill him.

text: t & # 252 ; rlich accidentally stumbles across some information about his origin and decides to go to klein ischgl in austria .
translation: 特尔里赫意外发现了一些关于自己起源的信息，并决定前往奥地利的小伊施格尔。
back_translation: Terlihe unexpectedly discovered some information about his origins and decided to travel to Ischgl, Austria.

text: behind the glitz , hollywood is sordid and disgusting . quelle surprise !
translation: 在华丽的背后，好莱坞却是肮脏和令人厌恶的。真是意料之中！
back_translation: Behind the glamour, Hollywood is dirty and disgusting. It's really not surprising!

text: the story drifts so inexorably into cliches about tortured ( and torturing ) artists and consuming but impossible love that you ca n't help but become more disappointed as each overwrought new sequence plods on .
translation: 这个故事不可避免地陷入了关于受折磨（和折磨他人）的艺术家以及消耗但不可能的爱情的陈词滥调中，随着每一个过于煽情的新场景的拖沓进展，你不禁感到越来越失望。
back_translation: This story inevitably falls into the clichés about tormented (and tormenting) artists, as well as the exhausting yet impossible love, and with the sluggish progression of each overly emotional new scene, you can't help but feel increasingly disappointed.

text: rudy yellowshirt is an investigator with the police department and witnesses firsthand the painful legacy of indian existence .
translation: 鲁迪·黄衬衫是警察局的调查员，亲眼目睹了印度人存在的痛苦遗产。
back_translation: Rudy, in a yellow shirt, is an investigator at the police station who has witnessed firsthand the painful legacy of the Indians.

text: the waterlogged script plumbs uncharted depths of stupidity , incoherence and sub-sophomoric sexual banter .
translation: 这部水logged 剧本深入探讨了愚蠢、不连贯和幼稚的性玩笑的未知深度。
back_translation: This waterlogged script delves deep into the unknown depths of stupid, incoherent, and childish sexual jokes.

text: anton jackson is an african-american man who seems harmless enough on the surface , but is a secret agent in the all-black brotherhood , an entity that levels the playing field against the all-white establishment .
translation: 安东·杰克逊是一个表面上看起来无害的非裔美国人，但实际上他是全黑兄弟会的秘密特工，这个组织旨在与全白建制势力对抗，改变游戏规则。
back_translation: Anton Jackson appears to be a harmless African American on the surface, but in reality, he is a secret agent for the All-Black Brotherhood, an organization aimed at opposing the all-white establishment and changing the rules of the game.

text: piccoli 's performance is amazing , yes , but the symbols of loss and denial and life-at-arm's-length in the film seem irritatingly transparent .
translation: 皮科利的表演很出色，是的，但电影中关于失落、否认和与生活保持距离的象征似乎令人恼火地透明。
back_translation: Pekoli's performance is excellent, yes, but the symbols in the movie about loss, denial, and keeping a distance from life seem frustratingly transparent.

text: a love triangle forms , with rachael , the least interested and keen to leave , but clues to her mothers whereabouts appear , as do her own problems which both rafe and matt wish to help with .
translation: 一个爱情三角关系形成，瑞秋是最不感兴趣的，渴望离开，但她母亲的下落线索出现了，她自己的问题也随之而来，拉斐和马特都希望能帮忙。
back_translation: A love triangle forms, with Rachel being the least interested and eager to leave, but clues about her mother's whereabouts emerge, bringing her own issues to the forefront. Both Raphael and Matt hope to help.

text: hollywood ending is not show-stoppingly hilarious , but scathingly witty nonetheless .
translation: 《好莱坞结局》虽然没有令人瞩目的搞笑效果，但依然机智尖锐。
back_translation: "Hollywood Ending," while lacking standout comedic effects, is still witty and sharp.

text: ploddy and his policeman rikhard set out to find the thieves - but it turns out to be both difficult and challenging !
translation: 普洛迪和他的警察理查德出发去寻找小偷，但结果证明这既困难又具挑战性！
back_translation: Proddy and his policeman Richard set off to look for the thief, but it turned out to be both difficult and challenging!

text: but too late or otherwise , love at first sight is exactly what happens .
translation: 但无论是太晚还是其他情况，一见钟情正是发生的事情。
back_translation: But whether it's too late or for other reasons, love at first sight is exactly what happens.

text: the plan goes awry when trasha and her psychosis find themselves a paying gig and tables are turned , trashed and burned .
translation: 当特拉莎和她的精神病找到一个有偿工作时，计划发生了偏差，局势反转，变得一团糟并且被烧毁。
back_translation: When Teresa and her mental illness found a paid job, the plan went awry, the situation reversed, became a mess, and was burned down.

text: for every inspired bit of absurdity , there 's a lame piece of improvisational noodling .
translation: 每一个充满灵感的荒谬之处，背后都有一段乏味的即兴瞎扯。
back_translation: Behind every inspiring absurdity lies a dull improvisational nonsense.

text: asia authors herself as anna battista , an italian superstar and aspiring directress who just happens to be her own worst enemy .
translation: 亚洲作者自称为安娜·巴蒂斯塔，一位意大利超级明星和有抱负的导演，恰好成为了自己最大的敌人。
back_translation: The Asian author refers to herself as Anna Battista, an Italian superstar and aspiring director, who happens to become her own biggest enemy.

text: half of it is composed of snappy patter and pseudo-sophisticated cultural observations , while the remainder . . . would be more at home on a daytime television serial .
translation: 其中一半由生动的对话和伪高级的文化观察组成，而其余部分……更适合在日间电视剧中出现。
back_translation: Half of it consists of lively dialogue and pseudo-highbrow cultural observations, while the rest... is more suited for daytime soap operas.

text: some movies were made for the big screen , some for the small screen , and some , like ballistic : ecks vs . sever , were made for the palm screen .
translation: 一些电影是为大屏幕制作的，有些是为小屏幕制作的，还有一些像《弹道：艾克斯与塞弗》则是为掌中屏制作的。
back_translation: Some movies are made for the big screen, some are made for the small screen, and some, like "Ballistic: Ecks vs. Sever," are made for handheld screens.

text: berling and bM-iart . . . continue to impress , and isabelle huppert . . . again shows uncanny skill in getting under the skin of her characters .
translation: 伯林和bM-iart……继续让人印象深刻，而伊莎贝尔·于佩尔……再次展现了她在深入角色内心方面的非凡才能。
back_translation: Berlin and bM-iart… continue to impress, while Isabelle Huppert… once again showcases her extraordinary talent for delving into the depths of her characters.

text: without family and all on her own , she only can confide her troubles to simon ( ray walston ) .
translation: 没有家人，全靠自己，她只能向西蒙（雷·沃尔斯顿）倾诉她的烦恼。
back_translation: Without family and relying solely on herself, she could only confide her troubles to Simon (Ray Winstone).

text: its inescapable absurdities are tantamount to insulting the intelligence of anyone who has n't been living under a rock ( since sept . 11 ) .
translation: 其不可避免的荒谬性无疑是在侮辱任何自九月十一日以来没有生活在石头下的人的智力。
back_translation: Its inevitable absurdity is undoubtedly an insult to the intelligence of anyone who has not been living under a rock since September 11.

text: this breezy caper movie becomes a soulful , incisive meditation on the way we were , and the way we are .
translation: 这部轻松的犯罪电影变成了一场深刻而富有情感的反思，关于我们曾经的样子和现在的样子。
back_translation: This lighthearted crime movie has transformed into a profound and emotional reflection on how we once were and how we are now.

text: somewhat blurred , but kinnear 's performance is razor sharp .
translation: 有些模糊，但基尼尔的表演却十分出色。
back_translation: It's a bit blurry, but Ginnell's performance is truly outstanding.

text: the journey takes them from the inner city to a satanic black mass ceremony , and into the depths of their own souls , as they search for johann christoph haizmann , the antichrist .
translation: 这段旅程将他们从市中心带到一个撒旦的黑弥撒仪式，深入到他们自己的灵魂深处，寻找约翰·克里斯托夫·海茨曼，那个反基督者。
back_translation: This journey takes them from downtown to a satanic black mass ceremony, deep into the depths of their own souls, searching for John Christopher Heitzman, the antichrist.

text: this seventh feature by chicago director covert uses the freedom of access afforded by the digital camera to emphasize the visceral quality of the story .
translation: 芝加哥导演科维特的第七部作品利用数码相机提供的访问自由，强调了故事的感官特质。
back_translation: The seventh work by Chicago director Kowitt takes advantage of the freedom provided by digital cameras, emphasizing the sensory qualities of the story.

text: 'dragonfly ' dwells on crossing-over mumbo jumbo , manipulative sentimentality , and sappy dialogue .
translation: 《蜻蜓》沉迷于交叉混乱、操控性的感伤和乏味的对话。
back_translation: "Dragonfly" is obsessed with convoluted chaos, manipulative sentimentality, and tedious dialogue.

text: his loving wife maya vows to help get him out of jail .
translation: 他深爱的妻子玛雅发誓要帮助他出狱。
back_translation: His beloved wife Maya vowed to help him get out of prison.

text: fedot the shooter is sent by the czar to find some special food for the foreighn ambassador 's visit .
translation: 费多特这个射手被沙皇派去为外国大使的来访寻找一些特殊的食物。
back_translation: Fedot, this shooter, was sent by the Tsar to find some special food for the visit of a foreign ambassador.

text: after a failed marriage to ali macgraw , a cocaine bust and rumored involvement with the cotton club murder , he disappeared into near-obscurity .
translation: 在与阿里·麦格劳（Ali MacGraw）婚姻失败之后，经历了一次可卡因逮捕和与棉花俱乐部谋杀案的传闻牵连，他几乎消失在公众视野中。
back_translation: After the failure of his marriage to Ali MacGraw, he nearly disappeared from the public eye following a cocaine arrest and rumors linking him to the Cotton Club murder case.

text: the scientist is sentenced to jail by the grand council of the galactic federation .
translation: 科学家被银河联邦的大议会判处监禁。
back_translation: The scientist was sentenced to imprisonment by the Grand Council of the Galactic Federation.

text: when the head of the order dies , alex is sent to rome to investigate mysterious circumstances surrounding the death .
translation: 当法令首领去世时，亚历克斯被派往罗马调查围绕这次死亡的神秘情况。
back_translation: When the leader of the law passed away, Alex was sent to Rome to investigate the mysterious circumstances surrounding the death.

text: it 's an exhilarating place to visit , this laboratory of laughter .
translation: 这是一个令人振奋的地方，笑声的实验室。
back_translation: This is an exhilarating place, a laboratory of laughter.

text: mo is beautiful but bald , mei has excessive body hair ( that somehow resulted from a sexual assault ) , hung has a large red birthmark on her face , and pao has abnormally small eyes .
translation: 莫漂亮但秃头，梅有过多的体毛（这 somehow 是性侵犯所导致的），洪的脸上有一个大红色胎记，而泡的眼睛异常小。
back_translation: Mo is not very attractive but bald, Mei has excessive body hair (which is somehow caused by sexual assault), Hong has a large red birthmark on his face, and Pao's eyes are unusually small.

text: though frida is easier to swallow than julie taymor 's preposterous titus , the eye candy here lacks considerable brio .
translation: 虽然弗里达比朱莉·泰摩尔的荒谬的《泰特斯》更容易接受，但这里的视觉享受缺乏相当的活力。
back_translation: Although Frida is more accessible than Julie Taymor's absurd "Titus," the visual enjoyment here lacks considerable vitality.

text: when a shoulder injury ended his minor league pitching career twelve years ago , jim morris resorted to the next best thing : coaching .
translation: 当肩部受伤结束了他十二年前的次级联赛投球生涯时，吉姆·莫里斯选择了下一最佳选择：教练。
back_translation: When a shoulder injury ended his minor league pitching career twelve years ago, Jim Morris chose the next best option: coaching.

text: in the meantime , a grifter breaks into their apartments and rummages their personal belongings , thus unfolding hidden secrets .
translation: 与此同时，一个骗子闯入他们的公寓，翻找他们的私人物品，揭开隐藏的秘密。
back_translation: Meanwhile, a scammer broke into their apartment, rummaging through their personal belongings and uncovering hidden secrets.

text: zhuangzhuang creates delicate balance of style , text , and subtext that 's so simple and precise that anything discordant would topple the balance , but against all odds , nothing does .
translation: 庄庄在风格、文本和潜台词之间创造了微妙的平衡，这种平衡如此简单而精确，以至于任何不和谐的因素都会破坏这种平衡，但出乎意料的是，什么也没有破坏。
back_translation: Zhuang Zhuang creates a subtle balance between style, text, and subtext, a balance so simple and precise that any discordant element would disrupt it, yet surprisingly, nothing has disturbed it.

text: still rapturous after all these years , cinema paradiso stands as one of the great films about movie love .
translation: 经过这些年的洗礼，《天堂电影院》依然令人陶醉，它是关于电影爱的重要影片之一。
back_translation: After years of refinement, "Cinema Paradiso" remains enchanting; it is one of the important films about the love of cinema.

text: it 's been 10 years since the events of the second film .
translation: 距离第二部电影的事件已经过去10年。
back_translation: It has been 10 years since the events of the second movie.

text: shyamalan offers copious hints along the way -- myriad signs , if you will -- that beneath the familiar , funny surface is a far bigger , far more meaningful story than one in which little green men come to earth for harvesting purposes .
translation: 沙马兰在过程中提供了大量暗示——无数的迹象，如果你愿意的话——在熟悉而有趣的表面之下，隐藏着一个更大、更有意义的故事，而不仅仅是小绿人为了收割而来到地球的简单情节。
back_translation: Shyamalan provides a wealth of hints throughout the process—countless signs, if you will—that beneath the familiar and intriguing surface lies a larger, more meaningful story, rather than just the simple plot of little green men coming to Earth to harvest.

text: in the 1870s , jacobina , daughter of german immigrants to southern brazil , starts to break with both the catholic and lutheran churches to preach body healing through soul cleansing .
translation: 在1870年代，雅可比娜，来自南巴西的德国移民的女儿，开始与天主教和路德宗教会决裂，宣扬通过灵魂净化实现身体的治愈。
back_translation: In the 1870s, Jacobina, the daughter of German immigrants from southern Brazil, began to break away from the Catholic and Lutheran churches, promoting healing of the body through the purification of the soul.

text: i found the ring moderately absorbing , largely for its elegantly colorful look and sound .
translation: 我发现这个环相当吸引人，主要是因为它优雅多彩的外观和声音。
back_translation: I find this ring quite attractive, mainly because of its elegant and colorful appearance and sound.

text: her family doctor is baffled ; his examination reveals her story to be true !
translation: 她的家庭医生感到困惑；他的检查显示她的故事是真实的！
back_translation: Her family doctor was puzzled; his examination showed that her story was true!

text: a beautiful , entertaining two hours . you get the idea , though , that kapur intended the film to be more than that .
translation: 一个美丽而有趣的两个小时。你能感受到，卡普尔希望这部电影不仅仅是这些。
back_translation: A beautiful and interesting two hours. You can feel that Kapoor hopes this film is more than just that.

text: soon , against his own expectations and the scorn of his friends , landon finds himself falling in love with this outwardly plain girl who possesses a passion for life he never imagined possible .
translation: 不久之后，出乎他自己的预期和朋友们的嘲笑，兰登发现自己爱上了这个外表平凡的女孩，她对生活的热情是他从未想象过的。
back_translation: Not long after, contrary to his own expectations and the mockery of his friends, Langdon found himself in love with this seemingly ordinary girl, whose passion for life was something he had never imagined.

text: the making of the dragon emphasizes and exaggerates all the overly dramatic moments , simplistic storylines and farcical elements that make up the films of the kung-fu genre .
translation: 《龙的制作》强调并夸大了所有过于戏剧化的时刻、简单化的故事情节和荒诞的元素，这些构成了功夫片的特征。
back_translation: "The Making of the Dragon" emphasizes and exaggerates all overly dramatic moments, simplified storylines, and absurd elements, which constitute the characteristics of kung fu films.

text: johann christoph haizmann , who lived in the 1650s , was a painter and a deeply disturbed individual .
translation: 约翰·克里斯托夫·海茨曼，生活在1650年代，是一位画家和一个内心深受困扰的人。
back_translation: Johann Christoph Heitzmann, who lived in the 1650s, was a painter and a deeply troubled person.

text: it 's slow -- very , very slow . it 's not the ultimate depression-era gangster movie . that 's pure pr hype .
translation: 它很慢——非常，非常慢。这并不是终极的经济大萧条时期黑帮电影。那纯粹是公关炒作。
back_translation: It's very slow—very, very slow. This is not the ultimate gangster movie from the Great Depression era. That's purely public relations hype.

text: a modest and acerbically clever escapade that relies more on wit than excitement .
translation: 一场朴实而尖酸刻薄的冒险，它更多依赖于机智而非刺激。
back_translation: A simple yet acerbic adventure that relies more on wit than on thrills.

text: depressingly thin and exhaustingly contrived . only masochistic moviegoers need apply .
translation: 令人沮丧的薄弱和令人疲惫的造作。只有有受虐倾向的电影观众需要申请。
back_translation: Frustrating weakness and exhausting artifice. Only moviegoers with a tendency for masochism need to apply.

text: it 's a weepy , nail-biting story line that 's all too familiar , although abbass portrays her character with strong conviction and carries the film gracefully .
translation: 这是一个让人感伤、让人紧张的故事情节，虽然过于熟悉，但阿巴斯对她角色的演绎充满了坚定的信念，并优雅地驾驭了整部影片。
back_translation: This is a touching and tense storyline, familiar though it may be, but Abbas's portrayal of her character is filled with firm belief and elegantly navigates the entire film.

text: a magnificent throwback to an almost vanished era of epic filmmaking by great filmmakers in thrall to their own passions , rather than to the studio bookkeepers .
translation: 对几乎消失的史诗电影时代的宏伟回归，那时伟大的电影制片人沉醉于自己的激情，而不是向制片厂的账目主管屈服。
back_translation: A magnificent return to the nearly vanished era of epic cinema, when great filmmakers were enamored with their own passions rather than yielding to the accountants of the studios.

text: a strong first act and absolutely , inescapably gorgeous , skyscraper-trapeze motion of the amazing spider-man .
translation: 强有力的第一幕，以及绝对无法逃避的华丽，摩天大楼秋千般的动作，令人惊叹的蜘蛛侠。
back_translation: A powerful first act, along with an absolutely unavoidable splendor, the skyscraper-swinging movements, and the astonishing Spider-Man.

text: together , they must battle a band of the world 's most treacherous pirates , led by the cursed captain barbossa , in order to save elizabeth , the love of will 's life , as well as recover the lost treasure that jack seeks .
translation: 他们必须一起与一伙世界上最危险的海盗作斗争，海盗首领是被诅咒的巴博萨船长，以拯救威尔生命中的挚爱伊丽莎白，并找回杰克所追寻的失落宝藏。
back_translation: They must fight together against a group of the world's most dangerous pirates, led by the cursed Captain Barbossa, to save Will's beloved Elizabeth and recover the lost treasure that Jack is seeking.

text: this unlikely pairing proves the rule that in love , there are no rules and the couple meet and fall deeply in love at first sight .
translation: 这个不太可能的搭配证明了爱情中没有规则的道理，情侣们在第一次见面时便深深相爱。
back_translation: This unlikely pairing proves the point that there are no rules in love, as couples can fall deeply in love at first sight.

text: separated from his wife , louis will be given the opportunity to find out what is most important . . .
translation: 与妻子分离的路易斯将有机会找到最重要的东西……
back_translation: Louis, separated from his wife, will have the opportunity to find the most important thing...

text: toledo awaits on the street for the exit of ana 's lover ( gustavo garz & # 243 ; n ) and begins a one-of-a-kind persecution-investigation that will last the whole night , to find out , before confronting him , who is that man and where did he meet ana .
translation: 托莱多在街上等待安娜的情人（古斯塔沃·加尔松）的出现，开始了一场独特的追踪调查，这场追踪将持续整个夜晚，想要在与他对峙之前，找出那个男人是谁，以及他和安娜是在哪里相遇的。
back_translation: Toledo waits on the street for the appearance of Anna's lover (Gustavo Garçon), beginning a unique investigation that will last throughout the night. He wants to find out who that man is and where he met Anna before confronting him.

text: most of the information has already appeared in one forum or another and , no matter how broomfield dresses it up , it tends to speculation , conspiracy theories or , at best , circumstantial evidence .
