text: scott was on his way to work shooting a documentary in midtown manhattan on september 11th .
translation: 斯科特在9月11日的曼哈顿中城前往工作，拍摄一部纪录片。
back_translation: Scott was on his way to work in Midtown Manhattan on September 11 to film a documentary.

text: till the end of time , they will stay that way .
translation: 直到时间的尽头，他们将一直保持这样。

text: it is a dark time for the resistance and skynet is on the verge of going online , the events of the last movie has changed nothing and john must now battle a new terminator called the t-x .
translation: 对抵抗势力来说，这是一个黑暗的时刻，天网即将上线，上一部电影的事件没有改变任何事情，约翰现在必须与一个新的终结者T-X作斗争。
back_translation: For the resistance, this is a dark moment, as Skynet is about to go online. The events of the previous movie haven't changed anything, and John must now fight against a new Terminator, T-X.

text: dr singh 's son ( anil kapoor ) stands by his father helping him raise funds for his fathers dream , with the sudden death of dr singh his son falls into a dilemma mainly because of the two ladies involved ( preity zinta & # 38 ; gracy singh ) and his father 's dream that is yet to be fulfilled .
translation: 辛格博士的儿子（阿尼尔·卡普尔）在父亲身边，帮助他为父亲的梦想筹集资金。随着辛格博士的突然去世，儿子陷入了困境，主要是因为涉及的两位女士（普丽提·赞塔和格雷西·辛格）以及父亲尚未实现的梦想。
back_translation: Dr. Singh's son (Anil Kapoor) is by his father's side, helping him raise funds for his father's dreams. With Dr. Singh's sudden passing, the son finds himself in a predicament, primarily due to the two women involved (Preity Zinta and Gracie Singh) and his father's unfulfilled dreams.

text: they are the only men who are allowed to kill .
translation: 他们是唯一被允许杀人的人。
back_translation: They are the only ones allowed to kill.

text: after waking up in hell to find out that his mask has been stolen by a dream devil by the name of freddy kruger , he must take revenge .
translation: 在地狱醒来后，他发现他的面具被一个名叫弗雷迪·克鲁格的梦魇恶魔偷走了，他必须复仇。
back_translation: After waking up in hell, he discovered that his mask had been stolen by a nightmarish demon named Freddy Krueger, and he must seek revenge.

text: [ allen 's ] best works understand why snobbery is a better satiric target than middle-america diversions could ever be .
translation: [艾伦的] 最佳作品理解了为什么势利眼比中美洲的娱乐活动更适合作为讽刺的目标。
back_translation: [Allen's] best work understands why snobbery is a more suitable target for satire than the entertainment of Central America.

text: thankfully , the film , which skirts that rapidly deteriorating line between fantasy and reality . . . takes a tongue-in-cheek attitude even as it pushes the croc hunter agenda .
translation: 值得庆幸的是，这部电影在幻想与现实之间那条迅速恶化的界线旁边游走……即使在推动鳄鱼猎人议程时，也采取了一种带有讽刺意味的态度。
back_translation: Fortunately, this film walks along the rapidly deteriorating line between fantasy and reality... even while advancing the crocodile hunter agenda, it takes a satirical attitude.

text: [ the digital effects ] reminded me of terry gilliam 's rudimentary old monty python cartoons , in which he would cut out figures from drawings and photographs and paste them together .
translation: [数字特效]让我想起了特里·吉列姆的简单古老的《蒙提·派森》动画片，他会把图画和照片中的人物剪下来然后拼接在一起。
back_translation: [Digital Effects] It reminds me of Terry Gilliam's simple, old Monty Python animations, where he would cut out figures from drawings and photos and stitch them together.

text: while the script starts promisingly , it loses steam towards the middle and never really develops beyond attacking obvious target .
translation: 尽管剧本开头很有前景，但在中间部分失去了动力，最终没有真正超越对显而易见目标的攻击。
back_translation: Although the beginning of the script is promising, it loses momentum in the middle and ultimately does not truly surpass its attack on obvious targets.

text: stuffed to the brim with ideas , american instigator michael moore 's film is a rambling examination of american gun culture that uses his usual modus operandi of crucifixion through juxtaposition .
translation: 充满想法的美国激进分子迈克尔·摩尔的电影，是对美国枪支文化的杂乱考察，运用了他一贯的对比通过钉十字架的方式。
back_translation: The film by the thought-provoking American radical Michael Moore is a chaotic examination of American gun culture, utilizing his characteristic approach of contrasting through shocking imagery.

text: making use of homemade steel helmets and chest plates to stop bullets , they committed a series of robberies from 1878-80 , when kelly was captured and hanged in melbourne .
translation: 他们利用自制的钢头盔和胸甲来抵挡子弹，进行了1878年至1880年间的一系列抢劫，直到凯利在墨尔本被捕并被绞死。
back_translation: They used homemade steel helmets and chest armor to deflect bullets, carrying out a series of robberies from 1878 to 1880, until Kelly was captured in Melbourne and hanged.

text: . . . pray does n't have a passion for the material . he nonetheless appreciates the art and reveals a music scene that transcends culture and race .
translation: ……祈祷并没有对物质产生热情，但他依然欣赏艺术，并展现出超越文化和种族的音乐场景。
back_translation: ...Prayer did not generate enthusiasm for material possessions, but he still appreciated art and showcased a musical scene that transcended culture and ethnicity.

text: the last kiss , a crowd-pleaser in the deepest sense , mixes heartbreak and happiness together until you do n't even want to see them apart .
translation: 最后一吻，深得人心，混合了心碎与快乐，让你甚至不愿意看到他们分开。
back_translation: The last kiss, deeply moving, blended heartbreak and joy, making you reluctant to see them part ways.

text: then there 's nicole , who gets her orgasmic intimacy watching chan every night .
translation: 然后是妮可，她每晚都通过观看昌而获得高潮般的亲密感。
back_translation: Then there is Nicole, who obtains a climax-like sense of intimacy every night by watching Chang.

text: an attorney ( ben affleck ) in a rush to make a court appointment to file legal papers involving a multi-million dollar trust accidentally collides with an alcoholic insurance salesman ( samuel jackson ) , who also is a rush for a court appointment involving the custody of his children .
translation: 一个律师（本·阿弗莱克）急于赶往法庭提交涉及数百万美元信托的法律文件，不小心与一位酗酒的保险推销员（塞缪尔·杰克逊）相撞，而这位推销员也在匆忙赶往法庭处理他的孩子抚养权问题。
back_translation: A lawyer (Ben Affleck) is in a hurry to get to court to submit legal documents involving a multimillion-dollar trust when he accidentally collides with a drunken insurance salesman (Samuel L. Jackson), who is also rushing to court to deal with his child custody issues.

text: those outside show business will enjoy a close look at people they do n't really want to know .
translation: 那些不在娱乐圈的人将会近距离观察那些他们并不真正想要了解的人。
back_translation: Those who are not in the entertainment industry will closely observe those they do not really want to understand.

text: everyone should be able to appreciate the wonderful cinematography and naturalistic acting .
translation: 每个人都应该能够欣赏到精彩的摄影和自然的表演。
back_translation: Everyone should be able to appreciate wonderful photography and natural performances.

text: originality ai n't on the menu , but there 's never a dull moment in the giant spider invasion comic chiller .
translation: 原创性不在菜单上，但在《巨型蜘蛛入侵》这部漫画惊悚片中，时刻都充满了刺激。
back_translation: Originality may not be on the menu, but the comic thriller "Attack of the Giant Spider" is filled with thrills at every turn.

text: unbeknownst to her , the real scoop is much more awesome then even she could write about , should she live to tell .
translation: 她不知道的是，真实的内幕比她能写的还要精彩得多，如果她活着能够讲述的话。
back_translation: What she didn't know was that the real story was much more exciting than what she could write, if only she were alive to tell it.

text: jude law co stars as a hit man hired to kill sullivan .
translation: 裘德·洛与其他演员共同出演，扮演一名被雇来杀死沙利文的杀手。
back_translation: Jude Law stars alongside other actors as a hitman hired to kill Sullivan.

text: each brush stroke brings him inexorably closer to an unknown fate , a fate that is perhaps foretold in the very visions that fuel his work .
translation: 每一笔刷痕都将他无情地驱向未知的命运，或许这个命运在激励他创作的幻象中早已预示。
back_translation: Each brushstroke ruthlessly drives him toward an unknown fate, perhaps this fate has long been foreshadowed in the illusion that inspires his creation.

text: a filmmaker , fascinated by the power of the camera and obsessed with the theories of russian film pioneer dziga vertov , decides to get a camera eye to replace the real eye he lost as a child .
translation: 一位电影制作人，被相机的力量所吸引，并对俄罗斯电影先驱季加·维尔托夫的理论着迷，决定获得一个相机的眼睛，以替代他在童年时期失去的真实眼睛。
back_translation: A filmmaker, captivated by the power of the camera and fascinated by the theories of Russian film pioneer Dziga Vertov, decides to obtain a camera's eye to replace the real eyes he lost in childhood.

text: she soon finds out it 's hard to get to know him , or even to get nearby him !
translation: 她很快发现，了解他很困难，甚至靠近他也很难！
back_translation: She soon realized that it was difficult to understand him, and even harder to get close to him!

text: a thriller with an edge -- which is to say that it does n't follow the stale , standard , connect-the-dots storyline which has become commonplace in movies that explore the seamy underbelly of the criminal world .
translation: 一部充满悬念的惊悚片——换句话说，它并没有遵循那些陈腐、标准的连点成线的故事情节，这种情节在探索犯罪世界阴暗面时已经变得司空见惯。
back_translation: A suspenseful thriller— in other words, it does not follow those clichéd, standard linear plotlines that have become commonplace when exploring the darker side of the criminal world.

text: it can become even more complicated when the visit is a most unusual homestay with three single , american men with extremely diverse and . . . unique personalities .
translation: 当这次访问是与三位单身的美国男性进行一个极为独特的寄宿时，它可能变得更加复杂，他们拥有非常多样化和...独特的个性。
back_translation: When this visit involves three single American men in a very unique homestay, it can become more complicated, as they have very diverse and... unique personalities.

text: the film 's almost unbearable portrait of sadness and grief transcends its specific story to speak to the ways in which need , history and presumption tangle , and sometimes destroy , blood ties .
translation: 这部电影几乎无法忍受的悲伤和哀痛的肖像超越了其特定的故事，诉说了需求、历史和假设交织在一起，有时摧毁血缘关系的方式。
back_translation: This movie's almost unbearable portrait of sadness and sorrow transcends its specific story, telling of the intertwining of needs, history, and assumptions, which sometimes destroy the bonds of kinship.

text: her all-star cast including nina hartley , kylie ireland , brooke hunter and more , peek at their highest performance levels .
translation: 她的全明星阵容包括尼娜·哈特利、凯莉·爱尔兰、布鲁克·亨特等，展现了他们的最高表现水平。
back_translation: Her all-star lineup includes Nina Hartley, Kelly Ireland, Brooke Hunter, and others, showcasing their highest level of performance.

text: sean , an all go no quit , military driven high school student recieves a video tape of a brutal murder .
translation: 肖恩，一个充满干劲、不轻言放弃的军人驱动高中生，收到了一段残忍谋杀的视频带。
back_translation: Sean, a high school student driven by a strong sense of determination and unwillingness to give up, received a video tape of a brutal murder.

text: a retired army colonel and veteran of three wars , rescorla was killed in the september 11 , 2001 attack on the world trade center , during which he saved the lives of thousands of wtc employees at the cost of his own life .
translation: 一位退休的陆军上校，参与过三场战争的退伍军人，雷斯科拉在2001年9月11日的世贸中心袭击中遇难，他在此过程中拯救了数千名世贸中心员工，付出了自己的生命。
back_translation: A retired Army colonel, a veteran who participated in three wars, Rescorla lost his life in the September 11, 2001 attacks on the World Trade Center, during which he saved thousands of World Trade Center employees, sacrificing his own life in the process.

text: the screenplay is hugely overwritten , with tons and tons of dialogue -- most of it given to children .
translation: 剧本的文字过于冗长，包含大量对话——大部分是给孩子们的。
back_translation: The script's text is overly lengthy, containing a lot of dialogue—mostly meant for children.

text: an unremarkable , modern action/comedy buddy movie whose only nod to nostalgia is in the title .
translation: 一部平凡的现代动作/喜剧搭档电影，唯一向怀旧致敬的是片名。
back_translation: A mundane modern action/comedy buddy film, the only tribute to nostalgia is the title.

text: despite its old-hat set-up and predictable plot , empire still has enough moments to keep it entertaining .
translation: 尽管其老套的设定和可预测的情节，《帝国》仍然有足够的时刻让它保持娱乐性。
back_translation: Despite its cliché setting and predictable plot, "Empire" still has enough moments to keep it entertaining.

text: its adult themes of familial separation and societal betrayal are head and shoulders above much of the director 's previous popcorn work .
translation: 其成人主题涉及家庭分离和社会背叛，远远超出了导演以前许多商业作品的水平。
back_translation: Its adult themes of family separation and social betrayal far exceed the level of many of the director's previous commercial works.

text: the movie is obviously a labour of love so howard appears to have had free rein to be as pretentious as he wanted .
translation: 这部电影显然是出于热爱，霍华德似乎完全自由地可以表现出他想要的矫揉造作。
back_translation: This movie is clearly born out of passion, and Howard seems completely free to express the pretentiousness he desires.

text: he has had no formal education , but on his own , he systematically studies western theories of industrial management and such classical chinese philosophies as confucianism , taoism , and suntzu .
translation: 他没有接受过正式教育，但他自学系统研究西方工业管理理论以及儒家、道家和孙子等经典中国哲学。
back_translation: He did not receive formal education, but he systematically taught himself to study Western industrial management theory as well as classical Chinese philosophies such as Confucianism, Taoism, and Sun Tzu.

text: the three leads produce adequate performances , but what 's missing from this material is any depth of feeling .
translation: 三位主角的表现尚可，但这部作品缺乏任何深刻的情感。
back_translation: The performances of the three main characters are acceptable, but this work lacks any deep emotion.

text: straight up : helicopters in action will take audiences on a series of aerial adventures .
translation: 直升机行动将带领观众体验一系列空中冒险。
back_translation: The helicopter operation will lead the audience to experience a series of aerial adventures.

text: shankman . . . and screenwriter karen janszen bungle their way through the narrative as if it were a series of bible parables and not an actual story .
translation: 香克曼……和编剧凯伦·詹森在叙述中磕磕绊绊，仿佛这是一系列圣经寓言，而不是一个真实的故事。
back_translation: Schenkman... and writer Karen Jansen stumble through the narration as if this were a series of biblical parables rather than a true story.

text: visually imaginative , thematically instructive and thoroughly delightful , it takes us on a roller-coaster ride from innocence to experience without even a hint of that typical kiddie-flick sentimentality .
translation: 视觉上富有想象力，主题上具有启发性，绝对令人愉悦，它带领我们从纯真走向经历，完全没有典型儿童电影的情感泛滥。
back_translation: Visually imaginative, thematically inspiring, and absolutely delightful, it leads us from innocence to experience, completely free from the emotional excess typical of children’s films.

text: brilliantly captures the brightness of the light , the intensity of the colors and the omnipresence of mexican motifs that informed kahlo 's art .
translation: 精彩地捕捉了光的明亮、颜色的强度以及影响卡洛艺术的墨西哥主题的无处不在。
back_translation: It brilliantly captures the brightness of light, the intensity of color, and the omnipresence of Mexican themes that influence Kahlo's art.

text: after taking a look at the people around her and examining her life 's choices , lucy decides that it would be unfair to give up this baby just because she did n't do what she wanted to with her own life .
translation: 在观察周围的人并审视自己生活的选择后，露西决定，单单因为自己没有按照想要的方式生活，就放弃这个婴儿是不公平的。
back_translation: After observing the people around her and reflecting on her own life choices, Lucy decided that it was unfair to give up the baby simply because she had not lived the way she had wanted.

text: director and co-writer hilary birmingham 's maiden featureM-^E is a strong , polished , professional indie effort that bodes well for bigger success .
translation: 导演兼编剧希拉里·伯明翰的首部特征作品是一部强大、精细、专业的独立电影之作，预示着她在更大成功方面的良好前景。
back_translation: Director and screenwriter Hillary Birmingham's debut feature is a powerful, refined, and professionally made independent film that heralds a promising outlook for her greater success.

text: like most of godard 's films , in praise of love makes you stay awake and lean forward .
translation: 像戈达尔的大多数电影一样，《爱的赞美》让你保持清醒和专注。
back_translation: Like most of Godard's films, "The Praise of Love" keeps you awake and focused.

text: she 's aided by his faithful bodyguard , with whom she soon falls in love .
translation: 她得到了他忠实保镖的帮助，随后与他相爱。
back_translation: She received help from his loyal bodyguard, and then fell in love with him.

text: in this playful and rollicking swashbuckler , drag king pirates take to the high seas on a quest to restore stolen treasures .
translation: 在这部充满趣味和欢闹的海盗冒险片中，假装男性的海盗们扬帆出海，踏上了寻找被盗宝藏的征程。
back_translation: In this entertaining and lively pirate adventure film, the male-impersonating pirates set sail on a journey to search for the stolen treasure.

text: it follows and in some cases re-enacts the chronology of shepherd 's visit to a local bar , his kidnap and beating , the discovery of him tied to a fence , the vigil at the hospital , his death and funeral , and the trial of his killers .
translation: 它遵循并在某些情况下重新演绎了牧羊人访问当地酒吧、被绑架和殴打、被发现绑在栅栏上的经历、在医院的守夜、他的死亡和葬礼，以及对其杀手的审判的时间顺序。
back_translation: It follows and, in certain cases, reinterprets the timeline of the shepherd's experiences visiting the local pub, being kidnapped and beaten, being found tied to a fence, his vigil in the hospital, his death and funeral, and the trial of his killer.

text: taylor williams iii , a wealthy seventeen year old meets his dream `` lavender `` girl ( mandi carson , who comes from a lower-middle class ) for the very first time at mr . dodson 's business education class at seaport-greene high school .
translation: 泰勒·威廉姆斯三世，一个富有的十七岁少年，在海港绿高中道森先生的商业教育课上第一次遇见了他的梦中情人“薰衣草”女孩（曼迪·卡森，她来自中下阶层）。
back_translation: Tyler Williams III, a wealthy seventeen-year-old, first encounters the girl of his dreams, the "Lavender" girl (Mandy Carson, who comes from a lower-middle-class background), in Mr. Dawson's business education class at Harbor Green High School.

text: a heady , biting , be-bop ride through nighttime manhattan , a loquacious videologue of the modern male and the lengths to which he 'll go to weave a protective cocoon around his own ego .
translation: 在夜晚的曼哈顿中，伴随着一种令人陶醉、尖锐的比波音乐之旅，一段关于现代男性的口若悬河的视频独白，以及他为编织自我保护的茧而愿意付出的种种努力。
back_translation: In the nighttime of Manhattan, accompanied by an intoxicating and sharp bebop musical journey, there is a video monologue about the modern man, detailing the various efforts he is willing to make to weave a cocoon of self-protection.

text: it looks good , but it is essentially empty .
translation: 看起来不错，但实际上是空的。
back_translation: It looks good, but in reality, it is empty.

text: this includes never-before-seen images of tests of modified v-1s at point mugu naval air station , and the flight test program for regulus at edwards air force base in 1950 .
translation: 这包括在莫古海军航空站对改进型V-1进行测试的前所未见的图像，以及1950年在爱德华斯空军基地进行的Regulus飞行测试计划。
back_translation: This includes previously unseen images of the improved V-1 being tested at Mugu Navy Air Station, as well as the Regulus flight test program conducted in 1950 at Edwards Air Force Base.

text: as dex prepares to do battle with herb , he must also deal with all the intricacies it takes to make a relationship work .
translation: 当德克斯准备与赫伯战斗时，他也必须应对维持一段关系所需的所有复杂细节。
back_translation: As Dex prepares to fight Herbert, he also has to deal with all the complex details required to maintain a relationship.

text: as shaky as the plot is , kaufman 's script is still memorable for some great one-liners .
translation: 虽然情节不够稳固，但考夫曼的剧本仍然因一些精彩的台词而令人难忘。
back_translation: Although the plot is not solid enough, Kaufman's script is still memorable for some brilliant lines.

text: in the end , the movie bogs down in insignificance , saying nothing about kennedy 's assassination and revealing nothing about the pathology it pretends to investigate .
translation: 最终，这部电影陷入了微不足道之中，对于肯尼迪的刺杀没有提供任何见解，也未揭示它所假装调查的病理。
back_translation: Ultimately, this film falls into insignificance, offering no insights into Kennedy's assassination and failing to reveal the pathology it pretends to investigate.

text: one of the most depressing movie-going experiences i can think of is to sit through about 90 minutes of a so-called 'comedy ' and not laugh once .
translation: 我能想到的最令人沮丧的电影观看体验之一就是坐在那儿看一个所谓的“喜剧”，整整90分钟却一点都没有笑。
back_translation: One of the most frustrating movie-watching experiences I can think of is sitting there watching a so-called "comedy" for a full 90 minutes without laughing at all.

text: the cousins work nights at a local mall as security guards .
translation: 表兄弟在当地的购物中心当夜间保安。
back_translation: Cousins work as night security at the local shopping center.

text: armed with a bag of money and mysterious martial arts skills , with marie by his side , bourne scours paris for clues about his identity and past life . . .
translation: 带着一袋钱和神秘的武术技能，鲍恩在玛丽的陪伴下，四处搜寻巴黎寻找关于自己身份和过去生活的线索……
back_translation: With a bag of money and mysterious martial arts skills, Bowen, accompanied by Mary, searches around Paris for clues about his identity and past life...

text: with only a few weapons and time running out , they take shelter in an ancient house , inside which they will uncover the secrets of the `` house of the dead . ``
translation: 他们只有几件武器，时间紧迫，躲进了一栋古老的房子，在那里他们将揭开“亡者之家”的秘密。
back_translation: They had only a few weapons, time was running out, and they took shelter in an ancient house, where they would uncover the secrets of the "House of the Dead."

text: although the editing might have been tighter , hush ! sympathetically captures the often futile lifestyle of young people in modern japan .
translation: 尽管剪辑可能更加紧凑，但《静默！》同情地捕捉到了现代日本年轻人往往徒劳的生活方式。
back_translation: Although the editing may be more compact, "Silence!" empathetically captures the often futile lifestyle of modern young people in Japan.

text: chicago glorifies murder , glamorizes sex & death -- in other words it is just right for today 's unsunny times .
translation: 芝加哥美化谋杀，迷恋性与死亡——换句话说，它正适合今天这个阴暗的时代。
back_translation: Chicago beautifies murder, with a fascination for sex and death— in other words, it is well-suited for today's dark times.

text: at no point during k-19 : the widowmaker did this viewer feel enveloped in a story that , though meant to be universal in its themes of loyalty , courage and dedication to a common goal , never seems to leave the lot .
translation: 在《K-19：寡妇制造者》的整个过程中，这位观众从未感受到被一个故事所包围，尽管它的主题旨在体现忠诚、勇气和对共同目标的奉献，但似乎从未超出其范围。
back_translation: Throughout the entire experience of "K-19: The Widowmaker," the viewer never feels enveloped by a story, despite its themes intended to embody loyalty, bravery, and dedication to a common goal; it seems to never go beyond its limits.

text: i was hoping that it would be sleazy and fun , but it was neither .
translation: 我本希望它既低俗又有趣，但它两者都不是。
back_translation: I originally hoped it would be both crude and funny, but it turned out to be neither.

text: the egyptian queen cleopatra bets against the roman emperor , julius caesar , that her people are still great , even if the times of the pharaohs has long passed .
translation: 埃及女王克利奥帕特拉与罗马皇帝尤利乌斯·凯撒打赌，认为即使法老时代早已过去，她的人民仍然伟大。
back_translation: Queen Cleopatra of Egypt made a bet with Roman Emperor Julius Caesar, believing that even though the era of the pharaohs had long passed, her people were still great.

text: it works its magic with such exuberance and passion that the film 's length becomes a part of its fun .
translation: 它以如此旺盛的活力和热情运作其魅力，以至于影片的长度成为其乐趣的一部分。
back_translation: It operates its charm with such vigorous energy and enthusiasm that the length of the film becomes part of its enjoyment.

text: series of 12 short movies from the start of the twentieth century , compiled by michel reilhac .
translation: 由米歇尔·雷尔哈克编制的20世纪初的12部短片系列。
back_translation: A series of 12 short films from the early 20th century compiled by Michel Reilhac.

text: this bold and lyrical first feature from raja amari expands the pat notion that middle-aged women just wan na have fun into a rousing treatise of sensual empowerment .
translation: 拉贾·阿马里的这部大胆而抒情的首部作品，扩展了中年女性只想要快乐的普通观念，成为了一部激励人心的性感赋权论文。
back_translation: Raja Amari's bold and lyrical debut expands the conventional notion that middle-aged women only seek happiness, transforming it into an inspiring essay on sensual empowerment.

text: atanarjuat , unfolding on a cold-blasted primeval arctic plain , has the quality of totem .
translation: 阿塔纳朱特，展开在一片寒冷的原始北极平原上，具有图腾的特质。
back_translation: Atanarjuat unfolds on a cold, pristine Arctic plain, possessing totemic qualities.

text: . it 's a brilliant revision of the book and it offers a motivation for the invention that 's lacking in the first film version .
translation: 这是对该书的精彩修订，提供了第一部电影版本中缺乏的发明动机。
back_translation: This is an excellent revision of the book, providing the inventive motivations that were missing in the first film version.

text: the country bears has no scenes that will upset or frighten young viewers . unfortunately , there is almost nothing in this flat effort that will amuse or entertain them , either .
translation: 这个国家熊没有任何场景会让年轻观众感到不安或害怕。不幸的是，这部平淡的作品几乎没有任何能够让他们感到开心或娱乐的内容。
back_translation: This country's bears have no scenes that would make young viewers feel uneasy or scared. Unfortunately, this bland work has almost nothing that can make them feel happy or entertained.

text: austin powers in goldmember is a cinematic car wreck , a catastrophic collision of tastelessness and gall that nevertheless will leave fans clamoring for another ride .
translation: 《奥斯汀·鲍尔斯：金牌会员》是一场电影事故，是无味与大胆的灾难性碰撞，但仍会让粉丝渴望再来一次。
back_translation: "Austin Powers: Goldmember" is a cinematic accident, a disastrous collision of tastelessness and audacity, yet it still leaves fans craving for more.

text: as the strange thefts escalate , detective phil barbara ( gale harold ) is assigned to the case and is soon on chep and fran 's trail .
translation: 随着奇怪的盗窃事件升级，侦探菲尔·巴巴拉（盖尔·哈罗德）被指派负责此案，并很快追踪到切普和弗兰。
back_translation: As the strange thefts escalated, Detective Phil Babala (Gale Harold) was assigned to the case and quickly traced it to Chip and Fran.

text: let 's hope -- shall we ? -- that the 'true story ' by which all the queen 's men is allegedly `` inspired `` was a lot funnier and more deftly enacted than what 's been cobbled together onscreen .
translation: 让我们希望——可以吗？——所有女王的手下所谓“灵感来源”的“真实故事”比拼凑在荧幕上的内容要有趣得多，且更巧妙地表演。
back_translation: Let us hope—if we can—that the so-called "real stories" that inspire all the queen's minions are much more interesting and cleverly performed than the content pieced together on screen.

text: when they come through , will is left with a decision .
translation: 当他们出现时，威尔面临一个决定。
back_translation: When they appeared, Will faced a decision.

text: imagine the cleanflicks version of 'love story , ' with ali macgraw 's profanities replaced by romance-novel platitudes .
translation: 想象一下‘爱情故事’的cleanflicks版本，艾丽·麦格劳的脏话被浪漫小说的陈词滥调所取代。
back_translation: Imagine a CleanFlicks version of "Love Story," where Ali McGraw's profanity is replaced by clichés from romantic novels.

text: at first , it seems like a great place to hideout but soon they find themselves smack dab in the center of a family that gives a whole new definition to the word crazy and makes them think that maybe they 'd be better off with the mob .
translation: 起初，这似乎是一个绝佳的藏身之处，但不久之后，他们发现自己正好置身于一个家庭之中，这个家庭赋予“疯狂”一词全新的定义，并让他们觉得或许和黑手党在一起会更好。
back_translation: At first, it seemed like a perfect hiding place, but soon they found themselves in the midst of a family that gave a whole new meaning to the word "crazy," making them feel that perhaps being with the mafia would be better.

text: tom , a spaniard , is married to sylvie and lives a quiet but a bit boring life in the britanny countryside ( west of france ) .
translation: 汤姆是一个西班牙人，和西尔维结婚，住在布列塔尼的乡村（法国西部），过着安静但有些无聊的生活。
back_translation: Tom is a Spaniard who is married to Sylvie, living in the countryside of Brittany (western France), leading a quiet but somewhat boring life.

text: as jake and sam bicker throughout their trek across majestic india , they find kabir , a museum curator who possesses an artifact which he claims can produce the musical tone required to open the door to the temple .
translation: 在杰克和萨姆穿越壮丽的印度时争吵不休时，他们遇到了一个博物馆馆长卡比尔，他拥有一件文物，声称可以发出打开寺庙之门所需的音乐音调。
back_translation: While Jack and Sam were arguing endlessly during their traversal of magnificent India, they encountered a museum curator named Kabir, who possessed an artifact that he claimed could produce the musical tones needed to open the temple doors.

text: yet , one rare pok & # 233 ; mon is n't safe without help from another - thus enters suicune , a . k . a . the north wind .
translation: 然而，一种稀有的宝可梦在没有其他帮助的情况下并不安全 - 于是苏生（Suicune），即北风，登场。
back_translation: However, a rare Pokémon is not safe without other assistance - thus Suicune, the north wind, appears.

text: its plot and animation offer daytime tv serviceability , but little more .
translation: 它的情节和动画提供了日间电视的可看性，但仅此而已。
back_translation: Its plot and animation provide daytime television watchability, but that's all.

text: throughout the rest of the movie , the two never got along , whereas mitch is trying to investigate the whereabouts of a criminal who possesses a mythical `` big gun `` that has enough firepower to collapse a house , while trey just wants to be famous .
translation: 在电影的其余部分，两人一直不和，而米奇则试图调查一名拥有神秘“巨型武器”的罪犯的下落，这把武器的火力足以摧毁一座房子，而特雷只想出名。
back_translation: In the rest of the movie, the two are at odds, while Mickey tries to investigate the whereabouts of a criminal with a mysterious "giant weapon" that has the firepower to destroy a house, while Trey just wants to become famous.

text: under the queen 's wrathful gaze , tops are bottomed , tranny sailors seduce pirate captains , kings are mothers and cross-dressing femmes pack a wallop .
translation: 在女王愤怒的目光下，顶尖被压制，变性水手诱惑海盗船长，国王是母亲，变装女性展现强大魅力。
back_translation: Under the queen's angry gaze, the top is suppressed, the transgender sailor seduces the pirate captain, the king is the mother, and the cross-dressing woman exhibits a powerful charm.

text: heidi , now living in tennessee - a married woman with kids - had always dreamt of a joyful reunion .
translation: 海蒂，现在住在田纳西，身为已婚妇女且有孩子，一直以来都梦想着一次快乐的重聚。

text: the importance of being earnest , so thick with wit it plays like a reading from bartlett 's familiar quotations
translation: 《真诚的重要性》，满是机智，宛如在朗读《巴特利特名言集》。
back_translation: "The Importance of Sincerity" is full of wit, as if reading aloud from "The Bartlett's Familiar Quotations."

text: mayhem and comedy explode as several members find price attractive while price struggles for his sanity .
translation: 混乱与喜剧同时上演，多名成员发现价格很有吸引力，而价格则在为自己的理智而挣扎。
back_translation: Chaos and comedy unfolded simultaneously, as several members found the prices very attractive, while the prices struggled for their own sanity.

text: as commander-in-chief of this film , bigelow demonstrates a breadth of vision and an attention to detail that propels her into the upper echelons of the directing world .
translation: 作为这部影片的总指挥，比格罗展现了广阔的视野和对细节的关注，使她跻身导演界的顶尖阶层。
back_translation: As the general director of this film, Bigelow has demonstrated a broad vision and attention to detail, placing her among the top tier of directors.

text: the acting , costumes , music , cinematography and sound are all astounding given the production 's austere locales .
translation: 在制作的简朴地点，表演、服装、音乐、摄像和音效都令人惊叹。
back_translation: In the humble setting of the production, the performance, costumes, music, cinematography, and sound effects are all astonishing.

text: meanwhile , wolverine heads north to investigate his past .
translation: 与此同时，狼叔北上调查他的过去。
back_translation: Meanwhile, Wolverine travels north to investigate his past.

text: the daughter mary yearns for a home where the books do n't always get sold .
translation: 女儿玛丽渴望一个书籍不总是被出售的家。
back_translation: Daughter Mary yearns for a home where books are not always sold.

text: although rampant unemployment , alcoholism and domestic violence are the norm for many reservation inhabitants , rudy has largely escaped this cycle of despair .
translation: 尽管失业、酗酒和家庭暴力在许多保留地居民中已成为常态，但鲁迪在很大程度上摆脱了这种绝望的循环。
back_translation: Although unemployment, alcohol abuse, and domestic violence have become the norm among many residents of the reservations, Rudy has largely escaped this cycle of despair.

text: this is n't a terrible film by any means , but it 's also far from being a realized work .
translation: 这绝对不是一部糟糕的电影，但它也远未成为一部成熟的作品。
back_translation: This is definitely not a terrible movie, but it is also far from being a mature work.

text: jordan is a mom who is on a life long search for true faith as she tries to protect her only child from what she believes is injustice .
translation: 乔丹是一位母亲，她终身寻找真正的信仰，试图保护她唯一的孩子免受她所认为的不公正。
back_translation: Jordan is a mother who has spent her life searching for true faith, trying to protect her only child from what she perceives as injustice.

text: a flawed film but an admirable one that tries to immerse us in a world of artistic abandon and political madness and very nearly succeeds .
translation: 一部有缺陷但令人钦佩的电影，试图让我们沉浸在艺术放纵和政治疯狂的世界中，并且几乎成功。
back_translation: A flawed yet admirable film that attempts to immerse us in a world of artistic indulgence and political madness, and nearly succeeds.

text: `` cold mountain `` tells the story of a wounded confederate soldier named inman ( jude law ) who struggles on a perilous journey to get back home to cold mountain , n . c . as well as to ada ( nicole kidman ) , the woman he left behind before going off to fight in the civil war .
translation: 《冷山》讲述了一名受伤的南方联盟士兵因曼（裘德·洛饰）在危险的旅途中挣扎，试图回到北卡罗来纳州的冷山，以及回到他在内战前留在身后的女人艾达（妮可·基德曼饰）身边的故事。
back_translation: "Cold Mountain" tells the story of a wounded Confederate soldier named Inman (played by Jude Law) who struggles on a perilous journey to return to Cold Mountain in North Carolina and to the woman he left behind, Ada (played by Nicole Kidman), before the Civil War.

text: finally paula , who ran away from home and got pregnant , is now in a relationship she does n't want .
translation: 最后，保拉离家出走并怀孕，现在处于一段她不想要的关系中。
back_translation: In the end, Paula ran away from home and got pregnant, and is now in a relationship she does not want.

text: but all is not smooth in the rockies , as their relationship accelerates - cultural differences , family issues , former loves and life-altering challenges threaten to shake things up .
translation: 但在落基山脉并不一帆风顺，随着他们的关系加深，文化差异、家庭问题、往日情感和改变人生的挑战威胁着他们的关系。
back_translation: However, things are not smooth sailing in the Rocky Mountains. As their relationship deepens, cultural differences, family issues, past emotions, and life-changing challenges threaten their relationship.

text: some of the most inventive silliness you are likely to witness in a movie theatre for some time .
translation: 你可能在电影院里看到的一些最具创造性的愚蠢行为，可能会持续一段时间。
back_translation: Some of the most creatively silly behaviors you might see in a movie theater could last for a while.

text: on the very day lizzy finds out she 's pregnant , she also finds herself the unwitting subject of a twisted television expos & # 233 ; perpetrated by the new world standard of unethical journalism : hardcore action news .
translation: 在莉琪发现自己怀孕的那一天，她也发现自己成为了一档扭曲电视曝光的无意对象，这档节目是由新世界不道德新闻标准——硬核行动新闻——所制作的。
back_translation: On the day Licky discovered she was pregnant, she also found out that she had become an unwitting subject of a distorted television expose, created by the unethical news standards of New World—Hardcore Action News.

text: the movie is undone by a filmmaking methodology that 's just experimental enough to alienate the mainstream audience while ringing cliched to hardened indie-heads .
translation: 这部电影由于一种制作方法而告失败，这种方法在实验性上刚好足以使主流观众感到疏远，同时又对成熟的独立电影爱好者显得陈腐。
back_translation: This film failed due to a certain production method, which is just experimental enough to alienate mainstream audiences while appearing cliched to mature independent film enthusiasts.

text: harks back to a time when movies had more to do with imagination than market research .
translation: 追溯到一个电影更注重想象力而非市场调研的时代。
back_translation: Tracing back to an era when movies focused more on imagination rather than market research.

text: `` ox `` anderson , much greener , is also getting the same new task : protect the navajo codetalkers ( ben yahzee and charles whitehorse , respectively ) .
translation: ``ox`` 安德森，更加环保的，正在接受同样的新任务：保护纳瓦霍密码翻译者（本·雅齐和查尔斯·怀特霍斯，分别）。
back_translation: "Ox" Anderson, more environmentally friendly, is taking on the same new mission: to protect the Navajo code talkers (Ben Yahzee and Charles Whitehorse, respectively).

text: but despite his looks of francis , he indeed is henry ( timothy bottoms ) , a man with a much better character than patricia ever could have dreamt of .
translation: 但尽管他的外表看起来像弗朗西斯，他实际上是亨利（蒂莫西·博顿斯），一个性格比帕特里夏曾经梦想的要好得多的男人。
back_translation: But despite his appearance resembling Francis, he is actually Henry (Timothy Botans), a man whose character is much better than Patricia ever dreamed of.

text: holy mad maniac in a mask , splat-man ! good old-fashioned slash-and-hack is back !
translation: 疯狂的神圣小丑，喷血人！经典的劈砍回来了！
back_translation: Crazy Holy Clown, Blood Spitting Man! The classic slashing is back!

text: a weaving trail of twists and turns that left people unsettled for two generations until investigative persistence aided by modern technology brings justice for a young mother and her family some 28 years later .
translation: 一条交织着曲折的道路，使人们在两代人中感到不安，直到现代科技的调查坚持帮助为一位年轻母亲及其家人带来正义，时隔28年。
back_translation: A winding road intertwined with twists and turns leaves people feeling uneasy between two generations, until a modern technological investigation insists on helping to bring justice to a young mother and her family, 28 years later.

text: clerick john preston ( bale ) is a top ranking government agent responsible for destroying those who resist the rules .
translation: 克莱里克·约翰·普雷斯顿（贝尔）是一名高级政府特工，负责消灭那些反抗规则的人。
back_translation: Cleric John Preston (Bell) is a senior government agent responsible for eliminating those who rebel against the rules.

text: then one night when he 's up in his mom 's loft , a dead famous comedian appears who tells pauly to kill himself cause he 'll go down as a comedic genius who died before his time .
translation: 然后有一天晚上，当他在妈妈的阁楼上时，一位已故的著名喜剧演员出现了，告诉保利自杀，因为这样他会被视为在巅峰之前就去世的喜剧天才。
back_translation: Then one night, while he was in his mother's attic, a deceased famous comedian appeared and told Paulie to commit suicide, as this way he would be regarded as a comedic genius who died before reaching his peak.

text: dantes is imprisoned on the island prison of chateau d'lf for 13 years , where he plots revenge against those who betrayed him .
translation: 但丁在显尔岛的监狱被囚禁了13年，他在那里策划对背叛他的人的复仇。
back_translation: Dante was imprisoned on the island of Elba for 13 years, where he plotted his revenge against those who betrayed him.

text: a woman who is again able to reach out for love .
translation: 一个再次能够追求爱的女人。
back_translation: A woman who can once again pursue love.

text: they have fallen on hard times and are now working jobs outside of show business to make ends meet .
translation: 他们已经陷入困境，现在不得不从事演艺行业以外的工作来维持生计。
back_translation: They have fallen into difficulty and now have to engage in work outside of the entertainment industry to make a living.

text: dejected , schmitz discovers robert stephens , a young , gay britney impersonator .
translation: 失落的施密茨发现了罗伯特·史蒂芬斯，一个年轻的、同性恋的布兰妮模仿者。

text: where as many films of this nature linger on the hard , the ugly , the blood , or just the stylistic ; empire focuses on the thinking , the love , and even the light-heartedness , as well as the violence .
translation: 而许多此类电影往往停留在残酷、丑陋、血腥或仅仅是风格上；《帝国》则专注于思考、爱，甚至是轻松愉快的元素，以及暴力。
back_translation: Many such films often dwell on cruelty, ugliness, bloodshed, or merely style; however, "Empire" focuses on reflection, love, and even joyful elements, as well as violence.

text: she gets quite curious about this man , who is not like anyone she 's ever met before .
translation: 她对这个男人产生了相当大的好奇，因为他与她之前见过的任何人都不一样。
back_translation: She felt quite a curiosity about this man, as he was unlike anyone she had met before.

text: all kinds of animals begin immigrating to the south , seeking more warm climates .
translation: 各种动物开始向南迁徙，寻求更温暖的气候。
back_translation: Various animals begin to migrate south in search of a warmer climate.

text: there are many things that solid acting can do for a movie , but crafting something promising from a mediocre screenplay is not one of them .
translation: 优秀的表演可以为电影带来很多好处，但从平庸的剧本中打造出有前景的作品却并非其中之一。
back_translation: Outstanding performances can bring many benefits to a film, but creating promising works from a mediocre script is not one of them.

text: it will make you think twice about what might be going on inside each trailer park you drive past -- even if it chiefly inspires you to drive a little faster .
translation: 这会让你重新思考你路过的每一个拖车公园里可能发生的事情——即使它主要激励你开得更快一些。
back_translation: This will make you rethink what might happen in every trailer park you pass by – even if it mainly inspires you to drive a bit faster.

text: the hand that eluded him his entire life , the one that held the cigarettes , and the hand he will never hold again .
translation: 他一生中一直无法抓住的手，那只拿着香烟的手，而他将再也无法握住的手。
back_translation: The hand he could never grasp in his life, the one holding the cigarette, and the hand he will never be able to hold again.

text: shortly after the arrival of the rehab escapees , luck shoots and kills salo jr . and his wife .
translation: 在康复逃亡者到达后不久，拉克开枪杀死了萨洛二世及其妻子。
back_translation: Shortly after the escaped refugees arrived, Rak fired and killed Salor II and his wife.

text: a reasonably efficient mechanism , but it offers few surprises and finds its stars slumming in territory they should have avoided .
translation: 一个相当高效的机制，但它提供的惊喜不多，并且发现其明星在他们本该避免的领域中徘徊。
back_translation: A fairly efficient mechanism, but it offers few surprises and finds its stars lingering in areas they should have avoided.

text: in dogville trier works extensively with light , sound , score and music to obtain and heighten dramatic atmosphere .
translation: 在《狗镇》中，特吕弗广泛运用光、声音、配乐和音乐，以获取并提升戏剧气氛。
back_translation: In "Dogville," Truffaut extensively uses light, sound, sound effects, and music to create and enhance the dramatic atmosphere.

text: by embracing the original series ' tacky elements and inserting just enough self-mockery to avoid smugness , the movie manages to fulfill basic expectations .
translation: 通过接受原系列的“俗气元素”并适度自嘲以避免自满，这部电影成功地满足了基本期望。
back_translation: By embracing the "clichéd elements" of the original series and employing self-deprecation to avoid complacency, the film successfully meets basic expectations.

text: a young man ( keanu reeves ) plays a doctor caring for a man ( nicholson ) , who suffers a heart attack at the house of his young girlfriend 's mother ( keaton ) .
translation: 一个年轻人（基努·里维斯）扮演一名医生，照顾一位（杰克·尼科尔森）在他年轻女友的母亲（戴安·基顿）家中发生心脏病发作的男人。
back_translation: A young man (Keanu Reeves) plays a doctor taking care of a man (Jack Nicholson) who has a heart attack at the home of his young girlfriend's mother (Diane Keaton).

text: if you have an uneasy tummy , this movie is not for you !
translation: 如果你肚子不舒服，这部电影不适合你！
back_translation: If you have an upset stomach, this movie is not suitable for you!

text: it 's about issues most adults have to face in marriage and i think that 's what i liked about it -- the real issues tucked between the silly and crude storyline .
translation: 这涉及到大多数成年人在婚姻中必须面对的问题，我认为这正是我喜欢它的原因——在愚蠢和粗俗的情节之间隐藏着真实的问题。
back_translation: This involves issues that most adults must face in marriage, and I think that's exactly why I like it – real problems hidden between silly and vulgar plots.

text: a diverse and astonishingly articulate cast of palestinian and israeli children .
translation: 一群多样且令人惊叹地能言善辩的巴勒斯坦和以色列儿童。
back_translation: A diverse and remarkably eloquent group of Palestinian and Israeli children.

text: but , disaster strikes , when val goes temporarily blind , due to paranoia .
translation: 但灾难降临，当瓦尔因偏执而暂时失明。
back_translation: But disaster struck when Varl became paranoid and temporarily blind.

text: after a number of failed attempts , they finally arrive by boat and stumble across a german radar station .
translation: 经过多次失败的尝试，他们终于乘船抵达，偶然发现了一个德国雷达站。
back_translation: After multiple failed attempts, they finally arrived by boat and accidentally discovered a German radar station.

text: patricia gets increasingly unhappy within the materialistic las vegas scene .
translation: 帕特里夏在物质主义的拉斯维加斯环境中越来越感到不快乐。
back_translation: Patricia is increasingly feeling unhappy in the materialistic environment of Las Vegas.

text: mr . deeds is not really a film as much as it is a loose collection of not-so-funny gags , scattered moments of lazy humor .
translation: 《德德斯先生》并不算是一部真正的电影，更像是由一些不太好笑的笑料和散乱的懒散幽默时刻组成的松散集合。
back_translation: "Mr. Dedes" is not exactly a real movie; it feels more like a loose collection made up of some not-so-funny jokes and scattered moments of lazy humor.

text: the more he digs , the more evidence he finds that the overdose may have been attempted murder .
translation: 他挖得越深，发现的证据越多，表明这次过量服药可能是故意谋杀。
back_translation: The deeper he dug, the more evidence he found, indicating that this overdose might be a case of intentional murder.

text: in prospect bay , a remote outpost on the south australian coast , two communities , the goonyas ( whites ) and the nungas ( blacks ) , come together on the one field they have in common , the football field .
translation: 在南澳大利亚海岸的一个偏远哨所——前景湾，两个社区，古尼亚人（白人）和南加人（黑人），在他们唯一共同的领域，足球场上汇聚在一起。
back_translation: In a remote outpost on the coast of South Australia—Frontier Bay, two communities, the Guniyah people (whites) and the Nanga people (blacks), come together in their only common ground, the football field.

text: [ toback 's ] fondness for fancy split-screen , stuttering editing and pompous references to wittgenstein and kirkegaard . . . blends uneasily with the titillating material .
translation: [托巴克的] 对华丽分屏、颤抖剪辑以及对维特根斯坦和基尔凯郭尔的自负引用的喜爱……与令人兴奋的素材混合得不太顺畅。
back_translation: [Toback's] love for flashy split screens, jittery edits, and self-important references to Wittgenstein and Kierkegaard... does not blend smoothly with the exciting material.

text: this is human comedy at its most amusing , interesting and confirming .
translation: 这是人类喜剧最有趣、最吸引人和最令人信服的表现。
back_translation: This is the most interesting, captivating, and compelling manifestation of human comedy.

text: based on a true story , sergeant peter king ( kenneth cranham ) of the army dental corps , too old to fight , and private leslie cuthbertson ( leo bill ) , a trainee dental mechanic in the corps , are thrown together by their passionate desire to see active service .
translation: 根据一个真实的故事，军队牙科军团的彼得·金中士（肯尼斯·克兰汉）已年老不适合作战，而私人莱斯利·卡斯伯特森（利奥·比尔）是军团中的一名牙科机械学员，他们因渴望参加实战而走到了一起。
back_translation: Based on a true story, Sergeant Peter King (Kenneth Cranham) of the Army Dental Corps is too old to serve in combat, while Private Leslie Cuthbertson (Leo Bill) is a dental technician trainee in the corps. They come together out of a desire to participate in active service.

text: . . . tara reid plays a college journalist , but she looks like the six-time winner of the miss hawaiian tropic pageant , so i do n't know what she 's doing in here . . .
translation: ...塔拉·里德扮演一名大学记者，但她看起来像是六届夏威夷热带小姐的获得者，所以我不知道她在这里干什么......
back_translation: ...Tara Reid plays a college reporter, but she looks like a six-time winner of the Miss Hawaii tropical pageant, so I don't know what she's doing here...

text: what he does n't know , however , is that syd has a tragic secret .
translation: 然而，他不知道的是西德有一个悲惨的秘密。
back_translation: However, what he did not know was that West Germany had a tragic secret.

text: the fact is that the screen is most alive when it seems most likely that broomfield 's interviewees , or even himself , will not be for much longer .
translation: 事实是，当看起来布伦菲尔德的采访对象，甚至是他自己，可能不再有多久的时候，屏幕最为生动。
back_translation: The fact is that when it seems that Bloomfield's interview subjects, or even he himself, may not have much longer, the screen comes alive the most.

text: mike sullivan ( tom hanks ) works as a hit man for crime boss john rooney ( paul newman ) sullivan views rooney as a father figure .
translation: 迈克·沙利文（汤姆·汉克斯饰）是一名为犯罪老板约翰·鲁尼（保罗·纽曼饰）工作的职业杀手，沙利文视鲁尼为父亲般的形象。
back_translation: Mike Sullivan (played by Tom Hanks) is a hitman working for crime boss John Rooney (played by Paul Newman), and Sullivan regards Rooney as a father figure.

text: well cast and well directed - a powerful drama with enough sardonic wit to keep it from being maudlin .
translation: 演员阵容出色，导演水平高超——这是一部强有力的戏剧，恰到好处的讽刺幽默使它避免了感伤。
back_translation: The cast is outstanding and the director's skills are top-notch—this is a powerful drama, with just the right amount of satirical humor that prevents it from becoming sentimental.

text: dogville is shot exclusively in studio with a minimum of props once again allowing the actors ' maximum freedom and full exposure inspired by televised theatre of the 70s .
translation: 《狗镇》完全在摄影棚内拍摄，使用最少的道具，再次为演员提供了最大的自由和充分的展现，这一切都受到了70年代电视戏剧的启发。
back_translation: "Dogville" was entirely shot in a studio, using minimal props, which once again provided the actors with maximum freedom and full expression, all inspired by 1970s television drama.

text: both got stuck in a broken elevator , 17 level above ground .
translation: 他们都被困在一个坏掉的电梯里，离地面17层。
back_translation: They are all trapped in a broken elevator, 17 floors above the ground.

text: in addition to the overcooked , ham-fisted direction , which has all the actors reaching for the back row , the dialogue sounds like horrible poetry .
translation: 除了过于夸张、笨拙的导演手法，让所有演员都显得像是在朝后排伸手之外，台词听起来就像糟糕的诗歌。
back_translation: Apart from the overly exaggerated and clumsy directorial techniques that make all the actors seem like they are reaching out to the back row, the dialogue sounds like terrible poetry.

text: daphne then must struggle with a snobby half-sister and with following the social obligations expected of her while maintaining her own identity .
translation: 达芙妮必须与一个势利的同父异母的妹妹斗争，并在遵循社会期望的义务的同时保持自己的身份。
back_translation: Daphne must struggle with a snobbish half-sister while maintaining her own identity and adhering to the obligations of societal expectations.

text: a picture that extols the virtues of comradeship and community in a spunky , spirited fashion .
translation: 一幅以热情洋溢、生气勃勃的方式颂扬友谊和社区美德的画面。
back_translation: A scene that exuberantly and vibrantly celebrates friendship and the virtues of community.

text: godard has never made a more sheerly beautiful film than this unexpectedly moving meditation on love , history , memory , resistance and artistic transcendence .
translation: 戈达尔从未制作过比这部出乎意料的感人之作更为纯粹美丽的电影，它对爱、历史、记忆、抗争和艺术超越的思考。
back_translation: Godard has never made a film more purely beautiful than this unexpectedly moving work, which reflects on love, history, memory, struggle, and the transcendence of art.

text: set in 1986 when best friends harry ( olsen ) and lloyd ( richardson ) were teenagers , this is the madcap comic tale of their attempt to get out of the `` special needs `` department and into regular high school life .
translation: 故事设定在1986年，当时最好的朋友哈里（奥尔森饰）和劳埃德（理查德森饰）还是青少年，这是他们尝试摆脱“特殊需求”部门，融入普通高中生活的疯狂搞笑故事。
back_translation: The story is set in 1986, when best friends Harry (played by Olsen) and Lloyd (played by Richardson) are still teenagers. It's a crazy and funny tale of their attempt to escape the "special needs" department and integrate into normal high school life.

text: this is snappy , frothy screwball comedy awash in french understatement .
translation: 这是一部迅速、轻松的闹剧，浸润在法式的含蓄之中。
back_translation: This is a fast-paced, light-hearted farce, steeped in French subtlety.

text: cuts right through the b . s . giving a big middle-fingered `` shut up `` to those who talk up what is nothing more than two guys beating the hell outta one another .
translation: 直接切入主题，给那些只是说着两个人在互相殴打的事情的人一个大大的中指“闭嘴”。
back_translation: Get straight to the point and give a big middle finger to those who just talk about two people beating each other: "Shut up".

text: their life , though unusual , is satisfying until one day , a man named barry kolker ( that her mother refers to at first as `` the goat man `` ) comes into their lives , and ingrid falls madly in love with him , only to have her heart broken , and her life ruined .
translation: 他们的生活虽然不同寻常，但直到有一天，一个名叫巴里·科尔克（她的母亲最初称他为“山羊人”）的男人闯入他们的生活，英格丽德对他疯狂地恋爱，但最终却心碎，生活也被毁掉。
back_translation: Their lives were unusual, but one day a man named Barry Cork, whom her mother initially called the "Goat Man," burst into their lives. Ingrid fell madly in love with him but ultimately ended up heartbroken, and her life was ruined.

text: romantic comedy and dogme 95 filmmaking may seem odd bedfellows , but they turn out to be delightfully compatible here .
translation: 浪漫喜剧与狗厌95电影制作看似不搭界，但在这里却意外地契合得令人愉快。
back_translation: Romantic comedies and dog aversion in filmmaking may seem unrelated, but here they surprisingly fit together delightfully.

text: all in all , the count of monte cristo is okay , but it is surely no classic , like the novel upon which it is based .
translation: 总的来说，《基督山伯爵》还不错，但绝对称不上经典，无法与其所基于的小说相比。
back_translation: Overall, "The Count of Monte Cristo" is not bad, but it definitely cannot be called a classic and cannot compare to the novel it is based on.

text: now he must battle the courts to get his children back .
translation: 现在他必须与法院斗争以找回他的孩子。
back_translation: Now he must fight the court to get his child back.

text: an enjoyably half-wit remake of the venerable italian comedy big deal on madonna street .
translation: 一部愉快的半傻改编版的意大利经典喜剧《马丹娜街的好交易》。
back_translation: A delightful half-crazy adaptation of the Italian classic comedy "The Good Deal on Madonna Street."

text: slim , otis , frank and alex ( three boys and a girl ) form a group of snowboard and skate young bank robbers .
translation: 斯利姆、奥提斯、弗兰克和亚历克斯（三个男孩和一个女孩）组成了一个滑雪板和滑板的年轻银行盗贼团体。
back_translation: Slim, Otis, Frank, and Alex (three boys and one girl) formed a young bank robber group that specializes in snowboarding and skateboarding.

text: 'christian bale 's quinn [ is ] a leather clad grunge-pirate with a hairdo like gandalf in a wind-tunnel and a simply astounding cor-blimey-luv-a-duck cockney accent . '
translation: “克里斯蒂安·贝尔的奎因是一个穿着皮革的垃圾摇滚海盗，头发像在风洞里的甘道夫，口音简直惊人，满口伦敦方言。”
back_translation: "Christian Bale's Quinn is a leather-clad junk rock pirate, with hair like Gandalf in a wind tunnel, an astonishing accent, and a mouth full of London dialect."

text: this dramatically shaky contest of wills only reiterates the old hollywood saw : evil is interesting and good is boring .
translation: 这场戏剧性而摇摆不定的意志争斗只重申了旧好莱坞的谚语：邪恶有趣，而善良无聊。
back_translation: This dramatic and wavering struggle of wills only reiterates the old Hollywood saying: evil is interesting, while goodness is boring.

text: a straight-shooting family film which awards animals the respect they 've rarely been given .
translation: 一部直率的家庭电影，给予动物们少有的尊重。
back_translation: A straightforward family film that gives animals rare respect.

text: shot independently over a 24-hour period , the film is first a witness to the fall of the twin towers , as a line of fire and a buckle in the armature signal imminent collapse .
translation: 在一个24小时的时间段内独立拍摄，本片首先见证了双子塔的倒塌，随着一线火焰和支架的翘曲，预示着即将发生的坍塌。
back_translation: In a 24-hour period of independent filming, this film first witnesses the collapse of the Twin Towers, with flames flaring and supports twisting, signaling the imminent collapse.

text: one minute , you think you 're watching a serious actioner ; the next , it 's as though clips from the pink panther strikes again and/or sailor moon have been spliced in .
translation: 一分钟，你觉得自己在看一部严肃的动作片；下一秒，就好像《粉红豹重出江湖》和/或《美少女战士》的片段被拼接进来了。
back_translation: In one minute, you feel like you're watching a serious action movie; the next second, it feels like clips from "The Pink Panther Strikes Again" and/or "Sailor Moon" have been spliced in.

text: how would you feel if when you woke , the nightmare had just begun ?
translation: 如果当你醒来时，噩梦才刚刚开始，你会有什么感受？
back_translation: What would you feel if the nightmare has just begun when you wake up?

text: oh come on . like you could n't smell this turkey rotting from miles away .
translation: 哦，拜托。你难道不能从几英里外就闻到这只火鸡腐烂的味道吗？
back_translation: Oh, come on. Can't you smell the rotten scent of this turkey from a few miles away?

text: despite a well-placed sense of historical outrage , fence is n't one-sided .
translation: 尽管有着恰当的历史愤慨感，围栏并不是单方面的。
back_translation: Despite having the appropriate historical sense of outrage, the enclosure is not one-sided.

text: as a thoughtful and unflinching examination of an alternative lifestyle , sex with strangers is a success .
translation: 作为对一种替代生活方式的深思熟虑和毫不动摇的审视，与陌生人的性关系是成功的。
back_translation: As a thoughtful and unwavering examination of an alternative lifestyle, sexual relations with strangers are successful.

text: for 7 years he has watched over the holy fire , forsaking his wife , family and every earthly pleasure .
translation: 他已经守护着神圣的火焰七年，放弃了妻子、家庭和一切世俗的享乐。
back_translation: He has guarded the sacred flame for seven years, giving up his wife, family, and all worldly pleasures.

text: the urban landscapes are detailed down to the signs on the kiosks , and the color palette , with lots of somber blues and pinks , is dreamy and evocative .
translation: 城市景观的细节描绘到了小摊上的标志，颜色调色板中包含了许多阴郁的蓝色和粉色，梦幻而富有感染力。
back_translation: The details of the urban landscape are depicted down to the signs on the stalls, with a color palette that includes many moody blues and pinks, dreamy and infectious.

text: the story takes place over the course of a day , when the couples get together for an afternoon of dining , drinking , and hot tubbing .
translation: 故事发生在一天的时间里，情侣们聚在一起享受午后的用餐、饮酒和泡热水浴。
back_translation: The story takes place over the course of a day, where couples gather together to enjoy afternoon meals, drinks, and hot baths.

text: the author 's devotees will probably find it fascinating ; others may find it baffling .
translation: 作者的追随者可能会觉得这很吸引人；而其他人可能会感到困惑。
back_translation: The author's followers may find this appealing; while others may feel confused.

text: like the best war movies -- and like martial literature going back to the iliad -- it balances the dreadful , unassuageable cruelty of warfare and the valor and decency of those who fight .
translation: 就像最好的战争电影一样——也像追溯到《伊利亚特》的武侠文学——它平衡了战争的可怕、不可抑制的残酷与那些战斗者的勇气和正直。
back_translation: Just like the best war films — and reminiscent of the martial arts literature tracing back to the "Iliad" — it balances the horrors and uncontrollable brutality of war with the courage and integrity of the fighters.

text: a little girl 's search for her biological mother who had abandoned her as a new born baby is brought out poignantly in 'kannathil muthamittal ' .
translation: 小女孩寻找她作为新生儿被遗弃的生母的过程在《Kannathil Muthamittal》中表现得非常感人。
back_translation: The process of the little girl searching for her biological mother, who abandoned her as a newborn, is portrayed very movingly in "Kannathil Muthamittal."

text: he also meets yuki , a 9-year-old guitar prodigy , who could help dewey win a `` battle of the bands `` competition , which would solve his financial problems and put him back in the spotlight .
translation: 他还遇到了优纪，一个9岁的吉他天才，她可以帮助杜威赢得一场“乐队对抗赛”，这将解决他的财务问题，并让他重新回到聚光灯下。
back_translation: He also met Yuki, a 9-year-old guitar prodigy, who can help Dewey win a "band battle" that will solve his financial problems and get him back in the spotlight.

text: ethan fernier is obsessed with the horror movies of b-movie director , winston korman .
translation: 伊桑·费尔尼尔痴迷于B级电影导演温斯顿·科尔曼的恐怖电影。
back_translation: Ethan Fernier is obsessed with the horror films of B-movie director Winston Coleman.

text: finnur , a 9 year old boy , finds his way to j & # 243 ; hanns world and they develop a special friendship .
translation: 芬努尔，一个9岁的男孩，找到了通往约翰的世界，他们建立了一段特别的友谊。
back_translation: Finnur, a 9-year-old boy, found a way to John’s world, and they established a special friendship.

text: his father eventually becomes very ill and passes away , the future of rammoth lays in ancanar 's hands .
translation: 他的父亲最终病重去世，拉莫斯的未来掌握在安卡纳尔手中。
back_translation: His father eventually passed away due to illness, and Ramos's future is in the hands of Ankaran.

text: eastwood is an icon of moviemaking , one of the best actors , directors and producers around , responsible for some excellent work . but even a hero can stumble sometimes .
translation: 伊斯特伍德是电影制作的偶像，是最优秀的演员、导演和制片人之一，为一些优秀作品负责。但即使是英雄有时也会绊倒。
back_translation: Eastwood is an icon of filmmaking, one of the finest actors, directors, and producers, responsible for some excellent works. But even heroes can stumble at times.

text: imprisoned and depressed pete 's letter gives eagle rekindled spirit .
translation: 被囚禁和抑郁的皮特的信让鹰重燃了斗志。
back_translation: The letter from the imprisoned and depressed Peter reignited the eagle's fighting spirit.

text: in this film , aussie david caesar channels the not-quite-dead career of guy ritchie .
translation: 在这部电影中，澳大利亚的戴维·凯撒借鉴了盖·里奇那不算完全死亡的职业生涯。
back_translation: In this film, Australia's David Caesar draws inspiration from Guy Ritchie's not entirely dead career.

text: [ demme ] creates a film that is both traditional , in keeping with its source material , and new millennium hip .
translation: [德梅] 制作了一部既传统，又符合其原材料，同时又具备新千年时尚的电影。
back_translation: [Demay] created a film that is both traditional and aligned with its raw materials, while also embodying the fashion of the new millennium.

text: a sweet film about two gentle souls - there is a genuine caring between them that feels like watching old friends .
translation: 一部关于两个温柔灵魂的甜美电影 - 他们之间有着真诚的关心，仿佛在观看老朋友的互动。
back_translation: A sweet movie about two gentle souls - there is genuine care between them, as if watching the interaction of old friends.

text: . . . either you 're willing to go with this claustrophobic concept or you 're not .
translation: ……要么你愿意接受这个幽闭的概念，要么你不愿意。
back_translation: Either you are willing to accept this concept of confinement, or you are not.

text: the film starts in 1846 and ends in 1863 with the draft riots .
translation: 这部电影从1846年开始，到1863年征兵骚乱结束。
back_translation: The movie starts in 1846 and ends with the draft riots in 1863.

text: a solid , psychological action film from hong kong .
translation: 一部来自香港的坚实心理动作片。
back_translation: A solid psychological action film from Hong Kong.

text: birthday girl is an amusing joy ride , with some surprisingly violent moments .
translation: 生日女孩是一段有趣的快乐旅程，包含一些令人意外的暴力时刻。
back_translation: The birthday girl is an interesting journey of joy, filled with some unexpected moments of violence.

text: considering the harsh locations and demanding stunts , this must have been a difficult shoot , but the movie proves rough going for the audience as well .
translation: 考虑到严酷的拍摄地点和要求高难度的特技，这肯定是一场艰难的拍摄，但这部电影对观众来说也同样艰难。
back_translation: Considering the harsh filming locations and the demanding stunts, it must have been a difficult shoot, but the movie is equally tough for the audience.

text: parts of the film feel a bit too much like an infomercial for ram dass 's latest book aimed at the boomer demographic . but mostly it 's a work that , with humor , warmth , and intelligence , captures a life interestingly lived .
translation: 影片的某些部分感觉有点像是为拉姆·达斯的最新书籍做的宣传，目标受众是婴儿潮一代。但大多数时候，这是一部用幽默、温暖和智慧捕捉到一段有趣人生的作品。
back_translation: Certain parts of the film feel a bit like promotion for Ram Dass's latest book, targeting the baby boomer generation. But for the most part, it is a work that captures an interesting life with humor, warmth, and wisdom.

text: final report : good , yes ; great , no .
translation: 最终报告：好，是的；出色，不。
back_translation: Final report: Good, yes; excellent, no.

text: leggy zeta-jones is so hot in the 'all that jazz ' number , she 's flammable . and zellweger defines delicious .
translation: 长腿的凯瑟琳·泽塔-琼斯在《舞出精彩》这段表演中真是太性感了，简直让人着迷。而瑞茜·威瑟斯彭的表现更是令人垂涎。
back_translation: The long-legged Catherine Zeta-Jones was absolutely stunning and mesmerizing in her performance in "Dancing with the Stars." And Reese Witherspoon's performance was even more drool-worthy.

text: despite some gulps the film is a fuzzy huggy .
translation: 尽管有些起伏，这部电影仍然是一个模糊温暖的怀抱。
back_translation: Despite some ups and downs, the film is still a vaguely warm embrace.

text: filmed in a california maximum security prison , the series is a look into the world of street and prison gangs , which ask is there a way out for these men who have dedicated their lives to gangs .
translation: 该系列在加利福尼亚州的一所最高安全监狱拍摄，深入探讨街头和监狱帮派的世界，询问这些将生命奉献给帮派的男人是否有出路。
back_translation: The series was filmed at a maximum-security prison in California, delving into the world of street and prison gangs, asking whether the men who have dedicated their lives to gangs have any way out.

text: this is a film brimming with detail and nuance and one that speaks volumes about the ability of the human spirit to find solace in events that could easily crush it forever .
translation: 这是一部充满细节和细微差别的电影，它深刻地传达了人类精神在那些可能永远压垮它的事件中找到安慰的能力。
back_translation: This is a film rich in detail and nuance, profoundly conveying the human spirit's ability to find comfort in events that could potentially crush it forever.

text: what separates miyazaki 's animation from everyone else 's is the way he imagines his worlds .
translation: 宫崎骏的动画与其他人的作品不同之处在于他构建世界的方式。
back_translation: Hayao Miyazaki's animations differ from those of others in the way he builds his worlds.

text: a movie that will surely be profane , politically charged music to the ears of cho 's fans .
translation: 一部肯定会亵渎，对赵的粉丝们来说充满政治色彩的电影。
back_translation: A film that will definitely be blasphemous and filled with political color for Zhao's fans.

text: nicks , seemingly uncertain what 's going to make people laugh , runs the gamut from stale parody to raunchy sex gags to formula romantic comedy .
translation: 尼克似乎不确定什么能让人发笑，从陈旧的模仿到粗俗的性笑话，再到公式化的浪漫喜剧，应有尽有。
back_translation: Nick seems unsure about what can make people laugh, ranging from outdated impressions to crude sexual jokes, and even formulaic romantic comedies.

text: the backyard follows several backyard wrestlers in different countries as they pursue their dream to become professional wrestlers .
translation: 后院讲述了几位来自不同国家的后院摔跤手的故事，他们追寻成为职业摔跤手的梦想。
back_translation: The backyard tells the stories of several backyard wrestlers from different countries who are pursuing their dream of becoming professional wrestlers.

text: serious and conservative , jamie ( moore ) was as far from cool as she could possibly be , and did n't care .
translation: 严肃而保守的杰米（摩尔）离“酷”这个词远得很，且对此毫不在意。
back_translation: Serious and conservative Jamie (Moore) is far from the word "cool" and doesn't care about it at all.

text: this action-thriller/dark comedy is one of the most repellent things to pop up in a cinematic year already littered with celluloid garbage .
translation: 这部动作惊悚片/黑暗喜剧是今年电影界中出现的最令人厌恶的作品之一，已经被无数胶卷垃圾所填满。
back_translation: This action thriller/dark comedy is one of the most detestable works to emerge in the film industry this year, filled with countless reels of garbage.

text: feels like six different movies fighting each other for attention .
translation: 感觉像是六部不同的电影在争夺注意力。
back_translation: It feels like six different films are competing for attention.

text: after pulling off an amazing gold bullion heist from a heavily guarded palazzo in venice , italy , charlie and his gang -- inside man steve ( norton ) , computer genius lyle ( green ) , wheelman handsome rob ( statham ) , explosives expert left-ear ( mos def ) and veteran safecracker john bridger ( sutherland ) - ca n't believe when one of them turns out to be a double-crosser .
translation: 在意大利威尼斯的一座 heavily guarded palazzo 中，查理和他的团队完成了一场惊人的黄金金条抢劫，团队成员包括内部人史蒂夫（诺顿），计算机天才莱尔（格林），驾驶高手汉斯罗布（斯塔萨姆），炸药专家左耳（莫斯·德夫）和老练的保险箱撬开者约翰·布里杰（萨瑟兰）。当其中一人竟然是双重间谍时，他们简直不敢相信。
back_translation: In a heavily guarded palazzo in Venice, Italy, Charlie and his team successfully completed an astonishing gold bar heist. The team members included insider Steve (Norton), computer genius Lyle (Green), driving expert Hans Rob (Statham), explosives specialist Left Ear (Moss Def), and seasoned safecracker John Bridger (Sutherland). They could hardly believe it when they discovered that one of them was actually a double agent.

text: chilling , well-acted , and finely directed : david jacobson 's dahmer .
translation: 令人毛骨悚然、演技精湛、导演出色：大卫·雅各布森的《达默》。
back_translation: Creepy, with excellent acting and outstanding direction: David Jacobson's "Dahmer."

text: soon jonah embarks on an adventure that leads him into the belly of a whale , and to the heart of nineveh for a hilarious showdown .
translation: 不久后，约拿踏上了一场冒险，带他进入鲸鱼的腹中，直抵尼尼微的核心，进行一场搞笑的对决。
back_translation: Not long after, Jonah embarked on an adventure that took him into the belly of a whale, directly to the heart of Nineveh, for a humorous showdown.

text: this documentary by stacy peralta makes a convincing case on behalf of skateboarding , of all things , as a catalyst for this change , and for some delinquent youths in a derelict los angeles neighborhood as its agents .
translation: 这部由斯泰西·佩拉尔塔制作的纪录片为滑板运动的变革作用提出了令人信服的论据，并将一些在洛杉矶贫民区的青少年视为其代理人。
back_translation: This documentary produced by Stacey Peralta presents a compelling argument for the transformative role of skateboarding, viewing some adolescents from the impoverished neighborhoods of Los Angeles as its agents.

text: scotland looks wonderful , the fans are often funny fanatics , the showdown sure beats a bad day of golf .
translation: 苏格兰看起来很美，球迷们常常是有趣的狂热者，比赛绝对比糟糕的一天高尔夫球要好。
back_translation: Scotland looks beautiful, and the fans are often interestingly passionate; the matches are definitely better than a terrible day of golf.

text: the face of the serpent is an action-thriller with strong political undertones of local government corruption .
translation: 《蛇之面孔》是一部充满政治暗示的动作惊悚片，揭示了地方政府的腐败。
back_translation: "The Face of the Snake" is an action thriller full of political implications, revealing the corruption of local governments.

text: nayomi and lisa go to do the hit but everything goes terribly wrong .
translation: 奈欧米和丽萨去执行任务，但一切都出了大问题。
back_translation: Naomi and Lisa went to carry out a mission, but everything went terribly wrong.

text: a pointed , often tender , examination of the pros and cons of unconditional love and familial duties .
translation: 对无条件的爱和家庭责任的优缺点进行尖锐而细腻的审视。
back_translation: A sharp and delicate examination of the pros and cons of unconditional love and family responsibilities.

text: a movie that 's full of deft , off-center observations about the world of filmmaking .
translation: 一部充满灵巧且不拘一格的关于电影制作世界的观察的电影。
back_translation: A clever and unconventional observation of the world of filmmaking.

text: so purely enjoyable that you might not even notice it 's a fairly straightforward remake of hollywood comedies such as father of the bride .
translation: 如此纯粹的享受，以至于你可能甚至不会意识到它其实是好莱坞喜剧《新郎的父亲》等的相对简单的翻拍。
back_translation: Such pure enjoyment that you might not even realize it is actually a relatively simple remake of Hollywood comedies like "Father of the Bride."

text: they all died 48 hours after logging on to a site named feardotcom . com .
translation: 他们在登录一个名为feardotcom.com的网站后48小时内全部死亡。
back_translation: They all died within 48 hours after logging into a website called feardotcom.com.

text: during his tenure , he was responsible for such revolutionary films as the godfather , rosemary 's baby , love story , the odd couple , harold and maude and chinatown .
translation: 在他任期内，他负责制作了一些具有革命性的电影，如《教父》、《罗丝玛丽的婴儿》、《爱情故事》、《奇异的情侣》、《哈罗德与莫德》和《唐人街》。
back_translation: During his tenure, he was responsible for producing several groundbreaking films, such as "The Godfather," "Rosemary's Baby," "Love Story," "The Odd Couple," "Harold and Maude," and "Chinatown."

text: an impressively coordinated enterprise that lasts three hours , manages a large cast , and covers a period of 30-odd years while successfully unfolding as a series of scenes from the life of a single character .
translation: 一个令人印象深刻的协调企业，持续三小时，管理着庞大的演员阵容，涵盖了30年左右的时间，同时成功呈现出一个角色生活的多个场景。
back_translation: An impressive coordination of the enterprise, lasting three hours, managing a large cast, covering around 30 years of time, while successfully presenting multiple scenes of a character's life.

text: a comic tale about the end of the summer in ireland , 2001 , where 5 boys and 5 girls are out to end the summer with a bang before heading back to school to sit the final exams , only to be thwarted by comic mishappenings .
translation: 一个关于2001年爱尔兰夏天结束的喜剧故事，五个男孩和五个女孩为了在回校参加期末考试之前尽情享受夏天的最后时光而出门，结果却被一系列搞笑的意外情况所阻碍。
back_translation: A comedic story about the end of summer in Ireland in 2001, where five boys and five girls set out to enjoy the last moments of summer before returning to school for final exams, only to be thwarted by a series of hilarious mishaps.

text: a summary of the plot does n't quite do justice to the awfulness of the movie , for that comes through all too painfully in the execution .
translation: 剧情的总结并不能充分体现这部电影的糟糕，因为这一点在执行上表现得过于痛苦。
back_translation: The summary of the plot does not fully reflect the awfulness of this movie, as this is expressed too painfully in its execution.

text: secrets of robert 's past start to emerge as he unleashes his awesome martial arts fighting abilities to defend himself and his wife .
translation: 罗伯特的过去秘密开始浮出水面，他释放出惊人的武术格斗能力来保护自己和他的妻子。
back_translation: Robert's past secrets began to surface, and he unleashed astonishing martial arts combat skills to protect himself and his wife.

text: trouble comes when tom ex girlfriend reappears , asking for help , announcing him that she had a girl from him 9 years ago .
translation: 当汤姆的前女友重新出现，要求帮助，并告诉他她9年前为他生了一个女孩时，麻烦就来了。
back_translation: Trouble arises when Tom's ex-girlfriend reappears, asking for help, and informs him that she had a girl for him nine years ago.

text: they nevertherless feel responsible to protect the flag until monday 's ceremony .
translation: 他们仍然感到有责任在周一的仪式之前保护旗帜。
back_translation: They still feel responsible for protecting the flag before the ceremony on Monday.

text: when an older woman , mutt , an eccentric hustler with a heart , and her dog fort pass by , janey `` s solitude is forever changed .
translation: 当一位年长女性、一个古怪的拉客者和她的狗福特路过时，珍妮的孤独永远改变了。
back_translation: When an older woman, an eccentric pimp, and her dog passed by, Jenny's loneliness changed forever.

text: we become complicit in our own seduction : we willingly let bielinsky manipulate us .
translation: 我们在自己的诱惑中变得共谋：我们自愿让比连斯基操控我们。
back_translation: We become accomplices in our own temptations: we willingly allow Bilyansky to manipulate us.

text: but freddy 's plans do n't go according to schedule when jason discovers that he has been manipulated , which really sends him over the egde .
translation: 但弗雷迪的计划并未按预定的时间进行，当杰森发现自己被操控时，真的让他崩溃了。
back_translation: But Freddy's plan did not go as scheduled, and when Jason realized he was being manipulated, it really broke him down.

text: the film is probably worth seeing for the sheer spectacle of it all , for the sake of obtaining valuable information , and for finding more closure on a story that has always been missing several pieces .
translation: 这部电影可能值得一看，因其壮观的场面，也为了获取有价值的信息，以及为了在一个一直缺失几部分的故事中寻找更多的圆满。
back_translation: This movie might be worth watching for its spectacular scenes, to gain valuable information, and to seek more completeness in a story that has long been missing some parts.

text: instead he hides out in a cave on goose creek , waging guerilla warfare against expansionism and the destruction of historic property with the help of his family , friends , and neighbors . . .
translation: 相反，他藏身于鹅溪的一处洞穴中，与家人、朋友和邻居一起，发起游击战争，抵抗扩张主义和Historic财产的破坏。
back_translation: On the contrary, he hid in a cave at Goose Creek, where he launched a guerrilla war with his family, friends, and neighbors to resist expansionism and the destruction of historic properties.

text: this movie shows the intense life of this character ; not only focusing in the robberies , but also in the reasons that pushed him into acting the way he did .
translation: 这部电影展示了这个角色的紧张生活；不仅关注于抢劫事件，还关注促使他以那种方式行事的原因。
back_translation: This movie showcases the character's tense life; it not only focuses on the robbery but also on the reasons that drive him to act in that way.

text: before the gang returns , jack and erin 's connection intensifies and who ends up with the money is anyone 's guess .
translation: 在帮派回来之前，杰克和艾琳的关系加深了，最后谁能拿到钱，无人知晓。
back_translation: Before the gang returned, Jack and Erin's relationship deepened, and in the end, no one knew who would get the money.

text: polanski has found the perfect material with which to address his own world war ii experience in his signature style .
translation: 波兰斯基找到了完美的素材，以他的独特风格来处理他自己的第二次世界大战经历。
back_translation: Polanski found the perfect material to process his own experiences of World War II in his unique style.

text: his religious devotion to the work is challenged however , when his best friend and personal mentor is run down by an irate motorist and knocked into a deep coma .
translation: 然而，他对工作的宗教般的奉献受到了挑战，因为他的挚友和个人导师被一名愤怒的司机撞倒，陷入了深度昏迷。
back_translation: However, his almost religious dedication to work was challenged when his close friend and personal mentor was struck by an angry driver and fell into a deep coma.

text: while dutifully pulling on heartstrings , directors dean deblois and chris sanders valiantly keep punching up the mix .
translation: 在恪尽职守地拉动观众的心弦的同时，导演迪恩·德布洛斯和克里斯·桑德斯勇敢地不断提升作品的层次。
back_translation: While diligently pulling at the audience's heartstrings, directors Dean DeBlois and Chris Sanders bravely continue to elevate the work's depth.

text: it 's the extra layer that makes this one , the movie 's understanding of how disillusion and inner compromise can gradually separate a young artist from his divine spark .
translation: 正是这一额外的层次让这部电影更具深度，它对幻灭和内心妥协如何逐渐将年轻艺术家与他的神圣火花分离的理解。
back_translation: It is this additional layer that gives the film more depth, understanding how disillusionment and inner compromise gradually separate the young artist from his divine spark.

text: the plants are the only break in the grey monotony around her .
translation: 植物是她周围灰色单调中唯一的亮点。
back_translation: The plants are the only highlights in the gray monotony around her.

text: with the fbi and press in hot pursuit , she must make the hardest decision in her life .
translation: 随着联邦调查局和媒体的紧密追踪，她必须做出一生中最艰难的决定。
back_translation: With the FBI and the media closely tracking her, she must make the hardest decision of her life.

text: the film truly does rescue [ the funk brothers ] from motown 's shadows . it 's about time .
translation: 这部电影确实让[起伏兄弟]摆脱了摩城的阴影。是时候了。
back_translation: This movie has indeed helped the [Fallen Brothers] break free from the shadow of Motown. It's about time.

text: briar patch is a modern , southern gothic tale of true love and murder .
translation: 《荆棘丛》是一个现代南方哥特风格的真实爱情与谋杀的故事。
back_translation: "The Thicket" is a modern Southern Gothic story of true love and murder.

text: a must for fans of british cinema , if only because so many titans of the industry are along for the ride .
translation: 对于英国电影的粉丝来说，这是必看之作，仅仅因为业界如此多的巨头参与其中。
back_translation: For fans of British cinema, this is a must-see simply because so many industry giants are involved.

text: lazy , miserable and smug . this is one of the biggest disappointments of the year .
translation: 懒惰、悲惨和自鸣得意。这是今年最大的失望之一。
