back_translation: Laziness, misery, and self-satisfaction. This is one of the biggest disappointments of the year.

text: a supernatural mystery that does n't know whether it wants to be a suspenseful horror movie or a weepy melodrama . it ends up being neither , and fails at both endeavors .
translation: 一个超自然的谜团，不知道自己想成为一部悬疑恐怖片还是一部感人的音乐剧。最后它都不是，两个目标都未能实现。
back_translation: A supernatural mystery that doesn't know if it wants to be a suspenseful horror film or a touching musical. In the end, it is neither, as both goals remain unachieved.

text: my wife is an actress has its moments in looking at the comic effects of jealousy . in the end , though , it is only mildly amusing when it could have been so much more .
translation: 我妻子是一名演员，在看待嫉妒的喜剧效果时有其独特的瞬间。然而，最终它只是稍微有趣，而本可以更有趣。
back_translation: My wife is an actress, and she has her own unique moments when it comes to the comedic effects of jealousy. However, in the end, it’s just slightly interesting when it could have been much funnier.

text: she faces exams , completion of her thesis , and a competitive interview process , all of which is compounded when a police detective , wade handler ( bratt ) , begins investigating the two year-old disappearance of her boyfriend , embry langan ( hunnam ) , a young man whose memory haunts and obsesses her .
translation: 她面临考试、论文完成和竞争激烈的面试过程中，同时她的男友埃姆布里·兰根（汉纳姆）两年前的失踪案件也被警探韦德·汉德勒（布拉特）调查，这让她的情况更加复杂，而这个年轻人的记忆一直困扰着她并让她沉迷。
back_translation: She is facing exams, the completion of papers, and highly competitive interviews, while her boyfriend Embry Langen (Hannam) has been missing for two years and his case is being investigated by Detective Wade Handler (Blatt), adding complexity to her situation. The memory of this young man has been haunting her and consuming her thoughts.

text: the very definition of the 'small ' movie , but it is a good stepping stone for director sprecher .
translation: “小电影”的确切定义，但这对导演斯普雷彻来说是一个很好的垫脚石。
back_translation: The exact definition of "short film" is indeed a good stepping stone for director Sprecher.

text: this movie in a single breath goes to the very heart of the russian experience .
translation: 这部电影一口气深入了俄罗斯经验的核心。
back_translation: This film deeply delves into the core of the Russian experience in one go.

text: even if it pushes its agenda too forcefully , this remains a film about something , one that attempts and often achieves a level of connection and concern .
translation: 即便它过于强势地推动其议程，这仍是一部关于某种事物的电影，一部试图并常常成功达到一种连接和关怀水平的电影。
back_translation: Even if it aggressively promotes its agenda, it is still a film about something, a film that attempts to and often succeeds in reaching a level of connection and care.

text: hoping to settle , once and for all , the issue of his virginity , nick begs roger to school him in the art of seducing women .
translation: 希望一次性解决他的处男问题，尼克恳求罗杰教他如何诱惑女人。
back_translation: Hoping to resolve his virginity issue all at once, Nick pleaded with Roger to teach him how to seduce women.

text: the film follows fictional movie star gray evans through the disintegration of his marriage , his gradual mental breakdown , and his increasing obsession with a young film student who reminds gray of his own life before becoming famous .
translation: 影片讲述了虚构电影明星格雷·埃文斯在婚姻解体、逐渐精神崩溃以及对一个年轻电影学生愈发痴迷的过程，这个学生让格雷想起了他成名之前的生活。
back_translation: The film tells the story of fictional movie star Gray Evans as he experiences the disintegration of his marriage, a gradual mental breakdown, and an increasing obsession with a young film student who reminds him of the life he had before he became famous.

text: like edward norton in american history x , ryan gosling ( murder by numbers ) delivers a magnetic performance .
translation: 就像爱德华·诺顿在《美国历史X》中表现的那样，瑞安·高斯林在《数字谋杀》中也展现了引人入胜的表演。
back_translation: Just like Edward Norton’s performance in "American History X," Ryan Gosling also showcased a captivating performance in "Digital Murder."

text: a series of mysterious and bizarre death threats soon ushers in symptoms of paranoia , unwelcome fame , and eventually a severe case of writer 's block .
translation: 一系列神秘而离奇的死亡威胁很快引发了偏执的症状、不受欢迎的名声，以及最终严重的写作障碍。
back_translation: A series of mysterious and bizarre death threats soon triggered symptoms of paranoia, an unwelcome reputation, and ultimately severe writing difficulties.

text: definitely not the knee-slapper that i was told it would be , but enough hahas for me to grade as passable .
translation: 绝对不是我被告知的那种令人捧腹的大笑，但足够让我觉得可以及格。
back_translation: It is definitely not the kind of hilarious laughter that I was told about, but it's enough for me to feel it's passable.

text: after letting his screenwriting software sit on his shelf for three years , he finally has the big idea that inspires him to load screenwriter 4 . 0 and get writing .
translation: 在让他的编剧软件静置在架子上三年后，他终于有了一个伟大的想法，激励他加载编剧4.0并开始写作。
back_translation: After letting his screenwriting software sit on the shelf for three years, he finally had a great idea that inspired him to load up Screenwriter 4.0 and start writing.

text: entwined with maggie 's search for hope , the film explores her interaction with her family and friends .
translation: 与梅吉寻求希望交织在一起，电影探讨了她与家人和朋友的互动。
back_translation: Intertwined with Mei Ji's search for hope, the film explores her interactions with family and friends.

text: best enjoyed as a work of fiction inspired by real-life events . those seeking a definitive account of eisenstein 's life would do better elsewhere .
translation: 最好将其视为受真实事件启发的虚构作品。那些寻求爱森斯坦生平的确切记载的人应该去别处寻找。
back_translation: It is best to consider it a fictional work inspired by real events. Those seeking exact accounts of Eisenstein's life should look elsewhere.

text: there 's only one thing his cousin did n't tell him . . .
translation: 他的表哥没有告诉他的一件事。。。
back_translation: One thing his cousin didn't tell him...

text: the behind the scenes series is more interesting than the resulting movie , but it 's still worth taking a look .
translation: 幕后系列比最终电影更有趣，但仍然值得一看。
back_translation: The behind-the-scenes series is more interesting than the final movie, but it's still worth watching.

text: the story focuses on an ambitious young executive , amanda , who inherits a lovely b & # 38 ; b on a remote island in maine when her grandmother dies .
translation: 这个故事讲述了一位雄心勃勃的年轻高管阿曼达，她在祖母去世后，继承了位于缅因州一座偏远岛屿上的一家迷人的民宿。
back_translation: This story tells of an ambitious young executive named Amanda, who, after the death of her grandmother, inherited a charming inn located on a remote island in Maine.

text: beautifully shot against the frozen winter landscapes of grenoble and geneva , the film unfolds with all the mounting tension of an expert thriller , until the tragedy beneath it all gradually reveals itself .
translation: 在格勒诺布尔和日内瓦冰冻的冬季风景中，影片以美丽的画面展开，伴随着专家级惊悚片的紧张氛围，直到隐藏在一切背后的悲剧逐渐浮现。
back_translation: In the frozen winter landscapes of Grenoble and Geneva, the film unfolds with beautiful imagery, accompanied by the tense atmosphere of an expert-level thriller, until the tragedy hidden behind it all gradually comes to light.

text: `` mr . deeds `` is suitable summer entertainment that offers escapism without requiring a great deal of thought .
translation: 《德德先生》是一部适合夏季娱乐的电影，它提供了一种逃避现实的方式，而不需要过多的思考。
back_translation: "Mr. Dede" is a movie suitable for summer entertainment, offering a way to escape reality without requiring too much thought.

text: things get a little awkward when harry suffers a heart attack at the home of marin 's mother erica ( keaton ) .
translation: 当哈里在玛琳的母亲艾丽卡（基顿）家中突发心脏病时，事情变得有些尴尬。
back_translation: Things became a bit awkward when Harry had a heart attack at Marlene's mother's house, Erika (Keaton).

text: they marry because that 's what you are supposed to do .
translation: 他们结婚是因为这就是你应该做的。
back_translation: They got married because that is what you are supposed to do.

text: . . . skirts the edges of snide condescension only to then abruptly catch the viewer off-guard with lightning strikes of genuine emotion .
translation: ……在轻蔑的边缘游走，却又突然以真挚的情感让观众感到措手不及。
back_translation: ...walking on the edge of disdain, yet suddenly bringing the audience to a standstill with sincere emotions.

text: fresh from a series of emotional traumas , allison is distrustful and not so easily rescued , though over a period of two days she comes to regard her idealization of dylan as a last opportunity for security and happiness .
translation: 经历了一系列情感创伤后，艾莉森变得不信任，也不易被救赎，尽管在两天的时间里，她开始将对迪伦的理想化视为获得安全和幸福的最后机会。
back_translation: After experiencing a series of emotional traumas, Allison became distrustful and hard to redeem, though within two days, she began to see her idealization of Dylan as her last chance to attain safety and happiness.

text: sam decker ( dolph lundgren ) is giving up .
translation: 萨姆·德克尔（道夫·朗格尔）正在放弃。
back_translation: Sam Dekker (Dolph Lundgren) is giving up.

text: now a full time tattoo artist , he meets a young student named sienna ( de rossi ) who secretly works as a bar stripper .
translation: 现在是一名全职纹身师，他遇到了一位名叫西耶娜（德·罗西）的年轻学生，她秘密地在酒吧当脱衣舞女。
back_translation: Now he is a full-time tattoo artist, and he has met a young student named Sienna (De Rossi), who secretly works as a stripper in a bar.

text: williams has now proven that he can play creepy with the best of them .
translation: 威廉姆斯现在已经证明他可以和最优秀的人一样表现得令人毛骨悚然。
back_translation: Williams has now proven that he can perform as chillingly as the best.

text: kudos to director doug liman for injecting textbook spy fare with slick intelligence and a truckload of tension .
translation: 向导演道格·林曼致敬，他为教科书式的间谍题材注入了巧妙的智慧和大量的紧张感。
back_translation: Tribute to director Doug Liman, who infused textbook-style spy themes with clever wit and a great deal of tension.

text: full of bland hotels , highways , parking lots , with some glimpses of nature and family warmth , time out is a discreet moan of despair about entrapment in the maze of modern life .
translation: 充满了单调的酒店、高速公路和停车场，偶尔能看到一些自然风光和家庭温暖，休息时发出对现代生活迷宫中被困的无声哀叹。
back_translation: Filled with monotonous hotels, highways, and parking lots, occasionally one can catch glimpses of natural scenery and family warmth, silently lamenting the entrapment in the maze of modern life during breaks.

text: leigh is one of the rare directors who feels acting is the heart and soul of cinema . he allows his cast members to make creative contributions to the story and dialogue . this method almost never fails him , and it works superbly here .
translation: 莱赫是为数不多的导演之一，他认为表演是电影的核心和灵魂。他允许他的演员在故事和对话中做出创造性的贡献。这种方法几乎从不让他失望，在这里表现得尤为出色。
back_translation: Leh is one of the few directors who believes that performance is the core and soul of a film. He allows his actors to make creative contributions to the story and dialogue. This approach rarely disappoints him, and here it shines particularly well.

text: the kind of movie that comes along only occasionally , one so unconventional , gutsy and perfectly executed it takes your breath away .
translation: 这种电影偶尔才会出现，它如此非常规、勇敢且完美执行，让人屏息以待。
back_translation: This type of movie only appears occasionally; it is so unconventional, bold, and perfectly executed that it leaves people breathless with anticipation.

text: it 's a fractured story about a naive , impulsive , but above all else passionate man , one who will do anything for his family , who will stop at nothing to live his dream .
translation: 这是一个关于一个天真、冲动、但最重要的是充满激情的人的破碎故事，他会为家人不惜一切，毫不犹豫地追求自己的梦想。
back_translation: This is a broken story about a naïve, impulsive, but most importantly passionate person who would do anything for his family and pursue his dreams without hesitation.

text: for all its random chaos , divine secrets works because of the power of its convictions -- and its cast .
translation: 尽管充满随机的混乱，《神秘秘密》之所以有效是因为其信念的力量和演员阵容。
back_translation: Despite being filled with random chaos, "The Secret" is effective because of the power of its beliefs and the cast.

text: a boy named frank ( pidgeon ) and his sister caroline ( podbielska ) find themselves in attic town after investigating strange noises coming from the house top .
translation: 一个名叫弗兰克（鸽子）的小男孩和他的妹妹卡罗琳（波德比尔斯卡）在调查来自房子顶部的奇怪声音后，发现自己身处于阁楼镇。
back_translation: A little boy named Frank (Pigeon) and his sister Caroline (Podbielska) find themselves in Attic Town after investigating strange sounds coming from the top of the house.

text: it may . . . work as a jaunt down memory lane for teens and young adults who grew up on televised scooby-doo shows or reruns .
translation: 这可能会成为青少年和年轻人走下记忆长廊的旅程，他们在电视上看过《史酷比》节目或重播。
back_translation: This could become a journey for teenagers and young people down the memory lane, as they have seen the "Scooby-Doo" show or its reruns on television.

text: she manages to test patricia in one of the biggest hotel-casinos , the caesars palace .
translation: 她设法在最大的酒店赌场之一——凯撒皇宫对帕特里夏进行测试。
back_translation: She managed to test Patricia at one of the largest hotel casinos - Caesars Palace.

text: each spring in the little port town of beaufort , north carolina , landon carter remembers his senior year at beaufort high and jamie sullivan , the girl who changed his life .
translation: 每年春天，在北卡罗来纳州的小港口镇博福特，兰登·卡特都会想起他在博福特高中的最后一年以及那个改变了他生活的女孩杰米·沙利文。
back_translation: Every spring, in the small coastal town of Beaufort, North Carolina, Landon Carter remembers his senior year at Beaufort High School and the girl Jamie Sullivan who changed his life.

text: frank and steve came to atlantic city twenty years ago to make a big score .
translation: 弗兰克和史蒂夫二十年前来到大西洋城，想要赚一笔大钱。
back_translation: Frank and Steve came to Atlantic City twenty years ago, hoping to make a fortune.

text: miyazaki is one of world cinema 's most wondrously gifted artists and storytellers .
translation: 宫崎骏是世界电影中最具天赋的艺术家和讲故事者之一。
back_translation: Hayao Miyazaki is one of the most talented artists and storytellers in world cinema.

text: he sabotages evan and gets the job of anchorman .
translation: 他破坏了伊凡，得到了主播的位置。
back_translation: He undermined Ivan and got the position of the host.

text: she is a wealthy and arrogant girl who is used to getting things done her way .
translation: 她是一个富有且傲慢的女孩，习惯于按照她的方式处理事情。
back_translation: She is a wealthy and arrogant girl who is used to doing things her way.

text: more prophetic words have never been spoken in a world where love , sex , race , and betrayal are more than skin deep .
translation: 在一个爱、性、种族和背叛的意义远超表面的世界里，更多的预言词从未被说出。
back_translation: In a world where love, sex, race, and betrayal carry meanings that go far beyond the surface, many prophetic words have never been spoken.

text: at times the guys taps into some powerful emotions , but this kind of material is more effective on stage . it 's not a motion picture ; it 's an utterly static picture .
translation: 有时这些家伙能够激发出强烈的情感，但这种类型的素材在舞台上更有效。这不是一部电影；这是一幅完全静止的画面。
back_translation: Sometimes these guys can evoke strong emotions, but this type of material is more effective on stage. This is not a movie; this is a completely still picture.

text: when his daughter is kidnapped and held in exchange for priceless diamonds , the leader of a crew of highly skilled urban thieves ( dmx ) forges an unlikely alliance with a taiwanese intelligence officer ( jet li ) to rescue her .
translation: 当他的女儿被绑架并以无价的钻石作为交换人质时，一个由高技能城市窃贼组成的团队的首领（DMX）与一名台湾情报官员（李连杰）建立了不太可能的联盟，旨在救回她。
back_translation: When his daughter is kidnapped and held for ransom for priceless diamonds, the leader of a team of highly skilled urban thieves (DMX) forms an unlikely alliance with a Taiwanese intelligence officer (Jet Li) to rescue her.

text: there 's also a local detective ( swank ) who is conducting her own personal investigation . . .
translation: 还有一位当地的侦探（斯旺克）正在进行她自己的个人调查……
back_translation: There is also a local detective (Swank) conducting her own personal investigation...

text: never again does n't quite rise above the conventions it attempts to deconstruct , but at its center are two gifted actors who are more than willing to take chances .
translation: 《永不再来》并没有完全超越它试图解构的传统，但其核心是两位愿意冒险的天才演员。
back_translation: "Never Again" does not completely transcend the tradition it seeks to deconstruct, but at its core are two daring genius actors.

text: hollywood comedian/actor pauly shore loses everything : his house , nobody in hollywood wants to represent him , he moves back home with his mom and is now parking cars at the comedy store .
translation: 好莱坞喜剧演员保利·肖尔失去了一切：他的房子，没有人愿意在好莱坞代理他，他回到母亲家里，现在在喜剧商店停车。
back_translation: Hollywood comedian Pauly Shore has lost everything: his house, no one is willing to represent him in Hollywood, he has returned to his mother's house, and now he is parking at a comedy store.

text: the sound of ma 's cello alone is reason not to miss naqoyqatsi .
translation: 仅仅是妈妈的大提琴声，就足以让人不想错过《naqoyqatsi》。
back_translation: Just the sound of mom's cello is enough to make one not want to miss "naqoyqatsi."

text: the master of disguise falls under the category of 'should have been a sketch on saturday night live . '
translation: 伪装大师属于“应该在周六夜现场上的一个小品”这一类别。
back_translation: The Master of Disguise belongs to the category of "a skit that should be on Saturday Night Live."

text: muccino is honest in the emotional damage left by his immature men and passionate in his portraits of twentysomething commitment-phobes struggling against growing up .
translation: 穆奇诺诚实地描绘了他那些不成熟男性所造成的情感伤害，并热情地描绘了那些在成长中挣扎的二十多岁对承诺恐惧者的肖像。
back_translation: Mujino honestly portrays the emotional damage caused by his immature male characters and passionately depicts the portrait of those in their twenties who struggle with a fear of commitment.

text: so unassuming and pure of heart , you ca n't help but warmly extend your arms and yell 'safe ! '
translation: 如此谦逊而纯洁的心灵，让你忍不住热情地张开双臂大喊“安全！”
back_translation: Such a humble and pure soul makes you unable to help but enthusiastically open your arms and shout "Safe!"

text: in 1968 poland expelled the last remaining jews from what once used to be the largest jewish settlement in the world , effectively ending over thousand year long history .
translation: 1968年，波兰驱逐了最后一批犹太人，结束了曾经是世界上最大犹太人聚居地的历史，实际上结束了超过千年的历史。
back_translation: In 1968, Poland expelled the last group of Jews, marking the end of what was once the largest Jewish settlement in the world and effectively concluding over a thousand years of history.

text: this is a true documentry of art versus money-driven media conglomerates .
translation: 这是关于艺术与以金钱驱动的媒体集团之间斗争的真实纪录片。
back_translation: This is a true documentary about the struggle between art and money-driven media groups.

text: whether seen on a 10-inch television screen or at your local multiplex , the edge-of-your-seat , educational antics of steve irwin are priceless entertainment .
translation: 无论是在10英寸的电视屏幕上还是在当地的电影院，史蒂夫·欧文的惊险教育行为都是无价的娱乐。
back_translation: Whether on a 10-inch television screen or in a local cinema, Steve Irwin's thrilling educational antics are priceless entertainment.

text: but there is one major problem -- oscar 's true love is his stepmother eve .
translation: 但有一个主要问题——奥斯卡的真爱是他的继母伊芙。
back_translation: But there is one main problem—Oscar's true love is his stepmother Eve.

text: mocking kung fu pictures when they were a staple of exploitation theater programming was witty . mocking them now is an exercise in pointlessness .
translation: 在那些功夫影片成为剥削影院程序主打时，嘲讽它们是机智的。而现在嘲讽它们则是一种无意义的练习。
back_translation: When those kung fu films became the main feature of exploitation cinema, mocking them was clever. Now, mocking them is a meaningless exercise.

text: in flashbacks that parallel his investigation , we see alicia , a scholarship girl worried about her grades , gradually pulled into the social life of three rich and amoral young women , led by the blond hadley , a femme fatale .
translation: 在与他调查相呼应的闪回中，我们看到阿丽西亚，这位担心自己成绩的奖学金女孩，逐渐被三位富有而不道德的年轻女性的社交生活所吸引，女主角是金发美女哈德莉，一位致命 femme fatale。
back_translation: In a flashback that corresponds with his investigation, we see Alicia, a scholarship girl worried about her grades, gradually becoming attracted to the social lives of three rich and unethical young women, with the leading character being the blonde beauty Hadley, a deadly femme fatale.

text: an experience so engrossing it is like being buried in a new environment .
translation: 一种体验如此吸引人，仿佛置身于一个全新的环境中。
back_translation: An experience so captivating, it feels as if one is immersed in an entirely new environment.

text: long before it 's over , you 'll be thinking of 51 ways to leave this loser .
translation: 早在结束之前，你就会想出51种离开这个 loser 的方法。
back_translation: Long before it ends, you'll come up with 51 ways to leave this loser.

text: now even that joy will be stripped away as his son prepares to place him in a nursing home .
translation: 现在，即使那份快乐也将被剥夺，因为他的儿子正准备将他送进养老院。
back_translation: Now, even that joy will be taken away, as his son is preparing to send him to a nursing home.

text: this is darkest drama reminiscent of antonin artaud 's literary experiments in psychoanalysis .
translation: 这是最黑暗的戏剧，令人想起安东宁·阿尔托在精神分析中的文学实验。
back_translation: This is the darkest drama, reminiscent of Antonin Artaud's literary experiments in psychoanalysis.

text: an 83 minute document of a project which started in a muddle , seesawed back and forth between controlling interests multiple times , then found its sweet spot
translation: 一个83分钟的项目纪录片，开始时一片混乱，多次在控制权之间摇摆不定，最终找到了合适的发展方向。
back_translation: An 83-minute project documentary begins in chaos, fluctuating multiple times between control, and ultimately finds a suitable direction for development.

text: while grieving along with her parents and drawn into legal issues presented by a district attorney seeking justice for the family , he finds himself falling in love with another woman , against his own best intentions .
translation: 在与父母共同悲痛并被地区检察官提起的法律问题所纠缠之际，他发现自己违背本意地爱上了另一位女性。
back_translation: Amid the shared grief with his parents and the legal issues brought up by the district attorney, he found himself unintentionally falling in love with another woman.

text: with salvage crews ordered to clear the crash zone for the busy easter traffic , the locals undertook their own salvage operation , making it their best easter ever .
translation: 由于清理事故区域的打捞队被指派以确保繁忙的复活节交通，当地居民自行开展了打捞行动，使得他们度过了有史以来最好的复活节。
back_translation: Due to the salvage team being assigned to clean up the accident area to ensure busy Easter traffic, local residents took it upon themselves to carry out salvage operations, allowing them to have the best Easter ever.

text: trivial where it should be profound , and hyper-cliched where it should be sincere .
translation: 在应该深刻的地方却显得琐碎，在应该真诚的地方却过于陈词滥调。
back_translation: It seems trivial where it should be profound, and overly clichéd where it should be sincere.

text: watching living actors interact against the lush , studied inertia of the backdrops gives us the impression of history come to life , or statues magically transformed into living creatures .
translation: 观看活生生的演员在丰富、精心设计的背景下互动，给我们一种历史重现的印象，或者雕像神奇地变成活生生的生物。
back_translation: Watching live actors interact against a rich, meticulously designed backdrop gives us the impression of historical reenactment, or statues magically transforming into living beings.

text: unable to remember his name or anything from his past life , he can not get a job or an apartment , so he starts living on the outskirts of the city and slowly starts putting his life back on track .
translation: 他无法记住自己的名字或过去的任何事情，无法找到工作或公寓，于是他开始住在城市的边缘，慢慢地开始重新恢复自己的生活。
back_translation: He couldn't remember his name or anything about his past, couldn't find a job or an apartment, so he began to live on the outskirts of the city and slowly started to rebuild his life.

text: it 's kind of sad that so many people put so much time and energy into this turkey .
translation: 真让人感到遗憾的是，很多人倾注了如此多的时间和精力在这只火鸡上。
back_translation: It is truly regrettable that many people have invested so much time and effort into this turkey.

text: this insufferable movie is meant to make you think about existential suffering . instead , it 'll only put you to sleep .
translation: 这部让人无法忍受的电影本应让你思考存在的痛苦。相反，它只会让你昏昏欲睡。
back_translation: This unbearable movie was supposed to make you contemplate the pain of existence. Instead, it just makes you drowsy.

text: i basically went in expecting garbage , but color me surprised when it actually turned out to be quite funny !
translation: 我基本上是抱着期望糟糕的心态去的，但让我惊讶的是，它实际上还挺搞笑的！
back_translation: I basically went in with a mindset of expecting it to be awful, but to my surprise, it was actually quite funny!

text: hoffman 's performance is authentic to the core of his being .
translation: 霍夫曼的表演真诚地反映了他内心的核心。
back_translation: Hoffman's performance genuinely reflects the core of his inner self.

text: they , the teen learns , have discovered a spring that makes them immortal .
translation: 他们，青少年了解到，发现了一处使他们不死的泉水。
back_translation: They, the teenagers, discovered a spring that would make them immortal.

text: nair and writer laura cahill dare to build a movie around some flawed but rather unexceptional women , emerging with a fine character study that 's short on plot but rich in the tiny revelations of real life .
translation: 娜尔和作家劳拉·卡希尔勇敢地围绕一些有缺陷但相当普通的女性打造了一部电影，最终呈现出一部精致的人物研究，情节虽简短却富含现实生活中的微小启示。
back_translation: Naer and writer Laura Cahill bravely created a film around some flawed yet quite ordinary women, ultimately presenting a refined character study that, while short in plot, is rich with small revelations from real life.

text: with its young cast and an appealing balance of uplifting attitude and irreverent humor , drumline has the potential to be a sleeper hit .
translation: 凭借其年轻的演员阵容以及令人愉悦的积极态度与无礼幽默的平衡，《乐队》有潜力成为一部黑马之作。
back_translation: With its young cast and a delightful balance of positive attitude and irreverent humor, "The Band" has the potential to become a sleeper hit.

text: largely , this is a movie that also does it by the numbers .
translation: 在很大程度上，这是一部按部就班制作的电影。
back_translation: To a large extent, this is a film made step by step.

text: seduction strikes steve and tracy , and steve and sean 's lives may never be the same again .
translation: 诱惑袭击了史蒂夫和特雷西，史蒂夫和肖恩的生活可能再也不会相同。
back_translation: Temptation struck Steve and Tracy, and Steve and Sean's lives may never be the same again.

text: it has that rare quality of being able to creep the living hell out of you . . .
translation: 它有那种罕见的品质，可以让你感到无比恐惧……
back_translation: It has that rare quality that can make you feel immense fear...

text: . . . a trashy little bit of fluff stuffed with enjoyable performances and a bewildering sense of self-importance
translation: ……一部廉价的小作品，充满了愉快的表演和令人困惑的自我重要感。
back_translation: ...a cheap little piece, filled with delightful performances and a perplexing sense of self-importance.

text: in his flight he encounters sonya , a young bosnian mother desperately trying to return home to see her son .
translation: 在他的逃亡中，他遇到了索尼娅，一个年轻的波斯尼亚母亲，她拼命想要回家见她的儿子。
back_translation: During his escape, he met Sonya, a young Bosnian mother who desperately wanted to return home to see her son.

text: the movie is essentially a series of fleetingly interesting actors ' moments .
translation: 这部电影本质上是一系列短暂有趣的演员瞬间。
back_translation: This movie is essentially a series of brief and amusing moments with actors.

text: she 's saving herself for her very shallow boyfriend , victor johnson ( kip pardue ) , who 's left the states to backpack across europe .
translation: 她在为她那个非常肤浅的男朋友维克托·约翰逊（基普·帕杜）保存自己，他已经离开美国去欧洲背包旅行。
back_translation: She is saving herself for her very superficial boyfriend Victor Johnson (Kip Pardue), who has left the United States to backpack through Europe.

text: set from his college student years , to his first victims , his capture , escape from prison ( twice ) , his final killing spree to his trial , conviction and execution .
translation: 从他的大学学生时代，到他的第一批受害者，捕获，逃离监狱（两次），最终的杀戮狂潮，到他的审判、定罪和处决。
back_translation: From his university student days, to his first batch of victims, capture, escape from prison (twice), the final killing spree, to his trial, conviction, and execution.

text: if you want a movie time trip , the 1960 version is a far smoother ride .
translation: 如果你想要一次电影时光之旅，1960年的版本则是一段更为顺畅的旅程。
back_translation: If you want a cinematic time travel experience, the 1960 version offers a smoother journey.

text: with a story inspired by the tumultuous surroundings of los angeles , where feelings of marginalization loom for every dreamer with a burst bubble , the dogwalker has a few characters and ideas , but it never manages to put them on the same path .
translation: 这个故事灵感来源于洛杉矶动荡的环境，在那里，每个梦想者在泡沫破裂后都感受到被边缘化的氛围。《遛狗者》有几个角色和想法，但始终无法将它们置于同一轨道上。
back_translation: This story is inspired by the turbulent environment of Los Angeles, where every dreamer feels a sense of marginalization after the bubble burst. "The Dog Walker" features several characters and ideas, but never manages to place them on the same track.

text: starts as an intense political and psychological thriller but is sabotaged by ticking time bombs and other hollywood-action cliches .
translation: 开始时是一个紧张的政治和心理惊悚片，但被定时炸弹和其他好莱坞动作老套破坏。
back_translation: It starts as a tense political and psychological thriller, but is undermined by a ticking bomb and other Hollywood action clichés.

text: if you are into splatter movies , then you will probably have a reasonably good time with the salton sea .
translation: 如果你喜欢喷血电影，那么你可能会在《盐湖海》这部影片中度过一个相当愉快的时光。
back_translation: If you enjoy splatter films, then you might have quite a good time watching "Salt Lake Sea."

text: high in the mountains of macedonia a team of young film makers are making a documentary about katerina vandeva - a descendant of an ancient and very famous family .
translation: 在马其顿的高山中，一组年轻的电影制作人正在拍摄一部关于卡特里娜·万德瓦的纪录片，她是一个古老而非常著名家族的后裔。
back_translation: In the high mountains of Macedonia, a group of young filmmakers is shooting a documentary about Katrina Vanderwaal, a descendant of an ancient and very famous family.

text: by the end of the girl 's journey there is only one question to be answered : what is real and what is her imagination ?
translation: 在女孩的旅程结束时，只有一个问题需要回答：什么是真实，什么是她的想象？
back_translation: At the end of the girl's journey, there is only one question to answer: what is real and what is her imagination?

text: it comes the closest to any movie experience i 've had in re-creating the aftermath of unexplained suicide .
translation: 这部电影在重现无法解释的自杀后果方面与我所经历过的任何电影体验最为接近。
back_translation: This film is the closest to any cinematic experience I have had in recreating the consequences of inexplicable suicides.

text: laugh-out-loud lines , adorably ditsy but heartfelt performances , and sparkling , bittersweet dialogue that cuts to the chase of the modern girl 's dilemma .
translation: 让人捧腹的台词，既可爱又迷糊但发自内心的表演，以及闪耀着甜蜜苦涩的对话，直击现代女孩的困境。
back_translation: The hilarious lines, the endearing yet confused performances that come from the heart, and the dialogues that shine with bittersweetness hit directly at the struggles of modern girls.

text: see clockstoppers if you have nothing better to do with 94 minutes . but be warned , you too may feel time has decided to stand still . or that the battery on your watch has died .
translation: 如果你没有更好的事情可以做，可以看看《时间停摆者》，大约94分钟。不过要小心，你也可能会觉得时间决定停滞不前，或者你的手表电池已经没电了。
back_translation: If you have nothing better to do, you can watch "The Time Stopper," which is about 94 minutes long. But be careful, you might also feel that time has decided to stand still, or that your watch battery has run out.

text: twenty years later , e . t . is still a cinematic touchstone .
translation: 二十年后，《外星人》仍然是电影的标志性作品。
back_translation: Twenty years later, "Alien" is still an iconic work in cinema.

text: the girls have unwittingly botched up a diamond delivery to the middle east .
translation: 女孩们无意中搞砸了一次送往中东的钻石交付。
back_translation: The girls accidentally messed up a diamond delivery destined for the Middle East.

text: ( wendigo is ) why we go to the cinema : to be fed through the eye , the heart , the mind .
translation: （温迪戈是）我们去影院的原因：通过眼睛、心灵和思维来获得滋养。
back_translation: (Wendigo is) the reason we go to the cinema: to gain nourishment through our eyes, hearts, and minds.

text: alternative medicine obviously has its merits . . . but ayurveda does the field no favors .
translation: 替代医学显然有其优点……但阿育吠陀对这个领域并没有好处。
back_translation: Alternative medicine clearly has its advantages... but Ayurveda does not contribute positively to this field.

text: he goes to a small room downtown , where he finds some rich asian teenager punks who are slumming it in their own little kick pad .
translation: 他去了市中心一个小房间，在那里他发现一些富有的亚洲青少年朋克，他们在自己的小蹦床上混日子。
back_translation: He went to a small room in the city center, where he found some wealthy Asian teenage punks who were passing their days on their little trampolines.

text: an eloquent , reflective and beautifully acted meditation on both the profoundly devastating events of one year ago and the slow , painful healing process that has followed in their wake .
translation: 一部富有表现力、深思熟虑且演技出色的冥想作品，既反映了去年发生的深重灾难事件，也展现了随之而来的缓慢而痛苦的疗愈过程。
back_translation: A richly expressive, thought-provoking, and skillfully acted meditation piece that reflects the profound disaster events of last year while also showcasing the slow and painful healing process that followed.

text: anna changes her mind : when some rich , ignorant american couple wondering about if they should buy the house asks for the swimming pool ( while the mediterranean is half a mile away ) , she simply doubles the charge , and finally puts the `` for sale `` plate into the garbage can .
translation: 安娜改变了主意：当一个富有且无知的美国夫妇在考虑是否应该购买这栋房子时，询问游泳池的情况（而地中海距离仅有半英里），她简单地将费用翻倍，最后把“待售”牌子扔进了垃圾桶。
back_translation: Anna changed her mind: when a wealthy and ignorant American couple was considering whether to buy the house and asked about the pool (while the Mediterranean was only half a mile away), she simply doubled the price and ultimately tossed the "for sale" sign into the trash.

text: this is one of mr . chabrol 's subtlest works , but also one of his most uncanny .
translation: 这是查布罗先生最微妙的作品之一，但也是他最离奇的作品之一。
back_translation: This is one of Mr. Chabrol's most subtle works, but also one of his most bizarre.

text: in his determination to lighten the heavy subject matter , silberling also , to a certain extent , trivializes the movie with too many nervous gags and pratfalls .
translation: 在他努力减轻沉重主题的过程中，西尔伯林在某种程度上也让这部电影显得有些琐碎，充斥着过多的紧张逗趣和摔倒场面。
back_translation: In his effort to lighten the heavy themes, Silberling somewhat makes the film appear trivial, filled with excessive tense humor and slapstick moments.

text: it 's the most nimble epic you 're likely to see .
translation: 这是你可能看到的最灵活的史诗。
back_translation: This is the most flexible epic you might ever see.

text: after the fellowship has broken , merry and pippin , taken by orcs , make new allies in the ents , while legolas , gimli and aragorn make allies in the people of rohan , and all of them must launch an assault on isengard .
translation: 在联盟破裂后，梅里和皮聘被奥克斯抓住，他们在树人那里结成了新的盟友，而莱戈拉斯、吉姆利和阿拉贡则在洛汗人民中寻求盟友，他们都必须对艾辛格发起进攻。
back_translation: After the alliance broke apart, Merry and Pippin were captured by Orcs. They formed new allies with the Ents, while Legolas, Gimli, and Aragorn sought allies among the people of Rohan. They all had to launch an attack on Isengard.

text: this charmless nonsense ensues amid clanging film references that make jay and silent bob 's excellent adventure seem understated .
translation: 这段乏味的胡言乱语伴随着嘈杂的电影暗示，让《杰和沉默的鲍勃的出色冒险》显得相形见绌。
back_translation: This tedious nonsense, accompanied by the noisy cinematic implications, makes "Jay and Silent Bob's Excellent Adventure" seem out of place.

text: for a film that 's being advertised as a comedy , sweet home alabama is n't as funny as you 'd hoped . for a film that 's being advertised as a comedy , sweet home alabama is n't as funny as you 'd hoped .
translation: 对于一部被宣传为喜剧的电影《甜蜜家园阿拉巴马》，它并没有你期望的那么搞笑。
back_translation: For a film marketed as a comedy, "Sweet Home Alabama" is not as funny as you might expect.

text: who is murdered & # 38 ; who is the murderer . . .
translation: 谁被谋杀了，谁是谋杀者。。。
back_translation: Who was murdered, and who is the murderer...

text: but genevieve is anticipating exactly that type of response from starla and soon turns everyone , including starla 's friends and family , against her by playing the poor victim and making it appear that starla 's the aggressor .
translation: 但珍妮薇正期待着来自斯塔拉的那种反应，很快便将所有人，包括斯塔拉的朋友和家人，都转向反对她，装作可怜的受害者，并让人觉得是斯塔拉在攻击她。
back_translation: But Jenny was looking forward to the kind of reaction from Stella that would soon turn everyone, including Stella's friends and family, against her, pretending to be a pitiful victim and making it seem like Stella was the one attacking her.

text: aaliyah rarely dampens her diva persona enough to spark genuine chemistry with townsend . when she speaks , her creepy egyptian demigod voice is as computer processed and overproduced as it was in her music .
translation: 阿莉亚很少抑制她的女神形象，以至于能够与汤森德产生真正的化学反应。当她说话时，她那诡异的埃及半神般的声音和她的音乐一样，都是经过电脑处理和过度制作的。
back_translation: Alia rarely suppresses her goddess image to the extent that she can create a genuine chemistry with Townsend. When she speaks, her strange, Egyptian demigod-like voice, much like her music, is computer-enhanced and overproduced.

text: while staking out his next assignment -- the innocent girlfriend of his notorious boss -- contract killer malik reflects on the dark path he 's chosen but can not escape .
translation: 在暗中监视他下一个目标——他那声名显赫的老板的无辜女友时，合同杀手马利克反思他所选择但无法逃脱的黑暗道路。
back_translation: As Malik, the contract killer, secretly watches his next target—the innocent girlfriend of his illustrious boss—he reflects on the dark path he has chosen but cannot escape.

text: a great script brought down by lousy direction . same guy with both hats . big mistake .
translation: 一部出色的剧本被糟糕的导演毁掉了。是同一个人同时担任两个角色。大错误。
back_translation: An outstanding script was ruined by a terrible director. It was the same person taking on both roles at the same time. A big mistake.

text: rumours of haunting , paired with the desire to forget the painful tragedy that took place five years before , have kept the truth of holy angel 's last days buried with the innocent victims .
translation: 关于闹鬼的传闻，加上想要忘记五年前发生的痛苦悲剧的愿望，使得圣天使最后日子的真相与无辜的受害者一同被埋葬。
back_translation: The rumors about haunting, combined with the desire to forget the painful tragedy that happened five years ago, led to the truth of the final days of the Holy Angel being buried along with the innocent victims.

text: in the process , he comes to understand that if he is to make it as a comic artist , he must engage with the community he comes from , take that experience back out into the world , and put it in his work .
translation: 在这个过程中，他逐渐明白，如果他想成为一名漫画艺术家，就必须与他所来自的社区互动，将那段经历带回到世界上，并融入到他的作品中。
back_translation: In this process, he gradually understood that if he wanted to become a comic artist, he had to interact with the community he came from, bring that experience back to the world, and incorporate it into his work.

text: the funny thing is , i did n't mind all this contrived nonsense a bit .
translation: 有趣的是，我一点也不介意这些刻意的胡闹。
back_translation: Interestingly, I don't mind these deliberate antics at all.

text: `` 13 conversations about one thing `` is an intelligent flick that examines many different ideas from happiness to guilt in an intriguing bit of storytelling .
translation: `` 13个关于一件事的对话 `` 是一部聪明的影片，探讨了从幸福到内疚的许多不同思想，讲述了引人入胜的故事。
back_translation: "The 13 Conversations About One Thing" is a clever film that explores many different thoughts from happiness to guilt and tells an engaging story.

text: although attorney matt murdock is blind , his other four senses function with superhuman sharpness .
translation: 虽然律师马特·默多克是盲人，但他的其他四种感官却以超人般的敏锐度运作。
back_translation: Although the lawyer Matt Murdock is blind, his other four senses operate with superhuman sharpness.

text: soon , disease spread , robbing people 's abilities to speak ; the endless rain killing all other forms of communication with its acidic torrent .
translation: 很快，疾病蔓延，夺走人们的言语能力；无尽的暴雨用其酸性的洪流杀死了所有其他形式的交流。
back_translation: Soon, the disease spread, taking away people's ability to speak; endless torrential rains killed all other forms of communication with their acidic floods.

text: maggie 's daughter is kidnapped , forcing father and estranged daughter to work together to get her back .
translation: 玛吉的女儿被绑架，迫使父亲和疏远的女儿一同合作营救她。
back_translation: Maggie's daughter has been kidnapped, forcing her father and estranged daughter to work together to rescue her.

text: it 's as if de palma spent an hour setting a fancy table and then served up kraft macaroni and cheese .
translation: 就像德帕尔玛花了一个小时设定一个华丽的餐桌，然后端上了卡夫的通心粉与奶酪。
back_translation: Just like De Palma spent an hour setting a beautiful dining table, only to serve Kraft's macaroni and cheese.

text: mature , graceful documentary on conservative christian parents with homosexual children .
translation: 关于持保守基督教信仰的父母与同性恋子女之间关系的成熟而优雅的纪录片。
back_translation: A mature and elegant documentary about the relationship between parents who hold conservative Christian beliefs and their homosexual children.

text: barry convinces us he 's a dangerous , secretly unhinged guy who could easily have killed a president because it made him feel powerful .
translation: 巴里让我们相信他是一个危险的、秘密失常的人，他很容易杀掉一位总统，因为这让他感到强大。
back_translation: Barry lets us believe that he is a dangerous, secretly unstable person who would easily kill a president because it makes him feel powerful.

text: he is extremely strict at work and believes in pushing his workers to the limit .
translation: 他在工作中非常严格，认为应当将员工推向极限。
back_translation: He is very strict at work and believes that employees should be pushed to their limits.

text: staggers between flaccid satire and what is supposed to be madcap farce .
translation: 在软弱的讽刺和应当是疯狂闹剧之间摇摆不定。
back_translation: Wavering between weak sarcasm and what should be a crazy farce.

text: the story is risen out of the conflicts between the white anglo-saxon `` natives `` and the irish immigrants coming into the five points .
translation: 这个故事源于白人盎格鲁-撒克逊“本土居民”和涌入五点地区的爱尔兰移民之间的冲突。
back_translation: This story originates from the conflict between the white Anglo-Saxon "natives" and the Irish immigrants who flowed into the Five Points area.

text: . . . the one thing this wild film has that other imax films do n't : chimps , lots of chimps , all blown up to the size of a house . that 's fun for kids of any age .
translation: ... 这部疯狂的电影有其他IMAX电影所没有的一样东西：猴子，很多很多的猴子，个头大得像房子。这对任何年龄段的孩子来说都是乐趣。
back_translation: ... This crazy movie has something that other IMAX films don’t have: monkeys, lots and lots of monkeys, as big as houses. This is fun for kids of all ages.

text: the classic tale of 'peter pan ' continues in disney 's sequel 'return to never land ' .
translation: 经典故事《彼得·潘》在迪士尼的续集《回到梦游岛》中继续。
back_translation: The classic story "Peter Pan" continues in Disney's sequel "Return to Never Land."

text: a byzantine melodrama that stimulates the higher brain functions as well as the libido .
translation: 一部拜占庭风格的 melodrama，既刺激高级脑功能，也激发欲望。
back_translation: A Byzantine-style melodrama that stimulates high-level brain functions while also igniting desires.

text: can those memories be strong enough to make them find their own ways , back in each others arms again ?
translation: 那些记忆是否足够强大，让他们再次找到彼此的怀抱？
back_translation: Are those memories strong enough for them to find each other's embrace again?

text: when tony takes her on a private cruise from greece to italy , amber is unimpressed at this impromptu no-frills vacation , and takes out her anger on the ship 's first mate , giuseppe ( adriano giannini ) .
translation: 当托尼带她进行从希腊到意大利的私人邮轮时，安柏对这次即兴的简单假期并不感兴趣，并将她的愤怒发泄在船上的大副朱塞佩（阿德里亚诺·吉安宁）身上。
back_translation: When Tony took her on a private cruise from Greece to Italy, Amber was not interested in this spontaneous simple vacation and vented her anger on the ship's first mate, Giuseppe (Adriano Giannini).

text: exhibits the shallow sensationalism characteristic of soap opera . . . more salacious telenovela than serious drama .
translation: 展现了肥皂剧特有的肤浅轰动性……更像是低俗的阿根廷剧而不是严肃的戏剧。
back_translation: It showcases the superficial sensationalism unique to soap operas... more like a vulgar Argentine play than serious drama.

text: warren schmidt ( nicholson ) is forced to deal with an ambiguous future as he enters retirement .
translation: 沃伦·施密特（尼克尔森饰）在进入退休生活时不得不面对一个模糊不清的未来。
back_translation: Warren Schmidt (played by Nicholson) has to confront an unclear future as he enters retirement.

text: the story captures the dilemma of gifted musicians turning music into a professional career without losing artistic integrity and soul .
translation: 这个故事描绘了天才音乐家们在将音乐变为职业生涯的过程中，如何在不失去艺术 integrity 和灵魂的情况下面临的困境。
back_translation: This story depicts the dilemmas faced by genius musicians as they turn music into a career while navigating the challenges of not losing their artistic integrity and soul.

text: their brother was killed by a drug overdose a few years earlier and the gang is determined to keep drugs off their block .
translation: 他们的哥哥几年前因药物过量而死，帮派决心要将毒品清除出他们的区域。
back_translation: Their brother died a few years ago from a drug overdose, and the gang is determined to eliminate drugs from their area.

text: suffers from the lack of a compelling or comprehensible narrative . still , as a visual treat , the film is almost unsurpassed .
translation: 缺乏引人入胜或易于理解的叙事。尽管如此，作为一种视觉享受，这部电影几乎无与伦比。
back_translation: Lacking an engaging or easily comprehensible narrative. Nevertheless, as a visual treat, this film is almost unparalleled.

text: what jones needs , however , is not to be cured - but to be accepted for what and who he is .
translation: 然而，琼斯所需要的不是被治愈，而是被接受为他所是的和他是谁。
back_translation: However, what Jones needs is not to be cured, but to be accepted for who he is and what he is.

text: the story has its redundancies , and the young actors , not very experienced , are sometimes inexpressive .
translation: 这个故事有一些冗余，而年轻演员的经验不足，有时显得没有表现力。
back_translation: The story has some redundancy, and the young actors' lack of experience sometimes makes their performances seem uninspiring.

text: between new york and california is the wasteland known as the plague zone .
translation: 在纽约和加利福尼亚之间是被称为疫病区的荒地。
back_translation: Between New York and California is a wasteland known as the plague zone.

text: if you can push on through the slow spots , you 'll be rewarded with some fine acting .
translation: 如果你能坚持度过那些慢节奏的部分，你将会欣赏到一些精彩的表演。
back_translation: If you can persevere through the slower parts, you will appreciate some wonderful performances.

text: it 's at this point that he buys a pirate record whose magical powers bring him the success he 's longed for .
translation: 在这一点上，他买了一张海盗唱片，凭借其魔法力量为他带来了他渴望已久的成功。
back_translation: At this point, he bought a pirate record, which brought him the success he had long desired through its magical power.

text: when julius caesar gets wind of the project succeeding , he has the building site attacked by his troops in order to win the bet and not lose his face .
translation: 当尤利乌斯·凯撒得知这个项目成功时，他派遣部队袭击工地，以赢得赌注并挽回面子。
back_translation: When Julius Caesar learned that the project was successful, he dispatched troops to attack the construction site in order to win the bet and salvage his reputation.

text: you feel like you 're the one moving at 80 mph , not the street lugers .
translation: 你感觉自己像是在以每小时80英里的速度行驶，而不是街头滑板者。
back_translation: You feel like you are driving at a speed of 80 miles per hour, rather than being a street skateboarder.

text: the film is old-fashioned , occasionally charming and as subtle as boldface .
translation: 这部电影过时，偶尔迷人，且像粗体字一样明显。
back_translation: This movie is outdated, occasionally charming, and as obvious as bold text.

text: but mathayus ends up getting much more than he bargained for .
translation: 但马泰乌斯最终得到了远超他所预期的东西。
back_translation: But Matthaus ultimately got far more than he had expected.

text: offers a quieter version of the midlife-crisis roller coaster .
translation: 提供了一个更安静的中年危机过山车版本。
back_translation: A quieter version of the midlife crisis roller coaster has been provided.

text: as she learns more about her ex 's infidelity , she wonders if bogdan 's lifestyle may be preferable to the manipulative starkness of her ex that ultimately lead to his murder .
translation: 随着她对前任的不忠行为了解得更多，她开始思考博格丹的生活方式是否可能比她的前任那种最终导致他被谋杀的操控性冷漠更可取。
back_translation: As she learned more about her ex's infidelity, she began to wonder if Bogdan's lifestyle might be preferable to the manipulative indifference of her ex that ultimately led to his murder.

text: forgotten in the nearby camp of maslakh ( slaughterhouse ) 150 , 000 displaced afghans hardly survive .
translation: 在附近的马斯拉赫（屠宰场）营地中，15万名被迫迁移的阿富汗人几乎无法生存。
back_translation: In the nearby Maslakh (slaughterhouse) camp, 150,000 displaced Afghans are barely able to survive.

text: i suspect that you 'll be as bored watching morvern callar as the characters are in it . if you go , pack your knitting needles .
translation: 我怀疑看《莫尔文·卡拉》你会觉得无聊，就像剧中角色一样。如果你去的话，记得带上你的针织针。
back_translation: I suspect that watching "Moorwen Kara" will make you feel bored, just like the characters in the play. If you go, remember to bring your knitting needles.

text: bursting through the constraints of its source , this is one adapted- from-television movie that actually looks as if it belongs on the big screen .
translation: 突破其来源限制，这部改编自电视的电影实际上看起来更适合在大银幕上播放。
back_translation: Breaking its source limitations, this film adapted from television actually appears more suitable for the big screen.

text: a film about a young man finding god that is accessible and touching to the marrow .
translation: 一部关于年轻人发现上帝的电影，既易于接近又感人至深。
back_translation: A film about young people discovering God, which is both accessible and deeply moving.

text: it 's gripping entertainment in a popular vein -- the police procedural -- that nevertheless follows no preconceived formulas .
translation: 这是一部引人入胜的娱乐作品，属于流行类型——警察程序剧——但却并未遵循任何预设的公式。
back_translation: This is an engaging entertainment piece that falls under the popular genre of police procedural drama, yet it does not adhere to any preset formula.

text: anything but a feel-good movie in its particulars , read my lips nonetheless communicates a liberating message as refreshing as it is peculiar .
translation: 《读我的嘴》在细节上绝不是一部令人感觉良好的电影，然而它传达的信息却既清新又独特，带有解放的意义。
back_translation: "Read My Lips" is not a feel-good movie in terms of its details, yet the message it conveys is fresh and unique, carrying a sense of liberation.

text: in its treatment of the dehumanizing and ego-destroying process of unemployment , time out offers an exploration that is more accurate than anything i have seen in an american film .
translation: 在对失业这一去人性化和摧毁自我的过程的处理上，《时间停顿》提供了一种比我在任何美国电影中见过的更加准确的探索。
back_translation: In dealing with the depersonalizing and self-destructive process of unemployment, "Time Stand Still" offers a more accurate exploration than I have seen in any American film.

text: rehearsals are frequently more fascinating than the results . last dance , whatever its flaws , fulfills one facet of its mission in making me want to find out whether , in this case , that 's true .
translation: 排练往往比结果更引人入胜。尽管《最后的舞蹈》存在一些缺陷，但它在实现其使命的某个方面上让我想知道，在这种情况下，这是不是真的。
back_translation: Rehearsals are often more captivating than the outcomes. Although "The Last Dance" has some flaws, it makes me wonder in some aspects whether it truly achieves its mission in this context.

text: they get on from the word go , but now dad needs a liver transplant and ludvig and harald set about raising the wherewithal .
translation: 他们一开始就相处得很好，但现在爸爸需要进行肝脏移植，路德维希和哈拉尔德开始筹集资金。
back_translation: They got along well at first, but now Dad needs a liver transplant, and Ludwig and Harald are starting to raise funds.

text: after a dream of a horrific car crash , kimberly helps save several people and causes another rift in death 's design , but this time its different , since alex walked off the plane death 's design did not only affect the survivors of flight 180 , but every single person they 've come in contact with , now how will they stop it ?
translation: 在一次可怕车祸的梦中，金博琳帮助拯救了几个人，并导致死亡的设计再次出现裂痕，但这次有所不同，因为亚历克斯在飞机上走开之后，死亡的设计不仅影响了180号航班的幸存者，还影响了他们所接触的每一个人，现在他们该如何阻止这一切呢？
back_translation: In a nightmare of a terrible car accident, Kim Boleyn helped save several people, and the design of death reappeared with cracks, but this time it was different. After Alex walked away from the plane, the design of death affected not only the survivors of Flight 180 but also everyone they came into contact with. Now, how can they stop it all?

text: one of the greatest romantic comedies of the past decade .
translation: 过去十年中最伟大的浪漫喜剧之一。
back_translation: One of the greatest romantic comedies of the past decade.

text: aida ( yvette freemen ) is the overworked er nurse treating frankie 's fractures .
translation: 艾达（伊薇特·弗里曼）是过于忙碌的急诊室护士，负责治疗弗兰基的骨折。
back_translation: Aida (Yvette Freeman) is an overly busy emergency room nurse responsible for treating Frankie's fracture.

text: i was sent a copyof this film to review on dvd . for free . i still want my money back .
translation: 我收到了一份免费的DVD电影以供评论。我仍然想要我的钱。
back_translation: I received a free DVD movie for review. I still want my money.

text: but the record industry has passed them by^ & # 197 ; so has the general public whose musical tastes are continually changing .
translation: 但唱片工业已经被他们抛在了身后，公众的音乐品味也在不断变化。
back_translation: But the music industry has been left behind by them, and the public's taste in music is constantly changing.

text: ever see one of those comedies that just seem like a bad idea from frame one ?
translation: 你有没有看过那种从第一帧就看起来是个坏主意的喜剧？
back_translation: Have you ever seen a comedy that looks like a bad idea from the very first frame?

text: mib ii is a movie that makes it possible for the viewer to doze off for a few minutes or make several runs to the concession stand and/or restroom and not feel as if he or she has missed anything . that 's because relatively nothing happens .
translation: 《外星人特攻队 II》是一部让观众可以打瞌睡几分钟，或者多次跑去小吃摊和/或洗手间而不觉得错过任何东西的电影。因为相对来说，几乎没有什么发生。
back_translation: "Alien Attack Squad II" is a movie that allows viewers to doze off for a few minutes or repeatedly run to the snack stand and/or bathroom without feeling like they've missed anything. Because relatively speaking, not much happens.

text: although commentary on nachtwey is provided . . . it 's the image that really tells the tale .
translation: 尽管对纳赫特维的评论有所提供……但真正讲述故事的是图像。
back_translation: Although comments on Nachtwey are provided, it is the images that truly tell the story.

text: though there are many tense scenes in trapped , they prove more distressing than suspenseful .
translation: 尽管《困境》中有许多紧张的场景，但它们更多地令人感到痛苦而非悬念。
back_translation: Despite the many tense scenes in "Dilemma," they evoke more pain than suspense.

text: it 's plotless , shapeless -- and yet , it must be admitted , not entirely humorless . indeed , the more outrageous bits achieve a shock-you-into-laughter intensity of almost dadaist proportions .
translation: 它没有情节，没有形状——然而，必须承认，绝对不是完全没有幽默感。事实上，那些更加离谱的片段达到了令人震惊到爆笑的强度，几乎可以说是达达主义的程度。
back_translation: It has no plot, no shape—however, it must be acknowledged that it is definitely not completely devoid of a sense of humor. In fact, some of the more absurd segments reach a level of shockingly hilarious intensity, to the point that one could almost say they are at the level of Dadaism.

text: in his way , meets prosit , a german villain on a persistant mission to find pots of gold in the superstition montains .
translation: 在他的旅途中，他遇到了普罗斯特，一位德国恶棍，他执着地要在迷信山脉中寻找金盆。
back_translation: On his journey, he encountered Prost, a German villain who was eager to search for the golden basin in the Mountains of Superstition.

text: when they goes to the fence to get them , they discover that someone stole them .
translation: 当他们去栅栏那里去取时，他们发现有人偷了它们。
back_translation: When they went to the fence to retrieve them, they discovered that someone had stolen them.

text: in verifying information , she interviews the narrator and becomes his lover .
translation: 在核实信息时，她采访了叙述者，并成为了他的情人。
back_translation: While verifying the information, she interviewed the narrator and became his lover.

text: a friendship without a future is the only friendship possible for these two men .
translation: 对于这两个男人来说，唯一可能的友谊就是没有未来的友谊。
back_translation: For these two men, the only possible friendship is one without a future.

text: when not solving murders in tinseltown , detective joe gavilan and his rookie partner kasey calden both moonlight in other fields : gavilan sells real estate ( poorly ) , and calden aspires to become an actor ( brando , namely ) .
translation: 当侦探乔·加维兰在好莱坞不忙于破案时，他和他的实习搭档凯西·卡尔登都在其他领域兼职：加维兰（卖房子）卖得不怎么样，而凯西则渴望成为一名演员（尤其是布兰登）。
back_translation: When detective Joe Gavilan is not busy solving cases in Hollywood, he and his intern partner Casey Cardin are working part-time in other fields: Gavilan (selling houses) is not doing very well, while Casey is eager to become an actress (especially like Brandon).

text: i certainly found its depiction of a family affected by grief far more believable and effective than the strident dish-breaking , breast-beating of in the bedroom .
translation: 我确实发现它对一个受到悲痛影响的家庭的描绘比那种在卧室里尖锐的打碎餐具和捶胸顿足更加真实和有效。
back_translation: I do find that its portrayal of a family affected by grief is more authentic and effective than the kind of sharp shattering of dishes and pounding of chests in the bedroom.

text: lightly reflective and consistently entertaining , lucky break is an easy-to-take diversion .
translation: 轻松反射且持续娱乐的《幸运的机会》是一种容易接受的消遣。
back_translation: "Fortunate Chance," which is easy to reflect on and provides ongoing entertainment, is a readily acceptable pastime.

text: overall , it 's a wacky and inspired little film that works effortlessly at delivering genuine , acerbic laughs .
translation: 总体来说，这是一部古怪且灵感满满的小电影，毫不费力地带来了真实而尖锐的笑声。
back_translation: Overall, this is a quirky and inspiring little film that effortlessly delivers genuine and sharp laughs.

text: `` an entire film about researchers quietly reading dusty old letters . ``
translation: 一部关于研究人员安静地阅读尘封旧信的完整电影。
back_translation: A complete film about researchers quietly reading old, dusty letters.

text: his half-sister 's threats to pay back the enormous debts with the mafia has put a lot of pressure at his marriage .
translation: 他同父异母的姐妹威胁要用黑手党来偿还巨额债务，这给他的婚姻带来了很大的压力。
back_translation: His half-sister threatened to use the mafia to pay off a huge debt, which put a lot of pressure on his marriage.

text: despite an impressive roster of stars and direction from kathryn bigelow , the weight of water is oppressively heavy .
translation: 尽管拥有一份令人印象深刻的明星阵容和凯瑟琳·毕格罗的导演，水之重却是压倒性的沉重。
back_translation: Despite having an impressive star cast and being directed by Kathryn Bigelow, the weight of "Weight of Water" is overwhelmingly heavy.

text: charlie is heartbroken when his girlfriend of three years , mallory , breaks up with him .
translation: 查理在他的女朋友马洛里分手三年后感到心碎。
back_translation: Charlie felt heartbroken three years after breaking up with his girlfriend Mallory.

text: the first mistake , i suspect , is casting shatner as a legendary professor and kunis as a brilliant college student -- where 's pauly shore as the rocket scientist ?
translation: 我怀疑第一个错误是将舒特纳演成传奇教授，而库妮丝则饰演优秀大学生——保罗·肖尔在哪里？他怎么不扮演火箭科学家？
back_translation: I suspect the first mistake was casting Shatner as the legendary professor, while Kunis played the excellent college student—where is Paul Shore? Why isn't he playing the rocket scientist?

text: now all they have to do is pick the right guy .
translation: 现在他们只需要挑选对的人。
back_translation: Now they just need to choose the right people.

text: when dwindling membership and increasing overheads makes a local bowling club and prime candidate for a takeover , it 's all hands on deck to save the club , in what turns into an epic battle where young meets old , greed meets good and people rise to the occasion in extraordinary circumstances .
translation: 当会员人数减少和管理成本增加使一个地方保龄球俱乐部成为收购的热门候选者时，大家齐心协力拯救俱乐部，这变成了一场史诗般的斗争，年轻人与年长者交锋，贪婪与善良对抗，人们在非凡的环境中挺身而出。
back_translation: When the decrease in membership and the increase in management costs make a local bowling club a prime candidate for acquisition, everyone comes together to save the club. This turns into an epic struggle, with young people clashing with the elderly, greed facing goodness, and people stepping up in extraordinary circumstances.

text: this sets off an irrevocable chain of events that lead to aravasu losing his love , paravasu desecrating the great sacrifice , the creation of a demon and the deaths of yavakri and raibhya .
translation: 这引发了一系列不可逆转的事件，导致阿拉瓦苏失去了他的爱，帕拉瓦苏亵渎了伟大的祭祀，创造了一个恶魔，雅瓦克里和瑞赫比亚相继死亡。
back_translation: This triggered a series of irreversible events, leading Alavasu to lose his love, Palavasu to desecrate the great sacrifice, creating a demon, and resulting in the deaths of Yavakri and Rehibiya in succession.

text: two brothers , leon and bobby are members of the street gang in brooklyn known as the deuces .
translation: 两个兄弟，里昂和鲍比，是布鲁克林一个叫做“二号”的街头帮派的成员。
back_translation: Two brothers, Leon and Bobby, are members of a street gang called "Number Two" in Brooklyn.

text: bennie may not be who she seems , and there may be a chink in banks 's tough-guy armor .
translation: 班妮可能并不像看起来那样，而邦克斯的硬汉形象也可能有破绽。
back_translation: Bani may not be what she seems, and Bunkus's tough-guy image may also have flaws.

text: director roger michell does so many of the little things right that it 's difficult not to cuss him out severely for bungling the big stuff .
translation: 导演罗杰·米歇尔在许多小事上做得非常出色，以至于很难不因为他在大事上搞砸而对他大发雷霆。
back_translation: Director Roger Michell excelled in many small things, making it difficult not to explode at him for messing up the big things.

text: the film is told in flashbacks with a female reporter interviewing gale .
translation: 电影通过闪回的方式叙述，一名女性记者在采访盖尔。
back_translation: The film tells the story through flashbacks, focusing on a female journalist interviewing Gail.

text: on her last day alive , she develops an unusual relationship with kevin , a bisexual hustler specializing in `` freaks . ``
translation: 在她最后的生存日，她与凯文建立了一种不寻常的关系，凯文是一名专攻“怪胎”的双性恋陪客。
back_translation: In her final days of survival, she formed an unusual relationship with Kevin, a bisexual escort who specialized in "freaks."

text: enter the beautiful and mysterious secret agent petra schmitt .
translation: 神秘而美丽的特工佩特拉·施密特登场。
back_translation: The mysterious and beautiful agent Petra Schmidt makes her appearance.

text: ' . . . both hokey and super-cool , and definitely not in a hurry , so sit back , relax and have a few laughs while the little ones get a fuzzy treat . '
translation: ‘……既滑稽又超级酷，绝对不急，所以坐下来，放松一下，享受几次欢笑，同时让小朋友们享受一个毛绒绒的美味。’
back_translation: "…both hilarious and super cool, absolutely not rushed, so sit down, relax, enjoy some laughs, and let the kids enjoy a fluffy delicious treat."

text: does not go far enough in its humor or stock ideas to stand out as particularly memorable or even all that funny .
translation: 在幽默和陈旧观念上没有走得远，因此并没有特别令人难忘或非常搞笑。
back_translation: It hasn't gone far in terms of humor and outdated ideas, so it is not particularly memorable or very funny.

text: most new movies have a bright sheen . some , like ballistic , arrive stillborn . . . looking like the beaten , well-worn video box cover of seven years into the future .
translation: 大多数新电影都有一种明亮的光泽。像《弹道》这样的电影，送来的时候就像是死胎……看起来像是七年后破旧的、磨损的录像盒封面。
back_translation: Most new movies have a bright sheen. Movies like "Ballistic" arrive looking like stillborn... they seem like an old, worn-out VHS cover from seven years later.

text: speaking in terms of spectacle , craft , romance and humor , it 's the movie to beat this summer .
translation: 从视觉效果、工艺、浪漫和幽默的角度来看，它是这个夏天的必看电影。
back_translation: From the perspective of visual effects, craftsmanship, romance, and humor, it is a must-see movie this summer.

text: a compassionate , moving portrait of an american ( and an america ) always reaching for something just outside his grasp .
translation: 一个富有同情心、感人至深的肖像，描绘了一位美国人（以及一个美国）始终渴望着一些触手可及的东西。
back_translation: A compassionate and deeply moving portrait that depicts an American (and an America) always yearning for something tangible.

text: despite its faults , this is a fascinating look at a subculture .
translation: 尽管存在缺陷，这仍然是对一个亚文化的迷人观察。
back_translation: Despite its flaws, this is still a fascinating observation of a subculture.

text: the early and middle passages are surprising in how much they engage and even touch us . this is not a classical dramatic animated feature , nor a hip , contemporary , in-jokey one . it 's sort of in-between , and it works .
translation: 早期和中段的情节令人惊讶地让我们如此投入，甚至感动。这不是一部经典的戏剧动画片，也不是一种时髦、当代、充满内涵笑话的作品。它有点介于两者之间，而且效果很好。
back_translation: The early and mid-stage plot surprisingly engages us so deeply, even moving us. This is not a classic dramatic animated film, nor is it a trendy, contemporary work filled with meaningful jokes. It falls somewhat in between, and it works very well.

text: son of the bride is slight fare , but it does have it poignancies , and it is well-acted and sweet without being cloying .
translation: 新郎的儿子是小品，但确实有它的感人之处，表演得很好，甜美而不令人厌烦。
back_translation: The groom's son is a skit, but it indeed has its moving moments, and the performance is very good, sweet without being annoying.

text: in its dry and forceful way , it delivers the same message as jiri menzel 's closely watched trains and danis tanovic 's no man 's land .
translation: 以干燥而有力的方式，它传达了与吉里·门泽尔的《受关注的火车》和达尼斯·塔诺维奇的《无人区》相同的信息。
back_translation: In a dry and powerful manner, it conveys the same message as Gili Menzel's "The Train in Focus" and Danis Tanović's "No Man's Land."

text: each story is built on a potentially interesting idea , but the first two are ruined by amateurish writing and acting , while the third feels limited by its short running time .
translation: 每个故事都有一个潜在有趣的想法，但前两个故事被业余的写作和表演毁了，而第三个故事则因为短暂的时间而显得受限。
back_translation: Each story has a potentially interesting idea, but the first two stories are ruined by amateur writing and performance, while the third story feels limited due to its brief duration.

text: nothing short of a respectful testament to the ingenious creative drive of the outsider .
translation: 这无疑是对局外人具有独创性创造力的尊敬见证。
back_translation: This is undoubtedly a testament to the respect for the originality and creativity of outsiders.

text: though in some ways similar to catherine breillat 's fat girl , rain is the far superior film .
translation: 尽管在某些方面与卡特琳·布雷叶的《胖女孩》相似，但《雨》是一部远超前者的电影。
back_translation: Although similar to Catherine Breillat's "Fat Girl" in certain aspects, "Rain" is a film that far surpasses the former.

text: tonight there 's a dancing competition at the hottest salsa restaurant in copenhagen .
translation: 今晚在哥本哈根最热门的萨尔萨餐厅举行舞蹈比赛。
back_translation: Tonight, a dance competition will be held at the hottest salsa restaurant in Copenhagen.

text: the film thrusts the inchoate but already eldritch christian right propaganda machine into national media circles .
translation: 这部电影将尚未成熟但已经神秘的基督教右翼宣传机器推进到国家媒体圈中。
back_translation: This film advances the yet-to-be-matured but already mysterious Christian right propaganda machine into the realm of national media.

text: in a generation of individuals , they struggle to choose love .
translation: 在这一代人中，他们在选择爱情时感到挣扎。
back_translation: In this generation, they struggle with choosing love.

text: driven by romantic illusion to join the french foreign legion , simon learns what it truly means to be a hero .
translation: 受到浪漫幻想的驱动，西蒙加入了法国外籍军 Legion，他了解到成为一个英雄真正意味着什么。
back_translation: Driven by romantic fantasies, Simon joined the French Foreign Legion, where he learned what it truly means to be a hero.

text: this movie is maddening . it conveys a simple message in a visual style that is willfully overwrought .
translation: 这部电影令人疯狂。它传达了一个简单的信息，但其视觉风格却故意过于夸张。
back_translation: This movie is crazy. It conveys a simple message, but its visual style is intentionally exaggerated.

text: until one night max had a dream , where he dreamt that his mother died in a car crash .
translation: 直到有一天晚上，马克做了一个梦，他梦见他的母亲在一场车祸中去世。
back_translation: One night, Mark had a dream in which he dreamed that his mother passed away in a car accident.

text: as he spirals into a series of hallucinations , the line between his sister 's death and ellen 's disappearance blurs .
translation: 随着他陷入一系列的幻觉，他姐姐的死亡和艾伦的失踪之间的界限变得模糊。
back_translation: As he succumbed to a series of hallucinations, the boundary between his sister's death and Allen's disappearance became blurred.

text: a surprisingly good-natured throwback to the '80s heyday of the body-switching genre .
translation: 对80年代身体互换类型的怀旧之作，意外地表现出令人惊讶的好脾气。
back_translation: This nostalgic work about body-swapping from the 1980s surprisingly displays a remarkable good nature.

text: sometimes charming , sometimes infuriating , this argentinean 'dramedy ' succeeds mainly on the shoulders of its actors .
translation: 有时迷人，有时令人愤怒，这部阿根廷的“戏剧喜剧”主要依靠演员的表现取得成功。
back_translation: Sometimes charming, sometimes frustrating, this Argentine "dramedy" mainly succeeds due to the performances of its actors.

text: a generic international version of a typical american horror film .
translation: 一部典型美国恐怖电影的通用国际版。
back_translation: A generic international version of a typical American horror movie.

text: what begins as a seemingly brainless , bubbly romantic comedy becomes a cliche-drenched melodrama by mid-film and , by film 's end , a feminist action fantasy .
translation: 起初看似毫无脑筋、充满泡泡的浪漫喜剧，到影片中段变成了充满陈词滥调的情节剧，而到影片结尾则变成了一部女性主义动作奇幻片。
back_translation: At first, it seems like a mindless romantic comedy filled with fluff, but halfway through it transforms into a cliched drama, and by the end, it becomes a feminist action fantasy film.

text: beyond borders is an epic tale of the turbulent romance between two star-crossed lovers set against the backdrop of the world 's most dangerous hot spots .
translation: 《超越边界》是一部史诗般的故事，讲述了两位命中注定的恋人之间波澜起伏的浪漫关系，背景设在世界上最危险的热点地区。
back_translation: "Beyond Borders" is an epic story that narrates the tumultuous romantic relationship between two destined lovers, set against the backdrop of the world's most dangerous hotspots.

text: a budget affair that exposes the generally sad existence of the bedouins while providing a precious twinkle of insight into their lives .
translation: 一场预算有限的活动，揭示了贝都因人普遍悲惨的生活，同时为他们的生活提供了一丝珍贵的洞察。
back_translation: An event with a limited budget revealed the generally tragic life of the Bedouins, while also providing a glimpse of precious insights into their lives.

text: learn about competitions such as k- ! , the world 's most popular martial arts competition .
translation: 了解诸如K-1等比赛，这是世界上最受欢迎的武术比赛。
back_translation: Understanding competitions like K-1, which are the most popular martial arts events in the world.

text: ultimately , anime moves far beyond the realm of simple cartoons , encompassing a sensuous melange of complex storytelling , cutting edge imagery , music and fashion .
translation: 最终，动漫远远超越了简单卡通的领域，融合了复杂叙事、尖端影像、音乐和时尚的感性混合体。
back_translation: In the end, anime has far surpassed the realm of simple cartoons, blending complex narratives, cutting-edge visuals, music, and a sensibility of fashion.

text: amold & oacute ; var is a master of emotional texture , peeling away layer upon layer of the feelings . . . until he reaches benigno 's troubled psyche and marco 's benevolent soul .
translation: 阿莫尔德·瓦尔是一位情感质感的高手，逐层剥离情感，直至他触及贝尼尼的困扰心理和马尔科的仁慈灵魂。
back_translation: Amolde Val is a master of emotional texture, peeling back layers of emotion until he touches Benini's troubled psyche and Marco's compassionate soul.

text: while it 's genuinely cool to hear characters talk about early rap records ( sugar hill gang , etc . ) , the constant referencing of hip-hop arcana can alienate even the savviest audiences .
translation: 虽然听到角色谈论早期的说唱唱片（例如糖丘帮等）确实很酷，但对嘻哈文化知识的不断提及可能会让即使是最懂行的观众感到疏远。
back_translation: Although it's really cool to hear characters talk about early rap records (like the Sugarhill Gang, etc.), the constant references to hip-hop culture may alienate even the most knowledgeable audience members.

text: what better message than 'love thyself ' could young women of any size receive ?
translation: “爱自己”对任何体型的年轻女性来说，还有什么更好的信息呢？
back_translation: "What better message could there be for young women of any body type than 'love yourself'?"

text: if the film fails to fulfill its own ambitious goals , it nonetheless sustains interest during the long build-up of expository material .
translation: 如果这部电影未能实现其雄心勃勃的目标，但在长时间的铺陈材料中仍然能够保持观众的兴趣。
back_translation: If this movie fails to achieve its ambitious goals, it can still maintain the audience's interest throughout its lengthy exposition.

text: a model of what films like this should be like .
translation: 类似这种电影的典范。
back_translation: A typical example of such a movie.

text: every single scene conveys a significant and concise narrative development , yet does so in an unassuming , patient fashion that emphasizes detail .
translation: 每一个场景都传达了重要且简洁的叙事发展，但却以一种不张扬、耐心的方式进行，强调了细节。
back_translation: Each scene conveys important and concise narrative developments, yet unfolds in an understated and patient manner, emphasizing the details.

text: but still , the killings do not stop with his death .
translation: 但是，随着他的死亡，杀戮并没有停止。
back_translation: However, with his death, the killing did not stop.

text: a solid piece of journalistic work that draws a picture of a man for whom political expedience became a deadly foreign policy .
translation: 一篇扎实的新闻作品，描绘了一个因政治权宜而变成致命外交政策的人的形象。
back_translation: A solid piece of journalism depicts the image of a person whose political expediency has turned into a deadly foreign policy.

text: the script is a tired one , with few moments of joy rising above the stale material .
translation: 这个剧本很疲惫，几乎没有什么令人愉悦的时刻能够超越这枯燥的内容。
back_translation: This script is very exhausting, with almost no enjoyable moments that can transcend its dull content.

text: a hypnotic cyber hymn and a cruel story of youth culture .
translation: 一首催眠的网络圣歌和一个残酷的青年文化故事。
back_translation: A hypnotic online anthem and a brutal youth culture story.

text: gus sits on the sofa and talks about being the world 's oldest pothead , who started smoking in 1936 .
translation: 古斯坐在沙发上，谈论自己是世界上最老的吸烟者，1936年就开始吸烟。
back_translation: Gus sits on the sofa, talking about being the oldest smoker in the world, having started smoking in 1936.

text: former caa power broker , michael ovitz is probably very sorry he ever decided to do that vanity fair interview .
translation: 前CAA权力中介迈克尔·欧维茨可能非常后悔自己曾决定接受《名利场》的采访。
back_translation: Former CAA power broker Michael Ovitz may deeply regret his decision to accept an interview with Vanity Fair.

text: for the past seven years mel bishop , a cold-blooded old west outlaw , had rotted away in a filthy mexican prison .
translation: 在过去的七年里，梅尔·比肖普，一个冷血的老西部亡命之徒，湮灭在一所肮脏的墨西哥监狱里。
back_translation: In the past seven years, Mel Bishop, a cold-blooded old West outlaw, has vanished in a dirty Mexican prison.

text: not a bad choice here , assuming that . . . the air-conditioning in the theater is working properly .
translation: 在这里算是一个不错的选择，前提是……剧院的空调正常运作。
back_translation: It's a good choice here, provided that... the theater's air conditioning is functioning properly.

text: using fossilized dna , a scientist resurrects one of nature 's most fearsome predators , a sabretooth tiger .
translation: 科学家使用化石DNA复活了大自然中最凶猛的捕食者之一——剑齿虎。
back_translation: Scientists have revived one of nature's fiercest predators, the saber-toothed tiger, using fossil DNA.

text: with a little help from the well connected and seductive daughter of a columbian gangster , he becomes a drug kingpin with a nationwide monopoly on drug running .
translation: 在一位与哥伦比亚黑帮少爷的魅力女儿的帮助下，他成为了一位毒品大亨，拥有全国范围内的毒品贩运垄断。
back_translation: With the help of the charming daughter of a Colombian gang lord, he became a drug tycoon, monopolizing drug trafficking nationwide.

text: leela is a true reflection of how the south asian-american community is beginning to emerge , blend , and influence the mainstream american culture in its own exquisite ways .
translation: Leela真实地反映了南亚裔美国社区如何开始崭露头角、融合并以独特的方式影响主流美国文化。
back_translation: Leela authentically reflects how the South Asian American community has begun to emerge, integrate, and uniquely influence mainstream American culture.

text: he is a gentle , philosophical guy , and she works on the checkout at a supermarket .
translation: 他是一个温和、富有哲理的人，而她在超市的收银台工作。
back_translation: He is a gentle, philosophical person, while she works at the checkout counter in a supermarket.

text: it trusts the story it sets out to tell .
translation: 它信任它所要讲述的故事。
back_translation: It trusts the story it wants to tell.

text: thus when he surprisingly gets an email from american film producer alex brubeck who writes that he had liked the script and would like to meet him personally , tam & # 225 ; s sees all his dreams come true .
translation: 因此，当他意外收到美国电影制片人亚历克斯·布鲁贝克的电子邮件时，布鲁贝克写道他喜欢这个剧本，并希望与他亲自会面，塔姆看到他所有的梦想都成真了。
back_translation: Therefore, when he unexpectedly received an email from American filmmaker Alex Brubaker, who wrote that he liked the script and wanted to meet with him in person, Tam felt that all his dreams were coming true.

text: just as he begins to suspect the movie is ruining his love life , his world is turned inside-out by a girl who just might be the modern equivalent of annie hall herself .
translation: 正当他开始怀疑这部电影正在毁掉他的爱情生活时，一个女孩彻底颠覆了他的世界，她可能就是现代版的安妮·霍尔。
back_translation: Just when he began to doubt that the movie was ruining his love life, a girl completely turned his world upside down; she might be the modern version of Annie Hall.

text: at this , he loses his temper and gets physical with the employee .
translation: 在这时，他失去了耐性，并对员工动了手。
back_translation: At that moment, he lost his patience and turned violent towards his employees.

text: for this sort of thing to work , we need agile performers , but the proficient , dull sorvino has no light touch , and rodan is out of his league .
translation: 要让这种事情有效，我们需要灵活的表演者，但熟练、乏味的索尔维诺没有轻松的手法，而罗丹显然不在行。
back_translation: To make this work effectively, we need flexible performers, but the skilled yet dull Solvigno lacks an easy technique, and Rodin is clearly out of his depth.

text: if you open yourself up to mr . reggio 's theory of this imagery as the movie 's set . . . it can impart an almost visceral sense of dislocation and change .
translation: 如果你接受雷吉奥先生关于这种意象作为电影背景的理论……它可以传达一种几乎是身体上的错位和变化感。
back_translation: If you accept Mr. Reggio's theory about this imagery as a backdrop for the film... it can convey a sense of almost physical dislocation and transformation.

text: because the flag is dirty , the teacher asks them to take it home and to wash it .
translation: 因为旗帜脏了，老师让他们把它带回家洗。
back_translation: Because the flag was dirty, the teacher asked them to take it home to wash it.

text: far from perfect , but its heart is in the right place . . . innocent and well-meaning .
translation: 远非完美，但它的出发点是好的……无辜且用心良好。
back_translation: Far from perfect, but its starting point is good... innocent and well-intentioned.

text: the girl he wanted to run away with and share the rest of his life .
translation: 他想和她私奔，共度余生的女孩。
back_translation: He wants to elope with the girl he wants to spend the rest of his life with.

text: . . . a hollow joke told by a cinematic gymnast having too much fun embellishing the misanthropic tale to actually engage it .
