translation: ……一个空洞的笑话，由一位享受过多的电影体操运动员讲述，她对这个厌世的故事进行了过多的渲染，导致无法真正投入其中。
back_translation: ...a hollow joke told by a movie gymnast who has indulged too much, embellishing this cynical story to the point where one cannot truly engage with it.

text: 'estupendamente actuada , sumamente emotiva y profundamente humana , es una experiencia fM-mlmica imposible de olvidar '
translation: “表演出色，情感极为深刻，人性深邃，令人难以忘怀的电影体验。”
back_translation: "Outstanding performance, extremely deep emotions, profound human nature, an unforgettable movie experience."

text: it 's a thin notion , repetitively stretched out to feature length , awash in self-consciously flashy camera effects , droning house music and flat , flat dialogue .
translation: 这是一个薄弱的概念，反复拉伸到特长片的长度，充斥着自觉浮华的摄影效果、低沉的电子音乐和单薄的对话。
back_translation: This is a weak concept, repeatedly stretched to the length of a short film, filled with self-consciously flamboyant photographic effects, somber electronic music, and thin dialogues.

text: chaotic , self-indulgent and remarkably ugly to look at , it 's . . . like a series of pretentiously awful student films strung together into one feature-length horror .
translation: 混乱、自我放纵，并且看起来相当丑陋，这就像是一系列装模作样且糟糕的学生电影串联在一起，变成了一部完整的恐怖片。
back_translation: Chaotic, self-indulgent, and looking quite ugly, it's like a series of pretentious and terrible student films stitched together into a complete horror movie.

text: the film is about the relationships rather than about the outcome . and it sees those relationships , including that between the son and his wife , and the wife and the father , and between the two brothers , with incredible subtlety and acumen .
translation: 这部电影关注的是人际关系，而不是结果。它以令人难以置信的细腻和敏锐的眼光看待这些关系，包括儿子与妻子之间的关系、妻子与父亲之间的关系以及两个兄弟之间的关系。
back_translation: This film focuses on interpersonal relationships rather than outcomes. It looks at these relationships with incredible delicacy and keen insight, including the relationship between the son and the wife, the relationship between the wife and the father, and the relationship between the two brothers.

text: sacrifices the value of its wealth of archival foot-age with its less-than-objective stance .
translation: 牺牲了其丰富档案素材的价值，因其立场不够客观。
back_translation: It sacrifices the value of its rich archival materials due to its lack of objectivity.

text: so relentlessly wholesome it made me want to swipe something .
translation: 如此无私而美好，令我想要偷点什么。
back_translation: So selfless and beautiful, it makes me want to steal something.

text: will certainly appeal to asian cult cinema fans and asiaphiles interested to see what all the fuss is about .
translation: 肯定会吸引亚洲 cult 电影爱好者和对了解热议内容感兴趣的亚洲迷。
back_translation: It will definitely attract Asian cult film enthusiasts and fans interested in understanding trending topics.

text: resurrection has the dubious distinction of being a really bad imitation of the really bad blair witch project .
translation: 《复活》具有可疑的特殊性，实在是一个对《鬼驱人》这个烂片的拙劣模仿。
back_translation: "Resurrection" has a dubious uniqueness; it is actually a poor imitation of the bad film "The Exorcist."

text: despite their many differences , they form a loving , long term relationship .
translation: 尽管他们有许多不同之处，但他们建立了一个充满爱的长期关系。
back_translation: Despite their many differences, they have built a long-term relationship filled with love.

text: paulie , a pot smoking proctologist who has a list of pre-requisites for dating which reads like `` war and peace . ``
translation: 保罗，一个抽大麻的肛肠科医生，他的约会前提条件清单就像《战争与和平》。
back_translation: Paul, a proctologist who smokes marijuana, has a dating prerequisite list that's like "War and Peace."

text: touted as an unofficial sequel to his 1989 hit sex , lies , and videotape , this arty film-within-a-film ( which was shot in just 18 days ) revolves around seven people with little in common whose lives collide .
translation: 被誉为他1989年热门影片《性、谎言与录像带》的非官方续集，这部艺术性强的电影（仅用18天拍摄完成）围绕七个几乎没有共同点的人们的生活交汇展开。
back_translation: Hailed as the unofficial sequel to his 1989 hit film "Sex, Lies, and Videotape," this artistic film (shot in just 18 days) revolves around the intersecting lives of seven people who have almost nothing in common.

text: beary , a young bear raised by a human family in a world where humans and talking bears coexist , attempts to trace his roots .
translation: 比瑞是一只年轻的熊，在一个人类和会说话的熊共存的世界里由一个人类家庭抚养长大，他试图追溯自己的根源。
back_translation: Bi Rui is a young bear raised by a human family in a world where humans and talking bears coexist, and he is trying to trace his origins.

text: filmmakers have to dig deep to sink this low . fortunately for all involved , this movie is likely to disappear as quickly as an ice cube thrown into a pot of boiling water .
translation: 电影制作人必须深挖才能达到如此低的水平。对所有参与者来说，这部电影很可能会像扔进开水锅里的冰块一样快速消失。
back_translation: Filmmakers must dig deep to reach such a low level. For all involved, this movie is likely to vanish as quickly as an ice cube thrown into a pot of boiling water.

text: an inexperienced director , mehta has much to learn .
translation: 作为一名缺乏经验的导演，梅塔还有很多需要学习的地方。
back_translation: As an inexperienced director, Meita still has a lot to learn.

text: this indie drama resonantly demonstrates how a person 's worth is weighed in a town where you 're only as good as your last game .
translation: 这部独立戏剧深刻地展示了一个人在一个小镇上的价值是如何被衡量的，在这个小镇上，你的价值只取决于你最后一场比赛的表现。
back_translation: This independent play profoundly demonstrates how a person's worth is measured in a small town, where your value depends solely on your performance in your last match.

text: shahrul is a mechanic who also takes part in illegal bike racing .
translation: 沙赫鲁尔是一名机械师，同时也参与非法摩托车比赛。
back_translation: Shaheerul is a mechanic who also participates in illegal motorcycle races.

text: two young gentlemen ( rupert everett & # 38 ; colin firth ) living in 1890s england use the same pseudonym ( `` earnest `` ) on the sly , which is fine until they both fall in love with women using that name , which leads to a comedy of mistaken identities . . .
translation: 两个年轻绅士（鲁珀特·艾弗雷特 & 科林·费尔斯）生活在1890年代的英格兰，偷偷使用同一个化名（“欧内斯特”），这一切都很好，直到他们都爱上了使用这个名字的女人，导致了一场误认身份的喜剧……
back_translation: Two young gentlemen (Rupert Everett & Colin Firth) live in England in the 1890s, secretly using the same pseudonym ("Ernest"). Everything is going well until they both fall in love with a woman who uses this name, leading to a comedy of mistaken identity...

text: take a friend ( invisible or real ) to see this one . . . it 's laugh out loud funny
translation: 带上一个朋友（无论是看不见的还是现实中的）来看看这个……真是让人捧腹大笑。
back_translation: Bring a friend (whether invisible or real) to check this out... it's truly laugh-out-loud funny.

text: measured against practically any like-themed film other than its oscar-sweeping franchise predecessor the silence of the lambs , red dragon rates as an exceptional thriller .
translation: 与几乎任何类似题材的电影相比，除了赢得奥斯卡奖的前作《沉默的羔羊》，《红龙》都是一部卓越的惊悚片。
back_translation: Compared to almost any other film of a similar genre, "Red Dragon" is an outstanding thriller, second only to its Oscar-winning predecessor "The Silence of the Lambs."

text: elegantly produced and expressively performed , the six musical numbers crystallize key plot moments into minutely detailed wonders of dreamlike ecstasy .
translation: 优雅地制作，富有表现力的演出，这六首音乐作品将关键情节时刻凝聚成微妙而详细的梦幻狂喜奇观。
back_translation: Elegantly crafted and expressively performed, these six musical pieces condense the key moments of the plot into a subtle and detailed dreamlike ecstasy spectacle.

text: offers big , fat , dumb laughs that may make you hate yourself for giving in . ah , what the hell .
translation: 提供了巨大的、愚蠢的搞笑，可能会让你因为屈服而自责。啊，管它呢。
back_translation: It offers massive, silly humor that might make you feel guilty for giving in. Ah, who cares.

text: the vistas are sweeping and the acting is far from painful .
translation: 风景壮丽，演技远离尴尬。
back_translation: The scenery is magnificent, and the acting is far from awkward.

text: however when sex and greed rear-up between the good crims and the bad cops , the consequences are both bizarre and fatal .
translation: 然而，当性欲和贪婪在善良的罪犯与恶劣的警察之间抬头时，后果既怪异又致命。
back_translation: However, when lust and greed rise between the kind-hearted criminal and the vicious police, the consequences are both strange and deadly.

text: everyday prisoners are led out in chain gangs to work the swamps and untamed bayous , festered with poisonous snakes and alligators .
translation: 每天囚犯们被押送到沼泽和未驯化的河口，以锁链工队的形式工作，那里满是毒蛇和鳄鱼。
back_translation: Every day, the prisoners are escorted to the swamps and untamed estuaries to work in chain gangs, where they are surrounded by poisonous snakes and crocodiles.

text: by turns pretentious , fascinating , ludicrous , provocative and vainglorious .
translation: 时而自命不凡，迷人，荒谬，挑衅，和虚荣。
back_translation: At times self-important, charming, absurd, provocative, and vain.

text: this appears to be only the beginning of a string of suicides around the country .
translation: 这似乎只是全国范围内一系列自杀事件的开始。
back_translation: This seems to be just the beginning of a series of suicide events nationwide.

text: a moving and weighty depiction of one family 's attempts to heal after the death of a child .
translation: 对一个家庭在失去孩子后努力治愈的感人而深刻的描绘。
back_translation: A moving and profound portrayal of a family's struggle to heal after the loss of a child.

text: angela gheorghiu as famous prima donna floria tosca , roberto alagna as her lover mario cavaradossi , and ruggero as the villainous , lecherous police chief scarpia , all sing beautifully and act adequately .
translation: 安杰拉·乔治乌饰演著名女歌手弗洛莉亚·托斯卡，罗伯托·阿拉尼亚饰演她的爱人马里奥·卡瓦拉多西，鲁杰罗饰演奸诈好色的警察局长斯卡皮亚，三人都唱得很美，表演也相当出色。
back_translation: Angela Gheorghiu plays the famous singer Floria Tosca, Roberto Alagna plays her lover Mario Cavaradossi, and Ruggero sings the cunning and lecherous police chief Scarpia. All three sing beautifully and their performances are quite outstanding.

text: `` red dragon `` is entertaining . an obvious copy of one of the best films ever made , how could it not be ? but it is entertaining on an inferior level . it is a popcorn film , not a must-own , or even a must-see .
translation: 《红龙》很有娱乐性。显然是模仿了有史以来最好的影片之一，怎么可能不是呢？但它的娱乐性在于较低的层次。它是一部快餐电影，不是必备的，也甚至不是必看的。
back_translation: "Red Dragon" is very entertaining. It clearly imitates one of the best films of all time, how could it not? But its entertainment value is on a lower level. It is a fast-food movie, not essential, and not even a must-watch.

text: swims in mediocrity , sticking its head up for a breath of fresh air now and then .
translation: 在平庸中游泳，时不时抬起头来喘口新鲜空气。
back_translation: Swimming in mediocrity, occasionally lifting your head to catch a breath of fresh air.

text: a fairly harmless but ultimately lifeless feature-length afterschool special .
translation: 一个相当无害但最终乏味的特长篇放学特别节目。
back_translation: A rather harmless but ultimately boring long special program after school.

text: worth watching for dong jie 's performance -- and for the way it documents a culture in the throes of rapid change .
translation: 值得一看的是董洁的表演——以及它记录了一个快速变化中的文化。
back_translation: What is worth seeing is Dong Jie’s performance—and how it captures a rapidly changing culture.

text: he is going to sweden , and invites lilja to come along and start a new life .
translation: 他要去瑞典，并邀请莉莉娅一起去开始新的生活。
back_translation: He is going to Sweden and invites Liliya to go with him to start a new life.

text: russian ark is a new treasure of the hermitage .
translation: 《俄罗斯方舟》是冬宫的新宝藏。
back_translation: "The Russian Ark" is the new treasure of the Winter Palace.

text: he and joey have been painfully estranged ever since vincent divorced his wife and left the decaying boardwalks of long beach , long island for the anonymity of manhattan and a successful career with the nypd .
translation: 自从文森特与妻子离婚，离开长岛长滩衰败的木板路，前往曼哈顿追求匿名和纽约市警察局的成功职业以来，他和乔伊一直痛苦地疏远。
back_translation: Since Vincent divorced his wife and left the crumbling boardwalk of Long Beach on Long Island to pursue anonymity and a successful career with the New York City Police Department in Manhattan, he and Joy have suffered a painful estrangement.

text: the humor is n't as sharp , the effects not as innovative , nor the story as imaginative as in the original . but it could have been worse .
translation: 幽默感没有那么犀利，特效也不够创新，故事的想象力也不如原作。不过，它本来可以更糟。
back_translation: The humor isn't as sharp, the special effects aren't innovative enough, and the story's imagination pales in comparison to the original. However, it could have been worse.

text: nothing short of a masterpiece -- and a challenging one .
translation: 简直是一部杰作——而且是一个具有挑战性的杰作。
back_translation: It's simply a masterpiece—and a challenging one at that.

text: the real charm of this trifle is the deadpan comic face of its star , jean reno , who resembles sly stallone in a hot sake half-sleep .
translation: 这部甜点的真正魅力在于其明星让·雷诺那毫无表情的喜剧面孔，他在热清酒的半梦半醒中，像极了西尔维斯特·史泰龙。
back_translation: The true charm of this dessert lies in its star, Jean Reno, whose expressionless comedic face resembles that of Sylvester Stallone in a half-dream, half-awake state while drinking hot sake.

text: her daughter siri , whom , in this way , she turns into her virtual twin , learns as a child that she is the world 's first cloned human being .
translation: 她的女儿西里，以这种方式，她将其变成她的虚拟双胞胎，作为一个孩子，她了解到自己是世界上第一个克隆人。
back_translation: Her daughter Siri, in this way, turned herself into her virtual twin. As a child, she learned that she was the first clone in the world.

text: watch as superfag with the help of his zany superfriends , taco chick and salsa girl , the incredible dyke , the bionic old lady , supermomma , disco diva , the wonder trannies and many more , fight against the evil fiend , professor peckerhead who attempts to rid the world of homosexuality forever !
translation: 观看超级小子和他的疯狂超级朋友们，墨西哥卷饼女孩和莎莎女孩，超级女侠，义肢老太太，超级妈妈，迪斯科女神，奇妙变性人等，如何与邪恶恶棍佩克教授作斗争，他企图永远消灭世界上的同性恋！
back_translation: Watch Super Kid and his crazy super friends, Burrito Girl and Salsa Girl, Superwoman, Prosthetic Granny, Super Mom, Disco Goddess, Fabulous Transgender Person, etc., as they fight against the evil villain Professor Peck, who seeks to eradicate homosexuality from the world forever!

text: a document about a unique political and artistic moment , the film traces the links between the two most important latin american filmmaking movements of the late '60s the brazilian cinema n & # 244 ; vo and the cuban cine revolucionario .
translation: 一份关于独特政治和艺术时刻的文件，影片追溯了20世纪60年代末两个最重要的拉丁美洲电影运动之间的联系：巴西的“新电影”(Cinema Novo)和古巴的“革命电影”(Cine Revolucionario)。
back_translation: A document about unique political and artistic moments, the film traces the connections between two of the most important Latin American film movements of the late 1960s: Brazil's "Cinema Novo" and Cuba's "Cine Revolucionario."

text: the filmmakers try to balance pointed , often incisive satire and unabashed sweetness , with results that are sometimes bracing , sometimes baffling and quite often , and in unexpected ways , touching .
translation: filmmakers试图在尖锐且往往深刻的讽刺与毫不掩饰的甜美之间寻找平衡，结果有时令人振奋，有时令人困惑，往往在意想不到的方式上感人。
back_translation: Filmmakers try to find a balance between sharp and often profound satire and unabashed sweetness, resulting in outcomes that are sometimes uplifting, sometimes confusing, and often moving in unexpected ways.

text: stephen stalls his interrogators with stories of his affair with toni , while she risks her freedom by seducing an employee in the d . a . 's
translation: 斯蒂芬通过讲述他与托尼的 affair 来拖延审讯者的时间，而她则通过勾引一名检察官办公室的员工来冒险失去自由。
back_translation: Stephen delays the interrogator's time by recounting his affair with Toni, while she risks losing her freedom by seducing an employee of the prosecutor's office.

text: as a woman who can let go of her need to be in control .
translation: 作为一个能够放下控制欲的女性。
back_translation: As a woman who can let go of her desire for control.

text: tonight at hamilton high , the lesson is survival .
translation: 今晚在汉密尔顿高中，课程是生存。
back_translation: Tonight at Hamilton High, the lesson is survival.

text: as directed by dani kouyate of burkina faso , sia lacks visual flair . but kouyate elicits strong performances from his cast , and he delivers a powerful commentary on how governments lie , no matter who runs them .
translation: 根据布基纳法索的达尼·库亚特的指示，《西亚》缺乏视觉魅力。但库亚特能激发演员们的强烈表演，并对政府如何说谎进行了强有力的评论，无论是谁在掌控它们。
back_translation: According to Burkina Faso's Dani Kouyaté, "West Asia" lacks visual appeal. However, Kouyaté is able to inspire strong performances from the actors and makes a powerful commentary on how the government lies, regardless of who is in control.

text: a movie that will touch the hearts of both children and adults , as well as bring audiences to the edge of their seats .
translation: 一部会触动儿童和成人心灵的电影，同时也会让观众紧张到坐不稳。
back_translation: A movie that touches the hearts of both children and adults, while also making the audience so tense that they can't sit still.

text: after a wild session of lovemaking , dawn goes for a walk .
translation: 在一场疯狂的爱之后，黎明去散步。
back_translation: After a crazy love, Dawn went for a walk.

text: but then nora is revealed and tactics need to be changed .
translation: 但随后诺拉被揭露，战术需要改变。
back_translation: But then Nora was revealed, and the tactics needed to change.

text: one of the best films i have ever seen , constantly pulling the rug from underneath us , seeing things from new sides , plunging deeper , getting more intense .
translation: 我看过的最好的电影之一，不断地从我们脚下抽走地毯，从新的角度看待事物，深入探讨，变得越来越激烈。
back_translation: One of the best movies I've ever seen, constantly pulling the rug out from under us, offering new perspectives on things, delving deeper, and becoming increasingly intense.

text: a graceful , contemplative film that gradually and artfully draws us into a world where the personal and the political get fatally intertwined .
translation: 一部优雅而深思的电影，逐渐而巧妙地将我们带入一个个人与政治致命交织的世界。
back_translation: An elegant and thought-provoking film that gradually and skillfully immerses us into a world where personal and political fates are intertwined.

text: staked-out in his one-bedroom apartment with his kidnap victim , brian ( justin bartha ) , gigli soon realizes that what he thought would be a routine assignment soon becomes a tumultuous task .
translation: 在他的一居室公寓里与他的绑架受害者布莱恩（贾斯汀·巴萨）一起被困，吉利很快意识到他以为会是例行公事的任务变成了一个动荡不安的挑战。
back_translation: Trapped in his one-bedroom apartment with his kidnapping victim Brian (Justin Bassa), Jili quickly realizes that what he thought would be a routine assignment has turned into a tumultuous challenge.

text: this is the decades-long story of the relationship between a prominent high school football coach ( harris ) in a small south carolina town and the illiterate , mentally-challenged man nicknamed radio ( gooding ) whom he mentors , who before that had always been the target of jokes and teasing by the community .
translation: 这是一个关于南卡罗来纳州一个小镇上，一位著名的高中足球教练（哈里斯）与一个被称为“收音机”（古丁）的文盲、心理受限的人的关系的几十年故事，这位教练在之前一直是社区嘲笑和戏弄的对象。
back_translation: This is a decades-long story about a famous high school football coach (Harris) in a small town in South Carolina and his relationship with a person known as "Radio" (Gootin), who is illiterate and mentally challenged. The coach was previously the subject of ridicule and teasing in the community.

text: the dea finally convinces the chinese military that robert may be of more help to them outside jail by leading them to the real smugglers .
translation: 缉毒局最终说服了中国军方，罗伯特在监狱外可能更能帮助他们，引导他们找到真正的走私者。
back_translation: The drug enforcement agency eventually convinced the Chinese military that Robert might be more helpful outside of prison, guiding them to find the real smugglers.

text: this will go on so long as there are moviegoers anxious to see strange young guys doing strange guy things .
translation: 只要还有观众渴望看到奇怪的年轻人做奇怪的事情，这种现象就会持续下去。
back_translation: As long as there are audiences eager to see strange young people doing strange things, this phenomenon will continue.

text: more than the last time around , it has elements that might help divert those bigger people who find themselves unavoidably in attendance .
translation: 比上一次更多，它包含了一些可以帮助分散那些不情愿到场的大人物注意力的元素。
back_translation: More than last time, it includes some elements that can help divert the attention of those influential figures who are reluctant to attend.

text: plays like a toddler running along a lumpy field , stumbling every few feet but always getting back up and eventually reaching his destination , unharmed and happy .
translation: 就像一个幼儿在颠簸的田野上奔跑，每走几步就摔倒一次，但总是能重新站起来，最终无伤无碍、快乐地到达目的地。
back_translation: Like a toddler running across a bumpy field, falling down every few steps but always getting back up, eventually arriving at the destination unscathed and happily.

text: they feel they are at the end of their rope and know they need a big stash of cash to make their musical dreams a reality .
translation: 他们感到筋疲力尽，知道需要一大笔现金才能实现他们的音乐梦想。
back_translation: They feel exhausted and know that they need a large sum of cash to realize their musical dreams.

text: four friends - one summer - an italian-american neighborhood in yonkers , ny .
translation: 四个朋友 - 一个夏天 - 纽约扬克斯的意大利裔美国人社区。
back_translation: Four friends - one summer - in the Italian-American community of Yonkers, New York.

text: after chance brings them together they create , 'searching for mr right . com , `` a web site to locate husbands for marie and liz .
translation: 在机会让他们相聚后，他们创建了“寻找好男人.com”，这是一个为玛丽和丽兹寻找丈夫的网站。
back_translation: After the opportunity brought them together, they created "FindingGoodMen.com," a website for Mary and Liz to find husbands.

text: it desperately wants to be a wacky , screwball comedy , but the most screwy thing here is how so many talented people were convinced to waste their time .
translation: 它迫切想成为一部离奇古怪的喜剧，但这里最疯狂的事情是有这么多有才华的人被说服去浪费他们的时间。
back_translation: It desperately wants to be a bizarre comedy, but the craziest thing here is that so many talented people were persuaded to waste their time.

text: what the film lacks in general focus it makes up for in compassion , as corcuera manages to find the seeds of hope in the form of collective action .
translation: 这部影片虽然在整体焦点上有所欠缺，但在同情心上弥补了这一点，因为科尔库埃拉设法以集体行动的形式发现了希望的种子。
back_translation: Although this film lacks in overall focus, it compensates for this with its empathy, as Colquhoun manages to uncover the seeds of hope through collective action.

text: vesa , a 16-year old bulgarian girl , can not speak .
translation: 维萨，一名16岁的保加利亚女孩，无法说话。
back_translation: Visa, a 16-year-old Bulgarian girl, is unable to speak.

text: this dark bittersweet drama focuses on roberta , a 350-lb secretary who loses her job and learns she is dying on the same day .
translation: 这部黑暗而苦涩的剧情剧集中在罗伯塔身上，她是一位体重350磅的秘书，在同一天失业并得知自己正面临死亡。
back_translation: This dark and bitter drama centers on Roberta, a 350-pound secretary who loses her job and learns she is facing death on the same day.

text: `` mudbloods `` ( people of muggle families ) are `` petrified `` by an evil monster lurking in the grounds .
translation: “泥巴种”（麻瓜家庭出身的人）被潜藏在场地中的邪恶怪物“石化”。
back_translation: "Mudbloods" (people from Muggle families) are petrified by the evil monster hidden in the venue.

text: this is the film training day wanted to be .
translation: 这是电影《训练日》想要成为的作品。
back_translation: This is the work that the movie "Training Day" aspires to be.

text: rodney boland is a professional hit man who `` services `` politicians and their wealthy backers .
translation: 罗德尼·博兰德是一名专业杀手，专门为政治家和他们富有的支持者“服务”。
back_translation: Rodney Boland is a professional assassin who specializes in "serving" politicians and their wealthy supporters.

text: suspiciously , word of the device got out to the underworld and both parents were brutally killed in front of the girls ' eyes by criminals eager to get their hands on the invention .
translation: 可疑的是，这个装置的消息泄露到了黑社会，两个父母在女孩面前被渴望得到这个发明的罪犯残忍杀害。
back_translation: Suspiciously, the news of this device leaked to the underworld, and the girl's parents were brutally murdered in front of her by criminals who coveted this invention.

text: the draw [ for `` big bad love `` ] is a solid performance by arliss howard .
translation: 《大坏爱情》的表现非常出色，由阿尔利斯·霍华德主演。
back_translation: The performance of "Bad Love" is outstanding, starring Arliss Howard.

text: will god let her fall or give her a new path ?
translation: 上帝会让她跌倒，还是给她一条新路？
back_translation: Will God let her fall, or give her a new path?

text: while it has n't always been smooth sailing , they 've ridden out the rough spots with humor , passion , and wisdom , redefining and reinventing their own version of `` family values . ``
translation: 虽然并非总是一帆风顺，但他们以幽默、热情和智慧度过了艰难时刻，重新定义和 reinvented 自己的“家庭价值观”。
back_translation: Although it was not always smooth sailing, they navigated difficult times with humor, passion, and wisdom, redefining and reinventing their "family values."

text: without [ de niro ] , city by the sea would slip under the waves . he drags it back , single-handed .
translation: 没有[德尼罗]，《海边城市》将会沉入波浪之下。他单枪匹马将它拖回。
back_translation: Without [De Niro], "Seaside City" would sink beneath the waves. He single-handedly pulled it back.

text: jack ( samuel l . jackson ) finds himself being held hostage while the criminals decide what to do with him , and the leader 's beautiful girlfriend , erin ( milla jovovich ) , is left alone to watch jack .
translation: 杰克（塞缪尔·杰克逊）发现自己被劫持，犯罪分子正在决定对他做什么，而头目的美丽女友艾琳（米拉·乔沃维奇）被留下来独自看守杰克。
back_translation: Jack (Samuel L. Jackson) finds himself kidnapped, with the criminals deciding what to do with him, while the beautiful girlfriend of the leader, Erin (Milla Jovovich), is left alone to guard Jack.

text: the film is a contrivance , as artificial as the video games japanese teens play in a nightclub sequence , but it 's an enjoyable one .
translation: 这部电影是一种人工构造，如同日本青少年在夜总会场景中玩的视频游戏一样，但它却是一个令人愉快的作品。
back_translation: This film is an artificial construct, much like the video games that Japanese teenagers play in nightclub scenes, but it is a delightful work.

text: this is scorsese 's finest work , and one of the best films of 2002 .
translation: 这是斯科塞斯的杰作，也是2002年最好的电影之一。
back_translation: This is Scorsese's masterpiece and one of the best films of 2002.

text: having transplanted herself to hawaii with no one 's blessing but her own , anne marie finds all she needs in the adrenaline-charged surf scene . . .
translation: 安妮·玛丽毫无他人祝福，自行移居到夏威夷，她在充满肾上腺素的冲浪场景中找到了她所需的一切……
back_translation: Annie Marie moved to Hawaii without anyone's blessing, and she found everything she needed in the adrenaline-filled surfing scene...

text: patricia mistakes a truck drivers destination and strands in las vegas .
translation: 帕特里夏误解了一名卡车司机的目的地，最终在拉斯维加斯滞留。
back_translation: Patricia misunderstood a truck driver's destination and ended up stranded in Las Vegas.

text: as `` daddy day care `` starts to catch on , it launches them into a highly comedic rivalry with chapman academy 's tough-as-nails director ( anjelica huston ) . . . who has driven all previous competitors out of business .
translation: 随着《爸爸日托》开始流行，它使他们与查普曼学院的坚韧董事（安杰丽卡·休斯顿）展开了一场高度喜剧性的竞争……她已经将所有以前的竞争对手赶出了市场。
back_translation: As "Dad Daycare" begins to gain popularity, it sparks a highly comedic rivalry with the tenacious director of Chapman Academy (Angelica Huston)... who has already driven all previous competitors out of the market.

text: while insomnia is in many ways a conventional , even predictable remake , nolan 's penetrating undercurrent of cerebral and cinemantic flair lends ( it ) stimulating depth .
translation: 虽然失眠在许多方面是一部常规甚至可预测的重拍，但诺兰犀利的智识和电影艺术的深度赋予了它刺激的内涵。
back_translation: Although "Insomnia" is a conventional and even predictable remake in many ways, Nolan's sharp intellect and the depth of his cinematic artistry give it a provocative essence.

text: because of his shame , bobby undergoes a type of 'splitting ' where a decrepit , ghoulish version of him is separated from his healthy self .
translation: 由于他的羞愧，鲍比经历了一种“分裂”，他那破旧、阴森的版本与健康的自我分离开来。
back_translation: Due to his shame, Bobby experienced a kind of "split," where his worn-out, eerie version separated from his healthy self.

text: april burns ( holmes ) invites her family to thanksgiving dinner at her teeny apartment on new york 's lower east side .
translation: 艾普莉尔·伯恩斯（霍尔姆斯）邀请她的家人在纽约下东区她的小公寓里共进感恩节晚餐。
back_translation: April Burns (Holmes) invites her family to Thanksgiving dinner in her small apartment in the Lower East Side of New York.

text: dogville may regret it ever began to bare its teeth . . .
translation: 狗镇可能会后悔自己曾经露出过牙齿……
back_translation: Dog Town might regret having shown its teeth before...

text: but all four are having trouble dealing with it , and steve has a job offer in san francisco .
translation: 但四个人都在努力应对这个问题，而史蒂夫在旧金山有一个工作机会。
back_translation: But the four of them are all working hard to cope with this issue, while Steve has a job opportunity in San Francisco.

text: the life story of the late graham chapman , legendary founding member of monty python .
translation: 已故的格雷厄姆·查普曼的生活故事，他是“蒙提·派森”的传奇创始成员。
back_translation: The life story of the late Graham Chapman, who was a legendary founding member of "Monty Python."

text: forget other scary movies with freaky internet sites , dastardly murderers , ghosts on boats , spooky videotapes , they are n't half as scary as a gothic good old horror film about monsters that live under the bed
translation: 忘掉其他带有怪异网站、卑鄙谋杀者、船上的鬼魂、恐怖录像带的可怕电影，它们远没有一部关于藏在床下的怪物的哥特式经典恐怖电影那么可怕。
back_translation: Forget about other terrible movies featuring weird websites, despicable murderers, ghosts on ships, and terrifying videotapes; they are nowhere near as frightening as a gothic classic horror film about a monster lurking under the bed.

text: ralph 's the kind of guy the nerds stole lunch money from .
translation: 拉尔夫是那种被书呆子抢了午餐钱的人。
back_translation: Ralph is the type of person who gets his lunch money taken by nerds.

text: the rare movie that 's as crisp and to the point as the novel on which it 's based .
translation: 这部罕见的电影与其基础上的小说一样简洁明了。
back_translation: This rare film is as concise and straightforward as the novel it is based on.

text: confuses its message with an ultimate desire to please , and contorting itself into an idea of expectation is the last thing any of these three actresses , nor their characters , deserve .
translation: 将其信息与最终的取悦愿望混淆，并扭曲成一种期望的观念，是这三位女演员及其角色最后应该得到的事情。
back_translation: Confusing this information with the ultimate desire to please and distorting it into a concept of expectation is what these three actresses and their roles ultimately deserve.

text: martian children are captivated by terran television shows which talk about our ole pal , kris kringle .
translation: 火星孩子们被讲述我们老朋友克里斯·金布尔的地球电视节目所吸引。
back_translation: The Martian kids were captivated by the Earth television program of our old friend Chris Kimball.

text: i 'm not sure all about lily chou-chou made sense in my head , but it made sense in my heart .
translation: 我不确定《莉莉白白》的所有内容在我脑海中是否有意义，但在我心中是有意义的。
back_translation: I'm not sure if all the content of "Lily White" makes sense in my mind, but it has meaning in my heart.

text: the directing and story are disjointed , flaws that have to be laid squarely on taylor 's doorstep . but the actors make this worth a peek .
translation: 导演和故事不连贯，这些缺陷必须归咎于泰勒。但演员们让这部作品值得一看。
back_translation: The director and the story are incoherent; these flaws must be attributed to Taylor. However, the performances make this work worth watching.

text: salvagers discover the antonia graza , an italian luxury liner with a dark secret .
translation: 打捞者发现了安东尼亚·格拉扎号，这是一艘有着暗黑秘密的意大利豪华 liner。
back_translation: The salvagers discovered the Anthony Glazer, an Italian luxury liner with dark secrets.

text: the only way to be victorious is one must destroy the other .
translation: 取胜的唯一方法是摧毁对方。
back_translation: The only way to win is to destroy the opponent.

text: the pursuit eventually takes us back to l . a . , where secrets begin to get exposed . . . .
translation: 追逐最终带我们回到洛杉矶，秘密开始浮出水面……
back_translation: Chasing ultimately brings us back to Los Angeles, and secrets begin to surface...

text: the stripped-down approach does give the film a certain timeless quality , but the measured pace and lack of dramatic inflection can also seem tedious .
translation: 这种简化的方法确实赋予了电影某种永恒的品质，但缓慢的节奏和缺乏戏剧性的起伏也可能显得乏味。
back_translation: This simplified approach does give the film a certain timeless quality, but the slow pace and lack of dramatic ups and downs can also come across as tedious.

text: at the end of the worst day of his life , bruce angrily ridicules and rages against god and god responds .
translation: 在他人生中最糟糕的一天结束时，布鲁斯愤怒地嘲笑并对神发怒，而神回应了他。
back_translation: At the end of the worst day of his life, Bruce angrily mocked and vented his fury at God, and God responded to him.

text: the film shows the surreal side of routines that seem simple and ordinary .
translation: 影片展示了看似简单和平常的日常生活的超现实一面。
back_translation: The film showcases the surreal aspect of seemingly simple and ordinary daily life.

text: works both as an engaging drama and an incisive look at the difficulties facing native americans .
translation: 既是一部引人入胜的戏剧，也深刻揭示了美洲原住民面临的困境。
back_translation: It is both an engaging drama and profoundly reveals the challenges faced by Native Americans.

text: johnson has , in his first film , set himself a task he is not nearly up to .
translation: 约翰逊在他首部电影中给自己设定了一个他远远无法胜任的任务。
back_translation: Johnson set himself a task in his first film that he was far from capable of handling.

text: a compelling motion picture that illustrates an american tragedy .
translation: 一部引人注目的电影，展现了一个美国悲剧。
back_translation: A striking film that showcases an American tragedy.

text: it is then an intimate view of the smoldering monochromatic site and the surrounding solitary streets , the ashen outskirts of new york 's financial center , desolate and strewn with debris , the epicenter , a steel moonscape of dresdenesque remains .
translation: 这是一幅亲密的视角，展现了炽热的单色场地和周围孤寂的街道，纽约金融中心的灰烬边缘，荒凉而满地废墟，震中是一个钢铁般的月球景观，满是德累斯顿式的残骸。
back_translation: This is an intimate perspective, showcasing a scorching monochrome landscape and the desolate streets nearby, on the edge of the ashes of New York's financial center, barren and littered with debris, with the epicenter being a steel-like lunar scene, filled with Dresden-style wreckage.

text: it 's her millionaire boss , george wade ( hugh grant ) .

text: no number of fantastic sets , extras , costumes and spectacular locales can disguise the emptiness at the center of the story .

text: in these modern times where phrases like `` two income families `` are the norm , is it wrong for a woman to want to stay home and raise a family ?

text: a comedy about misfits in which a veterinarian becomes involved with a client , whose wife has begun acting like a dog .

text: the film also features the hawaii-born superstars of professional sumo : konishiki , jesse `` takamiyama `` kuhaulua , and akebono ( the first non-japanese to reach the exalted rank of yokozuna , or grand champion ) .

text: sum `` is jack ryan 's `` do-over . `` give credit to everyone from robinson down to the key grip that this bold move works . especially give credit to affleck .
translation: 总结一下，杰克·瑞安的“重来”。要给从罗宾逊到关键抓握的每一个人都给予认可，这一大胆的举措是成功的。尤其要把赞誉给阿弗莱克。

text: four friends sruggling with life meet in the maine woods for their annual hunting trip .

text: majid majidi interviews peasants , soldiers , youngsters , women , elderly and gives a special attention to the children 's extraordinary resilience as they are confronted with the emotional and physical turmoil of war .
translation: 马基德·马吉迪采访了农民、士兵、年轻人、女性和老人，并特别关注儿童在面对战争带来的情感和身体动荡时表现出的惊人韧性。
back_translation: Majid Majidi interviewed farmers, soldiers, young people, women, and the elderly, with a particular focus on the astonishing resilience shown by children in the face of the emotional and physical turmoil brought about by war.

text: jacquot 's rendering of puccini 's tale of devotion and double-cross is more than just a filmed opera . in his first stab at the form , jacquot takes a slightly anarchic approach that works only sporadically .
translation: 雅克的普契尼忠诚与背叛故事的演绎不仅仅是一部电影歌剧。在他首次尝试这一形式时，雅克采取了一种稍显无政府主义的方式，但这种方式的效果仅偶尔奏效。
back_translation: Jacques' interpretation of the story of Puccini's loyalty and betrayal is not just an operatic film. When he first attempted this form, Jacques took a somewhat anarchic approach, but this approach only worked occasionally.

text: when marisa 's true identity is revealed , the two find that they are worlds apart , even though the distance separating them is just a subway ride between manhattan and the bronx .

back_translation: The Erwin family was unharmed, but the fictional shots appeared unrealistic, and the actors' performances were extremely poor.

text: the third , roger corman , flees to the alien countryside where he decides to begin a violent quest to find out the truth behind his mission .
translation: 第三位，罗杰·科曼，逃往外星乡村，在那里他决定开始一场激烈的追求，以揭开自己任务背后的真相。

translation: 但在途中会有一些惊喜……

translation: 涂鸦清除：通过在涂鸦上重新上漆来移除标记和涂鸦的行为。

text: the film was immensely enjoyable thanks to great performances by both steve buscemi and rosario dawson . . .
translation: 这部电影非常令人愉快，得益于史蒂夫·布西密和罗萨里奥·道森的出色表演。。。

text: like leafing through an album of photos accompanied by the sketchiest of captions .
translation: 就像翻阅一本照片集，配上简略的说明。
back_translation: It's like flipping through a photo album, accompanied by brief descriptions.

text: bret packard is the best baseball player in the world .
translation: 布雷特·帕克是世界上最好的棒球运动员。
