text: the iditarod lasts for days - this just felt like it did .
translation: 以代拉罗德犬拉比赛持续了几天——这让我感觉像是一样。
back_translation: The competition with the Dalmatian lasted for several days—this made me feel like it was the same.

text: at the shelter which offers only a two to three month respite from the streets , counselor tony perez ( jack forcinito ) tries to provide guidance to steve and his roommates mike ( demetrius navarro ) and andy ( esteban powell ) .
translation: 在这个仅提供两到三个月避难所的街头庇护所，辅导员托尼·佩雷斯（杰克·福尔西尼托）努力为史蒂夫和他的室友迈克（德梅特里乌斯·纳瓦罗）以及安迪（埃斯特班·鲍威尔）提供指导。
back_translation: In this street shelter that only provides refuge for two to three months, counselor Tony Perez (Jack Folsom) strives to guide Steve and his roommates Mike (Demetrius Navarro) and Andy (Esteban Powell).

text: oscar wilde 's masterpiece , the importance of being earnest , may be the best play of the 19th century . it 's so good that its relentless , polished wit can withstand not only inept school productions , but even oliver parker 's movie adaptation .
translation: 奥斯卡·王尔德的杰作《认真的重要性》可能是19世纪最好的剧作。它如此出色，以至于其毫不妥协、精致的机智不仅能够抵御拙劣的学校演出，甚至还能承受奥利弗·帕克的电影改编。
back_translation: Oscar Wilde's masterpiece "The Importance of Being Earnest" may be the best play of the 19th century. It is so outstanding that its uncompromising, exquisite wit can withstand not only poor school performances but also endure Oliver Parker's film adaptation.

text: but billy 's not into him ^ & # 214 ; he 's in love with sonny , a musician into sm .
translation: 但比利对他没有兴趣，他爱的是索尼，一个喜欢SM的音乐家。
back_translation: But Billy was not interested in him; he was in love with Sony, a musician who liked S&M.

text: together with john connor , it must stop the rise of the machines or all humanity will fall .
translation: 与约翰·康纳一起，必须阻止机器的崛起，否则整 humanity将会陨落。
back_translation: Together with John Connor, we must stop the rise of the machines, or all of humanity will fall.

text: combines improbable melodrama ( gored bullfighters , comatose ballerinas ) with subtly kinky bedside vigils and sensational denouements , and yet at the end , we are undeniably touched .
translation: 结合了不太可能的戏剧性（被刺的斗牛士、昏迷的芭蕾舞者）与微妙的性感床边守夜以及戏剧性的结局，然而在最后，我们无可否认地被打动。
back_translation: Combining unlikely dramatic elements (the stabbed bullfighter, the unconscious ballerina) with subtle sexy bedside vigils and a dramatic ending, we are undeniably moved in the end.

text: a hitchcockian thriller in the spirit of 'rope ' and agatha christie 's 'ten little indians ' that begs the question can murder , if done well , be considered art ?
translation: 一部希区柯克风格的惊悚片，灵感来源于《绳索》和阿加莎·克里斯蒂的《十个印度人》，引发了一个问题：如果谋杀得当，是否可以被视为艺术？
back_translation: A Hitchcock-style thriller inspired by "Rope" and Agatha Christie's "Ten Little Indians," raises the question: if murder is executed perfectly, can it be considered art?

text: with david carradine , theo van gogh , kate clarke and henry jaglom - featuring a soundtrack by grammy nominated composer willie wisely , who also plays the lead character , willie vincent .
translation: 与大卫·卡拉丁、西奥·范·戈赫、凯特·克拉克和亨利·贾格朗合作 - 由格莱美提名作曲家威利·怀斯利创作配乐，他也饰演主角威利·文森特。
back_translation: Collaborating with David Carradine, Theo van Gogh, Kate Clark, and Henry Jaglom - the score is composed by Grammy-nominated composer Willie Wisely, who also stars as the main character, Willie Vincent.

text: ultimately , it ponders the reasons we need stories so much .
translation: 最终，它思考了我们为什么如此需要故事的原因。
back_translation: Ultimately, it contemplated why we have such a need for stories.

text: the deeper john digs , the clearer the mothman 's purpose arises - only to leave his life in immediate danger , as it seems .
translation: 约翰挖得越深，飞蛾人目的越明显——似乎只会让他的生命处于直接危险之中。
back_translation: The deeper John digs, the more obvious the motives of the mothman seem—it's as if it will only put his life in direct danger.

text: the only question . . . is to determine how well the schmaltz is manufactured -- to assess the quality of the manipulative engineering . average , at best , i 'm afraid .
translation: 唯一的问题是……要确定这种炫耀的制造质量——评估这种操控工程的质量。恐怕充其量也只是中等水平。
back_translation: The only problem is... to determine the manufacturing quality of this ostentation - to assess the quality of this engineering manipulation. I'm afraid at best it is just average.

text: an homage to the early 1960s sex comedies that starred rock hudson and doris day .
translation: 向1960年代早期以罗克·哈德森和多丽丝·岱主演的性喜剧致敬。
back_translation: A tribute to the sex comedies featuring Rock Hudson and Doris Day from the early 1960s.

text: when mr . hundert tells us in his narration that 'this is a story without surprises , ' we nod in agreement .
translation: 当亨特先生在叙述中告诉我们“这是一个没有惊喜的故事”时，我们点头表示同意。
back_translation: When Mr. Hunter tells us in the narration that "this is a story without surprises," we nod in agreement.

text: furthermore , he seeks to investigate and confront the powerful elite political and corporate interests fanning this culture for their own unscrupulous gain .
translation: 此外，他试图调查并面对那些为了自身不道德利益而助长这种文化的强大精英政治和企业利益集团。
back_translation: In addition, he attempted to investigate and confront the powerful elite politics and corporate interest groups that foster this culture for their own immoral benefits.

text: ken russell would love this . in one scene , we get a stab at soccer hooliganism , a double-barreled rip-off of quentin tarantino 's climactic shootout M-^W and meat loaf explodes .
translation: 肯·拉塞尔一定会喜欢这个。在一场戏中，我们对足球流氓行为进行了嘲讽，双管齐下地模仿了昆丁·塔伦蒂诺高潮部分的枪战，肉饼也爆炸了。
back_translation: Ken Russell will definitely love this. In one scene, we satirized football hooliganism, simultaneously mimicking the climax gunfight scenes of Quentin Tarantino, and the meat pie exploded too.

text: you can see the would-be surprises coming a mile away , and the execution of these twists is delivered with a hammer . thumbs down .
translation: 你能在远处看到那些潜在的惊喜，且这些转折的执行方式就像用锤子敲打一样。很失望。
back_translation: You can see those potential surprises from a distance, and the execution of these twists is like being hammered down. It's very disappointing.

text: director charles stone iii applies more detail to the film 's music than to the story line ; what 's best about drumline is its energy .
translation: 导演查尔斯·斯通三世对影片的音乐投入了更多的细节，而不是故事情节；《鼓手阵线》最棒的就是它的活力。
back_translation: Director Charles Stone III devoted more attention to the music of the film rather than the storyline; the best thing about "Drumline" is its vitality.

text: always excitable and volatile , jie becomes reckless and dangerous when he has the gun in his hand .
translation: 杰总是情绪激动且多变，当他手中握着枪时，他变得鲁莽而危险。
back_translation: Jie is emotionally volatile and changes quickly; when he holds a gun, he becomes reckless and dangerous.

text: mark hamill plays coroner who begins to doubt that it is a suicide .
translation: 马克·哈米尔饰演一名开始怀疑自杀的法医。
back_translation: Mark Hamill plays a coroner who begins to have doubts about suicide.

text: a refreshing change from the usual whoopee-cushion effort aimed at the youth market .
translation: 与通常面向年轻市场的插屁垫努力相比，这是一种令人耳目一新的变化。
back_translation: Compared to the usual efforts aimed at the young market with butt pads, this is a refreshing change.

text: fans of plympton 's shorts may marginally enjoy the film , but it is doubtful this listless feature will win him any new viewers .
translation: 对普林普顿短片感兴趣的粉丝可能会稍微享受这部电影，但这部无精打采的长片是否能吸引到新的观众还是很难说的。
back_translation: Fans interested in the Plimpton short may enjoy this film to some extent, but it's hard to say whether this lackluster feature will attract new audiences.

text: she 's a brilliant lawyer with a sharp , strategic mind .
translation: 她是一位优秀的律师，拥有敏锐的战略思维。
back_translation: She is an excellent lawyer with sharp strategic thinking.

text: occasionally funny and consistently odd , and it works reasonably well as a star vehicle for zhao .
translation: 偶尔搞笑且 consistently odd，这部作品作为赵的明星载体效果相当不错。
back_translation: Occasionally funny and consistently odd, this work serves as a great vehicle for Zhao's stardom.

text: have you ever met that certain someone that made your heart drop the moment you met ?
translation: 你有没有遇到过那个人，让你在见到他的瞬间心跳加速？
back_translation: Have you ever encountered that person who makes your heart race the moment you see them?

text: however , just as velma 's star fell , so does roxie 's , when go-to-hell kitty arrives at the jail on a multiple murder charge , the press forget roxie and now she and velma are in the same boat .
translation: 然而，就在维尔玛的明星陨落时，罗克西的明星也随之下降，当“去死吧，凯蒂”因多重谋杀指控来到监狱时，媒体忘记了罗克西，而她和维尔玛现在处于同一境地。
back_translation: However, just as Velma's star was declining, Roxie's star also fell. When "Die, Katie" arrived in prison due to multiple murder charges, the media forgot about Roxie, and she and Velma found themselves in the same situation.

text: `` the motorcycle diaries `` is based on the journals of che geuvara , leader of the cuban revolution .
translation: 《摩托车日记》是基于切·格瓦拉的日记，他是古巴革命的领导者。
back_translation: "The Motorcycle Diaries" is based on the diaries of Che Guevara, who was a leader of the Cuban Revolution.

text: after 20 years of exile in paris , gustavo returns to his native city s & # 227 ; o paulo .
translation: 经过20年的巴黎 exile，古斯塔沃回到了他的故乡圣保罗。
back_translation: After 20 years of exile in Paris, Gustavo returned to his hometown of São Paulo.

text: their world comes crashing down after one of the girls is murdered by a blackmail victim .
translation: 她们的世界在其中一个女孩被一个勒索受害者谋杀后崩溃了。
back_translation: Their world collapsed after one of the girls was murdered by a victim of extortion.

text: hey , at least the title of this film lets you know exactly where it 's heading .
translation: 嘿，至少这部电影的标题让你准确地知道它将走向何方。
back_translation: Hey, at least the title of this movie lets you know exactly where it is headed.

text: we see the action of the book as we see kaufman struggle to adapt it into a movie .
translation: 我们在看到考夫曼努力将这部书改编成电影时，感受到了书中的动作。
back_translation: We felt the action in the book when we saw Kaufman working hard to adapt it into a movie.

text: daddy & # 38 ; papa explores the growing phenomenon of gay fatherhood and its impact on american culture .
translation: 《爸爸与父亲》探索了日益增长的同性恋父亲现象及其对美国文化的影响。
back_translation: "Dads and Fathers" explores the growing phenomenon of gay fathers and its impact on American culture.

text: yeah , she 's been hanging with some pretty freaky people and she 's tired of their crazy scene and wants out .
translation: 是的，她和一些非常怪异的人在一起，她对他们疯狂的生活方式感到厌倦，想要离开。
back_translation: Yes, she is with some very strange people, and she is tired of their crazy lifestyle and wants to leave.

text: when they reach la , lucy ( britney spears ) falls in love with ben and against her father 's wishes , she stays and she goes to the audition .
translation: 当他们到达洛杉矶时，露西（布兰妮·斯皮尔斯）爱上了本，并违背父亲的意愿，她决定留下来并参加试镜。
back_translation: When they arrived in Los Angeles, Lucy (Britney Spears) fell in love with Ben and, against her father's wishes, decided to stay and audition.

text: the main theme of this feature- 90 minute film , the exploitation of art for political ideology , is expressed by the personal and ideological conflicts between three artists and their mentors .
translation: 这部90分钟电影的主要主题是艺术在政治意识形态中的剥削，通过三位艺术家与他们的导师之间的个人和意识形态冲突表现出来。
back_translation: The main theme of this 90-minute film is the exploitation of art within political ideology, manifested through the personal and ideological conflicts between three artists and their mentors.

text: chris jones ( malik yoba ) is a strong , independent , black man who finds himself lost on a desolate road .
translation: 克里斯·琼斯（马利克·约巴饰）是一位强大、独立的黑人男性，他发现自己迷失在一条荒凉的道路上。
back_translation: Chris Jones (played by Malik Yoba) is a strong, independent Black man who finds himself lost on a desolate road.

text: as any creature-feature fan knows , when you cross toxic chemicals with a bunch of exotic creatures , you get a lot of running around , screaming and death . on that score , the film certainly does n't disappoint .
translation: 正如任何怪兽电影爱好者所知道的，当你将有毒化学物质与一群奇异生物结合在一起时，你会得到许多奔跑、尖叫和死亡。在这一点上，这部电影确实没有让人失望。
back_translation: As any monster movie enthusiast knows, when you combine toxic chemicals with a group of strange creatures, you get a lot of running, screaming, and death. At this point, the movie definitely does not disappoint.

text: these camps were surrounded by barb wire and guard towers .
translation: 这些营地被铁丝网和哨塔包围。
back_translation: These camps are surrounded by barbed wire and watchtowers.

text: celebrates family in a way that 's deeply felt by the director and screenwriter/subject and no doubt will be shared by viewers of any ethnicity .
translation: 以一种导演和编剧/主题深刻感受到的方式庆祝家庭，无疑会被任何种族的观众所共鸣。
back_translation: Celebrating family in a way that is deeply felt by directors and screenwriters will undoubtedly resonate with audiences of all races.

text: stay clear of reminding yourself that it 's a `` true story `` and you 're likely to have one helluva time at the movies .
translation: 尽量不要提醒自己这是一部“真实故事”，这样你在观看电影时可能会享受得非常愉快。
back_translation: Try not to remind yourself that this is a "true story," as this way you may enjoy watching the movie very much.

text: tsai has a well-deserved reputation as one of the cinema world 's great visual stylists , and in this film , every shot enhances the excellent performances .
translation: 蔡英文在电影界享有应有的声誉，是卓越的视觉风格师，在这部影片中，每一个镜头都提升了卓越的表演。
back_translation: Tsai Ing-wen has a well-deserved reputation in the film industry as an outstanding visual stylist, and in this film, each shot enhances the excellent performances.

text: miller is playing so free with emotions , and the fact that children are hostages to fortune , that he makes the audience hostage to his swaggering affectation of seriousness .
translation: 米勒在情感上表现得如此自由，而孩子们又是命运的俘虏，这使得观众也成为了他那种摆出严肃情态的傲慢假象的俘虏。
back_translation: Miller expresses emotions so freely, while the children are captives of fate, which makes the audience also become captives of his arrogant illusion of seriousness.

text: mi yun and kang have difficulty working with each other , as their personalities and working methods are constantly in conflict .
translation: 米云和康在合作上遇到困难，因为他们的性格和工作方式不断冲突。
back_translation: Mi Yun and Kang encountered difficulties in their collaboration because their personalities and work styles constantly clashed.

text: nicholson 's understated performance is wonderful . as warren he stumbles in search of all the emotions and life experiences he 's neglected over the years .
translation: 尼克尔森低调的表演非常精彩。作为沃伦，他在追寻这些年来忽视的各种情感和生活经历时磕磕绊绊。
back_translation: Nicholson's understated performance is exceptional. As Warren, he stumbles through the various emotions and life experiences that have been overlooked over the years.

text: they come to get afang & # 38 ; xiang , because they were once involved in a war , and they have to testifie .
translation: 他们来找阿芳和湘，因为他们曾经卷入过一场战争，必须作证。
back_translation: They came to find Afang and Xiang because they had been involved in a war and had to testify.

text: this director 's cut -- which adds 51 minutes -- takes a great film and turns it into a mundane soap opera .
translation: 这版导演剪辑版——增加了51分钟——将一部伟大的电影变成了一部平庸的肥皂剧。
back_translation: This director's cut version—adding 51 minutes—turns a great film into a mediocre soap opera.

text: the result is good gossip , entertainingly delivered , yet with a distinctly musty odour , its expiry date long gone .
translation: 结果是好八卦，娱乐性十足，但却带着明显的霉味，早已过了保质期。
back_translation: The result is quite gossipy, full of entertainment, but it carries a明显的霉味 and has long been past its expiration date.

text: the son of the bride 's humour is born out of an engaging storyline , which also is n't embarrassed to make you reach for the tissues . this movie is to be cherished .
translation: 新郎的幽默源于一个引人入胜的情节，同时也毫不害羞地让你拿出纸巾。这部电影值得珍惜。
back_translation: The groom's humor comes from an engaging storyline, while also unapologetically making you reach for a tissue. This film is worth cherishing.

text: frailty is n't as gory or explicit . but in its child-centered , claustrophobic context , it can be just as frightening and disturbing -- even punishing .
translation: 脆弱并没有那么血腥或露骨，但在以儿童为中心、封闭的背景下，它可以同样令人害怕和不安，甚至是惩罚性的。
back_translation: Vulnerability is not so bloody or explicit, but in a child-centered, closed context, it can be equally frightening and unsettling, even punitive.

text: a wedding with stifler orchestrating the correlating social event . . .
translation: 一个由斯蒂夫勒策划的婚礼和相关社交活动……
back_translation: A wedding and related social events planned by Stifler...

text: the problem is he 's trying to be everything he 's not .
translation: 问题是他试图成为他并不是的样子。
back_translation: The problem is that he is trying to be someone he is not.

text: together they travel to england and meet up with chon lin to kill rathbone and get the imperial seal back .
translation: 他们一起前往英格兰，与钟琳会合，杀掉拉特本并夺回皇家印章。
back_translation: They went to England together to meet Zhong Lin, kill Ratburn, and retrieve the royal seal.

text: the determination of pinochet 's victims to seek justice , and their often heartbreaking testimony , spoken directly into director patricio guzman 's camera , pack a powerful emotional wallop .
translation: 皮诺切受害者寻求正义的决心，以及他们常常令人心碎的证词，直接对着导演帕特里西奥·古兹曼的镜头，具有强烈的情感冲击力。
back_translation: The determination of Pinochet's victims to seek justice, along with their often heartbreaking testimonies directed straight at the camera of director Patricio Guzmán, has a strong emotional impact.

text: in this high-school coming of age romantic comedy and with 2 months of summer vacation ahead of them , fresh graduates kiki ( charlene choi ) and kammy ( gillian chung ) swear to look for their first boyfriends and bring them to show their schoolmates at the high school reunion .
translation: 在这部高中成长的浪漫喜剧中，面对两个多月的暑假，刚毕业的琪琪（蔡卓妍）和嘉美（钟欣潼）发誓要寻找她们的第一个男朋友，并在高中同学 reunion 上向同学们展示。
back_translation: In this romantic comedy about high school growth, facing over two months of summer vacation, newly graduated Kiki (Zhou Zhen) and Jiahui (Zhong Xintong) vow to find their first boyfriends and show them off to their classmates at the high school reunion.

text: feels less like a cousin to blade runner than like a bottom-feeder sequel in the escape from new york series .
translation: 感觉更像是《逃出纽约》系列中的一个低劣续集，而不是《银翼杀手》的表亲。
back_translation: It feels more like a poor sequel in the "Escape from New York" series rather than a relative of "Blade Runner."

text: the movie 's gloomy atmosphere is fascinating , though , even if the movie itself does n't stand a ghost of a chance .
translation: 这部电影阴郁的氛围令人着迷，尽管电影本身毫无希望。
back_translation: The movie's gloomy atmosphere is fascinating, even though the film itself is hopeless.

text: a bittersweet drama about the limbo of grief and how truth-telling can open the door to liberation .
translation: 一部关于悲伤的苦乐参半的剧作，探讨了哀悼的停滞状态以及讲真话如何能开启解放之门。
back_translation: A bittersweet play about sadness that explores the stagnant state of mourning and how speaking the truth can open the doors to liberation.

text: this film is difficult to watch for the inhumanity it depicts , but important to see for its factual elements and the reminder of both the difficulty and importance of maintaining one 's humanity .
translation: 这部电影因其描绘的不人道行为而难以观看，但因其真实的元素以及提醒人们保持人性的重要性和艰难性而值得一看。
back_translation: This film is difficult to watch due to its portrayal of inhumane acts, but it is worth seeing for its realistic elements and the way it reminds people of the importance and difficulty of maintaining humanity.

text: hunted by the police and the various mafia groups , they work their way up to the source of this incredible plot to find out who is manipulating them .
translation: 在警方和各个黑帮的追捕下，他们逐步追查这个令人难以置信的阴谋的源头，以找出是谁在操控他们。
back_translation: Under the pursuit of the police and various gangs, they gradually traced the source of this incredible conspiracy to find out who was manipulating them.

text: bears is even worse than i imagined a movie ever could be .
translation: 《熊》的糟糕程度远超过我对电影的想象。
back_translation: The level of misery in "Bear" far exceeds my expectations for the film.

text: dr . akash sinha is a respected neuro surgeon , who too is no less devoted to his professional than his father .
translation: 阿卡什·辛哈博士是一位受人尊敬的神经外科医生，他在专业上对工作的投入不亚于他的父亲。
back_translation: Dr. Akash Sinha is a respected neurosurgeon whose dedication to his profession is on par with that of his father.

text: for anyone who cares about the future of america , it 's required viewing .
translation: 对于关心美国未来的人来说，这是必看的内容。
back_translation: For those who care about the future of the United States, this is a must-watch content.

text: he used to love mitchell allen ( thomas ian nicholas ) before mitchell dumped him for candice ( clare kramer ) .
translation: 他曾经爱过米切尔·艾伦（托马斯·伊恩·尼古拉斯饰），在米切尔为了坎迪斯（克莱尔·克雷默饰）抛弃了他之后。
back_translation: He once loved Mitchell Allen (played by Thomas Ian Nicholas), after Mitchell abandoned him for Candice (played by Claire Kramer).

text: overwhelmed and excited about the big studio adventure ahead of him , alex moves into an apartment with two other up-n'-comings .
translation: 亚历克斯对即将到来的大型工作室冒险感到兴奋和不知所措，他与另外两个正在崭露头角的人一起搬进了公寓。
back_translation: Alex feels excited and overwhelmed about the upcoming big studio adventure, and he has moved into an apartment with two other rising individuals.

text: funny and , at times , poignant , the film from director george hickenlooper all takes place in pasadena , `` a city where people still read . ``
translation: 这部由乔治·希肯卢珀执导的电影幽默而时而感人，全部发生在帕萨迪纳，“一个人们仍然阅读的城市”。
back_translation: This film directed by George Hickenlooper is humorous yet occasionally touching, set entirely in Pasadena, "a city where people still read."

text: far-fetched premise , convoluted plot , and thematic mumbo jumbo about destiny and redemptive love .
translation: 牵强的前提、复杂的情节，以及关于命运和救赎之爱的主题胡言乱语。
back_translation: Forced premises, complex plots, and nonsensical themes about fate and the love of redemption.

text: using everything from closely mic-ed subjects to infrared video standing by yourself gets uncomfortably close to its subjects as they get drunk and high , squander money , rip-off their parents , and get in trouble with pretty much everyone in their paths as a conduit to simply having a good time .
translation: 通过使用近距离麦克风收音的对象和红外视频，独自在一旁，令人不适地靠近那些醉酒、嗑药、挥霍金钱、欺骗父母并与几乎所有人发生冲突的人，他们将这些行为视为单纯享乐的渠道。
back_translation: By using close-range microphones to capture the sound of individuals and infrared video, one finds themselves uncomfortably close to those who are drunk, on drugs, squandering money, deceiving their parents, and clashing with almost everyone, seeing these behaviors merely as avenues for pleasure.

text: before long , the bay boy of bowls is turning the sedate and very english pastime upside down with hysterical results .
translation: 不久之后，这位保龄球年轻人将这项沉稳且非常英式的消遣颠覆，带来了 hysterical 的结果。
back_translation: Soon after, this young bowler would disrupt this calm and very British pastime, leading to hysterical results.

text: poignant and moving , a walk to remember is an inspirational love story , capturing the innocence and idealism of that first encounter .
translation: 感人至深，《温馨之行》是一部鼓舞人心的爱情故事，捕捉了第一次邂逅的纯真与理想主义。
back_translation: Deeply moving, "A Warm Journey" is an inspiring love story that captures the innocence and idealism of a first encounter.

text: mitchell misses the bus and starts walking to school .
translation: 米切尔错过了公交车，开始走路去学校。
back_translation: Mitchell missed the bus and started walking to school.

text: the experiment is supposed to be transported to a prison asteroid , yet manages to escape captain gantu , who was supposed to deliver him there .
translation: 实验本应被运输到一颗监狱小行星，但却成功逃脱了本应将他送到那里的人，甘图船长。
back_translation: The experiment was supposed to be transported to a prison asteroid, but it successfully escaped from the person who was supposed to take it there, Captain Gantu.

text: but santa 's got problems ( he 's even mysteriously losing weight ) and things quickly go south when he finds out that his son , charlie , has landed on this year 's `` naughty `` list .
translation: 但圣诞老人遇到了问题（他甚至神秘地减肥了），当他发现他的儿子查理上了今年的“坏孩子”名单时，一切迅速恶化。
back_translation: But Santa Claus ran into trouble (he even mysteriously lost weight), and things quickly took a turn for the worse when he found out that his son Charlie made this year's "naughty list."

text: like being invited to a classy dinner soiree and not knowing anyone . you leave the same way you came -- a few tasty morsels under your belt , but no new friends .
translation: 就像被邀请参加一个优雅的晚宴聚会，却不认识任何人。你离开时和来的时候一样——肚子里带着几口美味的小吃，却没有交到新朋友。
back_translation: It's like being invited to an elegant dinner party where you don't know anyone. You leave just as you arrived — with a few delicious bites in your stomach but without making any new friends.

text: while the costumes hint at changes beneath the surface , it is abbass ' performance , as she vacillates flawlessly between muted hausfrau and shining hoofer , that reveals the depths of her transformation .
translation: 尽管服装暗示着表面下的变化，但阿巴斯的表演展现了她的蜕变深度，她在柔和的家庭主妇和闪亮的舞者之间无缝切换。
back_translation: Although the clothing suggests changes beneath the surface, Abbas's performance showcases the depth of her transformation as she seamlessly switches between a gentle housewife and a dazzling dancer.

text: the only threat mastermind thief charlie croker ( wahlberg ) never saw coming was a member of his own crew .
translation: 唯一威胁到天才盗贼查理·克罗克（沃尔伯格饰）的，是他自己团队中的一名成员。
back_translation: The only threat to the genius thief Charlie Croker (played by Wahlberg) is a member of his own team.

text: the correspondence between spielrein , freud and jung discovered that day in the geneva basement has become essential to understanding the evolution of psychoanalysis ^ & # 214 ; and the virtually insurmountable challenges facing women who sought to contribute in any role other than that of patient .
translation: 瑞尔、弗洛伊德和荣格之间的通信在日内瓦地下室被发现，这对理解精神分析的发展及女性在寻求以患者以外的任何角色作出贡献时所面临的几乎无法克服的挑战至关重要。
back_translation: The correspondence between Rire, Freud, and Jung was discovered in a basement in Geneva, which is crucial for understanding the development of psychoanalysis and the almost insurmountable challenges faced by women in seeking to contribute in roles beyond that of the patient.

text: the doctor delivers the news that this has been a false pregnancy , one in which the embryo never develops .
translation: 医生传达了消息，这是一场假孕，胚胎从未发育。
back_translation: The doctor conveyed the message that it was a false pregnancy, and the embryo never developed.

text: eagle is facing his own living hell 3 , 000 miles away in new jersey .
translation: 老鹰在新泽西距离他自己的生活地狱有3,000英里。
back_translation: The eagle is 3,000 miles away from its own hell in New Jersey.

text: while there , the elder man falls in love with the mom ( keaton ) .
translation: 在那里，那个老者爱上了妈妈（基顿）。
back_translation: There, the old man fell in love with mom (Keaton).

text: vir , a young man from a rural village , learns on his wedding day that the people whom he thought were his parents ar n't .
translation: 维尔，一个来自农村的年轻人，在他的婚礼当天得知他认为是父母的人并不是他的亲生父母。
back_translation: Weir, a young man from the countryside, learns on his wedding day that the people he believes are his parents are not his biological parents.

text: with rare birds , as with the shipping news before it , an attempt is made to transplant a hollywood star into newfoundland 's wild soil -- and the rock once again resists the intrusion .
translation: 在稀有鸟类的情况下，正如之前的航运新闻一样，试图将好莱坞明星移植到纽芬兰的荒野中——而这片土地再次抵抗了这种侵入。
back_translation: In the case of rare birds, much like previous shipping news, there is an attempt to transplant Hollywood stars into the wilderness of Newfoundland—yet this land has once again resisted such intrusion.

text: abandoned and filled with a mysterious past , holy angel school for girls is about to reveal its secrets of betrayal , jealousy , and vengeance .
translation: 被遗弃并充满神秘过去的圣天使女子学校即将揭示背叛、妒忌和复仇的秘密。
back_translation: The abandoned and mysterious St. Angel Girls' School is about to unveil secrets of betrayal, jealousy, and revenge.

text: the message becomes the savior for `` the country bears , `` an equal parts silly and sweet tale that wears its great big ol ' heart on its grizzly-sized sleeve .
translation: 这个消息成为了“国家熊”的救世主，这是一部既傻乎乎又甜蜜的故事，展现了它那颗大得像灰熊一样的心。
back_translation: This news became the savior of the "National Bear," featuring a story that is both silly and sweet, showcasing its heart that is as big as a grizzly bear.

text: simon calms his prot & # 233 ; g & # 233 ; that genuine happiness only comes from the inside .
translation: 西蒙在安抚他的门徒时说，真正的幸福只有来自内心。
back_translation: Simon said while comforting his disciples that true happiness comes only from within.

text: sandra bullock and hugh grant make a great team , but this predictable romantic comedy should get a pink slip .
translation: 桑德拉·布洛克和休·格兰特是一对出色的搭档，但这部可预见的浪漫喜剧应该被辞退。
back_translation: Sandra Bullock and Hugh Grant make a great pair, but this predictable romantic comedy should be dismissed.

text: probes in a light-hearted way the romantic problems of individuals for whom the yearning for passion spells discontent .
translation: 以轻松的方式探讨那些因为渴望激情而感到不满的个体的浪漫问题。
back_translation: Discuss the romantic issues of individuals who feel discontent due to a longing for passion in a relaxed manner.

text: a girl at a southern baptist high school finds that her pregnancy makes her an outcast .
translation: 一名在南方浸信会高中的女孩发现她的怀孕让她成为了异类。
back_translation: A girl at Southern Baptist High School discovered that her pregnancy made her an outcast.

text: at the age of 25 , tiz is considered a survivor .
translation: 在25岁时，Tiz被认为是一个幸存者。
back_translation: At the age of 25, Tiz is considered a survivor.

text: but katherine holds her back , not to let interfere anything with her successful career .
translation: 但是凯瑟琳阻止了她，不让任何事情干扰她的成功职业生涯。
back_translation: But Catherine stopped her, not allowing anything to interfere with her successful career.

text: the story of trouble every day . . . is so sketchy it amounts to little more than preliminary notes for a science-fiction horror film , and the movie 's fragmentary narrative style makes piecing the story together frustrating difficult .
translation: 《每日烦恼》的故事非常模糊，充其量不过是科幻恐怖电影的初步笔记，而电影的片段叙事风格则使得拼凑这个故事变得异常困难。
back_translation: The story of "Daily Troubles" is very vague, at best just preliminary notes for a science fiction horror film, and the fragmented narrative style of the movie makes piecing together this story exceptionally difficult.

text: with wit and empathy to spare , waydowntown acknowledges the silent screams of workaday inertia but stops short of indulging its characters ' striving solipsism .
translation: 《Waydowntown》以丰富的机智和同理心，承认日常无聊的无声呐喊，但没有沉溺于角色的自我中心追求。
back_translation: "Waydowntown" acknowledges the silent cries of everyday monotony with rich wit and empathy, but does not wallow in the self-centered pursuits of its characters.

text: tom is a charismatic late-night radio talk show host , whose unconventional upbringing has made him a little too quick to fall in love and marry , resulting in three divorces before the age of 40 .
translation: 汤姆是一位富有魅力的深夜广播谈话节目主持人，他非传统的成长经历让他太过迅速地陷入恋爱和结婚，导致他在40岁之前经历了三次离婚。
back_translation: Tom is a charismatic late-night talk show host whose unconventional upbringing led him to fall in love and marry too quickly, resulting in three divorces before the age of 40.

text: philippa is arrested and questioned about her ( supposedly terroristic ) motives .
translation: 菲利帕被逮捕并被审问她（所谓的恐怖主义）动机。
back_translation: Philippa was arrested and questioned about her (so-called terrorism) motives.

text: he wanted to make a difference - but nothing does at downview high .
translation: 他想要有所改变，但在道恩维尤高中没有什么改变。
back_translation: He wants to see some changes, but there are no changes at Dawnview High School.

text: what might 've been an exhilarating exploration of an odd love triangle becomes a sprawl of uncoordinated vectors .
translation: 本可能是对一个奇异爱情三角关系的令人振奋的探索，却变成了不协调矢量的杂乱。
back_translation: What could have been an exhilarating exploration of a peculiar love triangle has turned into a chaotic mishmash of discordant vectors.

text: this may be burns 's strongest film since the brothers mcmullen .
translation: 这可能是伯恩斯自《麦克穆伦兄弟》以来最强的一部电影。
back_translation: This may be Burns' strongest film since "The McMullen Brothers."

text: the parts are better than the whole ( bizarre , funny , tragic - like love in new york ) .
translation: 部分比整体更好（奇怪、搞笑、悲惨 - 就像纽约的爱情）。
back_translation: Part is better than the whole (strange, funny, tragic - just like love in New York).

text: [ davis ] has a bright , chipper style that keeps things moving , while never quite managing to connect her wish-fulfilling characters to the human race .
translation: [达维斯] 具有明亮而愉快的风格，使事情保持进展，但始终未能将她那些愿望成真的角色与人类联系起来。
back_translation: [Davis] has a bright and cheerful style that keeps things moving forward, but has always struggled to connect her characters with the humanity of those wishes.

text: the cast , collectively a successful example of the lovable-loser protagonist , shows deft comic timing .
translation: 这个演员阵容 collectively 是一个成功的可爱失败者主角的范例，展现了敏捷的喜剧时机。
back_translation: This cast is a successful example of a lovable loser protagonist, showcasing agile comedic timing.

text: leela is a film based on the south asian-american experience .
translation: 《莉拉》是一部基于南亚裔美国人经历的电影。
back_translation: "Lila" is a film based on the experiences of South Asian Americans.

text: as he tries to re-discover the family that he abandoned long ago , he is forced to confront the anxieties in his memories - the family he betrayed and abandoned at the expense of his own happiness .
translation: 当他试图重新发现他早已抛弃的家庭时，他被迫面对记忆中的焦虑——他背叛和抛弃的家庭，是以自己的幸福为代价的。
back_translation: When he tried to rediscover the family he had long abandoned, he was forced to confront the anxiety of his memories—the family he betrayed and abandoned, at the cost of his own happiness.

text: enough trivializes an important crisis , reduces it to an almost comic embarrassment .
translation: “足够”将一个重要危机轻描淡写，使其几乎降格为一种滑稽的尴尬。
back_translation: "Enough" downplays an important crisis, reducing it to almost a ridiculous embarrassment.

text: may not have generated many sparks , but with his affection for astoria and its people he has given his tale a warm glow .
translation: 可能没有产生太多火花，但他对阿斯托里亚及其人们的深情使他的故事散发出温暖的光芒。
back_translation: It may not have generated too many sparks, but his deep affection for Astoria and its people gives his story a warm glow.

text: narc is a no-bull throwback to 1970s action films . it zips along with b-movie verve while adding the rich details and go-for-broke acting that heralds something special .
translation: 《告密者》是一部毫不掩飾、回归1970年代动作电影的作品。它以B级电影的活力快速推进，同时加入了丰富的细节和全力以赴的表演，预示着一些特别的东西。
back_translation: "The Informer" is a work that unapologetically returns to the action films of the 1970s. It moves forward with the energy of a B-movie while incorporating rich details and committed performances, hinting at something special.

text: as tricky and satisfying as any of david mamet 's airless cinematic shell games .
translation: 和大卫·马梅特的无空气电影游戏一样复杂且令人满意。
back_translation: As complex and satisfying as David Mamet's airless film games.

text: from the choppy editing to the annoying score to 'special effects ' by way of replacing objects in a character 's hands below the camera line , `` besotted `` is misbegotten
translation: 从跳跃的剪辑到恼人的配乐，再到通过在镜头下方替换角色手中物体的“特效”，《迷恋》实属错误之作。
back_translation: From the jumpy editing to the annoying music, and the "special effects" of replacing objects in the characters' hands from below the camera, "Obsession" is undoubtedly a flawed work.

text: the pink house is a fast-paced , youthful comedy that has been called a sweeter , more intellectual animal house .
translation: 粉色豪宅是一部节奏快速、充满青春气息的喜剧，被称为更甜美、更聪明的动物屋。
back_translation: The Pink Mansion is a fast-paced, youthful comedy described as a sweeter and smarter Animal House.

text: shy tonho dreams of being successful , but misses his family and brazil .
translation: 害羞的托尼梦想着取得成功，但他思念家人和巴西。
back_translation: Shy Tony dreams of success, but he misses his family and Brazil.

text: with a single clue to their whereabouts and nothing to lose , he leaves to find 'his people ' .
translation: 带着一个关于他们下落的线索和一无所失，他出发去寻找“他的人民”。
back_translation: With a clue about their whereabouts and nothing to lose, he set off to find "his people."

text: in the end , egoyan 's enormous talent and mychael danna 's intense score keep ararat interesting and emotional .
translation: 最终，埃戈扬巨大的才华和米歇尔·丹纳的动人配乐使《阿拉拉特》保持了趣味和情感。
back_translation: In the end, Egoyan's immense talent and Michel Danna's touching score kept "Ararat" engaging and emotional.

text: an afterschool special without the courage of its convictions .
translation: 一部缺乏信念勇气的课后特别节目。
back_translation: A special after-school program lacking belief and courage.

text: despite the authenticity of the trappings , the film is overblown in its plotting , hackneyed in its dialogue and anachronistic in its style .
translation: 尽管外表看起来真实，影片的情节却显得过于夸张，台词陈腐，风格又不合时宜。
back_translation: Although it looks realistic on the surface, the plot of the film is overly exaggerated, the dialogue is clichéd, and the style is out of date.

text: despite a quieter middle section , involving aragorn 's dreams of arwen , this is even better than the fellowship . there are scenes of cinematic perfection that steal your heart away .
translation: 尽管中间部分相对平静，涉及阿拉贡对阿尔温的梦境，但这部作品甚至比《护戒使者》更精彩。有一些完美的电影场景会让你心醉神迷。
back_translation: Despite the relatively calm middle section involving Aragorn's dreams of Arwen, this work is even more wonderful than "The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring." There are some perfect movie scenes that will leave you mesmerized.

text: you really have to wonder how on earth anyone , anywhere could have thought they 'd make audiences guffaw with a script as utterly diabolical as this .
translation: 你真的不得不想，任何地方的人怎么会认为用如此完全糟糕的剧本让观众哈哈大笑。
back_translation: You really have to wonder how people anywhere could think that using such a completely terrible script would make the audience laugh.

text: the vitality of the actors keeps the intensity of the film high , even as the strafings blend together .
translation: 演员们的活力使得电影的紧张感依然很高，即使空袭的场景交织在一起。
back_translation: The actors' energy keeps the tension of the film high, even as the air raid scenes intertwine.

text: during that time , evelyn and her brothers suffer the abuses of living in orphanages while desmond struggles to secure finances .
translation: 在那段时间，伊夫琳和她的兄弟们忍受着生活在孤儿院的虐待，而德斯蒙德则在努力筹集资金。
back_translation: During that time, Evelyn and her brothers endured the abuse of living in an orphanage, while Desmond was struggling to raise funds.

text: the discovery of this new world is described parallel to other stories of emancipation , such as that of three young prostitutes , of an aged couple going nowhere and man 's n landing on the moon .
translation: 这一新世界的发现与其他解放故事并行描述，例如三名年轻妓女的故事，一对无处可去的老夫妻，以及人类登月的故事。
back_translation: The discovery of this new world is described alongside other stories of liberation, such as the tales of three young prostitutes, an elderly couple with nowhere to go, and the story of humanity's landing on the moon.

text: an occasionally funny , but overall limp , fish-out-of-water story .
translation: 一个偶尔幽默，但总体上乏力的生存困境故事。
back_translation: A story about a survival predicament that is occasionally humorous, but overall lacks energy.

text: the period -- swinging london in the time of the mods and the rockers -- gets the once-over once again in gangster no . 1 , but falls apart long before the end .
translation: 这个时期——喧闹的伦敦，正值摩托车党和摇滚乐队的时代——在《黑帮老大》中再次被审视，但在结束之前就已经崩溃。
back_translation: This period - the noisy London, which was the era of motorcycle gangs and rock bands - is revisited in "The Godfather," but it collapses before it ends.

text: ben affleck as jack ryan , tom clancy 's intrepid hero ? ridiculous . what 's next ? d . j . qualls as indiana jones ? or tom green as han solo ?
translation: 本·阿弗莱克饰演杰克·瑞安，汤姆·克兰西的不屈英雄？太荒谬了。接下来会是谁？D·J·夸尔斯饰演印第安纳·琼斯？还是汤姆·格林饰演汉·索罗？
back_translation: Ben Affleck plays Jack Ryan, Tom Clancy's indomitable hero? Ridiculous. Who will be next? D.J. Qualls as Indiana Jones? Or Tom Green as Han Solo?

text: in the world of skin deep , not all suspects are created equal .
translation: 在肤浅的世界里，并非所有嫌疑人都是平等的。
back_translation: In a superficial world, not all suspects are created equal.

text: their reporting becomes more compelling when they gather the courage to tell the truth about witnessing two of their peers throw a four-year-old out of a 14th story window .
translation: 当他们鼓起勇气讲述目睹两个同龄人将一个四岁孩子扔出14楼窗外的真相时，他们的报道变得更加引人注目。
back_translation: When they mustered the courage to tell the truth about witnessing two peers throwing a four-year-old child out of a 14th-floor window, their report became even more striking.

text: hellbent on vengence , jason renews his bloodbath in pursuit of personally slaughtering krueger , and anyone else in his path .
translation: 杰森执意复仇，重启他的血腥屠杀，誓言亲手宰杀克虏伯和任何挡在他面前的人。
back_translation: Jason is determined to seek revenge, restarting his bloody massacre, vowing to personally slaughter Krueger and anyone who stands in his way.

text: gradually , will and marcus become friends , and as will teaches marcus how to be a cool kid , marcus helps will to finally grow up .
translation: 渐渐地，威尔和马库斯成为了朋友，威尔教马库斯如何变得酷一点，而马库斯帮助威尔最终成长起来。
back_translation: Gradually, Will and Marcus became friends. Will taught Marcus how to be a bit cooler, while Marcus helped Will ultimately grow up.

text: documentary-style drama showing the events that lead up to the tragic incident on january 30 , 1972 in the northern ireland town of derry when a protest march led by civil rights activist ivan cooper was fired upon by british troops , killing 13 protesters and wounding 14 more .
translation: 以纪录片风格呈现的戏剧，展示了1972年1月30日在北爱尔兰德里镇发生的悲惨事件的经过。当时，由民权活动家伊万·库珀领导的抗议游行遭到英国军队的枪击，导致13名抗议者身亡，另有14人受伤。
back_translation: A drama presented in a documentary style showcases the tragic events that took place on January 30, 1972, in Derry, Northern Ireland. At that time, a protest march led by civil rights activist Ivan Cooper was met with gunfire from the British Army, resulting in the deaths of 13 protesters and injuries to another 14.

text: but even with the two-wrongs-make-a-right chemistry between jolie and burns . . . this otherwise appealing picture loses its soul to screenwriting for dummies conformity .
translation: 但即使在朱莉和伯恩斯之间的“两错造一对”的化学反应下……这部原本颇具吸引力的影片也因屈从于“傻瓜化”写作而失去了灵魂。
back_translation: But even with the "two wrongs make a right" chemistry between Julie and Burns, this originally quite appealing film loses its soul by succumbing to "dumbing down" writing.

text: in its understanding , often funny way , it tells a story whose restatement is validated by the changing composition of the nation .
translation: 在它的理解中，以常常幽默的方式讲述了一个故事，其重新表述通过国家组成的变化而得到验证。
back_translation: In its understanding, a story is told often in a humorous way, and its rephrasing is verified by the changes that make up the nation.

text: though the dutchman is white , he has been found to be a reincarnated king in the west african nation of ghana - his wife 's homeland .
translation: 尽管这个荷兰人是白人，但他被发现是西非国家加纳——他妻子的家乡——的一位转世国王。
back_translation: Although this Dutch man is白人, he was found to be a reincarnated king from the West African country of Ghana—his wife's hometown.

text: how inept is serving sara ? it makes even elizabeth hurley seem graceless and ugly .
translation: 为莎拉服务的能力有多差？甚至让伊丽莎白·赫利看起来也显得笨拙而丑陋。
back_translation: How poor is the ability to serve Sarah? It even makes Elizabeth Hurley look awkward and ugly.

text: money 's tight , relationships are tough and all around us , media and advertising constantly bombard us with competing messages .
translation: 钱紧、关系困难，周围的媒体和广告不断向我们轰炸竞争的信息。
back_translation: Money is tight, relationships are difficult, and the surrounding media and advertising continuously bombard us with information about competition.

text: hard as this may be to believe , here on earth , a surprisingly similar teen drama , was a better film .
translation: 尽管这很难让人相信，但在地球上，一部令人惊讶的相似青少年剧，是一部更好的电影。
back_translation: Although it's hard to believe, on Earth, a surprisingly similar teen drama is actually a better movie.

text: it throws quirky characters , odd situations , and off-kilter dialogue at us , all as if to say , `` look at this ! this is an interesting movie ! `` but the film itself is ultimately quite unengaging .
translation: 它向我们投掷古怪的角色、奇特的情境以及不和谐的对话，仿佛在说：“看看这个！这是一部有趣的电影！”但影片本身最终却显得相当无趣。
back_translation: It throws at us quirky characters, unusual situations, and discordant dialogues, as if saying, "Look at this! This is an interesting movie!" But the film itself ultimately comes off as quite dull.

text: those 24-and-unders looking for their own caddyshack to adopt as a generational signpost may have to keep on looking .
translation: 那些24岁以下的年轻人，寻找可以作为他们一代人标志的自己的高尔夫球场，可能还得继续寻找。
back_translation: Young people under the age of 24, looking for a golf course that can serve as a symbol for their generation, may have to continue searching.

text: first kammy meets the 40-year-old danny ( dave wong ) and falls head over heels .
translation: 首先，卡米遇见了40岁的丹尼（戴夫·王），并一见钟情。
back_translation: First, Karmie met 40-year-old Danny (Dave Wang) and fell in love at first sight.

text: when investigative reporter , chase somete and her team are on a trail of uncovering this organized fight ring , suk is torn between protecting the only family he knows , and defending the person who can bring him down .
translation: 当调查记者谢斯·索梅特和她的团队正在追踪揭露这个有组织的战斗团伙时，苏克在保护自己唯一的家人和捍卫可能将他拉下马的人之间陷入了挣扎。
back_translation: As investigative journalist Jess Sommet and her team were tracking the revelations of this organized fighting gang, Sook found himself torn between protecting his only family and defending against those who might bring him down.

text: you might say tykwer has done all that heaven allows , if you wanted to make as anti-kieslowski a pun as possible . suffice to say its total promise is left slightly unfulfilled .
translation: 你可以说泰克威尔做到了所有天上所允许的，如果你想尽可能制作一个反基耶斯劳斯基的双关语。总之，它的全部承诺略显未能实现。
back_translation: You could say that Techwell has achieved everything that is allowed in the heavens, if you want to create a pun that is as anti-Kieslowski as possible. In short, its entire promise seems slightly unfulfilled.

text: when the young and highly repressive king pentheus discovers that his own mother agave has given herself over to this upstart god of wine and erotic joy , he declares a state of war , despite the very stern warnings of cadmus , the former king and the famed prophet teiresias .
translation: 当年轻且高度压制的国王佩提乌斯发现自己的母亲阿伽薇已经投身于这个崛起的酒神与情色欢乐之中时，他宣布了战争状态，尽管前国王卡德摩斯和著名的先知提瑞西阿斯给予了非常严厉的警告。
back_translation: When the young and highly repressed King Pentheus discovered that his mother Agave had immersed herself in the rising Dionysian revelry and erotic pleasures, he declared a state of war, despite the very stern warnings from the former king Cadmus and the famous prophet Tiresias.

text: a plan to start a parisian salon with a distinctively democratic air brings conflict with her new surroundings and an unusual ally in a country girl raised by pigs .
translation: 一个计划要在巴黎开设一个具有明显民主气息的沙龙，与她的新环境发生冲突，并与一个由猪养大的乡村女孩形成不寻常的联盟。
back_translation: A plan to open a salon in Paris with a distinctly democratic atmosphere clashes with her new environment and forms an unusual alliance with a country girl raised by pigs.

text: boll uses a lot of quick cutting and blurry step-printing to goose things up , but dopey dialogue and sometimes inadequate performances kill the effect .
translation: 博尔使用大量快速剪辑和模糊的逐帧打印来增强效果，但愚蠢的对话和有时不够出色的表演削弱了这种效果。
back_translation: Bohr uses a lot of fast cuts and blurry frame-by-frame printing to enhance the effect, but the silly dialogue and sometimes lackluster performances weaken this effect.

text: just like any other elevator in any old building .
translation: 就像任何老建筑中的其他电梯一样。
back_translation: Just like the other elevators in any old building.

text: `` issaquena `` chronicles the decay of a wealthy mississippi delta family in the 1930 's .
translation: ``Issaquena`` 记录了一户富裕的密西西比三角洲家庭在1930年代的衰落。
back_translation: "Issaquena" chronicles the decline of a wealthy Mississippi Delta family in the 1930s.

text: then one night she surprises her husband frank ( dennis quaid ) having sex with another man , and her tidy world starts spinning out of control .
translation: 然后有一天晚上，她意外发现丈夫弗兰克（丹尼斯·奎德）与另一个男人发生性关系，她原本井然有序的生活开始失控。
back_translation: One night, she unexpectedly discovered her husband Frank (Dennis Quaid) having sex with another man, and her previously orderly life began to spiral out of control.

text: haynes has so fanatically fetishized every bizarre old-movie idiosyncrasy with such monastic devotion you 're not sure if you should applaud or look into having him committed .
translation: 海因斯对每一个奇怪的旧电影特性进行了如此痴迷的迷恋，仿佛是修道士般的虔诚，让人不确定是该鼓掌还是考虑把他送去精神病院。
back_translation: Hines has such an obsessive fascination with every strange characteristic of old movies, almost with a monk-like devotion, that it leaves one unsure whether to applaud or consider sending him to a mental institution.

text: i 'm not a fan of the phrase 'life affirming ' because it usually means 'schmaltzy , ' but real women have curves truly is life affirming .
translation: 我不喜欢“生活肯定”的这个说法，因为它通常意味着“过于感伤”，但《真实女性有曲线》确实是生活肯定的。
back_translation: I don't like the term "life-affirming" because it usually implies being "too sentimental," but "Real Women Have Curves" is indeed life-affirming.

text: with the help of an angry young filmmaker , a russian sound recordist hoping to break into the local film industry , and a seven-foot tall tow truck driver from quebec , he embarks on a comical investigation into . . .
translation: 在一位愤怒的年轻电影制片人的帮助下，一个希望打入当地电影行业的俄罗斯音响录音师，以及一位来自魁北克的七英尺高的拖车司机，他开始了一场滑稽的调查……
back_translation: With the help of an angry young filmmaker, a Russian sound engineer hoping to break into the local film industry, and a seven-foot-tall truck driver from Quebec, he embarks on a hilarious investigation...

text: but when it comes down to it , the one thing stopping you from living your dreams is you .
translation: 但归根结底，阻止你实现梦想的唯一因素就是你自己。
back_translation: But ultimately, the only factor preventing you from achieving your dreams is yourself.

text: pray 's film works well and will appeal even to those who are n't too familiar with turntablism .
translation: 祈祷的电影作品很好，并且将吸引那些对唱片表演不太熟悉的人。
back_translation: The film about prayer is excellent and will attract those who are not very familiar with record performances.

text: when a regular fashion show goes horribly wrong , they are sucked into the nasty but irresistible underworld of bombay .
translation: 当一场常规时装秀糟糕透顶时，他们被卷入了孟买令人厌恶但无法抗拒的阴暗世界。
back_translation: When a regular fashion show goes horribly wrong, they get pulled into the disgusting yet irresistible dark world of Mumbai.

text: they start an in-depth investigation of a doctor chu , who is shin-hyun 's psychiatrist .
translation: 他们开始对朱医生进行深入调查，他是信贤的精神科医生。
back_translation: They began an in-depth investigation into Dr. Zhu, who is Xinxian's psychiatrist.

text: with spy kids 2 : the island of lost dreams , the spy kids franchise establishes itself as a durable part of the movie landscape : a james bond series for kids .
translation: 《间谍孩子2：失落梦想岛》使得间谍孩子系列在电影界稳固了其持久的地位：一个为孩子们打造的詹姆斯·邦德系列。
back_translation: "Spy Kids 2: The Island of Lost Dreams" solidified the Spy Kids series' lasting position in the film industry: a James Bond series designed for children.

text: for the first time in years , de niro digs deep emotionally , perhaps because he 's been stirred by the powerful work of his co-stars .
translation: 多年后，德尼罗首次在情感上深入挖掘，也许是因为他受到了搭档们出色表演的激励。
back_translation: Years later, De Niro delves deeply into emotions for the first time, perhaps inspired by the outstanding performances of his co-stars.

text: the sweetest thing , a romantic comedy with outrageous tendencies , may be a mess in a lot of ways . but it does have one saving grace . a lot of its gags and observations reflect a woman 's point-of-view .
translation: 《最甜蜜的事情》是一部带有荒谬倾向的浪漫喜剧，在很多方面可能有些混乱。但它确实有一个拯救之处，它的许多笑料和观察反映了女性的观点。
back_translation: "The Sweetest Thing" is a romantic comedy with absurd tendencies that may be chaotic in many aspects. However, it does have a saving grace, as many of its jokes and observations reflect a female perspective.

text: adopting the name `` spider-man `` , peter first uses his newfound powers to make money , but after his uncle is murdered at the hands of a criminal peter failed to stop , he swears to use his powers to fight the evil that killed his uncle .
translation: 彼得在采用“蜘蛛人”这个名字后，首先利用他新获得的力量来赚钱，但在他的叔叔被彼得未能阻止的罪犯谋杀后，他发誓要利用自己的力量来与杀死他叔叔的恶势力作斗争。
back_translation: After adopting the name "Spider-Man," Peter initially used his newly acquired powers to make money, but after his uncle was murdered by a criminal that Peter failed to stop, he vowed to use his powers to fight against the evil forces that killed his uncle.

text: he is still famous , although still disliked by snape , malfoy , and the rest of the slytherins .
translation: 他仍然很有名，尽管还是不受斯内普、马尔福和其他斯莱特林的喜欢。
back_translation: He is still very famous, although he is still not liked by Snape, Malfoy, and other Slytherins.

text: sandra bullock , despite downplaying her good looks , carries a little too much ain't- she-cute baggage into her lead role as a troubled and determined homicide cop to quite pull off the heavy stuff .
translation: 桑德拉·布洛克尽管贬低自己的美貌，但在饰演一位烦恼而坚定的谋杀警探时，带着一点过多的“她可爱吧”包袱，未能完全展现更深层次的表现。
back_translation: Sandra Bullock, despite downplaying her beauty, carries a bit of an excessive "isn't she charming" burden when portraying a troubled yet determined murder detective, failing to fully showcase deeper layers of performance.

text: if oscar had a category called best bad film you thought was going to be really awful but was n't , guys would probably be duking it out with the queen of the damned for the honor .
translation: 如果奥斯卡设立一个叫做最佳烂片的奖项，原本以为会非常糟糕但其实并不是，那些家伙可能会和《被诅咒的女王》争夺这个荣誉。
back_translation: If the Oscars established an award for Best Bad Movie, originally thought to be terrible but actually not, those guys might contend for this honor alongside "The Cursed Queen."

text: one of those decades-spanning historical epics that strives to be intimate and socially encompassing but fails to do justice to either effort in three hours of screen time .
translation: 这是一个跨越数十年的历史史诗，努力在亲密感和社会包容性方面取得平衡，但在三个小时的放映时间内未能做到这两点的公正。
back_translation: This is a historical epic spanning decades, striving to achieve a balance between intimacy and social inclusivity, but fails to do justice to both within its three-hour runtime.

text: every moment crackles with tension , and by the end of the flick , you 're on the edge of your seat .
translation: 每个瞬间都充满了紧张感，而到影片结束时，你会感到如坐针毯。
back_translation: Every moment is filled with tension, and by the end of the film, you will feel like you're sitting on a bed of nails.

text: combining historical documentation , personal stories , and interviews with noted experts and legislators , this documentary honors the dildo 's fight for legitimacy and its many admirers .
translation: 结合历史文献、个人故事以及与知名专家和立法者的访谈，这部纪录片尊重阴道情趣用品争取合法地位的斗争及其众多爱好者。
back_translation: Combining historical literature, personal stories, and interviews with renowned experts and lawmakers, this documentary respects the struggle for the legal status of vaginal pleasure products and its many enthusiasts.

text: the film is to be produced by jules , melina 's husband .
translation: 这部电影将由朱尔斯制作，梅琳娜的丈夫。
back_translation: This movie will be produced by Jules, Melina's husband.

text: provides an intriguing look at how the new economy has redrawn class lines in contemporary china .
translation: 提供了一个引人入胜的视角，展示了新经济如何在当代中国重新划定阶级界限。
back_translation: It provides an engaging perspective on how the new economy is redefining class boundaries in contemporary China.

text: a film without surprise geared toward maximum comfort and familiarity .
translation: 一部没有惊喜、旨在最大程度地舒适和熟悉的电影。
back_translation: A film without surprises, aimed at maximizing comfort and familiarity.

text: in other words , it 's just another sports drama/character study . yet this one makes up for in heart what it lacks in outright newness . plus , like i already mentioned . . . it 's robert duvall ! c'mon !
translation: 换句话说，这只是另一部体育剧/人物研究。尽管如此，这部作品在情感上弥补了缺乏新意的不足。此外，正如我已经提到的……这可是罗伯特·杜瓦尔！来吧！
back_translation: In other words, this is just another sports drama/character study. Nevertheless, this work emotionally compensates for the lack of originality. Furthermore, as I have already mentioned... this is Robert Duvall! Come on!

text: he has the wrong blood type to be able to donate one of his kidneys , so he arranges a trade with a group of organ dealers : one of his kidneys , and 10 million won , in return for their finding a kidney for his sister .
translation: 他的血型不适合捐献一个肾脏，因此他与一群器官贩子进行了交易：他将捐出一个肾脏，并支付1000万韩元，以换取他们为他的姐姐找到一个肾脏。
back_translation: His blood type is not suitable for donating a kidney, so he made a deal with a group of organ traffickers: he would donate one kidney and pay 10 million won in exchange for them finding a kidney for his sister.

text: these people , most of whom were american citizens , were taken from their homes and sent to `` relocation `` camps in desolate , isloated areas .
translation: 这些人，大多数是美国公民，被从家中带走，送往位于荒凉、偏僻地区的“安置”营。
back_translation: Most of these people are American citizens who were taken from their homes and sent to "relocation" camps in desolate and remote areas.

text: a bit too derivative to stand on its own as the psychological thriller it purports to be .
translation: 有点过于模仿，无法独立成为它自称的心理惊悚片。
back_translation: It is a bit too imitative and cannot independently become the psychological thriller it claims to be.

text: in the throes of falling for one another , they are soon forced to deal with the bitter realities of their lives prior to that chance encounter .
translation: 在相互爱慕的过程中，他们很快就被迫面对在那次偶遇之前生活的痛苦现实。
back_translation: In the process of mutual affection, they were soon forced to confront the painful reality of life before that fateful encounter.

text: while soderbergh succeeds in recapturing the themes and mood of tarkovsky 's version , he also brings with them a cold , emotionless sheen , a detached air that defeats his efforts to truly engage us .
translation: 虽然索德伯格成功地重新捕捉到了塔可夫斯基版本的主题和氛围，但他同时也带来了冷漠无情的光泽和一种超然的气息，这使得他真正吸引我们的努力受到挫败。
back_translation: Although Soderbergh successfully re-captured the themes and atmosphere of Tarkovsky's version, he also brought a cold, merciless sheen and a detached air that undermined his effort to truly engage us.

text: its purpose is to use the precog ( nitive ) potential of three genetically altered humans to prevent murders .
translation: 它的目的是利用三个基因改造人类的预知（认知）潜能来防止谋杀。
back_translation: Its purpose is to use three genes to enhance human precognitive (cognitive) potential to prevent murder.

text: every so often a movie comes along that confirms one 's worse fears about civilization as we know it . the new guy is one of them .
translation: 时不时会出现一部电影，让人确认对我们所知文明的最糟糕担忧。《新家伙》就是其中之一。
back_translation: Every now and then, a movie appears that confirms our worst fears about the civilization we know. "The New Guy" is one of them.

text: director kevin bray excels in breaking glass and marking off the `` miami vice `` checklist of power boats , latin music and dog tracks . he does n't , however , deliver nearly enough of the show 's trademark style and flash .
translation: 导演凯文·布雷擅长打破常规，并完成“迈阿密风云”中权力快艇、拉丁音乐和赛狗场的清单。然而，他并没有传递出足够多该节目标志性的风格和华丽感。
back_translation: Director Kevin Bray excels at breaking the norm and completes the checklist of power boats, Latin music, and dog racing in "Miami Vice." However, he does not convey enough of the iconic style and glamour that the program is known for.

text: unlike most anime , whose most ardent fans outside japan seem to be introverted young men with fantasy fetishes , metropolis never seems hopelessly juvenile .
translation: 与大多数动漫不同的是，外在日本的狂热粉丝往往是具有幻想癖好的内向年轻男性，而《大都会》似乎从未显得无望地幼稚。
back_translation: Unlike most anime, which often attract introverted young men with fantasy obsessions outside of Japan, "Metropolis" never seems hopelessly childish.

text: guzman 's powerful and sometimes triumphant documentary is not only an excellent overview of the affair , but serves as the perfect finale to the monumental trilogy about the coup and its aftermath .
translation: 古兹曼的这部强有力且时而令人振奋的纪录片不仅是对这一事件的优秀概述，还作为关于政变及其后果的宏大三部曲的完美结尾。
back_translation: Guzmán's powerful and at times uplifting documentary is not only an excellent overview of the event, but also serves as a perfect conclusion to the grand trilogy about the coup and its consequences.

text: none of this is meaningful or memorable , but frosting is n't , either , and you would n't turn down a big bowl of that , would you ?
translation: 这些都没有意义，也不值得记住，但糖霜也一样，你不会拒绝一大碗糖霜，对吧？
back_translation: These things are meaningless and not worth remembering, but the same goes for icing; you wouldn't refuse a big bowl of icing, right?

text: torn between the divine and the carnal , the righteous and the unjust , father amaro must summon his strength to choose which life he will lead .
translation: 在神圣与肉体、正义与邪恶之间挣扎，阿马罗神父必须召唤他的力量来选择他将过哪种生活。
back_translation: Struggling between the sacred and the physical, between justice and evil, Father Amaro must summon his strength to choose the life he will lead.

text: over the next few days , united by nothing more than their common suffering , the two young women form an unlikely friendship to cope with the tragic events that threaten to overwhelm them .
translation: 在接下来的几天里，两位年轻女性因共同的痛苦而团结在一起，形成了一段不太可能的友谊，以应对那些威胁要淹没她们的悲惨事件。
back_translation: In the coming days, two young women bond together over their shared suffering, forming an unlikely friendship to cope with the tragic events that threaten to overwhelm them.

text: bigelow handles the nuclear crisis sequences evenly but milks drama when she should be building suspense , and drags out too many scenes toward the end that should move quickly .
translation: 比格罗在处理核危机的情节时保持了均衡，但在应该营造悬念时却过于渲染戏剧性，并且在结尾时拉长了太多应该快速推进的场景。
back_translation: Bigelow maintained a balance in handling the nuclear crisis plot, but over-dramatized moments that should have built suspense, and excessively prolonged scenes that needed to progress quickly at the end.

text: i 'm not exactly sure what this movie thinks it is about .
translation: 我不太确定这部电影认为它是关于什么的。
back_translation: I'm not quite sure what this movie thinks it's about.

text: this is the kind of movie that used to be right at home at the saturday matinee , and it still is .
translation: 这部电影曾经是周六下午场的经典之作，现在仍然如此。
back_translation: This movie was once a classic for Saturday afternoon screenings, and it still is.

text: femme fatale is not the director 's best work ever , but it is as good as we 've seen him be in much too long a time .
translation: 《致命女人》并不是导演迄今为止最好的作品，但在我们很长时间没有看到他如此优秀的表现时，这部电影的水准还算不错。
back_translation: "Fatal Women" is not the director's best work to date, but given that it has been a long time since we've seen such a strong performance from him, the quality of this film is quite good.

text: if you grew up on scooby -- you 'll love this movie . matthew lillard is born to play shaggy !
translation: 如果你是看《史酷比》长大的，你一定会喜欢这部电影。马修·利拉德就是天生适合饰演沙吉！
back_translation: If you grew up watching Scooby-Doo, you will definitely love this movie. Matthew Lillard is born to play Shaggy!

text: throwing caution to the wind with an invitation to the hedonist in us all , nair has constructed this motion picture in such a way that even the most cynical curmudgeon with find himself or herself smiling at one time or another .
translation: 在向我们内心的享乐主义者发出邀请时，奈尔不顾一切地制作了这部电影，以至于即使是最愤世嫉俗的乖戾者也会在某个时刻露出微笑。
back_translation: In inviting the hedonist within us, Niall made this film with such abandon that even the most cynical curmudgeon will crack a smile at some point.

text: during the course of a single day all three will be faced with the difficult choice of choosing which path they will go down in life .
translation: 在一天的过程中，三个人都将面临艰难的选择，决定他们将走哪条人生道路。
back_translation: During the course of one day, all three individuals will face difficult choices that will determine which path they will take in life.

text: equilibrium the movie , as opposed to the manifesto , is really , really stupid .
translation: 《平衡》这部电影，与宣言相比，真的是非常非常愚蠢。
back_translation: The movie "Balance" is truly very, very stupid compared to the declaration.

text: a limp eddie murphy vehicle that even he seems embarrassed to be part of .
translation: 一部平淡无奇的艾迪·墨菲电影，连他自己似乎都为参与其中而感到尴尬。
back_translation: A dull and unremarkable Eddie Murphy movie, which even he seems to feel embarrassed to be a part of.

text: it 's hard to tell with all the crashing and banging where the salesmanship ends and the movie begins .
translation: 很难分清在所有的碰撞和喧嚣中，推销技巧到哪里结束，电影又从哪里开始。
back_translation: It is hard to distinguish where the sales techniques end and the movie begins amidst all the collisions and noise.

text: amidst the la-freaks , hollywood wannabes , and outrageous gym culture of los angeles , the now determined bodybuilder struggles to preserve an integrity of the mind , body , and spirit that is so apparently void in this strange new land .
translation: 在洛杉矶的花哨怪异、怀有好莱坞梦的人们，以及极端的健身文化中，如今坚定的健美运动员努力保持心灵、身体与精神的完整性，而这在这个奇怪而新颖的地方显得如此明显地缺失。
back_translation: In the flashy and eccentric atmosphere of Los Angeles, where people harbor Hollywood dreams alongside an extreme fitness culture, dedicated bodybuilders today strive to maintain the integrity of their minds, bodies, and spirits, which seems so evidently lacking in this strange and novel place.

text: sitting through the last reel ( spoiler alert ! ) is significantly less charming than listening to a four-year-old with a taste for exaggeration recount his halloween trip to the haunted house .
translation: 坐在最后一卷（剧透警告！）显得远不如听一个四岁的孩子夸张地讲述他去鬼屋的万圣节之旅那么有趣。
back_translation: Sitting through the last volume (spoiler alert!) is nowhere near as interesting as listening to a four-year-old exaggerate about their Halloween trip to a haunted house.

text: with a little money , they set out on the road with a guy named ben .
translation: 他们带着一点钱，和一个叫本的家伙一起上路。
back_translation: They set out with a little money and a guy named Ben.

text: an absorbing trip into the minds and motivations of people under stress as well as a keen , unsentimental look at variations on the theme of motherhood .
translation: 一次引人入胜的旅行，探索在压力下人们的心智和动机，同时对母性主题的变奏进行了敏锐而不感情用事的观察。
back_translation: An engaging journey that explores the minds and motivations of people under pressure, while also providing a keen and unsentimental observation of the variations on the theme of motherhood.

text: while this one gets off with a good natured warning , future lizard endeavors will need to adhere more closely to the laws of laughter
translation: 虽然这一项以善意的警告开始，但未来的蜥蜴努力将需要更严格地遵循笑声的法则。
back_translation: Although this started as a good-natured warning, future efforts of the lizards will need to adhere more strictly to the rules of laughter.

text: carrying this wafer-thin movie on his nimble shoulders , chan wades through putrid writing , direction and timing with a smile that says , 'if i stay positive , maybe i can channel one of my greatest pictures , drunken master . '

back_translation: Carrying this paper-thin film on his flexible shoulders, Jackie Chan explores with a smile amidst the rotten script, director, and timing, as if his smile says, "If I stay positive, maybe I can recreate one of my greatest films, 'Drunken Master.'"

text: a man ( phillipe ) awakens in a hospital not recalling the last two years as he begins to find out things from his past he discovers his ability to move from the year 2002 to the year 1999 .

translation: 寻求一种可以融入他的仿生眼中的微型摄像头，以便他能够秘密拍摄他所见的一切，这位导演探索可能实现这一目标的未来科技，同时回顾自己过去的几章。

translation: 如果这部电影让你感到冷静，它也会让你陷入有趣的沉思。

translation: 她的父亲发明了世界全景图供当局使用，但遭到了拒绝。

text: hey arnold ! the movie is what happens when you blow up small potatoes to 10 times their natural size , and it ai n't pretty .

text: it 's pretty linear and only makeup-deep , but bogdanovich ties it together with efficiency and an affection for the period .

text: throughout the day 's move , their two very different groups of friends tangle in conflicts and romance while august tries to figure out who he really wants before it 's too late .

text: `` frida `` is a good film that has some brilliant moments of artistry throughout .

text: a domestic melodrama with weak dialogue and biopic cliches .

text: claire is a terrific role for someone like judd , who really ought to be playing villains .

text: ice age posits a heretofore unfathomable question : is it possible for computer-generated characters to go through the motions ?
translation: 《冰河世纪》提出了一个前所未有的问题：计算机生成的角色是否有可能表现出真实的动作？

text: a time machine , a journey back to your childhood , when cares melted away in the dark theater , and films had the ability to mesmerize , astonish and entertain .
translation: 一个时间机器，一次回到你童年的旅程，当忧虑在黑暗的影院中融化，电影能够令人着迷、惊奇和娱乐。

text: he is reluctant to help at first because he is wearing his friend kumin 's shoes and does n't want it to be dirty .

text: the irony is that this film 's cast is uniformly superb ; their performances could have -- should have -- been allowed to stand on their own .
translation: 讽刺的是，这部电影的演员阵容都是出色的；他们的表演本可以——应该可以——单独展示。

text: an uncomfortable movie , suffocating and sometimes almost senseless , the grey zone does have a center , though a morbid one .
