back_translation: An uncomfortable movie, suffocating, sometimes almost meaningless, but "The Grey Zone" does have a center, albeit a morbid one.

text: when a stranger stumbles in to their camp disoriented mumbling things about lights in the sky the four friends put in a struggle with a psychotic army colonel and a being that has taken control of one of their minds .
translation: 当一个陌生人迷失方向、喃喃自语着关于天空中光点的事情闯入他们的营地时，四个朋友与一位疯狂的军 Colonel 以及一个控制了他们其中一人的思维的存在展开了斗争。
back_translation: When a stranger, lost and mumbling about the points of light in the sky, stumbles into their camp, four friends begin a struggle against a crazy military colonel and a presence that has taken control of one of them.

text: the biggest problem i have ( other than the very sluggish pace ) is we never really see her esther blossom as an actress , even though her talent is supposed to be growing .
translation: 我最大的问题（除了节奏非常缓慢之外）是我们从未真正看到她作为演员的埃丝特·布拉索姆的成长，尽管她的才华应该在不断提升。
back_translation: My biggest problem (aside from the very slow pace) is that we never really see Esther Blasom grow as an actress, even though her talent should be continuously improving.

text: the remaining friends must now rescue the captives , while desperately trying to avoid the long arm of the law .
translation: 剩下的朋友们现在必须营救被捕者，同时竭尽全力避免法律的制裁。
back_translation: The remaining friends must now rescue the captured ones while doing everything possible to avoid legal penalties.

text: it is intensely personal and yet -- unlike quills -- deftly shows us the temper of the times .
translation: 这极具个人色彩，但又与羽毛笔不同，灵巧地展示了时代的气息。
back_translation: This is very personal in style, yet different from a feather pen, skillfully showcasing the spirit of the era.

text: 'bloody magic ' is the story of zack , an eleven year old school boy , who 's family is visited by three debt collectors .
translation: 《血腥魔法》是一个关于扎克的故事，他是一名11岁的学生，他的家庭被三个债务追收者拜访。
back_translation: "Bloody Magic" is a story about Zach, an 11-year-old student whose family is visited by three debt collectors.

text: an overstylized , purM-ied mM-ilange of sex , psychology , drugs and philosophy . sometimes entertaining , sometimes indulgent -- but never less than pure wankery .
translation: 一种过度风格化、混合了性、心理学、药物和哲学的作品。有时令人娱乐，有时沉迷，但绝不低于纯粹的自我陶醉。
back_translation: A work that is overly stylized, blending sexuality, psychology, drugs, and philosophy. Sometimes entertaining, sometimes addictive, but never falling below pure self-indulgence.

text: he follows them into a cave with a mysterious blue light and it turns out he is following h . g . wells , who , in turn , is on a time travel chase of dr . noah , a brilliant scientist who has gone mad with the intentions on destroying the world .
translation: 他跟随他们进入一个散发神秘蓝光的洞穴，结果发现他跟随的是赫伯特·乔治·威尔斯，而威尔斯实际上正在追踪诺亚博士，这位疯狂的杰出科学家意图摧毁世界。
back_translation: He followed them into a cave that emitted a mysterious blue light, only to find that he was following Herbert George Wells, who was actually tracking Dr. Noah, the mad yet distinguished scientist intent on destroying the world.

text: based on nicole valery-grossu 's european best seller autobiographic novel `` bless you , prison `` , the film is a true story , with real events and characters .
translation: 根据尼科尔·瓦莱里-格罗苏的欧洲畅销自传小说《祝福你，监狱》，这部电影是一个真实的故事，包含真实的事件和人物。
back_translation: Based on Nicole Valéry-Grossu's bestselling autobiographical novel "Bless You, Prison," this film is a true story that includes real events and characters.

text: in the year 2009 , a new drug known as blood heat is developed .
translation: 在2009年，一种名为“血热”的新药被开发出来。
back_translation: In 2009, a new drug called "Blood Heat" was developed.

text: partnered with the sassy , stunning sistah girl , our hero must first undergo the ultimate attitude adjustment and trade in his 'fro and platforms for tennis sweaters and penny loafers .
translation: 与那位风趣、迷人的姐妹女孩合作，我们的英雄必须首先经历终极态度调整，将他的卷发和高跟鞋换成网球毛衣和便士鞋。
back_translation: With the help of that witty and charming sister girl, our hero must first undergo the ultimate attitude adjustment, trading his curly hair and high heels for a tennis sweater and penny loafers.

text: no earth-shattering accomplishment , but an unusually smart movie that the whole family can go to without a single person getting bored or talked down to .
translation: 并没有震撼世界的成就，但这是一部异常聪明的电影，适合全家人一起观看，没有一个人会感到无聊或被冷落。
back_translation: It may not be a world-shattering achievement, but it is an exceptionally smart movie that is suitable for the whole family to watch together; no one will feel bored or neglected.

text: it 's fun , but the code-talk will fly right over everyone 's head
translation: 这很有趣，但代码语言会让每个人都听不懂。
back_translation: This is very interesting, but the programming language will make it hard for everyone to understand.

text: a bored secretary in the holiday firm funtime inc spends her time looking after the plants around her .
translation: 一位在假期公司Funtime Inc工作的无聊秘书，花时间照顾她周围的植物。
back_translation: A bored secretary working at Funtime Inc during her vacation spends time taking care of the plants around her.

text: handsome and sincere but slightly awkward in its combination of entertainment and evangelical boosterism .
translation: 英俊而真诚，但在娱乐与福音宣传的结合上略显笨拙。
back_translation: Handsome and sincere, but somewhat clumsy in the combination of entertainment and gospel promotion.

text: a film that perfectly distills the relationship between pop music and teens searching for identity .
translation: 一部完美提炼流行音乐与寻求自我认同的青少年之间关系的电影。
back_translation: A movie that perfectly captures the relationship between pop music and a teenager's quest for self-identity.

text: but after he 's done his `` day job `` matt takes on a secret identity as `` the man without fear , `` daredevil , the masked avenger that patrols the neighborhood of hell 's kitchen and new york city to combat the injustice that he can not tackle in the courtroom .
translation: 但在完成他的“日常工作”后，马特化身为“无畏者”，恶棍，那个在地狱厨房和纽约市巡逻的蒙面复仇者，去对抗他在法庭上无法处理的不公正。
back_translation: But after completing his "daily work," Matt transforms into the "Daredevil," a villain, the masked avenger patrolling Hell's Kitchen and New York City, fighting against the injustices he cannot address in court.

text: set in 1960 's sydney , this is the story of an australian gangster whose booming business , buoyed by the influx of u . s . soldiers in town for r & # 38 ; r during their tours in vietnam , attracts the attention of first the chicago mafia , and then their east coast competitors .
translation: 故事设定在1960年代的悉尼，讲述了一位澳大利亚黑帮分子的故事。他的生意蓬勃发展，受到到镇上休假美国士兵涌入的推动，这引起了首先是芝加哥黑手党的注意，随后是他们东海岸的竞争对手。
back_translation: The story is set in 1960s Sydney and tells the tale of an Australian gangster. His business is thriving, driven by the influx of American soldiers on leave in town, which first attracts the attention of the Chicago Mafia, followed by their East Coast competitors.

text: prey for rock & # 38 ; roll is the story of jacki and her all-girl rock and roll band , clam dandy , who are trying to make it in the la club scene of the late 1980 's .
translation: 《为摇滚祈祷》讲述了杰基和她的全女子摇滚乐队Clam Dandy的故事， 他们试图在1980年代末的洛杉矶俱乐部场景中闯出一片天地。
back_translation: "Praying for Rock and Roll" tells the story of Jackie and her all-female rock band, Clam Dandy, as they try to make a name for themselves in the Los Angeles club scene of the late 1980s.

text: meanwhile , a sith lord orchestrates events between the forces of good and evil , all the while waiting to play the final move that will ensure him control of the galaxy .
translation: 与此同时，一位西斯领主在善与恶的力量之间策划事件，一直在等待着下最后一招，以确保他对银河系的控制。
back_translation: Meanwhile, a Sith Lord is orchestrating events between the forces of good and evil, patiently waiting to make the final move to ensure his control over the galaxy.

text: nick , a district attorney investigating the most recent case , a suspicious apparent suicide , and her interviews with friends and family of the deceased trigger extensive and intricately interwoven flashbacks that reveal surprising facts about the man 's life and death .
translation: 尼克，一名地区检察官，正在调查最近的案件——一起可疑的显性自杀。她与死者的朋友和家人的访谈引发了广泛且错综复杂的闪回，揭示了关于这个人在生与死之间令人惊讶的事实。
back_translation: Nick, a district attorney, is investigating a recent case - a suspicious apparent suicide. Her interviews with the deceased's friends and family evoke a wide-ranging and intricate series of flashbacks, revealing surprising facts about this person between life and death.

text: there 's a wickedly subversive bent to the best parts of birthday girl .
translation: 《生日女孩》的最佳部分带有一种恶作剧般的颠覆性倾向。
back_translation: The best part of "Birthday Girl" has a mischievous subversive tendency.

text: in their own words , and not a moment too soon - 'broadway ' tells the stories of our theatrical legends , how they came to new york , and how they created this legendary century in american theatre .
translation: 用他们自己的话来说，不再迟疑——《百老汇》讲述了我们的戏剧传奇人物的故事，他们是如何来到纽约，以及他们如何在美国戏剧史上创造了这个传奇的世纪。
back_translation: In their own words, without hesitation—"Broadway" tells the story of our theatrical legends, how they came to New York, and how they created this legendary century in the history of American theater.

text: schnieder bounces around with limp wrists , wearing tight tummy tops and hip huggers , twirling his hair on his finger and assuming that 's enough to sustain laughs . . .
translation: 施耐德摇曳着松弛的手腕，穿着紧身的肚子上衣和低腰裤，指间旋转着头发，自以为这就足以引人发笑……
back_translation: Schneider swayed his relaxed wrist, wearing a tight belly top and low-rise pants, spinning his hair between his fingers, thinking that this was enough to make people laugh...

text: nicholas , his sister and mother venture to london to seek help from their uncle ralph , but ralph 's only intentions are to separate the family and exploit them .
translation: 尼古拉斯、他的妹妹和母亲前往伦敦寻求他们叔叔拉尔夫的帮助，但拉尔夫的唯一意图是分离这个家庭并利用他们。
back_translation: Nicholas, his sister, and mother went to London to seek help from their uncle Ralph, but Ralph's only intention was to tear the family apart and exploit them.

text: then , grace lets us in on the secret of their marriage , and how she is able to keep communication front and center in their relationship .
translation: 然后，格蕾丝告诉我们他们婚姻的秘密，以及她是如何保持沟通在他们关系中的重要性。
back_translation: Then, Grace told us the secret of their marriage and how she maintains the importance of communication in their relationship.

text: by the time you reach the finale , you 're likely wondering why you 've been watching all this strutting and posturing .
translation: 等你看到最后一幕时，你可能会想，为什么要看这么多炫耀和摆姿势。
back_translation: When you see the last scene, you might wonder why you watched so much boasting and posturing.

text: bret has an idea that will push them both across lines they 'd never seriously considered crossing .
translation: 布雷特有一个想法，能够推动他们两个跨越他们从未认真考虑过的界限。
back_translation: Brett has an idea that could push both of them across boundaries they had never seriously considered before.

text: with some encouragement from tom ( paul bettany ) , the self-appointed town spokesman , the little community agrees to hide her and in return , grace agrees to work for them .
translation: 在汤姆（保罗·贝坦尼饰）的一些鼓励下，自任城镇发言人的小社区同意藏匿她，作为交换，格蕾丝同意为他们工作。
back_translation: With some encouragement from Tom (played by Paul Bettany), a small community that has appointed itself as the town's spokesperson agrees to hide her, in exchange for which Grace agrees to work for them.

text: ramu stands in and repeats the wisdom of sharonna , freeing the mind of the posh guests and attracting lexi to him .
translation: 拉穆站出来，重复了莎朗娜的智慧，解放了高档客人的思想，并吸引了莱克西。
back_translation: Lamu stood up, echoed Sharona's wisdom, liberated the thoughts of the upscale guests, and attracted Lexi.

text: neil burger here succeeded in . . . making the mystery of four decades back the springboard for a more immediate mystery in the present .
translation: 尼尔·伯杰在这里成功地将四十年前的谜团作为当前更紧迫谜团的跳板。
back_translation: Neil Berger successfully uses the mystery from forty years ago as a springboard for the more urgent mystery of the present.

text: director yu seems far more interested in gross-out humor than in showing us well-thought stunts or a car chase that we have n't seen 10 , 000 times .
translation: 于导演似乎对恶搞幽默更感兴趣，而不是展示我们未曾看到过一万次的精心设计特技或追车场面。
back_translation: The director seems more interested in parody humor rather than showcasing meticulously designed stunts or chase scenes that we have seen a thousand times before.

text: patricia confides to her good-hearted maid maria ( theresa saldana ) , that she is convinced that her husband already waits for her in 'shangri-la ' , the fabulous get-away-paradise where she will fulfill her infinite happiness of a family .
translation: 帕特里夏向她的善良女佣玛利亚（特雷莎·萨尔达纳）倾诉，认为她的丈夫已经在“香格里拉”等待她，这个神奇的度假天堂将实现她无尽的家庭幸福。
back_translation: Patricia confided in her kind maid Maria (Teresa Saldana), believing that her husband was waiting for her in "Shangri-La," a magical resort paradise that would fulfill her endless family happiness.

text: what full frontal lacks in thematic coherence it largely makes up for as loosey-goosey , experimental entertainment . still , i 'm not quite sure what the point isM-^E
translation: 《全裸正面》在主题的一致性上有所欠缺，但在松散、实验性的娱乐性上弥补了这一点。不过，我还是不太明白它的要点是什么。
back_translation: "Full Frontal" lacks consistency in its themes, but it compensates for this with loose, experimental entertainment value. However, I still don't quite understand what its main point is.

text: the jokes are sophomoric , stereotypes are sprinkled everywhere and the acting ranges from bad to bodacious .
translation: 笑话幼稚，刻板印象处处可见，表演从糟糕到极端不凡。
back_translation: The jokes are childish, stereotypes are everywhere, and the performances range from terrible to extremely exceptional.

text: the crew of the enterprise ( picard and company ) find themselves on planet romulus and eventually discover a threat to the earth .
translation: 企业号的船员（皮卡德和团队）发现自己在罗姆ulus星球，并最终发现对地球的威胁。
back_translation: The crew of the Enterprise (Picard and the team) finds themselves on the planet Romulus and ultimately discovers a threat to Earth.

text: he has been hired by an american known only as `` wall street `` ( see rule two ) to make a delivery , but when frank stops along route , he notices his `` package `` is moving .
translation: 他被一个只知道名为“华尔街”的美国人雇佣去送货，但当弗兰克在途中停下来时，他注意到他的“包裹”在动。
back_translation: He was hired by an American who only goes by the name "Wall Street" to deliver a package, but when Frank stopped along the way, he noticed that his "package" was moving.

text: the only thing that matters for him is break dancing .
translation: 对他来说，唯一重要的就是霹雳舞。
back_translation: For him, the only thing that matters is breakdancing.

text: heaven is a haunting dramatization of a couple 's moral ascension .
translation: 《天国》是一部对一对夫妇道德升华的令人难忘的戏剧化呈现。
back_translation: "The Kingdom" is a memorable dramatic presentation of the moral elevation of a couple.

text: the united states of america is notorious for its astronomical number of people killed by firearms for a developed nation without a civil war .
translation: 美国以其天文数字的火器致死人数而臭名昭著，尤其是在没有经历过内战的发展中国家中。
back_translation: The United States is notorious for its astronomical number of firearm-related deaths, especially among developing countries that have not experienced civil wars.

text: the film is n't especially dynamic , but it brims with insightful , poignant memories from survivors .
translation: 这部电影不是特别具有动感，但充满了来自幸存者的深刻而感人的回忆。
back_translation: This movie is not especially dynamic, but it is filled with profound and touching memories from the survivors.

text: the film culminates with the band 's arrival on the u . s . stage at wolf trap national park .
translation: 影片以乐队在美国沃尔夫陷国家公园登台表演为高潮。
back_translation: The film peaks with the band performing at Wolf Trap National Park in the United States.

text: astrid magnussen is a 12 year old girl , living in california .
translation: 阿斯特里德·马格努森是一个12岁的女孩，住在加利福尼亚。
back_translation: Astrid Magnusson is a 12-year-old girl who lives in California.

text: intriguing and beautiful film , but those of you who read the book are likely to be disappointed .
translation: 引人入胜且美丽的电影，但那些读过书的人可能会感到失望。
back_translation: A captivating and beautiful film, but those who have read the book may feel disappointed.

text: the story follows unpredictable twists and turns until it climaxes with a madcap finale .
translation: 故事经历了不可预测的曲折，最终以疯狂的高潮结束。
back_translation: The story went through unpredictable twists and turns, ultimately ending in a crazy climax.

text: a depressingly retrograde , 'post-feminist ' romantic comedy that takes an astonishingly condescending attitude toward women .
translation: 一部令人沮丧的倒退式“后女权”浪漫喜剧，对女性采取了令人震惊的居高临下的态度。
back_translation: A frustratingly regressive "post-feminist" romantic comedy that takes a shocking condescending attitude towards women.

text: amerika , zed and kyle are good friends until the excitingly undermedicated bitch goddess trasha enters the frame , cutting kyle off from his friends and their vacuous and unencumbered world of beer and porn .
translation: 美洲、泽德和凯尔一直是好朋友，直到那个令人兴奋的缺乏教育的女神特拉莎出现，切断了凯尔与他的朋友以及他们那无忧无虑、充满啤酒和色情的世界的联系。
back_translation: America, Zed, and Kyle had always been good friends, until the excitingly uneducated goddess Teresa showed up, severing Kyle's connection with his friends and their carefree world filled with beer and erotica.

text: a vivid , spicy footnote to history , and a movie that grips and holds you in rapt attention from start to finish .
translation: 历史的生动而辛辣的脚注，一部从头到尾都能紧紧吸引你注意力的电影。
back_translation: A vivid and poignant footnote to history, a film that can capture your attention from beginning to end.

text: a painting brought to life , the tracker is an enigmatic visual essay set on a vast australian landscape .
translation: 一幅充满生机的画作，《追踪者》是一部以广阔的澳大利亚景观为背景的神秘视觉散文。
back_translation: A vibrant painting, "The Tracker" is a mysterious visual essay set against the vast Australian landscape.

text: an inept , tedious spoof of '70s kung fu pictures , it contains almost enough chuckles for a three-minute sketch , and no more .
translation: 一部无能且乏味的'70年代功夫电影恶搞，它几乎有足够的笑点来撑起三分钟的短剧，但除此之外毫无新意。
back_translation: A incompetent and boring spoof of a '70s kung fu movie, it has almost enough laughs to support a three-minute skit, but otherwise lacks any originality.

text: dek and shirley live together with 12 year-old marlene , her daughter by the sexy delinquent jimmy , who skeddadled years ago and has n't been heard from since .
translation: 德克和雪莉与她们12岁的女儿马琳共同生活，马琳是雪莉和那个性格放荡的流氓吉米的女儿，吉米几年前就离开了，此后便杳无音信。
back_translation: Dirk and Shelly live together with their 12-year-old daughter Marlene, who is the daughter of Shelly and the reckless scoundrel Jimmy. Jimmy left a few years ago and has since disappeared without a trace.

text: the stars may be college kids , but the subject matter is as adult as you can get : the temptations of the flesh are unleashed by a slightly crazed , overtly determined young woman and a one-night swim turns into an ocean of trouble .
translation: 这些明星可能是大学生，但主题却是无比成熟的：一个略显疯狂、极度执着的年轻女人释放出肉体的诱惑，一场一夜的游泳变成了一片波涛汹涌的麻烦。
back_translation: These stars may be college students, but the theme is incredibly mature: a slightly crazy and extremely obsessed young woman unleashes the temptation of her body, and a night of swimming turns into a tumultuous trouble.

text: maggie finds that life can take many unexpected turns as she discovers mateo has risked a dangerous trip at sea and he has made it to miami .
translation: 玛吉发现生活可能会发生许多意想不到的变化，因为她得知马特奥冒险进行了危险的海上旅行，并且他已经到达迈阿密。
back_translation: Maggie realizes that life can bring many unexpected changes as she learns that Matteo has taken a dangerous sea journey and has arrived in Miami.

text: the movie is the strangest experience : a matter-of-fact thing that swallows you whole .
translation: 这部电影是最奇怪的体验：一种平淡无奇却能将你整个吞噬的东西。
back_translation: This movie is the strangest experience: something mundane that can completely engulf you.

text: what jackson has accomplished here is amazing on a technical level .
translation: 杰克逊在这里取得的成就是在技术层面上令人惊叹的。
back_translation: The achievements that Jackson has made here are astonishing on a technical level.

text: by the end , only one thing is certain - justice is simply a toss of the coin .
translation: 到最后，唯一可以确定的就是 - 正义不过是抛硬币的结果。
back_translation: In the end, the only thing that can be certain is that justice is nothing more than the result of a coin flip.

text: just when we think we have a grasp on each character 's inner-motives , more characters get sucked into the fray altering everyone 's dynamic and the course of april 's `` perfect `` shower .
translation: 就在我们认为掌握了每个角色的内心动机时，更多角色被卷入其中，改变了每个人的动态和四月“完美”淋浴的进程。
back_translation: Just when we thought we had grasped the inner motivations of each character, more characters became involved, changing everyone's dynamics and the course of April's "perfect" shower.

text: dares to look conventional hollywood wisdom in the eye and refuses to blink
translation: 敢于直视传统好莱坞智慧，且毫不退缩。
back_translation: Dare to confront traditional Hollywood wisdom without flinching.

text: off the hook is overlong and not well-acted , but credit writer-producer-director adam watstein with finishing it at all .
translation: 《脱离困境》冗长且表演不佳，但要感谢编剧、制作人和导演亚当·瓦茨坦能将其完成。
back_translation: "Out of the Woods" is lengthy and poorly performed, but credit should be given to the screenwriter, producer, and director Adam Wartzan for bringing it to completion.

text: this comic gem is as delightful as it is derivative .
translation: 这部漫画佳作既令人愉悦又富有衍生性。
back_translation: This comic is both delightful and rich in derivation.

text: [ w ] hile long on amiable monkeys and worthy environmentalism , jane goodall 's wild chimpanzees is short on the thrills the oversize medium demands .
translation: 虽然简·古道尔的《野生黑猩猩》充满了友好的猴子和有价值的环保主义，但却缺少了这种超大媒介所要求的惊险刺激。
back_translation: Although Jane Goodall's "Wild Chimpanzees" is filled with friendly monkeys and valuable environmentalism, it lacks the excitement and thrill that this oversized medium demands.

text: epic myth becomes burning truth on the mountain of fire .
translation: 史诗神话在火之山上化为燃烧的真理。
back_translation: Epic myths transform into burning truths on the mountain of fire.

text: during a climbing trip to kullen in sweden , charlotte is inches from falling to her death . teis
translation: 在瑞典的库伦攀岩旅行中，夏洛特距离跌落致死只有几寸。
back_translation: During a climbing trip in Sweden, Charlotte was only a few inches away from falling to her death.

text: she ignores him and climbs the town water tower regularly .
translation: 她无视他，定期爬上城镇的水塔。
back_translation: She ignored him and regularly climbed up the town's water tower.

text: soon after , the old man reappears on the shore and is greeted by his wife , who has been waiting for his arrival .
translation: 不久之后，老人重新出现在海岸上，受到一直在等候的妻子的欢迎。
back_translation: Not long after, the old man reappeared on the coast, welcomed by his wife who had been waiting for him.

text: grace 's only salvation appears to be by the guidance of her paternal grandfather reverend salo sr . ( the amazing kreskin ) .
translation: 格雷斯唯一的救赎似乎是通过她父亲的祖父萨洛牧师（惊人的克雷斯金）的引导。
back_translation: Grace's only redemption seems to come through the guidance of her grandfather, Pastor Salo (the astonishing Kreshkin).

text: coppola 's directorial debut is an incredibly layered and stylistic film that , despite a fairly slow paced , almost humdrum approach to character development , still manages at least a decent attempt at meaningful cinema .
translation: 科波拉的导演处女作是一部层次丰富且风格独特的电影，尽管在角色发展上节奏较慢，几乎显得平淡无奇，但仍然至少在有意义的电影方面做出了相当不错的尝试。
back_translation: Coppola's directorial debut is a richly layered and uniquely styled film. Although it has a slower pace in character development, almost feeling unremarkable, it still makes quite a good attempt at being a meaningful film.

text: a morality tale whose thought-provoking potential is hampered by a made-for-tv look , rigid performances and an asinine 'twist ' that brazenly rips off the sixth sense .
translation: 这是一部道德寓言，尽管其引人深思的潜力受到制作过于电视化、表演僵硬以及一个愚蠢的“反转”的阻碍，后者公然抄袭了《第六感》。
back_translation: This is a moral fable, though its thought-provoking potential is hindered by overly television-like production, stiff performances, and a silly "twist" that blatantly plagiarizes "The Sixth Sense."

text: smith 's approach is never to tease , except gently and in that way that makes us consider our own eccentricities and how they are expressed through our homes .
translation: 史密斯的方法从不嘲弄，除非是温和地，以那种让我们反思自己怪癖及其在我们家中表达方式的方式。
back_translation: Smith's approach never mocks, unless it is gently, in a way that makes us reflect on our own quirks and how they are expressed in our homes.

text: a chaotic panorama that 's too busy flying a lot of metaphoric flags .
translation: 一个混乱的全景，忙于挥舞许多隐喻的旗帜。
back_translation: A chaotic panorama, busy waving many metaphorical flags.

text: a disfigured man , known as the phantom who loves to strike fear in the minds of the paris opera house staff , comes to a young singer , christine daae , and tutors her voice .
translation: 一个面目全非的男人，被称为幽灵，喜欢在巴黎歌剧院的工作人员心中制造恐惧，他来到一位年轻的歌手克里斯廷·达艾，并指导她的歌喉。
back_translation: A man who has become unrecognizable, known as the Phantom, enjoys instilling fear in the hearts of the staff at the Paris Opera House. He comes to a young singer, Christine Daaé, and guides her vocal talent.

text: she comes from nothing and finally gets everything , but . . .
translation: 她从一无所有开始，最终获得了一切，但……
back_translation: She started from nothing and ultimately gained everything, but...

text: not all of the stories work and the ones that do are thin and scattered , but the film works well enough to make it worth watching .
translation: 并不是所有的故事都有效，而有效的那些又显得稀薄和分散，但这部电影足够好，值得一看。
back_translation: Not all stories are effective, and those that are tend to be sparse and scattered, but this film is good enough to be worth watching.

text: a young boy has been possessed so as to capture a young , beautiful girl .
translation: 一个年轻男孩被附身，以便捕捉一个年轻美丽的女孩。
back_translation: A young boy is possessed in order to capture a young beautiful girl.

text: in 1977 , during anita bryant 's crusade , an anti-gay book alan wrote years before gets published without his consent .
translation: 在1977年，安妮塔·布赖恩特的运动期间，艾伦多年前写的反同性恋书籍未经他同意出版。
back_translation: In 1977, during Anita Bryant's campaign, a book written years earlier by Allen against homosexuality was published without his consent.

text: what makes this latest version of the four feathers the best so far are the beautiful desert locations ( in morocco ) , and the superb action sequences .
translation: 这部最新版本的《四根羽毛》之所以是迄今为止最好的，得益于其美丽的沙漠景观（在摩洛哥）和出色的动作场面。
back_translation: The reason this latest version of "Four Feathers" is the best so far is due to its beautiful desert landscapes (in Morocco) and outstanding action scenes.

text: davis has filled out his cast with appealing fresh faces .
translation: 戴维斯已填补他的演员阵容，加入了迷人的新面孔。
back_translation: Davis has filled his cast with charming new faces.

text: rock 's got the kind of sly charm and non- self-conscious sincerity that could fit into any action hero archetype imaginable , even the old-school ones .
translation: 摇滚拥有那种狡猾的魅力和毫不自觉的真诚，能够融入任何可以想象的动作英雄 archetype，甚至是那些老派的。
back_translation: Rock possesses a sly charm and an unconscious sincerity that can blend into any imaginable action hero archetype, even the old-fashioned ones.

text: more impressionistic than analytical , a grin without a cat is a grand immersion .
translation: 比起分析，更像是印象派的，一抹微笑没有猫是一种伟大的沉浸。
back_translation: Compared to analysis, it is more like impressionism; a stroke of a smile without a cat is a great immersion.

text: it may not be the most immediate or attention-grabbing work , but there 's certainly something satisfying in its thoughtfulness .
translation: 这可能不是最直接或最引人注意的作品，但其深思熟虑中确实有一种令人满意的感觉。
back_translation: This may not be the most direct or attention-grabbing work, but there is indeed a satisfying feeling in its thoughtfulness.

text: a breezy , diverting , conventional , well-acted tale of two men locked in an ongoing game of cat-and-cat .
translation: 一个轻松、有趣、传统且表演出色的故事，讲述了两名男子陷入持续的猫鼠游戏。
back_translation: A lighthearted, fun, traditional, and well-performed story about two men caught in an ongoing cat-and-mouse game.

text: not quite as miraculous as its dreamworks makers would have you believe , but it more than adequately fills the eyes and stirs the emotions .
translation: 并不像梦工厂的制作方所想象的那样神奇，但它足够吸引眼球，并激动人心。
back_translation: It is not as magical as the creators of DreamWorks envisioned, but it is eye-catching enough and exciting.

text: unlike the rest , she did n't vanish forever from history .
translation: 与其他人不同，她没有永远从历史中消失。
back_translation: Unlike others, she did not disappear from history forever.

text: spousal abuse is a major problem in contemporary society , but the film reduces this domestic tragedy to florid melodrama .
translation: 配偶虐待是当代社会的一个重大问题，但这部电影将这一家庭悲剧简化为华丽的情感剧。
back_translation: Spousal abuse is a significant problem in contemporary society, but this film simplifies this family tragedy into a glamorous emotional drama.

text: a deftly entertaining film , smartly played and smartly directed .
translation: 一部巧妙有趣的电影，表演聪明，导演也很出色。
back_translation: A cleverly entertaining movie with smart performances and an excellent director.

text: dan tort , a troubled genius attempts to build a magnetic engine while running from the deamons of his past , and trying to stay a couple steps ahead of the government and corperate kings .
translation: 丹·托特，一个饱受困扰的天才，试图在逃避过往幽灵的同时构建一个磁动力引擎，并努力在政府和企业大佬面前保持几步领先。
back_translation: Dan Tott, a troubled genius, tries to build a magnetic propulsion engine while escaping the ghosts of his past, striving to stay a few steps ahead of the government and corporate moguls.

text: all her father gus wants is for her to get married to a nice greek boy .
translation: 她父亲古斯只希望她嫁给一个好心的希腊男孩。
back_translation: Her father Gus only hoped that she would marry a kind Greek boy.

text: it tends to remind one of a really solid woody allen film , with its excellent use of new york locales and sharp writing
translation: 这让人想起了一部非常优秀的伍迪·艾伦电影，出色地利用了纽约的场景和犀利的写作。
back_translation: This reminds me of a very excellent Woody Allen movie that makes outstanding use of New York's scenery and sharp writing.

text: documentary and drama carry spielrein 's life into the cross-hairs of warring ideologies ( communism , national socialism ) .
translation: 纪录片和戏剧将斯皮尔雷的生活置于冲突意识形态（共产主义、民族社会主义）的焦点之中。
back_translation: The documentary and drama place Spielberg's life at the center of conflicting ideologies (communism, national socialism).

text: a live-action cartoon , a fast-moving and cheerfully simplistic 88 minutes of exaggerated action put together with the preteen boy in mind .
translation: 一部真人动画片，片长88分钟，快速且快乐地简化了夸张的动作，是专为青少年男孩而制作的。
back_translation: A live-action animated film, 88 minutes long, quickly and happily simplifies exaggerated actions, specifically made for teenage boys.

text: as sebastien does his research over the next several days he begins to discover more about himself than he ever anticipated .
translation: 在接下来的几天里，塞巴斯蒂安在进行研究时，开始发现自己比他预想的要多。
back_translation: In the following days, Sebastian began to realize that he was doing more than he had anticipated while conducting his research.

text: sadly , 'garth ' has n't progressed as nicely as 'wayne . '
translation: 遗憾的是，'garth' 进展得没有 'wayne' 那么顺利。
back_translation: Unfortunately, 'garth' has not progressed as smoothly as 'wayne'.

text: the kind of film that grows on you upon reflection
translation: 那种在反思中愈发吸引你的电影。
back_translation: That kind of movie that becomes more appealing as you reflect on it.

text: egoyan 's work often elegantly considers various levels of reality and uses shifting points of view , but here he has constructed a film so labyrinthine that it defeats his larger purpose .
translation: 埃戈彦的作品常常优雅地考虑各种现实层面，并使用不同的视角，但在这里，他构建了一部如此复杂的电影，以至于阻碍了他更大的目标。
back_translation: Egon's works often elegantly consider various aspects of reality and use different perspectives, but here he has constructed a film so complex that it hinders his larger ambitions.

text: laggard drama wending its way to an uninspired philosophical epiphany .
translation: 渐缓的戏剧逐渐走向一个缺乏灵感的哲学顿悟。
back_translation: The gradually slowing drama is moving towards a lack of inspiration in philosophical enlightenment.

text: there , he befriends a 13 year old boy left behind years before by his mother .
translation: 在那里，他与一个十三岁的男孩交上了朋友，这个男孩多年前被他的母亲遗留下来。
back_translation: There, he made friends with a thirteen-year-old boy who had been abandoned by his mother years ago.

text: he 's survived only by holding onto his dream of revenge against matty , the man he believes betrayed him .
translation: 他仅靠着对报复马蒂的梦想生存，他认为马蒂背叛了他。
back_translation: He survives solely on the dream of avenging Mattie, believing that Mattie has betrayed him.

text: the film `` eternally aliens `` is a 24 min .
translation: 电影《永恒的外星人》时长24分钟。
back_translation: The movie "Eternal Alien" has a duration of 24 minutes.

text: they lie in bed but all his advances are instantly rejected by a progressively more nervous ana .
translation: 他们躺在床上，但安娜却对他的一切进攻毫不留情地迅速拒绝，变得越来越紧张。
back_translation: They lay in bed, but Anna quickly and mercilessly rejected all of his advances, becoming more and more tense.

text: plays like a series of vignettes -- clips of a film that are still looking for a common through-line .
translation: 就像是一系列小插曲——一部电影的片段，它们仍在寻找一个共同的主线。
back_translation: It's like a series of minor episodes—a fragment of a movie—that are still searching for a common storyline.

text: connie sumner has a loving husband , a beautiful home , and a wonderful son , but she wants more .
translation: 康妮·萨姆纳有一个深爱的丈夫，一个美丽的家，还有一个出色的儿子，但她渴望更多。
back_translation: Connie Sumner has a beloved husband, a beautiful home, and an outstanding son, but she longs for more.

text: a soap-opera quality twist in the last 20 minutes . . . almost puts the kibosh on what is otherwise a sumptuous work of b-movie imagination .
translation: 最后20分钟的情节转折如同肥皂剧般……几乎扼杀了这部本是视觉盛宴的B级电影的想象力。
back_translation: The plot twist in the last 20 minutes was like a soap opera... it nearly suffocated the imagination of this B-movie, which was originally a visual feast.

text: simon is an angel who shows jordan a clear oath .
translation: 西蒙是一个天使，他向乔丹展示了一个明确的誓言。
back_translation: Simon is an angel, and he showed Jordan a clear vow.

text: pan nalin 's exposition is beautiful and mysterious , and the interviews that follow , with the practitioners of this ancient indian practice , are as subtle and as enigmatic .
translation: 潘·纳林的阐述既美丽又神秘，紧随其后的采访，对这门古老印度实践的从业者们来说，同样微妙而神秘。
back_translation: Pan Nalin's elaboration is both beautiful and mysterious, followed by interviews that are equally subtle and enigmatic for the practitioners of this ancient Indian practice.

text: the film contains colour home movie footage of the film 's production which where shot by charles ' brother sydney .
translation: 影片包含了由查尔斯的兄弟西德尼拍摄的彩色家庭电影片段，记录了电影的制作过程。
back_translation: The film includes color home movie footage shot by Charles' brother Sidney, documenting the production process of the movie.

text: blau ( trevor griffiths ) needs a favor for old times ' sake .
translation: 布劳（特雷弗·格里菲斯）需要一个为了旧时光的帮忙。
back_translation: Blau (Trevor Griffiths) needs help for the sake of old times.

text: his intelligence and unconventional attitude attract the attention of veteran walter burke ( al pacino ) who squires him through the agency 's difficult training courses and helps him to quickly rise through the ranks .
translation: 他的聪明才智和独特态度引起了资深人士沃尔特·伯克（阿尔·席奇诺）的注意，后者带着他经过该机构的艰难培训课程，并帮助他迅速晋升。
back_translation: His intelligence and unique attitude caught the attention of senior figure Walter Burke (Al Sicchino), who guided him through the rigorous training program at the agency and helped him rise quickly through the ranks.

text: they live in a poor village in the soviet union , fantisizing about a better life .
translation: 他们住在苏联一个贫穷的村庄里，幻想着更好的生活。
back_translation: They live in a poor village in the Soviet Union, dreaming of a better life.

text: he meets up with the country bears , a long-since broken-up band , a parody of bands like the eagles .
translation: 他与乡村熊乐队见面，这是一个早已解散的乐队，模仿像老鹰乐队这样的乐队。
back_translation: He met with the country bear band, a group that had long since disbanded and imitated bands like the Eagles.

text: although forcibly baptized , the sisters are chased through christendom until they arrive in venice .
translation: 尽管被强迫洗礼，这些姐妹们仍然在基督教世界中被追赶，直到她们抵达威尼斯。
back_translation: Although they were forcibly baptized, these sisters were still pursued in the Christian world until they reached Venice.

text: ultimately , the band must find its strength in the music that is their passion and the thread that holds them together , inspiring them to prevail .
translation: 最终，乐队必须在音乐中找到他们的力量，这种音乐是他们的热情，也是将他们联系在一起的纽带，激励他们战胜一切。
back_translation: In the end, the band must find their strength in the music, which is their passion and the bond that connects them, inspiring them to overcome everything.

text: this is the sort of burly action flick where one coincidence pummels another , narrative necessity is a drunken roundhouse , and whatever passes for logic is a factor of the last plot device left standing .
translation: 这是那种粗犷动作片，其中一个巧合接连冲击另一个，叙事的必要性像个醉酒的回旋踢，而任何勉强算作逻辑的东西都只是最后一个残留的情节装置的结果。
back_translation: This is the kind of rugged action film where one coincidence continually impacts another, the necessity of the narrative resembling a drunken spin kick, and anything that might be forced to count as logic is merely the result of the last remaining plot device.

text: visually exciting sci-fi film which suffers from a lackluster screenplay .
translation: 视觉上令人兴奋的科幻电影，但剧本平淡无奇。
back_translation: Visually exciting science fiction film, but the script is mediocre.

text: standing by yourself tracks the movements and daily machinations of a group of outcast friends in their strip-mall new york state hometown .
translation: 《独自坚守》记录了一群被排斥的朋友在他们位于纽约州的商场家乡中的行动和日常运作。
back_translation: "Staying Strong Alone" documents the actions and daily operations of a group of marginalized friends in their hometown mall in New York State.

text: together they find out , much to their horror , that all the housewives are strangely blissful , and somehow . . .
translation: 他们一起发现，令他们感到恐怖的是，所有的家庭主妇都异常幸福，并且不知为何……
back_translation: They discovered together that what terrified them was that all the housewives were extraordinarily happy, and for some reason...

text: a charming trifle . . . a welcome return to jocular form .
translation: 一个迷人的小玩意……一个令人愉快的幽默回归。
back_translation: A charming little trinket... a delightful humorous return.

text: those with a modicum of patience will find in these characters ' foibles a timeless and unique perspective .
translation: 拥有一点耐心的人会在这些角色的小缺陷中发现一种永恒而独特的视角。
back_translation: Those who have a bit of patience will find an eternal and unique perspective in the small flaws of these characters.

text: nsa agent gibbons ( samuel l . jackson ) forces xxx to cooperate with the government to infiltrate an underground russian crime ring and avoid going to prison .
translation: 国家安全局特工吉本斯（塞缪尔·杰克逊）迫使XXX与政府合作，渗透一个地下俄罗斯犯罪集团，以避免入狱。
back_translation: National Security Agency agent Gibbons (Samuel L. Jackson) forces XXX to cooperate with the government to infiltrate an underground Russian crime syndicate in order to avoid imprisonment.

text: the film has too many spots where it 's on slippery footing , but is acceptable entertainment for the entire family and one that 's especially fit for the kiddies .
translation: 这部电影有太多地方表现得不够稳妥，但对整个家庭来说是可以接受的娱乐，尤其适合孩子们观看。
back_translation: This movie has too many aspects that are not handled well, but it is acceptable entertainment for the whole family, especially suitable for children to watch.

text: there is a refreshing absence of cynicism in stuart little 2 -- quite a rarity , even in the family film market . eventually , it wins you over .
translation: 《斯图尔特·李特2》中有一种令人耳目一新的缺乏愤世嫉俗的气息——这在家庭电影市场中实属罕见。最终，它会打动你。
back_translation: "Stuart Little 2" has a refreshing lack of cynicism, which is quite rare in the family movie market. In the end, it will touch your heart.

text: a well-rounded tribute to a man whose achievements -- and complexities -- reached far beyond the end zone .
translation: 对一位成就与复杂性远远超越终点区的男人的全面致敬。
back_translation: A comprehensive tribute to a man whose achievements and complexities far exceed the finish line.

text: pretty new temp irene ca n't help falling for graham 's spontaneous charm .
translation: 漂亮的新临时工艾琳无法抵挡格雷厄姆的随性魅力。
back_translation: The beautiful new temp Erin cannot resist Graham's laid-back charm.

text: reaching to break the wishbone , thomas thinks of his ultimate dream - to see the sexy neighbor naked .
translation: 在伸手去抓愿望骨时，托马斯想着他的终极梦想——看到性感邻居的裸体。
back_translation: As Thomas reached out to grab the wish bone, he thought about his ultimate dream - seeing the naked body of the sexy neighbor.

text: insomnia is involving . still , i thought it could have been more .
translation: 失眠涉及许多方面。尽管如此，我认为它本可以更多一些。
back_translation: Insomnia involves many aspects. Nevertheless, I think it could have been more.

text: a slick , well-oiled machine , exquisitely polished and upholstered .
translation: 一台光滑、运转良好的机器，精致地抛光和装饰。
back_translation: A smooth, well-functioning machine, exquisitely polished and decorated.

text: i like my christmas movies with more elves and snow and less pimps and ho 's .
translation: 我喜欢我的圣诞电影有更多精灵和雪，而不是娼妓和皮条客。
back_translation: I prefer my Christmas movies to have more elves and snow, rather than prostitutes and pimps.

text: while working a car insurance scam , toni cutter , a female con artist , accidentally turns a routine collision into a fatality and exposes her lawyer and lover , stephen tally , to felony murder charges from the district attorney .
translation: 在进行一项汽车保险诈骗时，女性骗子托尼·卡特意外将一起例行碰撞变成了致命事件，并使她的律师及情人斯蒂芬·塔利面临检察官的重罪谋杀指控。
back_translation: During a car insurance scam, female con artist Toni Carter accidentally turned a routine collision into a fatal incident, putting her lawyer and lover Stephen Tully at risk of facing felony murder charges from prosecutors.

text: on his journey he befriends slacker jimmy the fin ( peter sarsgaard ) and becomes involved in rescuing his neighbor colette ( debra kara unger ) from her own demons .
translation: 在他的旅程中，他结识了懒散的吉米·芬（彼得·萨斯加德饰），并卷入了拯救邻居科莱特（黛布拉·卡拉·昂格饰）摆脱自己的恶魔。
back_translation: During his journey, he befriended the laid-back Jimmy Finn (played by Peter Sarsgaard) and became involved in helping his neighbor Colette (played by Debra Kara Unger) rid herself of her demons.

text: mostly honest , this somber picture reveals itself slowly , intelligently , artfully .
translation: 大多数是诚实的，这幅严肃的画面缓慢地、智能地、艺术地显现出来。
back_translation: Most are honest, and this serious image slowly, intelligently, and artistically emerges.

text: japan 's premier stylist of sex and blood hits audiences with what may be his most demented film to date .
translation: 日本顶尖的性与血腥造型师用他迄今为止最疯狂的电影冲击观众。
back_translation: Japan's top stylist of sex and gore shocks audiences with his wildest movie to date.

text: payne has created a beautiful canvas , and nicholson proves once again that he 's the best brush in the business .
translation: 佩恩创作了一幅美丽的画布，而尼科尔森再次证明了自己是业内最优秀的画笔。
back_translation: Payne created a beautiful canvas, while Nicholson once again proved himself to be the finest brush in the industry.

text: suffering from his flashbacks , vince does n't realize that ellen has also disappeared from the cemetery , right before his eyes .
translation: 在经历闪回的痛苦时，文斯没有意识到艾伦在他眼前也从墓地消失了。
back_translation: While experiencing the pain of a flashback, Vince did not realize that Allen had also disappeared from in front of him, right from the graveyard.

text: the farmer whom the barn belongs to is distraught and ca n't cope from the intruder 's power of articulations .
translation: 那位拥有这座谷仓的农夫感到心烦意乱，无法应对入侵者的表达能力。
back_translation: The farmer who owns the barn felt upset and unable to cope with the intruder's expressive abilities.

text: an unorthodox little film noir organized crime story that includes one of the strangest love stories you will ever see .
translation: 一部非正统的小电影黑色犯罪故事，包含了你见过的最奇特的爱情故事之一。

text: carmen and juni cortez team up with two other spy kids , gary and gerti giggles , and together they must save the world from the hands of an evil scientist named romero ( buscemi ) .
translation: 卡门和朱尼·科尔特斯与另外两个间谍儿童，加里和格尔蒂·吉格尔斯组成团队，必须一起拯救世界免受名为罗梅罗（布斯切米）的邪恶科学家的手中。
back_translation: Carmen and Juni Cortez, along with two other spy kids, Gary and Gertie Giggles, form a team that must work together to save the world from the hands of an evil scientist named Romero (Buscemi).

text: freddy krueger ( robert englund ) is desparate to kill , but he ca n't since the parents of elm street have been doping their kids up with dream suppressants .
translation: 弗雷迪·克鲁格（罗伯特·英格伦饰）迫切想要杀人，但他无法做到，因为厄尔姆街的父母们一直在给他们的孩子服用梦境抑制剂。

text: after ten years of being ignored by record producers , jacki and the band find hope in one producer who promises to see them play and consider them for a contract .

back_translation: After ten years of being overlooked by record producers, Jecky and the band found hope in a producer who promised to watch their performance and expressed interest in considering signing them.

text: scotland , pa . is a strangely drab romp . some studio pizazz might have helped .
translation: 宾夕法尼亚州的苏格兰是一个奇怪的乏味之旅。一些导演的华丽风格可能会有所帮助。

text: sharing a cabin together , each finds out a little bit about themselves over the course of 10 days .

text: bound and determined to end their contentious relationship once and for all , melanie sneaks back home to alabama to confront her past , only to discover that you can take the girl out of the south , but you can never take the south out of the girl .
translation: 梅兰妮下定决心彻底结束她们之间的争执关系，偷偷回到阿拉巴马州面对她的过去，却发现你可以把女孩从南方带走，但永远无法把南方带离女孩。
back_translation: Melanie was determined to completely end the contentious relationship between them. She secretly returned to Alabama to face her past, only to discover that you can take the girl out of the South, but you can never take the South out of the girl.

text: this is n't exactly profound cinema , but it 's good-natured and sometimes quite funny .

text: calvin and his friends , who all live an in orphanage , find old shoes with the faded letters mj connected to a powerline .

back_translation: Calvin and his friends all lived in the orphanage. They found an old pair of shoes with faded letters "mj" on them, connected by a cable.

translation: 拉贾也成功地和他们一起去了马来西亚。

text: an intricate tale of guilt , grief and dark serendipity . . . so deft it 's hard not to gasp with delight as the plot 's pieces slide into place and its machinery begins humming .
translation: 一个复杂的关于内疚、悲伤和黑暗巧合的故事……如此巧妙，以至于当情节的各个部分逐渐明朗，机器开始运转时，难免会惊呼出声。

text: it may be a prize winner , but teacher is a bomb .
translation: 它可能是个奖项得主，但老师太厉害了。

text: a rollicking ride , with jaw-dropping action sequences , striking villains , a gorgeous color palette , astounding technology , stirring music and a boffo last hour that leads up to a strangely sinister happy ending .
translation: 一场令人兴奋的旅程，伴随着令人瞩目的动作场面，引人注目的反派，华丽的色彩调配，惊人的技术，激动人心的音乐，以及一个奇妙而阴险的快乐结局的精彩最后一小时。

text: harry potter and the chamber of secrets is deja vu all over again , and while that is a cliche , nothing could be more appropriate . it 's likely that whatever you thought of the first production -- pro or con -- you 'll likely think of this one .

back_translation: The feeling of "Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets" is like experiencing déjà vu once again. Although it sounds cliché, it couldn't be more fitting. Regardless of your opinion on the first film—whether you loved it or hated it—you are likely to have a similar view of this one.

text: [ jaglom ] creates an engaging insider 's world of enthusiastically entertaining characters and absorbing situations .

text: has enough wit , energy and geniality to please not only the fanatical adherents on either side , but also people who know nothing about the subject and think they 're not interested .

back_translation: In addition, artists from different music styles have also joined today to express global support, contributing to the goals of blues. "Of course, being famous is great, but I am more interested in gaining a following that has a kindred spirit."

text: but even more important than that , it is an emotional story of a character who learns to value relationships , life balance and spiritual purpose , over self-involvement and financial gain .
translation: 但比这更重要的是，这是一个关于角色的情感故事，他学会了重视人际关系、生活平衡和精神目的，而不是自我沉迷和财务利益。
back_translation: But more importantly, this is an emotional story about a character who learns to value interpersonal relationships, life balance, and a sense of purpose, rather than self-indulgence and financial gain.

text: when a vindictive inspector from the board of education invades their paradise , promising to shut them down , the members of this eccentric and highly dysfunctional family somehow find a way to pull together and win the day .

text: his songs were once well thought of , but the music business clearly has changed .

text: if it seems like a minor miracle that its septuagenarian star is young enough to be the nonagenarian filmmaker 's son , more incredible still are the clear-eyed boldness and quiet irony with which actor and director take on life 's urgent questions .
translation: 如果说其七旬明星年轻到足以成为九旬导演的儿子似乎是一种小奇迹，那么演员和导演以清醒的勇气和细腻的讽刺来应对生活紧迫问题的方式则更令人难以置信。
back_translation: If it seems like a small miracle that a seventy-year-old star is young enough to be the son of a ninety-year-old director, then the way the actor and director confront pressing life issues with sober courage and subtle irony is even more incredible.

text: thinking the young man is dead , a curious fisherman with a scalpel finds two bullets in his back and a miniature laser device in his hip .

text: the story starts with a bit more in depth on the court house scene which ended the last film .

text: while `` real women have curves `` suffers from an obvious and simplistic screenplay , it 's a bright looking , well-acted charmer .

text: meticulously mounted , exasperatingly well-behaved film , which ticks off kahlo 's lifetime milestones with the dutiful precision of a tax accountant .
translation: 精心制作的、令人恼火地表现得体的电影，以像税务会计一样的尽职尽责精准勾勒出卡洛一生的重要里程碑。
back_translation: A meticulously crafted film that frustratingly performs with poise, outlining the key milestones of Carlo's life with the kind of thorough precision akin to that of a tax accountant.

text: the work of a filmmaker who has secrets buried at the heart of his story and knows how to take time revealing them . strange occurrences build in the mind of the viewer and take on extreme urgency .

back_translation: The work of a filmmaker, whose story is deeply buried with secrets and knows how to slowly reveal them. Strange events gradually accumulate in the minds of the audience and become extremely urgent.

text: despite its lavish formalism and intellectual austerity , the film manages to keep you at the edge of your seat with its shape-shifting perils , political intrigue and brushes with calamity .
translation: 尽管其奢华的形式主义和知识上的严峻，该影片仍成功地让你心悬于椅边，充满了形势变化的危险、政治阴谋和与灾难的擦肩而过。
back_translation: Despite its luxurious formalism and intellectual severity, the film still successfully keeps you on the edge of your seat, filled with the danger of shifting circumstances, political intrigue, and near-misses with disaster.

text: too bland and fustily tasteful to be truly prurient .

text: only a supremely flexible talent like kinnear could whittle away at crane 's nuances and come up with thespian gold .

translation: 罗查在古巴的流亡岁月（1971-72年）正值拉丁美洲和第三世界社会和政治革命中，艺术角色激烈讨论和文化变革的重要时期。

translation: 对政治、权力和社会流动性的微妙、幽默和启发性的研究。

text: one night , tobias knifes his father in the back , and escape to switzerland .

text: there are touching moments in etoiles , but for the most part this is a dull , dour documentary on what ought to be a joyful or at least fascinating subject .

text: what one is left with , even after the most awful acts are committed , is an overwhelming sadness that feels as if it has made its way into your very bloodstream .

text: this is a winning ensemble comedy that shows canadians can put gentle laughs and equally gentle sentiments on the button , just as easily as their counterparts anywhere else in the world .

text: a week later , jash contacts the police , asking not for a ransom but for retired police inspector mo to be his police contact .

text: the production values are up there . the use of cgi and digital ink-and-paint make the thing look really slick . the voices are fine as well . the problem , it is with most of these things , is the script .
translation: 制作水准相当高。 CGI和数字绘画的使用让作品看起来非常光滑，声音也不错。问题在于，像大多数这些作品一样，剧本是个短板。
back_translation: The production quality is quite high. The use of CGI and digital painting makes the work look very smooth, and the sound is good too. The problem is that, like most of these works, the script is a weak point.

text: this is a romantic comedy about a girl named christina who , one day , meets a guy in a bar .
translation: 这是一个关于一个名叫克里斯蒂娜的女孩的浪漫喜剧。一天，她在酒吧遇见了一个男孩。

text: a psychological thriller that does n't really hold up if you think about it too much , but is nonetheless highly entertaining in a low-budget , david lynch-ian way .
translation: 一部心理惊悚片，如果你想得太多就不太成立，但在低预算、戴维·林奇式的方式中依然非常娱乐。
back_translation: A psychological thriller that may not make much sense if you overthink it, but is still very entertaining in a low-budget, David Lynch-style manner.

text: e . t . works because its flabbergasting principals , 14-year-old robert macnaughton , 6-year-old drew barrymore and 10-year-old henry thomas , convince us of the existence of the wise , wizened visitor from a faraway planet .
translation: 《E.T.外星人》之所以成功，是因为其令人惊讶的主角，14岁的罗伯特·麦克诺顿，6岁的德鲁·巴里莫尔和10岁的亨利·托马斯， convinc 说服我们相信来自遥远星球的聪明而饱经风霜的访客的存在。
back_translation: The success of "E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial" is due to its surprising protagonists, 14-year-old Robert MacNaughton, 6-year-old Drew Barrymore, and 10-year-old Henry Thomas, who convincingly persuade us to believe in the existence of an intelligent and weathered visitor from a distant planet.

text: `` 13 conversations `` holds its goodwill close , but is relatively slow to come to the point .
translation: `` 13 conversations `` 保持着它的善意，但相对比较慢于直入主题。
back_translation: "13 conversations" maintains its kindness, but is relatively slower at getting to the point.

text: cedar takes a very open-minded approach to this sensitive material , showing impressive control , both visually and in the writing .

back_translation: The cedar has taken a very open attitude towards this sensitive material, demonstrating impressive control both visually and in writing.

text: he dwells in a world of external night -- but the blackness is filled with sounds and scents , tastes and textures that most can not perceive .
translation: 他居住在一个外界黑暗的世界里——但那黑暗中充满了大多数人无法感知的声音和气味、味道和质感。
back_translation: He lives in a world of external darkness—but that darkness is filled with sounds and scents, flavors and textures that most people cannot perceive.

text: three stories of undying love from acclaimed japanese filmmaker takeshi kitano .
translation: 著名日本电影导演北野武的三段不朽爱情故事。

text: an incredibly clever and superbly paced caper filled with scams within scams within scams .
translation: 一个极其聪明且节奏 superb 的骗局，充满了内有欺诈的欺诈。
back_translation: An extremely clever and superbly rhythmic scam, full of deceit within deceit.

text: reign of fire may well be the most grim dragon movie ever made -- and it 's all the more effective for the filmmakers ' decision to play it straight .
translation: 《火焰统治》可能是有史以来最阴郁的龙电影——而且由于电影制作人决定以严肃的方式呈现，这部影片显得更加有效。

text: during the year 2000 geyrhalter and his teams travelled to a different destination each month , looking for places untouched by the millennium hysteria .
translation: 在2000年，盖尔哈尔特和他的团队每个月都前往一个不同的目的地，寻找那些未被千年狂热所触碰的地方。

translation: 《等待古夫曼》的影迷、《美国电影》和《罗什莫尔》的粉丝们在这部搞笑的伪纪录片中找到了新的最爱。

text: it 's funny and human and really pretty damned wonderful , all at once .
translation: 这既有趣又人性化，而且真的是美妙得让人惊讶，一下子全部结合在一起。

text: the two engage in a spirited and acerbic dialogue - meanwhile accomplishing nothing .
translation: 两人展开了一场生动而尖刻的对话——然而毫无所获。

text: but things are not always what they may look like .
translation: 但事情未必总是看起来那样。

translation: 桑顿饰演一名男子，他在因企图抢劫而杀死一名青少年后服刑19年，现已获得自由。

text: his attention settles on alicia browning ( busy philipps ) , a darkly troubled outsider who , as the only person present throughout the entire incident , is both the key witness and a possible suspect .

translation: 2. 一个缝隙、空洞或裂缝，比如在岩石中。

text: johnny lever ( paaji ) is a millionaire sardarji who believes in distributing & # 38 ; spending lavishly his wealth on his friends .
translation: 约翰尼·莱弗（戏称“帕吉”）是一位千万富翁的锡克人，他相信将自己的财富慷慨分配和奢华消费在朋友身上。

text: engaging peter is the story of peter , a struggling documentary filmmaker who has resorted to shooting weddings for rent money .
translation: 《吸引彼得》是彼得的故事，一个挣扎中的纪录片导演，他被迫拍摄婚礼以赚取租金。
back_translation: "Attracting Peter" is the story of Peter, a struggling documentary filmmaker who is forced to shoot weddings to pay the rent.

text: if you keep a list of films you want to see one way or another , you would be doing yourself a service by keeping this film high up on that list .
translation: 如果你保持一份想看的电影清单，那么把这部电影放在清单的靠前位置对你自己来说是一种服务。
back_translation: If you keep a list of movies you want to watch, placing this movie near the top of the list is a service to yourself.

text: the battle results in an incident that sees one of the men re-evaluate his values in life .
translation: 这场战斗导致了一起事件，使其中一位男子重新评估他的人生价值观。
back_translation: This battle led to an incident that caused one of the men to reassess his values in life.

text: this film is adapted from the play the fire and the rain by one of india 's foremost playwrights , girish karnad .
translation: 这部电影改编自印度最著名的剧作家吉里什·卡纳德的剧作《火与雨》。
back_translation: This film is adapted from the play "Fire and Rain" by India's most renowned playwright Girish Karnad.

text: the film 's images give a backbone to the company and provide an emotional edge to its ultimate demise .
translation: 这部电影的图像为公司提供了支撑，并为其最终的衰亡增添了情感的深度。
back_translation: The imagery of the film provides support for the company and adds emotional depth to its eventual downfall.

text: it 's all entertaining enough , but do n't look for any hefty anti-establishment message in what is essentially a whip-crack of a buddy movie that ends with a whimper .
translation: 这部电影虽然足够 entertaining，但不要指望在这部本质上是一个拍档电影的作品中找到任何强烈的反体制信息，因为它最后的结局实在太平淡。
back_translation: This movie is entertaining enough, but don’t expect to find any strong anti-establishment messages in this essentially buddy film, as its ending is just too bland.

text: though the characters are sometimes forced into madcap situations for the sake of adding yuks , the film works best when the protagonists are just being themselves
translation: 尽管角色有时被迫陷入疯狂的情境以增加笑点，但当主角只是做他们自己时，这部电影的效果最好。
back_translation: Although the characters are sometimes forced into crazy situations to increase the humor, the movie works best when the protagonists are just being themselves.

text: however after roxie has undergone the 'casting couch ' treatment , and fred has had his wicked way with her , he reveals that he has no more connections in showbusiness than she does .
translation: 然而，在罗克西经历了“试镜沙发”待遇后，弗雷德趁机与她发生关系，却透露他在娱乐圈的关系与她一样少。
back_translation: However, after Roxy experienced the "casting couch" treatment, Fred took the opportunity to have a relationship with her, but revealed that his connections in the entertainment industry were just as limited as hers.

text: along the way , they get tips from various experts , which include performances from george kennedy , tippi hedren , erick avari , and stephen furst .
translation: 在这个过程中，他们从各类专家那里获得建议，包括乔治·肯尼迪、蒂比·海德伦、埃里克·阿瓦里和斯蒂芬·弗斯特的表演。
back_translation: During this process, they received advice from various experts, including performances by George Kennedy, Tippi Hedren, Eric Avari, and Stephen Foster.

text: it 's young guns meets goodfellas in this easily skippable hayseeds-vs . -greaseballs mob action-comedy .
translation: 这是年轻枪手与好家伙的结合，这部轻松可跳过的乡巴佬与油腻家伙的黑帮动作喜剧。
back_translation: This is a combination of young guns and good guys, a light, skippable rural and greasy gangster action comedy.

text: that a high-profile movie with big-name actors could inspire such philosophical reflection is impressive .
translation: 一部有大牌演员的高调电影能够激发如此深刻的哲学思考，令人印象深刻。
back_translation: A high-profile movie featuring big-name actors can provoke such profound philosophical thoughts, which is impressive.

text: as he chases the elusive bounty hunter , jango ( and his cloned son boba ) leads obi wan to geonosis , where he meets count dooku and finds a startling revelation about the former jedi .
translation: 当他追逐那位难以捉摸的赏金猎人时，贾戈（和他的克隆儿子博巴）引导欧比旺来到吉奥诺西斯，在那里他遇到了杜库伯爵，并发现了关于这位前绝地武士的惊人真相。
back_translation: As he pursued the elusive bounty hunter, Jango (with his clone son Boba) led Obi-Wan to Geonosis, where he encountered Count Dooku and uncovered astonishing truths about the former Jedi Knight.

text: one can only assume that the jury who bestowed star hoffman 's brother gordy with the waldo salt screenwriting award at 2002 's sundance festival were honoring an attempt to do something different over actually pulling it off
translation: 人们只能够假设，2002年圣丹斯电影节上授予霍夫曼兄弟戈尔迪沃尔多·盐编剧奖的评审团，是在表彰一种尝试去做不同事情的努力，而不是实际实现了这一点。
back_translation: People can only speculate that the jury awarding the Gordy Waldorf Screenwriting Award to the Hoffman brothers at the 2002 Sundance Film Festival was acknowledging an effort to attempt to do something different, rather than actually achieving it.

text: daily prison life is not drab but full of unexpected happenings like a story .
translation: 日常监狱生活并不是单调的，而是充满了意想不到的事情，就像一个故事。
back_translation: Daily life in prison is not monotonous; it is full of unexpected events, just like a story.

text: he tries to recapture the past , and make some sense of his life , that of his friends and family , and the present state of his native country .
translation: 他试图重新捕捉过去，理清自己、朋友和家人的生活，以及他故乡的现状。
back_translation: He tried to recapture the past, clarify the lives of himself, his friends, and family, as well as the current state of his hometown.

text: rare is the 'urban comedy ' that even attempts the insight and honesty of this disarming indie .
translation: 少有的“都市喜剧”能像这部迷人的独立电影那样尝试洞察和诚实。
back_translation: Few "urban comedies" can attempt insight and honesty like this charming independent film.

text: rarely has a film 's title served such dire warning .
translation: 电影的标题很少发出如此严峻的警告。
back_translation: The title of the movie rarely issues such a stern warning.

text: dialogue-heavy and too cerebral for its own good -- or , at any rate , too cerebral for its racy subject matter .
translation: 对话过多，思考性过强，甚至有些不适合自己的主题内容。
back_translation: Excessive dialogue, overly strong thinking, and even some content that is not suitable for one's own theme.

text: as david letterman and the onion have proven , the worst of tragedies can be fertile sources of humor , but lawrence has only a fleeting grasp of how to develop them .
translation: 正如大卫·莱特曼和《洋葱报》所证明的那样，最糟糕的悲剧可以成为幽默的沃土，但劳伦斯对如何发展这些幽默只有短暂的理解。
back_translation: As demonstrated by David Letterman and The Onion, the worst tragedies can serve as fertile ground for humor, but Lawrence has only a fleeting understanding of how to develop this humor.

text: wins my vote for 'the 2002 enemy of cinema ' award .
translation: 赢得我对“2002年电影公敌”奖的支持。
back_translation: Win my support for the "2002 Movie Public Enemy" award.

text: the plan goes by smoothly , but troubles comes when ray actually falls in love with eva .
translation: 计划进行得很顺利，但当雷真的爱上艾娃时，麻烦就来了。
back_translation: The plan was going smoothly, but trouble arose when Ray truly fell in love with Ava.

text: starving artist gus bishop ca n't even give away his paintings .
translation: 饥饿的艺术家古斯·比晓普连自己的画都无法送出去。
back_translation: The starving artist Gus Bishop couldn't even send out his own paintings.

text: arcangel gets a message from his brother telling that their father is very sick .
translation: 阿尔坎杰尔收到他兄弟的消息，说他们的父亲病得很重。
back_translation: Alcangel received news from his brother that their father was very ill.

text: after collateral damage , you might imagine that most every aggrieved father clichM-i has been unturned . but no .
translation: 在附带损害之后，你可能会想，几乎每一个受委屈的父亲的陈词滥调都已经被翻转。但不是。
back_translation: After the accompanying damage, you might think that almost every cliché of the aggrieved father has been turned upside down. But it hasn't.

text: a unique and irreverent look at new york 's cubicle filled sweatshops .
translation: 对纽约充满小隔间的汗水工厂的独特且不拘一格的观察。
back_translation: A unique and unconventional observation of sweat factories in New York filled with small booths.

text: and lastly there 's dinka , a fellow barber who is madly in love with terri but does n't get the time of day .
translation: 最后还有丁卡，一个理发师，他疯狂地爱着特里，却得不到任何回应。
back_translation: Finally, there's Dinka, a barber who is madly in love with Terry, but receives no response.

text: through it all , carlos comes to understand that if he is to make it as a comic artist , he must engage with the community he comes from , take that experience back out into the world , and put it in his work .
translation: 通过这一切，卡洛斯明白如果他想以漫画艺术家身份成功，必须与他所来自的社区互动，把这种经历带回到世界中，并融入到他的作品中。
back_translation: Through all of this, Carlos understood that if he wanted to succeed as a comic artist, he had to engage with the community he came from, bring that experience back into the world, and incorporate it into his work.

text: it 's difficult to imagine that a more confused , less interesting and more sloppily made film could possibly come down the road in 2002 .
translation: 很难想象在2002年会有一部更加混乱、缺乏趣味、制作更加粗糙的电影问世。
back_translation: It's hard to imagine that in 2002 there could be a film that is more chaotic, lacks interest, and is produced more poorly.

text: the result reverberates on the screen with a deadly force and fury more intense than anything mr . scorsese has yet achieved on the meanest and most beloved streets he could imagine or recall .
translation: 结果在屏幕上以一种致命的力量和愤怒回响，强烈程度超越了斯科塞斯先生迄今为止在他能想象或回忆起的最艰苦和最受喜爱的街道上所取得的任何成就。
back_translation: The result resonated on the screen with a deadly force and anger, the intensity surpassing any achievement Mr. Scorsese has attained so far on the most arduous and beloved streets he can imagine or recall.

text: uses sharp humor and insight into human nature to examine class conflict , adolescent yearning , the roots of friendship and sexual identity .
translation: 运用尖锐的幽默感和对人性的洞察，探讨阶级冲突、青少年的渴望、友谊的根源和性别认同。
back_translation: Using sharp humor and insights into human nature, explore class conflict, adolescent desires, the roots of friendship, and gender identity.

text: in doing so , he learns that the conventional answers of easy availability of guns , violent national history , violent entertainment and even poverty are inadequate to explain this violence when other cultures share those same factors without the equivalent carnage .
translation: 在这样做的过程中，他认识到，枪支的易得性、暴力的国家历史、暴力娱乐甚至贫困等传统答案无法充分解释这种暴力，因为其他文化也分享这些相同因素却没有同等的伤亡。
back_translation: In the process of doing this, he realized that the accessibility of guns, the historical violence of the nation, violent entertainment, and even poverty—traditional answers—could not fully explain this violence, as other cultures also share these same factors but do not experience equivalent casualties.

text: nine queens is exactly the sort of film hollywood is always re-making and utterly ruining in the process . see it in this incarnation .
translation: 《九个女王》正是好莱坞总是重拍并在过程中彻底毁掉的电影类型。以这部版本来观看吧。
back_translation: "Nine Queens" is exactly the type of movie that Hollywood always remakes and ends up completely destroying in the process. Watch it based on this version.

text: by turns gripping , amusing , tender and heart-wrenching , laissez-passer has all the earmarks of french cinema at its best .
translation: 《通行证》时而扣人心弦，时而有趣，时而温柔，时而令人心碎，展现了法国电影最佳的特质。
back_translation: "Passages" is at times gripping, at times interesting, at times tender, and at times heartbreaking, showcasing the best qualities of French cinema.

text: it 's a shame the marvelous first 101 minutes have to be combined with the misconceived final 5 .
translation: 真可惜精彩的前101分钟必须与错误构思的最后5分钟结合在一起。
back_translation: It's a pity that the exciting first 101 minutes must be combined with the poorly conceived last 5 minutes.

text: when a movie is as down-and-out funny as austin powers in goldmember , it 's easy to overlook the missed opportunities and fizzled jokes littering the barrage of hilarity .
translation: 当一部电影像《奥斯汀·鲍尔斯：金牌大盗》一样令人捧腹时，很容易忽视那些被错过的机会和散发着冷场的笑话，这些笑话在欢笑的洪流中显得微不足道。
back_translation: When a movie is as hilarious as "Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me," it's easy to overlook the missed opportunities and awkward jokes that feel insignificant amidst the flood of laughter.

text: with the help of his roommate , joe and his roommate 's girlfriend , bess , peter begins to explore more about himself and his values only to be crushed by those who love him .
translation: 在室友乔和他女朋友贝丝的帮助下，彼得开始更加探索自己和自己的价值观，却被那些爱他的人深深打击。
back_translation: With the help of his roommate Joe and his girlfriend Beth, Peter began to explore himself and his values more deeply, but he was profoundly affected by those who love him.

text: the story , touching though it is , does not quite have enough emotional resonance or variety of incident to sustain a feature , and even at 85 minutes it feels a bit long .
translation: 尽管这个故事感人，但情感的共鸣和事件的多样性不足以支撑一部完整的电影，即使在85分钟的时长下也显得有些冗长。
back_translation: Although this story is touching, the emotional resonance and the diversity of events are not enough to support a complete film, making it feel somewhat lengthy even at 85 minutes.

text: luckily , this would n't be sabina 's final contribution to psychoanalysis .
translation: 幸运的是，这不会是萨宾娜对心理分析的最后贡献。
back_translation: Fortunately, this will not be Sabina's last contribution to psychoanalysis.

text: when in their thirties , they lose their father and inherit his second-hand bookshop .
translation: 在他们三十多岁的时候，他们失去了父亲，并继承了他的二手书店。
back_translation: In their thirties, they lost their father and inherited his second-hand bookstore.

text: when rebecca went away to college john thought webcams would help them keep in touch .
translation: 当丽贝卡去上大学时，约翰认为网络摄像头会帮助他们保持联系。
back_translation: When Rebecca went to college, John thought that the webcam would help them stay in touch.

text: they literally bump heads one night , and become best friends .
translation: 他们在一个晚上碰了头，成为了最好的朋友。
back_translation: They met one night and became the best of friends.

text: painted with broad strokes but with a palette of rich , colorful details .
translation: 用宽大的笔触绘制，但调色板上充满了丰富多彩的细节。
back_translation: Draw with broad strokes, but the palette is filled with rich and colorful details.

text: while playing , young t & # 252 ; rlich falls unconscious onto a duck nest and is carried away forever by the small river .
translation: 在玩耍时，年轻的Tü rlich昏倒在一个鸭巢上，最终被小河带走了。
back_translation: While playing, the young Tü rlich fainted on a duck nest and was eventually carried away by the small river.

text: in the meantime , she has had a little love affair with a young man from the village , found a girlfriend from her childhood days , swum in the sea , and found a way to live in peace with her melancholic memories .
translation: 与此同时，她与村子里的一个年轻人发生了一段小恋情，找到了一个儿时的女朋友，游过海，找到了与她忧郁回忆和平共处的方法。
back_translation: Meanwhile, she had a brief romance with a young man from the village, reconnected with a childhood girlfriend, swam across the sea, and found a way to coexist peacefully with her melancholic memories.

text: however he 's cauught by the mexican secret police and is forced to infiltrate a gruop political activist in the movement of 68 .
translation: 然而，他被墨西哥秘密警察逮捕，被迫渗透进68年运动中的一组政治活动人士。
back_translation: However, he was arrested by the Mexican secret police and forced to infiltrate a group of political activists in the 1968 movement.

text: mr . deeds is sure to give you a lot of laughs in this simple , sweet and romantic comedy .
translation: 《德德斯先生》一定会在这部简单、甜美且浪漫的喜剧中给你带来很多笑声。
back_translation: "Mr. Dedes" will surely bring you a lot of laughter in this simple, sweet, and romantic comedy.

text: truth to tell , if you 've seen more than half-a-dozen horror films , there 's nothing here you have n't seen before .
translation: 说实话，如果你看过超过六部恐怖片，这里没有什么是你没见过的。
back_translation: To be honest, if you've seen more than six horror movies, there's nothing here that you haven't seen before.

text: without the dark spookiness of crystal lake camp , the horror concept completely loses its creepy menace .
translation: 没有水晶湖营地的黑暗诡异气氛，这个恐怖概念完全失去了其阴森的威胁。
back_translation: Without the dark and eerie atmosphere of Crystal Lake Camp, this horror concept completely loses its ominous threat.

text: cruise 's character has the tables turned on him when he is accused of a future crime and must find out what brought it about and stop it before it can happen in the year 2054 , a so-called `` pre-crime division `` is working around washington , dc .
translation: 克鲁斯的角色在被指控未来犯罪时，情况反转，他必须找出导致这一切的原因并在2054年之前阻止它，所谓的“预犯罪部门”正在华盛顿特区运作。
back_translation: Kruze's role takes a turn when he is accused of a future crime; he must uncover the reasons behind it and stop it before 2054, as the so-called "Pre-Crime Division" is operating in Washington, D.C.

text: ricky is an ex-con with two strikes against him and is desperately trying to stay straight .
translation: 瑞奇是一个有过前科的罪犯，身上背负着两个罪名，正在拼命努力保持清白。
back_translation: Richie is a convicted criminal with a criminal record, burdened with two charges, and is desperately trying to maintain his innocence.

text: worthless , from its pseudo-rock-video opening to the idiocy of its last frames .
translation: 毫无价值，从其伪摇滚视频的开场到最后画面的愚蠢。
back_translation: Worthless, from the opening of its fake rock video to the stupid final scene.

text: unfortunatly fate was not on his side because problems on location caused the film to go bankrupt within 12 days of shooting .
translation: 不幸的是，命运并不站在他这一边，因为拍摄现场的问题导致电影在拍摄12天内破产。
back_translation: Unfortunately, fate was not on his side, as issues on set caused the film to go bankrupt within 12 days of shooting.

text: so she writes it using info from people who talk about him and writes an unflattering piece , which does n't make him happy .
translation: 所以她利用谈论他的人所提供的信息写了一篇不太恭维的文章，这让他感到不快。
back_translation: So she wrote a rather unflattering article using the information provided by those who talked about him, which displeased him.

text: nothing short of wonderful with its ten-year-old female protagonist and its steadfast refusal to set up a dualistic battle between good and evil .
translation: 这部作品完美无瑕，拥有十岁的女性主角，并坚决拒绝设定善与恶的二元对立斗争。
back_translation: This work is flawless, featuring a ten-year-old female protagonist, and firmly rejects the binary opposition of good and evil.

text: guru gulab leaves india for america and comes to stay in the neighbourhood of dr . anmol acharya ( aftab shivdasani ) .
translation: 古鲁·古拉布离开印度前往美国，来到德·安莫尔·阿查里亚（阿夫塔布·希夫达萨尼）的邻居。
back_translation: Guru Gulab left India for the United States and arrived at the neighbor of De Anmol Acharya (Aftab Shivdasani).

text: shaky close-ups of turkey-on-rolls , stubbly chins , liver spots , red noses and the filmmakers new bobbed do draw easy chuckles but lead nowhere .
translation: 摇晃的特写镜头展示了火鸡卷、胡茬下巴、肝斑、红鼻子和电影制作人的新短发，引发了轻松的笑声，但没有深入的意义。
back_translation: The shaky close-up shot showcases the turkey roll, stubbled chin, liver spots, red nose, and the filmmaker's new short hair, eliciting light laughter, but lacking any deeper meaning.

text: now the job is n't the payoff , it 's about payback .
translation: 现在这份工作不是回报，而是报复。
back_translation: Now this job is not a reward, but revenge.

text: a sparkling cosmopolitan comedy that plays fast and loose with sacred cows of family values .
translation: 一部璀璨的都市喜剧，轻松调侃家庭价值观的禁忌话题。
back_translation: A brilliant urban comedy that lightly satirizes taboo topics related to family values.

text: national lampoon 's van wilder was better than we expected ; a 'not a total waste of money ' kind of dateflick for those just hitting pre-collegiate years .
translation: 《国家公园的万威尔德》比我们预期的要好；对于那些刚进入大学前期的年轻人来说，是一部“并不是完全浪费钱”的约会影片。
back_translation: "Wild at Heart, Wild at Mind" is better than we expected; for young people just entering their early college years, it is a date film that is "not a complete waste of money."

text: mitch is left for dead in the desert -- or so they think -- rescued and nursed back to health by a gorgeous women named , angela rose ( nicole austin ) .
translation: 米奇在沙漠中被认为已经死去——或者他们是这么认为的——被一个名叫安吉拉·罗斯（妮可·奥斯汀）的美丽女人救起并悉心照料。
back_translation: Mickey is believed to be dead in the desert—or so they thought—until a beautiful woman named Angela Ross (Nicole Austin) rescued him and took care of him.

text: a feature documentary offering a gripping portrait of the esgenoopetitj mi'gmaq first nation during the summer of 2000 as the canadian government appears to wage war on the community for exercising their inherent and court-affirmed fishing rights .
translation: 一部纪实特写片，生动展现了2000年夏季的Esgenoopetitj Mi'gmaq第一民族，当时加拿大政府似乎对该社区发动战争，因其行使固有的、法院确认的捕鱼权。
back_translation: A documentary short film vividly showcases the Esgenoopetitj Mi'gmaq First Nation in the summer of 2000, during a time when the Canadian government seemed to wage war against the community for exercising its inherent, court-recognized fishing rights.

text: even if the ride 's a little bumpy , with a final lap that 's all too suspiciously smooth , you got ta give director roger michell , best known for the superfluous notting hill , credit for trying .
translation: 即使这趟旅程有些颠簸，最后一圈却过于平滑，导演罗杰·米歇尔（以多余的《诺丁山》闻名）仍值得称赞，因为他尝试过。
back_translation: Even though this journey has been a bit bumpy, the final lap is overly smooth. Director Roger Michell (known for the unnecessary "Notting Hill") is still worth praising for his attempt.

text: when images of nicholas 's absent father start to appear to him , the boy is understandably frightened .
translation: 当尼古拉斯缺席的父亲的影像开始出现在他面前时，这个男孩自然感到害怕。
back_translation: When the image of Nicholas's absent father began to appear before him, the boy naturally felt afraid.

text: so , shaun goes to great lengths with a little help from his girlfriend ashley and his drugged-out loser brother lance to get into stanford any way they see fit .

text: the two leads are almost good enough to camouflage the dopey plot , but so much naturalistic small talk , delivered in almost muffled exchanges , eventually has a lulling effect .

text: raunchy though [ cho 's ] material is , it embraces all comers , regardless of gender , sexuality , race or ethnicity . and it 's never been sharper -- or funnier -- than it is here .
translation: 尽管[cho的]材料粗俗，但它包容所有人，无论性别、性取向、种族或民族。而且它在这里表现得从未如此犀利——或者如此幽默。
back_translation: Although the material of [cho's] is crude, it is inclusive of everyone, regardless of gender, sexual orientation, race, or ethnicity. Moreover, it has never been so sharp here — or so humorous.

text: sincere energy gives this soul-searcher something magic to find - if even along the beaten path .

translation: 四个老朋友的友好假期——两对大学情侣——变得不愉快……然后

text: spielrein was a young russian-jewish woman of 18 when she arrived in august 1904 at the burgh & # 246 ; lzli clinic in zurich where carl gustav jung had set up shop .
