text: tackles the difficult subject of grief and loss with such life-embracing spirit that the theme does n't drag an audience down .

text: to the film 's credit , the acting is fresh and unselfconscious , and munch is a marvel of reality versus sappy sentiment .

text: rajput then gets together a team of three blind men vishwas prajapati ( akshay kumar ) , arjun verma ( arjun rampal ) and ilias ( paresh rawal ) who will help him obtain his vengeance and make a heap of money at the same time .
translation: 拉杰普特随后组建了一支由三名盲人组成的团队，分别是维什瓦斯·普拉贾帕提（阿克谢·库玛尔）、阿尔琼·维尔玛（阿尔琼·拉姆帕尔）和伊利亚斯（帕雷什·拉瓦尔），他们将帮助他实现复仇，并同时赚取一大笔钱。

text: . . . turns so unforgivably trite in its last 10 minutes that anyone without a fortified sweet tooth will likely go into sugar shock .

text: it has the ability to offend and put off everyone , but it holds you with its outrageousness .

text: this holds particularly true for blacky , a white teen who is more interested in books than sport , and his best friend , dumby , the aboriginal star of the team .

text: boon hock comes from a low-income family and needs to balance school and helping out at the food stall .

text: ultimately . . . the movie is too heady for children , and too preachy for adults .

back_translation: Ultimately, this movie is too profound for children and too preachy for adults.

text: the pace of the film is very slow ( for obvious reasons ) and that too becomes off-putting .
translation: 电影的节奏非常缓慢（出于明显的原因），这也令人感到不适。

text: by turns whimsical and absurdist , babek payami 's secret ballot is a slight but likable iranian film with the flavor of a shaggy-dog story conceived by samuel beckett and directed by jim jarmusch .
translation: 风格时而异想天开、时而荒诞的巴贝克·帕亚米的《秘密投票》是一部轻松但讨喜的伊朗电影，仿佛是一则由塞缪尔·贝克特构思、吉姆·贾木许执导的长篇笑话。
back_translation: The style of Babek Payami's "Secret Vote," at times whimsical and at times absurd, is a light yet charming Iranian film, as if it were a long joke conceived by Samuel Beckett and directed by Jim Jarmusch.

text: reminds viewers of how beautiful and sexy a pregnant woman can be .
translation: 提醒观众怀孕的女性可以是多么美丽和迷人。

text: veteran actor serrault and rising newcomer seigner . . . pitch their performances perfectly , skilfully underplaying to match carion 's understated direction .

text: a lean , surprisingly artful programmer , closer in spirit to something like don siegel 's riot in cell block 11 than to typical boxing fare .
translation: 一个精瘦、出人意料地富有艺术感的程序员，精神上更接近于唐·西格尔的《监狱11号的骚乱》，而非典型的拳击题材。
back_translation: A lean, surprisingly artistic programmer, mentally closer to Don Siegel's "Riots in Cell Block 11" than to a typical boxing theme.

text: but seemingly coming to her rescue is isabelle ( tina krause ) , a mysterious and voluptuous woman who offers her food and shelter .
translation: 但看似前来救助她的是伊莎贝尔（蒂娜·克劳斯），一个神秘而丰满的女人，她为她提供食物和庇护。
back_translation: But it seems that the one come to her rescue is Isabel (Tina Klaus), a mysterious and voluptuous woman, who provides her with food and shelter.

text: captivates and shows how a skillful filmmaker can impart a message without bludgeoning the audience over the head .
translation: 吸引人并展示了一位熟练的电影制作人如何在不猛击观众的情况下传达信息。

text: this documentary captures the life story of legendary hollywood producer and studio chief robert evans .
translation: 这部纪录片讲述了传奇好莱坞制作人和制片厂负责人罗伯特·埃文斯的生平故事。

text: those who do n't entirely 'get ' godard 's distinctive discourse will still come away with a sense of his reserved but existential poignancy .
translation: 那些不完全理解戈达尔独特话语的人，仍然会感受到他内敛但存在主义的深刻情感。

text: one of those joyous films that leaps over national boundaries and celebrates universal human nature .
translation: 是一部跨越国界、庆祝普遍人性的快乐电影。

text: [ reynolds ] takes a classic story , casts attractive and talented actors and uses a magnificent landscape to create a feature film that is wickedly fun to watch .
translation: [ 雷诺兹 ] 采用了一个经典故事，选择了迷人而有才华的演员，并利用壮丽的自然风光，制作了一部令人愉悦的影片。
back_translation: [Reynolds] has adopted a classic story, selected charming and talented actors, and utilized magnificent natural scenery to create a delightful film.

text: daphne , a free-spirited american 19-year-old ( amanda bynes ) raised by her equally free-spirited mother goes to england to establish a relationship with her father ( colin firth ) , who turns out to be a prominent political figure heavily involved in social customs .
translation: 达芙妮，19岁，性格自由奔放的美国女孩（阿曼达·拜恩斯饰），在同样性格自由的母亲的抚养下，前往英国与她的父亲（科林·费尔斯饰）建立关系，发现她的父亲是一位在社会习俗中深有影响力的显赫政治人物。
back_translation: Daphne, a 19-year-old free-spirited American girl (played by Amanda Bynes), is raised by her equally free-spirited mother and travels to England to establish a relationship with her father (played by Colin Firth), only to discover that he is a prominent political figure with a significant influence on social customs.

text: the santa clause 2 `` goes down as easy as an eggnog on christmas eve .
translation: 《圣诞老人的秘密2》就像平安夜喝蛋奶酒一样轻松。

text: much like robin williams , death to smoochy has already reached its expiration date .
translation: 就像罗宾·威廉姆斯一样，《死亡如虹》已经过期了。
back_translation: Just like Robin Williams, "Death as a Rainbow" has expired.

text: as elegantly crafted as it often is , anderson 's movie is essentially a one-trick pony that , hampered by an undeveloped script , ultimately pulls up lame .
translation: 尽管安德森的电影制作精良，但本质上是一部单一技巧的影片，由于剧本未成熟，最终显得无能为力。
back_translation: Although Anderson's film is well-crafted, it is essentially a one-note film that ultimately feels ineffectual due to an immature script.

text: a little girl steals from the jar , containing her poor family 's meager savings .
translation: 一个小女孩从装着她贫穷家庭微薄积蓄的罐子里偷钱。
back_translation: A little girl stole money from a jar that contained her poor family's meager savings.

text: as they struggle to get out of the country and fight to stay alive , they find a special love and compassion from which emerges their ultimate moral and spiritual redemption .
translation: 在他们挣扎着逃离这个国家并奋力求生时，他们发现了一种特殊的爱和同情，从中孕育出他们最终的道德和精神救赎。
back_translation: As they struggled to escape the country and desperately sought survival, they discovered a special love and compassion, which gave rise to their ultimate moral and spiritual redemption.

text: greg puts up with martha 's harsh criticism in exchange for a place to lay-low until he can evade the police and repair his delicate relationship with his young daughter , chelsea .
translation: 格雷格忍受玛莎的严厉批评，以换取一个藏身的地方，直到他能躲避警方并修复与他年轻女儿切尔西的微妙关系。
back_translation: Greg endures Martha's harsh criticism in exchange for a place to hide until he can evade the police and mend his delicate relationship with his young daughter, Chelsea.

text: but will 's drive for the brass ring hits a last-minute obstacle when his mistress suddenly vanishes - with the capital for his latest plans for expansion .
translation: 但他的追求成功的愿望在最后关头遇到了障碍，因为他的情妇突然消失了，带走了他最新扩展计划的资金。
back_translation: But his desire for success in his pursuit encountered an obstacle at the last moment, as his mistress suddenly disappeared, taking away the funds for his latest expansion plan.

text: it is too bad that this likable movie is n't more accomplished . the actors try hard but come off too amateurish and awkward .
translation: 这部可爱的电影实在太可惜了，它并没有更出色。演员们虽然努力表演，但显得太过业余和笨拙。

text: handsome , charming and undeniably self-absorbed , he treats her more like a nanny than a harvard law grad and can barely choose a tie without her help .
translation: 英俊、迷人且无可否认地自恋，他对待她的态度更像是对待保姆，而不是哈佛法学院的毕业生，几乎连选择领带都需要她的帮助。
back_translation: Handsome, charming, and undeniably narcissistic, his attitude towards her was more like that of a caretaker than a graduate from Harvard Law School, needing her help even for choosing a tie.

text: slowly , patricia regains her joy of life although living in complete isolation .
translation: 虽然生活在完全孤立中，帕特里夏慢慢地重新找回了生活的快乐。
back_translation: Although living in complete isolation, Patricia gradually rediscovered the joy of life.

text: like the best of godard 's movies . . . it is visually ravishing , penetrating , impenetrable .
translation: 就像戈达尔最好的一些电影一样……它在视觉上令人惊艳，深刻而又难以捉摸。
back_translation: Like some of Godard's best films... it is visually stunning, profound, and elusive.

text: on a purely pictorial level , this is one of the best-looking imax movies ever .
translation: 从纯粹的画面角度来看，这是有史以来最漂亮的IMAX电影之一。

text: now she ca n't perform the song , and aksel realizes he must take action !
translation: 现在她无法演唱这首歌，阿克塞尔意识到他必须采取行动！

text: when you resurrect a dead man , hard copy should come a-knocking , no ?
translation: 当你复活一个死人的时候，硬拷贝应该来敲门，不是吗？
back_translation: When you resurrect a dead person, shouldn't a hard copy come knocking at the door?

text: a pathetic exploitation film that tries to seem sincere , and just seems worse for the effort .
translation: 一部可怜的剥削片，试图显得真诚，但反而让人觉得更糟。

text: the result puts a human face on derrida , and makes one of the great minds of our times interesting and accessible to people who normally could n't care less .
translation: 这个结果让德里达的人性化，使我们这个时代的一位伟大思想家对那些通常毫不关心的人变得有趣且易于接近。

text: the making of the dragon is a comedic satire ( not a spoof ) of the kung-fu film genre .
translation: 《龙的制作》是一部对功夫电影类型的喜剧讽刺（而非恶搞）。
back_translation: "Dragon's Production" is a comedic satire (rather than a parody) of the kung fu film genre.

text: jones ' desire was to document the creative work of yhf 's production , he seems to have found a bit more , including band members departing and a conflict with reprise record company .
translation: 琼斯的愿望是记录YHF制作的创作工作，他似乎发现了更多，包括乐队成员的离开和与复兴唱片公司的冲突。
back_translation: Jones' wish is to document the creative work produced by YHF, and he seems to have uncovered more, including the departure of band members and conflicts with the Revival record company.

text: the longer version may be truer to tornatore 's tripartite vision -- and less simply cloying and calculated -- but ultimately it 's also less coherent and emotionally satisfying .
translation: 较长的版本可能更符合托尔纳托雷的三部曲愿景——并且不那么简单、令人厌烦和有心计——但最终它也不那么连贯，情感上不那么令人满足。
back_translation: A longer version may better align with Tornatore's trilogy vision—less simplistic, tedious, and calculating—but ultimately, it is also less coherent and emotionally satisfying.

text: when a movie asks you to feel sorry for mick jagger 's sex life , it already has one strike against it .
translation: 当一部电影让你为米克·贾格尔的性生活感到同情时，它就已经有了一个不利之处。
back_translation: When a movie makes you feel sympathy for Mick Jagger's love life, it already has a disadvantage.

text: how much you are moved by the emotional tumult of [ franM-gois and michM-hle 's ] relationship depends a lot on how interesting and likable you find them .
translation: 你对[ franM-gois 和 michM-hle ]关系的情感波动有多感动，很多程度上取决于你觉得他们有多有趣和可爱。
back_translation: Your emotional fluctuations regarding the relationship between FranM-gois and MichM-hle largely depend on how interesting and cute you find them.

text: three astronauts crash land on an earth-like planet after returning from a 7-year long expedition to ganymede .
translation: 三名宇航员在经历了为期七年的木卫三探险后，坠毁在一个类地行星上。
back_translation: Three astronauts crashed onto a rocky planet after a seven-year exploration of Europa.

text: louis is a struggling painter whose life is turned upside down when his wish comes true and he becomes trapped in his own paintings .
translation: 路易是一位挣扎的画家，当他的愿望实现并被困在自己的画作中时，他的生活彻底颠覆了。
back_translation: Louis is a struggling painter, and when his wish comes true and he gets trapped in his own artwork, his life is completely turned upside down.

text: poor ben bratt could n't find stardom if mapquest emailed him point-to-point driving directions .
translation: 可怜的本·布拉特，如果地图导航给他发送逐点驾驶路线，他也找不到成名之路。
back_translation: Poor Ben Blatter, even if the map navigation sends him step-by-step driving directions, he still can't find his way to fame.

text: the movie 's major and most devastating flaw is its reliance on formula , though , and it 's quite enough to lessen the overall impact the movie could have had .
translation: 这部电影最大的也是最致命的缺陷在于它依赖于公式化的模式，这足以削弱电影原本可能产生的整体影响。
back_translation: The biggest and most fatal flaw of this film lies in its reliance on a formulaic pattern, which is enough to diminish the overall impact that the film could have originally produced.

text: the discoveries made by bob cornuke and larry williams will shock the world and rewrite history .
translation: 鲍勃·科尔纽克和拉里·威廉姆斯所做的发现将震惊世界并重写历史。
back_translation: The discoveries made by Bob Kohnuk and Larry Williams will shock the world and rewrite history.

text: merchant has n't directed this movie so much as produced it -- like sausage .
translation: 商人并没有像制作香肠那样导演这部电影，而是更像是制作了它。
back_translation: The merchant did not direct this film like making sausages, but rather more like produced it.

text: an engaging documentary about people who live in unusual homes .
translation: 一部关于住在不寻常房屋的人们的引人入胜的纪录片。
back_translation: An engaging documentary about people living in unusual houses.

text: ' . . . young , savvy cinematic sensibility framed by the limitations of a conservative , unrelenting culture . '
translation: “……年轻、聪明的电影感性受到保守、不妥协文化的局限。”
back_translation: "...... The youthful and intelligent cinematic sensibility is limited by a conservative and uncompromising culture."

text: it takes us finally to the comedy clubs that for so many years we saw only at the beginning and end of seinfeld .
translation: 这最终带我们来到喜剧俱乐部，许多年里我们只在《宋飞正传》的开头和结尾看到过这些地方。
back_translation: This ultimately brings us to the comedy club, places we have only seen at the beginning and end of "Seinfeld" for many years.

text: jimmy tong ( chan ) is just a lowly chauffeur for millionaire clark devlin ( isaacs ) , until devlin has an accident that puts him in the hospital .
translation: 吉米·汤（詹）只是百万富翁克拉克·德夫林（艾萨克斯）的一个低ly司机，直到德夫林发生意外住进医院。
back_translation: Jimmy Tang (Zhan) was just a lowly driver for millionaire Clark Devlin (Isaacs) until Devlin had an accident and was hospitalized.

text: is life a series of uncontrollable events that are laid out for us or is it truly what we make of it ?
translation: 生活是我们所经历的一系列无法控制的事件，还是我们真正创造的？
back_translation: Is life a series of uncontrollable events that we experience, or is it something we truly create?

text: it is psychedelic , hypnotic , exhilarating and horrifying , and sometimes all at once .
translation: 它是迷幻的、催眠的、令人振奋的和恐怖的，有时这一切会同时发生。
back_translation: It is psychedelic, hypnotic, exhilarating, and terrifying, and sometimes all of these happen at the same time.

text: herzog , a man of detail became enraptured with his subject and was unable to use his editing shears .
translation: 赫尔佐格，这位注重细节的人，对他的主题产生了强烈的兴趣，以至于无法使用他的编辑剪刀。
back_translation: Herzog, a detail-oriented person, developed a strong interest in his subject to the extent that he could not use his editing scissors.

text: vikrant wrongly implicates guru gulab in a very serious crime , which forces him to flee out of the india .
translation: 维克兰特错误地将古鲁·古拉布牵连到一起非常严重的犯罪中，这迫使他逃离印度。
back_translation: Vikrant wrongfully implicated Guru Gulab in a very serious crime, which forced him to flee India.

text: with the help of a fellow believer ( hugh mclean ) , and despite several obstacles in the way , he sets out on this mission to fulfill his goal .
translation: 在一位信徒（休·麦克莱恩）的帮助下，尽管面临几重障碍，他仍然踏上了这一使命，以实现自己的目标。
back_translation: With the help of a believer (Hugh McLean), he embarked on this mission to achieve his goal, despite facing several obstacles.

text: unlike cinderella though , ella must depend on herself and her intelligence to get her through her troubles and find lucinda in order for her `` curse `` to be broken !
translation: 与灰姑娘不同，艾拉必须依靠自己和她的智慧度过难关，并找到露辛达，以便解除她的“诅咒”！
back_translation: Unlike Cinderella, Ella must rely on herself and her intelligence to get through difficulties and find Lucinda in order to lift her "curse"!

text: but one day everything changes when a dog named lucky enters his life .
translation: 但有一天，一只名叫幸运的狗改变了他的生活。
back_translation: But one day, a dog named Lucky changed his life.

text: when his mom named him after warren beatty . . .
translation: 当他妈妈以沃伦·比蒂的名字给他命名时……
back_translation: When his mother named him after Warren Beatty...

text: it 's hard to say who might enjoy this , are there tolstoy groupies out there ? it 's dark and tragic , and lets the business of the greedy talent agents get in the way of saying something meaningful about facing death
translation: 很难说谁可能会喜欢这个，外面有没有托尔斯泰的粉丝？这是黑暗而悲惨的，让贪婪的经纪人的商业行为妨碍了对面对死亡说一些有意义的话。
back_translation: It's hard to say who might like this. Are there any Tolstoy fans out there? It's dark and tragic, letting the greedy actions of agents interfere with saying something meaningful about facing death.

text: time of fear is a taut psychological thriller thrusting an fbi agent and a grieving father into the dark world of a demented killer .
translation: 《恐惧之时》是一部紧张的心理惊悚片，将一名联邦调查局特工和一位悲痛的父亲推入一个疯狂杀手的黑暗世界。
back_translation: "Time of Fear" is a tense psychological thriller that plunges an FBI agent and a grieving father into the dark world of a crazed killer.

text: despite the film 's bizarre developments , hoffman keeps us riveted with every painful nuance , unexpected flashes of dark comedy and the character 's gripping humanity .
translation: 尽管影片的发展非常离奇，霍夫曼通过每一个痛苦的细微之处、意外的黑色幽默闪现和角色扣人心弦的人性，使我们保持着紧张的关注。
back_translation: Despite the bizarre development of the film, Hoffman keeps us engaged with tense attention through every painful detail, unexpected flashes of dark humor, and the characters' compelling humanity.

text: `` bums in the mist `` will expose you to a world where alcohol is king and sloth is a virtue ; buddy george will discover , bums who are able to find love and professional success all while maintaining their `` mondern frontiersman `` lifestyle ; bums who 's natural gifts enable them to move down the ladder of success at an astronomical rate ( or whatever the opposite of astronomical is ) and who 's penchant for violence impact every aspect of their lives .
translation: 《雾中的流浪汉》将让你接触一个以酒为王、懒惰为美德的世界；乔治伙伴将发现，那些能够找到爱情和职业成功的流浪汉，同时维持他们的“现代边疆人”生活方式；那些自然天赋使他们以惊人的速度（或与惊人相反的速度）下滑成功阶梯的流浪汉，以及他们对暴力的偏好影响着生活的方方面面。
back_translation: "The Drifter in the Mist" will introduce you to a world where alcohol reigns and laziness is seen as a virtue; George's companions will discover that those drifters who manage to find love and career success at the same time maintain their "modern frontier" lifestyle; the naturally gifted drifters who slide down the ladder of success at an astonishing speed (or, conversely, at an astonishingly slow pace), and how their preference for violence affects every aspect of their lives.

text: little does he know , he is investigating some of the biggest events of the star wars saga , as he finds out that there is a connection between the assassination attempts and a separtists movement led by a former jedi ( christopher lee ) against the republic .
translation: 他并不知道，他正在调查星球大战传奇中一些重大的事件，因为他发现刺杀阴谋与一个由前绝地武士（克里斯托弗·李）领导的分裂主义运动之间存在联系，该运动是反对共和国的。
back_translation: He is unaware that he is investigating some major events in the Star Wars legends, as he discovers a connection between the assassination plot and a separatist movement led by a former Jedi Knight (Christopher Lee) that is opposing the Republic.

text: however , nicholas can not keep the creature hidden forever and must eventually face his own feelings .
translation: 然而，尼古拉斯无法永远将生物隐藏起来，最终必须面对自己的感受。
back_translation: However, Nicholas cannot hide his feelings forever and must eventually confront them.

text: it takes you on a personal journey through one family 's history , one man 's self-destructive grief and a love that transcends time and death .
translation: 它带你踏上个人旅程，穿越一个家庭的历史，一个男人自我毁灭的悲痛，以及超越时间和死亡的爱。
back_translation: It takes you on a personal journey, traversing a family's history, the pain of a man's self-destruction, and love that transcends time and death.

text: short stories revolving around a bar and a hotel in recife , unveil a mosaic of exotic characters living in the brazilian underground : a butcher married with an evangelical woman , a necrophile in love with a bar owner , a transvestite , and many others .
translation: 围绕着累西腓的一家酒吧和一家酒店的短篇故事，揭示了生活在巴西地下社会的异域角色的马赛克：一个与一位福音派女性结婚的屠夫，一个爱上酒吧老板的恋尸癖者，一个变性人，以及许多其他人物。
back_translation: A short story set around a bar and a hotel in Recife reveals a mosaic of exotic characters living in Brazil's underground scene: a butcher married to an evangelical woman, a necrophiliac in love with the bar owner, a transgender person, and many other characters.

text: compared to sorority boys . . . this is high comedic art .
translation: 与《联谊会男孩》相比……这是高级喜剧艺术。
back_translation: Compared to "The Boys of the Fellowship"... this is high comedic art.

text: character development is conveyed primarily through the combatants actions and the choices they make as they progress across their combat route .
translation: 角色的发展主要通过战斗者的行动和他们在战斗路线中所做的选择来传达。
back_translation: The development of characters is primarily conveyed through the actions of the fighters and the choices they make in the battle route.

text: a broad stylistic combination of cinema verit & # 233 ; and magic realism , the film follows emile 's life as he tries to reconnect with his last remaining relation nada .
translation: 这部电影在纪录片风格和魔幻现实主义之间广泛结合，讲述了埃米尔的生活，他试图重新与他最后的亲人纳达建立联系。
back_translation: This film extensively combines documentary style and magical realism, narrating the life of Emil as he tries to reconnect with his last remaining relative, Nada.

text: he is haunted by the ghost of his deceased brother paul who guides him toward his salvation .
translation: 他受到已故兄弟保罗的灵魂的困扰，保罗引导他走向救赎。
back_translation: He is haunted by the spirit of his late brother Paul, who guides him towards redemption.

text: since all her architects are either busy otherwise or too conservative in style , this ambivalent honour falls to numerobis .
translation: 由于她所有的建筑师要么忙于其他事情，要么风格过于保守，这个模棱两可的荣誉落在了努梅罗比斯身上。
back_translation: Due to all her architects either being busy with other matters or having overly conservative styles, this ambiguous honor fell on Numebrobus.

text: a film that clearly means to preach exclusively to the converted .
translation: 一部显然只想向信奉者传教的电影。
back_translation: A film that clearly only wants to preach to its believers.

text: evokes the 19th century with a subtlety that is an object lesson in period filmmaking .
translation: 以微妙的方式唤起了19世纪，成为时代电影制作的一个经典例证。
back_translation: In a subtle way, it evokes the 19th century, becoming a classic example of period filmmaking.

text: with billy badly wounded , hotly pursued by a determined sheriff , the gang makes an unexpected and unwelcome visit .
translation: 比利重伤在身，受到一个坚定的警长的紧追不舍，团伙意外且不受欢迎地造访。
back_translation: Billy, severely injured, is relentlessly pursued by a determined sheriff, while an unexpected and unwelcome visit from a gang occurs.

text: when jason sees a movie preview of his story , he and best friend kaylee ( amanda bynes ) go to los angeles to make wolf confess to using jason 's story as well as to clear jason 's name and to get him out of having to attend summer school .
translation: 当杰森看到自己故事的电影预告时，他和最好的朋友凯莉（阿曼达·拜尼斯饰）一起去洛杉矶，让狼坦白使用了杰森的故事，并且为了给杰森洗清名声，免去他参加暑期学校的负担。
back_translation: When Jason saw the movie trailer for his story, he went to Los Angeles with his best friend Kelly (played by Amanda Bynes) to confront the wolf who had confessed to using Jason's story, in order to clear Jason's name and relieve him of the burden of attending summer school.

text: she must finally step out of her rarefied world and confront the assumptions on which she 's built her whole life .
translation: 她必须最终走出她那高高在上的世界，直面她用来构建整个生活的假设。
back_translation: She must ultimately step out of her lofty world and confront the assumptions she used to build her entire life.

text: a genuinely funny ensemble comedy that also asks its audience -- in a heartwarming , nonjudgmental kind of way -- to consider what we value in our daily lives .
translation: 一部真正搞笑的群体喜剧，它还以一种温情而不带评判的方式，邀请观众思考我们在日常生活中所重视的东西。
back_translation: A truly funny ensemble comedy that invites the audience to reflect on what we value in our daily lives in a warm and non-judgmental manner.

text: unfortunately things do n't go as planned , and when the kids ' van breaks down at an old slaughterhouse , they are hunted down one by one . . .
translation: 不幸的是事情没有按计划进行，当孩子们的面包车在一个旧屠宰厂坏掉时，他们一个接一个地被追捕……
back_translation: Unfortunately, things did not go as planned, and when the children's van broke down at an old slaughterhouse, they were chased one by one...

text: in the end , each must deal with the mysterious and , perhaps , scandalous reason their affair suddenly ended .
translation: 最终，每个人都必须面对他们的 affair 突然结束的神秘以及，也许，是丑闻般的原因。
back_translation: Ultimately, everyone must confront the mystery of their affairs suddenly coming to an end, and perhaps, the scandalous reasons behind it.

text: the teen must decide whether to become immortal and stay with a tuck she 's fallen in love with .
translation: 这个青少年必须决定是否变得不朽，与她所爱上的那个男孩在一起。
back_translation: This teenager must decide whether to become immortal and be with the boy she loves.

text: the performances are so leaden , michael rymer 's direction is so bloodless and the dialogue is so corny that the audience laughs out loud .
translation: 表演如此沉闷，迈克尔·瑞默的导演风格冷淡，台词如此老套，以至于观众忍不住大声笑出声。
back_translation: The performance was so dull, Michael Rhymer's directing style was so indifferent, and the dialogues were so clichéd that the audience couldn't help but laugh out loud.

text: movies like this are selling the old european candor , the old wink of 'bold ' revelation . but in 2002 , such revelations wilt .
translation: 这样的电影在销售旧欧洲的坦率，以及“大胆”揭示的旧调侃。但在2002年，这样的揭示已不再新鲜。
back_translation: Movies like this sell the frankness of old Europe and the "bold" unveiling of old jests. However, in 2002, such revelations were no longer fresh.

text: otis wants to relive the old days , mark does n't .
translation: 奥提斯想重温往日时光，马克则不想。
back_translation: Otis wants to relive the old days, while Mark does not.

text: one of the finest , most humane and important holocaust movies ever made .
translation: 最优秀、最人道和最重要的奥斯维辛电影之一。
back_translation: One of the most outstanding, humane, and important Auschwitz films.

text: a young korean war veteran returns home to find his parents have died and his wife has left him for another man .
translation: 一位年轻的韩国战争老兵回到家中，发现他的父母已经去世，妻子也和另一个男人离开了他。
back_translation: A young Korean War veteran returns home to find that his parents have passed away and his wife has left him for another man.

text: fontaine indulges her signature style , creating a carefully measured film -- the kind whose impact slowly sneaks up on its audience and haunts them long after leaving the theatre .
translation: 芳婷沉浸于她标志性的风格，创造了一部经过精心度量的电影——这种电影的影响力悄然袭来，令人久久难以忘怀，即使离开了影院也仍然萦绕在心头。
back_translation: Fang Ting immerses herself in her signature style, creating a meticulously crafted film—one whose impact quietly comes upon you, lingering in your mind long after leaving the theater.

text: living with the fosters is a darkly funny and dangerously subtle comedy about one family 's paranoid preparation for the year 2000 crisis and beyond .
translation: 与福斯特一家同住是一部黑暗幽默且微妙危险的喜剧，讲述了一个家庭对2000年危机及其后续的偏执准备。
back_translation: Living with the Foster family is a darkly humorous and subtly dangerous comedy that tells the story of a family grappling with the 2000 crisis and their ensuing paranoid preparations.

text: his odyssey finally leads him onto a theatre stage .
translation: 他的冒险最终将他引向了一个剧院舞台。
back_translation: His adventure eventually led him to a theater stage.

text: on his way he gets again and again into situations of obsessive self-uncovering .
translation: 在他的旅程中，他一次又一次地陷入强迫自我揭示的境地。
back_translation: Throughout his journey, he found himself in situations of forced self-revelation time and time again.

text: the connected stories of breitbart and hanussen are actually fascinating , but the filmmaking in invincible is such that the movie does not do them justice .
translation: 布雷特巴特和哈努森的相关故事实际上非常引人入胜，但《不可战胜》的电影制作使得这部电影没有呈现出它们的价值。
back_translation: The stories of Breitbart and Hanussen are actually very intriguing, but the filmmaking of "Unconquerable" does not showcase their value.

text: dex and eric are ordinary , twenty-something guys dealing with work , relationships and friends .
translation: 德克斯和埃里克是普通的二十多岁年轻人，正在处理工作、人际关系和朋友。
back_translation: Dex and Eric are ordinary young adults in their twenties, dealing with work, relationships, and friendships.

text: novak manages to capture a cruelly hilarious vein of black comedy in the situation with his cast of non-actors and a gritty , no-budget approach .
translation: 诺瓦克成功地在他的非职业演员阵容和粗犷、无预算的方式中捕捉到了一种残酷而搞笑的黑色幽默。
back_translation: Novak successfully captures a brutal and darkly comedic humor in his cast of non-professional actors and his rough, low-budget style.

text: malone does have a gift for generating nightmarish images that will be hard to burn out of your brain . but the movie 's narrative hook is way too muddled to be an effectively chilling guilty pleasure .
translation: 马龙确实有创造令人毛骨悚然的图像的天赋，这些图像会很难从你的脑海中抹去。但这部电影的叙事钩子实在太混乱，无法成为一种有效的令人毛骨悚然的罪恶快感。
back_translation: Ma Long truly has a talent for creating chilling images that are hard to erase from your mind. However, the narrative hooks in this film are too confusing to serve as an effective source of guilty pleasure that is truly eerie.

text: subconscious art : a product of artistic merit that was created without conscious artistic intentions .
translation: 潜意识艺术：一种没有意识艺术意图而创作的具有艺术价值的作品。
back_translation: Subconscious art: a work with artistic value created without conscious artistic intention.

text: if you 're part of her targeted audience , you 'll cheer . otherwise , maybe .
translation: 如果你是她的目标受众，你会为此欢呼。否则，可能就不会。
back_translation: If you are her target audience, you would cheer for it. Otherwise, you probably wouldn't.

text: however , when one of the lads accidentally shags a punter ( steven berkoff ) to death , they are forced to look for 'work ' elsewhere .
translation: 然而，当其中一个小伙子不小心把一个顾客（史蒂文·伯科夫）弄死后，他们被迫到其他地方寻找“工作”。
back_translation: However, when one of the guys accidentally killed a customer (Steven Burkoff), they were forced to look for "work" elsewhere.

text: the film provides some great insight into the neurotic mindset of all comics -- even those who have reached the absolute top of the game .
translation: 这部电影提供了对所有漫画家神经质心态的深刻洞察——即使是那些已经达到了顶尖水平的人。
back_translation: This movie offers a profound insight into the neurotic mindset of all cartoonists—even those who have reached the highest levels.

text: a perfect example of rancid , well-intentioned , but shamelessly manipulative movie making .
translation: 一个典型的令人厌恶、出于好意但无耻操控的电影制作例子。
back_translation: A typical example of a disgusting, well-meaning yet shamelessly manipulative film.

text: discarded and forgotten , pete williams is living out his days in an old soldiers home in galveston , texas .
translation: 被遗弃和遗忘的皮特·威廉姆斯正在德克萨斯州加尔维斯顿的一家老兵之家度过他的日子。
back_translation: Peter Williams, abandoned and forgotten, is spending his days at a veterans' home in Galveston, Texas.

text: while some will object to the idea of a vietnam picture with such a rah-rah , patriotic tone , soldiers ultimately achieves its main strategic objective : dramatizing the human cost of the conflict that came to define a generation .
translation: 尽管有人会反对以如此激昂、爱国的语气呈现越南战争的画面，但《士兵》最终达到了其主要战略目标：戏剧化这场定义了一代人的冲突所带来的人的代价。
back_translation: Although some may oppose presenting the images of the Vietnam War with such passionate and patriotic rhetoric, "The Soldier" ultimately achieved its primary strategic goal: to dramatize the human cost of a conflict that defined a generation.

text: for anni they are not enemies , but just men .
translation: 对安妮来说，他们不是敌人，而只是男人。
back_translation: To Annie, they were not enemies, but just men.

text: are they illusions , visions from the past , ghosts - or is it reality ?
translation: 它们是幻觉，是来自过去的幻影，鬼魂——还是现实？
back_translation: Are they illusions, specters from the past, ghosts—or reality?

text: sometimes makes less sense than the bruckheimeresque american action flicks it emulates .
translation: 有时比它模仿的布鲁克海默式美国动作片更缺乏逻辑。
back_translation: Sometimes it is even less logical than the Jerry Bruckheimer-style American action films it imitates.

text: M-^Eit was n't the subject matter that ultimately defeated the filmM-^Eit was the unfulfilling , incongruous , `` wait a second , did i miss something ? `` ending .
translation: 最终使这部电影失败的并不是主题内容，而是那个令人失望、不协调的“等一下，我是不是漏掉了什么？”的结尾。
back_translation: What ultimately caused this film to fail was not the thematic content, but rather the disappointing and disjointed ending that left one wondering, “Wait, did I miss something?”

text: the l . a . dogwalking scene provides a colorful backdrop for the story of ellie moore ( diane gaidry ) , damaged goods on the run from her latest abusive boyfriend and on the verge of transformation .
translation: 洛杉矶遛狗的场景为艾莉·穆尔（黛安·盖德里）这一故事提供了多姿多彩的背景，她是一个受过伤害的女孩，正在逃离她最新的虐待男友，并即将经历蜕变。
back_translation: The scene of walking dogs in Los Angeles provides a colorful backdrop for the story of Ellie Moore (Diane Gaidry), a wounded girl who is escaping her latest abusive boyfriend and is about to undergo a transformation.

text: the 50-something lovebirds are too immature and unappealing to care about .
translation: 这对五十多岁的恋人太幼稚且缺乏吸引力，让人无从关心。
back_translation: These lovers in their fifties are too immature and lack appeal, making it hard to care about them.

text: reluctantly , busy katherine allows patricia to audition and , at once , recognizes her incredible talent .
translation: 不情愿的忙碌凯瑟琳允许帕特里夏试镜，并立刻认出了她的惊人天赋。
back_translation: Reluctantly busy, Katherine allowed Patricia to audition and immediately recognized her incredible talent.

text: one of the best examples of how to treat a subject , you 're not fully aware is being examined , much like a photo of yourself you did n't know was being taken .
translation: 这是一个很好的例子，说明如何处理一个你并不完全了解的主题，就像是一张你不知道被拍摄的自己的照片。
back_translation: This is a good example of how to handle a subject you don't fully understand, like a photo of yourself that you don't know was taken.

text: the crassness of this reactionary thriller is matched only by the ridiculousness of its premise .
translation: 这种反动惊悚片的粗俗程度仅与其荒谬的前提相匹配。
back_translation: The vulgarity of this reactionary thriller is matched only by its absurd premise.

text: jones has crafted a natty narrative that , enhanced by erin nordstrom 's editing , is filled with payoffs .
translation: 琼斯创造了一种精致的叙事，在埃琳·诺德斯特罗姆的编辑下，充满了回报。
back_translation: Jones crafted a sophisticated narrative, edited by Erin Nordstrom, filled with rewards.

text: vividly conveys the shadow side of the 30-year friendship between two english women .
translation: 生动地传达了两位英国女性三十年友谊的阴暗面。
back_translation: Vividly conveys the dark side of the thirty-year friendship between two British women.

text: . . . fifty minutes of tedious adolescent melodramatics followed by thirty-five minutes of inflated nonsense .
translation: ……五十分钟烦人的青春剧 followed by 三十五分钟夸大的胡说八道。
back_translation: ...fifty minutes of annoying youth drama followed by thirty-five minutes of exaggerated nonsense.

text: the rebellion against sauron is building up and will be led by gandalf the white ( sir ian mckellen ) , who was thought to be dead after the balrog captured him .
translation: 反对索伦的叛乱正在酝酿中，领导者是甘道夫白袍（伊恩·麦克连饰），他在巴尔罗格捕获他后被认为已经死去。
back_translation: The rebellion against Sauron is brewing, led by Gandalf the White (played by Ian McKellen), who was thought to be dead after being captured by the Balrog.

text: every sequel you skip will be two hours gained . consider this review life-affirming .
translation: 你跳过的每个续集都将节省两个小时。请考虑这条评论是对生活的肯定。
back_translation: Every sequel you skip will save you two hours. Consider this comment as an affirmation of life.

text: that the chuck norris `` grenade gag `` occurs about 7 times during windtalkers is a good indication of how serious-minded the film is .
translation: 在《风语者》中出现了大约7次查克·诺里斯的“手榴弹笑话”，这很好地表明了这部电影的严肃性。
back_translation: The "Chuck Norris grenade joke" appears about seven times in "Windtalkers," which well illustrates the seriousness of the film.

text: together they discover that a corporation funds and is profitting from the plantation-like work environment they are forced to work under .
translation: 他们一起发现，一家公司资助并从他们被迫工作的种植园式工作环境中获利。
back_translation: They discovered together that a company was funding and profiting from the plantation-style work environment they were forced to work in.

text: in the 1880 's , chon wang ( jackie chan ) 's father and keeper of the imperial seal has been murdered by parliament and royal family member rathbone ( aidan gillen ) , ( who steals the imperial seal ) with chon wang 's sister , chon lin ( fann wong ) witnessing the murder .
translation: 在1880年代，崇王（成龙）的父亲和皇 Imperial Seal 的守护者被议会和皇家成员拉斯本（艾丹·吉伦）谋杀，拉斯本偷走了皇 Imperial Seal，而崇王的妹妹崇琳（范玮琪）目睹了这一谋杀。
back_translation: In the 1880s, the father of Prince Chong (Jackie Chan) and the guardian of the Imperial Seal were murdered by the parliament and royal member Rasban (Aidan Gillen). Rasban stole the Imperial Seal, and Prince Chong's sister, Chong Lin (Vanessa Wu), witnessed the murder.

text: the events of the film are just so weird that i honestly never knew what the hell was coming next .
translation: 电影的情节实在是太奇怪了，我真的是不知道接下来会发生什么。
back_translation: The plot of the movie is really strange, and I honestly don't know what will happen next.

text: the film is shot in multiple formats from 35mm ( the majority ) to the newer digital format of digi-beta , with a short , eerily beautiful dream segment shot in super-8 .
translation: 该影片使用多种格式拍摄，从35毫米（占大多数）到更新的数码格式Digi-beta，还有一段短小、诡异美丽的梦境片段是用Super-8拍摄的。
back_translation: The film is shot in various formats, ranging from 35mm (the majority) to the newer digital format Digi-beta, and there is a short, oddly beautiful dream sequence filmed in Super-8.

text: soon , however , they are regretting their decision and wishing christmas would hurry up and finish until a surprise christmas `` miracle `` , could there still be hope for christmas , and the websters ?
translation: 然而，他们很快就后悔了自己的决定，希望圣诞节快点结束，直到一个意外的圣诞“奇迹”出现，圣诞节和韦伯斯特一家还能有希望吗？
back_translation: However, they quickly regretted their decision and hoped Christmas would end soon, until an unexpected Christmas "miracle" occurred. Is there still hope for Christmas and the Webster family?

text: gino and settimo try to repay roberto 's hospitality by chasing off a debt collector who wants his property , but their strong arm tactics alarm him and he realises they are n't the pr consultants they claimed to be liquor store night clerk jose ( freddie ganno ) has two dreams : winning the state lottery and winning the heart of a lovely young shoe store salesperson , diana ( christi adams ) .
translation: 吉诺和塞蒂莫试图通过赶走想要他财产的债务催收员来回报罗伯托的款待，但他们的强硬手段让他感到不安，他意识到他们并不是所声称的公关顾问。酒类商店的夜班店员荷西（弗雷迪·甘诺）有两个梦想：赢得国家彩票和赢得年轻鞋店销售员戴安娜（克里斯蒂·亚当斯）的心。
back_translation: Gino and Setimo attempted to repay Roberto's hospitality by driving away the debt collector who wanted to seize his property, but their aggressive tactics made him uneasy, and he realized they were not the public relations consultants they claimed to be. The night clerk at the liquor store, Jose (Freddy Gano), has two dreams: to win the national lottery and to win the heart of the young shoe salesman, Diana (Christy Adams).

text: at night he is daredevil , a masked vigilante stalking the dark streets of the city , a relentless avenger of justice .
translation: 在夜晚，他是个英雄，一个面具下的义务者，潜伏在城市的黑暗街道上， relentless的正义复仇者。
back_translation: At night, he is a hero, a masked vigilante lurking in the dark streets of the city, a relentless avenger of justice.

text: pauly then fakes his own death , and the media goes crazy .
translation: 保利随后假装自己去世，媒体疯了。
back_translation: Poly then pretended to be dead, and the media went crazy.

text: with the exception of mccoist , the players do n't have a clue on the park . the acting is n't much better .
translation: 除了麦考伊斯特，其他球员在场上毫无头绪。表演也没好到哪里去。
back_translation: Apart from McIlwain, the other players were completely lost on the field. The performance wasn't very good either.

text: but jim 's team , knowing their coach is a great ball player , makes a deal with him : if they win the district championship , they want jim to try out for a major-league organization .
translation: 但是吉姆的队伍知道他们的教练是一位优秀的球员，因此和他达成了一个协议：如果他们赢得地区冠军，他们希望吉姆能试训一家大联盟球队。
back_translation: However, Jim's team knows that their coach is an excellent player, so they reached an agreement with him: if they win the regional championship, they hope Jim can try out for a Major League team.

text: watching beanie and his gang put together his slasher video from spare parts and borrowed materials is as much fun as it must have been for them to make it .
translation: 观看比尼和他的团队用备用零件和借来的材料制作他的恐怖视频，和他们制作时的乐趣一样有趣。
back_translation: Watching Binny and his team create his horror video using spare parts and borrowed materials is just as enjoyable as the fun they have while making it.

text: chock full of ethnic flavor , whimsy , doubt , faith , joy and wonder , mary and joe is a delightful surprise , as the old story is brought into the present with startling freshness and power .
translation: 充满了民族风情、奇思妙想、怀疑、信仰、快乐和惊奇，《玛丽与乔》是一个令人愉快的惊喜，古老的故事以惊人的新鲜感和力量被带入当代。
back_translation: Filled with ethnic charm, imaginative ideas, skepticism, faith, joy, and wonder, "Mary and Joe" is a delightful surprise, bringing an ancient story into the contemporary world with astonishing freshness and power.

text: unfortunately , the bomb goes off unplanned and kills four innocent people .
translation: 不幸的是，炸弹意外爆炸，导致四名无辜的人遇难。
back_translation: Unfortunately, the bomb accidentally exploded, resulting in the deaths of four innocent people.

text: that rare film whose real-life basis is , in fact , so interesting that no embellishment is needed .
translation: 那部罕见的电影，其真实基础实际上如此有趣，甚至不需要任何修饰。
back_translation: The rare film has such an interesting true foundation that it doesn’t even require any embellishment.

text: he 's confused , he 's hurt , and he does n't know what to do .
translation: 他很困惑，他很受伤，他不知道该怎么办。
back_translation: He is very confused, he is very hurt, and he doesn't know what to do.

text: more concerned with overall feelings , broader ideas , and open-ended questions than concrete story and definitive answers , soderbergh 's solaris is a gorgeous and deceptively minimalist cinematic tone poem .
translation: 索德伯格的《太阳陷落》是一部华丽且表面上简约的电影抒情诗，更关注整体感受、广泛的观念和开放式的问题，而不是具体的故事和明确的答案。
back_translation: Sodeberg's "The Sun Sets" is a magnificent yet seemingly minimalist cinematic poem that focuses more on the overall feeling, broad concepts, and open-ended questions rather than specific stories or clear answers.

text: while everybody else sweats and frets , jim 's dad is cool while giving advice and getting ready for one of the best days of his life .
translation: 当其他人都紧张不安时，吉姆的父亲却很冷静，一边提供建议，一边为他生命中最美好的日子之一做准备。
back_translation: While others were anxious and unsettled, Jim's father remained calm, offering advice and preparing for one of the best days of his life.

text: once convicted , he ends up on death row in texas himself , telling his story to a reporter through a series of flashbacks .
translation: 一旦被定罪，他最终在德克萨斯州的死刑监狱里，透过一系列的闪回向一位记者讲述自己的故事。
back_translation: Once convicted, he ultimately recounts his story to a journalist through a series of flashbacks while in Death Row in Texas.

text: russian ark moves beyond a simple technical exercise and into the realm of greatness . it 's a masterpiece on every level .
translation: 《俄罗斯方舟》超越了简单的技术练习，进入了伟大的领域。它在各个层面上都是一部杰作。
back_translation: "Russian Ark" goes beyond being a mere technical exercise; it enters the realm of greatness. It is a masterpiece on all levels.

text: the pianist is a fine valedictory work for polanski , made richer by his own experiences , making his other movies somehow richer in the bargain .
translation: 《钢琴家》是波兰斯基的一部精彩的告别作品，因他自身的经历而更加深厚，从而使他的其他电影在交易中也变得更加丰富。
back_translation: "The Pianist" is a brilliant farewell work by Polanski, made even more profound by his own experiences, which enriches his other films as well.

text: in the latino neighborhood of new york city 's washington heights , two sons of immigrants one dominican , one irish wrestle with ambition and identity , only to discover that sometimes pursuing one 's dreams comes at a heavy cost .
translation: 在纽约市华盛顿高地的拉丁裔社区，两个移民的儿子，一个是多米尼加人，一个是爱尔兰人， wrestle with ambition and identity，最终发现追求梦想有时会付出沉重的代价。
back_translation: In the Latinx community of Washington Heights in New York City, two immigrant sons, one Dominican and one Irish, wrestle with ambition and identity, ultimately discovering that the pursuit of dreams can sometimes come with a heavy price.

text: it 's fun , wispy , wise and surprisingly inoffensive for a film about a teen in love with his stepmom .
translation: 这部电影有趣、轻盈、聪明，令人惊讶的是，对于一个关于青少年爱上继母的故事来说，竟然如此不冒犯。
back_translation: This movie is interesting, light, and clever, and surprisingly, for a story about a teenager falling in love with their stepmother, it is remarkably non-offensive.

text: too bad maggio could n't come up with a better script .
translation: 真可惜，马焦无法想出更好的剧本。
back_translation: It's a pity that Majao can't come up with a better script.

text: the tragic real life story of a serial killer who stalked his victims in the early 1970 's in small town america .
translation: 在1970年代初，美国小镇上，一名连续杀手追踪受害者的悲惨真实故事。
back_translation: In the early 1970s, a tragic true story of a serial killer stalking victims in a small American town.

text: its message has merit and , in the hands of a brutally honest individual like prophet jack , might have made a point or two regarding life .
translation: 它的信息是有价值的，而在像先知杰克这样一个直言不讳的人手中，可能会对生活提出一两点见解。
back_translation: Its information is valuable, and in the hands of someone outspoken like Prophet Jack, it may offer one or two insights into life.

text: five hundred years before columbus ( 996 a . d . ) , a young norwegian viking with the heart of a lion and the soul of a poet discovers america while on a quest to bring his loved one to 'the top of the world ' .
translation: 在哥伦布之前的五百年（公元996年），一个年轻的挪威维京人，拥有狮子的心和诗人的灵魂，在寻求将心爱之人带到“世界之巅”的过程中发现了美洲。
back_translation: Five hundred years before Columbus (in the year 996), a young Norwegian Viking, with the heart of a lion and the soul of a poet, discovered America while seeking to bring his beloved to the "top of the world."

text: over 80 of the world 's greatest martial artists demonstrate techniques and discuss philosophy in this fascinating account of the martial arts phenomenon and its increasing global popularity .
translation: 超过80位世界上最伟大的武术家在这本关于武术现象及其日益全球化受欢迎程度的迷人著作中展示技术并讨论哲学。
back_translation: More than 80 of the world's greatest martial artists demonstrate techniques and discuss philosophy in this fascinating work about the phenomenon of martial arts and its increasing global popularity.

text: an entertaining but unspectacular film . pretty goofy at times - but the slick and gleefully self-indulgent violence will not disappoint the action fan .
translation: 一部娱乐性但不出色的电影。有时相当傻乎乎的，但光鲜亮丽且乐于自我放纵的暴力场面不会让动作影迷失望。
back_translation: An entertaining but unremarkable movie. Sometimes quite silly, but the flashy and self-indulgent violent scenes won’t disappoint action movie fans.

text: based on actual accounts , the untold is the story of harlan knowles ( lance henriksen ) , billionaire and president of bio-comp industries who heads up a team of experts in a quest to locate a company plane that disappeared over the remote forests of the pacific northwest .
translation: 根据真实事件，《未被诉说的故事》讲述了哈兰·诺尔斯（兰斯·亨利克森饰）的故事，他是一位亿万富翁，也是生物复合工业公司的总裁，带领一组专家寻找一架在太平洋西北部偏远森林中失踪的公司飞机。
back_translation: Based on true events, "The Untold Story" tells the story of Harlan Noles (played by Lance Henriksen), a billionaire and the president of a biocomposite industrial company, who leads a team of experts in search of a company plane that went missing in a remote forest in the Pacific Northwest.

text: the character of zigzag is not sufficiently developed to support a film constructed around him .
translation: zigzag这个角色的发展不足以支持围绕他构建的电影。
back_translation: The development of the character Zigzag is insufficient to support the movie built around him.

text: as a good old-fashioned adventure for kids , spirit : stallion of the cimarron is a winner .
translation: 作为一场经典的儿童冒险，电影《精神：野马的故事》绝对是一部胜利之作。
back_translation: As a classic children's adventure, the movie "Spirit: Stallion of the Cimarron" is definitely a winning creation.

text: two men ( eddie murphy and jeff garlin ) get laid off in product development at a large food company and are forced to become stay-at-home fathers and take their sons out of the exclusive chapman academy .
translation: 两名男子（艾迪·墨菲和杰夫·加林）在一家大型食品公司产品开发部门被裁员，不得不成为全职父亲，并把他们的儿子从专属的查普曼学院中带出来。
back_translation: Two men (Eddie Murphy and Jeff Garlin) are laid off from the product development department of a large food company and have to become full-time fathers, taking their son out of the exclusive Chapman Academy.

text: henry romero discovers , samantha already knows ( firsthand ) of the evils young men do .
translation: 亨利·罗梅罗发现，塞曼莎已经（亲身）了解年轻人所做的邪恶。
back_translation: Henry Romero discovered that Samantha had personally come to understand the evil that young people do.

text: harry , a world-weary career criminal masquerading as a priest , takes to the road with escaped convict nate and his jailbait girlfriend angel .
translation: 哈利，一个对生活感到厌倦的职业罪犯伪装成牧师，和逃亡犯内特以及他的未成年女友安吉尔一起上路。
back_translation: Harry, a career criminal who is tired of life, disguises himself as a pastor and sets off on the road with fugitive Nate and his underage girlfriend Angel.

text: shot like a postcard and overacted with all the boozy self-indulgence that brings out the worst in otherwise talented actors . . .
translation: 拍得像明信片一样，过于表演，充满了酒醉自我沉醉的情节，展现了本来才华横溢的演员们最糟糕的一面……
back_translation: It was shot like a postcard, overly theatrical, filled with scenes of drunken self-indulgence, showcasing the worst side of the inherently talented actors...

text: he has to walk through some of the worst areas in l . a .
translation: 他必须穿过洛杉矶一些最糟糕的地区。
back_translation: He has to pass through some of the worst areas of Los Angeles.

text: a stirring tribute to the bravery and dedication of the world 's reporters who willingly walk into the nightmare of war not only to record the events for posterity , but to help us clearly see the world of our making .
translation: 对世界记者的勇气和奉献精神的感人致敬，他们愿意走进战争的噩梦，不仅是为了将事件记录给后人，更是为了帮助我们清晰地看到我们所塑造的世界。
back_translation: A touching tribute to the courage and dedication of world reporters, who are willing to step into the nightmare of war not only to document events for future generations but also to help us clearly see the world we have shaped.

text: rewarding for its brash originality and daring in etching a portrait of a man who refuses to take life 's disappointments lying down .
translation: 以其大胆的原创性和勇气描绘一个拒绝对生活的失望屈服的男人而令人赞赏。
back_translation: It is commendable to portray a man who refuses to succumb to disappointment in life with bold originality and courage.

text: as blunt as it is in depicting child abuse , el bola is a movie steeped in an ambiguity that lends its conflicts a symbolic resonance .
translation: 《球》这部电影在描绘儿童虐待方面虽然直截了当，但却充满了模糊性，使得其冲突具有了象征性的共鸣。
back_translation: The movie "The Ball" portrays child abuse in a straightforward manner, but it is filled with ambiguity, giving its conflicts a symbolic resonance.

text: only through tremendous will and uncanny luck did he once again rise as the kid who stays in the picture .
translation: 只有通过巨大的意志和不可思议的运气，他才再次崛起，成为那个在画面中停留的孩子。
back_translation: Only through immense will and incredible luck did he rise again, becoming the child who remained in the picture.

text: their relationship has seen better days and jessica acquiring a clapped-out 1984 skoda does n't make things easier .
translation: 他们的关系曾经更好，而杰西卡买了一辆破旧的1984年斯柯达无疑让事情变得更糟。
back_translation: Their relationship used to be better, and Jessica buying a rundown 1984 Skoda undoubtedly made things worse.

text: uma thurman stars in quentin tarantino 's fourth film venture , kill bill .
translation: 乌玛·瑟曼主演昆汀·塔伦蒂诺的第四部电影作品《杀死比尔》。
back_translation: Uma Thurman stars in Quentin Tarantino's fourth film, "Kill Bill."

text: solondz is without doubt an artist of uncompromising vision , but that vision is beginning to feel , if not morally bankrupt , at least terribly monotonous .
translation: 索朗兹无疑是一位具有不妥协视野的艺术家，但这种视野开始让人感觉，尽管不是道德破产，至少也非常单调。
back_translation: Soraanze is undoubtedly an artist with an uncompromising vision, but this vision is beginning to feel, if not morally bankrupt, at least very monotonous.

text: a classic romance always involves a certain formula : boy meets girl , boy loses girl , boy gets girl . beijing bicycle is a romance , except the love interest is a bicycle and not a girl .
translation: 经典的浪漫故事总是涉及某种公式：男孩遇见女孩，男孩失去女孩，男孩重新得到女孩。《北京自行车》是一部浪漫作品，但爱情的对象是一辆自行车，而不是女孩。
back_translation: Classic romantic stories always involve a certain formula: boy meets girl, boy loses girl, boy gets girl back. "Beijing Bicycle" is a romantic work, but the object of affection is a bicycle, not a girl.

text: there 's no denying the physically spectacular qualities of the film . . . or the emotional integrity of the performances .
translation: 不可否认这部电影在视觉上的壮观品质……以及表演的情感真诚。
back_translation: It is undeniable that the film has spectacular visual quality... and the performances are emotionally sincere.

text: at its heart and most importantly , spirited away concerns a little girl learning to honour her friends and her family by valuing herself .
translation: 在其核心和最重要的地方，《千与千寻》讲述了一个小女孩通过珍视自我来学会尊重她的朋友和家人。
back_translation: At its core and most importantly, "Spirited Away" tells the story of a little girl who learns to respect her friends and family by valuing herself.

text: in betsy , she finds a dark mirror of herself - a lonely , angry , complex woman whose own troubled past proves disturbingly close to her own .
translation: 在贝西身上，她发现了自己黑暗的倒影——一个孤独、愤怒、复杂的女人，她的痛苦过去与自己的经历惊人地相似。
back_translation: In Bessie, she discovered her own dark reflection—a lonely, angry, complex woman whose painful past was strikingly similar to her own experiences.

text: he falls for hunky diner owner matt , who falls just as hard back .
translation: 他爱上了迷人的 diner 老板马特，马特也同样深深爱着他。
back_translation: He fell in love with the charming diner owner, Matt, who also deeply loved him in return.

text: with no job possibilities on the horizon , the two dads open their own day care facility , `` daddy day care `` , and employ some fairly unconventional and sidesplitting methods of caring for children .
translation: 由于没有工作机会出现，这两位爸爸开设了自己的托儿所“爸爸托儿所”，并采用一些相当非常规且令人捧腹的方式来照顾孩子。
back_translation: Due to the lack of job opportunities, these two dads opened their own daycare called "Dad's Daycare," and adopted some rather unconventional and hilarious methods to take care of the children.

text: scooby-doo does n't know if it wants to be a retro-refitting exercise in campy recall for older fans or a silly , nickelodeon-esque kiddie flick .
translation: 史酷比不知道是想成为一部吸引老粉丝的怀旧改造练习，还是一部滑稽的尼克儿童电影。
back_translation: Scooby-Doo doesn't seem to know whether it wants to be a nostalgic remake that appeals to old fans or a goofy Nickelodeon kids' movie.

text: the process of figuring out the moment the movie re-imagines the battle of the bulge with a bare-chested guardsman and a pike is more than worth the price of admission .
translation: 电影重新想象“突出部战役”的时刻，展现了一个赤裸上身的警卫和一根长矛，寻找这个瞬间的过程绝对值得票价。
back_translation: The film reimagines the moment of the "Battle of the Bulge," showcasing a bare-chested guard and a long spear; the quest for this moment is definitely worth the ticket price.

text: ricki ( jennifer lopez ) , a gorgeous , free-spirited female gangster is sent to assist gigli with the kidnapping because his boss does not think that gigli is up to the job .
translation: 瑞基（詹妮弗·洛佩兹饰）是一位迷人、自由奔放的女性 gangster，她被派去协助吉利进行绑架，因为她的老板认为吉利胜任不了这个工作。
back_translation: Riki (played by Jennifer Lopez) is a charming, free-spirited female gangster who is assigned to assist Gilly in a kidnapping because her boss believes Gilly is not capable of handling the job.

text: turin , italy : philippa paccard , deeply disappointed by the police 's lax investigation following her husband 's drug death , places a bomb in the dealer 's cover office .
translation: 意大利，都灵：菲莉帕·帕卡德因对警方在她丈夫因毒品死亡后进行的松散调查感到非常失望，向毒贩的掩护办公室投放了一枚炸弹。
back_translation: Turin, Italy: Philippa Packard, feeling very disappointed with the lax investigation by the police following her husband's drug-related death, detonated a bomb at a drug dealer's hideout.

text: with a court martial to keep visser and the germans distracted , mcnamara orchestrates a cunning scheme to escape and destroy a nearby munitions plant , enlisting the unwitting help of young lt . tommy hart .
translation: 麦克纳马拉策划了一场狡猾的阴谋，利用军事法庭让维瑟和德军分心，以逃脱并摧毁附近的弹药厂，毫不知情地动员年轻的汤米·哈特中尉协助。
back_translation: McNamara devised a cunning scheme, using a military tribunal to distract Weiser and the German army, in order to escape and destroy a nearby ammunition factory, unknowingly enlisting the help of young Lieutenant Tommy Hart.

text: you would n't want to live waydowntown , but it is a hilarious place to visit .
translation: 你可能不想住在市中心，但它是一个值得一游的搞笑地方。
back_translation: You might not want to live in the city center, but it is a funny place worth visiting.

text: they invite a group of prostitutes , among them irma whose fianc & # 233 ; has just been executed by the germans .
translation: 他们邀请了一群妓女，其中包括伊玛，她的未婚夫刚刚被德国人处决。
back_translation: They invited a group of prostitutes, including Emma, whose fiancé had just been executed by the Germans.

text: visits spy-movie territory like a novel you ca n't put down , examines a footnote to history seldom brought to light on the screen , and keeps you guessing from first frame to last .
translation: 访问间谍电影的领域，就像一本让你无法放下的小说，审视一个历史上很少在荧幕上被提及的脚注，并从第一帧到最后一直让你猜测。
back_translation: Accessing the realm of spy movies is like a novel you can't put down, examining a historical footnote that is rarely mentioned on screen, keeping you guessing from the first frame to the last.

text: it 's not difficult to spot the culprit early-on in this predictable thriller .
translation: 在这部可预测的惊悚片中，早早就能发现罪犯，并不困难。
back_translation: In this predictable thriller, it is not difficult to identify the criminal early on.

text: max , a self-declared sugarholic , might be just what stan needs , and he , the answer to her addictions .
translation: 马克，一个自称是糖瘾者，可能正是斯坦所需要的，而他则是她戒除瘾癖的答案。
back_translation: Mark, who claims to be a sugar addict, might be just what Stan needs, and he could be the answer to her overcoming her addiction.

text: before she drowns , the baby is rescued by manny and sid .
translation: 在她溺水之前，婴儿被曼尼和西德救了。
back_translation: Before she drowned, the baby was rescued by Manny and Sid.

text: ultimately , it is harold who timidly suggests participating in the upcoming duct tape festival in minneapolis-st .
translation: 最终，是哈罗德羞怯地建议参加即将在明尼阿波利斯举行的胶带节。
back_translation: In the end, Harold shyly suggested participating in the upcoming Tape Festival in Minneapolis.

text: and if she 's lucky , she may find love along the way .
translation: 如果她幸运的话，可能会在旅途中找到爱情。
back_translation: If she is lucky, she might find love during her journey.

text: completely shocked , she ca n't take life anymore as all her dreams fall apart .
translation: 她完全震惊，无法再承受生活，因为她所有的梦想都崩溃了。
back_translation: She was completely stunned, unable to bear life any longer, as all her dreams had collapsed.

text: greta is a sharp , spunky editor who is rotten with ambition .
translation: 格蕾塔是一位精明而活泼的编辑，充满了野心。
back_translation: Greta is a savvy and lively editor, full of ambition.

text: an odd , haphazard , and inconsequential romantic comedy .
translation: 一部奇怪、杂乱无章且无关紧要的浪漫喜剧。
back_translation: A strange, chaotic, and inconsequential romantic comedy.

text: not just unlikable . disturbing . disgusting . without any redeeming value whatsoever .
translation: 不仅令人厌恶。令人不安。令人恶心。完全没有任何令人欣慰的价值。
back_translation: Not only repulsive. Disturbing. Nauseating. Completely devoid of any reassuring value.

text: using previously unseen video footage , the film shows rocha all jerky and with florid rhetoric urging his cuban comrades to embrace the new political and cultural challenges of the age ; outlining his vision of a unified third world ; and expounding on the differences and peculiarities of latin americans and the means by which their revolutionary aims might be achieved .
translation: 使用前所未见的录像素材，电影展示了罗查手舞足蹈，情绪激昂地敦促他的古巴同志们迎接这个时代的新政治和文化挑战；阐述了他对统一第三世界的愿景；并对拉丁美洲人的差异和独特性进行了深入分析，以及实现他们革命目标的手段。
back_translation: Using unprecedented video footage, the film showcases Rocha dancing energetically and passionately urging his Cuban comrades to embrace the new political and cultural challenges of the times; it articulates his vision for the unification of the Third World; and provides an in-depth analysis of the differences and uniqueness of Latin Americans, as well as the means to achieve their revolutionary goals.

text: broomfield seems to uncover a massive scoop here , revealing the multitude of people involved and the possible motivations behind the killings of his titular subjects .
translation: 布鲁姆菲尔德似乎在这里揭示了一条重大的新闻，揭露了众多涉及人员和他们可能的动机，背后是他所关注的案件中的杀人事件。
back_translation: Bloomfield appears to reveal a significant piece of news here, exposing numerous individuals involved and their possible motives, related to the murder case he is concerned with.

text: in her confusion and grief , she finds consolation in the friendship of their african-american gardener , raymond ( dennis haysbert ) - a socially taboo relationship that leads to the further disintegration of life as she knew it .
translation: 在她的困惑和悲痛中，她在非裔美国园丁雷蒙德（丹尼斯·海斯伯特）的友谊中找到了安慰——一种社会禁忌的关系，这导致她所熟知的生活进一步解体。
back_translation: In her confusion and sorrow, she found solace in her friendship with the African American gardener Raymond (played by Dennis Haysbert) – a socially taboo relationship that led to further disintegration of the life she once knew.

text: they are told the story of the chamber of secrets .
translation: 他们听说了密室的故事。
back_translation: They heard the story of the secret room.

text: documentary about runaway and homeless lesbian , gay , and transsexual youth .
translation: 关于流浪和无家可归的女同性恋、男同性恋和跨性别青少年的纪录片。
back_translation: A documentary about homeless and runaway lesbian, gay, and transgender youth.

text: the ingenious construction ( adapted by david hare from michael cunningham 's novel ) constantly flows forwards and back , weaving themes among three strands which allow us to view events as if through a prism
translation: 这部巧妙的作品（由大卫·赫尔根据迈克尔·坎宁汉的小说改编）不断地在时间上前后流动，交织着三个主线的主题，使我们能够透过棱镜观察事件。
back_translation: This clever work (adapted by David Hare from Michael Cunningham's novel) constantly shifts back and forth in time, intertwining the themes of three main storylines, allowing us to observe events through a prism.

text: figuring it will be a good way to make money fellow convict emmanuel 'mendy ' ripstein ( peter falk ) sets up a prison boxing match between the two men to decide who is the real undisputed champ .
translation: 考虑到这是一个赚钱的好方法，同囚艾曼纽尔 '门迪' 里普斯坦（彼得·福克）安排了一场监狱拳击比赛，决定谁是真正的无争议冠军。
back_translation: Considering this is a good way to make money, inmate Emanuel 'Mendy' Lipstein (Peter Falk) arranges a prison boxing match to determine who is the true undisputed champion.

text: starry-eyed forest ranger , jackie , rescues the hunk of her dreams from a cliff side motorcycle accident .
translation: 满怀憧憬的森林管理员杰基从悬崖边的摩托车事故中救下了她梦想中的型男。
back_translation: The forest ranger Jackie, full of hope, saved the handsome man of her dreams from a motorcycle accident at the edge of a cliff.

text: inside the breathtaking structure , they discover wondrous artifacts of an advanced , but long dead , civilization .
translation: 在这个令人叹为观止的建筑内部，他们发现了一个先进但早已灭绝的文明的奇妙工艺品。
back_translation: Inside this breathtaking building, they discovered a marvelous artifact from an advanced but long-extinct civilization.

text: while 'manhunter ' takes the prize for stylishness , 'dragon ' is much scarier and more emotionally involving .
translation: 虽然《猎人》在风格上获得了奖项，但《龙》则更加恐怖，更富有情感。
back_translation: Although "Hunter" has won awards for its style, "Dragon" is scarier and more emotionally rich.

text: definitely funny stuff , but it 's more of the 'laughing at ' variety than the 'laughing with . '
translation: 这绝对是有趣的东西，但更多的是那种“嘲笑”的类型，而不是“和你一起笑”。
back_translation: This is definitely an interesting thing, but more of the "mocking" type rather than "laughing with you."

text: when raj arrives in india , he is struck by tina 's beauty but equally as struck to pooja 's personality .
translation: 当拉杰到达印度时，他被蒂娜的美丽所震撼，同时也被普贾的个性深深吸引。
back_translation: When Raj arrived in India, he was shocked by Tina's beauty and deeply attracted to Puja's personality.

text: set in 1898 sudan , this fifth film to be adapted from the a . e . w .
translation: 设定在1898年的苏丹，这部第五部改编自A.E.W.的电影。
back_translation: Set in Sudan in 1898, this fifth installment is adapted from A.E.W.'s film.

text: escapes the precious trappings of most romantic comedies , infusing into the story very real , complicated emotions .
translation: 逃脱了大多数浪漫喜剧的珍贵束缚，为故事注入了非常真实、复杂的情感。
back_translation: It escapes the precious constraints of most romantic comedies and injects very real, complex emotions into the story.

text: i ca n't remember the last time i saw worse stunt editing or cheaper action movie production values than in extreme ops .
translation: 我无法记起在《极限特工》中见过如此糟糕的特技剪辑或如此低廉的动作电影制作水准。
back_translation: I can't recall seeing such bad stunt editing or such a low standard of action movie production in "xXx".

text: they 've all got midlife crises : clownish beav has love problems ; the intellectual shrink , henry , is slowly succumbing to the siren song of suicide ; pete is losing a war with beer ; jonesy has had weird premonitions ever since he got hit by a car .
translation: 他们都经历了中年危机：滑稽的比夫有感情问题；知识分子亨利正慢慢屈服于自杀的诱惑；皮特正在与啤酒奋战；琼西自从被车撞了之后就有了奇怪的预感。
back_translation: They all experienced a midlife crisis: the ridiculous Biff has emotional problems; the intellectual Henry is slowly succumbing to the temptation of suicide; Peter is battling with beer; and Jonesy has had strange premonitions since he was hit by a car.

text: betting xxx can succeed where other conventional spies have failed , gibbons sends xxx to enter this world of crime undetected , using his natural athletic prowess and a whole lot of attitude .
translation: 赌博xxx可以在其他传统间谍失败的地方取得成功，吉本斯派遣xxx进入这个犯罪世界，毫无察觉，利用他天生的运动能力和满满的态度。
back_translation: Gambling xxx can succeed in areas where other traditional spies have failed. Gibbons sends xxx into this criminal world, completely unaware, leveraging his natural athletic ability and full attitude.

text: has the rare capability to soothe and break your heart with a single stroke .
translation: 具有罕见的能力，能够在一瞬间安慰并让你的心碎。
back_translation: Possessing a rare ability to comfort you and break your heart in an instant.

text: truly an intellectual , igby is a modern day holden caulfield , and the world he lives in is far removed from the high standards of expectation he holds for it .
translation: 伊格比真是一个知识分子，他是现代的霍尔顿·考尔菲尔德，而他所生活的世界与他对其所抱有的高标准期望相去甚远。
back_translation: Iggby is truly an intellectual; he is the modern Holden Caulfield, and the world he lives in falls far short of the high standards he holds for it.

text: directing with a sure and measured hand , [ haneke ] steers clear of the sensational and offers instead an unflinching and objective look at a decidedly perverse pathology .
translation: [哈内克]以坚定而谨慎的手法引导，避开了耸人听闻的情节，而是提供了对一种明显扭曲病态的坚定而客观的观察。
back_translation: [Haneke] guides with a firm yet cautious approach, avoiding sensationalized plots, instead offering a steadfast and objective observation of a clearly distorted pathology.

text: frank spens his days paying for his past sins and steve wants to be dean martin in `` oceans 11 `` .
translation: 弗兰克花费他的日子为过去的罪孽买单，而史蒂夫想在《十一罗汉》中成为迪恩·马丁。
back_translation: Frank spends his days atoning for past sins, while Steve wants to be Dean Martin in "Ocean's Eleven."

text: collateral damage is , despite its alleged provocation post-9/11 , an antique , in the end . as are its star , its attitude and its obliviousness .
translation: 附带损害，尽管在9/11后被指责为挑衅，但最终只是个古董。它的明星、态度和无知也是如此。
back_translation: Collateral damage, although blamed as provocation after 9/11, ultimately turned out to be just an antique. Its stars, attitude, and ignorance are the same.

text: here 's yet another cool crime movie that actually manages to bring something new into the mix .
translation: 这又是一部酷炫的犯罪电影，实际上成功地在其中带来了一些新元素。
back_translation: This is another cool crime movie that actually succeeds in bringing some new elements to it.

text: the story takes place in rural vermont , against the backdrop of the state capitol , where civil union laws are being debated along with gun control and dwis .
translation: 这个故事发生在佛蒙特州的乡村背景下，以州议会为背景，正在辩论民事结合法、枪支管制和酒驾问题。
back_translation: This story takes place against the rural backdrop of Vermont, with the state legislature debating issues such as civil union laws, gun control, and drunk driving.

text: it 's up to an undercover fbi agent to stop him before it 's too late .
translation: 这要靠一名 undercover 的 FBI 特工在为时已晚之前阻止他。
back_translation: This relies on an undercover FBI agent to stop him before it's too late.

text: s1m0ne 's satire is not subtle , but it is effective . it 's a quirky , off-beat project . . . .
translation: 《s1m0ne》的讽刺不够微妙，但却很有效。这是一个怪异而不寻常的项目……
back_translation: The satire in "s1m0ne" is not subtle enough, but it is very effective. It's a strange and unusual project...

text: but craig wants to be boyfriends , while gary has other issues .
translation: 但克雷格想成为男朋友，而加里有其他问题。
back_translation: But Craig wants to be a boyfriend, while Gary has other issues.

text: to portray modern women the way director davis has done is just unthinkable .
translation: 以导演戴维斯的方式描绘现代女性真是不可思议。
back_translation: It is truly incredible how director Davis depicts modern women.

text: what he finds is a pocket of life that seems to be in another era , where prejudice and intolerance are accepted , where the small minds of angry men call the shots and where one woman attempts to save him and fails .
translation: 他发现的是一个看似处于另一个时代的生命小天地，在那里，偏见和不容忍被接受，愤怒男人的狭隘思想主导着一切，而一位女性试图拯救他却失败了。
back_translation: What he discovered was a small world of life that seemed to belong to another era, where prejudice and intolerance were accepted, the narrow-minded thoughts of angry men dominated everything, and a woman who tried to save him ultimately failed.

text: so she invites niko to finish his erotic tale over a drink at her apartment !
translation: 所以她邀请尼科到她的公寓喝酒，继续讲他的情色故事！
back_translation: So she invited Nico to her apartment for drinks, to continue telling his erotic stories!

text: `` the dangerous lives of altar boys `` has flaws , but it also has humor and heart and very talented young actors
translation: 《祭坛男孩的危险生活》有缺陷，但也充满幽默和温情，并且有非常有才华的年轻演员。
back_translation: "The Dangerous Life of the Altar Boys" has flaws, but it is also filled with humor and warmth, and features very talented young actors.

text: not knowing that the others have also been invited , they show up and discover an amusement park that affects young visitors in very strange ways .
translation: 他们不知道其他人也被邀请了，结果出现后发现一个游乐园，对年轻游客产生了非常奇怪的影响。
back_translation: They didn't know that others were invited too, and when they showed up, they found an amusement park that had a very strange effect on the young visitors.

text: in a big corner office in hell , satan is throwing up his hands in surrender , is firing his r & d people , and has decided he will just screen the master of disguise 24/7 .
translation: 在地狱的一个大角落办公室里，撒旦举起双手投降，解雇了他的研发人员，并决定每天24小时播放《伪装大师》。
back_translation: In a large corner office in hell, Satan raised his hands in surrender, dismissed his research and development staff, and decided to play "The Master of Disguise" 24 hours a day.

text: matt lee has to stay a few steps ahead of his own police force and everyone he 's trusted in order to find out the truth .
translation: 马特·李必须领先于自己的警察部队和他所信任的每一个人，以便找到真相。
back_translation: Matt Lee must stay ahead of his police force and everyone he trusts in order to uncover the truth.

text: his sister nicole is 15 , and dealing with her impending womanhood ; middle brother mike is the `` normal `` one , but in some ways the most childish - his latest conquest is nadine , who runs the dog kennel at his security guard job .
translation: 他的妹妹妮可15岁，正在应对即将到来的女性身份；中间的哥哥迈克是“正常”的一个，但在某些方面却是最幼稚的——他最新的征服对象是纳丁，她在他的保安工作中经营着一家狗舍。
back_translation: His sister Nicole is 15 years old and is coping with her impending female identity; the middle brother, Mike, is the "normal" one, but in some ways he is the most immature—his latest conquest is Nadine, who runs a dog kennel in his security job.

text: there 's a solid woman- finding-herself story somewhere in here , but you 'd have to dig pretty deep to uncover it .
translation: 这里有一个关于女人自我发现的故事，但你需要深挖才能揭示出来。
back_translation: Here is a story about a woman's self-discovery, but you need to dig deep to reveal it.

text: she meets noble , an endearing bundle of tragic flaws , and sparks fly between these two lost but likeable souls .
translation: 她遇见了诺布尔，一个令人喜爱的悲剧缺陷的集合体，这两个迷失但可爱的人之间产生了火花。
back_translation: She met Nobel, a delightful embodiment of tragic flaws, and sparks flew between these two lost yet lovely individuals.

text: there 's no getting around the fact that this is revenge of the nerds revisited -- again .
translation: 不可否认，这又是《小子复仇》的重聚。
back_translation: It is undeniable that this is another reunion of "The Kid's Revenge."

text: this story is a heartbreaking look into the addiction of smoking and its consequences to the loved ones of the smoker .
translation: 这个故事深刻地揭示了吸烟成瘾及其对吸烟者所爱之人的影响。
back_translation: This story profoundly reveals the addiction to smoking and its impact on the loved ones of the smoker.

text: but now , hogwarts students are strangely being turned into stone .
translation: 但现在，霍格沃茨的学生们奇怪地被变成了石头。
back_translation: But now, the students of Hogwarts have strangely turned into stone.

text: 'tracks ' chronicles their descent with a striking visual portrayal of a boy who made a mistake , paid the consequences and got back on 'track . '
translation: 《轨迹》通过生动的视觉表现描绘了一个犯错的男孩的堕落历程，他承担了后果并重新回到了正轨。
back_translation: "Trajectory" vividly depicts the downfall of a boy who makes mistakes through powerful visual representation; he faces the consequences and returns to the right path.

text: but melanie 's past holds many secrets , including jake , the redneck husband she married in high school , who refuses to divorce her .
translation: 但梅兰妮的过去隐藏着许多秘密，包括她在高中时结婚的乡下丈夫杰克，他拒绝和她离婚。
back_translation: But Melanie's past hides many secrets, including her rural husband Jack, whom she married in high school and who refuses to divorce her.

text: real women have curves does n't offer any easy answers .
translation: 真正的女人有曲线，并没有提供任何简单的答案。
back_translation: A real woman has curves and does not offer any simple answers.

text: parker updates the setting in an attempt to make the film relevant today , without fully understanding what it was that made the story relevant in the first place .
translation: 帕克更新了背景，试图让这部电影在今天变得相关，但并没有完全理解是什么让这个故事在最初就具有相关性。
back_translation: Parker updated the background in an attempt to make the movie relevant today, but did not fully grasp what made the story relevant in the first place.

text: atlantic city serenade is about the price we pay for the choices we make in the quest for power over our own inner demons .
translation: 《大西洋城的颂歌》讲述了我们在追求掌控内心恶魔的过程中，为所做出的选择所付出的代价。
back_translation: "The Anthem of Atlantic City" narrates the price we pay for the choices we make in our pursuit to control the demons within us.

text: the phantom , feeling betrayed , kidnaps christine and brings her to his lair where he plans to make her his eternal bride .
translation: 幽灵感到背叛，绑架了克里斯汀并将她带到他的巢穴，计划将她变成他的永恒新娘。
back_translation: The ghost felt betrayed, kidnapped Christine, and took her to his lair, planning to turn her into his eternal bride.

text: there 's the plot , and a maddeningly insistent and repetitive piano score that made me want to scream .
translation: 情节在那里，还有一段令人发狂、顽固而单调的钢琴音乐，让我想要尖叫。
back_translation: The plot is there, along with a maddening, stubborn, and monotonous piano music that makes me want to scream.

text: a continually fascinating exploration of the physical and psychological pain and pleasure of a bizarre relationship .
translation: 对一种奇特关系中身心痛苦与快乐的持续迷人探索。
back_translation: A persistent and captivating exploration of the physical and mental pain and pleasure in a peculiar relationship.

text: i enjoyed `` formula 51 `` in a guilty kind of way
translation: 我以一种内疚的方式享受了《51号公式》。
