text: however , instead of bringing the prime minister down , ali is embraced by the nation as the voice of youth and 'realness ' , making the prime minister and his government more popular than ever .
translation: 然而，阿里并没有让总理下台，反而被全国视为青年和“真实”的声音，使得总理及其政府的支持率比以往任何时候都更高。
back_translation: However, Alibaba did not force the Prime Minister to step down; instead, it was regarded as the voice of the youth and the "real" voice of the people, leading to even higher support for the Prime Minister and his government than ever before.

text: a young man lingers in the family home of his fiancee , after her accidental death .
translation: 一名年轻人在未婚妻意外去世后，依旧徘徊在她的家庭住所。
back_translation: A young man lingers around the family home of his fiancée after her accidental death.

text: spider-man is about growing strange hairs , getting a more mature body , and finding it necessary to hide new secretions from the parental units .
translation: 蜘蛛侠讲述的是成长过程中长出奇怪的毛发，身体变得更加成熟，以及发现有必要向父母隐瞒新的分泌物。
back_translation: Spider-Man tells the story of growing strange hair during the process of maturation, the body becoming more mature, and realizing the need to hide new secretions from parents.

text: when sai gwai ( turtle , in the english version ) starts working for lmf corporation with his cousin lun , he immediately meets the four `` pork chops `` ( cantonese slang for ugly women ) : mo , mei , hung and pao .
translation: 当赛龟（在英文版中是turtle）开始与他的表弟伦一起为lmf公司工作时，他立刻遇见了四个“猪排”（粤语俚语指的是丑女人）：莫、梅、雄和包。
back_translation: When the tortoise (called turtle in the English version) started working with his cousin Lun at lmf company, he immediately met four "pork chops" (a Cantonese slang term for ugly women): Mo, Mui, Hung, and Bao.

text: in order to arrive at a possible explanation , michael moore takes on a deeper examination of america 's culture of fear , bigotry and violence in a nation with widespread gun ownership .
translation: 为了找到一个可能的解释，迈克尔·摩尔深入探讨了美国的恐惧文化、偏见和暴力，这是一个拥有广泛枪支拥有权的国家。
back_translation: To find a possible explanation, Michael Moore delves into America's culture of fear, prejudice, and violence in a country with widespread gun ownership.

text: she is intrigued by his knowledge of shakespeare , manner of living and the fifteen perfectly organized bags beneath his bench .
translation: 她对他对莎士比亚的知识、生活方式以及他长椅下整齐排列的十五个包感到好奇。
back_translation: She was curious about his knowledge of Shakespeare, his lifestyle, and the fifteen neatly arranged bags under his bench.

text: shortly hereafter she encounters dieter , a charming young man .
translation: 不久之后，她遇到了一个迷人的年轻人迪特。
back_translation: Not long after, she met a charming young man named Dieter.

text: to the degree that ivans xtc . works , it 's thanks to huston 's revelatory performance .
translation: 在伊凡的《极乐世界》取得成功的程度上，都归功于休斯顿的启示性表演。

text: meanwhile , obi-wan kenobi continues to train the young jedi anakin skywalker , who fears that the jedi code will forbid his growing romance with amidala . . .
translation: 与此同时，欧比旺·肯obi继续训练年轻的绝地安akin·天行者，他担心绝地法典会禁止他与阿米达拉日益增长的浪漫关系……
back_translation: Meanwhile, Obi-Wan Kenobi continues to train the young Jedi Anakin Skywalker, concerned that the Jedi Code will prohibit his growing romantic relationship with Padmé Amidala...

text: one of the very best movies ever made about the life of moviemaking .
translation: 关于电影制作生活的最优秀电影之一。
back_translation: One of the best films about the life of film production.

text: a somewhat soapish but nonetheless beautifully acted excoriation of religious piousness and blind allegiance to faith as a socially constructed institution .
translation: 一部有些肥皂剧味道但 nonetheless 演技精湛的戏剧，斥责了宗教虔诚和对信仰的盲目追随作为一种社会建构的制度。
back_translation: A drama that has a somewhat soap opera flavor but nonetheless features excellent acting, critiques religious piety and blind adherence to faith as a socially constructed institution.

text: a comedy about bending the rules to reach your goal , bend it like beckham explores the world of women 's football , from kick-abouts in the park to freekicks in the final .
translation: 一部关于打破规则以实现目标的喜剧，《像贝克汉姆一样弯曲》探索了女性足球的世界，从公园里的随意踢球到决赛中的任意球。
back_translation: A comedy about breaking the rules to achieve goals, "Bend It Like Beckham" explores the world of women's football, from casual play in the park to free kicks in the final.

text: the first hour alone is worth the admission price .
translation: 第一个小时的内容就值得这个票价。
back_translation: The content of the first hour is worth the ticket price.

text: her recent divorce has left her with terminal writer 's block and extremely depressed , and her best friend , patti , is beginning to think she might never recover .
translation: 她最近的离婚让她遭遇了严重的写作障碍，情绪极度低落，她的好朋友帕蒂开始担心她可能永远无法恢复。
back_translation: Her recent divorce has resulted in a severe writing block for her, and she is extremely low in spirits. Her good friend Patty has started to worry that she may never recover.

text: mirabelle falls in love with the glamorous ray , and her life takes a magical turn , but eventually she realizes that she must empower herself and make a choice between them .
translation: 米拉贝尔爱上了迷人的雷，她的生活发生了神奇的转变，但最终她意识到必须增强自己，并在他们之间做出选择。
back_translation: Mirabel fell in love with the charming Ray, and her life underwent a magical transformation, but in the end, she realized she had to strengthen herself and make a choice between them.

text: if people accept it , the crime rate is going to drop drastically , but it never will be known if there might not be too many people imprisoned , some or even all of them innocent .
translation: 如果人们接受它，犯罪率将会大幅下降，但永远无法知道是否会有太多的人被监禁，其中一些甚至所有人都是无辜的。
back_translation: If people accept it, the crime rate will significantly decrease, but we will never know if too many people will be imprisoned, some of whom might even be innocent.

text: her husband was the love of her life and she does not expect to find another .
translation: 她的丈夫是她一生的挚爱，她不指望再找到另一个。

text: the sort of movie that gives tastelessness a bad rap .
translation: 那种让无品味名声坏掉的电影。

text: in his latest effort , storytelling , solondz has finally made a movie that is n't just offensive -- it also happens to be good .
translation: 在他最新的作品《讲故事》中，索隆兹终于制作了一部不仅仅惹人反感的电影——它实际上也很好。

text: the acting is uniformly excellent , with kyra sedgwick and fairuza balk in particular deserving to be singled out for praise .
translation: 演技一致出色，凯拉·塞吉威克和费鲁莎·巴尔克尤其值得特别表扬。

text: proves mainly that south korean filmmakers can make undemanding action movies with all the alacrity of their hollywood counterparts .
translation: 主要证明了韩国电影制片人能够像他们的好莱坞同行一样迅速制作出无要求的动作电影。

text: [ griffith ] adds another intriguing character to her formidable body of work .

text: the film does a solid job of slowly , steadily building up to the climactic burst of violence .
translation: 影片很好地缓慢而稳步地铺陈，最终达到高潮暴力的爆发。
back_translation: The film slowly and steadily unfolds, ultimately reaching a climax of explosive violence.

text: on a concert tour in india , they marry at a secret and romantic ceremony without any press attention .
translation: 在印度的演唱会巡演中，他们在没有任何媒体关注的情况下举行了一场秘密而浪漫的婚礼。

text: both grant and hoult carry the movie because they are believable as people -- flawed , assured of the wrong things , and scared to admit how much they may really need the company of others .
translation: 格兰特和霍尔特承载了整部电影，因为他们让人信服，展现了真实的人性——有缺陷，自信于错误的事物，并且害怕承认自己可能真的需要他人的陪伴。
back_translation: Grant and Holt carry the entire film because they are convincing and demonstrate true human nature—flawed, confident in the wrong things, and afraid to admit that they might actually need the company of others.

text: captures a more realistic depiction of the effects of death on a family .
translation: 更真实地描绘了死亡对一个家庭的影响。
back_translation: It depicts more realistically the impact of death on a family.

text: if kaufman kept cameron diaz a prisoner in a cage with her ape , in his latest , he 'd have them mate .
translation: 如果考夫曼把卡梅隆·迪亚兹和她的猩猩囚禁在一个笼子里，在他的最新作品中，他会让他们交配。
back_translation: If Kaufman put Cameron Diaz and her gorilla in a cage, in his latest work, he would make them mate.

text: a highly spirited , imaginative kid 's movie that broaches neo-augustinian theology : is god stuck in heaven because he 's afraid of his best-known creation ?
translation: 一部充满活力和想象力的儿童电影，探讨了新奥古斯丁神学：上帝是否因为害怕他最著名的创造物而被困在天堂？
back_translation: A vibrant and imaginative children's movie that explores the new Augustinian theology: Is God trapped in heaven out of fear of his most famous creation?

text: all this takes a strange turn when a mysterious patient ( satan , he calls himself ) the hospital seeking help .
translation: 这一切在一个神秘的病人（他称自己为撒旦）来到医院寻求帮助时发生了奇怪的转折。

text: ling min becomes the manager of haier factory when the factory is almost bankrupted .
translation: 凌敏在海尔工厂快要破产时成为了厂长。

text: while most films these days are about nothing , this film seems to be about everything that 's plaguing the human spirit in a relentlessly globalizing world .
translation: 如今大多数电影似乎无关紧要，但这部电影似乎涉及到在一个不断全球化的世界中困扰人类精神的一切问题。
back_translation: Most movies today seem inconsequential, but this film appears to address all the issues troubling the human spirit in an increasingly globalized world.

text: dennis , nicknamed `` spider `` by his mother has been institutionalized with acute schizophrenia for some 20 years .
translation: 丹尼斯，母亲给他起了个绰号“蜘蛛”，已经因为急性精神分裂症住院治疗约20年。
back_translation: Dennis, whose mother gave him the nickname "Spider", has been hospitalized for treatment of acute schizophrenia for about 20 years.

text: jack must then put his life in the hands of a series of characters that he just can not seem to trust - for good reason , they lead him to a fate that jack could never have suspected - a tongue-in-check send-up of a classic urban myth .
translation: 杰克必须把自己的生命托付给一系列他根本无法信任的角色——这是有原因的，他们将他引向一个杰克从未料想到的命运——对经典城市神话的讽刺性调侃。
back_translation: Jack must entrust his life to a series of characters he cannot possibly trust—there's a reason for this, as they lead him toward a fate that Jack never anticipated—a ironic parody of classic urban myths.

text: ramsay is clearly extraordinarily talented , and based on three short films and two features , here 's betting her third feature will be something to behold .
translation: 拉姆齐显然才华横溢，基于她的三部短片和两部影片，我敢打赌她的第三部作品将会非常令人瞩目。
back_translation: Ramsey is obviously talented, and based on her three short films and two feature films, I would bet that her third work will be very remarkable.

text: compassionately explores the seemingly irreconcilable situation between conservative christian parents and their estranged gay and lesbian children .
translation: 以同情的眼光探讨保守基督教父母与他们疏远的同性恋和女同性恋孩子之间看似无法调和的关系。
back_translation: Explore the seemingly irreconcilable relationship between conservative Christian parents and their estranged gay and lesbian children through a lens of sympathy.

text: this sets off a minor battle between the two for control of the fish supply .
translation: 这引发了两人之间一场小规模的争夺鱼类供应的斗争。

text: if you 're not totally weirded- out by the notion of cinema as community-therapy spectacle , quitting hits home with disorienting force .
translation: 如果你对电影作为社区疗法表演的概念没有感到完全反感，那么辞职这一点会以令人困惑的力量击中内心。
back_translation: If you are not entirely repulsed by the concept of film as a form of community therapy, then the idea of resignation will hit the heart with a confusing power.

text: the films stars roark critchlow ( days of our lives , friends , mr . deeds ) as the would be husband who has to come clean about a few things from his past and risk losing the love of his life .
translation: 这部电影的明星是罗克·克里奇洛（《我们的生活的日子》、《老友记》、《大人物》），他扮演即将成为丈夫的人，必须坦白自己过去的一些事情，并冒着失去他一生挚爱的风险。
back_translation: The star of this movie is Rock Cretlow ("Days of Our Lives," "Friends," "Big Shots"), who plays a man about to become a husband, who must confess some things from his past while risking the loss of the love of his life.

text: normally , rohmer 's talky films fascinate me , but when he moves his setting to the past , and relies on a historical text , he loses the richness of characterization that makes his films so memorable .
translation: 通常情况下，罗梅尔的对话片令我着迷，但当他将背景设定在过去，并依赖于历史文本时，他失去了让他的影片如此难忘的角色刻画的丰富性。
back_translation: Usually, Romer's dialogue captivates me, but when he sets the background in the past and relies on historical texts, he loses the richness of character portrayal that makes his films so memorable.

text: scores by marshaling facts that speak for themselves . and they do n't speak kindly .
translation: 通过整理不言而喻的事实来得分。而这些事实并不好听。
back_translation: Score by organizing self-evident facts. And these facts are not pleasant.

text: nolan bravely treads where few american films dare to delve -- into the world of ambivalence and ambiguity . . .
translation: 诺兰勇敢地踏入了少数美国电影敢于深入的领域——模棱两可和暧昧的世界……
back_translation: Nolan bravely ventured into a realm that few American films dare to explore—the world of ambiguity and ambiguity...

text: 'the nugget ' is a tale about a group of three roadworkers who stumble upon the world 's biggest nugget , and become instant millionaires - or so they think .
translation: 《金块》是一个关于三名公路工人的故事，他们偶然发现了世界上最大的金块，并以为自己瞬间变成了百万富翁。
back_translation: "Gold Nugget" is a story about three highway workers who accidentally discover the largest gold nugget in the world and believe they have instantly become millionaires.

text: bluer than the atlantic and more biologically detailed than an autopsy , the movie . . . is , also , frequently hilarious .
translation: 比大西洋更蓝，比尸检更生物详细，这部电影……也是，常常令人捧腹大笑。
back_translation: Bluer than the Atlantic, more biologically detailed than an autopsy, this movie... is also often hilarious.

text: the story of ned kelly , who formed the notorious kelly gang with his brother dan and two other men .
translation: 内德·凯利的故事，他与兄弟丹和另外两名男子组建了臭名昭著的凯利帮。
back_translation: The story of Ned Kelly, who formed the notorious Kelly Gang with his brother Dan and two other men.

text: the idea of 49-year-old roberto benigni playing the wooden boy pinocchio is scary enough . the reality of the new live-action pinocchio he directed , cowrote and starred in borders on the grotesque .
translation: 49岁的罗伯托·贝尼尼饰演木偶皮诺丘的想法令人感到害怕。他执导、共同编剧并主演的新真人版皮诺丘的现实则近乎荒诞。
back_translation: The idea of 49-year-old Roberto Benigni playing the puppet Pinocchio is frightening. The reality of the new live-action Pinocchio, which he directed, co-wrote, and starred in, is almost absurd.

text: hoffman 's unfettered performance beautifully captures wilson 's sad , manic quality .
translation: 霍夫曼毫无束缚的表演完美地捕捉到了威尔逊悲伤而狂躁的特质。
back_translation: Hoffman's unrestrained performance perfectly captured Wilson's sad and manic qualities.

text: de oliveira creates an emotionally rich , poetically plump and visually fulsome , but never showy , film whose bittersweet themes are reinforced and brilliantly personified by michel piccoli .
translation: 德·奥利维拉创造了一部情感丰富、诗意饱满且视觉上充实，但又从不浮夸的电影，其苦乐参半的主题得到了米歇尔·皮科利的强化和出色体现。
back_translation: De Oliveira created a film that is rich in emotion, poetically充实 and visually abundant, yet never ostentatious; its bittersweet themes are reinforced and beautifully embodied by Michel Piccoli.

text: the title helpfully offers the most succinct review of it you 'll read anywhere .
translation: 这个标题提供了你在任何地方能读到的最简洁的评论。

text: with an estimate of over 10 , 000 sexual conquests .
translation: 估计有超过10,000次性征服。

text: enigma is well-made , but it 's just too dry and too placid .
translation: 谜语做得很好，但就是太干燥太平静了。
back_translation: The riddles are well done, but they are just too dry and calm.

text: he 's a rockabilly star who 's a legend both because of his great hits and because he gave up music very young when his brother was killed .
translation: 他是一位摇滚复兴明星，因其伟大的热门歌曲而成为传奇，也因为在他兄弟被杀后非常年轻便放弃了音乐。

text: what 's the most positive thing that can be said about the new rob schneider vehicle ? well , it 's not as pathetic as the animal .
translation: 关于新的罗布·施奈德电影，最积极的一点是什么？嗯，它并没有像《动物》那样可悲。

text: the 'fun and games ' in which louis and hilary involve soledad are a lacerating look at their twisted relationship .
translation: 路易斯和希拉里让索莱达卷入的“乐趣和游戏”是对他们扭曲关系的深刻剖析。

text: frustrated with the official investigation and haunted by the thought that the man responsible for murdering his family might never be brought to justice , brewer takes matters into his own hands and tracks his quarry ultimately to colombia .
translation: 因对官方调查感到沮丧，并且心里萦绕着杀害自己家人的凶手可能永远不会被绳之以法的念头，酿酒师决定采取行动，最终追踪到哥伦比亚。
back_translation: Frustrated with the official investigation and haunted by the thought that the murderer of his family may never be brought to justice, the brewer decided to take action and eventually tracked him down to Colombia.

text: too timid to bring a sense of closure to an ugly chapter of the twentieth century .
translation: 过于胆怯，无法为二十世纪一段丑陋的历史带来结束感。
back_translation: Too timid to bring a sense of closure to a dark chapter of the twentieth century.

text: here 's my advice , kev . start reading your scripts before signing that dotted line .
translation: 这是我的建议，凯夫。在签那条虚线之前，先阅读你的剧本。

text: the film has the courage of its convictions and excellent performances on its side .
translation: 这部电影有着坚定的信念和出色的表演。

text: as immaculate as stuart little 2 is , it could be a lot better if it were , well , more adventurous .
translation: 尽管《小斯图尔特2》无可挑剔，但如果更具冒险精神，那就会更好。

text: more successful at relating history than in creating an emotionally complex , dramatically satisfying heroine
translation: 在讲述历史方面更成功，而在塑造一个情感复杂、戏剧性令人满意的女主角方面则不够出色。

text: what it lacks in originality it makes up for in intelligence and b-grade stylishness .
translation: 它在原创性上虽然有所欠缺，但在智力和B级时尚感上弥补了这一点。
back_translation: Although it lacks originality, it compensates for this with intelligence and a sense of B-level fashion.

text: essentially , noyce just wants to tell a good story , which he does .
translation: 本质上，诺伊斯只是想讲一个好故事，而他做到了。
back_translation: Essentially, Neus just wanted to tell a good story, and he succeeded.

text: it shows that some studios firmly believe that people have lost the ability to think and will forgive any shoddy product as long as there 's a little girl-on-girl action .
translation: 这表明一些工作室坚信人们已经失去了思考的能力，只要有一点女女互动，他们就会原谅任何劣质产品。
back_translation: This indicates that some studios firmly believe that people have lost the ability to think; as long as there is a little bit of girl-girl interaction, they will forgive any low-quality product.

text: will only satisfy those who ca n't tell the difference between the good , the bad and the ugly .
translation: 只会满足那些无法分辨好坏与丑的人。
back_translation: It will only satisfy those who cannot distinguish between good and bad, and beauty and ugliness.

text: though it was made with careful attention to detail and is well-acted by james spader and maggie gyllenhaal , i felt disrespected .
translation: 尽管它是经过仔细关注细节而制作的，并且詹姆斯·斯派德和玛吉·吉伦哈尔的表演都很好，但我感到不被尊重。
back_translation: Although it is made with careful attention to detail, and both James Spader and Maggie Gyllenhaal's performances are good, I feel disrespected.

text: when she was a little child she was given up for adoption and now she is ready to discover the story of her life .
translation: 当她还是个小孩时，她被送去收养，现在她准备去探索她的生命故事。
back_translation: When she was a child, she was sent for adoption, and now she is ready to explore her life story.

text: charlotte sometimes is a brilliant movie . it is about irrational , unexplainable life and it seems so real because it does not attempt to filter out the complexity .
translation: 《夏洛特有时》是一部精彩的电影。它讲述了非理性和无法解释的生活，这看起来如此真实，因为它并未试图过滤掉复杂性。
back_translation: "Charlotte Sometimes" is a wonderful film. It tells the story of the irrational and unexplainable aspects of life, which feels so real because it does not attempt to filter out the complexities.

text: a man brutally beats his girlfriend to death and tosses her remains into a local river . . .
translation: 一名男子残忍地将女友打死，并将她的尸体扔进当地的一条河里。。。
back_translation: A man brutally beat his girlfriend to death and threw her body into a local river...

text: or so he thinks until the blackmailer pulls a u-turn on rodney .
translation: 或者他是这样认为的，直到勒索者对罗德尼进行了180度的转变。
back_translation: Or he thought so, until the extortionist made a 180-degree turn on Rodney.

text: the movie takes place in mexico , 2002 ( based on a story from the 1800 's ) .
translation: 电影发生在2002年的墨西哥（基于19世纪的一个故事）。
back_translation: The movie takes place in Mexico in 2002 (based on a 19th-century story).

text: gigli abducts the brother from his mental hospital and holds him hostage in his apartment .
translation: 吉吉利绑架了他在精神病院的兄弟，并把他囚禁在自己的公寓里。
back_translation: Gigi Li kidnapped his brother from the mental hospital and imprisoned him in his own apartment.

text: filled with alexandre desplat 's haunting and sublime music , the movie completely transfixes the audience .
translation: 充满了亚历山大·德斯普拉 haunting 和崇高的音乐，这部电影完全吸引了观众。
back_translation: Filled with Alexander Desplat's haunting and sublime music, the film completely captivates the audience.

text: why would anyone cast the magnificent jackie chan in a movie full of stunt doubles and special effects ?
translation: 为什么会有人在充满特技替身和特效的电影中选用杰出的成龙？
back_translation: Why would someone choose the outstanding Jackie Chan in a film filled with stunts and special effects?

text: it 's a beautiful experience , nearly perfect with a fragile flowing fluid score .
translation: 这是一种美丽的体验，几乎完美，伴随着脆弱流畅的音乐配乐。
back_translation: This is a beautiful experience, almost perfect, accompanied by delicate and smooth musical accompaniment.

text: theology aside , why put someone who ultimately does n't learn at the center of a kids ' story ?
translation: 撇开神学不谈，为什么要把一个最终不学习的人置于孩子故事的中心呢？
back_translation: Putting someone who ultimately does not learn at the center of a children's story, why is that?

text: from the creative mind of pulizter winner dave barry , comes a film following a chain of events inspired by the arrival of a mysterious suitcase in miami .
translation: 从普利策奖获奖者戴夫·巴里富有创意的头脑中，诞生了一部电影，讲述了一系列由神秘手提箱在迈阿密出现所引发的事件。
back_translation: From the creative mind of Pulitzer Prize-winning Dave Barry comes a film that tells the story of a series of events triggered by a mysterious briefcase appearing in Miami.

text: `` notebook `` follows a young couple ( mcadams and gosling ) who meet in their teens and are reunited after world war ii .
translation: 《笔记本》讲述了一对年轻情侣（麦克亚当斯和高斯林）在十几岁时相遇，并在二战后重聚的故事。
back_translation: "The Notebook" tells the story of a young couple (McAdams and Gosling) who meet as teenagers and reunite after World War II.

text: where tom green stages his gags as assaults on america 's knee-jerk moral sanctimony , jackass lacks aspirations of social upheaval .
translation: 汤姆·格林将他的恶搞视为对美国膝反应式道德自命不凡的攻击，而《大傻瓜》则缺乏社会动荡的追求。
back_translation: Tom Green sees his parody as an attack on America's knee-jerk moral pretentiousness, while "The Big Dumb" lacks the pursuit of social upheaval.

text: andrew moves to a small town way up north to isolate himself from the rest of the world .
translation: 安德鲁搬到一个遥远的小镇，以便与世隔绝。
back_translation: Andrew moved to a remote little town to isolate himself from the world.

text: a hilarious film for anyone who remembers lying as a kid -- and anyone who wants to see a movie that 's just plain fun .
translation: 一部让人捧腹大笑的电影，适合那些记得小时候撒谎的人，以及想要观看一部纯粹有趣的电影的观众。
back_translation: A hilarious movie that is suitable for those who remember lying as a child and for audiences looking for a purely entertaining film.

text: a mobster 's wife is forced to confront her dark side when her young child is kidnapped and held for ransom .
translation: 一名黑帮老大的妻子被迫面对她的黑暗面，因她年幼的孩子被绑架并索要赎金。
back_translation: The wife of a gang leader is forced to confront her dark side when her young child is kidnapped and a ransom is demanded.

text: screenwriter dan schneider and director shawn levy substitute volume and primary colors for humor and bite .
translation: 编剧丹·施耐德和导演肖恩·利维用音量和原色替代幽默和尖锐。
back_translation: Screenwriter Dan Schneider and director Shawn Levy replace humor and sharpness with volume and primary colors.

text: never rising above routine episodic storytelling , white oleander nonetheless retains something of its source novel 's ravaged emotional surface and cool , observant manner .
translation: 尽管《白夹竹桃》从未超越例行的情节叙述，但它却保留了原著小说破碎的情感表面和冷静、观察的风格。
back_translation: Although "The White Oleander" never surpasses routine plot narration, it retains the fractured emotional surface and the calm, observational style of the original novel.

text: and this particular scheme requires a large amount of time-travel , and kidnapping austin powers ' father , england 's master spy , nigel powers .
translation: 这个特别的计划需要大量的时间旅行，以及绑架奥斯汀·鲍尔斯的父亲，英国的特工大师奈杰尔·鲍尔斯。
back_translation: This special plan requires a lot of time travel, as well as the kidnapping of Austin Powers' father, the British master spy Nigel Powers.

text: once the downward spiral comes to pass , auto focus bears out as your typical junkie opera . . .
translation: 一旦下行 spiraling 发生，自动聚焦就像你典型的吸毒者歌剧一样。
back_translation: Once the downward spiraling occurs, automatic focus is like your typical drug addict's opera.

text: it is most remarkable not because of its epic scope , but because of the startling intimacy it achieves despite that breadth .
translation: 它之所以引人注目，不是因为其史诗般的宏大规模，而是因为尽管有这种广度，它所达到的惊人亲密感。
back_translation: What makes it remarkable is not its epic scale, but rather the astonishing intimacy it achieves despite this breadth.

text: fine acting but there is no sense of connecting the dots , just dots .
translation: 精湛的表演，但没有连接点的感觉，只有点。
back_translation: A brilliant performance, but it feels disconnected, just points.

text: the ensuing road trip packs even more slapstick and locker room humor into an `` already-bursting `` movie .
translation: 随之而来的公路旅行在这部“已经爆满”的电影中加入了更多的滑稽幽默和更衣室笑话。
back_translation: The ensuing road trip adds more slapstick humor and locker room jokes to this "already packed" movie.

text: a gorgeously strange movie , heaven is deeply concerned with morality , but it refuses to spell things out for viewers .
translation: 一部美丽而奇特的电影，《天堂》深刻关注道德，但它拒绝为观众明言一切。
back_translation: A beautiful and unique film, "Paradise" deeply engages with morality but refuses to spell everything out for the audience.

text: a player in a famous orchestra finds sexual experiences with a russian opera singer , which he enjoys much because his wife has just left due to the fact that he has purchased a porno movie .
translation: 一位著名交响乐团的乐手与一位俄罗斯歌剧歌手发生性关系，他非常享受这段经历，因为他的妻子刚刚因他购买了一部色情电影而离开了他。
back_translation: A musician from a famous symphony orchestra had a sexual relationship with a Russian opera singer, and he thoroughly enjoyed the experience, as his wife had just left him for buying a pornographic movie.

text: woody allen 's latest is an ambling , broad comedy about all there is to love -- and hate -- about the movie biz .
translation: 伍迪·艾伦的最新作品是一部悠然自得、幽默广泛的喜剧，描绘了电影行业中所有值得喜爱和憎恨的事物。
back_translation: Woody Allen's latest work is a leisurely, widely humorous comedy that depicts all the things in the film industry that are worthy of love and hate.

text: she is the supply teacher of the 6d , the worst group of st-c & # 233 ; cile elementary school .
translation: 她是6D的代课老师，圣西尔小学最差的班级。
back_translation: She is the substitute teacher for class 6D, the worst class at St. Cyril Elementary School.

text: two sisters aged six years , no sooner see their remaining parent buried when they are torn apart .
translation: 两个六岁的姐妹，刚刚看到他们唯一剩下的父母被埋葬，就被迫分开。
back_translation: Two six-year-old sisters, having just seen their only surviving parent buried, were forced to part ways.

text: [ drumline ] is entertaining for what it does , and admirable for what it does n't do .
translation: [鼓乐队]因其所做的而令人娱乐，因其未做的而令人钦佩。
back_translation: The band entertains because of what they do and earns admiration for what they do not do.

text: `` all for nothin ' `` is their story of love , forgiveness and redemption .
translation: 《一切都是徒劳》是他们的爱情、宽恕和救赎的故事。
back_translation: "Everything is in vain" is their story of love, forgiveness, and redemption.

text: woody allen can write and deliver a one liner as well as anybody . but i had a lot of problems with this movie .
translation: 伍迪·艾伦能够像任何人一样写出并传递一个精彩的幽默台词。但我对这部电影有很多问题。
back_translation: Woody Allen can write and deliver a great humorous line like anyone else. But I have many questions about this movie.

text: he 's a middle aged hermit who likes to talk and has an answer to everything .
translation: 他是一个中年隐士，喜欢聊天，对任何事情都有答案。
back_translation: He is a middle-aged hermit who enjoys chatting and has an answer for everything.

text: despite suffering a sense-of-humour failure , the man who wrote rocky does not deserve to go down with a ship as leaky as this .
translation: 尽管遭遇了幽默感的失效，但写下《洛基》的那个人并不应该随这艘如此漏水的船沉没。
back_translation: Although faced with the failure of humor, the person who wrote "Loki" shouldn't sink with such a leaky ship.

text: a non-britney person might survive a screening with little harm done , except maybe for the last 15 minutes , which are as maudlin as any after-school special you can imagine .
translation: 一个非布兰妮的人在放映中可能会毫发无损地生存下来，除了最后15分钟，简直和你能想象的任何一部课后特别节目一样伤感。
back_translation: A non-Britney person might survive the screening unscathed, except for the last 15 minutes, which are as heartbreakingly sad as any after-school special you can imagine.

text: meanwhile , on jesse & # 180 ; s trail is the saint of the killers , a holy cowboy assassin with the mission of kill custer .
translation: 与此同时，在杰西的追踪下，是一个神圣的牛仔刺客——杀手圣徒，他的任务是杀掉卡斯特。
back_translation: Meanwhile, under Jesse's pursuit, is a holy cowboy assassin - the Killer Saint, whose mission is to kill Caster.

text: . . . this is n't even a movie we can enjoy as mild escapism ; it is one in which fear and frustration are provoked to intolerable levels .
translation: ……这不仅仅是一部我们可以轻松享受的电影；它是一部使人感到恐惧和沮丧的作品，情感达到无法忍受的程度。
back_translation: ...this is not just a movie we can easily enjoy; it is a work that evokes fear and despair, with emotions reaching an unbearable level.

text: the screenplay comes across , rather unintentionally , as hip-hop scooby-doo .
translation: 这个剧本看起来，尽管不是有意而为之，像是嘻哈版的史酷比。
back_translation: This script appears, although not intentionally, to be like a hip-hop version of Scooby-Doo.

text: into their midst come a hotshot american , van zan ( matthew mcconaughey ) , who says he has a way to kill the beasts and save mankind - a way quinn 's never seen done .
translation: 在他们中间出现了一位杰出的美国人范·赞（马修·麦康纳），他说他有办法杀死那些野兽，拯救人类——这是奎因从未见过的方法。
back_translation: Among them appeared an outstanding American, Van Zant (Matthew McConaughey), who claimed he had a way to kill those beasts and save humanity—this was a method Quinn had never seen before.

text: the quest is hope and the passions that drive us in this search .
translation: 追求是希望，以及驱动我们进行这场探索的激情。
back_translation: Pursuit is hope, as well as the passion that drives us to undertake this exploration.

text: ultimately she discovers that what appears on the surface to be true quite often is not .
translation: 最终，她发现表面上看似真实的事情往往并非如此。
back_translation: In the end, she realized that things that seem real on the surface are often not so.

text: leela is the story of leela , an aware , liberal woman who struggles with the true meaning of independence .
translation: 《利拉》是关于利拉的故事，她是一位有意识的自由女性，奋力探索独立的真正意义。
back_translation: "Leela" is a story about Leela, a conscious free woman who strives to explore the true meaning of independence.

text: robert harmon 's less-is-more approach delivers real bump-in -the-night chills -- his greatest triumph is keeping the creepy crawlies hidden in the film 's thick shadows .
translation: 罗伯特·哈蒙的少即是多的方法带来了真正的夜间惊悚感——他最大的成功在于将爬虫类隐藏在影片浓厚的阴影中。
back_translation: Robert Harmon's less is more approach brings a true sense of nightmarish thrill—his greatest success lies in concealing the reptiles within the film's dense shadows.

text: labute masterfully balances both traditional or modern stories together in a manner that one never overwhelms the other . something for everyone .
translation: 拉布特巧妙地将传统故事和现代故事相结合，让它们之间互不压倒。每个人都能找到合适的内容。
back_translation: Labute skillfully combines traditional and modern stories, allowing them to coexist without overshadowing one another. Everyone can find suitable content.

text: however , his son is a celibate priest who has never had any success with women . . . , ever .
translation: 然而，他的儿子是一个独身的牧师，从未在女性面前取得过任何成功……，从来没有过。
back_translation: However, his son is a celibate pastor who has never had any success in front of women... never.

text: well , bruce nolan , played by jim carrey , gets that chance after he freaks out on live tv , is fired and is offered a new job by an unknown place .
translation: 布鲁斯·诺兰，由吉姆·凯瑞饰演，在直播中失控后获得了这个机会，他被解雇并收到了一份来自一个不知名地方的新工作的邀请。
back_translation: Bruce Nolan, played by Jim Carrey, gains this opportunity after losing control during a live broadcast; he is fired and receives an invitation for a new job from an unknown place.

text: burns ' fifth beer-soaked film feels in almost every possible way -- from the writing and direction to the soggy performances -- tossed off .
translation: 伯恩斯的第五部啤酒浸泡的电影在几乎所有可能的方面都显得草率——从编剧和导演到松散的表演。
back_translation: Burns' fifth beer-soaked film comes across as hasty in almost every possible aspect—from the writing and directing to the loose performances.

text: contributors include : director mimi leder , editor anne v . coates , producer gail katz and director claudia weill .
translation: 参与者包括：导演米米·莱德，编辑安妮·V·科茨，制作人盖尔·卡茨和导演克劳迪娅·维尔。
back_translation: Participants include director Mimi Leder, editor Anne V. Coates, producer Gale Katz, and director Claudia Weill.

text: takes a look at an old world , passionless arrangement in a way that is at once so biting and so brutally honest that you chuckle first , then shudder .
translation: 以一种既尖锐又 brutally honest 的方式审视一段老旧的、缺乏激情的安排，让你先是发笑，随后又感到颤栗。
back_translation: Examine an old, passionless arrangement in a way that is both sharp and brutally honest, making you first laugh and then shudder.

text: but what exactly is good and waht exactly is evil ?
translation: 但究竟什么是好的，什么是坏的呢？
back_translation: But what exactly is good, and what is bad?

text: . . . [ a ] strained comedy that jettisons all opportunities for rock to make his mark by serving up the usual chaotic nonsense .
translation: 一部紧张的喜剧，放弃了摇滚发挥自己影响力的所有机会，只是呈现出通常的混乱无序。
back_translation: A tense comedy that gives up all opportunities for rock to exert its influence, simply presenting the usual chaos and disorder.

text: this is a harrowing movie about how parents know where all the buttons are , and how to push them .
translation: 这是一部令人痛苦的电影，讲述了父母如何知道所有的按钮在哪里，以及如何去按它们。
back_translation: This is a painful movie that tells how parents know where all the buttons are and how to press them.

text: at once emotional and richly analytical , the cosby-seinfeld encounter alone confirms the serious weight behind this superficially loose , larky documentary .
translation: 同时充满情感和深刻分析，考斯比与塞infeld的遭遇仅此一例就证实了这个表面轻松、嬉笑的纪录片背后严肃的分量。
back_translation: Filled with emotion and deep analysis, the encounter between Cosby and Seinfeld alone proves the serious weight behind this seemingly light-hearted and humorous documentary.

text: a fast-moving , fluidly told tale , eugene jarecki 's documentary certainly will likely inflame kissinger 's ardent cronies . and yet , as one-sided as its story is , the movie also manages a measured disposition .
translation: 一部快速推进、流畅叙述的故事，尤金·贾雷基的纪录片无疑会激怒基辛格的热心追随者。尽管其故事极具片面性，这部电影仍然展现了相对客观的态度。
back_translation: A fast-paced, smoothly narrated story, Eugene Jarecki's documentary will undoubtedly infuriate passionate followers of Kissinger. Although the narrative is highly one-sided, the film still presents a relatively objective attitude.

text: along the way , the filmmakers try to learn from these relationship veterans , while navigating their own fledgling polyamorous relationships .
translation: 在这个过程中，电影制作者试图向这些关系老手学习，同时也在应对自己初生的多元恋关系。
back_translation: In this process, the filmmakers tried to learn from these relationship veterans while also dealing with their own budding polyamorous relationships.

text: would anyone believe mary and joe 's claim to abstinence ?
translation: 有人会相信玛丽和乔的禁欲声明吗？
back_translation: Will anyone believe Mary and Joe's celibacy statement?

text: until it goes off the rails in its final 10 or 15 minutes , wendigo , larry fessenden 's spooky new thriller , is a refreshingly smart and newfangled variation on several themes derived from far less sophisticated and knowing horror films .
translation: 直到最后的10到15分钟失控，《温迪戈》，拉里·费森登（Larry Fessenden）最新的惊悚片，是对几个主题的清新、智能且新颖的变体，这些主题源自那些远不如其成熟和深刻的恐怖电影。
back_translation: Until the last 10 to 15 minutes of chaos, "Wendigo," Larry Fessenden's latest thriller, is a fresh, intelligent, and novel variation on several themes drawn from horror films that are far less mature and profound.

text: if ever a concept came handed down from the movie gods on a silver platter , this is it . if ever such a dependable concept was botched in execution , this is it .
translation: 如果有哪个概念像是从电影之神那里端来的银盘子，这就是它。如果有哪个如此可靠的概念在执行时被搞砸了，那就是它。
back_translation: If there is a concept that seems to have been delivered on a silver platter from the god of cinema, it is this one. If there is a concept so reliable that it gets messed up in execution, it is this one.

text: as self-aware movies go , who is cletis tout ? is clever enough , though thin writing proves its undoing .
translation: 在自我意识电影中，克莱蒂斯·托特是谁？尽管这一影片足够聪明，但薄弱的剧本最终导致了它的失败。
back_translation: In self-awareness films, who is Cleitis Tott? Although the film is clever enough, a weak script ultimately leads to its failure.

text: saigon , 1952 , a beautiful , exotic , and mysterious city caught in the grips of the vietnamese war of liberation from the french colonial powers .
translation: 西贡，1952年，一个美丽、异国情调且神秘的城市，正陷入越南从法国殖民力量解放战争的漩涡中。
back_translation: Saigon, 1952, a beautiful, exotic, and mysterious city, is plunged into the vortex of Vietnam's war for liberation from French colonial power.

text: well , jason 's gone to manhattan and hell , i guess a space station in the year 2455 can be crossed off the list of ideas for the inevitable future sequels ( hey , do n't shoot the messenger ) .
translation: 好吧，杰森去曼哈顿了，我想在2455年的太空站可以从未来续集的创意清单上划掉了（嘿，别杀死传话者）。
back_translation: Alright, Jason went to Manhattan, and I think we can cross off the creative list for future sequels at the space station in 2455 (hey, don't shoot the messenger).

text: the heedless impetuousness of youth is on full , irritating display in [ this ] meandering and pointless french coming-of-age import from writer-director anne-sophie birot .
translation: 年轻人无所顾忌的冲动在这部由编剧和导演安-索非·比罗特创作的漫无目的且毫无意义的法式成长电影中表现得淋漓尽致，令人恼火。
back_translation: The reckless impulsiveness of youth is vividly portrayed in this aimless and meaningless French coming-of-age film created by screenwriter and director An-Sophie Birot, which is frustrating.

text: eva is an accidental witness of the death of a young girl , even more : she 's got it all on tape .
translation: 埃娃意外目睹了一名年轻女孩的死亡，更重要的是，她把这一切都录了下来。
back_translation: Eva accidentally witnessed the death of a young girl, and more importantly, she recorded it all.

text: i 'm not sure which half of dragonfly is worse : the part where nothing 's happening , or the part where something 's happening , but it 's stupid .
translation: 我不确定蜻蜓的哪个部分更糟：什么都没有发生的部分，还是有事情发生但很愚蠢的部分。
back_translation: I'm not sure which part of the dragonfly is worse: the part where nothing happens, or the part where something happens but it's very stupid.

text: and while bruce is getting everything he wants , he has been ignoring his girlfriend , grace and loses her .
translation: 当布鲁斯得到了他想要的一切时，他却忽视了他的女友格蕾丝，并失去了她。
back_translation: When Bruce got everything he wanted, he neglected his girlfriend Grace and lost her.

text: the acting is amateurish , the cinematography is atrocious , the direction is clumsy , the writing is insipid and the violence is at once luridly graphic and laughably unconvincing .
translation: 表演很业余，摄影糟糕透顶，导演笨拙，剧本平淡无味，暴力场面既显得过于血腥又让人觉得滑稽不堪。
back_translation: The performance is very amateurish, the photography is terrible, the direction is clumsy, the script is bland and uninteresting, and the violent scenes appear both excessively bloody and absurdly laughable.

text: oblivious of all the differences of status and background , a bond that would never break grew between them .
translation: 他们之间建立了一种永不破裂的纽带，毫不在意地位和背景的所有差异。
back_translation: They established an unbreakable bond between them, completely indifferent to all differences in status and background.

text: from spiritual rebirth to bruising defeat , vincent 's odyssey resonates in a profound way , comparable to the classic films of jean renoir .
translation: 从灵魂重生到惨痛的失败，文森特的冒险以深刻的方式产生共鸣，可与让·雷诺阿的经典电影相媲美。
back_translation: From the rebirth of his soul to painful failures, Vincent's adventures resonate in a profound way, comparable to the classic films of Jean Renoir.

text: in this debut short , meeper valiantly tries to warn the patrons of the ale-e-inn ( an intergalactic watering hole with its own constellation of stars ) of impending danger , only to find himself face-to-face with the most fearsome creatures in the galaxy .
translation: 在这部初次短片中，Meeper勇敢地试图警告酒吧（一个拥有自己星座的星际水坑）里的顾客即将来临的危险，却发现自己与银河中最可怕的生物面对面。
back_translation: In this short film, Meeper bravely attempts to warn the patrons of the bar (an interstellar watering hole with its own constellation) about the impending danger, only to find themselves face to face with the most terrifying creatures in the galaxy.

text: friday after next has the same problem that next friday did -- it 's called where 's chris tucker when you need him ?
translation: 下个星期五后有着和下个星期五一样的问题——这叫做“当你需要他时，克里斯·塔克在哪里？”
back_translation: Next Friday will have the same problem as this Friday - it's called "Where is Chris Tucker when you need him?"

text: the director 's twitchy sketchbook style and adroit perspective shifts grow wearisome amid leaden pacing and indifferent craftsmanship ( most notably wretched sound design ) .
translation: 导演那种神经质的素描风格和灵活的视角转换在沉闷的节奏和冷漠的工艺（特别是糟糕的音效设计）中变得令人厌倦。
back_translation: The director's neurotic sketch style and flexible perspective shifts become tedious amidst the dull rhythm and indifferent craftsmanship (especially the poor sound design).

text: that 's why handsome and his three best friends sammy , victor and the cribsheet genius applebee have banded together and found ways to cheat on their tests all through their school years .
translation: 这就是为什么英俊和他的三位好友萨米、维克多以及聪明的苹果比一起联合起来，想出了在学校期间作弊的方法。
back_translation: This is why the handsome boy and his three friends, Sammy, Victor, and the clever Apple, united to come up with a way to cheat during school.

text: beautifully filmed and well acted . . . but admittedly problematic in its narrative specifics .
translation: 拍摄精美，演技出色......但在叙事细节上确实存在问题。
back_translation: The cinematography is exquisite, and the acting is outstanding... but there are indeed problems with the narrative details.

text: lindberg demonstrates a remarkable sense of place , a keen understanding that emotions are boiled into a concentrate , not diluted , in the rural setting .
translation: 林德伯格展现了卓越的地方感，深刻理解情感在乡村环境中是浓缩的，而非稀释的。
back_translation: Lindbergh demonstrated an exceptional sense of place, deeply understanding that emotions in rural environments are concentrated rather than diluted.

text: i cry for i spy -- or i would if this latest and laziest imaginable of all vintage-tv spinoffs were capable of engendering an emotional response of any kind .
translation: 我为《我间谍》哭泣——或者说我会哭，如果这一最新且懒惰的老电视衍生剧能够引发任何情感反应的话。
back_translation: I cry for "My Spy" - or rather, I would cry if this latest and lazy old TV spin-off could elicit any emotional response.

text: four outlandish but faithful men , a moslem , a hindu , a jew and a christian coincidently meet up a mountain , at an altitude of 3000 metres .
translation: 四个奇特但忠诚的人，一个穆斯林，一个印度教徒，一个犹太人和一个基督徒，巧合地在一座3000米高的山上相遇。
back_translation: Four peculiar yet loyal people, a Muslim, a Hindu, a Jew, and a Christian, coincidentally meet on a mountain 3000 meters high.

text: but on the wedding day , they also sign a divorce agreement which is effective one year after their marriage .
translation: 但在婚礼当天，他们也签署了一份离婚协议，该协议在他们结婚一年后生效。
back_translation: But on the day of the wedding, they also signed a divorce agreement, which would take effect one year after their marriage.

text: the film falls short on tension , eloquence , spiritual challenge -- things that have made the original new testament stories so compelling for 20 centuries .
translation: 这部影片在紧张感、雄辩和精神挑战方面显得不足，这些正是使得原始新约故事在过去20个世纪中如此引人入胜的因素。
back_translation: This film falls short in terms of tension, eloquence, and spiritual challenge, which are precisely the factors that have made the original New Testament story so captivating over the past 20 centuries.

text: you watch for that sense of openness , the little surprises .
translation: 你要留意那种开放的感觉，那些小惊喜。
back_translation: You need to pay attention to that feeling of openness, those little surprises.

text: miyazaki 's nonstop images are so stunning , and his imagination so vivid , that the only possible complaint you could have about spirited away is that there is no rest period , no timeout .
translation: 宫崎骏的非停画像是如此惊艳，他的想象力如此生动，以至于你对《千与千寻》唯一可能的抱怨就是没有休息时间，没有暂停。
back_translation: Hayao Miyazaki's continuous imagery is so stunning, and his imagination is so vivid that the only possible complaint about "Spirited Away" is the lack of a break, no pause.

text: it 's the end of the world as metaphor for how we scuttle relationships , and it 's a remarkably apt one .
translation: 这是世界末日，作为我们如何破坏关系的隐喻，这个比喻非常贴切。
back_translation: This is the end of the world, and as a metaphor for how we destroy relationships, this analogy is very fitting.

text: this film was made by and for those folks who collect the serial killer cards and are fascinated by the mere suggestion of serial killers . for the rest of us , sitting through dahmer 's two hours amounts to little more than punishment .
translation: 这部电影是为那些收集连环杀手卡片并对连环杀手的暗示感到着迷的人制作的。对于我们其他人来说，观看达默的两个小时几乎只能算作是一种惩罚。
back_translation: This movie is made for those who collect serial killer cards and are fascinated by the hints about serial killers. For the rest of us, watching Dahmer for two hours can almost be considered a punishment.

text: from stag beetle to swastika narrates in a richly detailed , associative montage the boundless possibilities of manipulating images and using images the historionaut , a history machine , produces an incessant stream of remembered , contemporary and future images .
translation: 从锹甲虫到万字符，通过丰富细致、联想性的蒙太奇叙述了操控图像和使用图像的无限可能性，历史机——“历史航天者”产生不断流动的记忆、当代和未来图像。
back_translation: From the shovel beetle to the infinity symbol, it narrates the endless possibilities of manipulating and using images through rich, detailed, and associative montage, creating a historical mechanism— "historical space travelers" that generate continuously flowing memories, contemporary, and future images.

text: by the time it ends in a rush of sequins , flashbulbs , blaring brass and back-stabbing babes , it has said plenty about how show business has infiltrated every corner of society -- and not always for the better .
translation: 当它在一阵亮片、闪光灯、刺耳的铜管乐器和背后捅刀的美女中结束时，它已经充分说明了娱乐行业是如何渗透到社会的每一个角落——而且并不总是带来好处。
back_translation: When it ends amid a flurry of sequins, flashbulbs, blaring brass instruments, and backstabbing beauties, it thoroughly illustrates how the entertainment industry has seeped into every corner of society—and not always for the better.

text: the film succeeds as an homage to human spirit in the most shattering of circumstances .
translation: 这部电影在最严峻的环境中成功地致敬于人类精神。
back_translation: This movie successfully pays tribute to the human spirit in the harshest of environments.

text: arcangel and his son travel to hometown , the familiy house looks abandoned , only isabel , a misterious old woman , is there .
translation: 阿尔坎杰尔和他的儿子回到故乡，家族的房子看起来被荒废了，只有一个神秘的老妇人伊莎贝尔在那里。
back_translation: Alkanjiel and his son returned to their hometown, and the family house looked abandoned, with only a mysterious old woman named Isabel there.

text: smart science fiction for grown-ups , with only a few false steps along the way .
translation: 适合成年人的智能科幻，途中只有少数几次失误。
back_translation: Smart science fiction suitable for adults, with only a few mistakes along the way.

text: i 'll go out on a limb . it is n't quite one of the worst movies of the year . it 's just merely very bad .
translation: 我会冒险说，它并不是今年最糟糕的电影之一。它只是非常糟糕而已。
back_translation: I would venture to say that it is not one of the worst movies of the year. It is just very bad, that's all.

text: disney has always been hit-or-miss when bringing beloved kids ' books to the screen . . . tuck everlasting is a little of both .
translation: 迪士尼在将受人喜爱的儿童书籍搬上银幕时一直是好坏参半……《永恒的塔克》也是这样。
back_translation: Disney has had mixed results when bringing beloved children's books to the screen, and "The Eternal Tucker" is no exception.

text: . . . its stupidities wind up sticking in one 's mind a lot more than the cool bits .
translation: ……它的愚蠢往往比酷炫的部分更容易留在一个人的脑海中。
back_translation: ...its foolishness often sticks in a person's mind more easily than its cool parts.

text: in a world besieged by world war ii , wendy , now grown up , tries to give her own children hope by telling them of her magical experiences with peter pan in never land .
translation: 在一个被第二次世界大战围困的世界里，温迪现在长大了，她试图通过讲述自己在梦幻岛与彼得·潘的神奇经历来给予自己的孩子们希望。
back_translation: In a world besieged by World War II, Wendy has now grown up, and she tries to give her children hope by recounting her magical experiences with Peter Pan on Neverland.

text: the script is smart and dark - hallelujah for small favors .
translation: 这个剧本聪明而阴暗——为小恩惠而欢呼。
back_translation: This script is clever and dark—cheering for small favors.

text: a love story played out against a backdrop of political and religious upheaval .
translation: 在政治和宗教动荡的背景下上演的爱情故事。
back_translation: A love story set against the backdrop of political and religious turmoil.

text: an internet terrorist creates a computer source code based on the dna of a junkie .
translation: 一个互联网恐怖分子根据一个瘾君子的DNA创建了计算机源代码。
back_translation: An internet terrorist created computer source code based on the DNA of an addict.

text: it 's at once laughable and compulsively watchable , in its committed dumbness .
translation: 它既可笑又令人无法自拔，因其执着的愚蠢。
back_translation: It is both ridiculous and addictive, due to its persistent stupidity.

text: retired fbi profiler terry mccaleb ( eastwood ) , who has recently had a heart transplant , is hired by graciela rivers ( de jesus ) , to investigate the death of her sister , gloria , who happens to have given mccaleb his heart .
translation: 退休的FBI心理画像分析师特里·麦卡勒布（伊ース特伍德饰），最近接受了心脏移植，受格拉西亚·里弗斯（德·赫苏斯饰）委托，调查她的姐姐格洛丽亚的死因，而格洛丽亚恰好是麦卡勒布心脏的捐赠者。
back_translation: Retired FBI behavioral analyst Terry McCaleb (played by Eastwood) has recently undergone a heart transplant and is commissioned by Gracia Rivers (played by De Jesus) to investigate the cause of her sister Gloria's death, who just happens to be the donor of McCaleb's heart.

text: sassy postgrad elle woods ( witherspoon ) is all about animal rights .
translation: 调皮的研究生艾尔·伍兹（瑞茜·威瑟斯彭）全心全意投入动物权利的活动。
back_translation: The playful graduate student Elle Woods (Reese Witherspoon) is wholeheartedly dedicated to animal rights activism.

text: centuries of tradition place this holy mountain in the sinai peninsula of egypt , but compelling evidence will show that this hallowed ground , where moses was told to take the shoes of his feet before the burning bush , may actually be in the barren deserts of northwestern saudi arabia .
translation: 几个世纪的传统将这座神圣的山脉置于埃及的西奈半岛，但有力的证据显示，这片圣地，摩西在燃烧的荆棵前被告知要脱掉鞋子，实际上可能位于沙特阿拉伯西北部的贫瘠沙漠中。
back_translation: Centuries of tradition place this sacred mountain on the Sinai Peninsula in Egypt, but strong evidence suggests that this holy site, where Moses was told to take off his shoes before the burning bush, may actually be located in the barren desert of northwestern Saudi Arabia.

text: its valuable message makes it a must-see for children and teenagers , and even more so for those callous adults who have become casually corrupt in their efforts to simply get through life .
translation: 它宝贵的信息使其成为儿童和青少年必须观看的影片，对于那些为了简单度过生活而变得麻木不仁、随意堕落的成年人来说，更是如此。
back_translation: Its valuable message makes it a must-watch film for children and adolescents, and even more so for adults who have become numb and complacent in their lives.

text: it seems like i have been waiting my whole life for this movie and now i ca n't wait for the sequel .
translation: 我感觉我整个人生都在等待这部电影，现在我迫不及待想看续集了。
back_translation: I feel like I've been waiting my whole life for this movie, and now I can't wait to see the sequel.

text: this is n't just the cliffsnotes version of nicholas nickleby , it 's the cliffsnotes with pages missing .
translation: 这不仅仅是《尼古拉斯·尼克贝》的简明版，而是缺少页面的简明版。
back_translation: This is not just a simplified version of "Nicholas Nickleby," but a concise version that lacks pages.

text: years later , at the inauguration of the 'paradise-casino ' , patricia announces to a stunned crowd and a flabbergasted katherine that she immediately retires from showbusiness .
translation: 多年后，在“天堂赌场”的开幕式上，帕特里夏向震惊的人群和目瞪口呆的凯瑟琳宣布，她立即从娱乐圈退休。
back_translation: Years later, at the opening ceremony of the "Heaven Casino," Patricia announced to the shocked crowd and the stunned Catherine that she was retiring from the entertainment industry immediately.

text: a hip ride into hyper-time , clockstoppers is a lively and enjoyable adventure for all ages at any time .
translation: 《时间停止者》是一场充满活力和乐趣的冒险，适合所有年龄段的人们在任何时候观看。
back_translation: "The Time Stopper" is a vibrant and fun adventure suitable for people of all ages to watch at any time.

text: an entertaining and poignantly bittersweet take-down of a good man 's midlife crisis .
translation: 一个娱乐性十足且带有微妙苦涩的对一个好人的中年危机的揭示。
back_translation: A humorous yet subtly bittersweet revelation of a good person's midlife crisis.

text: ultimately this is a frustrating patchwork : an uneasy marriage of louis begley 's source novel ( about schmidt ) and an old payne screenplay .
translation: 最终，这是一种令人沮丧的拼凑：路易斯·贝格利的原著小说《关于施密特》与一部旧的佩恩剧本的勉强结合。
back_translation: Ultimately, this is a frustrating patchwork: a grudging combination of Louis Begley’s original novel "About Schmidt" and an old Paynes script.

text: sort of an existential version of a seinfeld episode .
translation: 一种存在主义版本的《宋飞正传》剧集。
back_translation: An existential version of "Seinfeld."

text: the camera cuts back and forth between gus and grace : he talks about what a great driver he is , she says he 's a lousy driver .
translation: 镜头在古斯和格雷斯之间切换：他谈论自己是多么优秀的司机，她则说他是个糟糕的司机。
back_translation: The camera switches between Gus and Grace: he talks about how great a driver he is, while she says he is a terrible driver.

text: there has to be a few advantages to never growing old . like being able to hit on a 15-year old when you 're over 100 .
translation: 永远不变老肯定有一些好处，比如当你过了100岁时仍然可以追求15岁的小女孩。
back_translation: There are definitely some benefits to never aging, such as being able to pursue a 15-year-old girl even when you are over 100 years old.

text: a london website designer ops out of her comfortable but ordinary relationship with a nice boyfriend when she forms a dangerously obsessive bond with a handsome , mysterious mountaineer , who turns out to have some secrets .
translation: 一位伦敦网站设计师在与一位好男友的舒适但平凡的关系中选择退却，当她与一位英俊神秘的登山者形成危险的痴迷关系时，这位登山者却隐藏着一些秘密。
back_translation: A London web designer chooses to retreat from her comfortable but ordinary relationship with a good boyfriend when she becomes dangerously obsessed with a handsome, mysterious mountaineer, who is hiding some secrets.

text: not only is it a charming , funny and beautifully crafted import , it uses very little dialogue , making it relatively effortless to read and follow the action at the same time .
translation: 它不仅是一部迷人、有趣且精美制作的进口作品，几乎没有对话，使得阅读和跟随情节变得相对轻松。
back_translation: It is not only a captivating, interesting, and beautifully produced imported work, but it also has very little dialogue, making it relatively easy to read and follow the plot.

text: they will try to find hanareh , a singer with a magic voice who crossed the border and may now be in danger in the iraqi kurdistan .
translation: 他们将努力寻找哈纳雷，一个拥有魔力声音的歌手，她越过了边境，现在可能在伊拉克库尔德斯坦面临危险。
back_translation: They will work hard to find Hanalei, a singer with a magical voice, who has crossed the border and may now be in danger in Iraqi Kurdistan.

text: nearly manages to be what `` blow `` could n't - a perpetual night party that generates a sick fascination to the bitter end .
translation: 几乎成功地成为《吹》所无法做到的 - 一个产生病态吸引力的永恒夜晚派对，一直持续到令人苦涩的尽头。
back_translation: Almost succeeded in becoming what "Blow" could not achieve - an eternal night party that generates morbid allure, continuing until a bitter end.

text: the project of pre-crime , at the time being in a state of trial run , is going to be voted about in the near future .
translation: 预犯罪项目目前处于试运行状态，将在不久的将来进行投票。
back_translation: The pre-crime project is currently in trial operation and will be put to a vote in the near future.

text: fontaine 's direction , especially her agreeably startling use of close-ups and her grace with a moving camera , creates sheerly cinematic appeal .
translation: 丰丹的导演风格，特别是她令人愉悦的惊人特写使用以及她对动态摄影机的优雅掌控，创造出纯粹的电影魅力。
back_translation: Feng Dan's directorial style, especially her delightful use of stunning close-ups and her elegant control of dynamic camera work, creates pure cinematic charm.

text: it 's a race against the clock as jay must convince kay -- who not only has no memory of his time spent with the agency , but is also the only person alive who has the expertise to save the galaxy -- to reunite with the mib before earth is destroyed completely .
translation: 这是一场与时间赛跑的比赛，杰伊必须说服凯——他不仅对自己在局里度过的时间没有记忆，而且还是唯一有能力拯救银河系的生还者——在地球完全毁灭之前与MIB重聚。
back_translation: This is a race against time, and Jay must convince Kai—who not only has no memory of the time he spent in the organization but is also the only survivor capable of saving the galaxy—to reunite with MIB before Earth is completely destroyed.

text: marly has given her career as an aquatic weeki wachee mermaid up and her marriage to steve is over .
translation: 玛莉放弃了作为水上威基瓦奇美人鱼的事业，她与史蒂夫的婚姻也结束了。
back_translation: Mary gave up her career as a mermaid at Weeki Wachee Springs, and her marriage to Steve also came to an end.

text: perry 's good and his is an interesting character , but `` serving sara `` has n't much more to serve than silly fluff . nor is it a romantic comedy .
translation: 佩里的表现不错，他是一个有趣的角色，但《为萨拉服务》没有提供更多的内容，只是一些无聊的花边。它也不是一部浪漫喜剧。
back_translation: Perry's performance is good; he is an interesting character, but "Serving Sara" doesn't provide much more than some boring fluff. It is also not a romantic comedy.

text: the result of a weekend affair he had back at the height of his fame produced olivia , a newpaper delivery girl for the south wales echo .
translation: 他在昔日声名鼎盛时期的一次周末风流情事的结果是奥利维亚，她是一名南威尔士回声报的报纸送递员。
back_translation: The result of his weekend affair during his former peak fame was Olivia, a newspaper delivery girl from the South Wales Echo.

text: everyone around graham has their reasons why he should or should n't fully recover . . .
translation: 在格雷厄姆周围，每个人都有自己的理由，说明他为什么应该或不应该完全康复……
back_translation: Around Graham, everyone has their own reasons explaining why he should or should not fully recover...

text: after confidential ( and shameful ) information was released by british authorities , this amazing story of survival was finally confirmed .
translation: 在英国当局发布了机密（和可耻）的信息后，这个令人惊叹的生存故事终于得到了证实。
back_translation: After the British authorities released confidential (and shameful) information, this astonishing survival story has finally been confirmed.

text: hope looms on the horizon though : he 's closing in fast on his dream of opening a four-star restaurant in north conway .
translation: 希望在地平线上冒出曙光：他正迅速接近实现他在北康威开一家四星级餐厅的梦想。
back_translation: Hoping for dawn to emerge on the horizon: He is quickly approaching the realization of his dream to open a four-star restaurant in North Conway.

text: plays like one long , meandering sketch inspired by the works of john waters and todd solondz , rather than a fully developed story .
translation: 这部作品更像是一段冗长而蜿蜒的草图，灵感来自约翰·沃特斯和托德·索伦兹的作品，而不是一个完全发展的故事。
back_translation: This work is more like a lengthy and winding sketch, inspired by the works of John Waters and Todd Solondz, rather than a fully developed story.

text: using his family 's old mob connections , tony has mapped out every detail for a very special evening .
translation: 利用他家族的老帮派关系，托尼为一个非常特别的晚上制定了每一个细节。
back_translation: Using the old gang connections of his family, Tony meticulously planned every detail for a very special evening.

text: although no pastry is violated , this nasty comedy pokes fun at the same easy targets as other rowdy raunch-fests -- farts , boobs , unmentionables -- without much success .
translation: 尽管没有违反任何糕点，这部恶心的喜剧仍然嘲笑了与其他喧闹的淫秽喜剧相同的简单目标——放屁、胸部、不可提及之物——但收效甚微。
back_translation: Despite not violating any pastries, this disgusting comedy still mocks the same simple targets as other noisy obscene comedies—farts, breasts, and things better left unmentioned—but with little effect.

text: it is only natural for `` the shu `` to flourish under the care of corrupt and powerful men like battista .
translation: 在像巴蒂斯塔这样的腐败而有权势的人物的照料下，“书”自然会繁荣发展。
back_translation: Under the care of corrupt and powerful figures like Batista, the "book" will naturally prosper and develop.

text: she trails the couch through a quirky landscape populated by hasidim in brooklyn , holocaust survivors and ex-communists in hungary , and , finally , the next generation of formerly-hasidic jews on the margins of their communities in new york and israel .
translation: 她在一个奇特的景观中拖着沙发，那里有布鲁克林的哈西德人、六千万幸存者和匈牙利的前共产主义者，最后是新一代居住在纽约和以色列的边缘之前哈西德犹太人。
back_translation: She drags a sofa through a strange landscape, populated by Hasidic Jews from Brooklyn, six million survivors, and former Communists from Hungary, ultimately leading to a new generation of Hasidic Jews living on the margins in New York and Israel.

text: in cinemania , hollywood 's biggest fans become the true stars .
translation: 在《电影狂热》中，好莱坞最大的粉丝成为真正的明星。
back_translation: In "Film Fanatic," Hollywood's biggest fans become real stars.

text: through his addiction to these ardent visions , he becomes more reclusive .
translation: 通过对这些热烈幻想的沉迷，他变得更加隐秘。
back_translation: Through his obsession with these passionate fantasies, he became more secretive.

text: . . . best seen as speculative history , as much an exploration of the paranoid impulse as a creative sequel to the warren report .
translation: . . . 最好视为一种投机性历史，既是对偏执冲动的探索，也是对沃伦报告的创造性续篇。
back_translation: ...best regarded as a speculative history, both an exploration of paranoid impulses and a creative sequel to the Warren Report.

text: in building a home-made bomb and setting off a plan that fails miserably , her status changes from young widow to that of a criminal in custody .
translation: 在制造自制炸弹并实施计划失败后，她的身份从年轻寡妇转变为被拘留的罪犯。
back_translation: After a failed attempt to manufacture homemade bombs and carry out her plan, her identity transformed from a young widow to a detained criminal.

text: searching for validity , recognition , and truth , he befriends a quirky computer genius and a kickboxing goddess , who all help one another realize what they have been missing from their lives .
translation: 为了寻找有效性、认同和真理，他结识了一位古怪的计算机天才和一位踢拳女神，他们互相帮助，让彼此意识到自己生活中缺失的东西。
back_translation: In search of efficacy, identity, and truth, he befriends an eccentric computer genius and a kickboxing goddess, and they help each other realize what is missing in their lives.

text: set in an american town in the rocky mountains in the 1930s .
translation: 故事发生在1930年代的落基山脉一个美国小镇上。
back_translation: The story takes place in a small town in the Rocky Mountains of the United States in the 1930s.

text: when a humans camp is attacked by tigers , a woman takes her baby and jumps on a river .
translation: 当人类营地受到老虎袭击时，一名妇女抱着她的婴儿跳进河里。
back_translation: When the human camp was attacked by a tiger, a woman jumped into the river holding her baby.

text: mother and daughter hide in the `` panic room , `` a secret room designed for just such a purpose , but still end up fighting for their lives . . .
translation: 母亲和女儿躲在“恐慌室”中，这个秘密房间是为了应对这种情况而设计的，但她们依然不得不为自己的生命而战……
back_translation: A mother and daughter are hiding in the "panic room," a secret space designed to deal with situations like this, but they still have to fight for their lives...

text: unless you 're a fanatic , the best advice is : 'scooby ' do n't .
translation: 除非你是个狂热者，否则最好的建议是：“别去搞‘斯库比’。”
back_translation: Unless you are a fanatic, the best advice is: "Don't go for the 'Scooby'."

text: it takes a strange kind of laziness to waste the talents of robert forster , anne meara , eugene levy , and reginald veljohnson all in the same movie .
translation: 浪费罗伯特·福斯特、安妮·米拉、尤金·列维和雷吉纳德·维尔约森等人才在同一部电影中，需要一种奇怪的懒惰。
back_translation: Wasting talents like Robert Forster, Annie Miller, Eugene Levy, and Reginald VelJohnson in the same movie requires a strange kind of laziness.

text: french director helene angel 's dark but deftly handled fable about familial violence has a terrifying , fairy-tale atmosphere that 's in perfect keeping with its unique point of view .
translation: 法国导演海伦·安吉尔（Helene Angel）关于家庭暴力的阴暗但巧妙处理的寓言，具有一种恐怖的童话氛围，这与其独特的视角完美契合。
back_translation: French director Helene Angel's dark yet skillful handling of the theme of domestic violence presents a tale with a haunting fairytale atmosphere, perfectly aligned with its unique perspective.

text: rainone 's love affair with singing sensation kelly mcguire whom he discovered and his near demise by the hands of his own prot & # 233 ; g & # 233 ; vincent riccola is the juice that fuels this roller coaster ride through two debauchery-filled decades of greed , sex , drugs and rock and roll .
translation: 雷诺与歌唱天才凯莉·麦圭尔的爱情故事，以及他几乎被自己的门徒文森特·里科拉所毀灭的经历，是推动这场充满贪婪、性、毒品和摇滚乐的过山车之旅的动力，跨越了二十年的放纵岁月。
back_translation: The love story between Renault and the singing talent Kelly McGuire, along with his near destruction at the hands of his disciple Vincent Ricola, serves as the driving force behind this rollercoaster journey filled with greed, sex, drugs, and rock 'n' roll, spanning two decades of indulgence.

text: when billy becomes suspicious , all hell breaks loose .
translation: 当比利产生怀疑时，一切都失控了。
back_translation: Everything went out of control when Billy started to have doubts.

text: he holds her prisoner while awaiting the surgery , but she escapes and hides out until she raises enough money to flee to the u . s . when she arrives in new york , she is placed in a detention center .
translation: 他在手术前将她囚禁，但她设法逃脱并藏起来，直到筹集到足够的钱逃往美国。当她抵达纽约时，她被送入一个拘留中心。
back_translation: He imprisoned her before the surgery, but she managed to escape and hide until she raised enough money to flee to the United States. When she arrived in New York, she was sent to a detention center.

text: a penetrating , potent exploration of sanctimony , self-awareness , self-hatred and self-determination .
translation: 对虔诚、自我意识、自我仇恨和自我决定的深刻而有力的探索。
back_translation: A profound and powerful exploration of devotion, self-awareness, self-hatred, and self-determination.

text: a big time drug dealer victor rosa ( john leguizamo ) is looking to get out of the game and sees his chance with a big deal with a new friend who happens to be a wall st . stockbroker .
translation: 一个大毒贩维克托·罗莎（约翰·雷吉扎莫）想要退出这个行业，他看到与一位新朋友达成一笔大交易的机会，而这位新朋友恰好是一名华尔街股票经纪人。
back_translation: A major drug dealer, Victor Rosa (John Leguizamo), wants to exit the industry. He sees an opportunity to strike a big deal with a new friend, who just happens to be a Wall Street stockbroker.

text: clashing their swords in fiece mortal combat , will and jack attempt to recapture the black pearl ship , save the british navy , and relinquish a fortune in forbidden treasure thereby lifting the curse of the pirates of the caribbean .
translation: 在激烈的生死斗争中，威尔和杰克试图重新夺回黑珍珠号船，拯救英国皇家海军，并放弃一笔被禁止的财富，从而解除加勒比海盗的诅咒。
back_translation: In a fierce struggle for survival, Will and Jack attempt to regain the Black Pearl, save the Royal Navy, and abandon a forbidden treasure to lift the curse of the Caribbean pirates.

text: besides being performers , they are also political activists - in aids awareness , anti-gay violence , the sex workers movement and the struggle against the extreme right and racism .
translation: 除了作为表演者，他们还是政治活动家——在艾滋病意识、反对针对同性恋者的暴力、性工作者运动以及与极右派和种族主义作斗争方面。
back_translation: In addition to being performers, they are also political activists—raising awareness about AIDS, opposing violence against homosexuals, advocating for sex worker rights, and fighting against the far-right and racism.

text: desperate for a grandchild , she 's eager to see him married and spends much of her time planning introductions to suitable chinese girls for daniel .
translation: 她非常渴望有一个孙子，渴望看到他结婚，花费很多时间为丹尼尔安排与合适的中国女孩的介绍。
back_translation: She is very eager to have a grandson and to see him get married, spending a lot of time arranging introductions for Daniel with suitable Chinese girls.

text: suddenly , patricia becomes suspicious that this arrogant man ca n't be her beloved husband .
translation: 突然，帕特里西亚开始怀疑这个傲慢的男人可能不是她心爱的丈夫。
back_translation: Suddenly, Patricia began to suspect that this arrogant man might not be her beloved husband.

text: charlotte and teis , partners for some years , are going to climb a mountain , literally and metaphorically .
translation: 夏洛特和泰斯，作为多年的搭档，将要攀登一座山，字面上和比喻上。
back_translation: Charlotte and Tess, as partners for many years, are about to climb a mountain, both literally and metaphorically.

text: jimmy ( thomas ) is a highly educated barber with a superiority complex who ca n't stand isaac ( garity ) , the new , white barber who just wants a shot at cutting some hair .
translation: 吉米（托马斯）是一位受过高等教育的理发师，拥有优越感，他无法忍受艾萨克（加里提），这位新来的白人理发师只想试试剪头发。
back_translation: Jimmy (Thomas) is a well-educated barber with a sense of superiority, and he cannot stand Isaac (Garity), the new white barber who just wants to try cutting hair.

text: could matty finish a porn movie before his legs get broken by tokyo tony ?
translation: 马蒂能在他的腿被东京托尼打断之前完成一部色情电影吗？
back_translation: Can Marty finish an adult film before his leg gets broken by Tokyo Tony?

text: but just when james starts to question his role and his cat-and-mouse relationship with his mentor , burke taps him for a special assignment to root out a mole .
translation: 但是在詹姆斯开始质疑自己的角色以及与他的导师伯克之间的猫捉老鼠关系时，伯克却指派他执行一项特殊任务，以查找间谍。
back_translation: However, as James began to question his role and the cat-and-mouse relationship with his mentor Burke, Burke assigned him a special task to find a spy.

text: a light-hearted french film about the spiritual quest of a fashion model seeking peace of mind while in a love affair with a veterinarian who is a non-practicing jew .
translation: 一部轻松愉快的法国电影，讲述了一位时装模特在与一位非从业犹太医生的恋情中寻求内心宁静的精神追求。
back_translation: A light-hearted French film that tells the story of a fashion model seeking inner peace in her spiritual journey through a romance with a non-practicing Jewish doctor.

text: . . . a visually pleasing , imaginative entertainment for the family audience .
translation: . . . 一场视觉上令人愉悦的、富有想象力的家庭娱乐。
back_translation: ... a visually pleasing and imaginative family entertainment.

text: for the next 2 1/2 years , these outrageous drag performers created 20 shows with titles like `` a crab on uranus means you 're loved `` and `` tinsel tarts in a hot coma , `` and were featured in four underground films .
translation: 在接下来的两年半里，这些离谱的变装表演者创建了20个节目，标题如《你在天王星上的螃蟹意味着你被爱着》和《热昏迷中的闪亮馅饼》，并出现在四部地下电影中。
back_translation: In the next two and a half years, these outrageous drag performers created 20 shows with titles like "The Crab on Your Uranus Means You're Loved" and "Shiny Pies in a Hot Coma," and appeared in four underground films.

text: alternately hilarious and sad , aggravating and soulful , scathing and joyous . it 's a masterpeice .
translation: 既搞笑又悲伤，令人恼火又充满灵魂，尖锐又欢乐。这是一部杰作。
back_translation: Both funny and sad, irritating yet soulful, sharp and joyful. This is a masterpiece.

text: highlighted by a gritty style and an excellent cast , it 's better than one might expect when you look at the list of movies starring ice-t in a major role .
translation: 以粗犷的风格和优秀的演员阵容为亮点，它比人们在查看冰T主演的主要角色电影列表时的预期要好。
back_translation: With its rugged style and excellent cast, it exceeds people's expectations when looking at the list of major films starring Ice-T.

text: the kind of movie that leaves vague impressions and a nasty aftertaste but little clear memory of its operational mechanics .
translation: 这种电影给人留下模糊的印象和刺人的余味，但对其运作机制却 barely 有清晰的记忆。
back_translation: This kind of movie leaves a vague impression and a sharp aftertaste, but there is barely a clear memory of how it operates.

text: gives an intriguing twist to the french coming-of-age genre .
translation: 为法国成长故事类型增添了引人入胜的转折。
back_translation: Added captivating twists to the growth story type in France.

text: the film follows three tracks : banks 's slow recruitment of bennie , the set-up for the hit at a swank resort in mexico , and the fbi 's close pursuit of banks , whom they want alive in hopes he 'll rat out his bosses .
translation: 影片围绕三个主要情节展开：银行对班尼的缓慢招募、在墨西哥一处豪华度假村进行的袭击策划，以及联邦调查局对银行的紧密追击，他们希望活捉银行，以便他出卖他的上司。
back_translation: The film revolves around three main plots: the bank's slow recruitment of Benny, the planning of an attack at a luxurious resort in Mexico, and the FBI's close pursuit of the bank in hopes of capturing him alive so he can betray his superiors.

text: this angst-ridden territory was covered earlier and much better in ordinary people .
translation: 这个充满焦虑的领域在《普通人》中早已得到更好、更深入的探讨。
back_translation: This anxiety-ridden field has already been explored in a better and deeper way in "Ordinary People."

text: it has become apparent that the franchise 's best years are long past .
translation: 该特许经营的最佳年华已经过去很久，这一点已经变得明显。
back_translation: The best years of this franchise have long passed, and this has become obvious.

text: within the five walls of the boxes , the rhythmic and dynamic movements become a fascinating visual experience .
translation: 在盒子的五面墙内，节奏感和动态的运动形成了一种迷人的视觉体验。
back_translation: Inside the five walls of the box, the sense of rhythm and dynamic movement creates an enchanting visual experience.

text: as for joe , he is bent on revenge for the beating he took , and soon he has a new prot & # 233 ; g & # 233 ; brad ( rick schroder ) who is just as good if not better then johnny .
translation: 至于乔，他执意要为自己遭受的毒打报仇，不久他就有了一个新的门徒布拉德（里克·施罗德），布拉德同样出色，甚至比约翰尼还要优秀。
back_translation: As for Joe, he was determined to take revenge for the beating he suffered, and soon he had a new disciple named Brad (Rick Schroder), who was just as impressive, if not better than Johnny.

text: however , when a friend confronts him with a very dark and horrifying scam for some quick dough and good times , he declines , but never the less he soon finds himself entangled in a web of sex , drugs and christmas carols .
translation: 然而，当一个朋友向他提出一个非常黑暗和可怕的骗局以快速赚钱和寻乐子时，他拒绝了，但不久他发现自己卷入了一场性、毒品和圣诞颂歌的纠缠中。
back_translation: However, when a friend proposed to him a very dark and terrifying scheme for quick money and fun, he refused, but soon found himself entangled in a web of sex, drugs, and Christmas carols.

text: do n't expect any surprises in this checklist of teamwork cliches . . .
translation: 不要期望在这份团队合作陈词滥调的清单中有任何惊喜……
back_translation: Don't expect any surprises on this cliché list of teamwork.

text: stuart 's poor-me persona needs a whole bunch of snowball 's cynicism to cut through the sugar coating . but once the falcon arrives in the skies above manhattan , the adventure is on red alert .
translation: 斯图尔特的可怜角色需要一大堆雪球的愤世嫉俗来打破那层糖衣。但一旦猎鹰出现在曼哈顿上空，冒险就处于紧急状态。
back_translation: Stuart's pitiful character needs a mountain of cynical snowballs to break through that sugary coating. But once the Falcon appears over Manhattan, the adventure is in a state of emergency.

text: mark hamill , sally struthers , brad hunt , angela featherstone and missy crider round out the cast .
translation: 马克·哈米尔，莎莉·斯特拉瑟斯，布拉德·亨特，安吉拉·费瑟斯通和米西·克里德尔组成了演员阵容。
back_translation: Mark Hamill, Sally Struthers, Brad Hunt, Angela Featherstone, and Missy Crider make up the cast.

text: after an attempt is made on his life by unknown gunmen , whom he kills them all using martal arts skills he did n't know he had , he learns that all of his dreams of a past life are real and that for the past three years he was raised by the couple after finding him in a river , half-dead with five bullet wounds in him .
translation: 在一次未知枪手对他生命的攻击后，他用自己并不知道的武术技能击杀了所有袭击者，他了解到自己过去生活中的所有梦想都是真实的，并且在过去的三年里，他是被这对夫妇抚养长大的，他们在河里发现了他，那时他半死不活，身上有五处枪伤。
back_translation: After an unknown gunman attacked his life, he used martial arts skills he did not know he possessed to kill all the attackers. He learned that all the dreams from his past life were real, and for the past three years, he had been raised by a couple who found him in the river, at which time he was half-dead and had five gunshot wounds on him.

text: jordan must decide if simon 's answers are good or evil as the paths become intertwined & # 38 ; the lives of the four friends are jeopardized as one falls victim to cociety 's views and the other three bond together to carry out a friends promise .
translation: 乔丹必须决定西蒙的答案是善还是恶，因为道路交错，四个朋友的生命受到威胁，其中一个成为社会观念的牺牲品，而其他三个则团结在一起履行朋友的承诺。
back_translation: Jordan must decide whether Simon's answer is good or evil, as the paths intersect, putting the lives of four friends at risk, with one becoming a victim of societal perceptions, while the other three unite to fulfill their promise as friends.

text: one sunday , while all the town , including his wife and son , are piously praying mass , a miracle occurs .
translation: 某个星期天，当全城的人，包括他的妻子和儿子，正在虔诚地参加弥撒时，一个奇迹发生了。
back_translation: One Sunday, while the whole city, including his wife and son, was earnestly participating in mass, a miracle occurred.

text: for all its brooding quality , ash wednesday is suspenseful and ultimately unpredictable , with a sterling ensemble cast .
translation: 尽管《灰星期三》充满了阴郁的气息，但它充满悬念，最终又出人意料，演员阵容非常出色。
back_translation: Although "Ash Wednesday" is filled with a gloomy atmosphere, it is full of suspense and ultimately surprising, with an outstanding cast.

text: quite funny for the type of movie it is . . .
translation: 对于这种类型的电影来说，真是相当有趣。
back_translation: It's really quite interesting for this type of movie.

text: now , when angered , he turns into a massive green behemoth with the mind of a child .
translation: 现在，当他愤怒时，他会变成一个巨大的绿色怪物，拥有孩子般的心智。
back_translation: Now, when he is angry, he turns into a massive green monster with a childlike mind.

text: roy & # 38 ; candy and lonnie earl & # 38 ; darlene are two married couples who thought they knew one another , until they decided to take their dream vacation together .
translation: 罗伊和糖果以及朗尼·厄尔和达琳是一对夫妻，他们原以为彼此知根知底，直到他们决定一起去实现梦想假期。
back_translation: Roy and Candy, as well as Lonnie Earl and Darlene, are a couple who thought they knew each other well, until they decided to embark on a dream vacation together.

text: godard has pared down his extravagances into a densely concentrated , resonant simplicity .
translation: 戈达尔将他的奢华缩减为一种密集而富有共鸣的简单之美。
back_translation: Godard reduced his luxury to a dense and resonant simple beauty.
