text: especially when you would much rather want to be one of the cool muslim boys who wears those golden necklages and say cool stuff in arabian .
translation: 特别是当你宁愿成为那些戴着金项链、用阿拉伯语说酷话的酷穆斯林男孩之一时。
back_translation: Especially when you would rather be one of those cool Muslim boys wearing gold chains and speaking cool words in Arabic.

text: welcome to peoplemovin . com , a leader in america 's transient workforce , more commonly known as temporary employment .
translation: 欢迎来到peoplemovin.com，一个美国临时劳动力的领军者，更常被称为临时就业。
back_translation: Welcome to peoplemovin.com, a leader in temporary workforce solutions in the United States, more commonly referred to as temporary employment.

text: people were fleeing away from the air raids on kandahar , herat and others cities and villages .
translation: 人们正在从坎大哈、赫拉特及其他城市和村庄的空袭中逃离。
back_translation: People are fleeing from airstrikes in Kandahar, Herat, and other cities and villages.

text: . . . a cheap , ludicrous attempt at serious horror .
translation: ……一次廉价、可笑的认真恐怖尝试。
back_translation: ...a cheap, ridiculous attempt at serious horror.

text: an essentially awkward version of the lightweight female empowerment picture we 've been watching for decades
translation: 一种基本上笨拙的轻量级女性赋权影片的变体，我们已经观看了几十年。
back_translation: A variant of a fundamentally clumsy lightweight women's empowerment film that we have been watching for decades.

text: the hard-to-predict and absolutely essential chemistry between the down-to-earth bullock and the nonchalant grant proves to be sensational , and everything meshes in this elegant entertainment .
translation: 现实主义的布洛克与随意的格兰特之间难以预测且绝对必要的化学反应证明了这是令人惊叹的，所有元素在这场优雅的娱乐中完美结合。
back_translation: The unpredictable yet absolutely necessary chemical reaction between the realistic Brock and the casual Grant proves that this is astounding, with all elements perfectly combined in this elegant entertainment.

text: the movie 's seams may show . . . but pellington gives `` mothman `` an irresistibly uncanny ambience that goes a long way toward keeping the picture compelling .
translation: 电影的接缝可能会显露出来……但佩林顿赋予《蝴蝶人》一种无法抗拒的 uncanny 氛围，这大大增强了影片的吸引力。
back_translation: The seams of the film may be visible... but Perlington imbues "The Butterfly Man" with an irresistibly uncanny atmosphere, which greatly enhances the film's appeal.

text: for diane , oscar fills a void in her life .
translation: 对于黛安，奥斯卡填补了她生活中的空缺。
back_translation: For Diane, Oscar filled the void in her life.

text: four characters are carried over , the first sergeant , the clerk , the mess sergent , and the misfit .
translation: 四个角色被保留，第一军士长、文书、伙食军士和不合群者。
back_translation: Four roles are retained: First Sergeant, Clerk, Mess Sergeant, and Outcast.

text: what starts as an innocent game of bar trivia soon escalates into an all out war - dex & # 38 ; eric vs . herb .
translation: 一场无辜的酒吧问答游戏很快升级为一场全面战争 - 德克斯与埃里克对抗赫尔伯特。
back_translation: An innocent bar quiz game quickly escalated into a full-blown war - Dex and Eric against Herbert.

text: an often watchable , though goofy and lurid , blast of a costume drama set in the late 15th century .
translation: 一部常常令人愉悦的，尽管搞笑且华丽的服装剧，设定在15世纪末。
back_translation: A consistently delightful, albeit humorous and lavishly costumed drama, set in the late 15th century.

text: murderous maids pulls no punches in its depiction of the lives of the papin sister and the events that led to their notorious rise to infamy . . .
translation: 《谋杀女仆》毫不含糊地描绘了帕平姐妹的生活以及导致她们臭名昭著崛起的事件……
back_translation: "Murdering the Maid" vividly depicts the lives of the Papin sisters and the events that led to their infamous rise...

text: john quincy archibald 's son michael collapses while playing baseball as a result of a heart failure .
translation: 约翰·昆西·阿基博尔德的儿子迈克尔在打棒球时因心脏衰竭而倒下。
back_translation: John Quincy Archibald's son Michael collapsed due to heart failure while playing baseball.

text: even when foreign directors . . . borrow stuff from hollywood , they invariably shake up the formula and make it more interesting .
translation: 即使是在外国导演……借用好莱坞的元素时，他们通常会打破公式，使其更加有趣。
back_translation: Even when foreign directors borrow elements from Hollywood, they often break the formula to make it more interesting.

text: the story follows ancanar , the sole heir to the rammoth valley and the last in the line of telganan .
translation: 这个故事讲述了安卡纳尔，拉默斯谷的唯一继承人，也是特尔甘南家族的最后一位成员。
back_translation: This story tells of Ankanar, the sole heir of Lamers Valley and the last member of the Terganan family.

text: when the popular , restless landon carter is forced to participate in the school drama production he falls in love with jamie sullivan , the daughter of the town 's minister .
translation: 当受欢迎且不安分的兰登·卡特被迫参加学校的戏剧制作时，他爱上了镇上牧师的女儿杰米·沙利文。
back_translation: When the popular and restless Landon Carter is forced to participate in the school play, he falls in love with Jamie Sullivan, the daughter of the town's pastor.

text: during the process of the post-crash discussion , the attorney accidentally drops the papers he needs to present in court .
translation: 在事故后讨论过程中，律师不小心掉了他需要在法庭上提交的文件。
back_translation: During the discussion after the incident, the lawyer accidentally dropped the documents he needed to submit in court.

text: joanna , a good-for-nothing girl who miserably failed in her attempt to win any television game show and contest , is hired by nino as his personal secretary , believing that she could be her lucky charm .
translation: 乔安娜，一个毫无用处的女孩，在尝试赢得任何电视游戏节目和比赛中惨遭失败，因而被尼诺聘为他的私人秘书，他相信她可能是他的幸运符。
back_translation: Joanna, a useless girl, suffered repeated failures in trying to win any television game show or competition, and was therefore hired by Nino as his personal secretary, believing that she might be his lucky charm.

text: the additional storyline is interesting and entertaining , but it does n't have the same magical quality as the beginning of the story . i like the new footage and still love the old stuff .
translation: 额外的情节很有趣且娱乐性强，但它没有故事开头那种神奇的品质。我喜欢新的素材，仍然喜欢旧的内容。
back_translation: The additional plot is interesting and entertaining, but it doesn't have the magical quality of the story's beginning. I enjoy the new material while still appreciating the old content.

text: he is locked up in a chinese prison where he is guilty until proven innocent .
translation: 他被关在中国监狱里，在那里他是有罪的，直到证明他是无辜的。
back_translation: He is imprisoned in a Chinese prison, where he is guilty until proven innocent.

text: the regulus submarines were the forerunners of these weapons , and proved the concept that stabilized the cold war .
translation: 瑞格鲁斯潜艇是这些武器的先驱，证明了稳定冷战的概念。
back_translation: The Regulus submarine was a pioneer of these weapons, demonstrating the concept of stabilizing the Cold War.

text: a young want-to-be actress ( justine lichtman ) is attracted to her boy friend 's ( james bowman ) friend ( musashi alexander ) , but her roomamte ( jordan cael ) picks up on vibes ( mistakenly ) that he is gay .
translation: 一个年轻的想成为演员的女孩（贾斯廷·李希特曼）被她男朋友（詹姆斯·鲍曼）的朋友（武藏·亚历山大）吸引，但她的室友（乔丹·凯尔）错误地察觉到他是同性恋的暗示。
back_translation: A young girl who dreams of becoming an actress (Justin Lichtman) is attracted to her boyfriend's friend (Musashi Alexander), but her roommate (Jordan Kael) mistakenly interprets hints that he is gay.

text: shadyac , who belongs with the damned for perpetrating patch adams , trots out every ghost trick from the sixth sense to the mothman prophecies .
translation: 沙迪亚克，因拍摄《帕奇·亚当斯》而与被诅咒者为伍，拿出了从《第六感》到《虫蛾人的预言》中的每一个鬼魂把戏。
back_translation: Shadyak, having worked alongside the cursed while filming "Patch Adams," pulled out every ghost trick from "The Sixth Sense" to "The Mothman Prophecies."

text: before long , a large canada goose covered entirely with duct tape is attached to the possum van , and red and the boys set out on their pilgrimage to save the lodge .
translation: 不久，一只完全用胶带包裹的大加拿大鹅被绑在了负鼠车上，红和小伙子们开始了他们的朝圣之旅，以拯救小屋。
back_translation: Not long after, a fully wrapped Canadian goose was tied to the possum car, and Hong and the guys began their pilgrimage to save the cabin.

text: but at one point finch and stifler put their differences aside and hold a huge party for jim , the night before his wedding .
translation: 但在某一时刻，芬奇和斯蒂夫勒放下了彼此的分歧，为吉姆在婚礼前夕举办了一场盛大的派对。
back_translation: But at one moment, Finch and Stifler put aside their differences and held a grand party for Jim on the eve of the wedding.

text: the sisters of st john of god have maintained a presence in the kimberley for nearly 100 years .
translation: 圣约翰神父的姐妹们在金伯利地区已经维持了近100年的存在。
back_translation: The Sisters of Saint John have maintained their presence in the Kimberley region for nearly 100 years.

text: siti accepts the challenge , as this will help the popularity and rating of her show `` cable news international `` to increase .
translation: 希蒂接受了挑战，因为这将有助于提升她的节目《国际有线新闻》的知名度和评级。
back_translation: She accepted the challenge because it would help raise the profile and ratings of her show "International Cable News."

text: everything had been going along smoothly until the gang entered their final year of high school and the stakes were upped by the school 's principal , mrs . stark .
translation: 一切都顺利进行，直到帮派进入高中最后一年，校长斯塔克夫人提高了赌注。
back_translation: Everything was going smoothly until the gang entered their final year of high school, when Principal Mrs. Stark raised the stakes.

text: frankly , it 's kind of insulting , both to men and women . and it 's not that funny -- which is just generally insulting .
translation: 坦白说，这有点侮辱，无论对男人还是女人。而且这并不好笑——这本身就是一种侮辱。
back_translation: To be honest, this is a bit insulting, whether to men or women. And it's not funny at all—it's an insult in itself.

text: the eccentric stories of a free spirited couple , the husband 's brother , a basket ball game , a bookie named dutch , two sinister , corrupt twins conniving over a faberge ' egg for their wife 's anniversary , a business is business hit-man , and an ex-con that has nothing to do with this story .
translation: 一个自由精神的夫妇的古怪故事，丈夫的兄弟，一场篮球比赛，一个叫达奇的赌徒，两名阴险腐败的双胞胎密谋为他们妻子的周年纪念日而争夺一个法贝热蛋，一个称为“生意就是生意”的杀手，以及一个与这个故事无关的前囚犯。
back_translation: A quirky story about a free-spirited couple, the husband’s brother, a basketball game, a gambler named Dutch, two sinister corrupt twins scheming to compete for a Fabergé egg for their wives' anniversary, a hitman known as "business is business," and a former prisoner who is not related to this story.

text: hilarious musical comedy though stymied by accents thick as mud .
translation: 滑稽的音乐喜剧，尽管口音厚重得像泥一样。
back_translation: A humorous musical comedy, despite the accent being as thick as mud.

text: he pays the price for his sleepless night , however , the next morning when his father awakens him into a whole nude world .
translation: 他为无眠的夜晚付出了代价，然而，第二天早晨，当他的父亲唤醒他时，他进入了一个完全赤裸的世界。
back_translation: He paid the price for sleepless nights, but the next morning, when his father woke him up, he entered a completely naked world.

text: the true story about robyn davidson who tamed four wild camels and with her dog , trekked from alice springs to the indian ocean , a trip no-one had ever made .
translation: 关于罗宾·戴维森的真实故事，她驯服了四只野骆驼，与她的狗一起，从爱丽丝泉徒步旅行到印度洋，这是无人曾经做过的旅程。
back_translation: The true story of Robyn Davidson, who tamed four wild camels and traveled on foot from Alice Springs to the Indian Ocean with her dog, a journey that no one had ever undertaken before.

text: this is the final straw for roxie , and her constant anger at rejection explodes .
translation: 这对罗克西来说是最后一根稻草，她对被拒绝的持续愤怒终于爆发。
back_translation: This was the last straw for Roxy, and her ongoing anger over the rejection finally erupted.

text: the sentimental script has problems , but the actors pick up the slack .
translation: 情感剧本存在问题，但演员弥补了不足。
back_translation: The emotional script has its issues, but the actors made up for the shortcomings.

text: it 's `` best in show `` meets `` strictly ballroom `` via `` kids in the hall `` .
translation: 它是“最佳表演”与“严格的舞厅”通过“少年时代”的结合。
back_translation: It is a combination of "Best Performance" and "Strict Ballroom" through "Boyhood."

text: most of the storylines feel like time fillers between surf shots . the movie is n't horrible , but you can see mediocre cresting on the next wave .
translation: 大多数情节感觉像是冲浪镜头之间的时间填充。电影并不糟糕，但你可以看到下一个浪潮上平庸的浪尖。
back_translation: Most of the plot feels like filler time between surfing shots. The movie isn't bad, but you can see the mediocre peaks of the next wave.

text: the `` actress `` becomes an overnight sensation , with a major singing career as well , and everyone thinks she 's a real person .
translation: 这位“女演员”一夜之间成名，拥有了重大的歌唱事业，所有人都认为她是真实存在的人。
back_translation: This "actress" became famous overnight and had a significant singing career, with everyone believing that she was a real person.

text: the aftermath of a high school shooting leaves deanna cartwright ( erika christensen ) seriously wounded and nine others dead , including the perpetrator .
translation: 一场高中枪击事件的后果使得迪安娜·卡特赖特（埃里卡·克里斯滕森饰）重伤，另有九人死亡，包括犯罪嫌疑人。
back_translation: The aftermath of a high school shooting leaves Diana Cartwright (played by Erika Christensen) seriously injured, and nine others dead, including the suspect.

text: he and his girlfriend , a terrorist seeking to change how the poor are treated in korea , kidnap his former boss 's daughter .
translation: 他和他的女朋友，一名寻求改变韩国穷人待遇的恐怖分子，绑架了他前老板的女儿。
back_translation: He and his girlfriend, a terrorist seeking to change the treatment of the poor in Korea, kidnapped the daughter of his former boss.

text: sean bateman ( james van der beek ) is the younger brother of psychotic wall street broker patrick bateman .
translation: 肖恩·贝特曼（詹姆斯·范德比克）是心理变态华尔街经纪人帕特里克·贝特曼的弟弟。
back_translation: Sean Bateman (James Van Der Beek) is the brother of Patrick Bateman, the psychopathic Wall Street broker.

text: writer/director walter hill is in his hypermasculine element here , once again able to inject some real vitality and even art into a pulpy concept that , in many other hands would be completely forgettable .
translation: 编剧/导演沃尔特·希尔在这里展现了他的超男性气质，再次能够为一个在许多其他人手中可能完全可遗忘的低俗概念注入真正的活力甚至艺术。
back_translation: Screenwriter/director Walter Hill showcases his hyper-masculinity here, once again managing to infuse real life and even art into a vulgar concept that might be entirely forgotten in the hands of many others.

text: she becomes part of anita 's world , but events do not run smoothly .
translation: 她成为了安妮塔的世界的一部分，但事情并不顺利。
back_translation: She became part of Anita's world, but things did not go smoothly.

text: although sensitive to a fault , it 's often overwritten , with a surfeit of weighty revelations , flowery dialogue , and nostalgia for the past and roads not taken .
translation: 尽管敏感到了一个极点，但它往往被大量沉重的启示、华丽的对话以及对过去和未走过的道路的怀旧所覆盖。
back_translation: Although sensitivity has reached an extreme point, it is often overshadowed by a heavy influx of revelations, ornate dialogues, and nostalgia for the past and untrodden paths.

text: at times a bit melodramatic and even a little dated ( depending upon where you live ) , ignorant fairies is still quite good-natured and not a bad way to spend an hour or two .
translation: 有时显得有些戏剧化，甚至有点过时（这取决于你住的地方），《无知的仙女》仍然相当和善，而且还是度过一两个小时的不错方式。
back_translation: Sometimes it seems a bit dramatic, even a bit dated (depending on where you live), but "The Clueless Fairy" is still quite charming and a nice way to spend an hour or two.

text: full of unforgiving irony and quiet realism , a song for martin stands as a powerful and moving achievement .
translation: 充满无情的讽刺和宁静的现实主义，《为马丁而歌》是一部强大而感人的成就。
back_translation: Filled with ruthless irony and serene realism, "Sing for Martin" is a powerful and moving achievement.

text: a dazzling thing to behold -- as long as you 're wearing the somewhat cumbersome 3d goggles the theater provides .
translation: 一件令人眼花缭乱的景象——只要你戴上剧院提供的稍显笨重的3D眼镜。
back_translation: A dazzling sight — as long as you put on the somewhat heavy 3D glasses provided by the theater.

text: this romantic thriller is steeped in the atmosphere of wartime england , and ably captures the speech patterns , moral codes and ideals of the 1940s .
translation: 这部浪漫惊悚片浸润在战争时期英格兰的氛围中，成功捕捉了20世纪40年代的言语模式、道德准则和理想。
back_translation: This romantic thriller is immersed in the atmosphere of wartime England, successfully capturing the speech patterns, moral codes, and ideals of the 1940s.

text: a macabre and very stylized swedish fillm about a modern city where all the religious and civic virtues that hold society in place are in tatters .
translation: 一部阴森而风格化的瑞典电影，讲述了一个现代城市，在那里支撑社会的所有宗教和公民美德都已经支离破碎。
back_translation: A dark and stylized Swedish film that tells the story of a modern city where all the religions and civic virtues that sustain society have been shattered.

text: waydowntown may not be an important movie , or even a good one , but it provides a nice change of mindless pace in collision with the hot oscar season currently underway .
translation: 《Waydowntown》可能不是一部重要的电影，甚至也不是一部好的电影，但它为当前热闹的奥斯卡季节提供了一种轻松的节奏变化。
back_translation: "Waydowntown" may not be an important film, nor is it necessarily a good one, but it offers a light change of pace during the bustling Oscar season.

text: a dull , inconsistent , dishonest female bonding picture .
translation: 一幅乏味、不一致、不诚实的女性关系画面。
back_translation: A dull, inconsistent, and dishonest portrayal of female relationships.

text: a long-winded and stagy session of romantic contrivances that never really gels like the shrewd feminist fairy tale it could have been .
translation: 一场冗长而做作的浪漫构思，始终未能如它本可以成为的机智的女性主义童话那样融洽。
back_translation: A lengthy and pretentious romantic concept never quite harmonized as it could have been as a witty feminist fairy tale.

text: certain to be distasteful to children and adults alike , eight crazy nights is a total misfire .
translation: 《八个疯狂的夜晚》无疑会让孩子和成年人都感到厌恶，完全是一次失误。
back_translation: "Eight Crazy Nights" will undoubtedly make both children and adults feel disgusted; it is completely a misstep.

text: despite these annoyances , the capable clayburgh and tambor really do a great job of anchoring the characters in the emotional realities of middle age .
translation: 尽管有这些烦人之处，才华横溢的克莱博和坦博确实很好地将角色锚定在中年的情感现实中。
back_translation: Despite these annoyances, the talented Klebo and Tambo do indeed anchor their roles well in the emotional reality of middle age.

text: max plays it cool as he infiltrates beno 's palace stronghold in the steamy jungle of the yucatan .
translation: 麦克斯在尤卡坦的热带丛林中潜入贝诺的王宫堡垒时，保持冷静。
back_translation: Max remained calm while infiltrating Benno's palace fortress in the tropical jungle of Yucatán.

text: ai n't no mountain high enough to keep the funk brothers from getting to you .
translation: 没有任何高山能阻挡音乐兄弟们到达你身边。
back_translation: No mountain can block the music brothers from reaching you.

text: they come across each other again and want to make their fathers ' wish come true , so they arrange for yoyo and cheung to meet in london .
translation: 他们再次相遇，并想实现他们父亲的愿望，于是他们安排了悠悠和昌在伦敦见面。
back_translation: They met again and wanted to fulfill their father's wishes, so they arranged for Youyou and Chang to meet in London.

text: now he thinks he is seeing things that are n't there and if things do n't improve , she will take their only son and leave .
translation: 现在他觉得自己看到了不存在的东西，如果情况没有改善，她会带着他们唯一的儿子离开。
back_translation: Now he feels that he sees something that doesn't exist. If the situation doesn't improve, she will take their only son and leave.

text: a postal worker has some lunch in a chinese restaurant and falls in love with the waitress , who happens to be chinese .
translation: 一位邮递员在一家中国餐厅吃午餐并爱上了服务员，而她恰好是中国人。
back_translation: A deliveryman eats lunch at a Chinese restaurant and falls in love with a waitress, who just happens to be Chinese.

text: see rare footage of some of the world 's greatest kickboxers such as benny `` the jet `` urquidez , don `` the dragon wilson and bill `` superfoot `` wallace .
translation: 观看世界上最伟大的踢拳手如本尼“喷气机”乌尔基德斯、唐“龙”威尔逊和比尔“超级脚”华莱士的一些稀有录像。
back_translation: Watch some rare footage of the greatest kickboxers in the world, such as Benny "The Jet" Urquidez, Don "The Dragon" Wilson, and Bill "Superfoot" Wallace.

text: a gripping documentary about james nachtwey , a new yorker who 's a longtime and much-honored chronicler of the world 's misery .
translation: 一部扣人心弦的纪录片，讲述了詹姆斯·纳赫特韦，一个长期以来记录世界苦难的纽约人，他受到了众多荣誉。
back_translation: An impassioned documentary tells the story of James Nachtwey, a New Yorker who has long documented the suffering of the world and has received numerous honors.

text: third time 's the charm . . . yeah , baby !
translation: 第三次是魅力所在……耶，宝贝！
back_translation: The third time is where the charm lies... Yeah, baby!

text: often moving and explores the discomfort inherent in the contacts between the american 'hosts ' and their 'guests . '
translation: 常常感人，并探讨了美国“主人”和他们的“客人”之间接触中固有的不适。
back_translation: Often touching, it explores the inherent discomfort in the interactions between America's "hosts" and their "guests."

text: she challenges isabel 's authority and is prepared to break her family ties and sacrifice her faith for love .
translation: 她挑战伊莎贝尔的权威，并准备断绝家庭关系，为爱牺牲自己的信仰。
back_translation: She challenges Isabel's authority and is prepared to sever family ties, sacrificing her beliefs for love.

text: good performances and a realistic , non-exploitive approach make paid in full worth seeing .
translation: 优秀的表演和现实且不剥削的方式使《全额支付》值得一看。
back_translation: Excellent performances and a realistic yet non-exploitative approach make "Full Payment" worth watching.

text: the movie , so briskly alert in details , is generic in its guiding ideas .
translation: 这部电影在细节上非常灵敏，但在其指导思想上却很普通。
back_translation: This movie is very sensitive in its details, but quite ordinary in its guiding principles.

text: a belgian gem on the twilight existence of four sisters of a certain age drawn together reluctantly by the need to care for one of their number .
translation: 一部比利时杰作，讲述了四位年长姐妹在不得不照顾其中一人的需要下，他们之间疏离而又被迫相聚的故事。
back_translation: A Belgian masterpiece that tells the story of four elderly sisters who, under the necessity of caring for one of them, experience estrangement yet are forced to come together.

text: jedi knights obi-wan kenobi and anakin skywalker discover there is more than meets the eye behind an assassination attempt on naboo senator padm & # 233 ; amidala 's life .
translation: 绝地骑士欧比旺·肯obi和阿纳金·天行者发现，在对纳布参议员帕德梅·阿米达拉的暗杀企图背后，隐藏着不止表面上的东西。
back_translation: Jedi Knight Obi-Wan Kenobi and Anakin Skywalker discovered that there was more behind the assassination attempt on Naboo Senator Padmé Amidala than met the eye.

text: the cooler is bernie lootz ( william h . macy ) , and the cooler is a love story about the changing fortunes of this down-at-heels loser who has made a career out of spreading his virulent bad luck on the floor of las vegas ' aging shangri-la casino .
translation: 《酷哥》中的酷哥是伯尼·卢茨（威廉·H·梅西饰），这部影片是一段爱情故事，讲述了这个落魄失败者的运势变化，他在拉斯维加斯老旧的香格里拉赌场里，以散播自己致命的霉运为职业。
back_translation: In "The Cool Guy," the cool guy is Bernie Lootz (played by William H. Macy). This film is a love story that tells of the change in fortune of this down-and-out loser, who works at the old Shangri-La Casino in Las Vegas, spreading his deadly bad luck.

text: the master rescues melinda ( jennie dallery ) , a gang-banger on the run ; blake ( jeff sauber ) , a failed young artist ; and ariel ( shannon morris ) , teen hooker ; and brings them to his shelter along with other social rejects .
translation: 大师救出了梅琳达（詹妮·达勒里），一名逃亡的黑帮成员；布莱克（杰夫·索伯），一名失败的年轻艺术家；还有阿里尔（香农·莫里斯），一名青少年妓女；并将他们和其他社会边缘人一起带到了他的庇护所。
back_translation: The master rescued Melinda (Jenny Dalloway), a fugitive gang member; Blake (Jeff Sobel), a frustrated young artist; and Ariel (Shannon Morris), a teenage prostitute; and brought them along with other marginalized individuals to his sanctuary.

text: has its moments -- and almost as many subplots .
translation: 有它的精彩时刻——几乎有同样多的副线故事。
back_translation: It has its精彩 moments—almost as many subplots.

text: america 's best player is being pulled in to the ultimate cyber-terror .
translation: 美国最佳球员正被卷入终极网络恐怖活动。
back_translation: The best players in the United States are being involved in ultimate cyber terrorism activities.

text: a strong enough effort to be worthy of faint praise .
translation: 值得微薄赞扬的努力。
back_translation: An effort worthy of a small amount of praise.

text: on the day a young photographer is moving out of his place to live with his girlfriend , he meets the stunning girl moving in and falls in love with her at first sight .
translation: 在一个年轻摄影师搬出自己的地方去和女友同住的那天，他遇到了正在搬进来的漂亮女孩，并对她一见钟情。
back_translation: The day a young photographer moved out to live with his girlfriend, he met a beautiful girl moving in and fell in love with her at first sight.

text: you see , what makes lucky no ordinary dog is his ability to talk .
translation: 你看，幸运之所以不是一只普通的狗，是因为它会说话的能力。
back_translation: You see, the reason why Lucky is not an ordinary dog is because it has the ability to speak.

text: a mix of gritty realism , crisp storytelling and radiant compassion that effortlessly draws you in .
translation: 一种粗犷现实主义、简洁叙事和光辉同情心的混合，轻易地吸引你深入其中。
back_translation: A blend of rugged realism, simple narrative, and radiant compassion that easily draws you in.

text: heart problems force boston cop pally lamarr to retire ; he 's in a funk and his wife charlotte sends him packing .
translation: 心脏问题迫使波士顿警察帕利·拉马尔退休；他情绪低落，妻子夏洛特让他离开。
back_translation: Heart problems forced Boston police officer Pali Lamar to retire; he was feeling depressed, and his wife Charlotte encouraged him to leave.

text: if you 're like me , a sucker for a good old fashion romance and someone who shamelessly loves to eat , then mostly martha offers all the perfect ingredients to more than satisfy your appetite .
translation: 如果你和我一样，是个喜欢经典浪漫的人，并且无耻地热爱美食，那么《大厨的情书》提供了满足你食欲的完美成分。
back_translation: If you, like me, are someone who loves classic romance and shamelessly adores food, then "The Chef's Love Letter" offers the perfect ingredients to satisfy your appetite.

text: jesse custer , a texas preacher , is imbued by the power of an entity called genesis , part angel and part demon , who give him the power of the word , the ability to make anybody do anything he says .
translation: 杰西·卡斯特，一个德克萨斯州的牧师，被一个叫创世纪的实体赋予力量，它部分是天使，部分是恶魔，赋予他“圣言”的能力，让他能够使任何人听从他的话。
back_translation: Jesse Caster, a pastor from Texas, is granted power by an entity called Genesis, which is part angel and part demon, giving him the ability of "divine speech" that allows him to make anyone obey his words.

text: perhaps even the slc high command found writer-director mitch davis 's wall of kitsch hard going .
translation: 也许即使是SLC的高层指挥部也觉得编剧兼导演米奇·戴维斯的这些庸俗之作难以接受。
back_translation: Perhaps even the high command of SLC finds it difficult to accept these mediocre works by writer and director Mickey Davis.

text: cathy , a young and innocent freshman , had a crush on senior hunk , nick , the campus ' basketball star .
translation: 凯西，一个年轻无邪的大一新生，暗恋校园篮球明星尼克，那个高年级的帅哥。
back_translation: Kacey, a young and innocent freshman, has a crush on Nick, the handsome upperclassman and campus basketball star.

text: fails in making this character understandable , in getting under her skin , in exploring motivation . . . well before the end , the film grows as dull as its characters , about whose fate it is hard to care .
translation: 未能让这个角色可理解，未能深入她的内心，也未能探讨动机……在影片结束之前，它就已经变得和角色一样无聊，让人难以关心他们的命运。
back_translation: It failed to make this character understandable, failed to delve into her inner self, and did not explore her motivations... By the end of the film, it had become as boring as the character, making it difficult to care about their fate.

text: a boring masquerade ball where normally good actors , even kingsley , are made to look bad .
translation: 一个无聊的化妆舞会，平时表现出色的演员，甚至包括金斯利，都显得很糟糕。
back_translation: A boring masquerade ball, where even the normally outstanding actors, including Kingsley, seemed to perform poorly.

text: salvation comes in the form of their american landlord simon cotton ( henry thomas ) and his brother neil ( marc blucas ) .
translation: 救赎以他们的美国房东西蒙·科顿（亨利·托马斯）及其兄弟尼尔（马克·布卢卡斯）的形式出现。
back_translation: Redemption appears in the form of their American house, Mont Cotton (Henry Thomas) and his brother Neil (Mark Blukas).

text: the actors must indeed be good to recite some of this laughable dialogue with a straight face .
translation: 演员们确实必须非常出色，才能以面无表情的方式朗诵这些可笑的对话。
back_translation: The actors really have to be outstanding to recite these ridiculous dialogues in an expressionless manner.

text: newcomer helmer kevin donovan is hamstrung by a badly handled screenplay of what is really an amusing concept M-^V a high-tech tux that transforms its wearer into a superman .
translation: 新晋导演凯文·多诺万受制于一份处理不当的剧本，而这个剧本其实是一个有趣的概念——一套高科技燕尾服可以把穿着者变成超级英雄。
back_translation: Newly appointed director Kevin Donovan is constrained by a poorly handled script, which is actually an interesting concept—a high-tech tuxedo that can turn the wearer into a superhero.

text: wimps out by going for that pg-13 rating , so the more graphic violence is mostly off-screen and the sexuality is muted .
translation: 通过选择PG-13评级而显得软弱，因此更具冲击力的暴力场面大多是在屏幕之外，而性内容也被压低了。
back_translation: By choosing the PG-13 rating, it appears weak, so the more impactful violent scenes mostly take place off-screen, and sexual content has also been toned down.

text: as they make their way to the city from suburban pennsylvania , april must endure a comedy of errors - like finding out her oven does n't work - in order to pull off the big event .
translation: 当她们从宾夕法尼亚州的郊区前往城市时，四月不得不忍受一连串的错误，比如发现她的烤箱坏了，以便顺利举行这场大型活动。
back_translation: As they traveled from the suburbs of Pennsylvania to the city, April had to endure a series of mishaps, such as discovering her oven was broken, in order to successfully host the large event.

text: ofrece una buena oportunidad de cultura ( aunque sea condensada ) que bien vale la pena aprovechar .
translation: 提供了一个很好的文化机会（尽管是浓缩的），非常值得利用。
back_translation: It offers a great cultural opportunity (albeit condensed) that is very worthwhile to take advantage of.

text: on new year 's eve , 1969 , a flamboyant ragtag troupe of genderbending hippies took the stage of san francisco 's palace theater and the cockettes were born .
translation: 在1969年的新年前夜，一支色彩斑斓、风格独特的变性嬉皮士剧团登上了旧金山宫殿剧院的舞台，科克特剧团由此诞生。
back_translation: On New Year's Eve in 1969, a colorful and uniquely styled transgender hippie troupe took to the stage of the Palace Theatre in San Francisco, marking the birth of the Cockettes.

text: when he wakes up the morning after his bachelor party in bed with a strange woman ( stiles ) , a man ( lee ) presumes he must have cheated on his fiancee .
translation: 当他在单身派对后的早晨醒来，发现与一个陌生女人（斯泰尔斯）躺在床上时，一个男人（李）认为他一定是背叛了他的未婚妻。
back_translation: When he wakes up on the morning after the bachelor party and finds himself in bed with a strange woman (Stiles), a man (Lee) believes he must have betrayed his fiancée.

text: people on the site work monotonously , in a fervor , then dazed , trance-like .
translation: 网站上的人们单调地工作，激情四溢，然后恍惚，像是陷入了恍惚状态。
back_translation: People on the website work monotonously, filled with passion, and then become dazed, as if they have fallen into a stupor.

text: typifies the pros and cons of the films that india churns out .
translation: 典型地反映了印度电影的优缺点。
back_translation: It typically reflects the strengths and weaknesses of Indian cinema.

text: the story goes that she ca n't go in the light , and if you wake up and see her , she 'll kill you .
translation: 故事是说她不能在光明中出现，如果你醒来看到她，她会杀了你。
back_translation: The story says she cannot appear in the light; if you wake up and see her, she will kill you.

text: in old-fashioned screenwriting parlance , ms . shreve 's novel proved too difficult a text to 'lick , ' despite the efforts of a first-rate cast .
translation: 在老派编剧的术语中，施里夫女士的小说被认为是一部过于复杂的文本，尽管有一流演员的努力，仍然难以“攻克”。
back_translation: In the terminology of old-school screenwriters, Ms. Shreve's novel is considered an overly complex text that, despite the efforts of top-notch actors, remains difficult to "crack."

text: yes , mibii is rote work and predictable , but with a philosophical visual coming right at the end that extravagantly redeems it .
translation: 是的，mibii是机械化的工作和可预测的，但是在最后有一个哲学性的视觉呈现，使其华丽地得到了救赎。
back_translation: Yes, mibii is mechanized and predictable, but in the end, there is a philosophical visual presentation that beautifully redeems it.

text: this may not have the dramatic gut-wrenching impact of other holocaust films , but it 's a compelling story , mainly because of the way it 's told by the people who were there .
translation: 这部电影可能没有其他大屠杀影片那种戏剧性的冲击力，但它是一个引人入胜的故事，主要是因为它是由当时在场的人讲述的。
back_translation: This film may not have the dramatic impact of other Holocaust films, but it is an engaging story primarily because it is told by those who were present at the time.

text: las horas es una de las obras que con mayor apasionamiento reflexiona acerca del hecho de vivir . . .
translation: 《时光》是反思生活这一事实的作品之一，充满了激情……
back_translation: "Time" is one of the works that reflect on the reality of life, filled with passion...

text: it is one of the last true medieval maximum-security penal farms in the country .
translation: 这是全国最后一座真正的中世纪最高安全等级惩教农场之一。
back_translation: This is one of the last true medieval high-security correctional farms in the country.

text: there are few things more frustrating to a film buff than seeing an otherwise good movie marred beyond redemption by a disastrous ending .
translation: 对电影爱好者来说，没有什么比看到一部本来不错的电影因糟糕的结局而被彻底毁掉更令人沮丧的了。
back_translation: For movie enthusiasts, nothing is more frustrating than seeing a once promising film completely ruined by a terrible ending.

text: forced to exist between living and dead , and only revealing their skeleton forms in the moonlight , the pirates intend to use elizabeth 's blood and necklace ( a part of their curse ) to return to their normal state .
translation: 在生与死之间被迫存在，只在月光下显露他们的骷髅形态，海盗意图利用伊丽莎白的鲜血和项链（他们诅咒的一部分）恢复到正常状态。
back_translation: Forced to exist between life and death, only revealing their skeletal forms under the moonlight, the pirates intend to use Elizabeth's blood and necklace (part of their curse) to restore themselves to normal.

text: this is a fudged opportunity of gigantic proportions -- a lunar mission with no signs of life .
translation: 这是一个巨大的机会——一项没有生命迹象的月球任务。
back_translation: This is a huge opportunity— a lunar mission with no signs of life.

text: the subject of this documentary is private life in the big city , apartments as a last stronghold of individuality , in addition to emphasizing the fact that to live together in one and the same place does not ensure that a community will be formed .
translation: 这部纪录片的主题是大城市中的私人生活，公寓作为个体性的最后堡垒。此外，还强调了一个事实，即在同一个地方共同生活并不保证能够形成一个社区。
back_translation: The theme of this documentary is private life in big cities, with apartments serving as the last bastion of individuality. Additionally, it emphasizes the fact that living together in the same place does not guarantee the formation of a community.

text: a sexy , surprising romance . . . idemoto and kim make a gorgeous pair . . . their scenes brim with sexual possibility and emotional danger .
translation: 一个性感而惊喜的浪漫故事……妹弟和金是一对绝配……他们的场景充满了性张力和情感危险。
back_translation: A sexy and surprising romantic story... Mei and Jin are a perfect match... Their scenes are filled with sexual tension and emotional danger.

text: sorvino makes the princess seem smug and cartoonish , and the film only really comes alive when poor hermocrates and leontine pathetically compare notes about their budding amours .
translation: 索尔维诺使公主演显得自满而卡通化，而这部电影真正活跃起来的时刻，只有当可怜的赫莫克拉提斯和莱昂蒂娜可悲地比较他们萌芽的爱情时。
back_translation: Solvay makes the protagonists seem complacent and cartoonish, and the only moments when the film truly comes to life are when the unfortunate Hermocritus and Leontina sadly compare their budding love.

text: perhaps it 's cliche to call the film 'refreshing , ' but it is . 'drumline ' shows a level of young , black manhood that is funny , touching , smart and complicated .
translation: 也许称这部电影为“清新”显得陈词滥调，但的确如此。《鼓乐队》展现了一种年轻黑人男性的面貌，既搞笑、感人，又聪明复杂。
back_translation: Perhaps calling this movie "refreshing" seems clichéd, but it is indeed true. "The Drumline" showcases a portrait of young Black men that is both funny and touching, as well as smart and complex.

text: the women clash as plans go awry , tragedy strikes , and hearts get broken .
translation: 当计划出错、悲剧发生时，女性们发生冲突，心灵受到伤害。
back_translation: When plans go wrong and tragedies occur, conflicts arise among women, and their hearts are hurt.

text: it 's one of those baseball pictures where the hero is stoic , the wife is patient , the kids are as cute as all get-out and the odds against success are long enough to intimidate , but short enough to make a dream seem possible .
translation: 这是一部典型的棒球电影，其中英雄坚定不移，妻子耐心等待，孩子们可爱得让人心醉，而成功的几率足够渺小以至于令人胆怯，但又足够大使梦想看似可能。
back_translation: This is a typical baseball movie, where the hero is unwavering, the wife patiently waits, the children are charming enough to make one swoon, and the odds of success are small enough to be daunting, yet large enough to make dreams seem possible.

text: the story has some nice twists but the ending and some of the back-story is a little tired . the performances are all solid ; it merely lacks originality to make it a great movie .
translation: 这个故事有一些不错的转折，但结局和一些背景故事稍显疲惫。表演都很扎实；只是缺乏原创性，无法使它成为一部伟大的电影。
back_translation: This story has some nice twists, but the ending and some background stories feel a bit tired. The performances are solid; it's just lacking in originality, which prevents it from becoming a great film.

text: ahas , son from a poor family , in his inner struggles , joins the troop of his classmates and heads for the front .
translation: 阿哈斯，来自一个贫困家庭的少年，在内心的挣扎中，加入了同学们的队伍，奔赴前线。
back_translation: Ahas, a boy from a poor family, joined his classmates' ranks and went to the front lines amid his inner struggles.

text: the 70-year-old godard has become , to judge from in praise of love , the sort of bitter old crank who sits behind his light meter and harangues the supposed injustices of the artistic world-at-large without doing all that much to correct them .
translation: 70岁的戈达尔，从《爱的赞美》中判断，已经变成了那种坐在光度计后面，唠叨着艺术界普遍存在的所谓不公正而没有做太多事情来纠正这些不公正的乖戾老头。
back_translation: At 70 years old, Godard has become that kind of grumpy old man who sits behind a photometer, nagging about the so-called injustices that exist in the art world without doing much to correct these injustices.

text: the pianist [ is ] a supremely hopeful cautionary tale of war 's madness remembered that we , today , can prevent its tragic waste of life . here is a divine monument to a single man 's struggle to regain his life , his dignity and his music .
translation: 《钢琴家》是一个极具希望的警示故事，它提醒我们今天可以防止战争带来的悲惨生命浪费。这是一个神圣的纪念碑，纪念一个人为了重获生活、尊严和音乐而进行的斗争。
back_translation: "The Pianist" is a deeply hopeful cautionary tale that reminds us that today we can prevent the tragic waste of life that war brings. It is a sacred monument commemorating one person's struggle to regain life, dignity, and music.

text: a cold-hearted judge finds out when a seemingly crazy young couple break into his house and take him captive .
translation: 一个冷酷无情的法官发现，当一对看似疯狂的年轻情侣闯入他的家并将他劫持时。
back_translation: A cold-blooded judge discovers when a seemingly crazy young couple breaks into his home and kidnaps him.

text: i ca n't remember the last time i saw a movie where i wanted so badly for the protagonist to fail .
translation: 我记不清上次看到一部电影时有多么希望主角失败是什么时候了。
back_translation: I can't remember the last time I watched a movie and hoped so much for the protagonist to fail.

text: as a technical exercise that redefines moviemaking , it is astonishing .
translation: 作为一项重新定义电影制作的技术练习，它令人惊叹。
back_translation: As a technical exercise that redefines filmmaking, it is amazing.

text: eul-boon kim 's soulful portrayal of the illiterate , deaf-mute grandmother illuminates the dignity of her demeanor and the sad resignation in her eyes .
translation: 金慧分对那个无知、失聪哑口的祖母的深情演绎，彰显了她举止中的尊严和眼中流露出的悲伤绝望。
back_translation: Jin Huifen's poignant portrayal of the ignorant, deaf-mute grandmother highlights the dignity in her demeanor and the sadness and despair reflected in her eyes.

text: there is one surefire way to get a nomination for a best-foreign-film oscar : make a movie about whimsical folk who learn a nonchallenging , life-affirming lesson while walking around a foreign city with stunning architecture .
translation: 获得最佳外语片奥斯卡提名的单一有效方法就是：拍摄一部关于一些异想天开的民众在外国城市的壮丽建筑中漫步时，学习一种轻松且肯定生命的课程的电影。
back_translation: The only effective way to get a Best Foreign Language Film Oscar nomination is to make a movie about whimsical people strolling through magnificent architecture in a foreign city while learning a relaxed and life-affirming lesson.

text: also , anthony is black and victoria is white , which does n't sit well with michael , anthony 's best friend since childhood and a surrogate older brother .
translation: 此外，安东尼是黑人，维多利亚是白人，这让安东尼自幼以来最好的朋友和代替大哥的迈克尔感到不快。
back_translation: In addition, Anthony is black and Victoria is white, which makes Michael, who has been Anthony's best friend since childhood and serves as a surrogate big brother, feel uncomfortable.

text: a mix of velocity and idiocy , this ruinous remake lacks the brawn -- and the brains -- of the 1970s original .
translation: 这种毁灭性的翻拍混合了速度和愚蠢，缺乏1970年代原版的力量和智慧。
back_translation: This destructive remake mixes speed and foolishness, lacking the power and wisdom of the original from the 1970s.

text: a young rebell oversteps the boarder between stage and life on the trail of francois villon .
translation: 一位年轻的叛逆者在弗朗索瓦·维永的足迹上越过了舞台与生活的边界。
back_translation: A young rebel crossed the boundary between stage and life, following in the footsteps of François Villon.

text: events go from tragic to dangerous as racism , paranoia , and a secret mistress come into play .
translation: 事件从悲剧发展到危险，因为种族主义、偏执和一个秘密情妇的介入。
back_translation: The event developed from a tragedy into a danger due to racism, paranoia, and the involvement of a secret mistress.

text: yet , beneath an upbeat appearance , she is struggling desperately with the emotional and physical scars left by the attack .
translation: 然而，在看似乐观的外表下，她正在拼命挣扎，承受着袭击留下的情感和身体创伤。
back_translation: However, beneath her seemingly optimistic exterior, she is struggling desperately, bearing the emotional and physical scars left by the attacks.

text: each of the five patients realise their dreams individually , but ultimately they decide to choose for each other and the familiarity of their own place .
translation: 五位患者各自实现了他们的梦想，但最终，他们决定为彼此和自己熟悉的地方而选择。
back_translation: Five patients each realized their dreams, but in the end, they chose for each other and the places that were familiar to them.

text: from naboo to tatooine , it grows into love for her .
translation: 从纳布到塔图因，对她的爱不断成长。
back_translation: From Naboo to Tatooine, her love kept growing.

text: he is to build the palace and be covered in gold , if not , his fate is to be eaten by crocodiles .
translation: 他将建造宫殿并镀上黄金，否则他的命运就是被鳄鱼吃掉。
back_translation: He will build a palace and gild it with gold, otherwise his fate will be to be eaten by a crocodile.

text: if this is the danish idea of a good time , prospective tourists might want to consider a different destination -- some jolly country embroiled in a bloody civil war , perhaps .
translation: 如果这是丹麦人对美好时光的定义，潜在游客可能需要考虑一个不同的目的地——也许是某个卷入血腥内战的欢乐国度。
back_translation: If this is the Danish definition of a good time, potential visitors might need to consider a different destination—perhaps a joyful country embroiled in a bloody civil war.

text: that storytelling has value can not be denied . not even solondz 's thirst for controversy , sketchy characters and immature provocations can fully succeed at cheapening it .
translation: 故事讲述的价值不容否认。即使是索隆兹对争议、可疑角色和不成熟挑衅的渴望，也无法完全成功地贬低它。
back_translation: The value of storytelling is undeniable. Even Zolo's desire for controversy, questionable characters, and immature provocations cannot entirely succeed in belittling it.

text: the kind of movie that seduces you into becoming putty in its manipulative card-sharking hands and making you enjoy being taken in by its shameless contrivance .
translation: 这种电影会诱使你变成它操控的工具，让你享受被它无耻的构思所吸引。
back_translation: This kind of movie will tempt you to become a tool manipulated by it, making you enjoy being lured by its shameless ideas.

text: when a cia agent is killed during a nuclear arms purchase , his partner oakes ( anthony hopkins ) , recruits his twin brother , jake hayes ( chris rock ) .
translation: 当一名中情局特工在核武器交易中被杀后，他的搭档奥克斯（安东尼·霍普金斯）招募了他的双胞胎兄弟杰克·海耶斯（克里斯·洛克）。
back_translation: After a CIA agent is killed during a nuclear weapons transaction, his partner, Oakes (played by Anthony Hopkins), recruits his twin brother, Jack Hayes (played by Chris Rock).

text: . . . plays like somebody spliced random moments of a chris rock routine into what is otherwise a cliche-riddled but self-serious spy thriller .
translation: ……就像有人将克里斯·洛克表演中的随机时刻剪接到一个充满陈词滥调但自以为是的间谍惊悚片中。
back_translation: ...it's like someone edited random moments from Chris Rock's performance into a spy thriller filled with clichés but smugly self-assured.

text: christians sensitive to a reductionist view of their lord as a luv-spreading dr . feelgood or omnipotent slacker will feel vastly more affronted than secularists , who might even praise god for delivering such an instant camp classic .
translation: 对基督徒而言，把他们的主看作一个只会传播爱的“情感医生”或是全能的懒散者的简化观点会让他们感到更加被冒犯，而世俗主义者可能会因为能得到这样一个瞬间的经典作品而赞美上帝。
back_translation: For Christians, viewing their Lord as merely an "emotional healer" who only spreads love or as an all-powerful slacker is a simplification that can be more offensive to them, while secularists may praise God for receiving such a fleeting classic work.

text: drank water from a spring that was actually a fountain of youth .
translation: 喝了来自一眼实际上是青春之泉的水。
back_translation: I drank water from a spring that is actually the fountain of youth.

text: the truth is that the truth about charlie gets increasingly tiresome .
translation: 事实上，关于查理的真相变得越来越令人厌烦。
back_translation: In fact, the truth about Charlie is becoming increasingly annoying.

text: however , she got more than what she bargained for when she realised she could even see ghosts .
translation: 然而，当她意识到自己甚至能看到幽灵时，她得到了超出预期的体验。
back_translation: However, when she realized that she could even see ghosts, she had an experience beyond her expectations.

text: the trials of henry kissinger is a remarkable piece of filmmaking M-^E because you get it .
translation: 《亨利·基辛格的审判》是一部了不起的电影作品，因为你能理解它。
back_translation: "The Trial of Henry Kissinger" is an outstanding cinematic work because you can understand it.

text: pacino , connery , de nero , schwarzenegger - together on film - for the first time . . .
translation: 帕琪诺、康纳利、德尼罗、施瓦辛格——首次在电影中同台合作……
back_translation: Pacino, Connery, De Niro, Schwarzenegger—together for the first time in a movie...

text: . . . begins on a high note and sustains it beautifully .
translation: ...以高亢的调子开始，并优美地维持着。
back_translation: ...begins in a high-pitched tone and is beautifully sustained.

text: it is a journey that will take both carol and charlie to the edge of reality and force carol to face up to her terrifying destiny .
translation: 这是一个旅程，将带领卡罗尔和查理走到现实的边缘，并迫使卡罗尔直面她可怕的命运。
back_translation: This is a journey that will lead Carol and Charlie to the edge of reality and force Carol to confront her terrible fate.

text: a twisted collision of `` barney `` `` the fisher king `` and `` serpico . ``
translation: 一个扭曲碰撞的“巴尼”、“渔王”和“赛尔皮科”。
back_translation: A distorted collision of "Barney," "Fisher King," and "Serpico."

text: with films like 'mouna ragam ' , 'alaipayuthe ' and now 'kannathil muthamittal ' , maniratnam yet again proves that he is at his best when tackling human emotions and relationships .
translation: 通过《寂静旋律》、《爱在心头》和现在的《吻在心口》，曼尼拉特南再次证明了他在处理人类情感和关系时表现得最好。
back_translation: Through "Silent Melody," "Love in the Heart," and now "Kiss on the Lips," Maniratnam once again proves that he excels in handling human emotions and relationships.

text: what a pity . . . that the material is so second-rate .
translation: 真可惜……这材料实在太次了。
back_translation: What a pity... this material is really too poor.

text: she is a very sweet girl , and they get along quite well with her .
translation: 她是一个非常甜美的女孩，他们和她相处得很好。
back_translation: She is a very sweet girl, and they get along well with her.

text: annie , an alluring lady , catches the eye of old widower leoncio .
translation: 安妮，一个迷人的女人，引起了老寡夫莱昂西奥的注意。
back_translation: Annie, a charming woman, caught the attention of the old widower Leancio.

text: `` sumo east and west `` is a feature documentary about americans in the ancient japanese sport of sumo wrestling .
translation: 《相扑东西》是一部关于美国人在古老的日本相扑运动中的纪录片。
back_translation: "Sumo East and West" is a documentary about Americans in the ancient sport of Japanese sumo.

text: all the pieces in the mystery are finally starting to fit together , and the case seems almost resolved .
translation: 这个谜案的所有线索终于开始拼凑在一起，案件似乎几乎得到了解决。
back_translation: All the clues in this mystery case have finally started to come together, and the case seems to be nearly solved.

text: this is a story about the warm relationship between a little girl and her father despite the difficult conditions they have to live in .
translation: 这是一个关于一个小女孩与她的父亲之间温暖关系的故事，尽管他们生活在艰难的环境中。
back_translation: This is a story about the warm relationship between a little girl and her father, despite their struggles in a difficult environment.

text: rather than spreading good cheer , the duo 's motive is to rob each establishment , a strategy that becomes complicated when they encounter an 8-year-old who teaches them the true meaning of christmas .
translation: 这对组合的动机不是传播欢乐，而是抢劫每个商家，这个策略在他们遇到一个教会他们圣诞节真正意义的8岁小孩时变得复杂。
back_translation: The motivation of this duo is not to spread joy, but to rob every merchant, a strategy that becomes complicated when they encounter an 8-year-old child who teaches them the true meaning of Christmas.

text: one thursday evening , their disagreements reach a fever pitch - anna is incensed that her mother does n't support her musical aspirations and tess , a widow about to remarry , ca n't see why anna wo n't give her fiance ( mark harmon ) a break .
translation: 一个星期四的晚上，她们的分歧达到了高潮——安娜对她的母亲不支持她的音乐理想感到愤怒，而即将再婚的寡妇泰丝则无法理解安娜为什么不愿意给她的未婚夫（马克·哈蒙）一个机会。
back_translation: On a Thursday night, their disagreements reached a climax—Anna was angry at her mother for not supporting her musical aspirations, while the soon-to-be remarried widow Tessa could not understand why Anna was unwilling to give her fiancé (Mark Harmon) a chance.

text: as an added twist robert discovers upon meeting wong dai , that the evil man himself has been manipulating our protagonist in order to have him kill wong dai 's own tong members and thus , secure the ill gotten gains of wong dai 's empire of crime for himself .
translation: 作为一个额外的转折，罗伯特在与黄大相遇时发现，那个邪恶的人一直在操控我们的主角，让他杀掉黄大的手下，从而为自己获取黄大犯罪帝国的不义之财。
back_translation: As an additional twist, Robert discovers upon meeting Huang Da that the evil person has been manipulating our protagonist all along, making him kill Huang Da's subordinates in order to gain the ill-gotten wealth of Huang Da's criminal empire for himself.

text: the problem is that the mysterious inhabitants are murderous lunatics out to kill every one of them . . .
translation: 问题在于那些神秘的居民是嗜血的疯子，想要杀死他们每一个人……
back_translation: The problem is that those mysterious inhabitants are bloodthirsty madmen who want to kill each and every one of them...

text: writer/director dante tomaselli merges two disturbing storylines into this visually arresting chiller .
translation: 编剧/导演丹特·托马塞利将两个令人不安的故事情节结合在一起，打造出一部在视觉上引人注目的惊悚片。
back_translation: Screenwriter/director Dante Tomaselli combines two disturbing storylines to create a visually striking thriller.

text: a small fortune in salaries and stunt cars might have been saved if the director , tom dey , had spliced together bits and pieces of midnight run and 48 hours ( and , for that matter , shrek ) .
translation: 如果导演汤姆·戴能够将《午夜狂奔》和《48小时》（以及《怪物史瑞克》）的片段拼在一起，或许可以节省一小笔薪水和特技车的费用。
back_translation: If director Tom Dey could splice together clips from "Midnight Run" and "48 Hours" (as well as "Shrek"), it might save a little on salaries and stunt car expenses.

text: during the heist , the kids overcome high-tech security systems , guard dogs , and a nasty head of security to get to a bank vault suspended 100-feet above ground .
translation: 在抢劫过程中，孩子们克服了高科技安保系统、警犬以及一个凶狠的保安主管，最终到达悬挂在离地100英尺高的银行金库。
back_translation: During the robbery, the children overcame high-tech security systems, police dogs, and a fierce security supervisor, ultimately reaching the bank vault suspended 100 feet above the ground.

text: director rob marshall went out gunning to make a great one .
translation: 导演罗伯·马歇尔全力以赴地想要制作一部伟大的作品。
back_translation: Director Rob Marshall is fully committed to creating a great work.

text: a 19th century insane asylum is memorialized by a captivating montage of inventories , histories , and brain surgeries .
translation: 19世纪的精神病院通过引人入胜的清单、历史和脑部手术的蒙太奇得以铭记。
back_translation: Asylums in the 19th century are remembered through captivating lists, histories, and montages of brain surgeries.

text: will anyone who is n't a fangoria subscriber be excited that it has n't gone straight to video ?
translation: 任何不是Fangoria订阅者的人会对它没有直接发行到视频而感到兴奋吗？
back_translation: Is anyone who is not a Fangoria subscriber excited that it didn't have a direct-to-video release?

text: having given permission to male nurse greg focker to marry his daughter , ex-cia man jack byrnes and his wife travel to detroit to greg 's parents , who this time around are mr . and mrs . focker , who are as different from them as can be .
translation: 在允许男护士格雷格·福克尔娶他的女儿后，前CIA特工杰克·伯恩斯和他的妻子前往底特律，拜访格雷格的父母，这次是福克尔夫妇，他们和伯恩斯夫妇截然不同。
back_translation: After allowing male nurse Greg Fokker to marry his daughter, former CIA agent Jack Byrnes and his wife traveled to Detroit to visit Greg's parents, who are very different from the Byrneses, this time the Fokkers.

text: ray finds himself feeling cursed , trapped , and miserable as a parade of `` injured `` clients constantly pressure him for their money , most of which is not deserved .
translation: 雷感到自己被诅咒、困住和痛苦，因为一群“受伤”的客户不断向他施加压力，要他给他们钱，而他们大部分的钱并不应该得到。
back_translation: Lei felt cursed, trapped, and tormented, as a group of "injured" clients constantly pressured him to give them money, most of which they did not deserve.

text: it 's refreshing that someone understands the need for the bad boy ; diesel , with his brawny frame and cool , composed delivery , fits the bill perfectly .
translation: 有人理解坏男孩的需求，这让人感到耳目一新；迪塞尔，他那健壮的身材和冷静沉着的表达方式，完全符合这个要求。
back_translation: Someone understands the needs of the bad boy, which is refreshing; Diesel, with his strong build and calm demeanor, perfectly fits this requirement.

text: a top secret military project hires prestigious university students to assist create a cell altering machine called the 'gammasphere ' .
translation: 一个最高机密的军事项目雇佣了知名大学的学生来协助创造一个名为“伽马球”的细胞变更机器。
back_translation: A highly classified military project hired students from a renowned university to assist in creating a cell transformation machine called "Gamma Sphere."

text: the movie , despite its rough edges and a tendency to sag in certain places , is wry and engrossing .
translation: 这部电影尽管有些瑕疵和在某些地方略显沉闷，但却机智且引人入胜。
back_translation: Despite some flaws and a slightly dull atmosphere in certain parts, this movie is clever and engaging.

text: isabelle huppert excels as the enigmatic mika and anna mouglalis is a stunning new young talent in one of chabrol 's most intense psychological mysteries .
translation: 伊莎贝尔·雨蓓在神秘角色米卡中表现出色，安娜·穆格拉利斯则是查布罗尔最为紧张的心理悬疑片之一中的新锐年轻人才。
back_translation: Isabelle Huppert excels in the mysterious role of Mika, while Anna Mouglalis is a fresh young talent in one of Chabrol's most intense psychological thrillers.

text: the movie starts with a legend and ends with a story that is so far-fetched it would be impossible to believe if it were n't true . this is the stuff that disney movies are made of .
translation: 电影以一个传说开始，以一个离奇得令人难以置信的故事结束，如果不是事实的话，真是难以相信。这正是迪士尼电影的素材。
back_translation: The film begins with a legend and ends with an incredible story that is hard to believe, if it weren't for the fact that it is true. This is exactly the material for a Disney movie.

text: . . . pays tribute to heroes the way julia roberts hands out awards -- with phony humility barely camouflaging grotesque narcissism .
translation: ……以朱莉娅·罗伯茨颁奖的方式向英雄致敬——伪装的谦逊掩盖了可怕的自恋。
back_translation: ... paying tribute to the heroes in the style of Julia Roberts presenting an award—disguised humility masks terrible narcissism.

text: but slowly , their teenage-son alan ( kristian horn ) got suspicious that henry is n't his father .
translation: 但渐渐地，他们的 teenage son alan (krystian horn) 开始怀疑亨利不是他的父亲。
back_translation: But gradually, their teenage son Alan (Krystian Horn) began to suspect that Henry was not his father.

text: in their love for each other and their ability to move on , the women are , in a way , lovely and amazing .
translation: 在她们对彼此的爱以及向前走的能力上，这些女性在某种程度上是可爱而令人惊叹的。
back_translation: In their love for each other and their ability to move forward, these women are, in a way, lovely and astonishing.

text: this mild-mannered farce , directed by one of its writers , john c . walsh , is corny in a way that bespeaks an expiration date passed a long time ago .
translation: 这部由编剧之一约翰·C·沃尔什执导的温和滑稽剧，看起来有些老套，仿佛早已过了保质期。
back_translation: This gently humorous film directed by one of the screenwriters, John C. Walsh, seems somewhat clichéd, as if it has already passed its expiration date.

text: there follow three months of exhausting interrogation and isolation .
translation: 接下来是三个月的疲惫审讯和孤立。
back_translation: What followed were three months of exhausting interrogation and isolation.

text: finally , the unequal lovers end up as fugitives from justice - but for how long ?
translation: 最终，不平等的恋人们最终成为逃避正义的逃犯——但是能逃多久呢？
back_translation: In the end, the unequal lovers ultimately become fugitives evading justice—but how long can they escape?

text: for once the kids do n't let sam down - and they 're not likely to forget the lessons they 've learned .
translation: 这次孩子们没有让萨姆失望，他们也不太可能忘记他们所学到的课。
back_translation: This time, the children did not disappoint Sam, and they are unlikely to forget the lessons they learned.

text: an entertaining , if somewhat standardized , action movie .
translation: 一部娱乐性强，但稍显模板化的动作电影。
back_translation: A highly entertaining, yet somewhat formulaic action movie.

text: the only thing that can help him is a very expensive operation , an operation their family can in no way afford .
translation: 唯一可以帮助他的就是一项非常昂贵的手术，而他们家负担不起这笔费用。
back_translation: The only thing that could help him was a very expensive surgery, which his family could not afford.

text: this rough but extraordinary film presents a haunting picture of life in kurdistan .
translation: 这部粗犷但非凡的电影描绘了库尔德斯坦生活的一个令人难忘的画面。
back_translation: This rugged yet extraordinary film paints an unforgettable picture of life in Kurdistan.

text: things never seem to be the way they really are .
translation: 事情似乎从来不是它们真正的样子。
back_translation: Things never seem to be what they really are.

text: april 's shower demands you to ask how far would you go for true love and if you have the strength to live in your truth .
translation: 四月的细雨促使你思考，为了真爱你愿意走多远，以及你是否有力量活出真实的自己。
back_translation: The fine rain of April prompts you to contemplate how far you are willing to go for true love and whether you have the strength to live out your authentic self.

text: it has a dashing and resourceful hero ; a lisping , reptilian villain ; big fights ; big hair ; lavish period scenery ; and a story just complicated enough to let you bask in your own cleverness as you figure it out .
translation: 它有一个潇洒而足智多谋的英雄；一个口齿不清、像爬行动物一样的反派；激烈的打斗；蓬松的头发；奢华的历史场景；还有一个足够复杂的故事，让你在揭开谜底的过程中沉醉于自己的聪明才智。
back_translation: It features a suave and cunning hero; a mumbling, reptilian villain; intense battles; fluffy hair; luxurious historical settings; and a plot complex enough to keep you engrossed in your own cleverness as you unravel the mysteries.

text: this may not be great moviemaking . . . but it 's vastly enjoyable in a low-down , scandal-mongering way .
translation: 这可能不是伟大的电影制作……但以一种低俗、喜好 scandal 的方式来讲，它非常有趣。
back_translation: This may not be great filmmaking... but in a vulgar, scandal-loving way, it's very entertaining.

text: haris seems to be an all-american guy except that he creates strange installations of hanging ropes , and suffers from terrible visions- of himself as a child in afghanistan in traditional dress , of smoke and bombs , of his dead parents and the russian soldier who shot them during the soviet invasion .
translation: 哈里斯似乎是一个典型的美国人，唯一不同的是他制作奇怪的悬挂绳索装置，并且遭受着可怕的幻觉——他作为儿童在阿富汗穿着传统服饰的样子，烟雾和炸弹，死去的父母，还有在苏联入侵期间射杀他们的俄罗斯士兵。
back_translation: Harris seems to be a typical American, the only difference being that he creates strange hanging rope devices and suffers from terrible hallucinations—his appearance as a child in Afghanistan wearing traditional clothing, smoke and bombs, his dead parents, and the Russian soldiers who shot them during the Soviet invasion.

text: the trouble is , its filmmakers run out of clever ideas and visual gags about halfway through .
translation: 问题是，影片的制片人到了一半就用尽了聪明的创意和视觉笑料。
back_translation: The problem is that the filmmakers ran out of clever ideas and visual gags halfway through the film.

text: jack black will play dewey finn , a depressed musician that was recently fired from his band .
translation: 杰克·布莱克将饰演德威·芬，一个最近被乐队解雇的抑郁音乐家。
back_translation: Jack Black will play Dewey Finn, a depressed musician who was recently fired by his band.

text: more of an intriguing curiosity than a gripping thriller .
translation: 更像是一种引人入胜的好奇心，而不是扣人心弦的惊悚片。
back_translation: It is more like a captivating curiosity rather than a suspenseful thriller.

text: unfortunately for them , sarah 's parents send sarah 's ex-boyfriend peter prentis ( played by christian kane ) to break up the happy marriage .
translation: 不幸的是，莎拉的父母派莎拉的前男友彼得·普伦蒂斯（由克里斯蒂安·凯恩饰演）来破坏这段幸福的婚姻。
back_translation: Unfortunately, Sarah's parents sent her ex-boyfriend Peter Prentiss (played by Christian Kane) to sabotage this happy marriage.

text: there 's none of the happily-ever -after spangle of monsoon wedding in late marriage -- and that 's part of what makes dover kosashvili 's outstanding feature debut so potent .
translation: 在晚婚中，没有那种“幸福快乐直到永远”的婚礼光环——这正是多佛·科萨什维利出色的首部长片如此引人注目的部分原因。
back_translation: In late marriage, there is no "happily ever after" wedding aura — this is precisely what makes Dovlatov Kosashvili's outstanding feature debut so compelling.

text: there 's an uneasy balance between the comedy and the drama that does n't really fire on all levels , but it works on a few of them .
translation: 喜剧和戏剧之间存在一种不安的平衡，虽然并未在所有层面上都表现得很好，但在一些层面上还是有效的。
back_translation: There is an uneasy balance between comedy and drama; although it does not perform well on all levels, it is effective on some levels.

text: . it 's a testament to the film 's considerable charm that it succeeds in entertaining , despite playing out like a feature-length sitcom replete with stereotypical familial quandaries . there 's a sheer unbridled delight in the way the story unfurls . . .
translation: 这部电影所展现的巨大魅力证明了尽管它像一部充满刻板印象的家庭困境的长篇情景喜剧，但仍然成功地让人娱乐。故事的展开充满了纯粹的无限乐趣。
back_translation: The immense charm displayed by this film proves that although it resembles a lengthy sitcom filled with stereotypes about family dilemmas, it still manages to entertain successfully. The unfolding of the story is full of pure, boundless fun.

text: these two stories are simultaneously linked to the work and life of virginia woolf , who 's writing the novel mentioned before .
translation: 这两篇故事与弗吉尼亚·伍尔夫的工作和生活同时相连，她是之前提到的小说的作者。
back_translation: These two stories are connected to the work and life of Virginia Woolf, who is the author of the mentioned novel.

text: about a boy will warm your heart without making you feel guilty about it .
translation: 关于一个男孩的故事会温暖你的心，而不让你感到内疚。
back_translation: A story about a boy will warm your heart without making you feel guilty.

text: elegant and eloquent [ meditation ] on death and that most elusive of passions , love .
translation: 优雅而雄辩的[冥想]关于死亡和那最难以捉摸的激情——爱情。
back_translation: An elegant and eloquent meditation on death and the most elusive passion—love.

text: it deals with a whole lot of fun , romance and suspense .
translation: 它涉及大量的乐趣、浪漫和悬念。
back_translation: It involves a lot of fun, romance, and suspense.

text: and slowly but surely , the dim-witted duo begin to realise this .
translation: 慢慢地，愚蠢的二人组开始意识到这一点。
back_translation: Slowly, the foolish duo began to realize this.

text: a disappointment for a movie that should have been the ultimate imax trip .
translation: 一部本应是终极IMAX体验的电影，却让人失望。
back_translation: A film that was supposed to be the ultimate IMAX experience ended up disappointing.

text: the film is an homage to power , strength and individualism .
translation: 这部电影是对力量、强大和个体主义的致敬。
back_translation: This film is a tribute to strength, power, and individualism.

text: paid in full is remarkably engaging despite being noticeably derivative of goodfellas and at least a half dozen other trouble-in-the-ghetto flicks .
translation: 《全额支付》尽管明显受到《好家伙》和至少半打其他困扰城市的电影的启发，但仍然令人非常投入。
back_translation: "Full Pay" is still very engaging, despite being clearly inspired by "Goodfellas" and at least half a dozen other films troubled by urban issues.

text: a fascinating literary mystery story with multiple strands about the controversy of who really wrote shakespeare 's plays .
translation: 一个迷人的文学悬疑故事，具有多个线索，围绕着谁真的写了莎士比亚的剧作的争议展开。
back_translation: A captivating literary mystery story with multiple clues, centered around the controversy of who really wrote Shakespeare's plays.

text: it 's easy for a filmmaker to blow up the world -- but what shyamalan does is much riskier . he tries to blow our minds .
translation: 对于一位电影制片人来说，摧毁世界很容易——但香农所做的则要冒更大的风险。他试图震撼我们的心灵。
back_translation: For a filmmaker, destroying the world is easy— but what Shannon does is take an even greater risk. He tries to shock our hearts and minds.

text: almost everything about the film is unsettling , from the preposterous hairpiece worn by lai 's villainous father to the endless action sequences .
translation: 几乎影片中的一切都让人感到不安，从赖的反派父亲所戴的荒谬假发到无休止的动作场面。
back_translation: Almost everything in the film is unsettling, from the ridiculous wig worn by the villainous father to the endless action scenes.

text: these were the first boats to perform deterrent patrols in the history of the navy , and they did it during some of the most crucial moments of the cold war including the 1962 cuban missile crisis .
translation: 这些是海军历史上首次执行威慑巡逻的舰艇，它们在冷战期间的几个关键时刻执行了这一任务，包括1962年的古巴导弹危机。
back_translation: These are the first vessels in naval history to perform deterrent patrols, and they carried out this mission during several critical moments of the Cold War, including the Cuban Missile Crisis in 1962.

text: comes . . . uncomfortably close to coasting in the treads of the bicycle thief .
translation: ...与自行车小偷的轨迹不舒服地接近。
back_translation: ...uncomfortably nearing the trajectory of the bicycle thief.

text: upon discovering her infidelity , roxie 's husband amos refuses to take the blame for the murder and roxie is sent to jail , pending hanging .
translation: 在发现她的不忠后，罗克西的丈夫阿莫斯拒绝为谋杀承担责任，罗克西被送入监狱，等待绞刑。
back_translation: After discovering her infidelity, Roxie's husband Amos refused to take responsibility for the murder, and Roxie was sent to prison, awaiting execution by hanging.

text: ong chooses to present ah na 's life as a slight , weightless fairy tale , whose most unpleasant details seem to melt away in the face of the character 's blank-faced optimism .
translation: ong选择将ah na的生活呈现为一个轻盈无重的童话，其最不愉快的细节在角色面无表情的乐观面前似乎消融了。
back_translation: Ong chooses to present Ah Na's life as a light and weightless fairy tale, where the most unpleasant details seem to dissolve in the face of the character's expressionless optimism.

text: there 's plenty of style in guillermo del toro 's sequel to the 1998 hit but why do we need 117 minutes to tell a tale that simply ca n't sustain more than 90 minutes .
translation: 吉尔莫·德尔·托罗的续集充满了风格，但为什么我们需要117分钟来讲述一个显然无法支撑超过90分钟的故事呢？
back_translation: Guillermo del Toro's sequel is full of style, but why do we need 117 minutes to tell a story that clearly can't support more than 90 minutes?

text: when stevie meets neil on the day he comes to deliver her brand new kitchen , it 's already too late for love at first sight .
translation: 当斯蒂薇在尼尔送来她全新厨房的那天遇见他时，已经为一见钟情太晚了。
back_translation: When Stevie met Neil on the day he delivered her brand new kitchen, it was already too late for love at first sight.

text: an endlessly fascinating , landmark movie that is as bold as anything the cinema has seen in years .
translation: 一部无尽吸引人的里程碑式电影，它的大胆程度堪比近年来影院所见的任何作品。
back_translation: An endlessly captivating milestone film, its boldness is on par with any work seen in theaters in recent years.

text: the movie just has too much on its plate to really stay afloat for its just under ninety minute running time .
translation: 这部电影的内容实在太多，以至于在不足九十分钟的片长里难以维持下去。
back_translation: The content of this movie is so abundant that it's difficult to sustain in less than ninety minutes of runtime.

text: 35-year old magnus edkvist hates class reunions as much as anyone and usually skip them .
translation: 35岁的马格努斯·埃德克维斯和其他人一样讨厌同学聚会，通常会选择缺席。
back_translation: 35-year-old Magnus Edkvist, like others, hates class reunions and usually chooses to skip them.

text: while their first few meetings are innocent enough , the obsessive and seductive madison wants more - much more .
translation: 虽然他们最初的几次见面相当无害，但痴迷而诱人的麦迪逊想要更多——远不止这些。
back_translation: Although their initial meetings were quite harmless, the obsessed and alluring Madison wanted more—much more than that.

text: flawed but riveting , it wo n't be everyone 's cocktail of choice , but if you can suspend disbelief long enough , you 'll get a whopping good wallop without the hangover .
translation: 有缺陷但引人入胜，这可能不是每个人的首选鸡尾酒，但如果你能足够长时间地暂停怀疑，你会得到一击强烈的快感而没有宿醉。
back_translation: Flawed but captivating, this may not be everyone's first choice cocktail, but if you can pause your doubts long enough, you'll get a strong hit of pleasure without a hangover.

text: feels like a cold old man going through the motions .
translation: 感觉像一个冷漠的老人在机械地做着事情。
back_translation: It feels like a cold, indifferent old man mechanically going through the motions.

text: like the series , the movie is funny , smart , visually inventive , and most of all , alive .
translation: 像这部系列剧一样，这部电影幽默、聪明、视觉独特，最重要的是，充满活力。
back_translation: Like this series, the movie is humorous, clever, visually unique, and most importantly, full of energy.

text: while cherish does n't completely survive its tonal transformation from dark comedy to suspense thriller , it 's got just enough charm and appealing character quirks to forgive that still serious problem .
translation: 虽然《珍爱》并未完全成功地从黑色幽默转变为悬疑惊悚片，但它仍然有足够的魅力和吸引人的角色特点来弥补这个严重的问题。
back_translation: Although "Cherish" did not completely succeed in transitioning from dark comedy to a suspense thriller, it still possesses enough charm and appealing character traits to make up for this serious flaw.

text: when in doubt , the film ratchets up the stirring soundtrack , throws in a fish-out-of-water gag and lets the cliched dialogue rip . or else a doggie winks .
translation: 在怀疑时，影片提高了激动人心的配乐，加入了不合时宜的搞笑桥段，让陈词滥调的对话尽情释放。否则，一只狗狗就会 wink。
back_translation: In moments of doubt, the film escalates the thrilling score and inserts untimely comedic gags, allowing the clichéd dialogues to run wild. Otherwise, a dog will wink.

text: its story is delicate and moving , and the film is a wholly commendable effort , if not quite as successful as majidi 's previous works .
translation: 它的故事细腻感人，这部电影是一个完全值得称赞的努力，尽管不如马基迪之前的作品那么成功。
back_translation: Its story is delicate and moving, and this film is a completely commendable effort, although it is not as successful as Makidi's previous works.

text: tension mounts , and as the cops arrive , morgan is growing impatient .
translation: 紧张气氛升级，随着警察的到来，摩根变得越来越不耐烦。
back_translation: The tense atmosphere escalated, and as the police arrived, Morgan became increasingly impatient.

text: cabin fever sets in , and the border between fact and fantasy begins to distort .
translation: 小屋症候群开始显现，真实与幻想之间的界限开始扭曲。
back_translation: The cabin syndrome begins to manifest, and the boundary between reality and fantasy starts to distort.

text: benito -- for years a fixture in the church as well as the community -- welcomes father amaro into a new life of unseen challenges .
translation: 贝尼托——多年来在教堂和社区中都是一个固定的身影——欢迎阿马罗神父迈入一个充满看不见挑战的新生活。
back_translation: Benito, a familiar presence in the church and the community for many years, welcomes Father Amaro into a new life filled with unseen challenges.

text: it 's that rare family movie -- genuine and sweet without relying on animation or dumb humor .
translation: 这是一部罕见的家庭电影——真实而甜美，不依赖于动画或低级幽默。
back_translation: This is a rare family film—genuine and sweet, not relying on animation or lowbrow humor.

text: in a time when a woman 's place was in the home , young emily ventures out and falls in love with a young soldier , eventually carrying his baby out of wedlock .
translation: 在一个女性的位置被认为是在家庭中的时代，年轻的艾米莉勇敢地走出去，爱上了一名年轻的士兵，最终未婚怀上了他的孩子。
back_translation: In an era when a woman's place was considered to be in the home, young Emily bravely stepped out, fell in love with a young soldier, and ultimately became unmarried and pregnant with his child.

text: he has no idea how he has journeyed the 400 miles in less than two hours .
translation: 他完全不知道自己是如何在不到两个小时内走完400英里的。
back_translation: He had no idea how he had traveled 400 miles in less than two hours.

text: because of his horribly unforgivable sins , freddy krueger ( robert englund ) is stuck in hell eternally .
translation: 由于他可怕的不可饶恕的罪行，弗雷迪·克鲁格（罗伯特·英格伦）永远被困在地狱里。
back_translation: Due to his terrible unforgivable crimes, Freddy Krueger (Robert Englund) is forever trapped in hell.

text: in the dark silence of the sea during world war ii , the submarine u . s . s .
translation: 在第二次世界大战期间，海洋的黑暗寂静中，潜艇U.S.S.
back_translation: During World War II, in the dark silence of the ocean, the submarine U.S.S.

text: not for everyone , but for those with whom it will connect , it 's a nice departure from standard moviegoing fare .
translation: 并不适合每个人，但对于那些能与之产生共鸣的人来说，这是一种从标准观影体验中愉快的 departure。
back_translation: It may not be suitable for everyone, but for those who can resonate with it, it is a pleasant departure from the standard viewing experience.

text: city by the sea is a gritty police thriller with all the dysfunctional family dynamics one could wish for . but how it washed out despite all of that is the project 's prime mystery .
translation: 海边城市是一部充满粗糙感的警匪惊悚片，拥有所有你可以想象的功能失调家庭动态。但它是如何在这一切之中洗净自我的，这成了项目的主要谜团。
back_translation: The seaside city is a gritty police thriller filled with all the dysfunctional family dynamics you can imagine. But how it cleanses itself amidst all this becomes the main mystery of the project.

text: for a film about action , ultimate x is the gabbiest giant-screen movie ever , bogging down in a barrage of hype .
translation: 《终极X》是一部关于动作的电影，有史以来最喧闹的巨幕电影，沉迷于一阵宣传的轰炸中。
back_translation: "Ultimate X" is an action movie, the loudest giant-screen film ever, immersed in a bombardment of promotional hype.

text: loonies is a touching comedy about five psychiatric patients who are forced to exchange their familiar surroundings for an old-fashioned , impersonal institution .
translation: 《呆子》是一部感人至深的喜剧，讲述了五位精神病患者被迫离开熟悉的环境，进入一个老式、缺乏个人化的机构。
back_translation: "Fool" is a deeply touching comedy that tells the story of five mental patients who are forced to leave their familiar environment and enter an old-fashioned, impersonal institution.

text: django is a character that decides to fight against his luck because he does n't accept the poverty he 's destined for .
translation: 江湖是一位决定与命运抗争的角色，因为他不接受自己注定要过的贫穷生活。
back_translation: Jianghu is a character who decides to fight against his fate because he refuses to accept the poor life he is destined to live.

text: they fool around for a while , but forget to get each other 's names down at the end of the night .
translation: 他们玩了一会儿，但在夜晚结束时忘记互相记下对方的名字。
back_translation: They played for a while, but by the end of the night, they forgot to remember each other's names.

text: en un ca & # 243 ; tico principio del siglo xxi , oleadas de cr & # 237 ; menes saturan los informativos , y decenas de sectas tratan de captar la fe de la cada vez m & # 225 ; s esc & # 233 ; ptica poblaci & # 243 ; n .
translation: 在21世纪初的一个卡特里科，犯罪潮涌入新闻报道，几十个邪教试图吸引越来越怀疑的民众的信仰。
back_translation: In the early 21st century, a wave of crime surged into news reports, with dozens of cults attempting to attract the increasingly skeptical public's faith.

text: 'lovely and amazing , ' unhappily , is neither . . . excessively strained and contrived .
translation: “可爱和惊人，”不幸的是，既不是……过于牵强和人为。
back_translation: "Lovely and amazing," unfortunately, neither is... too forced and artificial.

text: they grew up sharing a special relationship , in which they existed only to each other .
translation: 他们在一起成长，分享着一种特殊的关系，在这种关系中，他们只存在于彼此的世界里。
back_translation: They grew up together, sharing a special relationship in which they existed only in each other's world.

text: story of annette kellerman , the international swimming vaudeville and silent screen star whose life story inspired the mgm classic million dollar mermaid starring esther williams , which featured lavish busby berkeley scenes .
translation: 安妮特·凯勒曼的故事，这位国际游泳表演者和无声电影明星，她的生活故事激发了米高梅经典电影《百万美元美人》的创作，影片由埃丝特·威廉姆斯主演，展现了华丽的巴兹比·伯克利场景。
back_translation: The story of Annette Kellerman, the international swimming performer and silent film star, whose life inspired the creation of the MGM classic film "Million Dollar Mermaid," starring Esther Williams and featuring the lavish Busby Berkeley scenes.

text: broomfield reminds us that beneath the hype , the celebrity , the high life , the conspiracies and the mystery there were once a couple of bright young men -- promising , talented , charismatic and tragically doomed .
translation: 布鲁姆菲尔德提醒我们，在炒作、名人、奢华生活、阴谋和神秘之下，曾经有一对聪明年轻人——有前途、有才华、有魅力，但不幸注定。
back_translation: Bloomfield reminds us that beneath the hype, the celebrities, the luxurious lifestyles, the conspiracies, and the mysteries, there once were two smart young people—promising, talented, and charming, but unfortunately doomed.

text: an interesting psychological thriller that , more often than not , actually works .
translation: 一个有趣的心理惊悚片，更常见的是，它实际上是有效的。
back_translation: An interesting psychological thriller, more commonly, it is actually effective.

text: in order to make something of himself , dean assumes another identity and manages to enter high society .
translation: 为了成就自己，迪恩假扮成另一个身份，成功进入上层社会。
back_translation: In order to achieve his goals, Dean disguises himself as another identity and successfully integrates into high society.

text: the widow falls for the brit , who pretends to be in the fishing business but is actually a professional gambler .
translation: 寡妇爱上了那个英国人，他假装从事渔业，但实际上是一名职业赌徒。
