back_translation: The widow fell in love with that Englishman, who pretended to be a fisherman but was actually a professional gambler.

text: in this action comedy feature film , 'superbob ' utilizes his highflying karate mastery and investigative techniques to tackle the ruthless big yard .
translation: 在这部动作喜剧长片《超级鲍伯》中，超级鲍伯运用他高超的空中空手道技巧和调查手段，来对抗无情的恶势力。
back_translation: In this action-comedy feature film "Super Bob," Super Bob uses his incredible aerial martial arts skills and investigative methods to combat ruthless evil forces.

text: by presenting an impossible romance in an impossible world , pumpkin dares us to say why either is impossible -- which forces us to confront what 's possible and what we might do to make it so .
translation: 通过在一个不可能的世界中呈现一个不可能的浪漫，南瓜敢于质问我们为什么任何一个是不可能的——这迫使我们直面什么是可能的，以及我们可以做些什么来实现它。
back_translation: By presenting an impossible romance in an impossible world, Pumpkin dares to question us about why anything is impossible—this forces us to confront what is possible and what we can do to achieve it.

text: proves that a movie about goodness is not the same thing as a good movie .
translation: 证明一部关于善良的电影并不等同于一部好电影。
back_translation: Proving that a film about kindness is not necessarily a good film.

text: she does n't want christina to suffer as she has , so sam goes to the edge to try to save the life of this lost girl - whether she wants to be saved or not .
translation: 她不想让克里斯蒂娜像她一样受苦，因此萨姆走到了边缘，试图拯救这个迷失女孩的生命——无论她是否想被救。
back_translation: She didn't want Christina to suffer like she did, so Sam stepped to the edge, trying to save the life of this lost girl—whether she wanted to be saved or not.

text: a movie that will wear you out and make you misty even when you do n't want to be .
translation: 一部会让你感到疲惫甚至流泪的电影，即使你不想这样。
back_translation: A movie that will make you feel exhausted and even cry, even if you don't want to.

text: a smug and convoluted action-comedy that does n't allow an earnest moment to pass without reminding audiences that it 's only a movie .
translation: 一部自鸣得意且复杂的动作喜剧，丝毫不让任何真诚的时刻溜走，总是提醒观众这只是一部电影。
back_translation: A self-satisfied and complex action comedy that doesn't let any sincere moments slip away, always reminding the audience that this is just a movie.

text: beautifully crafted and cooly unsettling . . . recreates the atmosphere of the crime expertly .
translation: 精心制作且令人不安……巧妙地重现了犯罪的氛围。
back_translation: Meticulously crafted and unsettling... it cleverly recreates the atmosphere of crime.

text: apparently writer-director attal thought he need only cast himself and his movie-star wife sitting around in their drawers to justify a film .
translation: 显然，编剧兼导演阿塔尔认为只需要让自己和他的明星妻子穿着内衣坐在一起就足以证明这部电影的价值。
back_translation: Clearly, the writer and director Atar believes that simply having himself and his star wife sit together in their underwear is enough to prove the value of the film.

text: on the bright side , it contains jesse ventura 's best work since the xfl .
translation: 从好的一面来看，它包含了杰西·范图拉自XFL以来的最佳作品。
back_translation: On the bright side, it contains Jesse Ventura's best work since the XFL.

text: the verdict : two bodies and hardly a laugh between them .
translation: 判决：两个尸体之间几乎没有笑声。
back_translation: Judgment: There is almost no laughter between the two bodies.

text: . . . with the gifted pearce on hand to keep things on semi-stable ground dramatically , this retooled machine is ultimately effective enough at achieving the modest , crowd-pleasing goals it sets for itself .
translation: … 在天赋异禀的皮尔斯的支持下，剧情保持在半稳定的状态，这台重新设计的机器最终在实现其设定的适度、令观众满意的目标方面效果足够好。
back_translation: ... With the support of the exceptionally talented Pierce, the plot remains in a semi-stable state, and this redesigned machine ultimately performs well enough in achieving its modest and satisfying goals for the audience.

text: like its bizarre heroine , it irrigates our souls .
translation: 就像它那奇异的女主角一样，它滋润着我们的灵魂。
back_translation: Just like its strange female protagonist, it nourishes our souls.

text: read my lips is to be viewed and treasured for its extraordinary intelligence and originality as well as its lyrical variations on the game of love .
translation: 《读我的嘴》应该被视为一部珍贵的作品，因为它展现了非凡的智慧和独创性，同时也在爱情游戏上进行了抒情的变化。
back_translation: "Read My Lips" should be regarded as a valuable work because it showcases extraordinary wisdom and originality while also carrying out lyrical variations in the game of love.

text: unaware of the events to come , they quickly discovered that dabbling with the element of time may have dire consequences .
translation: 他们对即将发生的事件一无所知，迅速发现，玩弄时间元素可能会带来可怕的后果。
back_translation: They are completely unaware of the events about to unfold and quickly realize that manipulating the element of time may lead to terrifying consequences.

text: a perfectly acceptable , perfectly bland , competently acted but by no means scary horror movie .
translation: 一部完全可以接受、相当平淡、表演称职但绝对不恐怖的恐怖电影。
back_translation: A horror movie that is completely acceptable, quite bland, with competent performances, but absolutely not scary.

text: knowing his end is near , he puts out the call to his old comrade , john `` eagle eye `` pennell .
translation: 知道自己行将就木，他召唤了他的老战友，约翰 “鹰眼” 彭内尔。
back_translation: Knowing that he was nearing the end of his life, he summoned his old comrade, John "Hawkeye" Penner.

text: a happy young couple , sarah and tom ( brittany murphy and ashton kutcher ) marry against the wishes of sarah 's friends and family and go to europe for their honeymoon .
translation: 一对幸福的年轻夫妻，萨拉和汤姆（布列塔尼·墨菲和阿什顿·库彻）在萨拉的朋友和家人的反对下结婚，并前往欧洲度蜜月。
back_translation: A happy young couple, Sarah and Tom (Brittany Murphy and Ashton Kutcher), get married against the objections of Sarah's friends and family, and go on their honeymoon in Europe.

text: overall , this is a juicy movie but certainly not a trashy one .
translation: 总的来说，这是一部精彩的电影，但当然不是一部低俗的电影。
back_translation: Overall, this is a fantastic movie, but of course, it is not a sleazy movie.

text: the change in political leaders sparks paranoia among american cia officials , so cia director bill cabot recruits a young analyst to supply insight and advice on the situation .
translation: 政治领导人的变化引发了美国中情局官员的偏执，因此中情局局长比尔·卡博特招募了一位年轻的分析师，以提供对这一情况的见解和建议。
back_translation: The change in political leadership triggered paranoia among CIA officials, prompting CIA Director Bill Cabot to recruit a young analyst to provide insights and recommendations on the situation.

text: though excessively tiresome , the uncertainty principle , as verbally pretentious as the title may be , has its handful of redeeming features , as long as you discount its ability to bore .
translation: 尽管极其乏味，不确定性原理，尽管其标题听起来很自命不凡，却有其少数值得赎回的特征，只要你不考虑它让人厌倦的能力。
back_translation: Despite being extremely tedious, the uncertainty principle, although its title sounds pretentious, does have a few redeeming qualities, as long as you don't consider its ability to be boring.

text: the plot is plastered with one hollywood cliche after another , most of which involve precocious kids getting the better of obnoxious adults .
translation: 剧情充斥着一个又一个好莱坞陈词滥调，大多数情节涉及聪明伶俐的孩子们战胜讨厌的成年人。
back_translation: The plot is filled with one Hollywood cliché after another, with most of the storylines involving clever kids outsmarting annoying adults.

text: one day a mysterious young man enters her world .
translation: 有一天，一个神秘的年轻人进入了她的世界。
back_translation: One day, a mysterious young man entered her world.

text: nomad explores the futility of insulating oneself from the sometimes painful reality of human interaction .
translation: 游牧者探讨了将自己与人类互动的有时痛苦的现实隔绝的徒劳。
back_translation: The nomads discuss the futility of distancing themselves from the sometimes painful reality of interacting with humans.

text: extreme oops - oops , ops , no matter how you spell it , it 's still a mistake to go see it .
translation: 极端的错误 - 错误，不管你怎么拼写，这去看它仍然是个错误。
back_translation: Extreme error - error, no matter how you spell it, it's still an error to look at it.

text: what they do n't know , however , is that they 're filming near the secret hideout of slobodan pavle , a serbian war criminal .
translation: 然而，他们不知道的是，他们正在靠近塞尔维亚战争罪犯斯洛博丹·帕夫利奇的秘密藏身处拍摄。
back_translation: However, what they didn’t know was that they were filming close to the secret hideout of Serbian war criminal Slobodan Pavličić.

text: frances decides to take a break and she buys a villa in the beautiful tuscan countryside and decides to begin anew .
translation: 弗朗西斯决定休息一下，她在美丽的托斯卡纳乡村买了一栋别墅，决定重新开始。
back_translation: Frances decided to take a break, so she bought a villa in the beautiful Tuscan countryside and decided to start anew.

text: everyone is sick with start-up fever ; dreaming of the power and freedom of starting their own internet company .
translation: 每个人都渴望创业的热情；梦想着拥有创办自己互联网公司的力量和自由。
back_translation: Everyone yearns for the passion of entrepreneurship; dreaming of having the power and freedom to start their own internet company.

text: with this relation the characters will discover lot of things about their past .
translation: 通过这种关系，角色们将会发现许多关于他们过去的事情。
back_translation: Through this relationship, the characters will discover many things about their past.

text: chalk it up as the worst kind of hubristic folly .
translation: 把它归结为最糟糕的自负愚蠢。
back_translation: Boil it down to the worst kind of arrogant stupidity.

text: this is a shrewd and effective film from a director who understands how to create and sustain a mood .
translation: 这是一部聪明而有效的电影，导演懂得如何创造和维持氛围。
back_translation: This is a clever and effective movie, and the director knows how to create and maintain the atmosphere.

text: a spiritual exploration of sorts , offering a message of hope that resonates .
translation: 一种精神探索，传递出一个引起共鸣的希望信息。
back_translation: A spiritual exploration that conveys a resonant message of hope.

text: just when it seems martha 's influence may be having a favorable effect on greg 's attitude , his old ways win out .
translation: 就在玛莎的影响似乎对格雷格的态度产生积极影响时，他的旧习惯又占了上风。

text: this is the sort of low-grade dreck that usually goes straight to video -- with a lousy script , inept direction , pathetic acting , poorly dubbed dialogue and murky cinematography , complete with visible boom mikes .
translation: 这是一种通常直接发行视频的低劣作品——糟糕的剧本，拙劣的导演，惨淡的表演，糟糕的配音和模糊的摄影，甚至可以看到麦克风。
back_translation: This is a low-quality work that is usually released directly as a video—terrible script, poor direction, dismal performances, bad dubbing, and blurry cinematography, with even the microphone visible.

text: though a touch too arthouse 101 in its poetic symbolism , heaven proves to be a good match of the sensibilities of two directors .
translation: 虽然在其诗意象征上稍显艺术片入门，但《天堂》证明了这两位导演的敏感度很契合。
back_translation: Although the poetic symbolism is somewhat reminiscent of a beginner's art film, "Heaven" proves that the sensitivity of these two directors is very compatible.

text: schaeffer has to find some hook on which to hang his persistently useless movies , and it might as well be the resuscitation of the middle-aged character .
translation: 谢弗必须找到一个钩子来悬挂他那些持续无用的电影，而这个钩子最好是中年角色的复兴。
back_translation: Schafer must find a hook to hang his perpetually useless movies on, and that hook is best represented by a revival of middle-aged characters.

text: he leaves the city while searching for expression and finds a place to hide that he uses as his stage .
translation: 他离开城市，寻找表达的方式，找到一个可以藏身的地方，将其作为他的舞台。
back_translation: He left the city, seeking a way to express himself, finding a place to hide, and making it his stage.

text: ' [ the cockettes ] provides a window into a subculture hell-bent on expressing itself in every way imaginable . '
translation: 《科克特斯》提供了一个窥视，这个亚文化致力于以各种想象得到的方式表达自己。
back_translation: "The Cocktease" provides a glimpse into a subculture dedicated to expressing itself in various imaginable ways.

text: he returns to chris who then sends him with the money he got from the drugs , to an old racist drunk gunrunner named harry , to buy a gun .
translation: 他回到克里斯那里，然后克里斯用他从毒品中得到的钱派他去找一个名叫哈里的老种族主义酒鬼军火贩子，去买一把枪。
back_translation: He returned to Chris, and then Chris used the money he got from drugs to send him to find an old racist alcoholic arms dealer named Harry to buy a gun.

text: one day , butcher lee ( karen allen ) , inez 's trusted friend and an amateur mystic of sorts , reveals a vision that inez 's one true love is close by .
translation: 一天，屠夫李（卡伦·艾伦饰）是伊内斯值得信赖的朋友，也是一位业余神秘主义者，她透露了一个预示：伊内斯唯一的真爱就在不远处。
back_translation: One day, butcher Li (played by Karen Allen) is Ines's trusted friend and an amateur mystic, who reveals an omen: Ines's one true love is not far away.

text: in their late twenties and tired of partying their way around the world , danish marie and irish sophie come ashore in northern scotland .
translation: 在二十多岁并厌倦了周游世界派对的丹麦女孩玛丽和爱尔兰女孩索菲来到了苏格兰北部的海岸。
back_translation: In her twenties and tired of partying around the world, Danish girl Mary and Irish girl Sophie arrived at the northern coast of Scotland.

text: in the burial society , sheldon kasner , an unlikely criminal who works as a bank loan manager , infiltrates the mysterious world of the chevrah kadisha ( the jewish society that prepares bodies for burial according to ancient ritual ) in order to steal a body and fake his own death after mobsters come after him looking for two million dollars that he is accused of having stolen .
translation: 在《埋葬协会》中，谢尔顿·卡斯纳，一个看似不可能的罪犯，作为银行贷款经理，渗透进神秘的切华·卡迪莎（按照古老仪式准备尸体的犹太社团）世界，为了窃取一具尸体并伪造自己的死亡，因为黑帮追捕他，寻找两百万美元的赃款，他被控偷盗了这笔钱。
back_translation: In "The Burial Association," Sheldon Casner, an seemingly unlikely criminal, infiltrates the mysterious Chevra Kadisha (a Jewish organization that prepares bodies according to ancient rituals) as a bank loan manager in order to steal a corpse and fake his own death, as he is being pursued by the mafia for two million dollars in stolen money that he is accused of embezzling.

text: jude law plays a leading role as inman , a wounded confederate soldier who is on a perilous journey home to his mountain community , hoping to reunite with his prewar sweetheart , ada , played by nicole kidman .
translation: 裘德·洛在片中饰演因曼，一个受伤的南方联邦士兵，他踏上了一段危险的归乡之旅，希望能和他的战前爱人阿达重聚，阿达的角色由妮可·基德曼饰演。
back_translation: Jude Law plays Inman in the film, a wounded Confederate soldier who embarks on a dangerous journey home, hoping to reunite with his pre-war lover Ada, played by Nicole Kidman.

text: the film is based on the true story of telecommunications genius walter l . shaw sr . and his son walter t . shaw jr . , the confessed `` dinner time burglar . ``
translation: 这部电影是基于电信天才沃尔特·L·肖（Walter L. Shaw Sr.）和他的儿子沃尔特·T·肖（Walter T. Shaw Jr.）的真实故事，他们是自称的“晚餐时间入室盗贼”。
back_translation: This movie is based on the true story of telecommunications genius Walter L. Shaw Sr. and his son Walter T. Shaw Jr., who called themselves the "dinner-time burglars."

text: while holm is terrific as both men and hjejle quite appealing , the film fails to make the most out of the intriguing premise .
translation: 尽管霍尔姆在扮演两个角色时表现出色，而赫耶尔也颇具魅力，但这部电影未能充分利用其引人入胜的前提。
back_translation: Despite Holm's excellent performance in dual roles and Heyer’s charm, the film fails to fully leverage its captivating premise.

text: but how can graham really fall in love with her when he sees each time as the first time ?
translation: 但格雷厄姆怎么能真心爱上她呢，当他每次都像第一次一样看待她？
back_translation: But how can Graham truly love her when he looks at her every time as if it were the first?

text: he also tries to cope with the recent death of his 6 year old son jacob , whose presence can still be felt in the house .
translation: 他还试图应对他6岁儿子雅各布最近去世的事实，儿子在家中留下的气息依然可以感受到。
back_translation: He is also trying to cope with the fact that his 6-year-old son Jacob recently passed away, and the presence his son left in the home can still be felt.

text: aspires to the cracked lunacy of the adventures of buckaroo banzai , but thanks to an astonishingly witless script ends up more like the adventures of ford fairlane .
translation: 渴望追求《巴库·班扎伊的冒险》的疯狂，但由于剧本令人惊讶地无趣，最终更像是《福特·费阿莱恩的冒险》。
back_translation: Desiring the madness of pursuing "The Adventures of Baku Banzai," but ultimately feeling more like "The Adventures of Ford Fairlane" due to the surprisingly dull script.

text: [ a ] n utterly charming and hilarious film that reminded me of the best of the disney comedies from the 60s .
translation: 一部极其迷人和搞笑的电影，让我想起了60年代迪士尼喜剧的最佳作品。

text: amerika , zed and kyle are good friends until the wicked witch trasha comes along and takes kyle away .
translation: 美国、泽德和凯尔是好朋友，直到邪恶女巫特拉莎出现，把凯尔带走。

text: they share their drugs and bodies , and beg or steal whatever they have to in order to get by .

text: when he unexpectedly leaves for a week to go skiing with his wife , lillian is dragged out on the town by her best friend , andrea .

text: is office work really as alienating as 'bartleby ' so effectively makes it ?
translation: 办公室工作真的像《巴特比》所有效表现的那样令人感到疏离吗？
back_translation: Does office work really feel as alienating as portrayed in "Bartleby"?

text: a low-key labor of love that strikes a very resonant chord .
translation: 一种低调的爱之劳动，击中了一个非常有共鸣的弦。

text: one of the theives betrays his companions and swipes the gold for himself .
translation: 其中一个盗贼背叛了他的同伴，偷走了黄金为自己所用。

text: hawke draws out the best from his large cast in beautifully articulated portrayals that are subtle and so expressive they can sustain the poetic flights in burdette 's dialogue .
translation: 霍克从他庞大的演员阵容中挖掘出最好的表现，这些表现精致细腻，微妙而富有表现力，能够支撑伯代特对话中的诗意飞扬。
back_translation: Hawke extracts the best performances from his massive cast, which are exquisitely refined, subtle, and expressive, capable of supporting the poetic flights in Bordato's dialogue.

text: while maintaining the appearance of clinical objectivity , this sad , occasionally horrifying but often inspiring film is among wiseman 's warmest .
translation: 在保持临床客观外观的同时，这部悲伤、偶尔令人毛骨悚然但又常常让人鼓舞的电影是威斯曼最温暖的作品之一。
back_translation: While maintaining a clinical objective appearance, this sad, occasionally eerie but often uplifting film is one of Wiseman's warmest works.

text: the action sequences are fun and reminiscent of combat scenes from the star wars series .
translation: 这些动作场景充满乐趣，让人想起《星际大战》系列中的战斗场景。

text: a cheerful enough but imminently forgettable rip-off of [ besson 's ] earlier work .
translation: 一部足够欢快但即将被遗忘的剽窃作品，仿佛是[贝松]早期作品的翻版。

text: an impossible romance , but we root for the patronized iranian lad .
translation: 一段不可能的浪漫，但我们为那个被轻视的伊朗男孩加油。

text: neither revelatory nor truly edgy -- merely crassly flamboyant and comedically labored .
translation: 既没有启示性也不真正前卫——不过是粗俗的华丽和颇具喜剧色彩的生硬展示。
back_translation: Neither enlightening nor truly avant-garde—just vulgar glamour and a rather comical display of awkwardness.

text: despite guidance from the blue fairy , and the love of his father , gepetto , a wooden puppet 's curious spirit leads him into one wild adventure after another .
translation: 尽管有蓝色仙女的指引和他的父亲杰佩托的爱，木偶吉佩托好奇的灵魂让他一次又一次地陷入疯狂的冒险中。
back_translation: Despite the guidance of the Blue Fairy and the love of his father Geppetto, the curious soul of the puppet Geppetto repeatedly led him into wild adventures.

text: yet this highly traditional world is facing profound changes due to the postwar influx of foreign images and ideas in japanese culture .
translation: 然而，这个高度传统的世界正因战后外国图像和思想的涌入而面临深刻的变化。
back_translation: However, this highly traditional world is undergoing profound changes due to the influx of foreign images and ideas after the war.

text: a young man in his early early 20 's discovers his first love is getting married so he drops everything to travel across california and stop her , with no money and no car , where he discovers life , love and secrets from his past .
translation: 一个二十出头的年轻人发现他的初恋要结婚了，于是他放下一切，穿越加利福尼亚去阻止她。在没有钱和车的情况下，他在旅途中发现了生活、爱情和他过去的秘密。
back_translation: A young man in his twenties discovers that his first love is getting married, so he drops everything and travels across California to stop her. Without money or a car, he finds life, love, and secrets from his past along the journey.

text: styled after vh1 's `` behind the music , `` this mockumentary profiles the rise and fall of an internet startup , called icevan . com .
translation: 本模拟纪录片以VH1的“音乐背后”为风格，讲述了一家名为icevan.com的互联网初创公司的兴衰。
back_translation: This mockumentary, styled after VH1's "Behind the Music," tells the rise and fall of an internet startup company called icevan.com.

text: the only upside to all of this unpleasantness is , given its labor day weekend upload , feardotcom should log a minimal number of hits .
translation: 所有这些不愉快的事情中唯一的好处是，由于是在劳动节周末上传，feardotcom 应该只会有很少的访问量。
back_translation: The only benefit of all these unpleasant things is that, since it was uploaded on Labor Day weekend, feardotcom should have very few visitors.

text: an incredibly irritating comedy about thoroughly vacuous people . . . manages to embody the worst excesses of nouvelle vague without any of its sense of fun or energy .
translation: 一部关于彻底空洞人物的令人难以忍受的喜剧……设法体现了新新浪潮最糟糕的过度，而没有任何乐趣或活力。
back_translation: An unbearable comedy about completely hollow characters... that manages to embody the worst excesses of the new wave, without any fun or vitality.

text: he lives in a motor garage with his six friends .
translation: 他和他的六个朋友住在一个汽车修理厂里。

text: the embodiment of the very message it so modestly conveys -- it 's the accomplished little guy we fervently root for .
translation: 它是它所谦逊传达的信息的具象化——就是我们热切支持的那个小家伙。
back_translation: It is the embodiment of the humble message it conveys — the little guy we wholeheartedly support.

text: if you act in an inverse way , you will not have the room for larger stones .
translation: 如果你采取相反的方式，你将没有空间放置更大的石头。

text: offers 102 minutes of breezy , occasionally very funny entertainment .
translation: 提供了102分钟轻松愉快、偶尔非常搞笑的娱乐。

text: perhaps no greater example yet exists of the beauty achievable when one is a master of the digital aesthetic .
translation: 或许尚无更好的范例能展示掌握数字美学时所能实现的美丽。

text: `` it 's like those monster vampire high school kind of movies , only here the monsters are jesus-freak teenagers , `` says michael stipe , the former r . e . m .
translation: “这就像那些怪物吸血鬼高中电影，只不过这里的怪物是信奉耶稣的青少年，”前R.E.M.的迈克尔·斯蒂普说。
back_translation: "It's like those monster vampire high school movies, except here the monsters are Jesus-loving teenagers," said former R.E.M. member Michael Stipe.

text: ultimately , quinn rescues tasha from the hands of another assassin and takes her into his protection .
translation: 最终，奎因从另一个刺客的手中救下塔莎，并将她置于他的保护之下。
back_translation: In the end, Quinn rescued Tasha from another assassin and placed her under his protection.

text: a sweet-tempered comedy that forgoes the knee-jerk misogyny that passes for humor in so many teenage comedies .
translation: 一部温和的喜剧，放弃了许多青少年喜剧中那种肤浅的厌女幽默。
back_translation: A gentle comedy that abandons the superficial misogynistic humor found in many teen comedies.

text: he enlists the support of other prisoners including crips , bloods and a very powerful jamaican mobster and is able to expand his drug empire .
translation: 他争取了其他囚犯的支持，包括狗头帮、血帮和一位非常强大的牙买加黑帮分子，从而成功扩展了他的毒品帝国。
back_translation: He gained the support of other prisoners, including the Dog Head Gang, the Bloods, and a very powerful Jamaican gangster, successfully expanding his drug empire.

text: belongs in the too-hot-for-tv direct-to-video/dvd category , and this is why i have given it a one-star rating .
translation: 属于过热的电视直接视频/DVD类别，这就是我给它打一星的原因。
back_translation: This belongs to the overly heated television direct video/DVD category, which is why I rate it one star.

text: as 'chick flicks ' go , this one is pretty miserable , resorting to string-pulling rather than legitimate character development and intelligent plotting .
translation: 作为“少女电影”来说，这部影片相当糟糕，诉诸于操纵而非正当的人物发展和智能情节设计。
back_translation: As a "girl movie," this film is quite terrible, relying on manipulation rather than proper character development and intelligent plot design.

text: solondz may well be the only one laughing at his own joke
translation: 索伦兹可能是唯一一个在自己笑话上独自发笑的人。

text: kosminsky . . . puts enough salt into the wounds of the tortured and self-conscious material to make it sting .
translation: 科兹敏斯基……在受折磨且自我意识过强的材料中加入足够的盐，让其刺痛。
back_translation: Kozminski... adds enough salt to the tortured and overly self-aware material to make it sting.

text: almost nothing else -- raunchy and graphic as it may be in presentation -- is one-sided , outwardly sexist or mean-spirited . and in a sense , that 's a liability .
translation: 几乎没有其他东西——尽管其表现可能粗俗和直白——是片面的、表面上性别歧视或恶意的。从某种意义上说，这是一个负担。
back_translation: Almost nothing else—even though its expression may be crude and straightforward—is one-sided, superficially sexist or malicious. In a sense, this is a burden.

text: potter begins his second year at hogwarts school of wizardry , but is warned by a mysterious creature that danger awaits him at the school .
translation: 哈利·波特在霍格沃茨魔法学校开始他的第二年，但被一个神秘生物警告说学校里将会有危险等着他。
back_translation: Harry Potter begins his second year at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, but is warned by a mysterious creature that danger awaits him at the school.

text: a corrupt cia agent ( johnny depp ) who at that time , demands retribution from his worst enemy to carry out the drug lord 's uprising against the government .
translation: 一个腐败的中央情报局特工（约翰尼·德普），在那个时候，要求向他最仇恨的敌人复仇，以发动毒枭对政府的起义。
back_translation: A corrupt CIA agent (Johnny Depp), at that time, seeks revenge against his most hated enemy in order to incite a drug lord's uprising against the government.

text: automatically pegs itself for the straight-to-video sci-fi rental shelf .
translation: 自动将自己归类为直销视频的科幻租赁架。
back_translation: Automatically classify itself as a direct sales video sci-fi rental shelf.

text: somehow ms . griffiths and mr . pryce bring off this wild welsh whimsy .
translation: 不知怎的，格里菲斯女士和普赖斯先生成功地呈现了这种狂野的威尔士异想天开。

text: the three roommates have proudly scammed their way through the last four years of college and now , during the final exams , these big-men-on-campus are about to be busted by the most unlikely dude in school .
translation: 这三位室友自豪地在过去四年的大学生活中骗取了利益，而现在，在期末考试期间，这些校园里的大人物即将被学校里最不可能的家伙揭穿。
back_translation: These three roommates proudly took advantage of their college life over the past four years, and now, during finals week, these big shots on campus are about to be exposed by the most unlikely person in the school.

text: all the amped-up tony hawk-style stunts and thrashing rap-metal ca n't disguise the fact that , really , we 've been here , done that .
translation: 所有这些夸张的托尼·霍克风格特技和激烈的说唱金属并不能掩盖一个事实，那就是，实际上，我们已经经历过这一切。
back_translation: All these exaggerated Tony Hawk-style tricks and intense rap metal cannot mask the fact that, in reality, we have already been through all of this.

text: bielinsky 's script is slick and fiendishly clever , with seemingly a twist a minute .
translation: 比伦斯基的剧本流畅而狡猾，似乎每分钟都有一个意想不到的转折。
back_translation: Belinsky's script is smooth and clever, with seemingly an unexpected twist every minute.

text: an l . a . artist ( mark ruffalo ) with everything seemingly going for him suddenly finds a change in his life when an art curator cancels his upcoming one-man show .
translation: 一位洛杉矶的艺术家（马克·鲁法洛）原本似乎一切顺利，但当一名艺术策展人取消了他的即将举行的个人展览时，他的生活突然发生了变化。
back_translation: An artist in Los Angeles (Mark Ruffalo) seemed to be having everything go smoothly, but when an art curator canceled his upcoming solo exhibition, his life suddenly changed.

text: [ siegal ] proves that you do n't have to be a just out of film school gen-x'er to make a resonant and entertaining movie about young adults .
translation: [西戈尔]证明了你不必是刚从电影学院毕业的X世代才能制作一部关于年轻人的共鸣且富有娱乐性的电影。
back_translation: [Xigel] proves that you don't have to be a recent graduate of film school from Generation X to create a resonant and entertaining film about young people.

text: opens at a funeral , ends on the protagonist 's death bed and does n't get much livelier in the three hours in between .
translation: 故事开始于一场葬礼，以主人公的临终床边为结尾，中间的三小时里并没有变得多么生动。
back_translation: The story begins with a funeral and ends with the protagonist's deathbed; the three hours in between do not become very vivid.

text: called `` an elegant documentary `` by sundance and `` eloquent and deeply moving `` by the la times , toyo miyatake : infinite shades of gray is a penetrating portrait of this photographer 's search for truth and beauty in a world of impermanence .
translation: 被圣丹斯称为“优雅的纪录片”，被《洛杉矶时报》称为“雄辩且深具感染力”，宫武丰的《无限的灰色阴影》深刻展现了这位摄影师在无常世界中对真理和美的追寻。
back_translation: Called "an elegant documentary" by Sundance and "eloquent and deeply moving" by the Los Angeles Times, Mitsuhiro Miyamoto's "Infinite Gray Shadows" profoundly showcases the photographer's pursuit of truth and beauty in an impermanent world.

text: it is far from the worst , thanks to the topical issues it raises , the performances of stewart and hardy , and that essential feature -- a decent full-on space battle .
translation: 这远非最糟糕的，得益于它提出的热门话题、斯图尔特和哈迪的表演，以及那一重要特征——一场体面的全面太空战斗。
back_translation: This is far from the worst, thanks to the popular topics it presents, the performances of Stewart and Hardy, and that important feature—a decent all-around space battle.

text: can martin regain his better self - and not lose paula ?
translation: 马丁能否找回更好的自己，而不失去宝拉？
back_translation: Can Martin find a better version of himself without losing Paula?

text: according to eric and ami 's passive-aggressive mother who refuses to accept that her daughter is an adult ( jessica walters ) , that answer is `` yes `` .
translation: 根据埃里克和艾米的被动攻击型母亲（杰西卡·沃尔特斯饰），她拒绝接受她的女儿是成年人，这个答案就是“是的”。
back_translation: Based on Eric and Amy's passive-aggressive mother (played by Jessica Walters), who refuses to accept that her daughter is an adult, the answer is "yes."

text: successful filmmakers were asked how they balanced a family and a career .
translation: 成功的电影制作人被问及他们如何平衡家庭和职业。
back_translation: Successful filmmakers were asked how they balance family and career.

text: a plodding look at the french revolution through the eyes of aristocrats .
translation: 从贵族的视角缓慢审视法国大革命。
back_translation: Slowly examine the French Revolution from the perspective of the nobility.

text: a determined , ennui-hobbled slog that really does n't have much to say beyond the news flash that loneliness can make people act weird .
translation: 一个决心坚定、厌倦折磨的跋涉，实际上并没有太多内容可言，只是传达了一个新闻快讯：孤独会让人表现得奇怪。
back_translation: A determined and weary journey actually has little content to speak of; it simply conveys a news flash: loneliness can make people behave strangely.

text: on their last night of high school life , six best friends vow to spend their spring break together .
translation: 在高中生活的最后一个晚上，六个最好的朋友发誓要一起度过他们的春假。
back_translation: On the last night of their high school life, six best friends vowed to spend their spring break together.

text: the farcical elements seemed too pat and familiar to hold my interest , yet its diverting grim message is a good one .
translation: 滑稽的元素似乎过于简单和熟悉，无法引起我的兴趣，但其令人愉悦的严峻信息却是一个好的信息。
back_translation: The comedic elements seem too simple and familiar to capture my interest, but their pleasantly serious message is a good one.

text: wildly incompetent but brilliantly named half past dead -- or for seagal pessimists : totally past his prime .
translation: 极其无能但名字起得绝妙的《半死不活》——或者对于西戈尔的悲观主义者来说：完全过气。
back_translation: Extremely incompetent but with a brilliantly catchy title: "Half Alive"—or for the pessimists in Seagal's camp: completely washed up.

text: even if the world does n't see things the way [ michael moore ] does , his questions are worth asking . M-^E and bowling for columbine benefits from his iconoclastic zeal .
translation: 即使全世界不以迈克尔·摩尔的视角看待事物，他提出的问题仍然值得询问。《保龄球枪击案》得益于他那种破除传统的热情。
back_translation: Even if the whole world does not view things from Michael Moore's perspective, the questions he raises are still worth asking. "Bowling for Columbine" benefits from his passion for breaking conventions.

text: the smug , oily demeanor that donovan adopts throughout the stupidly named pipe dream is just repulsive .
translation: 唐纳文在那部愚蠢命名为“白日梦”的电影中所表现出的自以为是、油腻的举止实在令人厌恶。
back_translation: The self-righteous and greasy behavior displayed by Donovan in the stupidly titled movie "Daydream" is truly disgusting.

text: k-19 : the widowmaker is derivative , overlong , and bombastic -- yet surprisingly entertaining .
translation: 《K-19：寡妇制造者》虽然是衍生作品，长度过长且夸张，但却出乎意料地娱乐。
back_translation: "K-19: The Widowmaker," although a derivative work, is overly long and exaggerated, yet surprisingly entertaining.

text: through dream manipulations and guilt , he 's able to convince hockey-masked psychopath jason which both freddy and jason sense as the perfect opportunity for a slice-and-dice job .
translation: 通过梦境操控和内疚，他成功说服了戴着冰球面具的精神病杀手杰森，弗雷迪和杰森都认为这是一个完美的机会，进行一次切割和屠杀。
back_translation: Through dream manipulation and guilt, he successfully persuaded the hockey-masked psychopath killer Jason. Both Freddy and Jason believed it was a perfect opportunity for a cut and slaughter.

text: this was just after the offensive against the taliban forces had started .
translation: 这是在对塔利班部队发动攻势之后不久。
back_translation: This was shortly after the offensive against the Taliban forces was launched.

text: soon , she begins to receive strange phone calls from jennifer , her dead best friend , who has supposedly come back from the dead to avenge her death .
translation: 不久后，她开始接到来自她已故好友詹妮弗的奇怪电话，詹妮弗据说是复活来为她的死复仇的。
back_translation: Not long after, she started receiving strange phone calls from her deceased friend Jennifer, who was said to have been resurrected to take revenge for her death.

text: a simmering psychological drama in which the bursts of sudden violence are all the more startling for the slow buildup that has preceded them .
translation: 一部酝酿已久的心理剧，突如其来的暴力爆发因之前的缓慢铺垫而显得尤为震撼。
back_translation: A long-gestating psychological drama, the sudden outbreak of violence is particularly shocking due to the slow buildup that preceded it.

text: a boy 's introduction to acts of abuse , killing and suicide all take place inside an abandoned playground .
translation: 一个男孩对虐待、杀戮和自杀的介绍都发生在一个废弃的游乐场内。
back_translation: A boy's introduction to abuse, killing, and suicide takes place in an abandoned amusement park.

text: the ringwraiths return in an even more frightening form .
translation: 幽灵骑士以更可怕的形态回归。
back_translation: The Ghost Rider returns in a more terrifying form.

text: the beautiful fugitive , grace ( nicole kidman ) , arrives in the isolated township of dogville on the run from a team of gangsters .
translation: 美丽的逃犯格雷丝（妮可·基德曼饰）逃离一群黑帮分子，来到偏僻的小镇道格维尔。
back_translation: The beautiful fugitive Grace (played by Nicole Kidman) escapes from a group of gangsters and arrives at the remote town of Dougsville.

text: at first shocked into disbelief , amudha then expresses her determination to search out for her biological mother .
translation: 起初震惊到不敢相信，阿姆达随后表达了她寻找生母的决定。
back_translation: At first shocked and unable to believe it, Amdah then expressed her decision to search for her biological mother.

text: even if britney spears is really cute , her movie is really bad .
translation: 即使布兰妮·斯皮尔斯真的很可爱，她的电影也真的很差。
back_translation: Even though Britney Spears is really cute, her movies are really bad.

text: . . . plenty of warmth to go around , with music and laughter and the love of family .
translation: ……有许多温暖，伴随着音乐、笑声和家人的爱。
back_translation: There is a lot of warmth, accompanied by music, laughter, and the love of family.

text: the movie wavers between hallmark card sentimentality and goofy , life-affirming moments straight out of a cellular phone commercial .
translation: 这部电影在贺卡般的情感和直接来自手机广告的傻乎乎的、充满生活肯定的时刻之间摇摆不定。
back_translation: This film oscillates between card-like emotions and silly, life-affirming moments that come straight from mobile phone advertisements.

text: mark me down as a non-believer in werewolf films that are not serious and rely on stupidity as a substitute for humor .
translation: 把我算作一个不相信不严肃且依赖愚蠢作为幽默替代的狼人电影的人。
back_translation: Consider me someone who doesn't believe in serious werewolf movies and relies on stupidity as a substitute for humor.

text: it is von sydow who gives intacto its gravity , resonance , soul .
translation: 是冯·西多所赋予《无声》以重心、共鸣和灵魂。
back_translation: It is von Sidow who bestows "Silent" with depth, resonance, and soul.

text: perceiving his resignation as cowardice , his friends and fiancee give him four white feathers , the symbol of cowardice , but little do they know he 's actually going undercover and plans to redeem his honor .
translation: 他的朋友和未婚妻将他的辞职视为懦弱，给了他四根白羽毛，象征着懦弱，但他们并不知道他实际上是在潜伏，计划以此来挽回自己的荣誉。
back_translation: His friends and fiancée regarded his resignation as a sign of cowardice and gave him four white feathers, symbolizing weakness, but they did not know that he was actually lying in wait, planning to redeem his honor through this.

text: the fatal accident was actually choreographed by henrietta , a kervorkian wannabe , and dara and noble become henrietta 's unwitting pawns .
translation: 这起致命事故实际上是由亨丽埃塔策划的，她是一个想成为凯沃基安的人，而达拉和诺布尔则成为了亨丽埃塔无意中操控的棋子。
back_translation: This fatal accident was actually orchestrated by Henrietta, who wanted to become a Kevorkian, while Dara and Noble became pawns manipulated by Henrietta without her realizing it.

text: the 57-minute , color documentary feature film , wedding advice : speak now or forever hold your peace , explores contemporary american ambivalence about weddings and marriage .
translation: 这部57分钟的彩色纪录片《婚礼建议：现在说出或永远保持沉默》，探讨了当代美国人对婚礼和婚姻的矛盾心理。
back_translation: This 57-minute color documentary "Wedding Advice: Speak Now or Forever Hold Your Peace" explores the conflicting feelings of contemporary Americans towards weddings and marriage.

text: australia : land beyond time is an enjoyable big movie primarily because australia is a weirdly beautiful place .
translation: 澳大利亚：超越时间的土地是一部令人愉悦的大电影，主要是因为澳大利亚是一个奇异而美丽的地方。
back_translation: Australia: A Land Beyond Time is a delightful film, mainly because Australia is a strange and beautiful place.

text: some body smacks of exhibitionism more than it does cathartic truth telling .
translation: 某些身体更像是表现癖，而不是有治疗意义的真相表达。
back_translation: Certain physical conditions resemble expressive habits rather than expressions of truth that carry therapeutic significance.

text: later on , when frode is safely tucked in bed , something is stirring in the closet , because that little monster puppet is no ordinary puppet .
translation: 稍后，当弗罗德安全地躺在床上时，壁橱里出现了动静，因为那个小怪物木偶并不是普通的木偶。
back_translation: Later, when Frodo was safely lying in bed, there was a noise coming from the closet, because that little monster puppet was not an ordinary puppet.

text: another story follows the relationship between a stepfather ( neeson ) and his young stepson .
translation: 另一个故事讲述了一位继父（尼森）与他年轻的继子之间的关系。
back_translation: Another story tells about the relationship between a stepfather (Neeson) and his young stepson.

text: colson comes to live with them , an injection of danger in the form of a strange , silent houseguest with haunted eyes and odd habits .
translation: 科尔森来和他们住在一起，一个奇怪的、沉默的房客，带来了危险，他有着幽 haunted 的眼神和怪异的习惯。
back_translation: Colson came to live with them, a strange, silent lodger who brought danger with him, possessing haunted eyes and peculiar habits.

text: a young man shares his mantra and imagines innocent beauty as he reflects upon his lonely , mundane existence .
translation: 一位年轻人分享了他的座右铭，并在思考自己孤独而平凡的生活时想象着纯真的美。
back_translation: A young man shared his motto and imagined pure beauty while reflecting on his lonely and ordinary life.

text: smart and alert , thirteen conversations about one thing is a small gem .
translation: 聪明而机警，《关于一件事的十三次对话》是一颗小宝石。
back_translation: Clever and astute, "Thirteen Conversations About One Thing" is a little gem.

text: they 're just a couple of cops in copmovieland , these two , but in narc , they find new routes through a familiar neighborhood .
translation: 他们只是警察电影世界里的两个警察，但在《毒品》中，他们在一个熟悉的社区找到新的路线。
back_translation: They are just two police officers in the world of police movies, but in "Drugs," they find a new route in a familiar community.

text: the rich performances by friel -- and especially williams , an american actress who becomes fully english -- round out the square edges .
translation: 富有表现力的弗里尔，特别是美国女演员威廉姆斯，她完全融入了英伦风情，丰富了作品的方寸之地。
back_translation: The expressive Freer, especially American actress Williams, fully immerses herself in the British atmosphere, enriching the work's small space.

text: they decide that the path to true love is to purposely set each other up on `` extreme dates `` with the objects of their affections .
translation: 他们决定真正爱情的道路是故意让彼此与各自心仪的对象进行“极限约会”。
back_translation: They decided that the path to true love was to intentionally let each other go on "extreme dates" with their respective crushes.

text: purpo $ e is the story of young internet entrepreneur , john elias .
translation: 《purpo $ e》是年轻互联网企业家约翰·埃利亚斯的故事。
back_translation: "Purpo $ e" is the story of young internet entrepreneur John Elias.

text: while tattoo borrows heavily from both seven and the silence of the lambs , it manages to maintain both a level of sophisticated intrigue and human-scale characters that suck the audience in .
translation: 尽管《纹身》在很大程度上借鉴了《七宗罪》和《沉默的羔羊》，但它成功地保持了一种复杂的悬疑感和贴近人性的角色，吸引观众的注意。
back_translation: Although "Tattoo" draws heavily from "Seven" and "The Silence of the Lambs," it successfully maintains a complex sense of suspense and relatable characters, capturing the audience's attention.

text: not just any dress , this is a 1930s parisian ball gown , and the two women 's respective desires for it are played out to a comical through bitter end .
translation: 不仅仅是一件裙子，这是一条1930年代巴黎的舞会礼服，两个女性对它的欲望以一种既滑稽又痛苦的方式展现到最后。
back_translation: Not just a dress, this is a ball gown from 1930s Paris, and the desire of two women for it is showcased in a way that is both absurd and painful until the end.

text: even the finest chef ca n't make a hotdog into anything more than a hotdog , and robert de niro ca n't make this movie anything more than a trashy cop buddy comedy .
translation: 即使是最优秀的厨师也无法将热狗变成其他东西，而罗伯特·德尼罗也不能让这部电影变成比一部低俗的警察搭档喜剧更高档的作品。
back_translation: Even the best chef cannot turn a hot dog into something else, and Robert De Niro cannot elevate this film beyond a lowbrow buddy cop comedy.

text: the hilarity belies the poignancy of truth and love and the laughter is punctuated with honesty , tenderness and pain .
translation: 欢乐掩盖了真理和爱的深刻，而笑声中夹杂着诚实、温柔和痛苦。
back_translation: Joy masks the profundity of truth and love, with laughter mingled with honesty, tenderness, and pain.

text: she works at a pet clinic and lives alone with her only `` true friend `` ; a doll her mother gave her when she was a little girl .
translation: 她在一家宠物诊所工作，独自生活，唯一的“真正朋友”是她妈妈在她小时候送给她的一个玩偶。
back_translation: She works at a pet clinic, lives alone, and her only "real friend" is a doll that her mother gave her when she was a child.

text: exquisitely nuanced in mood tics and dialogue , this chamber drama is superbly acted by the deeply appealing veteran bouquet and the chilling but quite human berling .
translation: 这部室内戏剧在情绪细微变化和对话方面精致入微，由深具魅力的老演员布凯特和令人毛骨悚然但相当人性的贝尔林精彩演绎。
back_translation: This indoor drama is exquisitely nuanced in emotional subtleties and dialogue, brilliantly performed by the charming veteran actor Buquette and the eerie yet quite human Berliner.

text: in all , the film examines a destructive relationship that struggles with even the simplest decisions .
translation: 总体而言，这部电影探讨了一段破坏性的关系，甚至在最简单的决策上也面临挣扎。
back_translation: Overall, the film explores a destructive relationship that struggles even with the simplest decisions.

text: imperfect ? yes , but also intriguing and honorable , a worthwhile addition to a distinguished film legacy .
translation: 不完美？是的，但也引人入胜且值得尊敬，是对杰出电影遗产的有价值补充。
back_translation: Imperfect? Yes, but also captivating and respectable, it is a valuable addition to the legacy of outstanding films.

text: the year 2002 has conjured up more coming-of-age stories than seem possible , but take care of my cat emerges as the very best of them .
translation: 2002年唤起了比看起来更为丰富的成长故事，但《照顾我的猫》则成为其中最优秀的作品。
back_translation: The year 2002 evoked a richer coming-of-age story than it seems, but "Take Care of My Cat" became the finest work among them.

text: harry , it turns out , is a parsel-tongue .
translation: 哈利，结果上是一个说蛇语的人。
back_translation: Harry, in the end, is a person who speaks Parseltongue.

text: john connor ( nick stahl ) is living in the streets as a hacker .
translation: 约翰·康纳（尼克·斯塔尔）生活在街头，作为一名黑客。
back_translation: John Connor (Nick Stahl) lives on the streets as a hacker.

text: looking at the posters for blue crush , which show bosworth , rodriguez and lake posing with bikinis and surfboards , i expected another mindless surfing movie . blue crush is anything but .
translation: 看到《蓝色冲击》的海报，上面是博斯沃斯、罗德里格斯和湖畔穿着比基尼、拿着冲浪板摆姿势，我原以为这又是一部无脑的冲浪电影。但《蓝色冲击》远非如此。
back_translation: Seeing the poster for "Blue Impact," featuring Bosworth, Rodriguez, and Lakeside posing in bikinis with surfboards, I initially thought it was just another mindless surf movie. However, "Blue Impact" is far from that.

text: ever since her new neighbor , mr . mackenheim , the former ruler of a distant alien planet , moved in , all the cats in the neighborhood have been disappearing .
translation: 自从她的新邻居麦肯海姆先生，那个遥远外星星球的前统治者，搬进来后，邻里所有的猫都在消失。
back_translation: Ever since her new neighbor, Mr. McKenheim, the former ruler of a distant alien planet, moved in, all the cats in the neighborhood have been disappearing.

text: oh yes , and there are no rules in the game .
translation: 哦，是的，这个游戏没有规则。
back_translation: Oh, yes, this game has no rules.

text: to lena , vaughn represents the life she is running away from .
translation: 对莉娜来说，沃恩代表了她正在逃避的生活。
back_translation: For Lina, Vaughan represented the life she was escaping from.

text: five men and women race against time ( and sometimes their own knack for self-sabotage ) to save the consummate southern , rowdy group house from the academic upper crust and a vindictive sorority .
translation: 五名男女与时间赛跑（有时还要与他们自我破坏的习惯作斗争），以拯救完美的南方喧闹集体住宅，免于学术上层社会和复仇姐妹会的破坏。
back_translation: Five men and women are racing against time (sometimes also struggling against their self-destructive habits) to save the perfect southern noisy collective housing from the destruction of the academic elite and a vengeful sorority.

text: about schmidt is a curious slice of americana . . . the characters are so clearly drawn and the dialogue so rich , you are immediately hooked .
translation: 《关于施密特》是一片奇妙的美式风情……角色描绘得如此鲜明，对话如此丰富，立刻就让你被吸引住。
back_translation: "About Schmidt" is a wonderful piece of American charm... The characters are vividly portrayed, and the dialogue is so rich that it immediately captures your attention.

text: 10 minutes into the film you 'll be white-knuckled and unable to look away .
translation: 影片开始10分钟后，你会紧张得捏紧拳头，无法移开视线。
back_translation: Ten minutes into the movie, you'll be so tense that you'll clench your fists, unable to look away.

text: many of benjamins ' elements feel like they 've been patched in from an episode of miami vice .
translation: 许多本杰明的元素感觉就像是从《迈阿密风云》的一集拼凑而来的。
back_translation: Many elements of Benjamin feel like they were pieced together from an episode of "Miami Vice."

text: narrated by james ellroy , stan brakhage , and dr . roy menninger .
translation: 由詹姆斯·埃尔罗伊、斯坦·布拉哈吉和罗伊·梅宁格博士讲述。
back_translation: Narrated by James Ellroy, Stan Brahaig, and Dr. Roy Menninger.

text: the characters ' connect in a maze of situations , underpinning the idea that 'geography is destiny ' and that each of us has our own 'republic ' , where lives intersect .
translation: 这些角色在各种情境中交织，凸显了“地理即命运”的观点，以及我们每个人都有自己的“共和国”，在这里生命交汇。
back_translation: These characters intertwine in various situations, highlighting the viewpoint that "geography is destiny," and that each of us has our own "republic," where lives converge.

text: agency owner/president , claire upton , has put together a 6 minute training video designed to help you gain job satisfaction as a contingent employee .
translation: 机构所有者/总裁克莱尔·厄普顿制作了一段6分钟的培训视频，旨在帮助您作为临时员工获得工作满意度。
back_translation: The organization's owner/president, Claire Upton, created a 6-minute training video aimed at helping you, as a temporary employee, achieve job satisfaction.

text: watching trouble every day , at least if you do n't know what 's coming , is like biting into what looks like a juicy , delicious plum on a hot summer day and coming away with your mouth full of rotten pulp and living worms .
translation: 每天观看麻烦，至少如果你不知道接下来会发生什么，就像在炎热的夏天咬下一颗看起来鲜嫩美味的梅子，却发现嘴里满是腐烂的果肉和活虫。
back_translation: Watching every day is a hassle, at least if you don't know what will happen next, like biting into a seemingly fresh and delicious plum on a hot summer day, only to find your mouth full of rotten flesh and live worms.

text: `` the bride `` was once part of a group of world class female assassins , until the group leader , `` bill `` and the other assassins turn against her .
translation: ``新娘``曾经是一个世界级女性刺客小组的一员，直到小组的领袖``比尔``和其他刺客背叛了她。
back_translation: "The Bride" was once a member of a world-class female assassin group until the group's leader "Bill" and other assassins betrayed her.

text: drumline is a movie that treats its characters and audience with respect ; it ca n't be accused of being a dumbed-down teen comedy .
translation: 《鼓线》是一部尊重其角色和观众的电影；它不能被指责为低级的青少年喜剧。
back_translation: "Drum Line" is a film that respects its characters and audience; it cannot be criticized as a lowbrow teen comedy.

text: there 's lots of cool stuff packed into espn 's ultimate x .
translation: ESPN的终极X中包含了许多很酷的内容。
back_translation: ESPN's Ultimate X includes a lot of cool content.

text: the film takes place over the course of a day as anthony , victoria , michael and his wife , sarah , spend the afternoon dining , drinking , and soaking in the hot tub .
translation: 影片发生在一天的时间里，安东尼、维多利亚、迈克尔和他的妻子萨拉在下午享受用餐、饮酒和泡温泉的时光。
back_translation: The film takes place over the course of a single day, with Anthony, Victoria, Michael, and his wife Sarah enjoying a meal, drinks, and a hot spring in the afternoon.

text: in a classic homage to chinese martial arts films , he is involved in intense hand to hand combat including sword fighting , guns , car chases , and other ingenious forms of fighting to mame and kill these tong members .
translation: 在对中国武术电影的经典致敬中，他参与了激烈的徒手战斗，包括剑斗、枪战、追车以及其他巧妙的战斗形式，以伤害和杀死这些帮派成员。
back_translation: In a classic tribute to Chinese martial arts films, he participated in intense hand-to-hand combat, including sword fights, gun battles, car chases, and other clever forms of fighting, to injure and kill these gang members.

text: it finds its moviegoing pleasures in the tiny events that could make a person who has lived her life half-asleep suddenly wake up and take notice .
translation: 它在那些微小事件中找到观影的乐趣，这些事件能够让一个过着半梦半醒生活的人突然觉醒并引起注意。
back_translation: It finds joy in those tiny events that can suddenly awaken and draw the attention of someone living a half-dream, half-wake life.

text: enough to ensure adrien 's family 's future and to give werner one last opportunity to face death head on . . .
translation: 足以确保阿德里安家族的未来，并给维尔纳最后一次直面死亡的机会……
back_translation: Enough to ensure the future of the Adrian family and give Werner one last chance to confront death...

text: there 's no doubting that this is a highly ambitious and personal project for egoyan , but it 's also one that , next to his best work , feels clumsy and convoluted .
translation: 毫无疑问，这对埃戈扬来说是一个极具雄心和个人色彩的项目，但与他的最佳作品相比，它显得笨拙且复杂。
back_translation: Undoubtedly, this is a project for Egoyan that is highly ambitious and personal in nature, but it comes across as clumsy and convoluted compared to his best works.

text: the saturation bombing of reggio 's images and glass ' evocative music . . . ultimately leaves viewers with the task of divining meaning .
translation: 雷焦的影像和玻璃的引人联想的音乐的饱和轰炸……最终让观众面临解读意义的任务。
back_translation: The saturated bombardment of the imagery of Leijiao and the evocative music of glass ultimately presents the audience with the task of interpreting meaning.

text: no worse than a lot of the crap we 've been offered this summer , and slightly better than men in black 2 as far as slapdash extraterrestrial comedies go .
translation: 不比我们这个夏天所看到的许多烂片差，作为草率外星人喜剧，这部电影在某种程度上比《黑衣人2》要好。
back_translation: It's not worse than many lousy films we've seen this summer. As a hasty alien comedy, this movie is somewhat better than "Men in Black 2."

text: matt was drunk and as he reached for the car radio , he struck the girl as she crossed the road .
translation: 马特喝醉了，当他伸手去调车载收音机时，撞上了正在过马路的女孩。
back_translation: Matt was drunk, and when he reached out to adjust the car radio, he struck a girl who was crossing the street.

text: even if you feel like you 've seen this movie a thousand times before , it is kind of enjoyable thanks mainly to belushi 's easy-going likableness .
translation: 即使你觉得你之前看过这部电影一千次，但由于贝鲁西的随和可亲，这部电影还是有点愉快。
back_translation: Even if you think you've seen this movie a thousand times before, it is still somewhat enjoyable due to Belushi's amiable and friendly nature.

text: haris embarks on a journey through the world of afghan-americans to learn more about their culture , and there he finds both humor and tragedy .
translation: 哈里斯开始了一段探索阿富汗裔美国人世界的旅程，以了解更多关于他们的文化，在那里他发现了幽默和悲剧。
back_translation: Harris embarked on a journey to explore the world of Afghan Americans to learn more about their culture, where he discovered humor and tragedy.

text: at this far away place he bares his inside .
translation: 在这个遥远的地方，他袒露了内心。
back_translation: In this distant place, he revealed his inner feelings.

text: what lee does so marvelously compelling is present brown as a catalyst for the struggle of black manhood in restrictive and chaotic america . . . sketchy but nevertheless gripping portrait of jim brown , a celebrated wonder in the spotlight
translation: 李所做的令人赞叹的是，将布朗作为一个催化剂，展现了在限制和混乱的美国中黑人人性的挣扎……这是对吉姆·布朗的一个模糊但依然引人入胜的肖像，他是一位在聚光灯下的传奇人物。
back_translation: What Li has accomplished is impressive, using Brown as a catalyst to showcase the struggle of Black humanity amidst the constraints and chaos of America... This is a vague yet still captivating portrait of Jim Brown, a legendary figure in the spotlight.

text: a close acquaintance overhears their conversation , and , promised a fee , reports the win to max ( david winburn ) , smooth-talking but deadly leader of a hoodlum gang , who sends his beautiful paramour , cindy ( kelly taylor ) , to seduce jose , if necessary , to get her hands on the winning ticket .
translation: 一个熟人听到他们的对话，并承诺支付报酬，向麦克斯（大卫·温伯恩）报告了中奖消息，麦克斯是一个口才流利但狠毒的恶棍团伙头目，他派遣他的美丽情人辛迪（凯利·泰勒）去勾引何塞，必要时为了夺取中奖的彩票。
back_translation: An acquaintance overheard their conversation and promised to pay a reward to report the winning news to Max (David Winburn), a smooth-talking but vicious gang leader. He sent his beautiful lover Cindy (Kelly Taylor) to seduce Jose, if necessary, to seize the winning lottery ticket.

text: enough is not a bad movie , just mediocre . the performances are so overstated , the effect comes off as self-parody .
translation: 《足够》并不是一部糟糕的电影，只是平庸而已。表演过于夸张，效果显得像自我讽刺。
back_translation: "Enough" is not a terrible movie, just mediocre. The performances are overly exaggerated, making the effect seem self-mocking.

text: although estela bravo 's documentary is cloyingly hagiographic in its portrait of cuban leader fidel castro , it 's still a guilty pleasure to watch .
translation: 尽管艾斯特拉·布拉沃的纪录片对古巴领导人菲德尔·卡斯特罗的塑造过于崇拜，但观看起来仍然是一种罪恶的快乐。
back_translation: Although Estrella Bravo's documentary portrays Cuban leader Fidel Castro in an overly reverent manner, watching it still provides a guilty pleasure.

text: without resorting to hyperbole , i can state that kissing jessica stein may be the best same-sex romance i have seen .
translation: 不夸张地说，我可以声明《吻杰西卡·斯坦》可能是我见过的最好的同性恋爱情片。
back_translation: To be honest, I can say that "Kissing Jessica Stein" might be the best gay romance film I've ever seen.

text: the film has a few cute ideas and several modest chuckles but it is n't exactly kiddie-friendlyM-^E alas , santa is more ho-hum than ho-ho-ho and the snowman ( who never gets to play that flute ) has all the charm of a meltdown .
translation: 这部电影有一些可爱的创意和几处小小的笑点，但并不完全适合儿童。哎，圣诞老人更像是毫无生气而非欢快的“呼哈哈”，而那个从未能够吹笛子的雪人则完全没有魅力，像是崩溃了一样。
back_translation: This movie has some lovely ideas and a few small humorous moments, but it is not entirely suitable for children. Sigh, Santa Claus feels more lifeless rather than jolly with his "ho ho ho," and the snowman who can never play the flute is completely charmless, looking as if it has collapsed.

text: what begins as a friendly 'extreme ' week long camping trip goes from a warm 'big chill ' into a chilling 'deliverance ' as old wounds unsurface , passions rise and personalities unravel .
translation: 一场友好的“极限”一周露营之旅开始时温暖如“温馨大团圆”，却逐渐变成冰冷的“救赎”，旧伤浮出水面，激情四起，性格逐渐崩溃。
back_translation: A friendly "extreme" week-long camping trip starts off warm like a "heartwarming reunion," but gradually turns into a cold "redemption," with old wounds surfacing, passions flaring, and personalities slowly breaking down.

text: but the break turns into a nightmare when sanjana starts hearing screams .
translation: 但当桑贾娜开始听到尖叫声时，这个假期变成了一场噩梦。
back_translation: But when Sanjana began to hear the screams, this holiday turned into a nightmare.

text: little do they know but help is on the way and this friday will get freaky !
translation: 他们不知道的是，帮助正赶来，这个星期五将会变得疯狂！
back_translation: What they don't know is that help is on the way, and this Friday is going to get crazy!

text: a charming and funny story of clashing cultures and a clashing mother/daughter relationship .
translation: 一个迷人而有趣的关于文化冲突和母女关系冲突的故事。
back_translation: A charming and intriguing story about cultural conflict and the conflict between mother and daughter relationships.

text: years later , on a hunting trip in the maine woods , they are overtaken by a blizzard , a vicious storm in which something much more ominous moves .
translation: 几年后，在缅因州的树林里进行狩猎旅行时，他们遭遇了一场暴风雪，这是一场凶猛的风暴，其中潜伏着更为不祥的东西。
back_translation: Years later, while on a hunting trip in the woods of Maine, they encountered a blizzard, a fierce storm that concealed something more ominous.

text: he can not explain her intermittent crying and disturbed reactions .
translation: 他无法解释她间歇性的哭泣和烦躁的反应。
back_translation: He couldn't explain her intermittent crying and irritable reactions.

text: the assasins force walter to drive their escape car .
translation: 刺客迫使沃尔特驾驶他们的逃逸汽车。
back_translation: The assassin forced Walter to drive their getaway car.

text: the characters are so generic and the plot so bland that even as rogue cia assassins working for chris cooper 's agency boss close in on the resourceful amnesiac , we do n't feel much for damon/bourne or his predicament .
translation: 这些角色太普通，情节也太平淡，以至于即使作为对克里斯·库珀的机构老板工作的流氓中央情报局刺客逐渐逼近机智失忆者，我们对达蒙/伯恩或他的困境也没有太多感受。
back_translation: These characters are too ordinary, and the plot is too bland, so that even as the rogue CIA assassin working for Chris Cooper's institution gradually closes in on the clever amnesiac, we don't feel much for Damon/Bourne or his predicament.

text: now the monk must look for a new scrollkeeper .
translation: 现在僧侣必须寻找新的卷轴守护者。
back_translation: The monks must now seek new scroll guardians.

text: purpo $ e is a story about business in the new millenium , and a world shifted away from quality to quantity .
translation: 《目的》是一个关于新千年的商业故事，讲述了一个从质量转向数量的世界。
back_translation: "The Purpose" is a business story about the new millennium, telling the tale of a world that shifts from quality to quantity.

text: it is not long before the doctor realizes that his underworld patient is in love with his own sister , so he decides to take her to malaysia and get her married off .
translation: 医生很快意识到他的地下病人爱上了自己的姐姐，于是决定带她去马来西亚，给她安排婚事。
back_translation: The doctor quickly realized that his underground patient had fallen in love with his sister, so he decided to take her to Malaysia and arrange a marriage for her.

text: despite all evidence to the contrary , this clunker has somehow managed to pose as an actual feature movie , the kind that charges full admission and gets hyped on tv and purports to amuse small children and ostensible adults .
translation: 尽管有诸多证据表明事实相反，这部傻瓜电影不知怎么的竟然成功地伪装成了一部真正的.feature电影，哪种收取全票价、在电视上宣传并声称能娱乐小孩子和表面上看似成年人的电影。
back_translation: Despite ample evidence indicating otherwise, this ridiculous movie somehow manages to successfully disguise itself as a genuine feature film, one that charges full ticket prices, promotes itself on television, and claims to entertain children while superficially appealing to adults.

text: we 've seen it all before in one form or another , but director hoffman , with great help from kevin kline , makes us care about this latest reincarnation of the world 's greatest teacher .
translation: 我们以前以某种形式见过这一切，但导演霍夫曼在凯文·克莱恩的巨大帮助下，让我们关心这位世界上最伟大教师的最新化身。
back_translation: We have seen all of this in some form before, but director Hoffman, with the tremendous help of Kevin Kline, makes us care about the latest incarnation of the world's greatest teacher.

text: along comes sonja , who wants to know how the horny tale he 's now working on will end .
translation: 索尼娅来了，她想知道他现在正在创作的那个色情故事将如何结束。
back_translation: Sonia arrived, and she wanted to know how the erotic story he was currently writing would end.

text: this is the story of a deaf mute who is laid off , and his sister , who requires a kidney transplant .
translation: 这是一个关于一位失聪哑巴被解雇的故事，以及他的姐姐，她需要进行肾脏移植。
back_translation: This is a story about a deaf-mute who is fired and his sister, who needs a kidney transplant.

text: frank capra played this story straight . but the 2002 film does n't really believe in it , and breaks the mood with absurdly inappropriate 'comedy ' scenes .
translation: 弗兰克·卡普拉以认真的态度讲述了这个故事。但2002年的电影并不真心相信这一点，并且用荒谬不妥的“喜剧”场景打破了气氛。
back_translation: Frank Capra told this story with a serious attitude. However, the 2002 film does not sincerely believe in this and breaks the atmosphere with absurd and inappropriate "comedic" scenes.

text: change up is a documentary that follows the lives of best friends , rafael `` pepey `` rodriguez , and alex sosa , two hard throwing pitchers from the economically poor , but baseball rich island of the dominican republic .
translation: 《改变人生》是一部纪录片，讲述了最好的朋友拉斐尔“佩佩”罗德里格斯和亚历克斯·索萨的生活，他们是来自经济贫困但棒球资源丰富的多米尼加共和国的两名实力投手。
back_translation: "Changing Lives" is a documentary that tells the story of best friends Rafael "Pepe" Rodriguez and Alex Sosa, two talented pitchers from the economically impoverished yet baseball-rich Dominican Republic.

text: nearly a decade after skynet sent back the t-1000 , john connor faces a female terminator , the t-x , with power over all machines .
translation: 在天网发送回T-1000近十年后，约翰·康纳面对着一位女性终结者T-X，她拥有对所有机器的控制权。
back_translation: Ten years after Skynet sent back the T-1000, John Connor faces a female terminator, the T-X, who has control over all machines.

text: how can neil and stevie get out of their mistaken marriages and into each others arms ?
translation: 尼尔和史蒂维如何才能摆脱错误的婚姻，走进彼此的怀抱？
back_translation: How can Neil and Stevie get out of their wrong marriages and into each other's arms?

text: harboring a secret , john guides angela to a shocking realization that will uncover the past .
translation: 怀着秘密，约翰引导安吉拉揭开一个将揭示过去的震惊事实。
back_translation: With a secret in mind, John guides Angela to uncover a shocking truth that will reveal the past.

text: the chateau has one very funny joke and a few other decent ones , but all it amounts to is a mildly funny , sometimes tedious , ultimately insignificant film .
translation: 这部影片有一个非常有趣的笑话和几个不错的笑话，但归根结底，它只是一部轻微搞笑、有时乏味、最终无关紧要的电影。
back_translation: This film has one very interesting joke and a few decent ones, but ultimately, it is just a mildly funny, sometimes tedious, and ultimately inconsequential movie.

text: dude schmitz , an independent filmmaker , attempting to secure funds for his second feature , blows an opportunity at what promises to be a lucrative interview with pop sensation britney spears .
translation: 独立电影制片人德瑞德·施密茨正在为他的第二部作品筹集资金，但在与流行歌手布兰妮·斯皮尔斯的面试中错失了一个看似有利可图的机会。
back_translation: Independent filmmaker Dred Schmitz is raising funds for his second project, but missed what seemed to be a lucrative opportunity during an interview with pop singer Britney Spears.

text: dealing with the aftermath of the 'accident ' brings out the best and the worst in them .
translation: 处理“事故”后的 aftermath 激发了他们最好和最坏的一面。
back_translation: The aftermath of dealing with the "accident" brought out their best and worst sides.

text: daringly perceptive , taut , piercing and feisty , biggie and tupac is undeniably subversive and involving in its bold presentation .
translation: 大胆而敏锐，紧凑、刺穿和激烈，《大gie与图帕克》毫无疑问在其大胆的表现中颠覆且引人入胜。
back_translation: Bold and incisive, compact, piercing, and intense, "Biggie and Tupac" undoubtedly subverts and captivates with its daring portrayal.

text: they spend their afternoons discussing theater and lucy 's role as antigone in a school loneliness of the city more bearable .
translation: 他们下午花时间讨论戏剧，以及露西在学校中饰演安提戈涅的角色，这让城市的孤独感更容易承受。
back_translation: They spent the afternoon discussing the play and how Lucy’s role as Antigone at school made the city’s sense of loneliness more bearable.

text: but again , her guardian angel reactivates her will to live .
translation: 但再一次，她的守护天使唤醒了她对生活的意志。
back_translation: But once again, her guardian angel awakened her will to live.

text: the film is divided into three stories , each associated with one of the three main ideologies of the 20th century : fascism , communism & # 38 ; liberalism .
translation: 影片分为三个故事，每个故事与20世纪的三大主要意识形态相对应：法西斯主义、共产主义和自由主义。
back_translation: The film is divided into three stories, each corresponding to one of the three main ideologies of the 20th century: fascism, communism, and liberalism.

text: a magnificent conjuring act , an eerie historical mirage evoked in a single sweeping wave of the hand by alexander sokurov .
translation: 一场壮丽的魔术表演，一种神秘的历史幻影由亚历山大·索库罗夫通过一个 sweeping wave of the hand 唤起。
back_translation: A magnificent magic show, a mysterious historical illusion evoked by Alexander Sokurov through a sweeping wave of the hand.

text: her loving parents feel helpless as they watch their daughter suffer .
translation: 她慈爱的父母看到女儿受苦，感到无能为力。
back_translation: Her loving parents felt powerless watching their daughter suffer.

text: a wonderfully speculative character study that made up for its rather slow beginning by drawing me into the picture .
translation: 一部精彩的推测性人物研究，通过吸引我进入故事，弥补了其开头较慢的不足。
back_translation: An exciting speculative character study that compensates for its slow start by drawing me into the story.

text: kyle goes back to darkness falls to face his past , and the woman in the porceline mask ( aka the tooth fairy ) chance barron , a has-been `` cock-rock `` front-man , has wasted nearly eight years of his life working a dead-end job at softwipe incorporated , the world 's second largest manufacturer/distributor of double-plied toliet paper , but things change drastically for mr . barron when he receives a mysterious watch which counts down the number of days he has left to live .
translation: 凯尔回到黑暗降临的地方面对他的过去，而那个戴着瓷面具的女人（即牙仙）查斯·巴伦，一个过气的“公鸡摇滚”主唱，浪费了将近八年的生命在软擦公司（世界第二大双层卫生纸制造和分销商）做一份无望的工作。但是，当巴伦收到一只神秘手表，这只手表倒计时他剩余的生命天数时，他的生活发生了彻底的变化。
back_translation: Kyle returns to the land where darkness has fallen to confront his past, while the woman wearing a porcelain mask (the Tooth Fairy) Chas Barren, a washed-up "cock rock" frontman, has wasted nearly eight years of his life in a hopeless job at a company that soft wipes (the world's second-largest manufacturer and distributor of double-layer toilet paper). However, when Barren receives a mysterious watch that counts down the days of his remaining life, his life undergoes a complete transformation.

text: the second chapter of the harry potter series is even more magical than the first and simply the best family film of the year .
translation: 《哈利·波特》系列的第二章比第一章更具魔力，简直是今年最佳的家庭电影。
back_translation: The second chapter of the "Harry Potter" series is more magical than the first chapter and is simply the best family movie of the year.

text: behind the snow games and lovable siberian huskies ( plus one sheep dog ) , the picture hosts a parka-wrapped dose of heart .
translation: 在雪地游戏和可爱的西伯利亚哈士奇（再加上一只牧羊犬）背后，这幅画面传递了一种裹着外套的暖心情感。
back_translation: Behind the snowy game and the adorable Siberian Huskies (plus a shepherd dog), this scene conveys a warm feeling wrapped in a coat.

text: singer patricia paradise ( dee wallace stone ) has everything : beauty , fame , success , money . . .
translation: 歌手帕特丽夏·帕拉迪斯（迪·华莱士·斯通）拥有一切：美丽、名声、成功、财富……
back_translation: Singer Patricia Paradis (Di Wallace Stone) has it all: beauty, fame, success, and wealth...

text: what if jesus were born in the year 2002 to a young jewish couple in new york city , instead of bethlehem two millennia ago ?
translation: 如果耶稣在2002年出生于纽约市的一对年轻犹太夫妇，而不是两千年前的伯利恒，会怎样呢？
back_translation: What if Jesus was born in 2002 to a young Jewish couple in New York City, instead of Bethlehem two thousand years ago?

text: exploits [ headbanger ] stereotypes in good fun , while adding a bit of heart and unsettling subject matter .
translation: 在欢快的氛围中，利用了[头撞者]的刻板印象，同时加入了一些内心的温暖和不安的主题。
back_translation: In a cheerful atmosphere, it utilized the stereotype of the "head-butter" while incorporating themes of inner warmth and unease.

text: leading his army of women into the surrounding mountain glens , dionysus casts a spell on the city 's females , who abandon their husbands and fathers in order to engage in forbidden revels .
translation: 他带着他的女军队进入周围的山谷，狄俄尼索斯对城市的女性施下一个魔咒，她们抛弃了丈夫和父亲，参与禁忌的狂欢。
back_translation: He led his female army into the surrounding valleys, and Dionysus cast a spell on the women of the city, causing them to abandon their husbands and fathers to partake in the forbidden revelry.

text: the fictional characters become part of the creators world as they appear on the subway with them , imagination becomes reality .
translation: 虚构角色随着他们出现在地铁上，成为创作者世界的一部分，想象变成了现实。
back_translation: Fictional characters become part of the creator's world as they appear in the subway, where imagination turns into reality.

text: carefully crafted , notably in its deft dramatic structuring , and has become timely in a way its maker could never have anticipated .
translation: 精心制作，尤其在其巧妙的戏剧结构上，已经以一种制作者无法预见的方式变得及时。
back_translation: Carefully crafted, especially in its ingenious dramatic structure, has become timely in a way that the creators could not have anticipated.

text: a comedic short about a man flying through mexico who despite not speaking the language meets a pretty girl only to juggle his attention between her and the world 's worst case of 'montezuma 's revenge ' .
translation: 一个喜剧短剧，讲述一个男士在墨西哥飞行，尽管他不会说西班牙语，却遇见了一个漂亮女孩，他不得不在她和世界上最糟糕的“蒙特祖马复仇”之间 juggle。
back_translation: A comedic short play about a man flying in Mexico who, despite not speaking Spanish, encounters a beautiful girl, and he has to juggle between her and the world's worst "Montezuma's Revenge."

text: for all its violence , the movie is remarkably dull with only caine making much of an impression .
translation: 尽管电影充满了暴力，但它却令人惊讶地乏味，只有凯恩给人留下了深刻的印象。
back_translation: Although the film is filled with violence, it is surprisingly dull, with only Kane making a strong impression.

text: follows the original film virtually scene for scene and yet manages to bleed it almost completely dry of humor , verve and fun .
translation: 几乎逐帧重现了原版影片，却几乎完全抽干了幽默、活力和乐趣。
back_translation: It almost recreated the original film frame by frame, yet almost completely drained it of humor, energy, and fun.

text: after an ultimatum from his girlfriend tara ( alison eastwood ) , johnny finally commits to a `` real `` job in the construction business , but is soon miserable there .
translation: 在女朋友塔拉（阿莉森·伊斯特伍德）的最后通牒后，约翰尼终于在建筑行业找到了一份“真正的”工作，但很快在那里感到不快乐。
back_translation: After his girlfriend Tara (Alison Eastwood) gave him an ultimatum, Johnny finally found a "real" job in the construction industry, but soon felt unhappy there.

text: while certainly more naturalistic than its australian counterpart , amari 's film falls short in building the drama of lilia 's journey .
translation: 尽管比其澳大利亚同行更具自然主义色彩，阿玛里这部电影在描绘莉莉亚的旅程的戏剧性方面却显得不足。
back_translation: Despite being more naturalistic than its Australian counterparts, the film Amari falls short in terms of the dramatic portrayal of Liliana's journey.

text: despite dire warnings from his uncle , dean is seduced by the book 's knowledge .
translation: 尽管他的叔叔发出了严厉的警告，迪恩还是被书中的知识所吸引。
back_translation: Despite his uncle's stern warnings, Dean was still captivated by the knowledge in the book.

text: keith bennets ( mark thompson ) mother passed away a year ago , and he feels like he has moved on with his life , until one morning his mothers jewellery shows up on keiths bathroom sink .
translation: 基思·贝内特（马克·汤普森）的母亲一年前去世，他觉得自己已经走出了失去的阴影，直到某个早晨，他母亲的珠宝出现在基思的浴室洗手台上。
back_translation: Keith Bennett's mother, played by Mark Thompson, passed away a year ago. He thought he had moved on from the shadow of loss, until one morning, his mother's jewelry appeared on Keith's bathroom countertop.

text: despite the predictable parent vs . child coming-of-age theme , first-class , natural acting and a look at `` the real americans `` make this a charmer .
translation: 尽管有可预测的父母与孩子成长主题，出色的自然表演以及对“真正的美国人”的观察使这部作品充满魅力。
back_translation: Despite the predictable theme of parents and children growing up, the excellent natural performances and the observations of "real Americans" make this work compelling.

text: as it abruptly crosscuts among the five friends , it fails to lend the characters ' individual stories enough dramatic resonance to make us care about them .
translation: 由于它在五个朋友之间急剧切换，未能赋予角色的个体故事足够的戏剧共鸣，使我们对他们产生关心。
back_translation: Due to its rapid switching between five friends, it fails to give the individual stories of the characters enough dramatic resonance for us to care about them.

text: a film so terrifying - even the monsters are frightened !
translation: 一部令人毛骨悚然的电影——连怪物都感到害怕！
back_translation: A chilling movie - even the monsters are scared!

text: romy dispenses orders like a drill sergeant as they scramble southwest to round up the last two surviving members of eagle 's wwii , b-17 bomber crew .
translation: 罗米像个军士长一样发号施令，他们急忙向西南方赶去，寻找第二次世界大战中老鹰号B-17轰炸机的最后两名幸存成员。
back_translation: Romy issued orders like a sergeant major, and they hurried southwest to search for the last two surviving members of the Eagle B-17 bomber from World War II.

text: at best , cletis tout might inspire a trip to the video store -- in search of a better movie experience .
translation: 充其量，克莱蒂斯·托特可能会激发人们去录像店一趟——寻找更好的电影体验。
back_translation: At best, Cleitis Tote might inspire people to take a trip to the video store in search of a better movie experience.

text: for a movie about the power of poetry and passion , there is precious little of either .
translation: 对于一部关于诗歌和激情力量的电影来说，里面却几乎没有这两者的存在。
back_translation: For a movie about the power of poetry and passion, there is almost none of either present.

text: he also shies away from the shallow young women that he and his friends micke and mario meet at bars .
translation: 他也避开他和朋友米克和马里奥在酒吧遇到的那些肤浅的年轻女性。
back_translation: He also avoided the superficial young women he encountered at the bar with his friends Mick and Mario.

text: the story is set against a relationship that forms between a runaway american teenage boy and a brazilian teenage girl who meet in the drug and gang controlled slums of rio de janeiro .
translation: 故事设定在一个美国逃亡少年与一位巴西少女之间形成的关系，这两人在里约热内卢的毒品和帮派控制的贫民区相遇。
back_translation: The story is set around the relationship formed between an American runaway teenager and a Brazilian girl, who meet in the drug- and gang-controlled slums of Rio de Janeiro.

text: you will emerge with a clearer view of how the gears of justice grind on and the death report comes to share airtime alongside the farm report .
translation: 你将更清晰地看到正义的齿轮是如何运转的，以及死亡报告是如何与农场报告同时播出的。
back_translation: You will see more clearly how the gears of justice operate and how the death reports are broadcast simultaneously with the farm reports.

text: occupied france 1944 : in the castle , their local headquarters , the german officers decide to organize a party .
translation: 1944年占领的法国：在城堡，他们的地方指挥部，德国军官决定组织一个聚会。
back_translation: France occupied in 1944: At the castle, their local command post, the German officers decided to organize a party.

text: but the memories of their time together lingers inside their hearts .
translation: 但他们在一起的回忆仍然萦绕在心中。
back_translation: But the memories of being together still linger in the heart.

text: kids who are into this thornberry stuff will probably be in wedgie heaven . anyone else who may , for whatever reason , be thinking about going to see this movie is hereby given fair warning .
translation: 对这些 Thornberry 忍者少年感兴趣的孩子们可能会觉得如置身于拉裤带的天堂。其他任何因为某种原因考虑去看这部电影的人都在此获得明确警告。
back_translation: Children interested in these Thornberry Ninja Teens may feel as if they are in a paradise of drawstring pants. Anyone else considering watching this movie for any reason is given a clear warning here.

text: however , after an inexplicable letter arrives , any signs of normalcy in his life begin to fade .
translation: 然而，在一封无法解释的信件到达后，他生活中的任何正常迹象开始消失。
back_translation: However, after an inexplicable letter arrived, any signs of normalcy in his life began to disappear.

text: jonathan ecks ( antonio banderas ) , an fbi agent , realizes that he must join with his lifelong enemy , agent sever ( lucy liu ) , a rogue dia agent with whom he is in mortal combat , in order to defeat a common enemy .
translation: 乔纳森·艾克斯（安东尼奥·班达斯）是一名FBI特工，他意识到必须与他的终身敌人，特工塞弗（露西·刘）联合起来，这是一名叛变的DEA特工，他们之间有着生死搏斗，以便击败一个共同的敌人。
back_translation: Jonathan Ax (Antonio Banderas) is an FBI agent who realizes he must team up with his lifelong enemy, Agent Sefer (Lucy Liu), a rogue DEA agent with whom he has had life-and-death battles, in order to defeat a common enemy.

text: completely creatively stillborn and executed in a manner that i 'm not sure could be a single iota worse . . . a soulless hunk of exploitative garbage .
translation: 完全创造性上死胎，并以一种我不确定还能更糟的方式执行……一块无灵魂的剥削垃圾。
back_translation: Completely creatively stillborn, executed in a way that I'm not sure could be worse… a soulless piece of exploitative garbage.

text: as animation increasingly emphasizes the computer and the cool , this is a film that takes a stand in favor of tradition and warmth .
translation: 随着动画越来越强调计算机和酷炫，这部电影则站在传统和温暖的一方。
back_translation: As animation increasingly emphasizes computers and cool effects, this film stands on the side of tradition and warmth.

text: the characters , cast in impossibly contrived situations , are totally estranged from reality .
translation: 这些角色置身于极其矫揉造作的情境中，完全脱离了现实。
back_translation: These characters are placed in extremely contrived situations, completely detached from reality.

text: in the end , white oleander is n't an adaptation of a novel . it 's a flashy , star-splashed reduction .
translation: 最后，《白色栀子花》并不是一部小说改编作品，而是一个炫目的、充满明星效应的缩减版。
back_translation: In the end, "White Gardenia" is not an adaptation of a novel, but a dazzling, star-studded condensed version.

text: guaranteed to move anyone who ever shook , rattled , or rolled .
translation: 保证能感动那些曾经摇晃、颤动或滚动过的人。
back_translation: Ensure that it can touch those who have once swayed, trembled, or rolled.
