text: will tom be able to persuade his naturally cautious and terminally confused fianc & # 233 ; e to work through all the damage and chaos ?
translation: 汤姆能否说服他天生谨慎且永远困惑的未婚妻一起解决所有的伤害和混乱？
back_translation: Can Tom convince his naturally cautious and perpetually confused fiancée to work through all the hurt and chaos together?

text: when fran , ( paige turco ) walks into the prop house where he lives looking for unusual objects , chep immediately develops a crush .
translation: 当弗兰（佩奇·图尔科）走进他居住的道具屋寻找奇特物品时，切普立刻心生爱慕。
back_translation: When Fran (Paige Turco) walked into the props house where he lived in search of unusual items, Chip immediately fell in love.

text: the first question to ask about bad company is why anthony hopkins is in it . we assume he had a bad run in the market or a costly divorce , because there is no earthly reason other than money why this distinguished actor would stoop so low .
translation: 关于《坏公司》的第一个问题是为什么安东尼·霍普金斯会参演这部电影。我们假设他在市场上遭遇了不好的行情或经历了一次昂贵的离婚，因为除了钱之外，没有任何理由能解释这位杰出的演员为何会降格如此。
back_translation: The first question about "Bad Company" is why Anthony Hopkins participated in this movie. We assume he encountered a bad market situation or went through an expensive divorce, because beyond money, there seems to be no other reason to explain why this outstanding actor would lower himself to such a level.

text: upon arriving in los reyes , the ambitious father amaro meets amelia , a beautiful 16-year-old girl whose religious devotion soon becomes helplessly entangles in a growing attraction to the new priest .
translation: 在洛斯雷耶斯到达后，雄心勃勃的阿马罗父亲遇见了艾米莉亚，一个美丽的16岁女孩，她的宗教信仰很快被对新牧师日益增长的吸引所困扰。
back_translation: After arriving in Los Reyes, the ambitious father Amaro met Emilia, a beautiful 16-year-old girl, whose religious faith was soon troubled by her growing attraction to the new priest.

text: a gratingly unfunny groaner littered with zero-dimensional , unlikable characters and hackneyed , threadbare comic setups .
translation: 一部让人感到刺耳的无趣之作，充斥着毫无深度、让人厌恶的角色和陈腐、乏味的喜剧情节。
back_translation: A painfully dull work filled with shallow, detestable characters and clichéd, tedious comedic plots.

text: as the geological fracture deepens and widens , the european community begins to disassociate itself from the calamity , and panic ensues among tourists and residents attempting to escape .
translation: 随着地质裂缝的加深和扩展，欧洲共同体开始与灾难脱离关系，试图逃离的游客和居民之间随之出现恐慌。
back_translation: As geological fissures deepened and expanded, the European Community began to detach itself from the disaster, leading to panic among the fleeing tourists and residents.

text: unfortunately , the experience of actually watching the movie is less compelling than the circumstances of its making .
translation: 不幸的是，实际上观看这部电影的体验比其制作过程所带来的情境要逊色。
back_translation: Unfortunately, the experience of actually watching this movie is inferior to the context brought by its production process.

text: set against the bright lights of manhattan , a tale which takes a comic , urbane look at the modern male ego at war in the singles scene trenches .
translation: 在曼哈顿闪亮的灯光下，这个故事以一种幽默而都市的视角，探讨现代男性自我在单身场景战壕中的斗争。
back_translation: Under the bright lights of Manhattan, this story humorously and urbanely explores the struggles of the modern male self in the trenches of the single scene.

text: but before he is able to set out on his expedition , the professor , along with the tablet , are taken hostage by a group of mercenaries , led by the vicious philipe gallo .
translation: 但在他能够踏上探险之旅之前，教授和那块石板被一群由恶毒的菲利普·加洛领导的雇佣兵绑架了。
back_translation: But before he could embark on the adventure, the professor and the stone tablet were kidnapped by a group of mercenaries led by the wicked Philip Gallo.

text: the movie mixes the personal life of the ancestors of this man as well as historical moments for m & # 233 ; xico such as the reform war , the mexican revolution , etc . arc & # 225 ; ngel ca n't sleep .
translation: 电影将这个人的祖先的个人生活与墨西哥的历史时刻混合在一起，如改革战争、墨西哥革命等。阿尔坎赫尔无法入睡。
back_translation: The film intertwines this person's ancestral personal life with historical moments in Mexico, such as the Reform War and the Mexican Revolution. Arcanhel is unable to sleep.

text: pronounced cured , she became a psychoanalyst herself and , within eight years , was practising alongside the founding fathers .
translation: 她被宣布治愈后，自己成为了一名精神分析师，并在八年内与创始人们一起执业。
back_translation: After she was declared cured, she became a psychoanalyst and practiced alongside the founders for eight years.

text: this causes duncan 's father ( jenkins ) further grief , who does n't understand his son 's unusual mourning rituals .
translation: 这使得邓肯的父亲（詹金斯）更加痛苦，他无法理解儿子异常的哀悼仪式。
back_translation: This made Duncan's father (Jenkins) even more painful, as he could not understand his son's unusual mourning ritual.

text: the ill-conceived modern-day ending falls flat where it should deliver a moral punch .
translation: 这个构思不周的现代结局在应该传达道德冲击的地方显得苍白无力。
back_translation: This poorly conceived modern ending appears pale and powerless in the place where it should convey a moral impact.

text: the tenement is a four story anthology that in which each of its characters live within the same building and walk a fine line between good and evil .
translation: 《公寓》是一部四层的选集，其中的每个角色都生活在同一栋建筑里，他们在善与恶之间走着一条细微的界限。
back_translation: "The Apartment" is a four-layered anthology where each character lives in the same building, walking a fine line between good and evil.

text: dr . singh ( amitabh bachchan ) a senior doctor raise funds to fulfil his dream of having a state-of-the-art hospital .
translation: 辛格医生（阿密塔布·巴强）是一位高级医生，他筹集资金以实现拥有一所现代化医院的梦想。
back_translation: Dr. Singer (Amitabh Bachchan) is a senior doctor who raises funds to realize his dream of having a modern hospital.

text: henry bean 's thoughtful screenplay provides no easy answers , but offers a compelling investigation of faith versus intellect
translation: 亨利·比恩深思熟虑的剧本没有提供简单的答案，但提供了对信仰与理智之间的引人入胜的探讨。
back_translation: Henry Bean's thoughtful screenplay does not provide simple answers but offers an engaging exploration of the relationship between faith and reason.

text: it 's not that kung pow is n't funny some of the time -- it just is n't any funnier than bad martial arts movies are all by themselves , without all oedekerk 's impish augmentation .
translation: 并不是说《功夫熊猫》有时不好笑——只是它的搞笑程度并没有比那些糟糕的武侠电影更高，没有奥德克的顽皮修饰。
back_translation: It's not that "Kung Fu Panda" is sometimes not funny—it's just that its level of humor is not higher than that of those terrible martial arts movies, lacking the playful embellishments of Audeck.

text: has the kitsch appeal of a farm implement on a restaurant wall , or an andy warhol mao poster : interesting , but not for its original purpose .
translation: 具有农具挂在餐厅墙上的庸俗魅力，或者安迪·沃霍尔的毛泽东海报：有趣，但并非出于其原始用途。
back_translation: With a vulgar charm of farming tools hanging on the restaurant wall, or Andy Warhol's Mao Zedong poster: interesting, but not for their original purpose.

text: without getting grand or preachy , the sprechers use an unconventional approach to coax us into asking ourselves fundamental questions .
translation: 在不夸张或说教的情况下，讲者采用了一种非传统的方法，引导我们自问一些根本性的问题。
back_translation: Without exaggeration or preaching, the speaker adopted an unconventional approach, leading us to ask ourselves some fundamental questions.

text: battling his own demons he realizes he is just like the rest of us : good and evil .
translation: 与自己内心的恶魔斗争，他意识到自己和我们其他人一样：既有善良也有邪恶。
back_translation: In the struggle against the demons within himself, he realized that he is just like the rest of us: capable of both good and evil.

text: ben is a perfectionist and overachiever whose tunnel vision leads to nothing less than graduating at the top of his class .
translation: 本是一个完美主义者和超越者，他的目光集中在目标上，最终以优异的成绩毕业于班级之首。
back_translation: He was originally a perfectionist and an overachiever, focused on his goals, and eventually graduated at the top of his class with excellent results.

text: the movie fails to portray its literarily talented and notorious subject as anything much more than a dirty old man .
translation: 这部电影未能将其文学才华横溢且臭名昭著的主题描绘得更为深刻，只是将其呈现为一个肮脏的老头。
back_translation: The film fails to portray its literary prowess and notorious themes in a deeper way, merely presenting them as a dirty old man.

text: while gertie is able to manipulate ollie with the finesse of an adult , she is ultimately daddy 's little girl .
translation: 虽然格提能够像成人一样巧妙地操控奥利，但她最终还是爸爸的小女孩。
back_translation: Although Gertie can skillfully manipulate Ollie like an adult, she is ultimately still daddy's little girl.

text: it makes me feel weird / thinking about all the bad things in the world / like puppies with broken legs / and butterflies that die / and movies starring pop queens
translation: 这让我感到奇怪 / 思考这个世界上所有糟糕的事情 / 比如腿受伤的小狗 / 和死去的蝴蝶 / 还有以流行女王为主角的电影
back_translation: This makes me feel strange / Thinking about all the bad things in this world / Like the injured puppy / And the dead butterflies / And movies with pop queens as the main characters.

text: [ a ] superbly controlled , passionate adaptation of graham greene 's 1955 novel .
translation: 对格雷厄姆·格林1955年小说的完美控制和充满激情的改编。
back_translation: A perfect control and passionate adaptation of Graham Greene's 1955 novel.

text: his attempt at becoming a lefty leads to an interesting turn of events which suggest that he may be at the start of a never-ending cycle .
translation: 他试图成为一个左撇子的努力导致了一系列有趣的事件，这暗示着他可能正处于一场永无止境循环的开始。
back_translation: His attempt to become left-handed led to a series of interesting events, suggesting that he might be at the beginning of an endless cycle.

text: marisa ventura ( lopez ) is a single mother born and bred in the boroughs of new york city , who works as a maid in a first-class manhattan hotel .
translation: 玛丽莎·文图拉（洛佩兹）是一位在纽约市各区土生土长的单身母亲，现为一家曼哈顿顶级酒店的女佣。
back_translation: Marisa Ventura (Lopez) is a native single mother from the boroughs of New York City, currently working as a maid in a top hotel in Manhattan.

text: meanwhile , on a distant planet , alien authorities have captured the most dangerous of all criminals and are sending him via rocket to a prison planet .
translation: 与此同时，在一个遥远的星球上，外星当局抓获了所有罪犯中最危险的，并正通过火箭将他送往一个监狱星球。
back_translation: Meanwhile, on a distant planet, the alien authorities have captured the most dangerous of all criminals and are sending him to a prison planet via rocket.

text: for escape he paints the visions that haunt him , while eleanor sends all of his hard earned money to a seedy tele-evangelist .
translation: 为了逃避，他画出缠绕着他的幻影，而埃莉诺则把他辛苦挣来的钱全都寄给一个低级的电视布道者。
back_translation: To escape, he drew the phantom that entangled him, while Eleanor sent all of his hard-earned money to a low-level television evangelist.

text: in harlem , martin blaze , a writer for vibe , thinks he 's a loser since his fianc & # 233 ; e cheated on him .
translation: 在哈莱姆，作家马丁·布雷兹（Martin Blaze）认为自己是个失败者，因为他的未婚妻背叛了他。
back_translation: In Harlem, writer Martin Blaze considers himself a failure because his fiancée betrayed him.

text: no movement , no yuks , not much of anything .
translation: 没有动静，没有笑声，几乎没有任何事情。
back_translation: There was no movement, no laughter, and almost nothing happening at all.

text: a by-the-numbers effort that wo n't do much to enhance the franchise .
translation: 一项按部就班的努力，无法对该系列的提升产生太大作用。
back_translation: A step-by-step effort cannot have a significant impact on the improvement of the series.

text: an enchanting spectacular for potter fans anxious to ride the hogwarts express toward a new year of magic and mischief .
translation: 一个迷人的盛宴，专为那些渴望乘坐霍格沃茨特快列车，迎接新一年魔法与恶作剧的哈利·波特粉丝们准备。
back_translation: A captivating feast, specially prepared for those eager to board the Hogwarts Express and embrace a new year of magic and mischief, for Harry Potter fans.

text: new arrival alden pyle ( brendan fraser ) , an idealistic american aid worker , befriends london times correspondent thomas fowler ( michael caine ) .
translation: 新抵达的阿尔登·派尔（布兰登·弗雷泽饰）是一名理想主义的美国援助工作者，他与《泰晤士报》记者托马斯·福勒（迈克尔·凯恩饰）成为朋友。
back_translation: The newly arrived Alden Pyle (played by Brendan Fraser) is an idealistic American aid worker who becomes friends with Thomas Fowler (played by Michael Caine), a journalist from The Times.

text: there are things to like about murder by numbers -- but , in the end , the disparate elements do n't gel .
translation: 《数字谋杀》中有一些值得喜欢的地方，但最终，不同的元素并没有融合在一起。
back_translation: There are some likable aspects in "Digital Murder," but in the end, the different elements did not come together.

text: lando , after knowing the situation , attempted to kill roman .
translation: 兰多在了解情况后，试图杀死罗曼。
back_translation: Lando, after understanding the situation, attempted to kill Roman.

text: it 's rare to find a film to which the adjective 'gentle ' applies , but the word perfectly describes pauline & paulette .
translation: 很少能找到一个适合用“温柔”这个形容词来形容的电影，但这个词完美地描述了《保琳和宝丽特》。
back_translation: It is rare to find a movie that can be described with the adjective "gentle," but this word perfectly describes "Pauline and Paulette."

text: seeking a mental escape , simone begins to tune into what 's happening with the other couples around her .
translation: 寻找心理上的逃避，西蒙开始关注周围其他情侣的情况。
back_translation: In search of psychological escape, Simon began to pay attention to the situations of other couples around him.

text: vera 's technical prowess ends up selling his film short ; he smoothes over hard truths even as he uncovers them .
translation: 维拉的技术才华使他的电影受到限制；尽管他揭示了硬真相，但却对其进行美化。
back_translation: Vera's technical talent limited his films; although he revealed harsh truths, he beautified them.

text: filmmaker rick mckay documents actor/illusionist james beaman 's transformation from an attractive young actor to the legendary icon marlene dietrich .
translation: 电影制作人里克·麦凯记录了演员/幻术师詹姆斯·比曼从一个有吸引力的年轻演员转变为传奇偶像玛琳·迪特里希的过程。
back_translation: Filmmaker Rick McKay documents the transformation of actor/magician James Biman from an attractive young actor into the legendary icon Marlene Dietrich.

text: a take on the classic tale 'the boy who cried wolf ' , 'big fat liar ' is about a 14-year-old boy named jason shephard ( frankie muniz ) who lies for the fun of it .
translation: 《大胖子骗子》是对经典故事《喊狼来了》的改编，讲述了一个14岁男孩杰森·谢泼德（弗兰基·穆尼斯饰），他因乐趣而撒谎。
back_translation: "The Big Fat Liar" is an adaptation of the classic story "The Boy Who Cried Wolf," telling the story of a 14-year-old boy named Jason Shepherd (played by Frankie Muniz), who lies for fun.

text: with the prospect of films like kangaroo jack about to burst across america 's winter movie screens it 's a pleasure to have a film like the hours as an alternative .
translation: 随着像《袋鼠杰克》这样的电影即将在美国的冬季电影银幕上上映，能有《时间》的电影作为替代品真是一种享受。
back_translation: With movies like "Kangaroo Jack" set to hit the winter movie screens in the U.S., having a film like "Time" as an alternative is truly a delight.

text: shot on wide screen digibeta , sendak with his night kitchen theater partner , arthur yorinks and pilobolus artistic directors robby barnett , michael tracy , and jonathan wolken shows us the tenacity and wit that drive the creative process when serious artists work together .
translation: 在宽银幕数码带上拍摄，塞达克与他的夜间厨房剧院伙伴亚瑟·尤林克斯以及皮洛伯鲁斯艺术总监罗比·巴内特、迈克尔·特雷西和乔纳森·沃尔肯向我们展示了当严肃艺术家们共同工作时，推动创作过程的韧性和智慧。
back_translation: Sedicak, along with his nighttime kitchen theater partner Arthur Joulinks and Pilobolus art directors Robby Barnett, Michael Tracy, and Jonathan Wolken, showcases the resilience and wisdom that drive the creative process when serious artists collaborate, filmed in widescreen digital format.

text: uneven but ultimately appealing satire of the dreck we call white man 's rap music . some good performances and an often goofy script make for a generally good time .
translation: 不平衡但最终具有吸引力的讽刺作品，针对我们所称之为白人说唱音乐的垃圾。一些出色的表演和通常搞笑的剧本使整体体验相当愉快。
back_translation: An unbalanced yet ultimately captivating satirical piece targeting what we call white rap music trash. Some outstanding performances and generally humorous scripts make the overall experience quite enjoyable.

text: wes craven 's presence is felt ; not the craven of 'a nightmare on elm street ' or 'the hills have eyes , ' but the sad schlock merchant of 'deadly friend . '
translation: 韦斯·克雷文的存在感依然显著；不是那部《猛鬼街》或《山丘之眼》的克雷文，而是《致命朋友》中的悲惨低俗商人。
back_translation: Wes Craven's presence remains significant; not the Craven of "A Nightmare on Elm Street" or "The Hills Have Eyes," but the tragic, vulgar businessman in "Deadly Friend."

text: a splendid entertainment , young in spirit but accomplished in all aspects with the fullness of spirit and sense of ease that comes only with experience .
translation: 一种精彩的娱乐，年轻的精神却在各个方面都十分成熟，充满了只有通过经验才能获得的精神丰盈和轻松感。
back_translation: A wonderful form of entertainment, with a youthful spirit that is, in every aspect, very mature, filled with a richness and ease that can only be gained through experience.

text: evil czar and his no-less-evil sidekick general with the help of the local witch yaga try to eliminate fedot by giving him more and more complex quests and to take marusya to tsar 's palace .
translation: 邪恶的沙皇和他同样邪恶的助手将军在当地女巫雅加的帮助下，试图通过给费多特设定越来越复杂的任务来消灭他，并将马鲁西娅带到沙皇的宫殿。
back_translation: The evil tsar and his equally evil assistant, the general, with the help of the local witch Yaga, are trying to eliminate Fedot by assigning him increasingly complex tasks and bring Marusya to the tsar's palace.

text: before they can begin repairing and towing the ghost ship towards harbor , the crew encounters a series of bizarre ocurrences , and the group becomes trapped inside the ship .
translation: 在他们能够开始修理和拖曳幽灵船前往港口之前，船员们遇到了一系列奇怪的事件，团队被困在船内。
back_translation: Before they could start repairing and towing the ghost ship to the port, the crew encountered a series of strange events, leaving the team trapped on the ship.

text: kimberly corman , 19 , was just taking a trip with her friends . .
translation: 金伯利·科曼，19岁，只是在和她的朋友们一起旅行。
back_translation: Kimberly Koeman, 19, was just traveling with her friends.

text: her harrowing story ends in victory , but she has not forgotten the thousands of asylum seekers who remain in detention today .
translation: 她那令人痛心的故事以胜利结束，但她没有忘记今天仍然被拘留的数千名寻求庇护者。
back_translation: Her heartbreaking story ends in victory, but she has not forgotten the thousands of asylum seekers who are still detained today.

text: the best way to describe it is as a cross between paul thomas anderson 's magnolia and david lynch 's mulholland dr .
translation: 最好的描述方式是将其称为保罗·托马斯·安德森的《大 Magnolia》和大卫·林奇的《穆赫兰道》的结合。
back_translation: The best way to describe it is as a combination of Paul Thomas Anderson's "Magnolia" and David Lynch's "Mulholland Drive."

text: in 1959 , berry gordy jr . gathered the best musicians from detroit 's thriving jazz and blues scene to begin cutting songs for his new record company .
translation: 1959年，贝里·戈迪 Jr. 聚集了底特律蓬勃发展的爵士乐和蓝调场景中最优秀的音乐人，为他的新唱片公司开始录制歌曲。
back_translation: In 1959, Berry Gordy Jr. gathered the finest musicians from Detroit's thriving jazz and blues scene to start recording songs for his new record company.

text: maggie is a young cuban-american freelance writer who takes an eye opening trip back to her roots and meets a young enchanting native , mateo .
translation: 玛吉是一位年轻的古巴裔美国自由撰稿人，她进行了一次发人深省的旅行回到自己的根，并遇到了一位迷人的年轻土著，马特奥。
back_translation: Maggie is a young Cuban-American freelance writer who embarked on a thought-provoking journey back to her roots and encountered a charming young indigenous man, Mateo.

text: haneke keeps us at arm 's length . guided more by intellect than heart , his story flattens instead of sharpens .
translation: 哈内克让我们保持距离。他更受理智的驱动而非内心情感，他的故事让人感到平淡而不是尖锐。
back_translation: Haneke keeps us at a distance. He is driven more by reason than by inner emotions, and his stories feel bland rather than sharp.

text: so vivid a portrait of a woman consumed by lust and love and crushed by betrayal that it conjures up the intoxicating fumes and emotional ghosts of a freshly painted rembrandt .
translation: 如此生动的肖像描绘了一位被欲望与爱情吞噬、被背叛压垮的女性，仿佛让人想起新近描绘的伦勃朗作品中迷人的烟雾和情感的幽灵。
back_translation: This vivid portrait depicts a woman consumed by desire and love, crushed by betrayal, evoking the charming smoke and emotional ghosts found in recent paintings by Rembrandt.

text: in singapore , that means that at the age of 12 , the government has decided that they are not as academically inclined as their peers .
translation: 在新加坡，这意味着在12岁时，政府已经决定他们的学业能力不如同龄人。
back_translation: In Singapore, this means that by the age of 12, the government has already decided that their academic ability is not as good as their peers.

text: all while jolynn is persued by a masculine , toothpick chewing sheriff .
translation: 与此同时，乔琳被一个嚼着牙签的男性警长追逐。
back_translation: Meanwhile, Jolyn was being chased by a male sheriff who was chewing on a toothpick.

text: [ the film ] tackles the topic of relationships in such a straightforward , emotionally honest manner that by the end , it 's impossible to ascertain whether the film is , at its core , deeply pessimistic or quietly hopeful .
translation: [这部电影] 以如此直接、情感真诚的方式探讨了人际关系的话题，以至于到最后，人们难以判断这部电影在核心上是深度悲观还是默默充满希望。
back_translation: This film explores the topic of interpersonal relationships in such a direct and emotionally sincere way that, by the end, it becomes difficult for viewers to determine whether the film is fundamentally deeply pessimistic or quietly filled with hope.

text: krueger is able to disguise himself as pamela voorhees , and instructs jason to start murdering on elm street upon his resurrection , therefore restoring freddy 's power as well .
translation: 克鲁格能够伪装成帕梅拉·沃希斯，并指示杰森在复活后开始在艾尔姆街杀人，从而恢复弗雷迪的力量。
back_translation: Krueger was able to disguise himself as Pamela Voorhees and instruct Jason to start killing on Elm Street after being resurrected, thereby restoring Freddy's power.

text: unfortunately , the evil tall man ( angus scrimm ) controls that area .
translation: 不幸的是，邪恶的高个子男人（安格斯·斯克里姆）控制着那个地区。
back_translation: Unfortunately, the evil tall man (Angus Skrim) controls that area.

text: takes a simple premise and carries it to unexpected heights .
translation: 以一个简单的前提为基础，将其推向意想不到的高度。
back_translation: Based on a simple premise, take it to unexpected heights.

text: ruby acts out these scenes in real life with the men and shares her spoils with her sisters .
translation: 鲁比在现实生活中与那些男人演绎这些场景，并与她的姐妹们分享她的战利品。
back_translation: Ruby plays out these scenes with those men in real life and shares her spoils with her sisters.

text: we get some truly unique character studies and a cross-section of americana that hollywood could n't possibly fictionalize and be believed .
translation: 我们获得了一些真正独特的人物研究以及美国生活的一个横截面，而好莱坞不可能虚构出来并让人信服。
back_translation: We have acquired some truly unique character studies and a cross-section of American life that Hollywood could not possibly fabricate and make believable.

text: in this refreshingly shameless celebration of money and expensive stuff , director kevin bray grabs every retro action-film clichM-i .
translation: 在这部清新大胆地庆祝金钱和奢侈品的作品中，导演凯文·布雷抓住了每一个复古动作片的陈词滥调。
back_translation: In this fresh and bold celebration of money and luxury, director Kevin Bray captures every cliché of retro action films.

text: the result is a chronicle of the shift from a world organized by the principles of nature to one dominated by technology , the synthetic and the virtual .
translation: 结果是一个从自然原则组织的世界转变到一个被技术、合成和虚拟主导的世界的编年史。
back_translation: The result is a chronicle of the transition from a world organized by natural principles to one dominated by technology, synthesis, and the virtual.

text: as they each play out their own con , the line between rescuer and executioner , betrayer and martyr become blurred and they must learn to trust each other in order to survive .
translation: 随着他们各自展开自己的骗局，救赎者与处决者、背叛者与殉道者之间的界限变得模糊，他们必须学会相互信任以求生存。
back_translation: As they each unfold their own schemes, the boundaries between redeemers and executioners, betrayers and martyrs become blurred, and they must learn to trust each other in order to survive.

text: over a fourteen year period they were the heartbeat on every hit from motown 's detroit era .
translation: 在十四年的时间里，他们是每一首来自摩城底特律时代的热门歌曲的心跳。
back_translation: For fourteen years, they were the heartbeat of every hit song from the Motown Detroit era.

text: leoncio 's son robert and daughter marites disapprove of their father 's single-handed decision , leading to a conflict that causes the old man 's fatal heart attack .
translation: 莱昂西奥的儿子罗伯特和女儿马里特斯反对父亲单方面的决策，这导致了一场冲突，最终导致老人心脏病发作致命。
back_translation: Leoncio's son Robert and daughter Marites opposed their father's unilateral decisions, which led to a conflict that ultimately resulted in the old man's fatal heart attack.

text: this epic film , eschewing dialogue and conventional narrative logic , tells a gripping tale of biological drama through a highly improbable series of evocative images , superb acting and editing , and haunting music .
translation: 这部史诗般的电影摒弃了对话和传统叙事逻辑，通过一系列高度不可能的生动画面、出色的演技和剪辑，以及令人难以忘怀的音乐，讲述了一个引人入胜的生物戏剧故事。
back_translation: This epic film abandons dialogue and traditional narrative logic, telling a captivating biological drama through a series of highly improbable vivid images, excellent performances and editing, as well as unforgettable music.

text: if you sometimes like to go to the movies to have fun , wasabi is a good place to start .
translation: 如果你有时喜欢去电影院娱乐，芥末是一个不错的开始。
back_translation: If you sometimes enjoy going to the cinema for entertainment, mustard is a good start.

text: when she fails to find the `` perfect man `` that will make her happy , she decides to construct him herself , using parts from different people .
translation: 当她无法找到能让她快乐的“完美男人”时，她决定自己制造一个，用不同人的部分组合而成。
back_translation: When she couldn't find the "perfect man" who could make her happy, she decided to create one herself, assembled from parts of different people.

text: but sue , angry and feeling abandoned by lynn , decides to carry out the killing herself .
translation: 但是苏，愤怒并感到被琳抛弃，决定自己动手杀人。
back_translation: However, Su, feeling angry and abandoned by Lin, decided to take matters into his own hands and kill.

text: emma 's a succesful sale agent for a home security company , due in part to being the police chief 's daughter .
translation: 艾玛是一个成功的家庭安全公司的销售代理，这在一定程度上得益于她是警察局长的女儿。
back_translation: Emma is a successful sales agent for a home security company, which is partly due to her being the daughter of the police chief.

text: culkin , who 's in virtually every scene , shines as a young man who uses sarcastic lies like a shield .
translation: 卡尔金在几乎每个场景中都闪耀着光芒，饰演一个用讽刺的谎言作为盾牌的年轻人。
back_translation: Kalkin shines in almost every scene, playing a young man who uses ironic lies as a shield.

text: not only better than its predecessor , it may rate as the most magical and most fun family fare of this or any recent holiday season .
translation: 不仅比前作更好，它可能是这个或任何最近假日季节中最具魔力和最有趣的家庭娱乐。
back_translation: Not only is it better than its predecessor, it may be the most magical and enjoyable family entertainment of this or any recent holiday season.

text: just one more collection of penis , breast and flatulence gags in search of a story . or a profit . or some damn thing .
translation: 再收集一组关于阴茎、乳房和放屁的笑话，寻求一个故事，或者盈利，或者其他什么该死的东西。
back_translation: Collect another set of jokes about penises, breasts, and farting, looking for a story, or profit, or some other damn thing.

text: this odd , poetic road movie , spiked by jolts of pop music , pretty much takes place in morton 's ever-watchful gaze -- and it 's a tribute to the actress , and to her inventive director , that the journey is such a mesmerizing one .
translation: 这部奇特而富有诗意的公路电影，伴随着流行音乐的激荡，几乎全部在摩顿那双时刻关注的目光下展开——这不仅是对女演员的致敬，也是对她那富有创造力的导演的赞美，旅程令人着迷。
back_translation: This peculiar and poetic road movie unfolds almost entirely under the watchful gaze of Morton, accompanied by the stirring of pop music—it's not only a tribute to the actress but also a praise for her creative director, making the journey captivating.

text: if you 're a crocodile hunter fan , you 'll enjoy at least the `` real `` portions of the film . if you 're looking for a story , do n't bother .
translation: 如果你是鳄鱼猎人的粉丝，你会至少喜欢电影中“真实”的部分。如果你在寻找故事，那就别费心了。
back_translation: If you are a fan of crocodile hunters, you will at least enjoy the "real" parts of the movie. If you are looking for a story, then don't bother.

text: true love is right around the corner as long as he does n't lose sight of what he 's looking for .
translation: 真爱就在拐角处，前提是他不要失去对自己所寻找的东西的视线。
back_translation: True love is just around the corner, as long as he doesn't lose sight of what he is looking for.

text: after several fruitless attempts to sell the car , shirley dumps johnny , who has hopelessly fallen in love with her .
translation: 经过几次无果的尝试出售汽车后，雪莉抛弃了约翰尼，后者已经无可救药地爱上了她。
back_translation: After several unsuccessful attempts to sell the car, Sherry abandoned Johnny, who had hopelessly fallen in love with her.

text: dr . kanna & # 38 ; rupi are childhood lovers and made for each other .
translation: 康纳医生和鲁皮是青梅竹马，非常相配。
back_translation: Dr. Connor and Rupi are childhood friends and are a perfect match.

text: there is something in full frontal , i guess , about artifice and acting and how it distorts reality for people who make movies and watch them , but like most movie riddles , it works only if you have an interest in the characters you see .
translation: 在《全景》中，我想有一些关于虚构和表演的内容，以及它如何扭曲那些制作和观看电影的人们的现实，但是像大多数电影谜题一样，只有当你对所看到的角色感兴趣时，它才有意义。
back_translation: In "Panorama," I want to include some content about fiction and performance, and how it distorts the reality of those who create and watch films. However, like most film puzzles, it only makes sense when you are interested in the characters you see.

text: armed with a game supporting cast , from the pitch-perfect forster to the always hilarious meara and levy , like mike shoots and scores , doing its namesake proud .
translation: 凭借出色的配角阵容，从完美的福斯特到总是令人捧腹的梅拉和莱维，《如迈克》射门得分，名副其实。
back_translation: With an outstanding supporting cast, from the perfect Foster to the always hilarious Mela and Levy, "Like Mike" scores high, living up to its name.

text: forced to move back to his old job at a pizza parlor and into a rundown tenement where a number of oddballs wander the hall including a lonely middle aged woman ( mary coleston ) who makes spam casseroles for all the bachelors , a daffy prostitute ( krystina carson ) , and a spanish don juan ( manual cabra ) who wanders the halls in his bathrobe .
translation: 被迫回到他在披萨店的旧工作，搬进了一栋破旧的公寓，走廊里游荡着一些古怪的人，包括一位孤独的中年妇女（玛丽·科尔斯顿），她为所有的单身汉做火腿砂锅；一位疯狂的妓女（克里斯蒂娜·卡森）；以及一位西班牙的唐璜（曼努埃尔·卡布拉），他穿着浴袍在走廊里游荡。
back_translation: Forced to return to his old job at the pizza place, he moved into a run-down apartment building, where some eccentric people roamed the hallways, including a lonely middle-aged woman (Mary Colston) who made ham casseroles for all the bachelors; a crazy prostitute (Christina Carson); and a Spanish don Juan (Manuel Cabra) who wandered the halls in his bathrobe.

text: we ca n't accuse kung pow for misfiring , since it is exactly what it wants to be : an atrociously , mind-numbingly , indescribably bad movie . unfortunately , we 'd prefer a simple misfire .
translation: 我们不能指责《功夫激战》失误，因为这正是它想要成为的：一部令人厌恶、令人麻木、无法形容的糟糕电影。不幸的是，我们更希望它只是一次简单的失误。
back_translation: We cannot blame "Kung Fu Combat" for its mistakes, because this is exactly what it aims to be: a repulsive, numbing, and indescribably bad movie. Unfortunately, we would prefer it to be just a simple failure.

text: hardly an objective documentary , but it 's great cinematic polemic . . . love moore or loathe him , you 've got to admire . . . the intensity with which he 's willing to express his convictions .
translation: 几乎不是一部客观的纪录片，但它是一部极好的电影论战……无论你是喜欢摩尔还是厌恶他，你都必须钦佩……他愿意表达自己信念的强烈程度。
back_translation: It is hardly an objective documentary, but it is a great cinematic debate... Whether you like Moore or despise him, you must admire... the intensity with which he is willing to express his beliefs.

text: lauren ambrose comes alive under the attention from two strangers in town - with honest performances and realistic interaction between the characters , this is a coming-of-age story with a twist .
translation: 劳伦·安布罗斯在城里两个陌生人的关注下焕发活力 - 通过真实的表演和角色之间的现实互动，这是一部带有转折的成长故事。
back_translation: Lauren Ambrose shines in the spotlight of two strangers in town - through genuine performances and the realistic interactions between characters, this is a coming-of-age story with a twist.

text: these four will collide in a titanic battle to determine the fate of the world .
translation: 这四者将在一场巨大的战斗中相遇，以决定世界的命运。
back_translation: These four will meet in a great battle to determine the fate of the world.

text: ya-yas everywhere will forgive the flaws and love the film .
translation: 到处都是ya-yas，会原谅缺陷并热爱这部电影。
back_translation: There are ya-yas everywhere, forgiving flaws and loving this movie.

text: baaba andoh fled ghana in fear for her life , when her long-lost father tried to force her to undergo female genital mutilation .
translation: 巴巴·安多在她失散多年的父亲试图强迫她接受女性生殖器切割时，因害怕自己的生命而逃离加纳。
back_translation: Baba Ando fled Ghana out of fear for her life when her estranged father tried to force her to undergo female genital mutilation.

text: it 's also clear from the start that the transporter is running purely on adrenaline , and once the initial high wears off , the film 's shortcomings start to shine through .
translation: 从一开始就很明显，这部电影的推土机完全依赖于肾上腺素，一旦最初的快感消退，影片的缺陷就开始显露出来。
back_translation: From the very beginning, it was obvious that this movie's bulldozer completely relies on adrenaline; once the initial thrill fades, the film's flaws begin to emerge.

text: she marches coldly through her day , ignoring him , going about her business .
translation: 她冷冷地走过她的一天，忽视他，忙于自己的事。
back_translation: She coldly went about her day, ignoring him, busy with her own affairs.

text: from classrooms to dorm rooms , it 's hard to keep it together when you ca n't even find the door .
translation: 从教室到宿舍，当你连门都找不到时，很难保持镇定。
back_translation: It's hard to stay calm when you can't even find the door from the classroom to the dormitory.

text: diane lane works nothing short of a minor miracle in unfaithful .
translation: 黛安·莱恩在《不忠》中展现了不亚于小奇迹的演技。
back_translation: Diane Lane delivers a performance in "Unfaithful" that is nothing short of a small miracle.

text: will graham must risk his family 's security and his own safety to track down this one last murderer - the epitome of all evil - the red dragon .
translation: 威尔·格雷厄姆必须冒着家人的安全和自己安全的风险，追踪这最后一个杀人犯——所有邪恶的化身——红龙。
back_translation: Will Graham must risk the safety of his family and himself to track down the last murderer—the embodiment of all evil—the Red Dragon.

text: spider-man is in the same category as x-men - occasionally brilliant but mostly average , showing signs of potential for the sequels , but not giving us much this time around .
translation: 蜘蛛侠与X战警属于同一类 - 偶尔出彩，但大多数时候平平常常，显示出对续集的潜力，但这次并没有给我们太多惊喜。
back_translation: Spider-Man and the X-Men belong to the same category - occasionally outstanding, but most of the time average, showing potential for sequels, yet this time it didn’t offer us too many surprises.

text: skagerrak is the story of being hit by happiness when you least expect it .
translation: 《斯卡格拉克》是一个关于在你最意想不到的时候被幸福击中的故事。
back_translation: "Skagerrak" is a story about being struck by happiness when you least expect it.

text: ben stiller and jack black star as tim and nick , best friends , neighbors and co-workers , whose equal footing is suddenly tripped up when one of nick 's harebrained get-rich-quick schemes actually succeeds : vapoorizer , a spray that literally makes dog poop , or any other kind for that matter , evaporate into thin air -- to where exactly is anyone 's guess .
translation: 本·斯蒂勒和杰克·布莱克饰演蒂姆和尼克，最好的朋友、邻居和同事，当尼克的一项愚蠢的快速致富计划意外成功时，他们的平等关系突然被打破：蒸发器，一种喷雾剂，能够让狗屎或其他任何东西字面上蒸发成空气——究竟蒸发到哪里，谁也说不清。
back_translation: Ben Stiller and Jack Black play Tim and Nick, best friends, neighbors, and colleagues, whose equal relationship is suddenly disrupted when Nick's foolish get-rich-quick scheme unexpectedly succeeds: the evaporator, a spray that can literally make dog poop or anything else evaporate into thin air—exactly where it evaporates to remains a mystery.

text: after a really wild night jim and the gang wake up in an abandoned warehouse in a small town in the middle of no where , of which they have never heard of .
translation: 经过一个非常疯狂的夜晚，吉姆和他的朋友们在一个偏僻小镇的一处废弃仓库中醒来，他们从未听说过这个地方。
back_translation: After a very crazy night, Jim and his friends woke up in an abandoned warehouse in a remote town they had never heard of.

text: isabel and clara are growing up in a time of terror .
translation: 伊莎贝尔和克拉拉正在一个恐怖的时代成长。
back_translation: Isabelle and Clara are growing up in a terrifying time.

text: an astonishing feat for a major star let alone a 27 year old from pickum , south carolina who only two years ago was sleeping in a cardboard box in the back alleys of detroit with her mother , connie , and her uncle clutch , while playing guitar on the streets for spare change .
translation: 对于一位主要明星来说，这是一个令人惊叹的壮举，更别提是来自南卡罗来纳州皮克姆的27岁年轻人了。仅仅两年前，她和母亲康妮以及叔叔克拉奇一起，曾在底特律的后巷里睡在纸箱里，还在街上弹吉他换零钱。
back_translation: For a major star, this is an amazing achievement, let alone for a 27-year-old young person from Pickens, South Carolina. Just two years ago, she was sleeping in a cardboard box in an alley in Detroit with her mother Connie and uncle Crutch, and playing guitar on the streets to earn change.

text: renata is a young high-class girl and ulises is a poor guy .
translation: 瑞娜塔是一个年轻的高贵女孩，而乌利塞斯是一个穷小子。
back_translation: Rinata is a young noble girl, while Ulysses is a poor boy.

text: detective kuroda tries to find the answer , which is n't as simple as one could hope .
translation: 侦探黑田试图寻找答案，但这并不像人们所希望的那样简单。
back_translation: Detective Kuroda tried to find answers, but it was not as simple as people hoped.

text: like any warhol/morrissey relic , arnon goldfinger 's the komediant rediscovers chapters in new york 's cultural past .
translation: 就像任何安迪·沃霍尔/莫里西的遗物一样，阿尔农·戈尔丁法的《喜剧演员》重新发现了纽约文化过去的篇章。
back_translation: Like any relic of Andy Warhol/Morrissey, Arnon Goldfinger's "The Comedian" rediscovers a chapter of New York's cultural past.

text: she has been programmed to eliminate other cybernetic organisms .
translation: 她被编程来消灭其他赛博生物。
back_translation: She was programmed to eliminate other cyborgs.

text: debrauwer handles the story with such feeling and understanding that you quickly come to , not just like , but love these characters .
translation: 德布劳尔以如此深刻的感情和理解处理这个故事，令人很快不仅喜欢这些角色，而且爱上他们。
back_translation: De Bruyler handles this story with such deep emotion and understanding that it's easy to not only like these characters but to fall in love with them.

text: if an oscar category existed for ensemble acting , the hours would unquestionably earn it . watching a trio of actors at the top of their game is a delight .
translation: 如果有一个奥斯卡奖项是专门颁发给ensemble表演的，《霍尔斯》无疑会获得该奖项。观看三位顶尖演员的表演是一种享受。
back_translation: If there were an Oscar award specifically for ensemble performances, "Holes" would undoubtedly win that award. Watching the performances of the three top actors is a delight.

text: the mafia 's paul vitti ( de niro ) is back in prison and will need some serious counseling when he gets out .
translation: 黑手党的保罗·维提（德尼罗饰）再次入狱，出狱后需要一些严肃的辅导。
back_translation: Paul Vitti (played by De Niro) from the Mafia goes back to prison and needs some serious counseling after he gets out.

text: it shows us a slice of life that 's very different from our own and yet instantly recognizable .
translation: 它向我们展示了一个与我们自己非常不同但又瞬间可以识别的生活片段。
back_translation: It shows us a life fragment that is very different from our own but can be instantly recognized.

text: in an alternate space and time , a mythological being called the guardian is charged with manipulating and protecting dark matter .
translation: 在一个平行的空间和时间里，一个被称为守护者的神话生物负责操控和保护暗物质。
back_translation: In a parallel space and time, a mythical creature known as the Guardian is responsible for manipulating and protecting dark matter.

text: vince 's flood of memories about sara 's disappearance is brought on when he happens upon 10-year-old ellen , one of julie 's students .
translation: 文斯对萨拉失踪的回忆潮涌上心头，是因为他偶然遇到了10岁的艾伦，她是朱莉的一名学生。
back_translation: Vince's memories of Sara's disappearance flooded back to him because he happened to encounter 10-year-old Alan, a student of Julie's.

text: in the first trip in november 2001 , majidi visited the refugee camp of makaki in a taliban controlled area and mile 46 , another small camp situated in a northern alliance held area .
translation: 在2001年11月的第一次旅行中，马基迪访问了塔利班控制区的马卡基难民营，以及位于北方联盟控制区的46号小营。
back_translation: In November 2001, during his first trip, Maki di visited the Makaki refugee camp in the Taliban-controlled area, as well as Camp 46 located in the Northern Alliance-controlled area.

text: told in one fluid shot , a tale which floats like a dreamlike journey through the majestic spaces of the hermitage in st . petersburg , engaging real and imagined characters from russian and european history .
translation: 通过一个流畅的镜头，讲述了一个如梦如幻的旅程，穿越圣彼得堡的冬宫，吸引了来自俄罗斯和欧洲历史的真实与虚构人物。
back_translation: Through a smooth lens, it tells a dreamy journey, traversing the Winter Palace of St. Petersburg, attracting both real and fictional characters from Russian and European history.

text: this slender plot feels especially thin stretched over the nearly 80-minute running time .
translation: 这个细腻的情节在近80分钟的放映时间里显得特别单薄。
back_translation: This delicate plot appears particularly thin over the nearly 80 minutes of runtime.

text: jirM-m hubac 's script is a gem . his characters are engaging , intimate and the dialogue is realistic and greatly moving . the scope of the silberstein family is large and we grow attached to their lives , full of strength , warmth and vitality . .
translation: jirM-m hubac的剧本是一颗宝石。他的角色引人入胜，亲密无间，对话真实而感人。西尔伯斯坦家族的范围广泛，我们对他们充满力量、温暖和活力的生活产生依恋。
back_translation: The script of jirM-m hubac is a gem. Its characters are captivating and intimate, with dialogue that feels authentic and touching. The Silberstein family's wide-ranging narrative makes us attached to their powerful, warm, and vibrant lives.

text: what would have otherwise been a routine nostalgic coming-of-ager takes on a new , innovative form .
translation: 原本会是一次常规的怀旧成长故事，却以一种新的创新形式呈现。
back_translation: It was originally supposed to be a typical nostalgic coming-of-age story, but it was presented in a new and innovative form.

text: often overwrought and at times positively irritating , the film turns into an engrossing thriller almost in spite of itself .
translation: 这部电影常常显得过于紧张，有时甚至令人烦恼，但几乎不顾自身，它却变成了一部引人入胜的惊悚片。
back_translation: This movie often feels overly tense, sometimes even frustrating, but despite itself, it transforms into an engaging thriller.

text: good , -- * interviews with dp neihouse and astronaut susan helms *
translation: 好的，-- *与 dp neihouse 和宇航员苏珊·赫尔姆斯的访谈*
back_translation: Okay, -- *An interview with DP Neihouse and astronaut Susan Helms*

text: the leaping story line , shaped by director peter kosminsky into sharp slivers and cutting impressions , shows all the signs of rich detail condensed into a few evocative images and striking character traits .
translation: 这个跳跃的故事情节，在导演彼得·科斯明斯基的雕琢下，形成了尖锐的片段和深刻的印象，显示出丰富细节浓缩于几张生动的图像和鲜明的角色特征之中。
back_translation: The jumping storyline, under the sculpting of director Peter Kosminsky, forms sharp moments and deep impressions, showcasing rich details condensed into a few vivid images and distinct character traits.

text: he has just graduated college , he has a beautiful girlfriend , jane , and a publisher has picked up his first novel .
translation: 他刚刚大学毕业，拥有一个漂亮的女朋友简，并且有一家出版社出版了他的第一部小说。
back_translation: He just graduated from college, has a beautiful girlfriend named Jane, and a publishing house has published his first novel.

text: . . . the movie is just a plain old monster .
translation: ……这部电影只是一部普通的怪物电影。
back_translation: ...this movie is just an ordinary monster movie.

text: an apparent gynaecologist dr . nightingale hastily marries a pregnant patient , modesta and takes her home to his mysterious manor to meet mother .
translation: 一位名叫奈廷戈尔的显然是妇科医生，匆忙与一位怀孕的病人莫德斯塔结婚，并带她回到他神秘的庄园见母亲。
back_translation: A man named Natinger, who is apparently a gynecologist, hurriedly marries a pregnant patient named Modesta and takes her back to his mysterious estate to meet his mother.

text: the film is a travesty of the genre and even as spoof takes itself too seriously .
translation: 这部电影是这个类型的扭曲，甚至作为一种恶搞也显得过于严肃。
back_translation: This movie is a distortion of this genre, and even as a spoof, it comes off as overly serious.

text: in the end , all you can do is admire the ensemble players and wonder what the point of it is .
translation: 最后，你能做的就是欣赏这些演出者，感叹其中的意义何在。
back_translation: In the end, all you can do is appreciate these performers and marvel at the meaning behind it all.

text: a bounty hunter is on the trail of a conman who skipped bail .
translation: 一名赏金猎人在追踪一名逃避保释的骗子。
back_translation: A bounty hunter is tracking down a con artist who is evading bail.

text: they 've known each other since they met as children , when both discovered hip-hop for the first time .
translation: 他们从小就相识，那时他们第一次接触嘻哈文化。
back_translation: They have known each other since they were young, when they first came into contact with hip-hop culture.

text: in its chicken heart , crush goes to absurd lengths to duck the very issues it raises .
translation: 在《鸡心》中，克鲁什为回避自己提出的那些问题而不惜采取荒谬的手段。
back_translation: In "The Heart of a Chicken," Krush resorts to absurd means to avoid the questions he himself raised.

text: dong does n't demonize the conservative christians he talks to , but he does n't have to . . .
translation: 东并没有妖魔化他所交谈的保守基督徒，但他并不需要这样做……
back_translation: Dong did not demonize the conservative Christians he was talking to, but he did not need to do so...

text: when she decides to cancel her only holiday with tor and go on a self-development course with per instead , the passive bystander tor realises he 's going to have to stand up and be a man .
translation: 当她决定取消与托尔的唯一假期，而去参加与佩尔的自我发展课程时，消极旁观者托尔意识到他必须站出来，做个男人。
back_translation: When she decided to cancel the only holiday with Tor to attend a self-development course with Perl, the passive bystander Tor realized he had to step up and be a man.

text: five years later `` the bride `` awakens from the coma the assassins left her in and heads out to seek bloody revenge .
translation: 五年后，“新娘”从刺客留下的昏迷中醒来，开始寻求血腥复仇。
back_translation: Five years later, the "bride" wakes up from the coma left by the assassin and begins to seek bloody revenge.

text: this is a happy throwback to the time when cartoons were cinema 's most idiosyncratic form instead of one of its most predictable .
translation: 这是对那些卡通片还是电影中最独特形式，而不是最可预测形式的回忆，令人感到快乐。
back_translation: This is a recollection of the most unique forms found in those cartoons or movies, rather than the most predictable forms, evoking a sense of joy.

text: because of her finn is finally able to accept himself .
translation: 因为她，芬恩终于能够接纳自己。
back_translation: Because of her, Finn was finally able to accept himself.

text: . . . plays like a badly edited , 91-minute trailer ( and ) the director ca n't seem to get a coherent rhythm going . in fact , it does n't even seem like she tried .
translation: ...就像一部编辑不好的91分钟预告片（而且）导演似乎无法找到连贯的节奏。事实上，似乎她甚至没有尝试过。
back_translation: ...like a poorly edited 91-minute trailer, and the director seems unable to find a coherent rhythm. In fact, it seems she didn't even try.

text: he then dedicates himself to making sure the video tape is released to the public .
translation: 他随后致力于确保录像带向公众发布。
back_translation: He then dedicated himself to ensuring the release of the videotape to the public.

text: what drives a young african-american man to become a member of the republican party and to run for a united states congressional seat in a district in south georgia with a disturbing racist history ?
translation: 是什么驱动一位年轻的非裔美国男性加入共和党，并在一个有着令人不安的种族主义历史的南乔治亚州选区竞选国会席位？
back_translation: What drives a young African American man to join the Republican Party and run for a congressional seat in a southern Georgia district with a troubling history of racism?

text: pratfalls aside , barbershop gets its greatest play from the timeless spectacle of people really talking to each other .
translation: 除了意外的搞笑，理发店最大的魅力在于人们真正交流的永恒场面。
back_translation: Besides the unexpected humor, the greatest charm of a barbershop lies in the timeless scenes of genuine communication among people.

text: in the near future a young biker leaves his crumbling life in rural ireland to join a strange 'metal circus ' as it tours the cities of europe .
translation: 在不久的将来，一名年轻的摩托车手离开了自己在爱尔兰乡村破碎的生活，加入了一个奇异的“金属马戏团”，随着它在欧洲的城市巡演。
back_translation: In the near future, a young motorcyclist leaves his shattered life in the Irish countryside to join a bizarre "metal circus" as it tours cities in Europe.

text: although they have fallen into a habitual rivalry based on a cause long forgotten , the pair unite when the multinational fast-food outlet `` burgies `` unveils a new store directly opposite the twin fish & # 38 ; chips shops .
translation: 尽管他们已经陷入基于久远已忘的原因的习惯性竞争，但当跨国快餐连锁店“burgies”在双鱼炸鱼和薯条店正对面开设新店时，这对搭档团结一致。
back_translation: Despite their habitual competition based on long-forgotten reasons, the duo stands united when the multinational fast-food chain "burgies" opens a new store directly across from the Pisces Fish and Chips shop.

text: it is the weekend and the lottery office is closed .
translation: 现在是周末，彩票办公室关门了。
back_translation: It is the weekend now, and the lottery office is closed.

text: . . . a joke at once flaky and resonant , lightweight and bizarrely original .
translation: ... 一个同时轻浮又深刻，轻松而奇特的笑话。
back_translation: ... a joke that is both frivolous and profound, easygoing yet unusual.

text: as an actor 's showcase , hart 's war has much to recommend it , even if the top-billed willis is not the most impressive player . as a story of dramatic enlightenment , the screenplay by billy ray and terry george leaves something to be desired .
translation: 作为演员的展示，《哈特战争》有很多值得推荐的地方，即使是主角威利斯并不是最出色的表演者。作为一个戏剧启蒙的故事，由比利·雷和特里·乔治编写的剧本还有待提高。
back_translation: As a showcase for actors, "Hart's War" has many commendable aspects, even though the main actor, Willis, is not the most outstanding performer. As a story that serves as an introduction to drama, the script written by Billy Ray and Terry George still has room for improvement.

text: the time constraints of his job prevent him from spending time with his family and friends .
translation: 他的工作时间限制使他无法与家人和朋友共度时光。
back_translation: His work schedule restricts him from spending time with family and friends.

text: although their friendship raises some eyebrows at first , radio 's growth under the coach 's guidance ultimately inspires the local townsfolk , from 1964 when he first starts helping the hanna yellow jackets football team , through a 38+ career with the school that continues today ( 2002 ) , including tenures as the head cheerleader , assistant coach and team manager .
translation: 尽管他们的友谊起初引起了一些人的质疑，但在教练的指导下，电台的成长最终激励了当地居民。从1964年他开始帮助汉娜黄夹克足球队，到如今（2002年）在学校的38年以上的职业生涯，包括担任首席啦啦队员、助理教练和团队经理。
back_translation: Although their friendship initially raised some doubts, under the guidance of the coach, the growth of the radio station ultimately inspired the local residents. From 1964 when he began helping the Hannah Yellow Jacket football team, to now (2002) with over 38 years of his professional career at the school, including roles as chief cheerleader, assistant coach, and team manager.

text: sweet home alabama certainly wo n't be remembered as one of [ witherspoon 's ] better films .
translation: 《甜蜜家乡阿拉巴马》肯定不会被记住为[威瑟斯彭]较好的电影之一。
back_translation: "Sweet Home Alabama" will certainly not be remembered as one of [Witherspoon]'s better films.

text: there is n't one moment in the film that surprises or delights .
translation: 影片中没有一个时刻让人感到惊讶或愉悦。
back_translation: There wasn't a moment in the film that felt surprising or enjoyable.

text: overall very good for what it 's trying to do .
translation: 总体来说，对于它所要达到的目标非常好。
back_translation: Overall, it is very good for the goals it aims to achieve.

text: david is a painter with painter 's block who takes a job as a waiter to get some inspiration .
translation: 大卫是一位遭遇创作瓶颈的画家，他接了一份服务员的工作以寻找灵感。
back_translation: David is a painter who is experiencing a creative block, and he took a job as a waiter to find inspiration.

text: this is not an easy film . but it could be , by its art and heart , a necessary one .
translation: 这部电影不容易。但凭借其艺术和内涵，它可能是一部必要的作品。
back_translation: This movie is not easy. But with its artistry and depth, it might be an essential work.

text: the uneven movie does have its charms and its funny moments but not quite enough of them .
translation: 这部不均衡的电影确实有其魅力和搞笑的时刻，但这些时刻似乎还不够。
back_translation: This uneven movie does have its charm and funny moments, but those moments seem to be insufficient.

text: he spends most of his time throwing parties and `` fund raisers `` .
translation: 他大部分时间都在举办聚会和“筹款活动”。
back_translation: He spends most of his time hosting parties and "fundraising events."

text: oliver parker brings the wit 's [ oscar wilde ] work to the screen in a solidly rendered creation .
translation: 奥利弗·帕克将奥斯卡·王尔德的作品巧妙地搬上银幕，呈现出一部扎实的作品。
back_translation: Oliver Parker skillfully brings Oscar Wilde's work to the screen, presenting a solid piece.

text: a clichM-id and shallow cautionary tale about the hard-partying lives of gay men .
translation: 一个陈词滥调且肤浅的警示故事，讲述了同性恋男性的狂欢生活。
back_translation: A clichéd and superficial cautionary tale about the hedonistic lifestyle of gay men.

text: when a powerful developer named mr . scheck wants to knock down all the stores and houses in arnold 's neighborhood to build a huge `` mall-plex `` , it looks likes the neighborhood is doomed to disappear .
translation: 当一位名叫谢克的强大开发商想要摧毁阿诺德社区的所有商店和房屋，建造一个巨大的“购物中心综合体”时，这个社区看起来注定要消失。
back_translation: When a powerful developer named Sheke wants to destroy all the shops and houses in the Arnold community to build a massive "shopping mall complex," it seems that the community is destined to disappear.

text: gosling creates a staggeringly compelling character , a young man whose sharp intellect is at the very root of his contradictory , self-hating , self-destructive ways .
translation: 戈斯林创造了一个令人惊叹的角色，一个年轻人，他的聪明才智正是他矛盾、自我厌恶和自我毁灭行为的根源。
back_translation: Gosling created an amazing character, a young man whose intelligence is the root of his contradictions, self-loathing, and self-destructive behavior.

text: when the king meets the god in a face-to-face confrontation , the result takes on a horrible logic all its own .
translation: 当国王与神面对面对峙时，结果呈现出一种可怕的逻辑。
back_translation: When the king confronts the god face to face, the outcome presents a terrifying logic.

text: in converging with angels , a world-weary sex worker ( dylan thomas ) impulsively takes in a drunk , fragile young woman who is in distress ( allison campbell ) , hoping to force some measure of redemption in a life that is financially comfortable , but morally and spiritually bankrupt .
translation: 在《与天使交汇》中，一位疲惫不堪的性工作者（迪伦·托马斯）冲动地收留了一位在困境中喝醉的脆弱年轻女性（艾莉森·坎贝尔），希望在一个经济上舒适却在道德和精神上破产的生活中，迫使自己获得一定程度的救赎。
back_translation: In "Intersecting with Angels," a weary sex worker (Dylan Thomas) impulsively takes in a vulnerable young woman (Allison Campbell) who is drunk and in distress, hoping to achieve a measure of redemption in a life that is financially comfortable yet morally and spiritually bankrupt.

text: the movie eventually snaps under the strain of its plot contrivances and its need to reassure .
translation: 这部电影最终在情节的巧合和需要安慰的压力下崩溃。

text: the plot involves an innocent poor boy , who is a happy go lucky , always trying to live a stylish life .
translation: 情节涉及一个无辜的穷小子，他乐观向上，总是努力过上时尚的生活。

text: as the national media become more sedate and incurious , this country desperately needs a gadfly like moore . indeed , we need more like him .
translation: 随着国家媒体变得更加冷静和缺乏好奇心，这个国家迫切需要像摩尔这样的刺头。实际上，我们需要更多像他这样的人。
back_translation: As the national media becomes more calm and lacks curiosity, the country urgently needs firebrands like Moore. In fact, we need more people like him.

text: god appears in human form ( freeman ) and , endowing bruce with divine powers , challenges bruce to take on the big job to see if he can do it any better .
translation: 上帝以人形（自由人）的形式显现，并赋予布鲁斯神圣的力量，挑战布鲁斯去承担重大任务，看看他是否能做得更好。
back_translation: God appears in the form of a man (a free man) and bestows divine power upon Bruce, challenging him to take on a significant task to see if he can do it better.

text: the story of a normal family in which come out the dreams of those who have lost their possibilities and of those who want to realize them .
translation: 一个普通家庭的故事，在这个家庭中，展现了那些失去可能性的人和那些想要实现梦想的人的梦想。
back_translation: A story of an ordinary family, in which the dreams of those who have lost possibilities and those who want to achieve their dreams are showcased.

text: would be an unendurable viewing experience for this ultra-provincial new yorker if 26-year-old reese witherspoon were not on hand to inject her pure fantasy character , melanie carmichael , with a massive infusion of old-fashioned hollywood magic .
translation: 如果26岁的瑞茜·威瑟斯彭不在场为她的纯幻想角色梅兰妮·卡迈克尔注入大量老派好莱坞魔力，这对这个极端地方主义的纽约人来说将是一个无法忍受的观看体验。
back_translation: If 26-year-old Reese Witherspoon is not present to infuse her pure fantasy role of Melanie Carmichael with a lot of old-school Hollywood charm, it would be an unbearable viewing experience for this extremely local New Yorker.

text: enter sonia kapoor , the daughter of the 10th richest man in the world .
translation: 进入索尼娅·卡普尔，世界第十富翁的女儿。
back_translation: Enter Sonya Kapoor, the daughter of the world's tenth richest person.

text: turns out to be much more complex than the originally released gem .
translation: 结果比最初发布的宝石复杂得多。

text: mary goes to live with her beautician cousin in a crowded apartment , and begins to lose heart .
translation: 玛丽搬去和她的美容师表 cousin 住在一个拥挤的公寓里，开始感到沮丧。
back_translation: Mary moved to live with her beautician cousin in a crowded apartment and started to feel frustrated.

text: is the story of eight very different people who go on a catalogue modeling trip from sophisticated los angeles to the remote mountains of california .
translation: 这是一个关于八个截然不同的人，他们从时尚的洛杉矶前往加利福尼亚偏远山区进行目录模特拍摄的故事。
back_translation: This is a story about eight completely different individuals who travel from fashionable Los Angeles to the remote mountains of California for a catalog modeling shoot.

text: turturro is fabulously funny and over the top as a 'very sneaky ' butler who excels in the art of impossible disappearing/reappearing acts
translation: 图尔图罗的表演非常搞笑，夸张得令人咋舌，他饰演的是一个“非常狡猾”的管家，擅长于不可能的消失与再出现的艺术。
back_translation: Turturro's performance is very funny and astonishingly exaggerated. He plays a "very cunning" butler, skilled in the art of impossible disappearances and reappearances.

text: the career of a disillusioned producer , who is desperate for a hit , is endangered when his star walks off the film set .
translation: 一位失望的制片人的职业生涯在他的明星弃片而去时面临危险，他迫切希望获得一个成功的作品。
back_translation: A disappointed producer's career is in jeopardy when his star abandons the project, and he is desperate for a successful work.

text: peralta 's mythmaking could have used some informed , adult hindsight .
translation: 佩拉尔塔的神话构建本可以利用一些有见地的成年人的后见之明。
back_translation: The myth construction of Peralta could have benefited from the hindsight of some insightful adults.

text: this case made history in the new jersey judicial system and these teenagers ( who , at the time , were between the ages of 14 and 16 ) were the first in the state to be tried and convicted as adults .
translation: 此案件在新泽西司法系统中创造了历史，这些青少年（当时年龄在14至16岁之间）是该州首批作为成年人受审和定罪的人。
back_translation: This case made history in the New Jersey judicial system, as these teenagers (then aged between 14 and 16) were the first in the state to be tried and convicted as adults.

text: at times he seems to share nicholas 's fascination , but then appears more interested in making inroads with the girls at school .
translation: 有时他似乎对尼古拉斯的迷恋感到共鸣，但随后又似乎对在学校与女孩们建立联系更感兴趣。
back_translation: Sometimes he seemed to resonate with Nicholas's obsession, but then he seemed more interested in connecting with girls at school.

text: this is one case where you can actually believe the hype -- the lord of the rings : the two towers is indeed even better than its predecessor .
translation: 这确实是一个可以相信炒作的案例——《指环王：双塔奇兵》确实比它的前作还要优秀。
back_translation: This is indeed a case where the hype can be believed—"The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers" is indeed better than its predecessor.

text: yet , just beneath the surface , there is an insecurity and fear they can not face .
translation: 然而，表面之下，他们有一种无法面对的不安和恐惧。
back_translation: However, beneath the surface, they have a kind of anxiety and fear that they cannot face.

text: does n't come close to justifying the hype that surrounded its debut at the sundance film festival two years ago .
translation: 无法接近肯定两年前在圣丹斯电影节首映时所受到的热议。

text: the imax screen enhances the personal touch of manual animation .
translation: IMAX 屏幕增强了手动动画的个人化触感。

text: beers , who , when she 's given the right lines , can charm the paint off the wall . . . [ but ] the script goes wrong at several key junctures .
translation: 酒吧里，谁在被给予正确台词时，能把墙上的油漆都说得掉落……[但是]剧本在几个关键时刻出错了。
back_translation: In the bar, when someone is given the right lines, they can make the paint on the walls fall off... [but] the script went wrong at several key moments.

text: it 's a fun movie with lots of colorful characters , lots of bizarre plot meanderings and quite a few memorable lines and sequences .
translation: 这是一部有趣的电影，拥有许多丰富多彩的角色，离奇的情节曲折，以及相当多令人难忘的台词和片段。

text: the twist that ends the movie is the one with the most emotional resonance , but twists are getting irritating , and this is the kind of material where the filmmakers should be very careful about raising eyebrows .
translation: 结束电影的反转是情感共鸣最强烈的，但反转越来越令人厌烦，这种类型的题材， filmmakers 应该非常小心，避免引起争议。
back_translation: The twist at the end of the movie has the strongest emotional resonance, but the twists are becoming increasingly annoying. For this type of subject matter, filmmakers should be very careful to avoid causing controversy.

text: she and her daughter try to escape ( such as to her previous boyfriend played by futterman ) , but he pursues relentlessly .
translation: 她和女儿试图逃离（例如去找她之前的男友，来自Futterman的角色），但他却无情地追赶。
back_translation: She and her daughter attempt to escape (for example, to find her previous boyfriend, a character from Futterman), but he relentlessly pursues them.

text: expect the same-old , lame-old slasher nonsense , just with different scenery .
translation: 期待的还是老一套、无聊的杀手 nonsense，只是换了地方。

translation: 麦康纳希看起来很有趣，龙还不错，但剧本里没啥火花。
back_translation: McConaughey looks interesting, the dragon is pretty good, but there's not much spark in the script.

text: based on the edgar allen poe short story , `` the facts in the case of m . valdemar , `` comedy revolves around a doctor who convinces a dying man 's family to allow him to put the man in a trance as he takes his final breaths .
translation: 根据爱德加·爱伦·坡的短篇小说《瓦尔德玛先生案件的事实》，剧情围绕一位医生展开，他说服一位濒死者的家人允许他在这个人最后的呼吸中让他进入催眠状态。
back_translation: Based on Edgar Allan Poe's short story "The Facts in the Case of M. Valdemar," the plot revolves around a doctor who persuades the family of a dying man to allow him to hypnotize the person during his last breath.

text: black picket fence is director 's sergio goes ' poignant portrait of the bleak realities of life in the public housing projects of brooklyn 's east new york , one of the inner city 's most dangerous and violent neighborhoods .
translation: 《黑色栅栏》是导演塞尔吉奥对布鲁克林东纽约公共住房项目中生活严酷现实的深刻描绘，该地区是内城区中最危险和暴力的社区之一。
back_translation: "The Black Fence" is a profound depiction by director Sergio of the harsh realities of life in the public housing project in East Brooklyn, which is one of the most dangerous and violent neighborhoods in the inner city.

text: in 1949 , laura brown , a pregnant housewife , is planning a party for her husband , but she ca n't stop reading the novel 'mrs .
translation: 1949年，孕妇劳拉·布朗正在为丈夫策划一个派对，但她无法停止阅读小说《夫人》。
back_translation: In 1949, pregnant Laura Brown is planning a party for her husband, but she cannot stop reading the novel "Mrs."

text: although mainstream filmmakers are fond of their white saviors , most audiences of color are not .
translation: 尽管主流电影制片人喜欢他们的白人救世主，但大多数有色人种观众并不喜欢。
back_translation: Despite mainstream filmmakers' preference for their white saviors, most audiences of color do not like it.

text: nukui is perhaps her most devoted fan , and today he wants to prove it . . .
translation: nukui 也许是她最忠实的粉丝，今天他想证明这一点……
