text: a little more intensity and a little less charm would have saved this film a world of hurt .
translation: 多一点强度和少一点魅力会让这部电影免于许多痛苦。
back_translation: A little more intensity and a little less charm would spare this movie from much suffering.

text: it briefly flirts with player masochism , but the point of real interest -M-^V audience sadism -- is evaded completely .
translation: 它略微调侃了玩家的自虐倾向，但真正有趣的点——观众的施虐心理——却完全被回避。
back_translation: It slightly mocks players' tendencies for self-torture, but the truly interesting point—the audience's sadistic psychology—is completely avoided.

text: she hires karl to find her missing sister and karl soon finds himself drawn into a world of half-truths and lies as his simple missing-person case develops into a murder case that quickly becomes international in scope .
translation: 她雇佣卡尔寻找失踪的姐姐，但卡尔很快发现自己被卷入一个半真半假的世界，因为他原本简单的失踪案演变成了一个迅速发展为国际范围的谋杀案。
back_translation: She hires Karl to find her missing sister, but Karl soon realizes he is caught up in a world that is half true and half false, as what started out as a simple missing person case quickly evolves into an internationally escalating murder case.

text: she feels left out from her father 's new family , she 's had an abortion , she 's tried to commit suicide , and she hates life in the city .
translation: 她觉得被父亲的新家庭排斥，她曾经流产，试图自杀，并且她厌恨城市生活。
back_translation: She feels rejected by her father's new family, she has had a miscarriage, attempted suicide, and she hates city life.

text: the advantage of a postapocalyptic setting is that it can be made on the cheap . any rock pile will do for a set . reign of fire has the disadvantage of also looking cheap .
translation: 后末日设定的优势在于它可以低成本制作。任何一堆石头都可以作为布景。《火焰统治》则有显得便宜的劣势。
back_translation: The advantage of a post-apocalyptic setting is that it can be produced at a low cost. Any pile of stones can serve as a backdrop. "Flame Rule," on the other hand, suffers from the disadvantage of seeming cheap.

text: . . . too sappy for its own good .
translation: ...太甜腻了，不利于自己。
back_translation: ...too sweet and rich, not good for oneself.

text: several uninteresting , unlikeable people do bad things to and with each other in `` unfaithful . `` why anyone who is not a character in this movie should care is beyond me .
translation: 在《不忠》中，几个人物无趣且令人厌恶，他们彼此之间做一些坏事。我无法理解为什么电影外的任何人会关心这件事。
back_translation: In "Infidelity," several characters are boring and repulsive, and they do bad things to each other. I can't understand why anyone outside of the movie would care about this.

text: during the tuxedo 's 90 minutes of screen time , there is n't one true 'chan moment ' .
translation: 在《燕尾服》的90分钟放映时间里，没有一个真正的“成龙时刻”。
back_translation: In the 90-minute runtime of "Tuxedo," there is not a single true "Jackie Chan moment."

text: `` one look at a girl in tight pants and big tits and you turn stupid ? `` umM-^E . . is n't that the basis for the entire plot ?
translation: ``看一眼穿紧身裤和大胸部的女孩，你就变得傻了？`` 嗯-^E . . 这难道不是整个情节的基础吗？
back_translation: "Just a glance at a girl in tight pants and with big breasts, and you become foolish?" Hmm -^E . . Isn't this the foundation of the whole plot?

text: after finding the plane and its crew torn to shreds , the group tries to piece together clues about what could be responsible for the carnage .
translation: 在发现飞机及其机组人员被撕成碎片后，团队尝试拼凑线索，找出可能导致这场惨剧的原因。
back_translation: After discovering the plane and its crew torn to pieces, the team attempted to piece together clues to identify the possible causes of this tragedy.

text: filmmakers david weissman and bill weber benefit enormously from the cockettes ' camera craziness -- not only did they film performances , but they did the same at home .
translation: 电影制作人大卫·韦斯曼和比尔·韦伯从科克特斯的摄影疯狂中受益匪浅——他们不仅在现场拍摄表演，还在家中进行了同样的拍摄。
back_translation: Film producers David Weissman and Bill Weber greatly benefited from Cockteau's photographic frenzy – they not only filmed performances on-site but also conducted similar shoots at home.

text: unlike the nauseating fictions peddled by such 'have-yourself-a-happy-little-holocaust ' movies as life is beautiful and jakob the liar , the grey zone is honest enough to deny the possibility of hope in auschwitz .
translation: 与那些像《美丽人生》和《撒谎者雅各》这样的“让你拥有快乐小大屠杀”的令人作呕的虚构作品不同，《灰色地带》诚实地否认了在奥斯维辛集中营中存在希望的可能性。
back_translation: Unlike revolting fictional works like "Life is Beautiful" and "The Liar's Jacob," which offer you a "happy little holocaust," "The Grey Zone" honestly denies the possibility of hope existing in the Auschwitz concentration camp.

text: while mitchell is there , his mother shows up to get the gun .
translation: 当米切尔在那里时，他的母亲出现来取枪。
back_translation: When Mitchell was there, his mother appeared to take the gun.

text: that is the question that plagues steve richards ( john stamos ) and eric meyer ( daniel london ) in the comedy `` grownups . ``
translation: 这是困扰史蒂夫·理查兹（约翰·斯图尔特饰）和埃里克·迈耶（丹尼尔·伦敦饰）的问题，在喜剧《成人》中展现。
back_translation: This is the problem that troubles Steve Richards (played by John Stewart) and Eric Meyer (played by Daniel London) in the comedy "Adults."

text: he was married to former adult star < a href= `` /name ? holmes , % 20laurie `` > laurie
translation: 他曾与前成人影星劳里结婚。
back_translation: He was once married to former adult film star Laurie.

text: fearing that bobby is drifting away from him , nicholas takes a chance and kisses him .
translation: 尼古拉斯担心博比正在离他越来越远，冒险吻了他。
back_translation: Nicholas was worried that Bobby was getting further away from him, so he took the risk and kissed him.

text: every joke is repeated at least four times . every joke is repeated at least four times . every joke is repeated at least -- annoying , is n't it ?
translation: 每个笑话至少重复四次。每个笑话至少重复四次。每个笑话至少重复四次——很烦人，不是吗？
back_translation: Every joke is repeated at least four times. Every joke is repeated at least four times. Every joke is repeated at least four times—annoying, isn’t it?

text: tartakovsky 's team has some freakish powers of visual charm , but the five writers slip into the modern rut of narrative banality .
translation: 塔塔科夫斯基的团队拥有一些超凡的视觉魅力，但五位编剧却陷入了现代叙事平庸的模式。
back_translation: Tarkovsky's team possesses extraordinary visual appeal, but the five screenwriters have fallen into the pattern of modern narrative mediocrity.

text: the strength of the film lies in its two central performances by sven wollter as the stricken composer and viveka seldahl as his desperate violinist wife .
translation: 这部电影的力量在于两位主要演员的表演：斯文·沃尔特饰演受困的作曲家，维维卡·塞尔达尔饰演他绝望的小提琴手妻子。
back_translation: The strength of this film lies in the performances of the two main actors: Sven Walter plays the trapped composer, and Viveka Selda plays his desperate violinist wife.

text: this moving documentary tells the story of thomas and his relationship with blalock , one that ushered in advances in surgery that are still in existence today .
translation: 这部感人的纪录片讲述了托马斯与布莱洛克之间的关系，这段关系开启了至今仍在继续的外科手术进步。
back_translation: This touching documentary tells the story of the relationship between Thomas and Blalock, a relationship that opened the door to ongoing advancements in surgical procedures to this day.

text: a science-fiction pastiche so lacking in originality that if you stripped away its inspirations there would be precious little left .
translation: 一部缺乏原创性的科幻拼贴作品，如果去掉其灵感来源，几乎没有什么值得剩下的。
back_translation: A science fiction collage work that lacks originality has almost nothing worth keeping if you remove its sources of inspiration.

text: both overstuffed and undernourished . . . the film ca n't be called a solid success , although there 's plenty of evidence here to indicate clooney might have better luck next time .
translation: 既过度充实又营养不足……这部电影不能算是一部成功之作，尽管这里有很多证据表明克鲁尼下次可能会更幸运。
back_translation: Both overly packed and lacking in nutrition... this film cannot be considered a successful work, although there is plenty of evidence suggesting that Clooney may be luckier next time.

text: there are n't enough jedi to defend the republic against the threat , so chancellor palpatine enlists the aid of jango fett , who promises that his army of clones will handle the situation .
translation: 在防御共和国面临的威胁时，绝地武士的数量不足，因此帕尔帕廷 Chancellor 求助于詹戈·费特（Jango Fett），他承诺他的克隆军队将处理这一情况。
back_translation: In defending against the threats facing the Republic, the number of Jedi was insufficient, so Chancellor Palpatine turned to Jango Fett, who promised that his clone army would handle the situation.

text: the plan 's to use the school auto shop to prep two police cars , stash the drugs in secret compartments and drive away safely .
translation: 计划是利用学校的汽车修理厂准备两辆警车，把毒品藏在秘密夹层里，然后安全驾车离开。
back_translation: The plan is to use the school's auto repair shop to prepare two police cars, hide the drugs in a secret compartment, and then drive away safely.

text: `` underground poets railroad `` is equal parts concert film of performances at universities , churches , fire stations and national monuments across the country ; road trip documentary ; and , ultimately , a tribute to the 12 black firefighters who gave their lives on september 11 .
translation: 《地下诗人铁道》既是关于在全国大学、教堂、消防站和国家纪念碑上表演的音乐会电影；也是一次公路旅行纪录片；最终，它是对在9月11日献身的12位黑人员工的致敬。
back_translation: "The Underground Poet's Railroad" is both a concert film about performances at universities, churches, fire stations, and national monuments; a road trip documentary; and ultimately a tribute to the 12 Black employees who gave their lives on September 11.

text: it 's a lovely film with lovely performances by buy and accorsi .
translation: 这是一部精彩的电影，买和阿科尔西的表演都很出色。
back_translation: This is an amazing movie, and the performances by buy and Akerosi are excellent.

text: there 's some good material in their story about a retail clerk wanting more out of life , but the movie too often spins its wheels with familiar situations and repetitive scenes .
translation: 他们的故事中有一些关于零售店员渴望更多生活的好素材，但这部电影过于频繁地重复熟悉的情境和场景。
back_translation: In their story, there are some good materials about retail workers longing for more in life, but the film too frequently repeats familiar situations and scenes.

text: in his own mental state , he sees his wife alive and beautiful .
translation: 在他自己的心态中，他看到妻子活着且美丽。
back_translation: In his own mindset, he sees his wife as alive and beautiful.

text: twenty-two year old steve is on top of the world .
translation: 二十二岁的史蒂夫正处于人生巅峰。
back_translation: Twenty-two-year-old Steve is at the pinnacle of his life.

text: set in hollywood , `` coming clean `` is a 12 character ensemble romantic comedy about an engagement party gone wrong .
translation: 设定在好莱坞的《坦白说》是一部关于一场出错的订婚派对的12人角色群体浪漫喜剧。
back_translation: Set in Hollywood, "Honestly" is a romantic comedy featuring a group of 12 characters centered around a botched engagement party.

text: an uncluttered , resonant gem that relays its universal points without lectures or confrontations .
translation: 一个简洁、引人共鸣的瑰宝，通过简明的方式传达其普遍观点，而不进行讲课或对抗。
back_translation: A concise and resonant gem that conveys its universal perspective in a straightforward manner, without lecturing or confronting.

text: when a male friend commits suicide , he leaves all of his belongings to his friends .
translation: 当一个男性朋友自杀时，他将自己的所有财物留给了他的朋友们。
back_translation: When a male friend committed suicide, he left all his possessions to his friends.

text: renM-ie zellweger , catherine zeta-jones , richard gere , queen latifah and even sad-faced ol ' john c . reilly will have you singin ' and dancin ' in the aisles .
translation: 瑞恩·梅里尔、凯瑟琳·泽塔-琼斯、理查德·基尔、拉蒂法女王，甚至忧愁满面的老约翰·C·赖利都会让你在过道中唱歌跳舞。
back_translation: Ryan Merrill, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Richard Gere, Queen Latifah, and even the melancholic old John C. Reilly will have you singing and dancing down the aisle.

text: this movie attempts to reconstruct the bankruptcy of the banco ambrosiano bank and its liaisons with the vatican and the masonry through the story of its president roberto calvi , notoriously found dead under the blackfriars bridge in london in june 1982 .
translation: 这部电影试图通过其主席罗berto Calvi 的故事重建安布罗西亚诺银行的破产及其与梵蒂冈和共济会的联系，他在1982年6月被发现在伦敦的黑布里桥下死于非命。
back_translation: This film attempts to reconstruct the bankruptcy of the Ambrosiano Bank through the story of its president, Roberto Calvi, who was found dead under Blackfriars Bridge in London in June 1982.

text: . . . although this idea is `` new `` the results are tired .
translation: . . . 尽管这个想法是“新的”，但结果已经乏味。
back_translation: ... although the idea is "new," the result has become tedious.

text: set in a 1986 harlem that does n't look much like anywhere in new york .
translation: 设定在1986年的哈莱姆，但看起来不像纽约的任何地方。
back_translation: Set in Harlem in 1986, but it looks like nowhere else in New York.

text: there are two distince paths in life good vs . evil .
translation: 人生有两条截然不同的道路：善与恶。
back_translation: There are two completely different paths in life: good and evil.

text: but events spiral out of control , and before the summer ends she will experience frustrated desire , first love , and a broken heart .
translation: 但事情失控了，在夏天结束之前，她将经历挫折的渴望、初恋和心碎。
back_translation: But things got out of control, and before the summer ends, she will experience the longing for setbacks, first love, and heartbreak.

text: in a strange way , egoyan has done too much . he 's worked too hard on this movie .
translation: 以一种奇怪的方式，埃戈扬做得太多了。他在这部电影上投入了太多的努力。
back_translation: In a strange way, Egoyan has done too much. He put in too much effort on this film.

text: a retired boston pd detective is n't buying the news report of a local girl accidentally drowning . . .
translation: 一名退休的波士顿警察局侦探对当地女孩意外溺水的新闻报道并不相信……
back_translation: A retired Boston police detective does not believe the news report about a local girl who accidentally drowned...

text: it is dawn on the morning of the vernal equinox .
translation: 春分晨曦。
back_translation: Spring equinox dawn.

text: whenever the victim watches it , the phone rings , telling them they have only one week to live .
translation: 每当受害者观看它时，电话就会响起，告诉他们只有一周的生命。
back_translation: Whenever the victim watches it, the phone rings, telling them they have only one week to live.

text: their daughter rachel cleans in a home for elderly people , and their son rory is unemployed and aggressive .
translation: 他们的女儿瑞秋在一家养老院工作，儿子罗里失业且性格激动。
back_translation: Their daughter Rachel works in a nursing home, and their son Rory is unemployed and has an excitable personality.

text: what was once original has been co-opted so frequently that it now seems pedestrian .
translation: 曾经独特的东西现在被频繁地借用，以至于看起来变得平庸。
back_translation: Once unique things are now frequently borrowed, to the point that they appear mundane.

text: although mainstream american movies tend to exploit the familiar , every once in a while a film arrives from the margin that gives viewers a chance to learn , to grow , to travel .
translation: 尽管主流美国电影往往利用熟悉的元素，但偶尔会有一部来自边缘的电影出现，让观众有机会学习、成长和旅行。
back_translation: Although mainstream American films often utilize familiar elements, there are occasional films from the margins that offer audiences the opportunity to learn, grow, and travel.

text: the story of j whose goal is to be world master at playing nintendo .
translation: J的故事，他的目标是成为任天堂游戏的世界冠军。
back_translation: The story of J, whose goal is to become the world champion of Nintendo games.

text: not only a reminder of how they used to make movies , but also how they sometimes still can be made .
translation: 不仅是对他们过往制作电影方式的提醒，也是对他们有时仍然可以制作电影的证明。
back_translation: Not only is it a reminder of their past filmmaking methods, but also proof that they can still make movies at times.

text: no amount of nostalgia for carvey 's glory days can disguise the fact that the new film is a lame kiddie flick and that carvey 's considerable talents are wasted in it .
translation: 对卡维辉煌时代的任何怀旧都掩盖不了新电影是一部无聊的儿童电影这一事实，而卡维的显著才华在其中被浪费了。
back_translation: Any nostalgia for the glorious era of Kavi cannot hide the fact that the new movie is a boring children's film, in which Kavi's remarkable talent is wasted.

text: this idyllic existence is upset by the arrival in the village of anita rutter and her dysfunctional family .
translation: 这种田园般的生活因安妮塔·鲁特和她的功能失调家庭的到来而被打扰。
back_translation: This idyllic life was disturbed by the arrival of Anita Luth and her dysfunctional family.

text: the film is so packed with subplots involving the various silbersteins that it feels more like the pilot episode of a tv series than a feature film .
translation: 这部电影充满了涉及各种西尔伯斯坦家族的子情节，让人感觉更像是一部电视剧的试播集，而不是一部故事片。
back_translation: This movie is filled with subplots involving various Silberstein family members, making it feel more like a pilot episode of a TV series rather than a feature film.

text: the ensuing battle was one of the most savage in u . s . history .
translation: 随后的战斗是美国历史上最残酷的战斗之一。
back_translation: The subsequent battle was one of the most brutal battles in American history.

text: miracles , signs and wonders accompany them along with a massive media hunt to track down this `` miracle man . ``
translation: 奇迹、征兆和奇观伴随着他们，还有大规模的媒体追踪来追查这个“奇迹之人”。
back_translation: Miracles, signs, and wonders accompanied them, along with extensive media coverage to track down this "man of miracles."

text: an engineer creates the ultimate weapon in a battle against aliens , only to be suspected as an alien himself .
translation: 一名工程师在与外星人的战斗中创造了终极武器，却反被怀疑是外星人。
back_translation: An engineer created the ultimate weapon in a battle against aliens, but was instead suspected of being an alien.

text: the world around him seemingly comes to a stop ; everything and everybody becomes frozen in time .
translation: 他周围的世界似乎停滞不前；所有的事物和每一个人都被冻结在时间中。
back_translation: The world around him seemed to be at a standstill; everything and everyone was frozen in time.

text: frustrated and angered by a system that does n't seem to work , sam hands in his resignation .
translation: 在对一个似乎不能正常运作的系统感到沮丧和愤怒的情况下，萨姆递交了辞呈。
back_translation: Frustrated and angry at a system that seemed to be malfunctioning, Sam submitted his resignation.

text: and what makes lucky invaluable is his ability to teach mudd how to write again .
translation: 而使得拉基变得无价的是他教穆德再次学习写作的能力。
back_translation: What makes Raki invaluable is his ability to teach Mude to learn writing again.

text: when the film reaches its dramatic climax , a varied cast of characters must all figure out a way to bridge the chasm between their dreams and reality .
translation: 当影片达到戏剧高潮时，各种角色必须想办法弥合他们的梦想与现实之间的鸿沟。
back_translation: When the film reaches its dramatic climax, various characters must find ways to bridge the gap between their dreams and reality.

text: he falls in love with a village girl , ayu , who has just arrived in the city after being betrayed by her boyfriend .
translation: 他爱上了一个乡村女孩阿尤，她在被男友背叛后刚刚来到城市。
back_translation: He fell in love with a rural girl named Ayu, who had just come to the city after being betrayed by her boyfriend.

text: this bold and cathartic drama deserves to be experienced by those who cherish intimate dramas about individuals struggling against all odds to practice love , compassion , and forgiveness .
translation: 这部大胆且宣泄的剧作值得那些珍视关于个体在逆境中努力践行爱、同情和宽恕的亲密戏剧的人们去体验。
back_translation: This bold and cathartic play is worth experiencing for those who cherish intimate dramas about individuals striving to practice love, compassion, and forgiveness in the face of adversity.

text: turning a great movie into a pretty good one is still a step in the wrong direction . . . and the ring will never be more than a pretty good movie .
translation: 把一部伟大的电影变成一部相当不错的电影仍然是朝错误方向迈出的一步……而《指环》永远不会超过一部相当不错的电影。
back_translation: Turning a great movie into a fairly good one is still a step in the wrong direction... and "The Rings" will never surpass being a fairly good movie.

text: when boys fly pulls no punches in exposing this world - men are shown overdosing and engaging in risky behavior - but at the same time , it also shows the sense of community and vitality the parties bring to the men who attend .
translation: 《当男孩飞翔》毫不留情地揭示了这个世界——男孩们被展现出过量服药和参与冒险行为的场景——但同时，它也展示了聚会给参与的男士们带来的共同体意识和活力。
back_translation: "When Boys Soar" unflinchingly reveals a world where boys are shown in scenes of excessive medication use and adventurous behaviors, while at the same time, it also showcases the sense of community and vitality that gatherings bring to the participating men.

text: the art direction is often exquisite , and the anthropomorphic animal characters are beautifully realized through clever makeup design , leaving one to hope that the eventual dvd release will offer subtitles and the original italian-language soundtrack .
translation: 艺术指导常常精美绝伦，拟人化的动物角色通过巧妙的化妆设计得以美丽呈现，让人希望最终的DVD发行能够提供字幕和意大利语原声音轨。
back_translation: The art direction is often exquisite, with anthropomorphized animal characters beautifully presented through clever makeup design, leading one to hope that the final DVD release will provide subtitles and the original Italian soundtrack.

text: when the skittish emma finds blood on her pillow why does she still stay behind ?
translation: 当神经质的艾玛发现她的枕头上有血时，她为什么还留下来？
back_translation: Why did the neurotic Emma stay when she found blood on her pillow?

text: offers a fascinating look into the world of upper-echelon comics .
translation: 提供了一个引人入胜的视角，深入探讨上层漫画的世界。
back_translation: It provides an engaging perspective that delves into the world of upper-level comics.

text: but when his reputation is challenged by an aggressive racer with a fast ride , he ca n't back down .
translation: 但当他的声誉受到一位骑着快速赛车的激进赛车手挑战时，他无法退缩。
back_translation: But when his reputation was challenged by a radical racer riding a fast car, he could not back down.

text: the director sees the strengths of alagna and gheorghiu and plays them for every cinematic moment .
translation: 导演看到阿拉尼亚和乔治乌的优点，并在每一个电影时刻中充分发挥他们的特长。
back_translation: The director recognized the strengths of Alania and Georgiou and made the most of their talents in every moment of the film.

text: a spiffy animated feature about an unruly adolescent boy who is yearning for adventure and a chance to prove his worth .
translation: 一部炫酷的动画电影，讲述了一位追求冒险并渴望证明自己价值的叛逆少年。
back_translation: A cool animated movie that tells the story of a rebellious boy who seeks adventure and yearns to prove his worth.

text: he must use his amateur military skills to beat them to the finish line , and get the tape out in the open .
translation: 他必须利用自己的业余军事技能抢先到达终点，并把胶带暴露出来。
back_translation: He must use his amateur military skills to reach the finish line first and expose the tape.

text: arthur herk , a corrupt business owner , wants to get his hands on the case .
translation: 亚瑟·赫克，一个腐败的商人，想要掌控这个案件。
back_translation: Arthur Heck, a corrupt businessman, wants to take control of the case.

text: this cinema verite speculation on the assassination of john f . kennedy may have been inspired by blair witch , but it takes its techniques into such fresh territory that the film never feels derivative .
translation: 这部关于约翰·F·肯尼迪刺杀事件的真实电影风格的推测可能受到了《女巫布莱尔》的启发，但它将这些技巧带入了如此新颖的领域，以至于电影从未给人感觉是抄袭。
back_translation: This speculative film about the assassination of John F. Kennedy, with its true-to-life style, may have been inspired by "The Blair Witch Project," but it brings these techniques into such a novel realm that the film never feels like a copy.

text: renee zellweger is amazing and richard gere brings a life to the screen that he has n't in several years .
translation: 丽妮·齐薇格真是太棒了，而理查德·基尔带来了多年未曾在荧屏上展现的生命力。
back_translation: Renée Zellweger is truly amazing, and Richard Gere brings a vitality that has not been seen on screen for many years.

text: if your senses have n't been dulled by slasher films and gorefests , if you 're a connoisseur of psychological horror , this is your ticket .
translation: 如果你的感官没有被血腥片和恐怖电影麻木，如果你是心理恐怖的鉴赏家，那么这是你的入场券。
back_translation: If your senses haven't been dulled by bloody films and horror movies, and if you are an aficionado of psychological horror, then this is your ticket in.

text: durval and celia are charmed by the child at first , but soon they see some sad news about celia and kiki on tv that will change the whole situation .
translation: 德尔瓦尔和塞莉亚起初被这个孩子吸引，但很快他们在电视上看到关于塞莉亚和基基的一些悲伤消息，这将改变整个局面。
back_translation: Delvar and Celia were initially attracted to the child, but soon they saw some sad news on television about Celia and Kiki, which would change the entire situation.

text: this remake gets all there is to get out of a peculiar premise with promise : al pacino loathing robin williams .
translation: 这个重拍作品充分挖掘了一个独特而充满潜力的前提：阿尔·帕西诺厌恶罗宾·威廉姆斯。
back_translation: This remake fully explores a unique and promising premise: Al Pacino's hatred for Robin Williams.

text: a gang of robbers , lead by career criminal charlie croker , create the largest traffic jam in los angeles history , giving them time to pull off a theft of gold bullion .
translation: 一伙强盗，由职业罪犯查理·克罗克领导，在洛杉矶史上制造了最大的交通堵塞，给他们提供了时间去进行黄金砖的盗窃。
back_translation: A group of robbers, led by professional criminal Charlie Croker, caused the largest traffic jam in Los Angeles history, giving them time to carry out the theft of gold bars.

text: the film documents the band responding to the twists and turns of the recording industry , rehearsing for their tour , preparing for their debut concert at the grand ole opry , charting the course for their career with their managers , and living every-day life on the farm where they reside in rural tennessee .
translation: 影片记录了乐队如何应对音乐产业的曲折变化，排练他们的巡演，准备在格兰德欧普里举行首场音乐会，与经理人规划职业生涯，以及在他们居住于田纳西州乡村的农场上过着日常生活。
back_translation: The film documents how the band navigates the ups and downs of the music industry, rehearses for their tour, prepares for their first concert at the Grand Ole Opry, works with their manager to plan their careers, and lives their daily lives on a farm in rural Tennessee.

text: once again , director chris columbus takes a hat-in-hand approach to rowling that stifles creativity and allows the film to drag on for nearly three hours .
translation: 导演克里斯·哥伦布再次采取了一种卑躬屈膝的态度对待罗琳，这抑制了创造力，使得电影近三个小时地拖延下去。
back_translation: Director Chris Columbus once again adopted a subservient attitude towards Rowling, stifling creativity and causing the movie to drag on for nearly three hours.

text: yanks tanks is a first look at the phenomenon of classic american cars in cuba .
translation: 《美国车在古巴的现象：第一眼来看Yanks Tanks》
back_translation: "The Phenomenon of American Cars in Cuba: A First Look at Yanks Tanks"

text: they are five cinderellas in search of prince charming and a new chance in life .
translation: 她们是五位灰姑娘，正在寻找白马王子和生活的新机会。
back_translation: They are five Cinderella figures, searching for their prince charming and new opportunities in life.

text: getting nowhere , jen 's mysterious grandma intercedes and casts a spell .
translation: 无济于事，詹的神秘奶奶插手并施展了一个咒语。
back_translation: It was of no use; Jan's mysterious grandmother intervened and cast a spell.

text: this is one of the outstanding thrillers of recent years .
translation: 这是近年来最杰出的惊悚小说之一。
back_translation: This is one of the most outstanding thriller novels in recent years.

text: captures all the longing , anguish and ache , the confusing sexual messages and the wish to be a part of that elusive adult world .
translation: 捕捉了所有的渴望、痛苦和憔悴，令人困惑的性暗示以及渴望融入那个难以捉摸的成年世界。
back_translation: Capturing all the desires, pain, and exhaustion, the confusing sexual implications, and the yearning to fit into that elusive adult world.

text: in their fortuitous encounter , forged by fire , he makes peace with the past and she takes control of her destiny .
translation: 在他们偶然的相遇中，经过磨炼，他与过去和解，而她掌控了自己的命运。
back_translation: In their chance encounter, he reconciled with his past through hardship, while she took control of her own destiny.

text: one of the friends is a dress designer and provides him the artist 's clothes and imported cars are provided to him to enjoy life .
translation: 其中一个朋友是一位服装设计师，提供给他的艺术家服装和进口汽车，让他享受生活。
back_translation: One of his friends is a fashion designer who provides him with designer clothes and imported cars, allowing him to enjoy life.

text: embracing the afghan women 's cause as a primary commitment , iara lee 's short film not only spotlights the despair on both sides of the afghan-pakistan border , but also captures the hope and dignity that still define afghan men , women and children .
translation: 将阿富汗女性的事业作为首要承诺，伊亚拉·李的短片不仅突显了阿富汗与巴基斯坦边界两侧的绝望，还捕捉到了仍然定义阿富汗男性、女性和儿童的希望与尊严。
back_translation: Focusing on the careers of Afghan women as a primary commitment, Ialara Li's short film not only highlights the despair on both sides of the Afghanistan-Pakistan border but also captures the hope and dignity that still define Afghan men, women, and children.

text: too many improbabilities and rose-colored situations temper what could 've been an impacting film .
translation: 太多的不可能和美化的情境削弱了本可以成为一部影响深远的电影。
back_translation: Too many impossibilities and embellished situations have weakened what could have been a far-reaching film.

text: painful , horrifying and oppressively tragic , this film should not be missed .
translation: 痛苦、可怕且压抑悲惨，这部电影不容错过。
back_translation: Painful, terrifying, and oppressively tragic, this movie is a must-see.

text: together they set off from minneapolis to duluth on what they think will be a redemptive and romantic road trip to the north shore .
translation: 他们一起从明尼阿波利斯出发，前往杜卢斯，他们认为这将是一场充满救赎和浪漫的北岸公路之旅。
back_translation: They set off together from Minneapolis to Duluth, believing it would be a North Shore road trip filled with redemption and romance.

text: the delicious trimmingsM-^Earrive early and stay late , filling nearly every minuteM-^Ewith a lighthearted glow , some impudent snickers , and a glorious dose of humankind 's liberating ability to triumph over a scrooge or two .
translation: 美味的配菜早来晚走，几乎每一分钟都充满轻松的光辉，一些无礼的窃笑，以及人类战胜一个或两个守财奴的解放能力的辉煌剂量。
back_translation: Delicious side dishes arrive early and depart late, with every minute filled with a relaxed glow, some impolite chuckles, and a glorious dose of humanity’s ability to triumph over one or two misers.

text: the drama is played out with such aching beauty and truth that it brings tears to your eyes .
translation: 这部戏剧以如此令人心痛的美和真实上演，令人泪目。
back_translation: This play is performed with such heart-wrenching beauty and authenticity that it brings tears to the eyes.

text: their marriage turns into a downward spiral where she works at a local strip club and starts having an affair with her husbands best friend , freddy .
translation: 他们的婚姻陷入了恶性循环，她在当地的脱衣舞俱乐部工作，并开始与丈夫的挚友弗雷迪发生婚外情。
back_translation: Their marriage fell into a vicious cycle; she worked at a local strip club and began an affair with her husband's close friend, Freddy.

text: there are many definitions of 'time waster ' but this movie must surely be one of them .
translation: 关于“浪费时间”的定义有很多，但这部电影肯定是其中之一。
back_translation: There are many definitions of "wasting time," but this movie is definitely one of them.

text: sensing that he has become but another mark for his mother to con , johnny flees with her money .
translation: 约翰尼感觉到自己成了母亲欺骗的又一个目标，于是带着她的钱逃跑了。
back_translation: Johnny felt that he had become another target of his mother's deception, so he ran away with her money.

text: in its combination of religion , love story and exotic locales , `` heaven `` is a bit reminiscent of james michener 's `` hawaii , `` although this is a somewhat simpler , more personal tale .
translation: 在宗教、爱情故事和异国情调地点的结合中，《天堂》有点让人想起詹姆斯·米切纳的《夏威夷》，尽管这是一个相对简单、更具个人色彩的故事。
back_translation: In the combination of religion, love stories, and exotic locations, "Paradise" somewhat reminds one of James Michener's "Hawaii," although it is a relatively simpler story with a more personal touch.

text: with exquisite craftsmanship . . . olivier assayas has fashioned an absorbing look at provincial bourgeois french society .
translation: 以精湛的工艺，奥利维耶·阿萨亚斯对省级资产阶级法国社会进行了引人入胜的展示。
back_translation: With exquisite craftsmanship, Olivier Assayas presents an intriguing portrayal of the provincial bourgeois French society.

text: there starts a dangerous game where the two teenagers that graham is protecting will be implied .
translation: 那是一场危险的游戏，格雷厄姆所保护的两个青少年将被暗示。
back_translation: It was a dangerous game, and the two teenagers protected by Graham would be hinted at.

text: a british officer sees the drummer chasing his canteen and mistakes him as a deserter running away through the woods .
translation: 一名英国军官看到鼓手追赶他的水壶，误以为他是一个在树林中逃跑的叛逃者。
back_translation: A British officer saw a drummer chasing after his water bottle and mistakenly thought he was a defector fleeing in the woods.

text: part contemporary investigation and part historical inquiry , documentary follows the quest of one journalist in search of justice .
translation: 这部纪录片既是当代调查，也是历史探究，讲述了一位记者寻找公正的旅程。
back_translation: This documentary is both a contemporary investigation and a historical inquiry, telling the story of a journalist's quest for justice.

text: desperate to help his son , scott heads back home , leaving a substitute claus to watch over things at the pole .
translation: 绝望地想帮助他的儿子，斯科特回家了，留下一个替代的克劳斯在极地看管事情。
back_translation: Desperately wanting to help his son, Scott returned home, leaving an alternate Klaus to oversee matters at the Pole.

text: the film tells the parallel , conflicting trajectory of five women : anita , isabel , adela , leire , and maricarmen .
translation: 这部电影讲述了五位女性的平行而冲突的轨迹：安妮塔、伊莎贝尔、阿德拉、莱莉和玛丽卡门。
back_translation: This movie tells the parallel yet conflicting stories of five women: Anita, Isabel, Adela, Riley, and Mari Carmen.

text: fragmented , elliptical and overplotted to the point of being hard to track . still , it 's worth hanging in for the finish . . . [ when ] soderbergh pulls off a delicious trick , a gesture of pure , tender , unabashed movie love that makes up for everything .
translation: 碎片化、椭圆形，重叠到难以追踪的地步。尽管如此，还是值得坚持到最后……[当时]索德伯格施展了一个美妙的把戏，一个纯粹、温柔且毫不掩饰的电影爱意的手势，弥补了一切。
back_translation: Fragmented, elliptical, overlapping to the point of being difficult to track. Nonetheless, it is worth persevering until the end... [At that time] Soderbergh performed a marvelous trick, a gesture of pure, gentle, and unadulterated love for cinema that made up for everything.

text: often shocking but ultimately worthwhile exploration of motherhood and desperate mothers .
translation: 常常令人震惊，但最终值得的对母亲和绝望母亲的探索。
back_translation: Often shocking, but ultimately worthwhile exploration of mothers and desperate mothers.

text: two brothers choose the opposite sides in a civil war of a small country .
translation: 两个兄弟在一个小国的内战中选择了对立的阵营。
back_translation: Two brothers chose opposing sides in a civil war in a small country.

text: no amount of good intentions is able to overcome the triviality of the story .
translation: 再好的意图也无法克服故事的琐碎。
back_translation: No matter how good the intentions, they cannot overcome the trivialities of the story.

text: kok pin , boon hock and terry are classmates in `` em3 `` stream .
translation: kok pin、boon hock和terry是“em3”班的同学。
back_translation: Kok Pin, Boon Hock, and Terry are classmates in the "em3" class.

text: unaware she is the object of his affection , frankie is in for a big surprise when she shows up after work with mervin ( keith david ) on her arm .
translation: 弗兰基并不知道自己是他的爱慕对象，当她在下班后和梅尔文（基思·大卫）走在一起时，她将面临一个大惊喜。
back_translation: Frankie doesn't know that she is the object of his affection, and when she walks with Melvin (Keith David) after work, she will face a big surprise.

text: lead by billy clemens , the gang includes maggie and virginia caulder , two beautiful sisters who have a penchant for disguise as well as gun handling .
translation: 由比利·克莱门斯领导，这个团伙包括玛吉和维吉尼亚·考尔德，两个美丽的姐妹，她们不仅擅长伪装，还擅长使用枪械。
back_translation: Led by Billy Clemens, this gang includes Maggie and Virginia Calder, two beautiful sisters who are not only skilled at disguise but also adept at using firearms.

text: alenka indulges in the belief that her lover is dead in order to account for his absence .
translation: 阿连卡沉迷于相信她的爱人已死，以此来解释他的缺席。
back_translation: Alyanka is obsessed with believing that her lover is dead, as an explanation for his absence.

text: complicating matters further is the fact that commitment-shy dex unexpectedly meets marcia , the girl of his dreams .
translation: 更复杂的是，犹豫不决的德克意外地遇到了梦想中的女孩玛西亚。
back_translation: More complicated is that the hesitant Dirk unexpectedly meets the girl of his dreams, Marcia.

text: so when a jamaican family move in next door and build a cricket net in the back garden , david is in seventh heaven .
translation: 当一个牙买加家庭搬到隔壁，并在后花园里搭建一个板球网时，大卫高兴得像在第七天堂。
back_translation: When a Jamaican family moved in next door and set up a cricket net in their backyard, David was as happy as if he were in seventh heaven.

text: he forgets most things after only a few minutes .
translation: 他在几分钟后就忘记了大多数事情。
back_translation: He forgot most things a few minutes later.
